The ice facade is लगभग 60 m high
Ice formations in the titlis हिमानी cave
A glacier cave is a गुफा formed भीतर the ice of a glacier.
Glacier caves are प्रायः पुकारा बर्फ गुफाएं, लकिन इस पद is properly प्रयुक्त to describe bedrock caves that contain year-round ice.
In भौतिकी, गोलाकार गति is a गति of an ऑब्जेक्ट along the circumference of a circle or rotation along a circular path.
It can be वर्दी, साथ निरंतर कोणीय रेट of रोटेशन ( और constant speed ), or non-uniform with a changing rate of rotation.
The rotation around a fixed axis of a three-dimensional देह involves गोलाकार motion of its parts.
The equations of गति describe the गति of the center of mass of a body.
Examples of circular गति शामिल : an कृत्रिम उपग्रह orbiting the धरती at निरंतर ऊँचाई, a स्टोन जिससे is tied to a रस्सी और is होने swung in वृत्त, a car turning through a curve in a race track, an electron moving perpendicular to a uniform magnetic field, and a gear turning inside a mechanism.
चूंकि the ऑब्जेक्ट 's गति वेक्टर is constantly बदलना दिशा, the चलती object is undergoing acceleration by a centripetal force in the direction of the center of rotation.
बगैर इस त्वरण, the ऑब्जेक्ट होता मूव in a सीधा line, according to Newton 's laws of motion.
Apollo Creed is a fictional character from the Rocky films, initially portrayed as the undisputed हेवीवेट चैंपियन of the World.
He was played by कार्ल weathers.
Creed had multiple nicknames, सहित the निपुण of विपत्ति, the किंग of स्टिंग, the नाचना विनाशक, The Prince of Punch, The One and Only and The Count of Monte Fisto.
Urban legend राज्य कि अपोलो पंथ 's नाम is a wordplay on the Apostles ' Creed, a statement of belief used in Christian churches.
All of Apollo 's चैंपियनशिप झगड़े यहूद अनुसूचित for the 15 round distance.
चैंपियनशिप झगड़े किया नहीं convert from 15 rounds to 12 rounds until 1987.
Rocky Balboa is often wrongly credited with popularizing the रेड, श्वेत, और ब्लू trunks ; पंथ थी the पहला man to पहनें उन्हें ( latterly worn by रॉकी बाल्बोआ in the 3rd and 4th installments and finally by Tommy `` The Machine '' Gunn ( Tommy Morrison ) in the 5th installment ) although normally he wore red and white, as seen in Rocky II.
Balboa 's signature colors यहूद ब्लैक और gold—colors he प्रयुक्त in the latest movie.
In the United States, the title of federal judge usually अर्थात् a न्यायधीश नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य और confirmed by the United States Senate pursuant to the Appointments Clause in Article II of the United States Constitution.
In addition to the Supreme Court of the United States, whose existence and some aspects of whose jurisdiction are beyond the constitutional power of Congress to alter, acts of कॉंग्रेस have स्थापित 13 न्यायालयों of appeals ( भी पुकारा `` सर्किट न्यायालयों '' ) with appellate jurisdiction over different regions of the United States, and 94 United States district courts.
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a federal judge ; such positions include the Chief Justice and Associate justices of the परम् अदालत, सर्किट न्यायाधीशों of the न्यायालयों of appeals, और ज़िला न्यायाधीशों of the संयुक्त States district courts.
All of these judges described thus far are referred to sometimes as `` Article III judges '' because they exercise the judicial power vested in the न्यायिक शाखा of the संघीय सरकारी by आलेख iii of the U.S. Constitution.
In addition, न्यायाधीशों of the अदालत of अंतरराष्ट्रीय Trade exercise judicial power pursuant to Article III.
Other न्यायाधीशों सेवारत in the संघीय न्यायालयों, सहित मजिस्ट्रेट न्यायाधीशों और bankruptcy judges, are also sometimes referred to as `` federal judges '' ; however, they are neither appointed by the President nor confirmed by the Senate, and their power derives from Article I instead.
See Article I and Article iii अधिकरणों.

Variable Universal Life बीमे ( प्रायः shortened to vul ) is a type of life insurance that builds a cash value.
In a VUL, the cash value can be invested in a चौड़ी किस्में of पृथक खाते, समान to परस्पर निधि, और the चुनाव of जिससे of the available separate accounts to use is entirely up to the contract owner.
The 'variable ' घटक in the नाम refers to इस क्षमता to invest in पृथक खाते जिनकी मान vary—they vary because they are invested in stock and/or bond markets.
The 'universal ' घटक in the name refers to the flexibility the owner has in making premium payments.
The प्रीमियम can vary इससे nothing in a दिए माह up to maximums defined by the Internal Revenue Code for life insurance.
This flexibility is in contrast to whole life insurance that has fixed premium payments that typically can not be missed without lapsing the policy ( although one may exercise an Automatic Premium Loan विशेषता, or आत्मसमर्पण dividends to pay a Whole Life premium ).
Variable universal life is a type of permanent जीवन बीमे, क्युकी the मौत लाभ होगा be सशुल्क if the insured मरता any time as long as there is sufficient cash value to pay the costs of insurance in the policy.
With most if not all VULs, unlike whole life, there is no endowment age ( the age at which the नकदी मान बराबरी the मौत लाभ राशि, जिससे लिये पूरे जीवन is typically 100 ).
This is yet another कुंजी लाभ of VUL over Whole Life.
With a ठेठ पूरे जीवन नीति, the मौत लाभ is सीमित to the फेस राशि निर्दिष्ट in the policy, and at endowment age, the face amount is all that is paid out.
Thus with either death or endowment, the बीमे कम्पनी keeps कोई नकदी मान निर्मित up over the years.
However, some participating पूरे जीवन नीतियों प्रस्ताव राइडर्स जिससे बताएँ कि कोई dividends सशुल्क on the policy be used to purchase `` paid up additions '' to the policy which increase both the cash value and the death benefit over time.
If investments made in the पृथक खाते out-perform the सामान्य खाता of the insurance company, a higher rate-of-return can occur than the fixed rates-of-return typical for whole life.
The combination over the years of no endowment age, continually increasing death benefit, and if a high rate-of-return is earned in the separate accounts of a VUL policy, this could result in उच्चतर मान to the मालिक or लाभार्थी than कि of a पूरे जीवन नीति साथ the वही amounts of money paid in as premiums.
The बाहरी लकडी बॉयलर is a रूपांतर of the क्लासिक लकडी स्टोव adapted for set-up outdoors while still transferring the heat to interior buildings.

Girl Scout Cookies are cookies sold by Girl Scouts of the USA ( GSUSA ) as one of its प्रमुख fundraisers लिये लोकल Scout units.
सदस्यों of the gsusa have महरूम selling cookies since 1917 to raise funds.
Girls जो participate can earn prizes for their efforts.
There are also unit incentives if the unit as a whole करता खूब.
As of 2007, sales were estimated at about 200 लाख बाक्स प्रति साल.
विश्वविद्यालयों Hall
Purdue University, located in West lafayette, इंडियाना, is the फ्लैगशिप विश्वविद्यालयों of the six-campus Purdue University system.
Purdue was founded on May 6, 1869, as a land-grant university when the Indiana General Assembly, taking advantage of the Morrill Act, accepted a donation of land and money from lafayette बिजनेसमैन जॉन purdue to स्थापित a college of science, technology, and agriculture in his name.
The पहला वर्ग यहूद आयोजित on सितंबर 16, 1874, with six instructors and 39 students.
Today, Purdue is a सदस्य of the बिग टेन सम्मेलन, और is a well known world-class research institution.
Purdue enrolls the second largest student body of any विश्वविद्यालयों in इंडियाना as खूब as the चौथी largest international student population of any university in the United States.
Purdue offers both undergraduate और ग्रैजुएट कार्यक्रम in over 211 प्रमुख क्षेत्रों of पढ़ाई, और is खूब known for its competitive engineering curricula.
The university has also been highly influential in America 's history of aviation, having established the first college क्रेडिट offered in उड़ान प्रशिक्षण, the पहला four-year स्नातक 's उपाधि in विमानन, और the पहला विश्वविद्यालयों airport ( Purdue University Airport ).
Purdue 's aviation प्रौद्योगिकी कार्यक्रम remains एक of the सबसे प्रतिस्पर्धी aviation-specific programs in the world.
In the mid-20th सदी, purdue 's विमानन program expanded to encompass advanced spaceflight technology giving rise to Purdue 's nickname, Cradle of Astronauts.
Twenty-three purdue graduates have गए on to become astronauts, सहित गस Grissom ( one of the original Mercury Seven astronauts ), Neil Armstrong ( the first person to walk on the moon ), and Eugene Cernan ( the most recent person to walk on the moon ).
A sebaceous cyst ( ) is a term that loosely refers to either epidermoid cysts ( भी ज्ञात as epidermal cysts ; L72.0 ) or pilar cysts ( also known as trichilemmal cysts ; L72.1 ).
Because an epidermoid cyst originates in the epidermis and a pilar cyst originates इससे बाल follicles, by परिभाषा, neither type of cyst is strictly a sebaceous cyst.
The name is regarded as a misnomer as the वसीय, श्वेत, semi-solid सामग्री in दोनो of these cyst entities is not sebum, but keratin.
Furthermore, under the microscope neither entity contains वसामय glands.
In अभ्यास, however, the शर्तें are often used interchangeably.
`` True '' sebaceous cysts are relatively rare और हैं ज्ञात as steatocystomas or, if अनेक, as steatocystoma multiplex.
आधुनिक pointe shoes.
The edge of the toe pad, जिससे is inserted between the पैर और toe box for cushioning, can be seen on the right foot.
A pointe जूता is a प्रकार of जूता worn by ballet dancers when performing pointe work.
Pointe shoes विकसित इससे the ख्वाहिश लिये नर्तक to appear weightless और sylph -like और have विकसित to enable नर्तक to dance en pointe ( on the tips of their toes ) for extended periods of time.
They are normally worn by female dancers, हालांकि पुरूष नर्तक may पहनें उन्हें लिये अपरंपरागत भूमिकाएँ ऐसे as the भद्दा stepsisters in सिंडरेला, नीचे in a midsummer Night 's Dream, or men performing as women in dance companies such as Les Ballets Trockadero and Grandiva.
They are manufactured in a किस्में of रंगों, most commonly in shades of light pink.
This tablespoon has a क्षमता of परिचय 15 mL.
measuring spoons
In the us और भाग of कनाडा, a tablespoon is the largest type of spoon used for eating from a bowl.
In the UK, Europe और सबसे राष्ट्रमंडल countries, a tablespoon is a type of large spoon usually used for serving.
In countries where a tablespoon is a serving spoon, the nearest equivalent to the US tablespoon is either the मिठाई चमचा or the soup spoon.
A tablespoonful, nominally the क्षमता of one tablespoon, is commonly used as a measure of volume in cooking.
It is abbreviated as T, tb, tbs, tbsp, tblsp, or tblspn.
The capacity of ordinary tablespoons is not regulated by law and is subject to considerable विभिन्नता.
In the USA one tablespoon ( मापन ईकाई ) is लगभग 15 mL ; the capacity of an actual tablespoon ( dining utensil ) ranges from 7 mL to 14 mL.
in ऑस्ट्रेलिया एक tablespoon ( measurement unit ) is 20 mL.
Harry Potter is a series of सात काल्पनिक novels written by the British author J. K. Rowling.
The books chronicle the adventures of a wizard, Harry Potter, and his friends Ronald वीज़्ली और हर्माइनी ग्रेंजर, सब of जिसको हैं विद्यार्थी at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
The main story arc concerns Harry 's quest to overcome the Dark wizard Lord Voldemort, whose aims are to become अमर, जीतें the wizarding संसार, subjugate non-magical लोगों, और destroy all those who stand in his way, especially Harry Potter.
Since the release of the first novel Harry Potter and the पारस 's स्टोन on 30 जून 1997, the किताबे have gained immense popularity, critical acclaim and commercial success worldwide.
The series has also had some share of आलोचना, सहित चिंता लिये the increasingly dark tone.
, the book series has sold about 450 million copies, making it the best-selling book श्रेणी in इतिहास, और रै महरूम translated into 67 languages.
The last four books consecutively set records as the fastest-selling किताबे in history.
A series of many genres, including fantasy and coming of age ( with elements of mystery, thriller, adventure, और रोमांस ), it रै अनेक cultural meanings and references.
According to Rowling, the main थीम is मौत.
There are also many other themes in the श्रेणी, ऐसे as पूर्वाग्रह और भ्रष्टाचार.
The initial major publishers of the books were bloomsbury in the संयुक्त किंगडम and Scholastic Press in the United States.
The books have चूंकि महरूम प्रकाशित by many publishers worldwide.
The books, with the seventh book split into दो भाग, have महरूम बना into an eight-part film series by Warner Bros. Pictures, the highest-grossing film series of all time.
The series also originated much tie-in merchandise, making the Harry कुम्हार ब्रांड लायक in excess of $ 15 अरब.
Also due to the success of the books and films, Harry Potter has been प्रयुक्त लिये a थीम पार्क, the wizarding संसार of हैरी कुम्हार in सार्वभौमिक Parks & Resorts 's Islands of Adventure.

viking 5C rocket engine
A rocket engine, or simply `` rocket '', is a jet engine that uses तभी भंडारित propellant द्रव्यमान लिये forming इसके ऊँची गति propulsive jet.
प्रक्षेपास्त्र इंजन हैं प्रतिक्रिया इंजन और obtain thrust in accordance with Newton 's third law.
Since they need no बाह्य सामग्री to रूप उनके जेट, प्रक्षेपास्त्र इंजन can be प्रयुक्त लिये spacecraft propulsion as well as terrestrial uses, such as missiles.
Most rocket engines are internal combustion इंजन, हालांकि non-combusting फ़ॉर्म भी मौजूद.
Rocket engines as a group have the highest exhaust गतियाँ, हैं by दूर the lightest, लकिन हैं the तनिक propellant efficient of all types of jet engines.
``... Baby One More समय '' is a सोंग by अमरीकी recording artist Britney Spears.
It served as Spears 's debut single and title track from her debut studio album,... baby एक अधिक समय ( 1999 ).
लिखा by अधिकतम मार्टिन और उत्पादित by मार्टिन और Rami, ``... Baby One More Time '' was released on September 30, 1998, by Jive Records.
After recording and sending a demo tape with an unused song इससे toni braxton, स्पीयर्स हस्ताक्षरित a multi-album deal with Jive.
``... Baby One More Time '' is a teen pop और dance-pop सोंग कि refers to a girl who regrets breaking up with her boyfriend.
The song received generally favorable reviews इससे आलोचकों, जो praised its composition.
``... Baby One More Time '' attained वैश्विक कामयाबी, reaching क्रमांक one in every country it charted.
It also प्राप्त numerous certifications around the संसार, and is one of the best-selling singles of all time, with over 10 million copies sold.
An accompanying music video, directed by Nigel Dick, portrays स्पीयर्स as a छात्र इससे a कैथोलिक ऊँची स्कूल, जो starts to daydream that she is singing and dancing around the school, while watching her love interest from afar.
The music video was later referenced in the music video of `` If U Seek Amy `` ( 2008 ), where स्पीयर्स 's fictional बेटी is वेश साथ a समान schoolgirl पहनावा जबकि wearing pink ribbons in her hair.
In 2010, the music video for ``... Baby One More Time '' थी voted the तीसरा सबसे influential video in the history of pop music, in a poll held by Jam !.
Spears has performed ``... Baby One अधिक समय '' in a क्रमांक of सजीव दिखावे और in all of her concert tours.
It was the encore of the... Baby One More Time दौरे ( 1999 ) और सपना भीतर a सपना दौरे ( 2001 ) ; स्पीयर्स भी performed remixed versions of the song during the Oops !...
I Did It Again World Tour ( 2000 ), the गोमेद होटल दौरे ( 2004 ), The M+M 's Tour ( 2007 ), The Circus Starring Britney Spears ( 2009 ), and the Femme Fatale Tour ( 2011 ).
``... Baby One More Time '' was nominated for a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन मादा पॉप गायन प्रदर्शन, और रै महरूम included in lists by Blender, Rolling Stone and VH1.
It has been noted for redefining the ध्वनि of late 1990s music.
Spears has named ``... Baby One More Time '' as one of उसके पसंदीदा गीतों इससे उसके करियर.
It was also the final सोंग to be निभाई on the बीबीसी 's म्यूज़िक कार्यक्रम Top of the Pops.
Cholera is an infection in the छोटी आंत caused by the bacterium Vibrio cholerae.
The main symptoms are watery अतिसार and vomiting.
Transmission occurs primarily by पीने जल or खाने खाना कि रै महरूम contaminated by the मल ( waste product ) of an infected person, including one with no apparent symptoms.
The severity of the diarrhea and vomiting can lead to rapid निर्जलीकरण और electrolyte असंतुलन, और मौत in some cases.
The primary treatment is oral rehydration therapy, typically with oral पुनर्जलीकरण समाधान, to बदलें water and electrolytes.
If this is not tolerated or करता नहीं provide सुधार fast enough, intravenous fluids can also be used.
Antibacterial drugs are beneficial in those साथ कठोर बीमारी to shorten its duration and severity.
Worldwide, it affects 3–5 लाख लोगों और कल्याणकारी 100,000–130,000 deaths a year.
Cholera was one of the earliest infections to be पढ़ाई by epidemiological methods.
The Picture of Dorian Gray is the only published novel by Oscar Wilde, appearing as the सीसे स्टोरी in lippincott 's मासिक पत्रिका on 20 जून 1890, printed as the July 1890 issue of this magazine.
The magazine 's editors feared the स्टोरी was indecent as submitted, so they censored roughly 500 words, without Wilde 's knowledge, before publication.
But even with that, the story was still greeted with outrage by अंग्रेजों reviewers, कुछ of जिसको सुझाया कि वाइल्ड चाहिए be prosecuted on moral grounds, leading Wilde to defend the novel aggressively in letters to the British press.
Wilde later revised the story for book publication, making substantial alterations, deleting controversial passages, adding new chapters and including an aphoristic preface जिससे रै चूंकि become famous in its own right.
The amended संस्करण थी प्रकाशित by Ward, Lock and Company in April 1891.
Some scholars believe that Wilde would आज have चाही us to पढ़ा the संस्करण he originally सुपुर्द to Lippincott 's.
The novel tells of a young man named Dorian धूसर, the विषय of a painting by artist Basil Hallward.
Basil is impressed by Dorian 's beauty and becomes infatuated with him, believing उसके सौंदर्य is जिम्मेदार लिये a नई विधि in उसके art.
Dorian meets Lord Henry Wotton, a friend of बेसिल 's, और becomes enthralled by रब Henry 's world view.
Espousing a नई hedonism, रब हेनरी suggests the तभी बाते worth pursuing in life are beauty and fulfilment of the senses.
Realizing that one day his beauty will fade, Dorian ( whimsically ) expresses a ख्वाहिश to बेचें उसके आत्मा to ensure the पोर्ट्रेट बेसिल रै चित्रित होता age rather than he.
Dorian 's wish is fulfilled, and when he subsequently pursues a जीवन of विलासिता, the पोर्ट्रेट serves as a स्मरण of the effect each act has upon his soul, with each sin displayed as a disfigurement of his form, or through a sign of aging.
the चित्र of डोरियन धूसर is considered a work of classic Gothic fiction with a strong Faustian theme.
Sári Gábor ( born 6 February 1917 ), known as Zsa Zsa Gabor ( ), is a Hungarian -born अमरीकी अभिनेत्री जो acted in supporting भूमिकाएँ in फिल्मों, on ब्रॉडवे, और occasionally on television.
गैबर थी भी a socialite.
She began उसके स्टेज करियर in वियना at age 15, and was crowned Miss Hungary in 1936.
She emigrated to the संयुक्त राज्य in 1941 और became a sought-after actress with `` European flair and style '', with a personality that `` exuded charm and grace ''.
Her first movie role थी as supporting actress in Lovely to Look At.
She बाद acted in We 're Not Married !
and played one of her few leading roles in Moulin Rouge ( 1952 ), directed by John हस्टन, जो वर्णित उसके as a `` creditable '' actress.
Besides her फिल्मी और टेलीविज़न दिखावे, वो is बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये having नौ पतियों, सहित hotel magnate Conrad Hilton and actor George Sanders.
She once stated, `` मेन have सदा liked me और I have always liked men.
But I like a mannish man, a man जो knows कैसा to बात to और दावत a woman – not just a man with muscles. ''
Bruce Lee ( traditional : 李小龍 ; born Lee Jun-fan ; 27 नवम्बर 1940 – 20 July 1973 ) was a Chinese American martial artist, actor, martial arts instructor, philosopher, and filmmaker.
The founder of जीत kune do, ली थी the बेटे of cantonese opera star Lee Hoi-Chuen.
He is widely considered by commentators, critics, media and other martial artists to be one of the सबसे influential martial कलाकारों of सब समय, और a pop culture icon of the 20th century.
He is often credited with helping to change the way Asians यहूद प्रस्तुत in अमरीकी films.
Lee was born in Chinatown, सैन फ्रांसिस्को on 27 नवम्बर 1940 to अभिभावक इससे हांग काँग and was raised in Kowloon with his family until his late teens.
He was introduced to the फिल्मी उद्योग by उसके father and appeared in several films as a child actor.
Lee moved to the United States at the age of 18 to receive his higher education, and it was during this time that he began शिक्षण martial कला.
His Hong Kong and Hollywood -produced films elevated the परंपरागत हांग काँग martial कला फिल्मी to a नई स्तर of लोकप्रियता and acclaim, sparking a surge of interest in Chinese martial arts in the West in the 1970s.
The direction and tone of his films changed and influenced martial arts and martial कला films in हांग काँग और the बाकी of the world.
He is noted for his roles in five feature-length films : Lo Wei 's The Big Boss ( 1971 ) and Fist of Fury ( 1972 ) ; Way of the Dragon ( 1972 ), directed and written by Lee ; Warner Brothers ' Enter the Dragon ( 1973 ) और the खेल of मौत ( 1978 ), दोनो निर्देशित by रॉबर्ट Clouse.
Lee became an iconic figure known throughout the world, particularly among the चाइनीज, as he portrayed चाइनीज राष्ट्रवाद in उसके films.
He initially trained in Wing Chun, but later अस्वीकृत well-defined martial आर्ट शैलियाँ, favouring बजाय the उपयोग of तकनीकों इससे विभिन्न स्त्रोत, in the स्पिरिट of उसके personal martial arts philosophy, which he dubbed Jeet Kune Do ( The Way of the Intercepting Fist ).
Lee held dual citizenship of Hong काँग और the संयुक्त States.
He died in Kowloon Tong on 20 जुलाई 1973 at आयु 32.
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ), also known as chronic obstructive फेफड़ों बीमारी ( ठंडा ), दीर्घकालिक obstructive airway बीमारी ( coad ), दीर्घकालिक airflow limitation ( कैलोरी ) और दीर्घकालिक obstructive respiratory बीमारी ( cord ), is the occurrence of दीर्घकालिक ब्रोंकाइटिस or emphysema, a pair of commonly co-existing diseases of the lungs in which the airways narrow over time.
This हद airflow to और इससे the फेफड़े, causing shortness of breath ( dyspnea ).
In clinical practice, copd is पारिभाषित by इसके characteristically low airflow on lung function tests.
In कंट्रास्ट to दमा, इस limitation is poorly reversible and usually gets progressively worse over time.
COPD is caused by noxious अणु or गैस, सबसे commonly इससे tobacco smoking, which triggers an abnormal inflammatory response in the lung.
The diagnosis of COPD requires फेफड़ों function tests.
Important प्रबन्धन रणनीति हैं धूम्रपान cessation, vaccinations, rehabilitation, and drug therapy ( often using inhalers ).
Some patients go on to आवश्यकता long-term oxygen therapy or lung transplantation.
Worldwide, COPD ranked as the छठे अग्रणी कारण of मौत in 1990.
It is projected to become the चौथी अग्रणी कारण of मौत विश्वव्यापी by 2030, due to an increase in smoking rates and demographic changes in many countries.
COPD is the third leading कारण of मौत in the u.S., और the आर्थिक बोझ of copd in the U.S. in 2007 was $ 42.6 billion in health care costs and lost productivity.
Annelies `` Anne '' Marie Frank (, ?, ; 12 June 1929early March 1945 ) is one of the सबसे discussed यहूदी पीड़ितों of the holocaust.
Her diary has been the आधार लिये several plays and films.
Born in the city of Frankfurt am Main in Weimar जर्मनी, वो जिया सबसे of उसके जीवन in or near Amsterdam, in the Netherlands.
Born a जर्मनी नेशनल, फ़्रैंक lost her citizenship in 1941.
She gained international fame मरणोपरांत बाद उसके डायरी थी published.
It documents her अनुभवों छुपाना दौरान the जर्मनी occupation of the Netherlands in World War II.
The फ़्रैंक परिवार स्थानांतरित इससे Germany to Amsterdam in 1933, the year the Nazis gained control over Germany.
By the beginning of 1940, they यहूद फंस in एम्सटर्डम by the नाजी occupation of the Netherlands.
As persecutions of the Jewish population increased in July 1942, the परिवार गई into छुपाना in the hidden rooms of Anne 's father, Otto Frank 's, office building.
After two years, the समूह थी गद्दारी और transported to concentration camps.
Anne Frank and her sister, Margot, were eventually transferred to the bergen-belsen concentration camp, where they died of typhus in March 1945.
Otto Frank, the only उत्तरजीवी of the परिवार, लौटे to एम्सटर्डम after the war to find that Anne 's diary had been saved, and his efforts led to its publication in 1947.
It was अनूदित इससे इसके असली डच और पहला प्रकाशित in अंग्रेज़ी in 1952 as The Diary of a Young Girl.
It has since been अनूदित into many languages.
The diary, which was दिए to ऐनी on उसके 13th जन्मदिवस, क्रॉनिकल्स उसके जीवन इससे 12 जून 1942 जबतक 1 August 1944.
Kurt 's हस्ताक्षर
Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20, 1967 – April 5, 1994 ) was an American musician and artist, best ज्ञात as the सीसे सिंगर, guitarist और प्राथमिक songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana.
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist novoselic in एबरडीन, वॉशिंगटन in 1985 और स्थापित it as भाग of the सिएटल म्यूज़िक झाँकी, having its debut album Bleach released on the independent record label Sub Pop in 1989.
After signing with major label DGC Records, the band found breakthrough success with `` Smells Like Teen Spirit `` from इसके दूसरी एल्बम nevermind ( 1991 ).
Following the success of Nevermind, Nirvana थी labeled `` the फ्लैगशिप बैंड '' of पीढी x, और कोबेन hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation ''.
Cobain, however, was often uncomfortable and frustrated, believing उसके संदेश और कलाकारी दृष्टि to have महरूम misinterpreted by the पब्लिक, साथ उसके निजी issues often subject to media attention.
He challenged Nirvana 's दर्शक साथ इसके फाइनल स्टुडियो एल्बम In Utero ( 1993 ).
During the last years of his life, Cobain struggled साथ हेरोइन व्यसन, बीमारी and depression.
He also had difficulty coping with his fame and public चित्र, और the पेशेवर और lifelong निजी pressures surrounding himself and his wife, musician Courtney Love.
on अप्रैल 8, 1994, कोबेन थी मिला मुर्दे at उसके home in Seattle, the victim of what was officially ruled a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head.
the हालातों of उसके मौत at age 27 have become a topic of public fascination and debate.
Since their debut, Nirvana, with कोबेन as a songwriter, रै बेची over 25 million albums in the U.S., and over 50 million worldwide.

Radial engine of a बाईप्लेन

The radial engine is a प्रत्यागमनी प्रकार आतंरिक दहन इंजन विन्यास in जिससे the सिलेंडर point outward from a central crankshaft like the spokes of a wheel.
It resembles a stylized star when viewed from the front, and is called a `` स्टार इंजन '' ( जर्मनी sternmotor ) in कुछ languages.
The radial configuration was very commonly used in aircraft engines पहले टर्बाइन इंजन became predominant.
The Golden Girls is an अमरीकी sitcom, निर्मित by सुसान हैरिस, कि originally aired on NBC from September 13, 1985, to May 9, 1992.
Starring Bea आर्थर, बेट्टी श्वेत, rue mcclanahan and Estelle Getty, the show centers on four older women sharing a home in Miami, Florida.
It was produced by Witt/Thomas/Harris प्रोडक्शन्स, in संघ साथ touchstone टेलीविज़न, और पॉल Junger Witt, Tony Thomas, and Harris served as the original executive producers.
The Golden Girls received critical acclaim throughout सबसे of इसके चलाएं और जीती अनेक awards, including the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Comedy Series twice.
It also won three Golden Globe Awards for Best टेलीविज़न श्रेणी – Musical or Comedy.
All four सितारों प्रत्येक प्राप्त an Emmy Award throughout the series ' run and had multiple nominations.
The series also ranked among the top ten highest-rated programs for छह आउट of इसके सात सीज़न.
Deepwater खुदाई is the प्रक्रम of आयल और गैस खोजी और production in depths of more than 500 feet.
By this definition, there are approximately 600 deepwater कुएं in the गल्फ of मैक्सिको.
It has been economically infeasible for many years, but with rising oil कीमतें, अधिक कंपनियाँ हैं निवेश in इस area.
Major companies working in this सेक्टर शामिल डायमंड offshore, TransOcean, and Baker Hughes.
There are basically two kinds of mobile deepwater खुदाई rigs : semi-submersible खुदाई rigs and drillships.
Drilling can also be performed from a fixed-position installation such as a floating spar ( मंच ) or tension-leg मंच.
Recent industry analysis has अनुमानित कि the कुल व्यय in the global deepwater infrastructure market will reach $ 145bn in 2011.
“Not all oil is accessible on जमीन or in उथले जल.
You can find some oil जमा दफ्न गहन अंतर्गत the समंदर floor.”... using sonic equipment, oil companies determine the drilling sites most likely to produce oil.
Then they उपयोग a मोबाईल offshore drilling unit ( MODU ) to dig the initial well.
Some units are converted into उत्पादन rigs, अर्थ वे स्विच इससे खुदाई for oil to capturing oil once it 's found.
Most of the time, the oil कम्पनी होगा बदलें the मोदू साथ a अधिक स्थाई आयल उत्पादन rig to capture oil.”... The MODU 's job is to drill down into the ocean 's floor to find oil deposits.
The part of the drill that extends नीचे the डेक और through the जल is called the riser.
The riser allows for drilling fluids to मूव between the मंजिल और the रिग.
Engineers निम्नतर a ड्रिल स्ट्रिंग -- a श्रेणी of पाइप designed to ड्रिल down to the oil deposit -- through the riser.”
“The expansion of deepwater drilling is happening despite दुर्घटनाओं in offshore फ़ील्ड... ”
In 2010 a large explosion occurred killing 11 workers and spilling लाखो of गैलन of आयल into the गल्फ of Mexico while a BP oil rig was drilling in deep waters.
“... Despite the risks, the deepwater खुदाई ट्रेंड is spreading in the Mediterranean and off the coast of East Africa after a string of huge discoveries of natural gas.”
“The reason for the resumption of such drilling, analyst say, is continuing ऊँची माँग लिये energy worldwide.”
America needs the oil so it is लगभग जरुरी to फेस the ऊँची risks कि आइये साथ deepwater drilling in order for Americans to continue to carry on their everyday lives.
“The उर्जा विभाग recently projected that gulf oil production would expand from its 2011 level of 1.3 million barrels a day, still nearly a quarter of total domestic production, to 2 million barrels a day by 2020.”
Deepwater drilling affects the पर्यावरण in दोनो ऋणात्मक and positive ways.
Although Deepwater खुदाई rarely कल्याणकारी आयल spills it is स्टिल a hazardous possible outcome.
Oil spills result in आयल डूब to the नीचे of the समंदर smothering plant life leaving fish without food and shelter to survive.
On the other hand deepwater खुदाई प्रभाव the पर्यावरण in a positive ways too.
In time once the deepwater oil खूब is नहीं in उपयोग anymore पौधे होगा grow on and around the well making a cave or cavern like shelter ideal for animals to thrive in.
Deepwater drilling also lets us देखिए the गहराइयों of the ocean floor that are hardly ever seen.
”Cameras on rovers at the bottom of the wells रिकार्ड फुटेज और लो फ़ोटो of विरल मछली कि हैं in there natural habitat, giving scientist a look at animals they rarely seen” ( Chevron Corporation ). ''
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23, 1973 ) is an अमरीकी स्त्री साथ जिसको संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्ष Bill Clinton admitted to having had an `` improper relationship '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996.
The affair and its परखना ( जिससे शामिल क्लिंटन 's impeachment ) became known as the Lewinsky scandal.
फ्रांसिस अल्बर्ट `` फ़्रैंक '' सिनात्रा,, ( दिसम्बर 12, 1915 – May 14, 1998 ) was an American singer and film actor.
Beginning his musical career in the swing era with Harry James and Tommy Dorsey, Sinatra found unprecedented success as a solo कलाकार इससे the जल्दी to mid-1940s बाद होने signed to Columbia Records in 1943.
Being the आइडल of the `` bobby soxers ``, he released his first album, The Voice of Frank Sinatra in 1946.
His professional career had stalled by the 1950s, but it was reborn in 1953 after he won the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting कर्ता for his performance in From Here to Eternity.
He signed with Capitol Records in 1953 and released several critically lauded albums ( such as In the Wee Small Hours, गीतों लिये swingin ' प्रेमियों !, आइये मक्खी साथ me, तभी the निर्जन and Nice 'n ' Easy ).
Sinatra left Capitol to found his own record label, Reprise Records in 1961 ( finding success with albums such as Ring-a-Ding-Ding !, Sinatra at the Sands and Francis Albert Sinatra & Antonio कार्लोस jobim ), toured internationally, थी a founding सदस्य of the चूहा पैक और fraternized with celebrities and statesmen, including John F. Kennedy.
Sinatra turned 50 in 1965, recorded the retrospective सितंबर of my सालो, स्ट्रक्चर in the एमी -winning टेलीविज़न खास फ़्रैंक Sinatra : A Man and His Music, and scored hits with `` Strangers in the Night `` and `` My Way ``.
With sales of his music dwindling और बाद appearing in अनेक poorly प्राप्त films, Sinatra retired for the first time in 1971.
Two years later, however, he came आउट of रिटायरमेंट और in 1973 अंकित several albums, scoring a Top 40 hit with `` ( Theme From ) New York, New York `` in 1980.
Using his Las Vegas shows as a घर आधार, he toured दोनो भीतर the संयुक्त राज्य और internationally, जबतक a short time before his death in 1998.
Sinatra also forged a highly कामयाब करियर as a film actor.
After winning Best Supporting Actor in 1953, he also garnered a नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता लिये the man साथ the सुनहरी भुजा, और critical acclaim for his performance in The Manchurian Candidate.
He also स्ट्रक्चर in ऐसे musicals as ऊँची समाज, Pal Joey, Guys and Dolls and On the Town.
Sinatra was honored at the Kennedy Center Honors in 1983 और थी awarded the अध्यक्षीय पदक of स्वतंत्रता by रोनाल्ड reagan in 1985 and the Congressional Gold Medal in 1997.
He was the recipient of eleven Grammy Awards, including the Grammy Trustees Award, Grammy Legend Award and the Grammy आजीवन उपलब्धि पुरस्कार.
Sinatra is also one of world’s best-selling artists of all time, having sold more than 150 लाख नक़ल विश्वव्यापी.
ठेठ cornhole board
Cornhole, also known as bean bag toss, corn toss, baggo or bags, is a lawn game in जिससे खिलाड़ी लो turns फेंकना मकई छेद बैग at a उठाया platform with a hole in the far end.
A bag in the hole scores 3 points, while one on the मंच स्कोर 1 पाइंट.
Play continues जबतक a टोली or खिलाड़ी reaches the score of 21.
The American Gold Eagle is an आधिकारिक सुनहरा bullion सिक्का of the United States.
Authorized under the Gold Bullion Coin Act of 1985, it was पहला released by the संयुक्त States Mint in 1986.
Bikram Yoga is a system of योग कि बिक्रम choudhury synthesized इससे परंपरागत hatha योग techniques and popularized beginning in the early 1970s.
All Bikram Yoga वर्ग चलाएं लिये 90 मिनट्स और consist of the same series of 26 postures and 2 breathing exercises.
Bikram Yoga is ideally practiced in a room heated to 105°F ( ≈ 40.6°C ) with a humidity of 40 %,.
Christopher Michael Massey ( born 26 January 1990 ) is an अमरीकी कर्ता, हास्य और rapper बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये अभिनीत as Michael Barret in Nickelodeon television series Zoey 101.
Massey has received many awards and nomination including a Young Artist Award and Emmy पुरस्कार nominations.

A conventional teaspoon made of बेदाग स्टील.
A teaspoon is an item of cutlery and/or a measuring यंत्र, as खूब as a ईकाई of मापन of volume in some countries and customs.
a फर्न is कोई एक or अधिक of a समूह of about 12,000 species of plants belonging to the botanical group known as Pteridophyta.
Unlike mosses, they have जाइलम और फ्लोएम ( making them vascular plants ).
They have तना, पत्ते, और roots like other vascular plants.
ferns reproduce via बीजाणुओं और have neither seeds nor flowers.
By far the largest group of ferns is the leptosporangiate ferns, but ferns as defined here ( भी पुकारा monilophytes ) शामिल horsetails, whisk ferns, marattioid ferns, and ophioglossoid ferns.
The term pteridophyte also refers to ferns और a few अन्य बीजरहित vascular plants ( see classification section below ).
Ferns first appear in the चट्टान रिकार्ड 360 लाख सालो पहले in the carboniferous लकिन अनेक of the वर्तमान परिवारों और प्रजाति किया नहीं appear जबतक roughly 145 million years ago in the early Cretaceous ( after flowering plants came to dominate many environments ).
Ferns are not of major economic importance, but some are grown or gathered for food, as शोभायमान पौधे, लिये remediating contaminated soils, और have महरूम the subject of research for their ability to remove some chemical pollutants from the air.
Some are significant weeds.
वे भी खेल a role in mythology, medicine, and art.
Flat roofs in Israel
चपटा छत in Los Angeles
A flat roof is a type of covering लिये a भवन.
In contrast to the more sloped रूप of छत, a चपटा छत is horizontal or nearly horizontal.
The slope of a roof is properly known as its pitch : Roofs which are nearly flat are known as low-pitch roofs ( as the angle of ढलान increases, so the पिच is कहा to बढ़ाएँ ).
Any sheet of material used to कवर a चपटा or low-pitched छत is प्रायः ज्ञात as a झिल्ली and the primary purpose of these membranes is to waterproof the roof area.
Materials that cover चपटा roofs typically allow the water to run off from a slight inclination or camber into a gutter system.
Water from some flat roofs such as on garden sheds sometimes flows freely बंद the किनारे of a छत, हालांकि gutter प्रणालियों हैं of लाभ in keeping दोनो दीवारें and foundations dry.
Gutters on smaller roofs often lead water directly onto the मैदान, or बेहतर, into a specially made soakaway.
Gutters on larger roofs usually lead water into the rainwater drainage system of any built up area.
Occasionally flat roofs though are designed to collect water in a pool, usually for aesthetic उद्देश्य, or लिये rainwater buffering.
Flat roofs exist all over the world और प्रत्येक क्षेत्रफल रै इसके अपना परंपरा or preference for materials used.
In warmer climes where rainfall is less and जमने is असंभावित to occur, अनेक चपटा roofs हैं बस निर्मित of चिनाई or कंक्रीट और this is good at keeping out the heat of the sun and cheap and easy to build where timber is not readily available.
In areas where the roof could become saturated by rain and leak, or where water soaked into the brickwork could फ्रीज to बर्फ और यूँ सीसे to 'blowing ' ( तोड़कर up of the mortar/brickwork/concrete by the expansion of ice as it forms ) these roofs are not suitable.
Traditionally most flat roofs in the पश्चिमी संसार मेक उपयोग of तारकोल or अधिक प्रायः तारकोल paper applied over roof decking to keep a building watertight.
The tar or tarpaper is in turn covered in gravel to keep the sun 's heat, UV rays and weather off it and helps protect it इससे cracking or blistering और degradation.
Roof decking is usually of plywood, chipboard or OSB boards ( OSB = Oriented strand फलक, भी ज्ञात as स्टर्लिंग board ) of around 18mm thickness.
The tar coating is applied in one or more coats as a hot liquid, heated in a तारकोल केतली, or as चादरें of तारकोल impregnated 'paper ' चिपके bas और sealed साथ at joints by hot tar - once it has cooled, the gravel is spread evenly over it.
A main reason for failure of these traditional roofs is ignorance or lack of maintenance where people or events कारण the बजरी to be स्थानांतरित or removed इससे the तारकोल or tarpaper waterproofing, यूँ exposing it to मौसम और सूर्य whereupon cracking और blistering occurs over समय और आखिरकार water gets in.
Tarpaper is usually a 'paper ' or fibre सामग्री soaked or impregnated in tar.
As gravel can not protect tarpaper सतहों जहाँ वे वृद्धि खड़ा इससे the छत ऐसे as on मुंडेर दीवारें or upstands, tarpaper विसंगतियाँ हैं उत्पादित with fine gravel applied to the hot tar during the process of manufacture such that a permanent layer of gravel is stuck to it in order to give it ongoing protection.
Tarpapers vary in quality as does the workmanship और प्रशिक्षण of those applying it to produce more or less successful results.
In some micro climates or shaded areas these rather 'basic ' tarpaper roofs can last well in relation to the cost of materials purchase and cost of laying them, however the cost of आधुनिक झिल्लियों ऐसे as epdm रै आइये bas over हाल सालो to मेक उन्हें अधिक और अधिक सस्ती.
There are now more firms supplying modern alternatives and there is generally a growing जागरूकता of उनके प्रदर्शन और availability.
If a leak does occur on a flat roof then क्षति प्रायः goes unnoticed लिये long अवधि of समय दौरान जिससे जल penetrates और soaks the decking and any insulation and/or structure beneath it.
This can lead to expensive क्षति इससे the दुर्गन्ध जिससे प्रायः develops and if left can weaken the roof structure.
There हैं भी विभिन्न स्वास्थ्य risks to लोगों और पशु श्वास the mould spores : the severity of this health risk remains a debated point.
एक प्रॉब्लम साथ maintaining चपटा roofs is कि if water does penetrate the barrier covering ( be it traditional or a modern membrane ) it can travel a long way before causing visible damage or leaking into a building where it can be seen.
Thus it is not आसान to देखिए जहाँ it is leaking in order to repair it.
Once underlying roof decking is soaked it often sags causing a further संग्रहण or puddling of water in that area and the problem worsens.
A CD-ROM ( ) is a pre-pressed कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क which contains data.
The name is an acronym जिससे स्टैंड लिये `` कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क read-only मेमोरी ``.
Computers can read CD-ROMs, but can नहीं लिखें on उन्हें.
CD-ROMs are popularly used to distribute computer software, including video games and multimedia applications, though any data can be भंडारित ( up to the क्षमता सीमा of a disc ).
Some CDs, called enhanced CDs, hold both computer data और ऑडियो साथ the latter capable of being played on a CD player, while data ( such as software or digital video ) is only usable on a computer ( such as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ).
The Yellow Book is the technical standard that defines the स्वरूप of cd-roms.
One of a set of color-bound books that contain the तकनीकी विशेषताएँ लिये सब cd स्वरुप, the पीला किताब, created by Sony and Philips, was the first extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio.
It adapted the स्वरूप to hold any form of data.
Joanne `` Jo '' Rowling ( ), ( born 31 जुलाई 1965 ), कलम नाम J. K. रोलिंग, is a British novelist, best known as the author of the Harry Potter fantasy series.
The Potter किताबे have gained विश्वव्यापी ध्यान, जीती multiple awards, and sold more than 400 million copies.
They have become the best-selling किताब श्रेणी in इतिहास, और been the basis for a series of films which has become the highest-grossing film series in history.
Rowling had overall approval on the scripts as well as maintaining रचनात्मक कंट्रोल by सेवारत as a निर्माता on the फाइनल instalment.
Born in Yate, Gloucestershire, Rowling was working as a researcher and bilingual secretary for माफ़ी अंतरराष्ट्रीय जब वो conceived the विचार for the Harry Potter series on a delayed train from Manchester to London in 1990.
The seven-year period that followed entailed the death of her mother, divorce from her पहला husband और गरीबी जबतक रोलिंग समाप्त the पहला अनोखा in the श्रेणी, हैरी Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone ( 1997 ).
Rowling subsequently published 6 sequels—the last, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows ( 2007 ) —as खूब as 3 पूरक to the श्रेणी.
In 2012, Rowling parted with her agency and resumed writing in the form of a tragicomedy अनोखा aimed at वयस्क readership, entitled The Casual Vacancy.
Rowling has कहा वो is फिलहाल working on दो books—one aimed लिये वयस्कों, the other for children younger than the Harry Potter audience, and she expects the latter to be published first.
Rowling has led a `` rags to अमीरी `` जीवन स्टोरी, in जिससे वो progressed इससे जीना on राज्य लाभ to multi-millionaire status within five years.
She is the United Kingdom 's best-selling लेखक चूंकि records began, with sales in excess of £238m.
The 2008 Sunday Times Rich List estimated Rowling 's fortune at £560 million ( $ 798 million ), रैंकिंग उसके as the बारहवीं richest स्त्री in the संयुक्त Kingdom.
Forbes ranked Rowling as the forty-eighth most powerful celebrity of 2007, and TIME magazine named her as a runner-up for its 2007 व्यक्ति of the साल, noting the सोशल, moral, और राजनैतिक प्रेरणा वो रै दिए her fans.
In October 2010, Rowling was named the `` सबसे influential स्त्री in ब्रिटेन '' by अग्रणी magazine editors.
She has become a notable philanthropist, supporting such charities as कॉमिक राहत, एक जनक परिवारों, अनेक काठिन्य समाज of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और lumos ( formerly the Children 's High Level Group ).
auburndale is a नगर in polk County, Florida, United States.
The population थी 11,032 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.
According to the u.s जनसांख्यिकी estimates of 2005, the नगर had a population of 12,381.
It is part of the lakeland – शीत हेवन Metropolitan Statistical Area.
Hurricane Isabel ( 2003 ) as देखी इससे कक्षा दौरान expedition 7 of the International Space Station.
The eye, eyewall, और surrounding rainbands, विशेषताएँ of tropical cyclones, are clearly visible in this view from space.
A tropical cyclone is a storm प्रणाली characterized by a low-pressure बीच घिरी by a सर्पिल arrangement of thunderstorms that produce strong winds and heavy rain.
तीव्र cyclones strengthen जब जल काफूर इससे the समंदर is released as the saturated air rises, resulting in condensation of water vapor contained in the moist air.
They are fueled by a different ऊष्मा यांत्रिकी than अन्य cyclonic windstorms ऐसे as nor'easters, European windstorms, and polar lows.
The characteristic that separates तीव्र cyclones इससे अन्य cyclonic प्रणालियों is कि at कोई ऊँचाई in the माहौल, the center of a tropical cyclone will be warmer than its surroundings ; a phenomenon called `` warm core `` storm systems.
The term `` tropical '' refers both to the भौगोलिक उत्पत्ति of ये प्रणालियों, जिससे प्रायः रूप in तीव्र regions of the globe, and to their formation in maritime tropical air masses.
The term `` cyclone '' refers to such तूफ़ान ' cyclonic प्रकृति, साथ counterclockwise हवा प्रवाह in the उत्तरी Hemisphere and clockwise wind flow in the Southern Hemisphere.
The opposite दिशा of the हवा प्रवाह is a परिणाम of the Coriolis force.
Depending on its location and strength, a tropical cyclone is referred to by names such as hurricane (, ), typhoon ( ), tropical storm, cyclonic storm, tropical अवसाद, और बस चक्रवात.
While tropical cyclones can उपज अत्यधिक शक्तिशाली winds and torrential rain, they are also able to produce high waves, damaging storm surge, and tornadoes.
They develop over large bodies of warm water, and lose their strength if they move over land due to increased सतह घर्षण और घाटा of the warm ocean as an energy source.
This is क्यों तटीय regions can प्राप्त significant क्षति from a tropical cyclone, while inland regions are relatively safe from receiving strong winds.
Heavy rains, however, can उपज significant बाढ़ अंतर्देशीय, और storm surges can produce extensive coastal flooding up to from the coastline.
Although their effects on इंसान populations can be विनाशकारी, तीव्र cyclones can relieve drought conditions.
They also carry heat energy away from the ऊष्णकटिबन्ध और हस्तांतरण it toward शीतोष्ण latitudes, which makes them an important part of the global atmospheric circulation mechanism.
As a परिणाम, तीव्र cyclones सहायता to maintain संतुलन in the Earth 's troposphere, and to maintain a relatively stable and warm temperature worldwide.
Many tropical cyclones develop when the वायुमंडलीय शर्तें around a कमजोर disturbance in the atmosphere are favorable.
The background environment is modulated by climatological चक्र और पैटर्न ऐसे as the madden-julian दोलन, El Niño-Southern Oscillation, and the Atlantic multidecadal oscillation.
Others form when other types of cyclones acquire तीव्र विशेषताएँ.
Tropical systems are then moved by steering winds in the troposphere ; if the conditions remain favorable, the tropical disturbance intensifies, और can भी develop an eye.
On the other end of the spectrum, if the conditions around the system deteriorate or the tropical चक्रवात makes landfall, the प्रणाली weakens और आखिरकार dissipates.
It is not possible to artificially induce the dissipation of ये प्रणालियों साथ वर्तमान प्रौद्योगिकी.
Kirk Douglas ( born Issur Danielovitch, ; December 9, 1916 ) is an American stage and film कर्ता, फिल्मी निर्माता और लेखक.
His popular films include Out of the Past ( 1947 ), Champion ( 1949 ), Ace in the Hole ( 1951 ), The Bad and the Beautiful ( 1952 ), 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea ( 1954 ), Lust for Life ( 1956 ), Paths of Glory ( 1957 ), Gunfight at the O.K. Corral ( 1957 ), The Vikings ( 1958 ), Spartacus ( 1960 ), Lonely हैं the वीर ( 1962 ), सात दिनों in may ( 1964 ), the नायक of telemark ( 1965 ) और मुश्किल यारों ( 1986 ).
He is No.17 on the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान 's सूची of the महानतम male American screen legends of all time, making him the highest-ranked living person on the list.
In 1996, he received the Academy Honorary Award `` for 50 years as a creative and moral फ़ोर्स in the गति चित्र जातियाँ. ''
he is एक of the पिछला surviving actors from Hollywood 's `` golden age ''.
Robert क्लार्क `` bob '' seger ( born may 6, 1945 ) is an American rock and roll singer-songwriter, guitarist and pianist.
As a locally successful Detroit-area artist, he performed और अंकित as bob seger और the पिछला सुना और bob seger System throughout the 1960s.
By the early 1970s, he had dropped the `` System '' from his recordings and जारी to नीयत लिये broader कामयाबी साथ other various bands.
In 1973, he put together The Silver Bullet Band, a group of Detroit-area musicians, with whom he became most successful on the national level with the album Live Bullet, recorded live साथ the चांदी गोली बैंड in 1975 at cobo हॉल in Detroit, Michigan.
In 1976, he हासिल a नेशनल breakout with the studio album Night Moves.
On his studio albums, he also worked extensively साथ the alabama-based मांसपेशी shoals लय खण्ड, which appeared on several of Seger 's best-selling singles and albums.
A roots rocker with a classic raspy, shouting आवाज़, seger लिखा और अंकित गीतों कि dealt साथ प्रेम, महिलाओं, blue-collar विषयवस्तु and was an exemplar of heartland rock.
Seger has recorded many hits, including `` Night Moves, '' `` Turn the Page, '' `` We 've Got Tonight, '' `` Against the Wind, '' and Shakedown that was written for बेवर्ली पहाड़ियाँ cop ii और `` जैसे a चट्टान, '' और भी co-wrote the ईगल्स ' number-one hit `` Heartache Tonight. ''
His iconic recording of `` Old Time Rock and Roll `` was named one of the गीतों of the सदी in 2001.
With a career spanning five दशकों, seger continues to perform and record today.
Seger was inducted into the चट्टान और फेंकें Hall of Fame in 2004 and the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 2012.
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January 9, 1913 – April 22, 1994 ) थी the 37th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, सेवारत इससे 1969 to 1974, when he became the only president to resign the office.
Nixon had previously परोसा as a रिपब्लिकन u.S. प्रतिनिधि और सीनेटर इससे कैलिफ़ोर्निया और as the 36th Vice President of the United States from 1953 to 1961.
Nixon was born in yorba लिंडा, California.
He graduated from Whittier College in 1934 and Duke University School of Law in 1937, returning to कैलिफ़ोर्निया to practice law.
He and उसके बीवी, पैट निक्सन, स्थानांतरित to वॉशिंगटन to work for the federal government in 1942.
He subsequently परोसा in the संयुक्त राज्य नेवी दौरान World War II.
Nixon was elected in California to the House of प्रतिनिधि in 1946 and to the Senate in 1950.
His pursuit of the Alger Hiss case स्थापित उसके प्रतिष्ठा as a leading anti-communist, and elevated him to national prominence.
He was the running mate of Dwight D. Eisenhower, the Republican पार्टी अध्यक्षीय nominee in the 1952 चुनाव.
Nixon served लिये आठ सालो as vice president.
He waged an unsuccessful presidential campaign in 1960, narrowly losing to John F. Kennedy, and lost a race for Governor of California in 1962.
In 1968, he ran again for the प्रेसिडेंसी और थी निर्वाचित.
Although Nixon initially escalated America 's भागीदारी in the Vietnam War, he subsequently ended U.S. involvement in 1973.
Nixon 's visit to the People 's Republic of China in 1972 opened diplomatic relations between the two nations, और he initiated détente और the anti-ballistic मिसाइल सन्धि साथ the Soviet Union the same year.
Domestically, उसके प्रशासन generally embraced policies that transferred power from Washington to the states.
Among other things, he launched पहलों to लड़ो कर्कट और illegal दवाएँ, imposed मजदूरी और दाम नियंत्रण, enforced desegregation of some Southern schools, and established the Environmental Protection Agency.
Though he presided over the lunar landings beginning with Apollo 11, he scaled वापस मानवयुक्त स्पेस exploration.
He was re-elected by a भूस्खलन in 1972.
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab oil embargo, the resignation of उसके वाइस अध्यक्ष, spiro agnew, और a continuing श्रेणी of खुलासे परिचय the Watergate scandal and other misconduct by members of the administration.
The scandal escalated, costing Nixon much of his राजनैतिक support, और on अगस्त 9, 1974, he resigned in the face of almost certain impeachment and removal from office.
After his resignation, he controversially received a pardon जारी by उसके successor, Gerald Ford.
In retirement, Nixon 's work as an elder statesman, authoring अनेक किताबे and undertaking many foreign trips, helped to rehabilitate his public image.
He suffered a debilitating स्ट्रोक on April 18, 1994, and died four days later at the age of 81.
{ { Infobox सीनेटर
The Dominican Republic annexation treaty caused कड़वा contention between अध्यक्ष Grant and Sen. Sumner.
ब्रैडी 1869 ] ]
Sen. Sumner, opposed to American imperialism in the caribbean और fearful कि annexation होता सीसे to the conquest of the neighboring ब्लैक republic of Haiti, became convinced that corruption lay behind the treaty, and that men close to the president shared in the corruption.
As chairman of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee, Sen. Sumner initially withheld his राय on the सन्धि on जनवरी 18, 1870.
Sen. Sumner had been leaked information from Assistant Secretary of राज्य, bancroft डेविस, कि u.s. Naval ships were being used to protect President Báez.
Sen. Sumner 's committee voted विरूद्ध annexation और at sen. sumner’s सुझाव and quite possibly to save the party from an ugly fight or the president from embarrassment, the Senate held its debate of the treaty behind closed doors in executive session.
President Grant persisted and sent messages to Congress in favor of annexation on कूच 14, 1870, and May 31, 1870.
In closed session, Sen. Sumner spoke out against the treaty ; warnng that there होता be परेशानी साथ the विदेशी नागरिकों, noting the दीर्घकालिक विद्रोह कि took place on the island, and the risk that the independence of Haiti, recognized by the United States in 1862, would be lost.
Sumner stated that Grant 's use of the u.S. नेवी as a प्रोटेक्टोरेट थी a violation of International law and unconstitutional.
Finally, on June 30, 1870 the सन्धि थी voted on by the सीनेट और विफल to लाभ the जरूरी 2/3 majority for treaty passage.
The following day, अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट, अहसास गद्दारी by sen. sumner, retaliated by ordering the dismissal of Sumner’s close friend J. Lothrop Motley, Ambassador to Britain.
By autumn, Sumner 's निजी दुश्मनी to the अध्यक्ष थी पब्लिक knowledge, and he blamed the Secretary of State for failing to have resigned, rather than let Grant have his way.
The two men, friends until then, cooled into कड़वा दुश्मनों.
In December, 1870, still fearful that Grant meant to acquire Santo Domingo somehow, Sumner gave a fiercely नाजुक वाक accusing the अध्यक्ष of usurpation and Babcock of unethical conduct.
already, अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट, समर्थित by उसके सचिव of राज्य Hamilton Fish, had initiated a campaign to depose Sumner from the chairmanship of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee.
Although Sumner stated he was an `` Administration man '', in addition to having stopped Grant 's Dominican Republic treaty attempt, Sumner had defeated Grant 's full repeal of the Tenure of Office Act, blocked Grant 's nomination of Alexander Stewart to U.S. Secretary of Treasury, and been a निरंतर harassing फ़ोर्स pushing पुनर्निर्माण नीतियों तेज़ than ग्रान्ट था महरूम willing to go.
ग्रान्ट resented Sumner 's superiority of manner, as well.
Told once that Sumner did not believe in the Bible, the president is supposed to have said that he थी नहीं चकित : `` he did n't write it. ''
As the rift between Grant and Sumner increased, sumner’s स्वास्थ्य began to decline.
When the 42nd U.S. Congress convened on March 4, 1871, Senators affiliated with President Grant, known as ‘’New Radicals’’ voted to oust sen. sumner इससे the सीनेट विदेशी संबंध Committee chairmanship.
Business ethics ( also corporate ethics ) is a form of applied ethics or पेशेवर आचार कि examines नैतिक सिद्धान्त और moral or ethical problems that arise in a business environment.
It applies to all aspects of business conduct and is प्रासंगिक to the conduct of individuals और entire organizations.
कारोबार आचार रै दोनो normative and descriptive dimensions.
As a corporate practice और a करियर specialization, the field is primarily normative.
Academics attempting to understand कारोबार बर्ताव employ वर्णनात्मक methods.
The range and quantity of business ethical issues reflects the interaction of profit-maximizing बर्ताव साथ non-economic चिंताएं.
Interest in business ethics accelerated dramatically during the 1980s and 1990s, दोनो भीतर प्रमुख corporations and within academia.
For example, आज सबसे प्रमुख corporations प्रचार उनके प्रतिबद्धता to non-economic values under headings such as ethics codes and social responsibility charters.
Adam Smith said, `` People of the same trade seldom meet साथ, भी लिये merriment और diversion, लकिन the conversation ends in a conspiracy against the public, or in some contrivance to raise prices. ''
Governments use laws and regulations to point कारोबार बर्ताव in कया वे perceive to be beneficial directions.
Ethics implicitly regulates areas and details of behavior that lie beyond सरकारी कंट्रोल.
The emergence of large corporations with limited relationships and sensitivity to the communities in जिससे वे operate त्वरित the विकास of formal ethics regimes.
A burn is a type of injury to flesh or skin caused by heat, विद्युत, रसायन, घर्षण, or radiation.
Most burns affect only the superficial skin ( known as सतही or पहला उपाधि ) or extend into the deeper स्किन लकिन do नहीं involve the पूरा मोटाई of the skin ( known as partial thickness or second degree ).
Rarely all layers of the skin or deeper ऊतकों, ऐसे as मांसपेशी or अस्थि can be घायल in जिससे case the burn is either full thickness ( third degree ) or fourth degree.
The treatment required depends on the गंभीरता of the बर्न.
Superficial burns संभवतः प्रबंधित साथ छोटी अधिक than simple pain killers while major burns may require prolonged treatment in specialized burn centers.
Cooling with tap water may aid pain and decrease damage however if exposure is prolonged it may result in low body temperature.
Partial मोटाई burns may आवश्यकता सफ़ाई साथ soap and water followed by dressings.
Blisters चाहिए typically be left unbroken.
Full thickness burns usually require सर्जिकल उपचार ऐसे as स्किन कलम और extensive burns प्रायः आवश्यकता large amount of intravenous fluids.
The सबसे आम जटिलताओं of burns are related to infection.
While large burns can be fatal, modern treatments developed in the last 50 years have significantly improved the outcomes, विशेषकर in children और यंग वयस्कों.
globally परिचय 11 लाख लोगों seek medical treatment and 300,000 people die from burns.
In the United States, of those admitted to a बर्न बीच, लगभग 4 % die from their injuries.
The long term outcome is primarily सम्बन्धित to the आकार of बर्न and the age of the person effected.
The Atlantic Ocean, not including आर्कटिक और अंटार्कटिक regions
This video was taken by the क्रू of expedition 29 on board the ISS.
The pass starts इससे बस north-east of the द्वीप of Newfoundland over the North Atlantic Ocean to central Africa, over South Sudan.
The Atlantic Ocean is the second-largest of the संसार 's oceanic विभाजन.
साथ a कुल क्षेत्रफल of परिचय, it कवर लगभग 20 percent of the Earth 's surface and about 29 percent of its water surface area.
The first part of its नाम refers to एटलस of यूनानी mythology, making the Atlantic the `` Sea of Atlas ''.
The oldest known mention of `` Atlantic '' is in the histories of हिरोडोटस around 450 bc ( hdt. 1.202.4 ) : अटलांटिस थलैसा ( Greek : Ἀτλαντὶς θάλασσα ; English : Sea of Atlas ).
The term ethiopic समंदर, निकला from Ethiopia, was applied to the southern Atlantic as late as the mid-19th century.
Before Europeans discovered other oceans, the term `` ocean '' itself was synonymous with the waters परे the जलसन्धि of जिब्राल्टर that we now know as the Atlantic.
The early यूनानियों believed इस समंदर to be a gigantic river encircling the world.
The Atlantic Ocean occupies an elongated, S-shaped basin extending longitudinally between यूरेशिया और अफ़्रीकी to the ईस्ट, और the Americas to the west.
As one घटक of the interconnected वैश्विक समंदर, it is कनेक्ट in the उत्तर to the आर्कटिक समंदर ( which is sometimes considered a sea of the Atlantic ), to the Pacific Ocean in the southwest, the Indian Ocean in the southeast, and the Southern Ocean in the south.
( Other definitions describe the अटलांटिक as extending southward to Antarctica. )
The equator subdivides it into the North अटलांटिक समंदर और दक्षिण अटलांटिक Ocean.
Due to their long-term persistence, and the need for a unique identifier in issuing forecasts और चेतावनियाँ, तीव्र cyclones और उपोष्ण cyclones हैं दिए names according to policy ( see Tropical cyclone naming ).
The following are lists from जिससे ये तीव्र और उपोष्ण cyclone names are derived.
White light is dispersed by a प्रिज़्म into the रंगों of the optical spectrum.
The visible spectrum is the portion of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम कि is दृश्य to ( can be detected by ) the human eye.
Electromagnetic radiation in this दायरा of wavelengths is पुकारा दृश्य light or simply light.
A ठेठ इंसान नजर होगा respond to wavelengths from about 390 to 700 nm.
In terms of आवृत्ति, इस corresponds to a बैंड in the vicinity of 430–790 THz.
A light-adapted eye generally has its maximum sensitivity at around 555 nm ( 540 thz ), in the ग्रीन प्रदेश of the ऑप्टिकल वर्णक्रम ( see : luminosity function ).
The spectrum does not, however, contain all the रंगों कि the इंसान आँखें and brain can distinguish.
Unsaturated colors such as pink, or जामुनी विसंगतियाँ ऐसे as magenta, हैं अनुपस्थित, लिये उदाहरण, क्युकी वे can be made only by a mix of multiple wavelengths.
Colors containing तभी एक wavelength are also called pure colors.
Visible wavelengths pass through the `` optical window ``, the region of the electromagnetic वर्णक्रम जिससे allows wavelengths to pass largely unattenuated through the Earth 's atmosphere.
An उदाहरण of इस घटना is that clean air scatters blue light more than red wavelengths, and so the midday sky appears blue.
The optical window is also called the visible window because it overlaps the इंसान दृश्य जवाब वर्णक्रम.
The near infrared ( NIR ) window lies just out of the human vision, as well as the Medium Wavelength IR ( MWIR ) window and the Long wavelength or दूर इन्फ्रारेड ( lwir or fir ) खिड़की हालांकि अन्य पशु may अनुभव उन्हें.
Many species can see लाइट साथ बारंबारता बाहर the `` visible spectrum, '' which is defined in terms of human vision.
Bees and many other insects can detect पराबैंगनी लाइट, जिससे helps उन्हें find nectar in flowers.
Plant species that depend on insect pollination may owe reproductive success to उनके रूप in पराबैंगनी light, rather than how colorful they appear to humans.
Birds, too, can see into the पराबैंगनी ( 300–400 nm ), और कुछ have sex-dependent markings on their plumage that are visible only in the ultraviolet range.
Many animals that can see into the पराबैंगनी दायरा, however, can नहीं देखिए रेड लाइट or any other reddish wavelengths.
Bees ' visible spectrum ends at परिचय 590nm, बस पहले the orange wavelengths start.
Birds, however, can see some red wavelengths, लकिन नहीं as अनेक as इंसानो.
Zebras ( or ) are several प्रजाति of अफ़्रीकी equids ( घोड़ा परिवार ) united by their distinctive black and white stripes.
उनके धारियाँ आइये in अलग patterns, unique to each individual.
They are generally सोशल पशु that live in small harems to large herds.
Unlike their closest रिश्तेदारों, घोड़े और asses, zebras have never been truly domesticated.
There are three species of zebras : the plains zebra, the grévy 's जेब्रा और the mountain zebra.
The plains zebra and the mountain zebra belong to the subgenus Hippotigris, but Grévy 's zebra is the एकमात्र प्रजाति of subgenus dolichohippus.
The latter resembles an ass, to which it is closely related, while the पूर्व दो are more horse-like.
All three belong to the genus Equus, साथ साथ अन्य जीना equids.
The unique stripes of zebras make them एक of the पशु most familiar to people.
They occur in a variety of habitats, such as grasslands, savannas, वुडलैंड्स, thorny scrublands, mountains, and coastal hills.
However, various anthropogenic factors have had a severe impact on जेब्रा populations, in particular शिकार लिये खालें और आवास destruction.
Grévy 's zebra and the mountain जेब्रा हैं endangered.
While plains zebras are much more plentiful, one subspecies, the quagga, became विलुप्त in the लेट 19th सदी – हालांकि वहीँ is फिलहाल a योजना, पुकारा the quagga प्रोजेक्ट, that aims to breed zebras that are phenotypically similar to the quagga in a process called breeding back.
Barry White, born Barry Eugene Carter ( – ), थी an अमरीकी composer और singer-songwriter.
A two-time Grammy Award -winner known for his distinctive bass voice and romantic image, White 's greatest success came in the 1970s as a solo singer and with the Love Unlimited Orchestra, crafting many enduring आत्मा, दुर्गंध, और डिस्को गीतों ऐसे as उसके दो biggest हिट्स, `` तुम 're the पहला, the Last, My Everything `` and `` Ca n't Get Enough of Your Love, Babe. ''
Along with Isaac Hayes, White is considered by Allmusic.com as a pioneer of disco music in the जल्दी 1970s.
During the course of his career in the music business, White achieved 106 सुनहरा एल्बम विश्वव्यापी, 41 of जिससे भी attained platinum status.
White had 20 gold and 10 platinum singles, with worldwide sales in excess of 100 लाख, according to आलोचकों ed होगन और Wade Kergan.
His influences included Rev. James Cleveland, Ray चार्ल्स, एरीथा फ्रैंकलिन प्लस motown artists The Supremes, The Four Tops and Marvin Gaye.
Angelina Jolie (, born Angelina Jolie वोइट ; जून 4, 1975 ) is an अमरीकी actress, film director, and screenwriter.
She has received an Academy Award, two स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार, और तीन सुनहरी Globe Awards, and was named Hollywood 's highest-paid actress by Forbes in 2009 and 2011.
Jolie promotes humanitarian कल्याणकारी, और is विख्यात लिये उसके कार्य साथ refugees as a Special Envoy and former Goodwill Ambassador for the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees ( UNHCR ).
She has often been cited as the world 's `` most beautiful '' woman, a शीर्षक लिये जिससे वो रै प्राप्त substantial media attention.
Jolie made her screen debut as a child alongside her father Jon वोइट in lookin ' to मिलेंगी आउट ( 1982 ), लकिन उसके फिल्मी करियर began in सच्चाई a decade later with the low-budget production Cyborg 2 ( 1993 ).
Her first leading role in a प्रमुख फिल्मी was in the cyber-thriller Hackers ( 1995 ).
She starred in the critically acclaimed biographical television films George Wallace ( 1997 ) and Gia ( 1998 ), and won an Academy पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in the नाटक लड़की, बाधित ( 1999 ).
Jolie achieved wide fame after her portrayal of video game heroine Lara Croft in Lara Croft : Tomb Raider ( 2001 ), और स्थापित herself among the highest-paid actresses in Hollywood with the sequel The Cradle of Life ( 2003 ).
वो जारी उसके कार्रवाई स्टार करियर साथ mr. & mrs. स्मिथ ( 2005 ) और चाही ( 2008 ) —her biggest non-animated commercial successes to date—and received further critical acclaim for her performances in the dramas A Mighty Heart ( 2007 ) and Changeling ( 2008 ), which earned her a nomination for an Academy Award for Best Actress.
Jolie made उसके directorial डेब्यू साथ the wartime drama In the Land of Blood and Honey ( 2011 ).
Divorced from actors Jonny Lee Miller and बिली bob थॉर्नटन, जोली अभी lives with actor Brad Pitt, in a relationship notable for fervent media attention.
Jolie and Pitt have three biological children and three adopted children.
A natural arch produced by the erosion of differentially weathered चट्टान in Jebel Kharaz, Jordan
Erosion is the process by which soil and rock are removed from the Earth 's surface by exogenetic प्रक्रियाओं ऐसे as हवा or जल प्रवाह, और तब transported और deposited in अन्य स्थितियाँ.
While अपरदन is a प्राकृतिक प्रक्रम, इंसान क्रियाएँ have increased by 10-40 times the rate at which erosion is occurring globally.
excessive अपरदन कल्याणकारी समस्याएं ऐसे as मरुस्थलीकरण, decreases in agricultural productivity due to land degradation, sedimentation of waterways, and ecological collapse due to loss of the nutrient rich upper soil layers.
Water and wind erosion are now the two primary causes of land degradation ; combined, they are जिम्मेदार लिये 84 % of degraded acreage, making excessive erosion one of the most significant global environmental problems.
Industrial agriculture, deforestation, roads, anthropogenic climate change and urban sprawl are amongst the most significant human क्रियाएँ in लिहाज़ to उनके प्रभाव on stimulating erosion.
However, there are अनेक उपलब्धियाँ वैकल्पिक जमीन उपयोग practices कि can काटना or limit erosion, such as terrace -building, no-till agriculture, and revegetation of denuded soils.
जर्सी shore is an अमरीकी वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी जिससे ran on MTV from December 3, 2009 to December 20, 2012 in the United States.
The श्रेणी फ़ॉलो the जीवनदान of eight housemates spending their summer at the Jersey Shore in the U.S. state of New Jersey.
Season 2 followed the डाल escaping the cold northeast winter to Miami Beach, with Season 3 returning to the Jersey Shore.
The fourth season, filmed in इटली, premiered on August 4, 2011.
The show returned for a पांचवां ऋतु, at seaside Heights on January 5, 2012.
the पांचवां ऋतु finale aired on March 15, 2012.
On March 19, 2012, एमटीवी पुष्टि कि the series would return for their sixth season.
On August 30, 2012, एमटीवी घोषित कि the श्रेणी होगा समाप्त बाद the sixth season, which premiered on October 4.
the श्रेणी finale aired on December 20, 2012.
The show debuted amid large amounts of controversy regarding the use of the words `` Guido / Guidette, '' portrayals of italian-american stereotypes, and scrutiny from locals because the cast members were not residents of the area.
the श्रेणी garnered रिकार्ड दरजा लिये एमटीवी, making it the network 's most viewed series telecast ever.
The series ' cast have also been credited with introducing unique lexicon and phrases into अमरीकी लोकप्रिय संस्कृति.
The University of Chicago and the University of ओक्लाहोमा हैं among the शैक्षणिक संस्थानों that have had classes or conferences about the show.
In 2010, the cast of Jersey shore थी नामित on बारबरा walters ' 10 सबसे fascinating लोगों सूची, और the series has since been exported to dozens of countries worldwide.
There are several remakes of the show in other countries, with two set in the संयुक्त किंगडम ; the खूब ज्ञात geordie Shore, set in Newcastle upon Tyne, England.
The अन्य is the घाटियों, the वेल्श समतुल्य, which is filmed and set in Cardiff.
The only अन्य आधिकारिक रीमेक of the दिखाएँ is gandía Shore, set in Gandía, Spain.
सही
United States territory is any extent of region under the jurisdiction of the federal सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य, सहित सब waters ( around आइलैंड्स or continental tracts ) and all U.S. Naval vessels.
The United States has traditionally proclaimed the sovereign अधिकारों लिये exploring, exploiting, conserving, and managing its territory.
This extent of territory is all the area belonging to, and under the dominion of, the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय सरकारी ( जिससे शामिल tracts lying at a distance from the country ) for administrative and other purposes.
The संयुक्त राज्य कुल territory शामिल a subset of political divisions.
the u.S. सरकारी is a सरकारी with delegated powers under the United States Constitution.
`` The powers not delegated to the United States by the Constitution, nor prohibited by it to the States, are reserved to the राज्य क्रमशः, or to the लोगों '' by the दसवाँ amendment.
Terminator 3 : Rise of the Machines ( commonly abbreviated as T3 ) is a 2003 science fiction action film directed by जोनाथन mostow और अभिनीत अर्नाल्ड श्वार्ज़नेगर, उपनाम stahl, क्लेयर danes और kristanna Loken.
It is the दूसरी sequel to the Terminator ( 1984 ).
After Skynet fails to kill Sarah Connor before her son is born and to kill जॉन खुद as a चाइल्ड, it भेजना वापस another टर्मिनेटर, the t-x, in an attempt to wipe out as many Resistance officers as possible.
This शामिल जॉन 's भविष्य wife, but not John himself as his whereabouts are unknown to Skynet.
John 's life is placed in danger when the t-x accidentally पाता him.
a cord of wood
The cord is a unit of measure of dry volume used in Canada और the संयुक्त राज्य to माप firewood and pulpwood.
A cord is the amount of लकडी कि, जब `` क्रमित और खूब stowed '' ( arranged so टुकड़े are aligned, parallel, touching and compact ), occupies a volume of.
This corresponds to a well stacked woodpile ऊँची, long, और गहन ; or कोई अन्य व्यवस्था of रैखिक माप that yields the same volume.
The name cord संभवतः आता इससे the उपयोग of a cord or string to measure it.
The, is an 8-bit handheld video game device developed and manufactured by निन्टेंडो.
It was released in Japan on, in North अमेरिका in, और in यूरोपीय on.
It is the first handheld console in the Game Boy line, and was created by Gunpei Yokoi and Nintendo Research & Development 1 —the वही स्टाफ जो था designed the खेल & देखें श्रेणी as खूब as अनेक लोकप्रिय खेल for the Nintendo Entertainment System.
Redesigned versions were released in 1996 और 1998, in the रूप of खेल लड़के जेब, and Game Boy Light ( Japan only ), respectively.
The Game Boy is Nintendo 's second handheld system following the Game & Watch series introduced in, and it संयुक्त सुविधाएँ इससे दोनो the निन्टेंडो entertainment प्रणाली and Game & Watch.
It was originally bundled साथ the पहेली game Tetris.
As भाग of the चौथी पीढी of गेमिंग, the खेल Boy competed with the Sega Game Gear, Atari Lynx, and the TurboExpress.
Despite these अन्य technologically श्रेष्ठ हैंडहेल्ड consoles, the Game Boy was a tremendous success.
the खेल लड़के और इसके successor, the Game Boy Color, have both combined sold 118.69 million units worldwide.
Upon its release in the संयुक्त राज्य, it बेची इसके संपूर्ण शिपमेंट of one million units within weeks.
The World Trade Center is a complex of buildings under construction in Lower मैनहटन, नई यॉर्क नगर, संयुक्त राज्य, replacing an पहले complex of seven buildings with the same name on the same site.
The original World Trade Center featured landmark twin towers, which opened on April 4, 1973 और यहूद नष्ट in the सितंबर 11 हमले of 2001, along with 7 World Trade Center.
The other buildings in the जटिल यहूद क्षतिग्रस्त in the हमले, and their ruins were eventually demolished.
The site is being rebuilt with five new skyscrapers and a memorial to those मारे in the attacks.
, only one skyscraper has महरूम समाप्त ; the अन्य चार हैं अपेक्षित to be समाप्त before 2020.
One World व्यापार बीच होगा be the सीसे भवन for the new complex, reaching more than 100 stories at its completion.
It became the tallest building in नई यॉर्क नगर on अप्रैल 30, 2012, और is expected to be finished by 2013.
A sixth tower is प्रतीक्षारत पुष्टि.
At the time of उनके पूर्णता, the असली 1 संसार व्यापार बीच ( the उत्तर मीनार ) और 2 World Trade Center ( the South Tower ), known collectively as the `` Twin Towers '', were the tallest buildings in the world.
The other इमारतें शामिल 3 wtc ( the Marriott World Trade Center ), 4 WTC, 5 WTC, 6 WTC, and 7 WTC.
सब of ये इमारतें यहूद निर्मित between 1975 and 1985.
The cost लिये the निर्माण थी $ 400 million ( $ in dollars ).
the जटिल थी स्तिथ in the दिल of नई यॉर्क नगर 's शहर financial district and contained 13.4 million square feet ( 1.24 million m2 ) of office space.
The World Trade Center अनुभवी a आग on, 1975, a bombing on, 1993 and a robbery on, 1998.
In 1998, the Port प्राधिकार decided to privatize the संसार व्यापार बीच, पट्टे the इमारतें to a private company to manage, and awarded the lease to Silverstein Properties in.
On the morning of September 11, 2001, Al-Qaeda -affiliated hijackers flew two Boeing 767 jets into the जटिल, एक into प्रत्येक मीनार, in a समन्वित terrorist attack.
After burning for 56 minutes, the South Tower ( 2 ) collapsed, followed a half-hour बाद by the North Tower ( 1 ), with the attacks on the World Trade Center resulting in 2,753 deaths.
Falling debris from the towers, combined with fires that the debris initiated in several surrounding buildings, led to the partial or पूरा पतन of सब the अन्य इमारतें in the जटिल and caused catastrophic damage to ten other large structures in the surrounding area.
The process of क्लीनअप और रिकवरी at the World Trade Center site took eight months.
over the following सालो, योजनाएँ for a rebuilt World Trade Center took form.
The पहला नई भवन at the site was 7 World Trade Center, which opened in.
The Lower मैनहटन विकास निगम ( lmdc ), established in to oversee the rebuilding process, organized competitions to select a site plan and memorial design.
Memory Foundations, designed by Daniel Libeskind, was चयनित as the निपुण योजना, लकिन इस गई through substantial changes in design.
The new World Trade Center complex will include One World Trade बीच, तीन अन्य high-rise दफ्तर मीनारें, और the नेशनल September 11 Memorial & Museum.
सैन जिबरील Mountains
San Bernardino kyu, साथ mt. सैन gorgonio in the अग्रभूमि and Big Bear Lake in the background.
The Transverse Ranges are a group of mountain सीमाएँ of दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, in the प्रशांत Coast Ranges physiographic region in North America.
The Transverse Ranges begin at the southern end of the California Coast सीमाएँ और झूठ between सांता बारबरा और सैन डिएगो काउंटी.
They derive the name Transverse Ranges due to their East-West orientation, बनाना उन्हें अनुप्रस्थ to the सामान्य north-south अभिविन्यास of सबसे of California 's coastal mountains.
Periodic तालिका साथ electron shells
An electron shell may be विचार of as an कक्षा followed by electrons around an atom 's nucleus.
The closest shell to the nucleus is called the `` 1 shell '' ( also called `` K shell '' ), followed by the `` 2 शेल '' ( or `` l शेल '' ), तब the `` 3 शेल '' ( or `` M shell '' ), and so on farther and farther from the nucleus.
The shell letters K, l, m,..., प्रयुक्त in the x-ray संकेतन, are alphabetical.
Each shell can contain only a fixed क्रमांक of electrons : the 1st शेल can थाम up to दो electrons, the 2nd शेल can hold up to eight electrons, the 3rd shell can hold up to 18, and 4th shell can hold up to 32 and so on.
Since electrons are electrically attracted to the nucleus, an अणु 's electrons होगा generally occupy outer shells only if the more inner shells have already been completely filled by other electrons.
However, this is नहीं a सख्त आवश्यकता : अणु may have two or even three incomplete outer shells.
( See madelung नियम लिये more details. )
For an explanation of why electrons मौजूद in ये shells see electron configuration.
The electrons in the outermost occupied शेल ( or शेल ) determine the रासायनिक properties of the atom ; it is called the valence shell.
Each shell consists of one or more subshells, और प्रत्येक subshell consists of one or more atomic orbitals.
Vickie Lynn Marshall ( née Hogan ; November 28, 1967 – फ़रवरी 8, 2007 ), known by her moniker Anna Nicole Smith, was an American model, actress, and television personality.
