Smith first gained लोकप्रियता in प्लेबॉय, बनने the 1993 Playmate of the Year.
She modeled लिये कपडे companies, including Guess jeans and Lane Bryant.
Smith dropped out of ऊँची स्कूल और was married in 1985.
Her अत्यधिक publicized दूसरी विवाह to आयल कारोबार mogul, J. हावर्ड मार्शल, 62 years her senior, resulted in speculation that she married the octogenarian for his money, which she denied.
Following Marshall 's death, Smith began a lengthy विधिक बैटल over a share of his estate.
Her case, Marshall v. Marshall, reached the U.S. Supreme Court on a question of संघीय क्षेत्राधिकार, और again on a सवाल of दिवालियापन अदालत प्राधिकार ( now called Stern v. Marshall ).
Smith died on February 8, 2007 in a हॉलीवुड, फ्लोरिडा होटल रूम as a परिणाम of an overdose of नुस्खा drugs.
Within the final six months of her life, Smith थी the फ़ोकस of a नवीनीकृत दबायें कवरेज surrounding the मौत of her son, Daniel, and the paternity and custody battle over her newborn daughter, Dannielynn.
The is एक denomination of Japanese yen.
The current design was first minted in 1959 using Japanese characters known as the `` नई स्क्रिप्ट ``, और यहूद भी minted इससे 1949-1958 using `` old-script '' Japanese characters.
Five-yen coins date to 1870 ( when, due to the much उच्चतर मान of the येन, वे यहूद minted in gold ).
The front of the coin depicts a rice plant growing out of the water, with `` five yen '' written in kanji ; the वापस is stamped साथ `` जापानी '' और the साल of समस्या, भी in kanji, separated by sprouts of a tree.
The three graphic elements of the coin represent कृषि और fisheries, the कुंजी तत्व of the जापानी first-sector economy.
Around a hole, वहीँ is a गियर कि represents उद्योग.
It is the only जापानी सिक्का in परिसंचरण to कमी अरबी numerals on either face.
TLC is an American girl group whose repertoire spanned R & B, हिप हॉप, आत्मा, दुर्गंध, और नई जोकर swing.
Originally consisting of singer Tionne `` T-Boz '' Watkins, rapper Lisa `` Left Eye '' Lopes and singer Rozonda `` Chilli '' थामस, the समूह मिला unprecedented कामयाबी in the 1990s जबकि भी enduring a श्रेणी of spats साथ the law, each other, and the group 's record label.
Initially, TLC achieved वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी following the release of their debut album Ooooooohhh...
On the TLC Tip, which sold 6 लाख नक़ल विश्वव्यापी.
However, it was their second album, CrazySexyCool, कि catapulted the समूह to superstar औकात.
CrazySexyCool went on to be certified diamond by the RIAA — a first for a female group, and eventually बेची 23 लाख नक़ल विश्वव्यापी.
Five years later, the group released their third album FanMail, जिससे became the समूह 's पहला एल्बम to डेब्यू at क्रमांक one and sold more than 11 million copies worldwide.
The subsequent दौरे following fanmails रिलीज became the highest grossing tour of all time by a female band.
In 2002, Lisa `` बाएँ नजर '' lopes died in a car accident in Honduras.
Seven months later, T-Boz and Chilli released the group 's fourth album 3D, which बेची 2 लाख नक़ल विश्वव्यापी, it प्रदर्शित unreleased vocals from Left Eye.
Billboard magazine क्रमित tlc as एक of the greatest musical trios.
Between 1992 and 2003, the band संचित टेन शीर्ष टेन singles, चार क्रमांक एक singles, four multi-platinum albums, and four Grammy Awards.
At the समाप्त of 1999, tlc थी क्रमित as the seventh most successful act of the 1990s by Billboard.
In 2008, the group was inducted into the All समय hot 100 कलाकार हॉल of कीर्ति by the same magazine, at 56th place.
That year it was also listed as the # 25 r & b/hip-hop artist of the preceding 25 years.
TLC has sold अधिक than 65 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी और वे हैं क्रमित as the दूसरी बेहतरीन selling female group of all time, and the best selling female R & B group of all time.
In 2012, TLC ranked 12th on vh1 's 100 महानतम महिलाओं in म्यूज़िक, होने क्रमित the number one all girl group on that list.
Tarzan is a 1999 अमरीकी एनिमेटेड एडवेंचर फिल्मी उत्पादित by वॉल्ट Disney Feature Animation and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures.
The 37th film in the Walt Disney Animated Classics, it is आधारित on the स्टोरी टार्ज़न of the apes by एडगर Rice Burroughs, and is the only major motion picture version of the story Tarzan property to be animated.
Directed by Chris Buck and Kevin Lima with a screenplay by Tab Murphy, Bob Tzudiker, and Noni White, Tarzan features the voices of Tony goldwyn, minnie ड्राइवर, ग्लेन बंद, और रोजी o'donnell साथ Brian Blessed, Lance Henriksen, Wayne Knight, and Nigel Hawthorne.
It was the last bona fide hit पहले the डिज़्नी slump of the जल्दी 2000s grossing $ 171,091,819 domestically and $ 448,191,819 worldwide, outgrossing its predecessors Hercules ( 1997 ) and Mulan ( 1998 ).
At the time of its release, its उत्पादन बजट of $ 130 लाख बना it the सबसे महंगी एनिमेटेड फिल्मी ever made, until topped by Disney 's own $ 140 million Treasure Planet in 2002.
It was also the first Disney animated feature to खोलें at # 1 चूंकि pocahontas.
इस थी the पिछला प्रमुख box office success of the Disney Renaissance.
Oil Platform P-51 बंद the ब्राज़ीलियाई coast is a semi-submersible platform.
Oil मंच mittelplate in the North sea
An आयल मंच, ( offshore मंच or colloquially आयल रिग ) is a विशाल ढांचा साथ सुविधाएं to drill wells, to extract and process oil and natural gas, and to temporarily store product until it can be brought to shore for refining and marketing.
In many मामले, the मंच contains सुविधाएं to हाउस the workforce as well.
Depending on the circumstances, the platform may be fixed to the ocean floor, may consist of an कृत्रिम द्वीप, or may float.
Remote subsea wells may also be कनेक्ट to a मंच by प्रवाह lines and by umbilical connections.
These subsea solutions may consist of one or अधिक subsea कुएं, or of एक or अधिक manifold केंद्रों लिये multiple wells.
Slaughter is the killing of पशु, प्रायः कि of domestic livestock for food.
The animals most commonly slaughtered लिये खाना हैं चौपायों, जल भैंस ( लिये बीफ और वील ), शीप, बकरियों ( लिये मेमने और मटन ), सूअर ( लिये pork ), horses ( for horse meat ), and fowl, largely chickens, turkeys, and ducks and increasingly fish from the aquaculture industry ( fish farming ).
The White House, the president 's official निवास और बीच of the administration
Under the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान, the President of the United States is the head of state and head of government of the United States.
As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal government as a whole, the प्रेसिडेंसी is the उच्चतम राजनैतिक दफ्तर in the संयुक्त राज्य by influence and recognition.
The president is also the commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त राज्य Armed Forces.
The president is indirectly elected to a four-year term by an चुनावी कॉलेज ( or by the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि चाहिए the चुनावी कॉलेज असफल to पुरस्कार an absolute majority of votes to any person ).
Since the ratification of the Twenty-second Amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान in 1951, no व्यक्ति may be निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष more than twice, and no one who has served more than two years of a term to which someone else was elected may be elected more than once.
Upon the death, इस्तीफा, or हटाना इससे दफ्तर of an लाज़िम अध्यक्ष, the Vice President assumes the office.
The President must be at least 35 सालो of आयु और a `` प्राकृतिक born '' citizen of the United States.
This list includes only those व्यक्तियों जो यहूद sworn into दफ्तर as अध्यक्ष following the ratification of the United States Constitution, which took effect on March 4, 1789.
For अमरीकी नेताओ पहले इस अनुसमर्थन, see President of the Continental Congress.
The list does not include any Acting राष्ट्रपतियों अंतर्गत the twenty-fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution.
There have been 43 people sworn into office, and 44 presidencies, as Grover क्लीवलैंड परोसा दो non-consecutive शर्तें और is गिने क्रमबद्धता as both the 22nd and 24th president.
Of the individuals elected as अध्यक्ष, चार died in दफ्तर of प्राकृतिक कल्याणकारी ( विलियम Henry Harrison, Zachary Taylor, Warren G. Harding, and Franklin D. Roosevelt ), four were assassinated ( Abraham Lincoln, James A. Garfield, William McKinley, and John F. Kennedy ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ).
George Washington, the पहला अध्यक्ष, थी उदघाटन in 1789 बाद a unanimous vote of the Electoral College.
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in office with 32 days in 1841, and Franklin D. रूज़वेल्ट खर्च the longest साथ over बारह सालो, लकिन died shortly into उसके चौथी पद in 1945.
He is the only president to serve more than दो शर्तें, और a संवैधानिक amendment, affecting presidents after Harry Truman, was passed to limit the number of times an individual can be elected president.
Andrew Jackson, the seventh president, was the first to be elected by men of all classes in 1828 after सबसे कानून barring non-land-owners इससे मतदान यहूद repealed.
Warren हार्डिंग थी the पहला निर्वाचित after women gained voting rights in 1920.
History records four presidents – John Q Adams, रदरफोर्ड B. हेज़, बेंजामिन हैरिसन और जार्ज W. बुश – जो खोया the लोकप्रिय vote but assumed office.
John F. Kennedy has been the only president of Roman Catholic faith, और the वर्तमान अध्यक्ष, बराक ओबामा, is the first president of African descent.
Several firearms with detachable suppressors, from top to bottom : An Uzi, An ar-15, a heckler & koch खासियत रणनीतिक, a beretta 92fs, और a sig मच्छर.
Bolt action rimfire राइफल साथ suppressor
AWM-F स्निपर राइफल साथ संलग्न suppressor.
A suppressor, sound suppressor, or sound moderator, is a device attached to or part of the बैरल of a firearm जिससे reduces the राशि of रव, और usually the amount of muzzle flash, generated by firing the weapon.
A suppressor can be प्रयुक्त दोनो साथ a firearm and with compressed air gun.
Though it is sometimes referred to as a silencer, this term is a misnomer popularized by cinematic fiction : the sound of a projectile, especially one moving faster than the speed of sound, through the air can not be eliminated.
Using a suppressor in long distance shooting ( i.e. वृहद than 300 मीटर ) can lessen, or retard, the रपट at the moment of impact, and create the impression of silence near the target.
The noise heard near the muzzle as a प्रक्षेप्य पत्ते the barrel, though subdued, is not silent at all.
A suppressor is usually a metal cylinder with internal mechanisms to reduce the sound of firing by slowing the escaping propellant gas and sometimes by reducing the velocity of the bullet.
Early suppressors were created around the शुरूआत of the 20th सदी by several inventors.
American inventor Hiram Percy Maxim ( not to be confused with Hiram Stevens Maxim, Hiram Percy 's father, and the inventor of the Maxim Machine Gun ), is credited with inventing और selling the पहला commercially कामयाब models circa 1902 ( patented 30 March 1909 ).
Maxim gave his device the trademarked नाम कहावत silencer.
The muffler for internal combustion engines थी विकसित in समानांतर साथ the firearm suppressor by कहावत in the जल्दी 20th सदी, using अनेक of the same techniques to provide quieter-running engines ( in many European countries automobile mufflers are still called silencers ).
The word silencer in reference to gun suppressor remains in फैली उपयोग, हालांकि it रै चूंकि गिरे आउट of एहसान साथ कुछ, विशेषकर among the firearms उद्योग, होने replaced with the more literally accurate term sound suppressor or just suppressor, because a `` sound suppressor '' does not `` silence '' any weapon, rather it eliminates muzzle flash and reduces the sonic pressure of a firearm discharging.
Common usage and U.S. legislative language favor the historically पहले पद, silencer.
In U.S. law, the terms `` firearm मफलर '' और `` firearm silencer '' are synonymous.
Suppressors were regularly used by agents of the United States दफ्तर of रणनीतिक सेवाएं, जो favored the newly designed High Standard HDM.22 Long Rifle pistol during World War II.
OSS Director William Joseph `` Wild Bill '' Donovan demonstrated the पिस्टल लिये अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट at the White House.
According to OSS शोध मुख्य स्टेनली लोवेल, डोनोवन ( an बूढ़ा और विश्वसनीय friend of the President ) was waved into the Oval Office, where Roosevelt was dictating a letter.
While Roosevelt finished his message, Donovan turned his back and fired ten shots into a sandbag he had brought with him, announced what he था किया और हात the धूम्रपान गन to the astonished president.
The British SOE ( Special Operations Executive ) Welrod assassination pistol with an integral suppressor was also प्रयुक्त by the अमरीकी oss on clandestine परिचालन in नाजी occupied यूरोपीय दौरान the दूसरी World War.
Beatrice `` Bea '' आर्थर ( may 13, 1922 – अप्रैल 25, 2009 ) was an American actress, comedienne, and singer whose career spanned seven decades.
Arthur achieved fame as the character Maude Findlay on the 1970s sitcoms सब in the परिवार और maude, और as डोरोथी zbornak on the 1980s sitcom The Golden Girls, winning Emmy Awards for both roles.
A stage actress both before and after her television success, she won the Tony Award for Best Featured Actress in a Musical लिये उसके प्रदर्शन as वीरा चार्ल्स in the असली डाल of mame ( 1966 ).
is a 2011 Japanese 3D computer-animated film based on the Tekken video game series, produced by डिजिटल frontier और वितरित by asmik इक्का entertainment in संघ with Bandai Entertainment.
The film premiered in North अमेरिका by बंदाई entertainment on July 26, 2011, and in Australia on July 27, 2011 in a special exclusive one-off screening.
It was released on सितंबर 3, 2011 in Japan.
The film was released on Blu-ray Disc on November 22, 2011 लिये यूएसए, और दिसम्बर 1, 2011 लिये Japan.
इस फिल्मी थी भी released on DVD on November 22, 2011 ( 2D Version only ).
The film was additionally included with the प्लेस्टेशन 3 खेल, tekken संकर, और the निन्टेंडो 3DS title, Tekken 3D : Prime Edition.
For a discussion of nonprofit, voluntary neighborhood advocacy समूह, देखिए पड़ोस संघ.
In the United States, a homeowner association is a corporation formed by a real estate डेवलपर लिये the purpose of विपणन, मैनेजिंग, और selling of homes and lots in a residential subdivision.
It grants the developer privileged voting rights in governing the association, while allowing the developer to निकास वित्तीय और विधिक जिम्मेदारी of the संगठन, typically by transferring स्वामित्व of the association to the homeowners after selling off a predetermined number of lots.
Membership in the homeowners association by a आवासीय खरीदार is typically a कंडीशन of खरीदें ; a buyer is n't given an option to reject it.
Most homeowner associations are incorporated, and are subject to state statutes कि govern non-profit corporations और homeowner एसोसिएशन.
State oversight of homeowner associations is minimal, and mainly takes the form of कानून जिससे हैं असंगत इससे राज्य to राज्य.
Some states, such as Florida and California, have a large body of homeowner संघ विधि, और कुछ राज्य, ऐसे as मैसाचुसेट्स, have वस्तुतः no homeowner association law.
The fastest growing form of housing in the United States today is common-interest developments ( cids ), a श्रेणी कि शामिल planned-unit developments of single-family homes, condominiums, and cooperative apartments.
Since 1964, homeowner एसोसिएशन have become increasingly common in the USA.
The Community Associations Institute trade association अनुमानित कि hoas governed 24.8 लाख अमरीकी homes and 62 million residents in 2010.
A prize-winning lilac-and-white Silkie
There are many breeds of Guinea सुअर जिससे have महरूम विकसित चूंकि its domestication ca. 5000 BC.
Breeds vary widely in रूप और purpose, ranging इससे दिखाएँ breeds with long, flowing hair to those in use as model organisms by science.
From ca. 1200 AD to the Spanish conquest of the Inca Empire in 1532, selective प्रजनन by स्वदेशी दक्षिण अमरीकी peoples resulted in अनेक varieties of domestic Guinea pigs, which form the basis for some of the modern domestic breeds.
Early andean breeds यहूद primarily रखा as agricultural stock for food, and efforts at improving the Guinea pig as a food source continue to the modern era.
With the export of गिनी सूअर to यूरोपीय in the 15th सदी, the लक्ष्य in प्रजनन shifted to focus on the development of appealing pets.
To this end, विभिन्न प्रतिस्पर्धी प्रजनन संगठन were founded by fanciers.
The American Cavy Breeders Association, an adjunct to the अमरीकी खरगोश प्रजनक Association, is the governing body in the United States and Canada.
The British Cavy परिषद governs cavy clubs in the United Kingdom.
Similar organizations exist in Australia ( Australian National Cavy परिषद ) और नई जीलैंड ( New Zealand Cavy Club ).
Each club publishes इसके अपना मानक of Perfection and determines which breeds are eligible for showing.
New breeds continue to emerge in the 21st century.
Though there हैं अनेक breeds of गिनी सुअर, तभी a few breeds are commonly found on the show table as pets.
Most Guinea pigs found as pets were either found undesirable by breeders or were bred to be सुखद पालतु regardless of कैसा खूब वे मिलें the नस्ल मानक of पूर्णता.
The short hair, Abyssinian, Peruvian and sheltie ( उर्फ silkie ) breeds हैं those सबसे frequently seen as pets, and the former three are the core breeds in the history of the competitive showing of Guinea pigs.
In addition to their standard form, nearly सब breeds आइये in a साटन variant.
Satins, due to उनके खोखला बाल shafts, possess coats of a special gloss and shine.
However, वहीँ is growing प्रमाण कि the जीनों जिम्मेदार लिये the Satin coat also can cause severe bone problems, including Osteodystrophy and Paget 's disease.
Showing Satin variations is prohibited by कुछ cavy प्रजनक ' एसोसिएशन क्युकी of animal welfare reasons.
All cavy breeds have some shared general मानकों : the सिर प्रोफ़ाइल चाहिए be rounded, with large eyes and large, smooth ears.
The body should be दमदार और of कॉम्पैक्ट build.
Coat colour should in सब विसंगतियाँ be clearly defined and thorough from root to tip.
These standards are best met by long established, commonly bred breeds, as उनके प्रजनक have था पर्याप्त time and animals to effectively breed for these qualities.
The coat colour ideal of good definition and thoroughness is rarely मिले by अन्य than the चिकना coated breeds, जिससे have had well established, separate breeding lines for different colours.
राज्य स्कूलों ( भी ज्ञात as पब्लिक स्कूलों or सरकारी स्कूलों ) generally refer to प्राथमिक or द्वितीयक स्कूलों mandated for or offered to all children without charge paid for, in whole or in part, by taxation.
The term may also refer to संस्थानों of post-secondary शिक्षा वित्तपोषित, in whole or in part, and overseen by government.
The ribosome assembles polymeric प्रोटीन अणुओं जिनकी sequence is controlled by the sequence of messenger RNA molecules.
This is जरूरी by सब जीना cells and associated viruses.
The ribosome ( from ribonucleic acid and the Greek soma, meaning `` body '' ) is a large and complex molecular machine, मिला भीतर सब जीना कोशिकाएं, कि serves as the प्राथमिक साईट of biological protein synthesis ( translation ).
ribosomes कड़ी अमीनो acids साथ in the order specified by messenger RNA ( mRNA ) molecules.
Ribosomes consist of two major subunits—the small ribosomal subunit पढ़े the mrna, जबकि the विशाल subunit joins amino acids to form a polypeptide chain.
Each subunit is composed of one or अधिक ribosomal rna ( rrna ) molecules and a variety of proteins.
The sequence of DNA encoding for a protein may be copied many टाइम्स into मेसेंजर rna ( mrna ) जंजीरों of a similar sequence.
Ribosomes can bind to an mrna कड़ी और उपयोग it as a टेम्पलेट लिये determining the correct sequence of amino acids in a particular protein.
Amino acids are selected, collected और carried to the राइबोसोम by ट्रांसफ़र rna ( trna अणुओं ), जिससे डालें one part of the ribosome and bind to the messenger RNA chain.
the संलग्न अमीनो acids हैं then linked together by another part of the ribosome.
Once the protein is produced, it can तब 'fold ' to उपज a विशिष्ट functional three-dimensional structure.
A ribosome is made from complexes of RNAs and proteins and is इसलिए a ribonucleoprotein.
Each ribosome is divided into two subunits : the छोटी subunit बांधता to the mrna पैटर्न, जबकि the larger subunit बांधता to the tRNA and the amino acids.
When a राइबोसोम finishes पढना an mRNA molecule, these two subunits split apart.
Ribosomes are ribozymes, क्युकी the catalytic peptidyl transferase कार्यकलाप कि कड़ी अमीनो acids together is performed by the ribosomal RNA.
Ribosomes from जीवाणु, आर्किया और eukaryotes ( the three domains of life on Earth ) differ in their size, sequence, structure, and the ratio of protein to RNA.
The differences in structure allow some antibiotics to kill bacteria by inhibiting their ribosomes, जबकि leaving इंसान ribosomes unaffected.
In bacteria and archaea, more than one ribosome may move along a single mRNA chain at one time, each `` reading '' इसके अनुक्रम और producing a सम्बन्धित प्रोटीन molecule.
The ribosomes in the mitochondria of eukaryotic cells functionally resemble अनेक सुविधाएँ of those in जीवाणु, reflecting the likely evolutionary origin of mitochondria.
Albert Claude, ईसाई de duve, और जार्ज एमिल palade यहूद jointly awarded the नोबेल पुरस्कार in physiology or आयुर्विज्ञान, in 1974, for the discovery of the ribosomes.
The Nobel Prize in Chemistry 2009 was awarded to venkatraman रामकृष्णन, थामस A. steitz और एडीए E. yonath लिये determining the detailed structure and mechanism of the ribosome.
The सरलीकृत आतंरिक ढांचा of a हरितलवक
Overview of the Calvin साईकिल और कार्बन fixation
The light-independent reactions of photosynthesis are chemical reactions that बदलें कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड और अन्य यौगिकों into glucose.
These प्रतिक्रियाएँ occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled area of a chloroplast outside of the thylakoid membranes.
These reactions take the light-dependent reactions and perform further रासायनिक प्रक्रियाओं on them.
There are three phases to the light-independent reactions, collectively called the Calvin साईकिल : कार्बन fixation, कटौती प्रतिक्रियाएँ, और ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration.
Despite its name, this process occurs तभी जब लाइट is उपलब्धियाँ.
Plants do not carry आउट the calvin cycle by night.
They, instead, release sucrose into the फ्लोएम इससे उनके मंड reserves.
This process happens when light is available independent of the kind of photosynthesis ( c3 कार्बन fixation, c4 कार्बन fixation, और crassulacean एसिड चयापचय ) ; CAM plants store malic acid in their vacuoles every night and release it by day in order to make this process work.
In mathematics, a वर्गाकार क्रमांक or पूर्ण वर्गाकार is an पूर्णांक कि is the square of an integer ; in other words, it is the product of some integer with itself.
लिये उदाहरण, 9 is a वर्गाकार number, since it can be written as.
The usual notation for the formula for the square of a number is नहीं the उत्पाद, लकिन the समतुल्य घातांक, usually pronounced as `` squared ''.
The name वर्गाकार क्रमांक आता इससे the name of the shape ; see below.
Square संख्याएँ हैं non-negative.
Another way of saying that a ( non-negative ) क्रमांक is a वर्गाकार क्रमांक, is कि इसके वर्गाकार roots are again integers.
For example, = ±3, so 9 is a square number.
A positive integer that has no perfect square divisors मगर 1 is पुकारा square-free.
For a non-negative integer, the th square क्रमांक is, साथ होने the zeroth square.
The concept of square can be विस्तारित to कुछ अन्य number systems.
If rational numbers are included, then a square is the अनुपात of दो वर्गाकार integers, और, conversely, the ratio of two square integers is a square ( e.g., 4/9 = ( 2/3 ) 2 ).
Starting साथ 1, वहीँ हैं वर्गाकार संख्याएँ up to और including, where the expression represents the floor of the number.
The Era of शुभ जज्बात चिह्नित a काल in the राजनैतिक इतिहास of the संयुक्त राज्य that reflected a sense of national purpose and a desire for unity among Americans in the aftermath of the Napoleonic Wars.
The era saw the collapse of the Federalist Party and an end to the bitter partisan विवादों between it और the प्रबल democratic-republican पार्टी during the First Party System.
President James मुनरो endeavored to downplay दलगत संबद्ध in बनाना his nominations, with the ultimate goal of national unity and eliminating parties altogether from national politics.
the काल is so closely संबद्ध साथ मुनरो 's presidency ( 1817–1825 ) and his administrative goals that his name and the era are virtually synonymous.
The Era of Good Feelings marked a transition in American politics with the समाप्त of the federalist Party as America began to develop after the War of 1812.
While America was experiencing growth and prosperity after the युद्ध साथ ब्रिटेन, इस era भी marks the पहला उदाहरण of economic troubles in the growing United States.
Mirroring the अमरीकी प्रणाली प्रस्तावित by हेनरी मिट्टी, सुरक्षात्मक tariffs और the chartering of the दूसरी बैंको of the संयुक्त States complicated the tension between the North and South with the coming of the first financial crisis.
While the term “Era of Good Feelings” is usually viewed with irony because of the राजनैतिक turmoil, आर्थिक कारकों caused animosity between the North and South.
The designation of the period by historians as one of “good feelings” is often conveyed with irony or skepticism, as the इतिहास of the era थी एक in जिससे the राजनैतिक माहौल थी strained और divisive, विशेषकर among factions within the Monroe administration and the Republican Party.
The phrase “Era of Good Feelings” was coined by Benjamin Russell, in the Boston Federalist newspaper, Columbian Centinel, on July 12, 1817, following मुनरो 's विज़िट to बोस्टन, Massachusetts as part of his good will tour of America.
Mariel Margaret `` मिया '' hamm ( born कूच 17, 1972 ) is a रिटायर्ड American professional soccer player.
hamm निभाई अनेक सालो as a आगे लिये the संयुक्त राज्य महिलाओं 's national soccer team and was a founding member of the Washington Freedom.
Hamm scored 158 international goals, more than any other player, male or female, in the history of सॉकर और is the तीसरा सबसे capped मादा खिलाड़ी in सॉकर इतिहास पीछे kristine लिली और क्रिस्टी rampone, appearing in 275 international matches.
Hamm was named the महिलाओं 's फीफा संसार खिलाड़ी of the साल the पहला दो टाइम्स कि पुरस्कार थी दिए ( in 2001 और 2002 ), and is listed as one of FIFA 's 125 best living players ( as chosen by Pelé ).
She was inducted into the National Soccer Hall of Fame as well as the Alabama Sports Hall of कीर्ति और टेक्सास खेल हॉल of कीर्ति.
She is the author of Go For the Goal : A Champion 's Guide to Winning in Soccer और जीवन और appeared in the एचबीओ वृत्तचित्र हिम्मत to सपना : the स्टोरी of the u.S. Women 's Soccer Team.
Washington Post columnist Michael Wilbon called Hamm, `` Perhaps the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण खिलाड़ी of the पिछला 15 सालो. ''
Hamm takes a कोने kick.
The New York Red Bulls is an American professional soccer team based in Harrison, New Jersey, representing the नई यॉर्क महानगर क्षेत्रफल.
The team competes in the Eastern Conference of Major लीग सॉकर ( MLS ).
It is one of the टेन चार्टर क्लब of mls, having competed in the league since its inception.
The team was a founding member of MLS ( 1996 ), लकिन रै गए through several name changes.
The team was originally known as the New york/new जर्सी metrostars through 1997.
From the 1998 season through the 2005 ऋतु, the टोली थी known as the MetroStars.
On March 9, 2006, the team was बेची to रेड सांड gmbh, leading to the team 's current name.
They are the only original MLS मताधिकार नहीं to have जीती कोई significant ट्रॉफी ( सहित नियमित season, playoffs, and knockout competition ) since inception.
The team 's बेहतरीन परिणाम in the mls थी the MLS Cup final in 2008.
In the us खोलें कप, the metrostars पहुँचे तीन semifinals ( 1997, 1998, 2000 ), before reaching their first final in 2003, losing 1–0 to the Chicago Fire.
On August 26, 2000, the Metros ' Clint Mathis नियत an mls रिकार्ड by स्कोरिंग पाँच लक्ष्य in a game against the Dallas Burn.
Some well-known players that have played for the team include Giovanni Savarese, Tim Howard, Tony Meola, Tab Ramos, Alexi Lalas, Clint Mathis, Jozy Altidore, Michael Bradley, Claudio Reyna, एडी पोप, रॉबर्टो donadoni, lothar matthäus, एडोल्फो वालेंसिया, youri djorkaeff, amado ग्वेरा, जुआन पाब्लो ángel, thierry Henry, Juninho Pernambucano, Jan Gunnar Solli, Rafael Márquez, and Tim Cahill.
The team has also had well-known coaches, including Carlos Queiroz, Carlos Alberto parreira, बोरा milutinović, bob ब्राडली, mo johnston, ब्रूस एरिना और hans backe.
Confucianism, Taoism, और buddhism हैं एक, a पेंटिंग in the litang स्टाइल portraying three men laughing by a river stream, 12th century, Song Dynasty.
Estimating the number of Buddhists in the world, or in many countries, is difficult due to definitional मुद्दे as खूब as व्यावहारिक समस्याएं of enumeration.
To begin with, the religious beliefs, practices, and identities of East Asians ( who comprise the majority of the world 's Buddhists by कोई माप ) प्रायः मिश्रण buddhism साथ अन्य परंपराओं सहित confucianism, the चाइनीज लोक religion, Daoism, Shinto, and Korean shamanism.
सबसे अनुसरणकर्ता of buddhism do नहीं belong to संरचित congregations, or observe a definite अनुष्ठान of adherence such as taking Refuge, making it difficult to accurately estimate the number of practitioners.
An additional challenge is the hostility of अनेक नेशनल सरकारें ( प्रायः कम्युनिस्ट ones ऐसे as चीन or उत्तर कोरियाई ) to religion generally or to Buddhism specifically.
Government policies in these countries may encourage the under-reporting or non-reporting of religious adherence, resulting in आधिकारिक योग कि may drastically underestimate the क्रमांक of religious practitioners in these countries.
Estimate of the विश्वव्यापी बौद्ध जनसांख्यिकी दायरा इससे 350 लाख to over one billion, but cluster nearer to the first figure.
Adherents.com ( as of 2012 ) suggests a फिगर of 397 million.
By प्रमुख शाखाओं, the numbers are as follows:
( 1 ) Mahayana Buddhism, including East Asian Buddhism, with no fewer than 185 लाख adherents, और संभवतः अनेक टाइम्स कि अनेक ( again, depending on definitional issues ).
This is the predominant form of Buddhism practiced in चीन, दक्षिण कोरियाई, जापानी, ताईवान, सिंगापुर, and Vietnam.
( 2 ) Theravada Buddhism, साथ no कम than 125 million adherents.
This is the predominant रूप of buddhism practiced in कंबोडिया, Thailand, Laos, Sri Lanka, and Burma.
( 3 ) Vajrayana Buddhism, साथ लगभग 20 million adherents.
This form predominates in the greater Tibetan and मंगोलियाई regions, as खूब as in the हिमालय.
Besides the independent countries of Mongolia and Bhutan, and various territories within what is now western China, Vajrayana is traditional to certain regions of Russia ( e.g. Kalmykia, बुर्यातिया ), इण्डिया ( e.g. लद्दाख, सिक्किम ), और Nepal ( e.g. Khumbu ).
Vajrayana, also known as Tibetan Buddhism, is often conflated with Tantric Buddhism, but this is imprecise, as shingon और अन्य फ़ॉर्म of East Asian Buddhism also practice tantra.
At least 7 countries ( Sri Lanka, Thailand, कंबोडिया, लाओस, बर्मा, भूटान, और मंगोल ) have unambiguous Buddhist majorities.
Depending on कैसा एक calculates चाइनीज और अन्य ईस्ट एशियाई adherents, इस फिगर might expand to include several more countries.
In addition, Buddhism is the राज्य धर्म of कंबोडिया और भूटान, और receives prominent mention in the constitutions of Thailand and Sri Lanka.
In northern India और नेपाल, the land where Buddhism was born, the religion severely declined during the first millennium.
Whether this decline was due to the Islamic conquest of northern इण्डिया, or to अन्य कारकों, remains controversial.
देखिए the आलेख Decline of Buddhism in India.
James Butler Hickok ( May 27, 1837 – August 2, 1876 ), better ज्ञात as जंगली विधेयक hickok, थी a folk hero of the American Old West.
His skills as a gunfighter और स्काउट, साथ साथ उसके प्रतिष्ठा as a lawman, provided the basis for his fame, although some of his reported exploits are fictionalized.
Born and raised on a farm in rural Illinois, Hickok went west at age 18 as a fugitive from justice, first working as a stagecoach driver, before he became a lawman in the frontier territories of कान्सास और नेब्रास्का.
He fought for the Union Army during the American सिविल युद्ध, और gained publicity बाद the युद्ध as a scout, marksman, actor, and professional gambler.
Between his law-enforcement कर्तव्य और जुए, जिससे easily overlapped, hickok was involved in several notable shootouts.
he थी शॉट और मारे जबकि playing poker in the Nuttal & Mann 's Saloon in Deadwood, Dakota Territory ( now South Dakota ).
Artist 's conception of the Curiosity रोवर vaporizing चट्टान on Mars.
The rover उतरा on मंगल in August 2012.
A Mars rover is an automated motor vehicle which propels itself across the सतह of the ग्रह मंगल बाद लैंडिंग.
Rovers have several advantages over stationary landers : they examine more territory, they can be directed to interesting features, they can place themselves in sunny positions to मौसम शीत महीने और वे can अग्रिम the ज्ञान of कैसा to perform बहुत remote robotic vehicle control.
There have been four successful robotically संचालित मंगल rovers.
The Jet Propulsion Laboratory managed the मंगल pathfinder मिशन और इसके अभी निष्क्रिय sojourner rover.
It फिलहाल manages the मंगल खोजी रोवर मिशन 's क्रियाशील अवसर rover and inactive Spirit, and, as part of the Mars Science Laboratory mission, the Curiosity rover.
A financial audit, or more accurately, an audit of financial statements, is the verification of the वित्तीय कथन of a विधिक एंटिटी, साथ a दृश्य to एक्स्प्रेस an ऑडिट राय.
The audit opinion is intended to provide reasonable परख, लकिन नहीं निरपेक्ष परख, that the financial statements are presented fairly, in all material respects, and/or give a true and fair view in accordance with the financial reporting framework.
The purpose of an audit is provide and objective independent परिक्षा of the वित्तीय कथन, जिससे increases the मान और विश्वसनीयता of the वित्तीय कथन उत्पादित by management, thus increase user confidence in the financial statement, reduce investor risk and consequently reduce the cost of capital of the preparer of the financial statements.
वित्तीय audits हैं typically performed by firms of practicing accountants who are experts in financial reporting.
The financial audit is one of अनेक परख कृत्यों provided by हिसाब firms.
Many संगठन separately employ or hire आतंरिक auditors, जो do not attest to financial reports but focus mainly on the internal controls of the organization.
External auditors may choose to place limited रिलायंस on the कार्य of internal auditors.
Auditing promotes transparency and accuracy in the financial disclosures made by an organization, therefore would likely to reduce of such corporations to छिपाते unscrupulous dealings.
internationally, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मानकों on auditing ( isa ) जारी by the International Auditing and Assurance Standards Board ( IAASB ) is considered as the benchmark for audit process.
Almost all jurisdictions require auditors to follow the ISA or a local विभिन्नता of the isa.
Dollar coins have been minted in the United राज्य in सुनहरा, चांदी, और base metal versions.
The term silver dollar is often used for any large white metal coin issued by the संयुक्त राज्य साथ a फेस मान of एक डालर, हालांकि purists जिद कि a डालर is not silver unless it contains some of that metal.
Silver dollars, the first dollar coin समस्या, यहूद minted beginning in 1794.
Gold dollars and gold-colored dollars have also महरूम उत्पादित by the United States.
The Sacagawea and Presidential dollars are often referred to as `` सुनहरी डॉलर ''.
In modern times, dollar coins have not been very लोकप्रिय in the संयुक्त States.
despite प्रयत्न by the सरकारी to promote their use, most Americans currently use the one dollar bill rather than dollar coins.
In सीधा और स्तर उड़ान लिफ्ट ( L ) equals weight ( W ).
In a banked turn of 60°, लिफ्ट बराबरी दोगुना the वज़न ( L=2W ).
The पायलट अनुभवों 2g and a doubled weight.
The steeper the बैंको, the वृहद the g-forces.
This top-fuel dragster can accelerate इससे शून्य to in 0.86 सेकेंड.
This is a horizontal acceleration of 5.3 g. Combined with the vertical g-force in the stationary मामला the pythagorean प्रमेय yields a g फ़ोर्स of 5.4 g.
g-force ( with g इससे गुरुत्वाकर्षक ) is a पद लिये accelerations felt as weight and measurable by accelerometers.
It is not a force, प्रति se, लकिन a फ़ोर्स per unit mass.
Since such a force is आभास as a वज़न, कोई g-force can be वर्णित as a `` वज़न per unit mass '' ( see the synonym specific weight ).
The g-force acceleration acts as a multiplier of weight-like forces for every unit of an object 's mass, और ( सहेजें लिये निश्चित इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ोर्स प्रभाव ) is the कारण of an ऑब्जेक्ट 's acceleration in relation to free-fall.
This त्वरण अनुभवी by an object is due to the vector sum of non-gravitational forces acting on an object free to move.
The accelerations that are not उत्पादित by गम्भीरता हैं termed proper accelerations, and it is only these that are measured in g-force units.
They cause तनावों और strains on objects.
Because of ये strains, large g-forces may be destructive.
Gravitation acting alone does not उपज a g-force, even though g-forces are expressed in multiples of the acceleration of a standard gravity.
Thus, the standard गुरुत्वाकर्षक त्वरण at the धरती 's सतह produces g-force only indirectly, as a result of resistance to it by mechanical forces.
The 1 g-force on an object sitting on the Earth 's surface is caused by mechanical फ़ोर्स exerted in the upward दिशा by the मैदान, keeping the ऑब्जेक्ट from going into free-fall.
The upward फ़ोर्स इससे the मैदान ensures कि an ऑब्जेक्ट at बाकी on the धरती 's सतह is accelerating relative to the free-fall condition, which is the path that the object would follow when falling freely toward the Earth 's center.
Objects allowed to free-fall in an inertial trajectory under the influence of gravitation-only, महसूस no g-force.
This is demonstrated by the `` zero-g '' conditions inside a freely falling elevator falling toward the Earth 's center ( in वैक्यूम ), or ( to शुभ सन्निकटन ) शर्तें अंदर a spacecraft in धरती कक्षा.
These are उदाहरण of निर्देशांक त्वरण ( a change in velocity ) without a sensation of weight.
the अनुभव of no g-force ( zero-g ), however it is उत्पादित, is synonymous with weightlessness.
In the absence of gravitational fields, or in directions at right angles to them, proper and coordinate accelerations are the same, and any coordinate त्वरण जरूर be उत्पादित by a सम्बन्धित g-force acceleration.
An example here is a rocket in free space, in which simple changes in velocity are produced by the engines, and उपज g-forces on the प्रक्षेपास्त्र और यात्री.
An augur पकड़कर a lituus, the curved wand often used as a symbol of augury on Roman coins
The augur was a priest and आधिकारिक in the शास्त्रीय संसार, विशेषकर ancient Rome and Etruria.
His main role थी to interpret the होगा of the देवताओं by अध्ययन the उड़ान of पक्षियों : whether वे हैं flying in groups or alone, what noises they make as they fly, direction of flight and what kind of birds they are.
This was ज्ञात as `` लेने the auspices. ''
The ceremony and फलन of the augur थी सेंट्रल to कोई प्रमुख undertaking in रोमन society—public or private—including matters of war, commerce, and religion.
The Roman historian Livy stresses the importance of the augurs : `` जो करता नहीं जान कि इस नगर थी संस्थापित तभी बाद लेने the auspices, that everything in war and in peace, at home and abroad, was done only after taking the auspices ? ''
Farmington पहाड़ियाँ is an affluent community in southeastern Michigan.
it is the दूसरी largest नगर in Oakland County in the U.S. state of Michigan.
Its population was 79,740 at the 2010 census.
it is भाग of the upscale northwestern उपनगरों of Metropolitan Detroit and is also northeast of downtown Ann Arbor.
Farmington Hills consistently ranks as one of the safest cities in the संयुक्त राज्य, as खूब as in the राज्य of मिशिगन.
In 2010, the क्षेत्रफल क्रमित as the 30th safest city in America.
Although the two cities have separate services and addresses, farmington और farmington पहाड़ियाँ हैं प्रायः विचार of as the same community.
Features of the community include a recently संवर शहर, boutiques, a विंटेज सिनेमा, numerous रेस्तरां, exotic car dealerships, art galleries, and public parks including Heritage Park.
वहीँ हैं अनेक ऐतिहासिक sites including the Longacre House and the Governor Warner Mansion.
Both cities are served by farmington पब्लिक स्कूलों.
Farmington Hills serves as a major business center लिये the वृहद डेट्रॉयट क्षेत्रफल.
present-day छाप of a Late Bronze Age seal
Town मुहर ( मेट्रिक्स ) of Náchod from 1570
A seal is a device for making an impression in wax, clay, paper, or some other medium, including an embossment on paper, and is भी the छाप यूँ made.
The original purpose was to authenticate a दस्तावेज़, a wrapper लिये एक ऐसे as a आधुनिक लिफाफा, or the cover of a container or package holding valuables or other objects.
The sealing प्रक्रम is essentially कि of a सांचे, साथ the फाइनल चित्र represented on the device for making the impression by a mirror-image design, incised in sunken- ( or counter- ) relief or intaglio.
The seal-making device is also referred to as the मुहर मेट्रिक्स or die ; the imprint it creates as the seal impression ( or, more rarely, the sealing ).
If the impression is made purely as a relief resulting from the वृहद दबाव on the पेपर जहाँ the ऊँची भाग of the मेट्रिक्स टच, the मुहर is known as a dry seal ; in all other cases a liquid or liquified medium ( such as ink or wax ) is used, usually in another color than the paper.
लिये विधिक उद्देश्य, the परिभाषा of a मुहर may be extended to include rubber stamps, or writing specified words ( `` seal '' or `` L.S. `` ).
In the United States, the word `` seal '' is sometimes assigned to a facsimile of the seal design ( in मोनोक्रोम or रंग ), जिससे may be प्रयुक्त in a किस्में of contexts सहित architectural जमावट, on flags, or on official letterheads.
Thus, for example, the Great Seal of the संयुक्त राज्य, among अन्य उपयोग, appears on the reverse of the one-dollar bill ; and several of the seals of the U.S. states appear on their respective state flags.
in यूरोपीय, हालांकि coats of बाहें और heraldic badges may well feature in such contexts as well as on seals, the seal design in its entirety rarely appears as an emblem.
the पढ़ाई of seals is known as sigillography or sphragistics.
Groundhog Day ( पेन्सिलवेनिया जर्मनी : grundsaudaag, murmeltiertag ) is a day celebrated on February 2.
According to folklore, if it is cloudy जब a groundhog emerges इससे इसके burrow on इस दिन, तब वसन्त will come early ; if it is sunny, the groundhog will supposedly see its shadow and retreat back into its burrow, and the winter weather will continue for six more weeks.
Modern customs of the holiday involve celebrations where early morning festivals are held to देखें the groundhog उभरते इससे इसके burrow.
In southeastern पेन्सिलवेनिया, groundhog lodges ( grundsow lodges ) celebrate the अवकाश साथ fersommlinge, social events in which food is served, speeches are made, and one or more g'spiel ( plays or skits ) are performed for entertainment.
The पेन्सिलवेनिया जर्मनी dialect is the तभी भाषा बोला at the इवेंट, और those जो बोलो अंग्रेज़ी pay a penalty, usually in the form of a nickel, dime, or quarter per word spoken, with the money put into a bowl in the center of the table.
The largest groundhog दिन जश्न is आयोजित in punxsutawney, Pennsylvania.
Groundhog Day, already a widely recognized and popular tradition, received फैली ध्यान as a परिणाम of the 1993 फिल्मी groundhog दिन, जिससे थी नियत in punxsutawney, PA ( though filmed primarily in Woodstock, IL ) and portrayed Punxsutawney Phil.
High resolution image of tampa खाड़ी region
The Tampa Bay area has a humid subtropical climate ( Koppen Cfa ), with warm and humid summers with बारंबार thunderstorms और drier सर्दियों साथ जमने temperatures occurring प्रत्येक 2–3 years.
The area experiences a significant summer wet ऋतु, as nearly two-thirds of the सालाना वर्षण जलप्रपात in the months of June through September.
The area is listed by the United States Department of Agriculture ( USDA ) as होने in hardiness मण्डल 10, जिससे is परिचय the उत्तरी सीमा of जहाँ नारियल palms and royal palms can be grown.
Highs usually range between 65 and 95 °f ( 18 और 35 °c ) साल round.
Though known for hot summers, Tampa 's official high has never पहुँचे 100 °f ( 38 °c ) – the नगर 's all-time रिकार्ड तापमान is 99 °F ( 37 °C ).
St. पीटर्सबर्ग 's all-time रिकार्ड ऊँची is exactly 100 °F ( 38 °C ).
Pinellas County झूठ on a प्रायद्वीप between tampa खाड़ी और the गल्फ of मैक्सिको, and much of the city of Tampa lies on a smaller peninsula jutting out into Tampa Bay.
This proximity to large bodies of जल दोनो नरमपंथियों temperatures and introduces large amounts of humidity into the atmosphere.
In general, the local communities farthest from the coast have larger तापमान सीमाएँ, दोनो दौरान a सिंगल day and throughout the seasons of the year.
A आरेख of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम, प्रर्दशित various properties across the range of frequencies and wavelengths
The electromagnetic spectrum is the range of all possible बारंबारता of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण.
The `` electromagnetic वर्णक्रम '' of an ऑब्जेक्ट रै a अलग अर्थ, और is बजाय the characteristic distribution of electromagnetic radiation emitted or absorbed by that particular object.
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from below the low frequencies used for modern रेडियो संचार to गामा विकिरण at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end, thereby covering wavelengths from thousands of kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an atom.
The limit for long wavelengths is the size of the universe itself, while it is thought that the short wavelength limit is in the vicinity of the प्लांक लंबाई, हालांकि in principle the वर्णक्रम is अनन्त and continuous.
Most parts of the electromagnetic spectrum are used in science for spectroscopic और अन्य probing interactions, as ways to study and characterize matter.
In addition, radiation from various parts of the spectrum has found many other uses for communications और निर्माण ( देखिए इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण लिये अधिक अनुप्रयोग ).
लेजेंड
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30, 1882 – April 12, 1945 ), also known by his initials, FDR, was the 32nd President of the United राज्य ( 1933–1945 ) और a सेंट्रल फिगर in संसार कार्यक्रम दौरान the mid-20th सदी, leading the United States during a time of worldwide economic depression and total war.
A dominant leader of the Democratic Party and the only American president elected to more than two terms, he built a New Deal गठबन्धन कि realigned अमरीकी राजनीती बाद 1932, as उसके घरेलू policies defined American liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century.
With the bouncy लोकप्रिय सोंग `` प्रसन्न दिनों हैं यहाँ again `` as उसके अभियान theme, FDR defeated incumbent Republican Herbert Hoover in November 1932, at the depth of the Great Depression.
Energized by his personal victory over polio, FDR 's unfailing आशावाद और सक्रियता contributed to a renewal of the national spirit.
He worked closely with British प्रधान मंत्री विंस्टन चर्चिल और सोवियत सामान्य Secretary Joseph Stalin in leading the Allies against Germany and Japan in World War II, and restoring prosperity to the nation 's economy.
In his first hundred days in office, which began March 4, 1933, Roosevelt spearheaded major legislation and issued a profusion of executive orders that instituted the New Deal —a variety of programs designed to produce relief ( government jobs for the unemployed ), रिकवरी ( आर्थिक विकास ), and reform ( through regulation of Wall Street, banks and transportation ).
The economy improved rapidly from 1933 to 1937, लकिन तब relapsed into a deep recession.
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented उसके पैकिंग the परम् अदालत or गुजर कोई considerable विधान ; it abolished many of the relief programs when unemployment diminished during World War II.
Most of the regulations on business were ended परिचय 1975–85, मगर लिये the विनियमन of वॉल Street by the Securities and Exchange Commission, which still exists.
Along with several smaller programs, major surviving programs include the Federal Deposit बीमे निगम, जिससे थी निर्मित in 1933, और सोशल सुरक्षा, जिससे कॉंग्रेस passed in 1935.
As World War II loomed after 1938, with the Japanese invasion of China and the aggression of Nazi Germany, FDR gave strong राजनयिक और वित्तीय support to चीन और ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, जबकि बाकी officially न्यूट्रल.
His goal was to मेक अमेरिका the `` आर्सेनल of लोकतंत्र `` which would supply munitions to the Allies.
In कूच 1941, रूज़वेल्ट, with Congressional approval, provided Lend-Lease aid to the countries fighting against Nazi Germany with Britain.
With very strong national support, he made war on Japan and Germany after the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor on December 7, 1941, कॉलिंग it a `` तिथि जिससे होगा सजीव in infamy ``.
He supervised the mobilization of the U.S. economy to support the Allied war effort.
As an active military leader, Roosevelt implemented an overall युद्ध रणनीति on दो fronts that ended in the defeat of the Axis Powers and the development of the world 's first atom bomb.
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the internment of 100,000 जापानी अमरीकी civilians.
Unemployment dropped to 2 %, राहत कार्यक्रम largely ended, और the औद्योगिक अर्थव्यवस्था grew rapidly to new heights as millions of people moved to new jobs in war centers, and 16 million men and 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered for military service.
रूज़वेल्ट वर्चस्व the अमरीकी राजनैतिक झाँकी नहीं only during the twelve years of his presidency, but also for decades afterward.
He orchestrated the realignment of voters that निर्मित the पांचवां पार्टी System.
FDR 's New Deal Coalition संयुक्त मजदूर संघ, बिग नगर मशीने, श्वेत ethnics, अफ़्रीकी Americans and rural white Southerners.
He also influenced the later creation of the United राष्ट्र और bretton वुड्स.
Roosevelt is consistently rated by विद्वानों as एक of the शीर्ष three U.S. Presidents, along with Abraham Lincoln and George Washington.
A liberal Democrat, Roosevelt defined his वैचारिक स्थिति as `` a छोटी बाएँ of बीच. ''
A Joint Committee is a term in politics कि is प्रयुक्त to refer to a कमेटी बना up of सदस्यों of both chambers of a bicameral legislature.
In other contexts, it refers to a committee with members from more than one organization.
The regulation of prostitution in the United States is not among the enumerated powers of the federal government ; Under the Tenth Amendment to the United राज्य संविधान, it is इसलिए exclusively the डोमेन of the राज्य to परमिट, prohibit, or वरना विनियमित वाणिज्यिक sex, except insofar as Congress may regulate it as part of interstate commerce with laws like the Mann Act.
In most states, prostitution is considered a misdemeanor in the श्रेणी of पब्लिक अनुक्रम अपराधों, a अपराधों कि disrupts the order of a community.
It was at one time considered to be a vagrancy अपराधों.
Currently, Nevada is the only state to allow brothel prostitution, the शर्तें of जिससे हैं stipulated in the Nevada Revised Statutes.
Only 8 counties currently contain क्रियाशील brothels.
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( which contains the Las Vegas–Paradise metropolitan area ), Washoe County ( which contains Reno ), कार्सन नगर, डगलस काउंटी, और lincoln County.
The अन्य काउंटी theoretically allow वेश्यालय prostitution, but some of these counties currently have no active brothels.
Street prostitution, `` pandering, '' and जीना बंद of the proceeds of a वेश्या remain illegal under Nevada law, as elsewhere in the country.
As with other देशों, वेश्यावृति in the संयुक्त राज्य can be विभाजित into three broad categories : street prostitution, brothel prostitution, and escort prostitution.
The national flag of the United States of America, often simply referred to as the American flag, consists of thirteen equal horizontal stripes of red ( top and bottom ) alternating with white, with a ब्लू आयताकार in the कैण्टन ( referred to specifically as the `` संघ '' ) bearing पचास small, white, five-pointed stars arranged in nine offset horizontal rows of six stars ( top and bottom ) alternating with rows of five stars.
The 50 stars on the flag represent the 50 states of the United States of America and the 13 stripes represent the thirteen British colonies कि घोषित स्वतंत्रता इससे the किंगडम of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन and became the first states in the Union.
Nicknames लिये the ध्वज शामिल the `` सितारों and Stripes '', `` Old Glory ``, and `` The Star-Spangled Banner. ''
India is a federal union of states comprising twenty-eight राज्य और सात संघ territories.
The states and territories हैं further subdivided into districts and so on.
congressional जिले लिये the 113th United States Congress
2010 जनसांख्यिकी change:
Change in apportionment of congressional जिले, starting in 2013, as a result of the 2010 census.
2000 जनसांख्यिकी change:
Change in apportionment of congressional districts, from 2003 to 2013, as a result of the 2000 census.
This is a complete list of congressional districts for प्रतिनिधित्व in the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि.
the मात्रा ( apportionment ) और सीमाएँ ( redistricting ) of जिले are determined after each census, although in some cases states have changed the boundaries more than once per census.
This सूची शामिल the 435 वर्तमान और over 200 obsolete districts.
For example, since the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी, नेब्रास्का has had three districts, but it used to have as many as six.
In the first दशक of the twenty-first सदी, टेक्सास था 32 districts, but has since added four due to reapportionment as a result of the 2010 census.
Other states have lost districts since the number of congressional सीटे रै महरूम नियत at 435 by statute.
भी शामिल यहाँ हैं non-voting delegations : six current and four obsolete.
The सीमाएँ of जिले प्रायः shift with each redistricting.
Over time, the region और जनसांख्यिकी represented in a ज़िला can change substantially.
Furthermore, districts sometimes retain the same boundaries जबकि बदलना उनके ज़िला संख्याएँ.
Mariah Carey ( born March 27, 1970 ) is an अमरीकी सिंगर, songwriter, record producer, actress, and philanthropist.
Under the guidance of Columbia Records कार्यपालिका टॉमी mottola, कैरी released उसके self-titled डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम mariah कैरी in 1990 ; it गई multi-platinum and spawned four consecutive number one singles on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 chart.
Following her marriage to mottola in 1993 और कामयाबी साथ hit रिकॉर्ड भाव ( 1991 ), म्यूज़िक Box ( 1993 ), and Merry Christmas ( 1994 ), Carey was established as Columbia 's highest-selling act.
Daydream ( 1995 ) made music history when its second single `` One Sweet Day ``, a duet with Boyz II Men, spent a record sixteen सप्ताह on शीर्ष of the बिलबोर्ड hot 100, और remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. chart history.
During the recording of the album, Carey began to deviate from her R & B and pop beginnings और धीरे traversed into hip hop.
This musical change became evident with the release of Butterfly ( 1997 ), at जिससे समय कैरी था अलग इससे mottola.
Carey बाएँ कोलंबिया in 2000, और हस्ताक्षरित a record-breaking $ 100 million recording contract with Virgin Records.
Before the release of her first feature film Glitter ( 2001 ), she suffered a physical and emotional विश्लेषण और थी hospitalized लिये कठोर थकावट.
Following the film 's ग़रीब रिसेप्शन, वो थी खरीदा आउट of उसके रिकॉर्डिंग contract for $ 50 million, which led to a decline in her career.
She signed a multi-million dollar contract deal with Island Records in 2002, and after an unsuccessful काल, लौटे to the शीर्ष of म्यूज़िक चार्ट साथ the emancipation of मिमी ( 2005 ).
Its second single `` we belong साथ `` became her most successful single of the 2000s, and was later named `` Song of the Decade '' by Billboard.
Carey once again ventured into film with a well-received अभिनीत भूमिका in ( 2009 ) ; वो थी awarded the `` भेदन प्रदर्शन पुरस्कार '' at the Palm Springs International Film Festival, and Black Reel and NAACP Image Award nominations.
In a career spanning over दो दशकों, कैरी रै बेची अधिक than 200 लाख रिकॉर्ड worldwide, making her one of the best-selling music artists of all time.
In 1998, she was honored as the world 's best-selling recording artist of the 1990s at the संसार म्यूज़िक Awards.
Carey was also named the best-selling female artist of the millennium in 2000.
According to the Recording Industry Association of America, she is the तीसरा best-selling मादा कलाकार in the संयुक्त राज्य, with 63.5 million certified albums.
With the release of `` Touch My Body `` ( 2008 ), Carey gained her eighteenth क्रमांक एक सिंगल in the संयुक्त राज्य, अधिक than कोई अन्य solo artist.
In 2012, कैरी थी क्रमित दूसरी on vh1 's सूची of the `` 100 Greatest Women in Music ''.
Aside from her commercial accomplishments, Carey has won five Grammy Awards, 17 संसार म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार, 11 अमरीकी म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार, और 31 बिलबोर्ड Music Awards.
referred to as the `` songbird परम् '' by the Guinness World Records, she is famed for her five-octave vocal range, power, melismatic style and signature use of the whistle register.

In meteorology, a cloud is a visible mass of द्रव droplets or frozen crystals made of water or various chemicals suspended in the atmosphere above the surface of a planetary body.
ये निलंबित अणु are also known as aerosols.
Clouds in धरती 's माहौल हैं पढ़ाई in the cloud physics branch of meteorology.
Two processes, possibly acting together, can lead to air becoming संतृप्त ; कूलिंग the एयर or adding जल वाष्प to the air.
In general, वर्षण होगा पतन to the सतह ; an exception is virga, which evaporates before reaching the surface.
The international cloud classification system is based on the fact clouds in their most basic forms can show free-convective upward विकास जैसे कपासी, appear in non-convective परतदार चादरें such as stratus, or take the form of thin fibrous wisps, as in the case of cirrus.
Prefixes are used in connection with clouds to express variations or complexities in these basic forms or to बताएँ मध्य or ऊँची ऊँचाई सीमाएँ.
These include strato- for low clouds with limited convection that form mostly in uneven layers, cumulo- for complex highly-convective storm clouds, nimbo- for thick layered clouds of some complexity that can produce moderate to भारी वर्षण, alto- लिये मध्य बादल, और cirro- लिये ऊँची बादल ; the latter दो of जिससे may be of simple or moderately complex structure.
Whether or not a cloud is low, middle, or ऊँची स्तर depends on कैसा दूर ऊपर the ground its base forms.
Cloud types with significant लंबवत extent can रूप in the low or middle altitude ranges depending on the moisture content of the air.
Clouds in the troposphere have Latin names due to the लोकप्रिय अनुकूलन of ल्यूक हावर्ड 's बादल categorization प्रणाली, which began to spread in popularity during December 1802.
Synoptic surface weather observations use code numbers to record and report the types of tropospheric cloud visible at each scheduled अवलोकन समय आधारित on the ऊँचाई और शारीरिक appearance of the clouds.
While a majority of clouds form in Earth 's troposphere, वहीँ हैं अवसरों जब बादल in the stratosphere and mesosphere can be observed.
These three main layers of the atmosphere जहाँ बादल may be देखी हैं collectively known as the homosphere.
Above this lies the thermosphere and exosphere, which साथ मेक up the heterosphere कि marks the परिवर्तन to outer space.
Clouds have been observed on other planets और moons भीतर the सौर प्रणाली, लकिन, due to उनके अलग तापमान विशेषताएँ, they are composed of other substances such as methane, ammonia, and sulfuric acid.
Galveston County is a काउंटी स्तिथ in the U.S. state of Texas within the Houston–Sugar Land–Baytown metropolitan area.
As of the 2010 census, the जनसांख्यिकी थी 291,309.
Its county seat is galveston.
League City is the largest city in Galveston County in terms of population ; URL_http between 2000 और 2005 it surpassed galveston as the काउंटी 's largest नगर.
galveston काउंटी थी founded in 1838.

The Big Ten Conference, formerly Western Conference and Big नौ सम्मेलन, is the oldest प्रभाग i college athletic conference in the United States.
Its twelve member institutions ( which are primarily flagship research universities in their respective states, well-regarded academically, और साथ अपेक्षाकृत विशाल छात्र नामांकन ) are located primarily in the Midwest, stretching from Nebraska in the west to Penn State in the east.
The conference competes in the NCAA 's Division I ; its football teams compete in the Football Bowl Subdivision ( FBS ), formerly known as प्रभाग i-a, the उच्चतम स्तर of ncaa प्रतियोगिता in that sport.
Member schools of the बिग टेन ( or, in दो मामले, उनके जनक विश्वविद्यालयों प्रणालियों ) भी हैं सदस्यों of the Committee on Institutional Cooperation, a leading educational and research consortium.
Despite the conference 's name, the Big Ten actually consists of 12 स्कूलों, following the जोड of the पेन्सिलवेनिया राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों in 1993 and the University of Nebraska–Lincoln in 2011.
In 2014, the conference will expand to 14 members with the additions of the University of मेरीलैंड, कॉलेज पार्क और rutgers, the राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों of नई जर्सी.
It is not to be confused with the Big 12 Conference, which रै तभी टेन स्कूलों और represents a अलग region of the country.
Single Malt Scotch is single malt whisky made in Scotland using a घट स्टिल आसवन प्रक्रम at a सिंगल डिस्टिलरी, with malted barley as the only grain ingredient.
As with any Scotch whisky, a सिंगल malt स्कॉच जरूर be आसुत in स्कॉटलैंड और matured in oak casks in Scotland for at least three years ( most single malts are matured longer ).
`` Malt '' indicates that the व्हिस्की is आसुत from a `` malted '' grain.
Several types of grains can be malted ( for example, barley, rye और गेहूं हैं सब दाने जिससे can be malted ) ; however, in the मामला of सिंगल malt Scotch, barley is always the only grain used.
`` Single '' indicates that all the malts in the बोतल आइये इससे a सिंगल डिस्टिलरी.
Bottlings containing malt whisky from multiple distilleries हैं पुकारा `` blended malt ``.
Until the Scotch व्हिस्की regulations 2009 ( swr 2009 ), the शब्द `` blended '' तभी appeared ( in the context of Scotch whisky ) on bottles of whisky that contained a mixture of both barley and non-barley grain whisky, but this is no longer the case.
Under the शब्दावली स्थापित by the swr 2009, a `` blended malt स्कॉच व्हिस्की '' is a मिश्रण of सिंगल malt स्कॉच whiskies, not a mixture of malted barley whisky and non-barley whisky ; those are called `` blended Scotch whisky '', without the word `` malt ''.
The term `` blended malt '' replaced `` vatted malt '' used under the prior labelling conventions.
The age statement on a bottle of सिंगल malt स्कॉच is the क्रमांक of सालो the व्हिस्की spent maturing in cask.
As very few whiskies are bottled from a single cask the age बयान reflects the आयु of the youngest malt in the mix.
A texture may be arranged so as to, `` closely approach the single-object status of fused-ensemble timbres, लिये उदाहरण, the खूबसूरत 'northern लाइट्स ' कॉर्ड..., in a बहुत दिलचस्प वितरण of pitches, produces a fused sound supported by a suspended cymbal roll `` ( Erickson ( 1975 ), p.166 & 168 ).
In contrast to more traditional musical textures, sound mass composition `` minimizes the महत्व of व्यक्तिगत pitches in वरीयता लिये बनावट, timbre, and dynamics as primary shapers of gesture and impact. ''
Developed from the modernist टोन क्लस्टर और स्प्रेड to orchestral लिखने by the लेट 1950s और 1960s, sound-mass `` obscures the boundary between sound and noise `` ( Edwards 2001, pp. 326–27 ).
तकनीकों जिससे may बनाएँ or be प्रयुक्त साथ ध्वनि द्रव्यमान शामिल विस्तारित तकनीकों ऐसे as muted brass or strings, flutter tonguing, wide vibrato, extreme ranges, and glissandos.
Composers and works include बारबरा kolb, pauline oliveros ' ध्वनि पैटर्न लिये कोरस ( 1961 ), norma Beecroft 's From Dreams of Brass for chorus ( 1963–1964 ), and Nancy Van de Vate.
Beecroft `` blurs individual pitches in एहसान of a सामूहिक timbre through the उपयोग of गायन and instrumental clusters, choral speech, narrator, and a wash of sounds from an electronic tape. ''
( ibid )
A very early example is the opening of Jean-Féry Rebel 's ballet Les Elémens ( 1737–38 ), where अराजकता is represented by a धीरे cumulating orchestral cluster of all seven notes of the D minor scale ( Henck 2004, pp. 52–54 ).
A later example is the third गति of रुथ क्रॉफर्ड seeger 's स्ट्रिंग quartet 1931 ( nonesuch h-71280 ) जबकि अधिक recently Phill Niblock 's multiple drone based music serves as an example.
The use of `` chords approaching timbres '' begins with Debussy and Edgard Varèse often carefully scored individual instrumental भाग so कि वे होता फ्यूज into एक ensemble timbre or ध्वनि द्रव्यमान ( एरिक्सन 1975, pp. 18 and 21 ).
Other examples include यूरोपीय `` textural '' रचनाएं of the fifties और sixties ऐसे as krzysztof penderecki 's threnody to the पीड़ितों of Hiroshima ( 1959 ) and György Ligeti 's works featuring micropolyphony in works like Atmosphères ( 1961 ) and his Requiem ( 1963-65 ).
Other composers with works using this technique include Henryk Górecki, karel husa, witold lutosławski, kazimierz Serocki, and Steven Stucky.
Sound mass techniques भी appear in the म्यूज़िक of जार्ज Crumb ( Anon. n.d. ).

Pupils in rural सूडान, 2002
A छात्र is a learner, or किसी जो attends an educational institution.
In some nations, the English term ( or its cognate in another language ) is reserved for those who attend university, while a schoolchild under the age of eighteen is called a pupil in English ( or an समतुल्य in अन्य भाषाएं ), हालांकि in the संयुक्त राज्य a व्यक्ति नामांकित in ग्रेड k–12 is often called a student.
In its widest use, student is प्रयुक्त लिये anyone जो is learning.
Australia is a महाद्वीप comprising मेनलैंड ऑस्ट्रेलिया, तस्मानिया, नई गिनी, seram, possibly Timor, and neighbouring islands.
The continent is sometimes known in technical contexts by the names sahul, australinea or meganesia, to distinguish it from the Australian mainland.
It is the smallest of the seven traditional continents in the अंग्रेज़ी conception.
New Zealand is not part of the महाद्वीप of ऑस्ट्रेलिया, लकिन of the separate, submerged continent of Zealandia.
zealandia और ऑस्ट्रेलिया हैं दोनो भाग of the wider regions known as Australasia and Oceania.
The continent of Australia lies on a continental shelf overlain by shallow seas which divide it into several landmasses — the Arafura Sea and Torres Strait between मेनलैंड ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई गिनी, और बास जलसन्धि between मेनलैंड ऑस्ट्रेलिया और तस्मानिया.
When समुद्र स्तर यहूद निम्नतर दौरान the pleistocene बर्फ आयु, सहित the last glacial maximum about 18,000 BC, they were connected by dry land.
During the past ten thousand years, rising sea levels overflowed the lowlands and separated the continent into today 's low-lying arid to semi-arid मेनलैंड और the दो mountainous आइलैंड्स of नई Guinea and Tasmania.
Geologically, a continent extends to the edge of its continental shelf, so the now-separate आइलैंड्स हैं माना part of the continent.
Due to the spread of animals, fungi and plants across the single Pleistocene landmass the पृथक lands have a सम्बन्धित biota.
Central Park is nearly twice as बिग as the संसार 's second-smallest country, Monaco.
Historically its reservoirs were महत्वपूर्ण components of the city 's water supply.
Environmental issues in New York City are affected by the city 's size, घनत्व, abundant पब्लिक परिवहन अवसंरचना, और स्थान at the mouth of the Hudson River.
New York 's population density has पर्यावरणीय फायदे and cons.
It facilitates the उच्चतम mass transit use in the United States, but also concentrates pollution.
Gasoline खपत in the नगर is at the रेट the नेशनल औसत थी in the 1920s, और ग्रीनहाउस gas emissions are a fraction of the national average, at 7.1 metric tons per person per year, below San Francisco, at 11.2 metric tons, and the national average, at 24.5 metric tons.
New York City खाते लिये तभी 1 % of संयुक्त States greenhouse gas emissions while housing 2.7 % of its population.
in सितंबर 2012, नई यॉर्क थी नामित the # 1 `` America 's Dirtiest City, '' by a Travel+Leisure readership survey that rated the environmental quality of 35 prominent cities in the United States.
Atlanta (, stressed, locally ) is the पूंजी of और the सबसे populous नगर in the U.S. state of Georgia, with an estimated 2011 population of 432,427.
Atlanta is the cultural and economic center of the अटलांटा महानगर क्षेत्रफल, घर to 5,457,831 people and the ninth largest metropolitan area in the United States.
Atlanta is the county seat of Fulton काउंटी, और a छोटी portion of the city extends eastward into DeKalb County.
Atlanta was established in 1837 at the चौराहे of दो रेलरोड लाइनों, और the नगर rose from the ashes of the Civil War to become a national center of commerce.
In the decades following the Civil Rights Movement, during which the city earned a reputation as `` too busy to hate '' for the प्रगतिशील दृश्य of इसके नागरिकों और नेताओ, अटलांटा attained अंतरराष्ट्रीय prominence.
Atlanta is the primary transportation hub of the Southeastern संयुक्त राज्य, via राजमार्ग, रेलरोड, और एयर, साथ hartsfield–jackson Atlanta International Airport being the world 's busiest airport since 1998.
अटलांटा is माना an `` अल्फा ( - ) संसार नगर, '' और, साथ a gross domestic product of US $ 270 billion, Atlanta’s economy ranks 15th among world cities and sixth in the nation.
Although Atlanta’s economy is considered diverse, dominant sectors include logistics, professional and business services, media परिचालन, सरकारी प्रशासन, और उच्चतर शिक्षा.
Topographically, Atlanta is marked by rolling hills and घना पेड़ कवरेज.
Revitalization of Atlanta 's neighborhoods, initially spurred by the 1996 ओलंपिक, रै intensified in the 21st सदी, altering the city 's demographics, politics, and culture.
A 1947 प्रचार कॉमिक किताब प्रकाशित by the catechetical गिल्ड Educational Society raising the specter of a Communist takeover
McCarthyism is the practice of making आरोपों of disloyalty, subversion, or treason without proper regard for evidence.
It also means `` the practice of making unfair allegations or using unfair investigative तकनीकों, विशेषकर in अनुक्रम to सीमित dissent or राजनैतिक criticism. ''
The term has its origins in the काल in the संयुक्त राज्य ज्ञात as the दूसरी रेड scare, स्थायी roughly इससे 1950 to 1956 और characterized by heightened fears of communist influence on American institutions and espionage by Soviet agents.
Originally coined to criticize the anti-communist pursuits of रिपब्लिकन u.s. सीनेटर जोसेफ मैकार्थी of विस्कॉन्सिन, `` McCarthyism '' soon took on a broader meaning, describing the excesses of similar efforts.
The term is also now used more generally to describe reckless, unsubstantiated आरोपों, as खूब as demagogic हमले on the अक्षर or patriotism of political adversaries.
During the McCarthy era, thousands of Americans were accused of being Communists or communist sympathizers और became the विषय of आक्रामक investigations और questioning पहले सरकारी or private-industry panels, committees and agencies.
The primary targets of ऐसे suspicions यहूद सरकारी कर्मचारी, those in the entertainment industry, educators and union activists.
suspicions यहूद प्रायः दिए credence despite inconclusive or questionable evidence, and the level of threat posed by a person 's real or supposed leftist associations or beliefs was often greatly exaggerated.
Many people suffered loss of employment and/or विनाश of उनके करियर ; कुछ भी suffered imprisonment.
Most of these punishments came about through trial verdicts later overturned, laws that would be declared unconstitutional, dismissals for reasons later घोषित illegal or actionable, or extra-legal प्रक्रियाओं कि होता आइये into सामान्य disrepute.
The most famous examples of McCarthyism include the speeches, investigations, and hearings of Senator McCarthy himself ; the Hollywood blacklist, संबद्ध साथ hearings conducted by the हाउस un-american क्रियाएँ कमेटी ( huac ) ; और the विभिन्न anti-communist क्रियाएँ of the Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) under Director J. Edgar Hoover.
McCarthyism was a widespread social and cultural phenomenon that प्रभावित सब स्तर of समाज और थी the सोर्स of a ग्रेट सौदे of बहस and conflict in the United States.
Napoleon is a fictional अक्षर और the प्रमुख विपक्षी in जार्ज Orwell 's Animal Farm.
While he is at first a आम फार्म सुअर, he gets rid of Snowball, another pig which shares the power.
He then takes advantage of the animals ' uprising against their masters to eventually become the tyrannical `` अध्यक्ष of एनिमल फार्म, '' जिससे he turns into a dictatorship.

The NEPTUNE Canada project is the world’s first regional-scale भाटे समंदर वेधशाला कि plugs directly into the Internet.
Since December 2009, it has allowed people to `` surf '' the seafloor जबकि समंदर वैज्ञानिकों चलाएं deep-water प्रयोग इससे लैब्स और विश्वविद्यालयों around the world.
Along with its sister project, VENUS, NEPTUNE offers a अद्वितीय दृष्टिकोण to समंदर विज्ञान.
Traditionally, ocean scientists have relied on infrequent ship cruises or space-based satellites to carry आउट उनके शोध, जबकि the वरुण project uses a remotely operated crawler.

In the 1960s, the नाम थी transferred to चकमा 's mid-size entry.
ARM9 is an भुजा वास्तुकला 32-bit RISC CPU family.
Commonwealth is a traditional English term for a political जातियाँ संस्थापित लिये the आम good.
Historically, it has sometimes महरूम synonymous with `` republic ``.
More recently it रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये fraternal associations of some sovereign nations.
Most notably, the Commonwealth of Nations, an association primarily of पूर्व सदस्यों of the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य, is प्रायः referred to as बस `` the राष्ट्रमंडल ''.
The September 11 attacks ( also referred to as September 11, September 11th, or 9/11 ) were a series of four coordinated terrorist attacks launched by the Islamic terrorist group al-Qaeda upon the United States in New York City and the वॉशिंगटन, d.C. क्षेत्रफल on सितंबर 11, 2001.
Four passenger airliners were hijacked by 19 al-Qaeda terrorists so वे could be flown into इमारतें in suicide attacks.
Two of those planes, American Airlines Flight 11 और संयुक्त एयरलाइंस उड़ान 175, यहूद क्रैश into the North and South towers, respectively, of the World Trade Center complex in New York City.
Within two hours, both towers collapsed साथ मलबा और the resulting फ़ायर causing आंशिक or पूरा पतन of सब other buildings in the WTC complex, as well as major damage to ten other large surrounding structures.
A third plane, American Airlines Flight 77, was crashed into the प्रस्तुतीकरण ( the मुख्यालय of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of रक्षा ), leading to a partial collapse in its western side.
The fourth plane, United Airlines Flight 93, was targeted at the United States Capitol in Washington, D.C., but क्रैश into a फ़ील्ड निकट shanksville, पेन्सिलवेनिया, बाद इसके यात्री आजमाया to overcome the hijackers.
In total, लगभग 3,000 लोगों died in the हमले, including the 227 civilians and 19 hijackers aboard the four planes.
suspicion जल्दी fell on al-Qaeda.
Although the group 's leader, ओसामा बिन लादेन, initially अस्वीकृत any involvement, in 2004 he claimed responsibility for the attacks.
Al-Qaeda and बिन लादेन cited u.S. support of इसराईल, the उपस्थिति of U.S. troops in Saudi Arabia, and sanctions against Iraq as motives for the attacks.
The United States responded to the हमले by शुभारंभ the युद्ध on आतंक and invading Afghanistan to depose the Taliban, which had harbored al-Qaeda.
Many countries strengthened their anti-terrorism विधान और विस्तारित विधि प्रवर्तन powers.
having evaded कैप्चर लिये सालो, बिन लादेन was located and killed by U.S. forces in May 2011.
The destruction of the Twin Towers and other properties caused serious damage to the अर्थव्यवस्था of निम्नतर मैनहटन और था a significant प्रभाव on global markets.
Cleanup of the संसार व्यापार बीच साईट थी समाप्त in May 2002, and the Pentagon was repaired within a year.
numerous memorials have महरूम constructed, सहित the National September 11 Memorial & Museum in New York, the Pentagon Memorial, and the Flight 93 National Memorial in Pennsylvania.
After a lengthy विलंब, the एक संसार Trade Center is expected to be completed at Ground Zero in New York City in 2013.
Crater Lake National Park is a संयुक्त राज्य नेशनल पार्क located in southern Oregon.
स्थापित in 1902, crater झील नेशनल Park is the fifth oldest national park in the United States and the only one in the state of Oregon.
The park encompasses the caldera of Crater Lake, a remnant of a नष्ट ज्वालामुखी, माउंट mazama, और the surrounding hills and forests.
The lake is deep at its deepest point, which makes it the deepest lake in the United States, the second deepest in उत्तर अमेरिका और the नवीं deepest in the संसार.
Crater Lake is often referred to as the seventh deepest lake in the world, but this former listing excludes the approximately depth of subglacial Lake Vostok in अंटार्कटिक, जिससे resides अंतर्गत nearly of बर्फ, और the हाल रपट of a maximum depth for Lake O'Higgins /San Martin, located on the border of Chile and Argentina.
However, when comparing its average depth of to the average गहराई of अन्य गहन झीलों, Crater Lake becomes the deepest in the Western Hemisphere and the third deepest in the world.
The impressive average depth of this volcanic lake is due to the nearly symmetrical deep caldera formed 7,700 years ago during the violent climactic eruptions and subsequent collapse of माउंट mazama और the अपेक्षाकृत नम जलवायु कि is ठेठ of the crest of the cascade Range.
The caldera रिम सीमाएँ in उन्नयन from.
The United States geological सर्वेक्षण benchmarked elevation of the lake surface itself is.
This नेशनल पार्क encompasses.
crater झील रै no स्ट्रीम flowing into or out of it.
All water that enters the lake is आखिरकार खोया इससे वाष्पीकरण or subsurface seepage.
The lake 's water commonly has a striking blue hue, and the lake is re-filled entirely इससे सीधा वर्षण in the form of snow and rain.
The Supreme Court of the संयुक्त राज्य is the उच्चतम अदालत in the United States.
It has ultimate ( and largely discretionary ) appellate jurisdiction over all federal courts and over state court cases involving issues of संघीय विधि, और असली क्षेत्राधिकार over a small range of cases.
The Court, which meets in the United States Supreme Court Building in वॉशिंगटन, d.C., consists of a मुख्य इंसाफ और आठ संबद्ध justices जो हैं मनोनीत by the अध्यक्ष और confirmed by the United States Senate.
Once appointed, justices have जीवन कार्यकाल unless they resign, retire, or are removed after impeachment.
