Elizabeth II ( Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the constitutional monarch of 16 sovereign states, known as the राष्ट्रमंडल realms, और उनके territories और dependencies, और सिर of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations.
She is Supreme Governor of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड और, in कुछ of her realms, carries the title of Defender of the Faith as part of her full title.
On her accession on 6 फ़रवरी 1952, एलिज़ाबेथ became सिर of the Commonwealth and queen regnant of seven independent Commonwealth countries : the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, Pakistan and Ceylon.
From 1956 to 1992, the क्रमांक of उसके realms varied as territories gained independence and some realms became republics.
At present, in addition to the first four aforementioned countries, Elizabeth is Queen of Jamaica, Barbados, the Bahamas, Grenada, Papua New Guinea, the सुलेमान आइलैंड्स, तुवालू, संत लूसिया, संत विंसेंट और the grenadines, बेलीज़, अण्टीगुआ और बारबूडा और संत किट्स and Nevis.
Her reign of years is currently the second longest for a British monarch ; तभी महारानी विक्टोरिया रै reigned longer at over 63 years.
Elizabeth was born in लंदन और शिक्षित privately at home.
Her father acceded to the throne as George VI in 1936 on the abdication of उसके bhai एडवर्ड viii, from which time she was the heir presumptive.
She began to undertake public duties दौरान the दूसरी संसार युद्ध, in जिससे वो परोसा in the Auxiliary Territorial Service.
In 1947, she married Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh, with whom she has चार children : चार्ल्स, ऐनी, एंड्रयू, और एडवर्ड.
Her coronation service took place in 1953 और थी the पहला to be televised.
The Queen 's many historic visits and meetings include a राज्य विज़िट to the गणतंत्र of आयरलैंड and reciprocal visits to and from the Pope.
The Queen has seen major संवैधानिक परिवर्तन in उसके realms, ऐसे as devolution in the संयुक्त Kingdom and the patriation of the Canadian constitution.
Times of personal significance have included the births and marriages of her children, the births of her grandchildren, the investiture of the Prince of Wales, and the celebration of माइलस्टोन ऐसे as उसके चांदी, सुनहरी, और डायमंड jubilees in 1977, 2002, और 2012, क्रमशः.
Major events in the Queen 's reign have included the परेशानियों in उत्तरी आयरलैंड, the falklands War, wars with Iraq and the War in Afghanistan.
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which include the death of her पिता at 56, the हत्या of प्रिंस फिलिप 's ताऊ, रब माउंटबेटन, the विश्लेषण of उसके children 's विवाह in 1992 ( a year deemed her annus horribilis ), the death in 1997 of her former daughter-in-law, Diana, Princess of Wales, and the deaths of her mother and sister in 2002.
The Queen has occasionally faced severe press criticism of the royal family and republican sentiments, लकिन support for the monarchy and her personal popularity remain high.
Christianity is the largest religion listed by australians in the नेशनल census.
In the 2011 Census, 61.1 % of australians were listed as Christian.
Australia has no official state religion and the Australian संविधान protects स्वतंत्रता of धर्म.
The presence of Christianity in Australia began with the आगमन of the पहला बेड़े of अंग्रेजों convicts in 1788.
the धर्म grew to खाता लिये 96.1 % of the नेशनल population at the time of the Federation of Australia in 1901.
The Anglican गिरिजाघर of ऑस्ट्रेलिया ( formerly ज्ञात as the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड in Australia ) remained the largest denomination until 1986, when it was surpassed by the Roman Catholic Church in Australia.
Post-war multiculturalism and a decline in religious observance among some sections of the population have diversified the जनसांख्यिकी of धर्म in ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
Of the roughly 61 % identifying as ईसाई in 2011, the largest denominations were either Roman Catholic ( 25 % ) or Anglican ( 17 % ), with the third largest denomination being the 5 % affiliated with the Uniting Church in Australia.
Post-war immigration has grown the numbers belonging to churches like the Greek Orthodox Archdiocese of Australia and there are large and growing पेंटेकोस्टल समूह, ऐसे as सिडनी 's hillsong Church.
The festivals of Easter और क्रिसमस हैं पब्लिक holidays in Australia.
Around a quarter of students attend church schools and Christian organisations हैं अग्रणी non-government प्रदाताओं of स्वास्थ्य और welfare सेवाएं through संगठनों जैसे कैथोलिक स्वास्थ्य ऑस्ट्रेलिया, anglicare, unitingcare Australia, the Salvation Army and St Vincent de Paul Society.
Historically significant Australian Christians have included रेव dr जॉन dunmore लैंग, संत मरियम mackillop, कैथरीन हेलेन spence, पादरी दाउद unaipon, the रेवरेंड John Flynn and Pastor Sir Doug Nicholls.
High profile contemporary Australian Christians include : Tim Costello बैपटिस्ट मंत्री और वर्तमान सीईओ of संसार दृष्टि ऑस्ट्रेलिया, फ़्रैंक ब्रेनन, जेसुइट इंसान अधिकारों वकील, कार्डिनल जार्ज pell, कैथोलिक archbishop of सिडनी, फिलिप aspinall the वर्तमान anglican primate और archbishop of Brisbane, Kevin Rudd, former Labor Prime Minister, and Tony Abbott, leader for the Federal Opposition Liberal Party.
Charter creating कॉलेजिएट स्कूल, जिससे became yale College, October 9, 1701
Yale University is a निजी आइवी लीग research university located in New Haven, Connecticut.
Founded in 1701 in the Colony of Connecticut, the university is the third-oldest संस्था of उच्चतर education in the United States.
Originally chartered as the `` Collegiate School '', the institution traces इसके जड़ें to 17th-century clergymen जो sought to establish a college to train clergy and political leaders for the colony.
In 1718, the College was renamed `` Yale कॉलेज '' to सम्मान a तोहफा इससे elihu yale, a governor of the British East India Company.
In 1861, the Graduate School of Arts and Sciences became the first U.S. institution to पुरस्कार the phd. yale became a founding सदस्य of the संघ of American Universities in 1900.
Yale College was transformed, beginning in the 1930s, through the स्थापना of आवासीय colleges : 12 now exist and two more are planned.
Yale employs over 1,100 faculty to teach and advise about 5,300 undergraduate और 6,100 ग्रैजुएट और पेशेवर students.
लगभग सब tenured professors सिखा undergraduate courses, more than 2,000 of which are offered annually.
The विश्वविद्यालयों 's एसेट शामिल an endowment valued at $ 19.4 billion, the second-largest of any academic institution in the world.
Yale 's system of अधिक than दो दर्जन पुस्तकालयों holds 12.5 million volumes.
49 Nobel laureates have महरूम संबद्ध साथ the University as students, faculty, and staff.
Yale has produced many notable alumni, including five U.S. राष्ट्रपतियों, 19 u.S. परम् अदालत justices, और अनेक foreign heads of state.
At the graduate level, yale विधि स्कूल, yale स्कूल of आर्ट, और yale स्कूल of नाटक are consistently ranked the top programs in their field.
Yale Law School is the सबसे चयनात्मक law school in the United States.
Yale students compete intercollegiately as the Yale bulldogs in the ncaa प्रभाग i आइवी League.
The oldest intercollegiate athletic event in the United States is the Yale-Harvard regatta.
Artemisia tridentata ( `` big sagebrush '' or `` sagebrush '' ) is an खुशबूदार झाड़ी इससे the परिवार asteraceae, जिससे grows in arid और semi-arid शर्तें, throughout a range of cold desert, steppe, and mountain habitats in the Intermountain West of North America.
The देशी नाम `` sagebrush '' is भी प्रयुक्त लिये अनेक related members of the genus Artemisia, such as California Sagebrush ( Artemisia californica ).
Big sagebrush और अन्य artemisia प्रजाति हैं the प्रबल पौधे आरपार large portions of the Great Basin, covering some 422,000 square miles in 11 western U.S. & Canadian states.
It is the राज्य flower of Nevada.
Sagebrush provides खाना और आवास लिये a किस्में of प्रजाति, ऐसे as ऋषि grouse, pronghorn antelope, gray vireo, pygmy rabbit, and mule deer.
Big sagebrush was used as an herbal medicine by Native Americans throughout the Intermountain West of North America—especially for preventing संक्रमण in wounds, stopping आतंरिक bleeding, और treating headaches और जुकाम.
Chemically, the active medicinal constituents include camphor, terpenoids, और tannins.
Several major threats exist to sage brush ecosystems, including human settlements, conversion to agricultural जमीन, पशुधन चरने, हृदयरोग संयंत्र प्रजाति, wildfires, and climate change.
Yahoo ! Mail is a free email service offered by the अमरीकी ढूंढें इंजन कम्पनी Yahoo !
It was शुभारम्भ in 1997, और, according to comscore, Yahoo ! Mail is the third-largest web-based email service with 281 million users as of December 2012.
Currently, Yahoo ! offers तीन संस्करण of याहू ! Mail.
The traditional `` Yahoo ! Mail Classic '' continues the availability of the असली इंटरफ़ेस introduced in 1997.
A version introduced in 2005 शामिल a नई अजाक्स इंटरफ़ेस, drag-and-drop सुविधाएँ, improved search functionality, keyboard shortcuts, address auto-complete, tabs, and other updated features.
In October 2010, Yahoo ! released a beta version of Yahoo ! मेल, जिससे शामिल सुधार to the design, performance, search functionality, and Facebook integration.
In May 2011, beta testing for the new version stopped, और it became the डिफॉल्ट इंटरफ़ेस for Yahoo ! Mail.
In early 2008, Yahoo ! began offering unlimited mail storage to its users in जवाब to heated प्रतियोगिता in the फ़्री web-mail मार्केट खण्ड.
On June 27, 2009, याहू ! मेसेंजर थी एकीकृत with Yahoo ! Mail.
Tacoma (, ) is a mid-sized शहरी बंदरगाहों नगर और the county seat of Pierce County, Washington, United States.
The city is on वॉशिंगटन 's puget ध्वनि, दक्षिणपश्चिम of सिएटल, northeast of the state capital, Olympia, and northwest of Mount Rainier National Park.
The population was 198,397, according to the 2010 census.
Tacoma is the second-largest नगर in the puget Sound area and the third largest in the state.
Tacoma also serves as the बीच of कारोबार कार्यकलाप लिये the South Sound region, which has a population of around 1 million people.
Tacoma adopted its name after the nearby Mount Rainier, originally पुकारा माउंट Tahoma.
It is known as the `` City of Destiny '' because the क्षेत्रफल थी चुनी to be the पश्चिमी टर्मिनस of the उत्तरी Pacific Railroad in the late 19th century.
The decision of the railroad was influenced by Tacoma 's neighboring deep-water हार्बर, शुरुआत Bay.
By connecting the bay with the railroad Tacoma 's motto became `` When rails मिलें sails. ''
Today Commencement Bay serves the Port of टकोमा, a बीच of अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार on the प्रशांत Coast and Washington state 's largest port.
Like most central cities, Tacoma suffered a prolonged decline in the mid-20th सदी as a परिणाम of suburbanization and divestment.
Since the 1990s, developments in the downtown core include the University of Washington टकोमा ; टकोमा कड़ी, the पहला आधुनिक इलेक्ट्रिक लाइट रेल सेवा in the राज्य ; the state 's highest density of art and history museums ; and a restored urban waterfront, the Thea Foss Waterway.
With a long history of blue-collar labor politics — from the railroad workers of the 19th सदी, to the longshoremen of the 20th सदी, to the मजदूर Ready workers of today — Tacoma has long been known for its rough, gritty image.
A song about Tacoma, `` Thrice All American '', by American singer-songwriter and former निवासी neko मामला, describes it as `` a dusty बूढ़ा गहना in the South Puget Sound / where the factories churn / and the timber 's all cut down ''.
tacoma-pierce काउंटी रै महरूम नामित one of the most livable areas in the country.
टकोमा थी भी recently सूचीबद्ध as the 19th most walkable city in the country.
In कंट्रास्ट, the नगर is भी क्रमित as the most stressed-out city in the country in a 2004 survey.
In 2006, महिलाओं 's पत्रिका स्वः named Tacoma the `` Most Sexually Healthy City '' in the United States.
In 2012, The Advocate gave Tacoma the title of `` Gayest City in America '', in भाग क्युकी of the विशाल विविधता of पब्लिक कार्यालयों आयोजित, और वॉशिंगटन राज्य गुजर a विधेयक in 2012 allowing LGBT couples to marry.
Tacoma is famous for the 1940 पतन of the Tacoma Narrows Bridge.
Chula Vista ( ; ) is the second largest city in the San Diego metropolitan area, the seventh largest city in Southern California, the fourteenth largest city in the State of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, और the 77th-largest नगर in the संयुक्त States.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 243,916 as of the 2010 census.
Located just from downtown San Diego and from the मैक्सिकन किनारा in the दक्षिण खाड़ी प्रदेश of the महानगर क्षेत्रफल, the नगर is at the बीच of one of the richest economic and culturally diverse zones in the United States.
chula विस्टा is so नामित क्युकी of इसके दर्शनीय location between the San Diego Bay and coastal mountain foothills.
Founded in the early 19th century, fast population growth has recently महरूम observed in the नगर.
As the दूसरी largest नगर in सैन डिएगो काउंटी, Chula Vista has quickly become a destination popular to many tourists.
Located in the city is one of America 's few year-round United States Olympic Training centers and popular tourist destinations include क्रिकेट बेतार amphitheater, the chula विस्टा मरीना, और the Chula Vista Nature Center.
Metes and bounds is a system or method of describing जमीन, रियल प्रॉपर्टी ( in कंट्रास्ट to personal property ) or real estate.
The system has been used in इंग्लैण्ड लिये अनेक सदियां, और is स्टिल प्रयुक्त वहीँ in the परिभाषा of general boundaries.
By custom, it was applied in the असली तेरह colonies कि became the United States, and in many other land jurisdictions based on English common law.
Typically the system uses physical features of the local भूगोल, साथ साथ दिशानिर्देश और दूरियाँ, to define and describe the boundaries of a parcel of land.
The boundaries are described in a running prose style, working around the parcel in sequence, from a point of beginning, returning back to the वही पाइंट ; compare साथ the मौखिक अनुष्ठान of धड़कन the bounds.
it may शामिल सन्दर्भ to अन्य adjoining parcels ( and their owners ), and it, in turn, could also be referred to in later surveys.
At the time the description is compiled, it may have been marked on the मैदान साथ स्थाई स्मारक लगाई जहाँ वहीँ यहूद no suitable natural monuments.
The term `` metes '' refers to a boundary defined by the measurement of each सीधा चलाएं, निर्दिष्ट by a अलहदा between the terminal points, and an orientation or direction.
A दिशा may be a सरल कम्पास bearing, or a precise orientation determined by accurate survey methods.
The term `` bounds '' refers to a more general boundary वर्णन, ऐसे as साथ a निश्चित watercourse, a स्टोन वॉल, an adjoining public road way, or an existing building.
The system is often used to define larger pieces of property ( e.g. farms ), and political subdivisions ( e.g. town boundaries ) where precise definition is not required or would be far too महंगी, or previously designated boundaries can be incorporated into the description.
Sir Isaac Newton ( 25 December 164220 कूच 1727 ) थी an अंग्रेज़ी physicist और गणितज्ञ who is widely regarded as one of the most influential scientists of all time and as a key figure in the scientific revolution.
उसके किताब philosophiæ naturalis प्रिन्सिपिया mathematica ( `` Mathematical Principles of Natural Philosophy '' ), first published in 1687, laid the foundations for most of classical mechanics.
Newton also made seminal योगदान to प्रकाशिकी और साझा क्रेडिट with Gottfried Leibniz for the invention of the infinitesimal calculus.
Newton 's Principia formulated the laws of motion and universal gravitation कि वर्चस्व वैज्ञानिकों ' दृश्य of the शारीरिक universe for the next three centuries.
It also demonstrated that the motion of objects on the Earth and that of celestial bodies could be वर्णित by the वही सिद्धान्त.
By deriving कॅप्लर 's कानून of ग्रहीय गति इससे उसके गणितीय वर्णन of गम्भीरता, Newton removed the last doubts about the validity of the heliocentric model of the cosmos.
Newton built the first practical reflecting telescope and developed a theory of colour based on the observation that a prism decomposes श्वेत लाइट into the अनेक रंग of the दृश्य वर्णक्रम.
He also प्रतिपादित an empirical law of cooling and studied the speed of sound.
In addition to his work on the calculus, as a mathematician Newton contributed to the study of power series, generalised the binomial theorem to non-integer exponents, और विकसित न्यूटन 's विधि लिये approximating the roots of a function.
Newton was a fellow of ट्रिनिटी कॉलेज और the दूसरी lucasian प्राध्यापक of गणित at the University of Cambridge.
He was a devout लकिन अपरंपरागत ईसाई और, unusually लिये a सदस्य of the कैम्ब्रिज संकाय, he refused to take holy orders in the Church of England, perhaps because he privately rejected the doctrine of trinitarianism.
In addition to his work on the mathematical sciences, Newton also dedicated much of his time to the study of alchemy and biblical chronology, but most of his work in those areas remained अप्रकाशित जबतक long बाद उसके मौत.
In his later life, Newton became अध्यक्ष of the royal Society.
He also परोसा the अंग्रेजों सरकारी as वार्डन and Master of the Royal Mint.
प्रोf. वाल्टर lewin explains Newton 's law of gravitation in MIT course 8.01
Satellites and projectiles all obey न्यूटन 's विधि of gravitation
Newton 's law of universal gravitation states that every point mass in the universe attracts every other point mass with a force that is directly आंशिक to the उत्पाद of उनके masses और inversely आंशिक to the वर्गाकार of the अलहदा between them.
( Separately it was shown that large spherically सममित masses आकर्षित और हैं आकर्षित as if all their mass were concentrated at their centers. )
This is a general शारीरिक विधि निकला इससे अनुभवजन्य observations by कया न्यूटन called induction.
It is a part of शास्त्रीय यांत्रिकी और थी प्रतिपादित in न्यूटन 's कार्य philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica ( `` the Principia '' ), first published on 5 July 1687.
( When Newton 's book was presented in 1686 to the Royal Society, Robert Hooke made a claim that Newton had obtained the inverse square law इससे उसे – देखिए इतिहास खण्ड नीचे. )
In आधुनिक भाषा, the विधि राज्य the following:
Assuming SI units, F is measured in newtons ( n ), m1 और m2 in kilograms ( kg ), r in meters ( m ), and the constant G is approximately equal to.
The value of the constant G was first accurately determined from the results of the कैवेंडिश प्रयोग conducted by the अंग्रेजों वैज्ञानिक हेनरी कैवेंडिश in 1798, although Cavendish did not himself calculate a numerical value for G.
इस प्रयोग थी भी the पहला परीक्षण of न्यूटन 's theory of gravitation between masses in the laboratory.
It took place 111 years after the publication of Newton 's Principia and 71 सालो बाद न्यूटन 's मौत, so none of न्यूटन 's calculations could उपयोग the मान of g ; बजाय he could only calculate a force relative to another force.
Newton 's law of gravitation resembles Coulomb 's law of विद्युत शक्तियां, जिससे is प्रयुक्त to गणना the magnitude of electrical force between two charged bodies.
Both are inverse-square laws, in which force is inversely आंशिक to the वर्गाकार of the distance between the bodies.
Coulomb 's Law has the product of two charges in place of the product of the masses, और the electrostatic निरंतर in प्लेस of the गुरुत्वाकर्षक constant.
Newton 's law has since been superseded by आइंस्टीन 's सिद्धान्त of सामान्य आपेक्षिकता, but it continues to be used as an excellent approximation of the effects of gravity.
Relativity is required only when there is a need for extreme परिशुद्धता, or जब dealing साथ gravitation लिये अत्यधिक massive and dense objects.
White and red flags, representing इराकी और अमरीकी मौतों, बैठना in the ग्रास चतुष्कोण of The Valley Library on the Corvallis, Oregon, campus of Oregon State University.
As part of the traveling Iraq Body Count प्रदर्शनी इससे 2008 to 2009 ( नहीं सम्बन्धित to इराकी देह गिनती project ), the flags aim to `` raise awareness of the human cost of the Iraq War. ''
( may 2008 )
Casualties of the conflict in Iraq since 2003 ( beginning with the 2003 invasion of Iraq, and continuing with the ensuing occupation of Iraq, as well as the क्रियाएँ of the विभिन्न हथियारबंद समूह ऑपरेटिंग in the देश ) have आइये in अनेक फ़ॉर्म, और the सटीकता of the सूचना available on different types of Iraq War casualties varies greatly.
The table below summarizes विभिन्न estimates of the Iraqi casualty figures.
For troops in the U.S.-led multinational coalition, the death टोल is carefully tracked और अद्यतनीकृत रोज़, और the names और छायाचित्र of those killed in action as well as in accidents have been published widely.
A कुल of 4,486 u.S. सैनिको were killed in Iraq between 2003 and 2012.
Regarding the इराकी, however, information on both military and civilian casualties is both less precise and less consistent.
Estimates of casualty levels are available from reporters on the scene, from officials of involved संगठन, और इससे समूह कि summarize सूचना on incidents reported in the news media.
The शब्द `` हताहत `` in इसके सबसे सामान्य भाव includes the injured as well as the dead.
Accounts of the number of coalition wounded vary widely, partly because it is not obvious what should be counted : चाहिए तभी those चोटों गंभीर पर्याप्त to put a soldier out of commission be included ?
Do illnesses or injuries caused by दुर्घटनाओं गिनती, or चाहिए the focus be restricted to wounds caused by hostile engagement ?
Sources using different परिभाषाएं may arrive at बहुत अलग संख्याएँ, और sometimes the precise definition is not clearly specified.

A highwayman was a thief and brigand जो preyed on travellers.
This type of outlaw usually travelled and robbed by horse, as compared to a footpad जो travelled और robbed on foot.
Mounted लुटेरों यहूद widely माना to be socially superior to footpads.
Such robbers operated in Great Britain and Ireland from the elizabethan era जबतक the early 19th century.
The word highwayman is first known to be used in the year 1617 ; other euphemisms शामिल `` शूरवीरों of the सड़क '' और `` सज्जनों of the road. ''
Two terms applied to 19th-century North American highwaymen were road एजेंटों in कुछ उदाहरण लिये पहाड़ डाकुओं जबकि in अन्य मामले the पद is Rlallaala for mountain-based ruffians.
In the same time period in Australia, they were known as bushrangers.
Earvin `` Magic '' Johnson, Jr. ( born August 14, 1959 ) is a retired American professional basketball खिलाड़ी जो निभाई पाइंट गार्ड लिये the लॉस एंजिल्स लेकर्स of the नेशनल Basketball Association ( NBA ).
After winning championships in ऊँची स्कूल और कॉलेज, जॉनसन थी चयनित first overall in the 1979 NBA Draft by the Lakers.
He won a championship and an NBA Finals Most मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी पुरस्कार in उसके रुकी season, and won four more championships with the Lakers during the 1980s.
Johnson retired abruptly in 1991 after announcing that he had contracted HIV, but लौटे to खेल in the 1992 all-star खेल, जीतना the all-star MVP Award.
After protests from his fellow players, he retired again for four सालो, लकिन लौटे in 1996, at आयु 36, to खेल 32 खेल for the Lakers before retiring for the third and final time.
Johnson 's करियर उपलब्धियाँ शामिल तीन एनबीए mvp पुरस्कार, nine NBA Finals appearances, twelve All-Star games, and ten All-NBA First and Second Team nominations.
He led the league in regular-season assists चार टाइम्स, और is the एनबीए 's all-time नेता in average assists per game, at 11.2.
जॉनसन थी a सदस्य of the `` सपना टोली ``, the U.S. basketball team that won the Olympic gold medal in 1992.
After leaving the NBA in 1992, जॉनसन formed the जादू जॉनसन all-stars, a barnstorming टोली कि travelled around the world playing exhibition games.
Johnson was honored as one of the 50 Greatest खिलाड़ी in एनबीए इतिहास in 1996, और enshrined in the बास्केट Hall of Fame in 2002.
He was रेटेड the महानतम एनबीए पाइंट गार्ड of all time by ESPN in 2007.
उसके दोस्ती और फंसने साथ बोस्टन सेल्टिक्स स्टार लैरी बर्ड, जिसको he faced in the 1979 NCAA finals and three NBA championship series, were well documented.
Since his रिटायरमेंट, जॉनसन रै महरूम an एडवोकेट लिये hiV/ एड्स रोकथाम और सुरक्षित sex, as खूब as an उद्योगों, philanthropist, broadcaster and motivational speaker.
Johnson was a part-owner of the Lakers for several years, and was part of a group कि खरीदा the लॉस एंजिल्स डॉजर्स in 2012.

The cells of eukaryotes ( left ) and prokaryotes ( सही )
The cell is the basic संरचनात्मक, कार्यात्मक and biological unit of all known living organisms.
It is the smallest unit of life that is classified as a living thing ( except virus, which consists तभी इससे dna/rna covered by प्रोटीन और lipids ), and is often called the building block of life.
It consists of a जीवद्रव्य enclosed भीतर a झिल्ली, which contains many biomolecules such as proteins and nucleic acids.
Organisms can be classified as एककोशिकीय ( consisting of a सिंगल कोशिका ; सहित most bacteria ) or multicellular ( including plants and animals ).
While the number of cells in plants and animals varies from प्रजाति to प्रजाति, इंसानो contain परिचय 100 trillion ( 1014 ) cells.
Most plant and animal cells are between 1 और 100 micrometres और इसलिए are visible only under the microscope.
the कोशिका थी discovered by Robert Hooke in 1665.
The cell theory, first developed in 1839 by Matthias Jakob schleiden और theodor schwann, राज्य कि सब जीवों हैं रचित of एक or अधिक कोशिकाएं, कि सब कोशिकाएं आइये इससे preexisting cells, that vital functions of an organism occur within cells, and that all cells contain the hereditary information necessary for regulating cell functions and for transmitting information to the next generation of cells.
Cells emerged on ग्रह धरती at least 4.0–4.3 billion years ago.
The word cell comes from the Latin cella, अर्थ `` छोटी रूम ''.
The वर्णनात्मक पद लिये the smallest जीना biological ढांचा थी coined by रॉबर्ट Hooke in a book he published in 1665 when he compared the cork cells he saw through his microscope to the small rooms monks lived in.
Grecian Formula is a men 's hair coloring उत्पाद in the United States.
Canada and Europe previously बैन the उत्पाद क्युकी of इसके use of lead acetate.
A motor scooter 's front with an impractical number and variety of headlamps, added लिये सजावटी उद्देश्य
A headlamp is a lamp attached to the सामने of a गाडी to लाइट the road ahead.
Headlamp performance has steadily improved throughout the automobile age, spurred by the great disparity between daytime and nighttime traffic fatalities : the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration states that nearly half of all traffic-related fatalities occur in the dark, despite तभी 25 % of traffic travelling during darkness.
While it is common for the term हेडलाइट to be प्रयुक्त interchangeably in अनौपचारिक चर्चा, headlamp is the पद लिये the यंत्र itself, while headlight properly refers to the beam of light produced and distributed by the device.
Other vehicles, such as trains and aircraft, are required to have headlamps.
Bicycle headlamps are often used on साइकिल, और हैं जरूरी in कुछ jurisdictions.
They can be powered by a बैटरी or a छोटी विद्युत सृजनकर्ता on the wheel.
Additionally automotive night vision प्रणालियों कार्य to संपूरक headlamps.
Women 's rights are the rights and entitlements claimed for महिलाओं और लड़कियों of अनेक समाजों worldwide.
In some places these rights are institutionalized or supported by law, local custom, and आचरण, whereas in अन्य वे may be उपेक्षित or suppressed.
They differ from broader notions of human rights through दावा of an अंतर्निहित ऐतिहासिक और परंपरागत bias against the exercise of rights by women and girls in favour of men and boys.
Issues commonly associated with notions of women 's rights include, though are not limited to, the सही : to bodily अखंडता और स्वायत्तता ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to थाम पब्लिक दफ्तर ; to कार्य ; to मेला मजदूरी or equal pay ; to own property ; to education ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to enter into legal contracts ; and to have marital, parental and religious rights.
Caryn Elaine Johnson, best ज्ञात as whoopi गोल्डबर्ग (, ( born नवम्बर 13, 1955 ) is an अमरीकी comedienne, actress, singer-songwriter, political activist, author and talk show host.
Goldberg made her film debut in The रंग जामुनी ( 1985 ), playing celie, a mistreated black woman in the Deep South.
She received a नामांकन लिये the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन Actress and won her first Golden Globe Award for her role in the film.
In 1990, वो निभाई oda mae भूरा, a wacky psychic helping a slain man ( Patrick Swayze ) save his lover ( Demi Moore ) in the blockbuster Ghost.
This performance won her a second Golden Globe और an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री ; इस बना गोल्डबर्ग तभी the second black woman in the history of the Academy Awards to win an acting Oscar—the first being Hattie McDaniel who won for Gone With the Wind in 1939.
Notable later films include Sister Act and Sister Act 2, The Player, Made in America, How Stella Got Her नाली वापस, लड़की, बाधित और चूहा Race.
She is also acclaimed for her roles as the bartender Guinan in Star Trek : The Next Generation, as Terry Doolittle in Jumpin ' Jack Flash, and as कार्मेन tibideaux in ग्ली, as well as the voice of Shenzi the hyena in The Lion King.
Goldberg has been nominated for 13 Emmy Awards for her कार्य in टेलीविज़न.
She was co-producer of the लोकप्रिय खेल दिखाएँ हॉलीवुड Squares from 1998 to 2004.
She has been the मॉडरेटर of the दिन talk show The View since 2007.
Goldberg has a ग्रैमी, दो दिन emmys, दो सुनहरी ग्लोब्स, a Tony ( for production, not acting ), and an Oscar.
In addition, Goldberg has a अंग्रेजों अकादमी फिल्मी पुरस्कार, चार People 's Choice Awards, and has been honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
She is एक of the few मनोरंजनकर्ता जो have won an Emmy, Grammy, Oscar, and Tony Award.
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit संघ '' जिससे operates a प्रमुख पेशेवर बर्फ hockey league of 30 franchised member clubs, of which seven are currently located in Canada and 23 in the United States.
Headquartered in New York City, the NHL is widely considered to be the premier professional ice hockey league in the संसार, और एक of the प्रमुख पेशेवर खेल लीग in the संयुक्त States and Canada.
The Stanley Cup, the oldest पेशेवर खेल ट्रॉफी in उत्तर अमेरिका, is awarded annually to the league playoff champion at the end of each season.
The league was organized on November 26, 1917, in मॉन्ट्रियल, क्यूबेक, कनाडा, बाद the बर्खास्तगी of परिचालन of इसके पूर्ववर्ती संगठन, the National Hockey Association ( NHA ), which had been founded in 1909.
It started with four teams and, through a series of expansions, contractions, और relocations, the लीग is अभी रचित of 30 क्रियाशील franchises.
The nation to which the name of the league originally referred थी कनाडा, हालांकि the लीग रै अभी महरूम binational since 1924 when it expanded into the United States.
After a labour dispute that led to the cancellation of the entire 2004–05 ऋतु, the लीग resumed खेल अंतर्गत a नई सामूहिक bargaining agreement that included a salary cap.
In 2009, the एनएचएल enjoyed रिकार्ड highs in terms of sponsorships, attendance, and television audiences.
The NHL draws many highly skilled players from all over the संसार और फिलहाल रै खिलाड़ी from about 20 different countries.
Although Canadians have historically constituted the majority of the players in the NHL, over the past four plus decades the percentages of US and European players have increased दोनो क्युकी of the एनएचएल 's जारी विस्तार इससे छह to तीस क्लब चूंकि 1967, and the increased availability of highly skilled European players.
Maggots feeding on carrion.
A maggot is the लार्वा of a मक्खी ( अनुक्रम diptera ) ; it is लागू in particular to the larvae of Brachyceran flies, such as houseflies, cheese flies, and blowflies, rather than larvae of the Nematocera, such as mosquitoes and Crane flies.
`` Maggot '' is not a technical term and should not be taken as such ; in अनेक मानक पाठ्यपुस्तकों of कीटविज्ञान it करता not appear in the index at all.
In many non-technical ग्रन्थ the पद is प्रयुक्त लिये insect larvae in general.
Other sources have coined उनके अपना परिभाषाएं ; for example : ``...
The term applies to a grub when all trace of limbs has disappeared... '' और ``... लागू to the footless larvae of Dipters. ''
Maggot-like fly larvae are of wide importance in ecology and medicine ; among other भूमिकाएँ, विभिन्न प्रजाति हैं prominent in रीसाइक्लिंग carrion और कचरा, attacking फसलों और foodstuffs, spreading microbial infections, and causing myiasis.
Herod (, Hordos, Greek :, Hērōdēs ), also known as Herod the ग्रेट ( 73/74 bce – 4 bce in जेरिको ), was a Roman client king of Judea.
His epithet of `` the Great '' is widely disputed as he is वर्णित as `` a madman जो murdered his own family and a great many rabbis ``.
He is भी ज्ञात लिये उसके colossal भवन प्रोजेक्ट in जेरूसलम और elsewhere, including his expansion of the Second Temple in Jerusalem ( sometimes referred to as Herod 's Temple ) and the construction of the port at Caesarea Maritima.
Important details of his biography are gleaned from the works of the 1st सदी ce roman–jewish इतिहासकार Josephus Flavius.
The Romans made Herod 's बेटे, हेरोदेस archelaus, ethnarch of judea, samaria, और idumea ( biblical Edom ) from 4 BCE to 6 CE, referred to as the tetrarchy of Judea.
Archelaus was judged incompetent by the Roman सम्राट augustus जो तब संयुक्त samaria, judea उचित और idumea into iudaea प्रांत under rule of a prefect until age 41.
Herod 's अन्य बेटे हेरोदेस antipas थी tetrarch of Galilee from 4 BCE–39 CE.
ABO blood group antigens उपस्थित on रेड रक्त cells and IgM antibodies present in the serum
The ABO blood group system is the most important blood type system ( or रक्त समूह प्रणाली ) in इंसान रक्त transfusion.
The associated anti-A and anti-B antibodies are usually IgM antibodies, which are usually produced in the first years of जीवन by sensitization to पर्यावरणीय substances ऐसे as खाना, bacteria, and viruses.
ABO blood types are also उपस्थित in कुछ अन्य पशु, लिये example apes such as chimpanzees, bonobos, and gorillas.

Northville is an affluent city located in and विभाजित by ओकलैंड और वेन काउंटी in the U.S. state of Michigan.
The area is a उपनगरीय of Metropolitan Detroit.
The population थी 5,970 at the 2010 census.

The Wayne काउंटी portion is घिरी by Northville Township.
northville is परोसा by Northville Public Schools.
The city is located पूर्वोत्तर of ऐन arbor and northwest of Detroit.
Elaine Stritch ( born February 2, 1925 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री and vocalist.
She has appeared in numerous स्टेज plays और musicals, feature films, and many television programs.

Misfits is a British science fiction comedy-drama television show about a group of यंग अपराधियों sentenced to कार्य in a जातियाँ सेवा कार्यक्रम, where they obtain supernatural powers after a strange electrical storm.
The series opened in 2009 and is फिलहाल जारी.
Antonia Thomas, Iwan Rheon, Lauren Socha, Nathan Stewart-Jarrett, and Robert sheehan हैं introduced as अलीशा डैनियल्स, साइमन bellamy, Kelly Bailey, Curtis Donovan, and Nathan Young respectively.
Sheehan left बाद the दूसरी श्रेणी, replaced in the third by Joseph Gilgun as Rudy Wade.

Brett Lorenzo Favre ( born October 10, 1969 ) is a former American फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक जो खर्च the बहुमत of his career with the Green Bay Packers of the National Football League ( NFL ).
He was a 20-year veteran of the NFL, having played quarterback for the Atlanta Falcons ( 1991 ), Green Bay पैकर्स ( 1992 – 2007 ), नई यॉर्क jets ( 2008 ) और मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स ( 2009 – 2010 ).
Favre is the तभी क्वार्टरबैक in एनएफएल इतिहास to throw लिये over 70,000 गज, over 500 touchdowns, over 300 interceptions, over 6,000 completions, and over 10,000 pass attempts.
Favre started at the quarterback position for the University of Southern Mississippi for four years before being चयनित in the दूसरी गोलाकार of the 1991 एनएफएल ड्राफ्ट by Atlanta ( 33rd overall ).
He was traded to ग्रीन खाड़ी on फ़रवरी 10, 1992, for the 19th pick in the 1992 NFL Draft.
Favre became the पैकर्स ' starting क्वार्टरबैक in the fourth game of the 1992 season, stepping in for injured quarterback Don Majkowski, and started every game through the 2007 season.
He was traded to the New York Jets and started at quarterback for the 2008 season before signing साथ the वाइकिंग्स on अगस्त 18, 2009 as उनके starting quarterback.
He made an NFL record 297 लगातार starts ( 321 including playoffs ).
He is the only player to जीत the ap सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी three consecutive times ( 1995–97 ).
He has led teams to eight division championships ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2007, 2009 ), पाँच nfc चैंपियनशिप खेल ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2007, 2009 ), और दो सुपर कटोरी दिखावे ( Super Bowl XXXI, Super Bowl XXXII ), winning one ( Super Bowl XXXI ).
He holds many NFL records, including most career touchdown passes, most career passing yards, most career pass completions, most career pass attempts, most career interceptions thrown, most consecutive starts by a player, most consecutive starts by a क्वार्टरबैक, सबसे करियर victories as a starting क्वार्टरबैक, most sacked, and most fumbles.
He is also referred to by उसके उपनाम `` the Gunslinger ''.

The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as WWW or W3, commonly known as the web ), is a प्रणाली of interlinked हाइपरटेक्स्ट दस्तावेज़ पहुँचा via the अंतरजाल.
With a web browser, one can view web pages that may contain text, images, videos, and other मल्टीमीडिया, और navigate between them via hyperlinks.
Using concepts from his earlier hypertext systems like ENQUIRE, British engineer, computer scientist and at that time employee of the CERN, Sir Tim Berners-Lee, now Director of the World Wide Web Consortium ( W3C ), wrote a proposal in March 1989 लिये कया होता आखिरकार become the संसार चौड़ी वेब.
At CERN, a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France and Switzerland, Berners-Lee और belgian कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक रॉबर्ट cailliau प्रस्तावित in 1990 to उपयोग हाइपरटेक्स्ट `` to कड़ी और अभिगम सूचना of विभिन्न kinds as a वेब of nodes in which the user can browse at will '', and they publicly introduced the project in December of the same year.
Wayne Lyman Morse ( October 20, 1900July 22, 1974 ) was a politician and attorney from ऑरेगॉन, संयुक्त राज्य, ज्ञात लिये उसके proclivity लिये opposing his parties ' leadership, and specifically for his opposition to the Vietnam War on constitutional grounds.
Born in Madison, Wisconsin, and educated at the University of Wisconsin-Madison and the University of Minnesota Law School, Morse स्थानांतरित to ऑरेगॉन in 1930 और began शिक्षण at the University of Oregon School of Law.
During World War II he was निर्वाचित to the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट as a रिपब्लिकन ; he became an स्वतंत्र after Dwight D. Eisenhower 's election to the presidency in 1952.
जबकि an स्वतंत्र, he नियत a रिकार्ड लिये performing the second longest one-person filibuster in the history of the Senate.
Morse joined the Democratic Party in 1955, और थी reelected twice जबकि a सदस्य of कि पार्टी.
Morse बना a ब्रैड चलाएं लिये the Democratic Party 's presidential nomination in 1960.
A few years later, Morse was one of only दो सीनेटरों जो opposed the गल्फ of tonkin रेज़ोल्यूशन, जिससे प्राधिकृत the president to take military action in Vietnam without a declaration of war.
He continued to speak out विरूद्ध the युद्ध in the ensuing सालो, और खोया उसके 1968 बोली लिये reelection to bob Packwood, who criticized his strong opposition to the war.
Morse made two more bids लिये reelection to the Senate before his death in 1974.
in संसदीय कार्यविधि, a गति to तालिका has two different and contradictory meanings:
In the United States, to table usually means the to lay [ the टॉपिक ] on the तालिका or to मूव लिये postponement of consideration ; a proposal to suspend consideration of a pending motion.
Much less often, it means a motion to `` put on the तालिका '' : a प्रस्ताव to शुरू विचार ( or reconsideration ), a usage consistent with the rest of the English-speaking world.
in the बाकी of the english-speaking संसार ऐसे as the संयुक्त किंगडम, to तालिका अर्थात् to move to place [ the topic ] upon the table ( or to move to place on the table ) : a proposal to begin consideration ( or reconsideration ) of a proposal.
Both the American and the British dialects have the भाव of `` to तालिका '' as to lay [ the टॉपिक ] on the तालिका or to कारण [ the topic ] to lie on the table.
The difference is the idea of what the table is for, that of a shelf बंद to the पक्ष, or an क्रियाशील work bench.
The British meaning has the sense of the table as being an active work बेंच, साथ the टॉपिक होने the बीच of ध्यान, considered and discussed by all until it can be resolved, at which point it is taken off the 'table '.
The American sense is that the table is like that of a shelf, अभिलेख, or long-term भंडार यंत्र, जहाँ the टॉपिक रै महरूम disposed of by sending it to the 'table ' और leaving it there.
Toy Story 3 is a 2010 अमरीकी 3d कंप्यूटर animated comedy-drama prison film, and the third installment in the Toy Story series.
it थी उत्पादित by Pixar Animation Studios and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures.
Directed by Lee Unkrich, the film was released विश्वव्यापी इससे जून through अक्तूबर in डिज़्नी डिजिटल 3-D, RealD, and IMAX 3D.
Toy Story 3 was also the first film to be released theatrically साथ dolby घेर 7.1 sound.
The screenplay was written by Michael arndt, जबकि unkrich लिखा the स्टोरी साथ साथ जॉन lasseter और Andrew Stanton, respectively director and co-writer of the two first films.
The plot focuses on the toys Woody, Buzz Lightyear, and their friends dealing with an uncertain future as उनके मालिक, एंडी, prepares to छोड़ लिये कॉलेज.
Actors Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Don Rickles, Estelle Harris, John Ratzenberger, Wallace shawn, जेफ़ pidgeon, jodi बेंसन, R. ली ermey, जॉन मॉरिस, और लॉरी metcalf reprised their voice-over roles from the previous films.
Jim Varney, who played Slinky Dog in the first two films, and Joe Ranft, who portrayed Lenny और wheezy, दोनो died पहले उत्पादन began on खिलौना स्टोरी 3.
the भूमिका of slinky श्वान थी लिया over by Blake Clark ( a friend of Varney ), while Ranft 's characters and various others were written out of the story.
New characters include performances by Ned beatty, टिमोथी डाल्टन, क्रिस्टन schaal, bonnie हंट, Whoopi Goldberg, Jeff Garlin, Richard Kind, and Michael Keaton.
The feature broke Shrek the Thirds record as the biggest opening day North American gross for an एनिमेटेड फिल्मी unadjusted लिये महंगाई, और a बिग खोलने साथ an unadjusted सकल of $ 110,307,189.
It is also the highest-grossing opening weekend for a Pixar film, as खूब as the highest-grossing खोलने वीकेंड लिये a फिल्मी to have खोली in the month of June.
This is the highest-grossing फिल्मी of 2010, दोनो in the संयुक्त States and Canada, and worldwide.
In early August, it became Pixar 's highest-grossing film at the North American box office ( surpassing Finding Nemo ), और the highest-grossing एनिमेटेड फिल्मी of सब समय विश्वव्यापी ( surpassing shrek 2 ) ; बाद कि माह, खिलौना स्टोरी 3 became the first ever animated film in history to make over $ 1 billion worldwide.
It is currently the 10th-highest-grossing फिल्मी of सब time.
Toy Story 3 was nominated for five Academy Awards, including Best चित्र, बेहतरीन adapted पटकथा, और बेहतरीन ध्वनि Editing.
It was the third animated film ( after Beauty and the Beast and Up ) to be मनोनीत लिये अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन चित्र.
It won the पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन एनिमेटेड Feature and Best Original Song.
John Levell Starks ( born August 10, 1965 ) is an अमरीकी रिटायर्ड पेशेवर basketball shooting guard.
Starks was listed at 6'5 '' and 190 पाउंड दौरान उसके एनबीए playing career.
Although he थी नहीं drafted in the 1988 एनबीए ड्राफ्ट बाद उपस्थित चार कॉलेजों in his native Oklahoma, including Oklahoma State University, he gained fame while playing for the New York Knicks of the National Basketball Association in the 1990s.
Secure Digital or ( SD ) is a non-volatile memory card format for use in portable devices, such as mobile फोन, डिजिटल कैमरे, gps नेविगेशन डिवाइस, और tablet computers.
The Secure Digital standard is कायम by the sd कार्ड संघ ( SDA ).
SD technologies have been implemented in अधिक than 400 ब्रांड्स आरपार दर्जनों of उत्पाद श्रेणी and more than 8,000 models.
The Secure Digital format includes four card families available in तीन अलग रूप कारकों.
The four परिवारों हैं the असली standard-capacity ( sdsc ), the High-Capacity ( SDHC ), the eXtended-Capacity ( SDXC ), and the SDIO, which combines input/output functions with data storage.
The three form कारकों हैं the असली आकार, the `` mini '' size, and the `` micro '' size ( see illustration ).
There are many combinations of रूप कारकों और device families.
electrically passive adapters allow the उपयोग of a छोटी card in a host device built to hold a larger card.
Host devices that comply with नए संस्करण of the specification provide पिछड़ा संगतता और accept older SD cards, but this article explains several factors that can prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A newer card may offer greater capacity than the मेजबान यंत्र can handle.
A नए कार्ड may उपयोग a संचिका system the host device can not navigate.
Use of an SDIO कार्ड requires the मेजबान यंत्र be designed for the input/output functions the card provides.
The संगठन of the कार्ड थी बदला starting with the SDHC family.
Some vendors produced SDSC ताश ऊपर 1 gb पहले the sda had standardized a method of doing so.
The SDA uses अनेक trademarked लोगो to enforce अनुपालन साथ its specifications and assure users of compatibility.
Hugh जॉन mungo ग्रान्ट ( born 9 September 1960 ) is a British actor and film producer.
He has received a Golden ग्लोब, a bafta, और an Honorary César.
His films have earned more than US $ 2.4 billion from 25 नाट्य रिलीज विश्वव्यापी.
Grant achieved international stardom after appearing in रिचर्ड कर्टिस 's कामयाब चार Weddings and a Funeral ( 1994 ).
He used this breakthrough role as a frequent cinematic persona during the 1990s, delivering comic प्रदर्शन in मुख्यधारा films जैसे मिकी ब्लू आँखें ( 1999 ) and Notting Hill ( 1999 ).
By the turn of the 21st century, he had established himself as a अग्रणी man skilled साथ a satirical कॉमिक talent.
Grant has expanded his oeuvre with critically acclaimed turns as a cad in Bridget Jones 's Diary ( 2001 ), About A Boy ( 2002 ), प्रेम दरअसल ( 2003 ), और अमरीकी dreamz ( 2006 ).
He later played against प्रकार साथ अनेक कैमियो भूमिकाएँ in the epic drama film Cloud Atlas ( 2012 ).
Within the film industry, Grant is cited as an anti-film star who approaches उसके भूमिकाएँ जैसे a अक्षर actor, and attempts to make his acting appear spontaneous.
Hallmarks of his comic skills include a nonchalant touch of irony / sarcasm and studied physical mannerisms as well as his precisely-timed संवाद डिलीवरी और फेशियल expressions.
The entertainment media 's coverage of Grant 's life off the बिग स्क्रीन रै प्रायः निष्प्रभ his work as a thespian.
He has महरूम गायन परिचय उसके अनादर लिये the व्यवसायिक of एक्टिंग, and in his disdain towards the culture of celebrity and hostility towards the media.
In a career spanning 30 years, Grant has repeatedly claimed that एक्टिंग is नहीं a सच्चा कॉलिंग लकिन बस a जॉब he fell into.
The Han Dynasty ( ; ) ( 206 BC – 220 ad ) थी an इम्पीरियल राजवंश of चीन, preceded by the Qin Dynasty ( 221–207 BC ) and succeeded by the Three Kingdoms ( 220–280 AD ).
It was संस्थापित by the विद्रोही नेता लियू बंग, known posthumously as Emperor Gaozu of Han.
It was briefly interrupted by the Xin राजवंश ( 9–23 ad ) of the former regent Wang Mang.
इस interregnum separates the हान into two periods : the Western Han ( 206 BC – 9 AD ) and Eastern Han ( 25–220 AD ).
Spanning over four centuries, the काल of the हान राजवंश is माना a golden age in Chinese history.
To this दिन, चीन 's बहुमत जातीय समूह refers to itself as the `` Han people '' and the Chinese script is referred to as `` Han characters ``.
The Han Empire was divided into areas directly नियंत्रित by the सेंट्रल सरकारी, known as commanderies, and a number of semi-autonomous kingdoms.
These kingdoms धीरे खोया सब vestiges of उनके स्वतंत्रता, विशेषकर following the विद्रोह of the Seven States.
The Xiongnu, a nomadic कनफेडरेशन जिससे वर्चस्व the पूर्वी Eurasian Steppe, defeated the Han army in battle in 200 BC.
Following the defeat, a political marriage alliance was negotiated in जिससे the हान became the de facto inferior partner.
When, despite the सन्धि, the xiongnu जारी to रेड हान सीमायें, Emperor Wu of Han ( r. 141–87 BC ) launched several military campaigns against them.
The ultimate Han victory in these wars आखिरकार मजबूर the xiongnu to accept vassal status as Han tributaries.
ये अभियान विस्तारित हान sovereignty into the Tarim Basin of Central Asia and helped establish the vast trade network known as the Silk Road, which reached as far as the Mediterranean world.
Han forces managed to divide the xiongnu into दो स्पर्धा राष्ट्र, the दक्षिणी और उत्तरी Xiongnu, and forced the Northern Xiongnu across the Ili River.
Despite these victories, the territories north of Han 's borders यहूद जल्दी overrun by the nomadic Xianbei Confederation.
After 92 AD, the palace eunuchs increasingly involved themselves in court politics, engaging in violent power struggles between the विभिन्न consort clans of the empresses और सम्राज्ञी dowagers, causing the Han 's ultimate downfall.
Imperial authority was भी seriously challenged by विशाल daoist धार्मिक समाजों जिससे instigated the Yellow Turban Rebellion and the Five Pecks of Rice Rebellion.
Following the मौत of सम्राट ling ( r. 168–189 ad ), the राजमहल हिजड़े suffered होलसेल नरसंहार by सैन्य officers, allowing members of the aristocracy and military governors to become warlords and divide the empire.
When Cao Pi, King of Wei, usurped the throne from सम्राट xian, the हान राजवंश ceased to मौजूद.
The Han Dynasty was an age of economic prosperity and saw a significant growth of the money economy first established during the झोऊ राजवंश ( c. 1050–256 BC ).
The coinage issued by the सेंट्रल सरकारी मिंट in 119 bc remained the standard coinage of China until the Tang Dynasty ( 618–907 AD ).
To pay for its military campaigns and the उपनिवेश of newly conquered frontier territories, the government nationalized the private salt and iron industries in 117 BC.
These government monopolies were repealed during the Eastern Han period, और the खोया आय थी recouped through heavily taxing private entrepreneurs.
The सम्राट थी at the pinnacle of Han society.
He presided over the Han government but shared power साथ दोनो the धामों और नियुक्त मंत्रियों who came largely from the scholarly gentry class.
From the शासनकाल of सम्राट wu onward, the चाइनीज अदालत officially sponsored Confucianism in education and court politics, synthesized with the cosmology of later scholars such as Dong Zhongshu.
This policy endured until the fall of the चिंग राजवंश in 1911 AD.
Science and technology during the Han period saw significant advances, including papermaking, the nautical steering rudder, the use of negative numbers in mathematics, the raised-relief मैप, the हाइड्रोलिक -powered armillary गोला लिये खगोलशास्त्र, and a seismometer employing an inverted pendulum.
Tourette syndrome ( also called Tourette 's syndrome, Tourette 's disorder, Gilles de la Tourette syndrome, GTS or, more commonly, simply Tourette 's or TS ) is an inherited neuropsychiatric विकार साथ onset in बाल्यकाल, characterized by multiple physical ( motor ) tics and at least one vocal ( phonic ) tic.
These tics characteristically wax and wane, can be suppressed temporarily, और हैं preceded by a premonitory urge.
Tourette 's is defined as part of a वर्णक्रम of टिक विकार, जिससे शामिल transient and chronic tics.
Tourette 's थी एकबार माना a विरल और विचित्र सिंड्रोम, सबसे प्रायः संबद्ध with the exclamation of obscene words or socially inappropriate and derogatory remarks ( coprolalia ), but this symptom is present in only a small minority of people with Tourette 's.
Tourette 's is no longer considered a rare condition, but it is not always correctly identified because most cases are mild और the गंभीरता of tics decreases लिये सबसे children as they pass through adolescence.
Between 0.4 % and 3.8 % of children ages 5 to 18 may have Tourette 's ; the prevalence of क्षणिक और दीर्घकालिक tics in school-age children is उच्चतर, साथ the अधिक आम tics of eye blinking, coughing, throat clearing, sniffing, and facial movements.
Extreme Tourette 's in adulthood is a rarity, और Tourette 's does not adversely affect intelligence or life expectancy.
Genetic and environmental factors play a role in the etiology of Tourette 's, but the exact causes are unknown.
In most cases, दवा is unnecessary.
There is no effective treatment for every case of tics, but certain medications और therapies can सहायता जब उनके use is warranted.
Education is an महत्वपूर्ण भाग of कोई उपचार plan, and explanation and reassurance alone are often sufficient treatment.
Comorbid conditions ( co-occurring diagnoses other than Tourette 's ) ऐसे as attention-deficit अतिसक्रियता disorder ( ADHD ) and obsessive–compulsive disorder ( OCD ) are present in many patients seen in tertiary specialty clinics.
These other conditions often cause more functional impairment to the व्यक्तिगत than the tics कि हैं the hallmark of tourette 's, hence it is important to correctly identify comorbid conditions and treat them.
The eponym was bestowed by Jean-Martin Charcot ( 1825–1893 ) on behalf of his resident, Georges Albert Édouard Brutus Gilles de la Tourette ( 1859–1904 ), a फ्रेंच चिकित्सक और neurologist, जो प्रकाशित an account of nine patients with Tourette 's in 1885.
Sunbeam बैज.
Sunbeam was a marque पंजीकृत by जॉन marston Co. Ltd of Wolverhampton, England, in 1888.
The company first made bicycles, then motorcycles and cars इससे the लेट 19th सदी जबतक परिचय 1936, और लागू the marque to all three forms of transportation.
The company also manufactured aero engines in the पहला संसार युद्ध और 647 वायुयान during the Second World War.
A Sunbeam was the first British car to जीत a ग्रैंड प्रिक्स रेस, और नियत a number of land speed records.
The company went into receivership in 1935 and was खरीदा by the rootes समूह, which continued to use the Sunbeam marque.
Fox News Channel ( fnc ), भी ज्ञात as फॉक्स न्यूज, is a केबल न्यूज चैनल स्वामित्व by the फॉक्स entertainment Group, a subsidiary of News Corporation.
As of April 2009, the channel was available to 102 million households in the संयुक्त राज्य और to दर्शक internationally, प्रसारण primarily from its New York studios.
The channel was created by Australian-American media mogul Rupert मर्डोक, जो नियुक्त पूर्व एनबीसी कार्यपालिका रोजर ailes as its founding CEO.
It शुभारम्भ on अक्तूबर 7, 1996 to 17 million cable subscribers.
It grew during the late 1990s and 2000s to become the dominant cable news network in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Critics have stated कि फॉक्स न्यूज चैनल promotes रूढ़िवादी राजनैतिक positions and biased reporting.
Commentators, news anchors, and reporters at Fox News Channel have responded कि न्यूज रिपोर्टिंग और राजनैतिक commentary operate independently of प्रत्येक other, and have denied any bias in news reporting.
The mandibular first molar or six-year molar is the tooth located distally ( दूर इससे the midline of the फेस ) इससे दोनो the mandibular दूसरी premolars of the मुँह लकिन mesial ( toward the midline of the face ) from both mandibular second molars.
It is located on the mandibular ( lower ) arch of the mouth, and generally opposes the ऊर्ध्वहनु ( अपर ) पहला molars और the ऊर्ध्वहनु 2nd premolar in normal class I occlusion.
The फलन of इस molar is समान to कि of सब molars in regard to grinding being the principal action during mastication, commonly known as chewing.
There are usually five well-developed cusps on mandibular first molars : two on the buccal ( side nearest the cheek ), two lingual ( पक्ष निकटतम the जीभ ), और एक distal.
There are great differences between the deciduous ( baby ) mandibular molars and those of the स्थाई mandibular molars, भी हालांकि उनके फलन are similar.
The स्थाई mandibular molars are not considered to have any teeth that precede it.
Despite being नामित molars, the पतझड़ी molars हैं followed by permanent premolars.
In the universal system of notation, the deciduous mandibular first molars are designated by a अक्षर लिखा in अपरकेस.
The right deciduous mandibular पहला molar is ज्ञात as `` s '', और the बाएँ one is known as `` L ''.
the अंतरराष्ट्रीय संकेतन has a different system of notation.
Thus, the right deciduous mandibular first molar is known as `` 84 '', and the बाएँ एक is ज्ञात as `` 74 ''.
In the सार्वभौमिक प्रणाली of संकेतन, the permanent mandibular first molars are designated by a number.
The सही स्थाई mandibular पहला molar is known as `` 30 '', and the left one is known as `` 19 ''.
The पामर संकेतन उपयोग a क्रमांक in संयोजन with a symbol designating in which quadrant the tooth is found.
For this दाँत, the बाएँ और सही पहला molars होता have the वही number, `` 6 '', but the right one would have the symbol, `` ┐ '', over it, while the left one would have, `` ┌ ''.
The international notation has a अलग क्रमांकन प्रणाली than the पिछला दो, और the सही स्थाई mandibular first molar is known as `` 46 '', and the left one is known as `` 36 ''.
mandibular प्राथमिक पहला molars usually have four pulp horns.
The first molar is usually the पहला स्थाई दाँत to erupt और रै वयस्क undertones.
Anatomy : The mandibular first molar रै पाँच पुलिन : the mesiobuccal ( mb, toward midline और गाल ), mesiolingual ( ml, toward midline और tongue ), distolingual ( DL, away from midline and towards tongue ), distobuccal ( DB, away from midline and toward cheek ), and distal ( D, away from midline ), listed in order of decreasing size.
Listed in order of decreasing height they are : ML, DL, DF, MF, and D. An eighth cusp was found in a primary second निम्नतर molar in an Argentinean child.
Viewed from the top of the tooth ( occlusal view ), the mandibular पहला molar is pentagonal ( पाँच तरफा ) in आकार और tapers toward the lingual, साथ the sides being the buccal surface, the mesial surface, the lingual surface, distal surface, and the distobuccal surface.
The occlusal सतह रै चार डोले.
The central groove is not straight but runs down the center of the tooth mesially to distally और contains चार गड्ढों ( mesial, central, central, and distal ).
the distobuccal नाली रनों इससे the distal गड्ढे in the सेंट्रल groove distobuccally separating the distal and distobuccal cusps.
The lingual groove रनों इससे the अधिक distal of the सेंट्रल गड्ढों in the सेंट्रल नाली toward the lingual surface between the mesiolingual and distolingual cusps.
The buccal groove runs from the more mesial of the central pits in the सेंट्रल नाली toward the buccal सतह between the mesiobuccal and distobuccal cusps ending in the buccal pit.
The portion of the central groove between the central pits is termed the Lewis offset and is mandatory to account for the locations of the buccal और lingual डोले ( buccal नाली होने अधिक mesial than the lingual groove while they are parallel ).
From the buccal ( buccal view ), two roots are present.
The distal root is generally straighter, हालांकि both often have a slight distal curvature.
The heights of contour on the mesial and distal सम्पर्क the सटा दांत और हैं स्तिथ at the जंक्शन of the occlusal and middle thirds of the crown.
The फ्लोरिडा विधानमंडल is the दो घरों that act as the state legislature of the U.S. state of Florida.
The Florida Constitution states that `` The legislative power of the state shall be vested in a legislature of the State of Florida, '' composed of a सीनेट और हाउस of प्रतिनिधि.
The विधानमंडल is seated at the Florida State Capitol in Tallahassee.
Stained कांच चित्रण of Daniel interceding with Arioch, the king 's guard.
Arioch had been charged with हत्या सब the हिकमत मेन बाद वे यहूद not able to interpret Nebuchadnezzar 's dream.
Daniel 2 is the दूसरी अध्याय of the Book of Daniel in the Hebrew Bible.
The chapter 's सोर्स टेक्स्ट is predominantly written in Aramaic.
According to the text, Nebuchadnezzar is the किंग of बाबुल जो is troubled by his dreams.
He demands an निर्वचन for his dreams or will have his mystic interpreters executed.
डेनियल seeks दैवी अक्ल to interpret the king 's dreams and praises God with a short psalm.
God gives Daniel a vision in the रात्रि to खुलासा the king 's dream.
Able to satisfy the king, डेनियल is प्रचारित over the पूरे province of Babylon.
One Comcast बीच, the मुख्यालय of comcast in Philadelphia, PA.
The old Comcast logo from 1969 to 1999, when it was replaced साथ the crescent logo.
The Comcast Corporation is an American provider of entertainment, सूचना और संचार products and services.
It is the largest cable operator, one of the biggest mass media, home Internet सेवा प्रदाता, और तीसरा largest घर टेलीफोन सेवा प्रदाता in the संयुक्त राज्य, providing केबल टेलीविज़न, ब्रॉडबैंड Internet, telephone service and in some areas home security ( including burglar alarms, surveillance cameras, fire alarm systems and home automation ) to both residential and commercial customers in 40 states and the District of Columbia.
The company is headquartered in फिलाडेल्फिया, पेन्सिलवेनिया.
In 2011, Comcast acquired a 51 % majority stake in media conglomerate nbcuniversal इससे ge in जनवरी 2011, और began the प्रक्रम of खरीदना the remaining 49 % on February 12, 2013, at a cost of $ 16.7 billion.
It समाप्त the खरीदें on कूच 19, 2013.
Comcast also has significant holding in अनेक केबल संजाल ( including E !
Entertainment Television, Style संजाल, g4, the गोल्फ़ चैनल और एनबीसी खेल संजाल ), distribution ( ThePlatform ), and related businesses.
Comcast has been the subject of criticism for activities सहित इसके stance on जाल neutrality, as खूब as ग़रीब results on customer satisfaction surveys.
Porcupines are rodents with a coat of शार्प कांटे, or quills, कि बचाव and camouflage them from predators.
They are indigenous to the Americas, दक्षिणी एशिया, और अफ़्रीकी.
porcupines हैं the तीसरा largest of the rodents, behind the capybara and the beaver.
Most porcupines हैं परिचय long, साथ an long tail.
Weighing, they are rounded, विशाल और slow.
Porcupines come in विभिन्न शेड्स of भूरा, gray, and the unusual white.
Porcupines ' spiny protection resembles that of the unrelated erinaceomorph hedgehogs और monotreme echidnas.
The common साही is a herbivore.
It eats leaves, herbs, twigs and green plants like skunk cabbage and clover और in the शीत it may खा छाल.
The North अमरीकी साही प्रायः climbs trees to find food.
The African साही is नहीं a climber and forages on the ground.
It is ज़्यादातर nocturnal, but will sometimes forage for food in the day.
Porcupines have become a pest in Kenya and are eaten as a delicacy.
The name साही आता इससे मध्य French porc espin ( spined pig ).
a क्षेत्रीय अमरीकी नाम लिये the animal is quill pig.

Elijah J. McCoy ( May 2, 1844 – October 10, 1929 ) थी a ब्लैक canadian-american आविष्कारक और इंजीनियर, जो was notable for his 57 U.S. patents, most to do with lubrication of steam engines.
Born free in Canada, he returned as a five-year-old child with his family to the United राज्य in 1847, जहाँ he जिया लिये the बाकी of उसके life and became a US citizen.
Honda FCX Clarity, a hydrogen ईंधन कोशिका demonstration गाडी introduced in 2008
A हाइड्रोजन गाडी is a गाडी कि उपयोग hydrogen as its onboard fuel for motive power.
Hydrogen vehicles include hydrogen fueled space rockets, as खूब as ऑटोमोबाइल और अन्य परिवहन vehicles.
The power plants of such वाहनों बदलें the रासायनिक उर्जा of हाइड्रोजन to mechanical उर्जा either by burning हाइड्रोजन in an आतंरिक combustion engine, or by reacting hydrogen with oxygen in a fuel cell to run electric motors.
Widespread use of hydrogen for fueling transportation is a कुंजी तत्व of a प्रस्तावित हाइड्रोजन economy.
Hydrogen fuel does not occur naturally on धरती और यूँ is not an energy source ; rather it is an energy carrier.
It is most frequently made from methane or other fossil fuels, लकिन it can be उत्पादित using स्त्रोत ( ऐसे as हवा, सौर, or नाभिकीय ) that are intermittent, too diffuse or too cumbersome to directly propel vehicles.
Integrated wind-to-hydrogen plants, using electrolysis of जल, हैं exploring technologies to उद्धार लागत कम पर्याप्त, और quantities great enough, to compete with traditional energy sources.
Many companies are working to develop technologies कि might efficiently exploit the potential of hydrogen energy for mobile uses.
the आकर्षण of using हाइड्रोजन as an उर्जा करेंसी is कि, if हाइड्रोजन is prepared बगैर using fossil fuel inputs, vehicle propulsion would not contribute to carbon dioxide emissions.
The drawbacks of hydrogen use are high capital cost, low energy content per unit volume, high tankage weights, very high storage vessel pressures, the storage, transportation and filling of gaseous or liquid hydrogen in वाहनों, the विशाल निवेश in अवसंरचना कि होता be जरूरी to ईंधन वाहनों, and the inefficiency of production processes.
Sacramento is the पूंजी नगर of the U.S. state of California and the seat of government of Sacramento County.
It is located at the confluence of the Sacramento River and the अमरीकी नदी in the उत्तरी portion of California 's expansive Central Valley.
With an estimated 2011 population of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest city in California and the 35th largest नगर in the संयुक्त States.
Sacramento is the core सांस्कृतिक और आर्थिक बीच of the sacramento महानगर area which includes seven counties with an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123.
Its metropolitan area is the fourth largest in California after the Greater Los Angeles Area, सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल, और the सैन डिएगो महानगर क्षेत्रफल, as खूब as the 25th largest in the संयुक्त States.
Sacramento was cited by समय पत्रिका as अमेरिका 's सबसे ethnically and racially integrated city in 2002.
Sacramento became a city through the efforts of the Swiss immigrant John sutter, sr., उसके बेटे जॉन sutter, jr., और जेम्स W. मार्शल.
Sacramento grew quickly thanks to the सुरक्षा of sutter 's फोर्ट, जिससे थी established by Sutter in 1839.
During the California Gold Rush, sacramento थी a प्रमुख वितरण पाइंट, a commercial and agricultural center, and a terminus for wagon trains, stagecoaches, riverboats, the telegraph, the Pony Express, and the First Transcontinental Railroad.
California State University, sacramento, अधिक commonly ज्ञात as sacramento राज्य or Sac State, is the largest local university.
It is one of the twenty-three campuses of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों प्रणाली.
Drexel विश्वविद्यालयों sacramento is स्तिथ in Downtown, Sacramento.
University of the Pacific 's mcgeorge स्कूल of विधि is located in the Oak Park neighborhood.
In addition, the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, Davis is located in nearby Davis, west of the capital.
The UC Davis Medical Center, a world-renowned research hospital, is स्तिथ in the city of Sacramento.
The Apple Store is a chain of retail stores owned and operated by Apple Inc., dealing in कंप्यूटर और उपभोक्ता electronics.
The stores sell Macintosh personal computers, software, iPods, iPads, iPhones, third-party accessories, और अन्य उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स ऐसे as ठहराना tv.
Some high profile stores feature a Theatre for presentations and workshops and a Studio for training with ठहराना उत्पाद ; सब स्टोर्स प्रस्ताव a प्रतिभाशाली बार लिये तकनीकी support and repairs, as well as free workshops available to the public.
Under the leadership of Ron Johnson, the पूर्व वरिष्ठ वाइस अध्यक्ष of खुदरा परिचालन, the Apple Stores have, according to an article in the New York Times, been responsible for `` [ turning ] the boring computer sales floor into a sleek playroom filled with gadgets ''.
, Apple has 405 stores विश्वव्यापी, साथ वैश्विक बिक्री of billion in merchandise in 2011, and they lead the United States retail market in terms of sales per unit area.
Steven Paul `` स्टीव '' कार्य ( ; फ़रवरी 24, 1955 – अक्तूबर 5, 2011 ) was an American entrepreneur and inventor, best known as the co-founder, chairman, and CEO of Apple Inc.
Through Apple, he थी widely पहचाना as a charismatic पायोनियर of the निजी computer revolution and for his influential career in the computer and consumer electronics fields, transforming `` one industry after another, from computers and smartphones to music and movies... ''
Jobs also co-founded and served as chief executive of Pixar Animation Studios ; he became a member of the board of निर्देशकों of the वॉल्ट डिज़्नी कम्पनी in 2006, जब Disney acquired Pixar.
Jobs was among the first to see the commercial potential of Xerox PARC 's mouse -driven graphical user interface, which led to the सृष्टि of the ठहराना लिसा और, एक साल later, the Macintosh.
He also played a role in introducing the LaserWriter, one of the पहला widely उपलब्धियाँ लेज़र मुद्रक, to the market.
After a power संघर्ष साथ the फलक of निर्देशकों in 1985, कार्य बाएँ ठहराना और संस्थापित अगला, a कंप्यूटर मंच development company specializing in the higher-education and business markets.
In 1986, he acquired the computer ग्राफिक्स प्रभाग of लुकासफ़िल्म, जिससे was spun off as Pixar.
He was credited in Toy स्टोरी ( 1995 ) as an कार्यपालिका निर्माता.
He served as CEO and बहुमत shareholder जबतक डिज़्नी 's खरीदें of Pixar in 2006.
In 1996, after Apple had failed to deliver its operating system, Copland, Gil Amelio turned to NeXT Computer, and the NeXTSTEP platform became the न्यास लिये the मैक OS X.
कार्य लौटे to ठहराना as an advisor, and took control of the company as an interim CEO.
Jobs brought ठहराना इससे निकट bankruptcy to profitability by 1998.
As the new CEO of the कम्पनी, कार्य oversaw the विकास of the imac, itunes, iPod, iPhone, and iPad, and on the services side, the company 's Apple Retail Stores, iTunes Store and the App Store.
The success of these products and services provided अनेक सालो of stable वित्तीय returns, and propelled Apple to become the world 's most valuable publicly traded company in 2011.
The reinvigoration of the company is regarded by many टीकाकारों as एक of the महानतम turnarounds in कारोबार history.
In 2003, Jobs थी diagnosed with a pancreas neuroendocrine tumor.
Though it was initially treated, he reported a हार्मोन असंतुलन, underwent a जिगर प्रत्यारोपण in 2009, and appeared progressively thinner as his health declined.
On medical leave for most of 2011, कार्य resigned in अगस्त कि साल, and was elected Chairman of the Board.
He died of respiratory arrest related to his metastatic tumor on October 5, 2011.
Jobs received a क्रमांक of honors और पब्लिक मान्यता लिये उसके influence in the technology and music industries.
He has been referred to as `` legendary '', a `` futurist '' or simply `` दूरदर्शी '', और रै महरूम वर्णित as the `` पिता of the डिजिटल क्रान्ति '', a `` निपुण of नवीनता '', and a `` design perfectionist ''.

Roman numerals, the numeric प्रणाली in प्राचीन रोम, उपयोग combinations of अक्षर from the Latin alphabet to signify values.
The numbers 1 to 10 can be expressed in Roman numerals as follows:
और.
The Roman numeral प्रणाली is a cousin of Etruscan numerals.
Use of Roman numerals जारी बाद the मनाही of the Roman Empire.
From the 14th century on, Roman numerals began to be replaced in सबसे contexts by अधिक सुविधाजनक hindu-arabic numerals ; however इस process was gradual, and the use of Roman numerals in some minor applications continues to this day.
प्रभावी नाभिकीय चार्ज Diagram
The effective नाभिकीय चार्ज ( प्रायः symbolize as or Z* ) is the net positive charge experienced by an electron in a multi-electron atom.
The term `` effective '' is used क्युकी the shielding प्रभाव of negatively चार्ज electrons prevents higher orbital electrons from experiencing the full nuclear charge by the repelling effect of inner-layer electrons.
The effective nuclear charge अनुभवी by the बाहरी शेल इलेक्ट्रॉन is also called the core charge.
It is संभावित to determine the शक्ति of the nuclear charge by looking at the oxidation number of the atom.
