The Dwight D. Eisenhower National System of Interstate and Defense Highways ( commonly ज्ञात as the अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग प्रणाली, अंतरराज्यीय फ्रीवे प्रणाली, अंतरराज्यीय प्रणाली, or बस the अंतरराज्यीय ) is a network of freeways that forms a part of the National Highway System of the United States.
The system is नामित लिये अध्यक्ष Dwight D. Eisenhower, who championed its formation.
Construction was authorized by the संघीय Aid Highway Act of 1956, and the original portion was completed 35 years later.
The network has since been extended, and, it था a कुल लंबाई of, बनाना it the संसार 's दूसरी longest after China 's., about one-quarter of all vehicle miles driven in the country use the Interstate system.
the लागत of निर्माण रै महरूम अनुमानित at $ 425 अरब ( in 2006 dollars ), making it the `` largest public works program since the Pyramids ``.
The system has contributed in shaping the United States into a world economic महाशक्ति और a अत्यधिक industrialized nation.
.eu is the country code top-level domain ( cctld ) लिये the यूरोपीय संघ ( EU ).
Launched on 7 December 2005, the domain is उपलब्धियाँ लिये संगठनों in and residents of EU member states.
The TLD is administered by eurid, a consortium originally consisting of the नेशनल cctld रजिस्ट्री ऑपरेटर of बेल्जियम, Sweden, and Italy, joined later by the national registry operator of the Czech Republic.
Trademark owners were able to submit registrations through a सूर्योदय काल, in an effort to prevent cybersquatting.
पूरा पंजीकरण started on 7 April 2006.
Meister means master in जर्मनी ( as in निपुण craftsman, or as an honorific title such as Meister Eckhart ).
The word is akin to maestro.
In sports, Meister is used for the current national, European or world champion ( Deutscher Meister, *europameister, weltmeister ).
Many modern day जर्मनी पुलिस शक्तियां use the title Meister.
During the Second World War, Meister was the उच्चतम आयोजिक रैंक of the ordnungspolizei.
meister रै महरूम उधार into English slang, where it is used in compound nouns.
A person referred to as “Meister” is one who रै extensive सैद्धांतिक ज्ञान और व्यावहारिक skills in his profession, business, or some other kind of work or activity.
For example, a “puzzle-meister” होता be someone highly skilled at solving puzzles.
These neologisms sometimes have a sarcastic intent ( for example, “stubble-meister” for किसी साथ a छोटी, neat दाढ़ी or “crier-meister” लिये किसी जो प्रायः cries ).
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers is an अमरीकी live-action children 's टेलीविज़न श्रेणी परिचय teenagers साथ super-powers, based on the 16th installment of the Japanese Super Sentai franchise, Kyōryū Sentai Zyuranger.
Both the show and its related merchandise saw unbridled overnight कामयाबी, बनने a स्टेपल of 1990s पॉप culture in mere months.
Under the असली नाम, `` mighty morphin शक्ति रेंजरों '' the श्रेणी ran from 1993 to 1995 and spawned the feature film Mighty Morphin Power Rangers : The Movie.
The second and third seasons of the show drew on footage and तत्व इससे the सुपर sentai श्रेणी gosei sentai dairanger और निंजा sentai kakuranger क्रमशः, though the Zyuranger costumes were still used for the five main Rangers and several regular villains.
Only the mecha and the Kiba Ranger costume ( worn by the White Ranger ) were retained from Dairanger for the दूसरी ऋतु, जबकि तभी the mecha इससे kakuranger यहूद प्रदर्शित in the third season.
However the Kakuranger costumes were later used for the title characters of the mini-series, mighty morphin एलियन Rangers.
The series was उत्पादित by mmpr प्रोडक्शन्स, distributed by Saban Entertainment, and aired on Fox Kids.
the दिखाएँ 's merchandise was produced and distributed by Bandai Entertainment.
In 1996, the series was rebranded as the Power Rangers franchise ; renaming the series every year after, and using costumes, props, and footage from subsequent Super Sentai series, as well as बदलना the डाल और कथानक.
While an overarching storyline would continue जबतक शक्ति रेंजरों खोया आकाशगंगा, subsequent series after MMPR are not sequels or spin-offs in the traditional sense.
In 2010, a re-version of mighty morphin शक्ति रेंजरों, साथ a नई logo, comic book-referenced graphics, and extra alternative special effects, was broadcast on ABC Kids, and Bandai produced brand new toys to coincide with the series.
Edgar Allan Poe ( born एडगर पो ; जनवरी 19, 1809 – अक्तूबर 7, 1849 ) थी an American author, poet, editor and literary critic, considered part of the American Romantic Movement.
Best known for his tales of mystery and the macabre, Poe was one of the earliest American practitioners of the short story and is generally माना the आविष्कारक of the जासूस fiction विधा.
He is further credited with contributing to the उभरते विधा of विज्ञान fiction.
He was the first well-known American writer to try to earn a living through writing alone, resulting in a financially मुश्किल जीवन और करियर.
He was born as Edgar Poe in Boston, Massachusetts ; he was orphaned young when his माँ died shortly बाद उसके पिता abandoned the परिवार.
Poe was taken in by John and Frances Allan, of रिचमंड, वर्जिनिया, but they never formally adopted him.
He attended the University of Virginia for one सेमेस्टर लकिन बाएँ due to कमी of धन.
After enlisting in the Army and later failing as an officer 's cadet at वेस्ट पाइंट, पो parted तरीके with the Allans.
His publishing career began विनम्रतापूर्वक, साथ an बेनाम संग्रहण of poems, Tamerlane and Other Poems ( 1827 ), credited only to `` a Bostonian ''.
Poe switched his focus to prose and spent the next several years working for literary journals and periodicals, बनने ज्ञात लिये उसके अपना स्टाइल of साहित्यिक criticism.
His work मजबूर उसे to मूव among अनेक cities, including Baltimore, Philadelphia, and New York City.
In Baltimore in 1835, he शादीशुदा वर्जिनिया clemm, उसके 13-year-old cousin.
In January 1845 Poe प्रकाशित उसके कविता, `` the Raven ``, to instant success.
His wife died of तपेदिक two years after its publication.
He began planning to produce his own journal, the penn ( बाद renamed the स्टाइलस ), though he died before it could be produced.
On October 7, 1849, at age 40, Poe died in Baltimore ; the कारण of उसके मौत is अनजान और रै महरूम variously attributed to दारू, दिमाग जमघट, cholera, drugs, heart disease, rabies, suicide, tuberculosis, and other agents.
Poe and his works बहकावे साहित्य in the संयुक्त राज्य और around the संसार, as well as in specialized fields, such as cosmology and cryptography.
Poe and his work appear throughout popular culture in साहित्य, म्यूज़िक, films, और टेलीविज़न.
A number of his homes are समर्पित संग्रहालय आज.
The Mystery Writers of America present an annual award known as the Edgar Award for विशिष्ट कार्य in the रहस्य विधा.
Lions are obligate carnivores ; they आवश्यकता up to सात गामा ( 15 lbs ) of meat per day.
A major component of their diet is the flesh of विशाल स्तनधारियों, जैसे इस African buffalo.
A carnivore ( ) meaning 'meat eater ' ( Latin, caro अर्थ 'meat ' or 'flesh ' और vorare अर्थ 'to devour ' ) is an organism that derives its energy and nutrient requirements from a diet consisting mainly or exclusively of animal tissue, whether through predation or scavenging.
Animals that depend solely on animal flesh for their nutrient requirements are considered carnivores जबकि those कि भी consume non-animal food are considered carnivores.
Omnivores also consume both animal and non-animal food, and apart from the more general definition, there is no clearly defined ratio of plant to animal सामग्री कि होता फर्क a facultative carnivore इससे an omnivore.
A carnivore that sits at the top of the foodchain is an apex predator.
Plants that capture and digest insects are पुकारा मांसाहारी पौधे.
Similarly, fungi that कैप्चर microscopic पशु are often called carnivorous fungi.
The FIFA World Cup, often simply the World Cup, is an international association football प्रतियोगिता लडे by the वरिष्ठ मेन 's नेशनल टीमों of the सदस्यों of fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ), the sport 's global governing body.
The championship has been awarded every four years since the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1930, मगर in 1942 and 1946 when it was not held because of the Second World War.
The current champions are स्पेन, जो जीती the 2010 tournament.
The current format of the tournament involves 32 teams competing for the title at venues within the host nation ( s ) over a काल of परिचय a माह ; इस phase is प्रायः पुकारा the संसार Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, which currently takes place over the preceding तीन सालो, is प्रयुक्त to determine जिससे teams qualify for the tournament together with the host nation ( s ).
The 19 World Cup tournaments have been won by eight अलग नेशनल टीमों.
Brazil have won five times, and they are the तभी टोली to have निभाई in प्रत्येक टूर्नामेंट.
The other World Cup winners are Italy, साथ चार शीर्षक ; जर्मनी, साथ तीन शीर्षक ; अर्जेंटीना and inaugural winners Uruguay, with two titles each ; and England, France, and Spain, with one title each.
The World Cup is the संसार 's सबसे widely viewed sporting इवेंट ; an अनुमानित 715.1 लाख people watched the final match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany.
The next three World Cups will be hosted by Brazil in 2014, Russia in 2018, और क़तर in 2022.
Heroes is an American science fiction television drama series created by Tim क्रिंग कि appeared on एनबीसी लिये चार सीज़न इससे सितंबर 25, 2006 through February 8, 2010.
The series tells the stories of ordinary लोगों जो discover superhuman abilities, and how these abilities take effect in the characters ' lives.
The series emulates the aesthetic style and storytelling of अमरीकी कॉमिक किताबे, using multi-episode story arcs that build upon a larger, more encompassing arc.
The series was produced by Tailwind Productions in संघ साथ सार्वभौमिक मीडिया Studios.
It was filmed primarily in लॉस एंजिल्स, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
Four complete seasons aired, ending on फ़रवरी 8, 2010.
the critically acclaimed पहला ऋतु था a चलाएं of 23 एपीसोड and garnered an average of 14.3 million viewers in the United States, receiving the highest rating for an NBC drama premiere in five years.
The second season of Heroes attracted an average of 13.1 लाख दर्शक in the u.S., and marked NBC 's sole series among the top 20 ranked programs in total viewership for the 2007–2008 season.
नायक रै अर्जित a क्रमांक of पुरस्कार और nominations, सहित प्राइमटाइम Emmy Awards, Golden Globes, People 's Choice Awards and British Academy Television Awards.
An online extension of the series, नायक 360 अनुभव, बाद rebranded as नायक evolutions, was created to explore the Heroes universe and provides insight into the show 's mythology.
Other official Heroes media include magazines, action आंकड़े, tie-in और इंटरैक्टिव वेबसाइटों, a mobile game, a novel, clothing and other merchandise.
In the fall of 2008, NBC Digital Entertainment released a series of ऑनलाइन सामग्री लिये the गर्मियाँ, सहित अधिक असली वेब सामग्री, बेतार आईटीवी interactivity, graphic novels available for mobile viewing and webisodes.
NBC announced Heroes रद्दीकरण on May 14, 2010.
afterward, the संजाल माना बनाना a टेलीविज़न खास इवेंट to conclude the श्रेणी ; however, on September 9, 2010, NBC announced the decision to stop any further development of the Heroes franchise.
Tim Kring then suggested कि the व्यापक आधार of नायक storylines अनुमत लिये the मताधिकार to वापसी लिये fans, but he did not specify when or in what media format.
On April 17, 2013, TV Line reported कि एमएसएन थी in बाते to revive the series with a new cast.
John pierpont `` J. p. ''
Morgan ( April 17, 1837 – March 31, 1913 ) was an American financier, banker, philanthropist and आर्ट कलेक्टर जो वर्चस्व कॉरपोरेट वित्त और औद्योगिक consolidation during his time.
In 1892 मॉर्गन arranged the विलय of एडिसन सामान्य इलेक्ट्रिक और Thomson-Houston Electric Company to form General Electric.
After financing the creation of the Federal Steel Company, he merged in 1901 with the Carnegie Steel Company and several other स्टील और आयरन व्यवसायों, सहित संचित स्टील और तार कम्पनी स्वामित्व by William Edenborn, to form the United States Steel Corporation.
Morgan died in Rome, Italy, in his sleep in 1913 at the age of 75, leaving his fortune and business to his son, John pierpont `` जोकर '' मॉर्गन, jr., और bequeathing उसके mansion और विशाल किताब संग्रहण to The Morgan Library & Museum in New York.
At the height of Morgan 's career during the early 1900s, he and his partners had financial निवेश in अनेक विशाल corporations और यहूद अभियुक्त by आलोचकों of controlling the nation 's high finance.
He निर्देशित the बैंकिंग coalition that stopped the Panic of 1907.
He was the leading financier of the Progressive Era, and his dedication to efficiency and modernization helped रूपांतरण अमरीकी कारोबार.
This is a list of episodes of the टेलीविज़न श्रेणी.
The episodes were directed by शिगेरू ueda और उत्पादित by the yggdrasil Executive Committee which included Xebec and Genco.
The plot of the episodes is set in Tokyo and revolves around Rin Asōgi, an अमर निजी अन्वेषक, as वो explores the रहस्य of आधुनिक और near-future संसार और the अलौकिक कार्यक्रम that surround the fictional society of immortals like herself.
There are large time gaps in the internal chronology between the first पाँच एपीसोड, ranging इससे one to thirty years.
The six episodes were broadcast मासिक on at-x चैनल in जापानी, between February 3 and July 6, 2008.
Each एपीसोड is 45 minutes long.
Two pieces of theme music are used for the episodes : the opening theme `` alsatia '' और the ending theme `` Cause Disarray ''.
Both were composed and performed by the जापानी metal band Galneryus.
The series was produced to commemorate the दसवाँ वर्षगांठ of the at-x network it originally aired on.
Aerial photo of FLETC, where US digital forensics मानकों यहूद विकसित in the 1980s and '90s
Digital forensics ( sometimes ज्ञात as डिजिटल forensic विज्ञान ) is a शाखा of forensic विज्ञान encompassing the रिकवरी and investigation of material found in digital devices, often in relation to computer crime.
The term digital forensics was originally प्रयुक्त as a पर्याय लिये कंप्यूटर forensics लकिन has expanded to cover investigation of all devices capable of storing digital data.
With roots in the personal computing revolution of the late 1970s and early '80s, the अनुशासन विकसित in a haphazard manner दौरान the 1990s, and it was not until the early 21st century that national policies emerged.
Digital forensics investigations have a किस्में of applications.
The most common is to support or refute a परिकल्पना पहले दण्ड or सिविल ( as भाग of the इलेक्ट्रॉनिक डिस्कवरी process ) courts.
Forensics may भी विशेषता in the निजी सेक्टर ; ऐसे as दौरान आतंरिक कॉरपोरेट investigations or intrusion investigation ( a specialist probe into the nature and extent of an unauthorized network intrusion ).
The technical aspect of an investigation is divided into several sub-branches, relating to the प्रकार of डिजिटल डिवाइस शामिल ; कंप्यूटर forensics, network forensics, forensic data analysis and mobile device forensics.
The typical forensic process encompasses the seizure, forensic imaging ( acquisition ) and analysis of digital media and the उत्पादन of a रपट into एकत्रित evidence.
As well as identifying direct evidence of a crime, digital forensics can be used to attribute evidence to specific suspects, confirm alibis or statements, determine intent, पहचानो स्त्रोत ( for example, in copyright cases ), or authenticate documents.
Investigations are much broader in scope than other areas of forensic analysis ( where the usual aim is to provide जवाब to a श्रेणी of simpler सवाल ) प्रायः involving जटिल time-lines or hypotheses.
A comparison of the chromaticities enclosed by some color spaces.
A color मॉडल is an अमूर्त गणितीय मॉडल describing the रास्ता रंगों can be represented as tuples of numbers, typically as three or four values or color components ( e.g. RGB and CMYK are color models ).
However, a color model with no associated mapping function to an निरपेक्ष रंग स्पेस is a अधिक or कम मनमानी रंग प्रणाली साथ no कनेक्शन to any globally understood system of color interpretation.
Adding a certain mapping function between the color मॉडल और a निश्चित सन्दर्भ रंग स्पेस परिणाम in a definite `` पदचिह्न '' within the reference color space.
This `` footprint '' is known as a gamut, and, in combination with the color model, defines a नई रंग space.
For example, adobe आरजीबी और srgb हैं दो अलग निरपेक्ष रंग spaces, both based on the RGB model.
In the most जेनेरिक भाव of the परिभाषा above, color spaces can be defined without the use of a color model.
These spaces, such as Pantone, are in effect a given set of names or संख्याएँ जिससे हैं पारिभाषित by the अस्तित्व of a corresponding set of physical color swatches.
This article focuses on the गणितीय model concept.
Labor Day is an American federal holiday observed on the first Monday in सितंबर, कि मनाता the आर्थिक और सोशल योगदान of workers.
Life insurance is a contract between an insured ( insurance policy holder ) and an insurer, जहाँ the insurer वादे to अदा a designated लाभार्थी a योग of धन ( the `` लाभ '' ) upon the मौत of the insured person.
Depending on the contract, other events ऐसे as टर्मिनल बीमारी or critical illness may also trigger payment.
The policy होल्डर typically pays a प्रीमियम, either regularly or as a lump sum.
Other expenses ( such as funeral खर्च ) हैं भी sometimes included in the benefits.
Life policies are विधिक अनुबंध और the शर्तें of the अनुबंध describe the limitations of the insured events.
Specific exclusions are often written into the contract to limit the liability of the insurer ; common examples are claims relating to आत्महत्या, धोखाधड़ी, युद्ध, riot और सिविल commotion.
Life-based contracts tend to पतन into two major categories:
Protection policies – designed to provide a लाभ in the इवेंट of निर्दिष्ट इवेंट, typically a lump sum payment.
A common form of this डिज़ाइन is पद बीमे.
Investment नीतियों – जहाँ the प्रमुख उद्देश्य is to facilitate the growth of capital by regular or single premiums.
Common forms ( in the US ) are पूरे जीवन, सार्वभौमिक जीवन and variable life policies.

Mitzi gaynor donahue ( born may 2, 1962 in yorba लिंडा, नारंगी काउंटी, California ) is an American actress, also credited and more popularly known as Mitzi Kapture.
Kapture began her career in films, सबसे of जिससे यहूद नहीं विशाल वाणिज्यिक successes.
She went on to make a few television guest appearances ( MacGyver, 1st & Ten, and as a contestant on The $ 100,000 Pyramid ) before she gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय एक्सपोज़र साथ उसके पहला प्रमुख टेलीविज़न भूमिका as सार्जेंट रीता ली तलवार in the टेलीविज़न series Silk Stalkings.
Kapture 's role as Rita, the अन्य हाफ of the दो `` sams '' for almost 5 years, cemented her popularity.
Paired with Rob Estes who played Sergeant Chris Lorenzo, Kapture gained वैश्विक मान्यता साथ साथ उसके costar चूंकि the दिखाएँ थी broadcast in several countries.
Sergeant Lance आखिरकार became लेफ्टिनेंट तलवार by the समय kapture left the series in 1995 to have her first child Madison.
During her time with the series, kapture briefly सत in the निदेशक 's कुर्सी, लिये दो episodes.
She was interviewed for the Silk Stalkings Season 1 DVD जिससे थी वितरित by लंगर खाड़ी entertainment और released in September 2004.
After a short hiatus from the screen following her exit from Silk Stalkings, Kapture लौटे in 1997 to the छोटी स्क्रीन and USA Network.
She played lead roles in two USA Pictures Originals telemovies, Perfect Crime ( based on a true स्टोरी, भी पुकारा छुपा और तलाश : the जोआन जेन्सेन स्टोरी ), जिससे भी starred Jasmine Guy and His Bodyguard.
She later starred in a few other independent film projects and थिएटर प्रोडक्शन्स और था अनेक टेलीविज़न guest appearances.
Kapture also had a पुनरावर्ती भूमिका on बेवाच as Alexis Ryker.
She played Anita Hodges on The Young and the Restless from 2002 through 2004, where वो थी credited as Mitzi Kapture Donahue, and starred in the made-for-TV movie Night of Terror which premiered March 26, 2006 on Lifetime Network.
Her latest is a supporting role in परमेश्वर 's कानों, released in 2007.
Kapture is the आधिकारिक हस्ती प्रवक्ता for the Xeroderma Pigmentosum Society.
The Xbox 360 is the second video game console विकसित by और उत्पादित लिये microsoft और the successor to the Xbox.
The Xbox 360 competes with Sony 's PlayStation 3 and Nintendo 's Wii as भाग of the सातवाँ पीढी of वीडियो खेल consoles.
As of September 30, 2012, 70 million Xbox 360 consoles have महरूम बेची worldwide.
The Xbox 360 was officially unveiled on MTV on May 12, 2005, साथ विस्तृत लॉन्च और खेल सूचना divulged बाद कि माह at the इलेक्ट्रॉनिक Entertainment Expo ( E3 ).
The console sold out completely upon release in all regions मगर in जापानी.
Several major features of the एक्सबॉक्स 360 हैं इसके एकीकृत एक्सबॉक्स सजीव सेवा कि allows खिलाड़ी to compete online ; download arcade games, game demos, trailers, TV shows, music and movies ; and its Windows Media Center multimedia capabilities.
The Xbox Live also offers access to विभिन्न ( प्रायः region-specific ) third-party media streaming applications.
At their E3 presentation on June 14, 2010, microsoft घोषित a redesigned एक्सबॉक्स 360 कि होता ship on the same day.
The redesigned कंसोल is slimmer than the पिछला एक्सबॉक्स 360 मॉडल और features integrated 802.11 b/g/n Wi-Fi, TOSLINK S/PDIF optical audio output, five USB 2.0 ports ( compared to the three from older versions ) and a special AUX port.
पुरानी मॉडल of the एक्सबॉक्स 360 have since been discontinued.
The first new कंसोल to be released features a 250 GB hard drive, while a later, less expensive SKU features 4 GB internal storage.

a आधुनिक backpack
Swiss army backpack ca. 1960
एकीकृत तुमको frame.
A backpack ( also called rucksack, knapsack, packsack, pack ) is, in its simplest form, a cloth sack carried on one 's back और secured साथ दो straps कि go over the कन्धों, but there can be exceptions.
Lightweight types of backpacks are sometimes worn on only one shoulder strap.
Backpacks are often preferred to handbags for carrying heavy loads or carrying कोई sort of उपकरण, क्युकी of the सीमित क्षमता to carry heavy weights for long periods of time in the hands.
Large backpacks, used to carry loads over 10 kg ( 22 lbs ), usually offload the largest भाग ( up to परिचय 90 % ) of उनके वज़न onto padded हिप belts, leaving the shoulder straps mainly for stabilising the load.
This improves the potential to carry heavy loads, as the hips are stronger than the shoulders, and also increases agility और संतुलन, चूंकि the लोड यात्राएँ nearer the wearer 's अपना बीच of mass.
In ancient times, the backpack was used as a means to carry the hunter 's larger game and other प्रकार of शिकार और as a रास्ता of easier हस्तांतरण लिये other materials.
In the cases of larger hunts, the hunters would dismember their prey and distribute the pieces of the एनिमल around, प्रत्येक एक पैकिंग the मांस into अनेक wrappings और तब into बैग which they placed on to their backs.
The bag itself was made up of different animal hide and skin ( depending on what sorts of animals were in the area ) and sewn together by the intestines of said animals, जिससे यहूद woven साथ tightly to मेक a sturdy thread-like material.
Mexico ( ; ; ), officially the United Mexican States ( ), is a संघीय संवैधानिक गणतंत्र in North America.
It is bordered on the north by the United States ; on the south and west by the Pacific Ocean ; on the southeast by ग्वाटेमाला, बेलीज़, और the caribbean समुद्र ; और on the ईस्ट by the Gulf of Mexico.
Covering almost two million वर्गाकार किलोमीटर ( over 760,000 sq mi ), मैक्सिको is the पांचवां largest country in the Americas by total area and the 13th largest independent nation in the world.
With an estimated जनसांख्यिकी of over 113 लाख, it is the संसार 's eleventh सबसे populous country and the most populous Spanish-speaking country.
Mexico is a federation comprising thirty-one राज्य और a संघीय District, the capital city.
In pre-Columbian Mexico many cultures matured into advanced civilizations such as the Olmec, the toltec, the teotihuacan, the Zapotec, the Maya and the Aztec before first contact with Europeans.
In 1521, Spain conquered and colonized the territory from its base in méxico-tenochtitlan, जिससे थी administered as the Viceroyalty of New Spain.
This territory would eventually become मैक्सिको following मान्यता of the colony 's independence in 1821.
The post-independence period was characterized by आर्थिक अस्थिरता, the mexican-american War and territorial cession to the United States, a civil war, two empires and a domestic dictatorship.
The latter led to the Mexican Revolution in 1910, जिससे culminated साथ the promulgation of the 1917 संविधान and the emergence of the country 's current political system.
Elections आयोजित in जुलाई 2000 चिह्नित the पहला समय that an opposition party won the presidency from the Institutional Revolutionary Party.
Since 2006 the देश रै महरूम in the midst of a drug war which has caused 60,000 deaths.
Mexico रै एक of the world 's largest economies, and is considered both a regional power and middle power.
In जोड, मैक्सिको थी the पहला लैटिन अमरीकी सदस्य of the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development OECD ( since 1994 ), and considered an upper-middle income country by the World Bank.
Mexico is considered a newly industrialized देश और an उभरते शक्ति.
it रै the fourteenth largest नाममात्र GDP and the eleventh largest GDP by purchasing power parity.
The economy is strongly linked to those of इसके उत्तर American Free Trade Agreement ( NAFTA ) partners, especially the United States of America.
Mexico ranks sixth in the world and first in the Americas by number of UNESCO World Heritage Sites with 31, and in 2007 was the दसवाँ सबसे visited देश in the संसार साथ 21.4 लाख अंतरराष्ट्रीय आमद प्रति year.
Babe Ruth holds the एमएलबी करियर slugging प्रतिशत record (.690 ).
In baseball आंकडे, slugging प्रतिशत ( abbreviated SLG ) is a popular measure of the power of a hitter.
It is calculated as कुल bases विभाजित by at bats :
where AB is the number of at-bats लिये a दिए खिलाड़ी, और 1b, 2b, 3B, and HR are the number of singles, doubles, triples, and home runs, respectively.
सैर हैं specifically excluded from this calculation.
लिये उदाहरण, in 1920, Babe Ruth played his first season for the New York Yankees.
In 458 at bats, Ruth had 172 hits, comprising 73 singles, 36 doubles, 9 triples, and 54 home runs, which brings the total base count to ( 73 × 1 ) + ( 36 × 2 ) + ( 9 × 3 ) + ( 54 × 4 ) = 388.
His total number of bases ( 388 ) विभाजित by उसके कुल at-bats ( 458 ) is.847, his slugging percentage for the season.
The next year he slugged.846, and these records went unbroken until 2001, when Barry Bonds achieved 411 bases in 476 at-bats, bringing उसके slugging प्रतिशत to.863, बेमेल since.
is a role-playing video game developed and published by Square ( now Square एनिक्स ) लिये the सुपर निन्टेंडो entertainment प्रणाली in 1995.
Chrono Trigger 's development team included three designers that Square dubbed the `` Dream Team '' : Hironobu Sakaguchi, the creator of Square 's Final Fantasy series ; Yuji Horii, a freelance designer and creator of Enix 's popular Dragon Quest series ; and Akira toriyama, a freelance manga कलाकार famed लिये उसके कार्य साथ ड्रैगन क्वेस्ट और ड्रैगन Ball.
Kazuhiko Aoki produced the खेल, masato काटो लिखा सबसे of the प्लाट, जबकि composer yasunori Mitsuda scored most of the game before falling ill and deferring remaining tracks to Final Fantasy composer Nobuo Uematsu.
The game 's story follows a group of adventurers who travel through समय to prevent a वैश्विक प्रलय.
Square re-released a ported version by Tose in Japan for Sony 's प्लेस्टेशन in 1999, बाद repackaged साथ a फाइनल काल्पनिक iv बंदरगाहों as Final Fantasy Chronicles in 2001 for the North American market.
A slightly enhanced Chrono Trigger was released लिये the निन्टेंडो ds on नवम्बर 25, 2008, in North America and Japan, and went on sale in Australia on February 3, 2009 and in Europe on February 6, 2009.
The game was never released in PAL territories पहले the निन्टेंडो DS version.
Chrono Trigger was a नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी upon रिलीज and is considered today to be one of the greatest video games of all time.
Nintendo Power magazine described aspects of Chrono Trigger as revolutionary, including its अनेक endings, plot-related sidequests focusing on अक्षर विकास, unique battle system, and detailed graphics.
Chrono Trigger was the third best-selling game of 1995, और the खेल 's snes और प्लेस्टेशन iterations have shipped 2.65 million copies as of March 2003.
The संस्करण लिये the निन्टेंडो ds sold 790,000 copies as of March 2009.
Chrono Trigger थी भी ported to मोबाईल फोन, आभासी कंसोल, the प्लेस्टेशन संजाल ( तभी in the USA ), iOS devices, and Android devices.
बकरी चीज
Goat cheese, or chèvre ( from the French शब्द लिये बकरी ), is चीज बना आउट of the milk of goats.
Hyperthermia is elevated body temperature due to failed thermoregulation कि occurs जब a body produces or absorbs more heat than it dissipates.
Extreme तापमान उन्नयन then becomes a medical emergency requiring immediate treatment to prevent disability or death.
The most common causes include heat stroke and प्रतिकूल प्रतिक्रियाएँ to दवाएँ.
The former is an acute temperature elevation caused by exposure to excessive ऊष्मा, or संयोजन of ऊष्मा और आर्द्रता, कि overwhelms the heat-regulating mechanisms.
The latter is a relatively rare side effect of many drugs, विशेषकर those कि affect the central nervous system.
Malignant अतिताप is a विरल complication of some types of general anesthesia.
Hyperthermia can also be deliberately induced using drugs or medical devices और may be प्रयुक्त in the उपचार of कुछ kinds of cancer and other conditions, most commonly in conjunction with radiotherapy.
Hyperthermia differs from ज्वर in कि the देह 's तापमान नियत पाइंट remains unchanged.
The opposite is hypothermia, which occurs when the तापमान बूंदें नीचे कि जरूरी to maintain normal metabolism.
Belize, is a देश स्तिथ on the northeastern coast of Central America.
It is the only country in the क्षेत्रफल जहाँ अंग्रेज़ी is the आधिकारिक भाषा, although Kriol and Spanish are more commonly spoken.
Belize is bordered on the north by मैक्सिको, to the दक्षिण और वेस्ट by ग्वाटेमाला और to the east by the Caribbean Sea.
इसके मेनलैंड is about long and wide.
With of जमीन और a जनसांख्यिकी of तभी 312,698 inhabitants ( 2010 census ), Belize possesses the lowest population density in Central America.
The country 's population growth rate of 3.15 % ( 2012 est. ) is the दूसरी उच्चतम in the प्रदेश and one of the highest in the western hemisphere.
Belize 's abundance of terrestrial and marine प्रजाति, और इसके विविधता of ecosystems दे it a key place within the globally significant Mesoamerican Biological Corridor.
Belize has a diverse society, comprising अनेक संस्कृतियों and languages.
It is the only nation in the region with a British colonial heritage, but as a भाग of the पश्चिमी caribbean मण्डल, it भी साझा a common heritage with the fellow Anglophone Caribbean countries.
In general, बेलीज़ is माना to be a सेंट्रल American and Caribbean nation with strong ties to both the Caribbean and Latin America.
Belize is a member of the Caribbean Community ( CARICOM ), the जातियाँ of लैटिन अमरीकी और caribbean राज्य ( celac ), और सेंट्रल American Integration System ( SICA ).
Belize is known for its सितंबर जश्न, और is the birthplace of chewing gum and Punta Rock.
the `` बेट्सी Ross '' flag
A `` Betsy रॉस '' ध्वज उड़ती बाहर San Francisco City Hall
The Betsy Ross flag is an early design of the flag of the United States, popularly attributed to बेट्सी रॉस, using the आम motifs of alternating red-and-white striped field with five-pointed stars in a blue canton.
The flag was designed दौरान the अमरीकी क्रान्ति and features 13 stars to represent the original 13 colonies.
The distinctive feature of the रॉस ध्वज is the व्यवस्था of the सितारों in a circle.
Although the Betsy Ross story is accepted by most Americans, some flag historians and revisionists do not accept the बेट्सी रॉस डिज़ाइन as the पहला American flag.
According to the traditional account, the original flag was made in June 1776, जब a छोटी committee—including जार्ज वॉशिंगटन, रॉबर्ट मॉरिस और सापेक्ष George Ross —visited Betsy and discussed the need for a new American flag.
Betsy accepted the जॉब to manufacture the ध्वज, altering the कमेटी 's design by replacing the six-pointed stars with five-pointed stars.
While the Betsy Ross legend is questionable, the flag design is ज्ञात to have महरूम in उपयोग by 1777 ; अल्फ्रेड b. गली वर्णित it at the आत्मसमर्पण of सामान्य burgoyne और understood the circle of stars to represent equality among the American states.
It is one of the oldest versions of U.S. flags known to exist ; while it is not the oldest surviving ध्वज centuries in cloth रूप, इसके likeness appears on पुरानी शारीरिक अरबिंदो, namely, the समकालीन रणभूमि paintings by जॉन Trumbull and Charles Willson Peale.
वे depict the गोलाकार स्टार व्यवस्था होने flown इससे जलयान masts and many other places, and thus provide the first known historical documentation of the flag 's appearance.
The seal of the U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs uses the Betsy Ross flag to represent सेवा to सब दिग्गजों इससे the अमरीकी क्रान्ति to the उपस्थित दिन.
The Betsy Ross design of 13-star US flags has been featured in many popular artworks ( sometimes inaccurately, as in वॉशिंगटन क्रासिंग the डेलावेयर ) and films, such as the 1960 version of Pollyanna.
The flag continues to be one of the most popular प्रतीकों of the अमरीकी Revolution.
A purr is a ध्वनि बना by all species of felids and is a part of cat communication.
it varies between बिल्लियों ( लिये उदाहरण by loudness और tone ), and from species to species, but can be characterized as a tonal buzzing.
The term `` purring '' has महरूम प्रयुक्त liberally in साहित्य, और it रै महरूम claimed कि viverrids ( civet, mongoose, genet ), bears, badgers, hyaenas ( et cetera ) purr.
Other animals that have been said to purr are rabbits, squirrels, guinea सूअर, tapirs, ring-tailed lemurs, elephants, raccoons and gorillas while eating.
However, using a strict definition of purring that continuous sound production must alternate between pulmonic egressive and ingressive airstream ( and usually go on for minutes ), Peters ( 2002 ), in an exhaustive पुनर्विलोकन of the वैज्ञानिक साहित्य, पहुँचे the निष्कर्ष कि जबतक तब तभी ‘purring cats’ ( फ़ेलिडाए ) और दो प्रजाति of genets, genetta tigrina, और सबसे संभावित also Genetta genetta, had been documented to purr.
The platypus ( Ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic स्तनधारी endemic to पूर्वी ऑस्ट्रेलिया, including Tasmania.
Together with the four species of echidna, it is एक of the पाँच extant प्रजाति of monotremes, the only mammals that lay eggs instead of giving birth.
It is the sole living representative of its family ( Ornithorhynchidae ) and genus ( Ornithorhynchus ), हालांकि a क्रमांक of सम्बन्धित प्रजाति have महरूम मिला in the fossil record.
The unusual appearance of this egg-laying, duck -billed, बीवर -tailed, otter -footed स्तनधारी मनोरथ यूरोपीय naturalists जब वे पहला encountered it, with some considering it an elaborate fraud.
It is one of the few venomous mammals, the male platypus having a spur on the hind foot that delivers a venom सक्षम of causing severe pain to humans.
The unique features of the platypus make it an important subject in the study of evolutionary biology and a recognisable and iconic symbol of Australia ; it रै appeared as a शुभंकर at नेशनल कार्यक्रम और is प्रदर्शित on the रिवर्स of इसके 20-cent coin.
The platypus is the animal emblem of the राज्य of नई South Wales.
Until the early 20th century, it थी hunted लिये इसके फर, लकिन it is अभी सुरक्षित throughout its range.
हालांकि खिलाते प्रजनन programmes have था तभी सीमित कामयाबी and the platypus is vulnerable to the effects of pollution, it is not under any immediate threat.
St. Elizabeth is a गाँव in मिलर काउंटी, मिसौरी, United States.
The population was 336 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
Wilton is a census-designated प्लेस ( cdp ) in Sacramento County, California, United States.
It is भाग of the sacramento – arden-arcade – Roseville Metropolitan Statistical Area.
The population was 5,363 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, up from 4,551 at the 2000 census.
In human-computer interaction, cut and paste and copy and paste are related commands that offer a user-interface बातचीत तकनीक लिये transferring टेक्स्ट, आंकड़ा, फाइलें or वस्तुएँ from a source to a destination.
Most ubiquitously, users आवश्यकता the क्षमता to काटें और paste भाग of plain text.
The cut command removes the चयनित आंकड़ा इससे इसके असली स्थिति, जबकि the नक़ल command creates a duplicate ; in both cases the selected data is placed in a clipboard.
The data in the clipboard is later inserted in the स्थिति जहाँ the paste कमांड is जारी.
The command names are an interface metaphor based on the physical procedure used in manuscript संपादन to बनाएँ a पेज लेआउट.
This interaction technique has close associations with related techniques in graphical user interfaces that use pointing डिवाइस ऐसे as a कंप्यूटर चूहा ( by खीचें और बूँद, लिये उदाहरण ).
Economic order quantity is the अनुक्रम मात्रा कि minimizes total inventory holding costs and ordering costs.
It is one of the oldest शास्त्रीय उत्पादन scheduling models.
The framework used to determine this अनुक्रम मात्रा is भी ज्ञात as barabas EOQ Model or Barabas Formula.
The model was developed by Ford W. Harris in 1913, लकिन R. H. विल्सन, a सलाहकार who applied it extensively, is given credit for his in-depth analysis.
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray vaughan ( अक्तूबर 3, 1954 – अगस्त 27, 1990 ) थी an अमरीकी guitarist, singer-songwriter, and record producer.
Often referred to by उसके आद्याक्षर srv, vaughan is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a founding member and leader of Double Trouble.
साथ साथ वादक क्रिस layton and bassist Tommy Shannon, they ignited the blues revival of the 1980s.
With a career spanning seven years, Vaughan and Double Trouble consistently बेची आउट कॉन्सर्ट जबकि उनके एल्बम अक्सर गई सुनहरा.
He was born और उठाया in डलास, टेक्सास, and for a short period of time lived in Graham, Texas.
As the younger bhai of jimmie vaughan, vaughan प्रारंभ playing the guitar at age seven and formed several bands that occasionally performed in local nightclubs.
At age 17, he dropped out of high school and moved to Austin to further pursue his musical career, joining समूह ऐसे as krackerjack, the Nightcrawlers, and the Cobras.
In 1977, he formed Triple threat revue, a band that eventually evolved into Double Trouble and regularly performed around Austin.
In 1982, Vaughan and Double Trouble performed at the montreux जैज़ पर्व in Switzerland, catching the attention of musicians David Bowie and Jackson Browne.
Bowie asked Vaughan to play on his upcoming स्टुडियो एल्बम let 's नृत्य, जबकि browne offered the बैंड फ़्री उपयोग of उसके निजी स्टुडियो in Los Angeles to record an album.
In March 1983, Vaughan and Double Trouble were signed to Epic Records by दिग्गज रिकार्ड निर्माता जॉन हैमंड sr. and released their debut album, Texas Flood in June of that year.
After successful touring, the group released the albums, Could n't Stand the Weather ( 1984 ) और आत्मा to आत्मा ( 1985 ), the latter of जिससे प्रदर्शित new keyboardist Reese Wynans.
हालांकि उसके करियर था progressed सफलतापूर्वक, Vaughan checked into a rehabilitation hospital in Atlanta, Georgia to give up a cocaine and alcohol habit and returned to touring with the band.
In June 1989, in कदम थी released और अर्जित उन्हें a Grammy Award for Best Contemporary Blues Performance.
On अगस्त 27, 1990, vaughan थी मारे in a हेलीकाप्टर क्रैश following a performance in East Troy, Wisconsin.
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet तीव्र स्टाइल थी निकला from a variety of musical genres.
He was influenced by blues musicians including Albert King, Freddie King, ओटिस फटाफट, और muddy waters, और चट्टान guitarists ऐसे as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack.
His guitar playing reflected the क्लासिक ब्लूज़ और pentatonic scales.
He has received wide critical recognition for his guitar playing, रैंकिंग at # 6 on Rolling Stones list of `` 100 Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011.
He was posthumously inducted into the Blues Hall of कीर्ति in 2000 और a मेमोरियल प्रतिमा थी erected in Austin 's Auditorium Shores park.
Stevie Ray Vaughan is widely considered to be one of the महानतम संगीतकारों to आइये इससे the राज्य of Texas.
The Las Vegas Strip World of coca-cola museum in 2003
Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in स्टोर्स, रेस्तरां, और vending machines in every country except Cuba and North Korea.
It is produced by The Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta, Georgia, and is often referred to simply as Coke ( a registered trademark of The Coca-Cola Company in the संयुक्त राज्य चूंकि कूच 27, 1944 ).
Originally intended as a पेटेंट आयुर्विज्ञान जब it थी invented in the लेट 19th century by John Pemberton, Coca-Cola was bought out by businessman Asa Griggs Candler, whose marketing tactics led Coke to its dominance of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century.
The company produces concentrate, which is then sold to licensed coca-cola bottlers throughout the संसार.
The bottlers, who hold territorially exclusive contracts with the company, उपज समाप्त उत्पाद in डिब्बे और बोतलों इससे the concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners.
The bottlers then sell, distribute and merchandise Coca-Cola to खुदरा स्टोर्स and vending machines.
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola Enterprises, which is the largest सिंगल coca-cola bottler in उत्तर अमेरिका और पश्चिमी यूरोपीय.
The Coca-Cola Company also sells concentrate for soda fountains to major रेस्तरां और खाना सेवा वितरकों.
The Coca-Cola Company has, on occasion, introduced other कोला पेय अंतर्गत the कोक ब्रांड नाम.
The most common of these is Diet Coke, with others including Caffeine-Free coca-cola, आहार कोक caffeine-free, coca-cola चेरी, coca-cola शून्य, Coca-Cola Vanilla, and special versions with lemon, lime or coffee.
Based on Interbrand 's best global brand 2011, coca-cola थी the संसार 's सबसे valuable brand.
बैरी लुई larkin ( born अप्रैल 28, 1964 ) is a retired Major League Baseball player.
Larkin played shortstop for the Cincinnati Reds from 1986 to 2004 and थी एक of the pivotal खिलाड़ी on the 1990 लाल ' संसार Series championship team.
Larkin was elected to the National Baseball Hall of कीर्ति in जनवरी 2012 और थी inducted on July 22.
Larkin is considered one of the top players of his era, winning नौ चांदी slugger पुरस्कार और तीन सुनहरा Glove awards.
He was selected to the Major League All-Star Game बारह टाइम्स, और थी निर्वाचित the 1995 नेशनल लीग Most Valuable Player.
Brasília ( ) is the federal capital of Brazil and the seat of सरकारी of the संघीय ज़िला.
Administratively, the city is स्तिथ in the संघीय ज़िला which is in the Central-West Region.
Physically, it is located in the ब्राज़ीलियाई हाइलैंड्स.
It has a जनसांख्यिकी of परिचय 2,562,963 ( 3,716,996 in the metropolitan area ) as of the 2008 IBGE estimate, making it the fourth largest city in Brazil.
However, as a महानगर क्षेत्रफल, it ranks lower at sixth in population.
Brasília is the largest नगर in the संसार कि किया नहीं मौजूद at the शुरूआत of the 20th century.
Brasília has the fifth largest GDP among Latin अमरीकी शहरों और the तीसरा in ब्राज़ील.
At around R $ 62,000 Brazilian reais ( बराबर to लगभग $ 30,900 us डॉलर or €23,000 euros ), the city 's per capita income is the highest among Brazil 's largest cities.
As the national capital, Brasília is the सीट of सब तीन शाखाओं of the संघीय सरकारी of Brazil.
The city also hosts the मुख्यालय of अनेक ब्राज़ीलियाई companies.
Planning policies such as the location of residential buildings around expansive शहरी क्षेत्रों, as खूब as भवन the नगर around विशाल avenues और dividing it into सेक्टर, have sparked a debate and reflection on life in big cities in the 20th century.
The city 's design divides it into numbered blocks as well as सेक्टर लिये निर्दिष्ट क्रियाएँ, ऐसे as the होटल Sector, the Banking Sector or the Embassy Sector.
brasília होस्ट 124 विदेशी embassies.
The नगर थी नियोजित और विकसित in 1956 साथ Lúcio Costa as the principal urban planner, Oscar Niemeyer as the principal architect and Roberto Burle Marx as the landscape designer.
brasilia is in the युनेस्को 's संसार hertitage List due to its architecture.
On April 22, 1960, it formally became Brazil 's नेशनल पूंजी.
Viewed from above, the main portion of the नगर resembles an airplane or a butterfly.
The city is commonly referred to as पूंजी Federal, or simply BSB.
Residents of Brasília are known as brasilienses or candangos ( the latter referring to those नहीं born in the नगर लकिन जो migrated वहीँ बाद it was established ).
In local usage, the word `` Brasília '' usually refers only to the First Administrative Region ( RA I ) भीतर the संघीय ज़िला ( distrito संघीय ), जहाँ the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण सरकारी buildings are located.
Brasília has a unique status in Brazil, as it is an administrative प्रभाग बल्कि than a विधिक नगरपालिका जैसे nearly all cities in Brazil.
Nationally, the term is almost always used synonymously with the Federal District, which constitutes an indivisible federative ईकाई, analogous to a राज्य.
Several `` satellite cities '' exist जिससे हैं भी part of the Federal District.
Brasília International विमानक्षेत्र is the प्रमुख विमानक्षेत्र in brasília, connecting the पूंजी to all major Brazilian cities and many international destinations.
It is the third most महत्वपूर्ण विमानक्षेत्र in ब्राज़ील, in शर्तें of passengers and aircraft movements.
Personifications of Germany, France, Russia, Austria-Hungary, and the United Kingdom attempting to keep the lid on the simmering cauldron of imperialist और राष्ट्रवादी तनाव in the balkans to prevent a सामान्य European war.
They were कामयाब in 1912 and 1913 but did not succeed in in 1914.
The causes of World War I, which began in central Europe in late July 1914 and finished in 1918, included many factors, such as the conflicts and दुश्मनी of the चार दशकों अग्रणी up to the war.
सैन्यवाद, alliances, imperialism, and nationalism played major roles in the conflict as well.
The immediate origins of the war, however, lay in the decisions taken by statesmen and generals during the Crisis of 1914, casus belli for जिससे थी the हत्या of archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड ( the archduke of ऑस्ट्रिया Hungary ) and his wife Sophie by Gavrilo Princip, an irredentist Serb.
The crisis came after a long and difficult series of diplomatic clashes between the Great Powers ( Italy, France, Germany, the British Empire, the austria-hungarian साम्राज्य और रूस ) over यूरोपीय और औपनिवेशिक मुद्दे in the decade before 1914 that had left tensions high.
In फेरे ये राजनयिक clashes can be traced to changes in the balance of power in Europe since 1867.
The more immediate cause for the war was तनाव over territory in the Balkans.
Austria-Hungary competed with Serbia and Russia for territory and influence in the region और वे खींचा the बाकी of the ग्रेट शक्तियां into the विरोध through उनके विभिन्न alliances and treaties.
Although the chain of events unleashed by the assassination triggered the war, the युद्ध 's origins go deeper, involving नेशनल राजनीती, संस्कृतियों, economics, and a complex web of alliances and counterbalances that had developed between the various European powers since 1870.
Some of the most important long term or structural causes are : the growth of राष्ट्रवाद आरपार यूरोपीय, अनसुलझे territorial विवादों, an intricate प्रणाली of alliances, the आभास विश्लेषण of the संतुलन of शक्ति in यूरोपीय, convoluted और fragmented शासन, the बाहें races of the previous decades, previous military planning, imperial and colonial rivalry for wealth, power and prestige, and economic and military rivalry in industry and trade – e.g., the Pig War between Austria and Serbia.
Other causes that came into play during the diplomatic crisis that preceded the war शामिल misperceptions of intent ( e.g., the जर्मनी विश्वास कि the संयुक्त किंगडम होता remain न्यूट्रल ) and delays and misunderstandings in diplomatic communications.
The various categories of explanation for संसार युद्ध i correspond to different historians ' overall methods.
Most historians and popular commentators include causes from more than एक श्रेणी of स्पष्टीकरण to provide a rounded account of the causes of the war.
The deepest distinction among these accounts is between stories that see it as the अपरिहार्य और predictable निष्कर्ष of निश्चित कारकों, और those that describe it as an arbitrary and unfortunate mistake.
In attributing causes for the war, historians and academics had to deal with an unprecedented flood of memoirs and official दस्तावेज़, released as प्रत्येक देश शामिल आजमाया to avoid दोष लिये starting the war.
Early releases of सूचना by सरकारें, विशेषकर those released for use by the `` Commission on the Responsibility of the Authors of the War '' were shown to be incomplete and biased.
in जोड कुछ दस्तावेज़, विशेषकर राजनयिक cables between Russia and France, were found to have been doctored.
Even in later decades however, when much more information had been released, इतिहासकारों इससे the वही संस्कृति have महरूम दिखाया to come to differing conclusions on the causes of the war.
Johnson 's new chart of national emblems, प्रकाशित c. 1868.
The large flags shown in the corners हैं the 37-star ध्वज of the संयुक्त राज्य ( flown 1867-1877 ), the royal मानक of the United Kingdom, the Russian Imperial Standard, and the French tricolore with inset Imperial Eagle.
Various अन्य ध्वज flown by जहाजों हैं दिखाया.
the ध्वज of क्यूबा is labelled `` Cuban ( so called ) ``.
The Chinese dragon on the Flag of चीन थी drawn mistakenly as a western dragon.
A national flag is a flag that symbolizes a देश.
The flag is flown by the सरकारी, but usually can also be flown by citizens of the country.
Both public and निजी इमारतें ऐसे as स्कूलों और courthouses may fly the national flag.
In some countries, the national flags are तभी flown इससे non-military buildings on certain flag days.
There are three distinct types of नेशनल ध्वज लिये उपयोग on जमीन, और तीन लिये उपयोग at समुद्र, हालांकि अनेक countries use identical designs for several ( and sometimes all ) of these types of flag.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), also known as the युद्ध between the राज्य or बस the सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ), थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had इसके उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of गुलामी, विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन of slavery into the western territories.
Foreign powers किया नहीं intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure, the confederacy collapsed, गुलामी थी abolished, और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल एकता और guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential चुनाव, republicans, led by अब्राहम lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
Lincoln won, लकिन पहले उसके उद्घाटन on March 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address घोषित उसके प्रशासन would not initiate civil war.
Eight remaining slave states continued to अस्वीकृत काल्स लिये secession.
Confederate शक्तियां जब्त numerous संघीय forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to find a सुलह, और दोनो पहलू prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America.
hostilities began on अप्रैल 12, 1861, जब confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter, a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन, चार अधिक स्लेव states joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon controlled the border states and स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी कि अबोध the दक्षिणी economy.
The Eastern Theater थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ state ) ended with Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the emancipation उदघोषणा, which made ending slavery a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy, then much of their western armies, और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in दो at the मिसिसिपी River.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the बैटल of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to Ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of सब Union armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. Sherman drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched to the समुद्र, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश, और could afford to लड़ो battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending confederate फौज विफल, अग्रणी to ली 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
The American Civil War was one of the earliest true औद्योगिक युद्धों.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, and mass-produced हथियार यहूद employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian कारखानों, खानों, shipyards, banks, transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American history, resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined क्रमांक of civilian casualties.
Historian John huddleston estimates the मौत टोल at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years old, and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
Norrie बीमारी is a जेनेटिक विकार that primarily affects the eye and almost always leads to blindness.
In addition to the congenital ocular symptoms, some patients suffer from a progressive hearing loss starting mostly in their 2nd दशक of जीवन, जबकि another portion may be मानसिक challenged.
Patients with Norrie disease may develop cataracts, leukocoria ( a condition where the pupils appear white जब लाइट is shone on उन्हें ), साथ साथ अन्य developmental मुद्दे in the नजर, ऐसे as shrinking of the globe and the wasting away of the iris.
Around 30–50 % of them will also have developmental delay/ mental retardation, psychotic-like सुविधाएँ, incoordination of आंदोलनों or behavioral abnormalities.
Most मरीजों हैं born साथ सामान्य सुनना ; however, the onset of hearing loss is very common in early adolescence.
About 15 % of the मरीजों हैं अनुमानित to develop सब the features of the disease.
The disease affects almost only male infants at birth or soon after जनम, क्युकी the बीमारी is inherited x-linked recessive.
Only in very rare cases, females have been diagnosed साथ norrie disease as well.
The सटीक incidence क्रमांक is अनजान ; तभी a few hundred cases have been reported so far.
It is a very rare disorder that is नहीं संबद्ध साथ कोई specific ethnic or racial groups.
A contract is an agreement having a lawful ऑब्जेक्ट डाला into voluntarily by दो or अधिक पार्टियों, each of whom intends to create one or more legal obligations between them.
The elements of a contract are `` प्रस्ताव '' और `` स्वीकृति '' by `` competent व्यक्तियों '' having legal capacity who exchange `` consideration '' to create `` mutuality of obligation. ''
Proof of some or all of these तत्व may be किया in लिखने, हालांकि contracts may be made entirely orally or by conduct.
The remedy for breach of contract can be `` damages '' in the form of compensation of money or विशिष्ट प्रदर्शन enforced through an आदेश.
Both of these remedies award the party at loss the `` benefit of the bargain '' or अपेक्षा क्षतिपूर्ति, जिससे हैं वृहद than mere रिलायंस damages, as in promissory estoppel.
The parties may be natural persons or juristic व्यक्तियों.
A अनुबंध is a legally enforceable वादा or undertaking that something will or will not occur.
The word promise can be used as a legal synonym for contract, although care is required as a promise may not have the पूरा खड़ा of a अनुबंध, as जब it is an अनुबंध बगैर विचार.
Contract law varies greatly from one jurisdiction to another, including differences in common law compared to civil विधि, the प्रभाव of प्राप्त विधि, विशेषकर इससे इंग्लैण्ड in common law countries, and of law codified in regional legislation.
Regarding Australian Contract Law for example, there are 40 relevant acts which प्रभाव on the निर्वचन of अनुबंध at the राष्ट्रमंडल ( संघीय / नेशनल ) level, and an additional 26 acts at the level of the state of NSW.
In addition there are 6 international instruments or conventions which are applicable for international dealings, ऐसे as the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सम्मेलन on अनुबंध लिये the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Sale of Goods.
ASP.NET is a server-side वेब अनुप्रयोग फ्रेमवर्क designed for Web development to produce dynamic Web pages.
It was developed by Microsoft to allow programmers to build dynamic web sites, वेब अनुप्रयोग और वेब सेवाएं.
It was first released in January 2002 with version 1.0 of the.neT फ्रेमवर्क, और is the successor to Microsoft 's Active Server Pages ( ASP ) technology.
ASP.NET is built on the Common Language Runtime ( CLR ), allowing प्रोग्रामर्स to लिखें asp.net कोड using any supported.NET language.
The ASP.NET SOAP एक्सटेंशन फ्रेमवर्क allows ASP.NET components to process SOAP messages.
Lysergic acid diethylamide, abbreviated LSD or LSD-25, also known as lysergide ( INN ) and colloquially as acid, is a semisynthetic साइकेडेलिक ड्रग of the ergoline परिवार, खूब ज्ञात लिये इसके मनोवैज्ञानिक प्रभाव जिससे can शामिल altered सोच प्रक्रियाओं, बंद और खोलें नजर visuals, synesthesia, an altered sense of time and spiritual experiences, as well as for its key role in 1960s counterculture.
It is used मुख्यतः as an entheogen, recreational drug, and as an agent in psychedelic therapy.
LSD is non-addictive, is not known to कारण दिमाग क्षति, और रै अत्यधिक low toxicity relative to dose.
However, प्रतिकूल मनोरोग प्रतिक्रियाएँ ऐसे as anxiety, paranoia, and delusions are possible.
LSD was first synthesized by Albert Hofmann in 1938 from ergotamine, a रासायनिक निकला by आर्थर stoll इससे ergot, a grain fungus that typically grows on rye.
the छोटी रूप `` एलएसडी '' आता इससे इसके जल्दी कोड नाम lsd-25, which is an abbreviation for the German `` Lysergsäure-diethylamid '' followed by a sequential number.
LSD is संवेदनशील to ऑक्सीजन, पराबैंगनी लाइट, और chlorine, especially in solution, though its potency may last for years if it is stored away from light and moisture at low temperature.
In pure form it is a colorless, odorless, tasteless solid.
LSD is typically delivered orally, usually on a substrate ऐसे as absorbent blotter पेपर, a शुगर cube, or gelatin.
In its liquid रूप, it can भी be administered by intramuscular or intravenous injection.
LSD is very potent, with 20–30 μg ( micrograms ) being the threshold dose.
New experiments with LSD प्रारंभ in 2009 लिये the पहला समय in 40 years.
introduced by sandoz laboratories, साथ trade-name delysid, as a ड्रग साथ विभिन्न मनोरोग uses in 1947, LSD quickly became a therapeutic agent that appeared to show great promise.
In the 1950s, officials at the U.S. Central Intelligence Agency ( CIA ) thought the drug might be applicable to mind कंट्रोल और रासायनिक warfare ; the एजेंसी 's mkultra शोध कार्यक्रम propagated the drug among young servicemen and students.
The subsequent recreational use of the drug by youth culture in the पश्चिमी संसार दौरान the 1960s led to a राजनैतिक firestorm कि resulted in its prohibition.
Currently, a number of organizations—including the Beckley Foundation, MAPS, Heffter Research Institute and the Albert Hofmann foundation—exist to निधि, प्रोत्साहित और निर्देशांक research into the medicinal and spiritual uses of LSD and related psychedelics.
The United States Navy 's Sea, Air, Land Teams, commonly known as the Navy SEALs, are the u.S. नेवी 's प्रिंसिपल खास परिचालन फ़ोर्स और a भाग of the नवल खास warfare कमांड and United States Special Operations Command.
`` SEAL '' is सदा capitalized in सन्दर्भ to members of the Naval Special Warfare community.
The acronym is derived from their capacity to operate at sea, in the एयर, और on जमीन.
SEALs are male members of the संयुक्त राज्य Navy.
An एक्सचेंज कार्यक्रम साथ the coast गार्ड, which graduated three Coast Guardsmen as SEALs, was suspended in 2011.
The CIA 's highly secretive Special Activities Division ( SAD ) and more specifically इसके elite खास परिचालन समूह ( sog ) रंगरूटों operators from the SEAL Teams.
Joint Navy SEALs and CIA operations go back to the famed macv-sog दौरान the वियतनाम युद्ध.
This सहयोग स्टिल exists आज और is देखी in the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan, and in the finding and killing of Osama bin Laden in Pakistan.
World population estimates इससे 1800 to 2100, आधारित on un 2010 projections ( रेड, नारंगी, ग्रीन ) और US Census Bureau historical estimates ( black ).
Actual अंकित जनसांख्यिकी figures are in blue.
According to the highest estimate, the world population may rise to 16 अरब by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate, it may decline to 6 billion.
The world जनसांख्यिकी is the कुल number of living humans on Earth.
As of today, it is estimated to number billion by the United राज्य जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ( uscb ).
the uscb estimates that the world population exceeded 7 billion on March 12, 2012.
According to a separate estimate by the United Nations Population Fund, it पहुँचे इस पड़ाव on अक्तूबर 31, 2011.
The world population has experienced निरन्तर विकास चूंकि the समाप्त of the Great Famine and the Black Death in 1350, when it stood at around 370 million.
The highest rates of growth – global जनसांख्यिकी increases ऊपर 1.8 % प्रति साल – यहूद देखी briefly दौरान the 1950s, और लिये a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s.
The growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, और था अस्वीकृत to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total annual births were highest in the late 1980s at about 138 million, and are now expected to remain essentially constant at their 2011 level of 134 million, while deaths number 56 million per year, और हैं अपेक्षित to बढ़ाएँ to 80 लाख प्रति साल by 2040.
Current projections show a continued increase in जनसांख्यिकी in the निकट भविष्य ( लकिन a स्थिर मनाही in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास rate ), with the global population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates predict further growth, stagnation, or भी overall मनाही in the वैश्विक population by 2150.
Some विश्लेषकों have questioned the स्थिरता of further संसार जनसांख्यिकी growth, citing the growing pressures on the environment, global food supplies, and energy resources.
मेम्फिस is a नगर in the southwestern corner of the U.S. state of Tennessee, and the county seat of Shelby County.
The city is located on the 4th chickasaw bluff, दक्षिण of the संगम of the Wolf and Mississippi rivers.
मेम्फिस था a जनसांख्यिकी of 672,277 in 2011 बनाना it the largest नगर in the राज्य of टेनेसी, the largest city on the Mississippi River, the third largest in the Southeastern United States, and the 20th largest in the United States.
The वृहद मेम्फिस महानगर क्षेत्रफल, सहित adjacent counties in Mississippi and Arkansas, had a 2010 population of 1,316,100.
This makes मेम्फिस the दूसरी largest महानगर क्षेत्रफल in टेनेसी, surpassed only by metropolitan Nashville, which has overtaken Memphis in recent years.
Memphis is the youngest of टेनेसी 's major cities.
A resident of Memphis is referred to as a Memphian, and the Memphis प्रदेश is ज्ञात, विशेषकर to मीडिया आउटलेट, as `` Memphis & The Mid-South ``.
The cattenom Nuclear Power Plant in France.
France produces around तीन quarters of its electricity by nuclear power.
The Grafenrheinfeld Nuclear शक्ति संयंत्र in जर्मनी.
Chancellor Angela Merkel 's coalition announced on May 30, 2011, कि germany’s 17 नाभिकीय शक्ति स्टेशन होगा be shut bas by 2022, in a policy reversal following Japan 's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster.
फिलहाल, 68 रिएक्टरों are under construction in 15 countries.
Nuclear power स्टेशन operate in thirty countries.
In 2010, before the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster, it was reported that an average of about 10 nuclear reactors were expected to become operational per year, although according to the संसार नाभिकीय संघ, of the 17 civilian रिएक्टरों नियोजित to become operational between 2007 और 2009, तभी five actually came on stream.
as of जून 2011, जर्मनी और Switzerland are phasing-out nuclear power.
as of जून 2011, देशों ऐसे as ऑस्ट्रेलिया, Austria, Denmark, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Malaysia, Malta, New Zealand, Norway and Portugal remain opposed to nuclear power.
Skeletal muscles होमो sapiens
This is a तालिका of मांसपेशियां of the human anatomy.
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical human, and almost every muscle constitutes one part of a pair of identical bilateral muscles, found on दोनो पहलू, resulting in लगभग 320 pairs of मांसपेशियां, as प्रस्तुत in this article.
Nevertheless, the सटीक क्रमांक is मुश्किल to define because different sources group muscles differently, e.g. regarding what is defined as different parts of a single muscle or as several muscles.
उदाहरण दायरा from 640 to 850.
The muscles of the human body can be categorized into a number of समूह जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the सिर और गर्दन, मांसपेशियां of the धड़ or ट्रंक, muscles of the upper limbs, and muscles of the lower limbs.
The action refers to the action of each muscle from the मानक anatomical position.
In अन्य स्थितियाँ, अन्य actions may be performed.

The Seminole Wars, also known as the Florida Wars, were three conflicts in Florida between the seminole — the सामूहिक नाम दिए to the amalgamation of विभिन्न समूह of native Americans and Black people who settled in Florida in the early 18th century — and the United States Army.
The First Seminole War was from 1814 to 1819 ( although sources differ ), the Second seminole युद्ध इससे 1835 to 1842, और the तीसरा seminole युद्ध इससे 1855 to 1858.
The first विरोध साथ the seminoles arose आउट of तनाव relating to General Andrew Jackson 's attack and destruction of Negro Fort in Florida in 1816.
जैक्सन भी attacked the स्पेनी at Pensacola.
Ultimately, the स्पेनी क्राउन ceded the colony to United States rule.
Orono is a town in Penobscot County, maine, संयुक्त राज्य.
it थी पहला settled in 1774 and named in honor of Chief Joseph Orono of the Penobscot Nation.
It is home to The विश्वविद्यालयों of maine.
The population was 10,362 at the 2010 census.

Luxor Las वेगास is a होटल और कसीनो on the Las Vegas Strip in Paradise, Nevada.
The 30-story hotel, owned and operated by MGM Resorts International, has a कसीनो साथ over 2,000 स्लॉट मशीने और 87 तालिका games.
In the 2008 to 2009 renovation, it रै a नई, अत्यधिक आधुनिकीकरण, और समकालीन डिज़ाइन और contains a total of 4,400 rooms, including 442 suites, lining the interior walls of a pyramid style tower and within twin 22-story ziggurat towers that were built as later additions.
The hotel is named after the city of Luxor ( ancient thebes ) in मिश्र.
Luxor is the दूसरी largest होटल in लास वेगास ( the largest being the MGM Grand ) and the eighth largest in the world.
As of 2010, the लक्सर रै a 4 कुंजी दरजा इससे the ग्रीन कुंजी eco-rating Program, which evaluates `` sustainable '' hotel operations.
A pilot experiment, also called a pilot पढ़ाई, is a छोटी स्केल प्रारंभिक पढ़ाई conducted in order to evaluate feasibility, time, cost, adverse events, and effect size ( statistical variability ) in an attempt to predict an appropriate sample size and improve upon the study design prior to performance of a full-scale research project.
Pilot studies, इसलिए, may नहीं be उचित for case studies.
The Los Angeles Fire Department ( LAFD ) is the agency that provides fire protection and emergency चिकित्सा सेवाएं लिये the नगर of Los Angeles.
It may be unofficially referred to as the लॉस एंजिल्स नगर आग Department to distinguish it from the Los Angeles County Fire Department.
The acre is a unit of area used in the इम्पीरियल और u.S. प्रथागत systems.
An acre is about 40 % of a hectare – slightly smaller than an अमरीकी football field.
The acre is no longer commonly used, although a few notable exceptions include the United States, Australia, Burma and the United Kingdom ( as of 2010, the एकड़ is no longer officially used in the United Kingdom, though is still used in real estate descriptions ).
It is still used, to some extent, in कनाडा.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रतीक of the एकड़ is ac, और is पारिभाषित as 1/640 of a square mile.
The most commonly प्रयुक्त एकड़ आज is the international acre.
In the संयुक्त राज्य दोनो the अंतरराष्ट्रीय acre and the slightly different US survey acre are in use.
The most common use of the एकड़ is to माप tracts of land.
One international acre is defined as 4046.8564224 वर्गाकार metres.
During the मध्य आयु, an एकड़ थी the राशि of land that could be plowed in one day with a yoke of oxen.

Language processing refers to the way human beings उपयोग शब्द to communicate विचार और जज्बात, और कैसा ऐसे संचार are processed and understood.
Thus it is how the brain creates and understands भाषा.
Most recent theories consider that this process is carried आउट entirely by और अंदर the brain.
This is considered एक of the सबसे characteristic abilities of the human species - perhaps the most characteristic.
However very little is known about it और वहीँ is विशाल पैमाना for research on it.
Most of the knowledge acquired to date on the subject has come from patients who have suffered some type of significant head injury, whether बाह्य ( wounds, बुलेट ) or आतंरिक ( स्ट्रोक्स, tumors, अपक्षयी रोगों ).
Studies have shown that सबसे of the भाषा प्रसंस्करण कृत्यों are carried out in the cerebral cortex.
The essential फलन of the cortical language areas is symbolic representation.
Even though language exists in different forms, all of them are आधारित on सांकेतिक प्रतिनिधित्व.
The Bugatti Veyron EB 16.4 is a mid-engined grand touring car, designed और विकसित by the volkswagen समूह और manufactured in Molsheim, France by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S.
The Super Sport version of the Veyron is the fastest street-legal उत्पादन car in the संसार, with a top speed of.
The original संस्करण रै a शीर्ष गति of.
It was named Car of the दशक ( 2000–2009 ) by the BBC television programme Top Gear.

On 6 April 2013, Bugatti set the record for the fastest roadster in the संसार साथ the veyron ग्रैंड Sport Vitesse, reaching on average a top speed of.

In December 2010, Bugatti began offering prospective buyers the ability to customize exterior और इंटीरियर्स colours by using the Veyron 16.4 Configurator application on the marque 's official website.
DVD is an optical disc भंडार स्वरूप, invented और विकसित by फिलिप्स, Sony, Toshiba, and Panasonic in 1995.
DVDs offer higher storage क्षमता than कॉम्पैक्ट discs जबकि having the same dimensions.
Pre-recorded dvds हैं mass-produced using molding machines that physically stamp data onto the DVD.
Such discs are known as DVD- ROM, because data can तभी be पढ़ा और नहीं लिखा nor erased.
Blank recordable DVD discs ( DVD-R and DVD+R ) can be recorded once using a DVD recorder and then फलन as a dvd-rom. rewritable dvds ( dvd-rw, dvd+rw, और dvd-ram ) can be recorded and erased multiple times.
DVDs are used in DVD-Video consumer डिजिटल वीडियो स्वरूप और in DVD-Audio consumer digital audio format, as well as for authoring AVCHD discs.
DVDs containing other types of information may be referred to as dvd आंकड़ा discs.

Peter Gene Hernandez ( born October 8, 1985 ), known by his stage नाम ब्रूनो मंगल, is an American singer-songwriter and record producer.
Raised in Honolulu, Hawaii, by a परिवार of संगीतकारों, मंगल began बनाना म्यूज़िक at a young age and performed in various musical venues in his hometown throughout his childhood.
He graduated from high school और तब स्थानांतरित to लॉस एंजिल्स, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, to pursue a musical career.
मंगल उत्पादित गीतों लिये अन्य कलाकारों, joining production team The Smeezingtons.
मंगल था an unsuccessful कार्यावधि with Motown Records, but then signed with Atlantic in 2009.
He became recognized as a solo artist after lending his vocals and co-writing the hooks for the songs `` nothin ' on तुम `` by B.o.B, and `` Billionaire `` by Travie McCoy.
He also co-wrote the hits `` Right Round `` by flo rida featuring ke $ ha, और `` Wavin ' Flag `` by K'naan.
In अक्तूबर 2010, he released his debut album, Doo-Wops & Hooligans.
Anchored by the worldwide number-one singles `` Just the Way You Are `` and `` ग्रेनेड ``, the एल्बम peaked at number three on the Billboard 200.
Mars was nominated for seven Grammys at the 53rd Grammy Awards, winning बेहतरीन पुरूष पॉप गायन प्रदर्शन लिये `` बस the रास्ता You Are ''.
His second studio album, अपरंपरागत ज्यूकबॉक्स, थी released on December 11, 2012.
Mars ' music is noted for displaying a wide variety of styles and प्रभाव, और contains elements of many musical genres.
He has worked with an assortment of कलाकारों इससे various genres.
As a child, he was highly influenced by artists such as Little Richard, Elvis Presley and माइकल जैक्सन और होता प्रायः impersonate ये कलाकारों from a young age.
Mars also incorporates reggae - and Motown -inspired sounds into उसके कार्य.
विश्वव्यापी, मंगल became the best-selling digital artist in 2011.
He had three singles in the top ten, including first place with `` Just the रास्ता तुम हैं '', जिससे sold 12.5 million copies.
Mars won Best अंतरराष्ट्रीय पुरूष सोलो कलाकार at the 2012 ब्रिट Awards.
Bruno Mars has sold 6 million albums and 40 million singles विश्वव्यापी as a सिंगर.
Althought as a song-writer, producer and singer उसके कुल सिंगल डाउनलोड बिक्री surpass 100 million worldwide.

Greek mythology is the body of myths and teachings that belong to the ancient Greeks, concerning their gods and heroes, the प्रकृति of the संसार, और the origins और significance of उनके अपना cult and ritual practices.
It was a part of the religion in प्राचीन यूनानियों और is भाग of धर्म in modern Greece and around the world, known as Hellenismos.
Modern scholars refer to and study the myths in an attempt to throw light on the religious and राजनैतिक संस्थानों of प्राचीन यूनानियों और इसके सभ्यता, और to gain understanding of the nature of myth-making itself.
Greek mythology is explicitly embodied in a large collection of narratives, and implicitly in Greek representational arts, such as vase-paintings and votive gifts.
Greek myth attempts to explain the origins of the world, and details the lives and adventures of a चौड़ी किस्में of देवताओं, देवियाँ, heroes, heroines, and mythological creatures.
ये खाते initially यहूद disseminated in an oral-poetic tradition ; today the Greek myths are known primarily from Greek literature.
The oldest known Greek literary sources, Homer 's epic poems Iliad and Odyssey, फ़ोकस on कार्यक्रम surrounding the Trojan War.
Two poems by Homer 's near contemporary Hesiod, the Theogony and the Works and Days, contain accounts of the genesis of the world, the succession of divine rulers, the succession of इंसान आयु, the उत्पत्ति of इंसान woes, और the उत्पत्ति of sacrificial practices.
Myths are also preserved in the Homeric Hymns, in fragments of एपिक कविताएं of the एपिक साईकिल, in lyric कविताएं, in the works of the tragedians of the पांचवां सदी bc, in कृतियाँ of scholars and poets of the Hellenistic Age, and in texts from the time of the Roman Empire by writers such as Plutarch and Pausanias.
Archaeological findings provide a principal source of detail about Greek mythology, साथ देवताओं और नायक प्रदर्शित prominently in the decoration of many artifacts.
Geometric designs on pottery of the आठवीं सदी bc depict scenes from the Trojan cycle as well as the adventures of Heracles.
In the succeeding Archaic, Classical, and Hellenistic periods, Homeric and various other पौराणिक दृश्यों appear, supplementing the मौजूदा साहित्यिक evidence.
Greek mythology has had an extensive influence on the culture, arts, and साहित्य of पश्चिमी सभ्यता और remains भाग of पश्चिमी heritage and language.
Poets and कलाकारों इससे प्राचीन टाइम्स to the उपस्थित have derived inspiration from Greek mythology and have discovered contemporary significance and relevance in the themes.
