They are currently led by head coach Chris Petersen and play उनके घर खेल at bronco स्टेडियम.
The franc ( sign : Fr. or SFr. ; German : Franken, French and romansh : फ़्रैंक, इतालवी : फ्रेंको ; कोड : chf ) is the करेंसी और विधिक टेंडर of Switzerland and Liechtenstein ; it is also legal tender in the Italian exclave Campione d'Italia.
Although not formally legal tender in the जर्मनी exclave büsingen ( the एकमात्र विधिक करेंसी is the यूरोपियन ), it is in wide daily use there.
the स्विस नेशनल बैंको मुद्दे banknotes and the federal mint Swissmint issues coins.
The Swiss franc is the तभी संस्करण of the फ़्रैंक स्टिल issued in Europe.
The smaller denomination, a hundredth of a franc, is a rappen ( rp. ) in जर्मनी, centime ( c. ) in French, centesimo ( ct. ) in Italian, and rap ( rp. ) in Romansh.
The ISO code of the currency used by banks and financial institutions is CHF, although `` Fr. '' is used by most businesses and advertisers ; कुछ उपयोग sfr. ; the latinate `` ch '' स्टैंड for Confoederatio Helvetica.
Given the different languages used in Switzerland, Latin is प्रयुक्त लिये language-neutral inscriptions on the coins.
सर चार्ल्स स्पेंसर `` चार्ली '' चैपलिन, ( 16 April 188925 December 1977 ) was a British comic actor and filmmaker who rose to fame in the silent era.
Chaplin became a worldwide icon through his screen persona `` the Tramp `` and is considered एक of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण आंकड़े of the film industry.
His career spanned more than 75 years, from a child in the Victorian era to बंद to उसके मौत at the आयु of 88, और encompassed दोनो adulation and controversy.
Raised in London, Chaplin 's बाल्यकाल थी पारिभाषित by गरीबी और hardship.
He थी भेजा to a workhouse twice पहले the age of nine ; his father was absent, and his mother was committed to a mental asylum.
Chaplin began performing from a यंग आयु, touring music halls and later working as a stage actor and comedian.
At 19 he was signed to the prestigious फ्रेड karno कम्पनी, which took him to America.
Chaplin was scouted by the film उद्योग, और बना उसके पहला दिखावे in 1914 साथ keystone Studios.
He soon developed the Tramp persona और formed a विशाल प्रशंसक base.
Chaplin directed his films from an जल्दी स्टेज, और जारी to hone his craft as he moved to the Essanay, Mutual, and First National corporations.
By 1918, he was one of the most famous मेन in the world.
In 1919, Chaplin co-founded the वितरण कम्पनी संयुक्त कलाकारों, giving him complete control over his films.
His first feature-length चित्र थी the बच्चा ( 1921 ), followed by A Woman of Paris ( 1923 ), The Gold Rush ( 1925 ), and The Circus ( 1928 ).
He refused to move to ध्वनि films in the 1930s, instead producing City Lights ( 1931 ) and Modern Times ( 1936 ) without dialogue.
Chaplin became increasingly political and his next film, The ग्रेट तानाशाह ( 1940 ), satirised Adolf Hitler.
The 1940s was a decade चिह्नित साथ विवाद लिये चैपलिन, and his popularity declined rapidly.
He was accused of communist sympathies, जबकि उसके भागीदारी in a paternity सूट और विवाह to much younger women were considered scandalous.
An FBI investigation was opened on Chaplin, and he was eventually forced to छोड़ the संयुक्त राज्य और settle in Switzerland.
He abandoned the ट्रैम्प लिये उसके बाद films, जिससे include Monsieur Verdoux ( 1947 ), Limelight ( 1952 ), A King in New York ( 1957 ), and A Countess From Hong Kong ( 1967 ).
Chaplin wrote, directed, produced, संपादित, scored, और स्ट्रक्चर in सबसे of his films.
He was a perfectionist, and his financial स्वतंत्रता meant he प्रायः खर्च सालो on the development and production of a picture.
His films are characterised by slapstick combined with pathos, and often feature the ट्रैम्प struggling विरूद्ध adversity.
Many contain सोशल और राजनैतिक विषयवस्तु, as खूब as autobiographical elements.
In 1972, as part of a renewed appreciation for his work, Chaplin received an Honorary अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये `` the incalculable प्रभाव he रै था in बनाना motion pictures the art form of this century ''.
He continues to be held in ऊँची लिहाज़, साथ the सुनहरा फटाफट, नगर लाइट्स, आधुनिक Times, and The Great Dictator often ranked among the greatest films of all time.
Planned Parenthood Federation of America ( PPFA ), commonly shortened to Planned Parenthood, is the u.S. संबद्ध of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नियोजित parenthood संघ ( IPPF ) and one of its larger members.
PPFA is a non-profit organization providing reproductive health and मातृ और चाइल्ड स्वास्थ्य सेवाएं.
The Planned parenthood कार्रवाई निधि, inc. ( ppaf ) is a सम्बन्धित संगठन जिससे lobbies लिये pro-choice legislation, comprehensive sex education, and access to affordable health care in the United States.
Planned Parenthood is the largest U.S. provider of reproductive health services, सहित कर्कट स्क्रीनिंग, hiv स्क्रीनिंग और counseling, निरोधक, and abortion.
निरोधक खाते लिये 35 % of ppfa 's कुल सेवाएं और abortions account for 3 % ; PPFA conducts roughly 300,000 abortions each year, among 3 million people served.
the संगठन रै इसके roots in Brooklyn, New York, where Margaret Sanger opened the country 's first birth-control clinic.
Sanger founded the American Birth Control League in 1921, which in 1942 became भाग of the नियोजित parenthood Federation of America.
Since then, Planned parenthood रै grown to have over 820 क्लिनिक locations in the U.S., with a total budget of US $ 1 billion.
PPFA provides an array of services to over three million people in the संयुक्त राज्य, और supports सेवाएं लिये over एक लाख क्लाइंट बाहर the United States.
Mens rea is लैटिन लिये `` guilty mind ''.
In criminal law, it is viewed as one of the necessary elements of some crimes.
The standard आम विधि परीक्षण of दण्ड देयता is प्रायः expressed in the लैटिन phrase, actus non facit reum nisi mens sit rea, which means `` the act is not culpable unless the mind is guilty ''.
Thus, in jurisdictions साथ due प्रक्रम, वहीँ जरूर be an actus reus, or `` अपराधी अधिनियम, '' accompanied by some level of mens rea to constitute the crime with which the defendant is charged ( see the technical requirement of concurrence ).
as a सामान्य नियम, दण्ड देयता करता not attach to a person who acted with the absence of mental fault.
The एक्सेप्शन is सख्त देयता crimes.
In civil law, it is usually not necessary to prove a subjective mental element to स्थापित देयता लिये breach of contract or tort, for example.
However, if a tort is intentionally वचनबद्ध or a अनुबंध is intentionally breached, ऐसे intent may increase the scope of liability as well as the measure of damages payable to the plaintiff.
Therefore, mens rea refers to the दिमागी तत्व of the अपराध कि accompanies the actus reus.
In some jurisdictions, the शर्तें पुरुषों rea और actus reus have महरूम replaced by alternative terminology.
In Australia, for example, the elements of the federal offences are now designated as `` fault elements '' or `` mental elements '' ( mens rea ) और `` शारीरिक तत्व '' or `` बाह्य elements '' ( actus reus ).
This terminology was adopted to replace the अस्पष्टता of the लैटिन शर्तें साथ सरल and accurate phrasing.
Ulysses S. ग्रान्ट ( born hiram ulysses ग्रान्ट ; अप्रैल 27, 1822 – जुलाई 23, 1885 ) थी the 18th अध्यक्ष of the United States ( 1869–1877 ) following his highly successful role as a war general in the second half of the Civil War.
Under Grant, the Union Army defeated the Confederate military ; having effectively ended the war और secession साथ the आत्मसमर्पण of रॉबर्ट E. ली 's army at Appomattox.
As president he led the Radical Republicans in their effort to eliminate all vestiges of confederate राष्ट्रवाद और गुलामी.
Upset over uncontrolled violence in the South and having desired to protect African American नागरिकता, अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट effectively नष्ट the ku klux Klan in 1871.
Grant थी the पहला अध्यक्ष to स्थापित सिविल सेवा सुधार having created a two-year federally funded Civil Service Commission in 1871.
In terms of foreign नीति, ग्रान्ट नाज़िल an `` अनपेक्षित क्षमता लिये deliberation and consultation '' that promoted the national interest.
His प्रतिष्ठा थी marred by उसके दोहराया रक्षा of भ्रष्ट appointees, and by America 's first industrial age economic depression ( called the `` Panic of 1873 `` ) that dominated his second term.
Although his Republican Party split in 1872 with reformers denouncing उसे, ग्रान्ट थी easily reelected.
By 1875 the रूढ़िवादी श्वेत दक्षिणी विपक्ष regained control of every state in the South and as he left the White House in March 1877 his policies were being undone.
A career soldier, he graduated from the संयुक्त राज्य सैन्य अकादमी at West Point and served in the Mexican–American War.
When the सिविल युद्ध began in 1861, ग्रान्ट trained Union volunteer regiments in Illinois.
In 1862, as a general he fought a series of battles and was promoted to major general after forcing the आत्मसमर्पण of a विशाल confederate फौज और gaining कंट्रोल of केंटकी and most of Tennessee.
He then led Union forces to victory after initial setbacks in the बैटल of shiloh, कमाई a प्रतिष्ठा as an आक्रामक commander.
In July 1863, after a long, complex campaign, Grant पराजित पाँच uncoordinated confederate सेना ( capturing one of them ) and seized Vicksburg.
This famous victory gave the Union full control of the Mississippi River, विभाजित बंद the पश्चिमी confederacy, और खोली the way for more Union triumphs.
After another win at the Battle of Chattanooga in लेट 1863, अध्यक्ष अब्राहम lincoln बना उसे लेफ्टिनेंट सामान्य और कमांडर of सब of the Union Armies.
As commanding सामान्य of the फौज, ग्रान्ट confronted रॉबर्ट E. ली in a श्रेणी of very bloody battles in 1864 known as the Overland Campaign that ended with the bottling up of Lee at Petersburg, outside the Confederate capital of Richmond.
During the siege, Grant coordinated a series of devastating campaigns शुभारम्भ by विलियम tecumseh शरमन, फिलिप Sheridan, and George Thomas.
Finally breaking through ली 's trenches, the संघ फौज captured Richmond in April 1865.
Lee surrendered उसके depleted शक्तियां to ग्रान्ट at appomattox as the Confederacy collapsed.
Although pro-Confederate historians attacked ग्रान्ट as a ruthless butcher who won by brute force, most historians have hailed his military genius.
Grant 's two consecutive terms as President stabilized the nation after the American सिविल युद्ध और दौरान the turbulent पुनर्निर्माण period that followed.
As president, he enforced Reconstruction by enforcing civil rights laws and लड़ ku klux Klan violence.
Grant won passage of the Fifteenth Amendment ; giving संवैधानिक सुरक्षा लिये african-american voting rights.
He used the army to build the Republican Party in the South, based on black voters, Northern newcomers ( `` carpetbaggers `` ) और देशी श्वेत supporters ( `` Scalawags. '' )
As a result, African Americans were represented in the u.S. कॉंग्रेस लिये the पहला समय in American history in 1870.
Reformers praised Grant 's Indian peace policy by having broken the deadlock on Indian appropriations in Congress, the creation of the Board of Indian commissioners to मेक सुधार सुझाव, और उसके enlistment of quaker protestants जो नियंत्रित मिड पश्चिमी भारतीय एजेंसियों, कि effectively curbed congressional patronage.
Grant remained determined in keeping Indians from होने exterminated इससे श्वेत settler encroachment or by the U.S. military.
ग्रान्ट 's प्रतिष्ठा as अध्यक्ष by 1875 थी at an all-time ऊँची लिये उसके पिछला वीटो of the महंगाई Bill, the passage of the Resumption of Specie Act, and Secretary Bristow 's successful raids that shut down the Whiskey Ring.
Grant 's foreign policy, led by Secretary of State Hamilton Fish, implemented अंतरराष्ट्रीय मध्यस्थता, settled the अलबामा दावा साथ ब्रिटेन और avoided युद्ध साथ स्पेन over the virginius affair.
A jukebox is a partially automated music-playing device, usually a coin-operated यंत्र, कि होगा खेल a संरक्षक 's चयन इससे self-contained media.
The classic jukebox has buttons with letters and numbers on उन्हें कि, जब डाला in संयोजन, are used to play a specific selection.
A drug test is a technical analysis of a biological specimen – for example urine, hair, blood, sweat, or मौखिक द्रव / लार – to determine the उपस्थिति or अनुपस्थिति of निर्दिष्ट parent drugs or their metabolites.
Major uses of drug testing are to detect the presence of प्रदर्शन बढ़ाना steroids in खेल or लिये drugs prohibited by laws, such as cannabis, cocaine and heroin.
A `` 10-panel मूत्र स्क्रीन '' consists of the following:
Amphetamines ( सहित methamphetamine )
barbiturates
benzodiazepines
cannabinoids ( THC )
कोका
methadone
methaqualone
opiates ( codeine, मॉरफीन, Heroin, Oxycodone, Hydrocodone, etc. )
phencyclidine ( pcp )
propoxyphene
Saturn V rocket, used for the अमरीकी मानवयुक्त चंद्र landing missions
Space exploration is the discovery and exploration of बाहरी स्पेस by means of space technology.
Physical exploration of space is conducted दोनो by इंसान spaceflights और by रोबोटिक spacecraft.
While the observation of objects in space, known as astronomy, predates reliable recorded history, it was the development of large and relatively efficient rockets दौरान the जल्दी 20th सदी कि अनुमत शारीरिक स्पेस खोजी to become a reality.
Common rationales for exploring space include advancing scientific research, uniting अलग राष्ट्र, ensuring the भविष्य अस्तित्व of humanity and developing military and strategic advantages against other countries.
Various criticisms of space exploration are sometimes बना.
Space exploration has often been used as a proxy competition for geopolitical rivalries ऐसे as the Cold War.
The early era of space exploration was driven by a `` Space Race `` between the सोवियत संघ और the संयुक्त राज्य, the लॉन्च of the पहला man-made ऑब्जेक्ट to कक्षा the धरती, the ussr 's sputnik 1, on 4 अक्तूबर 1957, और the पहला चंद्रमा लैंडिंग by the अमरीकी Apollo 11 craft on 20 July 1969 are often taken as the boundaries for this initial period.
The Soviet space program achieved many of the first milestones, including the first living being in orbit in 1957, the first human spaceflight ( Yuri गगारिन सवार वोस्तोक 1 ) in 1961, the पहला spacewalk ( by aleksei leonov ) on 18 कूच 1965, the पहला स्वचालित लैंडिंग on another celestial body in 1966, and the launch of the first space station ( Salyut 1 ) in 1971.
After the first 20 years of exploration, focus shifted इससे one-off फ़्लाइट to बेदर्दी हार्डवेयर, ऐसे as the स्पेस शटल कार्यक्रम, और इससे प्रतियोगिता to cooperation as with the International Space Station ( ISS ).
With the substantial completion of the ISS following STS-133 in March 2011, योजनाएँ लिये स्पेस खोजी by the USA remain in flux.
Constellation, a Bush Administration program for a return to the Moon by 2020 was judged inadequately वित्तपोषित और unrealistic by an विशेषज्ञ पुनर्विलोकन फलक reporting in 2009.
The Obama Administration proposed a revision of Constellation in 2010 to focus on the development of the capability for crewed मिशन परे कम धरती कक्षा ( leo ), envisioning extending the आपरेशन of the iss परे 2020, transferring the development of launch vehicles for human crews from NASA to the private sector, and developing technology to enable missions to beyond LEO, such as Earth/Moon L1, the Moon, Earth/Sun L2, near-earth asteroids, and Phobos or Mars orbit.
As of March 2011, the US Senate and House of Representatives are still working towards a compromise NASA funding bill, which will probably terminate Constellation and fund विकास of a भारी लिफ्ट लॉन्च vehicle ( HLLV ).
In the 2000s, the People 's Republic of China initiated a कामयाब मानवयुक्त spaceflight कार्यक्रम, while the European Union, Japan, and India have also planned future manned space missions.
China, Russia, Japan, and India have advocated manned missions to the Moon during the 21st century, while the European Union has advocated manned missions to both the चंद्रमा और मंगल दौरान the 21st सदी.
From the 1990s onwards, निजी रूचि began promoting स्पेस पर्यटन और then private space exploration of the Moon ( see Google Lunar X Prize ).
John calvin कूलिज, jr. ( जुलाई 4, 1872january 5, 1933 ) was the 30th President of the United States ( 1923–1929 ).
A Republican lawyer from Vermont, Coolidge worked his way up the सीढ़ियाँ of मैसाचुसेट्स राज्य राजनीती, आखिरकार बनने राज्यपाल of that state.
His conduct during the Boston Police Strike of 1919 thrust him into the national स्पॉटलाइट और दिया उसे a प्रतिष्ठा as a man of decisive action.
Soon after, he was निर्वाचित as the 29th वाइस अध्यक्ष in 1920 और succeeded to the प्रेसिडेंसी upon the sudden death of Warren G. Harding in 1923.
Elected in his own right in 1924, he gained a reputation as a small-government रूढ़िवादी, और भी as a man who said very little.
Coolidge restored public विश्वास in the श्वेत हाउस after the scandals of his predecessor 's administration, and left office with considerable popularity.
As a Coolidge biographer put it, `` He embodied the स्पिरिट और उम्मीदें of the मध्य class, could interpret their longings and express their opinions.
That he did represent the genius of the average is the सबसे convincing प्रमाण of his strength. ''
Some later criticized कूलिज as part of a general criticism of laissez-faire government.
His reputation underwent a renaissance during the Ronald Reagan Administration, but the ultimate assessment of his presidency is still divided between those who approve of his reduction of the आकार of सरकारी कार्यक्रम और those जो मानना the संघीय सरकारी चाहिए be अधिक शामिल in regulating और controlling the economy.
Espresso is a concentrated beverage brewed by forcing a छोटी राशि of nearly boiling water under pressure through finely ground coffee beans.
एस्प्रेसो प्रायः रै a thicker संगति than कॉफी brewed by अन्य विधि, a उच्चतर विशेषज्ञता of निलंबित and dissolved solids, and crema ( meaning cream, but being a reference to the foam with a creamy texture that forms as a result of the pressure ).
As a result of the pressurized brewing प्रक्रम the जायका और रसायन in a ठेठ कप of espresso are very concentrated.
एस्प्रेसो is the base for other drinks, such as a latte, cappuccino, macchiato, mocha, or americano.
Espresso has more caffeine per unit volume than most beverages, but the usual serving size is smaller—a typical 60 mL ( 2 US fluid ounce ) of एस्प्रेसो रै 80 to 150 mg of caffeine, little less than the 95 to 200 mg of a standard 240 mL ( 8 US fluid ounces ) cup of drip-brewed coffee.
Brian Keith Kelly ( born October 25, 1961 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल कोच and former player.
He is currently the सिर फ़ुटबॉल कोच लिये the notre dame लड़ Irish, a position he has held since December 2009.
Kelly was previously head coach at Grand Valley State University ( 1991–2003 ), सेंट्रल मिशिगन विश्वविद्यालयों ( 2004–2006 ), and University of Cincinnati ( 2006–2009 ).
A contract is an agreement having a lawful ऑब्जेक्ट डाला into voluntarily by दो or अधिक पार्टियों, प्रत्येक of whom intends to create one or more legal obligations between them.
The elements of a contract are `` offer '' and `` acceptance '' by `` competent व्यक्तियों '' having विधिक क्षमता जो एक्सचेंज `` consideration '' to create `` mutuality of obligation. ''
Proof of some or all of ये तत्व may be किया in writing, though contracts may be made entirely orally or by conduct.
The remedy for breach of contract can be `` क्षतिपूर्ति '' in the रूप of compensation of money or specific performance enforced through an injunction.
Both of these remedies award the party at loss the `` benefit of the bargain '' or expectation damages, which are greater than mere reliance क्षतिपूर्ति, as in promissory estoppel.
the पार्टियों may be प्राकृतिक persons or juristic persons.
A contract is a legally enforceable promise or undertaking कि कुछ होगा or होगा नहीं occur.
The word वादा can be प्रयुक्त as a विधिक पर्याय लिये अनुबंध, हालांकि परवाह is जरूरी as a promise may not have the full standing of a contract, as when it is an agreement without consideration.
Contract law varies greatly from one क्षेत्राधिकार to another, सहित मतभेद in आम विधि compared to सिविल विधि, the प्रभाव of received law, particularly from England in common law countries, and of law codified in regional legislation.
Regarding Australian Contract Law for example, there are 40 relevant अधिनियमों जिससे प्रभाव on the निर्वचन of अनुबंध at the राष्ट्रमंडल ( संघीय / national ) level, and an additional 26 acts at the level of the state of NSW.
In addition there are 6 international instruments or conventions which हैं लागू लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय dealings, ऐसे as the संयुक्त राष्ट्र Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods.
Sidney Patrick Crosby, ONS ( born August 7, 1987 ) is a कनाडाई पेशेवर बर्फ hockey player who is captain of the Pittsburgh Penguins of the National Hockey League ( NHL ).
Crosby was drafted first overall by the Penguins out of the Quebec Major जूनियर हॉकी लीग ( QMJHL ).
During his two-year major junior career with the Rimouski Océanic, he earned back-to-back chl खिलाड़ी of the साल पुरस्कार और led उसके club to the 2005 Memorial Cup final.
Nicknamed `` The Next One ``, he was एक of the सबसे अत्यधिक regarded ड्राफ्ट चयन in हॉकी इतिहास, अग्रणी अनेक to refer to the 2005 Draft Lottery as the `` Sidney Crosby Sweepstakes ''.
In his first NHL season, Crosby finished sixth in league scoring with 102 points ( 39 goals, 63 assists ) and थी a runner-up लिये the calder मेमोरियल ट्रॉफी ( जीती by सिकंदर Ovechkin ).
By his second season, he led the NHL with 120 points ( 36 goals, 84 assists ) to capture the Art Ross ट्रॉफी, बनने the youngest खिलाड़ी और the तभी किशोरावस्था to जीत a स्कोरिंग शीर्षक in any major North American sports league.
That same season, Crosby also won the Hart Memorial Trophy as the Professional Hockey Writers Association 's choice for most valuable player and the Lester B. Pearson Award as the एनएचएल खिलाड़ी संघ 's चुनाव लिये सबसे बकाया खिलाड़ी, बनने the सातवाँ खिलाड़ी in एनएचएल इतिहास to earn all three awards in one year.
Crosby started the 2007–08 season with the team 's captaincy and subsequently led उन्हें to the 2008 स्टेनली कप फाइनल, जहाँ वे यहूद पराजित by the Detroit Red Wings in six games.
The Penguins returned to the Finals against Detroit the following year and won in seven games ; Crosby became the youngest कप्तान in एनएचएल इतिहास to win the Stanley Cup.
In the 2009–10 season, Crosby scored a career-high 51 goals, tying him with Steven Stamkos for the Rocket Richard ट्रॉफी as the league-leader ; साथ 58 assists, he totaled 109 अंक, second in the NHL.
During the off-season, crosby प्राप्त the Mark Messier Leadership Award.
in 2010–11, crosby sustained a concussion as a result of hits to the head in back-to-back games.
the चोट बाएँ उसे sidelined for ten and a half months.
However, after playing eight games in the 2011–12 season, Crosby 's concussion-like symptoms returned in December 2011, और he किया नहीं वापसी जबतक mid-march 2012.
Internationally, Crosby has represented Canada in numerous tournaments लिये the देश 's जूनियर और men 's teams.
After competing in the 2003 U-18 Junior संसार कप, he represented कनाडा in back-to-back IIHF World U20 Championships, winning silver in 2004 and gold in 2005.
At the 2006 IIHF World Championship, he led the tournament in स्कोरिंग, जबकि भी कमाई शीर्ष आगे और all-star टोली honours.
Four years later, Crosby was named to Team Canada for the 2010 शीत ओलंपिक in वैंकूवर.
playing the संयुक्त राज्य in the सुनहरा medal game, he scored the game-winning goal in overtime.
A United States cent, भी ज्ञात as a penny.
`` My two cents '' ( 2¢ ) and its longer version `` put my two cents in '' is an United States ( us ) idiomatic अभिव्यक्ति, लिया इससे the असली अंग्रेज़ी मुहावरा अभिव्यक्ति : to put in `` my two pennies worth '' or `` my tuppence worth. ''
It is used to preface the अंतरिम stating of one’s राय.
By deprecating the opinion to follow – suggesting its value is तभी दो सेंट, a बहुत छोटी राशि – the उपयोक्ता of the phrase उम्मीदें to lessen the प्रभाव of a संभवतः बयान, showing politeness and humility.
However, it is also sometimes प्रयुक्त साथ विडंबना जब expressing a strongly felt opinion.
The phrase is also used out of आदत to preface uncontentious opinions.

The Chinese Civil युद्ध थी a सिविल युद्ध in China fought between forces loyal to the government of the Republic of China led by the Kuomintang ( KMT ) and forces of the Communist Party of China ( CPC ).
The war began in April 1927, amidst the Northern Expedition, and essentially ended when major active लड़ाइयों ceased in 1950.
The विरोध आखिरकार resulted in दो de facto राज्य, the गणतंत्र of चीन ( आरओसी ) in ताईवान और the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन ( पीआरसी ) in मेनलैंड China, both claiming to be the legitimate government of China.
The war represented an वैचारिक विभाजित ( बाएँ vs. सही ) between the कम्युनिस्ट CPC, and the KMT 's brand of Nationalism.
the सिविल युद्ध जारी intermittently जबतक लेट 1937, when the two parties formed a Second United Front to counter a Japanese invasion.
China 's full-scale civil war resumed in 1946, a year after the समाप्त of hostilities साथ Japan.
After four more years, 1950 saw the cessation of प्रमुख सैन्य hostilities—with the newly संस्थापित लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन controlling मेनलैंड चीन ( सहित Hainan ), and the Republic of China 's jurisdiction being restricted to Taiwan, Penghu, Quemoy, Matsu and several outlying islands.
The Kuomintang शिकस्त is attributed to अनेक कारकों : भ्रष्टाचार - च्यांग लिखा in उसके डायरी on जून 1948 कि the KMT had failed, not because of external enemies but because of rot from within.
Strong initial support from the U.S. diminished, और तब, stopped.
( Partly because of KMT भ्रष्टाचार और anti-democratic शासन, और partly क्युकी of the अनिश्चित u.S. विदेशी नीति towards साम्यवादी between 1945 and 1950 ) ; Communist land reform policy promised poor peasants farmland from their landlords.
This ensured PLA लोकप्रिय support.
After the surrender of Japan at the end of World War II, सोवियत शक्तियां turned over उनके captured Japanese weapons to the CPC and allowed the CPC to take control of territory in Manchuria.
To this day, no armistice or सलाम सन्धि रै कभी महरूम हस्ताक्षरित, और it is debated as to the whether the Civil War has legally ended.
Cross-Strait relations have महरूम hindered by सैन्य खतरे और राजनैतिक और आर्थिक दबाव, विशेषकर over Taiwan 's political status, with both governments officially adhering to a `` One-China policy. ''
The PRC still actively claims Taiwan as part of its territory and continues to threaten the ROC with a military invasion if the ROC officially declares स्वतंत्रता by बदलना इसके नाम to और gaining अंतरराष्ट्रीय मान्यता as the Republic of Taiwan.
The ROC mutually claims मेनलैंड चीन, और वे both continue the fight over diplomatic recognition.
Today, the war as such occurs on the political and economic fronts in the रूप of cross-strait संबंध ; however, the दो पृथक de facto राज्य have close economic ties.
the एक सौ बारहवीं संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस थी the बैठक of the विधान branch of the United States federal government, from January 3, 2011 until January 3, 2013.
It convened in Washington, D.C. on January 3, 2011, and ended on January 3, 2013, 17 days before the समाप्त of the अध्यक्षीय पद to जिससे बराक ओबामा थी elected in 2008.
Senators elected to नियमित शर्तें in 2006 समाप्त those शर्तें in this Congress.
This कॉंग्रेस शामिल the पिछला हाउस of प्रतिनिधि निर्वाचित from congressional districts that were apportioned based on the 2000 census.
In the 2010 मध्यावधि चुनावों, the Republican Party won the majority in the House of Representatives.
While the Democrats kept their Senate majority, it was घटाया इससे the पिछला कॉंग्रेस.
This was the first Congress in which the House and Senate were controlled by अलग पार्टियों चूंकि the 107th कॉंग्रेस ( 2001–2003 ), and the first Congress to begin that way since the 99th Congress ( 1985–1987 ).
In this Congress, the House of Representatives had the largest number of रिपब्लिकन सदस्यों, 242, चूंकि the 80th Congress ( 1947–1949 ).
It was also the first Congress since 1947 in जिससे no सदस्य of the कैनेडी परिवार परोसा, as खूब as the सबसे politically polarized Congress since Reconstruction, with record low approval ratings.
Wealth in the United States is commonly measured in शर्तें of जाल लायक, जिससे is the योग of सब एसेट, including home equity, minus all liabilities.
The total net लायक of us households और nonprofit संगठन 1945–2009, unadjusted for inflation or population change.
For example, a household in possession of an $ 800,000 हाउस, $ 5,000 in परस्पर निधि, $ 30,000 in गाड़ियाँ, $ 20,000 लायक of भण्डार in उनके own company, and a $ 45,000 IRA would have assets totaling $ 900,000.
Assuming that this household होता have a $ 250,000 बंधक, $ 40,000 in car loans, and $ 10,000 in credit card debt, its debts would total $ 300,000.
Subtracting the debts from the लायक of इस household 's एसेट ( 900,000 - $ 300,000 = $ 600,000 ), this household would have a net worth of $ 600,000.
Net worth can vary साथ fluctuations in मान of the underlying assets.
The wealth —more specifically, the मध्य जाल worth—of households in the United States is varied with relation to race, education, geographic location and gender.
As one would expect, households with greater income feature the highest net worths, हालांकि ऊँची आय can नहीं be लिया as an always accurate indicator of net worth.
Overall the number of wealthier households is on the वृद्धि, साथ baby boomers hitting the highs of their careers.
In addition, wealth is unevenly distributed, with the wealthiest 25 % of us households owning 87 % of the माल in the संयुक्त राज्य, which was $ 54.2 trillion in 2009.
Including human capital such as कौशल, the संयुक्त राष्ट्र अनुमानित the कुल माल of the United States in 2008 to be $ 118 trillion.
This article deals with Selective Dorsal rhizotomy ( sdr ) बल्कि than the rhizotomy प्रक्रियाओं लिये पीड़ा राहत ; लिये those प्रक्रियाओं, जिससे have begun to take the name `` rhizotomy '' in certain instances, see facet rhizotomy and similar.
A rhizotomy ( ) is a term chiefly referring to a neurosurgical procedure that selectively नष्ट समस्यापूर्ण तंत्रिका जड़ें in the स्पाइनल cord, सबसे प्रायः to relieve the लक्षण of neuromuscular शर्तें ऐसे as spastic diplegia and other forms of spastic cerebral palsy.
The selective dorsal rhizotomy ( SDR ) for spastic cerebral palsy has महरूम the प्रमुख उपयोग of rhizotomy लिये neurosurgeons specialising in spastic cp चूंकि the 1980s ; in this surgery, the spasticity-causing nerves are isolated and then targeted and destroyed.
The sensory nerve roots, जहाँ spasticity is स्तिथ, हैं पहला अलग इससे the मोटर ones, and the nerve fibres to be cut are then identified via electromyographic stimulation.
The ones producing spasticity are then selectively lesioned साथ छोटा विद्युत pulses.
In spasticity, rhizotomy precisely targets and destroys the damaged nerves that don’t receive gamma amino butyric acid, जिससे is the कोर प्रॉब्लम लिये लोगों साथ spastic cerebral palsy.
These over-firing, non-GABA-absorbing nerves generate unusual electrical activity during the EMG testing phase in SDR and are thus considered to be the सोर्स of the रोगी 's hypertonia ; वे हैं eliminated साथ the electrical pulses once identified, while the remaining nerves and nerve routes carrying the correct messages remain fully intact and untouched.
This means that the spasticity is permanently dissolved, और कि इस is किया बगैर affecting बेचैन प्रणाली संवेदनशीलता or फलन in अन्य क्षेत्रों, because the only nerves destroyed are the over-firing ones responsible for the muscle tightness.
The शर्तें rhizotomy और neurotomy हैं भी increasingly बनने interchangeable in the treatment of chronic back pain from degenerative disc disease.
This is a procedure पुकारा a facet rhizotomy और is नहीं a सर्जिकल कार्यविधि लकिन is instead done on an outpatient basis using a simple probe to apply radiofrequency waves to the impinged pain-causing nerve root lying between the facet joint and the vertebral body.
Such radio frequency nerve lesioning results in five to आठ or अधिक महीने of पीड़ा राहत पहले the तंत्रिका regenerates and another round of the procedure needs to be performed.
A facet rhizotomy is just one of many different forms of radiofrequency ablation, and its use of the `` rhizotomy '' नाम चाहिए नहीं be उलझन साथ the SDR procedure.

The term migrant कार्यकर्ता रै अलग आधिकारिक meanings and connotations in different parts of the world.
the संयुक्त राष्ट्र ' परिभाषा is व्यापक, including any people working outside of their home country.
The term can also be used to describe someone who migrates within a देश, संभवतः उनके अपना, in अनुक्रम to pursue work such as seasonal work.
फोटोग्राफ of लील वेन साथ teardrop tattoos below his eyes.
The teardrop tattoo or tear tattoo is a सांकेतिक टैटू कि is लगाई underneath the eye.
It has no fixed अर्थ लकिन लगभग सब meanings ( see below ) have some connection to prison.
U.S. Route 75 is a north–south U.S. Highway.
The highway 's northern terminus is in Kittson County, Minnesota, at the Canadian border, where it एकबार जारी as मनिटोबा राजमार्ग 75 on the अन्य पक्ष of the now-closed border crossing.
Its southern terminus is at Interstate 30 and Interstate 45 in Dallas, Texas, जहाँ it is ज्ञात as उत्तर सेंट्रल एक्सप्रेसवे.
U.S. 75 was a border-to-border route, from Canada to the गल्फ of मैक्सिको at galveston, टेक्सास.
However, the entire segment south of Dallas, Texas has been decommissioned in favor of अंतरराज्यीय 45, a कटऑफ खण्ड of town-to-town सतह road having become State Highway 75.
Lower Ninth Ward is a पड़ोस of the नगर of New Orleans.
As the name implies, it is part of the नवीं वार्ड of नई Orleans.
The Lower Ninth Ward is often thought of as the entire area within New ऑरलियन्स downriver of the औद्योगिक कनाल ; however, the City Planning Commission divides this area into the Lower Ninth Ward ( 2 ) and Holy Cross ( 3 ) neighborhoods.
The term `` Lower '' refers to its location farther towards the mouth of the मिसिसिपी नदी, `` bas '' or `` below '' the rest of the city in local geographic terminology.
But the 9th Ward, जैसे सब wards in नई ऑरलियन्स, is a voting district.
The 9th वार्ड थी added as a voting district in 1852.
The `` lower '' 9th वार्ड is रचित of वार्ड 9 जिले 1, 2, 4, और 7 जिससे मेक up the Holy Cross Area and Ward 9 Districts 3, 5, 6, and 8.
Higher voting district numbers in the 9th Ward ( 8-27 ) are on the upriver side of the औद्योगिक कनाल.
The area came to national attention for its devastation in the aftermath of hurricane Katrina in 2005.

Red and orange tinted Moon, as seen from Earth during a lunar eclipse, जहाँ the धरती आता between the Moon and Sun
The Moon is the only प्राकृतिक उपग्रह of the धरती, और the पांचवां largest उपग्रह in the Solar System.
It is the largest natural satellite of a planet in the Solar प्रणाली सापेक्ष to the आकार of इसके प्राथमिक, having 27 % the व्यास और 60 % the घनत्व of Earth, resulting in its mass.
The Moon is the second densest satellite बाद io, a उपग्रह of बृहस्पति.
The Moon is in तुल्यकालिक रोटेशन साथ धरती, सदा प्रर्दशित the वही फेस साथ इसके निकट side marked by dark volcanic maria that fill between the bright ancient crustal highlands and the prominent impact craters.
It is the brightest ऑब्जेक्ट in the आसमान बाद the सूर्य, हालांकि its surface is actually very dark, with a reflectance similar to that of coal.
Its prominence in the sky and its regular cycle of phases have, चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स, बना the चंद्रमा an महत्वपूर्ण cultural influence on language, calendars, art and mythology.
The चंद्रमा 's गुरुत्वाकर्षक influence produces the ocean tides and the minute lengthening of the day.
The Moon 's current orbital अलहदा, परिचय तीस टाइम्स the व्यास of the धरती, कल्याणकारी it to appear लगभग the same size in the sky as the Sun, allowing it to cover the Sun nearly precisely in total solar eclipses.
This मिलान of apparent विज़ुअल size is a coincidence.
The Moon 's रैखिक अलहदा इससे the धरती is फिलहाल increasing at a rate of 3.82±0.07cm per year, but this rate is not constant.
The Moon is thought to have formed nearly 4.5 अरब years ago, not long after the Earth.
Although there have been several hypotheses for its origin in the past, the current most widely स्वीकृत स्पष्टीकरण is कि the चंद्रमा formed इससे the मलबा left over after a giant impact between Earth and a Mars -sized body.
The Moon is the only celestial body other than धरती on जिससे इंसानो have set foot.
The Soviet Union 's Luna programme was the first to reach the Moon with unmanned spacecraft in 1959 ; the United States ' NASA Apollo program हासिल the तभी मानवयुक्त मिशन to तिथि, शुरूआत साथ the पहला मानवयुक्त चंद्र orbiting मिशन by अपोलो 8 in 1968, और छह मानवयुक्त चंद्र अवतरण between 1969 और 1972, साथ the पहला होने अपोलो 11.
These missions returned over 380 kg of lunar rocks, which have been used to develop a geological understanding of the Moon 's origins, the formation of इसके आतंरिक ढांचा, और इसके subsequent इतिहास.
After the Apollo 17 mission in 1972, the Moon has been visited only by unmanned spacecraft, notably by the फाइनल सोवियत Lunokhod rover.
Since 2004, Japan, China, India, the United States, and the European स्पेस एजेंसी have प्रत्येक भेजा lunar orbiters.
These spacecraft have contributed to confirming the discovery of lunar water ice in permanently shadowed craters at the डंडे और बंधी into the चंद्र regolith.
Future मानवयुक्त मिशन to the चंद्रमा have been planned, including government as well as privately funded efforts.
The Moon remains, under the Outer स्पेस सन्धि, फ़्री to सब राष्ट्र to explore for peaceful purposes.
Ronald विल्सन reagan ( ; फ़रवरी 6, 1911 – June 5, 2004 ) was the 40th President of the United States ( 1981–1989 ).
Prior to that, he was the 33rd Governor of California ( 1967–1975 ), and a रेडियो, फिल्मी और टेलीविज़न कर्ता.
Born in tampico, इलिनोइस, और उठाया in डिक्सन, reagan थी शिक्षित at यूरेका College, earning a Bachelor of Arts degree in economics and sociology.
After graduating, Reagan moved first to Iowa to कार्य as a रेडियो प्रसारणकर्ता और तब, in 1937, to लॉस एंजिल्स जहाँ he began a career as an actor, first in films and later television.
Some of his most notable films include knute rockne, सब अमरीकी ( 1940 ), Kings Row ( 1942 ), and Bedtime for Bonzo ( 1951 ).
Reagan served as President of the Screen Actors Guild and later as a प्रवक्ता लिये सामान्य इलेक्ट्रिक ( ge ) ; उसके प्रारंभ in politics occurred during his work for GE.
Originally a member of the Democratic Party, his स्थितियाँ began shifting rightward in the 1950s, और he switched to the Republican Party in 1962.
After delivering a rousing speech in support of Barry goldwater 's अध्यक्षीय उम्मीदवारी in 1964, he थी persuaded to seek the California governorship, winning two years later and again in 1970.
He was defeated in his run for the Republican presidential nomination in 1968 and in 1976, लकिन जीती दोनो the नामांकन और सामान्य चुनाव in 1980, defeating incumbent Jimmy Carter.
As president, Reagan implemented sweeping नई राजनैतिक and economic initiatives.
His supply-side economic policies, dubbed `` Reaganomics ``, advocated reducing tax rates to spur economic growth, controlling the money सप्लाई to reduce महंगाई, deregulation of the economy, and reducing government spending.
In his first term he survived an assassination attempt, took a मुश्किल लकीर विरूद्ध मजदूर संघ, घोषित a नई युद्ध on दवाएँ, and ordered an invasion of Grenada.
He was re-elected in a landslide in 1984, proclaiming कि it थी `` Morning in America ``.
His second term was primarily चिह्नित by विदेशी matters, ऐसे as the समाप्ति of the ठंडा युद्ध, the 1986 bombing of Libya, and the revelation of the Iran-Contra affair.
Publicly describing the Soviet Union as an `` evil empire ``, he supported anti-communist आंदोलनों विश्वव्यापी और खर्च उसके पहला पद forgoing the रणनीति of détente by ordering a massive military buildup in an arms race with the USSR.
Reagan negotiated with Soviet सामान्य सचिव मिखाइल गोर्बाचेव, culminating in the inf Treaty and the decrease of both countries ' nuclear arsenals.
reagan बाएँ दफ्तर in 1989.
In 1994, the former president disclosed that he had been diagnosed with अल्जाइमर 's बीमारी पहले in the साल ; he died टेन सालो later at the age of 93.
A conservative icon, he बाँधने अत्यधिक in पब्लिक राय polls of U.S. Presidents and is credited for generating an ideological renaissance on the American political right.
पूरा नियत of scrolls, constituting the entire Tanakh.
The Tanakh (, or ; also Tenakh, Tenak, Tanach ) is a name used in judaism लिये the canon of the यहूदी बाइबल.
The Tanakh is also known as the masoretic टेक्स्ट or the Miqra.
The name is an acronym formed from the initial Hebrew letters of the Masoretic Text 's three traditional subdivisions : the तोरा ( `` शिक्षण '', भी ज्ञात as the पाँच किताबे of मूसा ), nevi'im ( `` नबियों '' ) और Ketuvim ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh.
The name `` miqra '' ( מקרא ), अर्थ `` कि which is read '', is an alternative Hebrew term for the Tanakh.
The books of the tanakh यहूद relayed साथ an accompanying oral tradition passed on by each generation, called the Oral Torah.
The Kawasaki Ninja ZX-6R is a कावासाकी 600 cc class sport motorcycle.
It was introduced in 1995, and has been constantly अद्यतनीकृत throughout the years in response to new products from Honda, Suzuki, and Yamaha.
The ZX series is what was known as the Ninja line of Kawasaki motorcycles in the 1980s और स्टिल carries the name today.
Assassination attempts and plots on राष्ट्रपतियों of the संयुक्त राज्य have महरूम numerous : अधिक than 20 attempts to kill sitting and former presidents, as well as the Presidents-elect, are known.
Four sitting presidents have been killed : Abraham Lincoln ( the 16th President ), James A. Garfield ( the 20th President ), William McKinley ( the 25th President ) and John F. Kennedy ( the 35th President ).
Two राष्ट्रपतियों यहूद घायल in attempted assassinations : former President Theodore Roosevelt ( the 26th President ), and President Ronald Reagan ( the 40th President ).
Although the historian J.W. Clarke has suggested that most American assassinations were politically motivated actions, carried out by rational men, नहीं सब ऐसे हमले have महरूम undertaken for political reasons.
Some attackers had questionable दिमागी स्थिरता, and a few were judged legally insane.
Since the Vice President of the United States has for more than a century been elected from the same राजनैतिक पार्टी as the अध्यक्ष, the हत्या of the अध्यक्ष is असंभावित to परिणाम in major policy changes.
This may explain क्यों राजनैतिक समूह typically do not make such attacks.
Where the Red Fern Grows is a novel written by Wilson Rawls in 1961 परिचय a लड़के जो खरीदता और रेल दो Redbone Coonhound hunting dogs.
Oklahoma ( ) ( Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa, Cayuga : gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a राज्य स्तिथ in वेस्ट दक्षिण सेंट्रल संयुक्त States.
ओक्लाहोमा is the 20th सबसे extensive and the 28th most populous of the 50 United States.
The state 's name is निकला इससे the choctaw शब्द okla और humma, meaning `` red people '', and it is known informally by its nickname, The Sooner State.
Formed by the combination of Oklahoma Territory and Indian Territory on नवम्बर 16, 1907, ओक्लाहोमा थी the 46th राज्य to डालें the संघ.
Its residents are known as oklahomans or, informally `` okies '', and its capital and largest city is Oklahoma City.
A major producer of natural gas, oil, and agriculture, Oklahoma relies on an economic base of विमानन, उर्जा, दूरसंचार, और जैवप्रौद्योगिकी.
It has one of the fastest growing economies in the nation, ranking among the top राज्य in प्रति capita आय विकास and gross domestic product growth.
Oklahoma City and Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's primary economic anchors, with nearly two thirds of Oklahomans living भीतर उनके महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रों.
With small mountain ranges, prairie, mesas, और पूर्वी वनों, सबसे of ओक्लाहोमा झूठ in the ग्रेट Plains and the U.S. Interior Highlands —a region especially prone to severe weather.
In addition to having a prevalence of English, German, Scottish, Irish and Native अमरीकी ancestry, अधिक than 25 देशी अमरीकी भाषाएं हैं बोला in Oklahoma, second only to California.
Oklahoma is located on a confluence of three major American cultural regions और historically परोसा as a रूट लिये चौपायों ड्राइव, a गंतव्य लिये दक्षिणी settlers, and a government-sanctioned territory for Native Americans.
Redwall, by Brian ज़ाक, is a श्रेणी of children 's fantasy novels.
It is the title of the first book of the series, published in 1986, as well as the name of the Abbey featured in the book और the नाम of an एनिमेटेड tv श्रेणी आधारित on तीन of the novels ( redwall, mattimeo, and Martin the Warrior ), which first aired in 1999.
The books हैं primarily aimed at पुरानी children, but have fans of all ages.
वहीँ have महरूम twenty-two novels and two picture books published.
The twenty-second, and final, अनोखा, the दुष्ट क्रू, थी posthumously released on May 3, 2011.
Natural Gas is usually measured by आवाज़ in the संयुक्त States and is stated in cubic feet.
A cubic foot of gas is the amount of gas needed to fill a आवाज़ of एक घन पैर अंतर्गत नियत शर्तें of दबाव और temperature.to माप larger amounts of natural gas, a `` therm '' is used to denote 100 cubic feet, and `` mcf '' is used to denote 1,000 cubic feet.
To provide greater accuracy in comparing fuels, उर्जा सामग्री is measured in शर्तें of `` अंग्रेजों थर्मल इकाई ( BTU 's ). ''
A BTU is the amount of ऊष्मा जरूरी to उठाएँ एक पाउंड of जल ( लगभग a pint ), one degree Fahrenheit at or close to its point of maximum density.
One British therm ( symbol thm ) is a non- SI unit of ऊष्मा उर्जा बराबर to 100,000 British thermal units ( BTU ).
It is approximately the energy equivalent of burning 100 cubic feet ( प्रायः referred to as 1 ccf ) of natural gas.
Since ( Natural Gas ) meters measure volume and not energy content, a therm factor is used by ( Natural ) gas companies to बदलें the आवाज़ of गैस प्रयुक्त to इसके ऊष्मा समतुल्य, and thus calculate the actual energy use.
The therm फ़ैक्टर is प्रायः in the units therms/CCF.
It will vary with the mix of hydrocarbons in the प्राकृतिक gas.
Natural gas with a higher than average विशेषज्ञता of इथेन, प्रोपेन or ब्यूटेन होगा have a higher therm factor.
Impurities, such as carbon dioxide or नाइट्रोजन, निम्नतर the therm फ़ैक्टर.
The volume of the gas is गणना as if measured at मानक temperature and pressure ( STP ).
The heat content of natural gas is solely dependent on the संयोजन of the गैस, और is स्वतंत्र of तापमान और pressure.
One therm is equal to about 105.5 megajoules, 25,200 kilocalories or 29.3 kilowatt-hours.
One therm can also be provided by परिचय of natural gas.
The therm sometimes has been confused साथ the thermie ( देखिए नीचे ).
The names of both units come from the यूनानी शब्द लिये ऊष्मा.
A thermie ( th ) is a मीट्रिक ईकाई of ऊष्मा उर्जा, भाग of the meter-tonne-second system sometimes used by European engineers.
The thermie is equal to the amount of energy required to उठाएँ the तापमान of 1 टन of जल by 1 °C.
The thermie is equivalent to 1,000 kilocalories, 4.1868 megajoules or 3968.3 BTU.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ), was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य कि घोषित उनके secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its origin in the समस्या of गुलामी, विशेषकर the extension of slavery into the western territories.
Foreign शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना, the confederacy collapsed, गुलामी थी abolished, और the मुश्किल Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential election, Republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त राज्य ' territories.
Lincoln won, but before उसके उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his administration होता नहीं initiate सिविल war.
Eight बाकी स्लेव राज्य जारी to reject calls for secession.
Confederate forces जब्त numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to find a सुलह, और दोनो पहलू prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did और none पहचाना the नई confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट sumter, a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by संघ सैनिकों in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; नतीजतन, चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon controlled the border राज्य और स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी that crippled the southern economy.
The Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The पतझड़ 1862 confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a Union state ) ended with Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln जारी the emancipation Proclamation, which made ending slavery a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the confederate नदी नेवी, तब much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना, और the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the बैटल of gettysburg.
Western successes led to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट command of all Union armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. Sherman drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched to the समुद्र, destroying confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from सब दिशानिर्देश, और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the overland अभियान towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, leading to Lee 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
The American Civil War was one of the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक युद्धों.
Railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, खानों, shipyards, बैंको, परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American history, resulting in the deaths of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined क्रमांक of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा, और 30 प्रतिशत of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
William Bruce Jenner ( born October 28, 1949 ) is a former U.S. track and field athlete, प्रेरक स्पीकर, socialite, टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व और बिजनेसमैन.
He जीती the सुनहरा पदक लिये decathlon in the Montreal 1976 Summer Olympics.
Following his Olympic win and the related recognition, he शादीशुदा क्रिस कार्दशियन, और उसके पेशेवर करियर विकसित into being a television celebrity.
By 1981, he had starred in several made-for-tv फिल्मों और थी erik एस्ट्राडा 's बदलना on the शीर्ष rated TV series CHiPs.
He has six children : बर्ट, केसी, ब्रैंडन, Brody, Kendall and Kylie.
Since his 1991 marriage to Kris Jenner, he is the stepfather to कोर्टनी, Kim, Khloe and Rob Kardashian.
Since 2007, he has appeared with उसके blended परिवार on keeping Up with the Kardashians.
Escherichia coli ( ; commonly abbreviated E. coli ) is a Gram-negative, rod-shaped bacterium कि is commonly मिला in the lower intestine of warm-blooded organisms ( endotherms ).
Most E. coli strains are harmless, but some serotypes can cause serious खाना विषाक्तता in इंसानो, और हैं occasionally जिम्मेदार लिये उत्पाद recalls due to food contamination.
The harmless strains are part of the normal flora of the gut, and can लाभ उनके होस्ट by producing विटामिन k2, और by preventing the establishment of pathogenic bacteria within the intestine.
E. coli and related bacteria constitute about 0.1 % of gut flora, and fecal–oral transmission is the प्रमुख रूट through जिससे रोगजनक strains of the bacterium cause disease.
Cells are able to survive outside the body for a limited amount of time, which makes them ideal indicator जीवों to परीक्षण पर्यावरणीय नमूने लिये fecal contamination.
There is, however, a growing देह of शोध कि रै examined environmentally persistent E. coli which can survive for extended periods outside of the host.
The bacterium can भी be grown easily और inexpensively in a प्रयोगशाला setting, and has been intensively investigated for over 60 years.
E. कोलाई is the सबसे widely पढ़ाई prokaryotic मॉडल सजीव, और an important species in the fields of biotechnology and microbiology, where it has served as the host organism for the majority of work with recombinant DNA.
Area code 217 is the North American telephone area code लिये much of पश्चिमी और सेंट्रल Illinois.
The 217 area includes Illinois ' capital, Springfield, plus Champaign, Urbana, Decatur, danville, क्विंसी, and Rantoul.
217 was one of the original area कोड, जिससे यहूद निर्मित in 1947.
The only significant change in 217 's सीमाएँ थी in 1957, जब इसके northern portion was combined with part of area code 815 to form area code 309.

Ozone depletion describes two distinct but related phenomena observed चूंकि the लेट 1970s : a स्थिर मनाही of परिचय 4 % प्रति दशक in the कुल आवाज़ of ओज़ोन in धरती 's stratosphere ( the ओज़ोन परत ), और a much larger springtime decrease in stratospheric ozone over Earth 's polar regions.
The latter phenomenon is referred to as the ओज़ोन hole.
In जोड to ये well-known stratospheric phenomena, there are also springtime polar tropospheric ozone depletion events.
The details of polar ozone hole formation differ from that of mid-latitude thinning, but the most महत्वपूर्ण प्रक्रम in दोनो is catalytic विनाश of ओज़ोन by atomic halogens.
The main source of these halogen atoms in the stratosphere is photodissociation of man-made halocarbon refrigerants ( cfcs, freons, halons ).
These compounds हैं transported into the stratosphere बाद being emitted at the surface.
Both प्रकार of ओज़ोन depletion यहूद observed to बढ़ाएँ as emissions of halo-carbons increased.
CFCs and other contributory substances हैं referred to as ozone-depleting substances ( ODS ).
Since the ozone layer prevents most harmful UVB wavelengths ( 280–315 nm ) of ultraviolet light ( UV light ) from passing through the Earth 's atmosphere, observed and प्रक्षिप्त decreases in ओज़ोन have उत्पन्न विश्वव्यापी चिंता अग्रणी to अपनाना of the मॉन्ट्रियल प्रोटोकॉल that bans the production of CFCs, halons, and other ozone-depleting chemicals such as carbon tetrachloride and trichloroethane.
It is suspected that a variety of biological consequences such as increases in स्किन कर्कट, cataracts, क्षति to पौधे, और कटौती of प्लवक populations in the समंदर 's photic मण्डल may परिणाम इससे the increased UV exposure due to ozone depletion.
The Preamble to the United States संविधान is a ब्रैड परिचयात्मक बयान of the संविधान 's fundamental purposes and guiding principles.
It states in general terms, and courts have referred to it as reliable evidence of, the Founding Fathers ' इरादों regarding the संविधान 's अर्थ और कया वे hoped the संविधान would achieve as it pertains to all of the people of the United States.
As the phrase, `` we the people '' suggests that the new government originates from the people of the United States and it sets into motion a question as it pertains to that vast population concerning the व्यक्तिगत अधिकारों और समता among सब लोगों ; इस can be देखी सबसे broadly in the divide between republicanism और सोशल democracy.
