the शॉट put ( सुनाया ) is a track and field event involving `` throwing '' / '' putting '' ( throwing in a pushing motion ) a heavy spherical object —the shot—as far as possible.
The shot put competition for men has been a part of the आधुनिक ओलंपिक since their revival in 1896, women 's competition began in 1948.
Map of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र ( un ) सदस्य राज्य, साथ उनके territories ( सहित निर्भर territories ) recognized by the UN in blue
There are संयुक्त राष्ट्र ( un ) सदस्य राज्य, और प्रत्येक of उन्हें is a सदस्य of the United Nations General Assembly.
The criteria for प्रवेश of नई सदस्यों हैं नियत out in the United Nations Charter, Chapter II, Article 4:
A recommendation for admission from the Security Council requires affirmative मत इससे at तनिक नौ of the परिषद 's पंद्रह सदस्यों, साथ none of the five permanent members voting against.
The Security Council 's recommendation must then be subsequently स्वीकृत in the सामान्य सभा by a two-thirds majority vote.
In principle, only sovereign states can become un सदस्यों, और फिलहाल सब un सदस्यों हैं sovereign राज्य ( हालांकि a few सदस्यों यहूद नहीं sovereign when they joined the UN ).
Because a state can only be admitted to the UN by the approval of the Security Council and the General Assembly, a number of states that may be considered sovereign states according to the Montevideo Convention criteria are not members क्युकी the un करता नहीं consider उन्हें to possess sovereignty, mainly due to the lack of international recognition or opposition from certain members.
In addition to the member states, the UN also invites non-member राज्य ( फिलहाल दो : the पावन देखिए और फिलिस्तीन ), intergovernmental संगठन, और अन्य अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन and entities whose statehood or sovereignty are not precisely defined, to become observers at the General Assembly, allowing them to participate and speak, but not vote, in General Assembly meetings.
The Eiffel Tower (, ) is an iron lattice tower located on the Champ de Mars in Paris, नामित बाद the इंजीनियर gustave एफिल, जिनकी कम्पनी designed और निर्मित the tower.
Erected in 1889 as the entrance arch to the 1889 World 's Fair, it has become both a वैश्विक सांस्कृतिक प्रतीक of फ़्रांस और एक of the सबसे recognizable structures in the world.
The मीनार is the tallest ढांचा in पेरिस और the most-visited सशुल्क स्मारक in the संसार ; 7.1 million people ascended it in 2011.
The third level observatory 's upper platform is at the highest accessible to public in the यूरोपीय संघ और the उच्चतम in यूरोपीय as long as the मंच of the Ostankino Tower, at, remains closed as a result of the fire of August 2000.
The tower received its 250 millionth आगंतुक in 2010.
the मीनार स्टैंड लम्बा, परिचय the same height as an 81-storey building.
During its construction, the Eiffel Tower surpassed the Washington Monument to assume the शीर्षक of the tallest man-made ढांचा in the संसार, a शीर्षक it आयोजित लिये 41 years, until the Chrysler Building in New York City was built in 1930.
Because of the जोड, in 1957, of the antenna atop the Eiffel Tower, it is now taller than the Chrysler Building.
Not सहित ब्रॉडकास्ट एन्टेना, it is the second-tallest structure in France, after the Millau Viaduct.
The tower has three levels for विज़िटर.
Tickets can be purchased to ascend, by stairs or लिफ्ट ( लिफ्ट ), to the पहला और दूसरी levels.
The walk from ground level to the first level is over 300 कदम, as is the चलना इससे the first to the second level.
The third and highest स्तर is accessible तभी by lift—stairs do exist but are usually closed to the public.
The first and दूसरी स्तर have restaurants.
The tower has become the most prominent प्रतीक of दोनो पेरिस और फ़्रांस, often in the establishing shot of films set in the city.
Kenneth Wayne `` Ken '' Jennings III ( born May 23, 1974 ) is an अमरीकी खेल दिखाएँ प्रतियोगी and author.
Jennings is noted for holding the record for the longest winning streak on the u.S. syndicated खेल show Jeopardy !
and as being the all-time leading money winner on अमरीकी खेल shows.
In 2004, Jennings जीती 74 jeopardy !
games before he was defeated by challenger नैंसी zerg on उसके 75th रूप.
उसके कुल आय on Jeopardy !
are $ 3,172,700, consisting of $ 2,520,700 over his 74 wins, a $ 2,000 second-place पुरस्कार in उसके 75th रूप, a $ 500,000 second-place prize in the Jeopardy !
Ultimate Tournament of champions, as खूब as हाफ of a $ 300,000 prize in the IBM Challenge.
During his पहला चलाएं of Jeopardy !
appearances, Jennings earned the रिकार्ड लिये the highest American game show winnings.
His total was surpassed by Brad rutter, जो पराजित जेनिंग्स in the finals of the Jeopardy !
Ultimate Tournament of Champions ( first aired on may 25, 2005 ), adding $ 2,000,000 to Rutter 's existing Jeopardy !
winnings.
Jennings regained the रिकार्ड बाद appearing on several other game shows, culminating in an appearance on Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader ?
( first aired on October 10, 2008 ), हालांकि rutter retains the Jeopardy !
रिकार्ड.
After his success on Jeopardy !, Jennings wrote about his experience and explored American ट्रिविया इतिहास और संस्कृति in उसके किताब brainiac : adventures in the जिज्ञासु, प्रतिस्पर्धी, बाध्यता संसार of Trivia Buffs, published in 2006.
the कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल लीग or cfl ( ' [ lcf ] in French ) is a professional sports league located in Canada.
The CFL is the highest level of competition in Canadian football, a form of gridiron फ़ुटबॉल closely सम्बन्धित to अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल.
Its eight वर्तमान टीमों, which are located in eight separate cities, are divided into two divisions of four teams each — the East Division and the West Division.
The लीग 's 19-week नियमित ऋतु रनों इससे लेट June to early November ; each team plays 18 games with one bye week.
Following the regular season, the three teams with the best records in their division ( except if the fourth place team in one division has a better record than the third place team in the अन्य प्रभाग, जब the टोली साथ the बेहतर रिकार्ड makes the playoffs और `` crosses over '' to the अन्य प्रभाग 's playoff ) compete in the लीग 's three-week divisional playoffs, which culminate in the late-November Grey Cup championship, the country 's largest annual sports and television event.
The CFL was officially founded on January 19, 1958, making it the second oldest gridiron football league in North अमेरिका स्टिल in आपरेशन, हालांकि सब इसके टीमों long predate the आधुनिक formation of the league.
It is the highest level of play in Canadian football, the most popular फ़ुटबॉल लीग in कनाडा, और the second-most popular major sports league in Canada, after the National Hockey League.
Although ice hockey is Canada 's most popular sport, the CFL has increased the लोकप्रियता of कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल in Quebec and Western Canada.
Canadian फ़ुटबॉल is भी निभाई at amateur स्तर ( i.e. youth, high school, CJFL, QJFL, CIS and senior leagues such as the Alberta Football League ).
The 2010s होगा be a significant दशक for the CFL in terms of growth, as teams have renovated, expanded stadiums, or plan to build entirely new stadiums.
The Montreal Alouettes accomplished this first, adding 5,000 seats to Percival Molson मेमोरियल स्टेडियम in समय लिये the 2010 cfl season.
The Edmonton Eskimos and कैला स्तेमपेड्रस भी संवर उनके संबंधित stadiums and facilities for the 2010 season.
In 2011, the BC Lions played under a new, retractable छत in bc प्लेस बाद spending one and a half seasons at Empire Field.
Then the Winnipeg Blue Bombers will play in an entirely new stadium at the विश्वविद्यालयों of मनिटोबा, अनुसूचित to खोलें in समय लिये the 2013 season.
The Hamilton Tiger-Cats, Saskatchewan Roughriders and the new ओटावा मताधिकार हैं भी looking at नई or extensively-renovated stadiums in the following years.
There are also hopes of expanding the league to अटलांटिक कनाडा ( ideally basing a टोली in either the अधिक आबादी halifax, or the more centralized Moncton ), as 2010 and 2011 had regular season games hosted in Moncton.
According to sports historian Douglas Brei, the Canadian Football League holds the distinction of being the only professional sports league in North America, major or minor league, in which each existing मताधिकार रै जीती at तनिक एक league title while in their current location.
Each antibody binds to a विशिष्ट प्रतिजन ; an बातचीत समान to a lock and key.
An antibody ( Ab ), also known as an immunoglobulin ( Ig ), is a large Y-shaped प्रोटीन उत्पादित by b-cells कि is प्रयुक्त by the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली to identify and neutralize foreign objects such as bacteria and viruses.
The एंटीबॉडी recognizes a अद्वितीय part of the foreign target, called an antigen.
Each tip of the `` Y '' of an एंटीबॉडी contains a paratope ( a ढांचा analogous to a lock ) that is specific for one particular epitope ( similarly analogous to a key ) on an antigen, allowing these two structures to bind together with precision.
Using this binding mechanism, an antibody can tag a microbe or an infected cell for attack by other parts of the immune प्रणाली, or can neutralize इसके निशाना सीधे ( लिये उदाहरण, by blocking a part of a microbe that is essential for its invasion and survival ).
The production of antibodies is the प्रमुख फलन of the humoral immune system.
Antibodies are secreted by a प्रकार of श्वेत रक्त कोशिका पुकारा a plasma cell.
Antibodies can occur in two physical forms, a soluble form कि is स्रावित इससे the कोशिका, और a झिल्ली -bound रूप कि is संलग्न to the surface of a B cell and is referred to as the B cell receptor ( BCR ).
The BCR is only found on the surface of B cells and facilitates the activation of these cells and their subsequent differentiation into either antibody factories called plasma कोशिकाएं, or मेमोरी b कोशिकाएं कि होगा जीवित in the देह और याद कि वही प्रतिजन so the b cells can respond faster upon future exposure.
In most cases, interaction of the b कोशिका साथ a t हेल्पर कोशिका is जरुरी to उपज पूरा activation of the B cell and, therefore, antibody generation following antigen binding.
Soluble antibodies are released into the blood and ऊतक fluids, as खूब as अनेक secretions to continue to survey for invading microorganisms.
Antibodies are glycoproteins belonging to the immunoglobulin superfamily ; the terms antibody and immunoglobulin are often used interchangeably.
antibodies हैं typically बना of मौलिक संरचनात्मक units—each with two large heavy chains and two small light chains.
There are several different types of एंटीबॉडी भारी जंजीरों, और अनेक अलग kinds of antibodies, which are grouped into different isotypes based on which heavy chain they possess.
Five different antibody isotypes are known in mammals, which perform different roles, and help सीधा the उचित प्रतिरक्षा जवाब लिये प्रत्येक अलग प्रकार of foreign object they encounter.
Though the general structure of all antibodies is बहुत समान, a छोटी प्रदेश at the टिप of the प्रोटीन is अत्यधिक परिवर्तनीय, allowing लाखो of antibodies with slightly different tip structures, or antigen binding sites, to exist.
इस प्रदेश is known as the hypervariable region.
Each of these variants can bind to a अलग antigen.
This विशाल विविधता of antibodies allows the immune system to recognize an equally wide variety of antigens.
The large and diverse population of antibodies is generated by random combinations of a नियत of जीन खण्ड कि encode अलग प्रतिजन बाइंडिंग साइट ( or paratopes ), followed by random mutations in this area of the antibody gene, which create further diversity.
Antibody genes also re-organize in a प्रक्रम पुकारा क्लास switching कि परिवर्तन the आधार of the भारी कड़ी to another, बनाना a अलग isotype of the antibody that retains the antigen specific variable region.
This allows a single एंटीबॉडी to be प्रयुक्त by अनेक अलग parts of the immune system.
The symbol used by the Zodiac Killer to sign his पत्राचार
The Zodiac कातिल थी a सीरियल कातिल जो संचालित in उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया in the late 1960s and early 1970s.
The killer 's पहचान remains अनजान.
The Zodiac murdered victims in Benicia, Vallejo, झील berryessa, और सैन फ्रांसिस्को between दिसम्बर 1968 और अक्तूबर 1969.
Four men and three महिलाओं between the आयु of 16 और 29 were targeted.
The killer originated the नाम `` zodiac '' in a श्रेणी of taunting letters sent to the local Bay Area press.
These अक्षर शामिल चार cryptograms ( or ciphers ).
Of the four cryptograms भेजा, तभी एक रै been definitively solved.
Suspects have been named by law enforcement and amateur investigators, लकिन no conclusive प्रमाण रै surfaced.
In April 2004, the सैन फ्रांसिस्को पुलिस विभाग marked the case `` inactive '', yet re-opened the case at some point prior to March 2007.
The case भी remains खोलें in the नगर of vallejo, as well as in Napa County and Solano County.
The California Department of इंसाफ रै कायम an खोलें मामला file on the Zodiac murders since 1969.
Jennings is a small city in and the parish seat of Jefferson Davis Parish, louisiana, संयुक्त राज्य, निकट झील चार्ल्स.
The population was 10,383 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, a छोटी मनाही from the 2000 tabulation.
The नगर is 68 प्रतिशत white.
Jennings is the principal city of the Jennings micropolitan सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल, which includes all of Jefferson Davis Parish.
It is also part of the larger Lake charles-jennings संयुक्त Statistical Area.
Nanotechnology ( sometimes shortened to `` nanotech '' ) is the हेरफेर of पदार्थ on an atomic and molecular scale.
The earliest, widespread description of nanotechnology referred to the particular technological goal of precisely manipulating atoms and molecules for fabrication of macroscale उत्पाद, भी अभी referred to as आणविक nanotechnology.
A more generalized description of nanotechnology was subsequently established by the National nanotechnology पहल, जिससे defines nanotechnology as the हेरफेर of matter with at least one dimension sized from 1 to 100 nanometers.
This definition reflects the fact that quantum mechanical effects are important at this quantum-realm scale, and so the definition shifted from a particular technological goal to a research category inclusive of all types of research और technologies कि सौदे साथ the खास गुण of पदार्थ कि occur नीचे the दिए आकार threshold.
It is therefore common to see the plural form `` nanotechnologies '' as well as `` nanoscale technologies '' to refer to the व्यापक दायरा of शोध and applications whose common trait is size.
Because of the variety of potential applications ( including औद्योगिक और सैन्य ), सरकारें have invested अरबों of डॉलर in nanotechnology research.
through इसके National Nanotechnology Initiative, the USA has invested 3.7 billion dollars.
The European Union has invested 1.2 अरब और जापानी 750 लाख डॉलर.
Nanotechnology as defined by size is naturally बहुत व्यापक, सहित फ़ील्ड of विज्ञान as विविध as surface science, organic chemistry, molecular biology, semiconductor physics, microfabrication, etc.
The associated शोध और अनुप्रयोग हैं बराबर विविध, ranging इससे एक्सटेंशन of conventional यंत्र भौतिकी to completely new approaches based upon molecular self-assembly, from developing new materials with dimensions on the nanoscale to direct control of matter on the atomic scale.
Scientists फिलहाल बहस the future implications of nanotechnology.
nanotechnology may be समर्थ to बनाएँ many new materials and devices with a vast range of applications, such as in medicine, electronics, biomaterials and energy production.
On the other hand, nanotechnology raises many of the same issues as any new technology, including concerns about the toxicity and पर्यावरणीय प्रभाव of nanomaterials, और उनके संभावित effects on global economics, as well as speculation about various doomsday scenarios.
These concerns have led to a बहस among वकालत समूह और governments on whether special regulation of nanotechnology is warranted.
मैप of the Eastern Bloc
The term Eastern Bloc or Communist Bloc refers to the former communist states of Central and Eastern यूरोपीय, generally the सोवियत संघ और the देशों of the Warsaw Pact.
The terms Communist Bloc and Soviet Bloc were also used to denote groupings of राज्य लकीर साथ the सोवियत संघ, हालांकि these terms might include states outside Central and Eastern Europe.
The New जर्सी gubernatorial चुनाव of 2009 took place on November 3, 2009.
Democratic Governor Jon Corzine was running for a second term and was being challenged by रिपब्लिकन क्रिस क्रिस्टी, स्वतंत्र क्रिस्टोफर Daggett and nine others, in addition to several write-in candidates.
Christie won the election, with about 48.5 percent of the vote, to 44.9 प्रतिशत लिये corzine और 5.8 प्रतिशत लिये Daggett.
Christie won the largest हाशिया लिये a पहला पद रिपब्लिकन चूंकि 1969.
Christie assumed दफ्तर on जनवरी 19, 2010.
This was the first election to fill the newly निर्मित दफ्तर of Lieutenant Governor.
The candidates for governor and lieutenant governor were joined साथ as a सिंगल चुनाव, so कि मतदाता किया not have the opportunity to split the ticket.
Kim guadagno, क्रिस्टी 's कार्यशील mate, became नई जर्सी 's first lieutenant governor following her inauguration.
स्वास्थ्य परवाह in the संयुक्त राज्य is provided by many distinct organizations.
Health care सुविधाएं हैं largely स्वामित्व और संचालित by private sector businesses.
Health insurance for public सेक्टर कर्मचारी is primarily provided by the government.
60-65 % of healthcare provision and बिता आता इससे कार्यक्रम ऐसे as medicare, Medicaid, TRICARE, the Children 's Health Insurance Program, and the Veterans Health Administration.
Most of the population under 65 is insured by their or a परिवार सदस्य 's नियोक्ता, कुछ ख़रीदे स्वास्थ्य बीमे on their own, and the remainder are uninsured.
Of 17 high-income देशों पढ़ाई by the नेशनल संस्थान of स्वास्थ्य in 2013, the संयुक्त राज्य थी at or निकट the नीचे in शिशु मृत्यु, heart and lung disease, sexually transmitted infections, adolescent pregnancies, injuries, homicides, and rates of disability.
Together, such मुद्दे प्लेस the u.S. at the bottom of the list for life expectancy.
On average, a U.S. male can be अपेक्षित to सजीव लगभग चार fewer years than those in the top-ranked country.
According to the World Health Organization ( WHO ), the United States खर्च अधिक on स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रति capita ( $ 7,146 ), और अधिक on स्वास्थ्य परवाह as percentage of its GDP ( 15.2 % ), than any other nation in 2008.
The Commonwealth Fund ranked the United States last in the विशेषता of स्वास्थ्य परवाह among समान देशों, and notes U.S. care costs the most.
The U.S. Census Bureau reported that 49.9 million residents, 16.3 % of the जनसांख्यिकी, यहूद uninsured in 2010 ( up from 49.0 million residents, 16.1 % of the population, in 2009 ).
A 2004 संस्थान of आयुर्विज्ञान ( iom ) report said : `` The United States is among the few industrialized nations in the world that does not guarantee access to health care for its population. ''
A 2004 OECD report said : `` With the एक्सेप्शन of मैक्सिको, तुर्कों, और the United States, all OECD countries had achieved universal or near-universal ( at least 98.4 % insured ) coverage of their populations by 1990. ''
A 2010 report observed that lack of health insurance causes roughly 48,000 अनावश्यक मौतों प्रत्येक साल in the United States.
In 2007, 62.1 % of filers लिये bankruptcies claimed ऊँची चिकित्सा खर्च.
A 2013 पढ़ाई मिला कि परिचय 25 % of सब वरिष्ठ नागरिकों घोषित दिवालियापन due to चिकित्सा खर्च, and 43 % are forced to mortgage or sell their primary residence.
On March 23, 2010, the रोगी सुरक्षा और सस्ती परवाह अधिनियम ( PPACA ) became law, providing for major changes in health insurance.
In physiology, body water is the water सामग्री of the इंसान देह.
A significant fraction of the human body is water.
Arthur Guyton 's Textbook of Medical Physiology states that `` the total amount of जल in a man of औसत वज़न ( 70 गामा ) is approximately 40 litres, averaging 57 percent of his total body weight.
In a newborn infant, this may be as high as 75 percent of the देह वज़न, लकिन it progressively decreases इससे जनम to बूढ़ा age, most of the decrease occurring during the first 10 years of life.
Also, obesity decreases the प्रतिशत of जल in the देह, sometimes to as low as 45 percent ''.
These figures are सांख्यिकीय averages, so हैं illustrative, और जैसे सब biostatistics, होगा vary साथ बाते जैसे प्रकार of population, age and number of people sampled, and methodology.
So there is not, and can not be, a figure that is exactly the same for all people, for this or कोई अन्य physiological माप.
For example, Jackson 's ( 1985 ) Anatomy & Physiology for Nurses gives a figure of 60 % for the proportion of body-weight attributable to water, which approximates Guyton 's 57 %.
In diseased states where body water is affected, the compartment or compartments कि have बदला can दे clues to the nature of the problem.
Body water is regulated by hormones, सहित anti-diuretic हार्मोन ( ADH ), aldosterone and atrial natriuretic peptide.
Per Netter 's Atlas of इंसान physiology, देह जल is टूटा down into the following compartments:
Intracellular द्रव ( 2/3 of देह water ).
Per Guyton, in a body containing 40 litres of fluid, about 25 litres is intracellular, जिससे amounts to 62.5 % ( 5/8 ), बंद पर्याप्त to the 2/3 rule of thumb.
Jackson 's texts states 70 % of देह द्रव is intracellular.
Extracellular द्रव ( 1/3 of देह जल ).
Per Guyton 's illustration, for a 40 litre body, about 15 litres is extracellular, which amounts to 37.5 % again, इस is बंद to the 1/3 नियम of thumb cited here.
Plasma ( 1/5 of extracellular fluid ).
Per guyton 's illustration, of the 15 litres of extracellular fluid, plasma volume averages 3 litres.
This amounts to 20 %, the वही as प्रति Netter 's Atlas.
Interstitial fluid ( 4/5 of extracellular fluid )
Transcellular fluid ( a.k.a. `` third space, '' सामान्यतः उपेक्षित in calculations )
Contained inside organs, such as the जठरांत्र, प्रमस्तिष्कमेरु, उदरावरणीय, और ocular fluids.
Self-esteem is a term used in मनोविज्ञान to प्रतिबिंबित a person 's overall emotional evaluation of his or her own worth.
It is a judgement of oneself as खूब as an रवैया toward the self.
Self-esteem encompasses beliefs ( लिये उदाहरण, `` i am competent, '' `` i am worthy '' ) and emotions such as triumph, despair, pride and shame.
Smith and Mackie define it by saying `` The self-concept is what we think परिचय the स्वः ; self-esteem, is the धनात्मक or ऋणात्मक evaluations of the स्वः, as in how we feel about it. ''
self-esteem is भी ज्ञात as the evaluative dimension of the self that includes feelings of worthiness, prides and discouragement.
One 's self-esteem is भी closely संबद्ध साथ self-consciousness.
Self-esteem is a disposition that a person has जिससे represents their judgements of their own worthiness.
In the mid-1960s, मॉरिस rosenberg और social-learning theorists defined self-esteem as a personal worth or worthiness.
Nathaniel Branden in 1969 defined self-esteem as `` the अनुभव of होने competent to cope with the basic challenges of life and being worthy of happiness. ''
According to Branden, self-esteem is the sum of self-confidence ( a अहसास of निजी capacity ) and self-respect ( a feeling of personal worth ).
It exists as a consequence of the implicit judgement that every person has of their क्षमता to फेस जीवन 's चुनौतियां, to समझे and solve problems, and their right to achieve happiness, and be given respect.
As a social psychological construct, self-esteem is आकर्षक क्युकी शोधकर्ताओं have conceptualized it as an influential predictor of relevant outcomes, such as academic achievement ( Marsh 1990 ) or exercise behavior ( Hagger et al. 1998 ).
In addition, self-esteem has also been treated as an important निष्कर्ष due to इसके बंद संबंध साथ मनोवैज्ञानिक well-being ( Marsh 1989 ).
Self-esteem can apply specifically to a particular dimension ( for example, `` I believe I am a good writer and I feel happy about कि '' ) or a वैश्विक extent ( लिये उदाहरण, `` i मानना i am a ख़राब व्यक्ति, and feel bad about myself in general '' ).
Psychologists usually regard self-esteem as an enduring personality characteristic ( `` trait '' self-esteem ), हालांकि सामान्य, short-term विसंगतियाँ ( `` state '' self-esteem ) also exist.
Synonyms or near-synonyms of self-esteem शामिल : self-worth, self-regard, self-respect, and self-integrity.
A Masonic Lodge, often termed a Private Lodge or Constituent Lodge, is the basic organisational unit of freemasonry.
Every new Lodge must be warranted or chartered by a Grand Lodge, but is subject to its direction only in enforcing the प्रकाशित संविधान of the क्षेत्राधिकार.
by एक्सेप्शन the तीन surviving lodges कि formed the संसार 's पहला ज्ञात ग्रैंड आवास in लंदन ( today called the United Grand Lodge of England ) have the unique privilege to operate as time immemorial i.e. without such warrant ; only one other lodge operates without a warrant - this is the Grand Stewards ' Lodge in London, although it is not also entitled to the `` time immemorial '' title.
A Freemason is generally हकदार to विज़िट कोई आवास, in कोई क्षेत्राधिकार ( i.e. under any Grand Lodge ) in amity with his own.
In some jurisdictions this privilege is restricted to Master Masons ( कि is, freemasons जो have attained the Order 's third degree ).
He is पहला usually required to check, and certify, the regularity of the relationship of the Lodge - and be able to satisfy that Lodge of his regularity of membership.
Freemasons gather together as a आवास to कार्य the तीन मौलिक डिग्री of Entered Apprentice, Fellowcraft and Master Mason.
Pilkington Group Limited is a बहुराष्ट्रीय कांच निर्माण company headquartered in St Helens, United Kingdom and a wholly owned subsidiary of the Japan-based NSG Group.
Prior to its acquisition by NSG in 2006 it was an स्वतंत्र कम्पनी सूचीबद्ध on the लंदन Stock Exchange and for a time was a constituent of the FTSE 100 Index.
A quotation is the repetition of one expression as part of another one, particularly when the quoted expression is well-known or explicitly attributed by citation to इसके असली सोर्स, और it is indicated by ( punctuated with ) quotation marks.
A quotation can also refer to the repeated use of units of any other form of अभिव्यक्ति, विशेषकर भाग of कलाकारी works : तत्व of a पेंटिंग, दृश्यों from a movie or sections from a musical composition.
Year 1877 ( MDCCCLXXVII ) was a common year starting on Monday ( कड़ी होगा प्रदर्शक the पूरा पंचांग ) of the gregorian पंचांग और a आम साल starting on Saturday of the 12-day slower Julian calendar.
Black pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering vine in the family Piperaceae, cultivated लिये इसके फल, जिससे is प्रायः सूखी और प्रयुक्त as a spice and seasoning.
The fruit, known as a peppercorn when dried, is लगभग in व्यास, अंधेरा रेड जब fully वयस्क, और, like all drupes, contains a single seed.
Peppercorns, and the ground pepper derived from them, may be described बस as pepper, or अधिक precisely as ब्लैक pepper ( cooked and dried unripe fruit ), green pepper ( dried unripe fruit ) and white pepper ( dried ripe seeds ).
Black pepper is देशी to दक्षिण इण्डिया, और is extensively cultivated there and elsewhere in tropical regions.
Currently Vietnam is the world 's largest producer and निर्यातक of pepper, producing 34 % of the संसार 's पाइपर nigrum crop as of 2008.
Dried ground pepper has been used since प्राचीनता लिये दोनो इसके फ्लेवर और as a medicine.
Black pepper is the संसार 's सबसे traded spice.
It is one of the most common spices added to यूरोपीय भोजन और इसके descendants.
The spiciness of black pepper is due to the chemical piperine, not to be उलझन साथ the capsaicin कि देता मांसल peppers theirs.
It is in the modern world, often युग्म साथ नमक.
Fire hydrant in charlottesville, वर्जिनिया, USA
A fire hydrant ( also known colloquially as a fire plug in the United States or as a johnny pump in New York City ), is an active fire protection measure, and a source of water provided in most urban, suburban और ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों साथ नगरपालिका जल सेवा to enable अग्निशमन to tap into the municipal water supply to assist in extinguishing a fire.
Buildings near a hydrant may qualify for an insurance discount since अग्निशमन चाहिए be समर्थ to अधिक rapidly बुझा a आग on the insured property.
the अवधारणा of fire plugs dates to at least the 17th century.
This was a time when firefighters responding to a call would dig down to the लकड़ी जल मेन्स और hastily bore a hole to secure water to fight fires.
The water would fill the hole creating a temporary well, और be transported इससे the खूब to the fire by bucket brigades or, later, by hand-pumped fire engines.
The holes were then plugged with stoppers, सामान्यतः redwood, जिससे over समय आए to be known as fire plugs.
The स्थान of the प्लग होता प्रायः be अंकित or marked so that it could be reused in future fires.
This is the source of the colloquial term fire प्लग स्टिल प्रयुक्त लिये आग hydrants आज.
After the Great Fire of London in 1666, the city installed water mains with holes drilled at intervals, equipped with risers, allowing an अभिगम पाइंट to the wooden fire plugs from street level.
the आविष्कार of a post- or pillar-type आग hydrant is generally credited to Frederick Graff Sr., Chief Engineer of the Philadelphia Water Works around the year 1801.
It had a combination hose/faucet outlet and was of `` wet barrel '' डिज़ाइन साथ the वाल्व in the शीर्ष.
It is said that Graff held the first patent for a fire hydrant, but this can not be सत्यापित क्युकी the पेटेंट दफ्तर in वॉशिंगटन d.C. caught on fire in 1836 destroying many patent records from that period in the process.
The President of the Republic of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी is the सिर of राज्य और सिर of सरकारी अंतर्गत South Africa 's Constitution.
From 1961 to 1994, the head of राज्य थी पुकारा the State President.
The President is elected by members of the National Assembly, the lower house of Parliament, and is usually the leader of the largest party, which has been the African National कॉंग्रेस चूंकि the पहला non-racial चुनावों यहूद आयोजित on 27 अप्रैल 1994.
The role was originally founded to be distinct from the now defunct role of प्रधान मंत्री, लकिन the दो भूमिकाएँ यहूद मिलाया in the 1983 constitution which specified a four-year term of office.
The 1993 and later constitutions limits the president 's समय in दफ्तर to दो five-year शर्तें.
The first President to be elected under the new constitution was Nelson Mandela, and the लाज़िम अध्यक्ष is याक़ूब Zuma.
Under the interim Constitution ( valid from 1994 to 1996 ), there was a Government of National Unity, in जिससे an mp इससे the largest विपक्ष पार्टी थी हकदार to a स्थिति as Deputy President.
Along with Thabo Mbeki, the last State President, F.W. De Klerk also served as Deputy अध्यक्ष, in उसके क्षमता as the नेता of the नेशनल पार्टी जिससे was the second-largest party in the new Parliament.
But De Klerk later resigned और गई into opposition with his party.
A voluntary coalition सरकारी continues to मौजूद अंतर्गत the नई संविधान ( adopted in 1996 ), although there have been no appointments of opposition politicians to the post of deputy president.
Special education or special needs शिक्षा is the शिक्षा of विद्यार्थी with special needs in a way that addresses the students ' individual differences and needs.
Ideally, this process involves the individually planned and systematically monitored arrangement of teaching procedures, adapted equipment and materials, accessible settings, and other interventions designed to सहायता learners साथ खास needs achieve a उच्चतर स्तर of निजी self-sufficiency और कामयाबी in स्कूल और जातियाँ than होता be उपलब्धियाँ if the student were only given access to a typical classroom education.
Common special needs include challenges with learning, communication challenges, emotional and behavioral विकार, शारीरिक disabilities, और developmental disorders.
Students with these kinds of special needs are likely to benefit from अतिरिक्त शैक्षणिक सेवाएं ऐसे as अलग approaches to teaching, use of technology, a specifically adapted teaching area, or resource room.
Intellectual giftedness is a difference in learning and can also benefit from specialized teaching techniques or different शैक्षणिक कार्यक्रम, लकिन the पद `` खास शिक्षा '' is generally प्रयुक्त to specifically indicate निर्देश of विद्यार्थी जिनकी खास needs reduce उनके क्षमता to सीख independently or in an ordinary कक्षा, और gifted education is handled separately.
In most developed countries, शिक्षक हैं modifying शिक्षण विधि और environments so कि the maximum number of students are served in general education environments.
खास शिक्षा in विकसित देशों is प्रायः regarded कम as a `` place '' and more as `` a range of services, available in every school. ''
Integration can reduce social stigmas और improve अकादमिक achievement for many students.
The opposite of special शिक्षा is सामान्य शिक्षा.
General education is the मानक curriculum presented with standard teaching methods and without additional supports.
George Soros ( or ; ; ; born August 12, 1930, as Schwartz György ) is a hungarian-american कारोबार महारथी, निवेशकों, और लोकसेवक.
He is the अध्यक्ष of सोरोस निधि Management.
Soros supports progressive-liberal causes.
He is ज्ञात as `` the man जो broke the बैंको of England `` because of his in investment profits during the 1992 Black Wednesday UK currency crisis.
Between 1979 and 2011, Soros gave away over $ 8 अरब to इंसान अधिकारों, public health, and education causes.
He played a significant role in the peaceful transition from communism to capitalism in Hungary ( 1984–89 ) and provided one of Europe 's largest उच्चतर शिक्षा endowments to सेंट्रल European University in Budapest.
Soros is also the chairman of the खोलें समाज संस्थान.
An actor portraying Alexander ग्राहम घंटी बोलना into an early model telephone.
The invention of the telephone is the culmination of work done by many individuals, the इतिहास of जिससे involves a संग्रहण of दावा और counterclaims.
the विकास of the आधुनिक विद्युत टेलीफोन शामिल an array of lawsuits founded upon the patent claims of several individuals and numerous companies.
This article covers the early years from 1844 to 1898, इससे धारणा of the विचार of an इलेक्ट्रिक voice-transmission यंत्र, to विफल कोशिशें to उपयोग `` make-and-break '' current, to successful experiments with electromagnetic telephones by Alexander Graham Bell and Thomas Watson, and finally to commercially successful telephones in the late 19th century.
A Master of Fine Arts ( MFA, M.F.A. ) is a graduate degree typically requiring 2–3 सालो of postgraduate पढ़ाई परे the स्नातक 's degree ( BFA ), although the term of study will vary by country or by university.
The MFA is a creative degree usually awarded as a टर्मिनल उपाधि in विज़ुअल कला, रचनात्मक लिखने, filmmaking, dance, or theatre and other performing arts.
coursework is primarily of an applied or performing nature with the program often culminating in a major work or performance.
Master of Fine Arts programs have generally जरूरी a स्नातक 's उपाधि prior to प्रवेश, लकिन अनेक do नहीं आवश्यकता that the undergraduate major be the same as the MFA field of study.
The most important admissions आवश्यकता रै प्रायः महरूम a नमूना portfolio or a performance audition.
The Master of Fine Arts differs from the Master of Arts in that the MFA, while an academic program, centers around practice in the particular field, whereas कार्यक्रम अग्रणी to the ma प्रायः बीच on the scholarly, अकादमिक, or नाजुक study of the field.
Additionally, in the United States, an MFA is recognized as a टर्मिनल उपाधि लिये practitioners of विज़ुअल आर्ट, डिज़ाइन, नृत्य, थिएटर, film/video, नई मीडिया, और रचनात्मक लिखने - अर्थ कि it is माना to be the highest degree in its field, and is used as a minimum qualification to be able to apply to become a Full-Time Professor teaching at the University level in these disciplines.
There are अपवाद to इस मानक in the कला, notably in the मामला of म्यूज़िक प्रदर्शन, जहाँ the MFA is not seen as a terminal degree in the context of the more standardized DMA degree.
It is also critical to note that in the interest of extending the कनेक्शन between रचनात्मक उत्पादन और जारी अकादमिक research, some universities have established practice-based Ph.D programs in fields such as creative writing, visual arts, new media, design and theater.
While this has had an effect in Creative Writing, and to a lesser extent in design and new media, the influx of graduates इससे practice-based phd कार्यक्रम रै नहीं appreciably बदला the मानक for the MFA as the terminal degree in most Arts disciplines yet.
This is an ongoing contentious topic, and is the बारंबार विषय of अकादमिक panels, especially at the annual College Art Association conference.
The CAA 2008 दिशानिर्देश regarding the mfa strongly re-affirms that the PhD is not required as a terminal degree in the visual arts.
The atomic bombings of the cities of Hiroshima and Nagasaki in Japan were conducted by the संयुक्त राज्य दौरान the फाइनल stages of World War II in 1945.
The two कार्यक्रम हैं the तभी उपयोग of nuclear weapons in war to date.
Following a firebombing campaign that नष्ट अनेक जापानी शहरों, the allies prepared लिये a costly आक्रमण of जापानी.
The war in Europe ended when Nazi जर्मनी हस्ताक्षरित इसके यंत्र of surrender on 8 May, but the Pacific War continued.
Together with the United Kingdom and the Republic of China, the United States called for a आत्मसमर्पण of जापानी in the पॉट्सडैम घोषणा on 26 जुलाई 1945, threatening Japan with `` prompt and utter destruction ''.
the जापानी सरकारी उपेक्षित इस ultimatum, और the United States deployed two nuclear weapons developed by the Manhattan Project.
American airmen dropped छोटी लड़के on the city of Hiroshima on 6 August 1945, followed by Fat Man over Nagasaki on 9 August.
Within the first two to चार महीने of the bombings, the acute effects killed 90,000–166,000 people in Hiroshima and 60,000–80,000 in Nagasaki, with roughly half of the deaths in each city occurring on the first day.
The Hiroshima prefecture health department estimated that, of the people who died on the day of the explosion, 60 % died from flash or flame burns, 30 % इससे गिरना मलबा और 10 % इससे अन्य कल्याणकारी.
During the following months, large numbers died from the effect of burns, विकिरण बीमारी, और अन्य चोटों, compounded by illness.
In a US estimate of the कुल तात्कालिक और छोटी पद कारण of मौत, 15–20 % died from radiation sickness, 20–30 % from burns, and 50–60 % from other injuries, compounded by illness.
In both cities, most of the dead were नागरिकों, हालांकि हिरोशिमा था a sizeable garrison.
On 15 August, six days after the bombing of Nagasaki, Japan announced its surrender to the Allies, signing the Instrument of Surrender on 2 September, officially समाप्ति संसार युद्ध II.
The bombings led, in part, to post-war जापानी 's adopting तीन non-nuclear सिद्धान्त, forbidding the nation from nuclear armament.
The role of the bombings in Japan 's surrender and their नैतिक औचित्य हैं स्टिल debated.
Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi ( ; 2 October 1869 – 30 जनवरी 1948 ), commonly ज्ञात as महात्मा गांधी, थी the preeminent leader of Indian nationalism in British-ruled India.
Employing non-violent civil disobedience, Gandhi led India to independence and inspired आंदोलनों लिये non-violence, सिविल अधिकारों और स्वतंत्रता आरपार the world.
The son of a senior government official, Gandhi was born and raised in a Hindu bania जातियाँ in तटीय गुजरात, और प्रशिक्षित in law in London.
Gandhi became famous by fighting for the civil rights of Muslim and Hindu Indians in South अफ़्रीकी, using नई तकनीकों of non-violent सिविल disobedience that he developed.
returning to इण्डिया in 1915, he set about organising peasants to protest excessive land-taxes.
A lifelong opponent of `` सांप्रदायिकता `` ( i.e. basing politics on religion ) he reached out widely to all religious groups.
he became a नेता of मुसलमान protesting the declining status of the Caliphate.
Assuming leadership of the Indian National Congress in 1921, Gandhi led nationwide campaigns for easing poverty, expanding women 's rights, building religious and ethnic amity, ending untouchability, increasing आर्थिक self-reliance, और ऊपर सब लिये achieving स्वराज —the स्वतंत्रता of India from British domination.
Gandhi led इंडियंस in protesting the नेशनल नमक कर साथ the Dandi Salt March in 1930, and later in demanding the British to immediately Quit India in 1942, during World War II.
He was imprisoned for that और लिये numerous अन्य राजनैतिक offenses over the years.
Gandhi sought to अभ्यास non-violence और सच्चाई in all situations, and advocated that others do the same.
He saw the गांवों as the कोर of the सच्चा इण्डिया और प्रचारित self-sufficiency ; he did not support the industrialization programs of his disciple Jawaharlal Nehru.
He lived modestly in a self-sufficient आवासीय जातियाँ and wore the traditional Indian dhoti and shawl, woven with yarn he had hand spun on a charkha.
His chief political enemy in ब्रिटेन थी विंस्टन चर्चिल, जो ridiculed him as a `` half-naked fakir. ''
He was a dedicated vegetarian, and undertook long fasts as means of both self-purification and political mobilization.
In his last year, unhappy at the partition of India, Gandhi worked to stop the carnage between मुसलमान, हिन्दुओं और सिखों कि raged in the किनारा क्षेत्रफल between India and Pakistan.
He was assassinated on 30 January 1948 by Nathuram Godse who thought गांधी थी too सहानुभूतिपूर्ण to India 's Muslims.
30 जनवरी is observed as Martyrs ' Day in India.
The honorific महात्मा ( `` ग्रेट आत्मा '' ) थी लागू to him by 1914.
In इण्डिया he थी also called Bapu ( `` Father '' ).
He is known in India as the Father of the Nation ; his birthday, 2 October, is commemorated there as Gandhi Jayanti, a national holiday, and world-wide as the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Day of Non-Violence.
Gandhi 's philosophy was not सैद्धांतिक लकिन एक of व्यावहारिकतावाद, कि is, practicing his principles in the moment.
Asked to give a message to the people, he होता respond, `` my जीवन is my संदेश. ''
Joan Crawford ( March 23, ca. 1904 – May 10, 1977 ), born Lucille Fay lesueur, थी an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री in फिल्मी, टेलीविज़न और theatre.
Starting as a dancer in traveling theatrical companies पहले debuting on ब्रॉडवे, क्रॉफर्ड थी हस्ताक्षरित to a गति चित्र अनुबंध by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer in 1925.
Initially frustrated by the size and quality of her parts, Crawford began a campaign of self-publicity and became nationally known as a flapper by the end of the 1920s.
In the 1930s, क्रॉफर्ड 's कीर्ति rivaled, and later outlasted, MGM colleagues Norma Shearer and Greta Garbo.
Crawford often played मेहनती यंग महिलाओं जो ढूँढें रोमांस and financial success.
ये `` rags-to-riches '' कहानियां यहूद खूब प्राप्त by Depression -era audiences and were popular with women.
क्रॉफर्ड became एक of हॉलीवुड 's सबसे prominent फिल्म सितारों and one of the highest paid women in the United States, but her films began losing money and by the end of the 1930s she was labeled `` box office poison ''.
After an absence of nearly two years from the screen, Crawford staged a comeback by starring in Mildred Pierce ( 1945 ), लिये जिससे वो जीती the Academy Award for Best Actress.
In 1955, she became शामिल साथ the pepsi-cola Company through her marriage to company Chairman Alfred Steele.
After his death in 1959, Crawford was elected to fill his vacancy on the फलक of निर्देशकों लकिन थी forcibly रिटायर्ड in 1973.
She continued acting in film and television regularly through the 1960s, जब उसके प्रदर्शन became कम ; बाद the रिलीज of the अंग्रेजों horror film Trog in 1970, Crawford retired from the screen.
following a पब्लिक रूप in 1974, बाद जिससे unflattering छायाचित्र यहूद प्रकाशित, Crawford withdrew from public life and became increasingly reclusive until her death in 1977.
क्रॉफर्ड शादीशुदा चार times.
Her first three marriages ended in तलाक ; the पिछला ended with the death of husband Alfred Steele.
She adopted five children, one of whom was reclaimed by उसके जनम माँ.
Crawford 's relationships with her two older children, क्रिस्टीना और क्रिस्टोफर, यहूद acrimonious.
Crawford disinherited the two and, after Crawford 's death, Christina wrote a `` tell-all '' संस्मरण, mommie dearest, in which she alleged a lifelong pattern of physical and emotional abuse perpetrated by Crawford.
She was voted the tenth greatest female star in the history of American cinema by the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान.

1903 lanchester rear-door Tonneau
Tonneau cover ( or ) describes a मुश्किल or नरम कवर used to protect unoccupied passenger seats in a convertible or roadster, or the cargo bed in a pickup truck.
Hard tonneau covers open by a hinging or फोल्डिंग यांत्रिकी while soft covers open by rolling up.
The tonneau cover is प्रयुक्त to छिपाते कार्गो.
When the cover is pulled out, it keeps items out of the sun and provides extra सुरक्षा by keeping निजी वस्तुएं आउट of sight, as well as shielding the driver from view.
Twitter is an online social networking service and microblogging service that enables its users to send और पढ़ा text-based संदेश of up to 140 वर्ण, ज्ञात as `` tweets ''.
Twitter was created in March 2006 by Jack Dorsey and by जुलाई, the सोशल नेटवर्किंग site was launched.
The service rapidly gained worldwide popularity, with over 500 लाख पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता as of 2012, generating over 340 लाख tweets daily and handling over 1.6 billion search queries per day.
Since its launch, Twitter has become one of the टेन सबसे visited वेबसाइटों on the अंतरजाल, और रै महरूम described as `` the SMS of the Internet. ''
Unregistered users can read tweets, while registered users can post tweets through the website interface, SMS, or a range of apps for mobile devices.
Twitter Inc. is आधारित in San Francisco, with additional servers and offices in New York City, Boston, and San Antonio.
The Hangover is a 2009 American comedy film, co-produced और निर्देशित by टॉड phillips और लिखा by jon Lucas and Scott Moore.
It is the पहला फिल्मी of the hangover franchise.The film stars Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, Heather Graham, Justin Bartha, and Jeffrey Tambor.
The Hangover tells the story of Phil Wenneck, Stu Price and Alan Garner, who सफर to लास वेगास लिये a स्नातक पार्टी to celebrate उनके dost डग billings ' impending marriage.
However, Phil, Stu and Alan have no memory of the पिछला रात्रि 's कार्यक्रम और जरूर ढूँढें डग पहले the wedding can take place.
Lucas and Moore wrote the script after executive producer क्रिस bender 's dost disappeared और था a विशाल विधेयक after being sent to a strip club.
After Lucas and Moore sold it to the studio for $ 2 million, Philips and Jeremy Garelick rewrote the script to शामिल a बाघ as खूब as a subplot involving a baby और a पुलिस क्रूजर, और भी सहित boxer Mike Tyson.
Filming took place in Nevada for 15 दिनों, और दौरान फिल्मांकन, the तीन प्रमुख अभिनेताओं ( कूपर, helms और Galifianakis ) formed a friendship.
The Hangover was released on June 5, 2009, बनने a नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक success.
It became the tenth-highest-grossing फिल्मी of 2009, साथ a विश्वव्यापी gross of over US $ 467 million.
Critics praised the फिल्मी 's comedic approach but criticized it for its vulgarity.
The film won the Golden Globe Award for Best Motion चित्र – musical or कॉमेडी, और प्राप्त अनेक अन्य accolades.
It is the tenth-highest-grossing फिल्मी of 2009 in the संसार, as खूब as the दूसरी highest-grossing r-rated कॉमेडी कभी in the संयुक्त राज्य, surpassing a record previously held by Beverly Hills Cop for almost 25 years and later being surpassed by Ted in 2012.
Out of all R-rated films, it is the third highest-grossing ever in the u.S., पीछे तभी the जुनून of the मसीह and The Matrix Reloaded.
A sequel, The hangover भाग ii, थी released in 2011, और a तीसरा and final film, The Hangover Part III, is set for release in 2013.
Events involving meiosis, प्रर्दशित chromosomal crossover
Meiosis ( ) is a special type of cell प्रभाग जरुरी लिये यौन जनन in eukaryotes.
The cells produced by meiosis हैं गैमीट or spores.
In many organisms, सहित सब पशु और जमीन पौधे ( लकिन नहीं कुछ other groups such as fungi ), gametes are called sperm and egg cells.
Whilst the process of meiosis bears a क्रमांक of similarities साथ the 'life-cycle ' cell division process of mitosis, it differs in two important respects:
the chromosomes in meiosis undergo a recombination which shuffles the genes producing a different genetic combination in each gamete, compared with the co-existence of each of the two separate pairs of प्रत्येक chromosome ( एक प्राप्त इससे प्रत्येक जनक ) in प्रत्येक कोशिका जिससे परिणाम from mitosis.
the outcome of meiosis is potentially चार ( genetically अद्वितीय ) अगुणित कोशिकाएं, compared with the two ( genetically identical ) diploid cells produced from mitosis.
Meiosis begins with one द्विगुणित कोशिका containing दो नक़ल of प्रत्येक chromosome —one from the organism 's mother and one from its father.
the कोशिका divides twice, potentially producing up to four haploid cells containing one copy of each chromosome.
( `` potentially '' क्युकी in कुछ मामले, ऐसे as the formation of oocytes in mammals, only one of the possible four haploid cells survives. )
In animals the haploid cell resulting from meiosis is a पुरूष or मादा gamete.
Each of the resulting chromosomes in the gamete कोशिकाएं is a अद्वितीय मिश्रण of मातृ और पैतृक डीएनए, resulting in औलाद कि हैं genetically distinct from either parent.
This gives rise to genetic diversity in sexually reproducing populations.
This genetic diversity can provide the विभिन्नता of शारीरिक और behavioural गुण ( phenotypes ) upon जिससे प्राकृतिक चयन can अधिनियम, लकिन, as वर्णित नीचे in खण्ड 6, उत्पत्ति and function of meiosis, the genetic diversity may be largely a by-product of the homologous recombination that is primarily employed for its DNA repair function during meiosis.
It is also noteworthy that during meiosis, specific जीनों हैं अधिक अत्यधिक transcribed, और ये हैं called the meiome, the term used in functional genomics for the meiotic transcriptome.
Meiosis is a key feature for all sexually reproducing eukaryotes in जिससे समजात chromosome pairing, synapse and recombination occur.
In addition to strong meiotic stage-specific expression of mRNA ( the meiome ), however, there are also pervasive translational controls ( e.g. selective usage of preformed mRNA ), regulating the ultimate meiotic stage-specific प्रोटीन अभिव्यक्ति of genes during meiosis.
Thus, both the meiome and translational controls determine the व्यापक restructuring of meiotic कोशिकाएं needed to carry out meiosis.
Prior to the meiosis process the cell 's chromosomes are duplicated by a गोलाकार of डीएनए replication, बनाना इससे the maternal and paternal versions of each chromosome ( homologs ) two exact copies, sister chromatids, attached at the centromere region.
in the शुरूआत of meiosis the maternal and paternal homologs pair to each other.
Then they typically exchange parts by homologous recombination leading to crossovers of डीएनए between the मातृ और पैतृक संस्करण of the chromosome.
spindle मछली bind to the centromeres of each pair of homologs and arrange the pairs at the spindle equator.
Then the fibers pull the recombined homologs to opposite poles of the cell.
As the chromosomes move दूर इससे the बीच the कोशिका divides into दो बेटी कोशिकाएं, प्रत्येक containing a haploid number of chromosomes composed of two chromatids.
After the recombined maternal and पैतृक homologs have अलग into the दो बेटी कोशिकाएं, a second round of cell division occurs.
वहीँ meiosis ends as the दो सिस्टर chromatids making up each homolog are separated and move into one of the four resulting gamete cells.
Upon fertilization, लिये उदाहरण जब a sperm enters an egg cell, two gamete cells produced by meiosis fuse.
The gamete from the mother and the gamete इससे the पिता प्रत्येक योगदान एक हाफ of the set of chromosomes that make up the new offspring 's genome.
Meiosis uses many of the same mechanisms as mitosis, a type of कोशिका प्रभाग प्रयुक्त by eukaryotes जैसे पौधे और पशु to विभाजित one cell into two identical daughter cells.
In all plants and in many protists meiosis results in the formation of बीजाणुओं : अगुणित कोशिकाएं कि can divide vegetatively without undergoing fertilization.
Boxing ( pugilism, prize fighting, the sweet science or in Greek pygmachia ) is a martial art and combat खेल in जिससे दो लोगों engage in a प्रतियोगिता of शक्ति, गति, reflexes, endurance and will by throwing punches with gloved hands.
Amateur boxing is an ओलम्पिक और राष्ट्रमंडल खेल और is a आम fixture in सबसे of the प्रमुख अंतरराष्ट्रीय खेल - it also has its own World Championships.
Boxing is supervised by a referee over a श्रेणी of one- to three-minute intervals called rounds.
The result is decided when an opponent is deemed incapable to continue by a रेफरी, is disqualified लिये तोड़कर a नियम, resigns by फेंकना in a तौलिया, or is सुनाया the विजेता or loser based on the judges ' scorecards at the end of the contest.
The birth hour of boxing as a sport may be its acceptance by the प्राचीन यूनानियों as an ओलम्पिक खेल as early as 688 BC.
Boxing evolved इससे 16th- और 18th-century prizefights, largely in ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, to the forerunner of आधुनिक मुक्केबाज़ी in the mid-19th century, again initially in Great Britain and later in the United States.
In 2004, ESPN ranked मुक्केबाज़ी as the सबसे मुश्किल sport in the world.
Agreement or concord happens when a word changes form depending on the other शब्द to जिससे it relates.
It is an instance of inflection, and usually involves making the value of some grammatical category ( such as gender or person ) `` agree '' between अलग शब्द or भाग of the वाक्य.
For example, in Standard English, एक may कह i am or he is, लकिन not `` I is '' or `` he am ''.
This is क्युकी the व्याकरण of the भाषा requires that the verb and its subject agree in person.
The pronouns I and he are first and third व्यक्ति क्रमशः, as हैं the क्रिया फ़ॉर्म am and is.
The verb form must be selected so that it has the वही व्यक्ति as the subject.
The agreement based on overt व्याकरणिक श्रेणी as ऊपर is औपचारिक अनुबंध, in contrast to notional agreement, which is based on meaning.
For instance, the phrase The United States is treated as singular for उद्देश्य of अनुबंध, भी हालांकि it is formally plural.
This is a list of places below mean sea स्तर कि हैं on land.
Places in tunnels, mines, basements, dug holes ( also with open sky ), under water, under ice, or मौजूदा temporarily as a परिणाम of ebbing of समुद्र tide etc. are not included.
All आंकड़े are in meters below sea level:
Debbie Macomber ( born October 22, 1948 in Yakima, Washington ) is a best-selling अमरीकी लेखक of over 150 रोमांस novels और समकालीन महिलाओं 's fiction.
Over 140 million copies of her books हैं in छपाई throughout the world, and four have become made-for-TV-movies.
Macomber was the inaugural winner of the fan-voted Quill Award for रोमांस in 2005 और रै महरूम awarded दोनो a रोमांस लेखक of अमेरिका रीता and a lifetime achievement award by the Romance Writers of America.
Catonsville is a census-designated place ( CDP ) in बाल्टीमोर काउंटी, मेरीलैंड, संयुक्त राज्य.
the जनसांख्यिकी was 41,567 at the 2010 census.
The community lies to the वेस्ट of बाल्टीमोर साथ the नगर 's किनारा.
Catonsville is the home of the University of Maryland, Baltimore County ( UMBC ), a public शोध विश्वविद्यालयों साथ over 12,000 students.
A lawyer, according to Black 's Law शब्दकोष, is `` a person learned in the law ; as an attorney, counsel or solicitor ; a person who is practicing law. ''
Law is the प्रणाली of नियम of conduct स्थापित by the sovereign सरकारी of a society to correct wrongs, maintain the stability of political and social authority, and deliver justice.
Working as a lawyer involves the व्यावहारिक अनुप्रयोग of अमूर्त legal theories and knowledge to solve specific individualized problems, or to advance the interests of those who retain ( i.e., hire ) lawyers to perform legal services.
The role of the lawyer varies significantly across legal jurisdictions, और so it can be treated यहाँ in तभी the सबसे general terms.
Vector Marketing is the domestic बिक्री भुजा of cutco निगम, an olean, नई York based cutlery manufacturer.
The Family और चिकित्सा छोड़ अधिनियम of 1993 ( fmla ) is a संयुक्त States federal law requiring covered employers to provide employees job-protected and unpaid leave for qualified medical and family reasons.
Qualified medical and family reasons include : निजी or परिवार बीमारी, परिवार सैन्य छोड़, गर्भावस्था, अपनाना, or the foster care placement of a child.
the fmla is administered by the Wage and Hour Division of the United States Department of Labor.
The bill was a major part of President विधेयक क्लिंटन 's कार्यसूची in his first term.
President Clinton हस्ताक्षरित the विधेयक into विधि on फ़रवरी 5, 1993 ( ; 29 u.s.c. sec. 2601 ; 29 CFR 825 ) and it took effect on August 5, 1993, six months later.
The FMLA was intended `` to balance the demands of the कार्यस्थल साथ the needs of families. ''
The Act allows eligible employees to take up to 12 work weeks of unpaid leave दौरान कोई 12-month काल to attend to the गंभीर स्वास्थ्य कंडीशन of the कर्मचारी, जनक, जीवनसाथी or child, or for pregnancy or care of a newborn child, or for adoption or foster care of a child.
In order to be eligible for FMLA leave, an employee must have been at the business at least 12 months, and worked at least 1,250 घंटों over the पास्ट 12 महीने, और कार्य at a स्थान जहाँ the company employs 50 or more employees within 75 miles.
the fmla कवर दोनो public- और private-sector कर्मचारी, but certain categories of employees are excluded, including elected officials and their personal staff members.
The Vietnam War ( ) was a Cold War -era military conflict that occurred in Vietnam, Laos, और कंबोडिया इससे 1 नवम्बर 1955 to the पतन of साइगॉन on 30 अप्रैल 1975.
This war followed the First Indochina War and was fought between North Vietnam, समर्थित by इसके कम्युनिस्ट allies, और the government of South Vietnam, supported by the United States and other anti-communist countries.
The Viet Cong ( also known as the National Liberation Front, or NLF ), a lightly armed South Vietnamese communist common सामने निर्देशित by the उत्तर, largely लड़ा a छापामार war against anti-communist forces in the region.
The Vietnam People 's Army ( North Vietnamese Army ) engaged in a more conventional युद्ध, at टाइम्स committing विशाल इकाई into बैटल.
U.S. and South Vietnamese forces relied on air superiority and overwhelming firepower to conduct ढूंढें और नष्ट परिचालन, involving मैदान शक्तियां, artillery, and airstrikes.
The U.S. government viewed involvement in the war as a रास्ता to prevent a कम्युनिस्ट कब्ज़ा of दक्षिण वियतनाम as part of their wider strategy of containment.
The North Vietnamese government and Viet Cong were fighting to reunify वियतनाम अंतर्गत कम्युनिस्ट rule.
They viewed the conflict as a colonial war, लड़ा initially विरूद्ध फ़्रांस, समर्थित by the u.S., और बाद विरूद्ध दक्षिण वियतनाम, जिससे it regarded as a U.S. puppet state.
अमरीकी सैन्य advisors arrived in what was then French Indochina beginning in 1950.
U.S. involvement escalated in the जल्दी 1960s, with troop levels tripling in 1961 and tripling again in 1962.
U.S. combat units were तैनात शुरूआत in 1965.
Operations spanned international borders, with लाओस और कंबोडिया heavily bombed.
American involvement in the war peaked in 1968, at the समय of the Tet Offensive.
After this, U.S. ground forces were gradually withdrawn as part of a नीति ज्ञात as vietnamization.
Despite the Paris Peace Accords, signed by all पार्टियों in जनवरी 1973, लड़ जारी.
U.S. military involvement ended on 15 अगस्त 1973 as a परिणाम of the Case–Church Amendment passed by the U.S. Congress.
The capture of Saigon by the वियतनाम लोगों 's फौज in अप्रैल 1975 चिह्नित the end of the war, and North and South Vietnam were reunified the following year.
the युद्ध exacted a विशाल इंसान लागत in terms of fatalities ( see Vietnam War casualties ).
estimates of the क्रमांक of वियतनामी सैनिको and civilians killed vary from 800,000 to 3.1 million.
Some 200,000–300,000 Cambodians, 20,000–200,000 Laotians, and 58,220 u.S. सेवा सदस्यों भी died in the conflict.
Cleveland ज्वालामुखी in the Aleutian Islands of Alaska photographed from the International Space Station, May 2006.
Ash plumes पहुँचे a ऊँचाई of 19 km दौरान the climactic eruption at Mount Pinatubo, Philippines in 1991.
A volcano is an opening, or rupture, in a planet 's सतह or क्रस्ट, जिससे allows hot मैग्मा, volcanic ash and gases to escape from the magma chamber below the surface.
Volcanoes are generally found जहाँ tectonic प्लेटों हैं diverging or converging.
A mid-oceanic ridge, for example the mid-atlantic लकीरें, रै उदाहरण of ज्वालामुखी caused by अपसारी tectonic प्लेटों pulling अलावा ; the Pacific Ring of Fire has examples of volcanoes caused by convergent tectonic plates coming together.
By contrast, volcanoes are usually not created जहाँ दो tectonic प्लेटों slide past one another.
ज्वालामुखी can भी रूप जहाँ वहीँ is stretching और thinning of the धरती 's क्रस्ट in the interiors of plates, e.g., in the East African Rift, the Wells Gray-Clearwater volcanic field and the Rio Grande Rift in North America.
This type of volcanism falls under the umbrella of `` थाली परिकल्पना '' volcanism.
Volcanism दूर इससे थाली boundaries has also been explained as mantle plumes.
These so-called `` हॉटस्पॉट ``, लिये उदाहरण हवाई, हैं postulated to arise from upwelling diapirs with magma from the core–mantle boundary, 3,000 km deep in the Earth.
Erupting volcanoes can पोज़ अनेक जोखिमों, नहीं only in the immediate vicinity of the eruption.
Volcanic ash can be a threat to वायुयान, in particular those साथ जेट इंजन जहाँ राख अणु can be melted by the high operating temperature.
Large eruptions can affect तापमान as राख और droplets of sulfuric एसिड अस्पष्ट the सूर्य और कूल the धरती 's lower atmosphere or troposphere ; however, they also absorb heat radiated up from the Earth, thereby warming the stratosphere.
Historically, so-called volcanic सर्दियों have caused catastrophic famines.
A deep pothole on नई यॉर्क नगर 's Second Avenue
A pothole ( sometimes पुकारा a केतली और ज्ञात in भाग of the पश्चिमी संयुक्त राज्य as a chuckhole ) is a type of disruption in the surface of a roadway where a portion of the road material has broken away, leaving a hole.
Renal cell carcinoma ( RCC, also known as hypernephroma ) is a kidney cancer that originates in the lining of the proximal convoluted tubule, the बहुत छोटी tubes in the गुर्दा कि हस्तांतरण gf ( glomerular filtrate ) from the glomerulus to the descending limb of the nephron.
RCC is the most common type of गुर्दा कर्कट in वयस्कों, जिम्मेदार for approximately 80 % of cases.
It is भी ज्ञात to be the सबसे lethal of all the genitourinary tumors.
Initial treatment is most commonly a कट्टरपंथी or आंशिक nephrectomy और remains the mainstay of curative treatment.
जहाँ the ट्यूमर is confined to the renal parenchyma, the 5-year survival rate is 60-70 %, but this is lowered considerably where metastases have spread.
It is relatively resistant to radiation चिकित्सा और कीमोथेरेपी, although some cases respond to immunotherapy.
Targeted cancer therapies such as sunitinib, temsirolimus, bevacizumab, interferon-alpha, और sorafenib have improved the outlook for RCC.

The company has its मुख्यालय in midtown मैनहटन, New York City.
The peritoneum ( ) is the serous झिल्ली कि फ़ॉर्म the अस्तर of the abdominal गुहा or the coelom —it कवर सबसे of the intra-abdominal ( or coelomic ) organs—in amniotes and some invertebrates ( annelids, for instance ).
It is composed of a परत of mesothelium समर्थित by a thin layer of connective tissue.
The peritoneum दोनो supports the abdominal अंगों और serves as a conduit for their blood and lymph vessels and nerves.
The abdominal cavity ( the space bounded by the vertebrae, abdominal मांसपेशियां, diaphragm और श्रोणि floor ) should not be confused with the intraperitoneal space ( located within the abdominal cavity, but wrapped in peritoneum ).
The structures within the intraperitoneal space are called `` intraperitoneal '' ( e.g. the stomach ), the structures in the abdominal cavity that are located behind the intraperitoneal space are called `` retroperitoneal `` ( e.g. the गुर्दे ), और those structures नीचे the intraperitoneal स्पेस हैं पुकारा `` subperitoneal '' or `` infraperitoneal '' ( e.g. the bladder ).
आधुनिक 2.5 '' ssd प्रयुक्त in consumer laptops and desktop computers.
DDR sdram आधारित SSD.
अधिकतम and.
पीसीआई संलग्न io Accelerator SSD
PCI-E, DRAM, and नन्द आधारित SSD.
It uses an बाह्य शक्ति सप्लाई to मेक the dram non-volatile.
A solid-state drive ( SSD ) ( also known as a solid-state डिस्क or इलेक्ट्रॉनिक डिस्क, हालांकि it contains no वास्तविक `` डिस्क '' of कोई दयालु ) is a आंकड़ा storage device using integrated circuit assemblies as memory to store data persistently.
SSD technology uses electronic अंतरफलक संगत साथ परंपरागत ब्लाक input/output ( I/O ) hard disk drives.
SSDs have no moving mechanical components, which distinguish them from traditional electromechanical magnetic disks such as hard disk ड्राइव ( hdds ) or फ्लॉपी डिस्क, जिससे contain घूम डिस्क और movable read/write heads.
Compared with electromechanical disks, SSDs are typically less susceptible to physical शॉक, much quieter, have निम्नतर अभिगम time, and less latency.
However, while the price of SSDs has जारी to मनाही in 2012, ssds हैं still about 7 to 8 times more expensive per unit of storage than HDDs.
Many SSDs use I/O interfaces developed for मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव, यूँ permitting simple replacement in common applications.
, most SSDs उपयोग nand-based flash memory, which retains data without power.
For applications requiring fast access, but not necessarily data persistence after शक्ति घाटा, ssds may be constructed इससे random-access memory ( RAM ).
Such devices may employ separate power sources, such as batteries, to maintain आंकड़ा बाद शक्ति loss.
Hybrid ड्राइव or ठोस राज्य संकर ड्राइव ( sshd ) combine the सुविधाएँ of ssds and HDDs in the same unit, containing a large hard disk drive and an SSD cache to improve performance of frequently accessed data.
These devices may प्रस्ताव near-ssd प्रदर्शन for many applications.
Salmon roe ( left ) and sturgeon caviar ( right ) served साथ माँ of पर्ल caviar spoons to avoid tainting the taste of the caviar.
