Caviar, according to the खाना और कृषि संगठन, is a उत्पाद made from salt-cured fish-eggs of the Acipenseridae family.
The roe can be `` भैस '' ( non-pasteurized ) or pasteurized, with pasteurization reducing its culinary and economic value.
Traditionally the term caviar refers only to roe इससे जंगली sturgeon in the कैस्पियन और ब्लैक Seas ( Beluga, Ossetra and Sevruga caviars ).
Depending on the देश, caviar may भी be प्रयुक्त to describe the roe of other fish such as salmon, steelhead, trout, lumpfish, whitefish, and other species of sturgeon.
Caviar is माना a लक्ज़री कोमलता और is eaten as a garnish or a spread.
In 2012, caviar बेची लिये $ 2,500 प्रति pound, or $ 3,000 to $ 5,500 per kilo.
The SEC Network is a television अनुप्रयोग संजाल featuring सजीव प्रसारण of college football and basketball events from the Southeastern Conference.
It is owned and operated by ESPN Plus and is shown in more than 50 percent of households in the संयुक्त राज्य, ज़्यादातर southeastern संयुक्त राज्य markets.
The SEC Network typically airs in the noon eastern स्लॉट कि थी पूर्व घर to the Raycom Sports SEC game of the week.
Games are shown locally on broadcast stations, regional sports networks, as खूब as on ईएसपीएन gameplan, ईएसपीएन पूरा अदालत, and ESPN3.com.
The SEC Network is also available in Canada via अटलांटा 's wpch-tv.
The SEC संजाल उपयोग the वही on-screen ग्राफिक्स currently used by ESPN on ABC, a version of ESPN 's graphics package.
SEC Network 's football programming still uses a title safe area because most of its affiliates do not letterbox उनके मानक परिभाषा फ़ीड्स, जबकि ईएसपीएन 's टेलीविज़न संजाल have अनुमत उनके ग्राफिक्स to abandon the title safe, but letterbox for SD viewers.
Starting with the SEC 2012 Basketball season, SEC संजाल 's ग्राफिक्स have महरूम परिवर्तित to a 16:9 Widescreen-only format.
This is also being used for the 2013 Basketball season, but had still adapted the पूर्व 4:3-safe ग्राफिक्स स्वरूप लिये the 2012 सेक फ़ुटबॉल season.
The 1990s, pronounced and also known as `` the Nineteen-Nineties '' or abbreviated as `` the nineties '' or `` the '90s '', थी a दशक कि began on जनवरी 1, 1990, और ended on December 31, 1999.
It was the 10th and last decade of the 20th century and the 100th और पिछला दशक of the 2nd millennium.
The decade is best known for the end of the Cold War at the beginning of the decade and the expansion and व्यावसायीकरण of the अंतरजाल दौरान the second half of the decade.
In much of the वेस्ट the 1990s is remembered as a काल of unprecedented सलाम और prosperity, though many parts of the so-called Third World faced various problems including genocide, AIDS and new or continuing ethnic tensions and civil wars.
Culturally speaking the decade was characterized by the rise of बहुसंस्कृतिवाद और वैकल्पिक media.
Movements such as grunge, the rave scene and hip hop spread around the world to यंग लोगों दौरान the दशक, aided by then-new प्रौद्योगिकी ऐसे as केबल television and the Internet.
A combination of factors, including the mass mobilization of capital markets through neoliberalism, the शुरूआत of the फैली अप्रसार of नई मीडिया ऐसे as the Internet, and the dissolution of the Soviet Union led to a realignment and reconsolidation of economic and political power across the world, and within countries.
Income inequality among countries in the world rose sharply between the 1980s and the mid-1990s, पहले levelling बंद और तब गिरना after 2000.
New ethnic conflicts emerged in Africa, the Balkans and the Caucasus, the पूर्व दो जिससे led to the rwandan नरसंहार and Bosnian genocide, respectively.
The United States began its वर्तमान सैन्य occupation of the मध्य ईस्ट दौरान the summer of 1990 with Desert Shield after it cut off a large portion of the world 's petroleum supply.
Signs of any resolution of tensions between Israel and the अरब संसार remained elusive, हालांकि the आयरिश परेशानियों आए to a standstill in 1998 with the Good Friday Agreement after 30 years of violence.
The gray wolf or धूसर भेड़िया ( canis lupus ) is a प्रजाति of canid native to the wilderness and remote areas of North America, Eurasia, and North Africa.
It is the largest member of its परिवार, साथ males averaging, and females.
It is समान in सामान्य रूप और proportions to a German shepherd, or sled dog, but has a larger head, narrower chest, longer legs, straighter tail and bigger paws.
Its winter fur is long and bushy, and predominantly a mottled gray in colour, हालांकि nearly pure श्वेत, रेड, or भूरा to black also occur.
Within the genus Canis, the gray wolf represents a more specialised and progressive form than its smaller cousins ( the coyote and golden jackal ), as demonstrated by its morphological adaptations to शिकार विशाल शिकार, its more gregarious nature and its highly advanced expressive behavior.
it is a सोशल एनिमल, यात्राएं in nuclear families consisting of a mated pair, accompanied by the pair 's adult offspring.
The gray wolf is typically an apex predator throughout इसके दायरा, साथ तभी इंसानो और tigers posing a serious threat to it.
It feeds primarily on large ungulates, though it also eats छोटी पशु, पशुधन, carrion, and garbage.
The gray wolf is one of the world 's most well researched animals, with संभवतः अधिक किताबे लिखा परिचय it than कोई अन्य वन्यजीव प्रजाति.
It has a long इतिहास of संघ साथ इंसानो, having महरूम despised और hunted in most agricultural communities due to its attacks on livestock, while conversely being respected by some Native American tribes.
It is the sole ancestor of the dog, जिससे थी पहला domesticated in the Middle East.
Although the fear of भेड़ियों is प्रचलित in अनेक इंसान समाजों, the बहुमत of recorded attacks on people have been attributed to animals suffering from rabies.
non-rabid भेड़ियों have attacked और मारे लोगों, मुख्यतः children, लकिन इस is असामान्य, as wolves are relatively few, live away from people, and have been taught to fear humans by hunters and shepherds.
Hunting and trapping has reduced the species ' range to, though its still relatively widespread range and stable population means that the species is not threatened at a global स्तर, और is इसलिए वर्गीकृत by the आईयूसीएन as तनिक चिंता.
The Roman Empire ( ) was the post- Republican period of the ancient Roman civilization, characterised by an निरंकुश रूप of सरकारी और विशाल territorial holdings around the भूमध्यसागरीय in यूरोपीय, Africa, and Asia.
The 500-year-old Roman Republic, which preceded it, had been destabilized through a श्रेणी of सिविल wars.
Several events marked the transition from Republic to Empire, including Julius Caesar 's appointment as perpetual तानाशाह ( 44 bc ) ; the बैटल of actium ( 31 bc ) ; और the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the Roman Senate ( 27 BC ).
The first two centuries of the Empire यहूद a काल of unprecedented stability and prosperity known as the Pax Romana ( `` Roman Peace '' ).
it पहुँचे इसके महानतम expanse during the reign of Trajan ( 98–117 AD ).
In the 3rd सदी, the साम्राज्य underwent a संकट कि threatened its existence, but was reunified and stabilized under the emperors Aurelian and Diocletian.
Christians rose to शक्ति in the 4th सदी, दौरान जिससे समय a system of dual rule was developed in the Latin West and Greek East.
After the collapse of central government in the West in the 5th century, the eastern half जारी as कया होता बाद be ज्ञात as the बीज़ान्टिन Empire.
Because of the Empire 's vast extent and long endurance, the institutions and culture of Rome had a profound and lasting influence on the development of language, religion, architecture, philosophy, law, and forms of सरकारी in the territory it governed, विशेषकर यूरोपीय, and by means of European expansionism throughout the modern world.
Education in the United States is mainly provided by the public sector, with control and funding coming इससे तीन स्तर : लोकल, राज्य, and federal, in that order.
Child education is compulsory, and there are also a large number and wide variety of higher शिक्षा संस्थानों throughout the देश कि एक can चुनें to attend, दोनो सरेआम और privately administered.
पब्लिक शिक्षा is universally available.
School curricula, funding, teaching, नियुक्ति, और अन्य नीतियों हैं नियत through locally निर्वाचित स्कूल boards with jurisdiction over school districts with many directives from state legislatures.
School जिले हैं प्रायः पृथक इससे अन्य local jurisdictions, with independent officials and budgets.
Educational standards and standardized परीक्षण निर्णय हैं प्रायः made by state governments.
The ages for compulsory education vary by राज्य.
It begins from ages five to eight and ends from ages चौदह to अठारह.
Compulsory education requirements can generally be संतुष्ट by educating children in पब्लिक स्कूलों, state-certified private schools, or an approved home school program.
In most public and private schools, education is divided into three स्तर : elementary स्कूल, मध्य स्कूल ( sometimes पुकारा जूनियर ऊँची स्कूल ), और ऊँची स्कूल ( sometimes referred to as secondary education ).
In almost all schools at these levels, children are divided by age groups into grades, ranging इससे किंडरगार्टन ( followed by पहला ग्रेड ) लिये the youngest children in elementary स्कूल, up to बारहवीं grade, the final year of high school.
The exact age range of students in these grade levels varies थोड़ा इससे क्षेत्रफल to area.
Post-secondary education, better known as `` college `` in the United States, is generally governed separately इससे the elementary और ऊँची स्कूल प्रणाली, और is वर्णित in a separate section below.
Government supported, फ़्री पब्लिक स्कूलों लिये सब प्रारंभ होने स्थापित बाद the क्रान्ति, and expanded in the 19th century, as the results of efforts of men like Horace Mann and Booker T. Washington.
by 1870, सब राज्य था फ़्री elementary स्कूलों, albeit only in urban centers.
As the 20th century खींचा nearer, राज्य प्रारंभ गुजर कानून to मेक schooling अनिवार्य, and by 1910, 72 percent of children attended school.
Private schools continued to spread during this time, as well as colleges and—in the ग्रामीण centers— जमीन ग्रान्ट कॉलेजों.
The year of 1910 भी देखी the पहला true high schools.
During the rest of the 20th सदी, शैक्षणिक प्रयत्न केन्द्रित on reducing the inequality of the schooling system.
The landmark Supreme Court case Brown v. Board of Education made the desegregation of elementary and high schools a national प्रधानता, जबकि the pell ग्रान्ट कार्यक्रम helped ग़रीब minorities gain access to college.
Special education थी बना into संघीय law in 1975.
The Elementary and Secondary शिक्षा अधिनियम of 1965 बना मानकीकृत परीक्षण a requirement, and in 1983, a commission was established to evaluate their results and propose a course of action.
The resulting No चाइल्ड बाएँ पीछे अधिनियम of 2001 was controversial and its goals proved to be unrealistic.
A commission established in 2006 evaluated उच्चतर शिक्षा, लकिन इसके सुझाव have yet to be fully implemented.
Paul Bragg ( February 6, 1895 – December 7, 1976 ), nutritionist, थी a पायोनियर in America’s wellness movement.
Health spending per capita, in $ us ppp-adjusted, साथ the US and Canada compared amongst other first world nations.
Comparison of the health care प्रणालियों in कनाडा और the United States are often made by government, public health and public policy analysts.
The two countries had similar health care systems before कनाडा reformed इसके प्रणाली in the 1960s और 1970s.
The United States spends much more money on स्वास्थ्य परवाह than कनाडा, on दोनो a per-capita basis and as a percentage of GDP.
In 2006, per-capita spending for health care in कनाडा थी us $ 3,678 ; in the u.S., US $ 6,714.
The U.S. spent 15.3 % of जीडीपी on स्वास्थ्य परवाह in कि साल ; Canada spent 10.0 %.
In 2006, 70 % of health care spending in Canada was financed by सरकारी, बनाम 46 % in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Total government spending per capita in the U.S. on health care was 23 % उच्चतर than कनाडाई सरकारी बिता, और u.S. सरकारी व्यय on स्वास्थ्य care was just under 83 % of total Canadian spending ( public and private ) though these statistics do n't take into account population differences.
Studies have आइये to अलग conclusions about the result of this disparity in spending.
A 2007 review of all studies comparing health outcomes in Canada and the US in a Canadian peer-reviewed medical journal found that `` health outcomes may be superior in patients cared लिये in कनाडा बनाम the संयुक्त राज्य, लकिन मतभेद हैं नहीं consistent. ''
Life expectancy is longer in Canada, and its infant mortality rate is lower than that of the u.S., लकिन वहीँ is बहस परिचय the underlying कल्याणकारी of ये मतभेद.
एक commonly cited तुलना, the 2000 संसार स्वास्थ्य संगठन 's दरजा of `` overall health service performance '', which used a `` composite measure of achievement in the level of health, the distribution of health, the level of responsiveness and fairness of financial contribution '', ranked Canada 30th and the US 37th among 191 member nations.
This study rated the us `` responsiveness '', or विशेषता of सेवा लिये individuals receiving उपचार, as 1st, compared with 7th for Canada.
While the average life expectancy for Canadians was 80.34 years compared with 78.6 years for residents of the US, simply comparing the life expectancy of two groups with different racial मेकअप और अलग मोटापा दरों is संभावित नहीं an प्रभावी रास्ता of determining which healthcare system is superior.
The WHO 's study विधि यहूद criticized by कुछ analyses.
हालांकि वहीँ is a माप of सर्वसम्मति कि life-expectancy और शिशु मृत्यु mark the most reliable ways to compare nation-wide health care, assuming the population makeup is similar, a recent report by the Congressional Research Service carefully summarizes some recent data and notes the `` difficult research issues '' facing international comparisons.
The sound source रै अभी टूटा through the ध्वनि गति अवरोध, and is traveling at 1.4 times the speed of sound, ( Mach 1.4 ).
Since the source is moving faster ( with a speed ) than the ध्वनि लहरें it creates, it दरअसल लीड the advancing wavefront.
The sound सोर्स होगा pass by a stationary निरीक्षक ( साथ a speed ) before the observer actually hears the sound it creates.
As a result, an निरीक्षक in सामने of the source will detect
and an निरीक्षक behind the source.
A sonic boom produced by an aircraft moving at m=2.92, गणना इससे the cone angle of 20 degrees.
An observer hears the बूम जब the शॉक wave, on the edges of the cone, crosses his or her location.
Mach कोन कोण
A sonic boom is the sound associated with the shock waves created by an ऑब्जेक्ट traveling through the एयर तेज़ than the speed of sound.
Sonic booms generate enormous amounts of ध्वनि उर्जा, sounding much like an explosion.
The crack of a supersonic bullet passing ओवरहेड is an उदाहरण of a sonic boom in miniature.
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno is an American late-night talk show hosted by Jay Leno that initially aired इससे may 25, 1992 to may 29, 2009, और resumed उत्पादन on March 1, 2010.
The fourth incarnation of the Tonight Show franchise made its debut on May 25, 1992, तीन दिनों following जॉनी कार्सन 's रिटायरमेंट as host of the program.
The program originates इससे एनबीसी studios in burbank, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, और is ब्रॉडकास्ट Monday through Friday at 11:35 PM in the Eastern and Pacific time zones ( 10:35 PM Central / Mountain time ).
Unlike Carson or his predecessor Jack Paar, Leno only एकबार utilized a अतिथि मेजबान, preferring to मेजबान the श्रेणी by himself.
On April 26, 1999, the show began broadcasting in 1080i hdtv, बनने the पहला अमरीकी nightly बात show to be shot in high definition.
The show is shot in 16:9 पहलू अनुपात.
the श्रेणी, जिससे followed the वही मौलिक स्वरूप as कि of उसके पूर्ववर्तियों ( an opening monologue followed by comedy routines, interviews and performances ), ran until May 29, 2009, after which Leno was succeeded by Conan O'Brien.
NBC signed Leno to a new deal लिये a nightly बात दिखाएँ in the 10:00 pm ET timeslot.
the प्राइमटाइम श्रेणी, titled the jay लीनो दिखाएँ, debuted on सितंबर 14, 2009, following a similar format to the Leno incarnation of Tonight.
Neither O'Brien 's संस्करण of the कार्यक्रम, जिससे premiered जून 1, 2009, nor the jay Leno Show generated the ratings that NBC had expected.
The network decided to मूव a सघन 30-minute संस्करण of Leno 's show to O'Brien 's time slot, and O'Brien 's Tonight Show a half-hour later.
This decision met with opposition इससे o'brien, जिनकी कार्यावधि on the tonight दिखाएँ ended January 22, 2010, after which he began his own talk show on TBS.
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno then began its second और वर्तमान incarnation, the sixth of the franchise, on March 1, 2010.
rfid चिप next to a grain of rice.
This chip contains a radio-frequency electromagnetic field कुंडली कि modulates an बाह्य चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र a coded identification number when queried by a reader device.
This small type is incorporated in उपभोक्ता उत्पाद, और implanted in pets, for identification purposes.
Radio-frequency identification ( RFID ) is the wireless non-contact use of radio-frequency electromagnetic fields to transfer data, for the purposes of automatically identifying और ट्रैकिंग टैग संलग्न to वस्तुएँ.
the टैग contain electronically stored information.
Some tags are powered and read at short ranges ( a few meters ) via चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड ( इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक induction ).
Others use a local power source such as a battery, or else have no battery but collect उर्जा इससे the interrogating em फ़ील्ड, और तब अधिनियम as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or UHF radio waves ( i.e., electromagnetic radiation at high frequencies ).
बैटरी संचालित टैग may operate at hundreds of meters.
नापसंद a बार कोड, the टैग करता नहीं necessarily need to be within line of sight of the reader, and may be embedded in the tracked object.
RFID tags हैं प्रयुक्त in अनेक उद्योग.
An RFID tag attached to an ऑटोमोबाइल दौरान उत्पादन can be प्रयुक्त to track its progress through the assembly line.
दवाएँ can be tracked through warehouses.
Livestock and पालतु may have टैग injected, allowing positive identification of the animal.
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing, possessions, or even implanted within people, the सम्भावना of पढना personally-linked सूचना बगैर सहमति has raised privacy concerns.
Id, ego and super-ego are the three parts of the psychic apparatus defined in सिग्मुंड फ्रायड 's संरचनात्मक मॉडल of the psyche ; वे हैं the तीन सैद्धांतिक constructs in शर्तें of जिनकी कार्यकलाप और बातचीत mental life is described.
According to this model of the psyche, the id is the set of uncoordinated instinctual trends ; the super-ego plays the नाजुक और moralizing भूमिका ; और the अहंकार is the व्यवस्थित, यथार्थवादी भाग कि mediates between the इच्छाओं of the id और the super-ego.
The super-ego can रोकें तुम इससे doing certain things that your id may want you to do.
Even though the model is structural and makes reference to an apparatus, the id, ego and super-ego हैं कृत्यों of the दिमाग बल्कि than भाग of the दिमाग और do नहीं correspond one-to-one साथ actual somatic structures of the kind dealt with by neuroscience.
The concepts themselves arose at a late stage in the development of Freud 's thought : the `` structural model '' ( which succeeded his `` economic model '' and `` topographical मॉडल '' ) थी पहला discussed in उसके 1920 निबन्ध `` परे the ख़ुशी principle `` और थी formalized and elaborated upon three years later in his `` The Ego and the Id ``.
Freud 's proposal was influenced by the ambiguity of the पद `` बेहोश `` और its many conflicting uses.
Air Force rotc emblem
The Air Force Reserve अधिकारी प्रशिक्षण Corps ( AFROTC ) is one of the three primary commissioning sources for officers in the United States Air Force, the other two being the United States Air Force Academy ( USAFA ) and Air Force Officer Training School ( OTS ).
A अधीनस्थ कमांड of the एयर विश्वविद्यालयों भीतर the एयर शिक्षा और प्रशिक्षण कमांड ( aetc ), AFROTC is aligned under the Jeanne M. Holm Center for Officer Accessions and Citizen Development at Maxwell AFB, Alabama.
The Holm Center, formerly known as the Air फ़ोर्स अधिकारी accession और प्रशिक्षण स्कूलों ( afoats ), retains direct responsibility for both AFROTC and OTS.
AFROTC is the largest and oldest सोर्स of commissioned अधिकारियों लिये the U.S. Air Force.
AFROTC 's stated mission is to produce quality leaders लिये the u.S. एयर फ़ोर्स.
AFROTC units are located on 144 college and university campuses with 984 additional institutions of higher learning participating in cross-town agreements कि allow उनके विद्यार्थी to attend afrotc वर्ग at a आसपास `` मेजबान '' कॉलेज or विश्वविद्यालयों.
According to AFOATS HQ, in 2006, AFROTC commissioned 2,083 USAF Second lieutenants, साथ afrotc नामांकन ranging इससे 23,605 in 1985 to 10,231 in 1993, and around 13,000 enrolled today.
AFROTC units at colleges and universities are called `` detachments, '' और हैं typically headed by an क्रियाशील ड्यूटी यूएसएएफ अधिकारी in the रैंक of कर्नल or लेफ्टिनेंट कर्नल जो कृत्यों as दोनो the detachment कमांडर for USAF purposes and with the nominal title of Professor of Aerospace Studies ( PAS ) within the institution 's academic community.
Most colleges and universities will designate the afrotc detachment as the Department of Aerospace Studies.
The PAS is assisted by three to four Assistant Professors of Aerospace अध्ययन ( apas ), सब क्रियाशील duty USAF officers in the ranks of major or captain.
Three USAF non-commissioned अधिकारियों और एक वरिष्ठ non-commissioned अधिकारी होगा typically provide सैन्य administrative support and are often augmented by one to two civilian staff support employees of the academic institution.
Within AFROTC detachments, the students ( referred to as `` cadets '' ) हैं व्यवस्थित into विंग्स, समूह, squadrons, और फ़्लाइट, mirroring the यूएसएएफ कार्यात्मक wing structure.
The AFROTC detachment 's cadet wing or cadet group is separated into two divisions : the General Military Course ( GMC ) consisting of the first two years of प्रशिक्षण, और the पेशेवर अधिकारी कोर्स ( poc ) consisting of the पिछला दो years of training.
The AFROTC program is also divided into two training कृत्यों : the अकादमिक कक्षा कार्यक्रम ( aerospace अध्ययन वर्ग ) और cadet क्रियाएँ ( i.e., Leadership Laboratory, Physical Training, and other training ).
Paper density ( also known as basis weight and grammage ) is a term used in the गूदा और पेपर उद्योग और भी लिये कपड़ा उद्योग to denote a measure of mass of the product per unit of area for a type of fabric, paper or paperboard.
The term `` density '' is not प्रयुक्त in इसके परंपरागत भाव of mass per unit volume.
`` पेपर घनत्व '', rather, is a measure of the area density.
पेपर उत्पाद कि let छोटी or no लाइट pass through ( e.g. poster board ) are considered dense or heavy.
Paper products that allow some light to pass through ( e.g. ऊतक पेपर ) are considered lightweight.
In the pulp and paper industry, it is common to set a वाणिज्यिक पेपर यंत्र to उपज पेपर to a निशाना पेपर density.
Paper density can also be used to फर्क पेपर इससे paperboard as the latter प्रायः has a grammage greater than 134 g/m2.
Two ways of expressing पेपर घनत्व are commonly used:
Expressed in grams per square meter ( g/m2 ), पेपर घनत्व is भी ज्ञात as grammage.
This is the माप प्रयुक्त in सबसे parts of the world.
Expressed in terms of the mass ( expressed as वज़न ) प्रति क्रमांक of sheets, it is known as basis weight.
The convention used in the संयुक्त राज्य और a few अन्य देशों using us पेपर आकार is पाउंड of a ream of 500 ( or in some cases 1000 ) sheets of a given ( raw, still uncut ) basis size.
Japanese paper is expressed as the वज़न in kg of 1000 sheets.
Candace Nicole Parker ( born April 19, 1986 ) is an American basketball player for the wnba 's लॉस एंजिल्स स्पार्क्स और ummc ekaterinburg of Russia.
She is the younger सिस्टर of NBA player Anthony Parker.
She attended the विश्वविद्यालयों of Tennessee and was drafted by the Sparks in 2008.
She may be best known for being the first woman to dunk in an NCAA टूर्नामेंट खेल और the पहला स्त्री to डंक twice in a कॉलेज game—she नियत दोनो माइलस्टोन as a redshirt freshman on March 19, 2006.
She also became only the second खिलाड़ी to डंक in a wnba खेल on June 22, 2008.
A versatile player, she is mainly a forward, लकिन थी सूचीबद्ध on टेनेसी 's रोस्टर as a forward, center, and guard.
She was a starter on the Lady Vols basketball team, विजेता of the 2007 और 2008 ncaa championships.
Parker won the 2009 निकलोडियन बच्चे ' चुनाव पुरस्कार as the पसंदीदा मादा athlete in the sports category.
And she was a अतिथि स्टार on Figure It Out.
A food guide pyramid is a पिरामिड तराशा मार्गदर्शिका of स्वस्थ foods divided into sections to show the recommended intake for each food group.
The first food पिरामिड थी प्रकाशित in Sweden in 1974.
The most widely known food pyramid was introduced by the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of कृषि in the साल 1992, was updated in 2005, and then replaced in 2011.
Over 25 other countries and organisations have भी प्रकाशित खाना पिरामिडों.
Hans Christian andersen ( ; प्रायः referred to in scandinavia as H. C. Andersen ; April 2, 1805August 4, 1875 ) was a Danish author and poet.
Although a prolific writer of plays, travelogues, novels, और कविताएं, andersen is बेहतरीन remembered for his fairy tales, a literary genre he so mastered that he himself has become as mythical as the tales he wrote.
Andersen 's popularity is not limited to children ; his stories—called, or `` fantastic tales '' —express विषयवस्तु कि transcend आयु and nationality.
During his lifetime he was acclaimed for having delighted children विश्वव्यापी और थी feted by रॉयल्टी.
Andersen 's fairy tales, which have been translated into more than 125 languages, have become culturally embedded in the West 's collective consciousness, readily accessible to children, लकिन पेश lessons of पुण्य और resilience in the फेस of adversity for mature readers as well.
They have inspired motion pictures, plays, नाटिकाओं, और एनिमेटेड films.

Eye contact occurs जब `` दो लोगों look at each other 's eyes at the same time. ''
In इंसान beings, नजर सम्पर्क is a रूप of अशाब्दिक संचार and is thought to have a large influence on social behavior.
Coined in the जल्दी to mid-1960s, the term has come in the West to often define the act as a meaningful and important sign of confidence and social communication.
The customs and significance of eye contact vary widely between संस्कृतियों, साथ धार्मिक और सोशल मतभेद प्रायः altering इसके meaning greatly.
The study of eye contact is sometimes ज्ञात as oculesics.
Bed bugs are parasitic कीट of the cimicid family that feed exclusively on blood.
The term most commonly refers to members of the genus Cimex of which Cimex lectularius, the common bed bug, is the best known as it prefers to feed on human रक्त हालांकि अन्य cimex प्रजाति हैं specialized to अन्य पशु, e.g., चमगादड़ बग, C. pipistrelli ( यूरोपीय ), C. pilosellus ( western US ), and C. adjunctus ( entire eastern US ).
The name of the `` bed bug '' is derived from the preferred habitat of Cimex lectularius : warm houses और विशेषकर आसपास or अंदर of beds और bedding or other sleep areas.
Bed bugs are mainly active at रात्रि, लकिन हैं नहीं exclusively nocturnal.
They usually feed on their hosts बगैर होने noticed.
A number of adverse health effects may result from bed कीड़ा bites, सहित स्किन rashes, मनोवैज्ञानिक effects, and allergic symptoms.
Diagnosis involves both ढूंढना bed बग और the occurrence of संगत symptoms.
Bed bugs have महरूम ज्ञात as इंसान परजीवी for thousands of years.
at a पाइंट in the जल्दी 1940s, वे यहूद mostly eradicated in the developed world, but have increased in prevalence since 1995.
Because infestation of human habitats रै महरूम on the increase, bed bug bites and related conditions have been on the rise as well.
The Book of Isaiah ( ) is the first of the Latter Prophets in the Hebrew Bible, preceding ezekiel, यिर्मयाह और the किताब of the Twelve.
( the अनुक्रम of the subsequent books differs somewhat in the Christian Old Testament ).
The first 39 chapters prophesy doom for a sinful Judah and for all the nations of the world that oppose God, while the last 27 prophesy the restoration of the nation of Israel और a नई सृष्टि in परमेश्वर 's गौरवशाली भविष्य किंगडम ; इस खण्ड शामिल the गीतों of the कष्ट नौकर, चार separate passages referring to the nation of Israel, interpreted by Christians as prefiguring the coming of Jesus Christ.
Tradition ascribes authorship of the book to Isaiah son of Amoz, but now scholars widely agree that the book is the work of three अलग लेखक - few विद्वानों इनकार इस दृश्य, और those that do, do so for theological reasons.
The first, termed Proto-Isaiah ( chapters 1–39 ), contains the words of the 8th-century BCE prophet with 7th-century BCE expansions ; the second, Deutero-Isaiah ( chapters 40–55 ), is the कार्य of a 6th-century bce लेखक लिखने निकट the समाप्त of the babylonian captivity ; और the तीसरा, the काव्य Trito-Isaiah ( chapters 56–66 ), was composed in Jerusalem shortly after the return from exile, probably by multiple authors.
Oregon State विश्वविद्यालयों ( osu ) is a coeducational, public research university located in Corvallis, Oregon, United States.
The university offers undergraduate, graduate and doctoral डिग्री और a multitude of शोध opportunities.
There are more than 200 academic उपाधि कार्यक्रम offered through the university.
OSU 's कार्यक्रम in सूक्ष्मजैविकी, नाभिकीय अभियान्त्रिकी, पारिस्थितिकी, वानिकी, public health, biochemistry, zoology, oceanography, food science and pharmacy are recognized nationally as top tier programs.
The OSU 's liberal arts programs have also grown significantly और the विभाग is माना a `` cornerstone '' of the institution.
अधिक than 200,000 लोगों have attended OSU since its founding.
The Carnegie न्यास classifies ऑरेगॉन राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों as part of its top tier of research institutions.
As of 2008, osu is एक of only seventy-three land-grant universities.
The school is also recognized as a sea-grant, space-grant and sun-grant institution, making it one of only दो us संस्थानों to retain सब चार designations और the तभी पब्लिक विश्वविद्यालयों to do so ( Cornell is the only other with similar designations ).
As one of the two flagship universities of the Oregon University System, OSU receives more funding for research, annually, than all other पब्लिक उच्चतर शिक्षा संस्थानों in ऑरेगॉन संयुक्त.
Female स्खलन is the expulsion of द्रव by इंसान महिलाओं इससे the paraurethral ducts through and around the female urethra during or before an orgasm.
It is also ज्ञात colloquially as gushing or squirting, हालांकि ये हैं माना to be different phenomena in some research publications.
The exact source and nature of the fluid continue to be a टॉपिक of बहस among चिकित्सा पेशेवर, जिससे is also related to doubts over the existence of the G-Spot.
The Kanab ambersnail, scientific name oxyloma haydeni kanabensis or oxyloma kanabense, is a critically endangered subspecies or species of small, air-breathing land snail, a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusc in the family Succineidae, the amber snails.
The common name of the amber घोंघे is आधारित on the शेल, जिससे is translucent and when empty usually resembles amber in color.
This प्रजाति is endemic to the संयुक्त States, specifically the state of Arizona and Utah, where it was first collected in the early 20th century.
It has महरूम सूचीबद्ध as endangered on the संयुक्त राज्य मछली and Wildlife Service list of endangered species since 8 August 1991.
This snail lives in वेटलैंड्स, स्रोतों, और seeps, और तभी दो of its natural habitats are known to exist : Three Lakes, a meadow near Kanab, Utah, and Vasey 's Paradise, a spring along the Colorado River within Grand Canyon National Park.
In its natural आवास it is बल्कि polyphagous, feeding mainly on bacteria, plants and fungi, and reproduces during the summer.
Now considered a Critically Endangered species on the IUCN Red List of Threatened Species due to a series of factors ( including influence ), the Kanab ambersnail has been reintroduced to three springs above the ऐतिहासिक ऊँची जल स्तर साथ the कोलोराडो नदी.
The स्पेनी भाषा is the दूसरी सबसे used language in the United States.
There are more Spanish speakers in the United States than there हैं अध्यक्षों of चाइनीज, French, German, Italian, Hawaiian, and the Native American languages combined.
According to the 2010 अमरीकी जातियाँ सर्वेक्षण conducted by the u.S. जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो, स्पेनी is the primary language spoken at home by almost 37 million people aged five or older, a figure more than double that of 1990.
There are 45 million Hispanophones who speak Spanish as a first or second language, as well as six million Spanish language students, composing the largest national Spanish-speaking जातियाँ बाहर of मैक्सिको और बनाना स्पेनी the रोमांस भाषा और the indo-european भाषा साथ largest क्रमांक of देशी अध्यक्षों in the संसार.
Roughly half of all U.S. स्पेनी अध्यक्षों भी speak English `` very well, '' based on the self-assessment Census question respondents.
The language came to the country since the 16th and 17th centuries with the आगमन of स्पेनी colonists in क्षेत्रों कि होता बाद become the राज्य of फ्लोरिडा, Texas, Colorado, New Mexico, Arizona, Nevada, Utah, and California and of the Spanish explorers - who explored areas of 42 states-.
Also वेस्ट of louisiana territory थी स्पेनी between 1763 - 1800 ( year of the French recovery of territory ), after the French and Indian War.
After of the incorporation of these states to the U.S. in first half of 19th century, the Spanish language was later reinforced by the acquisition of Puerto Rico in 1898 and by later waves of the हिस्पैनिक करणों, मूलरूप इससे हिस्पैनिक अमेरिका, to the संयुक्त राज्य beginning in the second half of 19th century until today.

The Tokyo Mew Mew manga और दुश्मनी श्रेणी सुविधाएँ a डाल of वर्ण designed by Mia Ikumi.
The series takes place in Tokyo, Japan, where five adolescent लड़कियों, पुकारा mew mews, हैं infused साथ the डीएनए of endangered species to combat aliens attempting to take over the Earth.
The manga series is followed by a short sequel series, टोकियो mew mew a la विधि, जिससे introduces a new Mew Mew and a new threat.
The Mew Mews are led by the main character, Ichigo Momomiya, whose first task is to एकत्रित the अन्य चार mew mews : मिंट aizawa, सलाद midorikawa, Pudding Fong, and Zakuro Fujiwara.
As the series progresses, Ichigo goes from having a crush on masaya aoyama to बनने उसके गर्लफ्रेंड जबकि trying to छुपा उसके secret double life from him.
The series antagonists include three aliens, kish, पाई, और तीखा, and their leader, Deep Blue.
originally इससे धरती, the एलियंस यहूद forced to leave long ago due to deadly environmental changes.
They have returned to मार the इंसानो, जो वे महसूस हैं destroying their planet, and reclaim the planet.
In a la Mode, middle school student Berry Shirayuki is introduced as the छठे mew mew और, in the अनुपस्थिति of Ichigo, the temporary leader of the Mew Mews.
A la Mode also introduces नई नियत of antagonists, the संत रोज़ crusaders, a group of human teenagers with various psychic abilities with a desire to create their own utopia.
Led by Duke, they make several attempts to kill बेरी, आखिरकार turning the लोकल populace against the Mew Mews.
Ikumi 's initial vision for Tokyo Mew Mew was a स्टोरी पुकारा टोकियो ब्लैक बिल्ली लड़की कि featured a cat-girl battling alien invaders.
After the story was transitioned to a more upbeat story of five female superheroes, the character डिजाइन यहूद redone to have a हल्का, अधिक रंगीन महसूस.
The main series characters were praised लिये होने a पूर्ण अनुरूप लिये the overall स्टोरी, as well as for their cute appearances.
The characters introduced in a la विधि यहूद भी praised लिये उनके विज़ुअल appearances, but criticized as being repeats of the original series.
The character Duke was also criticized लिये having a डिज़ाइन reminiscent of the white supremacy group, the Ku Klux Klan.

Sedimentary rocks are प्रकार of चट्टान कि हैं formed by the deposition of सामग्री at the Earth 's surface and within bodies of water.
Sedimentation is the collective name for processes that cause mineral and/or organic particles ( detritus ) to settle और accumulate or खनिज to precipitate इससे a समाधान.
Particles that form a sedimentary चट्टान by accumulating are called sediment.
Before being deposited, sediment was formed by weathering and erosion in a source क्षेत्रफल, और तब transported to the प्लेस of deposition by जल, हवा, ice, mass movement or glaciers which are called agents of denudation.
The sedimentary चट्टान कवर of the महाद्वीपों of the धरती 's क्रस्ट is extensive, but the total contribution of sedimentary rocks is estimated to be only 8 % of the total volume of the crust.
sedimentary रॉक्स हैं तभी a पतला veneer over a crust consisting mainly of igneous and metamorphic rocks.
Sedimentary rocks are deposited in परतों as strata, forming a ढांचा पुकारा bedding.
The study of sedimentary rocks and rock strata provides सूचना परिचय the subsurface कि is उपयोगी लिये सिविल अभियान्त्रिकी, लिये उदाहरण in the निर्माण of roads, houses, tunnels, canals or other constructions.
Sedimentary rocks are also important sources of natural संसाधन जैसे कोयले, चट्टान fuels, drinking water or ores.
the पढ़ाई of the अनुक्रम of sedimentary rock strata is the main source for scientific knowledge about the Earth 's history, including palaeogeography, paleoclimatology and the history of life.
The scientific अनुशासन कि अध्ययन the गुण और उत्पत्ति of sedimentary rocks is called sedimentology.
Sedimentology is both part of geology and physical geography and overlaps partly with other disciplines in the धरती sciences, ऐसे as pedology, geomorphology, भूरसायन or structural geology.

Humans are born with over 270 bones, some of जिससे फ्यूज साथ into a अनुदैर्ध्य अक्ष, the अक्षीय कंकाल, to जिससे the appendicular skeleton is attached.
Saint Patrick ( ; ; Modern ; ; c. 387 – 17 March c. 460 or c. 492 ) was a romano-british ईसाई मिशनरी और बिशप in आयरलैंड.
Known as the `` Apostle of आयरलैंड '', he is the प्राथमिक संरक्षक संत of the island along with Saints Brigid and Columba.
Two authentic letters from उसे जीवित, इससे जिससे आइये the तभी generally स्वीकृत details of his life.
When he was about 16, he was captured इससे उसके घर और लिया as a slave to Ireland, where he lived for six years before escaping and returning to his family.
After becoming a cleric, he returned to northern and western Ireland as an ordained बिशप, लकिन छोटी is ज्ञात परिचय the places where he worked.
By the seventh सदी, he था already आइये to be revered as the patron saint of Ireland.
सबसे उपलब्धियाँ विवरण of his life are from subsequent hagiographies, and these are now not accepted without detailed criticism.
The Annals of Ulster state that he arrived in Ireland in 432, ministered in ulster around 443, and died in 457 or 461.
The text, however, distinguishes between `` Old Patrick '' ( विचार to औसत palladius ) और `` पैट्रिक, archapostle of the Scots, '' who died in 492.
The actual dates of Patrick 's life can not be fixed with certainty but, on a widespread interpretation, he was active as a missionary in आयरलैंड दौरान the दूसरी हाफ of the 5th सदी.
He is generally credited साथ होने the first bishop of Armagh, Primate of All Ireland.
Saint Patrick 's Day is observed on March 17, the तिथि of उसके मौत.
It is celebrated both inside and outside Ireland, as both a religious and, especially outside आयरलैंड, धर्मनिरपेक्ष holiday.
In the dioceses of Ireland, it is दोनो a solemnity और a पावन दिन of दायित्व ; outside Ireland, it can be a celebration of Ireland itself.
लकीर खण्ड in the golden ratio
A golden rectangle with longer side a and shorter side b, when placed adjacent to a square with sides of लंबाई a, होगा उपज a समान सुनहरी आयताकार साथ longer पक्ष a + b और shorter side a.
This illustrates the संबंध.
In mathematics and the arts, two quantities are in the golden ratio if the ratio of the sum of the quantities to the larger मात्रा is बराबर to the ratio of the larger quantity to the smaller one.
The figure on the सही illustrates the ज्यामितीय relationship.
expressed algebraically:
जहाँ the यूनानी अक्षर phi ( ) represents the golden ratio.
इसके मान is:
The golden अनुपात is भी पुकारा the सुनहरी खण्ड ( लैटिन : sectio aurea ) or golden mean.
Other names include extreme and mean ratio, medial section, divine proportion, दैवी खण्ड ( Latin : sectio divina ), golden proportion, golden cut, and golden number.
Many 20th century artists and architects have proportioned their works to approximate the सुनहरी ratio—especially in the रूप of the सुनहरी आयताकार, in जिससे the अनुपात of the longer पक्ष to the shorter is the golden ratio—believing this proportion to be aesthetically pleasing ( see Applications and observations below ).
Mathematicians since Euclid have studied the properties of the सुनहरी अनुपात, सहित इसके रूप in the आयाम of a नियमित प्रस्तुतीकरण और in a सुनहरी आयताकार, जिससे can be cut into a square and a smaller rectangle with the same aspect ratio.
The golden ratio has also been used to analyze the proportions of natural objects as खूब as man-made प्रणालियों ऐसे as वित्तीय बाज़ार, in कुछ मामले आधारित on dubious fits to data.
North Myrtle बीच is a तटीय रिज़ॉर्ट नगर in Horry County, South Carolina, United States.
It was created in 1968 from four existing municipalities उत्तर of myrtle बीच, और serves as एक of the primary tourist towns along the Grand Strand.
The population was 13,752 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in Europe that began on 28 जुलाई 1914 और lasted जबतक 11 नवम्बर 1918.
It was predominantly called the World युद्ध or the ग्रेट युद्ध इससे इसके occurrence जबतक the start of World War II in 1939, and the First World War or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom, France and Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary and इटली ; लकिन, as austria–hungary था लिया the अप्रिय विरूद्ध the अनुबंध, इटली किया नहीं डालें into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised और विस्तारित as अधिक nations entered the war : Italy, Japan and the United States joined the Allies, and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 million military personnel, including 60 million Europeans, यहूद mobilised in एक of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases in the lethality of हथियार बगैर सम्बन्धित सुधार in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history, subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न राजनैतिक परिवर्तन, ऐसे as revolutions in अनेक of the nations involved.
One of the long-term causes of the war was the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी policies of the great powers of Europe.
More immediately, the हत्या of archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया, the वारिस to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the पिछला दशकों यहूद invoked.
Within weeks, the major powers यहूद at युद्ध और, via their colonies, the conflict soon spread around the world.
On 28 July, the Austro-Hungarians fired the first गोलियाँ of the युद्ध as तैयारी लिये the आक्रमण of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the germans invaded न्यूट्रल बेल्जियम and Luxembourg on the way to France, providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called चमत्कार of the marne —the पश्चिमी सामने settled into a static battle of attrition with a trench line that changed little until 1917.
On the Eastern Front, the रूसी फौज थी कामयाब विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians, but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans.
In नवम्बर the उस्मानी साम्राज्य joined the युद्ध, opening up fronts in the Caucasus, Mesopotamia and the Sinai.
Italy और बुल्गारिया गई to war in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर brought the russians to शर्तें with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front, the Allies drove back the germans in a श्रेणी of कामयाब offensives और अमरीकी forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had its own trouble with क्रांतिकारियों, सहमत to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in victory for the Allies.
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts, as the भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति and economic resources to fight a total war.
By the end of the war, four major इम्पीरियल powers—the जर्मनी, Russian, Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the former दो खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory, जबकि the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of central Europe was redrawn into अनेक छोटी राज्य.
The League of Nations was formed in the hope of preventing another ऐसे विरोध.
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires, the परखना of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और समस्याएं साथ the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II.
Camden is a city in camden काउंटी, नई जर्सी, United States.
It is the county seat, स्तिथ आरपार the Delaware River from Philadelphia.
As of the 2010 United States Census the city had a total जनसांख्यिकी of 77,344, representing a मनाही of 2,560 ( 3.2 % ) इससे the 79,904 निवासियों enumerated दौरान the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी, जिससे था in फेरे declined by 7,588 ( 8.7 % ) from the 87,492 counted in the 1990 Census.
Camden ranked as the 12th-most populous नगरपालिका in the राज्य in 2010 बाद having been ranked 10th in 2000.
Camden was originally incorporated as a city on February 13, 1828, from portions of the now-defunct न्यूटन township, जबकि the क्षेत्रफल was still part of Gloucester County.
On March 13, 1844, Camden became भाग of the newly formed Camden County.
Although once a thriving center for manufacturing and industry, camden is शायद बेहतरीन known for its struggles with urban dysfunction.
Three Camden mayors have महरूम jailed for corruption, the most recent being Milton Milan in 2000.
Since 2005 the school system and police department have been संचालित by the राज्य of नई जर्सी ; the कब्ज़ा समाप्त in 2012.
In 2008, Camden had the highest crime रेट in the u.S. साथ 2,333 हिंसक अपराधों per 100,000 people while the national average was 455 per 100,000.
Camden public schools spent $ 23,770 per छात्र ( $ 19,118 on a budgetary per-pupil आधार ) in the 2009–10 स्कूल year and two-thirds of the students graduate.
Two out of every five निवासियों हैं नीचे the national poverty line.
Amitriptyline ( Tryptomer, elavil, tryptizol, laroxyl, saroten, Sarotex, Lentizol, Endep ) is a tricyclic antidepressant ( TCA ).
It is the सबसे widely प्रयुक्त tca और रै at तनिक बराबर efficacy विरूद्ध अवसाद as the newer class of SSRIs according to a study from early 2001.
As well as reducing depressive symptoms, ये प्रकार of tricyclics also ease migraines, tension headaches, anxiety attacks and some schizophrenic symptoms.
It is also known to reduce आक्रामकता और violent behavior.
A computer is a सामान्य purpose यंत्र कि can be प्रोग्रामित to carry out a finite set of arithmetic or logical operations.
चूंकि a अनुक्रम of परिचालन can be readily changed, the computer can solve more than one kind of problem.
Conventionally, a computer consists of at least one प्रसंस्करण तत्व, typically a सेंट्रल प्रसंस्करण ईकाई ( CPU ) and some form of memory.
The processing element carries out arithmetic and logic operations, and a sequencing and कंट्रोल ईकाई कि can बदलें the अनुक्रम of परिचालन आधारित on stored information.
Peripheral devices allow सूचना to be पुनर्प्राप्त इससे an बाह्य सोर्स, और the परिणाम of operations saved and retrieved.
the पहला इलेक्ट्रॉनिक डिजिटल कंप्यूटर यहूद विकसित between 1940 and 1945 in the United Kingdom and United States.
Originally they were the size of a large room, consuming as much power as अनेक सौ आधुनिक निजी कंप्यूटर ( PCs ).
in इस era mechanical एनालॉग computers were used for military applications.
Modern computers based on integrated circuits are millions to अरबों of टाइम्स अधिक सक्षम than the जल्दी मशीने, और occupy a भिन्न of the space.
Simple computers are small enough to fit into मोबाईल डिवाइस, और मोबाईल कंप्यूटर can be powered by small batteries.
Personal computers in their विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म हैं प्रतीक of the सूचना आयु और हैं what most people think of as “computers.”
However, the embedded computers found in many devices from MP3 खिलाड़ी to सेनानी वायुयान और इससे खिलौने to औद्योगिक robots हैं the most numerous.
`` Barefoot और गर्भवती '' is a phrase सबसे commonly संबद्ध साथ the controversial idea that women should not work outside the home and should have many children during their reproductive years.
It has several other meanings as well.
It is a फिगर of वाक.
The phrase `` barefoot और गर्भवती '' was probably first used sometime before 1950.
An article from 1949 states, `` By early 1949, TWA was—in the words of its new अध्यक्ष, ralph S. damon—both 'barefoot and pregnant. ' ''
Its उपयोग may तिथि as early as the 1910s.
An article प्रकाशित in 1958 राज्य the phrase was first used by a `` Dr. Hertzler '' 40 years earlier.
`` Some forty years ago, dr. hertzler उन्नत a परिकल्पना जिससे यंग women of today seem bent on proving correct. '
The only way to keep a स्त्री प्रसन्न, ' he कहा, 'is to रखना उसके barefoot and pregnant. ' ''
Oakhurst is a census-designated प्लेस और unincorporated जातियाँ भीतर Ocean Township, in Monmouth County, New Jersey, United States.
As of the 2010 संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी, the CDP 's population was 3,995.
University of Phoenix Stadium, opened August 1, 2006, is a बहुउद्देशीय फ़ुटबॉल स्टेडियम स्तिथ in ग्लेनडेल, Arizona.
It is the घर of the एरिज़ोना कार्डिनल्स of the नेशनल Football League ( NFL ) and the annual Fiesta Bowl.
The stadium is स्तिथ अगला द्वार to the jobing.com एरिना और it सुविधाएँ the पहला fully retractable natural grass playing surface built in the United States on top of an AirField Systems drainage system.
An opening on one side of the stadium allows the playing फ़ील्ड to मूव to the exterior of the भवन, allowing the संपूर्ण natural turf playing surface to be exposed to daylight.
The stadium has hosted Super Bowl XLII, and the 2011 BCS नेशनल चैंपियनशिप खेल, a खेल कि it होस्ट प्रत्येक चार सालो, जिससे नियत the स्थान 's entertainment attendance record of 78,603 on January 11, 2011.
It will again host सुपर कटोरी xlix in 2015.
The University of Phoenix acquired the नामकरण अधिकारों in सितंबर 2006, shortly after the stadium had opened under the name Cardinals Stadium.
The `` University of Phoenix `` name is applied as a corporate sponsor, और नहीं as the घर स्टेडियम of the विश्वविद्यालयों ( which has no intercollegiate athletics program ).
The stadium has also hosted the WWE event WrestleMania xxvi साथ 72,219 प्रशंसक in उपस्थिति.
The event was held in the stadium on कूच 28th 2010.
Joshua Lawrence Chamberlain ( September 8, 1828 – February 24, 1914 ), born as लॉरेंस जोशुआ चेम्बरलेन, थी an अमरीकी कॉलेज प्राध्यापक इससे the राज्य of Maine, who volunteered during the American Civil War to join the Union Army.
Although having no earlier शिक्षा in सैन्य रणनीति, he became a अत्यधिक आदरणीय और decorated Union officer, reaching the rank of brigadier general ( and brevet major general ).
For his gallantry at gettysburg, he थी awarded the Medal of Honor.
He was given the honor of commanding the संघ सैनिकों at the आत्मसमर्पण ceremony for the infantry of Robert E. Lee 's Army at Appomattox, Virginia.
After the war, he डाला राजनीती as a रिपब्लिकन and served four one-year terms of office as the 32nd Governor of Maine.
He served on the faculty, and as अध्यक्ष, of उसके अल्मा मेटर, Bowdoin College.
An inning, or innings, is a fixed-length खण्ड of a खेल in कोई of a किस्में of खेल – most notably cricket and baseball during which one team attempts to score while the other team attempts to prevent the first from scoring.
In cricket, the पद पारी is दोनो एकवचन और बहुवचन और is सदा spelled and pronounced with the terminal `` s ''.
In baseball and सॉफ्टबॉल, the एकवचन रूप is inning और तभी the plural takes an `` s ''.
In many other sports, the length of the खेल is लिखवाई by a क्लॉक और टीमों स्वैप offensive and defensive roles dynamically by taking possession of a ball or similar item.
In baseball and cricket, however, one team, said to be `` batting '', attempts to score `` runs '' —see run ( baseball ) और चलाएं ( क्रिकेट ) —while the अन्य टोली, कहा to be `` क्षेत्ररक्षण '', attempts to prevent the scoring of runs and get members of the batting team out.
The teams स्विच स्थान बाद the क्षेत्ररक्षण टोली has succeeded in getting a fixed number of players out, making a clock unnecessary.
In cricket, the term innings is also used to refer to the खेल of एक particular खिलाड़ी ( स्मिथ had a poor innings, scoring only 12 ).
By extension, this term can be प्रयुक्त in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी लिये लगभग कोई कार्यकलाप जिससे takes a काल of time ( The Liberal government had a good innings, but finally lost office in 1972, or You 've had a fair innings, now it 's my turn, meaning `` you have spoken for long enough, now let me speak '' ).
It is also used in reference to someone who has died at a reasonably बूढ़ा आयु or जिया a समृद्ध और rewarding life ( Ah, well.
जॉन थी 89.
At least he had a शुभ पारी ).
The baseball-derived समानांतर to इस in अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी is the term at bat.
according to the ऑक्सफोर्ड अंग्रेज़ी शब्दकोष, the term innings has been used in reference to cricket since at least 1735.
As cricket was a mature, highly organized sport in the 1600s in इंग्लैण्ड, the पद 's उत्पत्ति could खूब precede इस first recorded usage.
The word inning meaning 'a gathering in ' is first recorded in 1522, और could be सम्बन्धित.
Adenosine deaminase deficiency, also called ADA deficiency or ADA-SCID, is an autosomal recessive metabolic disorder that causes immunodeficiency.
It occurs in कम than one in 100,000 live births worldwide.
It accounts for about 15 % of all cases of severe संयुक्त immunodeficiency ( scid ).
It is बहुत विरल, तुम have a 3 % chance of getting this gene.
ADA deficiency may be present in शैशव, बाल्यकाल, adolescense, or adulthood.
Age of onset and severity is related to some 29 ज्ञात genotypes संबद्ध with the disorder.
