`` We Can Work It Out '' is a सोंग by the बीटल्स, written by Paul McCartney and John Lennon.
It was released as a `` दोगुना a-sided `` सिंगल साथ `` दिन tripper ``, the first time both sides of a single were so designated in an initial release.
Both songs were recorded दौरान the रबर Soul sessions.
The song is an example of lennon–mccartney सहयोग at a depth that happened only rarely after they wrote the hit singles of 1963.
This song, `` a दिन in the जीवन ``, `` baby, तुम 're a समृद्ध man `` और `` i 've Got a Feeling ``, are among the notable exceptions.
As a medical diagnosis, pedophilia or paedophilia is a psychiatric disorder in persons 16 years of age or older typically characterized by a primary or exclusive sexual interest toward prepubescent children ( generally आयु 11 सालो or younger, हालांकि विशिष्ट निदान मापदण्ड for the disorder extends the cut-off point for prepubescence to age 13 ).
An adolescent who is 16 years of age or older must be at तनिक पाँच सालो पुरानी than the prepubescent चाइल्ड पहले the attraction can be diagnosed as pedophilia.
The term has a range of definitions, as मिला in psychiatry, मनोविज्ञान, the vernacular, and law enforcement.
The International Classification of Diseases ( ICD ) defines pedophilia as a `` विकार of वयस्क व्यक्तित्व और आचरण '' in जिससे वहीँ is a यौन वरीयता लिये children of prepubertal or early pubertal age.
According to the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders ( DSM ), it is a paraphilia in which adults or adolescents 16 years of age or older have intense and recurrent sexual urges towards and fantasies about prepubescent children कि वे have either acted on or जिससे कारण उन्हें तकलीफ or interpersonal परेशानी.
In popular usage, pedophilia means any sexual interest in children or the अधिनियम of चाइल्ड यौन गाली, प्रायः termed `` pedophilic behavior ''.
For example, The American Heritage Stedman 's Medical Dictionary states, `` Pedophilia is the act or fantasy on the भाग of an वयस्क of engaging in यौन कार्यकलाप with a child or children. ''
This common use application also extends to the sexual ब्याज in और यौन सम्पर्क साथ रोमिल or post-pubescent minors.
Researchers recommend that these imprecise uses be avoided because although people who commit child sexual abuse commonly exhibit the disorder, some अपराधियों do नहीं मिलें the नैदानिक निदान मानकों लिये pedophilia और these standards pertain to prepubescents.
additionally, नहीं सब pedophiles actually commit such abuse.
pedophilia was first formally recognized and named in the late 19th century.
A significant amount of research in the क्षेत्रफल रै लिया प्लेस चूंकि the 1980s.
Although mostly documented in men, वहीँ हैं भी महिलाओं who exhibit the disorder, and researchers assume available estimates underrepresent the true number of female pedophiles.
No cure for pedophilia has been developed, but there are therapies that can reduce the incidence of a व्यक्ति committing child sexual abuse.
In the United States, following Kansas v. Hendricks, sex अपराधियों जो हैं diagnosed साथ निश्चित दिमागी विकार, विशेषकर pedophilia, can be विषय to indefinite civil commitment, under various state laws ( generically called SVP laws ) and the federal Adam Walsh Child Protection and Safety Act of 2006.
At present, the exact कल्याणकारी of pedophilia have not been conclusively established.
Research suggests that pedophilia may be correlated with several different neurological abnormalities, और प्रायः co-exists साथ अन्य व्यक्तित्व disorders and psychological pathologies.
In the contexts of forensic psychology and law enforcement, a variety of typologies have been सुझाया to categorize pedophiles according to behavior and motivations.
Julio César chávez ( born जूलियो césar chávez gonzález on July 12, 1962 ) is a retired Mexican professional boxer.
Chávez is considered by many people लिये उनके खेल आंकडे the महानतम fighter ever to come out of Mexico.
He is a six-time world champion in three weight divisions, and for several सालो he थी माना एक of the बेहतरीन pound-for-pound boxer in the world.
In a career that spanned over 25 years, Chávez won five world titles in three weight divisions : WBC Super Featherweight in 1984, WBA Lightweight in 1987, WBC Lightweight in 1988, WBC Light welterweight in 1989, ibf लाइट welterweight in 1990, and WBC Light Welterweight in 1994.
He holds रिकॉर्ड लिये सबसे कामयाब लगातार defenses of संसार शीर्षक ( 27 ), most title fights ( 37 ), most title-fight victories ( 31 ) and he is after Joe Louis with ( 23 ) for most title defenses won by knockout ( 21 ).
Chávez भी रै the longest अपराजित streak in boxing history, 13 years.
His record was 89-0-1 going into his first loss to Frankie Randall और था an 87 लड़ो जीत streak जबतक his `` draw '' with Whitaker.
Julio César Chávez was known for his outstanding punching power, devastating body attack, remarkably दमदार chin और the अथक stalking of his opponents.
He ranks # 24 on ईएसपीएन 's 50 Greatest Boxers Of All Time.
On December 7, 2010, he थी inducted in the prestigious International Boxing Hall of Fame for the Class of 2011.
He is the पिता of prospect Omar Chávez and former WBC Middleweight Champion Julio César Chávez, Jr.
`` Selektion `` on the judenrampe, auschwitz, may/june 1944.
To be sent to the सही meant स्लेव labor ; to the left, the gas chamber.

The Holocaust ( from the Greek ' : hólos, `` whole '' and kaustós, `` जले '' ) भी ज्ञात as the shoah ( यहूदी :, hashoah, `` प्रलय '' ; यहूदी :, churben or hurban, इससे the यहूदी लिये `` विनाश '' ), थी the द्रव्यमान murder or genocide of approximately six million Jews during World War II, a programme of systematic state-sponsored murder by Nazi Germany, led by Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party, throughout German-occupied territory.
Of the नौ लाख यहूदियों जो था resided in यूरोपीय पहले the Holocaust, approximately two-thirds were killed.
Over one million Jewish children were killed in the Holocaust, as were लगभग दो लाख यहूदी महिलाओं और तीन लाख यहूदी मेन.
A network of over 40,000 facilities in जर्मनी और german-occupied territory were used to concentrate, hold, and kill Jews and other victims.
Some scholars argue that the mass murder of the Romani and people with disabilities should be included in the definition, and some use the common noun `` holocaust '' to describe other नाजी द्रव्यमान हत्याएं, सहित those of सोवियत बंदियों of war, Polish and Soviet civilians, and homosexuals.
Recent estimates based on figures obtained since the पतन of the सोवियत संघ indicates कुछ टेन to ग्यारह लाख नागरिकों और बंदियों of युद्ध यहूद intentionally murdered by the Nazi regime.
The persecution and नरसंहार यहूद carried out in stages.
Various laws to remove the Jews from civil society, most prominently the Nuremberg Laws, were enacted in Germany years before the outbreak of World War II.
Concentration camps were established in which inmates यहूद वशीभूत to स्लेव मजदूर जबतक वे died of exhaustion or disease.
Where Germany conquered new territory in पूर्वी यूरोपीय, specialized इकाई पुकारा einsatzgruppen murdered Jews and political opponents in mass shootings.
The occupiers required Jews and romani to be confined in overcrowded ghettos पहले होने transported by भाड़ा ट्रैन to extermination camps where, if they survived the journey, most were systematically killed in gas chambers.
Every arm of Germany 's अफसरशाही थी शामिल in the लोजिस्टिक्स कि led to the genocides, turning the तीसरा reich into कया one Holocaust scholar has called `` a genocidal state ''.
4-H in the United States is a youth organization administered by the National Institute of Food and Agriculture of the United राज्य विभाग of कृषि ( यूएसडीए ), साथ the मिशन of `` engaging युवावस्था to पहुँचें उनके fullest potential while advancing the field of youth development. ''
The name represents four personal development areas of focus for the संगठन : सिर, दिल, हैंड्स, और स्वास्थ्य.
The organization has over 6.5 million सदस्यों in the संयुक्त राज्य, इससे आयु पाँच to twenty-one, in approximately 90,000 clubs.
The goal of 4-H is to develop citizenship, leadership, responsibility and life skills of youth through experiential सीखना कार्यक्रम और a धनात्मक youth development approach.
Though typically thought of as an agriculturally focused संगठन as a परिणाम of इसके इतिहास, 4-h आज focuses on नागरिकता, healthy living, science, engineering, and technology programs.
Today, 4-H and related programs exist in over eighty countries around the संसार ; the संगठन and administration varies from country to country.
Each of these programs operates independently, लकिन cooperatively through अंतरराष्ट्रीय exchanges, global education programs, and communications.
The 4-H motto is `` To make the best better '', while its slogan is `` Learn by doing '' ( sometimes लिखा as `` सीख to do by doing '' ).
The national flag of Chile, consists of two unequal horizontal bands of white and red and a blue square the वही ऊँचाई as the श्वेत बैंड in the कैण्टन, जिससे bears a श्वेत five-pointed स्टार in the बीच.
It थी अपनाया on 18 October 1817.
The Chilean ध्वज is भी ज्ञात in स्पेनी as la estrella Solitaria ( The Lone Star ).
The star represents a guide to progress and honor ; ब्लू symbolizes the आसमान और the प्रशांत समंदर, श्वेत is लिये the snow-covered Andes, and red stands for the blood spilled to achieve independence.
According to the एपिक कविता la araucana, the रंगों यहूद निकला इससे those from the flag flown by the Mapuche during the Arauco War.
`` Flag Day '' is held each year on the ninth of July to commemorate the 77 soldiers who died in the 1882 बैटल of la concepción.
Generation Y, also known as the Millennial Generation, is the जनसांख्यिकी दल following पीढी X.
वहीँ हैं no precise dates for when Generation Y starts and ends.
Commentators use beginning birth dates from the latter 1970s, or इससे the जल्दी 1980s to the early 2000s.
The Torches of Nero, by henryk siemiradzki.
According to Tacitus, Nero targeted Christians as those जिम्मेदार लिये the आग.

Virginia ( ), officially the राष्ट्रमंडल of वर्जिनिया, is a u.S. state located in the South Atlantic region of the United States.
Virginia is nicknamed the `` Old डोमिनियन '' और the `` माँ of राष्ट्रपतियों '' बाद the आठ u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों born there.
The geography and climate of the Commonwealth are shaped by the Blue Ridge kyu और the chesapeake खाड़ी, जिससे provide आवास for much of its flora and fauna.
The capital of the राष्ट्रमंडल is Richmond ; and Virginia Beach is the most populous city.
Fairfax County is the सबसे populous राजनैतिक subdivision.
The wealthiest is loudoun County.
The Commonwealth 's population is over आठ लाख.
The area 's history begins साथ अनेक स्वदेशी groups, including the Powhatan.
In 1607 the London कम्पनी स्थापित the उपनिवेश of Virginia as the first permanent New World English colony.
Slave labor and the जमीन acquired इससे विस्थापित देशी अमरीकी tribes each played a significant role in the colony 's early politics and plantation economy.
Virginia was one of the 13 Colonies in the American Revolution and joined the confederacy in the अमरीकी Civil War, during which Richmond was made the Confederate capital and Virginia 's northwestern counties seceded to form the state of West Virginia.
Although the Commonwealth was under conservative single-party नियम लिये nearly a सदी following पुनर्निर्माण, दोनो प्रमुख नेशनल parties are competitive in modern Virginia.
The वर्जिनिया सामान्य सभा is the oldest legislature in the Western Hemisphere.
The state government has been repeatedly क्रमित सबसे प्रभावी by the pew Center on the States.
It is अद्वितीय in कैसा it ट्रीट शहरों और काउंटी बराबर, manages local roads, and prohibits its governors from serving consecutive terms.
Virginia 's economy has many sectors : agriculture in the Shenandoah Valley ; federal agencies in Northern Virginia, including the headquarters of the Department of रक्षा और सीआईए ; और सैन्य सुविधाएं in हैम्पटन Roads, the site of the region 's main seaport.
Virginia 's पब्लिक स्कूलों और अनेक कॉलेजों और विश्वविद्यालयों have contributed to growing media and technology sectors.
As a परिणाम, कंप्यूटर चिप्स have become the state 's leading export.
Windows Movie Maker ( formerly known as Windows Live फिल्म मेकर, codenamed sundance ) is a फ्रीवेयर वीडियो editing software by Microsoft.
It is a part of Windows Essentials software suite and offers the क्षमता to बनाएँ और संपादन वीडियो as खूब as to प्रकाशित उन्हें on skydrive, Facebook, YouTube, and Flickr.
`` Brenda 's Got A Baby '' is the सोलो डेब्यू सिंगल by तुपाक shakur, और दसवाँ track इससे his debut album, 2Pacalypse Now.
The song, which features R & B singer Dave hollister, is परिचय a बारह year-old लड़की नामित ब्रेंडा जो जीवनदान in a ghetto, has a baby, and is incapable of supporting it.
The सोंग explores the समस्या of टीन गर्भावस्था and its effect on the young mothers and their families.
Like many of Shakur 's songs, `` Brenda 's Got a baby '' draws इससे the दुर्दशा of the impoverished.
Using Brenda to represent young mothers in general, Shakur criticises the कम स्तर of support इससे the baby 's पिता, the सरकारी, और society in general.
Shakur wrote the song when he read a newspaper article about a twelve-year-old girl who got pregnant from her cousin और, क्युकी वो किया नहीं want उसके अभिभावक to जान परिचय the baby, threw it in a trash can.
The official logo of Pokémon for its international release ; `` Pokémon '' is छोटी लिये the असली जापानी शीर्षक of `` जेब राक्षस ''.
is a media franchise published and owned by जापानी वीडियो खेल कम्पनी Nintendo and created by Satoshi Tajiri in 1996.
Originally released as a pair of interlinkable Game Boy role-playing वीडियो खेल विकसित by खेल freak, पोकीमॉन रै चूंकि become the second-most successful and lucrative video game-based media franchise in the world, behind only Nintendo 's own Mario franchise.
Pokémon गुण have चूंकि महरूम merchandised into anime, manga, trading cards, toys, books, and other media.
The franchise celebrated in 2006, और, संचयी बिक्री of the वीडियो खेल ( सहित घर कंसोल संस्करण, such as the `` Pikachu '' Nintendo 64 ) have reached more than 200 million copies.
In November 2005, 4Kids Entertainment, which had managed the non-game related licensing of Pokémon, announced that it था सहमत नहीं to नवीनीकृत the Pokémon representation agreement.
Pokémon USA Inc. ( now the पोकीमॉन कम्पनी अंतरराष्ट्रीय ), a subsidiary of जापानी 's Pokémon Co., now oversees all Pokémon licensing outside of Asia.
The name Pokémon is the romanized contraction of the Japanese brand.
The term Pokémon, in addition to referring to the Pokémon franchise itself, also collectively refers to the 649 fictional प्रजाति कि have बना appearances in Pokémon media as of the release of the fifth generation titles Pokémon Black 2 and White 2 ; with the upcoming releases of Pokémon X and Y, 6 new Pokémon have been featured in promotions for the games.
`` Pokémon '' is identical in both the singular and plural, as is each individual species name ; it is grammatically correct to कह `` एक पोकीमॉन '' और `` अनेक पोकीमॉन '', as खूब as `` एक pikachu `` and `` many Pikachu ''.

Dada ( ) or Dadaism was an art movement of the यूरोपीय avant-garde in the early 20th century.
Many अर्जी दादा began in ज्यूरिख, स्विट्ज़रलैंड in 1916, spreading to बर्लिन shortly thereafter but the height of New York Dada was the year before in 1915.
To quote Dona Budd 's The Language of आर्ट ज्ञान, दादा थी born आउट of ऋणात्मक प्रतिक्रिया to the horrors of World War I.
This international movement was begun by a group of artist and poets संबद्ध साथ the कैबरे वोल्टेयर in ज्यूरिख.
Dada अस्वीकृत कारण और लॉजिक, prizing nonsense, irrationality and intuition.
The origin of the नाम दादा is unclear ; some believe that it is a nonsensical word.
Others maintain that it originates इससे the रोमानियाई कलाकारों ट्रिस्टन tzara और मार्सल janco 's बारंबार उपयोग of the शब्द da, da, meaning yes, yes in the Romanian language.
Another theory says that the name `` Dada '' came during a meeting of the group when a paper knife stuck into a French-German dictionary happened to पाइंट to 'डैडa ', a फ्रेंच शब्द लिये 'hobbyhorse '.
The गति primarily शामिल विज़ुअल कला, साहित्य, काव्य, आर्ट manifestoes, आर्ट theory, theatre, and graphic design, and concentrated its anti-war politics through a rejection of the prevailing standards in art through anti-art cultural works.
In addition to being anti-war, Dada was also anti- bourgeois and had राजनैतिक affinities साथ the कट्टरपंथी बाएँ.
Dada activities included public gatherings, demonstrations, और प्रकाशन of art/literary जर्नल्स ; passionate coverage of art, politics, and culture were topics often discussed in a variety of media.
Key figures in the movement included Hugo Ball, Emmy Hennings, Hans Arp, Raoul Hausmann, Hannah Höch, Johannes Baader, Tristan Tzara, फ्रांसिस picabia, रिचर्ड huelsenbeck, georg grosz, जॉन heartfield, मार्सल duchamp, beatrice लकडी, कर्ट Schwitters, and Hans Richter, among others.
The movement influenced later styles like the avant-garde and downtown music आंदोलनों, और समूह सहित surrealism, देवानंद réalisme, पॉप art and Fluxus.
Dada is the groundwork to abstract art and sound poetry, a starting point for performance art, a prelude to postmodernism, an influence on pop art, a जश्न of antiart to be बाद embraced लिये anarcho-political uses in the 1960s and the movement that lay the foundation for Surrealism.
First trophic स्तर.
The plants in this image, and the algae and phytoplankton in the झील, हैं प्राथमिक निर्माता.
They take nutrients from the soil or the water, and manufacture उनके अपना खाना by photosynthesis, using energy from the sun.
The trophic level of an organism is the स्थिति it occupies in a food chain.
The word trophic गर्भाशयी इससे the यूनानी τροφή ( trophē ) referring to food or feeding.
A food chain represents a उत्तराधिकार of जीवों कि eat another organism and are, in turn, eaten themselves.
The क्रमांक of कदम an सजीव is इससे the start of the chain is a measure of its trophic level.
Food chains start at trophic level 1 with primary producers such as plants, move to herbivores at level 2, predators at level 3 and typically finish साथ carnivores or apex परभक्षी at स्तर 4 or 5.
The path along the chain can form either a one-way प्रवाह, or a खाना `` web. ''
ecological समुदायों साथ higher biodiversity form more complex trophic paths.
Four of the most important domesticated रेशा शलभ.
Top to नीचे : bombyx mori, Hyalophora cecropia, Antheraea pernyi, Samia cynthia.

A silk-producing raspy cricket.
Silk is a natural protein fibre, कुछ फ़ॉर्म of जिससे can be woven into textiles.
The protein fibre of silk is रचित मुख्यतः of fibroin और उत्पादित by निश्चित insect larvae to form cocoons.
The best-known प्रकार of रेशा is प्राप्त इससे the cocoons of the लार्वे of the mulberry silkworm Bombyx mori reared in captivity ( sericulture ).
The shimmering appearance of silk is due to the triangular prism -like structure of the रेशा fibre, जिससे allows रेशा cloth to refract आवक लाइट at अलग कोण, thus producing different colors.
Silks are produced by several other insects, but generally only the silk of moth caterpillars रै महरूम used for textile manufacturing.
There has been some शोध into अन्य silks, जिससे differ at the molecular level.
Many silks are mainly उत्पादित by the लार्वे of कीट undergoing complete metamorphosis, but some adult insects such as webspinners produce silk, and some insects such as raspy crickets produce silk throughout their lives.
Silk production also occurs in Hymenoptera ( bees, wasps, and ants ), silverfish, mayflies, thrips, leafhoppers, भृंग, lacewings, fleas, उड़ता और midges.
अन्य प्रकार of सन्धिपाद उपज रेशा, सबसे notably various arachnids such as spiders ( see spider silk ).
Late Show साथ दाउद लेटरमैन is an अमरीकी late-night talk show hosted by David Letterman on CBS.
The show debuted on अगस्त 30, 1993, और is उत्पादित by लेटरमैन 's production company, Worldwide Pants Incorporated.
the दिखाएँ 's म्यूज़िक निदेशक और band-leader of the house band, the CBS Orchestra, is Paul Shaffer.
the सिर लेखक is मैट रॉबर्ट्स and the announcer is Alan Kalter.
Of the major u.S. late-night कार्यक्रम, लेट दिखाएँ बाँधने दूसरी in संचयी average viewers over time and third in number of episodes over time.
the दिखाएँ लीड other late night shows in ad revenue with $ 271 million in 2009.
In most U.S. markets the show airs at 11:35 p.m. eastern/pacific समय, लकिन is अंकित सोमवार through बुधवार at 4:30 p.m., and Thursdays at 3:30 p.m and 6:00 p.m.
The second Thursday एपीसोड प्रायः airs on शुक्रवार of that week.
In 2002, Late Show साथ दाउद लेटरमैन was ranked No. 7 on TV Guide 's 50 Greatest TV Shows of All Time.
CBS has a contract with Worldwide पैंट to continue the दिखाएँ through 2014 ; by तब, लेटरमैन will surpass Johnny Carson as the longest tenured late-night talk show host.
The Real Housewives of Orange काउंटी is an अमरीकी वास्तविकता वृत्तचित्र television program on Bravo, set in Orange County, California.
It was the पहला the रियल housewives program in the series.
The श्रेणी is a voyeuristic dekh into the धनवान lives of these housewives, as they shop, get plastic surgery, gossip, fight and live lavishly.
The financial संकट, the शुरूआत of जिससे coincided लगभग exactly with the first season 's broadcast, has since trimmed the housewives ' lifestyles with job losses, evictions, mortgage defaults, foreclosures, and marital stress—all recorded in progressive seasons of the show.
Cyberstalking is the use of the Internet or अन्य इलेक्ट्रॉनिक अर्थात् to stalk or harass an individual, a group of individuals, or an organization.
It may include the making of false accusations or statements of fact ( as in मानहानि ), निगरानी, बनाना खतरे, पहचान चोरी, क्षति to आंकड़ा or उपकरण, the solicitation of minors for sex, or gathering information that may be used to harass.
The definition of `` harassment '' must meet the criterion that a reasonable व्यक्ति, in कब्ज़ा of the same information, would regard it as sufficient to cause another reasonable person distress.
Cyberstalking is different from spatial or offline stalking in that it occurs through the use of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक संचार प्रौद्योगिकी ऐसे as the internet.
However, it sometimes लीड to it, or is accompanied by it.
दोनो हैं दण्ड offenses.
Cyberstalking shares important विशेषताएँ साथ ऑफ़लाइन stalking.
Many stalkers – online or off – हैं प्रेरित by a ख्वाहिश to control their victims.
A cyberstalker may be an ऑनलाइन अजनबी or a person whom the target knows.
A cyberstalker may be anonymous and may solicit involvement of अन्य लोगों ऑनलाइन जो do not even know the target.
cyberstalking is a दण्ड ठोकर कि आता into खेल under state anti-stalking laws, slander laws, and harassment laws.
A cyberstalking conviction can result in a restraining order, परिवीक्षा, or भी दण्ड दंड विरूद्ध the assailant, including jail.
A business letter is usually used when writing from एक कम्पनी to another, or लिये पत्राचार between ऐसे संगठन और उनके customers, clients and other external parties.
The overall स्टाइल of अक्षर होगा निर्भर on the संबंध between the parties concerned.
There are अनेक कारण to write a business letter.
It could be to request direct information or action from another party, to order supplies from a supplier, to पहचानो a गलती कि थी वचनबद्ध, to जवाब सीधे to a निवेदन, to माफी for a wrong or simply to convey goodwill.
Even today, the business letter is स्टिल बहुत उपयोगी क्युकी it produces a स्थाई रिकार्ड, is confidential, formal and delivers persuasive, well-considered messages.
Tilapia ( ) is the common नाम लिये nearly a सौ प्रजाति of cichlid fish from the tilapiine cichlid tribe.
Tilapia are mainly freshwater fish, inhabiting shallow streams, ponds, rivers and lakes, and कम commonly मिला जीना in brackish water.
Historically, they have been of major importance in कारीगर फ़िशिंग in अफ़्रीकी और the levant, और हैं of increasing importance in aquaculture.
Tilapia can become problematic invasive प्रजाति in नई warm-water habitats, whether deliberately or accidentally introduced, but generally not in temperate climates due to their inability to survive in cooler waters below about.
Turner & hooch is a 1989 कॉमेडी नाटक अपराधों फिल्मी अभिनीत tom हैंक्स और beasley the Dog as the eponymous characters, Turner and Hooch respectively.

It was co-written by Michael Blodgett from Beyond the घाटी of the डॉल कीर्ति.
Although K-9 ( with James Belushi ) was released prior to this film ( exactly तीन महीने पहले ), टर्नर & hooch became अधिक लोकप्रिय और seemingly निष्प्रभ its greater success, even though K-9 had a very similar plot.
A पायलट लिये a टर्नर & hooch TV series was made and ran as a part of The Magical World of Disney.

Adolf हिटलर ( ; 20 अप्रैल 1889 – 30 अप्रैल 1945 ) थी an आस्ट्रिया -born जर्मनी राजनेता and the leader of the Nazi Party ( ( NSDAP ) ; National Socialist German Workers Party ).
He was chancellor of Germany from 1933 to 1945 और तानाशाह of नाजी जर्मनी ( as führer und Reichskanzler ) from 1934 to 1945.
Hitler was at the केन्द्र of नाजी जर्मनी, World War II in Europe, and the Holocaust.
Hitler was a सजा दिग्गज of World War I.
he joined the जर्मनी मजदूर ' पार्टी ( precursor of the NSDAP ) in 1919, and became leader of the NSDAP in 1921.
In 1923, he attempted a coup d'état in म्यूनिख, ज्ञात as the Beer Hall Putsch.
the विफल तख्तापलट resulted in हिटलर 's imprisonment, during which time he wrote his memoir, Mein Kampf ( My Struggle ).
After his release in 1924, Hitler gained popular support by attacking the Treaty of Versailles and promoting Pan-Germanism, antisemitism, and anti-communism with charismatic छाये और नाजी प्रचार.
After his appointment as chancellor in 1933, he transformed the वाइमर गणतंत्र into the तीसरा reich, a single-party तानाशाही आधारित on the अधिनायकवादी और autocratic ideology of Nazism.
Hitler 's aim was to स्थापित a नई अनुक्रम of निरपेक्ष नाजी German hegemony in continental Europe.
To this end, his foreign and domestic policies had the aim of seizing Lebensraum ( `` living स्पेस '' ) लिये the germanic लोगों.
He directed the rearmament of Germany and the invasion of कैंडल by the wehrmacht in सितंबर 1939, resulting in the outbreak of World War II in Europe.
Under हिटलर 's नियम, in 1941 जर्मनी शक्तियां और उनके European allies occupied most of Europe and North Africa.
In 1943, Germany had been forced onto the defensive and suffered a series of escalating defeats.
In the final days of the युद्ध, दौरान the बैटल of बर्लिन in 1945, Hitler married his long-time partner, Eva Braun.
On 30 April 1945, less than two days later, the दो वचनबद्ध आत्महत्या to avoid कैप्चर by the रेड फौज, और उनके corpses were burned.
Hitler 's aggressive foreign policy is considered the main cause of the outbreak of संसार युद्ध ii in यूरोपीय.
His antisemitic policies and racially प्रेरित विचारधारा resulted in the मौतों of at तनिक 5.5 million Jews, and millions of other people deemed racially inferior.

A domain name is an identification string that defines a फ्रेम of प्रशासनिक autonomy, authority, or control on the Internet.
Domain names are formed by the rules और प्रक्रियाओं of the डोमेन नाम System ( DNS ).
technically, कोई नाम registered in the DNS is a domain name.
Domain names are used in various नेटवर्किंग contexts और application-specific naming and addressing purposes.
In सामान्य, a डोमेन नाम represents an अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( IP ) resource, such as a personal computer used to access the Internet, a server computer hosting a web site, or the web site itself or any other service communicated via the Internet.
Domain names are organized in subordinate levels ( subdomains ) of the डीएनएस रूट डोमेन, which is nameless.
The first-level नियत of डोमेन names हैं the top-level डोमेन ( tlds ), सहित the generic top-level domains ( gTLDs ), such as the prominent domains com, info, net and org, and the country code top-level domains ( ccTLDs ).
Below these top-level domains in the DNS hierarchy are the second-level and third-level डोमेन names कि हैं typically खोलें for reservation by end-users who wish to connect local area networks to the Internet, create other publicly accessible Internet resources or run web sites.
The registration of these domain names is usually administered by डोमेन नाम registrars जो बेचें उनके सेवाएं to the public.
A fully qualified domain name ( fqdn ) is a डोमेन नाम कि is completely specified in the hierarchy of the DNS, having no omitted parts.
Domain names are usually लिखा in लोअरकेस, हालांकि लेबल्स in the डोमेन Name System are case-insensitive.
Nitrate is a polyatomic ion with the molecular formula NO3− and a molecular mass of 62.0049 g/mol. nitrates भी describe the सशुल्क कार्यात्मक समूह rono2.
These nitrate esters are a specialized class of विस्फोटक.

कृषि is a प्रमुख उद्योग in the United States and the country is a net exporter of food.
As of the last census of agriculture in 2007, वहीँ यहूद 2.2 लाख खेतो, covering an क्षेत्रफल of, an average of per farm.
Although agricultural activity occurs in most states, it is particularly concentrated in the विशाल expanse of चपटा, arable जमीन ज्ञात as the ग्रेट मैदान, जिससे encompasses the central region of the nation.
The Mpemba effect, नामित बाद tanzanian छात्र erasto mpemba, is the assertion कि warmer water can freeze faster than colder water.
Although there is anecdotal support for the effect, there is no agreement on exactly कया the प्रभाव is और अंतर्गत what circumstances it occurs.
There have been reports of similar phenomena since प्राचीन टाइम्स, हालांकि साथ अपर्याप्त detail for the claims to be replicated.
The phenomenon seems contrary to thermodynamics, but a क्रमांक of संभावित स्पष्टीकरण लिये the प्रभाव have been proposed.
Further investigations will need to decide on a precise परिभाषा of `` जमने '' और कंट्रोल a विशाल क्रमांक of starting पैरामीटर्स in order to confirm or explain the effect.
The Siamese (, ) is one of the first distinctly recognized breeds of प्राच्य cat.
The breed originated in Thailand ( formerly known as Siam ), where they are one of several देशी breeds और हैं पुकारा wichian mat ( วิเชียรมาศ, a नाम अर्थ `` moon diamond '' ).
In the 20th century the siamese बिल्ली became एक of the सबसे लोकप्रिय breeds in Europe and North America.
Quality Food Centers ( QFC ) is a supermarket chain based in Bellevue, Washington, with 64 stores in the puget ध्वनि प्रदेश of वॉशिंगटन राज्य और in the पोर्टलैंड, ऑरेगॉन metropolitan area.
In economics, the धन सप्लाई or धन भण्डार, is the total amount of monetary assets available in an economy at a specific time.
There are several ways to define `` money, '' but standard measures usually शामिल करेंसी in परिसंचरण और माँग जमा ( जमाकर्ताओं ' easily पहुँचा एसेट on the किताबे of वित्तीय institutions ).
धन सप्लाई आंकड़ा हैं अंकित and published, usually by the government or the central bank of the country.
Public and private sector analysts have long monitored changes in धन सप्लाई क्युकी of इसके प्रभाव on the दाम स्तर, महंगाई, the एक्सचेंज रेट और the business cycle.
That relation between money and prices is historically associated with the मात्रा सिद्धान्त of धन.
There is strong empirical evidence of a direct relation between money-supply विकास और long-term दाम महंगाई, at तनिक लिये rapid increases in the amount of money in the economy.
That is, a country such as Zimbabwe जिससे देखी रैपिड increases in its money supply also saw rapid increases in prices ( hyperinflation ).
This is one reason for the रिलायंस on मौद्रिक नीति as a अर्थात् of controlling inflation.
The nature of this causal कड़ी is the विषय of contention.
Some शास्त अर्थशास्त्रियों argue कि the धन सप्लाई is endogenous ( संकल्पित by the workings of the economy, not by the central bank ) and that the sources of inflation must be found in the distributional structure of the economy.
In जोड, those अर्थशास्त्रियों देखकर the सेंट्रल bank 's control over the money supply as feeble say that there are two weak links between the growth of the money supply and the inflation rate.
First, in the aftermath of a मंदी, जब अनेक संसाधन हैं underutilized, an increase in the money supply can cause a sustained increase in real production instead of inflation.
Second, if the velocity of money, i.e., the ratio between nominal GDP and money supply, changes, an increase in the money supply could have either no effect, an अतिरंजित प्रभाव, or an मनमौजी प्रभाव on the growth of nominal GDP.

IMAX ( an abbreviation for Image Maximum ) is a motion picture फिल्मी स्वरूप और a नियत of सिनेमा प्रक्षेप मानकों निर्मित by the कनाडाई कम्पनी IMAX Corporation.
IMAX has the capacity to record and display images of far वृहद आकार और रेज़ोल्यूशन than conventional film systems.
Since 2002, some feature films have been converted ( or upgraded ) into IMAX format for प्रदर्शक in imax थिएटर और कुछ have भी महरूम partially shot in IMAX.
IMAX is the most widely used system for special-venue फिल्मी प्रस्तुतियों.
, there are 697 IMAX theatres in 52 देशों.
Today 's Special is a Canadian children 's टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ उत्पादित by क्लाइव vanderburgh at TVOntario from 1981 to 1987.
It also ran on Nickelodeon and the Faith and Values Channel/Odyssey ( now the Hallmark Channel ) as well as many PBS stations throughout the संयुक्त राज्य.
It was set in a department store, based on the फ्लैगशिप स्थान of the अभी defunct सिम्पसन 's in टोरंटो.
Many sequences for it were shot at the Queen Street West और yonge गली स्टोर बाद घंटों.
Constitutionalism, in इसके सबसे सामान्य अर्थ, is `` a जटिल of विचार, attitudes, और पैटर्न of बर्ताव elaborating the principle that the authority of government derives from and is limited by a body of fundamental law ''.
A political organization is constitutional to the extent that it `` contain [ s ] institutionalized mechanisms of शक्ति कंट्रोल लिये the सुरक्षा of the रूचि और लिबर्टीज of the citizenry, including those that may be in the minority ``.
As described by political वैज्ञानिक और संवैधानिक विद्वान David Fellman :
An ice-cream headache, also known as brain freeze, cold-stimulus headache, or its given scientific name sphenopalatine ganglioneuralgia ( meaning `` nerve pain of the sphenopalatine ganglion `` ), is a form of brief cranial पीड़ा or सिरदर्द commonly संबद्ध with consumption ( particularly quick consumption ) of cold beverages or foods such as ice cream and ice pops.
It is caused by having कुछ ठंडा टच the छत of the मुँह ( तालु ), और is believed to परिणाम इससे a तंत्रिका जवाब causing rapid constriction and swelling of blood vessels or a `` referring `` of pain from the roof of the mouth to the head.
The rate of सेवन लिये ठंडा भोजन रै महरूम studied as a contributing factor.
वहीँ हैं लोगों जो can नहीं experience `` brain freeze '' or similar symptoms.
The term ice-cream headache has been in use since at least 31 January 1937, contained in a जर्नल प्रविष्टि by रेबेका timbres प्रकाशित in the 1939 book We did n't ask Utopia : a Quaker family in Soviet Russia.
The first published use of the पद दिमाग फ्रीज, as it pertains to cold-induced headaches, was on 27 May 1991.
`` Auld Lang Syne '' ( : note `` s '' rather than `` z '' ) is a स्कॉट्स कविता लिखा by रॉबर्ट burns in 1788 और नियत to the tune of a traditional folk song ( Roud # 6294 ).
It is well known in many countries, especially in the english-speaking संसार ; इसके परंपरागत उपयोग होने to celebrate the प्रारंभ of the New Year at the stroke of midnight.
By extension, it is also sung at अंत्येष्टि, graduations and as a farewell or ending to other occasions.
The international Boy स्काउट युवावस्था गति, in अनेक देशों, उपयोग it as a बंद to jamborees and other functions.
The song 's Scots title may be translated into English literally as `` बूढ़ा long चूंकि '', or अधिक idiomatically, `` long long पहले '', `` days gone by '' or `` old times ''.
Consequently `` For auld lang syne '', as it appears in the पहला लकीर of the कोरस, might be loosely translated as `` for ( the sake of ) old times ''.
The phrase `` Auld Lang Syne '' is also used in समान कविताएं by रॉबर्ट ayton ( 1570–1638 ), allan ramsay ( 1686–1757 ), and James Watson ( 1711 ) as well as older folk songs predating Burns.
Matthew Fitt uses the phrase `` In the days of auld lang syne '' as the समतुल्य of `` एकबार upon a time...
`` in उसके retelling of fairy tales in the Scots language.

Leeroy Jenkins, sometimes misspelled Leroy Jenkins and often elongated with numerous additional अक्षर, is an अंतरजाल मीम नामित लिये a खिलाड़ी अक्षर निर्मित by बेन schulz in blizzard entertainment 's MMORPG, World of Warcraft.
the अक्षर became popular due to a video of the game that circulated around the Internet.
The phenomenon has since spread beyond the boundaries of the गेमिंग जातियाँ into अन्य ऑनलाइन और मुख्यधारा मीडिया.
Oscar Grant was fatally shot by BART police officer Johannes Mehserle in Oakland, California, संयुक्त राज्य, in the जल्दी morning घंटों of नई साल 's दिन 2009.
Responding to reports of a लड़ो on a भीड़ खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल रैपिड पारगमन ट्रैन returning इससे सैन फ्रांसिस्को, बार्ट Police officers detained Oscar Grant and several other passengers on the platform at the Fruitvale BART Station.
Officer Johannes Mehserle and another अधिकारी यहूद restraining Grant, who was prostrate and allegedly resisting arrest.
Officer Mehserle stood and, according to गवाह, said : `` Get back, I 'm gon na tase him. ''
Then Mehserle drew his gun and shot Grant once in the back ; Mehserle appeared दंग, put उसके हैंड्स to उसके सिर और exclaimed, `` Oh, my God ! ''
During his court testimony, Mehserle said that Grant then exclaimed, `` तुम शॉट me ! ''
Grant turned out to be unarmed ; he was pronounced dead the next morning at Highland हॉस्पिटल in Oakland.
The कार्यक्रम यहूद captured on multiple digital video and cell phone cameras.
The footage थी disseminated to मीडिया आउटलेट और to विभिन्न वेबसाइटों, where it was watched millions of times.
The following दिनों देखी दोनो शांतिपूर्ण and violent protests.
the शूटिंग रै महरूम variously labeled an involuntary manslaughter and a summary execution.
On January 13, Alameda County prosecutors चार्ज mehserle साथ हत्या for the shooting.
He resigned his स्थिति और pleaded not guilty.
The विचारण began on June 10, 2010.
Michael Rains, Mehserle 's criminal defense attorney, argued that Mehserle mistakenly शॉट ग्रान्ट साथ उसके पिस्टल, intending to उपयोग his Taser when he saw Grant reaching for his waistband.
Pretrial filings argue that his client did not commit first-degree हत्या और पूछा a लॉस एंजिल्स न्यायधीश to instruct the jury to limit its deliberations to either second-degree murder or acquittal.
Oakland civil rights attorney John Burris filed a $ 25 million wrongful मौत अर्जी विरूद्ध बार्ट on निमित्त of ग्रान्ट 's family.
On July 8, 2010, the jury returned its verdict : Mehserle was मिला अपराधी of involuntary manslaughter और नहीं अपराधी of second-degree murder and voluntary manslaughter.
Initial protests against the सत्ताधारी यहूद शांतिपूर्वक organized ; looting, arson, destruction of property, and small riots broke out after dark.
Nearly 80 लोगों यहूद eventually arrested.
On Friday, July 9, 2010, the U.S. Justice Department opened a civil अधिकारों मामला विरूद्ध mehserle ; the संघीय सरकारी can prosecute उसे independently लिये the वही अधिनियम अंतर्गत the separate sovereigns exception to double jeopardy.
The Department of Justice will be working with the u.S. attorney 's दफ्तर in सैन Francisco and the FBI.
On November 5, 2010, Mehserle थी sentenced to दो सालो, minus time served.
he परोसा उसके समय in the लॉस एंजिल्स County Jail, occupying a private cell away from other prisoners.
He was released on जून 13, 2011 and is now on parole.
Major प्रतिनिधि of the हार्लेम Renaissance.
The Harlem Renaissance was a cultural गति कि spanned the 1920s.
At the time, it was known as the `` New Negro गति '', नामित बाद the 1925 anthology by Alain Locke.
Though it थी केन्द्रित in the हार्लेम पड़ोस of नई यॉर्क नगर, अनेक french-speaking ब्लैक लेखक इससे अफ़्रीकी and Caribbean colonies who lived in Paris were also influenced by the Harlem Renaissance.
The Harlem पुनर्जागरण is unofficially recognized to have spanned from about 1919 until the early or mid-1930s.
Many of its ideas lived on much longer.
The zenith of this `` flowering of Negro साहित्य '', as जेम्स weldon जॉनसन पसन्दीदा to कॉल the Harlem Renaissance, was placed between 1924 ( the year that Opportunity : A Journal of Negro Life hosted a party for black writers where many white publishers were in attendance ) and 1929 ( the year of the stock market crash and the beginning of the Great Depression ).
African States between 500 bce और 1500 CE

The history of Africa begins with the prehistory of अफ़्रीकी और the emergence of होमो sapiens in ईस्ट अफ़्रीकी, continuing into the present as a patchwork of diverse and politically developing nation states.
Some early evidence of agriculture in Africa dates from 16,000 BCE, and metallurgy इससे परिचय 4000 BCE.
The recorded history of जल्दी सभ्यता arose in मिश्र, and later in Nubia, the Maghreb and the Horn of Africa.
During the Middle Ages, islam स्प्रेड through the regions.
Crossing the Maghreb और the सहेल, a major center of Muslim culture was Timbuktu.
Some notable pre-colonial states and societies in Africa include the Nok culture, Mali Empire, Ashanti Empire, Kingdom of Mapungubwe, Kingdom of Sine, Kingdom of Saloum, Kingdom of Baol, Kingdom of Zimbabwe, Kingdom of Kongo, Ancient Carthage, Numidia, Mauretania, the Aksumite Empire, the Ajuuraan State and the Adal Sultanate.
From the late 15th सदी, europeans और arabs took slaves from West, Central and Southeast Africa overseas in the African slave trade.
European colonization of अफ़्रीकी विकसित rapidly in the Scramble for Africa of the late 19th and early 20th centuries.
Following struggles for independence in many भाग of the महाद्वीप, as खूब as a weakened Europe after the Second World War ; decolonization took place.
Africa 's history has been challenging for researchers in the फ़ील्ड of अफ़्रीकी अध्ययन क्युकी of the किल्लत of लिखा sources in large parts of sub-Saharan Africa.
Scholarly techniques such as the recording of मौखिक इतिहास, ऐतिहासिक भाषाविज्ञान, पुरातत्व and genetics have been crucial.
Curry Foley was the first player in Major League बेसबॉल इतिहास to hit for the cycle.
In baseball, hitting for the cycle is the accomplishment of one batter hitting a सिंगल, a दोगुना, a ट्रिपल, और a home run in the same game.
Collecting the hits in कि अनुक्रम is ज्ञात as a `` natural cycle ''.
Cycles are uncommon in Major League Baseball ( MLB ), and have occurred 294 टाइम्स चूंकि the पहला by curry फोली in 1882.
The cycle is roughly as common as a no-hitter ( 279 आवृत्ति in एमएलबी इतिहास ) ; it has been called `` one of the rarest '' and `` most difficult feats '' in baseball.
Based on 2009 offensive स्तर, the संभाव्यता of an औसत एमएलबी खिलाड़ी hitting लिये a साईकिल विरूद्ध an औसत team in a game is approximately 0.00590 % ; this corresponds to about 2.5 cycles in a 162-game season with 30 teams.
In other baseball लीग, the साईकिल is achieved less frequently.
Through September 4, 2008, 62 खिलाड़ी in निप्पन Professional Baseball ( NPB ), the top-level baseball organization in Japan, have hit for the cycle, the most recent being Michihiro Ogasawara.
Two players have hit for the साईकिल on the वही दिन एकबार in npb इतिहास ; इस has occurred twice in MLB history.
One NPB खिलाड़ी रै भी hit लिये the साईकिल in an NPB All-Star game.
No player has ever hit for the cycle in the एमएलबी all-star खेल or the postseason.
The main slave routes in मध्यकालीन अफ़्रीकी.
This article discusses प्रणालियों, history, and effects of slavery within Africa.
देखिए अरब स्लेव व्यापार, अटलांटिक स्लेव व्यापार, Maafa, and Slavery in contemporary Africa for other discussions.
`` Slave transport in अफ़्रीकी ''.
europeans प्रायः किया not enter the interior regions.
Slavery in Africa has existed throughout the महाद्वीप लिये अनेक सदियां, and continues in the current day.
Systems of servitude and गुलामी यहूद आम in अनेक भाग of the महाद्वीप, as they were in much of the ancient world.
In most African societies जहाँ गुलामी थी प्रचलित, the enslaved लोगों यहूद largely treated as indentured servants and not treated as chattel slaves.
जब the अरब स्लेव व्यापार और अटलांटिक स्लेव व्यापार began, many of the local slave systems changed and began supplying captives for slave markets outside of Africa.
Slavery in historical Africa was practiced in many different forms और कुछ of ये do नहीं clearly fit the definitions of slavery elsewhere in the world.
Debt slavery, enslavement of war captives, military गुलामी, और दण्ड गुलामी यहूद सब practiced in विभिन्न parts of Africa.
Although there had been some trans-Saharan trade from the interior of sub-saharan अफ़्रीकी to अन्य regions, गुलामी थी a छोटी भाग of the आर्थिक जीवन of अनेक societies in Africa until the introduction of transcontinental slave trades ( Arab and Atlantic ).
Slave practices were again transformed with European colonization of अफ़्रीकी और the औपचारिक abolition of गुलामी in the early 1900s.
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System monitor application included with the Microsoft Windows NT family of operating systems that provides limited information about computer performance and running applications, processes and CPU usage, commit charge and memory information, network activity and statistics, logged-in users, and प्रणाली सेवाएं ( और as प्रायः is the मामला साथ तन्त्र टूल्स provided by microsoft लिये खिड़कियाँ, 3rd पार्टी तन्त्र is उपलब्धियाँ जिससे भरता the आवश्यकताएँ अधिक thoroughly, e.g, `` प्रक्रम एक्सप्लोरर '', `` Extended Task Manager '', `` Anvir Task Manager '', `` Process Hacker '', and `` System Explorer '' ).
The Task Manager can also be used to set process priorities, processor affinity, forcibly terminate प्रक्रियाओं, और shut bas, restart, hibernate or log off from Windows.
Windows Task मैनेजर थी introduced with Windows NT 4.0.
Previous versions of खिड़कियाँ nt शामिल the कार्य List application, which had far fewer features.
The task list was capable of listing फिलहाल कार्यशील प्रक्रियाओं और हत्या them, or creating a new process.
In Windows XP only, a Shutdown menu is also present that allows access to standby, hibernate, फेरे बंद, restart, Log Off and Switch User.
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows ( Microsoft Windows 3.x, Windows 95, Windows 98 ) had a program known as कार्य to प्रदर्शक the कार्यक्रम currently running.
This file was executed by running the taskman.exe संचिका इससे the c : \खिड़कीs directory.

Sparsely populated in relation to its area, the Democratic Republic of the Congo ( DRC ) is home to a vast potential of natural resources and mineral wealth, its untapped जमा of कच्चा खनिज हैं अनुमानित to be लायक in excess of us $ 24 खरब, yet the अर्थव्यवस्था of the DRC has declined drastically since the mid-1980s.
At the time of its independence in 1960, drc थी the दूसरी सबसे industrialized country in Africa after South Africa ; it boasted a thriving mining sector and its agriculture sector was relatively productive.
If the viewer stares at this image for 20–60 seconds and stares at a white ऑब्जेक्ट, a ऋणात्मक afterimage होगा appear ( in इस मामला, it will be cyan on magenta ).
This can also be achieved by the viewer closing his/her eyes और tilting उनके सिर up.
An afterimage or ghost image or image burn-in is an optical illusion that refers to an चित्र continuing to appear in एक 's दृष्टि बाद the एक्सपोज़र to the original image has ceased.
One of the most common afterimages is the bright glow that seems to float before one 's आँखें बाद looking into a लाइट सोर्स लिये a few seconds.
Closing the eye can help achieve a बेहतर भाव of the रंग in its own aspect.
Afterimages come in दो फ़ॉर्म, ऋणात्मक ( inverted ) and positive ( retaining original color ).
The process behind positive afterimages is अनजान, हालांकि विचार to be सम्बन्धित to neural adaptation.
On the other hand, negative afterimages are a retinal घटना and are well understood.
Lost is an American serial नाटक टेलीविज़न श्रेणी कि premiered on सितंबर 22, 2004 on the American Broadcasting Company ( ABC ).
The series was created by J. J. Abrams and Damon Lindelof, based upon an असली पायलट स्क्रिप्ट titled nowhere written by Jeffrey Lieber.
Six seasons of the show aired, in addition to numerous काटें shows to पूर्वावलोकन पिछला एपीसोड.
ABC announced that Lost would end after six सीज़न, having उत्पादित a total of 121 episodes.
The series follows the past, present, and future experience ( s ) of the survivors of a प्लेन क्रैश on a यात्री जेट, Oceanic Flight 815, flying from Sydney to Los Angeles after it crashes on a tropical island in the South Pacific.
The series also includes stories of the lives of people already living on the island — they include the `` Others ``, जो initially antagonize the survivors, as खूब as a समूह of लोगों जो arrive on the freighter Kahana.
Each episode typically features action on the island as well as a द्वितीयक कथानक इससे another point in a character 's life.
Season 6 features a detailing of the जीवनदान of the survivors in a different reality, as if the flight had never crashed.
In the following list, the term `` featured character ( s ) '' refers to the अक्षर or वर्ण जो हैं प्रदर्शित in the secondary storyline of each episode.
`` no.
in series '' refers to the एपीसोड 's क्रमांक in the overall series, whereas `` No.
in season '' refers to the एपीसोड 's number in each particular season.
`` U.S. viewers ( million ) '' refers to the क्रमांक of अमेरिकी in लाखो जो watched the episode live.
A total of 121 episodes of Lost were produced, the last of जिससे aired on may 23, 2010.
All सीज़न हैं उपलब्धियाँ on dvd in Regions 1–4 and on Blu-ray in Regions A and B.
Flat feet ( also called pes planus or fallen arches ) is a औपचारिक reference to a medical condition in which the arch of the foot collapses, with the entire sole of the foot coming into complete or near-complete contact with the ground.
In some individuals ( an estimated 20–30 % of the general population ) the मेहराब बस never develops in एक पैर ( unilaterally ) or दोनो फीट ( bilaterally ).
Three studies ( see citations below in military section ) of military recruits have दिखाया no प्रमाण of बाद increased चोट, or पैर समस्याएं, due to चपटा फीट, in a population of people who reach military service age without prior foot problems.
however, ये अध्ययन can नहीं be प्रयुक्त to न्यायधीश संभावित future damage from this condition when diagnosed at younger ages.
They also can not be applied to persons जिनकी चपटा फीट हैं संबद्ध साथ पैर लक्षण, or निश्चित symptoms in other parts of the body ( such as the leg or back ) possibly referable to the foot.
Generation X, commonly abbreviated to gen x, is the पीढी born बाद the Western post-World War II baby boom.
Demographers, historians and commentators use शुरूआत जनम तिथियाँ इससे the early 1960s to the early 1980s.
the पद थी popularized by डगलस coupland 's 1991 novel Generation X : Tales for an Accelerated Culture.
पहले कि, it था महरूम प्रयुक्त for various subcultures or countercultures after the 1950s.
Pressure ulcers, also known as decubitus ulcers or bedsores, are स्थानीयकृत चोटों to the स्किन and/or underlying ऊतक प्रायः over a bony prominence, as a result of pressure, or pressure in combination with shear and/or friction.
Most commonly इस होगा be the sacrum, coccyx, एड़ियों or the कूल्हों, लकिन अन्य साइट ऐसे as the elbows, knees, ankles or the back of the cranium can be affected.
The cause of pressure ulcers is pressure लागू to नरम ऊतक so कि रक्त प्रवाह to the soft tissue is completely or partially obstructed.
Shear is also a कारण ; shear खींचता on रक्त vessels that feed the skin.
Pressure ulcers सबसे commonly develop in व्यक्तियों जो are not moving about or are confined to wheelchairs.
It is widely believed that other factors can influence the tolerance of skin for pressure and shear thereby increasing the risk of दबाव अल्सर विकास.
These factors are protein-calorie malnutrition, microclimate ( skin wetness caused by sweating or incontinence ), diseases that reduce blood flow to the skin, such as arteriosclerosis or diseases that reduce the feeling in the स्किन, ऐसे as paralysis or न्यूरोपैथी.
The healing of pressure ulcers may be slowed by the आयु of the व्यक्ति, चिकित्सा शर्तें ( ऐसे as arteriosclerosis, मधुमेह or संक्रमण ), धूम्रपान or medications such as antiinflammatory drugs.
Although often prevented and treatable if found early, pressure ulcers can be very difficult to prevent in critically बीमार मरीजों, frail बड़ो, व्हीलचेयर उपयोक्ता ( विशेषकर जहाँ स्पाइनल चोट is involved ) and terminally ill patients.
Primary prevention is to redistribute दबाव by turning the patient regularly.
The benefit of turning to avoid further sores is खूब प्रलेखित चूंकि at तनिक the 19th century.
In addition to turning and re-positioning the patient in bed or wheelchair, eating a balanced diet साथ पर्याप्त प्रोटीन और keeping the स्किन फ़्री इससे एक्सपोज़र to मूत्र और स्टूल is very important.
The prevalence of दबाव छाले in hospital settings is high, but improvements are being made.
According to the 2010 IPUP ( International दबाव अल्सर व्यापकता सर्वेक्षण ) conducted in Canada, there was a significant decrease in the overall facility-acquired prevalence of pressure ulcers from 2009-2010.
Ulcers were most commonly identified at the sacral/coccyx अल्सर स्थान ; however, एड़ी छाले यहूद the सबसे आम facility-acquired location in the survey.
overboard is a 1987 अमरीकी romantic comedy film starring Goldie Hawn and Kurt Russell.
