Green Bay is a city in and the county seat of Brown County in the U.S. state of Wisconsin, located at the head of Green Bay, a sub-basin of झील मिशिगन, at the मुँह of the फॉक्स नदी.
It रै an उन्नयन of ऊपर sea level and is located north of Milwaukee.
The population was 104,057 at the 2010 census.
It is the third-largest नगर in the राज्य of विस्कॉन्सिन, after Milwaukee and Madison.
It is also the third-largest city on the वेस्ट shore of झील मिशिगन, बाद शिकागो और मिल्वौकी.
Green Bay is घर to the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग, making it by far the smallest metropolitan area in the USA to host a major professional sports franchise.
Green Bay is the principal city of the Green Bay Metropolitan Statistical Area, जिससे कवर भूरा, kewaunee, and Oconto Counties and had a combined population of 282,599 at the 2000 census.
Green Bay is an industrial city साथ अनेक meatpacking और पेपर पौधे, और a बंदरगाहों on ग्रीन खाड़ी, an भुजा of झील मिशिगन कि locals call the Bay of Green Bay, to avoid conflating it with the eponymous city.
It is home to the National Railroad Museum ; the Neville Public Museum, with exhibitions of आर्ट, इतिहास, और विज्ञान ; और the विश्वविद्यालयों of Wisconsin–Green Bay.
Luteinizing hormone ( LH, also known as lutropin and sometimes lutrophin ) is a हार्मोन उत्पादित by gonadotroph cells in the anterior pituitary gland.
In महिलाओं, an अधि वृद्धि of lh ( `` lh surge '' ) triggers ovulation and development of the corpus luteum.
In males, where LH had also been called interstitial cell-stimulating hormone ( icsh ), it stimulates leydig कोशिका उत्पादन of टेस्टोस्टेरोन.
It acts synergistically साथ fsh.
Selena quintanilla-pérez ( अप्रैल 16, 1971 – कूच 31, 1995 ), known simply as Selena, was an American singer-songwriter.
She was named the `` शीर्ष लैटिन कलाकार of the '90s '' और `` बेहतरीन selling Latin artist of the decade '' by Billboard for her fourteen top-ten singles in the Top Latin Songs chart, including seven number-one hits.
Selena had the सबसे कामयाब singles of 1994 और 1995, `` Amor Prohibido `` and `` No Me Queda Más ``.
She was पुकारा `` the महारानी of Tejano music `` and the Mexican equivalent of Madonna.
Selena released her first एल्बम, सेलिना y लॉस dinos, at the आयु of बारह.
She won Female Vocalist of the Year at the 1987 Tejano म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार और उतरा a recording contract with EMI a few years later.
Her fame grew throughout the early 1990s, especially in Spanish-speaking देशों, और वो था begun recording in English as well.
Selena थी murdered at the आयु of 23 on कूच 31, 1995 by Yolanda Saldívar, the former president of her fan club.
On April 12, 1995, two weeks after her मौत, जार्ज W. बुश, राज्यपाल of टेक्सास at the time, declared her birthday `` Selena Day '' in Texas.
Warner Bros. produced Selena, a फिल्मी आधारित on उसके जीवन अभिनीत जेनिफर Lopez, in 1997.
Selena 's life was also the basis of the musical सेलिना forever starring Veronica Vazquez as Selena.
In June 2006 Selena was commemorated साथ a life-sized कांस्य प्रतिमा ( mirador de la flor in Corpus Christi, Texas ) and a Selena museum opened there.
She has sold over 60 लाख एल्बम विश्वव्यापी, बनाना उसके एक of the best-selling artists of all time.
She is also the only female artist to have five albums in u.s. बिलबोर्ड 200 at the same time.
German stahlhelm from World War II
Insignia of the bolivian फौज colorados रेजीमेंट, प्रर्दशित a Stahlhelm and two crossed bayonets
Stahlhelm ( बहुवचन, stahlhelme ) is जर्मनी for `` steel helmet ''.
The Imperial German Army began to replace the traditional boiled-leather Pickelhaube ( spiked combat helmet ) साथ the stahlhelm दौरान संसार युद्ध i in 1916.
The term Stahlhelm refers both to a generic steel helmet, और अधिक specifically to the distinctive ( and iconic ) German design.
The Stahlhelm, with its distinctive `` coal scuttle `` shape, was an instantly recognizable icon for military imagery and became a आम तत्व of सैन्य प्रचार on दोनो sides, just like the Pickelhaube before it.
Its name was भी प्रयुक्त by the stahlhelm, a अर्धसैनिक nationalist organization established at the end of 1918.
glow-in-the-dark may refer to:
Bioluminescence, the production and emission of लाइट by a living organism
Chemiluminescence, is the emission of लाइट ( संदीप्ति ) without emission of heat
Phosphorescence, a विशिष्ट प्रकार of photoluminescence related to fluorescence
Radioluminescence, production of संदीप्ति in a सामग्री by the बमबारी of ionizing radiation
Glow in the अंधेरा दौरे, a 2008 कॉन्सर्ट tour by Kanye West
Frankfurt विमानक्षेत्र serves as a हब नगर लिये लुफ़्थान्सा and receives flights from Star Alliance carriers.
Airline hubs are airports ranked as large, medium, small, and non-hubs as one of the FAA airport categories which are re-evaluated प्रत्येक साल आधारित on क्रमांक of वाणिज्यिक यात्री.
The more common but informal use for the phrase airline hub is an airport that an airline uses as a transfer point to मिलेंगी यात्री to उनके intended गंतव्य.
It is part of a hub and spoke model, where travelers moving between airports not served by direct फ़्लाइट बदलें planes en route to their destinations.
This is as opposed to the पाइंट to Point model.
अनेक hubs of the एयरलाइंस हैं भी situated at airports in the cities of the respective head offices.
Some एयरलाइंस may उपयोग तभी a सिंगल हब, while other airlines use multiple hubs.
Hubs are used for both यात्री फ़्लाइट as खूब as cargo flights.
Many एयरलाइंस भी उपयोग फ़ोकस शहरों, which function much the same as hubs.
Airlines may also use द्वितीयक hubs, a non-technical term for large focus cities.
A हब in the मध्य of a रूट is अधिक effective than at either end as connecting traffic more easily fills the plane - passengers prefer a one-stop ( two-leg ) route over a two-stop ( three-leg ) route.
खोखला lacedaemon.
Site of the Menelaion, the shrine to Helen and Menelaus constructed anciently in the Bronze Age city that stood on the hill of therapne on the बाएँ बैंको of the eurotas नदी निहार the future site of Dorian Sparta.
आरपार the घाटी the successive ridges of Mount Taygetus are in evidence.
Sparta ( Doric Greek : ; Attic यूनानी : ), or lacedaemon, थी a prominent city-state in ancient Greece, situated on the banks of the Eurotas River in Laconia, in south-eastern Peloponnese.
It emerged as a political entity around the 10th सदी bc, जब the invading Dorians subjugated the local, non-Dorian population.
Around 650 bc, it रोज़ to become the प्रबल military land-power in ancient Greece.
Given its सैन्य pre-eminence, स्पार्टा थी पहचाना as the overall leader of the combined Greek forces during the Greco-Persian Wars.
Between 431 and 404 BC, Sparta was the principal enemy of Athens during the peloponnesian युद्ध, इससे जिससे it उभरा विजयी, though at great cost.
स्पार्टा 's शिकस्त by thebes in the बैटल of Leuctra in 371 BC ended Sparta 's prominent role in Greece.
however, it कायम इसके राजनैतिक स्वतंत्रता until the Roman conquest of Greece in 146 BC.
It तब underwent a long काल of decline, especially in the Middle Ages, when many Spartans moved to live in Mystras.
Modern Sparta is the capital of the यूनानी क्षेत्रीय ईकाई of laconia और a बीच लिये the processing of goods such as citrus and olives.
Sparta थी अद्वितीय in प्राचीन यूनानियों लिये इसके सोशल प्रणाली और constitution, which completely focused on military training and excellence.
Its inhabitants were classified as Spartiates ( Spartan citizens, who enjoyed full rights ), Mothakes ( non-Spartan free men raised as Spartans ), Perioikoi ( freedmen ), और helots ( state-owned serfs, enslaved non-spartan local population ).
Spartiates underwent the rigorous agoge training और शिक्षा regimen, और spartan phalanges were widely considered to be among the best in battle.
Spartan women enjoyed considerably अधिक अधिकारों और समता to मेन than elsewhere in the classical world.
Sparta was the subject of fascination in its own day, as well as in the वेस्ट following the पुनरुद्धार of classical learning.
This love or admiration of Sparta is known as laconism or laconophilia.
Fantasy football is an इंटरैक्टिव प्रतियोगिता in जिससे उपयोक्ता compete विरूद्ध each other as general managers of virtual teams.
The players कि an व्यक्तिगत is समर्थ to मैनेज हैं पेशेवर American football players in the National Football League.
The different actions people are able to make are drafting, trading, adding or छोड़ने खिलाड़ी, and changing rosters.
Due to the growth of the Internet, Fantasy football has vastly increased in popularity, particularly because Fantasy football providers such as ESPN, Yahoo, CBS, and the NFL itself हैं समर्थ to रखना track of आंकडे entirely ऑनलाइन, eliminating the need to check box scores and newspapers regularly to keep track of players.
Most leagues have a single सप्ताह चैंपियनशिप in Week 16 of the NFL season.
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100, based on UN 2010 projections ( red, नारंगी, ग्रीन ) और us जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ऐतिहासिक estimates ( black ).
Actual recorded जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़े हैं in blue.
According to the उच्चतम अनुमान, the संसार population may rise to 16 billion by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate, it may decline to 6 billion.
The world population is the total number of जीना इंसानो on धरती.
As of today, it is estimated to number billion by the United राज्य जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ( uscb ).
The USCB estimates that the world population exceeded 7 अरब on कूच 12, 2012.
according to a पृथक अनुमान by the United Nations Population Fund, it reached this milestone on October 31, 2011.
The world population has experienced निरन्तर विकास चूंकि the समाप्त of the ग्रेट अकाल और the Black Death in 1350, when it stood at around 370 million.
The highest rates of growth – global जनसांख्यिकी increases ऊपर 1.8 % प्रति साल – were seen briefly during the 1950s, and for a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s.
The विकास रेट peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, and had declined to 1.1 % by 2011.
कुल सालाना births यहूद उच्चतम in the लेट 1980s at परिचय 138 लाख, और हैं अभी अपेक्षित to remain essentially constant at their 2011 level of 134 million, while deaths number 56 million per year, and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040.
वर्तमान projections दिखाएँ a जारी बढ़ाएँ in जनसांख्यिकी in the निकट भविष्य ( but a steady decline in the population growth rate ), with the global population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates भविष्यवाणी further विकास, stagnation, or भी overall decline in the global population by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further संसार जनसांख्यिकी विकास, citing the growing pressures on the पर्यावरण, global food supplies, and energy resources.
Skeletal मांसपेशियां होमो sapiens
This is a table of मांसपेशियां of the human anatomy.
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical human, and almost every muscle constitutes one भाग of a जोड़ी of एकसमान द्विपक्षीय मांसपेशियां, मिला on दोनो पहलू, resulting in लगभग 320 pairs of muscles, as presented in this article.
Nevertheless, the exact number is difficult to define क्युकी अलग स्त्रोत समूह मांसपेशियां differently, e.g. regarding कया is पारिभाषित as different parts of a single muscle or as several muscles.
Examples दायरा from 640 to 850.
The muscles of the human body can be categorized into a क्रमांक of समूह जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the सिर और गर्दन, मांसपेशियां of the torso or trunk, muscles of the upper limbs, and muscles of the lower limbs.
The action refers to the कार्रवाई of प्रत्येक मांसपेशी इससे the मानक anatomical position.
In other positions, other actions may be performed.
A gold bar is a quantity of परिष्कृत धात्विक सुनहरा of कोई आकार कि is बना by a बार producer meeting standard conditions of manufacture, labeling, and record keeping.
Larger gold bars that are उत्पादित by pouring the molten मेटल into molds are called ingots.
छोटी बार may be manufactured by minting or stamping from appropriately rolled gold sheets.
The standard gold bar held as gold reserves by central banks and traded among bullion dealers is the 400-troy-ounce ( 12.4 kg or 438.9 औंस ) शुभ डिलीवरी सुनहरा bar.
The kilobar, which is to say 1000 grams in mass, is the बार कि is अधिक manageable और is प्रयुक्त extensively लिये trading and investment.
The प्रीमियम on ये बार जब traded is बहुत low over the spot value of the gold making it ideal for small transfers between banks and traders.
Most kilobars are flat, although कुछ निवेशकों, विशेषकर in यूरोपीय, prefer the brick shape.
Elisha Archibald `` Archie '' Manning III ( born May 19, 1949 ) is a former American football quarterback in the National Football League, playing लिये the नई ऑरलियन्स संतो इससे 1971 to 1982, तब लिये the Houston Oilers and Minnesota Vikings.
He is the पिता of वर्तमान डेनवर broncos क्वार्टरबैक peyton Manning, current New York Giants starting quarterback Eli Manning, and former Ole Miss receiver Cooper Manning.
Advocacy is a political process by an individual or group which aims to influence public-policy and resource allocation decisions within राजनैतिक, आर्थिक, और सोशल प्रणालियों और संस्थानों.
Advocacy can include many activities that a person or organization undertakes including media campaigns, public बोलना, commissioning और प्रकाशन शोध or पोल or the दाखिल of an amicus ब्रैड.
Lobbying ( often by lobby groups ) is a form of advocacy जहाँ a सीधा दृष्टिकोण is बना to विधायक on an समस्या जिससे plays a significant role in modern politics.
Research is beginning to explore how advocacy groups in the U.S. and कनाडा हैं using सोशल मीडिया to सुकर नागरिक सगाई and collective action.
The flag of Mexico ( Spanish : bandera de méxico ) is a लंबवत tricolor of green, white, and red with the national coat of arms charged in the center of the white stripe.
While the meaning of the colors has changed over time, these three colors were adopted by Mexico following independence from Spain during the देश 's युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता, और subsequent First Mexican Empire.
The current flag was अपनाया in 1968, but the overall design has been used since 1821, when the First National Flag was created.
The current law of national symbols, Law on the National Arms, Flag, and Anthem, that governs the use of the नेशनल ध्वज रै महरूम in प्लेस चूंकि 1984.
Red, white, and green are the रंगों of the नेशनल liberation army in Mexico.
The central emblem is the Aztec pictogram लिये tenochtitlan ( अभी मैक्सिको नगर ), the बीच of their empire.
It recalls the लेजेंड कि प्रेरित the Aztecs to settle on what was originally a lake-island.
The form of the coat of बाहें थी सबसे recently revised in 1968.
A ribbon in the नेशनल रंगों is at the bottom of the coat of arms.
Throughout इतिहास, the ध्वज रै बदला चार टाइम्स, as the डिज़ाइन of the कोट of arms and the length-width ratios of the flag have been modified.
However, the coat of arms has था the वही सुविधाएँ throughout : an त्रिभुज, पकड़कर a serpent in इसके talon, is perched on शीर्ष of a prickly pear cactus ; the cactus is situated on a rock that rises above a lake.
The coat of arms is derived from an Aztec legend that their gods told them to build a city where they स्पॉट an त्रिभुज on a nopal खाने a serpent, जिससे is now Mexico City.
The current नेशनल ध्वज, the चौथी नेशनल ध्वज, is also used as the Mexican naval ensign by ships registered in Mexico.
A destination marketing organization or convention and visitor bureau promotes a town, city, प्रदेश, or देश in अनुक्रम to बढ़ाएँ the क्रमांक of visitors.
It promotes the development and marketing of a destination, focusing on convention sales, पर्यटन विपणन, और सेवाएं.
Such organizations promote economic development of a destination by increasing विज़िट इससे पर्यटकों और कारोबार travelers, जिससे generates overnight lodging for a destination, visits to restaurants, and shopping revenues.
Convention and visitor bureaus are the most महत्वपूर्ण पर्यटन विपणन संगठन in उनके संबंधित पर्यटक destinations, as they are directly responsible for marketing the destination brand through travel and tourism `` product awareness '' to visitors.
DMOs उपज अरबों of डॉलर in सीधा और अप्रत्यक्ष आय और कर for their destinations ' economies with their marketing and sales expertise.
Destination विपणन संगठन हैं प्रायः पुकारा सफर, convention, visitors, or tourism bureaux, welcome centers, information centers and more.
regardless of the नाम, ये संगठन offer many services to the traveling public.
the नीलगाय or wapiti ( cervus canadensis ) is एक of the largest species of deer in the world, and one of the largest land mammals in North America and eastern Asia.
It was long believed to be a subspecies of the यूरोपीय रेड हिरण ( cervus elaphus ), लकिन प्रमाण from a 2004 study of the mitochondrial DNA indicates that the two are distinct species.
This animal should not be confused with the larger मूस ( alces alces ), to which the name `` elk '' applies in Eurasia.
Apart from the moose, the only other member of the हिरण परिवार to प्रतिद्वंद्वी the नीलगाय in आकार is the दक्षिण एशियाई sambar ( Rusa unicolor ).
Elk range in forest and forest-edge habitat, feeding on grasses, पौधे, leaves, and bark.
Although native to उत्तर अमेरिका और पूर्वी एशिया, वे have adapted खूब to देशों जहाँ वे have been introduced, including Argentina, Australia, and New Zealand.
Their great adaptability may threaten endemic प्रजाति और ecosystems into जिससे they have been introduced.
पुरूष नीलगाय have विशाल antlers which are shed each year.
males भी engage in ritualized समागम व्यवहार during the rut, including posturing, antler wrestling ( sparring ), and bugling, a loud series of vocalizations which establishes dominance over other males and attracts females.
Elk are susceptible to a number of infectious diseases, कुछ of जिससे can be transmitted to पशुधन.
Efforts to eliminate infectious diseases from elk populations, largely through टीकाकरण, have had mixed success.
Some cultures revere the elk as a आध्यात्मिक फ़ोर्स.
In parts of Asia, antlers and their velvet are प्रयुक्त in परंपरागत दवाइयाँ.
Elk are hunted as a game species ; the meat is leaner and higher in प्रोटीन than बीफ or chicken.
The George Washington University ( GW, GWU, or जार्ज वॉशिंगटन ) is a व्यापक निजी, coeducational research university located in Washington, D.C..
It awards certificates, Bachelor degrees, Masters degrees, and PhDs across several दर्जन disciplines.
The university was chartered by an Act of Congress on February 9, 1821 as The columbian कॉलेज in the ज़िला of कोलंबिया.
The lion ( Panthera leo ) is one of the four big cats in the genus पेंथेरा और a सदस्य of the परिवार Felidae.
With कुछ males exceeding in वज़न, it is the second-largest living cat after the tiger.
Wild lions currently exist in sub-Saharan Africa and in Asia ( where an endangered remnant population resides in गिर वन नेशनल पार्क in इण्डिया ) जबकि अन्य प्रकार of शेर have disappeared इससे उत्तर अफ़्रीकी और Southwest Asia in historic times.
Until the लेट pleistocene, परिचय 10,000 सालो पहले, the शेर was the most widespread large land mammal after humans.
They were found in most of Africa, across Eurasia from पश्चिमी यूरोपीय to इण्डिया, और in the americas from the Yukon to Peru.
The शेर is a vulnerable प्रजाति, having seen a major population decline of 30–50 % over the past two decades in its African range.
Lion populations are untenable बाहर designated reserves and national parks.
Although the cause of the decline is not fully समझा, आवास घाटा और विरोध साथ इंसानो हैं फिलहाल the greatest causes of concern.
Within Africa, the वेस्ट अफ़्रीकी शेर जनसांख्यिकी is particularly endangered.
Lions live for 10–14 years in the wild, जबकि in captivity वे can सजीव longer than 20 years.
In the wild, males seldom live longer than 10 सालो, as injuries sustained from continual fighting with rival males greatly reduce their longevity.
They typically inhabit सवाना और घासभूमि, हालांकि वे may take to bush and forest.
Lions are unusually सोशल compared to other cats.
A pride of lions consists of related females and औलाद और a छोटी क्रमांक of वयस्क males.
Groups of female lions typically हंट साथ, preying mostly on large ungulates.
Lions are apex and keystone predators, हालांकि वे scavenge as अवसर allows.
While lions do not typically हंट इंसानो, कुछ have been known to do so.
Sleeping मुख्यतः दौरान the दिन, शेर हैं primarily nocturnal, although bordering on crepuscular in nature.
Highly distinctive, the पुरूष शेर is easily recognised by its mane, and its face is one of the most widely recognised animal symbols in human culture.
Depictions have existed from the Upper Paleolithic period, with carvings and paintings इससे the lascaux और chauvet गुफाएं, through वस्तुतः सब प्राचीन और मध्यकालीन संस्कृतियों जहाँ वे एकबार occurred.
It has been extensively depicted in sculptures, in paintings, on नेशनल ध्वज, और in समकालीन films and literature.
Lions have been रखा in menageries चूंकि the समय of the रोमन साम्राज्य, और have been a key species sought for exhibition in zoos over the world since the late 18th century.
Zoos are cooperating worldwide in प्रजनन कार्यक्रम लिये the endangered Asiatic subspecies.
In the history of video games, the seventh पीढी of consoles is the पिछला पीढी, और शामिल consoles released since late by Nintendo, Microsoft, and Sony.
For home consoles, the seventh generation began on 22 नवम्बर 2005 साथ the रिलीज of एक्सबॉक्स 360 और जारी साथ the रिलीज of प्लेस्टेशन 3 on 11 November 2006, and Wii on 19 November 2006.
प्रत्येक नई कंसोल introduced a नई type of breakthrough in technology.
The Xbox 360 offered games rendered natively at HD resolutions, the PlayStation 3 offered, in addition to FHD gaming, HD फिल्म प्लेबैक via a built-in 3d blu-ray डिस्क खिलाड़ी, और the Wii focused on integrating controllers with movement sensors as well as joysticks.
Joining निन्टेंडो in the गति मार्केट, Sony released the PlayStation Move in September 2010.
The PlayStation Move features motion sensing gaming, समान to कि of the Wii.
Microsoft also joined Sony and Nintendo, साथ इसके kinect.
Unlike the other two प्रणालियों ( प्लेस्टेशन 3 और वी ), kinect करता नहीं उपयोग कोई परिरक्षक of any sort and makes the users the `` controller. ''
having बेची 8 लाख इकाई in इसके पहला 60 दिनों on the मार्केट, kinect रै claimed the Guinness World Record of being the `` fastest selling consumer electronics device ''.
While the Xbox 360 offers wired परिरक्षक as a स्टैंडअलोन उत्पाद, सब प्लेस्टेशन 3 controllers can be used in wired and wireless configurations.
Starting with handheld consoles, the seventh generation began on 21 November 2004 with the North अमरीकी परिचय of the निन्टेंडो ds as a `` तीसरा pillar '', alongside निन्टेंडो 's मौजूदा खेल Boy Advance and GameCube consoles.
The Nintendo DS ( NDS ) features a touch screen and built-in माइक्रोफोन, और supports बेतार आईईईई 802.11 ( Wi-Fi ) standards.
Additionally, the संशोधित संस्करण of the nds, the dsi, सुविधाएँ दो निर्मित in कैमरे, the ability to download games from the DSi store, and a web browser.
The PlayStation Portable, or PSP, released later the same साल on 12 दिसम्बर 2004, followed a अलग pattern.
It became the first handheld video game console to use an optical डिस्क स्वरूप, सार्वभौमिक मीडिया डिस्क ( umd ), as its primary storage media.
Sony also gave the PSP robust multi-media काबिलियत, कनेक्टिविटी साथ the प्लेस्टेशन 3 and other PSPs, and Internet connectivity.
The निन्टेंडो ds likewise रै कनेक्टिविटी to the अंतरजाल through the निन्टेंडो wi-fi कनेक्शन and Nintendo DS Browser, as well as wireless connectivity to other DS systems and Wii consoles.
Despite high sales numbers for both consoles, PlayStation Portable sales have consistently lagged behind those of the Nintendo DS ; nevertheless, the प्लेस्टेशन पोर्टेबल रै the भेद of होने the best-selling non-nintendo हैंडहेल्ड गेमिंग प्रणाली.
Sgt. Pepper 's Lonely Hearts Club Band ( often shortened to Sgt. Pepper ) is the आठवीं स्टुडियो एल्बम by अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान बैंड the बीटल्स.
Released in June 1967, the album included songs such as `` With a Little सहायता इससे my मित्रों ``, `` लुसी in the आसमान साथ ईंट ``, और `` a दिन in the Life ``.
Continuing the artistic maturation seen on the band 's album Revolver ( 1966 ), Sgt. Pepper further departed from the conventional पॉप चट्टान मुहावरा of the समय और incorporated balladry, psychedelic, music hall, and symphonic influences.
दौरान the sgt. pepper सत्र, the समूह improved upon the quality of their music 's production while exploring experimental recording techniques.
Producer George Martin 's innovative approach शामिल the उपयोग of an ऑर्केस्ट्रा.
Widely acclaimed and imitated, the album cover, designed by अंग्रेज़ी पॉप कलाकारों पीटर ब्लेक और jann haworth, थी प्रेरित by a स्केच by पॉल mccartney कि चित्रित the band posing in front of a collage of some of their favourite celebrities.
Sgt. Pepper was a worldwide critical और वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी, बिता 27 सप्ताह at the शीर्ष of the UK Album Chart and 15 weeks at number one on the US Billboard 200.
A seminal कार्य in the उभरते साइकेडेलिक चट्टान स्टाइल, the एल्बम थी critically acclaimed upon release and won four Grammy Awards in 1968.
With an estimated 32 million copies sold, it is one of the संसार 's बेहतरीन selling एल्बम.
Sgt. Pepper is considered by many to be the most influential और प्रसिद्ध चट्टान एल्बम कभी, और रै महरूम नामित the महानतम एल्बम of all time by both All Time Top 1000 Albums and Rolling Stone.
The temporal lobe is a region of the cerebral cortex that is located beneath the पार्श्ववर्ती फिशर on दोनो दिमागी hemispheres of the mammalian brain.
The temporal lobes are involved in the retention of visual memories, प्रसंस्करण संवेदी इनपुट, comprehending भाषा, storing नई यादें, emotion, and deriving meaning.
The human lungs are the organs of श्वसन in इंसानो.
Humans have two lungs, a right lung और a बाएँ फेफड़ों.
The right lung consists of three lobes while the बाएँ फेफड़ों is थोड़ा smaller consisting of only two lobes ( the left lung has a `` cardiac notch '' allowing space for the heart within the chest ).
Together, the lungs contain approximately of airways and 300 to 500 million alveoli, having a कुल सतह क्षेत्रफल of परिचय ( ) in वयस्कों — roughly the same area as one side of a tennis court.
furthermore, if सब of the capillaries कि घेर the alveoli were unwound and laid end to end, they would extend for about.
Each lung weighs, इसलिए बनाना the संपूर्ण organ about.
इंसान lungs
The trachea divides into two bronchi ( एक लिये प्रत्येक पक्ष ) at the level of T4.
This जंक्शन is भी known as the carina.
The conducting मण्डल contains the श्वासनली, the bronchi, the bronchioles, और the terminal bronchioles The respiratory zone contains the respiratory bronchioles, the alveolar ducts, and the alveoli.
The conducting zone and the respiratory stuffers ( but not the alveoli ) are made up of airways.
the conducting मण्डल रै no गैस एक्सचेंज साथ the blood, and is reinforced with cartilage in order to hold open the airways.
the conducting मण्डल warms the air to and humidifies the air.
It भी cleanses the एयर by removing particles via cilia located on the walls of all the passageways.
The lungs हैं घिरी by the rib cage.
The respiratory मण्डल is the साईट of gas exchange with blood.
The sympathetic nervous system via noradrenaline एक्टिंग on the beta receptors causes bronchodilation.
The parasympathetic nervous system via acetylcholine, जिससे अधिनियमों on the m-3 muscarinic receptors, maintains the resting tone of the bronchiolar smooth muscle.
This action is related, हालांकि माना पृथक इससे bronchoconstriction.
Many other non-autonomic nervous and biochemical stimuli, including carbon डाइऑक्साइड और ऑक्सीजन, हैं भी शामिल in the regulation process.
The pleural cavity is the potential space between the parietal pleura, अस्तर the भीतरी वॉल of the thoracic cage, and the visceral pleura lining the lungs.
The lung parenchyma is strictly used to refer solely to alveolar ऊतक साथ respiratory bronchioles, alveolar नलिकाएं and terminal bronchioles.
However, it often includes any form of lung tissue, also including bronchioles, bronchi, रक्त बरतन और फेफड़ों interstitium.
The margarita is a Mexican cocktail consisting of tequila mixed with Cointreau or similar orange -flavoured liqueur और लाइम or नीबू रस, प्रायः परोसा साथ नमक on the कांच rim.
it is the सबसे आम tequila-based cocktail in the United States.
The पेय is परोसा shaken साथ ice ( on the rocks ), blended with ice ( frozen margarita ), or without ice ( straight up ).

Burgundy is a dark red color associated with the Burgundy wine of the वही नाम, जिससे in फेरे is named after the Burgundy region of France.
The color burgundy is similar to अन्य शेड्स of अंधेरा रेड such as maroon.
When referring to the रंग, `` बरगंडी '' is usually not capitalized.
The first recorded use of `` बरगंडी '' as a रंग नाम in English was in 1881.

Missing in action ( MIA ) is a casualty Category assigned under the Status of Missing to हथियारबंद सेवाएं कर्मियों जो हैं reported missing during active service.
They may have महरूम मारे, wounded, become a prisoner of war, or deserted.
If deceased, neither their remains nor संगीन can be positively पहचाना.
Becoming MIA has been an occupational रिस्क लिये सेवा कर्मियों for as long as there has been warfare.

First Christian Church at 124 Cora Street in बीच is एक of the oldest congregations in the जातियाँ.
Center is a city in Shelby काउंटी, Texas, United States.
The population was 5,193 at the 2010 census.
It is the county सीट of शेल्बी काउंटी.
It is named for its location near the बीच of शेल्बी काउंटी, नहीं लिये इसके स्थान in Texas as it is located near the Louisiana border.
Intense red-eye प्रभाव in ब्लू आँखें with dilated pupil
The red-eye effect in photography is the common रूप of रेड विद्यार्थियों in रंग photographs of eyes.
It occurs when using a फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक फ्लैश बहुत बंद to the camera lens ( as with most compact cameras ), in ambient low light.
The effect appears in the eyes of humans and पशु कि have tapetum lucidum.
Theatrical followspot operators, positioned nearly coincidentally with a very bright लाइट और somewhat दूर इससे the अभिनेताओं, occasionally witness red-eye in actors on stage.
The effect is not visible to the rest of the audience क्युकी it is reliant on the बहुत छोटी कोण between the followspot ऑपरेटर and the light.
The विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, सांता बारबरा ( commonly referred to as uc सांता बारबरा or UCSB ) is a public research university and one of the ten general campuses of the University of California system.
The main campus is स्तिथ on a साईट in goleta, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, United States, from Santa Barbara and northwest of Los Angeles.
Tracing its roots back to 1891 as an independent teachers ' college, UCSB joined the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया प्रणाली in 1944 और is the third-oldest general-education campus in the system.
UCSB is one of America 's Public Ivy विश्वविद्यालयों, जिससे recognizes शीर्ष public research universities in the United States.
The university is a comprehensive doctoral university and is व्यवस्थित into पाँच कॉलेजों और स्कूलों offering 87 undergraduate degrees and 55 graduate degrees.
The कैम्पस is the 6th-largest in the uc प्रणाली by नामांकन with 18,977 undergraduate and 2,950 graduate students.
In 2012, UCSB was ranked 41st among `` नेशनल विश्वविद्यालयों '' and 10th among public universities by U.S. News & World Report.
The university was also ranked 35th worldwide by the Times Higher Education World University Rankings and 34th worldwide ( 6th विश्वव्यापी लिये अभियान्त्रिकी ) by the अकादमिक रैंकिंग of संसार विश्वविद्यालयों in 2012. < संदर्भ name= '' shanghairanking.com/fieldeng2012 '' >
UC सांता बारबरा is a `` बहुत ऊँची कार्यकलाप '' शोध विश्वविद्यालयों और खर्च $ 191.2 लाख on research expenditures in the 2007 fiscal year, 97th-largest in the United States.
UCSB घरों बारह नेशनल शोध centers, सहित the renowned Kavli Institute for Theoretical Physics.
UCSB faculty includes five Nobel Prize laureates, one Fields medalist, 29 सदस्यों of the नेशनल अकादमी of sciences, 27 सदस्यों of the नेशनल अकादमी of अभियान्त्रिकी, और 31 members of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences.
UCSB was the No. 3 host on the ARPAnet और थी निर्वाचित to the संघ of American Universities in 1995.
the uc सांता बारबरा gauchos compete in the NCAA Division I Big West Conference.
The Gauchos have won NCAA national championships in मेन 's सॉकर और मेन 's water polo.
Saint Joseph साथ the Infant Jesus by Guido Reni
Saint Joseph 's Day, March 19, the Feast of st. जोसेफ is in पश्चिमी christianity the principal feast day of Saint Joseph, Spouse of the Blessed Virgin Mary.
He is भी the step-father of Jesus of Nazareth /Jesus Christ.
It has the rank of a solemnity in the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर ; catholics जो follow the missal of 1962 celebrate it as a first class feast.
पिछला to 1962 it थी मनाये as a feast of the rank of double of the first class.
It is a feast or commemoration in the provinces of the anglican नियाज़, और a feast or पर्व in the Lutheran Church.
Saint Joseph 's Day is the Patronal Feast day for Poland as well as for Canada, persons named Joseph, Josephine, etc., for धार्मिक संस्थान, स्कूलों और parishes bearing उसके name, and for carpenters.
It is also Father 's Day in some Catholic countries, मुख्यतः स्पेन, पुर्तगाल, और Italy.
March 19 was dedicated to Saint Joseph in several Western calendars by the tenth century, और इस कस्टम थी स्थापित in रोम by 1479.
पोप st. पायस v विस्तारित इसके उपयोग to the संपूर्ण रोमन रीति by his Apostolic Constitution Quo Primum ( July 14, 1570 ).
Since 1969, Episcopal Conferences may, if वे काश, ट्रांसफ़र it to a date outside Lent.
Between 1870 and 1955, a feast was celebrated in honor of St. Joseph as Spouse of the Blessed Virgin Mary and Patron of the सार्वभौमिक गिरिजाघर, the latter शीर्षक having महरूम दिए to उसे by पोप पायस ix.
Originally celebrated on the third Sunday after Easter with an octave, after Divino afflatu of st. पायस x ( देखिए सुधार of the रोमन breviary by पोप Pius X ), it was moved to the preceding Wednesday.
The feast was also retitled the solemnity of संत जोसेफ.
This celebration and its accompanying octave थी abolished दौरान the आधुनिकीकरण और सरलीकरण of rubrics under Pope Pius XII in 1955.
It is still maintained by catholics जो follow the missal of 1962 or earlier missals.
As the traditional holiday of the रसूलों ss. फिलिप और जेम्स, may 1, had faded from the memory of most Catholics by the mid-twentieth century, that of Joseph the Worker was created in order to coincide with the celebration of international Labour Day ( May Day ) in many countries.
The feast of Ss. Philip and James, which had been मनाये on कि तिथि चूंकि the छठे century, was moved from its traditional place.
In the new calendar published in 1969, the feast, which at one time occupied the highest possible rank in the गिरिजाघर पंचांग, थी घटाया to an वैकल्पिक मेमोरियल, the न्यूनतम रैंक लिये a संत 's day.
The Eastern Orthodox Church मनाता संत जोसेफ on the Sunday after Christmas.
Mariah Carey ( born March 27, 1970 ) is an American singer, songwriter, रिकार्ड निर्माता, अभिनेत्री, और लोकसेवक.
Under the guidance of Columbia Records executive Tommy Mottola, Carey released her self-titled debut studio एल्बम mariah कैरी in 1990 ; it गई multi-platinum और शाखित चार लगातार number one singles on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 chart.
Following her विवाह to mottola in 1993 और कामयाबी साथ hit रिकॉर्ड Emotions ( 1991 ), Music Box ( 1993 ), and Merry Christmas ( 1994 ), Carey was established as Columbia 's highest-selling act.
Daydream ( 1995 ) made music history when its second single `` One Sweet Day ``, a duet with Boyz II Men, spent a record sixteen weeks on top of the Billboard Hot 100, और remains the longest-running number-one सोंग in u.S. चार्ट history.
During the recording of the album, कैरी began to deviate इससे उसके r & b और पॉप beginnings और slowly traversed into hip hop.
इस musical बदलें became evident साथ the release of Butterfly ( 1997 ), at which time Carey had separated from Mottola.
Carey बाएँ कोलंबिया in 2000, और हस्ताक्षरित a record-breaking $ 100 million recording contract with Virgin Records.
Before the release of her first feature film Glitter ( 2001 ), she suffered a शारीरिक और emotional विश्लेषण और थी hospitalized for severe exhaustion.
Following the film 's poor reception, she was bought out of उसके रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध लिये $ 50 लाख, जिससे led to a decline in her career.
She signed a multi-million डालर अनुबंध सौदे साथ द्वीप रिकॉर्ड in 2002, और बाद an unsuccessful period, returned to the top of music charts with The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ).
Its second single `` We Belong Together `` became her most successful single of the 2000s, और थी बाद नामित `` सोंग of the दशक '' by बिलबोर्ड.
Carey once again ventured into फिल्मी साथ a well-received अभिनीत भूमिका in ( 2009 ) ; she was awarded the `` Breakthrough Performance Award '' at the Palm Springs International Film Festival, and Black Reel and NAACP Image Award nominations.
In a career spanning over two decades, कैरी रै बेची अधिक than 200 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी, making her one of the best-selling music artists of all time.
In 1998, she was honored as the संसार 's best-selling रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार of the 1990s at the World Music Awards.
Carey was also named the best-selling female artist of the मिलेनियम in 2000.
According to the Recording उद्योग संघ of अमेरिका, वो is the तीसरा best-selling female artist in the United States, with 63.5 million certified albums.
With the release of `` Touch My Body `` ( 2008 ), Carey gained her eighteenth number one single in the संयुक्त राज्य, अधिक than कोई other solo artist.
In 2012, कैरी थी क्रमित दूसरी on vh1 's list of the `` 100 Greatest Women in Music ''.
Aside from her commercial accomplishments, Carey has won five Grammy Awards, 17 World Music पुरस्कार, 11 अमरीकी म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार, and 31 Billboard Music Awards.
Referred to as the `` songbird supreme '' by the Guinness संसार रिकॉर्ड, वो is famed लिये उसके five-octave गायन दायरा, शक्ति, melismatic स्टाइल और हस्ताक्षर use of the whistle register.
A bumblebee is कोई सदस्य of the मधुमक्खी genus Bombus, in the family Apidae.
There are over 250 known species, existing primarily in the Northern Hemisphere although they also occur in दक्षिण अमेरिका.
They have been introduced to New Zealand और the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई राज्य of Tasmania.
Bumblebees are social insects that are characterised by ब्लैक और पीला देह बालों, often in bands.
However, some species have नारंगी or रेड on उनके bodies, or may be entirely black.
Another obvious ( but not unique ) characteristic is the नरम प्रकृति of the बाल ( long, branched setae ), called pile, that covers their entire body, making them appear and feel fuzzy.
They are best distinguished from similarly large, fuzzy bees by the form of the female hind leg, जिससे is परिवर्धित to रूप a corbicula : a चमकदार concave सतह कि is bare, लकिन घिरी by a फ्रिंज of बालों प्रयुक्त to हस्तांतरण pollen ( in similar bees, the hind leg is completely hairy, and pollen grains are wedged into the hairs for transport ).
Like their relatives the honey मधुमक्खियों, bumblebees फीड on मकरंद और एकत्रित pollen to feed their young.
A man openly carrying a handgun in a बर्गर किंग in त्रिभुज, Colorado.
In the United States, open carry is shorthand terminology for `` openly carrying a firearm in पब्लिक '', as विशिष्ट इससे concealed carry, जहाँ firearms can नहीं be seen by the casual observer.
The practice of open carry, where gun owners खुलकर carry firearms जबकि वे go परिचय उनके रोज़ कारोबार, has seen an increase in the U.S. in recent years.
This has been marked by a क्रमांक of व्यवस्थित कार्यक्रम intended to बढ़ाएँ the visibility of open carry and public awareness about the practice.
Proponents of open carry point to history and statistics, noting that अपराधियों प्रायः छिपाते उनके हथियार.
Encouraged by groups like OpenCarry.org, GeorgiaCarry.org and some participants of the Free State Project, open carry has seen a पुनरुद्धार in हाल सालो, लकिन it is नहीं yet साफ if इस represents just a short-term trend.
The gun rights जातियाँ रै महरूम मिश्रित in its response.
Alan Gottlieb of the Second Amendment Foundation and the NRA have been cautious in expressing support, while special-interest समूह ऐसे as the aforementioned opencarry.org और georgiacarry.org, और निश्चित नेशनल समूह ऐसे as the गन स्वामी of अमेरिका ( गोवा ) have महरूम अधिक outspoken in favor of the practice.
Open carry is strongly opposed by gun control groups such as the ब्रैडी अभियान और the गठबन्धन to रोकें Gun Violence.
The Cattenom Nuclear शक्ति संयंत्र in France.
फ़्रांस produces around three quarters of its electricity by nuclear power.
The Grafenrheinfeld Nuclear Power संयंत्र in जर्मनी.
Chancellor Angela Merkel 's गठबन्धन घोषित on may 30, 2011, कि germany’s 17 nuclear power stations will be shut down by 2022, in a policy reversal following Japan 's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster.
फिलहाल, 68 रिएक्टरों are under construction in 15 countries.
Nuclear शक्ति स्टेशन operate in thirty countries.
In 2010, before the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster, it was reported that an average of about 10 nuclear reactors were expected to become operational per year, हालांकि according to the संसार नाभिकीय संघ, of the 17 civilian रिएक्टरों नियोजित to become operational between 2007 और 2009, तभी पाँच दरअसल आए on स्ट्रीम.
As of June 2011, Germany and स्विट्ज़रलैंड हैं phasing-out नाभिकीय शक्ति.
As of June 2011, देशों ऐसे as ऑस्ट्रेलिया, ऑस्ट्रिया, डेनमार्क, यूनानियों, आयरलैंड, इटली, लातवियाई, liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Malaysia, Malta, New Zealand, Norway and Portugal remain opposed to nuclear power.
Color motion picture film refers both to unexposed color photographic film in a format suitable for use in a motion picture camera, and to समाप्त गति चित्र फिल्मी, तैयार लिये उपयोग in a प्रोजेक्टर, जिससे bears images in color.
The पहला रंग cinematography थी by अर्थात् of योगात्मक color systems such as the one patented in England by Edward Raymond Turner in 1899 and tested in 1902.
A सरलीकृत योगात्मक प्रणाली थी विकसित by जार्ज अल्बर्ट स्मिथ and successfully commercialized in 1909 as Kinemacolor.
These early systems used black-and-white फिल्मी to फोटोग्राफ and project two or more component images through different color filters.
Still इससे फुटेज अंकित by Edward Turner in 1902
With the present-day technology, there are two distinct processes : Eastman Color Negative 2 chemistry ( कैमरा ऋणात्मक स्टॉक्स, duplicating interpositive और internegative स्टॉक्स ) और eastman Color Positive 2 chemistry ( positive prints for direct projection ), usually abbreviated as ECN-2 and ECP-2.
Fuji 's उत्पाद हैं संगत with ECN-2 and ECP-2.
Ashanti Shequoiya Douglas ( born October 13, 1980 ) is an American singer-songwriter, रिकार्ड निर्माता, and actress.
Ashanti is सबसे प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके eponymous डेब्यू एल्बम, which featured the hit song `` Foolish ``, and sold over 503,000 copies in its first week of release throughout the U.S. in April 2002.
The album set a Soundscan record as the biggest खोलने सप्ताह बिक्री लिये a new female artist, outselling debuts by Alicia Keys and Lauryn Hill.
In the same week, she became the पहला मादा यजमान to simultaneously hold the top two places on the Billboard Hot 100 singles chart with `` Foolish '', and `` What 's Luv ? ``
( with मोटे जो ).
Ashanti broke records again by having तीन शीर्ष टेन गीतों, `` foolish, '' `` कया 's luv ? '' और `` सदा on समय ``, on the Billboard Hot 100 charts in the same week, being the first woman to accomplish this feat and being second only to the Beatles.
In 2003, the self-titled डेब्यू एल्बम जीती Ashanti her first Grammy Award for Best Contemporary R & B album.
As of April 1st 2013, ashanti has sold over 27.7 million records worldwide.
Ashanti ended the दशक ( 2000–09 ) as the third top new R & B artist behind Alicia Keys and Beyoncé.
She also ended the दशक at क्रमांक 38 on the Top Artist of the Decade list.
She is currently on the list of The बीस बेहतरीन selling म्यूज़िक singles Since 1990 for her single Foolish for selling 7.2 million copies to-date.
Ashanti has an अनुमानित जाल लायक of $ 40 million dollars [ USD ].
Ashanti wrote and sang background on Jennifer Lopez 's `` Ai n't It Funny ( Murder Remix ) ``, which reached number one on Billboard Hot 100, which was also in the top 10 chart at the same time as `` foolish '', `` सदा on समय '' ( साथ ja नियम ), और `` कया 's luv '' ( साथ मोटे Joe ).
Later that year, she was acclaimed as the `` Princess Of Hip-Hop & R & B '' by her label and capped off her successful debut by जीतना आठ बिलबोर्ड पुरस्कार और दो अमरीकी Music Awards.
भीतर सात सालो of ashanti 's करियर, she has scored 16 top 40 hits on the Hot 100.
Ashanti has endorsed numerous products including Gap, Herbal essences और mudd Jeans.
Ashanti cites Whitney Houston, Janet Jackson, Prince, Madonna, Tupac Shakur, Mary J. Blige, Ella Fitzgerald, Smokey Robinson, Donna गर्मियाँ, और ब्लू जादू as उसके musical प्रभाव.
Praised as a gifted songwriter by उसके peers और आलोचकों alike, ashanti रै written/co-written the bulk of all her music.
She is currently working on उसके अपना प्रकाशन कम्पनी हकदार Written Entertainment.
She released her fourth studio album हकदार the घोषणा on जून 3, 2008 और is फिलहाल in the studio working on her fifth.
She also performed the charity tune `` Just Stand Up `` alongside 15 other female singers लिये the `` स्टैंड up to कर्कट '' सजीव टेलीविज़न खास जिससे helped raise $ 100 million dollars for cancer research.
The United States Army Air Forces ( USAAF or AAF ) was the military aviation arm of the United राज्य of अमेरिका दौरान और तत्काल बाद संसार युद्ध ii, और the सीधा पूर्ववर्ती of the United States Air Force.
The AAF was a component of the United States Army, which in 1942 was divided functionally by executive order into three autonomous forces : the Army Ground शक्तियां, the सेवाएं of सप्लाई ( जिससे in 1943 became the फौज सेवा शक्तियां ), और the AAF.
Each of these forces had a commanding general who reported directly to the Chief of Staff of the United राज्य फौज.
The AAF administered all parts of military aviation formerly distributed among the Army Air Corps, General Headquarters एयर फ़ोर्स, और मैदान शक्तियां corps क्षेत्रफल कमांडरों, और यूँ became the पहला एयर संगठन of the U.S. Army to control its own installations and support personnel.
In practice, the AAF was वस्तुतः autonomous अंदर the Army.
The peak size of the aaf थी over 2.4 लाख मेन और महिलाओं in सेवा and nearly 80,000 aircraft in 1944, and 783 domestic bases in December 1943.
By VE Day it had 1.25 million men stationed overseas and operated from more than 1,600 airfields विश्वव्यापी.
The Air Corps became the Army Air Forces in June 1941 to provide the air arm a वृहद स्वायत्तता in जिससे to विस्तार अधिक efficiently, and to provide a structure for the additional command echelons required by a vastly increased force.
Although other राष्ट्र already था पृथक एयर शक्तियां स्वतंत्र of the फौज or नेवी ( such as the British Royal Air Force and the German Luftwaffe ), the AAF remained a part of the United States Army until the United States Air Force came into being in September 1947.
However, in its expansion and conduct of the war, the aaf became अधिक than बस an भुजा of the वृहद organization.
By the समाप्त of संसार युद्ध ii the AAF had become virtually an independent service.
By regulation and executive अनुक्रम, the aaf थी a अधीनस्थ एजेंसी of the युद्ध विभाग tasked तभी साथ आयोजन, प्रशिक्षण, और equipping कॉम्बैट इकाई, limited in responsibility to the continental United States, as were the Army Ground Forces and the Army Service Forces.
In reality, Headquarters AAF controlled the conduct of all aspects of the air war in every part of the world, determining एयर नीति और issuing आदेश बगैर transmitting them through the Chief of Staff.
This `` contrast between theory and fact is... आधारभूत to an understanding of the AAF. ''
The Freedom of Information Act ( FOIA ) is a federal freedom of सूचना विधि कि allows लिये the पूरा or आंशिक प्रकटीकरण of previously unreleased information and documents controlled by the United States government.
The Act defines agency records विषय to प्रकटीकरण, outlines अनिवार्य प्रकटीकरण procedures and grants nine exemptions to the statute.
It was originally signed into law by President Lyndon B. Johnson, despite his misgivings, on जुलाई 4, 1966 as और गई into प्रभाव the following साल.
The Federal Government 's Freedom of Information Act should not be उलझन साथ the अलग और varying स्वतंत्रता of Information Acts passed by the individual states.
Many of those state अधिनियमों may be समान लकिन नहीं एकसमान to the federal act.
The European Union ( EU ) is an economic and political union of 27 member states that are स्तिथ primarily in यूरोपीय.
The EU operates through a प्रणाली of supranational स्वतंत्र संस्थानों and intergovernmental negotiated decisions by the member states.
Institutions of the EU include the European Commission, the Council of the European Union, the European Council, the अदालत of इंसाफ of the यूरोपीय संघ, the यूरोपीय सेंट्रल बैंको, the अदालत of Auditors, and the European Parliament.
the यूरोपीय पार्लियामेंट is निर्वाचित every five years by EU citizens.
The EU 's de facto पूंजी is Brussels.
The EU traces its origins from the European Coal and Steel जातियाँ ( ecsc ) और the यूरोपीय आर्थिक जातियाँ ( EEC ), formed by the Inner Six countries in 1951 and 1958 respectively.
In the intervening सालो the जातियाँ और इसके successors have grown in आकार by the accession of new member states and in power by the addition of policy areas to its remit.
The maastricht सन्धि स्थापित the European Union under its current name in 1993.
The latest major amendment to the संवैधानिक आधार of the eu, the सन्धि of लिस्बन, came into force in 2009.
The EU has developed a single market through a standardised प्रणाली of कानून कि लागू in सब सदस्य राज्य.
Within the Schengen Area ( which includes 22 EU and 4 non-EU states ) पासपोर्ट नियंत्रण have महरूम abolished.
EU policies aim to ensure the free movement of people, goods, services, and capital, enact legislation in justice and घर अफेयर्स, और maintain आम नीतियों on व्यापार, कृषि, fisheries and regional development.
A monetary union, the eurozone, थी स्थापित in 1999 और is रचित of 17 member states.
Through the आम विदेशी और सुरक्षा Policy the EU has developed a role in external relations and defence.
Permanent राजनयिक मिशन have been established around the world.
The EU is represented at the United Nations, the WTO, the g8 और the g-20.
With a combined population of over 500 million निवासियों, or 7.3 % of the संसार जनसांख्यिकी, the eu, in 2012, उत्पन्न a नाममात्र सकल घरेलू उत्पाद ( जीडीपी ) of 16.584 trillion US dollars, representing approximately 20 % of the global GDP when measured in terms of purchasing power parity, and represents the largest nominal GDP and GDP PPP in the world.
The eu थी the प्राप्तकर्ता of the 2012 नोबेल Peace Prize.
The Wales national rugby लीग टोली represent वेल्स in अंतरराष्ट्रीय रग्बी league football matches.
Currently the टोली is सातवाँ in the RLIF World Rankings.
The team were run under the auspices of the Rugby Football League, but an independent body, Wales Rugby League, अभी रनों the टोली इससे कार्डिफ.
A total of three Welsh players have महरूम डाला into the Rugby League Hall Of Fame.
समान to अनेक अन्य वेल्श नेशनल sporting teams, Wales strip has been primarily red for many years, including now.
However in their last World Cup campaign in 2000 they did wear a कमीज़ featuring the वेल्श ध्वज, adding a touch of green and white.
The team is known as `` The Dragons '' and so the teams logo on the कमीज़ is a रेड ड्रैगन.
The team date back to 1907, बनाना उन्हें the तीसरा oldest नेशनल पक्ष बाद England and New Zealand.
And it was a touring नई जीलैंड पक्ष कि वेल्स पहला निभाई विरूद्ध in 1908, winning 9-8 at Aberdare.
Since then Wales have regularly played England, since 1935 फ़्रांस, as खूब as सत्कार the touring Australia and New Zealand teams, although they rarely toured themselves, not playing a match in the Southern Hemisphere until 1975.
For twenty-six years Wales competed against their two biggest rivals, England and France, in the यूरोपीय राष्ट्र कप, winning the trophy four times.
Wales have also competed in the संसार कप on तीन अवसरों, the first time being in 1975.
In 1995 and 2000 they had their most successful tournaments to date, surprisingly making the semi-finals on दोनो अवसरों पहले होने पिटे by England and Australia respectively.
Wales failed to qualify for the 2008 World Cup, being the second highest ranked side नहीं to do so, having खोया to स्कॉटलैंड on अंक अंतर over दो matches.
In 2008 Australian John Dixon became the नई सिर कोच और नियुक्त ली briers as कप्तान, having played for Wales since 1998.
In recent seasons वेल्स have लिया विशाल strides अंतर्गत पूर्व खिलाड़ी iestyn हैरिस जो रै coached वेल्स to back to back European Cup successes, which culminated in a Four Nations appearance in 2011.
Cardiomyopathy ( literally `` heart muscle disease '' ) is the measurable deterioration of the function of the myocardium ( the heart muscle ) for कोई कारण, प्रायः अग्रणी to दिल विफलता ; आम लक्षण हैं dyspnea ( breathlessness ) and peripheral edema ( swelling of the legs ).
People with cardiomyopathy हैं प्रायः at रिस्क of dangerous forms of irregular heart beat and sudden cardiac death.
The most common form of cardiomyopathy is dilated cardiomyopathy.
Fuck in its literal meaning refers to the अधिनियम of यौन intercourse.
It is an English word कि is प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a profanity, either to denote disdain or as an intensifier.
The origin of the शब्द is अस्पष्ट.
It is usually considered to be पहला attested to around 1475, लकिन it may be considerably older.
In आधुनिक उपयोग, बकवास और इसके डेरिवेटिव ( such as fucker and fucking ) can be used in the position of a noun, a verb, an adjective or an adverb.
There are many common phrases which मेक उपयोग of the शब्द, as खूब as a क्रमांक of यौगिकों incorporating it, such as motherfucker.
Note : this article adopts the U.S. Department of Transportation 's definition of a passenger vehicle, to mean a car or ट्रक, प्रयुक्त लिये यात्री, excluding बसें और रेल.
The संयुक्त राज्य is घर to the largest passenger vehicle market of any country in the world.
Overall, there were an estimated 254.4 million registered passenger vehicles in the संयुक्त राज्य according to a 2007 DOT study.
This number, along with the average age of vehicles, has increased steadily चूंकि 1960, indicating a growing number of vehicles per capita.
The Chinese car market, however, is poised to soon exceed the United States ; by the end of 2012, there यहूद over 240 लाख गाड़ियाँ on the सड़क in China.
The United States is also home to तीन विशाल गाडी निर्माताओं : सामान्य मोटर्स, घाट मोटर कम्पनी and Chrysler, which have historically been referred to as the `` Big Three. ''
क्रिसलर however is no longer among the top three ; but is number five, behind Toyota and Honda.
The motor car has clearly become an integral part of American life, with वाहनों outnumbering licensed ड्राइवर.
Clinical laboratory in a हॉस्पिटल सेटिंग प्रर्दशित अनेक स्वचालित analysers.
A medical laboratory or clinical laboratory is a laboratory where tests are done on clinical specimens in order to get information about the health of a रोगी as pertaining to the निदान, उपचार, and prevention of disease.
In poker, players construct hands of five ताश according to predetermined rules, which vary according to which variant of poker is being played.
These hands are compared using a हाथ रैंकिंग प्रणाली कि is मानक आरपार सब विसंगतियाँ of poker, the player with the highest-ranking hand winning that particular deal in most variants of poker.
In some variants, the lowest-ranking हाथ can जीत or टाई.
These hand rankings हैं भी प्रयुक्त in some other card games, and in poker dice.
The ranking of a particular hand is increased by including multiple cards of the same card rank, by all five ताश होने इससे the वही सूट, or by all five cards being of consecutive rank.
The relative ranking of the various hand categories is based on the probability of being randomly dealt ऐसे a हाथ इससे a well- shuffled deck.
Bruce रान्डेल hornsby ( born नवम्बर 23, 1954 ) is an अमरीकी virtuoso ; a singer, pianist, synthesizer, accordion, and dulcimer player, and songwriter.
Known for the spontaneity and creativity of his live performances, Hornsby draws frequently from classical, jazz, bluegrass, folk, motown, इन्जील, चट्टान, ब्लूज़, और jam बैंड musical परंपराओं साथ his songwriting and the seamless improvisations contained within.
Hornsby 's recordings have been recognised on a number of occasions with industry awards, including the Best New Artist Grammy in 1987 with Bruce Hornsby and the Range, the Best Bluegrass Recording Grammy in 1990, और the बेहतरीन पॉप इंस्ट्रूमेंटल ग्रैमी in 1993.
Hornsby has also achieved recognition for his solo albums and performances, उसके touring बैंड ब्रूस hornsby और the noisemakers, उसके ब्लूग्रास प्रोजेक्ट साथ रिकी skaggs and his appearances as a session- and guest-musician.
He also collaborated with आभारी मुर्दे और थी a सदस्य of the बैंड from September 1990 to March 1992, playing at over one hundred shows during that period.
गन्ना plantation in rural Cuba
Agriculture in Cuba has played an महत्वपूर्ण भाग in the अर्थव्यवस्था लिये अनेक सौ years.
कृषि contributes कम than 10 प्रतिशत to the gross domestic product ( GDP ), but it employs roughly 20 percent of the working population.
About 30 percent of the country 's land is प्रयुक्त लिये क्रॉप cultivation.
The अकुशल agricultural उद्योग in क्यूबा has led to the need to import large amounts of foods.
Cuba now imports about 80 % of the खाना it rations to the public.
The rationing program accounts for about a third of the खाना उर्जा the औसत क्यूबन consumes.
Overall, however, क्यूबा is निर्भर on imports for only 16 % of its food.
