Mega Millions ( initially called The Big Game Mega लाखो as the successor of the बिग खेल ) is an अमरीकी multi-jurisdictional $ 1 lottery game.
The first ( The Big Game ) आचमन लाखो आरेखण थी in 2002 ( see below ).
The minimum Mega Millions advertised jackpot is $ 12,000,000, paid in 26 equal yearly किश्तों ( जबतक the नकदी विकल्प is चुनी ) ; प्रायः, the जैकपॉट increases when there is no top-prize winner.
However, despite no jackpot विजेता लिये the $ 12,000,000 दिसम्बर 18, 2012 आरेखण, the jackpot remained at $ 12,000,000 for the drawing to be held on December 21.
( See below for information on how the खेल 's जैकपॉट is funded. )
Reflecting common practice among American lotteries, the jackpot is advertised as a नाममात्र मान of सालाना installments.
A cash value option ( the usual choice ), when chosen by a जैकपॉट विजेता ( देखिए नीचे ), pays the सन्निकट उपस्थित value of the installments.
Mega Millions currently uses a 5/56 ( white balls ) प्लस 1/46 ( the आचमन बॉल ) दोगुना matrix to select its winning numbers.
Each खेल लागत $ 1.
In 43 of the 44 Mega Millions jurisdictions ( California is the exception ), there is an विकल्प, पुकारा megaplier ( ऐसे खेल हैं $ 2 प्रत्येक ) जहाँ non-jackpot prizes are multiplied by 2, 3, or 4.
The Megaplier was बना उपलब्धियाँ to सब आचमन लाखो jurisdictions in January 2011 ; it began as a Texas -only option.
Mega Millions is drawn at 10:59 p.m. पूर्वी समय मंगलवार and Fridays, including holidays.
Mega Millions is administered by a consortium of its 12 असली lotteries और the drawings हैं आयोजित at WSB-TV in Atlanta, Georgia.
पर्यवेक्षित by the जॉर्जिया Lottery.
The largest जैकपॉट in आचमन लाखो, as खूब as in अमरीकी लॉटरी इतिहास, थी $ 656,000,000 annuitized ( साथ a नकदी विकल्प of $ 474,000,000 ) for the March 30, 2012 drawing in which there were three jackpot-winning tickets ; one each in Illinois, Kansas, and Maryland.
All three tickets था महरूम claimed as of अप्रैल 18, with each set of winners choosing the cash option.
is a Japanese manga series created by writer tsugumi ohba और manga artist Takeshi Obata.
The main character is Light Yagami, a high school student who discovers a अलौकिक कोपी, the `` मौत Note '', dropped on Earth by a shinigami ( a god of death ) named Ryuk.
The Death Note अनुदान इसके उपयोक्ता the क्षमता to मार anyone जिनकी नाम और फेस they know, by writing the name in the notebook while picturing their face.
The series centers around Light 's attempt to create and rule a world `` cleansed of evil '' as `` परमेश्वर '' using the कोपी, और the प्रयत्न of a जासूस known as L to stop him.
Death Note was first serialized in 108 chapters by Shueisha in the जापानी manga पत्रिका साप्ताहिक shōnen जम्प इससे दिसम्बर 2003 to May 2006.
The series was also प्रकाशित in tankōbon स्वरूप in जापानी starting in May 2004 and ending in October 2006 with a total of thirteen volumes.
The anime series aired in जापानी इससे अक्तूबर 3, 2006, to June 26, 2007.
Composed of 37 एपीसोड, the दुश्मनी थी विकसित by Madhouse and directed by Tetsuro Araki.
A light novel based on the श्रेणी, लिखा by nisio isin, थी released in Japan.
Additionally, various video games have महरूम प्रकाशित by कोनामी for Nintendo DS.
The श्रेणी थी adapted into live-action films released in Japan on June 17, 2006, November 3, 2006, and February 2, 2008.
Viz Media licensed the Death नोट manga in उत्तर अमेरिका और रै प्रकाशित सब the बारह आयतन इससे the श्रेणी, a 13th आवाज़ which serves as a `` reader 's guide '', as well as the light novels.
The episodes from the दुश्मनी पहला appeared in उत्तर अमेरिका as downloadable by IGN.
Viz later licensed the anime series and it aired on Bionix in कनाडा और on कार्टून संजाल in the संयुक्त राज्य.
The live-action films briefly निभाई in निश्चित उत्तर American theaters since 2008.
However, none of the video games have thus far महरूम प्रकाशित in उत्तर अमेरिका or Europe.
Death Note is one of Weekly shōnen jumps best-selling manga श्रेणी of all time, with sales over 26.5 million copies.
Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All hallows ' संध्या `` ), भी ज्ञात as सब hallows ' संध्या, is a वार्षिक जश्न observed in a क्रमांक of देशों on अक्तूबर 31, the eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas.
According to many scholars, All Hallows ' Eve is a Christianised feast originally influenced by western European harvest festivals, and त्यौहार of the मुर्दे साथ संभावित pagan roots, particularly the Celtic Samhain.
Other scholars maintain that it originated independently of samhain और रै solely ईसाई जड़ें.
ठेठ त्यौहार हैलोवीन क्रियाएँ शामिल trick-or-treating ( भी ज्ञात as `` guising `` ), attending costume parties, carving pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, apple bobbing, visiting haunted attractions, playing pranks, telling scary stories, and watching horror films.
New York City taxicabs during Midtown फटाफट घंटा in मैनहटन
The taxicabs of New York City, with their distinctive पीला पेंट, हैं a widely पहचाना प्रतीक of the city.
Taxicabs are operated by private कंपनियाँ और licensed by the New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission ( TLC ).
It also oversees over 40,000 other for-hire vehicles, सहित `` ब्लैक गाड़ियाँ '', commuter vans and ambulettes.
`` Medallion taxis, '' the परिचित पीला कैब, हैं the तभी वाहनों in the city permitted to pick up passengers in response to a street hail.
Schematic क्रॉस खण्ड of भाग of पत्ता, xylem shown as red circles at figure 8.
Xylem is एक of the दो प्रकार of हस्तांतरण tissue in vascular plants ( phloem is the other ).
The word xylem is derived from the Greek word ξύλον ( xylon ), अर्थ `` लकडी '' ; the best-known जाइलम ऊतक is लकडी, though it is found throughout the plant.
Its basic function is to transport water, but it also transports some nutrients through the plant.
U.S. women suffragists demonstrating लिये the right to vote, February 1913.
Women 's suffrage also known as woman suffrage is the right of women to vote और to चलाएं लिये दफ्तर.
Limited voting rights were gained by महिलाओं in स्वीडन, फिनलैंड और कुछ पश्चिमी U.S. states in the late 19th century.
International organizations were formed to coordinate efforts, विशेषकर the अंतरराष्ट्रीय परिषद of महिलाओं ( 1888 ) and the International Woman Suffrage Alliance ( 1904 ).
In 1893, New Zealand, then a self-governing British colony, granted adult women the right to vote and the self-governing British colony of South Australia did the same in 1895, लकिन भी permitted महिलाओं to चलाएं लिये दफ्तर.
Australia federated in 1901, and women acquired the right to vote and stand in federal elections from 1902, though uneven प्रतिबंध on aboriginal महिलाओं मतदान in नेशनल चुनावों यहूद नहीं completely removed until 1962.
The first European country to introduce women 's suffrage was the Grand Duchy of Finland, then part of the Russian साम्राज्य, जिससे भी उत्पादित the संसार 's पहला मादा सदस्यों of पार्लियामेंट in the 1907 संसदीय elections.
Norway followed, granting पूरा women 's suffrage in 1913.
In most Western countries, महिलाओं 's suffrage आए बाद संसार I War I I, with some important late adopters being France in 1944 and Switzerland in 1971.
महिलाओं 's suffrage has generally been recognized after political campaigns to obtain it were waged.
In many countries it थी granted पहले सार्वभौमिक suffrage.
Women 's suffrage is explicitly stated as a right under the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of पक्षपात विरूद्ध महिलाओं, अपनाया by the संयुक्त Nations in 1979.
The Thirteenth Tale ( 2006 ) by डायने setterfield is a गोथिक सस्पेंस novel, the author 's first published book.
Jehovah 's Witnesses is a millenarian restorationist Christian denomination with nontrinitarian beliefs distinct from mainstream christianity.सोर्सs लिये descriptors : • millenarian : • restorationist : • ईसाई : • denomination : the संगठन reports worldwide membership of over 7.78 million adherents involved in evangelism, convention attendance of over 12 million, and annual Memorial attendance of over 19 million.
They are directed by the Governing देह of यहोवा 's गवाह, a समूह of बड़ो in Brooklyn, New York, that establishes all doctrines.
Jehovah 's Witnesses ' beliefs हैं आधारित on उनके interpretations of the बाइबल और they prefer to use their own translation, the New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures.
They believe that the destruction of the present world system at Armageddon is imminent, and that the establishment of God 's किंगडम on धरती is the तभी समाधान लिये सब समस्याएं faced by mankind.
The group emerged इससे the बाइबल छात्र गति —founded in the लेट 1870s by चार्ल्स taze रसेल साथ the गठन of zion 's Watch Tower Tract Society —with significant organizational and doctrinal changes under the leadership of Joseph Franklin Rutherford.
The name यहोवा 's गवाह, आधारित on यशायाह 43:10–12, थी अपनाया in 1931 to फर्क themselves from other Bible Student groups and symbolize a break with the legacy of Russell 's traditions.
Jehovah 's Witnesses are best known for their door-to-door उपदेश, distributing साहित्य ऐसे as The Watchtower and Awake !
, और refusing सैन्य service and blood transfusions.
वे consider use of the name Jehovah vital for proper worship.
They reject Trinitarianism, अंतर्निहित अमरत्व of the आत्मा, और hellfire, which they consider to be unscriptural doctrines.
They do not observe Christmas, Easter, birthdays, or अन्य छुट्टियाँ और कस्टम वे consider to have pagan origins incompatible with Christianity.
adherents commonly refer to उनके देह of मान्यताओं as `` the truth '' and consider themselves to be `` in the truth ''.
They consider secular society to be morally corrupt and under the influence of Satan, and सबसे सीमा उनके सोशल बातचीत साथ non-witnesses.
Congregational disciplinary actions include disfellowshipping, their term for औपचारिक expulsion और shunning.
Baptized individuals who formally leave are considered disassociated और हैं भी shunned.
Disfellowshipped and disassociated individuals may आखिरकार be reinstated if deemed repentant.
The religion 's position regarding ईमानदार objection to military service and refusal to salute national flags has brought it into conflict with some governments.
Consequently, यहोवा 's गवाह have महरूम persecuted और उनके क्रियाएँ are banned or restricted in some countries.
Persistent legal challenges by Jehovah 's Witnesses have बहकावे विधान सम्बन्धित to सिविल अधिकारों in अनेक देशों.
Last Tango in Paris ( ) is a 1972 Franco-Italian romantic Drama film directed by Bernardo bertolucci जिससे portrays a हाल अमरीकी विधुर जो begins an बेनाम यौन relationship with a young, betrothed Parisian woman.
it सितारों मार्लोन ब्रैंडो, मरिया श्नाइडर, and Jean-Pierre Léaud.
The film 's raw portrayal of यौन हिंसा और emotional turmoil led to अंतरराष्ट्रीय विवाद and drew various levels of government censorship.
The mpaa दिया the फिल्मी an x rating upon release in the United States.
After revisions यहूद बना to the MPAA ratings code, it was classified as an NC-17 in 1997.
MGM released a censored r-rated cut in 1981.
The film has its NC-17 दरजा लिये `` कुछ सुस्पष्ट sexual content. ''
Windows XP is an operating system produced by microsoft लिये उपयोग on निजी कंप्यूटर, सहित घर और कारोबार desktops, laptops and media centers.
First released to computer manufacturers on August 24, 2001, it is the दूसरी सबसे लोकप्रिय संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ, आधारित on संस्थापित user base.
The name `` XP '' is छोटी लिये `` अनुभव '', highlighting the enhanced user experience.
Windows XP, the successor to खिड़कियाँ 2000 और खिड़कियाँ me, थी the first consumer-oriented operating system produced by Microsoft to be built on the Windows NT kernel.
Windows XP was released विश्वव्यापी लिये खुदरा बिक्री on अक्तूबर 25, 2001, and over 400 million copies were in use in January 2006.
It was succeeded by खिड़कियाँ विस्टा in January 2007.
Direct OEM and retail sales of Windows XP ceased on जून 30, 2008.
Microsoft continued to sell Windows XP through their System Builders ( smaller OEMs who sell समवेत कंप्यूटर ) कार्यक्रम until January 31, 2009.
On April 10, 2012, Microsoft reaffirmed that extended support लिये खिड़कियाँ xp और दफ्तर 2003 होता समाप्त on अप्रैल 8, 2014 और सुझाया कि administrators begin preparing to migrate to a newer OS.
The NT -based versions of Windows, which are प्रोग्रामित in c, C++, और सभा, हैं ज्ञात लिये उनके improved stability and efficiency over the 9x versions of Microsoft Windows.
Windows XP presented a significantly redesigned graphical user interface, a change microsoft प्रचारित as अधिक user-friendly than पिछला संस्करण of Windows.
In an attempt to further ameliorate the `` DLL नरक `` कि plagued the पास्ट संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ, improved side-by-side सभा technology in Windows XP allows side-by-side installation, registration and servicing of multiple versions of globally shared software components in full isolation.
It is also the पहला संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ to उपयोग उत्पाद activation to combat illegal copying.
During खिड़कियाँ xp 's विकास, the प्रोजेक्ट थी codenamed `` whistler '', after Whistler, British Columbia, as many Microsoft employees skied at the Whistler-Blackcomb ski resort.
According to web analytics आंकड़ा उत्पन्न by जाल अनुप्रयोग, Windows XP was the most widely used operating system until August 2012, when Windows 7 overtook it.
, Windows XP market share is at 38.99 %, having decreased almost every month since at least November 2007, the first month लिये जिससे आंकडे हैं सरेआम उपलब्धियाँ इससे जाल अनुप्रयोग.
`` Por una Cabeza '' is an Argentine tango with music and lyrics written in 1935 by Carlos gardel और अल्फ्रेडो le प्रभा क्रमशः.
The name is a Spanish horse-racing phrase meaning `` by a सिर '', जिससे refers to a horse winning a race by the length of one head.
The lyrics speak of a compulsive horse-track जुआरी जो compares उसके व्यसन लिये घोड़े साथ his attraction to women.
Alfredo Le प्रभा थी a ब्राज़ीलियाई इससे são पाउलो, a much italian-influenced क्षेत्रफल in ब्राज़ील, और भी the जन्मस्थान of Zequinha de Abreu, composer of Tico-Tico no Fubá.
Le Pera and gardel died in an वायुयान crash in Medellín, ( Colombia ), on June 24, 1935.
Por ऊना cabeza
The tango has since been performed by numerous टैंगो orchestras.
Tango scenes with `` Por una Cabeza '' appear in Delicatessen ( 1991 ), Scent of a Woman ( 1992 ), Schindler 's List ( 1993 ), True Lies ( 1994 ), Titanic ( 1996 ), Bad Santa ( Uncut Version, 2003 ), All the King 's Men ( 2006 ), Planet 51 ( 2009 ), episode 37 of Nip/Tuck ( 2003–2010 ), episode 9 of South कोरियाई नाटक श्रेणी मीठी जासूस ( 2005–08 ), the शुरूआत और समाप्ति क्रेडिट of the दक्षिण कोरियाई नाटक ब्रॉडकास्ट i 'm sorry, i प्रेम तुम ( 2004 ), और the एपीसोड `` bas the खरगोश छेद `` ( 2007 ).
In the फिल्म frida ( सलमा हायेक, 2002 ), Gardel is heard singing it on a radio.
It is also quoted in दाउद डेल tredici 's `` Good News !
Nilda is वापस '' ( इससे the song cycle Miz Inez Sez ).
In Scent of a Woman ( 1992 ), the tango is performed by the `` The टैंगो प्रोजेक्ट '', जो दरअसल appear in the नाचना scene starring Al Pacino ( the recording used is available on one of their CD albums ).
John विलियम्स arranged a संस्करण of the टुकड़ा कि appears on the album `` Cinema Serenade '' with the violin solo performed by Itzhak Perlman.
Perlman and Williams ( conducting ) have also performed the piece साथ in सजीव concerts.
In 2012 a dance version थी released by the समूह `` Da Carrera '' featuring the original vocal recording by Carlos Gardel.
The baroreflex or baroreceptor reflex is एक of the देह 's homeostatic mechanisms for maintaining blood pressure.
It provides a ऋणात्मक प्रतिक्रिया लूप in जिससे an elevated रक्त दबाव reflexively causes heart rate to decrease therefore causing blood pressure to decrease ; likewise, decreased blood pressure activates the baroreflex, causing heart rate to increase thus causing an increase in blood pressure.
The system relies on specialized neurons, known as baroreceptors, in the aortic arch, carotid sinuses, and elsewhere to मॉनिटर परिवर्तन in रक्त दबाव और रिले them to the brainstem.
Subsequent changes in रक्त दबाव हैं mediated by the autonomic nervous system.
Atrial natriuretic peptide forms a parallel negative feedback loop in an endocrinological contrast to the renin-angiotensin प्रणाली.
The Loma Prieta earthquake, also known as the Quake of '89 and the World Series Earthquake, was a major earthquake that struck the सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल of कैलिफ़ोर्निया on अक्तूबर 17, 1989, at 5:04 pm local time.
Caused by a slip along the San Andreas Fault, the quake lasted 10–15 seconds and measured 6.9 on both the पल परिमाण स्केल ( surface-wave परिमाण 7.1 ) and on the open-ended Richter Scale.
The quake मारे 63 लोगों throughout northern California, injured 3,757 and left some 3,000–12,000 people homeless.
the भूकंप occurred दौरान the warm-up अभ्यास लिये the तीसरा खेल of the 1989 World Series, featuring both of the Bay Area 's Major League Baseball teams, the Oakland Athletics and the San Francisco Giants.
Because of game-related sports coverage, this थी the पहला प्रमुख भूकंप in the संयुक्त राज्य to have its initial jolt broadcast live on television.
Pawn in the मानक staunton पैटर्न
The pawn ( ♙♟ ) is the most numerous and in most circumstances the weakest piece in the खेल of शतरंज, historically representing infantry or, अधिक विशेषकर, हथियारबंद peasants or pikemen.
In chess, each player begins the खेल साथ आठ प्यादे, एक on प्रत्येक वर्गाकार of the rank immediately in front of the other pieces.
( In बीजीय संकेतन, the श्वेत प्यादे प्रारंभ on a2, b2, c2,..., h2, while black pawns start on a7, b7, c7,..., h7. )
Individual प्यादे हैं referred to by the file on which they stand.
For example, one speaks of `` White 's f-pawn '' or `` Black 's b-pawn '', or less commonly ( using descriptive notation ), `` White 's किंग 's बिशप साहूकार '' or `` ब्लैक 's महारानी 's नाईट pawn ''.
It is also common to refer to a rook pawn, meaning any pawn on the a- or h-file, a knight pawn ( on the b- or g-file ), a बिशप साहूकार ( on the c- or f-file ), a महारानी साहूकार ( on the d-file ), a king pawn ( on the e-file ), and a central pawn ( on either the d- or e-file ).
The military forces of the world have differing approaches to the enlistment of homosexual ( gay and lesbian ) and bisexual individuals.
The armed forces of most developed countries have now removed नीतियों excluding non-heterosexual individuals ( with strict policies on sexual harassment ).
Nations that permit gay लोगों to serve खुलकर in the सैन्य शामिल the 4 of the 5 सदस्यों of the un सुरक्षा परिषद ( संयुक्त States, United Kingdom, France, and Russia ), the Republic of China ( Taiwan ), Australia, Israel, South Africa, Argentina, and all NATO members excluding Turkey.
Hydrogen production is the परिवार of औद्योगिक methods for generating hydrogen.
Currently the प्रबल प्रौद्योगिकी for direct production is steam reforming from hydrocarbons.
Many other methods are known including electrolysis और thermolysis.
in 2006, the संयुक्त राज्य was estimated to have a production capacity of 11 million tonnes of hydrogen.
5 million tonnes of hydrogen were consumed on-site in oil refining, and in the उत्पादन of अमोनिया ( haber प्रक्रम ) and methanol ( reduction of carbon monoxide ).
0.4 million tonnes यहूद an incidental by-product of the chlor-alkali process.
Hydrogen उत्पादन is an अनुमानित $ 100 अरब industry.
A basis point ( often denoted as bp, colloquially referred to in the plural as `` bips '', also known as a `` बीप '' ) is a ईकाई बराबर to एक hundredth of a प्रतिशत पाइंट, or एक भाग per ten thousand, 1/10000.
The same unit is also ( rarely ) called a permyriad, literally अर्थ 'for ( प्रत्येक ) असंख्य ( टेन हजार ) ', और in कि कॉन्टेक्स्ट is लिखा साथ जिससे looks like a percent sign ( % ) with two extra zeroes at the end ( like a stylized form of the four zeros in the denominator, although it originates as a natural extension of the percent ( % ) and permille ( ‰ ) signs ).
A basis point is पारिभाषित as:
1 आधार पाइंट = 1 permyriad = one one-hundredth percent
1 bp = 1 = 0.01 % = 0.1‰ = 10−4 = = 0.0001
1 % = 100 bp = 100
Basis points are used as a convenient unit of measurement in contexts जहाँ प्रतिशत मतभेद of कम than 1 % are discussed.
The most common example is ब्याज दरों, जहाँ मतभेद in ब्याज दरों of कम than 1 % per year are usually meaningful to talk about.
For example, a difference of 0.10 percentage points is equivalent to a change of 10 आधार अंक ( e.g. a 4.67 % rate increases by 10 basis points to 4.77 % ).
जैसे प्रतिशत अंक, आधार अंक avoid the ambiguity between relative and absolute discussions about interest rates by dealing only with the absolute change in numeric value of a rate.
For example, if a report says there has been a `` 1 % increase '' from a 10 % interest rate, this could refer to an increase either from 10 % to 10.1 % ( सापेक्ष, 1 % of 10 % ), or from 10 % to 11 % ( absolute, 1 % plus 10 % ).
If, however, the report says there रै महरूम a `` 10 आधार पाइंट बढ़ाएँ '' इससे a 10 % ब्याज रेट, तब we know that the interest rate of 10 % has increased by 0.10 % ( the absolute change ) to a 10.1 % rate.
It is common practice in the financial industry to use basis points to denote a rate change in a वित्तीय यंत्र, or the अंतर ( स्प्रेड ) between two interest rates, including the yields of fixed-income securities.
Since certain loans and bonds may commonly be quoted in relation to some index or underlying सुरक्षा, वे होगा प्रायः be कोटेड as a स्प्रेड over ( or under ) the index.
For example, a loan that bears interest of 0.50 % per annum above the London Interbank Offered Rate ( LIBOR ) is कहा to be 50 आधार अंक over libor, जिससे is commonly expressed as `` L+50bps '' or simply `` L+50 ''.
The term `` basis point '' has its origins in trading the `` आधार '' or the स्प्रेड between two interest rates.
Since the basis is प्रायः छोटी, ये हैं कोटेड multiplied up by 10000, and hence a `` full point '' movement in the `` basis '' is a basis point.
Contrast with pips in fx आगे markets.
The relationship between percentage परिवर्तन और आधार अंक can be summarized as follows : 1 percentage point change = 100 basis points, and 0.01 percentage points = 1 basis point.
So, a bond whose उपज increases इससे 5 % to 5.5 % is कहा to बढ़ाएँ by 50 basis points ; or interest rates that have risen 1 percentage point are said to have increased by 100 basis points.
The British Royal Family is the समूह of बंद रिश्तेदारों of the monarch of the United Kingdom.
The term is also commonly applied to the same group of people who are the relations of the monarch in her or his role as sovereign of any of the अन्य राष्ट्रमंडल realms, यूँ sometimes at variance साथ आधिकारिक national terms for the family.
Members of the Royal Family belong to, either by जनम or विवाह, the हाउस of विंडसर, चूंकि 1917, जब जार्ज V changed the name of the royal house from Saxe-Coburg and Gotha.
This decision was primarily taken because Britain and her Empire were at war with Germany and given the British Royal Family 's strong German ancestry ; it थी लगा कि इसके पब्लिक चित्र could be improved by choosing a more British house name.
The new name chosen, विंडसर, था बिल्कुल no कनेक्शन अन्य than as the नाम of the castle which was and continues to be a royal residence.
Although in the United Kingdom there is no strict legal or formal definition of who is or is not a member of the Royal Family, and different lists will include different people, those carrying the style Her or His Majesty ( HM ), or Her or His Royal Highness ( HRH ) are always considered members, which प्रायः परिणाम in the अनुप्रयोग of the पद to the monarch, the consort of the monarch, the विधवा consorts of पिछला monarchs, the children of the monarch और पिछला monarchs, the male-line grandchildren of the monarch और previous monarchs, and the spouses and the widows of a monarch 's and previous monarch 's sons and male-line grandsons.
On 30 November 1917, King George V issued Letters Patent defining who are सदस्यों of the royal परिवार ; the टेक्स्ट of the सूचना इससे the लंदन Gazette is as follows:
In 1996, Her Majesty The Queen modified these Letters Patent, as थी evidenced by इस सूचना इससे the लंदन Gazette:
In 2013 अक्षर पेटेंट यहूद जारी to extend a title and a style borne by members of the Royal Family to additional persons to be born, evidenced by this Notice from the London Gazette:
Members and relatives of the British Royal Family historically represented the monarch in various स्थान throughout the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य, sometimes for extended periods as viceroys, or for specific ceremonies or events.
Today, they often perform ceremonial and social duties throughout the संयुक्त किंगडम और विदेश on निमित्त of the संयुक्त किंगडम.
Aside from the monarch, their only constitutional role in the affairs of government is to serve, if eligible and when appointed by letters patent, as a Counsellor of State, two or more of जिसको कसरत the प्राधिकार of the क्राउन ( भीतर stipulated हद ) in the indisposal or अनुपस्थिति from the British realm of the monarch.
In the other realms of the राष्ट्रमंडल रॉयल्टी do नहीं serve as Counsellors of State.
however in प्रत्येक ऐसे फ्रेम the monarch 's परिवार सदस्यों may अधिनियम on behalf of, are funded by, and represent the sovereign of that particular state, and not the United Kingdom.
The Queen, her consort, उसके children और grandchildren, as खूब as सब पूर्व अधिपति ' children और grandchildren थाम places in the first sections of the official orders of precedence in England and Wales, Scotland, and Northern Ireland.
Wives of the said enjoy their husbands ' precedence, and husbands of princesses are unofficially लकिन habitually लगाई साथ उनके पत्नियां as well.
However, the Queen changed the private order of precedence in the Royal Family in favour of Princesses Anne and Alexandra, जो henceforth लो निजी पूर्वता over the duchess of कॉर्नवॉल, जो is वरना the फ्रेम 's उच्चतम ranking woman after the Queen herself.
She किया नहीं alter the सापेक्ष पूर्वता of अन्य born-princesses, such as the daughters of her younger sons.
Haiti ( ; Haitian क्रियोल ayiti ), officially the गणतंत्र of Haiti ( ; ), is a Caribbean country.
It occupies the western, smaller portion of the island of Hispaniola, in the वृहद antillean द्वीपसमूह, जिससे it साझा with the Dominican Republic.
Ayiti ( land of high kyu ) थी the स्वदेशी taíno or Amerindian name for the island.
The country 's उच्चतम पाइंट is Pic la Selle, at.
the कुल क्षेत्रफल of Haiti is and its capital is Port-au-Prince.
haitian क्रियोल और French are the official languages.
Haiti 's regional, historical, and ethno-linguistic स्थिति is अद्वितीय लिये अनेक reasons.
It was the first स्वतंत्र स्वदेश of लैटिन अमेरिका और the caribbean, the पहला ब्लैक -led republic in the world, and the second republic in the Americas when it gained independence in 1804 as part of a successful slave revolution lasting nearly a decade.
In 2012, हैती घोषित इसके इरादे to seek associate membership status in the African Union.
Haiti is the most populous of the predominantly francophone स्वतंत्र राष्ट्र in the Americas.
It is एक of तभी दो स्वतंत्र राष्ट्र in the americas ( साथ साथ कनाडा ) to designate फ्रेंच as an official language ; the other French-speaking areas are all overseas départements, or collectivités, of France.
Haiti is the सबसे populous पूरा member-state of the Caribbean Community ( CARICOM ).
It is the poorest देश in the americas as measured by the Human Development Index.
Political violence has occurred regularly throughout इसके इतिहास, अग्रणी to government instability.
Most recently, in फ़रवरी 2004, a तख्तापलट d'état originating in the north of the country forced the resignation and exile of President Jean-Bertrand Aristide.
A provisional government took control with security provided by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र स्थिरीकरण मिशन in Haiti ( MINUSTAH ).
Michel Martelly, the वर्तमान अध्यक्ष, थी निर्वाचित in the haitian general election, 2011.
The island has had a इतिहास of destructive भूकंप.
A 7.0 magnitude earthquake struck हैती on 12 जनवरी 2010 और तबाह port-au-prince.
The highest reliable death गिनती थी अनुमानित at 220,000.
Haitian government estimates were higher.
The Presidential palace, Parliament and many other important structures were destroyed, along with अनगिनत घरों और व्यवसायों, leaving सैंकड़ों of हज़ारों of people homeless.
The country has yet to recover from the 2010 earthquake ( and subsequent incidents ) due to दोनो the गंभीरता of the क्षति हैती endured in 2010, as खूब as a सरकारी कि थी अप्रभावी well before the earthquake.
United States aid organizations have दान $ 2 billion.
Combined with other international donations, ये निधि हैं intended to योगदान to the rebuilding of the country.
The Bloody Beetroots is the pseudonym of सर bob कॉर्नेलियस rifo, the Italian electro house and dance-punk music producer, DJ and photographer.
The Bloody Beetroots is well-known लिये the ब्लैक venom मुखौटा he wears during performances.
In fact, the only identifying public feature of Rifo is the year `` 1977 '' tattooed आरपार उसके छाती, जिससे is दोनो the साल कि the निर्माता और punk-rock was born.
`` The Bloody Beetroots DJ set '' contains सर bob कॉर्नेलियस rifo and Tommy Tea.
A Motorola Advisor alphanumeric पेजर प्रयुक्त in ब्राज़ील in the 1990s, operated by Teletrim
A pager is a wireless दूरसंचार यंत्र कि receives और प्रदर्शक numeric or text messages, or receives and announces voice messages.
One-way pagers can only receive messages, while response pagers and two-way pagers can also acknowledge, जवाब to, और originate संदेश using an आतंरिक transmitter.
Pagers operate as part of a paging system which includes one or more fixed transmitters ( or in the case of response pagers and two-way pagers, एक or अधिक आधार स्टेशन ), as खूब as a क्रमांक of pagers carried by mobile users.
These systems can range इससे a रेस्तरां प्रणाली साथ a सिंगल low-power ट्रांसमीटर, to a nationwide system with thousands of high-power base stations.
One of the first practical paging services was शुभारम्भ in 1950 लिये physicians in the New York City area.
Physicians paid US $ 12 per month for the service and carried a ( 6 oz ) पेजर कि होता प्राप्त फोन संदेश भीतर ( 25 mi ) of a single transmitter tower.
The प्रणाली थी manufactured by the Reevesound Company and operated by Telanswerphone.
In 1960, John Francis Mitchell combined elements of मोटोरोला 's walkie talkie और ऑटोमोबाइल रेडियो technologies to create the first transistorized pager, and from this point, paging technology continued to advance, and pager adoption continued to expand, until the early 1990s.
However, by the mid-1990s, as सेल्यूलर technologies became सस्ता and more widely available, advanced services began to displace paging as a commercial product.
Today, pagers exist largely as niche products, finding preferential use in अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as अस्पताल, पब्लिक सुरक्षा, और खुदरा स्थितियाँ जहाँ उनके सादगी, ऊँची विश्वसनीयता, and low cost represent significant advantages.
Reevesville is a कस्बा in dorchester काउंटी, दक्षिण कैरोलिना, United States.
The population थी 196 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
As पारिभाषित by the u.S. दफ्तर of प्रबन्धन और बजट, और प्रयुक्त by the U.S. Census Bureau for statistical purposes only, Reevesville is included within the Charleston-North Charleston-Summerville metropolitan area.
Frida Kahlo de Rivera ( born Magdalena Carmen Frieda Kahlo y Calderón ; July 6, 1907 – July 13, 1954 ) थी a मैक्सिकन चित्रकार, born in coyoacán, जो is बेहतरीन known for her self-portraits.
Kahlo 's life began and ended in मैक्सिको नगर, in her home known as the Blue House.
She gave her birth date as July 7, 1910, लकिन उसके जनम प्रमाणपत्र shows July 6, 1907.
Kahlo had allegedly wanted the year of her जनम to coincide साथ the साल of the शुरूआत of the Mexican revolution so that her life would begin with the birth of modern Mexico.
Her work has been मनाये in मैक्सिको as emblematic of नेशनल और स्वदेशी परंपरा, और by नारीवादी for its uncompromising depiction of the female experience and form.
Mexican culture and Amerindian cultural tradition are important in her work, which has been sometimes characterized as naïve art or folk art.
Her work has also been described as `` surrealist '', and in 1938 André Breton, principal initiator of the surrealist गति, वर्णित kahlo 's art as a `` ribbon around a bomb ''.
Kahlo था a volatile विवाह with the famous Mexican artist Diego Rivera.
She suffered lifelong स्वास्थ्य problems.
अनेक of उसके स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं were the result of a traffic accident she survived as a teenager.
Recovering from her injuries isolated her from other people and this isolation बहकावे उसके works, अनेक of जिससे हैं self-portraits of एक sort or another.
Kahlo suggested, `` I paint myself because I am so प्रायः अलोन और क्युकी i am the विषय I know best. ''
She also stated, `` i थी born a bitch.
I थी born a painter. ''

theresienwiese on the दिन पहले Oktoberfest 2006
Oktoberfest is a 16-day festival celebrating beer held annually in म्यूनिख, बायर्न, जर्मनी, कार्यशील इससे लेट September to the first weekend in October.
It is one of the most famous events in Germany and is the world 's largest fair, साथ अधिक than 6 लाख लोगों from around the world attending the event every year.
To the स्थानीय, it is नहीं पुकारा oktoberfest, but `` die Wiesn '', after the colloquial name of the fairgrounds themselves.
The oktoberfest is an important part of Bavarian culture, having been held since 1810.
Other cities आरपार the संसार भी थाम oktoberfest जश्न, modeled after the original Munich event.
The Munich Oktoberfest originally took place during the sixteen days up to, and including, the पहला संडे in अक्तूबर.
In 1994, the schedule was modified in response to German reunification so that if the first Sunday in October falls on the 1st or 2nd, तब the पर्व होता go on until October 3 ( German Unity Day ).
Thus, the festival is now 17 days when the first Sunday is अक्तूबर 2 और 18 दिनों जब it is अक्तूबर 1.
In 2010, the festival lasted until the first सोमवार in अक्तूबर, to चिह्नित the वर्षगांठ of the event.
The festival is held in an area named the Theresienwiese ( field, or meadow, of Therese ), प्रायः पुकारा wiesn लिये छोटी, स्तिथ near Munich 's center.
Large quantities of Oktoberfest Beer are consumed, साथ लगभग 7 लाख liters served during the 16 day festival in 2007.
Visitors may also enjoy a wide variety of traditional food such as Hendl ( chicken ), Schweinebraten ( roast pork ), Schweinshaxe ( grilled ham hock ), Steckerlfisch ( ग्रील्ड मछली on a स्टिक ), würstl ( sausages ) साथ साथ brezeln ( pretzel ), knödel ( आलू or ब्रैड पकौड़ी ), Käsespätzle ( cheese noodles ), Reiberdatschi ( potato pancakes ), Sauerkraut or Rotkohl/Blaukraut ( red cabbage ) along with such Bavarian delicacies as Obatzda ( a spiced cheese-butter spread ) and Weisswurst ( a white sausage ).

Wheels of gouda
Cheese is a generic term for a diverse समूह of milk-based खाना उत्पाद.
Cheese is produced in wide-ranging जायका, textures, and forms.
चीज consists of प्रोटीन और मोटे from milk, usually the milk of cows, buffalo, goats, or sheep.
It is produced by जामन of the मिल्क प्रोटीन casein.
Typically, the milk is acidified and जोड of the एंजाइम rennet कल्याणकारी coagulation.
The solids are separated and pressed into फाइनल रूप.
Some cheeses have molds on the rind or throughout.
Most cheeses melt at कुकिंग तापमान.
Hundreds of types of cheese इससे विभिन्न देशों are produced.
Their styles, textures and flavors depend on the origin of the milk ( including the animal 's diet ), whether वे have महरूम pasteurized, the butterfat सामग्री, the जीवाणु और मोल्ड, the प्रसंस्करण, और aging.
Herbs, spices, or लकडी धुँआ may be प्रयुक्त as flavoring agents.
The yellow to red color of many cheeses, such as Red Leicester, is सामान्यतः formed इससे adding annatto.
लिये a few cheeses, the मिल्क is curdled by adding acids such as vinegar or lemon juice.
Most cheeses are acidified to a lesser उपाधि by जीवाणु, which turn milk sugars into lactic acid, then the addition of rennet completes the curdling.
Vegetarian alternatives to rennet हैं उपलब्धियाँ ; सबसे हैं उत्पादित by fermentation of the कवक Mucor miehei, but others have been extracted from various species of the Cynara thistle family.
Cheese is valued for its पोर्टेबिलिटी, long जीवन, और ऊँची सामग्री of मोटे, protein, calcium, and phosphorus.
Cheese is more compact and has a longer shelf life than milk, although how long a cheese will keep may depend on the type of cheese ; labels on packets of cheese often claim that a चीज चाहिए be खपत भीतर तीन to पाँच दिनों of opening.
Generally बोलना, मुश्किल cheeses पिछला longer than soft cheeses, such as Brie or goat 's milk cheese.
Cheesemakers near a dairy region may benefit इससे fresher, lower-priced मिल्क, and lower shipping costs.
The long storage life of some चीज, विशेषकर if it is encased in a protective rind, allows selling when markets are favorable.
अतिरिक्त संघटक may be added to some cheeses, such as black peppers, garlic, chives or cranberries.
A specialist विक्रेता of चीज is sometimes known as a cheesemonger.
To become an expert in this field, like वाइन or कुकिंग, requires कुछ औपचारिक शिक्षा और सालो of चख and hands-on experience.
This position is typically responsible for all aspects of the चीज inventory ; selecting the चीज मेनू, खरीदना, receiving, storage, and ripening.
Legal citation signals are a नियत of ब्रैड abbreviated वाक्यांश or शब्द प्रयुक्त to clarify the authority or significance of a legal citation as it relates to a proposition.
Signals help a reader quickly discern meaning or उपयोगिता of a particular सन्दर्भ जब the सन्दर्भ itself does not provide adequate information.
Most citation signals are placed in सामने of the citation to जिससे they apply.
For example, in the अनुच्छेद जब लिखने a legal argument, it is important to refer to primary sources.
to assist पाठक in locating ये स्त्रोत, it is desirable to use a standardized citation format.
See generally हार्वर्ड विधि पुनर्विलोकन संघ, The Bluebook : A Uniform System of Citation ( 18th ed. 2005 ).
Note, however, that some courts may आवश्यकता कोई विधिक papers कि हैं सुपुर्द to them to conform to a different citation format.
the signal is the phrase `` देखिए generally, '' जिससे indicates कि the citation `` the Bluebook : A Uniform System of Citation ( 18th ed. 2005 ) '' provides general background information on the topic.
Neil Alden आर्मस्ट्रांग ( अगस्त 5, 1930 – अगस्त 25, 2012 ) was an American astronaut and the first person to walk on the Moon.
He was also an aerospace इंजीनियर, नवल एविएटर, परीक्षण pilot, and university professor.
Before becoming an astronaut, आर्मस्ट्रांग थी an अधिकारी in the U.S. Navy and served in the Korean War.
After the war, he earned his bachelor 's degree at Purdue University and परोसा as a परीक्षण पायलट at the नेशनल सलाहकार कमेटी लिये aeronautics high-speed उड़ान Station, now known as the Dryden Flight Research Center, where he logged over 900 flights.
He later completed ग्रैजुएट अध्ययन at the विश्वविद्यालयों of Southern California.
A भागीदार in the u.S. एयर फ़ोर्स 's man in स्पेस soonest और x-20 dyna-soar इंसान spaceflight programs, Armstrong joined the NASA Astronaut Corps in 1962.
He made his first space flight, as कमांड pilot of Gemini 8, in 1966, becoming NASA 's first civilian astronaut to fly in space.
On this मिशन, he performed the पहला डॉकिंग of two spacecraft, with pilot David Scott.
Armstrong 's second and last spaceflight was as mission commander of the Apollo 11 moon लैंडिंग, in जुलाई 1969.
On this मिशन, आर्मस्ट्रांग और बज़ एल्ड्रिन descended to the चंद्र सतह और खर्च two and a half hours exploring, while Michael Collins remained in lunar orbit in the Command Module.
Along with Collins and Aldrin, Armstrong was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom by President रिचर्ड निक्सन ; in 1978, अध्यक्ष jimmy कार्टर प्रस्तुत आर्मस्ट्रांग the congressional स्पेस पदक of Honor in 1978 ; he and his former crewmates received the Congressional Gold Medal in 2009.
Armstrong died in सिनसिनाटी, ओहियो, on अगस्त 25, 2012, at the age of 82, after complications from coronary artery bypass surgery.
Secretariat ( March 30, 1970 – October 4, 1989 ) was an American Thoroughbred racehorse कि in 1973 became the पहला u.s. ट्रिपल क्राउन champion in 25 years.
He set race records in all three events in the Series — the केंटकी डर्बी ( 1:59.4 ), the preakness stakes ( 1:53 ), and the Belmont Stakes ( 2:24 ) — records that still stand today.
he is माना to be one of the greatest Thoroughbreds of all time.
In 1999, ESPN ranked Secretariat the 35th best athlete of the 20th सदी, the उच्चतम रैंकिंग racehorse on the list URL_http.
He ranked second behind Man o ' War in The Blood-Horse 's सूची of the शीर्ष 100 u.S. racehorses of the 20th Century.
सचिवालय थी sired by Bold Ruler out of Somethingroyal, by Princequillo.
He was foaled at the मर्ग in कैरोलीन County, Virginia.
Like उसके प्रसिद्ध पूर्ववर्ती man o ' युद्ध, सचिवालय was a large chestnut colt and was given the same nickname, `` Big Red. ''
Secretariat 's grandsire, nasrullah, is भी the great-great-grandsire of 1977 Triple Crown winner Seattle Slew.
Owned by Penny Chenery, he was trained by Lucien Laurin and mainly ridden by कनाडाई jockey रॉन turcotte, साथ साथ apprentice jockey Paul Feliciano ( first two races ), and veteran Eddie Maple ( last race ).
He raced in Chenery 's मर्ग stable 's ब्लू और श्वेत checkered रंगों and his groom was Eddie Sweat.
Secretariat stood approximately tall, और weighed, साथ a 75-inch girth, in his racing prime.
Madrid (, ) is the capital and largest नगर of स्पेन.
The population of the city is roughly 3.3 million and the entire जनसांख्यिकी of the मैड्रिड महानगर क्षेत्रफल is calculated to be around 6.5 million.
It is the third-largest नगर in the यूरोपीय संघ, बाद London and Berlin, and its metropolitan area is the third-largest in the European Union after London and Paris.
the नगर spans a total of.
The city is located on the Manzanares river in the centre of both the country and the Community of मैड्रिड ( जिससे comprises the नगर of मैड्रिड, इसके conurbation and extended suburbs and villages ) ; this community is bordered by the autonomous communities of Castile and León and Castile-La Mancha.
As the capital city of Spain, seat of government, और निवास of the स्पेनी monarch, मैड्रिड is also the political, economic and cultural centre of Spain.
The current mayor is Ana botella इससे the लोगों 's Party ( PP ).
The मैड्रिड शहरी agglomeration रै the third-largest जीडीपी in the यूरोपीय संघ और इसके प्रभाव in राजनीती, education, entertainment, environment, media, fashion, science, culture, and the arts all contribute to its status as one of the world 's major global cities.
Due to its आर्थिक आउटपुट, ऊँची मानक of जीना, और मार्केट size, Madrid is considered the major financial centre of Southern Europe and the Iberian Peninsula ; it hosts the head offices of the vast majority of the major Spanish companies, such as Telefónica, Iberia or Repsol.
Madrid is the most touristic city of Spain, the fourth-most touristic of the महाद्वीप, और the seventh most visited city in the world according to Forbes.
Is the 10th most livable city in the संसार according to monocle पत्रिका, in its 2010 index.
Madrid also ranks among the 12 greenest यूरोपीय शहरों in 2010. < संदर्भ name= '' एचटीटीपी : //www.citymayors.com/environment/greenest-cities-europe.html '' > Madrid is currently a Candidate City for the 2020 Summer Olympics.
Madrid घरों the मुख्यालय of the संसार पर्यटन संगठन ( wto ), belonging to the संयुक्त राष्ट्र संगठन ( un ), the segib, the संगठन of Ibero-American States ( OEI ), and the Public Interest Oversight Board ( PIOB ).
It also hosts major international institutions regulators of Spanish : the Standing Committee of the Association of Spanish Language Academies, headquarters of the Royal Spanish Academy ( RAE ), the cervantes संस्थान और the न्यास of तात्कालिक Spanish ( Fundéu ).
Madrid organizes fairs as fitur, आरको, simo tci और the cibeles Madrid Fashion Week.
While Madrid possesses a modern infrastructure, it has preserved the look and महसूस of अनेक of इसके historic neighbourhoods and streets.
Its landmarks include the Royal Palace of Madrid ; the Teatro Real ( Royal theatre ) with its restored 1850 Opera House ; the Buen Retiro Park, founded in 1631 ; the 19th-century National Library building ( founded in 1712 ) containing कुछ of स्पेन 's ऐतिहासिक अभिलेख ; a विशाल क्रमांक of नेशनल संग्रहालय, और the सुनहरी त्रिभुज of आर्ट, स्तिथ साथ the paseo डेल प्राडो और comprising तीन आर्ट संग्रहालय : प्राडो संग्रहालय, the museo nacional centro de arte Reina Sofía, a museum of modern art, and the Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum, which completes the shortcomings of the other two museums.
Cibeles Palace and Fountain have become the monument symbol of the city.
The path of the via appia और of the Via Appia Traiana.
Remains of the Appian Way in Rome, निकट quarto Miglio
निकट Rome.
The Appian Way ( लैटिन और इतालवी : via appia ) थी एक of the earliest और रणनीतिक most important Roman roads of the ancient republic.
It connected Rome to brindisi, apulia, in southeast Italy.
Its importance is indicated by its आम नाम, अंकित by Statius :
Appia teritur regina longarum viarum
`` the Appian रास्ता is the महारानी of the long roads ''
The road is named after Appius Claudius Caecus, the Roman censor who began and completed the first section as a military सड़क to the दक्षिण in 312 bc दौरान the samnite Wars.
The Draupner wave, a सिंगल दानव वेव measured on नई साल 's दिन 1995, आखिरकार confirmed the existence of freak waves, which had previously been considered near-mythical
दुष्ट लहरें ( भी ज्ञात as freak लहरें, दानव लहरें, कातिल लहरें, extreme waves, and abnormal waves ) are relatively large and spontaneous ocean surface waves that occur far out at sea, and are a threat even to large ships and ocean liners.
In oceanography, they are more precisely defined as waves whose height is more than twice the significant wave height ( SWH ), जिससे is itself पारिभाषित as the औसत of the largest तीसरा of waves in a wave record.
Therefore rogue waves are not necessarily the biggest waves found at समुद्र ; वे हैं, बल्कि, surprisingly large waves for a given sea state.
Rogue waves seem not to have a single distinct cause, but occur जहाँ शारीरिक कारकों such as high winds and strong currents cause waves to merge to create a single exceptionally large wave.
Electress Sophia of हनोवर ( 1630–1714 )
The line of succession to the अंग्रेजों सिंहासन is the ordered अनुक्रम of all those people eligible to succeed to the throne of the United Kingdom and the other 15 Commonwealth realms.
The Act of Settlement 1701 bestowed succession on the electress sophia of हनोवर और उसके वंशजों while excluding Roman Catholics.
The British government does not publish an official list of all those in line to succeed, but the work of genealogical authors and amateur शोधकर्ताओं suggests कि वहीँ हैं अनेक हजार लोगों potentially in line.
At a summit in Perth, Western Australia in 2011, the heads of government of all 16 Commonwealth realms agreed to take steps to adopt absolute primogeniture, समाप्त the exclusion of लोगों शादीशुदा to रोमन catholics, और मेक अन्य परिवर्तन in the उत्तराधिकार rules.
The line of succession is also used to select the Counsellors of State ( and a regent if the need arises ) अंतर्गत the प्रावधानों of the रीजेंसी Act 1937.
For earlier versions of the line of उत्तराधिकार, देखिए इतिहास of the British line of succession.
Edward Montgomery Clift ( October 17, 1920July 23, 1966 ) was an American film and stage कर्ता the नई यॉर्क times’ obituary विख्यात उसके portrayal of `` मूडी, संवेदनशील young men ''.
He often played outsiders and `` victim-heroes '' ; examples include the social climber in George Stevens 's A Place in the Sun, the anguished कैथोलिक पुजारी in हिचकॉक 's i कबूल, the doomed नियमित सिपाही रॉबर्ट E. ली prewitt in फ्रेड zinnemann 's इससे यहाँ to शाश्वत, और the Jewish GI bullied by antisemites in Edward Dmytryk 's The Young Lions.
Later, after a disfiguring car crash in 1956, and दारू और नुस्खा ड्रग गाली, he became erratic.
Nevertheless important roles were स्टिल उसके, सहित `` the लापरवाह, alcoholic, mother-fixated rodeo performer '' in John Huston 's The Misfits, the title role in Huston 's, and the concentration camp victim in Stanley Kramer 's Judgment at Nuremberg. ''
Clift received four Academy Award nominations during his career, three for बेहतरीन कर्ता और एक लिये बेहतरीन supporting Actor.
The War on Terror ( also known as the Global War on Terrorism ) is a term commonly लागू to an अंतरराष्ट्रीय सैन्य अभियान जिससे प्रारंभ as a result of the 11 September 2001 terrorist attacks on the United States.
This resulted in an international military campaign to eliminate al-Qaeda and other उग्रवादी संगठन.
The United Kingdom and many other नाटो और non-nato राष्ट्र participate in the conflict.
The phrase 'War on Terror ' was first used by us अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश on 20 September 2001.
The Bush administration and the Western media have since used the term to signify a वैश्विक सैन्य, राजनैतिक, lawful, और conceptual struggle—targeting दोनो संगठन designated as terrorist and regimes accused of supporting them.
It was typically used with a particular focus on उग्रवादी islamists, al-qaeda, और अन्य jihadi groups.
Although the term is not officially used by the administration of US President Barack Obama ( which instead uses the term Overseas Contingency आपरेशन ), it is स्टिल commonly प्रयुक्त by राजनेता, in the media and by some aspects of government officially, such as the United States ' Global War on Terrorism Service Medal.

Destroyer USS Shaw exploding after उसके आगे पत्रिका थी detonated दौरान the Attack on Pearl Harbor
The main causes of World War II were nationalistic मुद्दे, अनसुलझे मुद्दे, और resentments resulting इससे संसार युद्ध i और the interwar period in Europe, in addition to the effects of the Great Depression in the 1930s.
The culmination of events that led to the outbreak of युद्ध हैं generally समझा to be the 1939 आक्रमण of कैंडल by Germany and Soviet Russia and the 1937 invasion of the Republic of China by the Empire of Japan.
These military aggressions were the result of decisions made by the authoritarian सत्ताधारी नाजी elite in जर्मनी और by the नेतृत्व of the Kwantung Army in Japan.
World War II started after these आक्रामक क्रियाएँ यहूद मिले साथ an आधिकारिक घोषणा of war and/or armed resistance.

The list does not include creatures ; for ये, देखिए सूची of यूनानी पौराणिक creatures.
The Mitsubishi Galant is an automobile manufactured by Mitsubishi मोटर्स between 1969 and 2012.
The name was derived from the French word galant, अर्थ `` chivalrous ''.
There have been nine distinct generations, and संचयी बिक्री अभी exceed पाँच million.
It began as a compact sedan, लकिन over the कोर्स of इसके जीवन रै विकसित into a larger mid-size car.
Initial production was only based in Japan, but since 1994 the अमरीकी मार्केट रै महरूम परोसा by वाहनों assembled at the former Diamond-Star Motors ( DSM ) facility in Normal, Illinois.
Blood pressure ( BP ), sometimes referred to as arterial रक्त दबाव, is the दबाव exerted by circulating रक्त upon the walls of blood vessels, and is one of the principal vital signs.
When used without further specification, `` blood pressure '' usually refers to the arterial दबाव of the प्रणालीगत circulation.
During प्रत्येक धड़कन, blood pressure varies between a maximum ( systolic ) and a minimum ( diastolic ) pressure.
The blood pressure in the परिसंचरण is प्रधानतया due to the pumping action of the heart.
Differences in औसत रक्त दबाव हैं जिम्मेदार लिये blood flow from one location to another in the circulation.
The रेट of औसत रक्त प्रवाह depends on the प्रतिरोध to flow presented by the blood vessels.
Mean blood pressure decreases as the circulating रक्त चालें दूर इससे the दिल through धमनियों और capillaries due to viscous losses of energy.
Mean blood pressure drops over the whole circulation, although सबसे of the पतन occurs साथ the small arteries and arterioles.
गम्भीरता affects रक्त दबाव via hydrostatic शक्तियां ( e.g., दौरान standing ) and valves in veins, breathing, and pumping from contraction of skeletal muscles also influence blood pressure in veins.
Blood pressure without further specification usually refers to the प्रणालीगत arterial दबाव measured at a व्यक्ति 's अपर भुजा और is a माप of the pressure in the brachial artery, the major artery in the upper arm.
A person’s blood pressure is प्रायः expressed in शर्तें of the systolic दबाव over diastolic pressure and is measured in millimetres of mercury ( mmHg ), for example 120/80.
A veto – Latin for `` I forbid '' – is the power ( used by an officer of the state, लिये उदाहरण ) to unilaterally रोकें an आधिकारिक कार्रवाई, विशेषकर the enactment of legislation.
A veto can be absolute, as for instance in the United Nations Security Council, whose permanent members ( China, फ़्रांस, रूस, संयुक्त किंगडम, संयुक्त राज्य of America ) can block any resolution.
Or it can be limited, as in the legislative process of the United States, where a two-thirds vote in दोनो the हाउस और सीनेट may ओवरराइड a अध्यक्षीय वीटो of legislation.
A veto only gives power to stop changes, नहीं to अपनाना उन्हें ( मगर लिये the विरल `` amendatory veto '' ).
Thus a veto allows इसके होल्डर to protect the status quo.
The concept of a veto body originated with the रोमन consuls और tribunes.
Either of the two consuls holding office in a given year could ब्लाक a सैन्य or सिविल निर्णय by the अन्य ; कोई ट्रिब्यून था the शक्ति to unilaterally block legislation passed by the Roman Senate.
Sulfur dioxide ( also sulphur dioxide ) is the chemical यौगिक साथ the सूत्र.
It is a toxic gas with a pungent, तकलीफदेह महकते, कि is released by volcanoes and in various industrial processes.
Since coal and petroleum often contain sulfur compounds, उनके दहन generates गंधक डाइऑक्साइड जबतक the गंधक यौगिकों are removed before burning the fuel.
Further oxidation of SO2, usually in the presence of a उत्प्रेरक ऐसे as no2, फ़ॉर्म h2so4, और यूँ एसिड बरसात.
Sulfur dioxide emissions हैं भी a precursor to अभिकण in the atmosphere.
Both of these impacts are cause for चिंता over the पर्यावरणीय impact of these fuels.
myasthenia ग्रेविस ( इससे यूनानी μύς `` मांसपेशी '', `` कमज़ोरी '', और `` गंभीर '' ; abbreviated MG ) is an autoimmune neuromuscular disease leading to fluctuating muscle weakness and fatigability.
It is an autoimmune disorder, in which weakness is caused by circulating antibodies that block acetylcholine receptors at the postsynaptic neuromuscular जंक्शन, inhibiting the excitatory प्रभाव of the neurotransmitter acetylcholine on nicotinic receptors throughout neuromuscular junctions.
Myasthenia is treated medically with acetylcholinesterase inhibitors or immunosuppressants, और, in selected cases, thymectomy.
the बीमारी incidence is 3–30 cases per million per year and rising as a result of increased awareness.
MG must be distinguished from जन्मजात myasthenic syndromes कि can present similar symptoms but offer no response to immunosuppressive treatments.
परावर्तक मुड़ nematic liquid crystal display.
Polarizing filter फिल्मी साथ a लंबवत अक्ष to polarize light as it enters.
Glass substrate साथ ito electrodes.
The shapes of these electrodes will determine the आकार कि होगा appear जब the एलसीडी is turned ON.
Vertical ridges etched on the सतह हैं चिकना.
मुड़ nematic liquid crystal.
Glass substrate with आम एलेक्ट्रोड फिल्मी ( ito ) with horizontal ridges to line up with the horizontal filter.
polarizing फिल्टर फिल्मी with a horizontal axis to block/pass light.
Reflective surface to भेजें लाइट वापस to viewer.
( In a backlit एलसीडी, इस परत is replaced साथ a light source. )
A liquid-crystal प्रदर्शक ( एलसीडी ) is a चपटा फलक प्रदर्शक, इलेक्ट्रॉनिक visual display, or video display that uses the light modulating properties of liquid crystals.
Liquid crystals do नहीं emit light directly.
LCDs are available to display arbitrary images ( as in a general-purpose computer display ) or फिक्स्ड बिंब जिससे can be प्रदर्शित or छुपा, such as preset words, digits, and 7-segment displays as in a digital clock.
They use the same basic technology, except that arbitrary images are made up of a large number of small पिक्सेल, जबकि अन्य प्रदर्शक have larger elements.
LCDs are used in a wide range of applications सहित कंप्यूटर मॉनीटर, टेलीविज़न, instrument panels, aircraft cockpit displays, and signage.
They are common in consumer devices such as video players, gaming डिवाइस, घड़ियाँ, घड़ियाँ, calculators, और telephones, और have replaced कैथोड रे ट्यूब ( CRT ) displays in most applications.
They are available in a wider range of screen sizes than CRT and plasma displays, and since they do not use phosphors, वे do नहीं suffer चित्र burn-in.
LCDs are, however, susceptible to चित्र हठ.
the एलसीडी स्क्रीन is अधिक उर्जा efficient and can be disposed of more safely than a CRT.
Its low electrical power खपत enables it to be used in battery -powered electronic equipment.
It is an electronically modulated optical device made up of any number of segments filled with द्रव crystals और arrayed in सामने of a लाइट सोर्स ( backlight ) or reflector to produce images in color or monochrome.
Liquid crystals were पहला खोजा in 1888.
By 2008, worldwide sales of televisions with LCD screens exceeded annual sales of crt इकाई ; the crt became obsolete लिये most purposes.
The borgata होटल कसीनो और स्पा is a लक्ज़री होटल, कसीनो, और spa in Atlantic City, New Jersey, United States.
It is स्वामित्व by मरीना ज़िला विकास, a संयुक्त venture between Boyd Gaming and a divesture trust established by MGM Resorts International.
The $ 1.1 billion casino hotel सुविधाएँ 2,002 कक्ष और is the largest hotel in New Jersey.
The Borgata opened in July 2003 as a Las vegas-style megaresort और is the top-grossing casino in Atlantic City.
A bottle of high potency b-complex विटामिन संपूरक pills.
A vitamin ( or ) is an सशुल्क यौगिक जरूरी by an सजीव as a vital nutrient in limited amounts.
An organic chemical compound ( or सम्बन्धित नियत of यौगिकों ) is पुकारा a विटामिन जब it can नहीं be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism, and must be obtained from the diet.
Thus, the पद is सशर्त दोनो on the circumstances and on the particular organism.
लिये उदाहरण, एस्कॉर्बिक एसिड ( विटामिन c ) is a विटामिन लिये इंसानो, लकिन not for most other animals, and biotin and vitamin D are required in the human diet only in certain circumstances.
By convention, the term vitamin includes neither other अनिवार्य nutrients, ऐसे as dietary खनिज, अनिवार्य वसीय acids, or अनिवार्य अमीनो acids ( जिससे हैं needed in larger amounts than vitamins ) nor the large number of other nutrients that promote health but are otherwise required less often.
Thirteen vitamins are universally पहचाना at उपस्थित.
Vitamins are वर्गीकृत by उनके biological and chemical activity, not their structure.
Thus, each `` vitamin '' refers to a number of vitamer compounds that all show the biological कार्यकलाप संबद्ध साथ a particular vitamin.
Such a set of chemicals is grouped under an alphabetized vitamin `` जेनेरिक वर्णनकर्ता '' शीर्षक, ऐसे as `` विटामिन a ``, जिससे शामिल the यौगिकों retinal, retinol, and four known carotenoids.
Vitamers by definition are convertible to the active form of the vitamin in the body, and are sometimes inter-convertible to एक another, as खूब.
Vitamins have diverse biochemical कृत्यों.
Some have hormone-like functions as regulators of mineral metabolism ( such as विटामिन d ), or regulators of कोशिका और ऊतक विकास and differentiation ( such as some forms of vitamin A ).
Others function as antioxidants ( e.g., vitamin E and sometimes vitamin C ).
The largest number of vitamins ( such as B जटिल विटामिन ) फलन as precursors लिये एंजाइम cofactors, that help enzymes in their work as catalysts in metabolism.
In this role, vitamins may be tightly bound to enzymes as part of prosthetic समूह : लिये उदाहरण, biotin is part of enzymes involved in making fatty acids.
Vitamins may also be less tightly bound to enzyme catalysts as coenzymes, detachable अणुओं that function to carry chemical groups or electrons between molecules.
For example, folic acid may carry methyl, formyl, और methylene समूह in the cell.
Although these roles in assisting enzyme-substrate reactions are vitamins ' best-known फलन, the अन्य विटामिन कृत्यों हैं बराबर महत्वपूर्ण.
Until the mid-1930s, when the first commercial yeast-extract vitamin B complex and semi-synthetic vitamin C supplement tablets were sold, vitamins were obtained solely through food सेवन, और परिवर्तन in आहार ( जिससे, लिये उदाहरण, could occur दौरान a particular growing season ) usually greatly altered the types and amounts of vitamins ingested.
However, vitamins have been produced as commodity chemicals and made widely available as inexpensive semisynthetic and synthetic-source multivitamin dietary और खाना पूरक और एडिटिव, since the middle of the 20th century.
World Muslim population by percentage ( Pew Research बीच, 2009 )
World Muslim जनसांख्यिकी in लाखो
Islam is the world 's दूसरी largest धर्म बाद Christianity.
According to a 2010 study, Islam has 1.62 billion adherents, making up over 23 % of the संसार जनसांख्यिकी.
Islam is the predominant religion in the Middle East, in सहेल, in the सींग of अफ़्रीकी और उत्तरी Africa, and in some parts of Asia.
Large communities of Muslims are also मिला in चीन, the balkans, and Russia.
Other parts of the world host large Muslim immigrant communities ; in Western Europe, for instance, Islam is the second largest religion बाद christianity, जहाँ it represents 6 % of the कुल जनसांख्यिकी.
According to the Pew शोध बीच in 2010 there were 49 Muslim-majority countries.
Around 62 % of the world 's Muslims live in South और southeast एशिया, साथ over 1 billion adherents.
The largest Muslim country is Indonesia, home to 12.7 % of the संसार 's मुसलमान, followed by पाकिस्तानी ( 11.0 % ), India ( 10.9 % ), and Bangladesh ( 9.2 % ).
About 20 % of मुसलमान सजीव in अरब countries.
In the Middle East, the non-Arab countries of Turkey and Iran are the largest muslim-majority देशों ; in अफ़्रीकी, मिश्र और सीरियल have the most populous Muslim communities.
A study conducted by the Pew Research Center in 2010 and released January 2011 found that there हैं 1.62 अरब मुसलमान around the world.
The study found more Muslims in the United Kingdom than in लेबनान और अधिक in चीन than in Syria.
Rhode Island ( or ), officially the State of Rhode Island and विधाता बागानों, is a राज्य in the नई इंग्लैण्ड प्रदेश of the United States.
Rhode Island is the smallest in क्षेत्रफल, the eighth least populous, but the second most densely populated of the 50 US states behind New Jersey.
Rhode Island is bordered by Connecticut to the west and Massachusetts to the north and east, and it shares a जल boundary साथ नई यॉर्क 's long द्वीप to the दक्षिणपश्चिम.
Rhode Island was the first of the 13 original colonies to घोषित स्वतंत्रता इससे अंग्रेजों नियम, declaring itself independent on May 4, 1776, two months before any other colony.
The State was also the last of the तेरह असली colonies to ratify the संयुक्त राज्य Constitution.
Rhode Island 's official nickname is `` The Ocean State '', a reference to the State 's geography, since Rhode Island has अनेक विशाल bays और inlets कि राशि to परिचय 14 % of इसके कुल area.
Its land area is, but its total area is significantly larger.
Dubai ( ; ', ) is a city in the संयुक्त अरब अमीरात, स्तिथ भीतर the अमीर of the same name.
The emirate of Dubai is located on the southeast coast of the Persian Gulf on the arabian प्रायद्वीप और is एक of the seven emirates that make up the country.
It has the largest population in the UAE ( 2,106,177 ) and the second-largest जमीन territory by क्षेत्रफल ( 4,114 km2 ) after Abu Dhabi.
Dubai and Abu Dhabi, the नेशनल पूंजी, हैं the तभी दो अमीरात to have वीटो शक्ति over नाजुक matters of national importance in the country 's legislature.
The city of Dubai is located on the emirate 's उत्तरी तटरेखा और heads up the dubai-sharjah-ajman metropolitan area.
Dubai is nowadays often misperceived as a country or city-state और, in कुछ मामले, the UAE as a whole has been described as 'Dubai '.
The earliest mention of Dubai is in 1095 AD, और the earliest अंकित उपनिवेश in the प्रदेश तिथियाँ इससे 1799.
The Sheikhdom of Dubai was formally established in 1833 by Sheikh Maktoum bin Butti Al-Maktoum when he persuaded around 800 members of his tribe of the Bani Yas, जीना in कया थी तब the दूसरी सऊदी राज्य और अभी भाग of सऊदी अरब, to follow उसे to the दुबई क्रीक by the abu falasa गोत्र of the Bani Yas.
It remained under the tribe 's control when the संयुक्त किंगडम assumed सुरक्षा of the sheikhdom in 1892 और joined the nascent संयुक्त अरब Emirates upon independence in 1971 as the country 's second emirate.
Its strategic geographic location made the town an important trading hub and by the beginning of the 20th century, दुबई थी already an महत्वपूर्ण क्षेत्रीय port.
Today, दुबई रै उभरा as a कॉस्मोपॉलिटन metropolis that has grown steadily to become a global city and a business and cultural hub of the Middle East and the Persian Gulf region.
Although Dubai 's economy was historically निर्मित on the आयल उद्योग, the अमीर 's western-style मॉडल of कारोबार ड्राइव इसके अर्थव्यवस्था साथ the प्रमुख revenues अभी coming from tourism, real estate, and financial services.
Dubai has recently attracted world attention through many innovative विशाल निर्माण प्रोजेक्ट और खेल events.
The city has become symbolic for its skyscrapers and high-rise buildings, such as the world 's tallest Burj Khalifa, in addition to ambitious development projects including man-made islands, होटल, और कुछ of the largest खरीदारी malls in the region and the world.
This increased attention has also highlighted labor and human rights issues concerning the city 's largely दक्षिण एशियाई सशुल्क workforce.
Dubai 's property market experienced a major deterioration in 2008–2009 as a परिणाम of the विश्वव्यापी आर्थिक downturn following the financial crisis of 2007-2008.
However, दुबई रै बना a स्थिर और क्रमिक रिकवरी with help coming from neighboring emirates.
The handful of new projects that are in the pipeline have महरूम समर्थ to सहायता दुबई रियल एस्टेट make a comeback.
As of 2012, Dubai is the 22nd सबसे महंगी city in the world, and the most expensive city in the Middle East, surpassing Israel 's Tel Aviv ( 31st ).
Dubai has भी महरूम रेटेड as एक of the बेहतरीन स्थान to सजीव in the मध्य ईस्ट, including by US American global consulting firm Mercer who rated the city as the best place to live in the Middle East in 2011.
