Surface of the Atlantic ocean बैठक the धरती 's ग्रहीय boundary layer and troposphere.
Waves on an समंदर coast.
This animation uses Earth science data from a किस्में of सेंसर on नासा धरती observing satellites to माप शारीरिक oceanography पैरामीटर्स ऐसे as ocean currents, ocean winds, sea surface height and sea surface temperature.
an समंदर ( ; the संसार समंदर of शास्त्रीय प्राचीनता ) is a body of saline water that composes a large part of a planet 's hydrosphere.
In the context of Earth, it refers to one or all of the major divisions of the planet 's World Ocean – वे हैं, in descending अनुक्रम of क्षेत्रफल, the प्रशांत, अटलांटिक, भारतीय, Southern ( Antarctic ), and Arctic Oceans.
The word `` sea `` is often used interchangeably with `` ocean '', but strictly speaking a sea is a body of saline जल ( संभवतः a प्रभाग of the संसार समंदर ) partly or fully enclosed by land.
Earth is the only planet known to have an ocean ( or any large amounts of खोलें द्रव जल ).
Approximately 72 % of the ग्रह 's सतह ( ~3.6x108 km2 ) is covered by saline जल कि is customarily विभाजित into several principal oceans and smaller seas, with the ocean covering approximately 71 % of the Earth 's surface.
In शर्तें of the जलमंडल of the Earth, the ocean contains 97 % of the Earth 's water.
Oceanographers have stated that out of 97 %, तभी 5 % of the समंदर as a पूरे on धरती रै महरूम छान.
Because it is the principal component of Earth 's hydrosphere, the world ocean is integral to सब ज्ञात जीवन, फ़ॉर्म भाग of the कार्बन साईकिल, और प्रभाव climate and weather patterns.
The total volume is approximately 1.3 billion घन किलोमीटर ( 310 लाख cu mi ) साथ an average depth of.
It is the habitat of 230,000 known species, although much of the समंदर 's गहराइयों remain unexplored और it is अनुमानित कि over दो लाख marine species exist.
The origin of Earth 's oceans is still unknown, but महासागर हैं believed to have formed in the hadean काल and may have been the impetus for the emergence of life.
Extraterrestrial महासागर may be रचित of a चौड़ी range of elements and compounds.
The only confirmed large stable bodies of extraterrestrial surface liquids हैं the झीलों of टाइटन, हालांकि वहीँ is प्रमाण for the existence of oceans elsewhere in the Solar System.
Early in their geologic histories, मंगल और शुक्र हैं theorized to have had large water oceans.
The Mars ocean hypothesis suggests that nearly a third of the सतह of मंगल थी एकबार covered by जल, हालांकि the जल on मंगल is no longer oceanic, and a runaway greenhouse effect may have boiled away the global ocean of Venus.
Compounds such as salts and ammonia dissolved in water lower its जमने पाइंट, so कि जल might मौजूद in विशाल quantities in extraterrestrial environments as brine or convecting ice.
Unconfirmed oceans are speculated beneath the surface of many dwarf planets and प्राकृतिक satellites ; notably, the समंदर of यूरोपा is believed to have over twice the water volume of Earth.
The Solar System 's gas giant planets are भी believed to possess द्रव वायुमंडलीय परतों of yet to be confirmed compositions.
Oceans may also exist on exoplanets and exomoons, including सतह महासागर of द्रव जल within a circumstellar habitable zone.
Ocean planets are a काल्पनिक प्रकार of ग्रह साथ a surface completely covered with liquid.
Elvis Aaron Presley ( January 8, 1935 – अगस्त 16, 1977 ) थी an अमरीकी singer and actor.
A cultural icon, he is commonly known by the single name Elvis.
One of the सबसे लोकप्रिय संगीतकारों of the 20th सदी, he is प्रायः referred to as the `` King of Rock and Roll '' or `` the King ''.
Born in Tupelo, Mississippi, Presley स्थानांतरित to मेम्फिस, टेनेसी, साथ his family at the age of 13.
He began his career there in 1954, working साथ सूर्य रिकॉर्ड मालिक sam phillips, जो चाही to लाओ the ध्वनि of african-american music to a wider audience.
Accompanied by guitarist Scotty Moore and bassist Bill Black, Presley was the most महत्वपूर्ण popularizer of rockabilly, an uptempo, backbeat -driven fusion of country and rhythm and blues.
RCA Victor acquired his contract in a deal arranged by Colonel Tom Parker, who went on to मैनेज the सिंगर लिये over two decades.
Presley 's first RCA single, `` heartbreak होटल ``, released in January 1956, was a number-one hit.
He became the अग्रणी फिगर of the newly popular sound of rock and roll with a series of network television appearances and chart-topping records.
His energized interpretations of songs, many from African-American स्त्रोत, और उसके uninhibited प्रदर्शन स्टाइल बना उसे enormously popular—and controversial.
In November 1956, he made उसके फिल्मी डेब्यू in प्रेम Me Tender.
Drafted into सैन्य सेवा in 1958, प्रेस्ली relaunched his recording career two years later with some of his most commercially successful work.
He staged few concerts however, and guided by Parker, proceeded to devote much of the 1960s to बनाना हॉलीवुड फिल्मों और soundtrack albums, most of them critically derided.
In 1968, after seven years दूर इससे the स्टेज, he लौटे to सजीव प्रदर्शन in a मनाये वापसी टेलीविज़न खास कि led to an extended Las Vegas concert residency and a string of profitable tours.
In 1973 Presley staged the पहला कॉन्सर्ट ब्रॉडकास्ट globally via satellite, Aloha from Hawaii.
Prescription drug abuse severely deteriorated उसके स्वास्थ्य, और he died suddenly in 1977 at the age of 42.
Presley is regarded as one of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण आंकड़े of 20th-century लोकप्रिय culture.
He had a versatile voice and unusually wide success encompassing many जाति, सहित देश, pop ballads, gospel, and blues.
He is the best-selling सोलो artist in the history of popular music.
Nominated for 14 competitive Grammys, he won तीन, और प्राप्त the ग्रैमी आजीवन Achievement Award at age 36.
He has been inducted into अनेक म्यूज़िक halls of fame.
A कांच of रूट beer with foam
Root beer is a carbonated, sweetened beverage, originally बना using the रूट of a sassafras संयंत्र ( or the छाल of a sassafras tree ) as the primary flavor.
रूट बियर, popularized in North America, comes in two forms : alcoholic and soft drink.
The historical root beer was analogous to छोटी बियर in कि the process provided a drink with a very low alcohol content.
Although जड़ें हैं प्रयुक्त as the सोर्स of अनेक soft drinks throughout the world, often different names are used.
Fluorescent minerals emit visible light when exposed to पराबैंगनी लाइट
Fluorescence is the उत्सर्जन of लाइट by a पदार्थ कि रै अवशोषित light or other electromagnetic radiation.
It is a form of संदीप्ति.
In most cases, the emitted light has a longer wavelength, और इसलिए निम्नतर energy, than the absorbed radiation.
however, जब the अवशोषित इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण is तीव्र, it is संभावित लिये एक इलेक्ट्रॉन to absorb two photons ; this two-photon absorption can lead to emission of radiation having a shorter wavelength than the absorbed radiation.
The emitted radiation may also be of the वही wavelength as the अवशोषित विकिरण, termed `` resonance fluorescence ''.
The सबसे striking उदाहरण of प्रतिदीप्ति occur जब the अवशोषित विकिरण is in the पराबैंगनी प्रदेश of the वर्णक्रम, and thus invisible to the human eye, and the emitted light is in the visible region.
प्रतिदीप्ति रै अनेक व्यावहारिक अनुप्रयोग, सहित mineralogy, gemology, रासायनिक सेंसर ( fluorescence spectroscopy ), fluorescent labelling, dyes, biological detectors, and, most commonly, fluorescent lamps.
अनौपचारिक लॉजिक, intuitively, refers to the principles of logic and logical thought outside of a formal setting.
However, perhaps because of the अनौपचारिक in the शीर्षक, the precise परिभाषा of informal logic is a matter of some dispute.
Ralph H. Johnson and J. Anthony Blair define informal logic as `` a branch of logic whose task is to develop non-formal standards, criteria, procedures for the analysis, निर्वचन, मूल्यांकन, आलोचना और निर्माण of argumentation. ''
This definition reflects what had been अव्यक्त in उनके अभ्यास और कया others were doing in their informal logic texts.
Informal लॉजिक is संबद्ध साथ ( अनौपचारिक ) fallacies, critical thinking, the Thinking Skills Movement and the interdisciplinary inquiry known as argumentation theory.
Frans H. van Eemeren writes that the label `` अनौपचारिक लॉजिक '' कवर a `` संग्रहण of normative approaches to the पढ़ाई of तर्क in ordinary language that remain closer to the practice of argumentation than formal logic. ''
USA annual real GDP 1910–60, with the सालो of the ग्रेट अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
Unemployment rate in the US 1910–1960, साथ the सालो of the ग्रेट अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
The Great Depression began in August of 1929, जब the संयुक्त राज्य economy first went into an economic recession.
Although the country spent two months with declining GDP, it was not until the Wall Street Crash of October, 1929 that the effects of a घटती अर्थव्यवस्था यहूद लगा, and a major worldwide economic downturn ensued.
The मार्केट क्रैश चिह्नित the शुरूआत of a दशक of high unemployment, poverty, low profits, deflation, plunging farm incomes, and lost opportunities for economic growth and personal advancement.
हालांकि इसके कल्याणकारी हैं स्टिल अनिश्चित और विवादास्पद, the जाल प्रभाव was a sudden and general loss of confidence in the economic future.
The usual explanations include numerous factors, विशेषकर ऊँची उपभोक्ता कर्ज़, ill-regulated बाज़ार कि permitted overoptimistic लोन by banks and investors, and the lack of high-growth new industries, all interacting to create a downward economic spiral of reduced spending, falling confidence, and lowered production.
Industries that suffered the most included construction, agriculture as dust-bowl conditions persisted in the agricultural heartland, शिपिंग, खनन, और लॉगिंग as खूब as टिकाऊ goods जैसे ऑटोमोबाइल और उपकरण that could be postponed.
The economy reached bottom in the winter of 1932–33 ; then came four years of बहुत रैपिड विकास जबतक 1937, जब the मंदी of 1937 brought वापस 1934 levels of unemployment.
The अवसाद caused प्रमुख राजनैतिक changes in America.
Three years into the depression, Herbert Hoover lost the 1932 अध्यक्षीय चुनाव to फ्रैंकलिन Delano Roosevelt in a sweeping landslide.
Roosevelt 's economic recovery plan, the New Deal, instituted unprecedented programs for relief, रिकवरी और सुधार, और brought परिचय a प्रमुख realignment of American politics.
The Depression also resulted in an increase of emigration of लोगों to अन्य देशों लिये the पहला समय in अमरीकी history.
For उदाहरण, कुछ आप्रवासियों गई वापस to उनके native countries, and some native US citizens went to Canada, Australia, and South Africa.
It also resulted in the mass migration of people from badly hit areas in the Great Plains and the South to places such as कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the उत्तर, क्रमशः ( देखिए okies और the ग्रेट माइग्रेशन of अफ़्रीकी Americans ).
Racial तनाव भी increased दौरान इस time.
By the 1940s आव्रजन था returned back to normal, and emigration declined.
A well-known example of an emigrant was Frank McCourt, जो गई to आयरलैंड, as recounted in his book Angela 's Ashes.
The memory of the अवसाद भी तराशा आधुनिक theories of अर्थशास्त्र और resulted in अनेक परिवर्तन in कैसा the सरकारी dealt with economic downturns, such as the use of stimulus packages, Keynesian economics, and Social Security.
It also shaped modern अमरीकी साहित्य, resulting in प्रसिद्ध novels ऐसे as जॉन steinbeck 's `` The Grapes of Wrath `` and `` Of Mice and Men ``.
The ग्रेट अवसाद of the 1930s प्रारंभ with the stock market crash of October 1929.
Turkey ( ), officially the Republic of Turkey, is a transcontinental country, स्तिथ ज़्यादातर on आनातोलिया in पश्चिमी एशिया और on ईस्ट thrace in Southeastern Europe.
तुर्कों is bordered by आठ देशों : बुल्गारिया to the उत्तरपश्चिम ; यूनानियों to the वेस्ट ; जॉर्जिया to the northeast ; Armenia, Iran and the Azerbaijani exclave of Nakhchivan to the east ; and Iraq and Syria to the southeast.
The Mediterranean समुद्र is to the दक्षिण ; the ईजियन समुद्र is to the west ; and the Black Sea is to the north.
The Sea of Marmara, the Bosphorus and the Dardanelles ( which together form the Turkish Straits ) demarcate the boundary between thrace और आनातोलिया ; वे भी पृथक यूरोपीय and Asia.
Turkey 's location at the crossroads of यूरोपीय और एशिया makes it a देश of significant geostrategic importance.
The country 's official language is Turkish, a Turkic language, which is बोला by लगभग 85 % of the population as mother tongue.
The most numerous ethnic group is the Turks, who constitute between 70 % and 75 % of the जनसांख्यिकी according to the World Factbook.
Kurds are the largest जातीय अल्पसंख्यक और, according to the वही सोर्स, क्रमांक around 18 % of the population while other ethnic minorities are estimated to be at 7–12 %.
The vast majority of the जनसांख्यिकी is Muslim.
The area now called तुर्कों रै महरूम inhabited चूंकि the paleolithic, सहित various Ancient Anatolian civilizations and Thracian peoples.
After Alexander the Great 's conquest, the area was Hellenized, which continued with the रोमन नियम और the परिवर्तन into the बीज़ान्टिन Empire.
The Seljuk Turks began migrating into the area in the 11th century, starting the प्रक्रम of turkification, जिससे थी greatly त्वरित by the Seljuk victory over the Byzantines at the Battle of Manzikert in 1071.
The Seljuk Sultanate of rûm शासित आनातोलिया जबतक the mongol आक्रमण in 1243, upon which it disintegrated into several small Turkish beyliks.
Starting from the late 13th सदी, the उस्मानी beylik संयुक्त आनातोलिया और निर्मित an साम्राज्य encompassing much of Southeastern Europe, Western Asia and North Africa.
After the Ottoman Empire collapsed following its defeat in World War I, parts of it were occupied by the victorious allies.
A cadre of young military officers, led by Mustafa Kemal Atatürk and his colleagues, organized a successful resistance to the Allies ; in 1923 they स्थापित the आधुनिक गणतंत्र of तुर्कों, साथ Atatürk as its first president.
Turkey is a democratic, secular, unitary, संवैधानिक गणतंत्र साथ a विविध cultural heritage.
Turkey has become increasingly integrated with the West through सदस्यता in संगठनों ऐसे as the परिषद of यूरोपीय, NATO, OECD, OSCE and the G-20 major economies.
Turkey began full membership negotiations साथ the यूरोपीय संघ in 2005, having महरूम an associate member of the European Economic Community since 1963 and having joined the EU Customs Union in 1995.
Turkey has also fostered close cultural, political and economic relations साथ the मध्य ईस्ट, काकेशस, the turkic राज्य of सेंट्रल एशिया and the African countries through membership in organisations such as the Turkic Council, Joint Administration of Turkic Arts and Culture, Organisation of Islamic Cooperation and the Economic Cooperation Organisation.
Turkey 's growing economy and diplomatic initiatives have led to इसके मान्यता as a क्षेत्रीय शक्ति.
Turkey is the world 's 17th largest economy by nominal GDP and the 16th largest by खरीदना शक्ति पैरिटी.
Caryn Elaine Johnson, best known as Whoopi Goldberg (, ( born November 13, 1955 ) is an अमरीकी comedienne, अभिनेत्री, singer-songwriter, political activist, author and talk show host.
Goldberg made her film debut in the रंग जामुनी ( 1985 ), playing Celie, a mistreated black woman in the Deep South.
She received a nomination लिये the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री और जीती her first Golden Globe Award for her role in the film.
In 1990, she played Oda mae भूरा, a wacky मानसिक helping a slain man ( Patrick Swayze ) save his lover ( Demi Moore ) in the blockbuster Ghost.
This performance won her a second Golden Globe and an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress ; this made Goldberg only the second black woman in the history of the अकादमी पुरस्कार to जीत an एक्टिंग oscar—the पहला होने हैटी McDaniel who won for Gone With the Wind in 1939.
Notable later films include Sister Act and Sister Act 2, the खिलाड़ी, बना in अमेरिका, कैसा Stella Got Her Groove Back, Girl, Interrupted and Rat Race.
She is also acclaimed for her भूमिकाएँ as the बारटेंडर guinan in स्टार ट्रेक : the अगला पीढी, as टेरी Doolittle in Jumpin ' Jack Flash, and as Carmen Tibideaux in Glee, as well as the voice of Shenzi the hyena in The Lion King.
गोल्डबर्ग रै महरूम मनोनीत for 13 Emmy Awards for her work in television.
She was co-producer of the popular game show हॉलीवुड वर्गों इससे 1998 to 2004.
She has been the मॉडरेटर of the दिन talk show The View since 2007.
Goldberg has a Grammy, two Daytime Emmys, two Golden Globes, a टोनी ( लिये उत्पादन, नहीं एक्टिंग ), और an Oscar.
In addition, Goldberg has a British Academy Film Award, four People 's चुनाव पुरस्कार, और रै महरूम सम्मानित साथ a स्टार on the हॉलीवुड चलना of कीर्ति.
She is one of the few मनोरंजनकर्ता जो have जीती an Emmy, Grammy, Oscar, and Tony Award.
Augusta is a consolidated city in the U.S. state of Georgia, located at the fall line of the Savannah River, at the सिर of इसके navigable portion.
As of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, the augusta– रिचमंड County population was 195,844 not counting the unconsolidated cities of Hephzibah and Blythe.
Augusta is the principal city of the Augusta – Richmond County Metropolitan Statistical Area, which as of 2010 had an estimated population of 556,877, बनाना it दोनो the second-largest नगर और the second-largest मैट्रो area in the state after Atlanta.
It is the 116th-largest नगर in the संयुक्त राज्य.
internationally, augusta is बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये hosting The Masters Tournament in golf each spring.
A cd-rom ( ) is a pre-pressed कॉम्पैक्ट disc which contains data.
The name is an acronym which stands for `` कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क read-only memory ``.
Computers can पढ़ा cd-roms, लकिन can not write on them.
CD-ROMs are popularly used to distribute कंप्यूटर तन्त्र, सहित वीडियो खेल और मल्टीमीडिया अनुप्रयोग, though any data can be stored ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ).
Some CDs, called enhanced CDs, hold both computer data and ऑडियो साथ the latter सक्षम of होने निभाई on a cd खिलाड़ी, जबकि आंकड़ा ( ऐसे as software or digital video ) is only usable on a computer ( such as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ).
The Yellow Book is the technical standard that defines the स्वरूप of CD-ROMs.
One of a set of color-bound books that contain the technical specifications for all CD formats, the Yellow किताब, निर्मित by सोनी और फिलिप्स, थी the first extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio.
It adapted the format to थाम कोई रूप of data.
The Chicago Blackhawks ( spelled as Black Hawks before 1986, and known colloquially as the चीलों ) हैं a professional ice hockey team based in Chicago, Illinois.
They are सदस्यों of the सेंट्रल प्रभाग of the Western Conference of the National Hockey League ( NHL ).
They have जीती चार स्टेनली कप championships since their founding in 1926, most recently in 2009–10.
The Blackhawks are one of the Original Six NHL teams, along with the Detroit Red Wings, मॉन्ट्रियल canadiens, टोरंटो मेपल leafs, बोस्टन bruins and New York Rangers.
Since the ब्लैकहॉक्स have निभाई उनके घर खेल at the संयुक्त Center after having spent 65 years playing at Chicago Stadium.
Lent celebrants carrying out a street बारात दौरान पावन सप्ताह.
The violet color is often associated with penance and detachment.
Similar Christian penitential practice is seen in other कैथोलिक देशों, sometimes संबद्ध साथ mortification of the flesh.
granada, निकारागुआ.
Lent ( Latin : Quadragesima ) is a solemn observance in the liturgical साल of अनेक ईसाई denominations, स्थायी लिये a काल of लगभग six weeks leading up to Easter Sunday.
In the general Latin-rite and most पश्चिमी denominations lent is लिया to चलाएं इससे Ash Wednesday to Maundy Thursday ( Holy Thursday ) morning or to Easter Eve.
In the Catholic Church, Lent lasts until Holy Thursday, जबकि अन्य denominations run until Easter Eve.
The traditional purpose of Lent is the preparation of the आस्तिक through दुआ, penance, repentance, almsgiving, and self-denial.
इसके संस्थागत purpose is heightened in the सालाना commemoration of पावन सप्ताह, marking the death, burial and resurrection of Jesus, which recalls the events of the Bible when Jesus is crucified on Good Friday, which then culminates in the celebration on Easter Sunday of the Resurrection of Jesus Christ.
During Lent, many of the faithful commit to fasting or giving up निश्चित प्रकार of luxuries as a रूप of penitence.
The स्टेशन of the क्रॉस, a devotional commemoration of Christ 's carrying the Cross and of his execution, are often observed.
Many Roman Catholic and some Protestant churches remove पुष्प इससे उनके altars, जबकि crucifixes, धार्मिक statues, and other elaborate religious symbols are often veiled in violet fabrics in solemn observance of the event.
in निश्चित परहेज़गारों कैथोलिक देशों, कुछ adherents mark the season with the traditional abstention from the consumption of meat.
In some countries, grand religious processions and सांस्कृतिक कस्टम हैं observed, और the वफादार attempt to विज़िट सात चर्च during Holy Week in honor of Jesus Christ heading to Mount Calvary.
Lent is traditionally described as lasting for forty days, in commemoration of the चालीस दिनों जिससे, according to the gospels of मैथ्यू, चिह्नित और ल्यूक, यीशु खर्च उपवास in the मरुस्थल पहले the beginning of his public ministry, where he endured temptation by the Devil.
However, different ईसाई denominations गणना the forty days of Lent differently.
In most Western traditions the Sundays are not counted as part of Lent ; thus the period from Ash बुधवार जबतक ईस्टर consists of 40 days when the Sundays are excluded.
However in the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर lent is अभी लिया to समाप्त on पावन गुरुवार rather than Easter Eve, and hence lasts 38 days excluding Sundays, or 44 days in total.
This event, along साथ इसके परहेज़गारों कस्टम हैं observed by Catholics, Lutherans, Methodists, Presbyterians, and Anglicans.

The Chernobyl disaster (, Chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a अनर्थकारी नाभिकीय दुर्घटना कि occurred on 26 अप्रैल 1986 at the chernobyl नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in Ukraine ( then officially the Ukrainian SSR ), which was under the direct jurisdiction of the central authorities of the Soviet Union.
An explosion and fire released large quantities of रेडियोसक्रिय अणु into the माहौल, जिससे स्प्रेड over much of the western USSR and Europe.
The Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst nuclear power plant accident in history, and is one of only two classified as a level 7 event on the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नाभिकीय इवेंट स्केल ( the अन्य होने the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011 ).
The battle to contain the contamination and avert a greater catastrophe ultimately शामिल over 500,000 मजदूर और लागत an अनुमानित 18 अरब rubles.
The आधिकारिक सोवियत casualty गिनती of 31 मौतों रै महरूम विवादित, और long-term effects such as cancers and deformities are still being accounted for.
In grammar, a subject complement is a predicative expression that follows a linking क्रिया ( copula ) and that complements ( completes ) the subject of the sentence by either ( 1 ) renaming it or ( 2 ) describing it.
In the former case, a renaming noun phrase such as a संज्ञा or सर्वनाम is पुकारा a predicative nominal.
an क्रियाशील following the copula और describing the subject is called a predicative adjective.
In either case the predicative complement in प्रभाव mirrors the subject.
Subject complements are used साथ a छोटी क्लास of क्रियाएँ पुकारा linking क्रियाएँ or copula, of which be is the most common.
Since copula are stative verbs, subject complements हैं नहीं प्रभावित by कोई कार्रवाई of the verb.
Subject complements are typically नहीं clause वितर्क, nor are they clause adjuncts.
Throughout the fifty-five year history of the Grammy Awards, many significant रिकॉर्ड have महरूम नियत.
This page only includes the प्रतिस्पर्धी पुरस्कार जीती by various artists.
This does not include the various special awards that are presented by the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences such as Lifetime Achievement Awards, trustees पुरस्कार, तकनीकी पुरस्कार or Legend Awards.
the पेज however करता शामिल अन्य non-performance सम्बन्धित grammys ( ज्ञात as the शिल्प & Production Fields ) that may have been presented to the artist ( s ).
Marshall Bruce Mathers III ( born October 17, 1972 ), better known by उसके स्टेज नाम एमिनेम ( stylized as eminǝm ) और by उसके alter अहंकार पतला छायादार, is an अमरीकी rapper, record producer, songwriter and actor.
Eminem, साथ साथ उसके सोलो करियर, is a सदस्य of उसके समूह d12, और भी एक half of the hip hop duo Bad Meets Evil, with Royce da 5'9 ''.
एमिनेम is एक of the best-selling artists in the world and is the best-selling artist of the 2000s.
He has been listed and ranked as one of the greatest artists of all time by many magazines, सहित रोलिंग स्टोन पत्रिका which ranked him 82nd on its list of The 100 Greatest Artists of All Time.
The same पत्रिका घोषित him The King of Hip Hop.
सहित उसके कार्य साथ d12 और ख़राब meets दुष्ट, Eminem has achieved ten number-one albums on the Billboard 200.
He has sold more than 100 million records worldwide, including 42 लाख ट्रैक्स और 49.1 लाख एल्बम in the United States.
As an भूमिगत rapper एमिनेम released his debut solo album, Infinite in 1996.
The album थी a नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक failure.
He gained मुख्यधारा लोकप्रियता in 1999 after the release of his major-label debut album The Slim Shady LP.
The LP also earned Eminem his पहला ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये Best Rap Album.
His next two records The Marshall Mathers LP, and The Eminem Show, also won Best Rap Album ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, बनाना एमिनेम the पहला कलाकार to win Best Rap Album for three consecutive LPs.
This was followed by another स्टुडियो रिलीज in 2004 titled Encore.
Eminem then गई on अंतराल after touring in 2005.
He released his first album in five सालो titled पतन, on may 15, 2009.
In 2010, एमिनेम released his seventh studio album Recovery.
Recovery was an international success and was named the बेहतरीन selling एल्बम of 2010 विश्वव्यापी, joining The Eminem Show, which was the best seller of 2002.
Eminem won Grammy Awards for both Relapse and Recovery, giving उसे a कुल of 13 grammys in उसके career.
Eminem has opened other ventures, including उसके अपना रिकार्ड लेबल छायादार Records with his manager Paul Rosenberg.
He also रै उसके अपना रेडियो चैनल, Shade 45 on Sirius XM Radio.
Eminem began an acting career in 2002, जब he स्ट्रक्चर in the हिप हॉप नाटक film 8 Mile.
He won the Academy Award for बेहतरीन असली सोंग, बनने the पहला रैप कलाकार ever to win the award.
He has also बना कैमियो दिखावे in the धो ( 2001 ), Funny People ( 2009 ) and the television series Entourage.
The acre is a ईकाई of क्षेत्रफल प्रयुक्त in the इम्पीरियल और u.S. customary systems.
An acre is about 40 % of a hectare – slightly smaller than an American फ़ुटबॉल फ़ील्ड.
The acre is no longer commonly used, although a few notable अपवाद शामिल the संयुक्त राज्य, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, बर्मा और the संयुक्त किंगडम ( as of 2010, the एकड़ is no longer officially प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त किंगडम, हालांकि is स्टिल प्रयुक्त in रियल एस्टेट descriptions ).
It is still used, to कुछ extent, in Canada.
The international symbol of the एकड़ is ac, और is पारिभाषित as 1/640 of a square mile.
The सबसे commonly used acre today is the international acre.
In the United States both the international acre और the थोड़ा अलग us सर्वेक्षण एकड़ are in use.
The most common use of the एकड़ is to measure tracts of land.
One international acre is पारिभाषित as 4046.8564224 square metres.
During the मध्य आयु, an एकड़ थी the राशि of land that could be plowed in one day with a yoke of oxen.
Antoine Lavoisier 's डिस्कवरी of the विधि of संरक्षण of द्रव्यमान led to अनेक new findings in the 19th century.
Joseph Proust 's विधि of definite proportions और John Dalton 's atomic theory branched from the discoveries of Antoine Lavoisier.
Lavoisier 's quantitative experiments revealed that दहन शामिल ऑक्सीजन बल्कि than कया थी previously विचार to be phlogiston.
The law of conservation of mass, or principle of mass conservation, states that for any system closed to all transfers of matter and energy ( both of which have mass ), the mass of the प्रणाली जरूर remain निरंतर over समय, as प्रणाली द्रव्यमान can नहीं बदलें मात्रा if it is not added or removed.
hence, the मात्रा of mass is `` conserved '' over time.
The law implies that mass can neither be created nor नष्ट, हालांकि it may be rearranged in स्पेस, or the entities संबद्ध साथ it may be बदला in रूप, as लिये उदाहरण जब लाइट or physical work is transformed into particles that contribute the same mass to the system as the light or work had contributed.
The law implies ( requires ) कि दौरान कोई रासायनिक प्रतिक्रिया, नाभिकीय reaction, or radioactive decay in an isolated system, the mass of the reactants or starting material must equal the mass of the products.
The concept of mass conservation is widely प्रयुक्त in अनेक फ़ील्ड such as chemistry, mechanics, and fluid dynamics.
Historically, द्रव्यमान संरक्षण थी खोजा in रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ by एंटोनी लाव्वाज़्ये in the late 18th century, and was of crucial importance in the progress from alchemy to the modern natural science of chemistry.
The closely related concept of matter conservation was found to hold good in chemistry to such high approximation that it failed only for the high energies treated by the बाद refinements of आपेक्षिकता सिद्धान्त, लकिन वरना remains उपयोगी और fear सटीक लिये सबसे रासायनिक calculations, even in modern practice.
In special relativity, needed for accuracy when large energy transfers between systems is involved, the difference between thermodynamically closed and isolated systems becomes important, since संरक्षण of द्रव्यमान is सख्ती और perfectly upheld तभी लिये so-called पृथक systems, i.e. those completely isolated from all exchanges with the environment.
In this circumstance, the mass-energy equivalence प्रमेय राज्य that mass conservation is equivalent to total energy conservation, which is the first law of thermodynamics.
By contrast, for a thermodynamically closed system ( i.e., one which is closed to exchanges of पदार्थ, लकिन खोलें to exchanges of non-material उर्जा, ऐसे as heat and work, with the surroundings ) mass is ( usually ) only approximately conserved.
The input or output of non-material energy must change the द्रव्यमान of the प्रणाली in आपेक्षिकता सिद्धान्त, हालांकि the बदलें is प्रायः छोटी, चूंकि relatively large amounts of such energy ( by comparison with ordinary experience ) carry only a small amount of mass ( again by ordinary standards of measurement ).
In special relativity, mass is not converted to उर्जा, चूंकि उर्जा in सब of इसके फ़ॉर्म सदा retains इसके समतुल्य राशि of द्रव्यमान throughout कोई transformation or translocation into, or out of, a system.
However, certain types of matter ( a different concept ) may be converted to उर्जा, so long as the द्रव्यमान of the प्रणाली is अपरिवर्तित in the process.
however, if ऐसे उर्जा is removed from systems, they must lose the mass that is associated with it.
In general relativity, mass ( and energy ) conservation in expanding volumes of space is a complex concept, subject to different definitions, और neither द्रव्यमान nor उर्जा is as सख्ती और बस conserved as is the मामला in खास आपेक्षिकता and in Minkowski space.
For a चर्चा, see mass in general relativity.
A pig is any of the पशु in the genus सस, within the Suidae family of even-toed ungulates.
Pigs include the घरेलू सुअर, इसके पूर्वज the wild boar, and several other wild relatives.
Young and small pigs are ज्ञात as piglets.
Pigs are omnivores and are अत्यधिक सोशल और बुद्धिमान animals.

8-inch, -inch ( पूरा ऊँचाई ), and -inch drives
A 3.5-inch diskette 's `` फ्लॉपी '' चुम्बकीय material, removed from its housing
A floppy disk, or diskette, is a disk storage medium composed of a disk of thin and flexible magnetic storage medium, sealed in a rectangular plastic carrier lined साथ कपड़ा कि removes धूल अणु.
They are read और लिखा by a फ्लॉपी disk drive ( FDD ).
Floppy disks, initially as मीडिया और बाद in और 3.5-inch ( 90 mm ) आकार, यहूद a सर्वव्यापी form of data storage and exchange from the mid-1970s well into the first decade of the 21st century.
By 2010, computer motherboards were rarely manufactured with floppy drive support ; `` floppies could be used as an external usb ड्राइव, लकिन ``, 8 ``, और non-standard ड्राइव could तभी be handled by old equipment.
While floppy disk drives still have some limited उपयोग, विशेषकर साथ विरासत औद्योगिक कंप्यूटर उपकरण, वे have महरूम superseded by आंकड़ा भंडार विधि साथ much वृहद क्षमता, ऐसे as usb फ्लैश ड्राइव, portable external hard disk drives, optical discs, memory cards, and computer networks.
an एनिमेटेड diagram of a cutter
In baseball, a cutter, or cut fastball, is a प्रकार of fastball जिससे ब्रेक थोड़ा toward the पिचर 's glove side as it reaches home plate.
This पिच is कही between a स्लाइडर और a fastball, as it is usually thrown faster than a slider but with more motion than a typical fastball.
Some pitchers use a cutter as a way to prevent hitters from expecting their नियमित fastballs.
A common technique used to throw a कटर is to उपयोग a four-seam fastball grip with the baseball set slightly off center in the hand.
When a batter is able to hit a cutter pitch, it often results in soft contact and an easy out, due to the पिच 's गति keeping the बॉल दूर इससे the चमगादड़ 's मीठी spot.
The cutter is typically 2–5 किमी धीमा than a पिचर 's four-seam fastball.
in 2010, the औसत पिच वर्गीकृत as a कटर by pitchf/x thrown by a right-handed pitcher was 88.6 mph ; the average four-seamer was 92.1 mph.
`` What It Takes '' is a शक्ति ballad by अमरीकी hard rock band Aerosmith.
It was लिखा by स्टीवन टायलर, जो Perry, and Desmond Child.
It was released in 1990 as the तीसरा सिंगल इससे एरोस्मिथ 's critically and commercially successful 1989 album Pump.
In the video The Making of Pump, A & R man John Kalodner described the सोंग as `` a कलाकृति ''.
दौरान सजीव प्रदर्शन, टायलर गाती the पहला verse a cappella and belts out one of his signature screams right before the chorus.
The album version of the song is followed by an बेनाम छुपा track.

Odysseus ( or ; Greek :, ), भी ज्ञात by the रोमन नाम Ulysses ( ; ), was a legendary Greek king of Ithaca and a hero of Homer 's epic poem the Odyssey.
Odysseus also plays a key role in Homer 's Iliad and other works in कि वही एपिक Cycle.
Husband of Penelope, father of Telemachus, and son of Laërtes ( or Sisyphus ) and Anticlea, odysseus is प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके brilliance, छल, और versatility ( polytropos ), और is hence ज्ञात by the epithet odysseus the Cunning ( mētis, or `` cunning intelligence `` ).
He is most famous लिये the टेन eventful सालो he took to वापसी घर बाद the decade-long Trojan War and his famous Trojan Horse ploy to capture the city of Troy.
Erie is a Statutory Town in बोल्डर और वेल्ड काउंटी in the u.S. state of Colorado.
The population according to the 2010 census is 18,135 और थी अंकित as 6,291 at the 2000 census.
The Town of Erie is located बस वेस्ट of i-25 लिये आसान अभिगम to i-70, डेनवर अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport and Colorado 's entire Front Range.
Erie 's Planning Area spans 48 square miles, extending from the उत्तर पक्ष of राज्य राजमार्ग 52 दक्षिण to State Highway 7, and between US 287 on the west and Interstate 25 to the east.
Erie is approximately 35 minutes इससे डेनवर अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र, 25 minutes to Denver and 20 minutes from Boulder.
The Board of Trustees serves as the विधान और शासी देह of the कस्बा of erie and is responsible for establishing Town policies and goals.
The Board has the authority to adopt laws, ordinances and resolutions as needed to conduct the business of the Town, and by ordinance may enter into contracts or intergovernmental agreements to furnish, प्राप्त सेवाएं or to provide for cooperative service delivery.
Appointed by and serving at the pleasure of the Board of Trustees, the कस्बा व्यवस्थापक is the मुख्य ऑपरेटिंग और प्रशासनिक अधिकारी of the कस्बा और is जिम्मेदार लिये providing पेशेवर नेतृत्व in the प्रशासन और execution of policies and objectives formulated by the Board.
The mission of the Erie Police Department is to communicate and work with the community to maintain a safe environment, prevent अपराधों और enforce the विधि, जबकि protecting the अधिकारों of all.
Erie Municipal Airport ( eik ) is स्वामित्व और संचालित by the कस्बा of erie और is रणनीतिक स्तिथ in the denver-boulder महानगर area on Colorado Highway 7, a little over three miles west of Interstate 25.
The main runway is कंक्रीट प्रशस्त और 4,700 feet long.
The is a home video खेल कंसोल उत्पादित by Sony Computer Entertainment.
It is the successor to the PlayStation 2, as part of the प्लेस्टेशन श्रेणी.
The प्लेस्टेशन 3 competes साथ microsoft 's Xbox 360 and Nintendo 's Wii as part of the seventh generation of video game consoles.
It was first released on November 11, 2006, in जापानी, साथ अंतरराष्ट्रीय बाज़ार following shortly thereafter.
The console थी पहला officially घोषित at E3 2005.
Originally set for a spring 2006 रिलीज तिथि, it थी विलम्बित अनेक टाइम्स जबतक आखिरकार hitting stores at the end of the year.
It was the first and currently only console to उपयोग blu-ray डिस्क as इसके प्राथमिक storage medium.
Major features of the console include its unified online gaming service, the प्लेस्टेशन संजाल, और इसके कनेक्टिविटी साथ the प्लेस्टेशन पोर्टेबल और प्लेस्टेशन वीटा, in सितंबर 2009 the updated PlayStation 3 Slim, was released.
This Slim is lighter and thinner than the original version, although it lacks प्लेस्टेशन 2 पीछे संगतता ( removed on बाद असली मॉडल ), लकिन notably featured a re-designed logo and marketing design.
As of नवम्बर 4, 2012, 70 million PlayStation 3s have been sold worldwide.
Its successor, प्लेस्टेशन 4, is set for a Q4 2013 release.
Salvador Domingo Felipe Jacinto Dalí i Domènech, 1st Marqués de Dalí de Pubol ( May 11, 1904January 23, 1989 ), ज्ञात as साल्वाडोर dalí ( ), थी a prominent स्पेनी surrealist चित्रकार born in Figueres, Spain.
Dalí was a skilled draftsman, best known for the striking और विचित्र बिंब in उसके surrealist कार्य.
His painterly skills are often attributed to the influence of Renaissance masters.
His best-known work, The Persistence of Memory, was समाप्त in 1931.
Dalí 's expansive artistic repertoire included film, sculpture, and photography, in सहयोग साथ a दायरा of कलाकारों in a variety of media.
Dalí attributed his `` प्रेम of सबकुछ कि is gilded और excessive, my जुनून लिये लक्ज़री and my love of oriental clothes '' to a self-styled `` Arab lineage '', claiming that his ancestors were descended from the Moors.
Dalí थी अत्यधिक कल्पनाशील, और also enjoyed indulging in unusual and grandiose behavior.
उसके eccentric manner और attention-grabbing पब्लिक क्रियाएँ sometimes drew more attention than his artwork, to the dismay of those who held his work in high esteem, and to the irritation of his critics.

The humanities are academic disciplines that study human culture, using विधि कि हैं primarily विश्लेषणात्मक, नाजुक, or सट्टे, और having a significant historical element, as distinguished from the mainly empirical approaches of the natural sciences.
The मानवता शामिल प्राचीन और आधुनिक languages, literature, philosophy, religion, and visual and performing arts such as music and theatre.
The humanities that are also regarded as social sciences include history, anthropology, area studies, संचार अध्ययन, सांस्कृतिक अध्ययन, विधि, अर्थशास्त्र और भाषाविज्ञान.
Scholars working in the मानवता हैं sometimes वर्णित as `` humanists ''.
However, that term also describes the philosophical position of humanism, which some `` antihumanist `` विद्वानों in the humanities reject.
कुछ द्वितीयक स्कूलों प्रस्ताव मानवता वर्ग, प्रायः consisting of English literature, global studies, and art.
Human disciplines like history, cultural anthropology and psychoanalysis study subject matters to which the experimental method करता नहीं लागू, और वे have अभिगम बजाय to the तुलनात्मक method and comparative research.
The 2005 ब्लू Room Christmas Tree
The White House Christmas Tree, also known as the Blue Room Christmas Tree, is the आधिकारिक अंदर क्रिसमस पेड़ at the निवास of the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States, the White House.
The first indoor Christmas tree was installed in the White House sometime in the 19th century ( वहीँ हैं varying दावा as to the सटीक साल ) और चूंकि 1961 the पेड़ रै था a प्रसंग मोटिफ at the discretion of the First Lady of the United States.
The President of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका ( potus ) is the head of state and head of government of the United States.
The president leads the executive branch of the संघीय सरकारी और is the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces.
Article II of the U.S. Constitution vests the executive power of the United States in the president and charges him with the execution of federal law, alongside the जिम्मेदारी of appointing संघीय कार्यपालिका, राजनयिक, नियामक, और न्यायिक अधिकारियों, और concluding treaties साथ विदेशी powers, with the advice and consent of the Senate.
The president is further empowered to grant federal pardons and reprieves, और to convene और adjourn either or दोनो घरों of Congress under extraordinary circumstances.
Since the founding of the United States, the power of the president and the federal government have grown substantially and each modern president, despite possessing no औपचारिक विधान शक्तियां परे हस्ताक्षर or vetoing congressionally passed बिल्स, is largely responsible for dictating the legislative agenda of his party and the foreign and domestic policy of the United States.
The president is अक्सर वर्णित as the most powerful person in the world.
The अध्यक्ष is indirectly निर्वाचित by the लोगों through the चुनावी कॉलेज to a four-year term, and is one of only two nationally elected federal officers, the other being the Vice President of the United States.
The Twenty-second amendment, अपनाया in 1951, prohibits anyone from ever being elected to the presidency for a third full term.
It also prohibits a person from being elected to the प्रेसिडेंसी अधिक than एकबार if कि व्यक्ति previously था परोसा as अध्यक्ष, or एक्टिंग अध्यक्ष, for more than two years of another person 's term as president.
In all, 43 individuals have परोसा 55 four-year terms.
On January 20, 2009, बराक ओबामा became the 44th और वर्तमान president.
On November 6, 2012, he थी re-elected और is scheduled to serve until January 20, 2017.
Senses are physiological capacities of organisms that provide data for perception.
The senses and their operation, classification, and theory are overlapping विषय पढ़ाई by a किस्में of फ़ील्ड, सबसे notably neuroscience, cognitive psychology ( or cognitive science ), and philosophy of perception.
The nervous system has a specific संवेदी प्रणाली or अंग, समर्पित to each sense.
इंसानो have a multitude of senses.
Sight ( ophthalmoception ), hearing ( audioception ), taste ( gustaoception ), smell ( olfacoception or olfacception ), और टच ( tactioception ) हैं the पाँच traditionally पहचाना.
While the ability to detect other stimuli beyond those governed by the traditional senses exists, including temperature ( thermoception ), kinesthetic sense ( proprioception ), pain ( nociception ), balance ( equilibrioception ), acceleration ( kinesthesioception ), और विभिन्न आतंरिक stimuli ( e.g. the अलग chemoreceptors लिये detecting नमक और कार्बन dioxide concentrations in the blood ), only a small number of these can safely be classified as separate senses in and of themselves.
What constitutes a sense is a matter of some बहस, अग्रणी to कठिनाइयों in धमक कया exactly a sense is.
Animals also have receptors to sense the संसार around them, with degrees of capability varying greatly between species.
Humans have a comparatively weak sense of smell, while some पशु may कमी एक or अधिक of the परंपरागत five senses.
कुछ पशु may भी intake and interpret sensory stimuli in very different ways.
Some species of animals are able to sense the world in a way that humans can not, with some species able to sense electrical और चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड, और detect जल दबाव और currents.
Spiders ( order Araneae ) are air-breathing arthropods that have eight legs and chelicerae साथ fangs कि inject venom.
They are the largest order of arachnids and रैंक सातवाँ in कुल प्रजाति विविधता among all other groups of organisms.
Spiders are found worldwide on every continent except for Antarctica, and have become स्थापित in nearly every habitat with the exception of air and sea colonization.
As of 2008, at least 43,678 spider species, and 109 families have been recorded by taxonomists ; however, there has been confusion within the scientific community as to how all these families should be वर्गीकृत, as evidenced by the over 20 अलग classifications कि have महरूम प्रस्तावित चूंकि 1900.
Anatomically, spiders differ इससे अन्य arthropods in कि the usual देह खण्ड हैं fused into two tagmata, the cephalothorax and abdomen, and joined by a small, cylindrical pedicel.
Unlike insects, spiders do नहीं have antennae.
In all except the most primitive group, the Mesothelae, spiders have the most centralized nervous प्रणालियों of सब arthropods, as सब उनके ganglia हैं fused into एक द्रव्यमान in the cephalothorax.
Unlike most arthropods, spiders have no extensor मांसपेशियां in उनके limbs और बजाय extend them by hydraulic pressure.
Their abdomens bear appendages that have been modified into spinnerets कि extrude रेशा इससे up to छह प्रकार of रेशा ग्रंथियों within their abdomen.
Spider webs vary widely in आकार, आकार और the amount of sticky thread used.
It now appears कि the सर्पिल orb वेब may be एक of the earliest forms, and spiders that produce tangled cobwebs are more abundant and diverse than orb-web spiders.
Spider-like arachnids with silk-producing spigots appeared in the devonian काल परिचय, लकिन ये पशु जाहिर lacked spinnerets.
True spiders have been found in carboniferous रॉक्स इससे, और हैं बहुत similar to the most primitive surviving order, the Mesothelae.
The main groups of modern spiders, mygalomorphae और araneomorphae, पहला appeared in the Triassic period, before.
A herbivorous species, Bagheera kiplingi, was described in 2008, but all अन्य ज्ञात प्रजाति हैं परभक्षी, ज़्यादातर preying on insects and on other spiders, although a few large species also take birds and lizards.
Spiders use a wide range of strategies to capture शिकार : trapping it in स्टिकी webs, lassoing it with sticky bolas, mimicking the prey to avoid detection, or running it down.
Most detect prey mainly by sensing vibrations, but the active hunters have acute vision, और hunters of the genus portia दिखाएँ लक्षण of प्रज्ञा in उनके चुनाव of tactics और क्षमता to develop new ones.
Spiders ' guts are too narrow to take solids, and they liquidize their food by flooding it with digestive enzymes and पीस it साथ the bases of उनके pedipalps, as वे do नहीं have true jaws.
Male spiders identify themselves by a variety of complex courtship rituals to avoid होने खाया by the महिलाओं.
Males of most प्रजाति जीवित a few matings, limited mainly by their short life spans.
Females weave silk egg-cases, each of जिससे may contain hundreds of eggs.
Females of many species care लिये उनके यंग, लिये उदाहरण by carrying उन्हें around or by sharing food with them.
A minority of प्रजाति हैं सोशल, भवन सांप्रदायिक webs that may house anywhere from a few to 50,000 individuals.
Social behavior ranges from precarious toleration, as in the widow मकड़ियों, to co-operative शिकार और food-sharing.
हालांकि सबसे मकड़ियों सजीव लिये at सबसे दो सालो, tarantulas and other mygalomorph spiders can live up to 25 years in captivity.
While the venom of a few species is dangerous to humans, scientists are now researching the उपयोग of मकड़ी venom in आयुर्विज्ञान और as non-polluting pesticides.
Spider silk provides a combination of lightness, strength और लोच कि is श्रेष्ठ to कि of सिंथेटिक सामग्री, and spider silk genes have been inserted into mammals and plants to see if these can be used as silk factories.
As a result of their wide range of behaviors, spiders have become common symbols in art and mythology symbolizing विभिन्न combinations of सब्र, क्रूरता and creative powers.
Grey 's Anatomy is an American television medical drama that premiered on the American प्रसारण कम्पनी ( एबीसी ), as a mid-season बदलना on कूच 27, 2005.
The series has aired nine seasons, and focuses on the fictional lives of surgical interns and निवासियों as वे धीरे evolve into seasoned डॉक्टर, जबकि trying to maintain personal lives.
The show 's premise originated with Shonda Rhimes, who serves as an कार्यपालिका निर्माता, साथ साथ बेट्सी Beers, Mark Gordon, Krista Vernoff, Rob Corn, Mark Wilding, and Allan Heinberg.
The series was created to be racially diverse, utilizing a color-blind ढलाई तकनीक.
It is primarily फिल्माया in Los Angeles, California.
The series ' protagonist is Dr. Meredith Grey ( Ellen Pompeo ), who originally is स्वीकृत into the रेसिडेंसी कार्यक्रम at the fictional Seattle Grace Hospital.
Meredith is assigned to work under Dr. Miranda Bailey ( Chandra Wilson ), साथ साथ dr. क्रिस्टीना यांग ( सैंड्रा oh ), dr. जार्ज o'malley ( T. R. Knight ), Dr. Izzie Stevens ( Katherine Heigl ), and Dr. Alex Karev ( Justin Chambers ).
Following O'Malley 's death and Stevens ' departure, the hospital 's merger with Mercy West brings in Dr. Jackson एवेरी ( जेसी विलियम्स ) और dr. अप्रैल kepner ( सारा Drew ), in the sixth season.
The सर्जिकल wing is primarily पर्यवेक्षित by dr. रिचर्ड webber ( जेम्स Pickens, Jr. ), who is eventually replaced by Dr. Derek Shepherd ( Patrick Dempsey ), and later Dr. Owen Hunt ( Kevin McKidd ).
Dr. Preston Burke ( Isaiah Washington ) departs at the conclusion of the third season, and is replaced by dr. एरिका hahn ( ब्रुक स्मिथ ), जो पत्ते the दिखाएँ दौरान the पांचवां season, and later Dr. Teddy Altman ( Kim Raver ), who departs at the end of the eighth season.
Introduced in the second season is Dr. Addison Montgomery ( Kate Walsh ), who leaves the show at the end of the तीसरा ऋतु, in अनुक्रम to लॉन्च उसके अपना spin-off चिकित्सा नाटक निजी अभ्यास.
Dr. Callie Torres ( Sara Ramirez ) and Dr. Mark Sloan ( Eric Dane ) also enter the show in the second season, while the latter dies in the प्रीमियर of the नवीं ऋतु.
मेरेडिथ 's half-sister, dr. lexie Grey ( Chyler Leigh ), appears from season three and dies at the end of season eight.
Dr. एरिज़ोना रॉबिन्स ( जेसिका capshaw ) is given series regular status at the beginning of the sixth season.
Grey 's Anatomy is the highest-rated drama in the कुंजी 18–49 जनसांख्यिकी.
previously among the overall top-ten रेटेड shows in the United States, Grey 's Anatomy has been well received by critics.
Considered an impact on culture, the series रै प्राप्त numerous पुरस्कार, और has also been included in various critics ' top ten lists.
The show has उत्पादित अनेक specials, as खूब as वितरित all seasons to DVD, and released a collection of merchandise.
In 2012, Grey 's Anatomy was नामित the fifth-highest आय earning show, in terms of advertising per half-hour.
On May 11, 2012, the series was renewed for a ninth season, जिससे premiered on सितंबर 27, 2012.
Schizophrenia ( or ) is a mental disorder characterized by a विश्लेषण of विचार processes and by a deficit of typical emotional responses.
Common लक्षण शामिल auditory मति, paranoid or विचित्र delusions, or disorganized speech and thinking, and it is accompanied by significant social or occupational dysfunction.
The onset of लक्षण typically occurs in यंग adulthood, with a global lifetime prevalence of about 0.3–0.7 %.
Diagnosis is based on observed बर्ताव और the रोगी 's reported experiences.
Genetics, early environment, neurobiology, और मनोवैज्ञानिक और सोशल प्रक्रियाओं appear to be important contributory factors ; some recreational and prescription drugs appear to cause or worsen symptoms.
Current research is केन्द्रित on the भूमिका of neurobiology, हालांकि no single isolated organic cause has been found.
The many possible combinations of symptoms have triggered debate about whether the diagnosis represents a सिंगल विकार or a क्रमांक of अलहदा syndromes.
Despite the etymology of the पद इससे the यूनानी जड़ें skhizein ( σχίζειν, `` to विभाजित '' ) और phrēn, phren- ( φρήν, φρεν- ; `` दिमाग '' ), schizophrenia करता not imply a `` split personality '', or `` multiple personality disorder '' ( which is known these days as dissociative identity disorder ) —a condition with which it is often confused in public perception.
Rather, the term means a `` splitting of दिमागी कृत्यों '', क्युकी of the symptomatic presentation of the illness.
The mainstay of treatment is antipsychotic दवा, जिससे primarily suppresses dopamine ( and sometimes serotonin ) receptor activity.
Psychotherapy and वोकेशनल और सोशल पुनर्वास are also important in treatment.
In more serious cases—where there is risk to self and others— involuntary hospitalization may be जरुरी, हालांकि हॉस्पिटल stays हैं अभी shorter और कम बारंबार than they once were.
The disorder is thought mainly to affect संज्ञान, लकिन it भी प्रायः contributes to दीर्घकालिक समस्याएं with behavior and emotion.
People with schizophrenia are likely to have additional ( comorbid ) conditions, सहित प्रमुख अवसाद और चिंता विकार ; the आजीवन occurrence of पदार्थ उपयोग विकार is almost 50 %.
Social problems, such as long-term बेरोजगारी, poverty, and homelessness are common.
The average life प्रत्याशा of लोगों साथ the विकार is 12 to 15 सालो कम than those बगैर, the result of increased physical health problems and a higher suicide rate ( about 5 % ).
Paul Leslie Snider ( April 15, 1951–August 14, 1980 ) was the estranged husband और मैनेजर of प्लेबॉय मॉडल डोरोथी Stratten, whom he murdered before killing himself the same day.
The Epic of Gilgamesh, an epic poem from Mesopotamia, is amongst the earliest surviving works of साहित्य.
The साहित्यिक इतिहास of gilgamesh begins with five independent Sumerian poems about 'Bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian for Gilgamesh ), king of Uruk.
Four of these were used as source सामग्री लिये a संयुक्त एपिक in Akkadian.
This first combined epic, known as the `` Old Babylonian '' version, dates to the 18th century BC और is titled बाद इसके incipit, shūtur eli sharrī ( `` Surpassing All Other Kings '' ).
Only a few fragments of it have survived.
The later `` Standard Babylonian '' version dates from the 13th to the 10th सदियां bc और bears the incipit Sha naqba īmuru ( `` He who Saw the Deep '' ).
Fragments of approximately two thirds of this longer, twelve-tablet संस्करण have महरूम बरामद.
Some of the best copies were discovered in the पुस्तकालयों तबाह of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal.
The story centers on a दोस्ती between gilgamesh and Enkidu.
Enkidu is a wild man created by the gods as gilgamesh 's बराबर to distract उसे इससे oppressing the people of Uruk.
Together, वे यात्रा to the देवदार Mountain to defeat Humbaba, its monstrous guardian.
Later they kill the Bull of Heaven, जिससे the देवी इश्तार भेजना to सजा gilgamesh for spurning her advances.
As a punishment for these actions, the देवताओं वाक्य enkidu to मौत.
The दूसरी हाफ of the एपिक focuses on gilgamesh 's distress at Enkidu 's death, and his quest for immortality.
In order to learn the secret of eternal जीवन, gilgamesh undertakes a long और perilous journey.
He learns that `` The life that you are seeking तुम होगा never find.
When the gods निर्मित man वे आवंटित to उसे मौत, but life they retained in their own keeping. ''
This quote was originally attributed to Siduri in the Old Babylonian version of the epic, and then attributed to the immortal flood hero Utnapishtim in the अक्कादी संस्करण of the एपिक.
nevertheless, gilgamesh 's कीर्ति जिया on बाद उसके मौत, क्युकी of his great building projects, and his account of what Utnapishtim told him happened during the flood.
The story has been translated into many different languages, and gilgamesh रै चूंकि become adapted in works of popular fiction.
A eukaryote ( or ) is an सजीव जिनकी कोशिकाएं contain जटिल structures enclosed within membranes.
Eukaryotes may more formally be referred to as the taxon Eukarya or Eukaryota.
The defining membrane-bound structure that sets eukaryotic cells apart इससे prokaryotic कोशिकाएं is the केंद्रक, or नाभिकीय लिफाफा, भीतर जिससे the genetic material is carried.
The presence of a nucleus gives eukaryotes their name, which आता इससे the यूनानी ( eu, `` शुभ '' ) और ( karyon, `` nut '' or `` kernel '' ).
Most eukaryotic cells also contain other membrane-bound organelles ऐसे as mitochondria, chloroplasts और the golgi apparatus.
All large complex जीवों हैं eukaryotes, सहित animals, plants and fungi.
The group also शामिल अनेक एककोशिकीय organisms.
Cell division in eukaryotes is अलग इससे कि in जीवों without a nucleus ( Prokaryote ).
It involves separating the duplicated गुणसूत्रों, through आंदोलनों directed by microtubules.
There are दो प्रकार of division processes.
in समसूत्रण, एक कोशिका divides to produce two genetically identical cells.
In meiosis, which is required in sexual जनन, एक द्विगुणित कोशिका ( having दो उदाहरण of प्रत्येक chromosome, one from each parent ) undergoes recombination of each pair of parental chromosomes, and then two stages of cell division, resulting in four haploid cells ( gametes ).
Each gamete has just one पूरक of गुणसूत्रों, प्रत्येक a अद्वितीय mix of the corresponding pair of parental chromosomes.
Eukaryota appears to be monophyletic, और so makes up एक of the तीन डोमेन of life.
The two other domains, Bacteria and Archaea, are prokaryotes और have none of the ऊपर features.
Eukaryotes represent a छोटा अल्पसंख्यक of सब जीना बाते ; even in a human body there are 10 times more microbes than human cells.
However, due to their much larger size their सामूहिक विश्वव्यापी बायोमास is अनुमानित at about equal to that of prokaryotes.
They are considered to have first developed लगभग 1.6–2.1 अरब years ago.
The use of Internet services or software with Internet अभिगम to defraud पीड़ितों or to वरना लो लाभ of उन्हें, लिये उदाहरण by stealing personal information, which can even lead to identity theft.
a बहुत आम रूप of अंतरजाल fraud is the distribution of rogue security software.
Internet services can be used to उपस्थित बेईमान solicitations to prospective पीड़ितों, to conduct बेईमान ट्रांजेक्शन, or to transmit the proceeds of fraud to financial institutions or to others connected with the scheme.
Internet fraud can occur in गपशप कक्ष, ईमेल, संदेश boards, or on websites.
The International सुरक्षा सहायता फ़ोर्स ( isaf ) is a नाटो -led सुरक्षा मिशन in अफगानिस्तान कि was established by the United Nations Security Council in December 2001 by Resolution 1386, as envisaged by the Bonn Agreement.
Its main purpose is to ट्रैन the अफगान नेशनल सुरक्षा शक्तियां ( ansf ) और assist अफगानिस्तान in पुनर्निर्माण key government institutions but is also engaged in the 2001-present war with insurgent groups.
ISAF was initially charged with securing Kabul and surrounding areas from the Taliban, al Qaeda and factional warlords, so as to allow लिये the स्थापना of the अफगान transitional Administration headed by Hamid Karzai.
In October 2003, the UN Security Council authorized the expansion of the ISAF मिशन throughout अफगानिस्तान, और isaf subsequently विस्तारित the mission in four main stages over the whole of the country.
From 2006 to 2011, ISAF had been involved in increasingly more intensive कॉम्बैट परिचालन in दक्षिणी और पूर्वी अफगानिस्तान.
Troop योगदानकर्ता शामिल इससे the संयुक्त राज्य, संयुक्त Kingdom, NATO member states and a number of other countries.
The intensity of the combat faced by contributing nations varies greatly, with the United States, United Kingdom, and Canada sustaining the बहुमत of हताहत in intensive कॉम्बैट परिचालन, with other contributors sustaining significantly less.
As of जल्दी 2010, वहीँ यहूद at तनिक 700 सैन्य bases inside Afghanistan but more were expected to be built in the coming years.
About 400 of ये यहूद प्रयुक्त by american‐led NATO forces and 300 by ANSF.
Cocaine ( benzoylmethylecgonine ) ( इन ) is a crystalline tropane alkaloid that is obtained from the leaves of the coca plant.
The name आता इससे `` कोका '' और the एल्कलॉएड suffix -ine, forming cocaine.
It is a उत्तेजक, an भूख suppressant, and a topical anesthetic.
Biologically, cocaine acts as a serotonin–norepinephrine–dopamine reuptake inhibitor, also ज्ञात as a ट्रिपल reuptake inhibitor ( TRI ).
It is addictive because of इसके प्रभाव on the mesolimbic reward pathway.
नापसंद सबसे अणुओं, कोका रै pockets with both high hydrophilic and lipophilic efficiency, violating the rule of hydrophilic-lipophilic balance.
This causes it to cross the blood–brain barrier far better than अन्य psychoactive रसायन और may भी induce blood-brain barrier breakdown.
It is illegal to possess, produce, or वितरित कोका लिये non-medicinal और non-government-sanctioned उद्देश्य in almost every country.
Whole beef tri-tip rump, roasted मीडियम rare
The tri-tip is a cut of beef from the नीचे sirloin primal cut.
It is a छोटी triangular muscle, usually 1.5 to 2.5 lbs. ( 675 to 1,150g ) per side of beef.
The scientific name of this muscle is tensor fasciae latae, inserted in the fascia lata, the connective tissue covering the quadriceps femoris, भी पुकारा quadriceps extensor, a समूह of चार मांसपेशियां जिससे in फेरे insert in the patella, or knee cap of the animal.
Willmar is a city in, और the काउंटी सीट of, kandiyohi County, Minnesota, United States.
The population was 19,610 at the 2010 census.
willmar has been assigned ZIP code 56201 by the United States Postal Service.

The Speaker of the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि ( or Speaker of the House ) is the presiding officer of the chamber.
The office was established in 1789 by Article I, खण्ड 2 of the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान, जिससे राज्य in भाग, `` the हाउस of Representatives shall chuse their Speaker... ''
the वर्तमान स्पीकर is जॉन boehner, a Republican who represents Ohio 's 8th congressional district.
The Constitution does not require that the Speaker be a Member of कॉंग्रेस, लकिन no non-member रै कभी महरूम निर्वाचित to the office.
The Speaker is second in the United States अध्यक्षीय लकीर of उत्तराधिकार, बाद the वाइस अध्यक्ष and ahead of the President pro tempore of the U.S. Senate.
Unlike some Westminster system parliaments, in which the office of Speaker is considered non-partisan, in the United States the Speaker of the House is a नेतृत्व स्थिति और the office-holder actively works to नियत the बहुमत party 's legislative agenda.
The स्पीकर प्रायः करता नहीं personally preside over debates, instead delegating the duty to members of the House from the majority party.
Aside from duties relating to heading the House and the majority राजनैतिक पार्टी, the स्पीकर भी performs प्रशासनिक और प्रक्रियात्मक कृत्यों, and represents his or her Congressional district.
A bicycle frame is the main component of a सायकिल, on to जिससे पहियों and other components are fitted.
The modern and most common frame design for an upright bicycle is based on the सुरक्षा सायकिल, और consists of two triangles, a main triangle and a paired rear triangle.
This is ज्ञात as the diamond frame.
Frames are required to be strong, stiff and light, which they do by combining अलग सामग्री और आकार.
`` Simple gravity pendulum '' model assumes no घर्षण or एयर resistance.
An exemplar animation of a pendulum प्रर्दशित the गति और त्वरण vectors
A pendulum is a weight suspended from a so कि it can झूले freely.
When a pendulum is विस्थापित बगलों इससे इसके resting equilibrium position, it is subject to a restoring force due to gravity that will accelerate it back toward the equilibrium position.
When released, the restoring force combined with the pendulum 's द्रव्यमान कल्याणकारी it to oscillate परिचय the equilibrium position, swinging back and forth.
The time for one complete cycle, a बाएँ झूले और a सही झूले, is called the period.
a लोलक swings साथ a विशिष्ट period which depends ( mainly ) on its length.
From its discovery around 1602 by Galileo Galilei the regular motion of pendulums was used for timekeeping, and was the world 's most accurate timekeeping प्रौद्योगिकी जबतक the 1930s.
Pendulums हैं प्रयुक्त to विनियमित लोलक clocks, and are used in scientific instruments such as accelerometers and seismometers.
Historically they were प्रयुक्त as gravimeters to माप the त्वरण of गम्भीरता in geophysical surveys, and even as a standard of length.
The word 'pendulum ' is नई लैटिन, इससे the लैटिन pendulus, meaning 'hanging '.
The simple gravity pendulum is an idealized गणितीय model of a pendulum.
This is a weight ( or bob ) on the समाप्त of a massless cord suspended from a, without friction.
When given an initial push, it होगा झूले वापस और forth at a निरंतर amplitude.
Real pendulums हैं विषय to घर्षण and air drag, so the amplitude of their swings declines.
The First Battle of Bull Run, also known as First Manassas ( the name used by Confederate शक्तियां ), थी लड़ा on जुलाई 21, 1861, in प्रिंस विलियम County, Virginia, near the city of Manassas.
It was the first major जमीन बैटल of the American Civil War.
Just months after the start of the युद्ध at फोर्ट sumter, the उत्तरी पब्लिक clamored लिये a कूच विरूद्ध the confederate पूंजी of Richmond, Virginia, which they expected to bring an early end to the rebellion.
Yielding to political pressure, Brig. Gen. Irvin McDowell led उसके unseasoned संघ फौज आरपार सांड चलाएं विरूद्ध the equally inexperienced Confederate Army of Brig. Gen. P. G. T. Beauregard camped near Manassas Junction.
McDowell 's महत्वाकांक्षी योजना लिये a आश्चर्य पार्श्व आक्रमण on the confederate बाएँ थी poorly चलाया by उसके अधिकारियों और मेन ; nevertheless, the confederates, who had been planning to attack the Union left flank, found themselves at an initial disadvantage.
Confederate सुदृढीकरण अंतर्गत ब्रिगेडियर. gen. जोसेफ E. johnston arrived इससे the Shenandoah Valley by railroad and the course of the battle quickly changed.
A brigade of Virginians under a relatively unknown colonel from the Virginia सैन्य संस्थान, थामस J. जैक्सन, stood उनके ground and Jackson received his famous nickname, `` Stonewall Jackson ''.
The Confederates then launched a strong counterattack, और as the संघ सैनिकों began withdrawing अंतर्गत आग, अनेक panicked और it turned into a rout as mcdowell 's men frantically ran without order in the direction of Washington, D.C.
Both armies were sobered by the fierce fighting and many casualties, and realized the युद्ध थी going to be much longer और bloodier than either था anticipated.
