Weather is the state of the atmosphere, to the degree कि it is hot or ठंडा, गीला or शुष्क, शांत or stormy, साफ or cloudy.
Most weather phenomena occur in the क्षोभमण्डल, बस below the stratosphere.
Weather generally refers to day-to-day temperature and precipitation activity, whereas climate is the पद लिये the औसत वायुमंडलीय शर्तें over longer periods of time.
When used without qualification, `` weather '' is समझा to be the मौसम of धरती.
Weather is चलित by air pressure ( temperature and moisture ) differences between one place and another.
These pressure and temperature मतभेद can occur due to the सूर्य कोण at कोई particular spot, which varies by latitude from the tropics.
The strong temperature contrast between ध्रुवीय और तीव्र एयर देता वृद्धि to the jet stream.
Weather systems in the mid-latitudes, such as extratropical cyclones, हैं caused by instabilities of the जेट स्ट्रीम flow.
क्युकी the धरती 's अक्ष is tilted सापेक्ष to इसके कक्षीय plane, sunlight is incident at different angles at different times of the year.
On Earth 's surface, temperatures usually range ±40 °c ( −40 °f to 100 °F ) annually.
Over हज़ारों of सालो, परिवर्तन in धरती 's कक्षा affect the राशि and distribution of solar energy received by the Earth and influence long-term climate and global climate change.
सतह तापमान differences in turn cause pressure differences.
Higher altitudes are cooler than lower altitudes due to मतभेद in compressional heating.
Weather forecasting is the अनुप्रयोग of विज्ञान and technology to predict the state of the atmosphere for a future time and a given location.
The atmosphere is a chaotic प्रणाली, so छोटी परिवर्तन to एक भाग of the प्रणाली can grow to have large effects on the system as a whole.
Human attempts to control the weather have occurred throughout human history, and there is evidence कि इंसान कार्यकलाप ऐसे as कृषि और उद्योग रै inadvertently परिवर्धित मौसम पैटर्न.
Studying how the मौसम works on अन्य ग्रह रै महरूम helpful in understanding how weather works on Earth.
A famous landmark in the Solar System, Jupiter 's ग्रेट रेड स्पॉट, is an anticyclonic तूफ़ान ज्ञात to have existed for at least 300 years.
However, मौसम is नहीं सीमित to planetary bodies.
A star 's corona is constantly being lost to space, creating what is essentially a very thin माहौल throughout the सौर प्रणाली.
the गति of द्रव्यमान ejected from the Sun is known as the solar wind.
Katy Perry is an American singer-songwriter from Santa Barbara, California.
She signed with कैपिटल रिकॉर्ड.
Perry has released three studio albums, including her debut Christian effort Katy Hudson, एक of the लड़कों, और teenage Dream.
Perry 's mainstream career was kicked off with the massive chart success of उसके डेब्यू सिंगल `` i चूमा a लड़की ``.
During her career, Perry has been मनोनीत लिये numerous प्रमुख म्यूज़िक awards, primarily for Teenage Dream and One of the Boys.
The following is a list of sovereign राज्य और territories जहाँ अंग्रेज़ी is an आधिकारिक language or language of government.
In 2012, there were 88 states in कुल ( 60 sovereign राज्य और 28 non-sovereign states ).
In many countries English is the प्रबल भाषा, लकिन करता not have official status.
In Australia, English is spoken by the vast majority of the जनसांख्यिकी और is the तभी भाषा प्रयुक्त in सरकारी संस्थानों, but Australia does not have an official language.
The case is the same in the United Kingdom and the United States, though many राज्य और regions भीतर the u.S. do have English as an official language.
English is the dominant language of New Zealand and an official language of Canada ( along with French ), India ( along with Hindi and several other languages ), Ireland ( along with आयरिश ), और the फिलीपीन ( साथ साथ tagalog ).
English is the sole official language of the राष्ट्रमंडल of Nations and the Commonwealth Games.
English is one of the official languages of the United राष्ट्र, the यूरोपीय संघ और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Olympic Committee.
Many of these countries are current or former colonies or dependencies of the United Kingdom ( see also अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य ), or of the संयुक्त राज्य, itself a former colony of the UK.
Notable exceptions include Rwanda, which was a former Belgian colony and Eritrea, which was an Italian colony where the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य spanned इसके कंट्रोल तभी in संसार युद्ध ii और shortly after ( 1941-1952 ).
India 's भाषाई चित्र is complex.
According to the Constitution of India, `` Hindi in the Devanagari script '' is the official language of the union ; and English the 'subsidiary official language ' ; however, English is mandated लिये the authoritative ग्रन्थ of सब संघीय कानून और परम् अदालत निर्णय and ( along with Hindi ) is one of the two languages of the Indian Parliament.
English is used almost exclusively लिये उच्चतर शिक्षा, कारोबार and science.
पाठ्यक्रम in बहुमत of the स्कूलों are taught exclusively in English.
English is extensively प्रयुक्त लिये प्रशासनिक purposes in India.
इण्डिया is the second-largest english-speaking country in the world by number of speakers, after the United States.
As such, many consider English to be the de facto आधिकारिक भाषा of India.
See आधिकारिक भाषाएं of India.
The भाषाई मेकअप of पाकिस्तानी is similarly complex.
While the national language is उर्दू, अंग्रेज़ी is an आधिकारिक language and used in business, government and law.
English is a अनिवार्य भाषा in schools.
All school पाठ्यक्रम हैं taught in English.
पाकिस्तानी is the 9th largest english-speaking country in the world by population.
दक्षिणी कोन (, ) is a भौगोलिक प्रदेश रचित of the southernmost areas of South America, south of the Tropic of Capricorn.
Although geographically this includes Southern and part of Southeast ( São Paulo ) of Brazil, in terms of political भूगोल the दक्षिणी कोन रै traditionally comprised अर्जेंटीना, Chile, Paraguay, and Uruguay.
In the narrowest sense, it only covers Argentina, Chile and Uruguay, bounded on the north by the states of ब्राज़ील, पैराग्वे, बोलीविया और पेरू, on the वेस्ट by the प्रशांत समंदर, और दक्षिण to the जंक्शन between the प्रशांत और अटलांटिक महासागर, which it is the closest continental area of Antarctica ( 1000 km ).
High life प्रत्याशा, the उच्चतम इंसान विकास अनुक्रमणिका of Latin America, high Standard of living, significant participation in the global markets and the emerging economy of its members make the Southern Cone the most prosperous macro-region in South America.
For multi-event athletic प्रतियोगिताओं देखिए track और फ़ील्ड प्रतियोगिताओं, section `` Meetings ''.
Meetings are sometimes आयोजित around सम्मेलन tables.
In a meeting, two or more people come together to discuss एक or अधिक विषय, प्रायः in a औपचारिक सेटिंग.
An official game in baseball, also sometimes पुकारा a विनियमन खेल, is a game that has progressed beyond the point at which it can be considered complete if necessary.
This is approximately the halfway पाइंट of the खेल.
In the case of inclement weather, any game which has reached this पाइंट may be रोका और shortened as needed, साथ the परिणाम होने फाइनल, और सब रिकॉर्ड and statistics counted.
A game which has not reached this point before being stopped is either considered a suspended game ( to be continued at a later date from the point of stoppage ), or is बस रद्द और replayed from the start.
( This depends on the नियम of each individual league. )
In either case, no statistics are counted जबतक the खेल becomes official.
Since most professional baseball games are nine innings long, the fifth inning is प्रयुक्त as the दहलीज लिये an आधिकारिक game.
If the visiting team is अग्रणी, or the खेल is tied, the end of the fifth inning marks this point.
If the home team ( which bats last ) is already ahead in the स्कोर, और theoretically होता नहीं need इसके हाफ of the पांचवां inning, तब 41⁄2 innings ( i.e., the middle of the fifth ) is considered an official game.
The game is also considered official if the home team scores to take the lead in the bottom of the fifth inning, since the खेल होता समाप्त तत्काल if the वही बात happened in the ninth.
In nearly सब मामले, the `` आधिकारिक खेल '' औकात is used to determine whether a rain check will be honored for fans holding tickets.
If a game is started but does not reach the point of बनने आधिकारिक, प्रशंसक हैं हकदार to a नई ticket for the make-up game or ( in most cases ) any other available game of their choice.
If a game is halted after it becomes official, the game is बस shortened और no बरसात जाँच is given.
The `` आधिकारिक खेल '' statistic प्राप्त कुछ ध्यान दौरान the 1995 ऋतु, when Cal Ripken, Jr. was approaching the record for consecutive games played, previously held by Lou Gehrig.
Large numbers were hung on the side of the B & O गोदाम at oriole पार्क at camden गज to दिखाएँ the number of games in Ripken 's streak.
Each day, a new number was unfurled during the fifth inning after each game had become official ( since the statistic would not have गिने if the खेल था महरूम रोका पहले that point ).
A similar practice has been used to count down toward the demolition of several stadiums ( including Veterans स्टेडियम in फिलाडेल्फिया in 2003, बुच मेमोरियल स्टेडियम in st. लुई in 2005, और the असली यांकी स्टेडियम और shea स्टेडियम in नई यॉर्क नगर in 2008 ) ; as प्रत्येक game became official, the team would unveil a new ( lower ) number showing the number of games left to be played in the stadium.
A telephone number or phone number is a sequence of अंक प्रयुक्त to कॉल इससे एक टेलीफोन लकीर to another in a public switched telephone network.
When telephone numbers were invented, वे यहूद छोटी — as few as एक, two or three digits — and were given orally to a switchboard operator.
As phone systems have grown and interconnected to encompass the world, टेलीफोन संख्याएँ have become longer.
in जोड to telephones, वे अभी अभिगम अन्य डिवाइस, such as computers and fax machines.
The क्रमांक contains the सूचना जरुरी to identify uniquely the intended endpoint for the telephone call.
Each ऐसे endpoint जरूर have a unique number within the public switched telephone network.
Most countries use fixed length numbers ( for normal lines at least ) and therefore the क्रमांक of endpoints determines the जरुरी लंबाई of the टेलीफोन क्रमांक.
It is भी संभावित लिये प्रत्येक सदस्य to have a नियत of shorter numbers for the endpoints most often used.
These `` shorthand '' or `` speed calling '' numbers are automatically translated to अद्वितीय टेलीफोन संख्याएँ पहले the कॉल can be connected.
Some special services have their own short numbers ( e.g., 1-1-9, 9-1-1, 0-0-0, 9-9-9, 1-1-1, and 1-1-2 being the Emergency Services numbers for China, Japan, South कोरियाई, ताईवान और श्री लंका ; कनाडा और the संयुक्त राज्य ; ऑस्ट्रेलिया ; the संयुक्त किंगडम, आयरलैंड, दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी, कैंडल, सऊदी अरब, the United Arab Emirates, Morocco, Macao, Bahrain, Qatar, Bangladesh, Botswana, Ghana, Kenya, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Mauritius, Singapore, Zimbabwe, Trinidad, Tobago ; New Zealand ; Kuwait and the European Union, respectively. )
Many systems also allow काल्स भीतर a लोकल क्षेत्रफल to be बना without dialing the local area code.
For example, a phone number in North America will start with three numbers ( such as 661 ), which is the area code, followed by सात अंक विभाजित into भाग of तीन और चार ( ऐसे as 550-1212 ), which is the local number.
Some areas now have mandatory ten-digit डायलिंग in प्लेस, भी लिये local calls.
Most telephone networks today ( exceptions being private intercom and secure phone networks ) are interconnected in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय टेलीफोन संजाल, जहाँ the स्वरूप of telephone numbers is standardized by ITU-T in the recommendation E.164.
This specifies कि the संपूर्ण क्रमांक चाहिए be 15 अंक or shorter, and begin with a country prefix.
For most countries, this is followed by an area कोड or नगर कोड और the सदस्य क्रमांक, जिससे might consist of the code for a particular telephone exchange.
ITU-T recommendation E.123 describes how to represent an अंतरराष्ट्रीय टेलीफोन क्रमांक in writing or print, starting with a plus sign ( `` + '' ) and the country code.
When calling an international number from a fixed line phone, the + must be replaced साथ the अंतरराष्ट्रीय कॉल उपसर्ग चुनी by the country the call is being made from.
Some mobile phones allow the + to be डाला सीधे.
The format and allocation of local phone numbers are controlled by प्रत्येक स्वदेश 's संबंधित सरकारी, either सीधे or by प्रायोजित संगठन ( such as NANPA overseen by NeuStar Inc. ).
Before a telephone call is connected, the telephone क्रमांक जरूर be dialed by the calling party or Caller.
The called party might have equipment that presents कॉलर id पहले the call is answered.
A collection agency is a business कि pursues भुगतान of debts owed by individuals or businesses.
Most collection agencies operate as agents of creditors and collect debts लिये a शुल्क or प्रतिशत of the total amount owed.
There हैं अनेक प्रकार of collection agencies.
First-party agencies are oftentimes subsidiaries of the original कम्पनी the कर्ज़ is owed to.
Third-party agencies are separate companies contracted by a कम्पनी to collect debts on उनके behalf for a fee.
Debt buyers purchase the debt at a percentage of its value, तब attempt to collect it.
Each country has its own rules and regulations regarding them.
Cannabis flower साथ दृश्य trichomes
Cannabis, also known as मारिजुआना ( इससे the मैक्सिकन स्पेनी marihuana ), और by अन्य names, is a preparation of the Cannabis plant intended for use as a psychoactive drug and as medicine.
Pharmacologically, the प्रिंसिपल psychoactive constituent of कैनबिस is tetrahydrocannabinol ( thc ) ; it is एक of 483 known compounds in the plant, including at least 84 other cannabinoids, such as cannabidiol ( CBD ), cannabinol ( CBN ), tetrahydrocannabivarin ( THCV ).
and cannabigerol ( CBG ).
This is a सूची of अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल quarterbacks जो have प्रारंभ लिये the वॉशिंगटन redskins, as खूब as इसके पूर्ववर्तियों the Boston Braves ( 1932 ) and Boston Redskins ( 1933 – 1936 ), in the National Football League ( NFL ).
The वॉशिंगटन redskins मताधिकार थी originally संस्थापित in Boston, Massachusetts as the Boston Braves, named after the local baseball franchise.
The name was बदला the following year to the Redskins.
In 1937, the मताधिकार स्थानांतरित to वॉशिंगटन, D.C.
Of the 49 Redskins starting quarterbacks, two have महरूम inducted into the प्रो फ़ुटबॉल हॉल of Fame : Sammy Baugh and Sonny Jurgensen.

1st Special Forces Operational Detachment-Delta ( 1st SFOD-D ), popularly ज्ञात as डेल्टा फ़ोर्स, is one of the United States ' four secretive tier-one counter-terrorism and Special Mission Units.
It was formerly listed as the कॉम्बैट अनुप्रयोग समूह by the विभाग of रक्षा but has since been officially re-designated the Army Compartmented Elements ( ACE ).
While 1st SFOD-D is administratively समर्थित by usasoc, it जलप्रपात अंतर्गत the operational control of the Joint Special Operations Command.
Delta Force and its Navy counterpart, the Naval Special Warfare Development Group, हैं the संयुक्त राज्य सैन्य 's प्राथमिक counter-terrorism units.
Delta Force 's primary tasks are counter-terrorism, सीधा कार्रवाई, और नेशनल हस्तक्षेप परिचालन, हालांकि it is an अत्यधिक बहुमुखी group capable of conducting many types of covert missions, including, but not limited to, hostage rescues and raids.
The Central प्रज्ञा एजेंसी 's अत्यधिक गुपचुप खास क्रियाएँ प्रभाग ( SAD ) and more specifically its elite Special Operations Group ( SOG ) often works with – and recruits – operators from Delta Force.
Alpha decay is one example type of radioactive decay, in which an atomic nucleus emits an alpha particle, and thereby transforms ( or 'क्षयs ' ) into an अणु साथ a द्रव्यमान क्रमांक 4 कम और परमाणु क्रमांक 2 less.
Many other प्रकार of decays हैं संभावित.
Radioactive decay, also known as nuclear decay or radioactivity, is the प्रक्रम by जिससे a केंद्रक of an अस्थिर अणु loses energy by emitting particles of ionizing radiation.
A material that spontaneously emits this kind of radiation — which includes the emission of energetic alpha particles, beta particles, and गामा किरणें — is माना रेडियोसक्रिय.
There are many different types of रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय ( देखिए तालिका नीचे ).
A decay, or loss of energy, results when an atom with one type of nucleus, called the parent radionuclide, परिणत to an अणु साथ a केंद्रक in a अलग राज्य, or to a different nucleus containing different numbers of protons and neutrons.
Either of these products is नामित the बेटी nuclide.
In some decays the जनक और बेटी हैं अलग रासायनिक तत्व, और यूँ the क्षय प्रक्रम परिणाम in नाभिकीय transmutation ( creation of an atom of a new element ).
The first decay processes to be खोजा यहूद अल्फा decay, beta decay, and gamma decay.
Alpha decay occurs when the केंद्रक ejects an अल्फा कण ( हीलियम nucleus ).
This is the most आम प्रक्रम of emitting nucleons, लकिन in rarer प्रकार of decays, nuclei can eject protons, or specific nuclei of other elements ( in the process called cluster decay ).
Beta decay occurs when the nucleus emits an electron or positron और a प्रकार of न्यूट्रिनो, in a प्रक्रम कि परिवर्तन a proton to a neutron or the other way around.
The nucleus may capture an orbiting इलेक्ट्रॉन, converting a प्रोटॉन into a न्यूट्रॉन ( electron capture ).
All of ये प्रक्रियाओं परिणाम in nuclear transmutation.
By contrast, there exist radioactive decay प्रक्रियाओं कि do नहीं परिणाम in transmutation.
The energy of an excited nucleus may be emitted as a गामा रे in गामा क्षय, or प्रयुक्त to eject an कक्षीय इलेक्ट्रॉन by interaction with the excited nucleus in a process called internal conversion.
Radioisotopes occasionally emit neutrons, और इस परिणाम in a बदलें in an तत्व इससे one isotope to another.
One type of radioactive decay परिणाम in उत्पाद जिससे हैं not defined, but appear in a range of `` pieces '' of the original nucleus.
इस क्षय is called spontaneous fission.
This decay happens when a large unstable nucleus spontaneously splits into two ( and occasionally तीन ) छोटी बेटी nuclei, और प्रायः emits गामा किरणें, neutrons, or अन्य particles as a consequence.
Radioactive decay is a stochastic ( i.e., random ) process at the level of single atoms, in that, according to quantum सिद्धान्त, it is नामुमकिन to भविष्यवाणी जब a particular अणु will decay.
However, the chance that a दिए अणु होगा क्षय is constant over time.
For a large number of atoms, the decay rate for the संग्रहण is computable इससे the measured decay constants of the nuclides ( or equivalently from the half-lifes ).
Waxing is a form of semi-permanent बाल हटाना जिससे removes the hair from the root.
New hair होगा नहीं grow वापस in the previously waxed क्षेत्रफल लिये two to eight weeks, although some people will start to see regrowth in only a week.
Almost any क्षेत्रफल of the देह can be waxed, including eyebrows, face, bikini area, legs, arms, back, abdomen and feet.
वहीँ हैं अनेक प्रकार of वैक्सिंग उपयुक्त लिये removing unwanted hair.
स्ट्रिप वैक्सिंग is संपन्नता by spreading a wax thinly over the skin.
A cloth or paper strip is then pressed on the शीर्ष और ripped बंद the दिशा of बाल growth.
This removes the मोम साथ with the hair.
स्ट्रिप मोम can भी be बना at home using lemon juice, water, sugar and honey.
Hot waxing utilizes Hot मोम ( as opposed to strip wax ).
In this case, the मोम is लागू somewhat thickly and with no cloth or paper strips.
The wax then hardens when it cools, यूँ allowing the आसान हटाना by a therapist without the aid of cloths.
This waxing method is बहुत फायदेमंद to people who have sensitive skin.
Wall painting ( 1st सदी ad ) from Pompeii depicting a multigenerational banquet
Ancient Roman culture existed throughout the लगभग 1200-year इतिहास of the civilization of Ancient Rome.
the पद refers to the संस्कृति of the रोमन गणतंत्र, बाद the Roman Empire, which, at its peak, covered an area from Lowland Scotland and Morocco to the Euphrates.
Life in ancient Rome revolved around the city of Rome, its famed seven hills, and its स्मारकीय structures ऐसे as the flavian amphitheatre ( now called the Colosseum ), the Forum of Trajan, and the Pantheon.
The city also था अनेक थिएटर, gymnasiums, और many taverns, baths, and brothels.
Throughout the territory अंतर्गत प्राचीन रोम 's कंट्रोल, आवासीय वास्तुकला ranged इससे बहुत modest घरों to देश villas, and in the capital city of Rome, there were imperial residences on the elegant Palatine Hill, from which the word palace is derived.
The vast majority of the population lived in the city center, packed into insulae ( अपार्टमेंट ब्लॉक ).
The नगर of रोम थी the largest megalopolis of कि समय, साथ a जनसांख्यिकी कि may खूब have exceeded one million people, with a high end estimate of 3.6 million and a low end estimate of 450,000.
Historical estimates indicate that around 30 percent of the population under the city 's क्षेत्राधिकार जिया in innumerable शहरी centers, साथ जनसांख्यिकी of at तनिक 10,000 और अनेक सैन्य settlements, a बहुत high rate of urbanization by pre-industrial standards.
The most urbanized part of the Empire was Italy, which had an estimated rate of शहरी of 32 %, the वही रेट of शहरी of इंग्लैण्ड in 1800.
Most Roman towns and cities had a फ़ोरम, मंदिरों and the same type of buildings, on a smaller scale, as found in Rome.
The large urban population required an endless supply of खाना जिससे थी a जटिल logistical कार्य, सहित acquiring, transporting, storing and distribution of food for Rome and other urban centers.
Italian farms supplied सब्जियां and fruits, but fish and meat were luxuries.
Aqueducts were built to bring water to urban centers और वाइन और आयल यहूद आयातित इससे Hispania, Gaul and Africa.
There was a very large amount of commerce between the provinces of the Roman Empire, since its परिवहन प्रौद्योगिकी थी बहुत कुशल.
The average costs of transport and the प्रौद्योगिकी यहूद comparable साथ 18th-century Europe.
The later city of Rome did not भरण the स्पेस भीतर इसके प्राचीन aurelian walls until after 1870.
Eighty प्रतिशत of the जनसांख्यिकी अंतर्गत the क्षेत्राधिकार of ancient Rome lived in the countryside in settlements with less than 10 thousand inhabitants.
Landlords generally resided in cities and उनके estates यहूद बाएँ in the परवाह of फार्म managers.
The plight of rural slaves was generally worse than their counterparts working in शहरी वैभवशाली households.
To stimulate a उच्चतर मजदूर उत्पादकता सबसे landlords freed a large number of slaves and many received wages.
Some records indicate that `` as many as 42 people lived in one small farm hut in मिश्र, जबकि छह परिवारों स्वामित्व a single olive tree. ''.
Such a rural environment continued to induce migration of जनसांख्यिकी to शहरी centers जबतक the जल्दी 2nd सदी, जब the urban population stopped growing and started to decline.
Starting in the middle of the 2nd century BC, private Greek संस्कृति थी increasingly in ascendancy, in spite of tirades विरूद्ध the `` softening '' effects of Hellenized culture from the conservative moralists.
By the time of Augustus, cultured Greek household slaves taught the Roman young ( sometimes even the लड़कियों ) ; शेफ़, decorators, secretaries, doctors, and hairdressers—all came from the Greek East.
Greek sculptures सुशोभित hellenistic लैंडस्केप बागवानी on the palatine or in the विला, or यहूद imitated in Roman sculpture yards by Greek slaves.
The Roman cuisine preserved in the cookery किताबे ascribed to apicius is essentially Greek.
Roman writers disdained Latin for a संस्कारी यूनानी स्टाइल.
Only in law and शासन थी the तिरछा प्रकृति of रोम 's accretive culture supreme.
Against this human पृष्ठभूमि, दोनो the शहरी और ग्रामीण सेटिंग, एक of इतिहास 's सबसे influential सभ्यताओं took shape, leaving behind a cultural legacy that survives in part today.
James Joseph `` Duffy '' Waldorf, Jr. ( born August 20, 1962 ) is an अमरीकी पेशेवर golfer.

A Soviet मेयोनेज़ jar
A modern `` फ्रेंच kilner '' jar
Glass production involves दो प्रमुख विधि – the फ्लैश glass process, which produces sheet glass, and glassblowing which produces bottles and other containers.
A season is a subdivision of the साल, चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in weather, ecology, and hours of daylight.
Seasons result from the yearly revolution of the धरती around the सूर्य और the झुकाव of the धरती 's अक्ष सापेक्ष to the plane of revolution.
In temperate और ध्रुवीय regions, the सीज़न हैं चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in the तीव्रता of sunlight that reaches the Earth 's surface, variations of which may cause animals to go into hibernation or to migrate, and plants to be dormant.
During May, June and July, the northern hemisphere is exposed to more direct sunlight क्युकी the गोलार्ध चेहरों the सूर्य.
The same is true of the southern गोलार्ध in नवम्बर, दिसम्बर and January.
It is the झुकाव of the धरती कि कल्याणकारी the सूर्य to be उच्चतर in the sky during the summer months which increases the solar flux.
However, due to seasonal lag, June, जुलाई और अगस्त हैं the hottest महीने in the northern hemisphere and December, January and February are the hottest months in the southern hemisphere.
In temperate and subpolar regions, generally four calendar -based सीज़न ( साथ उनके adjectives ) हैं पहचाना : spring ( vernal ), summer ( estival ), autumn ( autumnal ) and winter ( hibernal ).
However, ecologists mostly use a six season model लिये शीतोष्ण जलवायु regions कि शामिल pre-spring ( prevernal ) और late summer ( serotinal ) as distinct seasons along with the traditional four.
Hot regions have two or three सीज़न ; the बरसात ( or गीला, or मानसून ) ऋतु और the शुष्क season, and in some tropical areas, a cool or mild season.
In some भाग of the संसार, खास `` सीज़न '' हैं loosely defined based on important events such as a hurricane season, tornado season or a wildfire season.
The six ecological seasons
The four calendar seasons, चित्रित in an प्राचीन रोमन मोज़ेक from Tunisia
The Battle of Fort Sumter ( April 12–14, 1861 ) थी the बमबारी और surrender of Fort Sumter, near Charleston, South Carolina, that started the American Civil War.
Following declarations of secession by सात दक्षिणी राज्य, दक्षिण कैरोलिना मांगे कि the U.S. Army abandon its facilities in Charleston Harbor.
On December 26, 1860, U.S. Major Robert Anderson surreptitiously moved his small command from the indefensible Fort Moultrie on सुलीवान 's द्वीप to फोर्ट sumter, a substantial किला controlling the entrance of Charleston Harbor.
an attempt by u.S. अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन to reinforce and resupply Anderson, using the unarmed merchant ship Star of the West, failed when it was fired upon by shore batteries on January 9, 1861.
South कैरोलिना अधिकारियों तब जब्त सब संघीय property in the Charleston area, except for Fort Sumter.
दौरान the जल्दी महीने of 1861, the हालात around Fort Sumter increasingly began to resemble a siege.
In कूच, ब्रिगेडियर. gen. P. G. T. beauregard, the पहला सामान्य अधिकारी of the newly formed Confederate States of America, was placed in command of Confederate forces in Charleston.
Beauregard energetically directed the strengthening of batteries around चार्ल्सटन हार्बर aimed at फोर्ट sumter.
Conditions in the fort grew dire as the Union soldiers rushed to पूरा the संस्थापना of additional guns.
एंडरसन थी छोटी of men, food, and supplies.
The resupply of Fort Sumter became the first crisis of the प्रशासन of अध्यक्ष अब्राहम Lincoln.
He notified the राज्यपाल of दक्षिण कैरोलिना, फ्रांसिस W. pickens, कि he थी sending सप्लाई जहाजों, जिससे resulted in an ultimatum from the Confederate government : evacuate Fort Sumter immediately.
Major Anderson refused to आत्मसमर्पण.
Beginning at 4:30 a.m. on अप्रैल 12, the Confederates bombarded the fort from artillery batteries surrounding the harbor.
Although the Union garrison returned fire, they were significantly outgunned and, after 34 घंटों, प्रमुख एंडरसन सहमत to evacuate.
वहीँ थी no घाटा of जीवन on either पक्ष as a सीधा परिणाम of इस सगाई, although a gun explosion during the surrender ceremonies on April 14 caused two Union deaths.
Following the battle, there was फैली support इससे दोनो उत्तर and South for further military action.
Lincoln 's immediate call for 75,000 volunteers to दबाने the विद्रोह resulted in an अतिरिक्त चार दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य also declaring their secession and joining the Confederacy.
The सिविल युद्ध था begun.
3G, छोटी लिये तीसरा पीढी, is the third generation of mobile telecommunications technology.
3G telecommunication networks support सेवाएं कि provide an सूचना ट्रांसफ़र रेट of at least 200 kbit/s.
However, many services advertised as 3g provide उच्चतर गति than the न्यूनतम तकनीकी आवश्यकताएँ for a 3G service.
Recent 3G releases, often denoted 3.5G and 3.75g, भी provide मोबाईल ब्रॉडबैंड अभिगम of अनेक Mbit/s to smartphones and mobile modems in laptop computers.
3G finds अनुप्रयोग in बेतार आवाज़ telephony, mobile Internet access, fixed wireless Internet access, video calls and mobile TV.
`` Mazel Tov ! '' लिखा on a वाइन glass tag
traditionally, बाद the दूल्हे breaks the glass, the guests shout `` Mazel Tov ! ``.
A birthday cake, iced with the words `` מזל טוב '' ( mazal tov ), as is प्रायः किया in इसराईल.
Here the phrase is लिखा in Hebrew cursive.
`` Mazel tov '' or `` mazal tov '' ( Hebrew / Yiddish : `` מזל טוב '', यहूदी : `` mazal tov '' ; यहूदी : `` mazel tov '' ; lit.
`` good luck '' ) is a phrase used to एक्स्प्रेस बधाई for a happy and significant occasion or event.
Hepatitis C is an infectious disease affecting primarily the liver, caused by the hepatitis C virus ( HCV ).
The infection is often asymptomatic, but chronic infection can lead to scarring of the liver and ultimately to cirrhosis, जिससे is generally apparent बाद many years.
In some cases, those with cirrhosis will go on to develop जिगर विफलता, जिगर cancer or life-threatening esophageal and gastric varices.
HCV is spread primarily by blood-to-blood contact associated with intravenous drug use, poorly sterilized चिकित्सा उपकरण और transfusions.
An estimated 130–200 लाख लोगों worldwide are infected with.
The existence of ( originally `` non- a non- b hepatitis '' ) was postulated in the 1970s and proven in 1989.
only infects humans और chimpanzees.
The वायरस persists in the liver in about 85 % of those infected.
This persistent infection can be treated with medication : the मानक चिकित्सा is a संयोजन of peginterferon and ribavirin, with either boceprevir or telaprevir added in some cases.
Overall, 50–80 % of लोगों treated are cured.
Those who develop cirrhosis or जिगर कर्कट may require a liver transplant.
is the अग्रणी कारण of liver transplantation, though the virus usually recurs after transplantation.
No vaccine विरूद्ध is available.
a लचीली बिता खाता ( fsa ), भी ज्ञात as a लचीली बिता व्यवस्था, is one of a number of tax-advantaged financial accounts that can be set up through a cafeteria plan of an employer in the United States.
An FSA allows an employee to set aside a portion of आय to अदा लिये योग्य खर्च as स्थापित in the cafeteria plan, most commonly for medical expenses but often for dependent care or other expenses.
Money deducted from an employee 's pay into an FSA is नहीं विषय to payroll कर, resulting in substantial payroll tax savings.
One significant disadvantage to using an FSA is that funds not used by the समाप्त of the योजना साल हैं खोया to the कर्मचारी, ज्ञात as the `` use it or lose it '' rule.
The most common type of flexible spending खाता, the चिकित्सा व्यय fsa ( भी चिकित्सा fsa or health FSA ), is similar to a health savings account ( HSA ) or a health reimbursement account ( HRA ).
However, while hsas और hras हैं लगभग exclusively प्रयुक्त as components of a consumer driven health care plan, medical FSAs are commonly offered with more traditional health plans as well.
In addition, निधि in a स्वास्थ्य बचत खाता हैं नहीं खोया जब the योजना year is over, unlike funds in an FSA.
Paper forms or an FSA debit card, also known as a Flexcard, may be used to access the खाता निधि.
Tennessee ( ) ( ) is a U.S. राज्य स्तिथ in the southeastern United States.
Tennessee is the 36th सबसे extensive और the 17th most populous of the 50 United States.
Tennessee is bordered by केंटकी और वर्जिनिया to the उत्तर, North Carolina to the east, Georgia, Alabama, and Mississippi to the south, and Arkansas and Missouri to the west.
The Appalachian Mountains dominate the eastern part of the राज्य, और the मिसिसिपी नदी फ़ॉर्म the state 's western border.
Tennessee 's capital and second largest नगर is नैशविले, जिससे रै a population of 609,644.
Memphis is the राज्य 's largest नगर, with a population of 652,050.
The state of टेनेसी is rooted in the watauga संघ, a 1772 frontier pact generally regarded as the first constitutional government west of the Appalachians.
What is now Tennessee was initially part of North कैरोलिना, और बाद भाग of the दक्षिणपश्चिम Territory.
Tennessee was admitted to the संघ as the 16th राज्य on जून 1, 1796.
Tennessee was the last state to leave the Union and join the Confederacy at the outbreak of the u.S. सिविल युद्ध in 1861, और the पहला state to be readmitted to the Union at the end of the war.
Tennessee furnished more soldiers for the confederate फौज than कोई अन्य राज्य, और अधिक सैनिको लिये the Union Army than any other Southern state.
In the 20th century, Tennessee transitioned from an agrarian अर्थव्यवस्था to a अधिक diversified अर्थव्यवस्था, aided at times by federal entities such as the Tennessee Valley Authority.
In the early 1940s, the city of ओक लकीरें थी स्थापित to हाउस the मैनहटन Project 's uranium enrichment facilities, helping to build the world 's first atomic bomb.
Tennessee has played a critical role in the development of many forms of American popular music, सहित चट्टान और फेंकें, ब्लूज़, देश, और rockabilly.
Beale Street in मेम्फिस is माना by अनेक to be the जन्मस्थान of the blues, with musicians such as W.C. Handy performing in its clubs as early as 1909.
Memphis was also home to Sun Records, where musicians such as Elvis Presley, Isaac Hayes, Johnny Cash, Carl Perkins, जेरी ली लुईस, रॉय orbison, और चार्ली समृद्ध began उनके रिकॉर्डिंग करियर, and where rock and roll took shape in the 1950s.
The 1927 Victor recording sessions in Bristol generally mark the beginning of the country music genre and the rise of the Grand Ole Opry in the 1930s helped मेक नैशविले the बीच of the देश म्यूज़िक रिकॉर्डिंग industry.
Three bricks and mortar museums recognize Tennessee 's role in nurturing विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म of लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक : the मेम्फिस चट्टान n ' आत्मा संग्रहालय, the देश म्यूज़िक हॉल of कीर्ति और संग्रहालय in नैशविले, और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Rock-A-Billy Museum in Jackson.
In addition, the Rockabilly Hall of Fame, an ऑनलाइन साईट recognizing the विकास of rockabilly in जिससे टेनेसी played a crucial role, is based in Nashville.
Tennessee 's major industries शामिल कृषि, निर्माण, and tourism.
Poultry, soybeans, and cattle are the state 's प्राथमिक agricultural उत्पाद, and major manufacturing exports include chemicals, transportation equipment, and electrical equipment.
The Great Smoky Mountains National Park, the nation 's most visited national park, is headquartered in the eastern part of the state, और a खण्ड of the एपलाशियन ट्रेल roughly फ़ॉलो the tennessee-north Carolina border.
Other प्रमुख पर्यटक आकर्षण शामिल the टेनेसी एक्वेरियम in चट्टानूगा, the sunsphere in knoxville, dollywood in कबूतर Forge, the Parthenon, the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum, and Ryman Auditorium in Nashville, and Elvis Presley 's Graceland residence and tomb in Memphis.
One डिज़ाइन रूपांतर of a cock ring.
A cock ring is a रिंग कि can be लगाई around a man 's शिश्न, usually at the base, primarily to slow the flow of blood from the erect penile tissue, thus maintaining an erection for a much longer period of time.
Cock rings can be worn around बस the शिश्न or दोनो the शिश्न और scrotum, or just the scrotum alone, though this is usually called a testicle cuff.
Rings can be made of a variety of different materials, most commonly चमड़े, रबर, or silicone, हालांकि नायलॉन और मेटल हैं भी प्रयुक्त either as the main component or part of the closure.
The term cock ring is sometimes used as a synonym for a Prince Albert piercing, a piercing of the शिश्न कि is प्रायः, हालांकि नहीं सदा, a metal ring.
When used in cases of erectile dysfunction they are known by various names ऐसे as `` स्तंभन ring '' and `` tension ring ''.
The headquarters of Major League Baseball at 245 Park Avenue, Midtown Manhattan, नई यॉर्क नगर, USA.
Major League Baseball ( MLB ) is a professional baseball league, consisting of टीमों कि खेल in the नेशनल लीग और the अमरीकी League.
Dating to 1876 and 1901 respectively, the two leagues merged in 2000 into a single organization led by the कमिश्नर of बेसबॉल, बाद 100 सालो as पृथक legal entities.
MLB constitutes एक of the प्रमुख पेशेवर sports leagues of the United States and Canada.
it is रचित of 30 teams — 29 in the United States and one in Canada.
Teams in MLB play 162 खेल प्रत्येक ऋतु over छह months ( April through September ).
Five teams in each league advance to a four-round postseason tournament that culminates in the World Series, a best-of-seven-games championship series between the two league champions जिससे तिथियाँ to 1903.
The संगठन oversees अनेक minor-league बेसबॉल लीग which operate about 240 teams affiliated with the major-league clubs.
With the अंतरराष्ट्रीय बेसबॉल संघ, the league also manages the international World Baseball Classic tournament.
MLB has the highest season attendance of any sports लीग in the संसार साथ nearly 75 लाख spectators in 2012.
Delaware ( ) is a U.S. state located on the Atlantic Coast in the mid-atlantic प्रदेश of the संयुक्त States.
It is bordered to the दक्षिण and west by Maryland, to the northeast by New Jersey, and to the north by Pennsylvania.
The state takes its name from Thomas West, 3rd Baron De la warr, an अंग्रेज़ी nobleman और वर्जिनिया 's पहला colonial governor, after whom what is now called Cape Henlopen was originally named.
Delaware is located in the northeastern portion of the delmarva प्रायद्वीप और is the दूसरी smallest, the छठे तनिक populous, लकिन the छठे most densely populated of the fifty United States.
Delaware is divided into तीन काउंटी.
From north to south, these three काउंटी हैं नई किला, केंट, and Sussex.
जबकि the दक्षिणी दो काउंटी have historically been predominantly agricultural, New Castle County has been more industrialized.
Before its coastline was explored by europeans in the 16th सदी, डेलावेयर थी inhabited by अनेक समूह of देशी अमेरिकी, including the Lenape in the north and Nanticoke in the south.
It was initially colonized by Dutch traders at zwaanendael, स्तिथ निकट the उपस्थित कस्बा of Lewes, in 1631.
Delaware was one of the 13 colonies participating in the American Revolution and on December 7, 1787, became the first राज्य to ratify the संविधान of the संयुक्त राज्य, thereby becoming known as The First State.
Energy परिवर्तन in Energy Systems Language
Energy transformation or उर्जा परिवर्तन is the प्रक्रम of बदलना one form of energy to another.
in भौतिकी, the पद उर्जा describes the क्षमता to produce certain changes within a system, without regard to limitations in transformation imposed by Entropy.
Changes in total energy of systems can only be accomplished by adding or subtracting energy from them, as उर्जा is a मात्रा जिससे is conserved, according to the पहला law of thermodynamics.
According to special relativity, changes in the energy of systems will also coincide साथ परिवर्तन in the प्रणाली 's द्रव्यमान, और the कुल राशि of द्रव्यमान of a प्रणाली is a measure of its energy.
Energy in a system may be रूपांतरित so कि it resides in a अलग state, or a different type of energy.
Energy in many states may be used to do अनेक किस्में of शारीरिक कार्य.
Energy may be used in natural प्रक्रियाओं or मशीने, or else to provide some service to society ( such as heat, light, or motion ).
For example, an आतंरिक दहन इंजन converts the संभावित रासायनिक उर्जा in गैसोलीन और ऑक्सीजन into ऊष्मा, जिससे is then transformed into the propulsive energy ( kinetic energy that moves a vehicle ).
A solar cell converts solar radiation into electrical energy that can then be प्रयुक्त to लाइट a bulb or power a computer.
The जेनेरिक नाम लिये a यंत्र जिससे converts energy from one form to another, is a transducer.
In general, most प्रकार of उर्जा, सहेजें लिये थर्मल energy, may be converted efficiently to any other kind of energy.
Sometimes this occurs with an efficiency of essentially 100 %, such as when potential energy is converted to kinetic उर्जा as an ऑब्जेक्ट जलप्रपात in वैक्यूम, or जब it orbits nearer or farther from another object, in space.
Conversion of other types of energies to heat may also occurs with nearly पूर्ण दक्षता ( अनेक प्रकार of घर्षण do इस ).
Exceptions for perfect conversion efficiency ( even for isolated systems ) occur when energy has already been partly distributed among many available quantum states for a collection of अणु, जिससे हैं freely अनुमत to explore कोई राज्य of आवेग और स्थिति ( phase space ).
In such circumstances, a measure called Entropy, or evening-out of energy distribution in such states, dictates that भविष्य राज्य of the प्रणाली जरूर be of at least equal evenness in energy distribution.
( There is no way, taking the universe as a पूरे, to collect energy into fewer states, once it has spread to them ).
A consequence of this requirement is that there are limitations to the efficiency with which thermal energy can be परिवर्तित to अन्य kinds of उर्जा, चूंकि थर्मल उर्जा in संतुलन at a given temperature already represents the maximal evening-out of energy between all possible states.
Such energy is sometimes माना `` degraded energy, '' because it is not entirely usable.
The second law of thermodynamics is a way of stating that, for this reason, thermal energy in a system may be converted to other kinds of energy with efficiencies approaching 100 %, तभी if the एन्ट्रॉपी ( even-ness or विकार ) of the ब्रह्मांड is increased by अन्य अर्थात्, to compensate लिये the घटी in एन्ट्रॉपी associated with the disappearance of the thermal energy and its entropy content.
Otherwise, only a part of thermal energy may be converted to other kinds of energy ( and thus, useful work ), since the remainder of the heat must be reserved to be transferred to a thermal reservoir at a lower temperature, in such a way कि the बढ़ाएँ in एन्ट्रॉपी लिये इस प्रक्रम अधिक than compensates लिये the एन्ट्रॉपी घटी संबद्ध with transformation of the rest of the heat into other types of energy.
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit association '' जिससे operates a प्रमुख पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी लीग of 30 franchised सदस्य clubs, of which seven are currently located in Canada and 23 in the United States.
Headquartered in New York City, the NHL is widely considered to be the premier professional ice hockey league in the world, and one of the प्रमुख पेशेवर खेल लीग in the United States and Canada.
The Stanley Cup, the oldest professional sports trophy in North America, is awarded annually to the league playoff champion at the end of each season.
The league was व्यवस्थित on नवम्बर 26, 1917, in मॉन्ट्रियल, क्यूबेक, कनाडा, after the suspension of operations of its predecessor organization, the National Hockey Association ( NHA ), which had been founded in 1909.
It प्रारंभ साथ चार टीमों और, through a श्रेणी of expansions, contractions, and relocations, the league is now composed of 30 active franchises.
The nation to which the name of the league originally referred was Canada, although the लीग रै अभी महरूम binational चूंकि 1924 जब it विस्तारित into the संयुक्त States.
After a labour dispute that led to the cancellation of the entire 2004–05 season, the league resumed play under a नई सामूहिक bargaining अनुबंध कि शामिल a सैलरी cap.
In 2009, the NHL enjoyed record highs in terms of sponsorships, उपस्थिति, और टेलीविज़न ऑडियंस.
The NHL draws many highly skilled players from all over the world and फिलहाल रै खिलाड़ी इससे परिचय 20 different countries.
Although Canadians have historically constituted the majority of the players in the NHL, over the पास्ट चार प्लस दशकों the percentages of us और यूरोपीय खिलाड़ी have increased दोनो क्युकी of the NHL 's continued expansion from six to thirty clubs since 1967, and the increased availability of highly skilled European players.
This is the complete list of the ratified and unratified amendments to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान जिससे प्राप्त the approval of the United States Congress.
twenty-seven amendments have महरूम ratified since the original signing of the Constitution, the first ten of which are known collectively as the Bill of Rights.
The procedure लिये amending the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान is governed by Article V of the original text.
There have been many other proposals for amendments to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान introduced in कॉंग्रेस, but not submitted to the states.
Before an amendment can take effect, it must be proposed to the states by a two-thirds vote of दोनो घरों of कॉंग्रेस or by a सम्मेलन ( ज्ञात as an आलेख v सम्मेलन ) called by two-thirds of the states, and ratified by three-fourths of the states or by three-fourths of conventions thereof, the method of ratification being determined by Congress at the time of proposal.
To date, no convention for proposing amendments has been called by the states, and तभी once—in 1933 for the ratification of the twenty-first amendment —has the convention method of ratification been employed.
FMR LLC ( Fidelity Management and Research ) or Fidelity Investments is an अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय financial services corporation.
It is one of the largest परस्पर निधि और वित्तीय services groups in the world.
It was founded in 1946 and serves उत्तर अमरीकी investors.
वफ़ादारी ventures is इसके venture capital arm.
वफ़ादारी अंतरराष्ट्रीय सीमित ( फील ), थी an अंतरराष्ट्रीय संबद्ध संस्थापित in 1969, serving most countries in the rest of the world.
In September 2011, FIL was rebranded as 'fidelity विश्वव्यापी निवेश '.
Fidelity Investments manages a विशाल परिवार of परस्पर निधि, provides निधि वितरण and investment advice services, as well as providing discount brokerage services, retirement services, wealth management, securities execution and clearance, life insurance and a number of other services.

Sociology is the scientific study of human society और इसके origins, विकास, संगठन, और संस्थानों.
It is a social science जिससे उपयोग विभिन्न विधि of अनुभवजन्य छानबीन and critical analysis to develop a body of knowledge about human social activity, structures, and functions.
A goal for many sociologists is to conduct research which may be applied directly to सोशल नीति और welfare, जबकि others focus primarily on refining the theoretical understanding of social processes.
Subject पदार्थ सीमाएँ इससे the सूक्ष्म स्तर of व्यक्तिगत एजेंसी और बातचीत to the macro level of systems and the social structure.
The traditional focuses of sociology include social stratification, social class, culture, race and ethnicity, gender and sexuality, सोशल गतिशीलता, धर्म, secularization, विधि, और deviance.
As all spheres of human कार्यकलाप हैं प्रभावित by the interplay between सोशल ढांचा और व्यक्तिगत एजेंसी, समाजशास्त्र रै धीरे expanded its focus to further subjects, such as health, medical, military and penal institutions, the Internet, environmental sociology, political economy and the role of social activity in the development of scientific knowledge.
The range of सोशल वैज्ञानिक विधि रै also expanded.
सोशल शोधकर्ताओं चित्रण upon a variety of qualitative and quantitative techniques.
The linguistic and cultural turns of the mid-twentieth century led to increasingly interpretative, hermeneutic, और philosophic approaches to the विश्लेषण of society.
Conversely, recent decades have देखी the वृद्धि of नई analytically, mathematically and computationally rigorous techniques, such as agent-based modelling and social network analysis.
Sociology should not be confused with various general social studies courses which bear little relation to समाजशास्त्रीय सिद्धान्त or सोशल विज्ञान शोध methodology.
थंडर is the sound caused by lightning.
Depending on the nature of the lightning and distance of the श्रोता, थंडर can दायरा इससे a शार्प, loud crack to a long, low rumble ( brontide ).
The sudden increase in pressure and temperature from lightning produces रैपिड विस्तार of the एयर surrounding and within a bolt of lightning.
In turn, this expansion of air creates a sonic shock wave, similar to a सोनिक बूम, जिससे produces the ध्वनि of थंडर, प्रायः referred to as a clap, क्रैक, or peal of thunder.
The distance of the lightning can be calculated by the श्रोता आधारित on the समय अंतराल इससे जब the बिजली is seen to when the sound is heard.
Palma (,, ), in full Palma de Mallorca, is the major city and port on the island of Majorca ( Mallorca ) and capital city of the autonomous जातियाँ of the Balearic Islands in Spain.
The names Ciutat de Mallorca ( City of majorca ) और ciutat ( नगर ) यहूद प्रयुक्त पहले the War of the Spanish Succession and are still used by people in Majorca.
However, the आधिकारिक नाम थी mallorca, the same as the island.
It is situated on the south coast of the द्वीप on the खाड़ी of Palma.
As of the 2009 census, the population of the city of Palma proper was 401,270, and the population of the संपूर्ण शहरी क्षेत्रफल थी 517,285, रैंकिंग as the twelfth largest urban area of Spain.
Almost हाफ of the कुल जनसांख्यिकी of Majorca live in Palma.
The Cabrera Archipelago, though widely separated इससे पालमा उचित, is administratively माना भाग of the municipality.
इसके विमानक्षेत्र, बेटे सन्त Joan, serves over 22 million passengers each year.
The Marivent Palace was offered by the नगर to the तब प्रिंस जुआन कार्लोस i of स्पेन.
the रॉयल्स have चूंकि spent their summer holidays in Palma.
luthor redirects here.
For other uses, see लूथर ( बहुविकल्पी ).
Alexander Joseph `` Lex '' Luthor is a fictional अक्षर, a supervillain appearing in comic books published by DC Comics.
Luthor is the archenemy of Superman, and as a high-status supervillain, has also come into conflict with बैटमैन और अन्य superheroes in the DC Universe.
Created by Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster, the character first appeared in Action Comics # 23 ( अप्रैल 1940 ).
luthor is वर्णित as `` a power-mad, दुष्ट scientist '' of high intelligence and incredible technological prowess.
Luthor 's goals typically center on killing Superman, the foremost बाधा to achieving the विलेन 's megalomaniacal लक्ष्य.
Despite periodically wearing a संचालित बहि, luthor has traditionally lacked superpowers or a dual identity.
The character was originally depicted as a mad वैज्ञानिक जो, in the रग of गूदा novels, wreaks कहर on the world with his futuristic weaponry.
In his earliest दिखावे, luthor is दिखाया साथ a पूरा head of red hair.
Despite this, the character later became hairless as the परिणाम of an कलाकार 's mistake.
A 1960 story by Jerry Siegel expanded upon Luthor 's origin and motivations, revealing him to be a childhood friend of सुपरमैन 's जो खोया उसके बाल जब a आग नष्ट उसके प्रयोगशाला ; Luthor vowed revenge.
Following the 1985 limited series Crisis on Infinite Earths, the अक्षर थी re-imagined as a Machiavellian industrialist and white-collar criminal, even briefly serving as President of the United States.
In recent years, various writers have revived Luthor 's mad scientist persona इससे the 1940s.
The character was ranked as the 8th Greatest विलेन by जादूगर on its 100 Greatest Villains of All Time list.
IGN 's list of the शीर्ष 100 कॉमिक किताब खलनायक of सब Time ranked Luthor as # 4.
Luthor is also described as a `` megavillain '' by कॉमिक किताब आलोचक पीटर sanderson, एक of a few genre-crossing खलनायक जिनकी adventures लो प्लेस `` in a संसार in जिससे the ordinary laws of nature are slightly suspended '' ; characters such as Professor Moriarty, Count Dracula, Hannibal Lecter, Doctor Doom, and Darth Vader, also fit this description.
Martin Luther King, Jr. Day is a United States federal holiday marking the जन्मदिवस of रेव. dr. मार्टिन लूथर किंग, Jr.
It is observed on the third Monday of जनवरी प्रत्येक साल, जिससे is around the time of King 's birthday, January 15.
The floating holiday is similar to छुट्टियाँ नियत अंतर्गत the वर्दी सोमवार अवकाश अधिनियम, हालांकि the अधिनियम predated the establishment of Martin Luther King, Jr. Day by 15 years.
King was the chief spokesman for nonviolent सक्रियता in the सिविल अधिकारों गति, जिससे सफलतापूर्वक protested racial discrimination in federal and state law.
The campaign for a federal holiday in किंग 's सम्मान began जल्द after his assassination in 1968.
Ronald Reagan signed the holiday into law in 1983, and it थी पहला observed on जनवरी 20, 1986.
At first, some राज्य resisted observing the अवकाश as ऐसे, giving it alternative names or combining it with other holidays.
It was officially observed in सब 50 राज्य लिये the first time in 2000.
The कैमरा फोन समाधान allows instant sharing of pictures.
As it 's automatic and instant, the user does not have to उपयोग a केबल or removable मीडिया to connect to a personal computer.
A camera phone is a मोबाईल फोन जिससे is able to capture still photographs ( and usually video ).
Since early in the 21st century the बहुमत of मोबाईल phones in use are camera phones.
Most camera phones हैं simpler than पृथक digital cameras.
Their usual fixed focus lenses and smaller sensors सीमा उनके प्रदर्शन in ग़रीब lighting.
Lacking a physical शटर, सबसे have a long shutter lag.
Flash, where उपस्थित, is usually weak.
Optical जूम और तिपाई screws are rare.
Some also कमी a usb कनेक्शन, removable मेमोरी card, or other way of transferring their pictures more quickly than by the phone 's inherent communication feature.
Some of the more expensive camera phones have only a few of these technical disadvantages, जिससे लागू सबसे acutely in कम लाइट शर्तें and in any case have not inhibited their widespread use.
Most model lines improve in ये regards every year or two.
Some, such as the Droid Incredible only have a menu choice to start an अनुप्रयोग कार्यक्रम to activate the कैमरा.
Others, such as the BlackBerry Storm 2, Droid X, मोटोरोला v980 और नोकिया 5800 भी have a separate camera button for quickness and convenience.
Windows Phones can be configured to operate as a कैमरा even if the phone is asleep.
Some camera phones are designed to resemble पृथक low-end डिजिटल कॉम्पैक्ट कैमरे in रूप और to कुछ extent in सुविधाएँ और picture quality, and are branded as both mobile phones and cameras, including certain Sony phones.
The principal advantages of कैमरा फोन हैं cost and compactness ; indeed for a user who carries a mobile phone anyway, the additional size and cost are negligible.
Smartphones that are camera phones may run mobile applications to add सामर्थ्य ऐसे as geotagging और चित्र stitching.
A few high end phones can use their टच स्क्रीन to सीधा उनके कैमरा to फ़ोकस on a particular object in the field of view, giving even an inexperienced user a degree of focus control exceeded only by seasoned photographers using manual focus.
`` Whatever Happened to the Man of Tomorrow ? '' is a 1986 कॉमिक किताब स्टोरी featuring the dc कॉमिक्स character of Superman.
Written by Alan Moore with help from long-time, and soon to be retiring, Superman editor, Julius Schwartz, the story was published in दो भाग, शुरूआत in सुपरमैन # 423 और समाप्ति in कार्रवाई कॉमिक्स # 583, दोनो प्रकाशित in सितंबर 1986.
The story was drawn by long-time artist Curt Swan, in उसके फाइनल प्रमुख योगदान to the सुपरमैन शीर्षक, और थी inked by George Pérez in the issue of Superman and Kurt Schaffenberger in the issue of Action Comics.
The story was an imaginary tale which told the final story of the Silver Age Superman and his long history, which was being rebooted following the events of संकट on अनन्त earths, पहले उसके आधुनिक परिचय in the John Byrne series, The Man of Steel.
Moore wanted his plot to honor the long इतिहास of the अक्षर और to serve as a complete conclusion to his mythology.
The story is a फ़्रेम स्टोरी नियत टेन सालो बाद सुपरमैन थी पिछला देखी, जहाँ Lois Lane recounts the tale of the end of Superman 's career to a reporter from the Daily Planet.
Her story includes numerous violent attacks against Superman by his दुश्मनों, the पब्लिक रहस्योद्घाटन of उसके रहस्य पहचान of Clark Kent and a number of deaths of those closest to him.
The story रै महरूम cited as एक of the बेहतरीन कहानियां of the अक्षर of Superman, and critics and audiences frequently choose it as one of the most memorable comics ever published.
It is used as an example of कैसा to बंद the long-time continuity of a comic book character.
The story 's legacy has endured with समान कहानियां लिखा as श्रद्धांजलि to it.
The title is a reference to one of the nicknames of Superman as the Man of कल, और थी प्रयुक्त in the शीर्षक of another सुपरमैन.
The Bugatti Veyron EB 16.4 is a mid-engined grand touring car, designed and developed by the Volkswagen Group and manufactured in molsheim, फ़्रांस by bugatti Automobiles S.A.S.
The Super Sport version of the Veyron is the fastest street-legal production car in the संसार, साथ a शीर्ष गति of.
The असली संस्करण रै a top speed of.
It was named Car of the Decade ( 2000–2009 ) by the बीबीसी टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम Top Gear.
The standard Veyron won Top Gears Best Car Driven All साल पुरस्कार in 2005.
On 6 April 2013, Bugatti set the record for the तीव्रतम roadster in the world with the Veyron Grand Sport Vitesse, reaching on average a top speed of.
the veyron 's मुख्य पंक्तियां थी hartmut warkuss, और the exterior थी designed by jozef kabaň of Volkswagen, with much of the engineering work being conducted under the guidance of engineering chief Wolfgang Schreiber.
A number of special विसंगतियाँ have महरूम उत्पादित.

The institution of the Eucharist has been a key theme in the depictions of the Last Supper in ईसाई आर्ट, as in इस 16th-century जुआन de juanes painting.
`` at the पिछला भोजन, on the रात्रि he was betrayed, our Savior instituted the Eucharistic sacrifice of his Body and Blood. ''
( Catechism of the कैथोलिक Church 1323 )
Eucharist in the Catholic Church refers to both the celebration of the Mass, that is, the Eucharist liturgy, and the bread and wine which after the consecration are transubstantiated ( changed in substance ) into the body and blood of Jesus Christ, Lord और परमेश्वर, a घोषणा प्रतिपादित by the परिषद of ट्रेंट साथ an anathema विरूद्ध anyone जो अस्वीकृत इस.
Blessed sacrament is a devotional पद प्रयुक्त in the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर to refer to the eucharistic species ( the Body and Blood of Christ ).

a छोटी स्टोरी is a ब्रैड work of literature, usually written in narrative prose.
Emerging from earlier oral storytelling traditions in the 17th century, the short story has grown to encompass a देह of कार्य so विविध as to defy आसान characterization.
At its most prototypical the short story features a small cast of named characters, and focuses on a self-contained घटना with the intent of evoking a `` single effect '' or mood.
In so doing, छोटी कहानियां मेक उपयोग of प्लाट, अनुनाद, और अन्य डायनेमिक components to a far greater degree than is typical of an anecdote, yet to a far lesser degree than a novel.
While the short story is largely पृथक इससे the अनोखा, लेखक of दोनो generally draw from a common pool of literary techniques.
छोटी कहानियां have no set length.
In terms of शब्द गिनती वहीँ is no official demarcation between an anecdote, a short story, and a novel.
Rather, the form 's parameters are given by the rhetorical and practical context in which a given story is produced and considered, so कि कया constitutes a छोटी स्टोरी may differ between genres, countries, eras, and commentators.
Like the novel, the short story 's predominant shape reflects the मांगे of the उपलब्धियाँ बाज़ार लिये प्रकाशन, और the एवोल्यूशन of the रूप seems closely tied to the evolution of the publishing industry and the submission guidelines of its constituent houses.
The short story has been considered both an apprenticeship form preceding more lengthy works, and a crafted रूप in इसके अपना सही, एकत्रित साथ in किताबे of समान लंबाई, दाम, और distribution as novels.
Short story writers may define उनके works as भाग of the कलाकारी and personal expression of the form.
They may also attempt to resist categorization by genre and fixed form.

The raccoon (, Procyon lotor ), sometimes spelled racoon, भी ज्ञात as the आम raccoon, उत्तर American raccoon, northern raccoon and colloquially as coon, is a medium-sized mammal native to North America.
The raccoon is the largest of the procyonid परिवार, having a देह लंबाई of and a body weight of.
Its grayish coat mostly consists of घना underfur which insulates against cold weather.
Two of the raccoon 's most distinctive features are its extremely dexterous front paws and its फेशियल मुखौटा, जिससे हैं विषयवस्तु in the mythology of अनेक Native American tribes.
Raccoons are noted for their intelligence, with studies प्रर्दशित कि वे हैं समर्थ to याद the समाधान to कार्य लिये up to three years.
The diet of the omnivorous raccoon, which is प्रायः nocturnal, consists of परिचय 40 % invertebrates, 33 % plant foods, and 27 % vertebrates.
The original habitats of the raccoon हैं पतझड़ी और मिश्रित वनों, लकिन due to उनके adaptability वे have विस्तारित उनके दायरा to mountainous areas, coastal marshes, and urban areas, where some homeowners consider them to be pests.
As a परिणाम of escapes और deliberate introductions in the mid-20th century, raccoons are now also distributed across the European mainland, the Caucasus region and Japan.
Though previously thought to be solitary, there is now प्रमाण कि raccoons engage in gender-specific social behavior.
Related females often share a common area, while unrelated males live together in groups of up to four animals to maintain their positions against foreign males during the mating season, and अन्य संभावित आक्रमणकारियों.
Home दायरा आकार vary anywhere इससे 3 हेक्टेयर ( 7 acres ) for females in cities to 50 km2 ( 20 sq mi ) for males in prairies.
After a gestation period of about 65 days, दो to पाँच यंग, ज्ञात as `` kits '', are born in spring.
The kits are subsequently उठाया by उनके माँ until dispersion in late fall.
Although captive raccoons have been known to live over 20 years, their औसत जीवन प्रत्याशा in the जंगली is तभी 1.8 to 3.1 सालो.
In many areas, शिकार और vehicular injury are the two most common causes of death.
The 2010 Haiti earthquake was a अनर्थकारी परिमाण 7.0 mw भूकंप, साथ an उपरिकेंद्र near the town of Léogâne ( Ouest Department ), approximately west of Port-au-Prince, Haiti 's capital.
The earthquake occurred at 16:53 local time ( 21:53 utc ) on Tuesday, 12 January 2010.
By 24 January, at least 52 aftershocks measuring 4.5 or वृहद था been recorded.
An estimated three million people were प्रभावित by the भूकंप.
The highest reliable death count was अनुमानित at 220,000.
Haitian government estimates were उच्चतर.
The government of Haiti estimated that 250,000 residences and 30,000 वाणिज्यिक इमारतें था collapsed or यहूद severely damaged.
The भूकंप caused प्रमुख क्षति in port-au-prince, Jacmel and other settlements in the region.
Many notable landmark buildings were significantly damaged or destroyed, including the Presidential Palace, the National सभा भवन, the port-au-prince गिरजाघर, और the प्रमुख कारावास.
Among those killed were Archbishop of port-au-prince जोसेफ सर्ज miot, और opposition leader Micha Gaillard.
The headquarters of the United Nations Stabilization Mission in Haiti ( MINUSTAH ), located in the capital, collapsed, killing many, including the मिशन 's मुख्य, hédi annabi.
Many countries responded to appeals for humanitarian सहायता, pledging निधि और dispatching बचाव और medical teams, engineers and support personnel.
Communication systems, air, land, and समुद्र हस्तांतरण सुविधाएं, अस्पताल, और विद्युत संजाल था महरूम क्षतिग्रस्त by the भूकंप, जिससे hampered बचाव और सहायता प्रयत्न ; confusion over who was in charge, air traffic congestion, and problems with prioritisation of flights further complicated early relief work.
Port-au-Prince 's morgues were overwhelmed with tens of हज़ारों of लाशें.
These था to be buried in mass graves.
as छुटकारा tailed बंद, आपूर्तियाँ, medical care and sanitation became priorities.
Delays in aid distribution led to angry appeals from aid workers and survivors, and looting और विरल हिंसा यहूद observed.
On 22 January the United Nations noted that the emergency phase of the relief operation was drawing to a बंद, और on the following दिन the haitian सरकारी officially called off the search for survivors.
Mister Ed is a fictional talking घोड़ा, originally appearing in छोटी कहानियां by वाल्टर R. ब्रूक्स, और बाद in an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न हालात comedy produced by Filmways that first aired in syndication from January 5 to July 2, 1961, and then on CBS from October 1, 1961 to February 6, 1966.
The stars of the show were Mister Ed, a palomino horse who could `` talk '', played by gelding Bamboo Harvester and voiced by former Western star Allan Lane ( who went uncredited for the entire length of the series ), and his owner, an eccentric और enormously klutzy, yet दोस्ताना, वास्तु named Wilbur Post ( Alan Young ).
much of the कार्यक्रम 's ह्यूमर stemmed इससे the फैक्ट Mister Ed would speak only to Wilbur, as well as Ed 's notoriety as a troublemaker.
Other running jokes centered on Wilbur 's अक्षर होने a विशाल klutz और inadvertently causing harm to himself or others.
According to the show 's producer, Arthur Lubin, Young was चुनी as the सीसे अक्षर क्युकी he `` just seemed like the sort of guy a horse would talk to ''.
Lubin, a friend of Mae West, scored a coup by persuading the screen प्रतीक to अतिथि स्टार in एक एपीसोड.
In the United States, reruns aired on Nick at Nite इससे कूच 3, 1986, to फ़रवरी 1, 1993.
Sister station TV जमीन भी reran the दिखाएँ इससे 1996–98 और again from 2003-06.
The series is फिलहाल ब्रॉडकास्ट प्रत्येक morning on इस tv, साथ साथ Highway Patrol, and The Patty Duke Show.
It is भी फिलहाल ब्रॉडकास्ट on Hallmark Movie Channel.
As of January 1, 2011, the first two seasons of the दिखाएँ हैं उपलब्धियाँ on Hulu.
The Rapture is a term in Christian eschatology which refers to the `` being caught up '' discussed in 1 thessalonians 4:17, जब the `` मुर्दे in Christ '' and `` we who are alive and remain '' will be `` caught up in the clouds '' to meet `` the Lord in the air ''.
The term `` rapture '' is प्रयुक्त in at least two senses.
In the pre-tribulation view, a समूह of लोगों होगा be बाएँ पीछे on धरती after another group literally leaves `` to meet the Lord in the air. ''
This is now the most common use of the term, especially among fundamentalist ईसाइयों और in the संयुक्त राज्य.
The other, older use of the term `` Rapture '' is simply as a synonym for the final resurrection generally, बगैर a विश्वास कि a समूह of लोगों is बाएँ पीछे on earth for an extended Tribulation period after the events of 1 Thessalonians 4:17.
This भेद is महत्वपूर्ण as कुछ प्रकार of christianity never refer to `` the rapture '' in religious education, but might use the older and more general sense of the word `` rapture '' in referring to what happens during the final resurrection.
There are many views among ईसाइयों regarding the समय of Christ 's return ( including whether it will occur in one event or two ), and various views regarding the destination of the aerial gathering described in 1 Thessalonians 4.
denominations ऐसे as रोमन catholics, Orthodox Christians, Lutheran Christians, and Reformed Christians believe in a rapture only in the sense of a general final resurrection, when Christ returns a single time.
They do not believe that a समूह of लोगों is बाएँ पीछे on earth for an extended Tribulation period after the events of 1 Thessalonians 4:17.
pre-tribulation rapture धर्मशास्त्र थी विकसित in the 1830s by जॉन Nelson Darby and the Plymouth Brethren, and popularized in the United States in the early 20th century by the wide circulation of the Scofield Reference Bible.
