The Philistine cities of Gaza, Ashdod, Ashkelon, ekron, और Gath
The Philistines (,,, or ;, Plištim ), Pleshet or Peleset, were a people who as part of the समुद्र peoples appeared in the दक्षिणी तटीय क्षेत्रफल of canaan at the शुरूआत of the Iron Age ( circa 1175 BC ), most probably from the Aegean region.
According to the Bible, they ruled the five city-states ( the `` Philistine Pentapolis '' ) of Gaza, Ashkelon, Ashdod, ekron और gath, इससे wadi गाजा in the south to the Yarqon River in the north, but with no fixed border to the east.
The बाइबल paints उन्हें as the किंगडम of इसराईल 's most dangerous enemy.
Originating somewhere in the Aegean, their population was around 25,000 in the 12th century BC, rising to a peak of 30,000 in the 11th सदी bc, of जिससे the ईजियन तत्व थी नहीं अधिक than हाफ the कुल, और शायद much less.
Nothing is known for certain about the original language or languages of the philistines, however वे यहूद नहीं भाग of the Semitic Canaanite population.
There is some limited प्रमाण in पक्ष of the assumption कि the philistines यहूद indo-european-speakers either इससे Greece and/or Luwian speakers from the coast of Asia Minor.
Philistine-related words found in the बाइबल हैं नहीं सामीती, और can in कुछ मामले, साथ रिज़र्वेशन, be traced back to Proto-Indo-European roots.
By the beginning of the 1st Millennium BCE they had adopted the सामान्य canaanite भाषा of the region.
The Armed Services वोकेशनल योग्यता बैटरी ( asvab ) is a अनेक चुनाव परीक्षण, administered by the संयुक्त States Military Entrance Processing Command, used to determine qualification for enlistment in the United States armed forces.
It is often offered to American high school students when वे हैं in the 10th, 11th और 12th ग्रेड, हालांकि anyone योग्य for enlistment may take it.
Although the परीक्षण is administered by the सैन्य, it is not ( and never has been ) a requirement that a test-taker with a qualifying score enlist in the armed forces.
In financial accounting, a balance sheet or बयान of वित्तीय स्थिति is a सारांश of the वित्तीय balances of a sole proprietorship, a business partnership, a corporation or other business organization, such as an LLC or an LLP.
Assets, देनदारी और स्वामित्व इक्विटी हैं सूचीबद्ध as of a specific date, such as the end of its financial year.
A balance sheet is often वर्णित as a `` स्नैपशॉट of a कम्पनी 's financial condition ''.
Of the four basic financial कथन, the संतुलन चादर is the तभी बयान जिससे applies to a single point in time of a business ' calendar year.
A standard company balance sheet has तीन भाग : एसेट, देनदारी और ownership equity.
The main categories of एसेट हैं प्रायः सूचीबद्ध first, and typically in order of liquidity.
Assets are followed by the देनदारी.
The difference between the assets and the liabilities is ज्ञात as इक्विटी or the जाल एसेट or the जाल लायक or पूंजी of the कम्पनी and according to the accounting equation, net worth must equal assets minus liabilities.
Another way to dekh at the वही समीकरण is कि assets equals liabilities plus owner 's equity.
Looking at the equation in this way shows how एसेट यहूद financed : either by उधार धन ( देयता ) or by using the owner 's money ( owner 's equity ).
संतुलन चादरें हैं प्रायः प्रस्तुत साथ एसेट in एक खण्ड और देनदारी और जाल लायक in the अन्य खण्ड साथ the दो भाग `` balancing. ''
A business operating entirely in cash can measure its profits by withdrawing the संपूर्ण बैंको संतुलन at the end of the period, plus any cash in hand.
However, अनेक व्यवसायों हैं नहीं सशुल्क तत्काल ; they build up inventories of goods and they acquire buildings and equipment.
In अन्य शब्द : व्यवसायों have एसेट और so वे can not, even if they want to, immediately turn these into cash at the end of each period.
Often, these businesses owe money to suppliers and to tax authorities, and the proprietors do not withdraw सब उनके असली पूंजी और profits at the समाप्त of each period.
In other शब्द व्यवसायों also have liabilities.
.17 Hornady Magnum Rimfire, commonly known as the.17 HMR, is a rimfire rifle cartridge developed by the ammunition कम्पनी hornady in 2002.
It descended from the.22 Magnum by necking down the.22 मैग्नम मामला to लो a.17 कैलिबर ( 4.5 mm ) गोली, and it is more costly to shoot than traditional.22 caliber rimfire cartridges.
commonly loaded साथ a 17 अनाज ( 1.1 g ) bullet, it can deliver muzzle velocities in excess of 2550 ft/s ( 775 m/s ).
The Schaumburg Flyers were a professional बेसबॉल टोली आधारित in schaumburg, इलिनोइस, in the संयुक्त States.
The Flyers were to be a charter member of the North American League, which is नहीं संबद्ध साथ प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल, however, the team folded in March 2011, before they began play in the NAL.
From the 1999 season to the 2010 season, the Flyers played their घर खेल at alexian फ़ील्ड, निकट the एल्गिन O'Hare Expressway.
The team formerly निभाई in थंडर खाड़ी, ओंटारियो, जहाँ वे यहूद ज्ञात as the Thunder Bay Whiskey Jacks.
The टोली थी originally a member of the Northern League from 1993 to 2010.
On July 27, 2009, the Flyers played मेजबान to बैटल of the लिंगों ii, जिससे pitted the flyers against the National Pro Fastpitch Softball Champions, the Chicago Bandits.
Played by आधिकारिक सॉफ्टबॉल नियम, the खेल थी देखी by an overflow record crowd of 8,918, and was won by the Bandits 4-2.
in 1999, the flyers hired their first manager, Ron Kittle.
Kittle is best known for his playing days with the Chicago White sox, और former Chicago Cubs and White Sox player Greg Hibbard was the pitching coach.
During the early years of the franchise, Kittle did a series of TV commercials to promote the team, using the gimmick `` ma kittle. '' जहाँ he निभाई दोनो himself and his `` Ma. ''
The ads were successful at sparking some initial ब्याज in the टोली as the Flyers hoped to steal away fans from the nearby Kane County Cougars.
The ad mimicked the highly कामयाब converse विज्ञापन जहाँ Larry Johnson starred as both himself and `` Gramama. ''
at the समाप्त of the 2001 ऋतु, however, Kittle resigned from his managerial position, and Jim Boynewicz was hired to replace him.
In 2004, the Flyers made it to the Northern League चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी विरूद्ध the st. पॉल संतो.
Despite leading the five-game series 2-1, Schaumburg eventually lost the series.
In Game 5, Flyers relief pitcher Lyle Prempas allowed a खेल जीतना ग्रैंड स्लैम by st. पॉल infielder मार्क Mirizzi in the ninth inning.
The Flyers appeared in the Northern League Playoffs four times ( 1999, 2003, 2004, 2006 ) लकिन never जीती the championship.
Some प्रसिद्ध खिलाड़ी जो निभाई लिये the flyers यहूद पूर्व ओकलैंड a 's outfielder Ozzie Canseco and former Chicago Cubs outfielder Dwight Smith.
Rachel Hannah Weisz ( / vice / ; born 7 March 1970 ) is an अंग्रेज़ी फिल्मी और थिएटर अभिनेत्री and former fashion model.
Weisz began her acting career at Trinity Hall, Cambridge in the early 1990s, then started working in टेलीविज़न, appearing in इंस्पेक्टर मोर्स, the अंग्रेजों mini-series स्कारलेट और ब्लैक, and the television film Advocates II.
She made her film début in the film Death Machine ( 1994 ), but उसके भेदन भूमिका आए in the फिल्मी कड़ी प्रतिक्रिया ( 1996 ), leading to a high-profile role as Evelyn Carnahan-O'Connell in the films The Mummy ( 1999 ) and The Mummy Returns ( 2001 ).
Other notable films featuring Weisz are Enemy at the Gates, About a Boy, Constantine, The Fountain and The Constant Gardener, for which वो प्राप्त an अकादमी पुरस्कार, a सुनहरी ग्लोब और a स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं ' गिल्ड पुरस्कार for her supporting role as Tessa Quayle.
वो रै महरूम labelled an `` अंग्रेज़ी rose '' since her minor role in Stealing Beauty ( 1996 ).
Weisz भी works in theatre.
Her stage breakthrough was the 1994 पुनरुद्धार of noël कायर 's खेल Design for Living, which earned her the London Critics Circle Award for the most promising newcomer.
Weisz 's performances also include the 1999 Donmar गोदाम उत्पादन of टेनेसी विलियम्स ' एकाएक, पिछला गर्मियाँ, और their 2009 revival of A Streetcar Named Desire.
Her portrayal of Blanche DuBois in the latter खेल अर्जित उसके the आलोचकों ' Circle Theatre Award for Best Actress.
She has recently played Evanora in oz the ग्रेट and Powerful.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), भी ज्ञात as the युद्ध between the राज्य or बस the सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ), थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of गुलामी, especially the extension of slavery into the western territories.
Foreign powers किया नहीं intervene.
After four years of bloody combat कि बाएँ over 600,000 सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना, the Confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential election, Republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into संयुक्त राज्य ' territories.
lincoln जीती, लकिन पहले उसके उद्घाटन on March 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
outgoing लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural पता घोषित उसके प्रशासन would not initiate civil war.
Eight remaining स्लेव राज्य जारी to reject calls for secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace सम्मेलन विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह, and both sides prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना the नई confederate States of America.
hostilities began on अप्रैल 12, 1861, जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon Fort Sumter, a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन, चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon controlled the border राज्य और स्थापित a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy.
the पूर्वी थिएटर was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln जारी the emancipation उदघोषणा, which made ending slavery a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy, तब much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना, और the संघ at vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the बैटल of Gettysburg.
पश्चिमी सफलताओं led to ulysses S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the समुद्र, destroying confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions, and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the overland अभियान towards रिचमंड, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, leading to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at Appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
The American Civil War was one of the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक युद्धों.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, और mass-produced हथियार were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, banks, परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American history, resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined क्रमांक of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years old, and 30 प्रतिशत of सब दक्षिणी white males aged 18–40.
Potato bread is a रूप of ब्रैड in जिससे आलू replaces a portion of the regular wheat flour.
It is cooked in a variety of methods, including by baking it on a hot तवे or पण, or in an oven.
It may be leavened or unleavened, and may have a किस्में of अन्य संघटक baked into it.
The ratio of potato to wheat flour varies significantly इससे रेसिपी to रेसिपी, साथ कुछ व्यंजनों having a majority of potato, and others having a majority of wheat flour.
Some recipes call for mashed आलू, साथ अन्य calling for dehydrated potato flakes.
It is available as a commercial product in many countries, with समान विसंगतियाँ in संघटक, cooking method, and other variables.
The Pacific Time Zone observes मानक समय by subtracting आठ घंटों इससे Coordinated Universal Time ( ).
The clock time in this zone is based on the औसत सौर समय of the 120th मध्याह्न west of the Greenwich Observatory.
During daylight छायांकन समय, its time offset is.
In the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा, इस समय मण्डल is generically called Pacific Time ( PT ).
Specifically, it is Pacific Standard Time ( PST ) when observing मानक समय ( शीत ), और प्रशांत daylight समय ( पीडीटी ) जब observing daylight saving time ( summer ).
Most of Canada उपयोग daylight छायांकन समय.
In मैक्सिको the utc−8 समय मण्डल is ज्ञात as the उत्तरपश्चिम मण्डल, जिससे is synchronized with the U.S. PDT daylight saving schedule.
The largest city in the Pacific Time Zone is लॉस एंजिल्स in कैलिफ़ोर्निया इससे यूएसए ; the city 's metropolitan area is the largest in the zone.
The zone is one hour ahead of the Alaska Time Zone, one hour behind the पहाड़ समय मण्डल और three hours behind the Eastern Time Zone.
Stereo 8, commonly known as the eight-track cartridge, eight-track tape, or simply eight-track, is a चुम्बकीय टेप ध्वनि रिकॉर्डिंग प्रौद्योगिकी.
It was popular in the United States from the mid-1960s through to the जल्दी 1980s, but was relatively unknown in many European countries.
It was, however, बहुत लोकप्रिय in the United Kingdom during this period.
Stereo 8 थी निर्मित in 1964 by a consortium led by विधेयक lear of lear जेट निगम, साथ with Ampex, Ford Motor Company, General Motors, Motorola, and RCA Victor Records ( RCA ).
It was a further विकास of the समान stereo-pak four-track cartridge created by Earl `` Madman '' Muntz.
A later quadraphonic version of the format was घोषित by आरसीए in अप्रैल 1970 और पहला known as Quad-8, then later changed to just Q8.
Ramesses II ( 1303 BC – July or August 1213 BC ; Egyptian :, alternatively transcribed as Rameses and Ramses or ), referred to as रामेसेस the ग्रेट, थी the तीसरा मिश्र pharaoh ( reigned 1279 bc – 1213 bc ) of the उन्नीसवीं राजवंश.
He is प्रायः regarded as the greatest, most celebrated, and most powerful pharaoh of the Egyptian Empire.
His successors और बाद उन्होंने called him the `` Great Ancestor. ''
Ramesses II led several military expeditions into the levant, re-asserting मिश्र control over Canaan.
He also led expeditions to the south, into Nubia, commemorated in inscriptions at beit el-wali and Gerf Hussein.
At age चौदह, रामेसेस थी नियुक्त Prince Regent by his father Seti I.
He is believed to have taken the throne in his late teens and is known to have ruled Egypt from 1279 bc to 1213 bc लिये 66 सालो और 2 महीने, according to both Manetho and Egypt 's contemporary historical records.
He was एकबार कहा to have जिया to be 99 सालो बूढ़ा, लकिन it is more likely that he died in his 90th or 91st year.
If he became Pharaoh in 1279 BC as most Egyptologists today believe, he होता have assumed the सिंहासन on may 31, 1279 BC, based on his known accession date of III Shemu day 27.
Ramesses II celebrated an unprecedented 14 sed festivals ( the पहला आयोजित बाद तीस सालो of a pharaoh 's शासनकाल, और तब प्रत्येक तीन सालो ) during his reign—more than any other pharaoh.
On his death, he was buried in a tomb in the Valley of the Kings ; his देह थी बाद स्थानांतरित to a royal संचय जहाँ it थी खोजा in 1881, and is now on display in the Cairo Museum.
The early part of उसके शासनकाल थी केन्द्रित on भवन cities, temples and monuments.
He established the city of pi-ramesses in the nile डेल्टा as उसके नई पूंजी और प्रमुख आधार for his campaigns in Syria.
This city was built on the remains of the city of Avaris, the पूंजी of the हिक्सोस जब वे took over, और थी the स्थान of the main Temple of Set.
He is also known as Ozymandias in the Greek sources, इससे a लिप्यन्तरण into यूनानी of a भाग of रामेसेस 's सिंहासन नाम,, `` ra 's mighty truth, chosen of Ra ''.
The Texas Rangers are a पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली located in the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex, based in Arlington, Texas.
The Rangers franchise is currently a member of the Western Division of प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल 's अमरीकी League.
Since, the Rangers have निभाई in रेंजरों ballpark in आर्लिंगटन in Arlington, Texas.
The team 's name is borrowed from the famous law प्रवर्तन एजेंसी of the वही नाम.
The franchise was established in 1961 by the name of the Washington Senators, an expansion team awarded to Washington, D.C., after the city 's first ballclub, the original Washington सीनेटरों, स्थानांतरित to मिनेसोटा and became the Twins.
After the season, the new सीनेटरों स्थानांतरित to आर्लिंगटन, टेक्सास, and debuted as the Rangers the following spring.
The Texas Rangers Baseball Club has made six appearances in the MLB postseason, all following प्रभाग championships, in 1996, 1998, 1999, 2010, 2011 and 2012.
In 2010, the Rangers advanced past the Division Series for the पहला समय, defeating the tampa खाड़ी Rays.
Texas then brought home their first American League Pennant after धड़कन the नई यॉर्क यांकीज़ in six games.
In the 2010 World Series, the franchise 's first, the रेंजरों गिरी to the सैन फ्रांसिस्को दिग्गज in पाँच games.
Their lone victory made them the first Texas team to win a World Series game, the ह्यूस्टन एस्टर्स having महरूम swept in उनके 2005 संसार श्रेणी रूप.
They repeated as American League champions the following साल, तब खोया the 2011 संसार श्रेणी to the st. लुई Cardinals in seven games.
Gaius Julius Caesar (, July 100 BC – 15 कूच 44 bc ) थी a रोमन सामान्य, statesman, Consul and notable author of Latin prose.
He played a critical role in the events कि led to the निधन of the रोमन गणतंत्र और the rise of the Roman Empire.
In 60 BC, Caesar, Crassus and Pompey formed a political गठबंधन कि थी to dominate रोमन politics for several years.
Their attempts to amass power through populist tactics were opposed by the conservative elite भीतर the रोमन सीनेट, among उन्हें केटो the younger साथ the बारंबार support of Cicero.
Caesar 's conquest of gaul, समाप्त by 51 bc, विस्तारित Rome 's territory to the English Channel and the Rhine.
Caesar became the पहला रोमन सामान्य to क्रॉस दोनो जब he निर्मित a सेतु आरपार the Rhine and conducted the first invasion of Britain.
These achievements granted him unmatched military power and threatened to eclipse the खड़ा of pompey, जो था realigned खुद with the Senate after the death of Crassus in 53 BC.
With the Gallic Wars concluded, the Senate ordered सीज़र to lay bas his military command and return to Rome.
Caesar refused, and marked his defiance in 49 BC by क्रासिंग the rubicon साथ a लीजन, leaving उसके प्रांत और illegally प्रवेश Roman territory under arms.
सिविल युद्ध resulted, इससे जिससे he उभरा as the unrivaled leader of Rome.
After assuming control of government, Caesar began a program of social and governmental reforms, सहित the सृष्टि of the जूलियन पंचांग.
He केंद्रीकृत the अफसरशाही of the Republic and was eventually proclaimed `` dictator in perpetuity ''.
But the underlying political conflicts had not been resolved, and on the Ides of March ( 15 कूच ) 44 bc, सीज़र थी assassinated by a समूह of सीनेटरों led by मार्कस junius Brutus.
A new series of सिविल युद्धों broke आउट, and the constitutional government of the Republic was never restored.
Caesar 's adopted heir octavian, बाद ज्ञात as Augustus, rose to sole power, and the era of the Roman Empire began.
Much of Caesar 's life is known from his own accounts of his सैन्य अभियान, और इससे अन्य समकालीन स्त्रोत, मुख्यतः the अक्षर और भाषणों of सिसरो and the historical writings of Sallust.
The later biographies of सीज़र by suetonius और प्लूटार्क हैं भी प्रमुख स्त्रोत.
Caesar is deemed to be one of the greatest सैन्य कमांडरों of history.
Linguistic map of सीरियल, कैमरून, and Benin.

There हैं सैंकड़ों of भाषाएं spoken in Nigeria.
The major भाषाएं हैं योरूबा, हौसा, इग्बो, ईदो, Fulfulde, Kanuri, and Ibibio.
The आधिकारिक भाषा of सीरियल, अंग्रेज़ी, the पूर्व औपनिवेशिक भाषा, was chosen to facilitate the cultural and linguistic unity of the country.
English, however, remains an विशेष बचाना of the देश 's शहरी elite, and is not widely spoken in rural areas, which comprise three quarters of the countries population.
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity is a microcosm of Africa as a whole, encompassing three major African languages परिवारों : afroasiatic, nilo-saharan, और niger–congo.
Nigeria also has several as-yet unclassified languages, such as Cen Tuum, which may represent a relic of an भी वृहद विविधता prior to the स्प्रेड of the वर्तमान language families.
Daucus carota ( common names include wild carrot, ( UK ) bird 's nest, bishop 's lace, and Queen Anne 's lace ( North America ) ) is a flowering plant in the family Apiaceae, native to temperate regions of यूरोपीय, दक्षिणपश्चिम Asia and naturalised to North America and Australia.
Domesticated गाजर हैं cultivars of a subspecies, Daucus carota subsp. sativus.
In the United States, the title of federal judge usually means a न्यायधीश नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य और पुष्टि by the संयुक्त States Senate pursuant to the Appointments Clause in Article II of the United States Constitution.
In addition to the Supreme Court of the United राज्य, जिनकी अस्तित्व और कुछ पहलुओं of जिनकी क्षेत्राधिकार हैं परे the संवैधानिक power of Congress to alter, acts of Congress have established 13 courts of appeals ( also called `` circuit courts '' ) with appellate jurisdiction over different regions of the United States, and 94 United States district courts.
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a federal judge ; such positions include the Chief Justice and Associate Justices of the Supreme Court, Circuit न्यायाधीशों of the न्यायालयों of appeals, और ज़िला न्यायाधीशों of the संयुक्त राज्य ज़िला न्यायालयों.
All of these judges described thus far are referred to sometimes as `` Article III judges '' क्युकी वे कसरत the न्यायिक शक्ति vested in the न्यायिक शाखा of the federal government by Article III of the U.S. Constitution.
In जोड, न्यायाधीशों of the अदालत of अंतरराष्ट्रीय Trade exercise judicial power pursuant to Article III.
Other judges serving in the federal courts, including magistrate judges and bankruptcy judges, are also sometimes referred to as `` संघीय न्यायाधीशों '' ; however, वे हैं neither नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष nor पुष्टि by the सीनेट, and their power derives from Article I instead.
See Article I and आलेख III tribunals.
Nelly Kim Furtado ( born December 2, 1978 ) is a कनाडाई सिंगर, songwriter और actress.
She has sold 20 million albums worldwide and more 20 लाख singles, bringing उसके कुल बिक्री to over 40 लाख रिकॉर्ड around the world.
Furtado first gained fame with her debut album, वाह, नेल !
, which spawned two successful singles, `` I 'm जैसे a बर्ड `` और `` फेरे बंद the लाइट ``. ``
I 'm Like A Bird '' won a 2001 Juno Award for Single of the Year और a 2002 ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन मादा पॉप गायन Performance.
In 2003, फ़र्टाडो released लोकगीत, जिससे उत्पादित three international singles— `` Powerless ( Say What You Want ) ``, `` Try `` and `` Força ``.
Three years later she released ढीला, a विश्वव्यापी commercial success.
The album spawned four number-one hits : `` Promiscuous ``, `` Maneater ``, `` कह it सही `` और `` सब शुभ बाते ( Come to an End ) ``.
After a three-year ब्रेक, वो released her first full-length Spanish album, Mi Plan, and Furtado received a Latin Grammy for Best Female Pop Vocal Album.
In 2012, Furtado 's fourth English-language studio album, the स्पिरिट अविनाशी थी released.
Furtado 's work रै अर्जित उसके numerous पुरस्कार and accolades, including 2 Grammy Awards, 10 Juno Awards, 3 MuchMusic Video Awards and a star on Canada 's Walk of Fame.
जीव of the रात्रि is the tenth studio album by Kiss.
it is the बैंड 's पिछला एल्बम लिये कासाब्लांका रिकॉर्ड, the only label the group had ever recorded for at that point.
The album was dedicated to the memory of Casablanca संस्थापक और जल्दी चुंबन समर्थक neil bogart, जो था died of कर्कट दौरान the recording sessions.
It is also the band 's last album recorded with Ace Frehley credited as an official सदस्य ( जबतक 1998 's psycho सर्कस ), और इसके पहला एल्बम साथ vinnie विंसेंट as the initially uncredited lead guitarist ( Vincent would later be credited, but not featured pictorially on the cover, of 1985 's reissue of the album ).
Touch is a निर्णायक अर्थात् of receiving information.
This photo shows tactile markings identifying सीढ़ियाँ लिये visually impaired people.
The somatosensory system is a विविध संवेदी प्रणाली comprising the receptors और प्रसंस्करण केंद्रों to उपज the sensory modalities such as touch, temperature, proprioception ( body position ), and nociception ( pain ).
The sensory receptors cover the स्किन और epithelia, skeletal मांसपेशियां, हड्डियों और joints, आतंरिक organs, and the cardiovascular system.
While touch is considered one of the five traditional senses, the छाप of टच is formed इससे अनेक modalities.
In medicine, the colloquial पद `` टच '' is प्रायः replaced साथ `` दैहिक होश '' to बेहतर प्रतिबिंबित the किस्में of mechanisms involved.
Somatic senses are sometimes referred to as somesthetic senses, with the समझना कि somesthesis शामिल टच, proprioception और ( depending on usage ) also haptic perception.
The system प्रतिक्रियाएँ to विविध stimuli using अलग receptors : thermoreceptors, nociceptors, mechanoreceptors and chemoreceptors.
Transmission of सूचना इससे the receptors गुजरता via संवेदी nerves through tracts in the spinal cord and into the brain.
Processing primarily occurs in the प्राथमिक somatosensory क्षेत्रफल in the parietal lobe of the cerebral cortex.
The cortical homunculus was devised by वाइल्डर penfield.
At its simplest, the system works when activity in a sensory neuron is triggered by a specific stimulus such as ऊष्मा ; इस सिग्नल आखिरकार गुजरता to an area in the brain uniquely attributed to that area on the body—this allows the processed stimulus to be felt at the correct location.
The point-to-point mapping of the देह सतहों in the दिमाग is called a homunculus and is essential in the creation of a body image.
इस brain-surface ( `` cortical '' ) map is not immutable, however.
Dramatic shifts can occur in जवाब to स्ट्रोक or injury.
Magnolia is a large genus of about 210 flowering plant species in the subfamily magnolioideae of the परिवार magnoliaceae.
It is नामित बाद फ्रेंच botanist Pierre Magnol.
Magnolia is an प्राचीन genus.
Appearing पहले मधुमक्खियों किया, the पुष्प evolved to encourage pollination by beetles.
To avoid damage इससे pollinating भृंग, the carpels of Magnolia flowers are extremely tough.
Fossilised specimens of Magnolia acuminata have been found dating to 20 million years पहले, और of पौधे identifiably belonging to the magnoliaceae dating to 95 million years ago.
Another aspect of Magnolias that is considered to represent an ancestral state is that the flower bud is enclosed in a bract rather than in sepals ; the perianth भाग हैं undifferentiated और पुकारा tepals बल्कि than पृथक sepals and petals.
Magnolia shares the tepal characteristic with several other flowering plants near the base of the flowering plant lineage such as Amborella और nymphaea ( as खूब as साथ अनेक अधिक recently derived plants such as Lilium ).
The natural range of Magnolia species is a disjunct distribution, with a main centre in ईस्ट और southeast एशिया और a द्वितीयक केन्द्र in eastern North America, Central America, the West Indies, and some species in South America.
अंगूठा
`` White Christmas '' is an इरविंग बर्लिन सोंग reminiscing परिचय an old-fashioned Christmas setting.
According to the Guinness Book of World Records, the version sung by bing crosby is the best-selling सिंगल of सब समय, साथ अनुमानित बिक्री in excess of 50 लाख copies worldwide.
Accounts vary as to जब और जहाँ Berlin wrote the song.
One story is that he wrote it in 1940, in गरम la quinta, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, जबकि रहकर at the la quinta होटल, a frequent Hollywood retreat also favored by writer-producer Frank Capra, although the Arizona Biltmore also claims the song was written there.
He often stayed up all night writing — he told his सचिव, `` पकड़ें अपना कलम और लो bas इस song.
I just wrote the best song I 've कभी लिखा — हेक, i बस लिखा the बेहतरीन सोंग कि anybody 's ever written ! ''
Cross-country skiing ( or XC skiing ) is a form of ski touring in जिससे भागीदार propel themselves आरपार snow-covered terrain using skis and poles.
The activity is popular in many places with large snowfields, primarily उत्तरी यूरोपीय, कनाडा, and Alaska.
Cross-country skiing is part of the nordic स्कीइंग खेल परिवार, जिससे शामिल स्की कूद, nordic संयुक्त ( cross-country स्कीइंग और स्की कूद ), biathlon ( skiing and rifle marksmanship ) and ski-orienteering ( which includes map navigation along snow trails and tracks ).
Cross-country skiing is the modern style of स्कीइंग कि सबसे resembles प्रागैतिहासिक skiing, particularly when done in the backcountry.
It is also related to telemark स्कीइंग.
A use tax in United States is पूरक to बिक्री कर जिससे अर्थात्, if तुम ख़रीदे a Taxable product/services without paying any Sales tax to vendor, you owe use tax.
You must self assess use tax and pay it directly to the state where the उत्पाद यहूद खपत or सेवाएं were rendered.
Use tax typically is a tax on consumption but if you buy an item ( without paying sales tax ) and store it in your warehouse initially, उपयोग कर applies to कि स्थान जहाँ goods यहूद भंडारित.
Later on जब the फाइनल खपत takes प्लेस at कुछ अन्य स्थान, you are required to pay the differential of tax rate to the jurisdiction of ultimate place of consumption.
This really means that you do n't have to अदा दोनो बिक्री कर as खूब as उपयोग Tax on one transaction.
It is only one or the other that you are required to pay on purchase of taxable products/services.
If vendor does n't चार्ज कोई बिक्री कर on इसके चालान then it is the obligation of the buyer to self assess Use tax and pay it to the appropriate Jurisdication.
उपयोग कर is generally चार्ज at the same tax rate of Sales Tax but in some states the tax rate is different.
Use tax is also termed as `` खपत कर '' or `` Consumer Use Tax ''.
a उपयोग कर is a प्रकार of excise tax levied in the United States by numerous state governments.
It is assessed upon tangible personal property purchased by a resident of the assessing state for use, storage, or consumption in that state ( not लिये पुनर्विक्रय ), regardless of जहाँ the purchase took place.
If a resident of a state makes a purchase within his home state, full बिक्री कर is सशुल्क at the समय of the लेनदेन.
The use tax applies when a निवासी of the assessing राज्य purchases an मद कि is नहीं विषय to his home state 's sales tax.
Usually, this is due to out-of-state purchases, as well as ordering items through the mail, by phone, or over the अंतरजाल इससे अन्य राज्य.
The use tax is typically assessed at the वही रेट as the बिक्री कर कि होता have been owed ( if any ) had the same goods been purchased in the state of residence.
For example, a निवासी of मैसाचुसेट्स, साथ a 6.25 % `` बिक्री और उपयोग कर '' on निश्चित goods और सेवाएं, purchases non-exempt goods or services in New Hampshire for use, storage or other consumption in Massachusetts.
Under New Hampshire law, the New Hampshire vendor collects no बिक्री कर on the goods, लकिन the मैसाचुसेट्स purchaser/user जरूर स्टिल अदा 6.25 % of the बिक्री दाम सीधे to the विभाग of Revenue in Massachusetts as a use tax.
If the same goods are purchased in a US state that does collect sales tax for such goods at time of purchase, whatever कर यहूद सशुल्क by the क्रेता to कि राज्य can be deducted ( as a कर क्रेडिट ) इससे the 6.25 % owed लिये subsequent use, storage or consumption in Massachusetts.
With few अपवाद, no राज्य 's विक्रेता will charge the native state 's sales tax on goods shipped out of state, meaning all goods ordered from out-of-state are essentially free of sales tax.
The purchaser is therefore जरूरी to घोषित और अदा the उपयोग कर to उसके घर राज्य on these ordered goods.
The assessing jurisdiction may make the use कर देय annually, लकिन कुछ राज्य आवश्यकता a मासिक payment.
For example, where a Vermont resident has not paid at least 6 % sales tax on property brought in for use in the state, Vermont law requires filing a tax return ( Form su-452 और भुगतान ) by the 20th दिन of the माह following non-exempt purchases to avoid a $ 50 लेट शुल्क, a 5 % दंड प्रति माह, to a maximum of 25 %, plus statutory interest on the unpaid tax and penalties.
Typical exemptions include purchases by charitable non-profit organizations or governmental agencies, purchases for resale in commerce, and purchases via `` कैज़ुअल बिक्री '' by individuals नहीं in the ordinary course of business.
Also note that there are thousands of tax jurisdictions in the u.S. और अनेक have ever-changing सूचियाँ of विशिष्ट types of goods and services that are not taxable.
As an illustration of the complexities : a 2006 Massachusetts law requires payment of tax on `` pre-written '' ( not custom ) software purchased and downloaded over the अंतरजाल लिये संस्थापना और उपयोग in मैसाचुसेट्स, regardless of where it originates.
However, the actual उपयोग of the वही तन्त्र डाउनलोड by a मैसाचुसेट्स resident to a server in another state remains a non-taxed `` service ''.
In contrast, Arkansas generally does not tax anything delivered over the Internet ( such as downloaded तन्त्र or म्यूज़िक ), मगर voip जिससे is specifically पारिभाषित as taxable `` दूरसंचार services ''.
Software ( pre-written or custom ) `` delivered thru a tangible medium '' ( i.e., on disk ) in अरकंसास is taxable भी if ordered ऑनलाइन, मगर `` कस्टम तन्त्र लिये a particular customer '' which is non-taxable `` programming services '' even if delivered on a disk.
In most cases, this complexity is part of the underlying sales tax laws ; but while a brick-and-mortar store has to deal with only the sales tax laws of its own location, remote sellers have to deal साथ the उपयोग कर कानून of अनेक jurisdictions—up to प्रत्येक us राज्य और मोहल्ले कि प्रकृती उन्हें, if the कम्पनी रै a presence or `` nexus '' in every state ( as large `` brick-and-mortar '' sellers like Wal-Mart and Best Buy do ).
In medicine, pulmonary hypertension ( ph ) is an बढ़ाएँ of रक्त दबाव in the pulmonary धमनी, pulmonary रग, or pulmonary capillaries, साथ ज्ञात as the फेफड़ों vasculature, अग्रणी to shortness of breath, dizziness, fainting, and other symptoms, all of which are exacerbated by exertion.
Pulmonary hypertension can be a severe disease with a markedly decreased कसरत tolerance and heart failure.
It was first identified by dr. अर्नस्ट वोन romberg in 1891.
According to the most recent classification, it can be one of five different types : arterial, venous, hypoxic, thromboembolic or विविध.

Sanuk, a division of Deckers बाहरी निगम, is a जूते brand based in Southern California.
Sanuk, the Thai word for fun, was founded by Southern कैलिफ़ोर्निया देशी जेफ़ kelley जब he प्रारंभ बनाना sandals out of indoor-outdoor carpet.
The first product created was green carpeted and entitled the `` Fur Real '' after एक दूकान मालिक पूछा if the विलक्षणता चन्दन थी `` For Real. ''
The Fur Real first became a runaway hit through बुटीक स्टोर्स और नहीं the intended surf shops.
The novelty act was followed up by a sandal wrapped in wire जाल, a तेंदुआ छपाई संस्करण, और शैलियाँ बना आउट of a poncho material in a variety of colors.
Sanuk रै grown to शामिल स्टाइल विकल्प लिये मेन, women and youth and is distributed across the United States and in over 50 countries throughout Europe, Asia, South America and Australia.
Sanuk centers itself around a धनात्मक जीवनशैली वकालत the slogan, `` Smile, Pass it on ! ``.
In computer science, array programming languages ( also known as vector or multidimensional languages ) generalize operations on scalars to लागू transparently to सदिश, matrices, and higher dimensional arrays.
सरणी प्रोग्रामिंग primitives concisely एक्स्प्रेस व्यापक विचार about data manipulation.
The level of conciseness can be dramatic in certain cases : it is not uncommon to ढूँढें सरणी प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा one-liners that require more than a couple of pages of Java code.
APL, designed by केन iverson, थी the पहला प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा to provide array programming capabilities.
The mnemonic APL refers to the title of his seminal book `` A Programming Language '' and not to arrays per se. Iverson 's योगदान to rigor और स्पष्टता थी संभवतः अधिक महत्वपूर्ण than the simple extension of dimensions to functions.
In the United States an annuity contract is created when an insured party, usually an व्यक्तिगत, pays a जीवन बीमे कम्पनी a सिंगल प्रीमियम that will later be distributed back to the insured party over time.
annuity अनुबंध traditionally provide a गारंटी वितरण of आय over time, such as via fixed payments, until the death of the person or persons named in the contract or until a final date, whichever comes first.
However, the majority of modern annuity ग्राहक उपयोग annuities तभी to accumulate funds free of income and capital gains taxes and to later take lump-sum withdrawals without using the guaranteed-income-for-life feature.
अध्यक्ष Barack Obama.
बराक ओबामा साथ उसके पहला परम् अदालत nominee, Sonia Sotomayor.
Following is a list of all United States संघीय न्यायाधीशों नियुक्त by अध्यक्ष बराक Obama during his presidency.
As of April 30, 2013, 187 Obama nominees to Article III judgeships have been confirmed by the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट, namely two Justices to the Supreme Court of the United States, 35 judges to the United States courts of appeals and 150 judges to the United States district courts.
25 further nominations हैं फिलहाल प्रतीक्षारत Senate action.
There are currently 16 vacancies on the संयुक्त राज्य Courts of Appeals, 67 vacancies on the United States district courts and 22 additional federal judiciary vacancies that are anticipated to occur before the end of Obama 's second term.
ओबामा रै नहीं बना any recess appointments to the federal courts.
Obama has made two nominations to the United राज्य अदालत of अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार, an आलेख iii tribunal.
Obama भी designated बैठे न्यायधीश एमिली C. हेविट of the संयुक्त States Court of Federal Claims, an Article I court, to be Chief Judge of that court.
This is a list of airports in मैक्सिको, sorted by स्थान.
Mexico has about 1,834 एयरपोर्ट, रैंकिंग 2nd in क्रमांक of एयरपोर्ट in उत्तर America, and 3rd in the world.

Agency debt also known as an एजेंसी बंध is a सुरक्षा, प्रायः a बंध, जारी by a u.S. government-sponsored agency.
The offerings of these एजेंसियों हैं समर्थित लकिन नहीं गारंटी by the us government since the agencies are private entities.
Some prominent issuers of ये प्रतिभूति हैं छात्र ऋण विपणन संघ ( sallie mae ), Federal National Mortgage Association ( Fannie Mae ) and Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation ( Freddie Mac ).
Agency securities are usually exempt इससे राज्य और लोकल कर, but not federal tax.
Agency कर्ज़ is भी पुकारा an agency security.
The Susquehanna भाप इलेक्ट्रिक स्टेशन, a boiling water reactor.
The reactors are located inside the आयताकार containment इमारतें towards the सामने of the cooling towers.
Three nuclear-powered American warships, ( top to bottom ) nuclear cruisers USS bainbridge और uss long बीच साथ uss एंटरप्राइज़ the first nuclear-powered aircraft carrier in 1964.
Crew members are spelling out Einstein 's mass-energy equivalence सूत्र E = mc2 on the flight deck.
The रूसी nuclear-powered हिमभंजक ns Yamal on a 1994 joint expedition with the NSF.
Nuclear power is the use of sustained नाभिकीय परिवर्द्धन to generate heat and electricity.
Nuclear power plants provided परिचय 5.7 % of the संसार 's उर्जा और 13 % of the world 's electricity, in 2012.
In 2013, the IAEA report that there are 437 operational nuclear power reactors ( हालांकि नहीं सब हैं producing विद्युत ), in 31 देशों.
In addition, there are approximately 140 naval vessels using nuclear propulsion in आपरेशन, संचालित by कुछ 180 रिएक्टरों.
There is an जारी बहस परिचय the उपयोग of nuclear energy.
Proponents, such as the World नाभिकीय संघ, the iaea और पर्यावरणविद लिये नाभिकीय उर्जा contend कि नाभिकीय शक्ति is a sustainable energy source that reduces carbon emissions.
Opponents, such as ग्रीनपीस अंतरराष्ट्रीय और nirs, मानना that nuclear power poses many threats to people and the environment.
Nuclear power plant accidents include the Chernobyl disaster ( 1986 ), फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति ( 2011 ), and the Three Mile Island accident ( 1979 ).
There have also been some nuclear-powered पनडुब्बी mishaps.
Research into safety improvements is continuing and nuclear fusion, believed to be safer, may be प्रयुक्त in the भविष्य.
As of 2012, according to the iaea, विश्वव्यापी वहीँ यहूद 68 सिविल nuclear power reactors under construction in 15 countries.
In the US the licenses of almost half its रिएक्टरों have महरूम विस्तारित to 60 सालो, और योजनाएँ to निर्माण another dozen are under serious consideration.
However, Japan 's 2011 Fukushima Daiichi nuclear विपत्ति prompted a पुनर्विचार of नाभिकीय उर्जा नीति in अनेक countries.
Germany decided to close सब इसके रिएक्टरों by 2022, and Italy has banned nuclear power.
Following Fukushima, the International Energy एजेंसी halved इसके अनुमान of अतिरिक्त नाभिकीय generating capacity to be built by 2035.
फोटोग्राफ of the बर्लिन Wall taken from the West side.
The Wall was built in 1961 to prevent ईस्ट Germans from fleeing from Communism.
It was an iconic प्रतीक of the ठंडा War and its fall in 1989 marked the end of the War.
The Cold War, often dated from 1947 to 1991, was a sustained state of राजनैतिक और सैन्य टेंशन between शक्तियां in the पश्चिमी bloc, वर्चस्व by the United States with NATO among its allies, and powers in the Eastern Bloc, dominated by the Soviet Union along with the Warsaw Pact.
This began after the success of उनके अस्थाई wartime गठबंधन विरूद्ध नाजी Germany, leaving the USSR and the US as two superpowers with profound economic and political differences.
A neutral faction arose with the Non-Aligned Movement founded by मिश्र, इण्डिया, और यूगोस्लाविया ; इस गुट अस्वीकृत संघ with either the US-led West or the Soviet-led East.
The Cold War was so named क्युकी the दो प्रमुख powers—each possessing nuclear weapons and thereby threatened with mutual assured destruction —never met in direct military combat.
Instead, in their संघर्ष लिये वैश्विक influence वे सगाई in जारी मनोवैज्ञानिक warfare and in regular indirect confrontations through proxy wars.
Cycles of relative calm होता be followed by high tension, which could have led to world war.
The tensest times were during the Berlin Blockade ( 1948–1949 ), the Korean War ( 1950–1953 ), the Suez Crisis ( 1956 ), the बर्लिन संकट of 1961, the क्यूबन मिसाइल संकट ( 1962 ), the वियतनाम War ( 1959–1975 ), the Yom Kippur War ( 1973 ), the Soviet war in Afghanistan ( 1979–1989 ), the Soviet downing of Korean Air Lines Flight 007 ( 1983 ), and the `` Able Archer '' NATO military exercises ( 1983 ).
The conflict was expressed through military coalitions, strategic conventional force deployments, extensive aid to client states, espionage, massive propaganda campaigns, conventional and nuclear arms races, appeals to न्यूट्रल राष्ट्र, फंसने at खेल कार्यक्रम ( in particular the ओलंपिक ), and technological competitions such as the Space Race.
The US और ussr became शामिल in राजनैतिक and military conflicts in the Third World countries of Latin America, Africa, the Middle East, and Southeast Asia.
To alleviate the risk of a potential nuclear war, both sides sought राहत of राजनैतिक तनाव through détente in the 1970s.
In the 1980s, the United States increased diplomatic, सैन्य, और आर्थिक pressures on the सोवियत संघ, at a समय जब the कम्युनिस्ट राज्य थी already कष्ट from economic stagnation.
In the mid-1980s, the नई सोवियत अध्यक्ष मिखाइल गोर्बाचेव introduced the liberalizing reforms of perestroika ( `` reorganization '', 1987 ) and glasnost ( `` openness '', ca. 1985 ).
Pressures for national independence grew stronger in पूर्वी यूरोपीय, विशेषकर Poland.
They reached a breaking पाइंट जब गोर्बाचेव refused to उपयोग सोवियत सैनिकों to support the faltering government of East Germany in late 1989.
Within weeks all the satellite states broke free इससे मास्को in a शांतिपूर्ण वेव of revolutions ( there was some violence in Romania ).
The pressures escalated अंदर the सोवियत संघ, जहाँ साम्यवादी गिरी और the ussr was formally dissolved in late 1991.
The United States remained as the world 's तभी महाशक्ति.
The Cold War and its events have left a significant विरासत, और it is प्रायः referred to in popular culture, especially in media featuring themes of espionage and the threat of nuclear warfare.
Pikes Peak State Park is a state park of Iowa, USA, featuring a bluff निहार the अपर मिसिसिपी नदी विपरीत the संगम of the Wisconsin River.
The park is संचालित by the आयोवा Department of Natural Resources.
It is nearly a हजार एकड़ ( 4 km2 ) in extent.
the निकटतम नगर is McGregor, Iowa.
Iowa Highway 76 approximately defines इसके उत्तरी boundary.
It gets its name from the Iowa incarnation of Pikes शिखर, a विशेषकर ऊँची पाइंट निहार the gorge of the Upper Mississippi, and like Pikes Peak in Colorado, is named for Zebulon Pike.
There हैं चढ़ाई trails, campgrounds and RV facilities.
Mountain bikes are permitted in certain portions of the पार्क.
Aside इससे recreational विकास, the जमीन in the पार्क थी never cleared and to a large extent remains as it was before the advent of white settlement.
It is part of a larger complex of parks, reserves और refuges जिससे शामिल पुतला mounds नेशनल स्मारक, the various components of the Yellow River State Forest, the enormous Upper Mississippi River National Wildlife and Fish Refuge and much smaller, much less well known Driftless Area National Wildlife Refuge.
The Northeast Iowa Legacy Trail System is undergoing विकास, और होगा कनेक्ट elements of these sites.
Zac Brown Band is an अमरीकी country/folk band based in Atlanta, Georgia.
The lineup consists of Zac Brown ( lead vocals, guitar ), Jimmy De Martini ( fiddle, vocals ), John Driskell Hopkins ( bass guitar, vocals ), Coy Bowles ( guitar, keyboards ), Chris Fryar ( drums ), Clay Cook ( guitar, keyboards, mandolin, steel guitar, vocals ), and Daniel de los Reyes ( percussion ).
The band has toured throughout the संयुक्त राज्य, सहित a slot on the 2009 and 2010 Bonnaroo Music Festival.
They have also recorded five studio albums, and charted nine Number One singles on the Billboard country charts : `` Chicken Fried ``, `` Toes ``, `` राजमार्ग 20 सवारी ``, `` फ़्री ``, `` as वो 's चलना दूर ``, `` colder मौसम ``, `` घुटना गहन ``, `` रखना me in दिमाग ``, और `` अलविदा in उसके आँखें `` in जोड to the singles `` whatever It Is `` and `` No Hurry ``, which peaked at number 2 on the same chart.
Talk radio is a रेडियो स्वरूप containing चर्चा about topical issues.
Most shows are regularly hosted by a single व्यक्तिगत, और प्रायः विशेषता साक्षात्कार with a number of different guests.
Talk radio typically includes an element of listener participation, usually by broadcasting live बातचीत between the मेजबान और श्रोता जो `` कॉल in '' ( प्रायः via टेलीफोन ) to the show.
Listener contributions are usually screened by a show 's producer ( s ) in order to maximize audience interest and, in the मामला of वाणिज्यिक बात रेडियो, आकर्षित विज्ञापनदाता.
Generally, the shows are organized into segments, each separated by a pause for advertisements ; however, in public or non-commercial रेडियो, म्यूज़िक is sometimes निभाई in प्लेस of commercials to पृथक the program segments.
Variations of talk radio शामिल रूढ़िवादी बात, hot बात, liberal talk and sports talk.
While talk radio has historically been associated with AM/FM, starting around 2005 the technology for internet-based talk-radio shows became लागत प्रभावी in the रूप of podcasts.
Now, it is possible for an individual to उपयोग a किस्में of सेवाएं to मेजबान an internet-based talk-radio show without carriage by a traditional radio station.
In addition TV programming from talk and news outlets such as बीबीसी, सीएनएन, ब्लूमबर्ग और फॉक्स हैं अभी प्रायः उपलब्धियाँ expanding the world of talk radio further.
Talk रेडियो सुनना is अभी enjoyed नहीं तभी on radios, but a wide variety of other devices and services including PCs using iTunes, station directories such as Tunein, show directory smartphones with apps such as Stitcher.
Hippa is a genus of decapod crustaceans in the परिवार hippidae, containing the following species:

Jakarta ( ), officially known as the Special Capital Region of जकार्ता ( ), is the पूंजी and largest city of Indonesia.
Located on the northwest coast of Java, Jakarta is the country 's economic, cultural and political केन्द्र, और साथ a जनसांख्यिकी of 10,187,595 as of November 2011, it is the most populous city in Indonesia and in Southeast Asia, and is the thirteenth most populated city in the world.
The official metropolitan area, known as Jabodetabek ( a name formed by combining the initial syllables of Jakarta, Bogor, Depok, tangerang और bekasi ), is the दूसरी largest in the world, yet the metropolis 's suburbs still continue beyond it.
Jakarta is listed as a global नगर in the 2008 वैश्वीकरण और संसार शहरों Study Group and Network ( GaWC ) research.
और रै an area of.
This area has population of well over 28 लाख, बनाना it एक of the world 's largest conurbations in terms of number of inhabitants.
In 2011, Jakarta ranked 17th among the संसार 's 200 largest cities, a jump from its 2007 ranking of 171.
Jakarta has grown more rapidly than Kuala lumpur, बीजिंग and Bangkok.
Established in the fourth century, the city became an महत्वपूर्ण trading port for the Kingdom of Sunda.
It was the de facto capital of the Dutch East Indies ( when it was ज्ञात as batavia ) और रै जारी as the पूंजी of इंडोनेशिया since the country 's independence was declared in 1945.
The city is the seat of the आसियान सचिवालय.
Jakarta is served by the Soekarno–Hatta International Airport, Halim Perdanakusuma International Airport, and Tanjung Priok Harbour ; it is कनेक्ट by अनेक intercity and commuter railways, and served by several bus lines running on reserved busways.
a ठेठ घर एयर conditioning window unit.
Air conditioning is the process of altering the properties of air ( primarily temperature और आर्द्रता ) to अधिक favourable शर्तें.
More generally, एयर कंडीशनिंग can refer to कोई रूप of technological कूलिंग, heating, ventilation, or disinfection that modifies the condition of air.
An air conditioner ( often referred to as air con, AC or A/C, and not to be confused with the abbreviation for alternating current ) is a major or home appliance, प्रणाली, or यांत्रिकी designed to change the air temperature and humidity within an area ( used for cooling and sometimes heating depending on the air properties at a given time ).
The cooling is typically done using a simple refrigeration cycle, but sometimes evaporation is used, commonly लिये सुकून कूलिंग in इमारतें और मोटर vehicles.
In निर्माण, a पूरा प्रणाली of हीटिंग, ventilation and air conditioning is referred to as `` HVAC ``.

DC बात ( styled as dc बात ), is a Grammy -winning Christian rap trio.
The group was formed in lynchburg, वर्जिनिया in 1987 by टोबी mckeehan, Michael Tait, and Kevin Max Smith.
They have released five major studio albums together : DC Talk ( 1989 ), Nu थांग ( 1990 ), फ़्री at पिछला ( 1992 ), यीशु freak ( 1995 ), और Supernatural ( 1998 ).
In 2002, the Encyclopedia of Contemporary Christian Music called DC Talk `` the most लोकप्रिय overtly ईसाई अधिनियम of सब समय. ''
In 2000, the group released an EP titled सोलो which contained two solo songs from each member.
Since that time, DC Talk has been on an indefinite hiatus, and the three band members have प्रत्येक led सोलो करियर.
They have performed and recorded individual songs together several times during the 2000s, हालांकि the समूह never officially reunited or disbanded.
The group 's musical style evolved significantly throughout their career.
Their first two releases, DC Talk and Nu Thang, यहूद of the हिप हॉप विधा.
DC Talk 's third album, Free at Last, also mainly took influence from the hip हॉप स्टाइल, हालांकि उनके म्यूज़िक began लेने on a चट्टान ध्वनि.
The trio 's last two albums, Jesus Freak and अलौकिक, यहूद predominantly pop rock.
The Bible is a compilation of many shorter books written at अलग टाइम्स और बाद समवेत into the biblical canon.
All लकिन the shortest of ये किताबे have महरूम विभाजित into chapters, generally a page or so in length, since the early 13th century.
चूंकि the mid-16th सदी, प्रत्येक अध्याय रै महरूम further divided into `` verses '' of a few short lines or sentences.
Sometimes a sentence spans more than one verse, as in the case of, and sometimes वहीँ is अधिक than एक sentence in a single verse, as in the case of.
As the chapter and verse divisions were not part of the original texts, वे रूप भाग of the paratext of the Bible.
the यहूदी विभाजन of the Hebrew text differ at various points from those used by Christians.
For instance, in Jewish tradition, the ascriptions to many Psalms are regarded as independent verses, making 116 more verses, whereas the स्थापित ईसाई अभ्यास is to गिनती और क्रमांक प्रत्येक Psalm ascription together with the first verse following it.
Some chapter divisions also occur in different places, e.g. in यहूदी bibles is गिने as in ईसाई translations.
An index ( plural : indexes ) is a list of words or phrases ( 'headings ' ) and associated संकेतक ( 'लोकेटरs ' ) to जहाँ उपयोगी सामग्री relating to कि heading can be found in a document.
In a traditional back-of-the-book index the headings will include names of people, places and events, and concepts selected by a व्यक्ति as होने प्रासंगिक और of ब्याज to a संभावित reader of the book.
The pointers are typically पेज संख्याएँ, अनुच्छेद numbers or section numbers.
In a पुस्तकालयों कैटलॉग the शब्द हैं लेखक, शीर्षक, विषय headings, etc., and the pointers are call numbers.
Internet search engines, such as Google, and full text searching सहायता provide अभिगम to सूचना लकिन हैं नहीं as चयनात्मक as an अनुक्रमणिका, as वे provide non-relevant कड़ी, and may miss relevant information if it is not phrased in exactly the way they expect.
In United States financial regulation, a suspicious activity report ( or SAR ) is a report made by a financial institution to the Financial Crimes प्रवर्तन संजाल ( fincen ), an एजेंसी of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of the राजकोष, regarding संदिग्ध or potentially suspicious activity.
Facebook on the ad-tech 2010
Facebook is an online social networking service, whose name stems from the colloquial name for the book दिए to विद्यार्थी at the प्रारंभ of the अकादमिक year by some university administrations in the United States to help students get to know each other.
It was founded in February 2004 by Mark zuckerberg साथ उसके कॉलेज roommates और fellow Harvard University students Eduardo Saverin, Andrew McCollum, Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes.
The website 's membership was initially सीमित by the संस्थापकों to हार्वर्ड विद्यार्थी, लकिन थी विस्तारित to other colleges in the Boston area, the Ivy League, and Stanford University.
It gradually added support for students at various अन्य विश्वविद्यालयों पहले खोलने to ऊँची स्कूल विद्यार्थी, and eventually to anyone aged 13 and over.
Facebook now allows any उपयोक्ता जो घोषित themselves to be at तनिक 13 सालो बूढ़ा to become पंजीकृत users of the site.
Users must register पहले using the साईट, बाद जिससे वे may बनाएँ a निजी प्रोफ़ाइल, add अन्य उपयोक्ता as मित्रों, और exchange messages, including automatic notifications when they update their profile.
Additionally, users may join common-interest user groups, organized by workplace, school or college, or other characteristics, and categorize उनके मित्रों into सूचियाँ ऐसे as `` People From Work '' or `` Close Friends ''.
As of September 2012, Facebook रै over एक अरब active users.
according to a may 2011 उपभोक्ता रिपोर्ट्स सर्वेक्षण, वहीँ हैं 7.5 million children under 13 with accounts and 5 million under 10, violating the site 's terms of service.
In May 2005, Accel partners invested $ 12.7 million in Facebook, and जिम breyer added $ 1 लाख of उसके अपना धन to the घट.
A January 2009 Compete.com पढ़ाई क्रमित फेसबुक as the सबसे प्रयुक्त सोशल networking service by worldwide monthly active users.
Entertainment साप्ताहिक शामिल the साईट on इसके end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' सूची, saying, `` कैसा on धरती did we stalk our exes, remember our co-workers ' birthdays, bug our friends, and play a rousing game of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
आलोचकों, ऐसे as फेसबुक detox, राज्य कि फेसबुक has turned into a national obsession in the United States, resulting in vast amounts of time lost and encouraging narcissism.
Quantcast estimates Facebook has 138.9 million monthly अद्वितीय u.S. विज़िटर in may 2011.
According to Social Media Today, in April 2010 an estimated 41.6 % ( 129.5 million ) of the u.S. जनसांख्यिकी था a फेसबुक account.
Nevertheless, Facebook 's market growth प्रारंभ to स्टाल in कुछ regions, साथ the साईट losing 7 million active users in the United States and Canada in May 2011.
Facebook eventually दायर लिये an आरंभिक पब्लिक offering on February 1, 2012, and was headquartered in Menlo Park, California.
Facebook Inc. began selling भण्डार to the पब्लिक and trading on the NASDAQ on May 18, 2012.
Sulfonamide कार्यात्मक समूह
hydrochlorothiazide is a सल्फोनेमाइड and a thiazide.
furosemide is a सल्फोनेमाइड, but not a thiazide.
सल्फोनेमाइड or sulphonamide is the basis of several groups of drugs.
The original antibacterial sulfonamides ( sometimes पुकारा sulfa दवाएँ or sulpha दवाएँ ) हैं सिंथेटिक रोगाणुरोधी agents that contain the sulfonamide group.
Some sulfonamides are भी विहीन of जीवाणुरोधी कार्यकलाप, e.g., the anticonvulsant sultiame.
the sulfonylureas और thiazide diuretics are newer drug groups based on the antibacterial sulfonamides.
Sulfa allergies हैं आम, hence medications containing sulfonamides are prescribed carefully.
It is important to make a distinction between sulfa drugs and other sulfur-containing दवाएँ और एडिटिव, ऐसे as sulfates और sulfites, जिससे are chemically unrelated to the sulfonamide group, and do not cause the same hypersensitivity reactions seen in the sulfonamides.

30 Seconds to मंगल is an अमरीकी चट्टान band from Los Angeles, formed in 1998.
Since 2007, the band has consisted of कर्ता jared leto ( सीसे vocals, लय गिटार, songwriter ), Shannon Leto ( drums, percussion ) and Tomo Miličević ( lead guitar, keyboards ).
Following the departure of Matt Wachter ( now of फ़रिश्ते & airwaves ) in 2007, टिम kelleher became the bassist लिये the समूह, performing सजीव तभी साथ दोनो jared and Miličević recording bass for studio recordings, while Braxton Olita ( keyboards ) was added to the touring lineup in 2009.
Previously, the group also featured guitarists Solon Bixler ( now of Great उत्तरी ) और केविन ड्रेक ( अभी of Polaroid Kiss ).
To date, 30 Seconds to Mars have released तीन स्टुडियो एल्बम – 30 सेकेंड to मंगल ( 2002 ), a खूबसूरत झूठ ( 2005 ), इस is युद्ध ( 2009 ) and three extended plays – AOL Sessions Undercover ( 2007 ), To the Edge of the Earth ( 2008 ), and MTV Unplugged : 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2011 ).
30 Seconds to Mars ' music has been संबद्ध ज़्यादातर साथ neo-prog, progressive metal and post-grunge, but they have also included emo, screamo, space rock and synthrock into their music.
They have been compared to Pink Floyd ( who were an influence on their work ) and Tool because of their use of philosophical और आध्यात्मिक गीत, अवधारणा albums and their use of experimental music.
A क्रिसमस स्टोरी is a 1983 अमरीकी क्रिसमस कॉमेडी फिल्मी आधारित on the छोटी कहानियां और semi-fictional उपाख्यानों of लेखक और raconteur Jean Shepherd, based on his book In God We Trust, All Others Pay Cash, with some elements derived from Wanda Hickey 's Night of Golden Memories.

The film has since become a holiday classic और is दिखाया numerous टाइम्स on टेलीविज़न दौरान the Christmas season on the network TBS, often in a 24-hour marathon.

New York City Cruise Liner Terminal in नरक 's रसोईघर at 52nd Street.
The New York Passenger Ship Terminal ( also known as the Luxury Liner Row or Manhattan Cruise टर्मिनल or नई यॉर्क क्रूज टर्मिनल ) is a terminal for ocean-going passenger ships on Manhattan 's west side.
The terminal consists of North River Piers 88, 90, 92 and 94 on the Hudson River between वेस्ट 46th और वेस्ट 54th Street.
( As a general rule, pier संख्याएँ in मैनहटन can be संकल्पित by adding 40 to the corresponding cross-street. )
Ships now डॉक at Piers 88, 90 and 92.
Pier 94 on the north पक्ष is now used for exhibition space.
बांध 86, एकबार प्रयुक्त by United States Lines, is now home to the USS Intrepid.
in 2003, the टर्मिनल handled 900,000 passengers.
The city is forecasting that 1.5 million होगा उपयोग the टर्मिनल by 2017.
The piers are long और अलावा.
They were first completed in 1935 to replace the चेल्सी पियर as the नगर 's लक्ज़री लाइनर terminal.
The new टर्मिनल थी निर्मित to हैंडल बडे जहाजों कि था outgrown the Chelsea Piers.
The piers were renovated in 1970 और हैं फिलहाल undergoing another $ 150 million renovation.
The renovated plans call for it to हैंडल तीन विशाल जहाजों at a समय.
In doing renovations, the नगर is भी considering decommissioning बांध 92.
Logo of the New York Cruise terminal.for
decades the टर्मिनल थी the तभी ocean-going passenger terminal in New York harbor.
With an upsurge in cruise ship traffic and the terminal 's ability to handle comfortably only three large ships at a time, two new terminals have opened in the हार्बर — the केप स्वतंत्रता क्रूज Port opened in 2004 in Bayonne, New Jersey ( used by Royal Caribbean Cruise Line, Celebrity Cruises and Azamara Cruises ), and the Brooklyn Cruise Terminal ( used by the Queen Mary 2 and other ships of the Carnival Corporation cruise brands ) opened in 2006 in Brooklyn, New York.
The वेस्ट पक्ष राजमार्ग takes a छोटी जोग ईस्ट इससे the पियर to नीचे वेस्ट 42nd Street because when the terminal was built land had to be taken away from Manhattan to allow for longer piers.
The US Army Corps of Engineers, who कंट्रोल the waterfront आयाम, होता नहीं extend the pierhead लकीर दूर into the river, so the city extended the pier by cutting away at the land.
The city पहले किया इस लिये the चेल्सी पियर ; however in Chelsea only landfill was taken away.
At the Passenger Terminal actual मैनहटन schist थी taken away.
From डाउनस्ट्रीम in the नदी
Many major passenger ships have docked there, including the RMS Queen Mary 2 और स्वतंत्रता of the समंदर, पहले the ब्रुकलीन and Bayonne terminals opened.
The SS normandie caught आग और subsequently capsized at its Pier 88 berth during World War II.
The Normandie, renamed USS Lafayette, lies capsized in the frozen मिट्टी at बांध 88 in the winter of 1942

Christian सही is a पद प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त राज्य to describe right-wing Christian political groups that are characterized by their strong support of socially conservative policies.
Christian conservatives principally seek to apply their understanding of the शिक्षाओं of christianity to राजनीती और पब्लिक नीति by proclaiming the मान of those शिक्षाओं and/or by seeking to उपयोग those शिक्षाओं to influence law and public policy.
In the U.S., the Christian right is an informal coalition formed around a कोर of धर्मान्तरण protestants कि draws `` support इससे नीतियां रूढ़िवादी Catholics, Jews, Mormons, and occasionally secularists '' who share their goals.
the गति रै इसके जड़ें in American politics going back as far the 1940s and has been especially influential since the 1970s.
Their influence draws, in part, from grassroots सक्रियता as खूब as उनके फ़ोकस on सोशल मुद्दे और ability to motivate the electorate around those issues.
The Christian right is notable today for advancing socially conservative स्थितियाँ on मुद्दे सहित स्कूल दुआ, स्टेम कोशिका शोध, समलैंगिकता, contraception, abortion, and pornography.
Although the Christian right is usually associated with the U.S., the movement has been a कुंजी फ़ैक्टर in the राजनीती of कनाडा, the नीदरलैंड्स, उत्तरी आयरलैंड and Australia, among others.
Far East Movement ( stylized as far★east गति or abbreviated fm ) is an American hip hop band quartet based in Los Angeles.
The group formed in 2003 and consists of Kev Nish ( Kevin Nishimura ), Prohgress ( जेम्स roh ), j-splif ( jae choung ), and DJ Virman ( Virman Coquia ).
Far East Movement 's पहला अर्जी to कीर्ति थी उनके सोंग `` गोलाकार गोलाकार '' प्रदर्शित in the Hollywood movie, The Fast and the Furious : Tokyo Drift, and its subsequent soundtrack, video game and DVD.
Since `` Round Round '', the group has been featured on various network shows including,, अनुगामी, गपशप लड़की, और finishing the खेल ( a प्रदर्शित फिल्मी at Sundance 2007 ).
Their single `` Like a G6 `` hit number one on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट और on itunes as खूब in late October 2010.
Far East Movement also has the distinction of being the first asian-american समूह to earn a # 1 hit on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 in the United States.
LR44 is the IEC designation for an क्षारीय 1.5 वोल्ट बटन कोशिका, commonly प्रयुक्त in छोटी led flashlights, digital thermometers, calculators, calipers, watches, clocks, toys and laser pointers.
LR44 क्षारीय कोशिका
The battery नामकरण is पारिभाषित by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Electrotechnical Commission ( IEC ) in its 60086-3 standard ( Primary batteries, part 3 Watch batteries ).
the अक्षर l indicates the electrochemical प्रणाली प्रयुक्त ; a zinc negative electrode, manganese dioxide depolarizer and positive electrode, and an alkaline electrolyte.
R44 indicates a round कोशिका 11.4±0.2 mm व्यास और 5.2±0.2 mm height as defined by the IEC standard 60086.
Manufacturers have their own part numbers for IEC प्रकार lr44 batteries including:
LR44, lr44g, lr44gd, LR44H
LR1154, l1154, l1154c, l1154f, l1154g, L1154H
6135-99-792-8475 ( nsn )
1166a
AG13, A613, ag14, ag-14, G13A, G13-A
157, 303, 357
A76, GDA76, GP76A, GPA7, gpa75, gpa76, gps76A,
1128MP, 208-904, A-76, CA18, CA19, cr44, d76a, ka, ka76, ms76h, px76a, PX675A, RPX675, RW82, SB-F9, V13GA
4.5-volt, d, c, AA, AAA, AAAA, A23, 9-volt, CR2032 and LR44 batteries
Other types of batteries are or were बना in the r44 आकार.
formerly, पारा बैटरी यहूद बना as button cells ( types MR44 and NR44 ).
zinc-air बैटरी type PR44 require air to work.
Silver-oxide बैटरी प्रकार sr44 may provide अतिरिक्त क्षमता compared to lr44 प्रकार but have slightly different voltage characteristics.
Performance of a device meant to use a silver-oxide battery may be degraded साथ प्रतिस्थापन of lr44 types.
निर्माता 's संख्याएँ लिये silver oxide R44 size cells include:
sr44/sr44w/sr44sw
6135-99-651-3240 ( NSN )
sr1154
