Hurricane कैटरीना थी the deadliest और सबसे destructive Atlantic hurricane of the 2005 Atlantic hurricane season.
It was the costliest natural disaster, as खूब as एक of the पाँच deadliest hurricanes, in the history of the United States.
Among recorded Atlantic hurricanes, it थी the छठे strongest overall.
At least 1,833 लोगों died in the hurricane और subsequent floods, बनाना it the deadliest u.S. hurricane since the 1928 Okeechobee hurricane ; total property damage was estimated at $ 81 billion ( 2005 USD ), nearly triple the damage brought by Hurricane Andrew in 1992.
hurricane कैटरीना formed over the बहामा on अगस्त 23, 2005 और crossed दक्षिणी Florida as a moderate Category 1 hurricane, causing some deaths and flooding there before strengthening rapidly in the Gulf of Mexico.
The hurricane strengthened to a Category 5 hurricane over the गरम गल्फ जल, लकिन weakened पहले बनाना इसके दूसरी landfall as a श्रेणी 3 hurricane on the morning of Monday, August 29 in southeast Louisiana.
It caused कठोर विनाश साथ the गल्फ coast इससे सेंट्रल Florida to Texas, much of it due to the storm surge.
The most significant क्रमांक of मौतों occurred in नई ऑरलियन्स, louisiana, जिससे flooded as the तटबन्ध प्रणाली catastrophically failed, in many cases hours after the storm had moved inland.
Eventually 80 % of the नगर और विशाल tracts of neighboring parishes became flooded, and the floodwaters lingered for weeks.
However, the worst property damage occurred in coastal क्षेत्रों, ऐसे as सब मिसिसिपी beachfront कस्बों, जिससे यहूद flooded over 90 % in hours, as boats and casino barges rammed buildings, pushing cars and houses inland, with waters reaching 6–12 miles ( 10–19 km ) from the beach.
the hurricane surge सुरक्षा असफलताओं in नई ऑरलियन्स हैं माना the worst सिविल अभियान्त्रिकी विपत्ति in U.S. history and prompted a lawsuit against the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers ( USACE ), the designers and builders of the levee system as mandated by the Flood Control Act of 1965.
Responsibility for the failures and flooding थी रखी squarely on the फौज corps in जनवरी 2008 by न्यायधीश stanwood डुवल, u.S. ज़िला अदालत, but the federal agency could not be held financially liable due to sovereign immunity in the Flood Control Act of 1928.
There was also an investigation of the responses from federal, state and local governments, resulting in the resignation of Federal Emergency प्रबन्धन एजेंसी ( fema ) निदेशक माइकल D. भूरा, और of नई ऑरलियन्स पुलिस विभाग ( nopd ) अधीक्षक एडी Compass.
Several agencies including the United States Coast Guard ( USCG ), नेशनल hurricane बीच ( nhc ), और नेशनल मौसम सेवा ( nws ) were commended for their actions.
They provided accurate hurricane weather tracking forecasts साथ sufficient सीसे समय.
Even the most insistent appeals इससे नेशनल, राज्य और लोकल public officials to residents to evacuate before the storm did not warn that the levees could breach and fail.
U.S. कर्ज़ इससे 1940 to 2011.
Red lines indicate the `` debt held by the पब्लिक '' और ब्लैक लाइनों indicate the कुल national debt or gross public debt.
The अंतर is the `` intragovernmental कर्ज़, '' जिससे शामिल दायित्वों to government programs such as Social Security.
Stated as a formula, National Debt = Debt held by the पब्लिक + intragovernmental कर्ज़.
The second panel shows the two debt figures as a percentage of u.S. जीडीपी ( डालर मान of u.S. आर्थिक production for that year ).
The शीर्ष फलक is deflated so every year is in 2010 dollars.
The United States public debt is the money borrowed by the federal government of the United States through the issuing of प्रतिभूति by the राजकोष और अन्य संघीय सरकारी agencies.
US public debt consists of दो घटकs:
Debt held by the public includes Treasury securities आयोजित by निवेशकों बाहर the संघीय सरकारी, सहित that held by individuals, corporations, the Federal Reserve System and foreign, state and local governments.
Debt held by government accounts or intragovernmental debt includes non-marketable Treasury securities held in खाते administered by the संघीय सरकारी that are owed to program beneficiaries, such as the Social Security Trust Fund.
Debt held by government accounts represents the cumulative surpluses, including ब्याज आय, of ये खाते कि have महरूम invested in Treasury securities.
Public debt increases or decreases as a result of the annual unified बजट deficit or surplus.
The federal सरकारी बजट deficit or surplus is the difference between government receipts and spending, ignoring intra-governmental transfers.
However, कुछ बिता कि is excluded इससे the deficit ( supplemental appropriations ) also adds to the debt.
Historically, the US public कर्ज़ as a share of जीडीपी increased during wars and recessions, and subsequently declined.
For example, debt held by the public as a share of GDP peaked just after संसार युद्ध ii ( 113 % of GDP in 1945 ), but then fell over the following 30 years.
In recent decades, however, large budget deficits and the resulting increases in कर्ज़ have led to चिंता परिचय the long-term स्थिरता of the संघीय सरकारी 's fiscal policies.
On 2 April 2013, debt held by the पब्लिक थी लगभग $ 11.959 खरब or about 75 % of GDP.
Intragovernmental holdings stood at $ 4.846 trillion, giving a संयुक्त कुल पब्लिक कर्ज़ of $ 16.805 खरब.
As of January 2013, $ 5.6 trillion or approximately 47 % of the debt held by the public was owned by foreign investors, the largest of जिससे यहूद the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन और जापानी at just over $ 1.1 trillion each.
In basketball, an assist is attributed to a खिलाड़ी जो गुजरता the बॉल to a teammate in a रास्ता कि लीड to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was `` assisting '' in the basket.
There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer चाहिए be credited साथ an assist.
An assist can be scored for the passer even if the player who receives the pass makes a बास्केट बाद ड्रिब्लिंग the ball.
However, the original definition of an assist did not include ऐसे परिस्थितियों, so the तुलना of assist आंकडे आरपार eras is a complex matter.
Only the pass directly before the score may be counted as an assist, so no more than एक assist can be अंकित प्रति फ़ील्ड लक्ष्य ( नापसंद in other sports, such as ice hockey ).
A pass that leads to a shooting foul and scoring by फ़्री throws करता नहीं गिनती as an assist in the एनबीए, लकिन करता in fiba खेल ( only one assist is awarded per set of free throws in which at least one free throw is made ).
Point guards tend to get the most assists per game ( apg ), as their role is primarily कि of a passer और ballhandler.
Centers tend to get fewer assists, but centers with good floor presence और अदालत दृष्टि can dominate a टोली by assisting.
Being inside the कुंजी, the बीच प्रायः रै the बेहतरीन कोण और the best position for `` dishes '' and other short passes in the scoring area.
Center Wilt Chamberlain led the NBA in assists in 1968.
A strong center with inside-scoring prowess, such as former NBA center Hakeem olajuwon, can भी be an प्रभावी assistor क्युकी the रक्षा 's double-teaming tends to खोलें up offense in the form of shooters.
The NBA single-game assist record is 30, held by Scott Skiles of the Orlando Magic against the डेनवर टेंडर्स, on December 30, 1990.
The NBA record for most career assists is आयोजित by जॉन स्टॉकटन साथ 15,806.
The mill or mille ( ) ( sometimes mil in the UK, when discussing property taxes in the United राज्य, or previously in साइप्रस और माल्टा ) is a now-abstract ईकाई of करेंसी प्रयुक्त sometimes in हिसाब.
In the United States, it is a notional unit equivalent to of a संयुक्त राज्य डालर ( a दसवाँ of a cent ).
In the United किंगडम it थी प्रस्तावित दौरान the decades of discussion on the decimalization of the pound as a division of the pound sterling.
अनेक अन्य मुद्राएँ प्रयुक्त the mill, such as the Maltese lira.
The term comes from the Latin `` millesimum '', meaning `` thousandth भाग ''.
The Greco-Persian Wars ( also often called the Persian Wars ) were a series of conflicts between the Achaemenid Empire of Persia और city-states of the हैलेनिक संसार कि प्रारंभ in 499 bc and lasted until 449 BC.
The टक्कर between the fractious राजनैतिक संसार of the यूनानियों और the विशाल empire of the Persians began when Cyrus the Great conquered Ionia in 547 BC.
Struggling to नियम the independent-minded शहरों of ionia, the फारसियों appointed tyrants to rule each of them.
This होता prove to be the सोर्स of much trouble for the Greeks and Persians alike.
In 499 BC, the then tyrant of Miletus, Aristagoras, embarked on an expedition to जीतें the द्वीप of naxos, साथ पारसी support ; however, the expedition थी a क़हर और, pre-empting उसके dismissal, Aristagoras incited all of Hellenic Asia Minor into rebellion against the Persians.
इस थी the शुरूआत of the आयोनियन Revolt, which would last until 493 BC, progressively drawing more regions of Asia Minor into the conflict.
Aristagoras secured military support from Athens and Eretria, and in 498 bc ये forces helped to capture and burn the Persian regional capital of Sardis.
The Persian किंग दारा the ग्रेट vowed to have बदला on Athens and Eretria for this act.
The revolt continued, with the two पहलू effectively stalemated throughout 497–495 BC.
In 494 BC, the Persians regrouped, और attacked the epicentre of the विद्रोह in Miletus.
At the Battle of Lade, the Ionians suffered a decisive defeat, and the विद्रोह collapsed, साथ the फाइनल सदस्यों होने stamped out the following year.
Seeking to secure his empire from further revolts और इससे the interference of the mainland Greeks, Darius embarked on a scheme to conquer Greece and to punish Athens and Eretria for burning Sardis.
The first Persian invasion of Greece began in 492 BC, with the Persian general Mardonius conquering Thrace and macedon पहले अनेक mishaps मजबूर an जल्दी समाप्त to the अभियान.
In 490 BC a second force was sent to Greece, this time आरपार the ईजियन समुद्र, अंतर्गत the कमांड of Datis and Artaphernes.
This expedition subjugated the cyclades, before besieging, capturing and razing Eretria.
However, while en route to attack Athens, the Persian force was decisively पराजित by the athenians at the बैटल of मैराथन, ending Persian efforts for the time being.
Darius then began to योजना to पूरा the conquest of यूनानियों, लकिन died in 486 BC and responsibility for the conquest passed to his son Xerxes I.
in 480 bc, xerxes personally led the second Persian invasion of Greece with one of the largest ancient armies ever assembled.
Victory over the 'Allied ' Greek states ( led by Sparta and Athens ) at the Battle of thermopylae अनुमत the फारसियों to मशाल एथेंस और overrun सबसे of यूनानियों.
However, while seeking to destroy the combined Greek fleet, the Persians suffered a severe शिकस्त at the बैटल of Salamis.
The following साल, the confederated यूनानियों गई on the अप्रिय, defeating the Persian army at the Battle of Plataea, and ending the invasion of Greece.
The allied Greeks followed up their success by destroying the rest of the Persian बेड़े at the बैटल of mycale, पहले expelling पारसी garrisons इससे Sestos ( 479 BC ) and Byzantium ( 478 BC ).
The actions of the general Pausanias at the siege of Byzantium alienated many of the Greek states from the Spartans, and the anti-Persian alliance was इसलिए reconstituted around athenian नेतृत्व, as the so-called Delian League.
The Delian League continued to campaign विरूद्ध फारस लिये the अगला तीन दशकों, शुरूआत with the expulsion of the remaining Persian garrisons from Europe.
At the बैटल of the eurymedon in 466 bc, the League won a double victory that finally secured freedom for the cities of Ionia.
However, the League 's involvement in an मिश्र विद्रोह ( इससे 460–454 bc ) resulted in a विनाशकारी शिकस्त, और further campaigning was suspended.
A fleet was sent to Cyprus in 451 BC, लकिन हासिल छोटी, और जब it withdrew the Greco-Persian Wars drew to a quiet end.
Some historical sources suggest the end of hostilities was marked by a सलाम सन्धि between एथेंस और फारस, the so-called Peace of Callias.
hooverville near Portland, Oregon
A `` Hooverville '' is the popular name for shanty कस्बों निर्मित by बेघर लोगों दौरान the ग्रेट अवसाद.
They were named after Herbert Hoover, who was President of the संयुक्त राज्य दौरान the onset of the अवसाद and widely blamed for it.
The term was coined by Charles माइकेल्सन, publicity मुख्य of the Democratic National Committee.
Matthew Michael Hasselbeck ( born September 25, 1975 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक लिये the इंडियानापोलिस Colts of the National Football League ( NFL ).
He was drafted in the sixth round of the 1998 NFL ड्राफ्ट by the ग्रीन Bay Packers.
बाद a ऋतु on the अभ्यास स्क्वाड और two seasons backing up Brett Favre, he was traded to the Seattle Seahawks in 2001.
Hasselbeck gained the starting role in 2003, and led Seattle to six playoff appearances and a Super Bowl रूप ; he थी चयनित to तीन प्रो प्याले और an all-pro selection.
Following ten सीज़न साथ the सीहॉक्स, Hasselbeck joined the Tennessee Titans in 2011.
Hasselbeck then signed a contract with the Indianapolis Colts in 2013 less than 24 घंटों बाद होने released by the टेनेसी Titans.
ICT is inevitably सम्बन्धित to the कंप्यूटर संजाल.
Information और संचार प्रौद्योगिकी or ( आईसीटी ), is प्रायः used as an extended synonym for information technology ( IT ), but is a more specific term that stresses the role of unified communications and the integration of telecommunications ( telephone lines and wireless signals ), computers as well as necessary enterprise software, middleware, storage, and audio-visual systems, which enable users to access, store, transmit, and manipulate information.
The phrase ICT had been used by academic researchers since the 1980s, but it became popular बाद it थी प्रयुक्त in a रपट to the uk सरकारी by डेनिस stevenson in 1997 और in the संशोधित नेशनल curriculum लिये इंग्लैण्ड, Wales and Northern Ireland in 2000.
The term ICT is now also used to refer to the convergence of audio-visual और टेलीफोन संजाल साथ कंप्यूटर संजाल through a सिंगल cabling or link system.
There are large economic incentives ( huge cost savings due to elimination of the telephone network ) to merge the audio-visual, building प्रबन्धन और टेलीफोन संजाल साथ the कंप्यूटर संजाल प्रणाली using a सिंगल एकीकृत प्रणाली of cabling, सिग्नल distribution and management.
The term Infocommunications is used in some cases as a shorter रूप of सूचना और संचार ( s ) प्रौद्योगिकी.
In fact Infocommunications is the expansion of telecommunications with information processing and content handling कृत्यों on a आम डिजिटल प्रौद्योगिकी आधार.
For a तुलना of ये और अन्य terms, see.
For ICT विकास अनुक्रमणिका around the world, see.

A schematic presentation of the plum pudding model of the atom ; in Thomson 's mathematical model the `` corpuscles '' ( or आधुनिक electrons ) यहूद arranged non-randomly, in घूर्णन rings
The current model of the sub-atomic structure involves a घना केंद्रक घिरी by a probabilistic `` cloud '' of electrons
The plum pudding model of the atom by J. J. Thomson, who discovered the electron in 1897, was proposed in 1904 before the discovery of the परमाणु केंद्रक in अनुक्रम to add the इलेक्ट्रॉन to the परमाणु मॉडल.
In this मॉडल, the अणु is रचित of electrons ( जिससे thomson स्टिल पुकारा `` corpuscles '', हालांकि G. J. stoney था प्रस्तावित कि अणु of विद्युत be पुकारा electrons in 1894 ) surrounded by a soup of positive charge to balance the electrons ' negative charges, like negatively charged `` plums `` surrounded by positively charged `` pudding ``.
The electrons ( as we know them today ) were thought to be positioned throughout the atom, but with many structures possible लिये positioning अनेक electrons, विशेषकर घूर्णन बजती of electrons ( देखिए नीचे ).
Instead of a soup, the atom was also sometimes said to have था a `` बादल '' of धनात्मक चार्ज.
With this model, Thomson abandoned उसके पहले `` nebular अणु '' hypothesis in which the atom was composed of immaterial vortices.
Now, at least part of the atom was to be composed of Thomson 's particulate negative corpuscles, although the rest of the positively चार्ज भाग of the atom remained somewhat nebulous and ill-defined.
The 1904 Thomson model was disproved by the 1909 सुनहरा foil प्रयोग of hans geiger और अर्नेस्ट मार्सडेन.
This was interpreted by अर्नेस्ट रदरफोर्ड in 1911
to imply a very small nucleus of the atom containing a very high positive charge ( in the मामला of सुनहरा, पर्याप्त to संतुलन परिचय 100 electrons ), thus leading to the Rutherford model of the atom.
Although gold has an atomic number of 79, immediately after रदरफोर्ड 's पेपर appeared in 1911 antonius वैन डेन broek बना the सहज सुझाव कि परमाणु number is nuclear charge.
the पदार्थ required experiment to decide.
Henry Moseley 's work showed experimentally in 1913 ( see Moseley 's law ) that the effective nuclear charge was very close to the atomic number ( Moseley found तभी एक ईकाई अंतर ), और moseley संदर्भित तभी the papers of वैन डेन broek और रदरफोर्ड.
This work culminated in the solar-system-like ( but quantum-limited ) Bohr model of the atom in the वही साल, in जिससे a केंद्रक containing an परमाणु क्रमांक of धनात्मक चार्ज is घिरी by an बराबर क्रमांक of electrons in orbital shells.
Bohr had भी प्रेरित moseley 's work.
Thomson 's model was compared ( though नहीं by thomson ) to a अंग्रेजों मिठाई called plum pudding, hence the name.
Thomson 's पेपर थी प्रकाशित in the कूच 1904 संस्करण of the philosophical Magazine, the leading British science journal of the day.
In Thomson 's view :... the atoms of the elements consist of a क्रमांक of negatively electrified corpuscles enclosed in a गोला of वर्दी positive electrification,...
In this model, the electrons were free to rotate भीतर the blob or बादल of धनात्मक substance.
These orbits were stabilized in the model by the फैक्ट कि जब an इलेक्ट्रॉन स्थानांतरित दूर इससे the बीच of the धनात्मक बादल, it लगा a larger जाल धनात्मक inward फ़ोर्स, क्युकी वहीँ थी अधिक material of opposite charge, inside its orbit ( see Gauss 's law ).
In Thomson 's model, electrons were free to rotate in rings which were further stabilized by interactions between the electrons, और spectra यहूद to be accounted लिये by उर्जा मतभेद of different ring orbits.
thomson attempted to मेक उसके मॉडल खाता लिये कुछ of the major spectral lines known for some elements, but was not notably successful at this.
Still, thomson 's मॉडल ( साथ साथ a समान saturnian रिंग मॉडल लिये परमाणु electrons, भी put forward in 1904 by Nagaoka after James Clerk Maxwell 's model of Saturn 's rings ), were earlier harbingers of the later and more successful solar-system-like Bohr model of the atom.
Typical स्ट्रिप of बेकन.
Bacon is a cured मांस prepared इससे a pig.
It is first cured using विशाल quantities of नमक, either in a brine or in a शुष्क पैकिंग ; the result is fresh bacon ( also known as green bacon ).
Fresh bacon may then be further dried for weeks or months in ठंडा एयर, or it may be boiled or smoked.
Fresh और सूखी बेकन is typically cooked before eating.
Boiled bacon is ready to eat, as is कुछ स्मोक्ड बेकन, लकिन may be cooked further before eating.
Bacon is prepared from अनेक अलग कटौती of meat.
It is usually made from side and back cuts of pork, मगर in the संयुक्त राज्य, जहाँ it is almost always prepared from pork belly ( typically referred to as `` streaky '', `` fatty '', or `` American style '' outside of the US and Canada ).
The side cut रै अधिक मांस और कम मोटे than the belly.
Bacon may be prepared इससे either of दो पृथक वापस कटौती : fatback, जिससे is लगभग pure fat, and pork loin, which is very lean.
bacon-cured pork loin is known as back bacon.
uncooked पोर्क पेट bacon strips.
Bacon may be खाया स्मोक्ड, boiled, fried, baked, or grilled, or used as a minor ingredient to flavor dishes.
Bacon is also used for barding and larding roasts, विशेषकर खेल, e.g. venison, pheasant.
The word is निकला इससे the बूढ़ा ऊँची जर्मनी bacho, अर्थ `` buttock '', `` ham '' or `` side of bacon '', and cognate with the Old French bacon.
In महाद्वीपीय यूरोपीय, इस भाग of the सुअर is प्रायः नहीं स्मोक्ड like bacon is in the United States ; it is used primarily in cubes ( lardons ) as a cooking ingredient, valued both as a source of fat and for its flavor.
In Italy, this is called pancetta and is usually पकाया in छोटी घन or परोसा uncooked और thinly sliced as भाग of an antipasto.
Meat from other animals, such as beef, lamb, chicken, goat, or turkey, may also be cut, cured, or वरना prepared to resemble bacon, and may even be referred to as `` bacon ''.
ऐसे उपयोग is आम in क्षेत्रों साथ significant Jewish and Muslim populations.
The USDA defines bacon as `` the cured पेट of a स्वाइन carcass '' ; अन्य कटौती और विशेषताएँ must be separately qualified ( e.g., `` smoked pork loin bacon '' ).
For safety, बेकन जरूर be treated to prevent trichinosis, caused by trichinella, a parasitic roundworm which can be destroyed by heating, freezing, drying, or smoking.
Bacon is distinguished from salt pork and ham by मतभेद in the brine ( or शुष्क पैकिंग ).
Bacon brine has added curing ingredients, most notably sodium nitrite, and occasionally sodium nitrate or potassium nitrate ( saltpeter ) ; sodium ascorbate or erythorbate हैं added to accelerate curing और stabilize color.
Flavorings such as brown शुगर or मेपल हैं प्रयुक्त लिये कुछ products.
If used, sodium polyphosphates are added to improve sliceability and reduce spattering जब the बेकन is पण fried.
Today, a brine for हैम, लकिन नहीं बेकन, includes a large amount of sugar.
Historically, `` ham '' and `` bacon '' referred to अलग कटौती of मांस कि यहूद brined or packed identically, often together in the same barrel.
The Employee रिटायरमेंट आय सुरक्षा अधिनियम of 1974 ( erisa ) (, संहिताबद्ध in भाग at ) is a संघीय विधि जिससे establishes न्यूनतम मानकों for pension plans in private industry and provides for extensive rules on the federal income tax effects of transactions associated with employee benefit plans.
ERISA was enacted to protect the रूचि of employee benefit plan participants and their beneficiaries by:
Requiring the disclosure of वित्तीय और अन्य सूचना concerning the plan to beneficiaries ;
Establishing standards of conduct लिये योजना fiduciaries ;
providing लिये उचित remedies and access to the federal courts.
ERISA is sometimes used to refer to the full body of laws regulating employee benefit योजनाएँ, जिससे हैं मिला मुख्यतः in the Internal Revenue Code and ERISA itself.
Responsibility for the निर्वचन और प्रवर्तन of erisa is विभाजित among the Department of Labor, the Department of the Treasury ( particularly the Internal Revenue Service ), and the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation.
Illegal immigration to the United States is the act of foreign nationals entering the United States, without government permission and in violation of United States nationality विधि, or रहकर परे the termination date of a visa, also in violation of the law.
A warning sign at the international boundary between the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा in Point Roberts, Washington.
A much different दृष्टिकोण at the u.s.-mexico किनारा near El Paso, Texas
The undocumented immigrant population of the United States in 2008 was estimated by the Center for Immigration Studies to be about 11 million people, down from 12.5 million people in 2007.
अन्य estimates range from 7 to 20 million.
According to a 2005 pew हिस्पैनिक बीच रपट, 56 % of undocumented immigrants were from Mexico ; 22 % were from other Latin American countries ; 13 % were from Asia ; 6 % were from Europe and Canada ; and 3 % were from Africa and the rest of the world.
Alvin Independent स्कूल ज़िला is a school district based in Alvin, Texas ( USA ).
Alvin ISD is a large suburban school district दक्षिण of ह्यूस्टन in the समुदायों of एल्विन, manvel, pearland, hillcrest, rosharon, Iowa Colony, Liverpool, and Amsterdam.
AISD serves Pearland city 's rapidly growing पश्चिमी portion of the नगर सहित the new large master-planned communities of Shadow Creek Ranch, South Fork, and Southern Trails.
Alvin ISD कवर of land.
in इंसान anatomy, the ulnar nerve is a nerve which runs near the ulna bone.
The ulnar collateral स्नायु of कोहनी संयुक्त is in relation with the ulnar nerve.
The nerve is the largest unprotected nerve in the human body ( अर्थ unprotected by मांसपेशी or अस्थि ), so चोट is common.
This nerve is directly connected to the little finger, और the सटा हाफ of the रिंग उंगली, supplying the palmar पक्ष of ये उंगलियाँ, including both front and back of the tips, perhaps as far back as the fingernail beds.
One method of injuring the nerve is to strike the medial epicondyle of the humerus इससे posteriorly, or inferiorly with the elbow flexed.
The ulnar nerve is फंस between the अस्थि and the overlying skin at this point.
This is commonly referred to as bumping एक 's `` funny bone ''.
This नाम is विचार to be a pun, आधारित on the sound resemblance between the name of the bone of the upper arm, the `` humerus `` and the word `` humorous ``.
alternatively, according to the Oxford English Dictionary it may refer to `` the peculiar sensation experienced when it is struck ''.
Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, shortened Hogwarts, is a fictional अंग्रेजों स्कूल of जादू लिये विद्यार्थी aged ग्यारह to eighteen, and is the primary setting for the first six books in J.K. Rowling 's Harry Potter series.
Rowling has suggested that she may have inadvertently लिया the नाम इससे the hogwort संयंत्र ( croton capitatus ), जिससे वो had seen at Kew Gardens some time before writing the series, although the names `` The Hogwarts '' and `` Hoggwart '' appear in the 1954 Nigel Molesworth book How To Be Topp by Geoffrey Willans.
Hogwarts school was voted as the 36th बेहतरीन स्कॉटिश शैक्षणिक स्थापना in a 2008 ऑनलाइन रैंकिंग, outranking Edinburgh 's Loretto School.
According to a director of the Independent Schools Network Rankings, it was added to the schools listing `` लिये मजा '' और थी तब voted on.
The U.S. subprime mortgage crisis was a set of events and conditions that led to a financial crisis and subsequent मंदी कि began in 2008.
It was characterized by a वृद्धि in subprime बंधक delinquencies and foreclosures, and the resulting decline of securities backed by said mortgages.
Several major financial institutions collapsed in September 2008, with significant disruption in the प्रवाह of क्रेडिट to व्यवसायों और उपभोक्ता और the onset of a severe global recession.
There were many causes of the crisis, with commentators assigning अलग स्तर of दोष to वित्तीय संस्थानों, regulators, क्रेडिट agencies, government housing policies, and consumers, among others.
A proximate cause was the rise in subprime lending.
The percentage of lower-quality subprime mortgages originated during a given year rose from the historical 8 % or lower दायरा to लगभग 20 % इससे 2004 to 2006, साथ much उच्चतर ratios in कुछ भाग of the U.S.
A high percentage of these subprime mortgages, over 90 % in 2006 लिये example, were adjustable-rate mortgages.
These two परिवर्तन यहूद भाग of a broader ट्रेंड of lowered lending मानकों and higher-risk mortgage products.
Further, U.S. households had become increasingly ऋणी, साथ the अनुपात of कर्ज़ to डिस्पोजेबल निजी income rising from 77 % in 1990 to 127 % at the end of 2007, much of this increase mortgage-related.
When U.S. home कीमतें अस्वीकृत steeply बाद peaking in mid-2006, borrowers ' ability to refinance their loans became more difficult.
As adjustable-rate mortgages began to reset at higher interest rates ( causing higher monthly भुगतान ), बंधक delinquencies soared.
Securities backed with mortgages, including subprime mortgages, widely held by financial firms globally, खोया सबसे of उनके मान.
Global investors also drastically reduced purchases of mortgage-backed कर्ज़ और अन्य प्रतिभूति as part of a decline in the capacity and willingness of the private financial system to support lending.
Concerns about the soundness of u.S. क्रेडिट और वित्तीय बाज़ार led to tightening क्रेडिट around the world and slowing economic growth in the U.S. and Europe.
The crisis had severe, long-lasting consequences for the u.S. और यूरोपीय economies.
The U.S. entered a deep recession, with nearly 9 लाख कार्य खोया during 2008 and 2009, roughly 6 % of the workforce.
U.S. housing prices fell nearly 30 % on average and the u.S. भण्डार मार्केट गिरी लगभग 50 % by early 2009.
As of early 2013, the U.S. stock market had recovered to its pre-crisis peak but housing prices remained निकट उनके कम पाइंट और unemployment remained elevated.
आर्थिक विकास remained below pre-crisis levels.
यूरोपीय भी जारी to संघर्ष साथ its own economic crisis.
कार्ल जंग in 1910.
Myers and Briggs extrapolated their mbti सिद्धान्त इससे जंग 's कृतियाँ in his book Psychological Types.
The Myers-Briggs Type Indicator ( MBTI ) मूल्यांकन is a psychometric questionnaire designed to measure psychological preferences in how people perceive the world and make decisions.
These preferences were extrapolated from the typological theories proposed by Carl Gustav Jung and पहला प्रकाशित in उसके 1921 किताब मनोवैज्ञानिक प्रकार ( अंग्रेज़ी edition, 1923 ).
Jung theorized कि वहीँ हैं चार प्रिंसिपल मनोवैज्ञानिक कृत्यों by which we experience the world : sensation, intuition, feeling, and thinking.
एक of ये चार कृत्यों is dominant most of the time.
The original developers of the personality inventory were Katharine Cook Briggs and her daughter, Isabel Briggs Myers ; these two, having studied extensively the work of Jung, turned their interest of human behavior into a भक्ति of turning the सिद्धान्त of मनोवैज्ञानिक प्रकार to practical use.
They began creating the indicator during World War II, believing that a knowledge of personality preferences would help women who were entering the industrial workforce for the first time to identify the sort of war-time कार्य कि होता be `` सबसे आरामदायक और प्रभावी ''.
The initial प्रश्नावली grew into the myers-briggs Type Indicator, which was first published in 1962.
The MBTI focuses on normal populations और emphasizes the मान of naturally occurring differences.
Robert Kaplan and Dennis Saccuzzo believe `` the underlying assumption of the mbti is कि we सब have विशिष्ट वरीयताओं in the way we construe our experiences, and these preferences underlie our interests, needs, values, and motivation '' ( p. 499 ).
`` Judas '' is a song by American recording artist Lady Gaga, from her second studio album born इस रास्ता ( 2011 ).
It was released by Interscope Records on अप्रैल 15, 2011, चार दिनों ahead of its scheduled release.
Written and produced by Lady Gaga and RedOne, `` Judas '' is a dance and इलेक्ट्रो हाउस सोंग परिचय a स्त्री in प्रेम साथ a man जो गद्दारी her.
It embodies the incidents that have haunted गागा in the पास्ट, और इसके कोर अर्थ refers to the negative parts of her life that she ca n't escape.
Gaga has further समझाया कि the सोंग थी भी परिचय honoring one 's inner darkness in order to bring oneself into the light.
The artwork for the single थी designed by गागा in microsoft Word.
In spite of a polarizing impact on several religious groups, the song was generally खूब प्राप्त by आलोचकों, जो likened the song to `` Bad Romance `` with some noting it should have been the album 's lead single.
The song has a similar sound to गागा 's पिछला redone-produced ट्रैक्स, सहित `` पोकर Face ``, `` LoveGame ``, `` Bad Romance '', and `` Alejandro ``.
It contains three पृथक hooks और a हाउस -influenced break down.
Gaga समझाया कि the लाइनों बोला दौरान the विश्लेषण बात about her as beyond redemption, regarding the traditional views of what a woman should be.
`` Judas '' initially had a strong sales opening, but was less successful commercially in तुलना to गागा 's पिछला singles.
The song reached the शीर्ष टेन of the charts in most major music markets, and also reached the top of the charts in South Korea.
A music video for the song was filmed in April 2011, co-directed by Gaga and Laurieann गिब्सन और co-starring नॉर्मन reedus.
It has a Biblical storyline where Reedus played Judas इस्कैरियट और गागा निभाई मरियम magdalene.
The video portrays them as आधुनिक दिन प्रचारकों going to Jerusalem.
It included the biblical स्टोरी of यहूदा betraying Jesus, and ended with Gaga as Magdalene getting stoned to death.
Before its release, the Catholic League condemned Gaga for the कथित उपयोग of धार्मिक imagery और उसके role in the video.
However, critics generally praised the वीडियो, नहीं finding any offensive content.
The video was nominated for two awards at the 2011 MTV वीडियो म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार.
Gaga has performed `` Judas '' on a number of television shows, including The Graham नॉर्टन दिखाएँ, शनिवार रात्रि सजीव, शुभ morning americas `` गर्मियाँ कॉन्सर्ट श्रेणी '', the फ्रेंच X Factor as well as on The Ellen DeGeneres Show.
मारविन gaye ( अप्रैल 2, 1939april 1, 1984 ), born मारविन Pentz Gay, Jr., was an American singer-songwriter and musician.
Gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown Records in the 1960s with a string of hits including `` How Sweet It Is ( To Be Loved By You ) `` and `` I Heard It Through the Grapevine `` and duet रिकार्डिंग साथ मरियम कुएं और tammi terrell, बाद कमाई the शीर्षक `` प्रिंस of motown '' and `` Prince of Soul ''.
During the 1970s, Gaye recorded the concept albums What 's Going on और let 's मिलेंगी it on और became among the पहला कलाकारों in motown to ब्रेक दूर इससे the reins of its production company.
Gaye 's बाद रिकार्डिंग बहकावे several R & B subgenres such as quiet storm and neo-soul.
Following a period in Europe under a tax exile in the early 1980s, gaye released the 1982 ग्रैमी award-winning hit `` यौन healing `` and the Midnight Love album.
Since his death in 1984, gaye रै महरूम मरणोपरांत सम्मानित by अनेक संस्थानों, सहित the ग्रैमी आजीवन Achievement Award and the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.
The Academy Award for Best Picture is one of the Academy Awards of Merit presented annually by the अकादमी of गति चित्र कला और sciences ( ampas ) to निर्माता working in the motion picture industry and is the only category in which every member is eligible to nominate for.
Best Picture is considered the most important of the Academy Awards, as it represents सब the directing, एक्टिंग, म्यूज़िक composing, लिखने, editing and other efforts put forth into a film.
Consequently, Best Picture is the फाइनल पुरस्कार और the निष्कर्ष of the सालाना Academy Awards ceremony.
The Grand Staircase columns at the Dolby Theatre in लॉस एंजिल्स, जहाँ the अकादमी पुरस्कार ceremonies have महरूम आयोजित चूंकि 2002, शोकेस every film that has won the Best Picture title since the award 's inception 85 years ago.
Heavy Rain is an इंटरैक्टिव नाटक action-adventure वीडियो game created by French developer Quantic Dream exclusively for the PlayStation 3.
The game is written and directed by Quantic Dream 's संस्थापक और सीईओ David Cage.
Heavy Rains story is a dramatic thriller modelled बाद फिल्मी noir, featuring चार protagonists शामिल साथ the mystery of the Origami Killer, a serial killer who uses extended periods of rainfall to drown his victims.
Ethan Mars is trying to save his son from being the next victim, while investigative journalist Madison Paige, FBI profiler Norman jayden, और निजी जासूस स्कॉट शेल्बी हैं प्रत्येक trying to track down clues to the Origami Killer 's identity.
The player interacts with the game by performing actions highlighted on screen related to motions on the controller, और in कुछ मामले, performing a श्रेणी of जल्दी समय कार्यक्रम during fast-paced action sequences.
The player 's decisions and क्रियाएँ दौरान the खेल होगा affect the narrative.
The main characters can be killed, और निश्चित क्रियाएँ may lead to different scenes and endings.
A playable demo was released on 11 फ़रवरी 2010.
The demo थी released prior to इस तिथि लिये लोगों जो took part in a Four Day Challenge on 5 February 2010.
A पैच to allow उपयोग of the प्लेस्टेशन मूव controller to play the game was released in September 2010.
Heavy Rain थी critically acclaimed and has sold over two million copies.
It won 2010 's Game of the Year from CNN and Gaming Union, and बेहतरीन ps3 खेल of 2010 by gamespy और ign.
A modified version of the game was released titled भारी बरसात संस्करण modifiée exclusively in France, aimed towards a younger audience.
in 2010, the खेल थी शामिल in the book 1001 Video Games You Must Play Before You Die.
Total superannuation industry देनदारी : सदस्यों निधि और reserves ( a $ लाखो ) since 1988.
Annual total superannuation industry एसेट विकास 1996-2005.
superannuation in ऑस्ट्रेलिया refers to the arrangements which people make in Australia to have funds available for them in retirement.
In Australia, superannuation arrangements are government-supported and प्रोत्साहित, और न्यूनतम प्रावधानों हैं अनिवार्य for employees.
For example, employers are required to pay a proportion of an employee 's salaries और मजदूरी ( फिलहाल 9 % ) into a superannuation निधि, लकिन लोगों हैं प्रोत्साहित to put aside additional funds into superannuation.
the न्यूनतम दायित्व जरूरी by नियोक्ता is set to increase to 12 % gradually stepping annually from 2013 to 2020.
An individual can withdraw निधि आउट of a superannuation निधि when the person meets one of the conditions of release contained in Schedule 1 of the Superannuation Industry ( Supervision ) Regulations 1994.

Electoral कॉलेज मैप प्रर्दशित the परिणाम of the 2012 U.S. presidential election.
President बराक ओबामा ( d - il ) जीती the लोकप्रिय vote in 26 states and the District of Columbia ( denoted in blue ) to capture 332 electoral votes.
पूर्व राज्यपाल mitt romney ( r - ma ) जीती the लोकप्रिय vote in 24 states ( denoted in red ) to capture 206 electoral votes.
Cartogram representation of the चुनावी कॉलेज vote लिये the 2012 election, with each square representing one electoral vote.
The United States Electoral College is the institution that officially elects the अध्यक्ष और वाइस अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य every four years.
The President and Vice President are not निर्वाचित सीधे by the मतदाता.
Instead, they are elected by `` electors '' who are chosen by popular vote on a state-by-state आधार.
Electors are apportioned to प्रत्येक राज्य और the ज़िला of कोलंबिया, लकिन नहीं to territorial possessions of the United States, such as Puerto Rico and Guam.
The number of electors in each state is equal to the number of सदस्यों of कॉंग्रेस to जिससे the राज्य is हकदार.
The Twenty-third Amendment रै सदा resulted in the District of Columbia having three electors.
There are 538 electors, based on there being 435 representatives and 100 सीनेटरों, प्लस the तीन निर्वाचक इससे the ज़िला of कोलंबिया.
Electors are pledged to particular presidential and vice presidential उम्मीदवार, हालांकि unpledged निर्वाचक are possible.
In all states, except Maine और नेब्रास्का, निर्वाचक हैं निर्वाचित on a `` winner-take-all '' basis.
That is, all निर्वाचक pledged to the अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी who wins the most votes in a state become electors for that state.
Maine and Nebraska use the `` congressional district method '', selecting एक elector भीतर प्रत्येक congressional ज़िला by लोकप्रिय vote और selecting the बाकी दो निर्वाचक by a राज्यव्यापी popular vote.
Although no elector is जरूरी by संघीय विधि to honor a pledge, there have only been very few occasions when an elector voted contrary to a pledge.
the बारहवीं amendment specifies कैसा a अध्यक्ष और वाइस अध्यक्ष हैं निर्वाचित and requires each elector to cast one vote for President and another vote for Vice President.
Critics argue that the Electoral College is inherently undemocratic और देता झूले राज्य अनुपातहीन influence in electing the President and Vice President.
The Electoral College gives a न्यूमेरिक लाभ in the चुनाव of the president to the smaller states, as the minimum number of electors for the small states is three compared to one for the election of representatives.
On the other hand, the winner-take-all विधि of मतदान favors the larger states.
A number of constitutional amendments have been proposed seeking to alter the चुनावी कॉलेज or बदलें it with a direct popular vote.
Barack Hussein Obama II ( ; born August 4, 1961 ) is the 44th और वर्तमान अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, the पहला अफ़्रीकी American to hold the office.
Born in Honolulu, Hawaii, ओबामा is a ग्रैजुएट of कोलंबिया विश्वविद्यालयों और हार्वर्ड Law School, where he was president of the Harvard Law Review.
He was a community आयोजक in शिकागो पहले कमाई उसके law degree.
He worked as a civil rights attorney in Chicago and taught constitutional law at the विश्वविद्यालयों of शिकागो विधि स्कूल इससे 1992 to 2004.
He served three terms representing the 13th ज़िला in the इलिनोइस सीनेट इससे 1997 to 2004, running unsuccessfully for the United States House of Representatives in 2000.
In 2004, Obama received national attention during his campaign to represent Illinois in the United States Senate साथ उसके विजय in the कूच लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी प्राथमिक, उसके keynote पता at the लोकतांत्रिक National Convention in July, and his election to the Senate in November.
He began his presidential campaign in 2007, and in 2008, after a close primary campaign against Hillary Rodham Clinton, he won sufficient delegates in the Democratic Party primaries to प्राप्त the अध्यक्षीय नामांकन.
He then defeated Republican nominee जॉन मैक्केन in the सामान्य चुनाव, और थी उदघाटन as president on January 20, 2009.
Nine महीने later, Obama was named the 2009 Nobel Peace Prize laureate.
He was re-elected president in November 2012, defeating Republican nominee Mitt Romney, and was sworn in for a second term on January 20, 2013.
Early in his पहला पद in दफ्तर, ओबामा हस्ताक्षरित into विधि आर्थिक stimulus legislation in response to the Great Recession in the form of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 and the Tax Relief, Unemployment Insurance Reauthorization, and Job Creation Act of 2010.
Other major domestic initiatives in his presidency include the Patient सुरक्षा और सस्ती परवाह अधिनियम, प्रायः referred to as `` obamacare '' ; the Dodd–Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act ; the Do n't Ask, Do n't Tell Repeal Act of 2010 ; the Budget Control Act of 2011 ; and the American Taxpayer Relief Act of 2012.
In May 2012, he became the first sitting U.S. president to publicly support same-sex marriage और in 2013 उसके प्रशासन दायर briefs जिससे urged the परम् अदालत to नियम in एहसान of same-sex युगल in two high-profile cases.
In foreign policy, Obama ended U.S. military involvement in the Iraq War, increased troop levels in Afghanistan, हस्ताक्षरित the नई प्रारंभ बाहें कंट्रोल सन्धि साथ रूस, ordered u.S. सैन्य भागीदारी in Libya, and ordered the military operation that resulted in the death of Osama bin Laden.

Sample दृश्य of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक health record
An electronic health record ( EHR ) is an evolving concept defined as a systematic collection of electronic स्वास्थ्य सूचना परिचय व्यक्तिगत मरीजों or populations.
It is a record in digital format that is theoretically सक्षम of being shared across different health care settings.
In some cases this sharing can occur by रास्ता of network-connected enterprise-wide सूचना प्रणालियों और अन्य information networks or exchanges.
EHRs may include a range of data, including demographics, medical history, medication and allergies, immunization औकात, प्रयोगशाला परीक्षण परिणाम, radiology images, vital signs, personal stats like age and weight, and billing information.

The Rime of the Ancient Mariner ( originally The Rime of the Ancyent Marinere ) is the longest प्रमुख कविता by the अंग्रेज़ी कवि सैमुएल टेलर कॉलरिज, लिखा in 1797–98 and published in 1798 in the first edition of Lyrical Ballads.
Modern editions use a later संशोधित संस्करण मुद्रित in 1817 that featured a gloss.
Along with other poems in Lyrical Ballads, it was a सिग्नल शिफ़्ट to आधुनिक काव्य और the शुरूआत of British Romantic literature.
A प्रॉक्सी auto-config ( pac ) संचिका defines कैसा वेब browsers and other user agents can automatically choose the appropriate proxy server ( access method ) for fetching a given URL.
A PAC file contains a जावास्क्रिप्ट फलन “findproxyforurl ( url, host ) ”.
This function returns a string with एक or अधिक अभिगम विधि specifications.
ये विशेषताएँ कारण the user agent to use a particular proxy server or to connect directly.
Multiple specifications provide a fall-back जब a प्रॉक्सी fails to respond.
The browser fetches इस pac संचिका before requesting other URLs.
The URL of the pac संचिका is either विन्यस्त manually or determined automatically by the Web Proxy Autodiscovery Protocol.
Zendaya Coleman ( born September 1, 1996 ), known mononymously as zendaya, is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री, सिंगर and dancer.
she stars on the Disney चैनल sitcom शेक It Up as Rocky Blue.

Zendaya is भी a संगीतकार.

She released a single from an independent label called `` Swag It Out `` और another सिंगल साथ बेला thorne पुकारा `` देखें me, '' which is featured on the Break It Down album.

This is a list of airports in पेन्सिलवेनिया ( a u.S. राज्य ), grouped by type and sorted by location.
It contains all public-use और सैन्य एयरपोर्ट in the state.

iOS ( previously iphone os ) is a मोबाईल ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली विकसित और वितरित by ठहराना Inc. Originally released in 2007 for the iPhone and iPod Touch platforms, it has been extended to support other Apple devices such as the iPad and Apple TV.
Unlike Microsoft 's खिड़कियाँ फोन और google 's एंड्रॉइड, ठहराना करता नहीं license iOS for installation on non-Apple hardware.
, Apple 's App Store contained more than 700,000 iOS applications, which have collectively महरूम डाउनलोड अधिक than 30 billion times.
It had a 21 % share of the smartphone mobile operating system इकाई shipped in the चौथी क्वार्टर of 2012, पीछे only Google 's Android.
In June 2012, it accounted for 65 % of mobile web data consumption ( including उपयोग on दोनो the ipod टच और the ipad ).
at the हाफ of 2012, वहीँ यहूद 410 million devices activated.
According to the special media event held by Apple on सितंबर 12, 2012, 400 लाख डिवाइस have महरूम बेची through June 2012.
The user interface of iOS is based on the concept of सीधा हेरफेर, using multi-touch gestures.
Interface control elements consist of sliders, switches, और बटन.
Interaction with the OS includes gestures such as swipe, tap, पिंच, और रिवर्स पिंच, सब of जिससे have विशिष्ट परिभाषाएं भीतर the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of the iOS operating system and its multi-touch interface.
Internal accelerometers are used by some applications to respond to shaking the device ( one आम परिणाम is the undo कमांड ) or घूर्णन it in तीन आयाम ( एक आम परिणाम is switching from portrait to landscape mode ).
iOS is निकला इससे os x, with which it shares the Darwin foundation.
iOS is Apple 's mobile version of the OS X ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली प्रयुक्त on ठहराना computers.
In iOS, वहीँ हैं चार abstraction परतों : the कोर OS layer, the Core Services layer, the Media layer, and the Cocoa Touch layer.
The current version of the operating system ( iOS 6.1.3 ) dedicates 1-1.5 gb of the यंत्र 's फ्लैश मेमोरी लिये the प्रणाली partition, using roughly 800 MB of that partition ( varying by model ) for iOS itself.
iOS currently रनों on iphone, ipad, iPod touch and Apple TV.

A spoiler is an automotive aerodynamic यंत्र जिनकी intended डिज़ाइन फलन is to 'spoil ' प्रतिकूल air movement across a body of a vehicle in motion, usually described as turbulence or drag.
Spoilers on the सामने of a गाडी हैं प्रायः पुकारा एयर dams, because in addition to directing air flow they also reduce the amount of air flowing underneath the vehicle which generally reduces aerodynamic lift and drag.
Spoilers are often fitted to race and high-performance sports गाड़ियाँ, हालांकि वे have become आम on passenger vehicles as well.
Some spoilers are added to cars primarily for styling purposes and have either little aerodynamic लाभ or भी मेक the वायुगतिकी बदतर.
Spoilers for cars are often incorrectly उलझन साथ, or the पद प्रयुक्त interchangeably with, wings.
Automotive wings are devices whose intended design is to generate downforce as एयर गुजरता around उन्हें, नहीं बस disrupt existing airflow patterns.
Mario, who serves as Nintendo 's mascot, is a fictional अक्षर निर्मित by खेल पंक्तियां शिगेरू miyamoto और voiced by Charles Martinet.
This is a list of video games where the character Mario plays a part, either as the समर्थक, विपक्षी, supporting अक्षर, as भाग of an ensemble cast, as a cameo, or in a game within a game.
It does not include simple references to the character, such as the portraits of Mario found in The लेजेंड of zelda : a कड़ी to the Past.
The year indicated is the year the game was first released, सबसे commonly in जापानी ; games were sometimes released years later in other regions of the world.

`` Man of Constant Sorrow '' ( also known as `` I Am A Man of Constant Sorrow '' ) is a traditional American लोक सोंग पहला अंकित by लंड burnett, a partially अँधा fiddler from Kentucky.
The सोंग थी originally अंकित by burnett as `` विदाई Song '' printed in a Richard Burnett songbook, circa 1913.
An early version was recorded by Emry आर्थर in 1928 ( vocalion Vo 5208 ).
Public ब्याज in the सोंग थी नवीनीकृत after the release of the 2000 film O Brother, Where Art Thou ?
, as it plays a central role in the फिल्मी 's प्लाट.
The song was also included in the film 's अत्यधिक कामयाब, multiple-platinum selling साउंडट्रैक.

The volt ( symbol : V ) is the si निकला ईकाई लिये इलेक्ट्रिक potential ( voltage ), electric potential difference, and electromotive force.
The volt is named in honor of the Italian physicist Alessandro Volta ( 1745–1827 ), who invented the वोल्टायिक pile, संभवतः the first chemical battery.
A plaque commemorating the location of the साराजेवो हत्या और कदम of gavrilo princip ( चित्र लिया in 1987, before steps were removed in 1992 and plaque changed from Cyrillic to Latin script )
A प्लैक commemorating the स्थान of the Sarajevo assassination ( image taken in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914, Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne, and his wife, Sophie, Duchess of Hohenberg, were shot dead in Sarajevo, by Gavrilo Princip, one of a समूह of छह बोस्नियाई serb हत्यारे समन्वित by डेनियल Ilić.
The political objective of the assassination was to break off Austria-Hungary 's south-slav प्रांतों so वे could be combined into a Greater Serbia or a Yugoslavia.
The assassins ' motives were सतत साथ the गति कि बाद became known as Young Bosnia.
Serbian military officers stood पीछे the attack.
At the top of these Serbian सैन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों थी मुख्य of सर्बियाई सैन्य प्रज्ञा dragutin Dimitrijević, his righthand man Major Vojislav Tankosić, and Masterspy Rade Malobabić.
Major Tankosić armed the assassins with bombs और pistols और प्रशिक्षित उन्हें.
The assassins were दिए अभिगम to the वही clandestine टनल of safe-houses and agents that Rade Malobabić used for the infiltration of weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary.
The assassins, the key members of the clandestine tunnel, and the key Serbian military conspirators who were still जिंदा यहूद गिरफ्तार, आजमाया, convicted और punished.
Those who were arrested in Bosnia were tried in साराजेवो in October 1914.
The other conspirators were arrested and tried before a सर्बियाई कंगारू अदालत on the french-controlled Salonika Front in 1916–1917 on unrelated false charges ; Serbia executed three of the top military conspirators.
Much of what is known about the assassinations आता इससे ये दो trials and related records.
Assignment of responsibility for the bombing and murders of 28 जून is अत्यधिक विवादास्पद क्युकी the आक्रमण led to the outbreak of World War I one month later.
Mission San Juan Capistrano was a स्पेनी मिशन in दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, स्तिथ in present-day San Juan Capistrano.
It was founded on All Saints ' Day November 1, 1776, by स्पेनी catholics of the Franciscan Order.
Named for Giovanni da Capistrano, a 15th सदी theologian और `` योद्धा पुजारी '' जो resided in the abruzzo प्रदेश of इटली, सैन जुआन capistrano रै the भेद of being home to the oldest building in California still in use, a chapel built in 1782.
Known alternately as `` Serra 's Chapel '' and `` Father सेरा 's गिरिजाघर, '' it is the तभी extant ढांचा जहाँ it रै महरूम प्रलेखित that the padre Junipero Serra celebrated mass.
One of the best known of the Alta California missions ( and one of the few missions to have actually been founded twice—others होने मिशन सैन जिबरील arcángel और मिशन la purísima concepción ).
The site was originally consecrated on अक्तूबर 30, 1775, by पिता fermín lasuén, but was quickly abandoned due to unrest among the indigenous population in San Diego.
The success of the settlement is evident in इसके ऐतिहासिक रिकॉर्ड.
Prior to the arrival of the missionaries, some 550 natives यहूद बिखरे throughout the local area.
By 1790, the number of converted Christians had grown to 700, and just six years later nearly 1,000 `` neophytes `` ( recent converts ) जिया in or around the मिशन compound.
1,649 baptisms were conducted that year alone, out of the कुल 4,639 souls परिवर्तित between 1776 and 1847.
More than 2,000 former inhabitants ( mostly juaneño इंडियंस ) हैं दफ्न in unmarked क़ब्रों in the मिशन 's cemetery ( campo santo ).
The remains of Father ( later Monsignor ) St. John O'Sullivan, who recognized the property 's historic value and working tirelessly to conserve and rebuild its structures, are buried at the entrance to the कब्रिस्तान on the वेस्ट पक्ष of the प्रॉपर्टी, और a प्रतिमा उठाया in उसके सम्मान स्टैंड at the सिर of the क्रिप्ट.
The surviving chapel also serves as the final resting place of three padres who passed on while serving at the Mission : Fathers José Barona, विसेंट fustér, और विसेंट Pascual Oliva are all entombed beneath the sanctuary floor.
The criolla or `` मिशन अंगूर, '' थी first planted at San Juan Capistrano in 1779 ; in 1783, the first wine produced in Alta California emerged from the Mission 's winery.
The मिशन डाला a long काल of क्रमिक decline after secularization in 1833.
Numerous efforts were made over the years to restore the Mission to its पूर्व महिमा, लकिन none मिले साथ ग्रेट कामयाबी जबतक the arrival of Father O'Sullivan in 1910.
Restoration efforts continue, और `` सेरा 's चैपल '' is still used for religious services.
About half-a-million visitors, including 80,000 स्कूल children, आइये to the मिशन प्रत्येक year.
And while the ruins of `` The Great Stone Church '' ( which was all but leveled by an 1812 earthquake ) are a प्रसिद्ध architectural अचरज, the मिशन is perhaps best known for the annual `` Return of the Swallows '' which is traditionally observed every March 19 ( Saint Joseph 's Day ).
Mission San Juan Capistrano has served as a favorite विषय लिये अनेक notable कलाकारों, और रै महरूम immortalized in literature and on film numerous times, perhaps more than any other mission.
In 1984, a modern church complex was constructed just north and west of the मिशन यौगिक और is अभी ज्ञात as मिशन Basilica San Juan Capistrano.
Today, the मिशन यौगिक serves as a संग्रहालय, साथ the सेरा Chapel within the compound serving as a chapel for the mission parish.
Better Off Dead is a 1985 अमरीकी टीन रोमांटिक कॉमेडी फिल्मी अभिनीत जॉन cusack और written and directed by Savage Steve Holland.
It tells the स्टोरी of ऊँची स्कूल छात्र लेन myer जो is suicidal after his girlfriend breaks up with him.
Mercedes-Benz Superdome ( originally Louisiana Superdome and commonly The Superdome ) is a sports and exhibition stadium, located in the Central Business ज़िला of नई ऑरलियन्स, louisiana, USA.
Plans were drawn up in 1967, by the New Orleans modernist architectural कड़ of कर्टिस और Davis.
Its steel frame covers a expanse.
Its dome is बना of a lamella multi-ringed फ़्रेम और रै a diameter of, making it the largest fixed domed structure in the world.
It is home to the NFL 's New Orleans Saints, the NCAA 's प्रभाग i-a tulane ग्रीन वेव फ़ुटबॉल टोली ( the largest फ़ुटबॉल स्टेडियम in सम्मेलन यूएसए ), the राज्य फार्म bayou क्लासिक, the r+l Carriers New Orleans Bowl, the Allstate Sugar Bowl and, every fourth year, the BCS National Championship Game.
Because of the size and location in one of the major tourist destinations in the United States, the Superdome routinely makes the `` short list '' of candidates being माना लिये प्रमुख sporting कार्यक्रम, ऐसे as the सुपर कटोरी और the Final Four.
In 2005, the Superdome gained international attention of a different type when it housed हज़ारों of लोगों seeking आश्रय इससे Hurricane Katrina.
The building suffered extensive damage as a result of the storm, and was closed लिये अनेक महीने afterward.
On October 3, 2011, it was घोषित कि जर्मनी automaker Mercedes-Benz purchased naming rights to the stadium.
The नई नाम took effect on October 23, 2011.
It is the third stadium that has naming rights from Mercedes-Benz ( and first in the United राज्य ), बाद the mercedes-benz एरिना, the स्टेडियम of bundesliga क्लबों vfb stuttgart, in stuttgart, Germany and the Mercedes-Benz Arena in Shanghai, China.
