Disney 's Animal किंगडम आवास is an african-themed डीलक्स resort at the Walt Disney World Resort.
It खोली on अप्रैल 16, 2001.
the रिज़ॉर्ट is owned and operated by Walt Disney Parks and Resorts.
Disney 's Animal Kingdom Lodge is located in the Animal Kingdom Resort Area, सटा to डिज़्नी 's एनिमल किंगडम.
It gives guests the opportunity to view grazing wildlife outside their rooms and public areas in the रिज़ॉर्ट भीतर निकटता of the animals, conveying the feeling of being in an African savanna.
The People 's Party, also known as the `` Populists '', थी a short-lived राजनैतिक party in the United States established in 1891 during the Populist movement ( United States, 19th Century ).
It was most important in 1892-96, और तब rapidly faded away.
Based among poor, white cotton farmers in the South ( especially North Carolina, Alabama, and Texas ) and hard-pressed wheat farmers in the plains states ( especially Kansas and Nebraska ), it represented a radical crusading रूप of agrarianism और दुश्मनी to बैंको, railroads, और elites generally.
It sometimes formed coalitions साथ मजदूर संघ, और in 1896 the Democrats endorsed their presidential nominee, William Jennings Bryan.
The terms `` populist '' and `` populism `` are commonly used for anti-elitist appeals in opposition to स्थापित रूचि और मुख्यधारा पार्टियों.
Linguistic map of सीरियल, कैमरून, और Benin.
Sign in English, बाहर the विश्वविद्यालयों of Lagos
वहीँ हैं सैंकड़ों of languages spoken in Nigeria.
The major भाषाएं हैं योरूबा, हौसा, इग्बो, Edo, Fulfulde, Kanuri, and Ibibio.
The official language of Nigeria, English, the पूर्व औपनिवेशिक भाषा, थी चुनी to सुकर the सांस्कृतिक और भाषाई एकता of the country.
English, however, remains an exclusive preserve of the देश 's शहरी elite, और is नहीं widely बोला in ग्रामीण areas, which comprise three quarters of the countries population.
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity is a microcosm of अफ़्रीकी as a पूरे, encompassing तीन major African languages families : Afroasiatic, Nilo-Saharan, and Niger–Congo.
Nigeria also has several as-yet unclassified भाषाएं, ऐसे as cen tuum, जिससे may represent a relic of an even greater diversity prior to the spread of the current language families.
A series of events led to the आक्रमण on पर्ल हार्बर.
War between Japan and the United States had been a possibility that each nation 's military forces planned लिये चूंकि the 1920s, हालांकि रियल टेंशन किया नहीं begin until the 1931 invasion of Manchuria by Japan.
Over the अगला दशक, जापानी विस्तारित धीरे into चीन, अग्रणी to all out war between the two in 1937.
In 1940 Japan invaded French Indochina in an प्रयत्न to embargo सब imports into चीन, सहित युद्ध आपूर्तियाँ purchased from the U.S.
This move prompted the United States to embargo all oil exports, leading the Imperial Japanese Navy to अनुमान कि it था कम than दो सालो of बंकर आयल बाकी और to support the मौजूदा योजनाएँ to seize आयल संसाधन in the Dutch East Indies.
नियोजन था महरूम underway लिये कुछ समय on an attack on the `` Southern Resource Area '' to add it to the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere that Japan envisioned in the Pacific.
The Philippine islands, at that time an American territory, यहूद भी a जापानी target.
The Japanese military concluded that an invasion of the Philippines होता provoke an अमरीकी सैन्य response.
Rather than seize and fortify the islands, and wait for the inevitable US counterattack, Japan 's military leaders instead decided on the pre-emptive Pearl Harbor attack, जिससे वे assumed होता negate the अमरीकी शक्तियां needed लिये the मुक्ति और reconquest of the आइलैंड्स.
Planning for the आक्रमण था begun in बहुत early 1941, by Admiral Isoroku Yamamoto.
He finally जीती assent इससे the नवल High Command by, among other things, threatening to resign.
The attack was स्वीकृत in the गर्मियाँ at an इम्पीरियल सम्मेलन and again at a second Conference in the fall.
simultaneously over the year, pilots were trained, and ships prepared for its execution.
Authority for the attack was granted at the दूसरी इम्पीरियल सम्मेलन if a diplomatic result satisfactory to Japan was not reached.
After final approval by Emperor Hirohito the order to आक्रमण थी जारी at the शुरूआत of दिसम्बर.
A common दफ्तर stapler
A common स्कूल stapler
A stapler is a mechanical device that joins चादरें of पेपर or समान सामग्री by driving a thin metal staple through the sheets and folding the ends.
Staplers are widely प्रयुक्त in सरकारी, कारोबार, offices, homes and schools.
The word `` stapler '' can दरअसल refer to a number of different devices of varying uses.
In addition to joining paper sheets together, staplers can also be used in a surgical setting to जुड़ें ऊतक साथ साथ सर्जिकल स्टेपल्स to बंद a surgical wound ( much in the same way as stitches or sutures ).
typically, सबसे staplers are used to join multiple sheets of paper.
Paper staplers come in two पृथक प्रकार : हस्तचालित और इलेक्ट्रिक.
Manual staplers are normally hand-held, although models that are used जबकि नियत on a डेस्क or अन्य सतह are not uncommon.
इलेक्ट्रिक staplers मौजूद in a variety of different designs and models.
Their primary operating function is to join large numbers of paper चादरें साथ in रैपिड उत्तराधिकार.
Some इलेक्ट्रिक staplers can जुड़ें up to 20 sheets at a time.
Swallowing, known scientifically as deglutition, is the प्रक्रम in the इंसान or एनिमल देह that makes something pass from the mouth, to the pharynx, and into the esophagus, while shutting the epiglottis.
If this fails and the object goes through the श्वासनली, तब choking or pulmonary aspiration can occur.
In the human body it is नियंत्रित by the swallowing reflex.
Thaddeus Stevens ( April 4, 1792 – August 11, 1868 ), of पेन्सिलवेनिया, थी a नेता of the कट्टरपंथी रिपब्लिकन faction of the Republican Party and a fierce opponent of slavery.
He was एक of the सबसे influential members in the history of Congress.
as अध्यक्ष of the शक्तिशाली हाउस तरीके और अर्थात् कमेटी, स्टीवंस, a witty, sarcastic speaker and flamboyant party leader, dominated the House from 1861 until his death.
He wrote much of the financial विधान कि सशुल्क लिये the American Civil War.
Stevens and Senator Charles Sumner were the प्रधान नेताओ of the कट्टरपंथी republicans during the war and Reconstruction era.
Scholarly views of स्टीवंस have swung sharply since his death as interpretations of Reconstruction have changed.
Historians of the Dunning School ( 1890s–1940s ) held Stevens responsible for demanding harsh treatment of the white South and violating American traditions of republicanism, depicting स्टीवंस as a विलेन लिये उसके वकालत of harsh measures in the South such as disfranchising all ex-Confederates.
This highly negative characterization आयोजित sway into the 1950s.
The rise of the neo-abolitionist स्कूल in the 1950s led to a दमदार धनात्मक सराहना of Stevens ' work on civil rights for Freedmen.
A recent biographer characterizes him as, `` The Great Commoner, savior of free public education in Pennsylvania, national Republican leader in the struggles against slavery in the United States and intrepid mainstay of the attempt to secure racial justice for the Freedmen दौरान पुनर्निर्माण, the तभी सदस्य of the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि कभी to have महरूम known as the 'dictator ' of Congress. ''
Overview of the अनुवाद of eukaryotic messenger RNA
Diagram showing the अनुवाद of mRNA and the synthesis of proteins by a ribosome
In molecular जीवविज्ञान और आनुवंशिकी, अनुवाद is the process through which cellular ribosomes manufacture proteins.
It is part of the प्रक्रम of जीन अभिव्यक्ति.
In translation, messenger RNA ( mRNA ) produced by transcription is decoded by the राइबोसोम to उपज a विशिष्ट अमीनो एसिड कड़ी, or polypeptide, that will later fold into an active protein.
In bacteria, translation occurs in the cell 's cytoplasm, where the विशाल और छोटी subunits of the ribosome are located, and bind to the mRNA.
In eukaryotes, अनुवाद occurs आरपार the झिल्ली of the endoplasmic reticulum in a process called vectorial synthesis.
The राइबोसोम facilitates डिकोडिंग by inducing the बाइंडिंग of trnas with complementary anticodon sequences to that of the mRNA.
The tRNAs carry specific amino acids that are chained together into a polypeptide as the mrna गुजरता through और is `` read '' by the ribosome in a fashion reminiscent to that of a stock ticker and ticker tape.
In many instances, the entire ribosome/mRNA complex binds to the outer membrane of the अशिष्ट endoplasmic reticulum और रिलीज the nascent प्रोटीन polypeptide अंदर लिये later vesicle transport and secretion outside of the cell.
Many types of transcribed RNA, such as transfer RNA, ribosomal RNA, and small nuclear RNA, do not undergo अनुवाद into प्रोटीन.
Translation proceeds in चार phases : दीक्षा, elongation, translocation and termination ( all describing the growth of the amino acid chain, or polypeptide that is the product of translation ).
Amino acids are brought to ribosomes और समवेत into प्रोटीन.
In activation, the correct amino acid is covalently bonded to the सही ट्रांसफ़र rna ( tRNA ).
The अमीनो एसिड is joined by इसके carboxyl group to the 3 ' OH of the tRNA by an ester bond.
When the tRNA has an amino एसिड linked to it, it is termed `` charged ''.
Initiation involves the छोटी subunit of the राइबोसोम बाइंडिंग to the 5 ' end of mRNA with the help of initiation factors ( IF ).
Termination of the polypeptide happens जब the a साईट of the राइबोसोम चेहरों a रोकें codon ( UAA, UAG, or UGA ).
no trna can recognize or bind to this codon.
बजाय, the रोकें codon induces the बाइंडिंग of a रिलीज factor protein that prompts the disassembly of the entire ribosome/mRNA complex.
A number of antibiotics act by inhibiting अनुवाद ; ये शामिल anisomycin, cycloheximide, chloramphenicol, tetracycline, streptomycin, erythromycin, and puromycin, among others.
Prokaryotic ribosomes have a अलग ढांचा इससे कि of eukaryotic ribosomes, और यूँ एंटीबायोटिक can specifically target bacterial infections without any detriment to a eukaryotic host 's cells.
A multimedia message on a मोबाईल फोन.
Multimedia Messaging Service ( MMS ) is a standard way to send संदेश कि शामिल मल्टीमीडिया सामग्री to and from mobile phones.
It extends the core SMS ( Short Message Service ) capability that allowed exchange of text संदेश तभी up to 160 वर्ण in लंबाई.
The most popular use is to send photographs from camera-equipped handsets, although it is also popular as a method of delivering न्यूज और entertainment सामग्री सहित वीडियो, तस्वीरें, टेक्स्ट pages and ringtones.
The standard is विकसित by the खोलें मोबाईल गठबंधन ( OMA ), although during development it was part of the 3GPP and WAP groups.
Smallpox was an infectious बीमारी अद्वितीय to इंसानो, caused by either of दो वायरस variants, Variola major and Variola minor.
The disease is also known by the Latin names variola or variola वीरा, निकला इससे varius ( `` spotted '' ) or varus ( `` pimple '' ).
The disease was originally known in English as the `` चेचक '' or `` रेड प्लेग '' ; the term `` smallpox '' was first used in Britain in the 15th century to distinguish variola from the `` great pox '' ( syphilis ).
The last naturally occurring मामला of smallpox ( variola नाबालिग ) थी diagnosed on 26 October 1977.
Smallpox localized in small blood बरतन of the स्किन और in the मुँह and throat.
In the skin it resulted in a characteristic maculopapular खाज and, later, raised fluid-filled blisters.
V. major produces a more गंभीर बीमारी और रै an overall मृत्यु rate of 30–35 %.
V. minor causes a milder form of disease ( also known as alastrim, cottonpox, milkpox, whitepox, और क्यूबन खुजली ) जिससे मारता परिचय 1 % of इसके पीड़ितों.
Long-term जटिलताओं of V. प्रमुख संक्रमण शामिल characteristic scars, commonly on the face, which occur in 65–85 % of survivors.
Blindness resulting from corneal ulceration and scarring, and limb deformities due to arthritis and osteomyelitis हैं कम आम जटिलताओं, seen in about 2–5 % of cases.
smallpox is believed to have emerged in human populations about 10,000 BC.
The earliest शारीरिक evidence of it is probably the pustular rash on the mummified body of Pharaoh Ramses V of Egypt.
The disease मारे an अनुमानित 400,000 europeans annually दौरान the closing सालो of the 18th century ( including five reigning monarchs ), and was responsible for a third of all blindness.
Of all those संक्रमित, 20–60 % —and over 80 % of infected children—died from the disease.
Smallpox थी जिम्मेदार लिये an अनुमानित 300–500 लाख deaths during the 20th century.
As recently as 1967, the World Health Organization ( WHO ) estimated that 15 लाख लोगों contracted the बीमारी और कि दो million died in that year.
After vaccination campaigns throughout the 19th and 20th centuries, the जो certified the eradication of smallpox in 1979.
Smallpox is one of two infectious diseases to have been eradicated, the अन्य होने rinderpest, जिससे थी घोषित eradicated in 2011.
`` i want to थाम अपना हाथ '' is a song by the English rock band the Beatles.
Written by John Lennon और पॉल mccartney, और अंकित in अक्तूबर 1963, it was the first Beatles record to be made using four-track equipment.
With advance orders exceeding one million copies in the United Kingdom, `` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' would ordinarily have gone straight to the top of the British record charts on its day of release ( 29 November 1963 ) had it not been blocked by the group 's first million विक्रेता `` वो loves तुम ``, the बीटल्स ' पिछला uk सिंगल, जिससे थी having a resurgent वर्तनी in the शीर्ष स्थिति following तीव्र media coverage of the group.
Taking दो सप्ताह to dislodge its predecessor, `` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' stayed at number one for five weeks and remained in the UK top fifty for twenty-one weeks in total.
It was also the समूह 's पहला अमरीकी क्रमांक एक, प्रवेश the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 chart on 18 January 1964 at number forty-five and starting the British invasion of the American music industry.
By 1 February it held the number one spot — for seven weeks — before being replaced by `` She Loves You '', a reverse scenario of कया था occurred in ब्रिटेन, और remained in the us चार्ट लिये a कुल of पंद्रह सप्ताह.
`` I want to थाम अपना हाथ '' became the Beatles ' best-selling single worldwide.
A gasser was a type of hot rod originating on the dragstrips of the संयुक्त राज्य in the लेट 1950s और जारी जबतक the जल्दी 1970s.
Gassers were based on production models from the 1930s to mid-1960s, which have been stripped of extraneous weight and jacked up using a truck beam axle to provide better weight distribution on acceleration ( Beam axles हैं भी हल्का than an स्वतंत्र सामने बर्खास्तगी ), हालांकि a उठाया भण्डार सामने बर्खास्तगी is आम as well.
Common weight reduction techniques include fiberglass body panels, stripped इंटीरियर्स और plexiglass खिड़कियाँ ( sometimes रंग tinted ).
क्युकी वे यहूद primarily निर्मित लिये racing, these cars typically had the engine swapped to a larger or more powerful one, the existing stock engine modified ( often heavily ) or both.
It was very common to fit a Roots supercharger and mechanical ईंधन इंजेक्शन, ऐसे as एक इससे algon, hilborn, or Crower.
With form being dictated by function, their appearance is often very top heavy and ungainly, largely due to front ends being raised higher than भण्डार, to assist in the वज़न ट्रांसफ़र दौरान रैपिड त्वरण ( रेसिंग ).
Having their exhaust pipes exit through the front fender खूब is a आम characteristic of gassers, as is having bodies painted in flamboyant metalflakes, pearls, and candy finishes complemented by lettering in wild fonts.
The name arose क्युकी वे competed in a गैसोलीन -fueled drag racing class, rather than one using methanol or nitromethane.
The gasser is the पूर्ववर्ती of the modern Funny Car.
twelve-lead ईकेजी of a 26-year-old male
electrocardiography ( ईसीजी or ईकेजी इससे ) is a transthoracic ( आरपार the thorax or chest ) interpretation of the electrical activity of the heart over a period of time, as detected by electrodes attached to the surface of the skin and recorded by a device external to the body.
The recording produced by this noninvasive procedure is termed an electrocardiogram ( also ECG or EKG ).
An ECG is used to measure the rate and regularity of heartbeats, as well as the size and position of the chambers, the presence of any क्षति to the दिल, और the प्रभाव of दवाएँ or डिवाइस प्रयुक्त to regulate the heart, such as a pacemaker.
Most ECGs are performed for diagnostic or research purposes on human hearts, but may also be performed on पशु, प्रायः लिये निदान of दिल abnormalities or research.
Donald जॉन ट्रम्प, sr. ( born जून 14, 1946 ) is an American business magnate, television personality and author.
He is the chairman and president of The Trump Organization and the founder of ट्रम्प entertainment रिसॉर्ट.
Trump 's extravagant lifestyle, outspoken manner, और भूमिका on the एनबीसी reality show The Apprentice have made him a well-known celebrity who was No. 14 on the 2012 Forbes Celebrity 100 list.
ट्रम्प is the बेटे of फ्रेड ट्रम्प, a wealthy New York City real-estate developer.
He worked for his father 's firm, Elizabeth Trump & Son, while attending the Wharton School of the विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया, और in 1968 officially joined the company.
He was दिए कंट्रोल of the कम्पनी in 1971 and renamed it The Trump Organization.
In 2010, Trump expressed an interest in बनने a प्रत्याशी लिये अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य in the 2012 चुनाव, though in May 2011, he announced he would not be a candidate.
In December 2011, ट्रम्प थी सुझाया as a संभावित वाइस अध्यक्षीय चयन by मिशेल Bachmann, if she were to win the Republican nomination.
`` A Change Is Gon na Come '' is a 1964 single by r & b singer-songwriter sam cooke, लिखा और पहला अंकित in 1963 और released under the RCA Victor label shortly after his death in late 1964.
Though only a modest hit लिये cooke in तुलना साथ his previous singles, the song came to exemplify the 1960s ' Civil Rights Movement.
The song has gained in popularity and critical acclaim in the दशकों चूंकि इसके रिलीज, और is # 12 on रोलिंग Stone 's 500 Greatest Songs of All Time.
Steam rising from the nesjavellir geothermal शक्ति स्टेशन in Iceland.
Geothermal energy is थर्मल उर्जा उत्पन्न और stored in the Earth.
Thermal energy is the energy that determines the तापमान of पदार्थ.
The Geothermal energy of the Earth 's crust originates from the असली गठन of the ग्रह ( 20 % ) और इससे रेडियोसक्रिय decay of minerals ( 80 % ).
The geothermal gradient, which is the difference in temperature between the core of the planet and its surface, ड्राइव a निरन्तर conduction of थर्मल उर्जा in the रूप of heat from the core to the surface.
The adjective geothermal originates इससे the यूनानी जड़ें γη ( ge ), अर्थ धरती, and θερμος ( thermos ), meaning hot.
At the core of the Earth, thermal energy is निर्मित by रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय और temperatures may reach over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ).
Heat conducts इससे the कोर to surrounding cooler rock.
The ऊँची तापमान और दबाव कारण some rock to melt, creating magma convection upward since it is lighter than the solid rock.
The magma heats चट्टान और जल in the क्रस्ट, sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ).
From hot springs, geothermal energy has been used for bathing since Paleolithic times और लिये स्पेस हीटिंग चूंकि प्राचीन Roman times, but it is now better known for electricity generation.
विश्वव्यापी, परिचय 10,715 megawatts ( mw ) of geothermal power is online in 24 countries.
An additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal heating क्षमता is संस्थापित लिये ज़िला हीटिंग, स्पेस हीटिंग, स्पा, औद्योगिक processes, desalination and agricultural applications.
Geothermal power is cost effective, reliable, चिरस्थायी, और environmentally दोस्ताना, लकिन रै historically been limited to areas near tectonic plate boundaries.
Recent technological advances have dramatically विस्तारित the दायरा और आकार of सुगठित संसाधन, विशेषकर for applications such as home heating, opening a potential for widespread exploitation.
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases trapped deep within the धरती, लकिन ये emissions हैं much निम्नतर प्रति उर्जा ईकाई than those of fossil fuels.
As a result, geothermal power has the potential to help mitigate global वार्मिंग if widely तैनात in प्लेस of चट्टान fuels.
The Earth 's geothermal resources are theoretically more than adequate to supply मानवता 's उर्जा needs, लकिन तभी a बहुत छोटी fraction may be profitably exploited.
Drilling and exploration for deep resources is बहुत महंगी.
Forecasts for the भविष्य of geothermal शक्ति निर्भर on assumptions about technology, energy prices, subsidies, and interest rates.
पायलट कार्यक्रम जैसे eweb 's ग्राहक ऑप्ट in ग्रीन शक्ति कार्यक्रम show that customers would be willing to pay a little more for a renewable energy source like geothermal.
But as a result of government assisted research and industry experience, the cost of generating geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the पास्ट दो दशकों.
In 2001, geothermal energy cost between two और टेन सेंट प्रति सम्पात.
Ownership of property may be private, सामूहिक, or आम और the प्रॉपर्टी may be वस्तुएँ, land/real estate, or intellectual property.
Determining ownership in law involves determining जो रै निश्चित अधिकारों और कर्तव्य over the property.
ये अधिकारों और कर्तव्य, sometimes पुकारा a 'bundle of rights ', can be separated and held by different parties.
The question of ownership reaches back to the ancient philosophers, प्लेटो और अरस्तू, जो आयोजित अलग राय on the subject.
Plato ( 428/427 BC – 348/347 BC ) thought private property created divisive inequalities, while Aristotle ( 384 BC – 322 BC ) thought निजी प्रॉपर्टी सक्रिय लोगों to प्राप्त the पूरा लाभ of their labor.
Private property can circumvent what is now referred to as the “ tragedy of the commons ” problem, where people tend to degrade common प्रॉपर्टी अधिक than वे do निजी property.
Given a short-sighted owner, however, a private property system can make these tragedies worse—for example, a private owner of a piece of oil-rich property, depending on his worldview, might be अधिक दिलचस्पी in short-term वित्तीय लाभ than वृद्धिशील उपयोग साथ an नजर toward अन्य 's concerns ( e.g., those of future generations, the disenfranchised, etc. ).
While Aristotle justified the existence of private ownership, he left open सवाल of ( 1 ) कैसा to allocate प्रॉपर्टी between कया is निजी और आम and ( 2 ) how to allocate the private property within society.
Over the millennia, and across cultures what can be property and how it is regarded culturally have varied widely.
Ownership is the basis for many other concepts that form the मूलाधार of प्राचीन और आधुनिक समाजों ऐसे as धन, trade, debt, bankruptcy, the criminality of theft, and private vs. public property.
Ownership is the key building block in the development of the capitalist socio-economic प्रणाली.
Adam Smith stated that one of the पवित्र कानून of इंसाफ थी to guard a person 's property and possessions.
The process and mechanics of ownership are fairly जटिल : एक can लाभ, ट्रांसफ़र और खोना स्वामित्व of property in a number of ways.
To acquire property one can purchase it with धन, व्यापार it लिये अन्य प्रॉपर्टी, प्राप्त it as a तोहफा, steal it, find it, make, it or homestead it.
One can transfer or lose ownership of property by selling it for money, exchanging it लिये अन्य प्रॉपर्टी, giving it as a तोहफा, होने robbed of it, it, or having it stripped from one 's ownership through legal means such as eviction, foreclosure, seizure, or taking.
Ownership is self-propagating in that the owner of कोई प्रॉपर्टी होगा भी अपना the आर्थिक लाभ of that property.
`` कया 's my नाम ? '' is a सोंग अंकित by barbadian recording artist Rihanna, for her fifth studio album Loud ( 2010 ).
Featuring guest vocals from Canadian rapper Drake, the song was released as the दूसरी सिंगल इससे लाउड on अक्तूबर 29, 2010 through Def Jam Recordings.
The R & B सोंग थी उत्पादित by the नॉर्वेजियाई उत्पादन duo स्टारगेट, और थी written by the duo along with Ester Dean, Traci Hale, and Drake.
Lyrically, it incorporates विषयवस्तु of sexual intercourse and romance.
Music critics gave the song positive reviews, citing it some of Rihanna 's best vocal work to date ; there was a praise regarding इसके रोमांटिक प्रकृति, as खूब as its sexual tones.
`` What 's My Name ? '' was a commercial success और अव्वल the us बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट, giving रिहाना उसके तीसरा number-one single in 2010, as well as her eighth overall on the chart.
The song also topped the charts in Hungary and the United Kingdom and पहुँचे the शीर्ष पाँच in कनाडा, आयरलैंड, नई जीलैंड, नार्वे और Slovakia.
The song received a nomination at the 54th ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन rap/sung Collaboration.
An accompanying म्यूज़िक वीडियो, निर्देशित by फिलिप andelman, portrays a रोमांटिक एनकाउंटर between रिहाना and Drake in a grocery store along with romantic scenes between the pair and Rihanna walking through Manhattan 's Lower East Side.
`` What 's My Name ? '' was promoted with live performances across both sides of the Atlantic, including शनिवार रात्रि सजीव in अमेरिका और the श्रेणी सात finale of the x फ़ैक्टर in the United Kingdom.
The latter performance resulted in an छानबीन इससे the देश 's मीडिया नियामक, ofcom, लिये the raunchy nature of Rihanna 's outfit.
A गणितीय निरंतर is a खास क्रमांक, usually a real number, that is `` significantly interesting in some way ''.
Constants arise in many different areas of mathematics, with constants such as e ( गणितीय निरंतर ) | और pi| occurring in ऐसे विविध contexts as भूगोल, number theory and calculus.
What it means for a constant to arise `` naturally '', and कया makes a निरंतर `` दिलचस्प '', is ultimately a पदार्थ of taste, and some mathematical constants are notable more for historical reasons than for their intrinsic mathematical interest.
The more popular constants have been studied throughout the आयु और computed to many decimal places.
All mathematical constants are definable numbers and usually are also computable numbers ( Chaitin 's constant being a significant exception ).
Elections to the United States Senate were held on नवम्बर 2, 2010, for 37 of the United States Senate 's 100 seats.
( A special election on जनवरी 19, 2010 in मैसाचुसेट्स थी held earlier in the year. )
Thirty-four of the seats were for six-year terms to the Senate 's `` क्लास तीन '', और तीन यहूद खास चुनावों for shorter terms.
Of the 37 elections, 19 featured incumbent Democrats ( 7 of whom retired or यहूद पराजित in the प्राथमिक ) and 18 featured incumbent Republicans ( eight of whom retired or were defeated in the primary ).
After the previous elections ( in 2008 ), the United States Senate was composed of 58 डेमोक्रेट, 40 republicans, and 2 independents who caucus with the Democrats.
Republicans won four seats held by retiring Democrats और republicans पराजित दो लाज़िम Democrats.
This was the largest number of Republicans gains since the 1994 चुनावों और भी the पहला समय चूंकि कि चुनाव कि republicans successfully defended all of their own seats.
This was the fourth consecutive election of `` class 3 '' senators where Democrats have failed to gain seats and the third consecutive mid-term election held in a अध्यक्ष 's पहला पद जहाँ republicans have picked-up seats.
Despite these Republican wins, however, the Democrats retained a बहुमत of the सीनेट साथ 51 सीटे plus 2 independents who caucus with them, compared to the 47 Republicans.
A solstice is an astronomical इवेंट कि occurs twice प्रत्येक साल as the Sun reaches its highest or lowest excursion relative to the celestial equator on the celestial sphere.
As a result, on the दिन of the संक्रांति, the सूर्य appears to have पहुँचे इसके उच्चतम or न्यूनतम annual altitude in the sky above the horizon at local solar noon.
The word solstice is derived from the Latin sol ( sun ) and sistere ( to stand still ), because at the solstices, the Sun stands still in उतार ; कि is, the मौसमी गति of the सूर्य 's पाथ ( as देखी इससे धरती ) आता to a रोकें before reversing direction.
The solstices, together with the equinoxes, हैं कनेक्ट साथ the सीज़न.
in अनेक संस्कृतियों the solstices चिह्नित either the beginning or the midpoint of winter and summer.
The term solstice can भी be प्रयुक्त in a broader भाव, as the date ( day ) when this occurs.
The day of the संक्रांति is either the longest दिन of the साल ( in summer ) or the shortest day of the year ( in winter ) for any place outside of the tropics.
Jerry Lee Lewis ( born September 29, 1935 ) is an American चट्टान और फेंकें और देश म्यूज़िक singer-songwriter और pianist.
He is known by the nickname `` The Killer '' and is often viewed as “rock & फेंकें 's पहला ग्रेट जंगली man”.
An early pioneer of rock and roll music, in 1956 Lewis made his पहला रिकार्डिंग at सूर्य रिकॉर्ड.
`` Crazy Arms `` sold 300,000 copies in the दक्षिण, लकिन it थी उसके 1957 hit `` पूरे Lotta Shakin ' Going On `` that shot Lewis to fame worldwide.
Lewis followed इस in कि same year when he recorded songs such as `` Great Balls of Fire ``, `` Breathless `` and `` High School Confidential ``.
Lewis sold more records than एल्विस प्रेस्ली at इस समय.
However, Lewis ' rock 'n ' roll करियर faltered in the वेक of उसके marriage to his young cousin.
He had little success in the charts following the कांड और his popularity quickly faded.
His live performance शुल्क plummeted इससे $ 10,000 per night to $ 250.
In the meantime he थी determined to gain back some of his popularity.
During the early 60’s he did n't have much चार्ट कामयाबी साथ few exceptions such as `` What 'd I Say ``.
His live performances at this time यहूद increasingly wild and energetic.
His album Live at the Star क्लबों, हैम्बर्ग इससे 1964 is प्रायः regarded by many music journalists and fans as one of the wildest and greatest rock and roll concert albums ever.
After recording songs such as `` I 'm on Fire '' for several years with little कामयाबी, in 1968 लुईस made a transition into country music and had hits with songs such as `` Another Place, Another Time ''.
This reignited his career and throughout the late '60s and '70s he regularly अव्वल the country-western चार्ट.
His # 1 country hits included `` To Make Love Sweeter For You ``, `` There Must Be More to Love Than This ``, `` होता तुम लो another मौका on me `` and `` Me And Bobby McGee ``.
Lewis 's successes continued throughout the decade and he embraced his rock 'n ' roll पास्ट साथ गीतों ऐसे as a कवर of the बिग bopper 's `` chantilly फीता `` and `` Rockin ' My Life Away ``.
In the 21st century Lewis continues to tour to audiences around the संसार और स्टिल रिलीज नई albums.
One such album, titled Last Man खड़ा, is उसके बेहतरीन selling to date at over a million copies sold worldwide.
This was followed by Mean Old Man which has received some of the बेहतरीन बिक्री of lewis’s करियर.
Lewis has था a दर्जन सुनहरा रिकॉर्ड in दोनो चट्टान और देश, जीती अनेक Grammy awards, including a Lifetime Achievement Award.
Lewis was inducted into the Rock और फेंकें हॉल of कीर्ति in 1986, और उसके pioneering योगदान to the genre has been recognized by the Rockabilly Hall of Fame.
In 1989, his life was chronicled in the फिल्म ग्रेट गेंदें of Fire, starring Dennis Quaid.
In 2003, Rolling Stone पत्रिका सूचीबद्ध उसके बक्सा नियत सब कातिल, No Filler : The Anthology number 242 on their list of `` 500 greatest albums of all time ``.
In 2004, वे क्रमित उसे क्रमांक 24 on their list of the 100 Greatest Artists of All Time.
Lewis is the last surviving member of Sun Records ' Million Dollar Quartet and the Class of '55 एल्बम, जिससे भी शामिल Johnny Cash, Carl Perkins, Roy Orbison and Elvis Presley.
Henry Louis स्टीफंस, बेनाम watercolor ( 1863 ) of a man पढना a समाचारपत्र with headline `` Presidential Proclamation / Slavery ''.
The emancipation उदघोषणा थी an अनुक्रम जारी to सब खण्ड of the कार्यपालिका शाखा ( including the Army and Navy ) of the United States by President Abraham Lincoln on January 1, 1863, during the American Civil War.
It was based on the अध्यक्ष 's संवैधानिक प्राधिकार as commander in chief of the armed forces ; it was not a law passed by Congress.
It proclaimed all those enslaved in Confederate territory to be forever free, and ordered the फौज ( और सब खण्ड of the कार्यपालिका शाखा ) to दावत as फ़्री सब those enslaved in टेन राज्य कि यहूद स्टिल in विद्रोह, thus applying to 3.1 million of the 4 million slaves in the U.S.
The Proclamation could not be enforced in areas still under विद्रोह, लकिन as the फौज took कंट्रोल of confederate regions, the स्लेव in those regions were emancipated rather than returned to their masters.
From 20,000 to 50,000 former slaves in regions जहाँ विद्रोह had already been subdued were immediately emancipated, and over 3 million more were emancipated as the Union army advanced.
The Proclamation किया नहीं लागू to the पाँच स्लेव राज्य कि यहूद नहीं in विद्रोह, nor to सबसे regions already controlled by the Union army ; emancipation there would come after separate state actions and/or the December 1865 ratification of the Thirteenth Amendment, which made slavery illegal everywhere in the U.S.
The Proclamation did not compensate the स्वामी, किया नहीं itself गैरकानूनी गुलामी, and did not make the ex-slaves ( called freedmen ) citizens.
It made the eradication of गुलामी an सुस्पष्ट युद्ध लक्ष्य, in जोड to the goal of reuniting the Union.
On September 22, 1862, Lincoln had issued a preliminary proclamation that he would order the emancipation of all slaves in any राज्य of the confederate राज्य of अमेरिका कि किया नहीं वापसी to Union control by January 1, 1863.
None returned, and the order, signed and issued January 1, 1863, took प्रभाव मगर in स्थितियाँ जहाँ the संघ था already ज़्यादातर regained control.
The Proclamation outraged white Southerners who envisioned a race war, angered some Northern Democrats, energized anti-slavery शक्तियां, और weakened शक्तियां in यूरोपीय कि wanted to intervene to help the Confederacy.
It also lifted the spirits of अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी दोनो in the दक्षिणी और उत्तरी राज्य, और led to many slaves escaping their masters and running behind Union lines in order to have their emancipation enforced.
Sucker Punch is a 2011 American fantasy action film directed by zack स्नाइडर और co-written by उसे और स्टीव Shibuya.
It is Snyder 's first film आधारित on an असली script.
The फिल्मी सितारों एमिली ब्राउनिंग, abbie Cornish, Jena Malone, Vanessa Hudgens, Jamie Chung, and Carla Gugino.
The storyline follows the fantasies of a यंग स्त्री जो is वचनबद्ध to a दिमागी संस्था, as she makes a plan to escape the hospital before suffering a lobotomy.
The film was released in both conventional and IMAX थिएटर in the संयुक्त राज्य at मध्यरात्रि on March 25, 2011.
it प्राप्त generally negative reviews from critics, but was a moderate box office success.

Haselblad 503CW with Ixpress V96C digital back, an example of a पेशेवर डिजिटल कैमरा प्रणाली
A digital camera ( or digicam ) is a camera that takes video or still छायाचित्र by रिकॉर्डिंग बिंब on an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक image sensor.
Most cameras sold today are digital, and डिजिटल कैमरे हैं incorporated into many devices ranging from PDAs and mobile phones ( called camera phones ) to vehicles.
Digital and film cameras share an optical system, typically using a लेंस साथ a परिवर्तनीय diaphragm to focus light onto an image pickup device.
The diaphragm and shutter admit the correct amount of लाइट to the imager, बस as साथ फिल्मी लकिन the चित्र पिकअप यंत्र is इलेक्ट्रॉनिक rather than chemical.
However, unlike film cameras, digital cameras can प्रदर्शक बिंब on a स्क्रीन तत्काल बाद होने अंकित, और स्टोर और delete images from memory.
Many digital cameras can also रिकार्ड चलती वीडियो साथ ध्वनि.
Some digital cameras can crop और सिलाई तस्वीरें and perform other elementary image editing.

Multiple web servers may be used for a high traffic website, यहाँ चार सूर्य आग x4200 सर्वर हैं installed together
Web server can refer to either the hardware ( the computer ) or the software ( the computer application ) that helps to deliver वेब सामग्री कि can be पहुँचा through the Internet.
The most common use of web servers is to host websites, but there are other uses such as gaming, data storage or कार्यशील एंटरप्राइज़ अनुप्रयोग.
The American Red Cross ( ARC ), also known as the American National Red क्रॉस, is a humanitarian संगठन कि provides आपात सहायता, विपत्ति राहत and education inside the United States.
It is the designated u.S. संबद्ध of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies.
Today, in addition to domestic disaster relief, the American Red Cross offers services in five other areas : community services that help the needy ; संचार सेवाएं और सुकून लिये सैन्य सदस्यों और उनके परिवार सदस्यों ; the संग्रहण, प्रसंस्करण और वितरण of blood and blood products ; educational programs on preparedness, health, and safety ; and international relief and development programs.
Issued a corporate charter by the United States Congress under Title 36 of the United States Code, Section 3001, the अमरीकी नेशनल रेड क्रॉस is governed by स्वयंसेवक और समर्थित by जातियाँ दान, आय इससे स्वास्थ्य और सुरक्षा training and products, and income from blood products.
The American Red क्रॉस is headquartered in Washington, D.C.

A rooster ( also called a cockerel or cock ) is a पुरूष gallinaceous bird.
It usually refers to a पुरूष मुर्गा ( gallus gallus ).
Immature पुरूष मुर्गियों कम than one year old are called cockerels.
The term `` rooster '' originates in the United States, and the पद is widely प्रयुक्त throughout उत्तर अमेरिका, as खूब as Australia and New Zealand.
In the United Kingdom and Ireland the older term `` cockerel '' is अधिक commonly used.
`` Cock '' is in general use as the नाम लिये a पुरूष of अन्य प्रजाति of बर्ड, लिये उदाहरण `` Cock sparrow ''.
`` Roosting '' is the action of perching aloft to sleep at night, and is done by both sexes.
The rooster is polygamous, लकिन can नहीं गार्ड अनेक nests of eggs at once.
He guards the general area where his hens are nesting, और होगा आक्रमण अन्य roosters that enter his territory.
दौरान the दिन, he प्रायः sits on a high perch, usually 3–5 feet off the ground to serve as a lookout for his flock.
He will sound a distinctive सचेतक कॉल if परभक्षी are nearby.
the पोकीमॉन व्यापार कार्ड खेल ( पोकीमॉन tcg ) is a collectible कार्ड game based on the Pokémon video game series, first published in October 1996 by Media Factory in Japan.
In the US, it was initially published by wizards of the coast, the कम्पनी that produces, in December 1998.
Nintendo took over प्रकाशन in जून 2003.
It is one of Nintendo 's last बाकी दमदार कड़ी to इसके विरासत as a playing card company.
Land Rover is a British car manufacturer साथ इसके मुख्यालय in gaydon, Warwickshire, United Kingdom which specialises in four-wheel-drive vehicles.
It is part of the Jaguar जमीन रोवर समूह, a subsidiary of tata Motors of India.
It is the दूसरी oldest four-wheel-drive car brand in the world ( after Jeep ).
The Land रोवर नाम थी originally प्रयुक्त by the रोवर कम्पनी लिये एक specific vehicle model, named simply the Land Rover, launched by Rover in 1948.
Over the following years it developed into a marque encompassing a range of four-wheel-drive मॉडल, सहित the defender, डिस्कवरी, freelander, Range Rover, Range Rover Sport and Range Rover Evoque.
Land Rovers are currently समवेत in the कम्पनी 's halewood और solihull पौधे, साथ शोध and development taking place at JLR 's Gaydon and Whitley engineering centres.
Land Rover sold 194,000 वाहनों विश्वव्यापी in 2009.
Although the brand originates इससे the असली 1948 मॉडल, जमीन रोवर as a company has only existed since 1978.
Prior to this, it was a product line of the Rover Company which was subsequently absorbed into the Rover-Triumph division of the अंग्रेजों leyland मोटर निगम ( bl ) following leyland मोटर निगम ’s takeover of Rover in 1967.
The ongoing commercial success of the original Land Rover series models, and latterly the Range Rover in the 1970s in the midst of bl’s खूब प्रलेखित कारोबार परेशानियों prompted the स्थापना of a पृथक जमीन रोवर कम्पनी लकिन स्टिल under the BL umbrella, remaining part of the subsequent Rover Group in 1988, under the ownership of British Aerospace after the remains of British Leyland were broken up and privatised.
In 1994 Rover Group plc was acquired by bmw.
In 2000, रोवर समूह थी broken-up by bmw और जमीन रोवर थी बेची to घाट Motor Company, becoming part of its Premier Automotive Group.
In 2006 घाट खरीदा the रोवर ब्रांड इससे BMW for around £6 million.
This reunited the Rover and Land Rover brands for the first time चूंकि 2000 जब the Rover group was broken up by BMW.
In June 2008, घाट बेची दोनो जमीन रोवर and Jaguar Cars to Tata Motors.
This sale also included the dormant रोवर ब्रांड
The cover of the पहला dvd संकलन released by Aniplex of The New Captain Shūsuke Amagai arc
The नवीं ऋतु of the Bleach anime series is named.
The series is based on tite kubo 's manga साथ same name.
The episodes are directed by Noriyuki Abe and produced by TV Tokyo, dentsu, और स्टुडियो Pierrot.
The episodes ' प्लाट focuses on the परिचय of a नई आत्मा reaper कप्तान, shūsuke amagai, और the रहस्य surrounding the Kasumiōji clan, one of the families that constitute the nobility of Soul Society.
The season began airing on April 23, 2008 in Japan on TV टोकियो और ended on अक्तूबर 7, 2008.
The English adaptation of the ब्लीच दुश्मनी is licensed by viz मीडिया, और इस चाप began airing on August 28, 2010 on Cartoon Network 's Adult Swim, and finished on January 29, 2011.
Five DVD compilations, each containing four episodes of the ऋतु, have महरूम released by aniplex ; the पहला dvd संकलन थी released on November 26, 2008 and the fifth on March 25, 2009.
A DVD box will be प्रकाशित by viz मीडिया on दिसम्बर 13, 2011.
The episodes use three टुकड़े of थीम म्यूज़िक : एक opening theme and two closing themes.
The opening theme is `` chu-bura `` by kelun.
The first closing theme is `` नारंगी '' by lil'b, प्रयुक्त लिये एपीसोड 168 to 179, and the second closing theme is `` Gallop '' by pe'zmoku, used for the remainder of the episodes.
The regulation of prostitution in the United States is not among the enumerated शक्तियां of the संघीय सरकारी ; अंतर्गत the दसवाँ amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान, it is therefore exclusively the domain of the states to permit, prohibit, or otherwise regulate commercial sex, except insofar as Congress may regulate it as part of interstate commerce with laws like the Mann Act.
In most states, prostitution is considered a misdemeanor in the category of public अनुक्रम अपराधों, a अपराधों कि disrupts the अनुक्रम of a community.
it थी at एक time considered to be a vagrancy crime.
Currently, Nevada is the only state to allow वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति, the शर्तें of जिससे हैं stipulated in the नेवाडा Revised Statutes.
Only 8 काउंटी currently contain active brothels.
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( which contains the Las vegas–paradise महानगर क्षेत्रफल ), washoe काउंटी ( जिससे contains रेनो ), Carson City, Douglas County, and Lincoln County.
The अन्य काउंटी theoretically allow वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति, but some of these counties currently have no active brothels.
Street prostitution, `` pandering, '' and living off of the proceeds of a वेश्या remain illegal अंतर्गत नेवाडा विधि, as elsewhere in the देश.
As with other देशों, वेश्यावृति in the संयुक्त राज्य can be विभाजित into तीन व्यापक श्रेणी : street prostitution, brothel prostitution, and escort prostitution.
The East Coast of the United States, also known as the Eastern seaboard or the अटलांटिक seaboard और commonly shortened to East Coast, refers to the easternmost coast of the United States along the Atlantic Ocean.
The states which have shoreline on the ईस्ट coast हैं, इससे उत्तर to दक्षिण, the u.S. states of Maine, New Hampshire, Massachusetts, Rhode Island, Connecticut, New York, New Jersey, Delaware, Maryland, Virginia, North Carolina, South Carolina, Georgia, and Florida.
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January 9, 1913 – April 22, 1994 ) was the 37th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, सेवारत इससे 1969 to 1974, जब he became the only president to resign the office.
Nixon had previously served as a Republican U.S. representative and सीनेटर इससे कैलिफ़ोर्निया और as the 36th Vice President of the United States from 1953 to 1961.
Nixon was born in yorba लिंडा, California.
He graduated from Whittier College in 1934 and Duke विश्वविद्यालयों स्कूल of विधि in 1937, returning to California to practice law.
He and his wife, Pat Nixon, moved to वॉशिंगटन to कार्य लिये the संघीय government in 1942.
he subsequently परोसा in the United States Navy during World War II.
Nixon was elected in California to the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि in 1946 और to the Senate in 1950.
His pursuit of the alger hiss मामला स्थापित his reputation as a leading anti-communist, and elevated him to national prominence.
He was the कार्यशील mate of ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर, the Republican Party presidential nominee in the 1952 election.
निक्सन served for eight years as vice president.
He waged an unsuccessful presidential campaign in 1960, narrowly खोने to जॉन F. कैनेडी, और खोया a रेस लिये राज्यपाल of California in 1962.
In 1968, he ran again लिये the प्रेसिडेंसी और थी निर्वाचित.
Although Nixon initially escalated America 's involvement in the वियतनाम युद्ध, he subsequently ended u.S. भागीदारी in 1973.
Nixon 's visit to the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन in 1972 खोली राजनयिक संबंध between the two nations, and he initiated détente and the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty with the Soviet Union the same year.
domestically, उसके प्रशासन generally embraced policies that transferred power from Washington to the states.
Among other things, he launched initiatives to fight cancer and illegal drugs, imposed wage and price controls, enforced desegregation of कुछ दक्षिणी स्कूलों, और स्थापित the Environmental Protection Agency.
Though he presided over the lunar landings beginning with अपोलो 11, he scaled वापस मानवयुक्त स्पेस खोजी.
He was re-elected by a landslide in 1972.
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab आयल embargo, the इस्तीफा of उसके वाइस अध्यक्ष, spiro agnew, और a continuing series of revelations about the Watergate scandal and other misconduct by members of the administration.
The scandal escalated, costing Nixon much of his political support, and on August 9, 1974, he resigned in the फेस of लगभग निश्चित महाभियोग and removal from office.
After his resignation, he controversially प्राप्त a pardon जारी by उसके successor, जेराल्ड घाट.
In retirement, Nixon 's work as an elder statesman, authoring अनेक किताबे और undertaking many foreign trips, helped to rehabilitate his public image.
He suffered a debilitating stroke on अप्रैल 18, 1994, और died four days later at the age of 81.
Sertraline hydrochloride ( trade names Zoloft, Lustral ) is an antidepressant of the चयनात्मक serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( ssri ) class.
It was introduced to the market by फाइजर in 1991.
Sertraline is primarily prescribed for major depressive disorder in adult outpatients as well as obsessive–compulsive, दहशत, और सोशल चिंता disorders in both adults and children.
In 2011, it was the second-most विहित antidepressant on the U.S. retail market, with 37,208,000 prescriptions.
The efficacy of sertraline for depression is समान to कि of पुरानी tricyclic antidepressants, but its side effects are much less pronounced.
मतभेद साथ नए antidepressants are subtler and also mostly confined to side effects.
Evidence suggests that sertraline may कार्य बेहतर than fluoxetine ( prozac ) for some subtypes of depression.
Treatment of दहशत विकार साथ sertraline परिणाम in a significant decrease of the number of panic attacks and in improved quality of life.
For obsessive-compulsive disorder, sertraline is not as effective as संज्ञानात्मक behavioral चिकित्सा ; the बेहतरीन परिणाम have महरूम हासिल by combining these two treatments.
Although approved for social phobia and posttraumatic stress disorder, sertraline लीड to तभी modest सुधार in these conditions.
Sertraline also alleviates the symptoms of premenstrual dysphoric विकार और can be प्रयुक्त in sub-therapeutic doses or intermittently for its treatment.
Sertraline साझा the आम पक्ष प्रभाव और contraindications of अन्य ssris, साथ high rates of nausea, diarrhea, insomnia, and sexual side effects ; however, it does not cause weight gain, and its effects on both cognition and vigilance are relatively mild.
In pregnant women taking sertraline, the drug was present in significant concentrations in fetal रक्त, और थी भी संबद्ध साथ a उच्चतर रेट of various birth defects.
Similarly to other antidepressants, the use of sertraline लिये अवसाद may be संबद्ध साथ a higher rate of suicidality.
The Five heartbeats is a 1991 musical नाटक फिल्मी निर्देशित by Robert Townsend, who co-wrote the script with Keenan Ivory Wayans.
Distributed by 20th Century Fox, the film 's main cast includes Townsend, Michael Wright, Leon Robinson, Harry J. Lennix, Tico Wells, हेरोल्ड निकोलस of the निकोलस भाइयो, और diahann Carroll.
The plot of the film ( which is loosely based on the lives of several artists : The Dells, The Temptations, Four Tops, Wilson Pickett, James Brown, Frankie Lymon, sam cooke और अन्य ) फ़ॉलो the तीन दशक करियर of the r & b गायन समूह the पाँच heartbeats.
The film depicts the rise and fall of a Motown inspired soul act through the eyes of the film 's main protagonist, Donald `` बतख '' matthews ( portrayed by टाउनसेंड ), जो serves as a narrator throughout the film.
however, a बहुमत of the सिनेमा is प्रस्तुत in a consecutive time line as opposed to traditional flash backs.
The film includes a significant amount of original music conceived by various artists for the film 's साउंडट्रैक, सहित singles ऐसे as `` a दिल is a हाउस लिये प्रेम ``, `` we have n't Finished Yet '', and `` Nothing But Love ''.
The film was released to most North American audiences March 29, 1991 however it was not made available to audiences in other continents until 2002 when a DVD was released prior to another DVD release in 2006 for the film 's 15th वर्षगांठ.
The movie received मिश्रित समीक्षाएँ इससे critics.
Secretariat ( March 30, 1970 – October 4, 1989 ) was an अमरीकी thoroughbred racehorse कि in 1973 became the पहला U.S. Triple Crown champion in 25 years.
He set रेस रिकॉर्ड in सब तीन कार्यक्रम in the श्रेणी — the Kentucky Derby ( 1:59.4 ), the Preakness Stakes ( 1:53 ), and the Belmont Stakes ( 2:24 ) — records that still stand today.
He is माना to be एक of the greatest Thoroughbreds of all time.
In 1999, ESPN ranked सचिवालय the 35th बेहतरीन खिलाड़ी of the 20th सदी, the highest ranking racehorse on the list URL_http.
He ranked second behind Man o ' War in the blood-horse 's सूची of the शीर्ष 100 u.S. racehorses of the 20th Century.
Secretariat was sired by बिंदास शासक आउट of somethingroyal, by Princequillo.
He was foaled at The Meadow in कैरोलीन County, Virginia.
जैसे उसके प्रसिद्ध पूर्ववर्ती man o ' युद्ध, Secretariat was a large chestnut colt and was given the same nickname, `` Big Red. ''
सचिवालय 's grandsire, nasrullah, is also the great-great-grandsire of 1977 Triple Crown winner Seattle Slew.
Owned by Penny Chenery, he was trained by Lucien Laurin and mainly ridden by कनाडाई jockey रॉन turcotte, साथ साथ प्रशिक्षु jockey पॉल Feliciano ( first two races ), and veteran Eddie Maple ( last race ).
He raced in Chenery 's Meadow Stable 's blue and श्वेत checkered रंगों और उसके दूल्हे थी Eddie Sweat.
Secretariat stood approximately tall, and weighed, साथ a 75-inch girth, in his racing prime.
A typical 12 V, 40 ah lead-acid car बैटरी
An automotive battery is a type of rechargeable बैटरी कि आपूर्तियाँ इलेक्ट्रिक energy to an automobile.
Usually this refers to an SLI battery ( starting, lighting, ignition ) to power the प्रारंभ मोटर, the लाइट्स, और the प्रज्वलन प्रणाली of a vehicle’s engine.
Automotive SLI batteries are usually lead-acid type, and are made of six गैल्वानी कोशिकाएं in श्रेणी to provide a 12 volt system.
Each कोशिका provides 2.1 volts for a total of 12.6 volt at full charge.
Heavy vehicles such as highway trucks or tractors, often equipped साथ डीज़ल इंजन, may have दो बैटरी in श्रेणी लिये a 24 वोल्ट प्रणाली, or may have समानांतर strings of batteries.
lead-acid बैटरी हैं बना up of प्लेटों of सीसे और पृथक प्लेटों of सीसे dioxide, which are submerged into an electrolyte solution of about 38 % sulfuric acid and 62 % water.
This causes a chemical reaction that releases electrons, allowing them to flow through conductors to produce electricity.
As the battery discharges, the acid of the electrolyte प्रतिक्रियाएँ साथ the सामग्री of the प्लेटों, changing their surface to lead sulfate.
When the battery is recharged, the रासायनिक प्रतिक्रिया is reversed : the lead sulfate reforms into lead dioxide and lead.
With the plates restored to their असली कंडीशन, the process may now be repeated.
Battery recycling of automotive batteries reduces the need for resources required for manufacture of new batteries, diverts toxic सीसे इससे landfills, और रोकता रिस्क of improper disposal.
Full-time employment is नियुक्ति in जिससे a व्यक्ति works a न्यूनतम क्रमांक of hours defined as such by his/her employer.
Full-time employment often comes with benefits that are not typically offered to part-time, temporary, or flexible workers, such as annual leave, sickleave, and health insurance.
Full-time jobs हैं प्रायः माना करियर.
They generally pay more than part-time कार्य, और प्रायः carry अधिक घंटों प्रति सप्ताह.
The Fair Labor Standards अधिनियम ( flsa ) करता नहीं define full-time employment or part-time employment.
This is a matter generally to be संकल्पित by the नियोक्ता ( us Department of Labor ).
The definition by नियोक्ता can vary और is generally published in a company 's Employee Handbook.
Companies commonly require इससे 30–35 or 40 घंटों प्रति सप्ताह to be पारिभाषित as full-time and therefore eligible for benefits.
full-time औकात varies between कम्पनी and is often based on the shift the employee must work during each work week.
The `` standard '' कार्य सप्ताह consists of पाँच eight-hour days, commonly served between 9:00AM to 5:00PM totaling 40 hours.
While a four-day week generally consists of four ten-hour days ; it may भी consist of as छोटी as नौ घंटों लिये a total of a 36 hour work week.
Twelve-hour shifts are often three days per सप्ताह, जबतक the कम्पनी रै the इरादे of paying out the employee overtime.
Overtime is legally सशुल्क आउट anytime an employee works more than 40 hours per week.
The legal minimum for ओवरटाइम starts at Base Pay + One-Half.
The increased payout is माना to compensate थोड़ा for the increased fatigue which a person experiences on such long shifts.
Shifts can also be बहुत irregular, as in खुदरा, लकिन हैं स्टिल full-time if the required number of hours is reached.
There are some situations where a person who needs full-time work is dropped to part-time, which is sometimes a form of constructive dismissal to avoid paying बेरोजगारी लाभ to a laid-off worker.
Seahorse is the title given to 54 species of समुद्री मछली in the genus Hippocampus.
`` Hippocampus '' comes from the प्राचीन यूनानी hippos अर्थ `` घोड़ा '' और kampos अर्थ `` sea monster ''.
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the Congress of the संयुक्त राज्य as शीर्षक ii of the व्यापक Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970.
The CSA is the संघीय u.S. ड्रग नीति अंतर्गत जिससे the manufacture, importation, कब्ज़ा, use and distribution of certain substances is regulated.
The Act also served as the नेशनल implementing विधान for the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs.
The legislation created five Schedules ( classifications ), साथ varying योग्यता लिये a substance to be included in each.
Two federal agencies, the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration, determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules, though the statute passed by कॉंग्रेस निर्मित the आरंभिक लिस्टिंग, और कॉंग्रेस रै sometimes अनुसूचित अन्य substances through विधान ऐसे as the hillory J. farias और सामन्था Reid Date-Rape Prevention Act of 2000, which placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I. Classification decisions are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ), currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States, and international treaties.
माया numerals
माया numerals हैं a vigesimal ( base - twenty ) numeral system used by the Pre-Columbian Maya civilization.
The numerals are made up of three प्रतीकों ; शून्य ( शेल आकार ), एक ( a बिन्दु ) और पाँच ( a bar ).
For example, thirteen is लिखा as तीन dots in a आड़ा row above two horizontal lines stacked above each other.
Lyndon Baines Johnson ( August 27, 1908 – January 22, 1973 ), often referred to as lbj, थी the 36th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1963–1969 ), a स्थिति he assumed after his service as the 37th Vice President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ).
He is one of only four people who served in all four elected federal कार्यालयों of the संयुक्त राज्य : प्रतिनिधि, सीनेटर, Vice President, and President.
Johnson, a Democrat from Texas, served as a United States Representative from 1937–1949 and as a Senator from 1949–1961, सहित छह सालो as संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट बहुमत नेता, दो as सीनेट अल्पसंख्यक नेता and two as Senate Majority Whip.
After campaigning unsuccessfully लिये the लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन in 1960, Johnson was asked by John F. Kennedy to be his running mate for the 1960 presidential election.
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the हत्या of जॉन F. कैनेडी on नवम्बर 22, 1963, समाप्त कैनेडी 's पद और थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष in उसके own right, winning by a large margin over Barry Goldwater in the 1964 election.
Johnson was greatly supported by the Democratic Party and as President, he was responsible for designing the `` Great समाज `` विधान कि शामिल कानून कि upheld सिविल rights, public broadcasting, Medicare, Medicaid, environmental protection, aid to education, and his `` War on Poverty. ''
Johnson was renowned for his domineering personality and the `` Johnson treatment, '' his coercion of शक्तिशाली राजनेता in अनुक्रम to अग्रिम legislation.
Meanwhile, जॉनसन escalated अमरीकी भागीदारी in the वियतनाम युद्ध, इससे 16,000 American advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 combat troops in early 1968, as American casualties soared and the peace process bogged down.
The involvement stimulated a विशाल एंग्री antiwar गति based especially on university campuses in the U.S. and abroad.
Summer riots broke out in सबसे प्रमुख शहरों बाद 1965, और अपराधों दरों soared, as उसके प्रतिद्वंद्वियों उठाया demands for `` law and order '' policies.
The Democratic Party split in multiple feuding factions, and after Johnson did poorly in the 1968 नई हैम्पशायर प्राथमिक, he ended his bid for reelection.
रिपब्लिकन रिचर्ड निक्सन थी elected to succeed him.
इतिहासकारों argue कि जॉनसन 's presidency marked the peak of modern liberalism in the United States after the New Deal era.
Johnson is ranked favorably by कुछ इतिहासकारों क्युकी of his domestic policies.
Progesterone also ज्ञात as p4 ( pregn-4-ene-3,20-dione ) is a c-21 स्टेरॉयड हार्मोन शामिल in the मादा menstrual साईकिल, pregnancy ( supports gestation ) and embryogenesis of humans and other species.
Progesterone belongs to a class of हार्मोन पुकारा progestogens, और is the major naturally occurring human progestogen.
Big Bird is a protagonist of the children 's टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ Sesame Street.
Officially performed by Caroll Spinney since 1969, he is an eight-foot two-inch ( 249 cm ) लम्बा उज्जवल primrose-yellow बर्ड.
He can रोलर स्केट, बर्फ स्केट, dance, sing, write poetry, draw and even ride a unicycle.
But despite this wide array of talents, he is prone to frequent misunderstandings, on एक अवसर भी गायन the वर्णमाला as एक बिग long शब्द ( इससे the सोंग called `` ABC-DEF-GHI, '' pronounced `` ab-keddef-gajihkel-monop-quristuv-wixyz '' ), pondering what it could ever mean.
He lives in a large घोंसला पीछे the 123 तिल गली brownstone and has a teddy bear named Radar.
webtrends is a निजी कम्पनी headquartered in Portland, Oregon, United States.
It provides वेब, सोशल, और मोबाईल analytics and other software solutions related to marketing intelligence.
The कम्पनी थी संस्थापित in 1993 and now serves more than 10,000 large and small firms. < ref name='Intelligent Enterprise 2007-05-21 ' >
The Second Crusade ( 1145–1149 ) was the second major crusade शुभारम्भ इससे यूरोपीय.
The Second Crusade was started in जवाब to the पतन of the काउंटी of Edessa the previous year to the forces of Zengi.
The county had been founded during the पहला crusade ( 1096–1099 ) by Baldwin of Boulogne in 1098.
While it was the first Crusader state to be संस्थापित, it थी भी the पहला to पतन.
The Second Crusade was घोषित by पोप यूजीन iii, और थी the पहला of the क्रूसेड to be led by European kings, namely Louis VII of France and Conrad III of Germany, with help from a number of other European nobles.
The armies of the two kings marched separately आरपार यूरोपीय.
After crossing बीज़ान्टिन territory into आनातोलिया, दोनो सेना were separately defeated by the Seljuq Turks.
The main Western ईसाई सोर्स, odo of deuil, और syriac ईसाई स्त्रोत अर्जी that the Byzantine emperor Manuel I Comnenus secretly hindered the crusaders ' progress, particularly in Anatolia where he is alleged to have deliberately ordered Turks to attack them.
Louis and Conrad and the remnants of their armies reached Jerusalem and, in 1148, participated in an ill-advised आक्रमण on दमिश्क.
The crusade in the east was a विफलता लिये the crusaders और a great victory for the Muslims.
It would ultimately have a key influence on the fall of Jerusalem and give rise to the Third crusade at the समाप्त of the 12th century.
The only success of the Second Crusade came to a संयुक्त फ़ोर्स of 13,000 फ्लेमिश, frisian, Norman, English, Scottish, and German crusaders in 1147.
Travelling from England, by ship, to the पावन जमीन, the फौज रोका और helped the छोटी ( 7,000 ) Portuguese army in the capture of Lisbon, expelling its Moorish occupants.
Wal-Mart Stores, Inc. ( ), branded as Walmart, is an American multinational retail निगम कि रनों जंजीरों of विशाल छूट विभाग stores and warehouse stores.
The company is the world 's third largest public corporation, according to the Fortune Global 500 list in 2012, the biggest private employer in the संसार साथ over दो लाख कर्मचारी, और is the largest retailer in the world.
walmart remains a family-owned कारोबार, as the company is controlled by the Walton family, who own a 48 percent stake in Walmart.
it is भी एक of the world 's most valuable companies.
The कम्पनी थी संस्थापित by sam वाल्टन in 1962, incorporated on October 31, 1969, and publicly traded on the New York Stock Exchange in 1972.
It is headquartered in bentonville, Arkansas.
Walmart is also the largest किराना रिटेलर in the United States.
In 2009, it उत्पन्न 51 प्रतिशत of इसके us $ 258 billion sales in the U.S. from grocery business.
It also owns and operates the sam 's क्लबों खुदरा warehouses in North America.
By 1988, wal-mart थी the सबसे लाभप्रद retailer in the US, and by November 1990, it outsold K-mart.
By 1991 it outsold Sears in retail, making it America 's largest रिटेलर, a भेद it स्टिल holds.
walmart रै 8,500 स्टोर्स in 15 countries, under 55 different names.
The company operates under the walmart नाम in the United States, including the 50 states and Puerto Rico.
It operates in Mexico as Walmex, in the United Kingdom as Asda, in जापानी as seiyu, and in India as Best Price.
It has wholly owned operations in Argentina, Brazil, और कनाडा.
Walmart 's investments outside North America have had mixed results : its operations in the United Kingdom, South America, and China are highly successful, whereas ventures in जर्मनी और दक्षिण कोरियाई यहूद unsuccessful.
Robert William Gary Moore ( 4 April 1952 – 6 February 2011 ), थी a उत्तरी आयरिश संगीतकार, सबसे widely recognised as a singer and guitarist.
In a career dating back to the 1960s, Moore played with artists सहित फिल lynott और ब्रायन downey दौरान उसके किशोर, अग्रणी उसे to सदस्यताएँ साथ the आयरिश bands स्किड पंक्ति और पतला lizzy on तीन पृथक अवसरों.
Moore shared the stage with such blues and rock luminaries as B.B. King, Albert King, Colosseum II, जार्ज हैरिसन और ग्रेग झील, as खूब as having a कामयाब सोलो career.
He guested on a number of albums recorded by high profile musicians, including a cameo appearance playing the lead गिटार सोलो on `` वो 's my baby `` इससे traveling wilburys आवाज़. 3.

A web hosting service is a type of Internet hosting service that allows individuals and संगठन to मेक उनके जालस्थल accessible via the World Wide Web.
Web hosts are companies that provide space on a server owned or leased for use by क्लाइंट, as खूब as providing अंतरजाल connectivity, typically in a data center.
Web hosts can also provide data center space and connectivity to the Internet for other सर्वर स्तिथ in उनके आंकड़ा बीच, पुकारा colocation, भी ज्ञात as आवास in लैटिन अमेरिका or France.
The scope of web hosting सेवाएं varies greatly.
The most basic is web page and small-scale file hosting, where files can be अपलोड via संचिका ट्रांसफ़र Protocol ( FTP ) or a Web interface.
The files are usually delivered to the Web `` as is '' or साथ minimal प्रसंस्करण.
Many Internet सेवा प्रदाताओं ( isps ) प्रस्ताव इस service free to subscribers.
Individuals and संगठन may भी obtain वेब page hosting from alternative service providers.
निजी वेब साईट होस्टिंग is typically free, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
Business web site hosting often has a higher व्यय depending upon the आकार और प्रकार of the website.
Single page hosting is generally sufficient लिये निजी वेब पृष्ठों.
A complex site calls लिये a अधिक व्यापक पैकेज कि provides डेटाबेस support और application development platforms ( e.g. PHP, Java, Ruby on Rails, ColdFusion, or ASP.NET ).
These facilities allow customers to write or install scripts for अनुप्रयोग जैसे forums और सामग्री management.
Also, Secure Sockets Layer ( एसएसएल ) is typically प्रयुक्त for e-commerce.
The host may also provide an interface or कंट्रोल फलक लिये मैनेजिंग the वेब सर्वर और installing scripts, as well as other modules and service applications like e-mail.
Some hosts specialize in certain software or services ( e.g. e-commerce ), which are commonly प्रयुक्त by larger companies that outsource network infrastructure.
Obstetrics ( from the Latin obstare, `` to stand by '' ) is the medical specialty dealing with the care of all महिलाओं 's reproductive tracts and their children during pregnancy ( prenatal period ), childbirth and the postnatal period.
Many obstetricians हैं भी स्त्रीरोग, अर्थ they perform in both specialties.
In the United States, these physicians are commonly referred to as OB/GYNs.
The Wright brothers, Orville ( August 19, 1871 – January 30, 1948 ) and Wilbur ( April 16, 1867 – may 30, 1912 ), यहूद दो अमरीकी भाइयो, आविष्कारक, and aviation pioneers who were credited with inventing and building the world 's first successful airplane and making the first controlled, powered and sustained heavier-than-air human flight, on December 17, 1903.
From 1905 to 1907, the भाइयो विकसित उनके उड़ती यंत्र into the first practical fixed-wing aircraft.
Although not the first to build and fly experimental aircraft, the Wright brothers यहूद the पहला to इफ़तेरा वायुयान नियंत्रण कि बना fixed-wing संचालित flight possible.
The brothers ' fundamental breakthrough was their invention of three-axis कंट्रोल, जिससे सक्रिय the पायलट to steer the वायुयान effectively and to maintain its equilibrium.
This method became standard और remains मानक on fixed-wing वायुयान of all kinds.
From the beginning of their aeronautical work, the Wright brothers focused on developing a reliable विधि of पायलट कंट्रोल as the कुंजी to solving `` the उड़ती problem ''.
This approach differed significantly from other experimenters of the समय जो put अधिक जोर on विकासशील शक्तिशाली इंजन.
Using a small homebuilt wind tunnel, the Wrights also collected अधिक सटीक आंकड़ा than कोई पहले, enabling उन्हें to डिज़ाइन और निर्माण विंग्स and propellers that were more efficient than any before.
Their first U.S. patent, 821,393, did not claim invention of a flying machine, but rather, the invention of a प्रणाली of aerodynamic कंट्रोल कि manipulated a उड़ती यंत्र 's surfaces.
They gained the mechanical skills essential for their success by working for years in their दूकान साथ मुद्रण दबाता, साइकिल, मोटर्स, और other machinery.
Their work with bicycles in particular influenced their belief कि an अस्थिर गाडी जैसे a उड़ती यंत्र could be नियंत्रित और balanced with practice.
From 1900 until their first powered flights in लेट 1903, वे conducted extensive glider परीक्षण that also developed their skills as pilots.
Their bicycle shop employee Charlie Taylor became an important part of the team, building उनके पहला वायुयान इंजन in बंद सहयोग with the brothers.
The Wright brothers ' status as आविष्कारक of the वायुयान रै महरूम subject to counter-claims by various parties.
Much controversy persists over the अनेक स्पर्धा दावा of जल्दी aviators.
America 's Next Top Model, साईकिल 12 is the बारहवीं साईकिल of अमेरिका 's Next Top Model and the sixth season to air on The CW network.
It premiered on March 4, 2009.

The पुरस्कार लिये this cycle are:
