Exxon Mobil Corporation, or exxonmobil, is an अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय आयल और गैस corporation headquartered in Irving, Texas, United States.
It is a direct descendant of John D. Rockefeller 's Standard Oil company, and was formed on November 30, 1999, by the merger of Exxon and Mobil.
It is affiliated with Imperial Oil जिससे operates in कनाडा.
ExxonMobil is the world 's largest company by revenue and in 2013, became the largest publicly traded कम्पनी by मार्केट capitalization in the world.
the कम्पनी is क्रमित # 5 globally in Forbes Global 2000 list in 2013.
Exxon Mobil 's reserves were 72 billion oil-equivalent barrels at the end of 2007 and, at तब ( 2007 ) दरों of उत्पादन, हैं अपेक्षित to पिछला over 14 years.
With 37 oil refineries in 21 countries constituting a combined daily refining capacity of, Exxon Mobil is the largest refiner in the संसार, a शीर्षक कि थी भी संबद्ध साथ मानक आयल चूंकि इसके incorporation in 1870.
exxonmobil is the largest of the संसार 's supermajors with daily production of 3.921 million BOE ( barrels of oil equivalent ).
in 2008, इस थी लगभग 3 % of संसार production, which is less than several of the largest state-owned petroleum companies.
जब क्रमित by आयल और गैस reserves it is 14th in the world with less than 1 % of the total.
A 2012 article in The Daily Telegraph says that ExxonMobil has `` grown into one of the planet’s सबसे hated corporations, समर्थ to determine अमरीकी विदेशी नीति और the fate of entire nations ''.
In terms of its environmental record, exxonmobil increasingly drills in terrains leased to them by dictatorships, such as those in Chad and Equatorial Guinea.
Lee Raymond, the corporation’s chief executive until 2005, was `` notoriously sceptical about जलवायु बदलें और disliked सरकारी interference at any level ''.
The कम्पनी थी widely criticized लिये इसके slow जवाब to सफ़ाई its 1989 Valdez oil spill in Alaska.
This आलेख is परिचय the Globe Theatre of Shakespeare.
For the modern reconstruction in लंदन, देखिए शेक्सपियर 's Globe.
लिये अन्य उपयोग, देखिए ग्लोब Theatre ( disambiguation ).
The Globe Theatre was a थिएटर in लंदन संबद्ध with William Shakespeare.
It was built in 1599 by Shakespeare 's playing company, the Lord Chamberlain 's Men, on land owned by Thomas Brend and inherited by his son, निकोलस brend और पोता Sir Matthew Brend, and was destroyed by fire on 29 June 1613.
A second Globe Theatre was built on the same साईट by जून 1614 और बंद in 1642.
A modern reconstruction of the Globe, named `` शेक्सपियर 's ग्लोब ``, खोली in 1997 लगभग इससे the साईट of the असली थिएटर.
It 's a Wonderful Life is a 1946 American Christmas drama film produced and directed by फ़्रैंक capra, आधारित on the छोटी स्टोरी `` the महानतम तोहफा ``, जिससे फिलिप वैन doren Stern wrote in 1939 and privately published in 1945.
The film is considered one of the most loved films in American cinema and has become traditional देखने दौरान the क्रिसमस ऋतु, alongside popular classics such as Charles Dickens ' A Christmas Carol.
The film stars James Stewart as George Bailey, a man who has given up उसके सपनो in अनुक्रम to सहायता अन्य और जिनकी निकट आत्महत्या on क्रिसमस संध्या brings about the intervention of his guardian angel, Clarence Odbody ( Henry Travers ).
क्लेरेंस shows जार्ज सब the lives he has touched and how different life in his community of Bedford Falls would be had he never been born.
Despite initially performing poorly at the box office due to high production costs and stiff प्रतियोगिता at the समय of इसके रिलीज, the फिल्मी रै आइये to be regarded as a classic and is a staple of Christmas television around the world.
Theatrically, the film 's break-even पाइंट थी दरअसल $ 6.3 लाख, लगभग twice the production cost, a figure it never came close to achieving in its initial release.
An appraisal in 2006 reported : `` Although it was not the पूरा बक्सा दफ्तर विफलता कि आज everyone मानता... it थी initially a प्रमुख निराशा और पुष्टि, at least to the studios, that Capra was no longer capable of turning out the populist features that made his films the must-see, money-making events they once were. ''
The film was nominated for पाँच ऑस्कर और रै महरूम पहचाना by the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान as एक of the 100 best American films ever made, placing number 11 on its initial 1998 greatest movie list, and would also place number one on its list of the most inspirational American films of all time.
Data गोदाम अवलोकन
In कम्प्यूटिंग, a आंकड़ा गोदाम or एंटरप्राइज़ आंकड़ा गोदाम ( DW, DWH, or EDW ) is a database used for reporting and data analysis.
It is a central repository of data which is created by integrating आंकड़ा इससे एक or अधिक disparate sources.
Data warehouses store current as खूब as ऐतिहासिक आंकड़ा और हैं प्रयुक्त लिये बनाना चर्चित रिपोर्ट्स लिये वरिष्ठ प्रबन्धन रिपोर्टिंग such as annual and quarterly comparisons.
The data stored in the warehouse are uploaded from the operational systems ( ऐसे as विपणन, बिक्री etc., shown in the figure to the right ).
The data may pass through an operational data store for अतिरिक्त परिचालन पहले वे are used in the DW for reporting.
The ठेठ etl -आधारd आंकड़ा गोदाम उपयोग स्टेजिंग, data integration, and access layers to house its key functions.
The staging layer or स्टेजिंग डेटाबेस स्टोर्स कच्चा आंकड़ा extracted from each of the disparate source data systems.
The integration layer integrates the disparate आंकड़ा सेट by transforming the आंकड़ा इससे the स्टेजिंग परत प्रायः storing इस रूपांतरित आंकड़ा in an operational data store ( ODS ) database.
The integrated data are then moved to yet another database, often called the data warehouse database, where the data is arranged into hierarchical समूह प्रायः पुकारा आयाम and into facts and aggregate facts.
The combination of facts and आयाम is sometimes called a star schema.
the अभिगम परत helps users retrieve data.
A data warehouse constructed from an integrated data source systems does not require etl, स्टेजिंग databases, or operational data store databases.
The integrated data source प्रणालियों may be माना to be a भाग of a distributed operational data store layer.
Data federation methods or data आभासीकरण विधि may be प्रयुक्त to अभिगम the वितरित एकीकृत सोर्स आंकड़ा प्रणालियों to consolidate and aggregate data directly into the data warehouse database tables.
Unlike the ETL-based data warehouse, the integrated source आंकड़ा प्रणालियों और the आंकड़ा warehouse are all integrated since there is no transformation of dimensional or reference data.
This integrated data warehouse architecture supports the drill down from the aggregate data of the आंकड़ा गोदाम to the transactional आंकड़ा of the एकीकृत source data systems.
आंकड़ा warehouses can be subdivided into data marts.
Data marts स्टोर subsets of आंकड़ा from a warehouse.
This definition of the data गोदाम focuses on data storage.
The main source of the data is cleaned, transformed, cataloged and made available for use by managers and other कारोबार पेशेवर लिये आंकड़ा खनन, ऑनलाइन विश्लेषणात्मक प्रसंस्करण, मार्केट शोध और निर्णय support ( Marakas & O'Brien 2009 ).
However, the means to retrieve and analyze data, to extract, transform and load data, and to manage the आंकड़ा शब्दकोष हैं भी माना essential components of a data warehousing system.
Many references to data warehousing उपयोग इस broader context.
Thus, an expanded definition for data warehousing includes business intelligence टूल्स, टूल्स to निकालें, रूपांतरण and load data into the repository, and tools to manage and retrieve metadata.
Portland स्टोन पाषाण on the आइल of पोर्टलैंड, England
An abandoned निर्माण कुल पाषाण near Adelaide, South Australia
A पाषाण is a प्रकार of open-pit mine from which rock or minerals are extracted.
Quarries are generally used for extracting building materials, such as dimension stone, निर्माण कुल, riprap, बालू, and gravel.
वे हैं प्रायः collocated साथ कंक्रीट और डामर पौधे due to the requirement for large amounts of aggregate in those materials.
Open mines that produce minerals are typically referred to as खोलें pit mines.
The word quarry can include भूमिगत quarrying लिये स्टोन, ऐसे as नहाना स्टोन.
Mormons ( ) are a religious and cultural समूह सम्बन्धित to mormonism, the प्रिंसिपल शाखा of the latter दिन संत गति of restorationist Christianity, which began with the visions of Joseph Smith in upstate New York during the 1820s.
After Smith 's death in 1844 the mormons followed ब्रिघम Young to what would become the Utah Territory.
Today Mormons are understood to be members of The गिरिजाघर of यीशु मसीह of latter-day Saints ( LDS Church ).
Some mormons हैं भी either स्वतंत्र or non-practicing.
The center of Mormon cultural influence is in Utah, and उत्तर अमेरिका रै अधिक mormons than कोई अन्य महाद्वीप, हालांकि the बहुमत of Mormons live outside the United States.
Mormons have विकसित a दमदार sense of communality that stems from their doctrine and history.
During the 19th century mormon converts tended to एकत्रित to a सेंट्रल भौगोलिक स्थान, and between 1852 and 1890 a minority of Mormons openly practiced plural marriage, a form of religious polygamy.
Mormons dedicate large amounts of time and resources to serving in their church, and many यंग mormons चुनें to serve a full-time proselytizing मिशन.
Mormons have a health code that eschews alcoholic पेय, तम्बाकू, coffee, tea, and other addictive substances.
They tend to be very family-oriented, and have strong connections across पीढियां और साथ विस्तारित परिवार, परावर्तक of उनके विश्वास कि परिवारों can be sealed साथ beyond death and throughout eternity.
mormons भी have a सख्त विधि of शुद्धता, requiring abstention from sexual relations outside of marriage and strict fidelity within marriage.
Mormons self-identify as Christian, though some of उनके beliefs differ from mainstream Christianity.
Mormons believe in the Bible, as खूब as अन्य किताबे of scripture, such as the Book of Mormon.
They have a अद्वितीय दृश्य of cosmology, and believe that all people are spirit-children of God.
Mormons believe that returning to God requires following the example of Jesus Christ, and accepting उसके प्रायश्चित through ordinances ऐसे as बपतिस्मा.
They मानना कि मसीह 's गिरिजाघर थी लौटी through जोसेफ स्मिथ, and is guided by living prophets and apostles.
Central to Mormon faith is the विश्वास कि परमेश्वर speaks to his children and answers their prayers.
In financial accounting, एसेट हैं आर्थिक संसाधन.
Anything tangible or intangible that is capable of होने स्वामित्व or नियंत्रित to उपज मान और कि is आयोजित to have positive economic value is considered an asset.
Simply stated, assets represent value of ownership that can be परिवर्तित into नकदी ( हालांकि नकदी itself is also considered an asset ).
The balance sheet of a कड़ रिकॉर्ड the monetaryj.
G. Siegel, N. Dauber & J. K. Shim, `` The Vest Pocket CPA '', Wiley, 2005.There are अलग विधि of assessing the मौद्रिक मान of the एसेट अंकित on the Balance Sheet.
In some cases, the Historical Cost is used ; such that the value of the एसेट जब it थी खरीदा in the past is used as the monetary value.
In other instances, the उपस्थित मेला मार्केट मान of the एसेट is used to determine the value shown on the balance sheet.
value of the एसेट स्वामित्व by the firm.
It is money and other valuables belonging to an व्यक्तिगत or business.
Two major asset वर्ग हैं ठोस एसेट and intangible assets.
Tangible assets contain various subclasses, सहित वर्तमान एसेट और फिक्स्ड assets.J.
Downes, J.E. Goodman, `` Dictionary of Finance & Investment Terms '', Baron 's Financial Guides, 2003 Current assets शामिल inventory, जबकि फिक्स्ड एसेट शामिल ऐसे वस्तुएं as इमारतें और उपकरण.J. downes, J.E. Goodman, `` Dictionary of Finance & Investment Terms '', Baron 's Financial Guides, 2003 ; and J. G. Siegel, N. Dauber & J. K. Shim, `` The Vest Pocket CPA '', Wiley, 2005.
Intangible assets are nonphysical resources and rights that have a मान to the कड़ क्युकी वे दे the कड़ some kind of advantage in the market place.
Examples of intangible assets are goodwill, copyrights, trademarks, patents and कंप्यूटर कार्यक्रम, और वित्तीय एसेट, सहित ऐसे वस्तुएं as खाते receivable, bonds and stocks.
A neuron ( or ; also known as a neurone or nerve cell ) is an electrically excitable cell that प्रक्रियाओं और transmits सूचना through विद्युत और रासायनिक सिग्नल.
A chemical signal occurs via a synapse, a specialized कनेक्शन साथ अन्य कोशिकाएं.
Neurons कनेक्ट to प्रत्येक अन्य to form neural networks.
Neurons are the core components of the बेचैन प्रणाली, जिससे शामिल the दिमाग, spinal cord, and peripheral ganglia.
A number of specialized प्रकार of न्यूरॉन्स मौजूद : संवेदी न्यूरॉन्स respond to टच, ध्वनि, लाइट और numerous अन्य stimuli affecting cells of the sensory organs that then send signals to the spinal cord and brain.
Motor neurons प्राप्त सिग्नल इससे the दिमाग और स्पाइनल cord, cause muscle contractions, and affect glands.
Interneurons connect neurons to other neurons within the same प्रदेश of the दिमाग or स्पाइनल cord.
A typical neuron possesses a cell body ( प्रायः पुकारा the सोम ), dendrites, and an axon.
Dendrites are thin structures that arise from the cell body, often extending लिये सैंकड़ों of micrometres और branching अनेक टाइम्स, giving वृद्धि to a जटिल `` dendritic पेड़ ''.
An axon is a special cellular extension that arises from the cell body at a site called the axon उभरकर और ट्रेवल्स लिये a अलहदा, as दूर as 1 meter in humans or even more in other species.
The cell body of a neuron frequently gives rise to multiple dendrites, but never to more than एक axon, हालांकि the axon may शाखा सैंकड़ों of टाइम्स पहले it terminates.
At the majority of synapses, सिग्नल हैं भेजा इससे the axon of one neuron to a dendrite of another.
There are, however, many exceptions to these rules : neurons that lack dendrites, neurons that have no axon, synapses कि कनेक्ट an axon to another axon or a dendrite to another dendrite, etc.
All neurons are electrically excitable, maintaining वोल्टेज अनुपात आरपार उनके झिल्लियों by अर्थात् of metabolically driven ion pumps, which combine with ion channels embedded in the membrane to generate intracellular-versus-extracellular concentration differences of ions such as sodium, potassium, chloride, and calcium.
परिवर्तन in the cross-membrane voltage can alter the function of voltage-dependent ion channels.
If the voltage changes by a large enough amount, an all-or-none electrochemical pulse called an action potential is उत्पन्न, जिससे ट्रेवल्स rapidly साथ the कोशिका 's axon, और activates सिनेप्टिक connections with other cells when it arrives.
Neurons do नहीं undergo कोशिका division.
In सबसे मामले, न्यूरॉन्स हैं generated by special types of stem cells.
Astrocytes, a type of glial cell, have भी महरूम observed to फेरे into neurons by virtue of the stem cell characteristic pluripotency.
In humans, neurogenesis largely ceases during adulthood—but in two brain areas, the hippocampus and घ्राण बल्ब, वहीँ is दमदार प्रमाण लिये पीढी of substantial संख्याएँ of new neurons.
Super Bowl XLIII was an American फ़ुटबॉल खेल between the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ) चैंपियन पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स और the नेशनल Football Conference ( NFC ) champion Arizona Cardinals to decide the National Football League ( NFL ) champion for the 2008 season.
the स्टीलर्स पराजित the Cardinals by the score of 27–23.
The game was निभाई on फ़रवरी 1, 2009, at रेमंड James Stadium in Tampa, Florida.
With this win, the Steelers became the पहला टोली to win six Super Bowls.
Pittsburgh, who finished the नियमित ऋतु साथ a 12–4 रिकार्ड, भी जीती उनके दूसरी सुपर Bowl in four years after winning Super Bowl XL at the end of the 2005 season.
The Cardinals entered the game seeking उनके पहला एनएफएल शीर्षक चूंकि 1947, the longest championship drought in the league.
The club became an unexpected winner during the regular season, compiling a 9–7 record, and the playoffs with the aid of head coach Ken Whisenhunt, जो थी the स्टीलर्स ' अप्रिय समन्वयक in सुपर कटोरी xl, और the re-emergence of क्वार्टरबैक कर्ट warner, जो थी the सुपर कटोरी mvp in Super Bowl XXXIV with his former team, St. Louis Rams.
पिट्सबर्ग कूद to a 17–7 मध्यांतर सीसे, aided by linebacker James Harrison 's Super Bowl record 100-yard interception return for a touchdown.
Trailing 20–7 at the start of the fourth quarter, Arizona scored 16 unanswered points, सहित चौड़ी receiver लैरी fitzgerald 's 64-yard touchdown reception, to take the lead with 2:37 remaining in the game.
But the Steelers marched 78 गज to स्कोर on चौड़ी receiver santonio holmes ' 6-yard game-winning touchdown catch with 35 seconds left.
Holmes, who caught nine passes for 131 yards and a touchdown, including four receptions लिये 73 गज on कि फाइनल game-winning drive, was named Super Bowl MVP.
He became the sixth wide receiver to win the पुरस्कार, और भी थी the तीसरा पिट्सबर्ग receiver to जीत the पुरस्कार, following Lynn Swann and Hines Ward.
Despite the global financial crisis and limited राशि of आनुषंगिक festivities कि हैं सामान्यतः आयोजित पहले the खेल, the NBC television network broadcast attracted an average U.S. audience of 98.7 million viewers, making it the most watched Super Bowl in history to that point.
A diagram of the electromagnetic वर्णक्रम, प्रर्दशित विभिन्न गुण across the range of frequencies and wavelengths
The electromagnetic spectrum is the range of सब संभावित बारंबारता of electromagnetic radiation.
The `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of an object has a अलग अर्थ, और is बजाय the characteristic वितरण of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक radiation emitted or absorbed by that particular object.
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from below the low frequencies used for modern radio communication to gamma radiation at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end, thereby covering wavelengths इससे हज़ारों of किलोमीटर bas to a भिन्न of the size of an atom.
the सीमा लिये long wavelengths is the आकार of the universe itself, while it is thought that the short wavelength limit is in the vicinity of the Planck length, although in principle the spectrum is infinite and continuous.
Most parts of the electromagnetic spectrum are used in science for spectroscopic and other probing interactions, as तरीके to पढ़ाई और characterize पदार्थ.
In addition, radiation from various parts of the spectrum has found many other uses for संचार और निर्माण ( देखिए इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक radiation for more applications ).
लेजेंड
marchantia, a liverwort
Bryophyte is a traditional name used to refer to all embryophytes ( land plants ) that do नहीं have सच्चा vascular ऊतक और हैं इसलिए called ' non-vascular plants '.
Some bryophytes do have specialized ऊतकों for the transport of water ; however since these do not contain lignin, they are not considered to be true vascular tissue.
Currently bryophytes are thought not to be a प्राकृतिक or monophyletic समूह ; however the नाम is सुविधाजनक और remains in उपयोग as a collective term for mosses, hornworts, and liverworts.
Bryophytes produce enclosed reproductive structures ( gametangia और sporangia ), लकिन वे उपज neither पुष्प nor seeds, reproducing via spores.
The term ब्रायोफाइटा आता इससे यूनानी βρύον, bryon, `` tree-moss, oyster-green '' + φυτόν - phyton `` plant ''.
A bank is a financial institution and a वित्तीय intermediary कि स्वीकृत जमा और चैनल्स those deposits into lending activities, either directly by loaning or indirectly through capital markets.
A bank is the connection between customers that have पूंजी deficits and customers with capital surpluses.
Due to their influence within a financial system and an अर्थव्यवस्था, बैंको हैं generally अत्यधिक regulated in सबसे countries.
Most banks operate under a प्रणाली ज्ञात as fractional आरक्षित बैंकिंग जहाँ वे hold only a small reserve of the funds deposited and lend out the rest for profit.
They are generally subject to minimum capital requirements which are based on an अंतरराष्ट्रीय नियत of पूंजी मानकों, known as the Basel Accords.
The oldest bank still in existence is Monte dei Paschi di Siena, headquartered in Siena, Italy, which has been ऑपरेटिंग लगातार चूंकि 1472.
It is followed by Berenberg Bank of हैम्बर्ग ( 1590 ) and Sveriges Riksbank of Sweden ( 1668 ).
Banking in इसके आधुनिक भाव विकसित in समृद्ध शहरों of पुनर्जागरण Italy, such as Florence, Venice and Genoa.
In the history of banking, a क्रमांक of बैंकिंग dynasties —among them notably Medici, Fugger, Welser, Berenberg, Baring and Rothschild —have played a central role over many centuries.
The Xbox is a video game console manufactured by microsoft.
It was released on November 15, 2001 in उत्तर अमेरिका, फ़रवरी 22, 2002 in Japan, and March 14, 2002 in Australia and Europe.
It was Microsoft 's पहला foray into the gaming console market.
As part of the sixth-generation of gaming, the Xbox competed साथ सोनी 's प्लेस्टेशन 2, sega 's dreamcast ( जिससे रोका American sales before the Xbox went on sale ), and Nintendo 's GameCube.
The Xbox was the first console offered by an अमरीकी कम्पनी बाद the Atari Jaguar stopped sales in 1996.
The integrated Xbox Live service launched in November 2002 allowed खिलाड़ी to खेल खेल ऑनलाइन साथ a ब्रॉडबैंड connection.
It first competed with Dreamcast 's online service but later primarily competed with प्लेस्टेशन 2 's ऑनलाइन सेवा.
Although these two are free while Xbox Live required a subscription, as well as broadband-only connection which was not completely अपनाया yet, एक्सबॉक्स सजीव थी a कामयाबी due to बेहतर सर्वर, सुविधाएँ ऐसे as a दोस्त सूची, और पड़ाव शीर्षक जैसे हेलो 2 released in नवम्बर 2004, जिससे is the best-selling Xbox video game and was by far the most popular online game for years.
Xbox 's successor, the एक्सबॉक्स 360, थी launched in November 2005.
the एक्सबॉक्स थी discontinued in लेट 2005 in Japan where sales were poor.
It was discontinued in late 2006 in यूरोपीय और जल्दी 2007 in उत्तर America.
The last Xbox game in Europe was टोनी हॉक 's प्रोजेक्ट 8 released in नवम्बर 2006, और the last game in North America was Madden NFL 09 released in August 2008.
Support for out-of-warranty Xbox consoles थी discontinued on कूच 2, 2009, stating that any in-warranty repair now needed will not be undertaken.
Xbox access to Xbox Live was रोका on अप्रैल 15, 2010.
The Gospel According to John ( Greek τὸ κατὰ Ἰωάννην εὐαγγέλιον ), commonly referred to as the Gospel of John or simply John and often referred to in New Testament स्कॉलरशिप as the चौथी इन्जील, is an खाता of the पब्लिक ministry of Jesus.
It begins with the witness and affirmation by John the बैपटिस्ट और concludes साथ the मौत, दफ़न, क़यामत, and post-resurrection appearances of Jesus.
This account is fourth of the canonical gospels, after the synoptics मैथ्यू, चिह्नित और Luke.
states that the book derives from the testimony of the ' शिष्य जिसको यीशु loved. '
Along with Peter, the unnamed शिष्य is विशेषकर बंद to यीशु, और early-church tradition identified him as John the Apostle, one of Jesus ' Twelve Apostles.
The gospel is closely related in style and content to the three surviving Epistles of John such that commentators दावत the चार किताबे साथ, yet, according to सबसे आधुनिक विद्वानों, John was not the author of any of these books.
Recent ईसाई scripture स्कॉलरशिप अधिक और अधिक has placed John within a first-century Jewish context.
Raymond E. Brown did pioneering work to ट्रेस the विकास of the tradition from which the gospel arose.
The discourses seem to be चिंतित साथ the वास्तविक मुद्दे of the church-and-synagogue debate at the time when the Gospel was written.
It is notable that, in the gospel, the community still appears to define itself primarily विरूद्ध judaism, बल्कि than as भाग of a wider Christian church.
Though Christianity started as a movement within Judaism, धीरे ईसाइयों और यहूदियों became bitterly opposed.
John presents a `` higher '' Christology than the synoptics, meaning that it describes Jesus as the अवतार of the दैवी लोगो through whom all things were made, as the object of veneration, and more explicitly as God incarnate.
Only in John does Jesus talk at length about himself and उसके दैवी भूमिका, प्रायः shared with the disciples only.
Against the synoptics, John focuses largely on different चमत्कार ( सहित resurrecting lazarus ), given as signs meant to engender faith.
Synoptic elements such as parables and exorcisms हैं नहीं मिला in जॉन.
It presents a realized eschatology in which मोक्ष is already उपस्थित for the believer.
The Plagues of Egypt ( ), also called the Ten Plagues ( ) or the Biblical Plagues, were ten calamities that, according to the biblical किताब of exodus, इसराईल 's परमेश्वर, yahweh, inflicted upon मिश्र to राजी Pharaoh to release the ill-treated Israelites from slavery.
pharaoh capitulated बाद the tenth plague, triggering the Exodus of the Jewish people.
The plagues were designed to कंट्रास्ट the शक्ति of yahweh साथ the नपुंसकता of Egypt 's various gods.
Some commentators have संबद्ध अनेक of the plagues with judgment on specific gods associated with the Nile, fertility and natural phenomena.
The plagues of Egypt हैं भी उल्लेखित in the Quran ( 7,133–136 ).
According to the Book of Exodus, God proclaims कि सब the देवताओं of मिश्र होगा be judged through the tenth and final plague:
John Martin 's painting of the प्लेग of hail and fire ( 1823 ).
A role-playing game ( RPG and sometimes roleplaying game ) is a game in which players assume the भूमिकाएँ of वर्ण in a fictional setting.
Players take responsibility for acting out ये भूमिकाएँ भीतर a कथा, either through शाब्दिक एक्टिंग or through a process of structured decision-making or character development.
Actions taken भीतर अनेक खेल सफल or असफल according to a formal system of rules and guidelines.
There are अनेक फ़ॉर्म of RPG.
The original form, sometimes called the tabletop RPG, is conducted through चर्चा, whereas in सजीव कार्रवाई role-playing games ( LARP ) players physically perform their characters ' actions.
in दोनो of ये फ़ॉर्म, an arranger पुकारा a खेल निपुण ( gm ) प्रायः decides on the rules and setting to be used and acts as referee, while each of the other players plays the role of a single character.
Several varieties of RPG also exist in electronic media, such as multi-player text-based MUDs and their graphics-based successors, massively एकाधिक ऑनलाइन role-playing games ( MMORPGs ).
Role-playing games also include single-player offline role-playing video खेल in जिससे खिलाड़ी कंट्रोल a अक्षर or टोली जो undertake quests, और may शामिल सामर्थ्य that advance using statistical mechanics.
These games often share settings and rules with tabletop RPGs, but emphasize character उन्नति अधिक than collaborative storytelling.
Despite this variety of forms, some game forms such as trading card games and wargames कि हैं सम्बन्धित to role-playing खेल may not be included.
Role-playing कार्यकलाप may sometimes be उपस्थित in such games, but it is not the primary focus.
The term is भी sometimes प्रयुक्त to describe लिए simulation games and exercises used in teaching, training, and academic research.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), also known as the War between the States or simply the सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ), थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery, विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the western territories.
Foreign शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure, the Confederacy collapsed, गुलामी थी abolished, और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल एकता और guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential election, Republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त राज्य ' territories.
Lincoln won, लकिन पहले उसके उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the incoming republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address घोषित उसके प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate civil war.
आठ बाकी स्लेव states continued to reject calls for secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A सलाम सम्मेलन विफल to find a compromise, and both sides prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed कि यूरोपीय देशों यहूद so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` that they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon Fort Sumter, a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called लिये प्रत्येक राज्य to provide सैनिकों to retake the fort ; consequently, four more slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy.
The Eastern Theater थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the emancipation उदघोषणा, which made ending slavery a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy, then much of their western armies, और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in दो at the मिसिसिपी River.
In 1863, Robert E. ली 's confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of all Union armies in 1864.
In the Western थिएटर, विलियम T. शरमन drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर Atlanta and marched to the sea, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from सब दिशानिर्देश, और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
the अमरीकी Civil War was one of the earliest true industrial wars.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, and mass-produced हथियार were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian कारखानों, खानों, shipyards, बैंको, परिवहन and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American history, resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा, और 30 प्रतिशत of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
The definition of the संसार 's व्यस्ततम विमानक्षेत्र रै महरूम निर्दिष्ट by the Airports Council International in Geneva, Switzerland.
The ACI defines और उपायों the following तीन types of airport traffic:
Passenger ट्रैफ़िक : कुल यात्री emplaned and deplaned, passengers in transit counted once
Cargo traffic : loaded and मोड भाड़ा और mail in metric tonnes
Traffic movements : landings and take-offs of वायुयान
World War I ( wwi ) थी a वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित in Europe that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from its occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939, और the पहला संसार War or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम, फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but, as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement, Italy did not enter into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations डाला the युद्ध : इटली, जापानी और the संयुक्त राज्य joined the Allies, and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 million सैन्य कर्मियों, सहित 60 लाख europeans, were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely क्युकी of technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest विरोध in संसार इतिहास, subsequently paving the way for various political changes, such as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी policies of the great powers of Europe.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक संकट जब austria-hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the पिछला decades were invoked.
Within weeks, the major powers were at war and, via their colonies, the conflict soon स्प्रेड around the संसार.
On 28 July, the Austro-Hungarians fired the first गोलियाँ of the युद्ध as तैयारी लिये the invasion of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's declaration of war against Germany.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a स्थिर बैटल of अपघर्षण साथ a गर्त लकीर that changed little until 1917.
on the पूर्वी सामने, the रूसी फौज थी कामयाब against the Austro-Hungarians, but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans.
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the युद्ध, खोलने up fronts in the काकेशस, मेसोपोटामिया and the Sinai.
Italy and बुल्गारिया गई to war in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in November brought the russians to शर्तें साथ the सेंट्रल शक्तियां.
After a 1918 जर्मनी अप्रिय साथ the western front, the Allies drove back the Germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had its own trouble साथ क्रांतिकारियों, सहमत to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in विजय लिये the allies.
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts, as the participants tried to mobilize their जनशक्ति और आर्थिक संसाधन to लड़ो a total war.
By the end of the war, four major imperial powers—the जर्मनी, रूसी, austro-hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the पूर्व दो खोया a great amount of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of central Europe was redrawn into अनेक छोटी राज्य.
The League of Nations was formed in the आशा of preventing another such conflict.
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires, the repercussions of Germany 's defeat and problems साथ the सन्धि of versailles हैं सहमत to be कारकों contributing to संसार War II.
The Deepwater Horizon oil spill ( also referred to as the BP oil spill, the BP oil disaster, the Gulf of मैक्सिको आयल spill, और the macondo blowout ) थी an आयल spill in the गल्फ of Mexico on the BP -operated Macondo Prospect, considered the largest accidental marine oil spill in the history of the petroleum industry, estimated to be between 8 % and 31 % larger in volume than the earlier Ixtoc I oil spill.
Following the explosion and sinking of the Deepwater Horizon oil rig, which claimed 11 lives, a sea-floor आयल gusher flowed unabated लिये 87 दिनों, जबतक it थी capped on 15 July 2010.
The total निर्वहन is अनुमानित at.
A massive response ensued to protect beaches, वेटलैंड्स और मुहानों इससे the spreading आयल utilizing skimmer ships, floating booms, controlled burns and of Corexit oil dispersant.
After several failed efforts to contain the flow, the well थी घोषित sealed on 19 September 2010.
Some reports indicate the well साईट continues to लीक.
Due to the months-long spill, along with adverse effects from the response and cleanup activities, extensive damage to marine and wildlife habitats, fishing and tourism industries, and human health problems have जारी through 2013.three सालो बाद the spill, तारकोल गेंदें could स्टिल be मिला on the मिसिसिपी coast.
Numerous investigations explored the causes of the विस्फोट और record-setting spill.
Notably, the U.S. government 's September 2011 report pointed to defective सीमेंट on the खूब, faulting ज़्यादातर bp, लकिन भी खूब ऑपरेटर Transocean and contractor Halliburton.
Earlier in 2011, a White House commission likewise blamed BP and its partners for a series of cost-cutting decisions and an अपर्याप्त सुरक्षा प्रणाली, लकिन भी concluded कि the spill resulted इससे `` प्रणालीगत '' रूट कल्याणकारी और `` अनुपस्थित significant reform in both industry practices and government policies, might well recur ''.
In November 2012, BP and the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of इंसाफ settled संघीय दण्ड आरोप साथ bp pleading अपराधी to 11 रिश्तो of manslaughter, two misdemeanors, and a felony count of lying to Congress.
bp भी सहमत to चार सालो of सरकारी निगरानी of इसके सुरक्षा practices और आचार, और the पर्यावरणीय Protection Agency announced that BP would be temporarily banned from new contracts with the US government.
BP and the विभाग of इंसाफ सहमत to a record-setting $ 4.525 अरब in जुर्माना and other payments but further legal proceedings not expected to conclude until 2014 are ongoing to determine payouts and fines under the Clean Water Act and the Natural Resources Damage Assessment.
As of February 2013, criminal and civil settlements और भुगतान to a विश्वास fund had cost the company $ 42.2 billion.
`` जहाँ the गलियों have No Name '' is a song by rock band U2.
It is the opening track from their 1987 album The Joshua Tree and was released as the album 's तीसरा सिंगल in अगस्त 1987.
The song 's hook is a repeating guitar arpeggio using a delay effect, played during the सोंग 's परिचय और again at the end.
Lead vocalist Bono wrote the lyrics in जवाब to the ख़्याल कि it is संभावित to पहचानो a व्यक्ति 's धर्म and income based on the street on which they lived, particularly in Belfast.
During the band 's difficulties recording the song, निर्माता ब्रायन eno माना erasing the song 's tapes to have them start from scratch.
`` Where the Streets Have No Name '' was praised by आलोचकों और became a वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी, peaking at क्रमांक तेरह in the US, number fourteen in Canada, number ten in the Netherlands, and number four in the United Kingdom.
The song रै become एक of the बैंड 's सबसे लोकप्रिय गीतों और रै remained a staple of their live act since the song debuted in 1987 on The Joshua Tree Tour.
The song was notably performed on a Los Angeles rooftop for the filming of इसके म्यूज़िक वीडियो, जिससे जीती a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन प्रदर्शन Music Video.Recently the song has been used by the NFL 's Baltimore Ravens as their entrance song in Super Bowl XLVII
Thomas Jeffrey `` Tom '' Hanks ( born July 9, 1956 ) is an अमरीकी कर्ता, निर्माता, लेखक, and director.
Hanks is known for his भूमिकाएँ in अपोलो 13, Big, That Thing You Do !
, The Green Mile, तुम 've मिला मेल, sleepless in सिएटल, चार्ली विल्सन 's युद्ध, कैच me if You Can, Forrest Gump, Cast Away, A League of Their Own, The Da Vinci Code, Angels & Demons, as well as animated films like the Toy Story film series, The Polar Express, and The Simpsons Movie.
He has earned and been nominated for numerous awards during his career, including winning a Golden Globe for Best Actor और an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता लिये उसके भूमिका in फिलाडेल्फिया और a सुनहरी ग्लोब, an अकादमी पुरस्कार, a स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं Guild Award, and a People 's Choice Award for Best Actor for his role in Forrest Gump, and earning the Stanley Kubrick Britannia Award for Excellence in Film from the BAFTAs in 2004.
Hanks is also known for his सहयोग साथ फिल्मी निदेशक स्टीवन स्पिलबर्ग on छायांकन निजी Ryan and the mini-series Band of Brothers, which launched Hanks also as a successful director, producer and writer.
As of 2012, Hanks ' films have grossed over $ 4.2 billion at the United States box office alone, and over $ 8.5 billion विश्वव्यापी बनाना उसे the उच्चतम all-time box office star.
The Cape is an अमरीकी superhero drama series.
It premiered on NBC during the 2010–2011 television season as a mid-season replacement beginning with a two-hour पायलट एपीसोड on संडे, जनवरी 9, 2011 at 9 pm Eastern and Pacific Time.

NBC subsequently cut the total number of episodes to be aired इससे 13 to 10 as a परिणाम of कम दरजा.
On March 2, 2011, NBC घोषित कि the श्रेणी finale would only be aired on the network 's website.
Halley 's Comet or Comet हैली ( or ), officially designated 1p/halley, is the best-known of the short-period comets and is visible from Earth every 75–76 years.
Halley is the only short-period comet that is clearly visible to the naked eye इससे धरती, और यूँ the तभी naked-eye धूमकेतु कि might appear twice in a human lifetime.
Other naked-eye धूमकेतुओं may be उज्जवल and more spectacular, but will appear only once in thousands of years.
Halley 's returns to the inner Solar System have महरूम observed और अंकित by खगोलशास्त्रियों since at least 240 BCE.
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were made by Chinese, Babylonian, and medieval यूरोपीय chroniclers, लकिन यहूद नहीं पहचाना as reappearances of the same object at the time.
The धूमकेतु 's periodicity थी पहला संकल्पित in 1705 by English astronomer Edmond Halley, after whom it is now named.
Halley 's Comet last appeared in the भीतरी सौर प्रणाली in 1986 and will next appear in mid-2061.
During its 1986 apparition, हैली became the पहला धूमकेतु to be observed in विवरण by spacecraft, providing the first observational data on the structure of a comet nucleus and the mechanism of coma and tail formation.
These observations समर्थित a क्रमांक of longstanding hypotheses परिचय धूमकेतु निर्माण, विशेषकर फ्रेड whipple 's `` dirty snowball '' model, which correctly predicted that Halley would be composed of a mixture of volatile ices – such as water, carbon dioxide and ammonia – and dust.
The missions also provided data which substantially reformed और reconfigured ये विचार ; लिये उदाहरण it is अभी समझा कि हैली 's सतह is largely composed of dusty, non-volatile materials, and that only a small portion of it is icy.
The following is a list of the most populous incorporated स्थान of the संयुक्त राज्य of America.
As पारिभाषित by the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो, an `` incorporated प्लेस `` includes a variety of designations, including city, town, village, borough, and municipality.
A few असाधारण जनसांख्यिकी designated स्थान ( cdps ) हैं also included in the Census Bureau 's listing of incorporated places.
Consolidated city-counties represent a पृथक प्रकार of सरकारी कि includes the entire population of a county, or county equivalent.
Some consolidated city-counties, however, शामिल अनेक incorporated places.
This list presents only that portion ( or `` balance '' ) of such consolidated city-counties कि हैं नहीं a भाग of another incorporated place.
Note that this list refers only to the जनसांख्यिकी of व्यक्तिगत municipalities भीतर उनके defined limits, which does not include other municipalities or unincorporated suburban areas within urban agglomerations.
A different ranking is evident जब considering u.S. महानगर area populations.
The Mayflower was the जलयान कि in 1620 transported 102 अंग्रेज़ी तीर्थयात्रियों, सहित a core group of Separatists, to New England.
Their story is one of travail और अस्तित्व in a हर्ष नई World environment.
A New Zealand forward ( in श्वेत ) takes a शॉट on लक्ष्य विरूद्ध कैमरून in the 2011 FIFA U-20 World Cup.
Forwards, also known as strikers, are the players on a टोली in संघ फ़ुटबॉल जो खेल निकटतम to the opposing टोली 's लक्ष्य, और हैं therefore principally responsible for scoring goals.
This very advanced position and its सीमित रक्षात्मक जिम्मेदारियों औसत आगे normally score more goals than other players.
This position requires प्रज्ञा, गति, और शक्ति, both of execution and of thought, to perform the role well.
Modern team formations usually include one to तीन आगे ; दो is the सबसे आम.
Coaches typically फ़ील्ड एक स्ट्राइकर जो plays in an उन्नत स्थिति ( the केन्द्र आगे ), और another attacking forward who plays somewhat deeper and assists in making goals as well as scoring ( the second striker ).
It should be noted that inside forwards develop इससे attacking midfield स्थितियाँ और hence हैं naturally midfielders.
Barcelona FC star Lionel Messi is a typical attacking मिडफील्डर देखी as a आगे due to उसके shot accuracy.
A California domestic partnership is a legal relationship available to same-sex couples, and to certain opposite-sex युगल in जिससे at तनिक एक पार्टी is at तनिक 18 सालो of age.
It affords the couple `` the same rights, protections, और लाभ, और... the वही जिम्मेदारियों, obligations, and duties under law... '' as married spouses.
Enacted in 1999, the domestic partnership registry was the first of इसके दयालु in the संयुक्त राज्य निर्मित by a विधानमंडल without court intervention.
Initially, domestic partnerships enjoyed very few privileges—principally just hospital-visitation rights and the सही to be claimed as a अगला of kin of the एस्टेट of a deceased partner.
The legislature has since expanded the scope of California domestic partnerships to शामिल सब of the अधिकारों और जिम्मेदारियों आम to marriage.
As such, California domestic partnerships are functionally equivalent to civil संघ offered in several other states.
Although the program enjoys broad support in कैलिफ़ोर्निया, it रै been the source of some controversy.
Groups opposed to the recognition of same-sex families have challenged the विस्तार of घरेलू partnerships in court.
Conversely, advocates of same-sex विवाह contend कि anything कम than पूरा विवाह अधिकारों extended to same-sex partners is analogous to the `` separate but equal '' racial laws of the Jim Crow era.
Mark A. Jackson ( born अप्रैल 1, 1965 ) is an अमरीकी बास्केट कोच, and former player who is the current head coach of the Golden State Warriors of the NBA.
A point guard from St. John 's University, he played for the New York Knicks, Indiana Pacers, Los Angeles Clippers, Denver Nuggets, Toronto Raptors, यूटा जैज़ और ह्यूस्टन rockets in the एनबीए in a करियर spanning इससे 1987 to 2004.
Jackson has also worked as a commentator for ESPN and ABC alongside his former coach जेफ़ वैन gundy और play-by-play man माइक breen.
he थी previously an एनबीए विश्लेषक for The YES Network 's New Jersey Nets games.
दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी रै ग्यारह आधिकारिक भाषाएं : अफ्रीकी, अंग्रेज़ी, ndebele, उत्तरी sotho, Sotho, Swazi, Tswana, Tsonga, Venda, Xhosa and Zulu.
Fewer than two percent of South Africans बोलो a पहला भाषा अन्य than an आधिकारिक एक.
Most South africans can बोलो अधिक than one language.
Dutch and English were the पहला आधिकारिक भाषाएं of दक्षिण Africa from 1910 to 1925.
Afrikaans was added as a भाग of डच in 1925.
Dutch was replaced by Afrikaans when South Africa became a गणतंत्र in 1961, और डच थी dropped in 1983, so between 1983 and 1994, South Africa had two official languages : English and Afrikaans.
The English version of the South African constitution refers to the languages by the names in those languages : isiZulu, isiXhosa, Afrikaans, Sepedi ( referring to Northern Sotho ), Setswana, अंग्रेज़ी, sesotho ( referring to दक्षिणी sotho ), xitsonga, siswati, tshivenda and isiNdebele ( referring to Southern Ndebele ).
In दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी, दक्षिणी ndebele is known simply as Ndebele, as most speakers of Northern Ndebele live in Zimbabwe.
The 1993 संस्करण of the संविधान referred to उत्तरी Sotho as Sesotho sa Leboa, but the 1996 version referred to the language as Sepedi.
Different government departments and आधिकारिक लाशें उपयोग अलग शर्तें to denote Northern Sotho.
The main language of government is English even if South Africans प्रायः लो अभिमान in using indigenous languages for any purpose.
Afrikaans also features prominently in कॉमर्स साथ साथ अंग्रेज़ी as the languages with the highest number of fluent speakers are Afrikaans and English.
In terms of भाषाई classification, the official languages include two West-Germanic languages ( English and Afrikaans ) and nine Bantu languages.
Four of these are Nguni languages ( Zulu, Xhosa, Swati and Ndebele ) and three are Sotho–Tswana भाषाएं ( उत्तरी sotho, दक्षिणी Sotho and Tswana ).
सोंगा is a Tswa–Ronga language.
South African Sign Language is a distinct though incompletely उभरा नेशनल मानक भाषा जिससे भी subsumes a क्लस्टर of semi-standardised dialects.

The New York Jets are a professional football team headquartered in florham पार्क, New Jersey, representing the New York metropolitan area.
The team is a member of the पूर्वी प्रभाग of the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल Conference ( AFC ) in the National Football League ( NFL ).
In a unique arrangement for the league, the jets share metlife स्टेडियम in ईस्ट रदरफोर्ड, New Jersey with the New York Giants.
The मताधिकार is legally और corporately registered as New York Jets, LLC.
The team थी संस्थापित in 1959 as the Titans of New York, an original member of the American Football League ; later, the franchise joined the NFL in the AFL–NFL merger.
The team began to खेल in 1960 at the Polo Grounds.
Under new ownership, the वर्तमान नाम थी अपनाया in 1963 और the मताधिकार was relocated to Shea Stadium in 1964 and then to the Meadowlands Sports Complex in 1984.
The Jets advanced to the playoffs for the first time in 1968 and went on to compete in सुपर कटोरी iii जहाँ वे पराजित the बाल्टीमोर कोल्टस, बनने the first AFL team to defeat an NFL club in an AFL-NFL World Championship Game.
Since 1968, the Jets have appeared in the playoffs thirteen times, and in the afc चैंपियनशिप खेल चार टाइम्स, सबसे recently खोने to the पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स in 2010.
however, the jets have never लौटे to the Super Bowl, making them one of three NFL teams to win their lone Super Bowl appearance, along with the New Orleans Saints and Tampa Bay Buccaneers.
The team 's training facility, अटलांटिक स्वास्थ्य jets प्रशिक्षण बीच, which opened in 2008, is located in Florham Park.
The team currently holds their सालाना प्रशिक्षण शिविर सत्र on the कैम्पस of the राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों of नई यॉर्क at cortland in Cortland, New York while holding occasional sessions at the Florham Park complex.
psilocybe semilanceata
Psilocybin mushrooms, also ज्ञात as साइकेडेलिक मशरूम, हैं fungi कि contain psychoactive indole alkaloids.
वहीँ हैं अनेक colloquial शर्तें लिये psilocybin mushrooms, the most common being shrooms and magic mushrooms.
Biological genera containing psilocybin mushrooms include Agrocybe, Conocybe, copelandia, galerina, gerronema, gymnopilus, hypholoma, inocybe, Mycena, Panaeolus, Pluteus, and Psilocybe.
There are लगभग 190 प्रजाति of psilocybin मशरूम and most of them fall in the genus Psilocybe.
Psilocybin mushrooms have likely been used since प्रागैतिहासिक टाइम्स और may have महरूम चित्रित in rock art.
Many संस्कृतियों have प्रयुक्त ये mushrooms in religious rites.
In modern Western society they are used recreationally for their साइकेडेलिक प्रभाव.
Recent studies done at Imperial College London and Johns Hopkins School of Medicine conclude कि जब प्रयुक्त properly, psilocybin acts as an anti-depressant as suggested by fMRI brain scans.
Alaska ( ) is a state in the United States, situated in the northwest extremity of the North American continent, with the international boundary with Canada to the east, the Arctic Ocean to the उत्तर, और the प्रशांत समंदर to the वेस्ट और दक्षिण, साथ रूस further west across the Bering Strait.
Alaska is the largest state in the United States by area, the 4th least populous and the तनिक densely populated of the 50 United States.
Approximately half of Alaska 's 731,449 निवासियों सजीव भीतर the anchorage महानगर area.
Alaska 's economy is dominated by the oil, natural गैस, और फ़िशिंग उद्योग ; it has these resources in abundance.
Alaska was purchased from Russia on कूच 30, 1867, लिये $ 7.2 लाख ( $ समायोजित for inflation ) at approximately two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
The land went through several administrative changes पहले बनने an व्यवस्थित ( or incorporated ) territory on may 11, 1912, and the 49th state of the U.S. on January 3, 1959.
The name `` Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already introduced in the रूसी औपनिवेशिक काल, जब it थी प्रयुक्त तभी लिये the प्रायद्वीप और is निकला इससे the aleut alaxsxaq, meaning `` the mainland '' or, more literally, `` the object towards which the action of the sea is directed ''.
It is also known as alyeska, the `` ग्रेट जमीन '', an aleut शब्द निकला from the same root.
The 101 French विभाग हैं विभाजित into 342 arrondissements, which may be translated into English as districts.
The capital of an arrondissement/district is पुकारा a subprefecture.
When an arrondissement contains the prefecture ( capital ) of the department, that prefecture is the capital of the arrondissement, एक्टिंग दोनो as a prefecture and as a subprefecture.
Arrondissements are further विभाजित into cantons और communes.
The vagina ( from Latin vāgīna, literally `` sheath '' or `` scabbard `` ) is a tubular tract which is a sex अंग और रै दो प्रमुख कृत्यों ; यौन intercourse and childbirth.
In humans, this passage leads from the opening of the vulva to the गर्भाशय ( womb ), but the vaginal tract ends at the cervix.
Unlike men, who have only one genital orifice, महिलाओं have दो, the urethra and the vagina.
The vaginal opening is much larger than the urethral opening, and both उद्घाटन हैं सुरक्षित by the labia.
The inner mould of the vagina has a foldy texture जिससे can बनाएँ घर्षण लिये the शिश्न दौरान intercourse.
During arousal, the योनि gets नम to सुकर the entrance of the penis.
The Latinate plural `` vaginae '' is rarely प्रयुक्त in English.
Colloquially, the शब्द योनि is प्रायः used to refer to the vulva or to the female genitals in general.
However, by its dictionary and anatomical definitions, योनि refers exclusively to the विशिष्ट आतंरिक structure.
The Cincinnati Reds are a Major League Baseball team based in सिनसिनाटी, ओहियो.
They are members of the नेशनल लीग सेंट्रल Division.
Established in 1881 as an independent club, the team became a charter member of the अमरीकी संघ in 1882, और joined the National League in 1890.
The club traditionally traces इसके उत्पत्ति to बेसबॉल 's पहला openly professional team in 1869.
The Reds have won five World Series titles, one American Association pennant, nine National लीग pennants और टेन division titles.
The Reds played in the National League West between 1969 और 1993 और have महरूम in the नेशनल League Central since 1994.
Since 2003, the Reds have played at Great American बॉल पार्क, निर्मित अगला to उनके home from 1970 to 2002, Riverfront Stadium.
Bob castellini रै owned the Cincinnati Reds since 2006.
a शरारत stink bomb.
A stink bomb is a device designed to बनाएँ an अप्रिय smell.
They range in effectiveness इससे सरल pranks to सैन्य ग्रेड malodorants or riot control chemical agents.
the गिनीज किताब of Records lists two smelliest substances.
One is `` US Government Standard बाथरूम malodor '' ; a मिश्रण of आठ रसायन साथ a stench resembling human feces, only much stronger, designed to test the efficacy of deodorizers and air fresheners.
Another one, `` Who me ? ``, is a मिश्रण of पाँच sulfur-containing chemicals and smells like rotting food and carcasses.
The adage `` A चित्र is लायक a हजार शब्द '' refers to the ख़्याल कि a complex idea can be conveyed with just a single still image.
It also aptly characterizes एक of the प्रमुख लक्ष्य of कल्पना, namely making it possible to absorb large amounts of data quickly.
The अभिव्यक्ति `` Use a picture.
It 's worth a thousand words. '' appears in a 1911 newspaper article quoting newspaper editor Arthur Brisbane discussing पत्रकारिता और publicity.
1913 समाचारपत्र advertisement
A similar phrase, `` One Look Is Worth A Thousand Words '', appears in a 1913 समाचारपत्र विज्ञापन लिये the piqua Auto Supply House of Piqua, Ohio.
An early use of the exact phrase appears in an 1918 newspaper advertisement for the San Antonio Light which says : One of the Nation 's Greatest Editors Says : One Picture is Worth a Thousand Words The San Antonio Light 's Pictorial Magazine of the War exemplifies the सच्चाई of the ऊपर बयान -- judging इससे the गरम रिसेप्शन it has received at the hands of the Sunday Light readers.
It is believed by some that the modern use of the phrase stems from an article by Fred R. Barnard in the विज्ञापन व्यापार जर्नल मुद्रक ' स्याही, promoting the उपयोग of बिंब in विज्ञापन that appeared on the sides of streetcars.
The December 8, 1921 issue carries an ad हकदार, `` एक dekh is लायक a हजार Words. ''
Another ad by Barnard appears in the March 10, 1927 समस्या साथ the phrase `` एक चित्र लायक टेन हजार शब्द, '' जहाँ it is labeled a Chinese proverb ( 一圖勝萬言 ).
The Home Book of proverbs, maxims, और परिचित वाक्यांश उद्धरण बर्नार्ड as saying he called it `` a Chinese proverb, so that people would take it seriously. ''
Soon after, the कहावत would become popularly attributed to Confucius.
The discussion of `` One Picture Worth Thousand Words '' versus `` One Picture Worth Ten हजार शब्द '' wan येन i hua और 10.000 मील लायक 10.000 किताबे is cited in सूचना ग्राफिक्स जहाँ the अवधारणा of many in different disciplines and cultures.
A picture is लायक a हजार words
Despite this modern origin of the popular phrase, the भावना रै महरूम expressed by earlier writers.
For example the Russian writer Ivan Turgenev wrote ( in Fathers और बेटे in 1862 ), `` a चित्र shows me at a glance what it takes dozens of pages of a book to expound. ''
कंप्यूटर प्रोग्रामर और लेखक फ्रेड ब्रूक्स makes an opposite statement regarding programming in The Mythical Man-Month : `` Show me your flowcharts and conceal your tables, and I shall continue to be mystified.
Show me your टेबल, और i won’t प्रायः need your flowcharts ; they’ll be obvious. ''
The phrase has also been spoofed by जॉन मैकार्थी, the प्रसिद्ध computer scientist, to make the opposite point : `` As the Chinese say, 1001 words is worth more than a picture. ''
A season is a subdivision of the साल, चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in weather, ecology, and hours of daylight.
Seasons result from the yearly revolution of the धरती around the सूर्य और the झुकाव of the धरती 's अक्ष सापेक्ष to the plane of revolution.
In temperate and polar regions, the seasons are marked by changes in the intensity of धूप कि पहुँच the धरती 's सतह, विसंगतियाँ of which may cause animals to go into hibernation or to migrate, and plants to be dormant.
During May, June and July, the northern hemisphere is उजागर to अधिक सीधा धूप क्युकी the गोलार्ध faces the sun.
The same is true of the southern hemisphere in नवम्बर, दिसम्बर और जनवरी.
It is the झुकाव of the धरती कि causes the Sun to be higher in the sky during the summer months which increases the solar flux.
However, due to seasonal lag, June, July and August are the hottest months in the northern hemisphere and December, जनवरी और फ़रवरी हैं the hottest months in the southern hemisphere.
In temperate and subpolar regions, generally चार पंचांग -आधारd सीज़न ( साथ उनके adjectives ) हैं पहचाना : वसन्त ( vernal ), summer ( estival ), autumn ( autumnal ) and winter ( hibernal ).
However, ecologists mostly use a six season model for temperate climate regions that includes pre-spring ( prevernal ) and late summer ( serotinal ) as पृथक सीज़न साथ साथ the traditional four.
Hot regions have two or three seasons ; the rainy ( or wet, or monsoon ) season and the dry season, and in some तीव्र क्षेत्रों, a कूल or mild ऋतु.
In some parts of the world, special `` seasons '' are loosely पारिभाषित आधारित on महत्वपूर्ण कार्यक्रम such as a hurricane season, tornado season or a wildfire season.
The six ecological seasons
The four calendar सीज़न, चित्रित in an ancient Roman mosaic from Tunisia
Dutch निर्यात in 2006
At the time of writing the Netherlands is the 17th largest अर्थव्यवस्था of the world.
( see : List of countries by जीडीपी ( nominal ) )
GDP per capita is roughly $ 42,000 which puts it in the शीर्ष 10 of richest nations in the world ( see : List of countries by GDP ( PPP ) per capita ).
Between 1996 और 2000 सालाना आर्थिक विकास ( GDP ) averaged over 4 %, well above the European average.
Growth slowed considerably in 2001-05 as भाग of the वैश्विक economic slowdown.
2006 और 2007 however showed economic growth of 3.4 % and 3.9 %.
The Dutch economy was hit considerably by the जारी वैश्विक वित्तीय संकट and the ensuing European debt crisis.
अनेक बैंको गई दिवालिया, और a number of others had to receive governmental aid.
In 2009 the economy declined साथ 3.5 %, followed by दो सालो of mild growth.
The Dutch अर्थव्यवस्था is फिलहाल in a मंदी again, with an economic decline of 0.5 % in 2012.
Inflation is at 3.2 % in February 2013.
Unemployment रै महरूम अपेक्षाकृत कम compared to अन्य eu राष्ट्र for decades but after mid-2012 it has seen a fast increase and in February 2013 it has hit 7.7 %.
The Netherlands managed to maintain its AAA rating at least until March 2013 according to the तीन प्रमुख क्रेडिट rating agencies.
Historically, the डच introduced और invented the stock market by the merchandise trading through Dutch West India Company.
The नीदरलैंड्स is a founding सदस्य of the यूरोपीय Union, the OECD and the World Trade Organization.
Loyal to the Game is the tenth studio album and छठे studio album by Tupac Shakur.
It contains remixes of previously unreleased music recorded by Shakur before his death in 1996.
Released in the United States on December 14, 2004 ( December 12 in the United Kingdom ), Loyal to the खेल थी उत्पादित by Eminem.
the असली फलक of the दृश्य ; Meredith Vieira, Star Jones, Debbie Matenopoulos and Barbara Walters in 1997.
The View is an American talk show ब्रॉडकास्ट on एबीसी कि debuted in 1997 as भाग of the संजाल 's daytime programming block.
Created by Barbara Walters and Bill Geddie, who both also serve as the show 's कार्यपालिका निर्माता, the कार्यक्रम सुविधाएँ a panel of women as co-hosts.
Along with Walters, the current panel includes Whoopi गोल्डबर्ग, जो serves as the मॉडरेटर, आनन्द behar, एलिज़ाबेथ Hasselbeck, and Sherri Shepherd.
अंतरराष्ट्रीय संस्करण of the program are aired in several countries.
As of the 2012–13 ऋतु, इसके 16th, the दृश्य is the fourth-longest running national daytime talk show in history, behind The Phil Donahue Show ( 29 ), the variously-named Live !
programs ( 25 ), and The Oprah विनफ्रे दिखाएँ ( 25 ).
Prunus virginiana, commonly called bitter-berry, chokecherry, Virginia bird cherry and western chokecherry ( also black chokecherry for P. virginiana var. demissa ), is a species of bird cherry ( Prunus subgenus padus ) देशी to उत्तर अमेरिका ; the प्राकृतिक ऐतिहासिक दायरा of P. virginiana शामिल सबसे of the महाद्वीप, मगर लिये the दूर उत्तर and far south.
Los Angeles International Airport is the primary विमानक्षेत्र सेवारत the वृहद लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल, the second-most populated metropolitan area in the United States.
It is most often referred to by its IATA airport code LAX, with the अक्षर सुनाया individually.
LAX is located in southwestern Los Angeles साथ the प्रशांत coast in the पड़ोस of westchester, इससे the शहर कोर और is the प्राथमिक airport of Los Angeles World Airports ( LAWA ), an agency of the Los Angeles city government formerly known as the Department of Airports.
In 2011, LAX was the sixth busiest airport in the world after Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport, Beijing Capital अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र, लंदन हीथ्रो विमानक्षेत्र, शिकागो o'hare अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport, and Tokyo Haneda International Airport with 61,862,052 passengers.
The airport holds the claim for `` the world 's busiest origin and गंतव्य ( o & d ) विमानक्षेत्र '' in 2011 कि involves non-connecting passenger traffic.
It is also the only airport to rank among the top five U.S. एयरपोर्ट लिये दोनो यात्री and cargo traffic.
LAX is the busiest airport in the वृहद लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल, लकिन अन्य एयरपोर्ट सहित bob आशा विमानक्षेत्र, जॉन वेन Airport, Long Beach Airport, LA/Ontario International Airport, and Palm Springs International Airport also serve the region.
LAX is also the busiest airport in कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the वेस्ट coast of the संयुक्त राज्य in terms of flight operations, passenger traffic and air cargo activity, leading it to be referred to as the `` Gateway to the Pacific Rim ``.
Peyton Williams Manning ( born March 24, 1976 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक लिये the डेनवर broncos of the National Football League ( NFL ).
He played for the Indianapolis Colts for 14 सीज़न इससे 1998 to 2011.
He is the son of former NFL quarterback Archie Manning and an elder bhai of नई यॉर्क दिग्गज क्वार्टरबैक एली मैनिंग.
Manning played कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल लिये the विश्वविद्यालयों of टेनेसी, अग्रणी the Volunteers to the 1997 SEC Championship in his senior season.
However, No. 3 Tennessee lost to the No. 2 नेब्रास्का cornhuskers 42-17 in the नारंगी कटोरी giving Nebraska and Tom Osborne their 3rd national championship in 4 years.
He was chosen by the Indianapolis कोल्टस साथ the पहला overall चुनें in the 1998 NFL Draft.
From 1998 to 2010, he led the कोल्टस to आठ ( सात afc दक्षिण and one AFC East ) division championships, two AFC championships, and to a Super Bowl championship ( Super Bowl XLI ).
He has won a record four league सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी पुरस्कार, थी the सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी of सुपर कटोरी xli, रै महरूम नामित to बारह प्रो Bowls, has twelve 4,000-yard passing seasons, and is the Indianapolis Colts ' all-time leader in passing yards ( 54,828 ) and touchdown passes ( 399 ).
In 2009, he was named the best player in the NFL and Fox Sports along with Sports illustrated नामित उसे the एनएफएल खिलाड़ी of the दशक of the 2000s.
In May 2011, he underwent neck surgery to alleviate neck pain and arm weakness he dealt with during the previous few seasons पहले हस्ताक्षर a five-year, $ 90 लाख अनुबंध एक्सटेंशन साथ the Colts in July 2011.
मैनिंग था hoped to खेल in the 2011 ऋतु, but in September 2011, he underwent a much more serious second surgery : a level one cervical fusion procedure.
Manning had never missed an NFL खेल in उसके करियर, लकिन थी मजबूर to मिस the संपूर्ण 2011 season.
He was released by the Colts on March 7, 2012, and after an almost two-week period where he visited साथ और worked आउट लिये अनेक एनएफएल टीमों, he हस्ताक्षरित with the Denver Broncos on March 20, 2012.
मैनिंग 's pre-snap दिनचर्या रै अर्जित him the nickname, `` The Sheriff '' and is one of the most recognizable and parodied in the NFL.
The Indianapolis Colts ' almost exclusive use of the hurry-up ठोकर led to मैनिंग using an सरणी of इशारों और मौखिक कमांड to कॉल the खेल at the line of scrimmage rather than in the huddle.
The अमेरिका मीनार of the अमरीकी सामान्य Center, the headquarters of Baker Hughes
Baker Hughes is one of the world 's largest oilfield सेवाएं companies.
It operates in over 90 countries, providing the oil and gas industry साथ उत्पाद और सेवाएं लिये खुदाई, गठन मूल्यांकन, पूर्णता, production and reservoir consulting.
Baker Hughes has its headquarters in the America मीनार in the American General Center in Neartown, Houston.
Baker Hughes Incorporated was formed when Baker International और ह्यूजेस औजार कम्पनी मिलाया in 1987.
Baker Hughes operates worldwide with प्रमुख कार्यालयों in लिवरपूल, संयुक्त किंगडम ; सिंगापुर ; दुबई ; a शोध और मेंटेनेंस सुविधा in celle, जर्मनी ; lafayette, louisiana ; ह्यूस्टन, टेक्सास ; Pescara, Italy ; and Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
The company is administered broadly in दो बांटती : the पूर्वी गोलार्ध साथ पाँच regions ( यूरोपीय, अफ़्रीकी, the Middle East, Asia Pacific and Russia/Caspian ) and the western hemisphere with four regions ( Canada, US Land, US Gulf, and Latin America ).
Each of these regions is subdivided into बाज़ार.
The United States one- cent coin, commonly known as a penny, is a ईकाई of करेंसी equaling एक one-hundredth of a United States dollar.
The cent 's प्रतीक is ¢.
Its obverse has प्रदर्शित the प्रोफ़ाइल of अध्यक्ष Abraham Lincoln since 1909, the centennial of his birth.
From 1959 ( the sesquicentennial of Lincoln 's birth ) to 2008, the रिवर्स प्रदर्शित the lincoln Memorial.
Four different reverse designs in 2009 honored Lincoln 's 200th birthday and a new, permanent reverse – the संघ शील्ड – थी introduced in 2010.
The coin is 0.75 इंच ( 19.05 mm ) in व्यास और 0.061 inches ( 1.55 mm ) in thickness.
The U.S. Mint 's आधिकारिक नाम लिये a पैनी is `` '' and the U.S. Treasury 's official name is `` one cent piece ''.
The colloquial term penny गर्भाशयी इससे the अंग्रेजों सिक्का of the वही नाम, the pre-decimal version of which had a similar value.
In American English, कौड़ी is the बहुवचन रूप, अन्य बहुवचन फ़ॉर्म पेंस and pee ( standard use in British English ) are not used.
As of 2012, it लागत the u.S. मिंट 2.00 सेंट to मेक a cent because of the cost of materials and production.
This figure includes the Mint’s fixed components लिये वितरण और fabrication, अनुमानित at $ 13 million in FY 2011.
It also includes Mint overhead allocated to the penny, जिससे थी $ 17.7 लाख लिये 2011.
Fixed costs and overhead would have to be absorbed by अन्य circulating सिक्के बगैर the penny.
The loss in profitability due to producing the one cent सिक्का in the संयुक्त राज्य लिये the साल of 2012 was $ 58,000,000.
This was a slight घटी इससे 2011, the साल पहले, which had a production loss of $ 60,200,000.
or more specifically, are ornamental varieties of domesticated common carp ( Cyprinus carpio ) कि हैं रखा लिये सजावटी उद्देश्य in बाहरी कोई तालाबों or water gardens.
Koi varieties are distinguished by coloration, patterning, और scalation.
Some of the प्रमुख रंगों हैं श्वेत, ब्लैक, red, yellow, blue, and cream.
The most popular category of कोई is the gosanke, जिससे is बना up of the kohaku, Taisho Sanshoku, and Showa Sanshoku varieties.
The American Federation of Government Employees ( AFGE ) is an American labor union representing over 650,000 employees of the federal government, about 5,000 employees of the District of Columbia, and a few hundred निजी सेक्टर कर्मचारी, ज़्यादातर in और around federal facilities.
AFGE is the largest union for civilian, non- postal संघीय कर्मचारी और the largest संघ लिये ज़िला of कोलंबिया कर्मचारी who report directly to the mayor ( i.e., outside of D.C. public schools ).
It is संबद्ध साथ the AFL-CIO.

The evolution of plants has resulted in increasing levels of complexity, from the earliest algal मैट्स, through bryophytes, lycopods, ferns to the जटिल gymnosperms and angiosperms of today.
While many of the groups which appeared पहले continue to thrive, विशेषकर in the environments in जिससे वे evolved, for a time each new grade of organisation became more `` successful '' than its predecessors.
In the Ordovician period, around, the पहला जमीन पौधे appeared.
These began to diversify in the late Silurian Period, around, and the results of their diversification हैं प्रदर्शित in उल्लेखनीय विवरण in an early Devonian fossil assemblage from the Rhynie chert.
This chert preserved जल्दी पौधे in सेल्यूलर detail, petrified in volcanic springs.
by the मध्य of the devonian काल, सबसे of the सुविधाएँ recognised in पौधे आज are present, including roots, leaves and secondary wood ; and, by late Devonian times, seeds had evolved.
लेट devonian पौधे था thereby पहुँचे a उपाधि of परिष्कार that allowed them to form forests of tall trees.
Evolutionary innovation continued into the carboniferous काल और is still ongoing today.
Most plant groups were अपेक्षाकृत unscathed by the permo-triassic extinction event, although the structures of communities changed.
This may have set the scene for the appearance of the flowering पौधे in the triassic ( ~ ), और उनके later diversification in the Cretaceous and Paleogene.
The latest major group of पौधे to evolve यहूद the grasses, जिससे became महत्वपूर्ण in the mid-Paleogene, from around.
The grasses, as well as many other groups, evolved new mechanisms of metabolism to जीवित the कम और गरम, शुष्क शर्तें of the ऊष्णकटिबन्ध over the last.
The winning सुपर कटोरी टोली receives the Vince Lombardi Trophy.
The Super Bowl is an annual American football game that determines the चैंपियन of the नेशनल Football League ( NFL ).
The contest is held in an American city that is chosen three to four years beforehand, प्रायः in warm-weather or domed sites.
Since 1971, the winner of the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ) चैंपियनशिप खेल रै faced the winner of the National Football Conference ( NFC ) Championship Game in the culmination of the NFL playoffs.
Before the 1970 merger between the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( afl ) और the National Football League ( NFL ), the two leagues met in four such contests.
The first two यहूद ज्ञात as the `` afl-nfl World Championship Game. ''
Super Bowl III in 1969 was the first such game that carried the `` Super Bowl '' moniker, the names `` सुपर कटोरी i `` और `` सुपर कटोरी ii `` यहूद retroactively applied to the first two games.
The NFC /NFL leads in Super Bowl विन्स साथ 25, जबकि the afc /AFL has won 22.
Eighteen different franchises, सहित टीमों कि relocated to another नगर, have won the Super Bowl.
The Pittsburgh Steelers have won the most Super Bowls with छह championships ( रिकार्ड 6–2 ), जबकि दोनो the डलास cowboys और सैन फ्रांसिस्को 49ers have five wins each ( Cowboys 5–3 ; 49ers 5–1 ).
Dallas and Pittsburgh have the सबसे सुपर कटोरी दिखावे साथ आठ, जबकि the भैंस Bills have the most consecutive appearances with four losses in a row from 1990 to 1993.
The New England Patriots, Denver Broncos and Minnesota Vikings have भी खोया a रिकार्ड चार सुपर प्याले.
Buffalo and Minnesota are both 0–4, डेनवर is 2–4 और New England is 3–4.
The record for consecutive wins is two and is shared by seven franchises : the 1966-67 Green Bay Packers, the 1972-73 मियामी डॉल्फिन, the 1974-75 और 1978-79 पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स ( the तभी टोली to accomplish इस feat twice ), the 1988-89 San Francisco 49ers, the 1992-93 Dallas Cowboys, the 1997-98 Denver Broncos, and the 2003-04 New England Patriots.
The only team with multiple Super Bowl appearances and no losses is the बाल्टीमोर ravens, जो in जीतना सुपर कटोरी xlvii unseated और replaced the 49ers in that position.
Four current NFL टीमों have never appeared in a सुपर Bowl, including franchise relocations and renaming : the Cleveland Browns, Detroit Lions, Jacksonville Jaguars, and Houston Texans, though both the Browns and Lions had won NFL Championship games prior to the creation of the Super Bowl.
Martin County is a county स्तिथ in the u.S. state of Texas.
As of the 2010 census, इसके जनसांख्यिकी थी 4,799.
इसके सीट is Stanton.
The county is named for wylie मार्टिन, an जल्दी settler.
Martin County is one of 30 prohibition, or entirely dry, काउंटी in the राज्य of टेक्सास.
Alkaline phosphatase ( ALP, ALKP ) ( ) is a hydrolase एंजाइम जिम्मेदार लिये निकालना फास्फेट groups from many types of molecules, including nucleotides, proteins, and alkaloids.
The process of removing the phosphate समूह is पुकारा dephosphorylation.
As the name suggests, क्षारीय phosphatases हैं सबसे effective in an alkaline environment.
It is sometimes प्रयुक्त synonymously as basic phosphatase.
Triticale ( × Triticosecale ), ( ) is a hybrid of wheat ( Triticum ) and rye ( secale ) पहला करवाया in laboratories during the late 19th century.
The grain थी originally करवाया in Scotland and Sweden.
Commercially available triticale is almost always a second generation hybrid, i.e., a cross between दो kinds of प्राथमिक ( पहला क्रॉस ) triticales.
As a rule, triticale combines the उपज संभावित और अनाज विशेषता of गेहूं with the disease and environmental tolerance ( including soil conditions ) of rye.
Only recently has it महरूम विकसित into a commercially viable crop.
Depending on the cultivar, triticale can अधिक or कम resemble either of इसके parents.
It is grown mostly for forage or fodder, हालांकि कुछ triticale-based भोजन can be खरीदा at स्वास्थ्य food stores or are to be found in some breakfast cereals.
When crossing wheat and rye, wheat is used as the मादा जनक और rye as the male parent ( pollen donor ).
The resulting hybrid is sterile, and must be treated with colchicine to induce polyploidy and thus the क्षमता to reproduce itself.
The primary producers of triticale हैं कैंडल, जर्मनी, France, Belarus and Australia.
In 2009, according to the खाना और कृषि संगठन ( FAO ), 15.0 million tons were harvested in 29 countries across the world.
The triticale hybrids are all amphidiploid, which means the plant is द्विगुणित लिये दो genomes निकला इससे अलग species.
In other words, triticale is an allotetraploid.
In earlier years, most work थी किया on octoploid triticale.
Different ploidy levels have महरूम निर्मित और evaluated over समय.
The tetraploids showed little promise, but hexaploid triticale was successful enough to ढूँढें वाणिज्यिक अनुप्रयोग.
the cimmyt triticale सुधार program wanted to improve food production and nutrition in developing countries.
Triticale has potential in the production of bread and other food उत्पाद, ऐसे as कुकीज़, पास्ता, पिज़्ज़ा आटा and breakfast cereals.
The protein content is higher than that of गेहूं, हालांकि the glutenin भिन्न is less.
The grain has also been stated to have उच्चतर स्तर of lysine than wheat.
Assuming increased स्वीकृति, the मिलिंग उद्योग होगा have to adapt to triticale, as the milling techniques employed for wheat are unsuited to triticale.
Sell et al. found triticale could be used as a feed grain, and later research मिला इसके मंड थी विशेषकर readily पचता.
As a feed grain, triticale is already well established और of ऊँची आर्थिक महत्व.
It has received attention as a potential energy crop, and research is currently being conducted on the उपयोग of the क्रॉप 's बायोमास in bioethanol production.

A college football national championship in the highest level of कॉलेजिएट खेल in the संयुक्त राज्य, फिलहाल the नेशनल कॉलेजिएट एथलेटिक संघ ( NCAA ) Division I Football Bowl Subdivision ( FBS ), is a designation awarded annually by various third-party organizations to their selection ( s ) of the best college football team ( s ).
Division I FBS ( formerly प्रभाग i-a ) फ़ुटबॉल is the तभी ncaa खेल in which a yearly champion is not determined by an NCAA sanctioned championship event.
Because the championship team is not determined by a ncaa चैंपियनशिप or टूर्नामेंट इवेंट, it is sometimes unofficially referred to as a `` mythical national championship ``.
Since the NCAA, the sport 's शासी देह, करता नहीं determine or घोषित a national champion in this field, determination of such has often engendered controversy.
A championship team is independently घोषित by विभिन्न individuals और organizations, often referred to as `` selectors ''.
These choices are sometimes at हालात साथ each other.
While the NCAA has never officially endorsed an annual championship team, it has documented the choices of several selectors in the official NCAA फ़ुटबॉल कटोरी subdivision रिकॉर्ड.
In addition, various third party analysts have independently प्रकाशित उनके अपना सूचियाँ of what they have determined to be the most legitimate selections for each season.
These are also often at odds with each other as well as individual school 's claims on national championships, जिससे, for any particular season, may or may not correlate to the selections published elsewhere.
Currently, two widely recognized national champions selectors are the Associated Press, which conducts a poll of football sportswriters, and the USA Today कोच ' पोल, a पोल of अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल कोच संघ क्रियाशील कोच कि is contractually obligated to नाम the विजेता of the Bowl Championship Series championship game as its national champion.

The वॉशिंगटन नागरिकों हैं a professional baseball team based in Washington, D.C.
the नागरिकों हैं a सदस्य of the ईस्ट प्रभाग of the नेशनल League of Major League Baseball ( MLB ).
The team 's home ballpark is Nationals Park, located on South कैपिटल गली in southeast D.C., near the Anacostia River.
