The Nationals ' नाम गर्भाशयी इससे the पूर्व वॉशिंगटन बेसबॉल टोली कि had the same name ( used interchangeably with Senators ).
उनके उपनाम is `` the nats '' —a shortened version that was also used by the old D.C. teams.
An expansion franchise, the क्लबों थी संस्थापित in as the मॉन्ट्रियल expos, the first major league team in Canada.
They were based in Montreal, क्यूबेक, और निभाई उनके घर खेल at jarry Park Stadium and later in Olympic Stadium.
In, the Expos won a division championship, won their first-ever playoff series by defeating the फिलाडेल्फिया फ़िलीज़, 3–2, और उन्नत to the नेशनल लीग चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी, जहाँ वे होता go on to खोना to the लॉस Angeles Dodgers, 3–2, in their only postseason appearance during the strike-shortened season.
The Expos had their highest winning percentage in the strike-shortened ऋतु of, जब the टोली था the बेहतरीन रिकार्ड in baseball.
The team 's subsequent shedding of खिलाड़ी caused fan interest to drop off.
After the 2001 season, MLB considered revoking the टोली 's मताधिकार, साथ साथ either the Minnesota Twins or the Tampa Bay Devil Rays.
After being purchased by MLB in 2002, the टोली थी स्थानांतरित पहले the season to Washington and renamed the Nationals, the first relocation since the second Washington Senators moved to Arlington, Texas, and became the Texas Rangers in.
The Nationals are one of two MLB franchises, and the only one in the National League, that has never played in a World Series ( the सिएटल मैरीनेर्स हैं the अन्य ).
A contingent fee ( in the United States ) or conditional fee ( in England and Wales ) is कोई शुल्क लिये सेवाएं provided जहाँ the शुल्क is देय तभी if there is a favourable result.
In the law, it is defined as a `` fee चार्ज लिये a वकील 's सेवाएं तभी if the मुकदमा is successful or is favorably settled out of court....
Contingent fees are usually गणना as a प्रतिशत of the क्लाएंट 's जाल रिकवरी. ''
In the अंग्रेज़ी विधिक प्रणाली, it is generally referred to as no win no fee.
A conditional fee अनुबंध between a विधि कड़ और a client.
The usual form of this agreement is that the solicitor होगा लो a विधि मामला on the समझना that if lost, no payment is made.
However, if the case is won, the lawyer will be entitled to the सामान्य शुल्क आधारित on hourly बिलिंग, plus a success fee.
The success fee in इंग्लैण्ड जरूर be as a प्रतिशत no greater than 100 % of the normal fee.
This contrasts साथ the आकस्मिकता शुल्क in the us, जिससे देता the successful attorney a percentage of the damages awarded in favor of his client.
This makes it easier for the poor to pursue their civil rights चूंकि वरना, to मुकदमा किसी लिये a अपकृत्य, एक जरूर पहला be धनवान enough to pursue such litigation in the first place.
however, क्युकी of the ऊँची रिस्क, few attorneys will take cases on a contingency basis unless they feel the case has good merit.
According to a 2004 book by law professor Herbert Kritzer, contingent fees were allowed as of that year in the following देशों : ऑस्ट्रेलिया, ब्राज़ील, कनाडा, the डोमिनिकन गणतंत्र, फ़्रांस, यूनानियों, आयरलैंड, जापानी, नई जीलैंड, the संयुक्त Kingdom and the United States.
They are also अनुमत in निजी injury actions in Lithuania.
Recently, they have been अनुमत in बेल्जियम as खूब.

Sons of Anarchy is a television drama series created by Kurt Sutter about the lives of a close-knit गैरकानूनी मोटरसाइकिल क्लबों ऑपरेटिंग in आकर्षक, a fictional कस्बा in कैलिफ़ोर्निया 's Central Valley.

those शामिल in the उत्पादन of the श्रेणी imply कि a सातवाँ and final season is creator Kurt Sutter 's plan.
The Grímsvötn sub-glacial झीलों ( ; vötn = `` waters '', singular : ) and the volcano of the same name are in South-East Iceland.
They are in the highlands of आइसलैंड at the northwestern पक्ष of the Vatnajökull ice-cap.
The झीलों हैं at, at an elevation of.
Beneath the lakes is the magma कक्ष of the grímsvötn ज्वालामुखी.
Grímsvötn is a basaltic volcano which has the highest eruption frequency of all the volcanoes in आइसलैंड और रै a southwest-northeast-trending fissure system.
The massive climate-impacting Laki fissure eruption of 1783–1784 थी a भाग of the वही फिशर प्रणाली.
Grímsvötn was erupting at the वही समय as laki दौरान 1783, but continued to erupt until 1785.
Because most of the volcano lies underneath Vatnajökull, most of its eruptions have been subglacial and the interaction of magma and meltwater इससे the बर्फ कल्याणकारी phreatomagmatic explosive activity.
On 21 May 2011 at 19:25 UTC, an eruption began, with high plumes accompanied by अनेक भूकंप, resulting in रद्दीकरण of 900 फ़्लाइट in आइसलैंड, और in the United Kingdom, Greenland, Germany, Ireland and Norway on 22–25 May.
Until 25 May the eruption scale had been larger than कि of the 2010 फटना of Eyjafjallajökull.
The eruption stopped at 02:40 utc on 25 may 2011, हालांकि there was some explosive activity from the tephra vents affecting only the area around the crater.
Vetting is the process of performing a background check on someone before offering them नियुक्ति, डाक्टरेट an पुरस्कार, इत्यादि.
A prospective person or प्रोजेक्ट may be vetted पहले बनाना a hiring decision.
In addition, in intelligence gathering, assets are vetted to determine their usefulness.

Caesars Entertainment Corporation ( formerly harrah 's entertainment इससे 1995 to 2010 ) is an अमरीकी पब्लिक गेमिंग निगम कि owns and operates over 50 casinos, hotels, and seven golf courses under several brands.
The company, based in Paradise, Nevada, is the largest gaming company in the world, साथ सालाना revenues of $ 8.9 अरब ( 2010 ).
Caesars is a public company, with a joint venture of Apollo Global Management and Texas Pacific Group ownig a large portion of the स्टेक और blackstone समूह भी पकड़कर a significant stake.
The name change इससे `` harrah 's entertainment inc. '' to `` caesars entertainment निगम '' was made official on November 23, 2010.
Harrah 's remains a कुंजी ब्रांड in the company.
On नवम्बर 5, 2010, harrah 's घोषित an आरंभिक पब्लिक offering of 31,250,000 shares but retracted this offering on November 19.
A स्थाई निवासी in कनाडा is a व्यक्ति जो is नहीं a कनाडाई नागरिक लकिन जो रै महरूम granted permission to live and work in Canada without any time limit on his or her stay.
A permanent resident must live in कनाडा लिये दो सालो out of every five or risk losing that status.
A Permanent Resident holds many of the same rights and responsibilities as a Canadian citizen, among others the right to work लिये कोई एंटरप्राइज़ as खूब as लिये the संघीय or प्रांतीय सरकारी ( अंतर्गत प्रतिबंध of अभिगम rights to certain regulated professions ).
The प्रमुख मतभेद हैं that residents can not :
vote in चुनावों in Canada ;
run for elected दफ्तर ;
hold Canadian passports ;
In addition, वे may be अनुमत to जुड़ें कनाडा 's armed forces if the national interest would not be prejudiced.
Permanent residents also risk deportation for serious crimes वचनबद्ध जबकि निवासी in कनाडा.
Permanent residents may apply for Canadian citizenship after three सालो in कनाडा ; however इस is नहीं अनिवार्य.

A graph of the US CPI इससे 1913 to 2006 ( in ब्लू ), और इसके प्रतिशत annual change ( in red )
A consumer price index ( CPI ) measures changes in the दाम स्तर of a मार्केट बास्केट of उपभोक्ता goods और सेवाएं purchased by households.
The CPI in the United States is पारिभाषित by the ब्यूरो of मजदूर आंकडे as `` a माप of the औसत बदलें over समय in the prices paid by urban consumers for a market basket of consumer goods and services. ''
The CPI is a statistical estimate constructed using the कीमतें of a नमूना of representative items whose prices are collected periodically.
Sub-indexes and sub-sub-indexes are computed for different categories and sub-categories of goods और सेवाएं, होने संयुक्त to उपज the overall अनुक्रमणिका साथ weights reflecting उनके साझा in the कुल of the consumer expenditures covered by the index.
It is one of several price indices गणना by most national statistical agencies.
The annual प्रतिशत बदलें in a CPI is used as a measure of inflation.
A CPI can be used to index ( i.e., adjust for the प्रभाव of महंगाई ) the रियल मान of मजदूरी, salaries, pensions, for regulating prices and for deflating monetary magnitudes to show changes in real values.
In most countries, the CPI is, along with the population census and the USA National Income and Product खाते, एक of the सबसे closely देखी नेशनल आर्थिक statistics.
Knocking on wood, or to touch wood, refers to the apotropaic परंपरा in पश्चिमी लोकगीत of वस्तुतः touching/knocking on लकडी, or merely stating कि तुम हैं doing or intend same, in order to avoid `` tempting fate `` after making a favourable observation, a boast, or declaration concerning one 's own death.
रॉकर arm
Generally referred to within the context of the internal combustion engine of automotive, marine, motorcycle and reciprocating aviation इंजन, the रॉकर भुजा is an oscillating लीवर कि conveys रेडियल गति इससे the कैम पालि into रैखिक गति at the poppet valve to open it.
One end is raised and lowered by a rotating lobe of the camshaft ( either सीधे or via a tappet ( lifter ) और pushrod ) जबकि the अन्य समाप्त अधिनियमों on the valve stem.
When the camshaft lobe raises the outside of the arm, the अंदर दबाता bas on the वाल्व स्टेम, खोलने the valve.
When the बाहर of the भुजा is permitted to वापसी due to the camshafts रोटेशन, the inside rises, allowing the valve spring to close the valve.
The drive cam is चलित by the camshaft.
This pushes the रॉकर भुजा up और bas about the trunnion pin or rocker shaft.
Friction may be reduced at the point of contact with the वाल्व स्टेम by a रोलर कैम अनुसरणकर्ता.
a समान व्यवस्था हस्तांतरण the motion via another roller cam follower to a second rocker arm.
This rotates about the rocker shaft, और हस्तांतरण the गति via a tappet to the poppet valve.
in इस मामला इस opens the intake valve to the cylinder head.
The effective leverage of the भुजा ( और यूँ the फ़ोर्स it can exert on the वाल्व स्टेम ) is संकल्पित by the रॉकर भुजा अनुपात, the ratio of the distance from the rocker arm 's center of rotation to the tip divided by the distance from the center of rotation to the point acted on by the camshaft or pushrod.
Current ऑटोमोटिव डिज़ाइन favors रॉकर arm ratios of about 1.5:1 to 1.8:1.
However, in the पास्ट छोटी धनात्मक ratios ( the वाल्व लिफ्ट is वृहद than the cam lift ) and even negative ratios ( valve lift smaller than the cam lift ) have been used.
Many pre-WW2 engines use 1:1 ( न्यूट्रल ) ratios.
For car इंजन the रॉकर बाहें हैं generally स्टील stampings, providing a reasonable balance of strength, weight and economical cost.
क्युकी the रॉकर बाहें हैं, in भाग, प्रत्यागमनी वज़न, excessive mass especially at the lever ends limits the engine 's ability to reach high operating speeds.
`` The Night the Lights Went Out in Georgia '' is a Southern Gothic song written by songwriter Bobby Russell and performed in 1972 by उसके then-wife Vicki Lawrence.
Reba mcentire बाद covered it in 1991.
Recorded in लेट अक्तूबर 1972 in united/western Studios on Sunset in Hollywood and released less than two weeks later in November 1972, the song centers around the older brother of the narrator, falsely convicted of and executed for a murder, which the narrator herself has committed.
In postal mail, a return address is an सुस्पष्ट समावेश of the पता of the person sending the message.
It provides the recipient ( and sometimes authorized intermediaries ) with a means to determine how to respond to the sender of the message if needed.
The return address need not include a प्रेषक 's नाम, लकिन चाहिए शामिल पता or P.O. box details in the same way as the delivery address should.
In some countries, the return पता is conventionally located in the upper left hand corner of the envelope, card, or label.
In the United Kingdom, the return address is usually placed on the रिवर्स of the envelope, near the top.
Businesses प्रायः उपयोग लिफाफे preprinted साथ a return address.
Many individuals have चादरें of चिपकने लेबल्स preprinted साथ उनके home address to affix to their correspondence.
धर्मार्थ sometimes include such sheets in mailshots.
Rolls of Return Address Labels can be purchased from companies that sell personalized labels to provide individuals an आसान रास्ता to छिलके और स्टिक वापसी पता लेबल्स to their envelopes.
The return address is not required on डाक मेल.
However, lack of a return address prevents the postal service from being able to return the item if it proves undeliverable ; such as इससे क्षति, postage due, or अमान्य destination.
Such mail may यूँ become मुर्दे अक्षर mail.
Should the return address be of a different state or country, the mail may be routed through कि स्थान for ease of return.
A nerve guidance conduit ( also referred to as an artificial nerve conduit or artificial nerve graft, as opposed to an autograft ) is an कृत्रिम अर्थात् of guiding axonal regrowth to facilitate nerve regeneration and is one of several clinical treatments for nerve injuries.
When direct suturing of the दो आउट of a severed तंत्रिका can नहीं be संपन्नता बगैर tension, the standard clinical treatment for peripheral nerve injuries is autologous nerve grafting.
Due to the limited availability of donor ऊतक और कार्यात्मक रिकवरी in autologous तंत्रिका कलम, neural tissue engineering research has focused on the development of bioartificial nerve guidance conduits as an alternative treatment, especially for large defects.
Similar techniques are also being explored लिये तंत्रिका मरम्मत in the स्पाइनल cord लकिन तंत्रिका regeneration in the central nervous system poses a greater challenge because its axons do not regenerate appreciably in their native environment.
The creation of artificial conduits is also known as entubulation क्युकी the तंत्रिका ends and intervening gap are enclosed within a tube composed of biological or synthetic materials.
Whether the conduit is in the form of a biologic tube, synthetic tube or tissue-engineered conduit, it should facilitate neurotropic और neurotrophic संचार between the proximal और distal ends of the तंत्रिका गैप, block external inhibitory factors, and provide a physical guidance for axonal regrowth.
The most basic objective of a nerve guidance conduit is to combine शारीरिक, रासायनिक, और biological cues अंतर्गत शर्तें कि होगा फोस्टर tissue formation.
Materials कि have महरूम प्रयुक्त to मेक biologic tubes include blood vessels and skeletal muscles, while nonabsorbable and bioabsorbable synthetic tubes have been made from silicone and polyglycolide respectively.
tissue-engineered तंत्रिका मार्गदर्शन conduits हैं a संयोजन of many elements : scaffold structure, scaffold material, cellular therapies, neurotrophic factors and biomimetic materials.
The choice of which शारीरिक, रासायनिक और biological cues to उपयोग is आधारित on the गुण of the तंत्रिका पर्यावरण, which is critical in creating the most desirable environment for axon regeneration.
The factors that control material selection include biocompatibility, biodegradability, mechanical अखंडता, controllability during nerve growth, implantation and sterilization.
Hardcore Pawn is an अमरीकी वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी उत्पादित by rdf यूएसए ( बाद zodiak यूएसए ) और रिचर्ड Dominick Productions for truTV about the day-to-day operations of American Jewelry and Loan, a family-owned pawn shop located at 20450 Greenfield Road, between 8 Mile Road and the John C. Lodge Freeway in Detroit, Michigan.
The series premiered on अगस्त 16, 2010, delivering two million viewers, setting a record as truTV 's most-watched series premiere ever.
amoxicillin BP
Amoxicillin ( INN ), formerly amoxycillin ( BAN ), and abbreviated amox, is a moderate-spectrum, bacteriolytic, β-lactam antibiotic प्रयुक्त to दावत बैक्टीरियल infections caused by susceptible microorganisms.
It is प्रायः the ड्रग of चुनाव within the class because it is better absorbed, following oral administration, than other β-lactam antibiotics.
amoxicillin is एक of the सबसे common antibiotics prescribed for children.
The drug became उपलब्धियाँ in 1972.
Amoxicillin is susceptible to degradation by β-lactamase -producing bacteria, which are resistant to a broad वर्णक्रम of β-lactam एंटीबायोटिक, ऐसे as पेनिसिलीन.
For this reason, it is प्रायः संयुक्त साथ clavulanic acid, a β-lactamase inhibitor.
This increases effectiveness by reducing its susceptibility to β-lactamase resistance.
Lyndon Baines Johnson ( August 27, 1908 – January 22, 1973 ), often referred to as LBJ, was the 36th President of the United States ( 1963–1969 ), a position he assumed बाद उसके सेवा as the 37th Vice President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ).
He is one of only four people who served in सब चार निर्वाचित संघीय कार्यालयों of the संयुक्त राज्य : प्रतिनिधि, Senator, Vice President, and President.
जॉनसन, a डेमोक्रेट इससे टेक्सास, परोसा as a संयुक्त राज्य प्रतिनिधि इससे 1937–1949 और as a सीनेटर from 1949–1961, including six years as United States Senate Majority Leader, two as Senate Minority Leader and two as Senate Majority Whip.
After campaigning unsuccessfully for the लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन in 1960, जॉनसन थी asked by John F. Kennedy to be his running mate for the 1960 presidential election.
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the हत्या of जॉन F. कैनेडी on नवम्बर 22, 1963, समाप्त Kennedy 's term and was elected President in his own right, winning by a large margin over Barry Goldwater in the 1964 election.
Johnson was greatly supported by the Democratic Party and as अध्यक्ष, he थी जिम्मेदार लिये डिजाइनिंग the `` ग्रेट समाज `` विधान कि शामिल कानून कि upheld civil rights, public broadcasting, Medicare, Medicaid, environmental protection, aid to education, and his `` War on Poverty. ''
Johnson was renowned for his domineering personality and the `` जॉनसन उपचार, '' उसके coercion of शक्तिशाली राजनेता in order to advance legislation.
meanwhile, जॉनसन escalated अमरीकी भागीदारी in the वियतनाम युद्ध, इससे 16,000 अमरीकी advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 combat troops in early 1968, as American casualties soared and the peace process bogged down.
The involvement stimulated a large angry antiwar गति आधारित विशेषकर on विश्वविद्यालयों campuses in the U.S. and abroad.
Summer riots broke out in most major cities after 1965, and crime rates soared, as his opponents उठाया मांगे लिये `` विधि और अनुक्रम '' नीतियों.
The Democratic Party विभाजित in अनेक feuding गिरोहों, और बाद जॉनसन किया poorly in the 1968 New Hampshire primary, he ended his bid for reelection.
Republican Richard Nixon was निर्वाचित to सफल उसे.
Historians argue कि जॉनसन 's प्रेसिडेंसी चिह्नित the शिखर of modern liberalism in the United States after the New Deal era.
Johnson is क्रमित favorably by कुछ इतिहासकारों क्युकी of उसके domestic policies.
The Big बंग सिद्धान्त डाल at कॉमिक कॉन 2009, इससे बाएँ : कुणाल नय्यर, Simon Helberg, Kaley Cuoco, Jim Parsons, and Johnny Galecki
The American sitcom The Big बंग सिद्धान्त, निर्मित और कार्यपालिका उत्पादित by चक lorre और Bill Prady, premiered on CBS on September 24, 2007.
The show centers on पाँच वर्ण : roommates शेल्डन कूपर और लियोनार्ड hofstadter, two Caltech physicists ; Penny, a waitress and aspiring actress who lives across the hall ; and Leonard and Sheldon 's friends and co-workers aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz, and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali.
Over time, several supporting characters have been प्रचारित to अभिनीत भूमिकाएँ : लेस्ली winkle ( ऋतु 1 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 2 नियमित ; ऋतु 3 अतिथि ), a physicist सहयोगी, और, at अलग टाइम्स, a प्रेमी of दोनो लियोनार्ड और हावर्ड ; bernadette rostenkowski-wolowitz ( ऋतु 3 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ), a microbiologist, हावर्ड 's fiancée and subsequent wife, and former part-time waitress alongside Penny ; neuroscientist Amy Farrah Fowler ( season 3 guest ; season 4 recurring ; season 4-present regular ), who joins the group after being matched to Sheldon on a dating website ; and comic book store-owner, Stuart Bloom ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ), who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space.
The show also features numerous supporting characters, प्रत्येक of जिसको plays a prominent role in a small group of episodes.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), also known as the War between the राज्य or बस the सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ), थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery, especially the extension of slavery into the पश्चिमी territories.
Foreign powers किया नहीं intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना, the confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential election, Republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
lincoln जीती, लकिन पहले उसके उद्घाटन on March 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक Republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural पता घोषित उसके प्रशासन would not initiate civil war.
Eight बाकी स्लेव राज्य continued to reject calls for secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A सलाम सम्मेलन विफल to ढूँढें a compromise, and both sides prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना the नई confederate States of America.
hostilities began on अप्रैल 12, 1861, जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon Fort Sumter, a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently, four more slave states joined the confederacy, bringing उनके कुल to ग्यारह.
The Union soon नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी that crippled the southern economy.
The Eastern Theater थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a संघ राज्य ) ended with Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation, जिससे बना समाप्ति गुलामी a युद्ध लक्ष्य.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy, then much of their western armies, and the Union at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in दो at the मिसिसिपी River.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the बैटल of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to Ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of all Union armies in 1864.
in the पश्चिमी थिएटर, विलियम T. शरमन drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions, and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the overland अभियान towards रिचमंड, the confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, leading to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox अदालत हाउस on April 9, 1865.
The American Civil War was one of the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक युद्धों.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, और mass-produced हथियार यहूद employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, banks, परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American history, resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा, और 30 प्रतिशत of सब दक्षिणी श्वेत males aged 18–40.
Human evolution refers to the evolutionary process leading up to the रूप of आधुनिक इंसानो.
While it began with the last common पूर्वज of सब जीवन, the टॉपिक प्रायः कवर तभी the विकासवादी इतिहास of primates, in particular the genus होमो, और the emergence of Homo sapiens as a distinct species of hominids ( or `` great apes '' ).
The study of human evolution involves अनेक वैज्ञानिक disciplines, सहित physical anthropology, primatology, archaeology, linguistics, evolutionary psychology, embryology and genetics.
According to genetic studies, primates diverged from other mammals about in the Late Cretaceous period, और the earliest जीवाश्मों appear in the paleocene, around.
The family Hominidae diverged from the Hylobatidae ( Gibbon ) family 15-20 लाख सालो पहले, और around, the ponginae ( orangutans ), diverged from the Hominidae family.
Bipedalism is the basic adaption of the Hominin line, and the earliest bipedal Hominin is माना to be either sahelanthropus or orrorin, साथ Ardipithecus, a full bipedal, coming somewhat later.
The gorilla and chimpanzee diverged around the same time, about 4-6 लाख सालो पहले, और either sahelanthropus or Orrorin may be our last shared ancestor with them.
The early bipedals आखिरकार विकसित into the australopithecines and later the genus Homo.
The earliest प्रलेखित सदस्यों of the genus होमो हैं होमो habilis जिससे विकसित around ; the earliest प्रजाति for which there is positive evidence of use of stone tools.
The brains of these early hominins were about the same आकार as कि of a चिंपैंजी.
During the next million years a process of encephalization began, and with the arrival of होमो इरेक्टस in the चट्टान रिकार्ड, cranial क्षमता था doubled to 850 cm3.
Homo erectus and Homo ergaster were the first of the hominina to leave Africa, और ये species spread through Africa, Asia, and Europe between.
It is believed that these species were the first to उपयोग आग और जटिल tools.
According to the Recent African Ancestry theory, modern humans evolved in Africa possibly from Homo heidelbergensis, Homo rhodesiensis or Homo antecessor and migrated out of the continent some 50,000 to 100,000 years ago, replacing लोकल populations of होमो इरेक्टस, होमो denisova, होमो floresiensis और होमो neanderthalensis.
Archaic Homo sapiens, the forerunner of anatomically आधुनिक इंसानो, विकसित between 400,000 and 250,000 years ago.
Recent DNA evidence suggests that several haplotypes of Neanderthal origin are present among all non-african populations, और neanderthals और अन्य hominids, ऐसे as denisova hominin may have contributed up to 6 % of उनके genome to present-day humans. < ref name= '' 10.1126/science.1209202 '' > Anatomically modern humans evolved from archaic Homo sapiens in the Middle Paleolithic, about 200,000 years ago.
The transition to behavioral modernity with the development of symbolic culture, language, and specialized lithic technology happened around 50,000 years ago according to अनेक विज्ञानियों हालांकि कुछ सुझाएँ a क्रमिक बदलें in बर्ताव over a longer time span.
Lisa Cuddy, M.D., is a fictional अक्षर on the फॉक्स network medical drama House.
वो is portrayed by Lisa Edelstein.
Cuddy was the Dean of आयुर्विज्ञान और हॉस्पिटल व्यवस्थापक of the fictional princeton-plainsboro Teaching Hospital in New Jersey.
वो भी becomes हाउस 's प्रेम ब्याज through the years to start a relationship with him in season seven.
Cuddy quit her job after the events of ऋतु सात 's finale `` चलती On ``.
Track and field is a खेल comprising विभिन्न प्रतिस्पर्धी athletic contests based on running, jumping, and throwing.
The name of the sport derives from the competition venue : a stadium with an oval running track around a ग्रास field.
The throwing and jumping events generally लो प्लेस in the सेंट्रल enclosed area.
Track and फ़ील्ड जलप्रपात अंतर्गत the छतरियाँ खेल of एथलेटिक्स, जिससे also includes road running, cross country running, and race walking.
The two most prestigious अंतरराष्ट्रीय track और field competitions are held under the banner of athletics : the athletics competition at the Olympic Games and the IAAF World Championships in Athletics.
The International संघ of एथलेटिक्स federations is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय governing body for track and field.
Track and field events are generally व्यक्तिगत खेल साथ athletes challenging each other to decide a single victor.
The racing events are won by the athlete with the fastest time, while the jumping and throwing events are won by the खिलाड़ी जो रै हासिल the महानतम अलहदा or ऊँचाई in the प्रतियोगिता.
The running events are categorised as sprints, middle और long-distance कार्यक्रम, relays, और hurdling.
Regular jumping events include long jump, ट्रिपल जम्प, ऊँची जम्प और ध्रुव वॉल्ट, जबकि the सबसे आम फेंकना कार्यक्रम हैं shot put, javelin, discus and hammer.
There हैं भी `` संयुक्त कार्यक्रम '', ऐसे as heptathlon and decathlon, in which athletes compete in a number of the above events.
Records are kept of the best performances in specific events, at संसार और नेशनल स्तर, सही bas to a personal level.
However, if athletes are deemed to have violated the इवेंट 's नियम or regulations, वे हैं disqualified इससे the प्रतियोगिता and their marks are erased.
In North America, the term track and field may be used to refer to एथलेटिक्स in सामान्य, बल्कि than specifically track और फ़ील्ड events.
The Gulf War ( 2 August 1990 – 28 February 1991 ), codenamed Operation Desert Storm ( 17 January 1991 – 28 February 1991 ) was a war waged by a U.N.-authorized Coalition force from 34 nations led by the United States, against इराकी in जवाब to इराकी 's आक्रमण और annexation of Kuwait.
The war is also known under other names, such as the Persian Gulf War, First गल्फ युद्ध, गल्फ युद्ध i, or the First Iraq War, before the term `` Iraq War '' became identified instead with the 2003 Iraq War ( also referred to in the U.S. as `` Operation Iraqi Freedom '' ).
कुवैत 's आक्रमण by इराकी सैनिकों कि began 2 अगस्त 1990 was met with international condemnation, and brought immediate economic sanctions against Iraq by members of the U.N. Security Council.
U.S. President जार्ज H. W. बुश तैनात u.S. शक्तियां into सऊदी अरब, and urged other countries to send their own forces to the scene.
An array of राष्ट्र joined the Coalition.
The great majority of the Coalition 's सैन्य शक्तियां यहूद इससे the u.S., साथ सऊदी अरब, the संयुक्त किंगडम और मिश्र as अग्रणी contributors, in that order.
Saudi Arabia सशुल्क around us $ 36 अरब of the US $ 60 billion cost.
The war was marked by the शुरूआत of सजीव न्यूज on the सामने lines of the fight, with the primacy of the U.S. network CNN.
The war has also earned the उपनाम वीडियो खेल युद्ध बाद the रोज़ broadcast images on board the U.S. bombers during Operation Desert Storm.
The initial conflict to expel Iraqi troops from Kuwait began साथ an aerial बमबारी on 17 January 1991.
This was followed by a मैदान assault on 24 February.
This was a decisive विजय लिये the गठबन्धन forces, who liberated Kuwait and advanced into Iraqi territory.
The Coalition ceased their advance, and declared a cease-fire 100 घंटों बाद the मैदान अभियान started.
Aerial and ground combat was confined to इराकी, कुवैत, and areas on Saudi Arabia 's border.
Iraq शुभारम्भ scud मिसाइलें विरूद्ध गठबन्धन सैन्य targets in Saudi Arabia and against Israel.
The nickel, in American उपयोग, is a five- cent coin issued by the United States Mint.
Composed of 75 % तांबे और 25 % निकल, the टुकड़ा has been struck since 1866.
The silver half dime, equal to five cents, had महरूम जारी since the 1790s.
The American Civil War caused economic hardship, driving gold and silver from circulation ; in response, in place of low-value coins, the सरकारी at पहला जारी पेपर करेंसी.
In 1865, Congress abolished the five-cent fractional currency note after Spencer M. Clark, head of the Currency Bureau ( today the Bureau of नक्काशी और मुद्रण ), लगाई उसके अपना पोर्ट्रेट on the denomination.
After successful introduction of two-cent and three-cent टुकड़े, बगैर अनमोल मेटल, कॉंग्रेस भी प्राधिकृत a five-cent टुकड़ा consisting of आधार मेटल ; the मिंट began striking this version in 1866.
The initial design of the शील्ड निकल थी struck जबतक 1883, तब replaced by the Liberty Head nickel.
the भैंस निकल थी introduced in 1913 as भाग of a ड्राइव to increase the beauty of American coinage ; in 1938, the Jefferson nickel followed.
In 2004 and 2005, special designs in सम्मान of the bicentennial of the Lewis and Clark Expedition were issued.
In 2006, the Mint reverted to using Jefferson nickel designer फेलिक्स schlag 's असली रिवर्स ( or `` tails '' पक्ष ), हालांकि a नई obverse, by Jamie Franki, was substituted.
As of 2013, it costs more than eleven cents to produce a nickel ; the Mint is exploring the possibility of reducing लागत by using कम महंगी धातुओं.
A poster with पुष्प or क्लस्टर of पुष्प produced by twelve species of flowering plants from different families
A flower, sometimes known as a bloom or blossom, is the reproductive structure found in flowering पौधे ( पौधे of the प्रभाग magnoliophyta, भी पुकारा angiosperms ).
The biological function of a flower is to effect reproduction, usually by providing a यांत्रिकी लिये the संघ of शुक्राणु with eggs.
Flowers may facilitate outcrossing ( fusion of sperm and eggs from different individuals in a जनसांख्यिकी ) or allow selfing ( संलयन of sperm and egg from the same flower ).
Some flowers produce diaspores without fertilization ( parthenocarpy ).
Flowers contain sporangia and are the साईट जहाँ gametophytes develop.
Flowers दे वृद्धि to फल and seeds.
Many flowers have विकसित to be आकर्षक to पशु, so as to cause them to be vectors for the transfer of pollen.
In addition to facilitating the जनन of flowering पौधे, पुष्प have long महरूम admired and used by humans to beautify their environment, and also as objects of romance, ritual, religion, medicine and as a source of food.
The McDonnell Douglas ( now Boeing ) F-15 Eagle is a twin-engine, all-weather रणनीतिक सेनानी designed by McDonnell Douglas to gain and maintain air superiority in aerial combat.
It is considered among the most successful modern fighters, साथ over 100 aerial कॉम्बैट victories with no losses in dogfights.
Following reviews of proposals, the United States Air Force selected McDonnell Douglas ' design in 1967 to meet the service 's need for a समर्पित एयर बड़प्पन सेनानी.
the त्रिभुज पहला उड़ाया in July 1972, and entered service in 1976.
Since the 1970s, the Eagle has been exported to Israel, Japan, सऊदी अरब, और अन्य राष्ट्र.
The f-15 थी originally envisioned as a pure air superiority aircraft.
Its design included a द्वितीयक ground-attack काबिलियत कि was largely unused.
The डिज़ाइन proved लचीली पर्याप्त कि an all-weather strike derivative, the F-15E Strike Eagle, was later developed, and entered service in 1989.
The F-15 Eagle is अपेक्षित to be in सेवा साथ the U.S. Air Force past 2025.
mimio is a ब्रांड नाम of a लकीर of technology products aimed at the education market.
The primary products are केन्द्रित around कंप्यूटर whiteboard interactive teaching devices.
MimioCapture डिवाइस भी allow users to capture all of the ink strokes that are written on the whiteboard.
When used in conjunction with a video projector it turns the ordinary whiteboard सतह into a fully इंटरैक्टिव whiteboard.
The product line was originally designed by आभासी Ink.
On October 4, 2006 newell rubbermaid acquired the Mimio interactive whiteboard ( iWB ) product line.
Rahab of जेरिको
Rahab, ( ; ; ) was, according to the Book of Joshua, a woman who lived in Jericho in the promised जमीन और assisted the Israelites in capturing the city.
Nearly all अंग्रेज़ी अनुवाद of जोशुआ describe her as a harlot or prostitute.
The संगठन of अमरीकी राज्य ( स्पेनी : organización de लॉस estados americanos, Portuguese : Organização dos Estados Americanos, French : Organisation des États américains ), or the OAS, is a regional international organization.
The OAS was founded on 30 April 1948, and has its headquarters in वॉशिंगटन, D.C., United States.
इसके सदस्यों हैं the 35 independent states of the Americas.
चूंकि 26 may 2005, the सचिव General of OAS has been José Miguel Insulza.
Christopher Columbus ( Italian : Cristoforo कोलोन ; स्पेनी : cristóbal colón ; पुर्तगाली : cristóvão कोलोन ; before 31 October 145120 May 1506 ) was an Italian explorer, navigator, and colonizer, born in the Republic of Genoa, in what is today northwestern Italy.
Under the auspices of the Catholic Monarchs of Spain, he completed four voyages across the Atlantic समंदर कि led to सामान्य यूरोपीय जागरूकता of the अमरीकी महाद्वीपों.
Those voyages, and his efforts to establish permanent settlements on the द्वीप of हिस्पानिओला, initiated the Spanish colonization of the New World.
In the context of emerging western साम्राज्यवाद और आर्थिक प्रतियोगिता between यूरोपीय kingdoms seeking माल through the स्थापना of व्यापार रूट और colonies, कोलंबस 's सट्टे प्रस्ताव, to पहुँचें the ईस्ट इंडीज by sailing westward, eventually received the support of the Spanish crown, which saw in it a promise, however remote, of gaining the upper hand over rival powers in the contest for the lucrative spice trade with Asia.
During his first voyage in 1492, instead of reaching Japan as he था intended, कोलंबस उतरा in the बहामा द्वीपसमूह, at a locale he named San Salvador.
Over the course of three more voyages, Columbus visited the Greater and Lesser antilles, as खूब as the caribbean coast of वेनेजुएला and Central America, claiming them for the Spanish Empire.
हालांकि कोलंबस थी नहीं the पहला यूरोपीय एक्सप्लोरर to पहुँचें the americas ( having महरूम preceded by the नॉर्स expedition led by leif Ericson in the 11th century ), Columbus 's voyages led to the first lasting European contact with the Americas, inaugurating a period of European exploration, conquest, and colonization that lasted for several centuries.
They had, इसलिए, an विशाल प्रभाव in the ऐतिहासिक development of the modern Western world.
Columbus himself saw his accomplishments primarily in the लाइट of the spreading of the Christian religion.
never admitting कि he था पहुँचे a महाद्वीप previously अनजान to Europeans, rather than the East Indies he had set out for, Columbus called the inhabitants of the lands he visited indios ( Spanish for `` Indians `` ).
Columbus 's strained relationship with the Spanish crown and its appointed colonial administrators in America led to his arrest and dismissal as governor of the settlements on the द्वीप of हिस्पानिओला in 1500, और बाद to protracted वाद over the लाभ जिससे कोलंबस और उसके वारिस claimed यहूद owed to उन्हें by the क्राउन.
Bred in Germany, the boxer is a नस्ल of stocky, medium-sized, short-haired dogs.
The coat is smooth and tight-fitting ; colors are fawn or brindled, साथ or बगैर श्वेत markings, which may cover the entire body.
Boxers are brachycephalic ( they have व्यापक, छोटी skulls ), और have a वर्गाकार muzzle, mandibular prognathism ( an underbite ), very strong jaws, and a powerful bite ideal for hanging on to large prey.
The boxer थी करवाया इससे the बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी बुल और the अभी विलुप्त Bullenbeisser, and is part of the Molosser group.
Boxers were first exhibited in a dog show for St. Bernards in Munich in 1895, the पहला boxer क्लबों होने संस्थापित the next year.
Based on 2012 American Kennel Club statistics, Boxers held स्थिर as the सातवाँ सबसे लोकप्रिय नस्ल of श्वान in the संयुक्त राज्य लिये the third consecutive year.
Serial ATA ( SATA ) is a computer bus interface कि connects मेजबान बस adapters to द्रव्यमान भंडार डिवाइस ऐसे as मुश्किल disk drives and optical drives.
Serial ATA replaces the older AT Attachment standard ( ATA ; later referred to as Parallel ATA or PATA ), offering several advantages over the पुरानी इंटरफ़ेस : घटाया केबल आकार और लागत ( सात conductors बजाय of 40 ), देशी hot swapping, faster data transfer through higher signalling rates, and more efficient transfer through an ( optional ) I/O queuing protocol.
SATA host adapters and devices communicate via a high-speed सीरियल केबल over two pairs of conductors.
In contrast, parallel ATA ( the redesignation for the legacy ATA specifications ) used a 16-bit चौड़ी आंकड़ा बस साथ अनेक अतिरिक्त support और कंट्रोल सिग्नल, सब ऑपरेटिंग at much निम्नतर frequency.
To ensure backward संगतता साथ विरासत ata तन्त्र और अनुप्रयोग, sata uses the same basic ATA and ATAPI command-set as legacy ATA devices.
SATA has replaced समानांतर ata in उपभोक्ता डेस्कटॉप और लैपटॉप कंप्यूटर, and has largely replaced PATA in new embedded applications.
SATA 's market share in the डेस्कटॉप pc मार्केट थी 99 % in 2008.
pata remains widely प्रयुक्त in औद्योगिक और अंतःस्थापित अनुप्रयोग that use CompactFlash storage, even though the new CFast standard is based on SATA.
Serial ATA industry compatibility specifications originate from the सीरियल ata अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन ( aka.
SATA-IO, serialata.org ).
The SATA-IO group collaboratively creates, reviews, ratifies, and publishes the interoperability विशेषताएँ, the परीक्षण cases, and plug-fests.
As with many other industry compatibility standards, the SATA content ownership is transferred to अन्य उद्योग लाशें : primarily the incits t13 उपसमिति ata, the incits t10 उपसमिति ( SCSI ) ; a subgroup of T10 responsible for Serial Attached SCSI ( SAS ).
The complete specification इससे SATA-IO.
The remainder of इस आलेख होगा try to use the terminology and specifications of SATA-IO.
The history of the अंतरजाल began with the development of electronic computers in the 1950s.
The public was first introduced to the concepts that would lead to the Internet when a message was sent over the ARPANet from computer science Professor Leonard kleinrock 's प्रयोगशाला at विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, लॉस एंजिल्स ( ucla ), बाद the दूसरी टुकड़ा of संजाल उपकरण थी संस्थापित at स्टैनफोर्ड शोध संस्थान ( SRI ).
Packet switched networks such as ARPANET, Mark I at NPL in the UK, CYCLADES, Merit Network, Tymnet, and Telenet, were developed in the late 1960s और जल्दी 1970s using a किस्में of प्रोटोकॉल.
The ARPANET in particular led to the development of protocols लिये internetworking, in जिससे अनेक पृथक संजाल could be joined together into a network of networks.
In 1982, the अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल सुइट ( tcp/ip ) थी मानकीकृत, और नतीजतन, the concept of a world-wide network of interconnected TCP/IP networks, called the Internet, was introduced.
Access to the ARPANET was expanded in 1981 when the National Science Foundation ( NSF ) developed the Computer Science संजाल ( csnet ) और again in 1986 when NSFNET provided access to supercomputer sites in the United States from research and education organizations.
Commercial Internet service providers ( ISPs ) began to emerge in the लेट 1980s and early 1990s.
The arpanet थी decommissioned in 1990.
The Internet was commercialized in 1995 when NSFNET was decommissioned, निकालना the पिछला प्रतिबंध on the उपयोग of the Internet to carry commercial traffic.
Since the mid-1990s, the Internet has had a revolutionary impact on culture and कॉमर्स, सहित the वृद्धि of near-instant संचार by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक मेल, तत्काल messaging, आवाज़ over अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( VoIP ) `` phone calls '', two-way interactive video calls, and the World Wide Web with its discussion forums, blogs, social networking, and online shopping sites.
The research and education community continues to develop और उपयोग उन्नत संजाल ऐसे as NSF 's very high speed Backbone Network Service ( vBNS ), Internet2, and National LambdaRail.
Increasing amounts of data are transmitted at higher and higher speeds over fiber optic संजाल ऑपरेटिंग at 1-gbit/s, 10-gbit/s, or अधिक.
The Internet 's takeover over the global communication landscape was almost instant in historical terms : it only communicated 1 % of the information flowing through two-way telecommunications networks in the year 1993, already 51 % by 2000, और अधिक than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007.
Today the Internet continues to grow, driven by ever greater amounts of online information, कॉमर्स, entertainment, और सोशल नेटवर्किंग.

Professor Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore is a major अक्षर और समर्थक of J. K. रोलिंग 's हैरी कुम्हार श्रेणी.
For most of the series, he is the हेडमास्टर of the wizarding school Hogwarts.
As part of his backstory, it is revealed that he is the founder and leader of the Order of the Phoenix, an संगठन समर्पित to लड़ the प्रमुख विपक्षी of the series, Lord Voldemort.
Dumbledore is portrayed by रिचर्ड हैरिस in the फिल्मी adaptions of Harry Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone and Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.
After Harris ' death, माइकल gambon portrayed डम्बल्डोर लिये all of the remaining films.
Rowling stated वो chose the नाम डम्बल्डोर, जिससे is an जल्दी आधुनिक अंग्रेज़ी शब्द for `` bumblebee ``, because of Dumbledore 's love of music : she imagined him walking around `` humming to himself a lot ''.
calcitonin ( भी ज्ञात as thyrocalcitonin ) is a 32-amino एसिड रैखिक polypeptide हार्मोन that is produced in humans primarily by the parafollicular cells ( also known as C-cells ) of the thyroid, and in many other animals in the ultimobranchial body.
It acts to reduce blood calcium ( Ca2+ ), opposing the प्रभाव of parathyroid हार्मोन ( PTH ).
calcitonin रै महरूम मिला in मछली, reptiles, birds, and mammals.
Its importance in humans has not been as well established as its महत्व in अन्य पशु, as इसके फलन is प्रायः नहीं significant in the regulation of normal calcium homeostasis.
It belongs to calcitonin-like protein family.
A mousepad साथ a padded wrist rest.
A mousepad ( US ) or mouse mat ( UK ) is a surface for रखकर and moving a computer mouse.
A mousepad enhances the usability of the mouse compared to using a mouse directly on a table by providing a सतह to allow the ट्रैकिंग led or बॉल ( in पूर्व मॉडल ) to माप गति accurately और बगैर jitter.
Some mousepads increase ergonomics by providing a padded कलाई rest.

Riverfront Stadium ( 1970–1995 ), later known as Cinergy फ़ील्ड ( 1996–2002 ), थी the घर of the सिनसिनाटी लाल नेशनल League baseball team and the Cincinnati Bengals National Football League team.
Located on the Ohio River in downtown Cincinnati, the stadium was best known as the home of `` the बिग रेड यंत्र ``, as the Reds were often called in the 1970s.
Construction began on February 1, 1968, and was completed at a लागत of कम than $ 50 million.
On जून 30, 1970, the लाल hosted the अटलांटा braves in their grand opening, with Hank Aaron hitting the first ever home run at Riverfront.
Two weeks later on July 14, 1970, riverfront hosted the 1970 प्रमुख लीग Baseball All-Star Game.
This game is best remembered for the often-replayed टक्कर at घर थाली between लाल स्टार पीट रोज़ and catcher Ray Fosse of the Cleveland Indians.
In September 1996, Riverfront Stadium was renamed `` Cinergy Field '' in a sponsorship deal साथ वृहद सिनसिनाटी 's उर्जा कम्पनी, Cinergy Corporation.
In 2001, to मेक रूम लिये ग्रेट American Ball Park, the seating capacity at Cinergy Field was reduced to 39,000.
There was a huge wall in Center Field visible after the renovations, to serve as the बैटर 's eye.
The स्टेडियम थी demolished by implosion on December 29, 2002.
Nexen Tire is a tire manufacturer, headquartered in yangsan, दक्षिण gyeongsang प्रांत, and Seoul, both in South Korea.

The silent majority is an unspecified large majority of लोगों in a देश or समूह जो do नहीं एक्स्प्रेस their opinions publicly.
The term was popularized ( हालांकि नहीं पहला प्रयुक्त ) by u.S. अध्यक्ष रिचर्ड निक्सन in a November 3, 1969, speech in which he said, `` And so tonight—to you, the great silent majority of my fellow Americans—I ask for your support. ''
In this usage it referred to those Americans who did not join in the large demonstrations against the Vietnam War at the time, who did not join in the counterculture, and who did not participate in पब्लिक प्रवचन.
Nixon along with many others saw this समूह of मध्य अमेरिकी as होने निष्प्रभ in the media by the more vocal minority.
The phrase was used in the 19th century as a euphemism referring to सब the लोगों जो have died, और others have used it before and after Nixon to refer to groups of voters in various nations of the world.
Sam, a rhesus monkey, flew to an ऊँचाई of 88 km in 1959.
( नासा )
Before humans went into स्पेस, अनेक पशु यहूद शुभारम्भ into स्पेस, सहित numerous monkeys, so that scientists could investigate the biological effects of space travel.
The United States launched flights containing primate कार्गो primarily between 1948-1961 with one flight in 1969 and one in 1985.
France शुभारम्भ दो monkey-carrying flights in 1967.
the सोवियत संघ and Russia launched monkeys between 1983 and 1996.
Most बंदरों यहूद anesthetized पहले lift-off.
Overall thirty-two monkeys flew in the space program ; none उड़ाया अधिक than once.
numerous back-up बंदरों भी went through the programs but never flew.
Monkeys from several species were प्रयुक्त, सहित rhesus बंदरों, cynomolgus बंदरों, गिलहरी monkeys, and pig-tailed macaques.
Some chimpanzees ( which are apes rather than बंदरों ) यहूद also used.
RAID ( redundant array of independent disks, originally अनावश्यक सरणी of inexpensive डिस्क ) is a भंडार प्रौद्योगिकी कि combines multiple disk drive components into a logical unit.
Data is distributed across the drives in one of several ways called `` RAID levels '', depending on the स्तर of अतिरेक and performance required.
The term `` RAID '' was first defined by David पैटरसन, garth A. गिब्सन, और रैंडी katz at the University of California, Berkeley in 1987.
Marketers representing industry रेड निर्माताओं बाद attempted to reinvent the पद to describe a अनावश्यक सरणी of independent disks as a means of disassociating a low-cost expectation from RAID technology.
RAID is अभी प्रयुक्त as an छतरियाँ पद लिये कंप्यूटर आंकड़ा भंडार योजनाएं कि can divide और replicate आंकड़ा among अनेक physical drives : RAID is an example of storage virtualization and the array can be accessed by the operating system as one single drive.
The अलग योजनाएं or architectures हैं named by the word RAID followed by a number ( e.g. RAID 0, RAID 1 ).
प्रत्येक योजना provides a अलग संतुलन between the कुंजी लक्ष्य : विश्वसनीयता and availability, performance and capacity.
RAID levels greater than RAID 0 provide protection against unrecoverable ( सेक्टर ) पढ़ा त्रुटियाँ, as खूब as पूरे डिस्क विफलता.
A lymphocyte is a type of श्वेत रक्त कोशिका in the vertebrate immune system.
Under the microscope, lymphocytes can be विभाजित into विशाल lymphocytes and small lymphocytes.
Large granular lymphocytes शामिल प्राकृतिक कातिल cells ( NK cells ).
Small lymphocytes consist of T cells and B cells.
The Big Lebowski is a 1998 dark comedy film written and निर्देशित by जोएल और ethan Coen.
जेफ़ पुलों सितारों as जेफ़ lebowski, an unemployed Los Angeles slacker and avid bowler, nicknamed `` The Dude. ''
After a case of mistaken पहचान, the यार is introduced to a millionaire also named Jeffrey Lebowski.
When the millionaire lebowski 's ट्रॉफी बीवी is बाद kidnapped, he आयोग The Dude to deliver the ransom to secure her release.
The plan goes awry जब the यार 's dost वाल्टर sobchak ( John Goodman ) schemes to keep the full ransom.
Steve Buscemi, Philip Seymour Hoffman, David Huddleston, Julianne Moore, Tara Reid, and John Turturro भी स्टार in the फिल्मी, जिससे is narrated by a काउंटी ज्ञात तभी as `` the अजनबी '', निभाई by Sam Elliott.
The film is loosely inspired by the कार्य of रेमंड चांडलर.
Joel Coen stated : `` We wanted to do a Chandler kind of story – how it moves episodically, and deals with the characters trying to unravel a mystery, as खूब as having a hopelessly जटिल प्लाट कि 's ultimately unimportant. ''
The original score was composed by Carter burwell, a longtime collaborator of the Coen Brothers.
The Big Lebowski was a disappointment at the U.S. box office and प्राप्त मिश्रित समीक्षाएँ at the time of its release.
Reviews have trended towards the positive over समय, और the फिल्मी रै become a cult पसंदीदा, noted for its idiosyncratic characters, dream sequences, unconventional dialogue, and eclectic soundtrack.
Severus Snape is a fictional character in the Harry कुम्हार किताब श्रेणी लिखा by j.K. रोलिंग.
In the first novel of the series, he is hostile toward Harry and is built up to be the प्राथमिक विपक्षी जबतक the फाइनल chapters.
As the series progresses, Snape 's character becomes अधिक परतदार और complex.
Rowling does not fully reveal the विवरण of उसके सच्चा loyalties जबतक the समाप्त of the फाइनल book, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows.
Over the course of the series, Snape 's portrayal evolves from that of a malicious and partisan teacher to कि of a pivotal अक्षर of considerable जटिलता and moral ambiguity.
Snape primarily teaches Potions at Hogwarts, though in the sixth novel he teaches Defence विरूद्ध the अंधेरा कला, a स्थिति जिससे he थी ज्ञात to have desired throughout the श्रेणी.
He ultimately becomes हेडमास्टर of हॉग्वार्ट्स in the फाइनल novel.
Rowling रै वर्णित उसे as `` a gift of a character ''.
Grits refers to a ground-corn खाना of देशी अमरीकी उत्पत्ति, कि is common in the Southern United States and mainly eaten at breakfast.
आधुनिक grits हैं commonly made of alkali-treated corn known as hominy.
Grits are similar to other मोटा maize-based porridges इससे around the संसार such as polenta or the thinner farina.
`` Instant grits '' have महरूम processed to speed cooking.
The word `` grits '' गर्भाशयी इससे the बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी word `` grytt, '' meaning coarse meal.
This word originally referred to गेहूं और अन्य porridges अभी known as groats in parts of the U.K..
Maize, unknown in यूरोपीय in the मध्य आयु, is a खाना निकला इससे corn ( a New World plant ) and `` corn '' had been used to describe wheat products in many European regions.
`` Grits '' may be either singular or plural ; historically, in the American South the word was invariably एकवचन notwithstanding इसके बहुवचन रूप ( cf. ऐसे खाना names as `` स्पघेटी '' or `` linguine '', likewise plural in form, but singular in use ).
Sometimes, grits are called sofkee or sofkey ( इससे a देशी अमरीकी muskogee word ).
In molecular biology, इंसान chorionic gonadotropin ( hcg ) is a hormone produced by the fertilized egg after conception.
Later during pregnancy it is made by the developing placenta, और बाद by the placental घटक syncytiotrophoblast.
Some cancerous tumors उपज इस हार्मोन ; इसलिए, elevated स्तर measured when the patient is not pregnant can lead to a cancer diagnosis.
However, it is not known whether this production is a contributing कारण or an प्रभाव of tumorigenesis.
The pituitary analogue of hcg, ज्ञात as luteinizing हार्मोन ( lh ), is produced in the pituitary gland of males and females of all ages.
, the FDA has prohibited the sale of `` होम्योपैथिक '' और over the काउंटर hcg आहार products and declared them fraudulent and illegal.
The Las Vegas स्ट्रिप संसार of coca-cola museum in 2003
Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft पेय बेची in स्टोर्स, रेस्तरां, और वेंडिंग machines in every country except Cuba and North Korea.
It is produced by The Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta, Georgia, and is often referred to बस as कोक ( a पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क of the coca-cola कम्पनी in the संयुक्त राज्य चूंकि March 27, 1944 ).
Originally intended as a patent medicine when it was invented in the late 19th century by जॉन pemberton, coca-cola थी खरीदा आउट by बिजनेसमैन asa griggs candler, जिनकी विपणन tactics led Coke to its dominance of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century.
The कम्पनी produces concentrate, जिससे is तब sold to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the world.
The bottlers, who hold territorially exclusive अनुबंध साथ the कम्पनी, उपज समाप्त उत्पाद in डिब्बे और bottles from the concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners.
The bottlers then बेचें, वितरित और merchandise Coca-Cola to retail stores and vending machines.
Such bottlers शामिल coca-cola उद्यमों, जिससे is the largest single Coca-Cola bottler in North America and western Europe.
The Coca-Cola कम्पनी भी बिकता concentrate लिये सोडा स्रोतों to प्रमुख रेस्तरां और food service distributors.
the coca-cola कम्पनी रै, on अवसर, introduced other cola drinks under the Coke brand name.
The most आम of ये is आहार कोक, साथ अन्य सहित caffeine-free coca-cola, Diet Coke Caffeine-Free, Coca-Cola Cherry, Coca-Cola Zero, Coca-Cola Vanilla, and special versions with lemon, lime or coffee.
Based on Interbrand 's best global brand 2011, coca-cola थी the संसार 's सबसे मूल्यवान brand.
An ombudsman is an official, usually appointed by the government or by parliament but with a significant degree of independence, who is charged with representing the रूचि of the पब्लिक by investigating और संबोधित शिकायत of maladministration or violation of rights.
In some countries an Inspector General, नागरिक एडवोकेट or अन्य आधिकारिक may have कर्तव्य समान to those of a national ombudsman, and may also be appointed by the legislature.
Below the national level an ombudsman may be appointed by a state, local or municipal government, and unofficial ombudsmen may be appointed by, or even work for, a निगम ऐसे as a यूटिलिटी प्रदायक or a समाचारपत्र, for an NGO, or for a professional regulatory body.
Whether appointed by the legislature, the executive, or an organization ( or, less अक्सर, निर्वाचित by the constituency कि he or वो serves ), the ठेठ कर्तव्य of an ombudsman हैं to investigate complaints and attempt to resolve them, usually through recommendations ( binding or not ) or mediation.
Ombudsmen sometimes also aim to identify systemic issues leading to ग़रीब सेवा or breaches of लोगों 's अधिकारों.
At the national level, most ombudsmen have a wide mandate to deal with the संपूर्ण पब्लिक सेक्टर, और sometimes भी तत्व of the private sector ( for example, contracted service providers ).
In some cases, there is a more प्रतिबंधित जनादेश, लिये उदाहरण साथ particular sectors of society.
More recent developments have included the creation of specialised children 's ombudsman और सूचना Commissioner agencies.
In some jurisdictions an ombudsman charged with the handling of concerns about national सरकारी is अधिक formally referred to as the `` संसदीय कमिश्नर '' ( e.g. the United Kingdom Parliamentary Commissioner for Administration, and the Western Australian state Ombudsman ).
In many countries where the ombudsman 's remit extends beyond dealing with alleged maladministration to promoting और protecting इंसान अधिकारों, the ombudsman is recognised as the नेशनल इंसान rights institution.
The post of ombudsman had by the end of the 20th century been instituted by सबसे सरकारें और by कुछ intergovernmental organizations such as the European Union.
Making a complaint to an ombudsman is प्रायः फ़्री of charge.

Fall foliage in the town of Stowe, Vermont
नई इंग्लैण्ड is a प्रदेश in the northeastern corner of the United States consisting of the six states of Maine, New Hampshire, Vermont, Massachusetts, Rhode Island, and Connecticut.
New England is bordered by New York state to the दक्षिणपश्चिम, क्यूबेक to the northwest, and New Brunswick and the Atlantic Ocean to the east.
In one of the earliest English settlements in North अमेरिका, तीर्थयात्रियों इससे इंग्लैण्ड first settled in New England in 1620, to form Plymouth Colony.
Ten years later, the puritans settled उत्तर of plymouth उपनिवेश in Boston, thus forming Massachusetts Bay Colony.
Over the next 130 years, New इंग्लैण्ड लड़ा in चार फ्रेंच और भारतीय युद्धों, जबतक the अंग्रेजों पराजित the French and their native allies in North America.
in the लेट 18th सदी, the नई इंग्लैण्ड colonies initiated the प्रतिरोध to the अंग्रेजों Parliament 's efforts to impose new taxes without the consent of the colonists.
The Boston Tea Party was a protest to which Great Britain responded with a series of दंडात्मक कानून stripping मैसाचुसेट्स of self-government, जिससे यहूद termed the `` Intolerable Acts `` by the colonists.
The confrontation led to खोलें warfare in 1775, the expulsion of the अंग्रेजों अधिकारियों from New England in spring 1776, and the Declaration of Independence in July 1776.
Some of the first movements of अमरीकी साहित्य, दर्शनशास्त्र, and education originated in New England.
The region played a prominent role in the movement to abolish slavery, and was the first region of the United राज्य to be रूपांतरित by the औद्योगिक Revolution.
Today, New इंग्लैण्ड is a प्रमुख संसार बीच of education, high technology, insurance, and medicine.
Boston is its cultural, financial, शैक्षणिक, चिकित्सा और परिवहन center.
Each state is principally subdivided into small incorporated municipalities ज्ञात as नई इंग्लैण्ड कस्बों, जिससे हैं प्रायः governed by town meeting.
The only unincorporated territory in नई इंग्लैण्ड exists in the sparse, उत्तरी regions of वर्मांट, नई हैम्पशायर, and Maine.
Since 1970, voters have more often supported liberal candidates at the राज्य और संघीय स्तर than those of any other region in the United States.
New England is the only one of the United States Census ब्यूरो 's नौ क्षेत्रीय विभाजन जिनकी नाम करता नहीं derive इससे इसके भूगोल, और it is the तभी multi-state प्रदेश साथ clear, consistent boundaries.
It maintains a strong sense of cultural identity set अलावा इससे the बाकी of the देश, हालांकि the शर्तें of इस पहचान हैं प्रायः लडे, combining Puritanism with liberalism, agrarian life with industry, and isolation with immigration.

is an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न श्रेणी that combines the medical drama and action-adventure genres.
It was produced by Mark VII Limited and वितरित by सार्वभौमिक Studios.
It debuted as a midseason replacement on January 15, 1972, on NBC, replacing the two short-lived श्रेणी the साझेदार और the शुभ जीवन, और भागा जबतक सितंबर 3, 1977, साथ छह अतिरिक्त two-hour टेलीविज़न films during the following two years.
