was created and produced by Jack Webb and Robert A. Cinader, both of whom यहूद भी जिम्मेदार लिये the पुलिस dramas Adam-12 and Dragnet.
The Eastern Time मण्डल ( et ) encompasses 17 u.S. राज्य in the पूर्वी भाग of the संलग्न संयुक्त States, parts of Canada and three countries in South America.
स्थान कि उपयोग पूर्वी Standard Time ( EST ) when observing standard time ( autumn/winter ) are 5 hours behind Coordinated Universal Time ( ).
Eastern Daylight Time ( EDT ), when observing daylight छायांकन समय ( spring/summer ) is 4 hours behind Coordinated Universal Time ( ).
In the northern parts of the time zone, during the second Sunday in March, at 2:00 a.m. EST, clocks are advanced to 3:00 a.m. edt leaving a एक घंटा `` गैप. ''
During the first Sunday in नवम्बर, at 2:00 a.m. edt, clocks are moved back to 1:00 a.m. EST, thus `` duplicating '' one hour.
Southern parts of the मण्डल ( पनामा और the caribbean ) do not observe daylight saving.
मानक रूप of the periodic table.
The colors represent अलग श्रेणी of elements explained below.
The periodic table is a tabular display of the chemical elements, organized on the आधार of उनके परमाणु संख्याएँ, इलेक्ट्रॉन configurations, और पुनरावर्ती chemical properties.
Elements are presented in अनुक्रम of increasing परमाणु क्रमांक ( क्रमांक of protons ).
The standard form of table comprises an 18 × 7 ग्रिड or प्रमुख देह of तत्व, positioned above a smaller double row of elements.
The table can also be deconstructed into four rectangular ब्लॉक : the s-block to the बाएँ, the p-block to the right, the d-block in the middle, and the f-block below that.
The rows of the table are called periods ; the columns of the s-, d-, और p-blocks हैं पुकारा समूह, साथ कुछ of ये having names such as the halogens or the noble gases.
Since, by definition, a periodic table incorporates recurring trends, any such तालिका can be प्रयुक्त to derive संबंध between the गुण of the तत्व और predict the properties of new, yet to be discovered or synthesized, elements.
As a result, a periodic table—whether in the standard form or some other variant—provides a उपयोगी फ्रेमवर्क लिये analyzing रासायनिक बर्ताव, और ऐसे टेबल हैं widely प्रयुक्त in रसायन और अन्य sciences.
Although precursors exist, Dmitri mendeleev is generally credited साथ the प्रकाशन, in 1869, of the first widely recognized periodic table.
He developed his table to illustrate आवधिक रुझान in the गुण of the then-known elements.
Mendeleev also पूर्वानुमानित कुछ गुण of then-unknown elements that would be expected to fill gaps in this table.
सबसे of उसके पूर्वानुमान यहूद proved सही जब the elements in question were subsequently discovered.
Mendeleev 's periodic table has since been विस्तारित और परिष्कृत साथ the डिस्कवरी or संश्लेषण of further नई तत्व और the विकास of new theoretical models to explain chemical behavior.
All elements from atomic numbers 1 ( hydrogen ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have महरूम खोजा or synthesized.
The elements from 1 to 98 ( californium ) have been found to exist naturally, हालांकि कुछ हैं मिला तभी in ट्रेस amounts और यहूद initially खोजा by synthesis in laboratories.
The elements after 98 have only महरूम synthesized in laboratories.
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is being pursued, with the question of how the periodic तालिका may need to be परिवर्धित to accommodate कोई ऐसे परिवर्धन होने a पदार्थ of ongoing debate.
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally occurring तत्व have भी महरूम उत्पादित in laboratories.
Minecraft is a सैंडबॉक्स इंडी खेल originally निर्मित by स्वीडिश programmer Markus `` Notch '' Persson and later developed and published by Mojang.
It was publicly released for the PC on May 17, 2009, as a developmental alpha version और, बाद क्रमिक अद्यतन, थी प्रकाशित as a पूरा रिलीज version on November 18, 2011.
A version for Android was released a माह पहले on अक्तूबर 7, और an आईओएस संस्करण थी released on November 17, 2011.
On May 9, 2012, the game was released on एक्सबॉक्स 360 as an एक्सबॉक्स सजीव आर्केड खेल, co-developed by 4J Studios.
All versions of minecraft प्राप्त आवधिक अद्यतन.
The रचनात्मक और भवन पहलुओं of minecraft allow खिलाड़ी to निर्माण constructions out of textured cubes in a 3D procedurally generated world.
Other activities in the खेल शामिल खोजी, महफ़िल resources, crafting and combat.
Gameplay in its commercial release has two principal modes : survival, which requires players to acquire resources and maintain their health and भूख ; और रचनात्मक, जहाँ खिलाड़ी have an असीमित सप्लाई of संसाधन, the क्षमता to fly, and no health or hunger.
A third gameplay mode named hardcore is the same as survival, differing only in परेशानी ; it is नियत to hardest सेटिंग और respawning is निष्क्रिय, forcing खिलाड़ी to हटाएँ उनके संसार upon death.
Minecraft received five awards from the 2011 खेल डेवलपर सम्मेलन : it थी awarded the नवीनता पुरस्कार, बेहतरीन downloadable Game Award, and the Best Debut Game Award from the Game Developers Choice Awards ; and the Audience Award, as well as the Seumas McNally Grand Prize, from the Independent Games Festival in 2011.
In 2012, Minecraft was awarded a Golden Joystick पुरस्कार in the श्रेणी बेहतरीन downloadable खेल.
As of April 8, 2013, the game has sold over 10 million copies on PC and as of January 22, 2013, over 20 लाख नक़ल आरपार सब प्लेटफ़ॉर्म.
The Dark नाईट is a 2008 british-american सुपरहीरो फिल्मी निर्देशित, उत्पादित, and co-written by Christopher Nolan.
Based on the DC Comics character Batman, the film is the second भाग of नोलन 's बैटमैन फिल्मी series and a sequel to 2005 's Batman Begins.
Christian Bale reprises the lead role of Bruce Wayne/Batman, with a returning cast of माइकल caine as अल्फ्रेड pennyworth, गेरी oldman as जेम्स गॉर्डन और मॉर्गन Freeman as Lucius Fox.
The film introduces the character of Harvey Dent ( Aaron Eckhart ), Gotham 's newly elected ज़िला attorney और the consort of ब्रूस वेन 's बाल्यकाल dost रेचल dawes ( मैगी जिलएनहॉल ), जो joins बैटमैन and the police in combating the new rising threat of a criminal mastermind calling himself `` The Joker `` ( Heath Ledger ).
नोलन 's प्रेरणा लिये the फिल्मी थी the जोकर 's कॉमिक किताब डेब्यू in 1940, the 1988 graphic novel, and the 1996 series, which retold Two-Face 's origin.
The nickname `` the Dark Knight '' was first applied to Batman in बैटमैन no. 1 ( 1940 ), in a स्टोरी लिखा by Bill Finger.
The Dark Knight was filmed primarily in शिकागो, as खूब as in several other locations in the United States, the United Kingdom, and Hong Kong.
Nolan used an IMAX camera to film some sequences, सहित the जोकर 's पहला appearance in the film.
On January 22, 2008, some months after he had completed filming on the अंधेरा नाईट और छह महीने पहले the फिल्मी 's रिलीज, Heath Ledger died from a toxic combination of prescription drugs, leading to intense attention from the press and movie-going public.
Warner Bros. had initially created a viral marketing campaign for The अंधेरा नाईट, विकासशील promotional वेबसाइटों और trailers highlighting स्क्रीन shots of Ledger as the Joker, but after Ledger 's death, the studio refocused its promotional campaign.
The Dark Knight was released on जुलाई 16, 2008 in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, on जुलाई 18, 2008 in North America, and on July 24, 2008 in the United Kingdom.
Considered one of the best films of the 2000s and one of the best superhero films ever made, the फिल्मी प्राप्त अत्यधिक धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ और नियत numerous records during its theatrical run.
With over $ 1 billion in revenue worldwide, it is the 14th-highest-grossing film of all time, unadjusted for inflation.
The film received eight Academy Award nominations ; it won the award for Best Sound संपादन और लेजर थी मरणोपरांत awarded बेहतरीन supporting कर्ता.
The Dark Knight Rises, the final part of the trilogy, was released on जुलाई 20, 2012.
The timeline of radio lists within the history of radio, the technology and events that produced यंत्र कि उपयोग रेडियो लहरें और क्रियाएँ कि people undertook.
Later, the history is वर्चस्व by प्रोग्रामिंग और सामग्री, जिससे is closer to general history.
The Sydney ओपेरा हाउस is a multi-venue performing arts centre in New South Wales, Australia.
It was conceived and largely built by Danish architect Jørn Utzon, opening in 1973 बाद a long gestation कि began साथ उसके competition-winning design in 1957.
Joseph Cahill 's New दक्षिण वेल्स सरकारी दिया the go-ahead for work to begin in 1958.
The government 's bold decision to select Utzon 's design is often overshadowed by the कांड कि followed.
It is on bennelong पाइंट in सिडनी Harbour, close to the Sydney Harbour Bridge.
It sits at the northeastern tip of the Sydney central business district ( the CBD ), घिरी on तीन पहलू by the harbour ( सिडनी कोव and Farm Cove ) and inland by the Royal Botanic Gardens.
Contrary to its name, it घरों अनेक प्रदर्शन venues.
It is among the busiest performing arts centres in the world, hosting over 1,500 प्रदर्शन प्रत्येक साल attended by कुछ 1.2 लाख लोगों.
It provides a venue for many performing-arts companies, including the four key resident companies Opera Australia, The Australian Ballet, the Sydney Theatre Company and the सिडनी सिंफनी ऑर्केस्ट्रा, and presents a wide range of productions on its own account.
It is also one of the most popular visitor आकर्षण in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, साथ अधिक than सात लाख people visiting each year, 300,000 of whom take a guided tour.
It is administered by the सिडनी ओपेरा हाउस विश्वास, under the New South Wales Ministry of the Arts.
On 28 जून 2007, it थी बना a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
It is one of the 20th सदी 's सबसे distinctive buildings and one of the most famous performing arts centres in the world.
A graph of body mass index as a function of देह द्रव्यमान और देह ऊँचाई is shown above.
The dashed lines represent subdivisions भीतर a प्रमुख क्लास.
For instance the `` Underweight '' classification is further विभाजित into `` severe '', `` moderate '', and `` mild '' subclasses.
The body mass index ( BMI ), or Quetelet index, is a measure for human देह आकार आधारित on an व्यक्तिगत 's वज़न और height.
It was devised between 1830 and 1850 by the belgian बहुश्रुत adolphe quetelet दौरान the कोर्स of विकासशील `` social physics ''.
Body mass index is defined as the individual 's देह द्रव्यमान विभाजित by the वर्गाकार of उनके height.
The formulae universally प्रयुक्त in आयुर्विज्ञान उपज a ईकाई of measure of kg/m2.
BMI can also be determined using a BMI chart, which displays BMI as a function of weight ( horizontal axis ) and height ( लंबवत अक्ष ) using रुपरेखा लाइनों लिये अलग मान of बीएमआई or रंगों लिये अलग बीएमआई श्रेणी.
† The factor for UK/US units is more precisely 703.06957964, लकिन कि स्तर of परिशुद्धता is not meaningful for this calculation.
To work from stone and pounds first multiply the stone by 14 then add the pounds to give the whole mass in pounds ; to कार्य इससे फीट और इंच पहला गुणा the फीट by 12 तब add the इंच to दे the whole height in inches.
Thomas Paine ( January 29, 1737 ( NS February 9, 1737 ) – June 8, 1809 ) was an english-american राजनैतिक activist, लेखक, राजनैतिक theorist और revolutionary.
As the author of two highly influential pamphlets at the start of the American क्रान्ति, he प्रेरित the देशप्रेमी in 1776 to घोषित स्वतंत्रता from Britain.
His ideas reflected Enlightenment era rhetoric of transnational human rights.
He has महरूम पुकारा `` a corsetmaker by trade, a journalist by profession, and a propagandist by inclination. ''
Born in Thetford, England, in the county of Norfolk, Paine emigrated to the अंग्रेजों अमरीकी colonies in 1774 साथ the सहायता of बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन और he arrived in time to participate in the American Revolution.
His principal contributions were the powerful, widely read pamphlet Common Sense ( 1776 ), the all-time best-selling American book that advocated colonial America 's independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain, और the अमरीकी संकट ( 1776–83 ), a pro-revolutionary pamphlet series.
Common Sense was so influential कि जॉन एडम्स कहा, `` बगैर the कलम of the लेखक of आम भाव, the sword of Washington would have been raised in vain.”
Paine जिया in फ़्रांस लिये सबसे of the 1790s, becoming deeply involved in the French Revolution.
He लिखा the अधिकारों of man ( 1791 ), in part a defence of the French Revolution against its critics.
His attacks on British writer Edmund Burke led to a trial and conviction in absentia in 1792 लिये the अपराधों of seditious मानहानि.
In 1792, despite not being able to speak French, he was elected to the फ्रेंच नेशनल सम्मेलन.
The girondists regarded him as an ally.
Consequently, the Montagnards, especially robespierre, regarded उसे as an enemy.
In December 1793, he was arrested and imprisoned in पेरिस, तब released in 1794.
He became बदनाम क्युकी of the आयु of कारण ( 1793–94 ), उसके किताब कि अधिवक्ताओं देववाद, promotes reason and freethinking, and argues against institutionalized religion in general and Christian doctrine in particular.
He also wrote the pamphlet Agrarian Justice ( 1795 ), discussing the origins of property, और introduced the अवधारणा of a गारंटी minimum income.
In 1802, he returned to America where he died on जून 8, 1809.
Only six people attended his funeral as he had been ostracized for his उपहास of christianity.
Clinical trials are sets of tests in medical research and drug development that generate safety and efficacy data ( or more specifically, information परिचय प्रतिकूल ड्रग प्रतिक्रियाएँ और प्रतिकूल प्रभाव of अन्य उपचार ) लिये स्वास्थ्य interventions ( e.g., दवाएँ, नैदानिक, डिवाइस, चिकित्सा प्रोटोकॉल ).
They are conducted only after संतोषजनक सूचना रै महरूम gathered on the विशेषता of the गैर नैदानिक safety, and health authority/ethics committee approval is granted in the country where approval of the drug or device is sought.
Previously, many emerging countries did नहीं आवश्यकता लोकल ट्रायल लिये उत्पाद approvals.
Now, though emerging countries still accept data from u.s./europe, वे भी आवश्यकता some local trials.
Depending on the type of product and the stage of its विकास, जांचकर्ताओं initially enroll स्वयंसेवक and/or मरीजों into small pilot studies, and subsequently conduct larger scale studies in patients that often compare the new product with others already approved for the affliction of interest.
As positive safety and efficacy आंकड़ा हैं gathered, the क्रमांक of patients is typically increased.
Clinical trials can vary in आकार, और can involve a सिंगल शोध entity in one country or many such entities in multiple countries.
A full series of ट्रायल may incur sizable लागत, और the बोझ of paying लिये सब the जरुरी लोगों and services is usually borne by the sponsor, which may be a governmental organization or a pharmaceutical, biotechnology or medical device company.
When the diversity of required support roles exceeds the resources of the प्रायोजक, a नैदानिक विचारण is प्रबंधित by an outsourced संगी, ऐसे as a अनुबंध शोध संगठन or a clinical trials unit in the academic sector.
The ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स हैं an American football team based in Green Bay, Wisconsin.
They are members of the North प्रभाग of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( NFC ) in the National Football League ( NFL ).
Green Bay is the third-oldest franchise in the NFL, having महरूम व्यवस्थित और playing in 1919.
The पैकर्स हैं the only non-profit, community-owned major league professional sports team in the United States.
The Packers are the last vestige of `` small town teams '' that were एकबार आम in the एनएफएल दौरान the 1920s and 1930s.
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name Lambeau फ़ील्ड on जिससे the टोली plays ) और जार्ज व्हिटनी calhoun, the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स can ट्रेस उनके lineage to other semi-professional teams in Green Bay dating back to 1896.
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers competed as a semi-professional फ़ुटबॉल टोली विरूद्ध क्लब from around Wisconsin and the Midwest.
They joined the American Professional Football Association ( APFA ) in 1921, the forerunner to कया is known today as the National Football League ( NFL ).
Although Green Bay is the last NFL `` small town '' team, its local fan base and media extends into आसपास मिल्वौकी ; the टोली भी निभाई चयनित home games there between 1933 and 1994.
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than any other team in the NFL ), including nine NFL championships prior to the सुपर कटोरी era और चार सुपर कटोरी victories —in 1967 ( सुपर कटोरी i ), 1968 ( Super Bowl II ), 1997 ( Super Bowl XXXI ) and 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ).
The Packers have long-standing, bitter rivalries साथ उनके nfc उत्तर ( formerly the nfc सेंट्रल ) प्रतिद्वंद्वियों, the Chicago Bears, Minnesota Vikings and the Detroit Lions.
The Bears-Packers rivalry is एक of the oldest rivalries in एनएफएल history, dating back to 1921.
Ethanol fuel is ethanol ( ethyl दारू ), the वही प्रकार of दारू मिला in alcoholic beverages.
It is सबसे प्रायः used as a motor fuel, mainly as a biofuel additive for gasoline.
World ethanol production for हस्तांतरण ईंधन tripled between 2000 और 2007 इससे 17 अरब to more than 52 billion liters.
From 2007 to 2008, the share of ethanol in global gasoline प्रकार ईंधन उपयोग increased इससे 3.7 % to 5.4 %.
In 2011 worldwide ethanol fuel production reached 22.36 billion U.S. liquid gallons ( bg ) ( 84.6 billion liters ), साथ the संयुक्त राज्य as the शीर्ष निर्माता साथ 13.9 bg ( 52.6 अरब liters ), हिसाब लिये 62.2 % of global production, followed by Brazil with 5.6 bg ( 21.1 billion liters ).
Ethanol fuel has a `` gasoline gallon equivalency `` ( gge ) मान of, which means 1.5 gallons of ethanol produce the energy of one gallon of gasoline.
Ethanol fuel is widely used in Brazil and in the United राज्य, और साथ दोनो देशों were responsible for 87.1 % of the world 's ethanol fuel production in 2011.
Most cars on the road today in the U.S. can run on blends of up to 10 % ethanol, and इथेनॉल represented 10 % of the u.S. गैसोलीन ईंधन सप्लाई निकला इससे घरेलू स्त्रोत in 2011.
Since 1976 the Brazilian government has made it mandatory to मिश्रण इथेनॉल साथ गैसोलीन, और चूंकि 2007 the विधिक मिश्रण is around 25 % ethanol and 75 % gasoline ( E25 ).
By December 2011 Brazil had a fleet of 14.8 million flex-fuel ऑटोमोबाइल और लाइट trucks and 1.5 million flex-fuel motorcycles that regularly use neat ethanol fuel ( known as E100 ).
Bioethanol is a form of renewable energy that can be उत्पादित इससे agricultural feedstocks.
It can be made from very common crops such as शुगर cane, आलू, manioc और मकई.
There has been considerable debate about how useful bioethanol होगा be in replacing गैसोलीन.
Concerns about its production and use relate to increased food prices due to the large amount of arable land required for crops, as well as the energy और प्रदूषण संतुलन of the पूरे साईकिल of इथेनॉल उत्पादन, विशेषकर इससे मकई.
हाल developments with cellulosic ethanol production and commercialization may allay some of these concerns.
cellulosic इथेनॉल offers वादा क्युकी cellulose मछली, a major and universal component in plant cells walls, can be used to produce ethanol.
According to the International Energy Agency, cellulosic ethanol could allow इथेनॉल fuels to खेल a much बडे भूमिका in the भविष्य than previously thought.

A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination and steps of gavrilo princip ( चित्र लिया in 1987, पहले कदम यहूद removed in 1992 और प्लैक changed from Cyrillic to Latin script )
A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo हत्या ( चित्र taken in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914, Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne, and his wife, सोफी, duchess of hohenberg, यहूद शॉट मुर्दे in साराजेवो, by gavrilo princip, एक of a group of six Bosnian Serb assassins coordinated by Danilo Ilić.
The political objective of the assassination was to break off Austria-Hungary 's south-Slav provinces so they could be संयुक्त into a वृहद सर्बिया or a यूगोस्लाविया.
The assassins ' motives were सतत साथ the गति that later became known as Young Bosnia.
Serbian सैन्य अधिकारियों stood behind the attack.
At the top of these Serbian military conspirators was Chief of Serbian Military Intelligence Dragutin Dimitrijević, his righthand man Major Vojislav tankosić, और masterspy rade malobabić.
Major Tankosić armed the assassins साथ बम और pistols और trained them.
The assassins were given access to the same clandestine टनल of safe-houses और एजेंटों कि rade malobabić प्रयुक्त लिये the घुसपैठ of weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary.
The assassins, the key सदस्यों of the clandestine टनल, और the कुंजी Serbian military conspirators who were still alive were arrested, tried, convicted and punished.
Those who were arrested in Bosnia यहूद आजमाया in साराजेवो in October 1914.
The other conspirators were arrested and tried before a Serbian kangaroo court on the french-controlled salonika सामने in 1916–1917 on unrelated गलत आरोप ; सर्बिया चलाया three of the top military conspirators.
Much of what is known परिचय the assassinations आता इससे these two trials and related records.
Assignment of responsibility for the bombing and हत्याएं of 28 जून is अत्यधिक विवादास्पद क्युकी the attack led to the outbreak of World War I one month later.
Renée Kathleen Zellweger ( born अप्रैल 25, 1969 ) is an अमरीकी actress and producer.
Zellweger first gained widespread attention for her role in the film Jerry Maguire ( 1996 ), and subsequently प्राप्त दो nominations लिये the अकादमी Award for Best Actress for her roles as Bridget Jones in the comedy Bridget Jones 's Diary ( 2001 ), and as Roxie Hart in the musical Chicago ( 2002 ).
She won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her प्रदर्शन in the नाटक ठंडा पहाड़ ( 2003 ).
She has won an Academy Award, three Golden Globe Awards, three Screen Actors Guild Awards, and a BAFTA Award ; was named Hasty खीर 's स्त्री of the साल in 2009 ; और स्थापित herself as एक of the highest-paid हॉलीवुड अभिनेत्रियों as of 2007.
The ossicles ( also पुकारा auditory ossicles ) हैं the तीन smallest हड्डियों in the human body, the malleus, the incus and the stapes.
They are contained within the middle ear space and serve to संचारण ध्वनि इससे the एयर to the fluid-filled labyrinth ( cochlea ).
The absence of the auditory ossicles would constitute a moderate-to-severe hearing loss.
The term `` ossicles '' वस्तुतः अर्थात् `` छोटा हड्डियों '' और commonly refers to the auditory ossicles, though the term may refer to any small bone throughout the body.
The New Covenant ( Hebrew • • — Greek • • diatheke kaine ) is a biblical interpretation originally निकला इससे a phrase in the किताब of यिर्मयाह, in the यहूदी Scriptures.
It is often thought of as an eschatological मुक्तिदाता आयु or संसार to आइये और is related to the biblical concept of the Kingdom of God.
Generally, ईसाइयों मानना कि the नई वचन थी instituted at the पिछला भोजन as भाग of the eucharist, which in the Gospel of John includes the New Commandment.
There are several Christian eschatologies that further define the New Covenant, as an example an inaugurated eschatology defines and describes the New Covenant as an जारी संबंध between ईसाई ईमानवालों और परमेश्वर कि होगा be in पूरा फलीभूत बाद the दूसरी coming of मसीह ; कि is, it होगा नहीं only be in full fruition in believing hearts, but in the future external world as well.
The connection between the Blood of Christ and the New Covenant is seen in most modern English translations of the New Testament with the saying : `` इस कप कि is poured आउट लिये you is the new covenant in my blood ''.
Christians believe that Jesus is the mediator of the New Covenant, and that the Blood of Christ shed at his crucifixion is the जरूरी रक्त of the वचन.
As with all covenants between God and man described in the Bible, the New Covenant is considered `` a bond in रक्त sovereignly administered by परमेश्वर. ''
It रै महरूम theorized कि the नई Covenant is the Law of Christ as spoken during his Sermon on the Mount.
The following सूची of लोगों pardoned or granted दया by the President of the United States documents the most prominent cases of each presidency.
As granted by the Constitution ( आलेख ii, खण्ड 2, clause 1 ), राष्ट्रपतियों have the power to grant clemency in one or more of the following ways : the ability to grant a full pardon, to commute a sentence, or to rescind a fine.
U.S. राष्ट्रपतियों have no शक्ति to ग्रान्ट clemency for crimes prosecuted under state law.
As to the difference between a pardon and a commutation:
A pardon is an कार्यपालिका order vacating a conviction.
A commutation is the mitigation of the sentence of someone currently सेवारत a वाक्य लिये a अपराधों pursuant to a conviction, बगैर vacating the conviction itself.
Approximately 20,000 pardons and clemencies were जारी by u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों in the 20th सदी अलोन.
the रिकॉर्ड of अधिनियमों of दया were public until 1934.
In 1981 the Office of the Pardon Attorney was created and रिकॉर्ड इससे अध्यक्ष H. W. बुश आगे are now listed.
इस सूची शामिल pardons and commutations.
tampa ( ) is a नगर in the U.S. state of Florida.
It serves as the county seat for Hillsborough County and is स्तिथ on the वेस्ट coast of फ्लोरिडा, on tampa Bay near the Gulf of Mexico.
the जनसांख्यिकी of Tampa in 2011 was 346,037.
The current location of Tampa was once inhabited by स्वदेशी peoples of the सुरक्षा हार्बर संस्कृति, सबसे notably the Tocobaga and the Pohoy, who lived along the shores of Tampa Bay.
It was briefly छान by स्पेनी explorers in the जल्दी 16th सदी, लकिन वहीँ यहूद no स्थाई अमरीकी or European settlements within today 's city limits until after the United States had acquired Florida from Spain in 1819.
In 1824, the United States Army established a frontier outpost पुकारा फोर्ट ब्रुक at the mouth of the Hillsborough River, near the site of today 's Tampa Convention Center.
The first civilian residents were pioneers who settled निकट the फोर्ट लिये सुरक्षा इससे the आसपास Seminole population.
The town grew slowly until the 1880s, when railroad links, the discovery of phosphate, and the arrival of the cigar industry jump-started Tampa 's विकास और helped it to grow into an महत्वपूर्ण नगर by the जल्दी 1900s.
Today, Tampa is a part of the metropolitan area most commonly referred to as the tampa खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल.
For U.S. Census purposes, Tampa is भाग of the tampa-st. petersburg-clearwater, Florida Metropolitan Statistical Area.
The four-county area is composed of roughly 2.7 million residents, making it the दूसरी largest महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल ( MSA ) in the state, and the fourth largest in the Southeastern United States, behind Miami, Washington, D.C., and Atlanta.
The Greater tampa खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल रै बस over 4 million residents and generally includes the Tampa and Sarasota metro areas.
The Tampa Bay साझेदारी और u.S. जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़ा दिखाया an औसत annual growth of 2.47 percent, or a gain of approximately 97,000 residents per year.
Between 2000 and 2006, the वृहद tampa खाड़ी मार्केट अनुभवी a combined growth rate of 14.8 percent, growing from 3.4 million to 3.9 million and hitting the 4 million people mark on April 1, 2007.
A 2012 estimate shows the Tampa Bay area population to have 4,310,524 लोगों और a 2017 projection of 4,536,854 people.
Tampa has a number of sports teams, such as the tampa खाड़ी buccaneers of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल League, the Tampa Bay Lightning of the National Hockey League, and the Tampa Bay Storm of the Arena Football League.
The Tampa Bay Rays in Major League Baseball and the Tampa Bay Rowdies of the North अमरीकी सॉकर लीग खेल उनके घर खेल in neighboring St. Petersburg, Florida.
In 2008, Tampa was क्रमित as the 5th बेहतरीन बाहरी नगर by Forbes.
A 2004 survey by the NYU समाचारपत्र वॉशिंगटन वर्गाकार न्यूज क्रमित tampa as a top city for `` twenty-somethings. ''
Tampa is now क्रमित as a `` गामा '' संसार नगर by Loughborough University.
according to loughborough, tampa बाँधने alongside other world cities such as Phoenix, Santo Domingo, and Osaka.
In recent years Tampa has seen a notable upsurge in high-market demand from consumers, signaling more माल concentrated in the क्षेत्रफल.
Tampa hosted the 2012 रिपब्लिकन National Convention.
The Chevrolet cavalier थी a कॉम्पैक्ट ऑटोमोबाइल produced from 1982 to 2005 by General Motors.
Built on the company 's J platform, the cavalier उत्पादित the उच्चतम बिक्री in 1984.
AT & T गतिशीलता llc ब्रांडेड और referred to as at & t ( formerly cingular बेतार llc ), is a wholly स्वामित्व subsidiary of AT & T Inc. that provides wireless services to 107 million subscribers in the United States, including Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands.
AT & T Mobility is the second largest wireless telecommunications provider in the United States and Puerto Rico, behind Verizon Wireless, which serves 115.78 लाख ग्राहक as of the चौथी क्वार्टर of 2012.
AT & T Mobility is headquartered in the lenox पार्क क्षेत्रफल of dekalb co. जॉर्जिया, just outside Atlanta.
Originally Cingular Wireless LLC from 2000 to 2007, a संयुक्त venture between sbc संचार और bellsouth, the कम्पनी acquired the बूढ़ा at & t बेतार in 2004 ; sbc later acquired the original AT & T and re-branded as `` AT & T ''.
Cingular became wholly स्वामित्व by at & t in December 2006 as a result of AT & T 's acquisition of BellSouth.
In January 2007, Cingular confirmed it would re-brand itself अंतर्गत the at & t नाम.
Although the legal corporate name change occurred immediately, for both regulatory and brand-awareness reasons both brands यहूद प्रयुक्त in the कम्पनी 's साइनेज और विज्ञापन दौरान a परिवर्तन period.
The परिवर्तन concluded in लेट जून, बस prior to the rollout of the Apple iPhone.
On March 20, 2011, AT & T गतिशीलता घोषित इसके इरादे to acquire T-Mobile USA from Deutsche Telekom for $ 39 billion.
If it had received government and regulatory स्वीकृति, at & t होता have था अधिक than 130 million subscribers.
However, the U.S. Department of Justice, the Federal Communications Commission, and AT & T Mobility 's competitors ( such as स्प्रिंट nextel ) opposed the मूव on the grounds कि it होता reduce प्रतियोगिता in the cellular communications market.
In December 2011, in the face of both governmental and widespread उपभोक्ता विपक्ष, at & t withdrew उनके प्रस्ताव to complete the merger.
Martin Luther King, Jr. ( January 15, 1929 – अप्रैल 4, 1968 ) was an American clergyman, activist, and leader in the African-American Civil Rights Movement.
He is best known for उसके भूमिका in the उन्नति of civil rights using nonviolent civil disobedience.
King has become a national icon in the history of अमरीकी प्रगतिवाद.
A बैपटिस्ट मंत्री, किंग became a सिविल अधिकारों activist early in his career.
He led the 1955 Montgomery Bus Boycott and helped found the दक्षिणी ईसाई नेतृत्व सम्मेलन ( sclc ) in 1957, सेवारत as इसके पहला president.
With the SCLC, King led an unsuccessful struggle against पृथक्करण in albany, जॉर्जिया, in 1962, और व्यवस्थित nonviolent protests in Birmingham, Alabama, that attracted national attention following television news coverage of the brutal police response.
King also helped to organize the 1963 March on Washington, where he वितरित उसके `` i Have a Dream `` speech.
There, he established his प्रतिष्ठा as एक of the महानतम orators in American history.
He also स्थापित उसके प्रतिष्ठा as a कट्टरपंथी, और became an object of the Federal Bureau of Investigation 's COINTELPRO for the rest of his life.
FBI agents investigated him for possible communist ties, recorded his extramarital liaisons और reported on उन्हें to सरकारी officials, और on एक अवसर, mailed किंग a threatening anonymous letter that he interpreted as an attempt to make him commit suicide.
On अक्तूबर 14, 1964, किंग प्राप्त the नोबेल सलाम पुरस्कार for combating racial inequality through nonviolence.
In 1965, he and the SCLC helped to organize the Selma to मोंटगोमरी marches और the following साल, he took the गति उत्तर to Chicago.
In the final years of his life, King विस्तारित उसके फ़ोकस to शामिल गरीबी और the वियतनाम युद्ध, alienating many of his liberal allies with a 1967 speech titled `` Beyond Vietnam ''.
King was planning a national occupation of Washington, D.C., पुकारा the ग़रीब लोगों 's अभियान.
King थी assassinated on अप्रैल 4, 1968, in Memphis, Tennessee.
His मौत थी followed by riots in many U.S. cities.
Allegations that James Earl Ray, the man convicted of killing किंग, था महरूम framed or acted in कॉन्सर्ट साथ सरकारी एजेंटों persisted लिये दशकों after the shooting, and the jury of a 1999 civil trial found Loyd Jowers to be complicit in a conspiracy against King.
King was awarded the अध्यक्षीय पदक of स्वतंत्रता और the congressional Gold Medal posthumously.
Martin Luther King, Jr. दिन थी स्थापित as a u.S. federal holiday in 1986.
सैंकड़ों of गलियों in the u.S. have been renamed in his honor.
A memorial statue on the नेशनल मॉल थी खोली to the public in 2011.
The बाघ ( पेंथेरा tigris ) is the largest cat species, reaching a total body length of up to and weighing up to.
It is the तीसरा largest जमीन carnivore ( behind only the polar bear and the brown bear ).
Its most recognizable feature is a पैटर्न of अंधेरा लंबवत stripes on reddish-orange fur with a lighter underside.
It has exceptionally stout दांत, और the canines हैं the longest among living felids with a crown height of as much as or even.
In zoos, tigers have lived for 20 to 26 years, which also seems to be उनके आयु in the wild.
They are territorial और generally एकान्त लकिन सोशल पशु, often requiring large contiguous areas of habitat that support their prey requirements.
This, coupled with the fact that they are indigenous to कुछ of the अधिक densely आबादी places on Earth, has caused significant conflicts with humans.
Tigers एकबार ranged widely आरपार एशिया, from Turkey in the west to the eastern coast of Russia.
Over the past 100 years, they have lost 93 % of their historic range, और have महरूम extirpated इससे दक्षिणपश्चिम और सेंट्रल एशिया, इससे the आइलैंड्स of Java and Bali, and from large areas of Southeast and Eastern Asia.
Today, they range इससे the siberian ताइगा to open grasslands and tropical mangrove swamps.
The बाकी छह बाघ subspecies have महरूम वर्गीकृत as endangered by IUCN.
The global population in the wild is estimated to number between 3,062 और 3,948 individuals, bas इससे around 100,000 at the प्रारंभ of the 20th century, with most remaining populations occurring in small pockets isolated from each other.
प्रमुख कारण लिये जनसांख्यिकी decline include habitat destruction, habitat fragmentation and poaching.
The extent of area occupied by tigers is estimated at less than, a 41 % मनाही इससे the क्षेत्रफल अनुमानित in the mid-1990s.
Tigers are among the most recognisable और लोकप्रिय of the world 's charismatic megafauna.
They have प्रदर्शित prominently in ancient mythology and folklore, and continue to be depicted in modern films and literature.
Tigers appear on many flags, coats of बाहें, और as mascots for sporting teams.
The बंगाल बाघ is the नेशनल animal of both India and Bangladesh.

Overview of the calvin साईकिल and carbon fixation
The light-independent reactions of photosynthesis are chemical प्रतिक्रियाएँ कि बदलें कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड और अन्य यौगिकों into glucose.
These reactions occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled क्षेत्रफल of a हरितलवक बाहर of the thylakoid membranes.
These reactions take the light-dependent प्रतिक्रियाएँ and perform further chemical processes on them.
There are three phases to the light-independent प्रतिक्रियाएँ, collectively पुकारा the calvin cycle : carbon fixation, reduction reactions, and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration.
Despite its name, this प्रक्रम occurs तभी when light is available.
पौधे do नहीं carry out the Calvin cycle by night.
They, instead, release sucrose into the फ्लोएम इससे उनके starch reserves.
This process happens when light is available independent of the kind of photosynthesis ( C3 carbon fixation, C4 कार्बन fixation, और crassulacean एसिड चयापचय ) ; कैम पौधे स्टोर malic एसिड in उनके vacuoles प्रत्येक night and release it by day in order to make this process work.
A linen handkerchief with pulled लड़ी कढ़ाई around the किनारे
Linen cloth recovered from qumran गुफा 1 निकट the Dead Sea.
Linen ( ) is a वस्त्र बना इससे the मछली of the flax plant, Linum usitatissimum.
Linen is labor-intensive to manufacture, लकिन जब it is बना into garments, it is valued for its exceptional coolness and freshness in hot weather.
The word `` लिनेन '' is of वेस्ट germanic उत्पत्ति और cognates with the Latin name for the flax plant linum, and the earlier Greek λινόν ( linon ).
This word history has given rise to a number of other terms in अंग्रेज़ी, the सबसे notable of जिससे is the अंग्रेज़ी word line, derived from the use of a linen ( flax ) thread to determine a straight line.
Textiles in a linen weave texture, even when made of cotton, hemp and other non-flax fibers are also loosely referred to as `` लिनेन ''.
Such fabrics generally have their own specific names other than linen ; for example, fine कपास धागे in a linen-style बुनते is पुकारा madapolam.
The सामूहिक पद `` linens `` is स्टिल प्रायः प्रयुक्त generically to describe a क्लास of woven and even knitted bed, bath, table and kitchen textiles.
the नाम linens is retained because traditionally, linen was used for many of these items.
In the past, the word `` linens '' was also used to mean lightweight undergarments such as shirts, chemises, waistshirts, lingerie ( a word also cognate with linen ), and detachable shirt collars और cuffs, जिससे यहूद historically बना लगभग exclusively आउट of लिनेन.
The inside cloth layer of fine composite कपडे garments ( as लिये example jackets ) was traditionally made of linen, and this is the origin of the word lining.
Linen textiles appear to be some of the oldest in the संसार : उनके इतिहास goes वापस अनेक हज़ारों of सालो.
Fragments of straw, seeds, मछली, yarns, और विभिन्न प्रकार of fabrics which date back to about 8000 BC have been found in Swiss lake dwellings.
Dyed flax fibers found in a prehistoric cave in Georgia suggest the use of woven linen fabrics from जंगली flax may तिथि back even earlier to 36,000 BP.
Linen was sometimes प्रयुक्त as करेंसी in प्राचीन Egypt.
Egyptian mummies were wrapped in linen because it was seen as a symbol of लाइट और पवित्रता, और as a display of wealth.
Some of these fabrics, woven from hand spun yarns, यहूद बहुत ठीक लिये उनके day, but are coarse compared to modern linen.
Today, linen is प्रायः an महंगी वस्त्र, और is produced in relatively small quantities.
It has a long `` staple '' ( individual fiber लंबाई ) सापेक्ष to कपास और अन्य natural fibers.
Many products are made of linen : aprons, बैग, तौलिये ( swimmers, नहाना, बीच, देह और धो तौलिये ), napkins, bed linens, linen tablecloths, runners, chair covers, and men 's & women 's wear.
The FIFA World Cup, often simply the World Cup, is an international association football competition contested by the वरिष्ठ मेन 's नेशनल टीमों of the सदस्यों of fédération internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ), the sport 's global governing body.
The championship has been awarded every four years since the inaugural tournament in 1930, except in 1942 and 1946 when it थी नहीं आयोजित क्युकी of the दूसरी संसार War.
The current champions हैं स्पेन, जो won the 2010 tournament.
The current format of the tournament involves 32 teams competing for the title at venues within the host nation ( s ) over a period of about a माह ; इस phase is प्रायः पुकारा the संसार Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, which currently takes place over the preceding three years, is प्रयुक्त to determine जिससे टीमों qualify लिये the टूर्नामेंट साथ साथ the host nation ( s ).
The 19 संसार कप tournaments have been won by eight different national teams.
Brazil have जीती पाँच टाइम्स, और वे are the only team to have played in every tournament.
The other World Cup winners are Italy, with four titles ; Germany, with three titles ; अर्जेंटीना और inaugural विजेता उरुग्वे, with two titles each ; and England, France, and Spain, with one title each.
The World Cup is the world 's most widely viewed sporting इवेंट ; an अनुमानित 715.1 लाख people watched the final match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany.
The next three World Cups will be hosted by ब्राज़ील in 2014, रूस in 2018, और क़तर in 2022.
The is an विस्तार यंत्र लिये the Wii Remote video game controller for the Wii that allows it to more accurately capture complex motion.
According to निन्टेंडो, the सेंसर in the यंत्र पूरक the accelerometer and Sensor Bar capabilities of the Wii Remote to enable actions to be rendered identically on the screen in real time.
The Wii 's successor कंसोल, the वी u, supports the वी motionplus and its peripherals in games where use of its touchscreen-built-in primary controller is not necessary.
Majulah Singapura ( Onward सिंगापुर ) is the नेशनल गान of सिंगापुर.
Composed by Zubir Said in 1958 as a थीम सोंग लिये आधिकारिक कृत्यों of the City Council of Singapore, the song was selected in 1959 as the island 's anthem when it attained self-government.
Upon full स्वतंत्रता in 1965, majulah singapura थी formally अपनाया as Singapore 's national anthem.
By law the anthem may only be sung with its original Malay lyrics, although there exist authorized अनुवाद of the गीत of the गान in सिंगापुर 's तीन अन्य official languages : English, Mandarin and Tamil.
Originally composed in the कुंजी of g प्रमुख, in 2001 the नेशनल गान थी officially relaunched in the lower key of F major as this was said to allow for a `` grander and more inspiring arrangement ''.
The national anthem is regularly performed or सुंग in स्कूलों और हथियारबंद शक्तियां शिविरों at ceremonies held at the beginning and/or the end of each day, during which the national flag is also raised and lowered and the national pledge is taken.
Singaporeans are especially encouraged to sing the national anthem on अवसरों of नेशनल जश्न or नेशनल significance ऐसे as at the नेशनल दिन परेड, at नेशनल Day observance ceremonies conducted by educational institutions and government departments, and at sporting events at which Singapore teams are participating.
An expedition 's shipwrights भवन a brigantine, 1541.
Shipbuilding is the निर्माण of जहाजों and floating vessels.
It normally takes place in a specialized सुविधा ज्ञात as a shipyard.
Shipbuilders, also called shipwrights, follow a specialized occupation कि traces इसके जड़ें to पहले अंकित history.
Shipbuilding and ship repairs, both commercial और सैन्य, हैं referred to as `` naval engineering ''.
The construction of नौकाएँ is a समान कार्यकलाप called boat building.
The dismantling of ships is पुकारा जलयान तोड़कर.
Wakonda is a कस्बा in मिट्टी County, South Dakota, United States.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 321 at the 2010 census.
The following is a सूची of the सबसे populous incorporated places of the United States of America.
As defined by the United States Census Bureau, an `` incorporated place `` includes a variety of designations, सहित नगर, कस्बा, गाँव, बरो, और municipality.
A few असाधारण जनसांख्यिकी designated स्थान ( cdps ) हैं भी included in the Census Bureau 's listing of incorporated places.
Consolidated city-counties represent a पृथक प्रकार of सरकारी कि शामिल the संपूर्ण जनसांख्यिकी of a county, or county equivalent.
Some consolidated city-counties, however, शामिल अनेक incorporated स्थान.
This list presents only कि portion ( or `` संतुलन '' ) of ऐसे संचित city-counties that are not a part of another incorporated place.
Note that this list refers only to the population of individual municipalities भीतर उनके पारिभाषित हद, जिससे करता नहीं शामिल अन्य municipalities or unincorporated suburban areas within urban agglomerations.
A different ranking is evident when considering u.S. महानगर area populations.

Nintendo DS storage devices are डिवाइस प्रयुक्त to स्टोर a licensed डेवलपर 's work-in-progress बिंब, homebrew वीडियो खेल और डाउनलोड commercial games ( since the Nintendo DS is not sold with a rewritable storage medium ).
licensed डेवलपर, however, can use a blue Intelligent Systems Nitro Emulator box to flash cards.
These devices are also known as `` flashcarts '' or `` flashcards ''.
There are two प्रमुख वर्ग of flashcarts : पुरानी डिवाइस जिससे fit in Slot-2 ( the Game Boy Advance Game Pak slot ) and newer devices that fit in Slot-1 ( the DS Game Card slot ).
Slot-2 ( or first-generation ) devices have been historically cheaper due to economies of scale ( inherited from their use with Game Boy Advance ), but require a booting tool in Slot-1 in order to उपयोग the टच स्क्रीन और अन्य ds सुविधाएँ.
Second-generation devices ( those which only use Slot-1 ) do not work with GBA homebrew, but became less महंगी और easier to उपयोग, rivaling अनेक slot-2 डिवाइस in price.
First-generation devices शामिल gba फ्लैश कारतूस, gbamp CF, SuperCard, and M3.
Second-generation devices शामिल r4 क्रान्ति, cyclods, G6 Real and DS-X.
The storage यंत्र either contains फ्लैश मेमोरी or a स्लॉट लिये a memory card to store homebrew.
Storage devices with a memory-card slot usually have more storage capacity than flash-memory डिवाइस.
Although flash-memory capacity is usually measured in megabits ( Mb ), memory-card capacity is प्रायः measured in मेगाबाइट ( mb ) ( जहाँ 8 Mb is 1 MB ).
Storage-device brands differ in their support for homebrew ; DS and Game Boy Advance roms ; खास सुविधाएँ ( ऐसे as क्षमता to खेल मीडिया फाइलें ) ; physical size and cost.
Strictly speaking, a storage device is नहीं जरुरी लिये ds साथ flashme installed because homebrew can be sent to the DS using WMB.
However, this is not an easily-portable विधि क्युकी the ds needs to be भीतर range of a suitable Wi-Fi card.
हैं अमरीकी people of Japanese heritage.
Japanese Americans have historically been among the तीन largest एशियाई अमरीकी समुदायों, लकिन in हाल दशकों, it has become the sixth largest group at roughly 1,304,286, including those of mixed-race or mixed-ethnicity.
In the 2010 census, the largest जापानी अमरीकी समुदायों यहूद मिला in California with 272,528, Hawaii with 185,502, New York with 37,780, Washington with 35,008, and Illinois with 17,542.
Southern California has the largest japanese-american population in North America.

This is a comprehensive listing which highlights significant उपलब्धियाँ और माइलस्टोन आधारित upon बिलबोर्ड magazine 's singles charts, most notably the Billboard Hot 100.
इस सूची spans इससे the issue dated January 1, 1955 to present.
The Billboard hot 100 began साथ the issue dated August 4, 1958, and is currently the standard popular music chart in the United States.
Prior to the creation of the Hot 100, Billboard published four singles charts : `` Best विक्रेता in स्टोर्स '', `` सबसे निभाई by Jockeys '', `` Most Played in Jukeboxes '' and `` The Top 100 ''.
These charts, which ranged from 20 to 100 slots, यहूद phased आउट at अलग times between 1957 and 1958.
Though technically नहीं भाग of the hot 100 चार्ट इतिहास, their data is included for computational purposes, and to avoid unenlightening or misleading characterizations.
All items listed below are from the Hot 100 era, unless वरना विख्यात ( pre-hot 100 चार्ट ).
V is an अमरीकी विज्ञान fiction टेलीविज़न श्रेणी that ran for two seasons on ABC, from November 3, 2009 to March 15, 2011.
A remake of the 1983 miniseries created by Kenneth Johnson, the new series chronicles the आगमन on धरती of a technologically उन्नत एलियन प्रजाति जिससे ostensibly आता in सलाम, लकिन actually has sinister motives.
V stars Morena Baccarin, Lourdes Benedicto, मॉरिस शाहबलूत, जोएल gretsch, लोगन huffman, चार्ल्स mesure, एलिज़ाबेथ मिशेल, लौरा Vandervoort and Scott Wolf, and was executive produced by Scott Rosenbaum, Yves Simoneau, Scott Peters, and Jace Hall.

Geocaching is an outdoor recreational कार्यकलाप, in जिससे the भागीदार उपयोग a वैश्विक Positioning System ( GPS ) receiver or mobile device and other navigational techniques to hide and seek containers, called `` geocaches '' or `` caches '', anywhere in the world.
A typical cache is a small waterproof container containing a logbook where the geocacher enters the तिथि वे मिला it और लक्षण it साथ उनके स्थापित कोड नाम.
After signing into the log, the cache must be placed वापस exactly जहाँ the person found it.
Larger containers such as plastic storage containers ( tupperware or समान ) or ammunition बाक्स can भी contain items for trading, usually toys or trinkets of little value.
Geocaching shares many aspects with benchmarking, trigpointing, orienteering, treasure-hunting, letterboxing, and waymarking.

DJ Scott La Rock was murdered on अगस्त 27, 1987, महीने बाद the रिलीज of BDP 's debut album, Criminal Minded.
The name of the group, बोगी bas, गर्भाशयी इससे a उपनाम for the South Bronx section of The Bronx, one of the five boroughs of New York City.
The group pioneered the fusion of dancehall reggae and hip hop music and their debut LP Criminal Minded contained frank descriptions of life in the दक्षिण bronx of the लेट 1980s यूँ सेटिंग the स्टेज लिये कया होता आखिरकार become gangsta rap.
a नगरपालिका बंध is a बंध जारी by a local government, or their agencies.
संभावित issuers of नगरपालिका bonds शामिल राज्य, शहरों, काउंटी, redevelopment एजेंसियों, special-purpose districts, school districts, public utility districts, publicly owned airports and seaports, and any other governmental entity ( or group of governments ) at or below the state level.
Municipal bonds may be general obligations of the जारीकर्ता or secured by निर्दिष्ट revenues.
In the United States, interest income received by धारकों of नगरपालिका bonds is प्रायः exempt इससे the संघीय आय कर और इससे the आय tax of the state in which they are issued, although municipal bonds issued for certain purposes may not be tax exempt.
Unlike new issue stocks that are brought to market with price restrictions until the deal is sold, municipal bonds are फ़्री to व्यापार at कोई समय एकबार वे हैं खरीदा by the निवेशकों.
Professional व्यापारियों regularly व्यापार और retrade the same bonds several times a week.
`` Gim me Some Lovin ' '' is a song written by Steve Winwood, Spencer Davis और muff winwood, और originally performed by the स्पेंसर डेविस समूह.

The Internet Movie Database ( IMDb ) is an online database of information सम्बन्धित to films, टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम, और वीडियो games.
This includes actors, production crew personnel, and fictional characters featured in ये तीन विज़ुअल entertainment मीडिया.
It is one of the most लोकप्रिय ऑनलाइन entertainment गंतव्यों, साथ over 100 लाख unique users each month and a solid and rapidly growing mobile presence.

Fibre Channel Host Bus एडाप्टर ( 64-bit PCI-X card )
scsi मेजबान बस Adapter ( 16-bit ISA card )
In computer hardware, a host controller, मेजबान एडाप्टर, or मेजबान बस एडाप्टर ( hba ) connects a मेजबान प्रणाली ( the कंप्यूटर ) to other network and storage devices.
The terms are primarily used to refer to devices for connecting scsi, fibre चैनल and eSATA devices.
however, डिवाइस लिये connecting to IDE, Ethernet, FireWire, USB and other systems may also be called host adapters.
Recently, the आगमन of iscsi और fibre चैनल over ईथरनेट रै brought about Ethernet HBAs, which are different from Ethernet NICs in that they include TCP Offload Engines.
There are also converged HBAs that support both Ethernet and Fibre Channel called Converged संजाल adapters ( cnas ).
cashmere Scarves
Modern men 's cashmere sweaters लिये बिक्री.
Cashmere wool, प्रायः बस ज्ञात as cashmere, is a रेशा प्राप्त from Cashmere goats and other types of goat.
The word cashmere गर्भाशयी इससे an old spelling of Kashmir.
Cashmere is fine in texture, strong, light, और नरम.
garments बना इससे it provide excellent insulation.
In the United States, under the U.S. Wool Products Labeling Act of 1939, as amended, ( 15 uction 68b ( a ) ( 6 ) ), राज्य कि a ऊन or वस्त्र उत्पाद may not be labeled as containing cashmere unless:
such wool product is the fine ( dehaired ) undercoat मछली उत्पादित by a cashmere goat ( Capra hircus laniger ) ;
the average diameter of the fiber of such wool उत्पाद करता नहीं exceed 19 माइक्रोन ; and
such wool product does not contain more than 3 percent ( by वज़न ) of cashmere मछली साथ औसत diameters कि exceed 30 microns.
The average fiber diameter may be विषय to a गुणांक of विभिन्नता around the औसत कि shall not exceed 24 percent.

Egg roll is a term प्रयुक्त लिये अनेक अलग foods around the world.
2__Egg_roll __ Varieties of egg rolls are found in mainland China, अनेक chinese-speaking regions of एशिया, और चाइनीज अप्रवासी समुदायों around the संसार.
Egg रोल्स as referred to in China.
In Guangdong and Hong काँग, अंडा फेंकें प्रायः refers to biscuit roll.
This is a प्रकार of बिस्किट.
The ingredient शामिल अंडा, आटा और शुगर.
Egg roll also is a dish in कैण्टन और हांग काँग, इस is प्रायः made with vegetable.
Within China egg rolls are eaten predominantly in the southeast और हैं नहीं as commonly consumed in the north and western parts of China.
In अमरीकी चाइनीज भोजन, an अंडा फेंकें is a savory dish typically served as an appetizer.
It is usually stuffed with chicken, pork or झींगा, गोभी, गाजर, टमाटर, सेम sprouts और अन्य vegetables, and then deep fried.
This variety of the egg roll is very common and लोकप्रिय, आरपार भी क्षेत्रीय किस्में of American Chinese food, and is often included as part of a `` combination platter ''.
In Montreal, Canada, open-ended eggrolls हैं a jewish-chinese संलयन dish.
They can be either kosher certified or merely kosher style.
Pain and suffering is the legal term for the physical and emotional तनाव caused इससे an चोट ( देखिए भी पीड़ा and suffering ).
Some damages that might be under this category would be : aches, temporary and permanent सीमाएं on कार्यकलाप, संभावित shortening of life, depression or scarring.
When filing a मुकदमा as a परिणाम of an चोट, it is आम लिये someone to seek money both in compensation for actual money that is lost and for the pain and stress associated with virtually any injury.
In a suit, pain and suffering is part of the `` general damages '' section of the claimant 's claim, or, alternatively, it is an तत्व of `` compensatory '' non-economic क्षतिपूर्ति कि allows रिकवरी लिये the दिमागी anguish and/or शारीरिक पीड़ा endured by the claimant as a result of injury for which the plaintiff seeks redress.
Apart from money damages awarded in trial, money damages are also given informally outside the judicial system in mediations, arbitration ( both of जिससे may be अदालत annexed or गैर litigated दावा ) as खूब as in routine insurance settlements.
Individual claimants or those represented by वकील प्रायः उपस्थित मांगे to insurers to settle for money.
These माँग लिये bodily चोट मुआवजे monies प्रायः set out damages that are similarly used in the court litigated pleadings.
Demands are प्रायः लिखा summaries of a claimant 's medical care and the facts which resulted in the injury.
Sample of a Medallion हस्ताक्षर गारंटी stampIn
the United States and Canada, a medallion signature गारंटी is a खास signature guarantee for the transfer of securities.
It is a guarantee by the transferring financial institution that the signature is genuine and the वित्तीय संस्था स्वीकृत देयता लिये any forgery.
Signature guarantees protect shareholders by preventing unauthorized हस्तांतरण और संभावित निवेशकों losses.
They also limit the liability of the ट्रांसफ़र एजेंट जो स्वीकृत the certificates.
Different institutions have different policies as to what type of पहचान वे आवश्यकता to provide the गारंटी और whether वे charge a fee for such service ( usually nominal if any ).
Most institutions will नहीं गारंटी a हस्ताक्षर of किसी जो has not already been their customer.
A medallion signature guarantee is not the same as an acknowledgment by a notary public, in the sense that a `` signature guarantee '' is a certification by the institution that the signature is authentic, and an acknowledgment is a प्रमाणन by a नोटरी पब्लिक attesting कि the signer हस्ताक्षरित a document voluntarily.
Some banks may no longer provide इस सेवा, however, अनेक स्टिल do as well as other financial institutions such as a Savings and Loans and Credit Unions.
At their sole discretion, ये संस्थानों may स्टिल मनाही to provide the Medallion Signature Guarantees.
When US citizens are abroad, some वित्तीय संस्थानों may accept संयुक्त राज्य दूतावास seals, in place of the Medallion Signature Guarantee Stamp.
Pacific Electric रेल streetcars stacked at a junkyard on टर्मिनल Island, Los Angeles County, California, March 1956
The General मोटर्स स्ट्रीटकार षड्यंत्र ( भी ज्ञात as the ग्रेट अमरीकी स्ट्रीटकार कांड ) refers to दोषारोपण और convictions in संबंध to a कार्यक्रम by General Motors ( GM ) and other companies who purchased and then dismantled streetcar and electric train systems in many American cities.
Between 1936 and 1950, National City Lines and Pacific City Lines —with investment from GM, Firestone Tire, Standard Oil of California, Phillips Petroleum, mack ट्रक, और the संघीय अभियान्त्रिकी corporation—bought over 100 इलेक्ट्रिक surface-traction प्रणालियों in 45 शहरों सहित बाल्टीमोर, Newark, Los Angeles, New York City, Oakland and San Diego and converted them into bus operation.
Several of the companies involved were convicted in 1949 of षड्यंत्र to monopolize interstate commerce but were acquitted of conspiring to monopolize the ownership of these companies.
Some suggest that this program played a key role in the decline of public transit in cities across the United States ; notably Edwin J. Quinby, who first drew attention to the program in 1946, and then Bradford C. Snell, an anti-trust attorney लिये the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट जिनकी विवादास्पद 1974 गवाही to a सीनेट पूछताछ brought the समस्या to नेशनल awareness.
Both Quinby and Snell argued that the deliberate विनाश of streetcars थी भाग of a larger strategy to push the United States into automobile dependency.
Others say that independent economic factors brought about changes in the transit प्रणाली, सहित the ग्रेट अवसाद, the पब्लिक यूटिलिटी पकड़कर कम्पनी अधिनियम of 1935, मजदूर अशांति, मार्केट शक्तियां, rapidly increasing traffic congestion, urban sprawl, taxation policies that favored private vehicle ownership, and general enthusiasm for the automobile.
One writer on the subject has suggested that Snell and others fell into simplistic conspiracy theory thinking, bordering on paranoid delusions saying `` clearly, gm waged a युद्ध on इलेक्ट्रिक कर्षण.
It was indeed an all out assault, but by no अर्थात् the सिंगल कारण लिये the विफलता of rapid transit.
Also, it is बस as साफ कि क्रियाएँ और inactions by सरकारी contributed significantly to the elimination of electric traction. ''
Only a small handful of u.S. शहरों have surviving प्रभावी rail-based शहरी हस्तांतरण प्रणालियों आधारित on streetcars or trams, सहित Newark, Philadelphia, San Francisco, Pittsburgh, and Boston ; others are re-introducing them.
The story has been explored अनेक टाइम्स in छपाई, फिल्मी और अन्य मीडिया, notably in जो framed Roger Rabbit, Taken for a Ride and The End of Suburbia.
Corwin House, Salem, मैसाचुसेट्स, निर्मित ca. 1660, First Period English
American colonial architecture includes several building design styles associated with the colonial period of the United States, including First Period English ( late-medieval ), फ्रेंच औपनिवेशिक, स्पेनी औपनिवेशिक, डच औपनिवेशिक और जॉर्जियाई.
ये शैलियाँ हैं संबद्ध साथ the घरों, churches and government buildings of the period from about 1600 through the 19th century.
`` In the Mood '' is a big बैंड era # 1 hit अंकित by अमरीकी bandleader Glenn Miller.
it अव्वल the चार्ट in 1940 in the U.S. and one year later was featured in the movie Sun Valley Serenade.
In 1999, National Public Radio ( NPR ) included the 1939 Glenn मिलर रिकॉर्डिंग on आरसीए bluebird on the npr 100, the सूची of `` the 100 सबसे important American musical works of the 20th century ''.
वरुण logo
The NEPTUNE Canada project is the world’s पहला regional-scale भाटे समंदर वेधशाला that plugs directly into the Internet.
Since December 2009, it रै अनुमत लोगों to `` surf '' the seafloor while ocean scientists run deep-water experiments from labs and universities around the world.
Along with its सिस्टर प्रोजेक्ट, शुक्र, वरुण offers a unique approach to ocean science.
Traditionally, ocean scientists have relied on infrequent ship cruises or space-based satellites to carry आउट उनके शोध, जबकि the वरुण प्रोजेक्ट उपयोग a remotely संचालित crawler.
A gramophone record, commonly known as a phonograph record ( in American English ), vinyl record ( in reference to vinyl, the material most commonly used after about 1950 ), or colloquially, `` a रिकार्ड '', is an एनालॉग ध्वनि भंडार मीडियम consisting of a चपटा डिस्क साथ an inscribed, modulated spiral groove.
The groove प्रायः starts निकट the periphery और ends near the center of the disc.
Phonograph records are generally described by their diameter in inches ( 12-inch, 10-inch, 7-inch, etc. ), the rotational speed at which they are played ( `` 33 rpm ``, `` 78 '', `` 45 '', etc. ), their time capacity ( `` long playing '' ), their reproductive सटीकता, or `` वफ़ादारी `` ( `` ऊँची वफ़ादारी '', `` orthophonic '', `` full-range '', इत्यादि. ), और the क्रमांक of चैनल्स of ऑडियो provided ( `` मोनो ``, `` स्टीरियो ``, `` quadraphonic ``, etc. ).
Phonograph records were the primary medium used for music reproduction for most of the 20th century, replacing the फोनोग्राफ बेलन, साथ which it had co-existed, by the 1920s.
By the late 1980s, digital मीडिया था gained a larger मार्केट share, और the vinyl record left the mainstream in 1991.
They continue to be manufactured और बेची in the 21st century.
In 2008, nearly 2.9 लाख इकाई shipped, the most in any year since 1998 and the format has continued to slowly regain popularity.
They are especially used by djs और audiophiles लिये अनेक प्रकार of music.
As of 2013, vinyl records continue to be प्रयुक्त for distribution.

Grasslands are areas where the vegetation is dominated by grasses ( पोएसी ), however sedge ( cyperaceae ) और फटाफट ( juncaceae ) families can also be found.
Grasslands occur naturally on सब महाद्वीपों मगर अंटार्कटिक.
In temperate latitudes, such as northwestern Europe and the Great Plains and California in North America, देशी grasslands हैं वर्चस्व by बारहमासी गुच्छा ग्रास प्रजाति, whereas in warmer climates annual species form a greater component of the vegetation.
grasslands हैं मिला in most ecoregions of the Earth.
For example there are five terrestrial ecoregion classifications ( subdivisions ) of the शीतोष्ण grasslands, savannas, और shrublands बायोम ( ' ecosystem ' ), which is one of eight terrestrial ecozones of the Earth 's surface.
Henna ( Lawsonia inermis, also called हिना पेड़ ) or हिना is a flowering संयंत्र, the एकमात्र प्रजाति in the genus Lawsonia in the family Lythraceae.
The English नाम `` हिना '' आता इससे the Arabic ( ALA-LC : ḥinnāʾ / pronounced ) or colloquially, loosely pronounced.
The name is also used for डाई preparations निकला इससे the संयंत्र, और लिये the art of temporary tattooing based on those dyes.
Henna has been used चूंकि प्राचीनता to डाई स्किन, बाल, और fingernails, as खूब as fabrics including Silk, wool and leather.
additionally, the नाम is misused लिये अन्य स्किन और बाल dyes, such as black henna or neutral henna, which are not derived from the plant.
A thin film is a layer of material ranging from भिन्नों of a nanometer ( monolayer ) to several micrometers in thickness.
Electronic semiconductor devices and optical coatings are the main अनुप्रयोग लाभकारी इससे thin-film निर्माण.
A familiar application of thin films is the household mirror, which typically has a thin metal coating on the वापस of a चादर of कांच to रूप a परावर्तक interface.
The process of silvering was once commonly प्रयुक्त to उपज mirrors.
A very-thin-film coating ( less than a nanometer मोटा ) is प्रयुक्त to उपज two-way mirrors.
The performance of optical coatings ( e.g. antireflective, or AR, coatings ) are typically उन्नत जब the thin-film कोटिंग consists of अनेक परतों having varying thicknesses and refractive indices.
Similarly, a periodic structure of alternating thin films of different materials may collectively form a so-called superlattice which exploits the घटना of क्वांटम कारावास by restricting electronic phenomena to two-dimensions.
Work is being done with ferromagnetic और ferroelectric पतला films for use as computer memory.
It is also होने लागू to दवाएँ, via thin-film drug delivery.
Thin-films are used to produce thin-film बैटरी.
Thin films हैं भी प्रयुक्त in dye-sensitized solar cells.
सिरेमिक पतला films are in wide use.
The relatively high hardness and inertness of सिरेमिक सामग्री मेक इस प्रकार of पतला कोटिंग of ब्याज लिये सुरक्षा of substrate materials against corrosion, oxidation and wear.
In particular, the use of such coatings on कटिंग टूल्स can extend the जीवन of ये वस्तुएं by several orders of magnitude.
Research is being done on a new class of thin-film अकार्बनिक ऑक्साइड सामग्री, पुकारा amorphous heavy-metal cation multicomponent आक्साइड, which could be used to make transparent transistors that are inexpensive, stable, and environmentally benign.
Gears of War is a सैन्य विज्ञान fiction third-person शूटर वीडियो खेल विकसित by एपिक खेल and published by Microsoft Game Studios.
It was initially released as an विशेष शीर्षक लिये the एक्सबॉक्स 360 in नवम्बर 2005 in उत्तर अमेरिका, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, और सबसे of Europe and included a `` Limited Collector 's Edition '' with added content and an art book titled Destroyed Beauty that detailed much of the game 's back-story.
Despite the initial statements of Xbox 360 exclusivity, a Microsoft Windows version of the खेल थी विकसित in संयोजन साथ लोगों can मक्खी और released a साल बाद, featuring नई सामग्री सहित additional campaign levels, a new multiplayer game mode, and Games for Windows Live functionality.
The game focuses on the troops of Delta Squad as वे wield a हताश, last-ditch attempt to save the remaining human inhabitants of the fictional planet Sera from a relentless and seemingly unstoppable subterranean enemy known as the Locust Horde.
The player assumes the भूमिका of मार्कस fenix ( लकिन can भी खेल as डोमिनिक सैंटियागो ), a पूर्व prisoner and war-hardened soldier.
The game is based on the use of cover and रणनीतिक आग लिये the खिलाड़ी to अग्रिम through the scenarios ; a दूसरी खिलाड़ी can play cooperatively through the main campaign to assist.
The खेल भी सुविधाएँ अनेक ऑनलाइन multiplayer game modes for up to eight players.
Gears of War sold over three लाख नक़ल in बस टेन सप्ताह और थी the fastest-selling video game of 2005 as well as the second-most played game over Xbox Live during.
It currently stands as the 5th best selling एक्सबॉक्स 360 खेल of सब समय.
The game has since sold over पाँच लाख नक़ल by सितंबर 2008.
The game was well received by critics, who praised its gameplay and detailed visuals, और it जीती अनेक `` खेल of the साल '' awards in 2006.
The success of the game has led to the development of the Gears of War मताधिकार, सहित the 2008 sequel गियर्स of युद्ध 2 और इसके follow-up, Gears of War 3, which was released on September 20, 2011, after having initially been set to have been released on April 5, 2011, the date upon which Epic Games ' Cliff Bleszinski was a guest on Late Night with Jimmy Fallon.
Adaptations to books, कॉमिक्स, as खूब as a विशेषता फिल्मी are to be expected.
A Tree Grows in Brooklyn is a 1943 novel लिखा by बेट्टी स्मिथ.
The story focuses on an irish-american परिवार in williamsburg, Brooklyn, New York City.
The novel is set in the first and second दशकों of the 20th सदी.
The book was an immense कामयाबी.
The main metaphor of the book is the hardy Tree of Heaven, native to China और ताईवान, अभी माना हृदयरोग, और आम in the vacant lots of New York City.
World map साथ the intertropical zone highlighted in red.
Tropical climate zones of the Earth where all twelve months have mean temperatures ऊपर 18 °c ( 64 °F ).
The tropics is a region of the धरती surrounding the Equator.
It is limited in latitude by the tropic of कर्कट in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध at approximately N and the Tropic of Capricorn in the southern hemisphere at S ; these latitudes correspond to the axial tilt of the Earth.
The tropics are also referred to as the तीव्र मण्डल और the torrid मण्डल ( देखिए भौगोलिक zone ).
The tropics include all the areas on the Earth जहाँ the सूर्य पहुँच a पाइंट सीधे ओवरहेड at तनिक एकबार during the solar year.
The tropics are distinguished from the other climatic and biomatic regions of Earth, the मध्य latitudes और the ध्रुवीय regions on either side of the equatorial zone.

`` What You need '' is an एपीसोड of the American television anthology series The Twilight Zone.
It is based on the short story of the same name by Lewis Padgett ( Henry kuttner और C. L. मूर ).
PlayhouseSquare, in the Cleveland Theater District in downtown Cleveland, Ohio, is the second-largest थिएटर जटिल in the संयुक्त राज्य, दूसरी तभी to New York City 's Lincoln Center ).
Constructed in a span of 19 months in the early 1920s, the theaters were subsequently बंद bas, लकिन यहूद revived through a grassroots effort.
Their renovation and reopening helped usher in a new era of downtown revitalization in Cleveland, और थी पुकारा `` एक of the शीर्ष टेन सफलताओं in Cleveland history. ''
The driver and passenger front airbags, after having महरूम तैनात, in a अंग्रेजों Peugeot 306 car.
An एयरबैग is a गाडी safety device.
It is an occupant संयम प्रणाली consisting of a लचीली कपड़ा लिफाफा or cushion designed to inflate rapidly during an automobile collision.
Its purpose is to cushion occupants during a क्रैश और provide सुरक्षा to उनके लाशें जब वे स्ट्राइक interior objects such as the steering wheel or a window.
Modern vehicles may contain multiple airbag modules in various side and frontal locations of the passenger seating positions, and sensors may deploy one or अधिक airbags in an प्रभाव मण्डल at परिवर्तनीय दरों आधारित on the प्रकार, कोण और गंभीरता of प्रभाव ; the airbag is designed to only inflate in moderate to severe frontal crashes.
Airbags are normally designed with the intention of supplementing the protection of an occupant who is correctly restrained with a seatbelt.
Most designs are inflated through pyrotechnic means और can तभी be संचालित once.
Newer side-impact airbag modules consist of compressed air cylinders that are triggered in the इवेंट of a पक्ष प्रभाव vehicle impact.
The first commercial designs यहूद introduced in यात्री ऑटोमोबाइल दौरान the 1970s with limited success.
Broad commercial adoption of airbags occurred in many markets during the late 1980s and early 1990s with a driver airbag, और a सामने यात्री एयरबैग as खूब on कुछ गाड़ियाँ ; और अनेक आधुनिक वाहनों अभी शामिल चार or more units.
IRS tax forms are used for taxpayers and tax-exempt संगठन to रपट वित्तीय सूचना to the Internal Revenue Service ( IRS ) of the United States.
They are used to report income, calculate taxes to be paid to the संघीय सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य, और ज़ाहिर अन्य सूचना as required by the Internal Revenue Code ( IRC ).
There are over 800 विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म और schedules.
the best-known of ये is Form 1040 used by individuals.
In the संयुक्त राज्य, ड्राइवर 's पंक्तियां हैं जारी by प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत state ( including Washington, D.C. and territories ), rather than the federal government because of the political concept of federalism.
ड्राइवर हैं सामान्यतः जरूरी to obtain a अनुज्ञा इससे their state of residence and all states recognize each other 's licenses for temporary visitors subject to normal age requirements.
A राज्य may भी बर्खास्तगी an व्यक्तिगत 's driving privilege within its borders for traffic violations.
Many राज्य share a आम प्रणाली of अनुज्ञा वर्ग, साथ कुछ अपवाद, और वाणिज्यिक अनुज्ञा classes are standardized by federal regulation at 49 CFR part 383.
China has been the source of many inventions, including the Four Great Inventions : papermaking, the compass, बारूद, और मुद्रण ( दोनो woodblock और movable type ).
The list नीचे contains these and other inventions.
The Chinese invented technologies involving mechanics, hydraulics, और गणित लागू to horology, metallurgy, खगोलशास्त्र, कृषि, अभियान्त्रिकी, म्यूज़िक theory, craftsmanship, nautics, and warfare.
By the Warring States Period ( 403–221 BC ), they had उन्नत metallurgic प्रौद्योगिकी, सहित the धमाका भट्टी और cupola furnace, while the finery forge and puddling process were known by the Han Dynasty ( 202 BC – AD 220 ).
A sophisticated economic प्रणाली in चीन दिया जनम to आविष्कारों such as paper money during the Song Dynasty ( 960–1279 ).
The invention of gunpowder by the 10th सदी led to an सरणी of आविष्कारों ऐसे as the आग तलवार, जमीन मेरा, नवल mine, hand cannon, exploding cannonballs, multistage rocket, and rocket bombs with aerodynamic wings and explosive payloads.
With the navigational aid of the 11th-century कम्पास और क्षमता to steer at ऊँची समुद्र साथ the 1st-century sternpost rudder, premodern Chinese sailors sailed as far as East Africa and Egypt.
In water-powered clockworks, the premodern Chinese had used the escapement mechanism since the 8th सदी और the अंतहीन power-transmitting कड़ी ड्राइव in the 11th century.
They also made large mechanical कठपुतली थिएटर चलित by waterwheels और carriage पहियों और wine-serving automatons driven by paddle wheel boats.
The contemporaneous Peiligang and pengtoushan संस्कृतियों represent the oldest पाषाणकालीन cultures of China and were formed around 7000 BC.
Some of the first inventions of Neolithic, prehistoric China include semilunar and rectangular stone knives, stone hoes और हुकुम, the cultivation of बाजरा, राइस और the सोयाबीन, the refinement of sericulture, the भवन of rammed धरती structures साथ लाइम -plastered हाउस floors, the सृष्टि of the कुम्हार 's व्हील, the सृष्टि of pottery with cord-mat-basket designs, the creation of pottery tripods and pottery steamers, and the development of ceremonial vessels and scapulimancy for purposes of divination.
Francesca Bray argues that the domestication of the ox and buffalo during the longshan संस्कृति ( c. 3000–c. 2000 bc ) काल, the अनुपस्थिति of longshan-era सिंचाई or high-yield फसलों, पूरा प्रमाण of longshan cultivation of dry-land खाद्यान्न फसलों जिससे gave high yields `` only when the soil was carefully cultivated, '' suggest that the plow was known at least by the Longshan culture period and explains the high agricultural production yields which allowed the rise of Chinese civilization during the Shang Dynasty ( c. 1600–c. 1050 BC ).
With later inventions such as the multiple-tube seed drill and heavy moldboard iron plow, China 's agricultural आउटपुट could sustain a much larger जनसांख्यिकी.
For the purposes of this list, inventions are regarded as technological firsts विकसित in चीन, और as ऐसे करता नहीं शामिल foreign technologies which the Chinese acquired through contact, such as the windmill from the Middle East or the telescope from Early modern Europe.
It also does not include technologies developed elsewhere और बाद invented separately by the Chinese, such as the odometer and chain pump.
Scientific, mathematic or natural discoveries, परिवर्तन in नाबालिग अवधारणाओं of डिज़ाइन or स्टाइल और कलाकारी innovations can not be regarded as inventions and do not appear on the list.
