Globalization ( or globalisation—see स्पेलिंग मतभेद ) is the प्रक्रम of अंतरराष्ट्रीय संयोजन arising from the interchange of world views, products, ideas, and other aspects of culture.
Put in simple terms, globalization refers to प्रक्रियाओं कि प्रचार world-wide exchanges of national and cultural resources.
Advances in transportation and दूरसंचार अवसंरचना, सहित the वृद्धि of the अंतरजाल, हैं major factors in globalization, generating further interdependence of economic and cultural activities.
Though several scholars place the origins of globalization in आधुनिक टाइम्स, अन्य ट्रेस इसके इतिहास long पहले the European age of discovery and voyages to the New World.
Some even ट्रेस the origins to the third millennium BCE.
Since the शुरूआत of the 20th सदी, the pace of वैश्वीकरण रै intensified at a rapid rate, especially during the Post Cold War era.
The term वैश्वीकरण रै महरूम in increasing उपयोग चूंकि the mid-1980s and especially since the mid-1990s.
In 2000, the International Monetary Fund ( IMF ) identified four basic aspects of globalization : trade and ट्रांजेक्शन, पूंजी और निवेश आंदोलनों, माइग्रेशन और गति of लोगों और the dissemination of knowledge.
Further, environmental challenges such as climate change, cross-boundary जल और एयर pollution, and over-fishing of the ocean are linked with globalization.
Globalizing processes affect and are affected by कारोबार और कार्य संगठन, अर्थशास्त्र, socio-cultural resources, and the natural environment.
The replacements is a 2000 अमरीकी खेल कॉमेडी फिल्मी directed by Howard Deutch.
It stars कियानू रीव्स, जीन hackman, and Brooke Langton.
An American Airlines वायुयान takes बंद इससे dallas/fort Worth International Airport.
This विमानक्षेत्र is the airline 's largest hub.
American Airlines flies to 79 domestic गंतव्यों और 78 अंतरराष्ट्रीय destinations in 48 countries.
( as of December 2012 )
The list includes the city, country, the codes of the International Air Transport Association ( IATA airport code ) and the International Civil Aviation Organization ( ICAO airport code ), और the विमानक्षेत्र 's नाम, साथ the एयरलाइन 's hubs, फ़ोकस cities and seasonal destinations marked.
The list also contains गंतव्यों no longer परोसा by the एयरलाइन, जिससे हैं marked as terminated destinations.
It does not include destinations served for American Airlines by its regional affiliates अमरीकी त्रिभुज एयरलाइंस, कार्यपालिका एयरलाइंस, and AmericanConnection.
`` Day-O ( The Banana Boat Song ) '' is a traditional Jamaican mento folk song, the best-known version of which was sung by Harry belafonte और an वैकल्पिक संस्करण interspersed साथ another jamaican folksong, Hill and Gully Rider, by Dame Shirley Bassey.
Despite the song 's mento प्रभाव, `` day-o ( the banana Boat Song ) '' is widely known as an example of calypso music.
It is a work song, from the point of view of dock workers working the night शिफ़्ट लदान केले onto जहाजों.
Daylight has आइये, the शिफ़्ट is over और वे want उनके work to be counted up so that they can go home.
संसार युद्ध i ( wwi ) थी a वैश्विक युद्ध centred in Europe that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
it थी predominantly पुकारा the संसार युद्ध or the Great War from its occurrence until the start of World War II in 1939, and the First World War or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom, France और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल गठबंधन of जर्मनी, austria-hungary और इटली ; लकिन, as austria–hungary था लिया the offensive against the agreement, Italy did not enter into the war ).
ये alliances यहूद दोनो reorganised और विस्तारित as अधिक राष्ट्र entered the war : Italy, Japan and the United States joined the Allies, and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 लाख सैन्य कर्मियों, सहित 60 लाख Europeans, were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of हथियार बगैर सम्बन्धित सुधार in सुरक्षा or गतिशीलता.
It was the fifth- deadliest विरोध in संसार इतिहास, subsequently paving the way for various political changes, such as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
एक of the long-term कल्याणकारी of the war was the resurgence of imperialism in the foreign policies of the great powers of Europe.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, the heir to the throne of austria-hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the पिछला दशकों यहूद invoked.
Within weeks, the major powers were at war and, via उनके colonies, the विरोध जल्द स्प्रेड around the world.
On 28 July, the austro-hungarians fired the पहला गोलियाँ of the war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and ध्वज on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the पश्चिमी सामने settled into a स्थिर बैटल of अपघर्षण साथ a गर्त line that changed little until 1917.
on the पूर्वी सामने, the रूसी फौज थी कामयाब विरूद्ध the Austro-Hungarians, but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans.
In November the उस्मानी साम्राज्य joined the युद्ध, खोलने up fronts in the Caucasus, Mesopotamia and the Sinai.
इटली और बुल्गारिया went to war in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in November brought the russians to शर्तें साथ the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front, the allies drove वापस the germans in a श्रेणी of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had its own trouble with क्रांतिकारियों, सहमत to an armistice on 11 नवम्बर 1918.
The war ended in victory लिये the allies.
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts, as the भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति and economic resources to fight a total war.
By the end of the युद्ध, चार प्रमुख इम्पीरियल powers—the German, Russian, Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the पूर्व दो खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of central यूरोपीय थी redrawn into several smaller states.
The लीग of राष्ट्र थी formed in the hope of preventing another such conflict.
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires, the परखना of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और समस्याएं साथ the सन्धि of versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II.
Nurse Jackie is an American series that premiered on June 8, 2009, on showtime, फिल्म सेंट्रल और the फिल्म संजाल.
The series stars Edie Falco as the title character Jackie Peyton, an emergency department nurse at सब संतो ' हॉस्पिटल in नई यॉर्क City.
For Jackie, `` प्रत्येक दिन is a ऊँची तार अधिनियम of juggling patients, doctors, fellow nurses and her own indiscretions. ''
Keeping Up with the kardashians ( प्रायः referred to बस as the kardashians ) is an अमरीकी वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न series that premiered on October 14, 2007, on E !.
It follows the lives of the Kardashian/Jenner परिवार, सहित बहनों कोर्टनी, किम, and Khloé Kardashian.
The series ' success has led to the spin-offs कोर्टनी और किम लो नई यॉर्क, Khloé & Lamar, Kourtney and Khloé Take Miami, and Kourtney and Kim Take Miami.
Afghanistan ( ; ; ), officially the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan, is a landlocked sovereign राज्य forming भाग of दक्षिण Asia, Central Asia, and to some extent Western Asia.
It has a population of around 30 लाख inhabiting an क्षेत्रफल of approximately, making it the 42nd most populous and 41st largest nation in the world.
It is bordered by Pakistan in the south and the east, Iran in the west, तुर्कमेनिस्तान, उज़्बेकिस्तान और ताजिकिस्तान in the उत्तर, और China in the far northeast.
Afghanistan has been an ancient focal point of the रेशा सड़क और इंसान माइग्रेशन.
Archaeologists have found evidence of human habitation इससे as दूर वापस as the मध्य Paleolithic.
Urban civilization may have begun in the क्षेत्रफल as जल्दी as 3,000 to 2,000 BCE.
Sitting at an महत्वपूर्ण geostrategic स्थान कि connects the मध्य ईस्ट संस्कृति साथ सेंट्रल एशिया and the Indian subcontinent, the land has been home to various peoples through the ages and witnessed many military campaigns, notably by Alexander the Great, Genghis Khan, and in modern era Western forces.
The land also served as a source from which the Greco-Bactrians, Kushans, hephthalites, saffarids, ghaznavids, ghorids, khiljis, timurids, मुगलों, Durranis, and others have risen to form major empires.
The political history of the modern state of Afghanistan begins in 1709, when the Hotaki dynasty was established in Kandahar followed by Ahmad Shah दुर्रानी 's वृद्धि to शक्ति in 1747.
In the late 19th century, अफगानिस्तान became a बफ़र राज्य in the `` Great Game `` between the British and Russian empires.
Following the 1919 Anglo-Afghan War, King Amanullah began a European style modernization of the country but थी रोका by the ultra-conservatives.
During the Cold War, after the withdrawal of the British from neighboring India in 1947, the United States and the Soviet Union began spreading प्रभाव in अफगानिस्तान, जिससे led to a खूनी युद्ध between the us-backed मुजाहिदीन शक्तियां और the soviet-backed अफगान सरकारी in which over a million Afghans lost their lives.
This was followed by the 1990s सिविल युद्ध, the वृद्धि and fall of the extremist Taliban government and the 2001–present war.
In December 2001, the United Nations Security Council authorized the creation of the International Security Assistance Force ( ISAF ) to help maintain सुरक्षा in अफगानिस्तान और assist the करज़ई प्रशासन.
Three decades of war made Afghanistan one of the world 's most dangerous countries, सहित the largest निर्माता of शरणार्थियों and asylum seekers.
While the international community is rebuilding war-torn Afghanistan, terrorist groups such as the हक्कानी संजाल और hezbi islami हैं actively शामिल in a देशभर तालिबान -led उग्रवाद, which includes hundreds of assassinations and suicide attacks.
According to the संयुक्त राष्ट्र, the insurgents यहूद जिम्मेदार लिये 80 % of civilian casualties in 2011 and 2012.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ), was a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य कि घोषित उनके secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery, especially the एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the पश्चिमी territories.
Foreign powers किया नहीं intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना, the confederacy collapsed, गुलामी थी abolished, और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential election, Republicans, led by अब्राहम lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त States ' territories.
Lincoln won, but पहले उसके उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the आवक republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural पता घोषित his administration would not initiate civil war.
Eight remaining स्लेव राज्य जारी to अस्वीकृत काल्स for secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to find a compromise, and दोनो पहलू prepared लिये युद्ध.
The Confederates assumed कि यूरोपीय देशों यहूद so निर्भर on `` किंग Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट sumter, a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each राज्य to provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन, four more slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon controlled the border states and स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी कि अबोध the दक्षिणी economy.
The Eastern Theater थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
lincoln जारी the emancipation उदघोषणा, which made ending slavery a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy, then much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना, और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western सफलताओं led to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of सब संघ armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the समुद्र, destroying confederate अवसंरचना along the way.
The Union marshaled the संसाधन और जनशक्ति to आक्रमण the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश, और could afford to लड़ो battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, leading to Lee 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at Appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
The American सिविल युद्ध थी एक of the earliest true industrial wars.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, and mass-produced हथियार यहूद employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, banks, transportation और खाना आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed संसार War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American history, resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा, और 30 प्रतिशत of सब दक्षिणी श्वेत males aged 18–40.
Cost of goods बेची ( cogs ) refer to the inventory लागत of those goods a business has sold during a particular period.
Costs are associated with particular goods using one of अनेक formulas, सहित विशिष्ट पहचान, first-in first-out ( FIFO ), or average cost.
Costs include all costs of purchase, costs of conversion and other लागत incurred in bringing the inventories to उनके present location and condition.
Costs of goods made by the business include सामग्री, मजदूर, और allocated overhead.
The costs of those goods not yet sold are deferred as costs of inventory जबतक the inventory is बेची or written down in value.
Freak Lunchbox कैंडी स्टोर in Halifax, Nova Scotia
A confectionery store ( more commonly referred to as a मीठी दूकान in the संयुक्त किंगडम, a कैंडी स्टोर in the उत्तर America, or a lolly shop in Australia ) sells confectionery and is usually targeted to children.
Most confectionery stores are filled with an assortment of मिठाई दूर larger than a पंसारी or convenience स्टोर could accommodate.
वे प्रायः प्रस्ताव a चयन of old fashioned treats, and sweets from different countries.
Very often अपरिवर्तित in लेआउट since their inception, confectioneries are known for their warming and nostalgic feel.
The village of Pateley Bridge claims to have the oldest confectionery स्टोर in England.
The oldest sweet shop in इंग्लैण्ड, in the गाँव of pateley Bridge
Oklahoma ( ) ( Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa, cay : gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a राज्य स्तिथ in West South Central United States.
Oklahoma is the 20th most extensive and the 28th सबसे populous of the 50 संयुक्त राज्य.
The state 's name is derived from the Choctaw words okla and humma, अर्थ `` रेड लोगों '', और it is ज्ञात informally by its nickname, The Sooner State.
Formed by the संयोजन of ओक्लाहोमा territory और भारतीय Territory on November 16, 1907, Oklahoma was the 46th state to enter the union.
Its residents are known as Oklahomans or, informally `` Okies '', और इसके पूंजी और largest city is Oklahoma City.
A major producer of natural gas, oil, and कृषि, ओक्लाहोमा relies on an आर्थिक आधार of विमानन, energy, telecommunications, and biotechnology.
It has one of the fastest growing economies in the स्वदेश, रैंकिंग among the शीर्ष राज्य in प्रति capita आय growth and gross domestic product growth.
Oklahoma City and Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's primary economic anchors, साथ nearly दो तिहाई of oklahomans जीना भीतर उनके महानगर सांख्यिकीय areas.
With small mountain ranges, prairie, mesas, and eastern forests, most of Oklahoma झूठ in the ग्रेट मैदान और the u.s. Interior Highlands —a region especially prone to severe weather.
In addition to having a prevalence of English, German, Scottish, Irish and Native American ancestry, more than 25 देशी अमरीकी भाषाएं हैं बोला in ओक्लाहोमा, दूसरी तभी to कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
Oklahoma is located on a confluence of three major American cultural regions and historically served as a route for cattle drives, a गंतव्य लिये दक्षिणी settlers, और a government-sanctioned territory for Native Americans.
stacked और खड़ा car tires
A tire ( or टायर ) is a ring-shaped covering कि fits around a wheel 's rim to protect it and enable better vehicle performance.
Most टायर, ऐसे as those लिये ऑटोमोबाइल और साइकिल, provide traction between the vehicle and the road while providing a flexible cushion that absorbs shock.
The materials of modern pneumatic tires are synthetic rubber, natural rubber, fabric and तार, साथ साथ कार्बन ब्लैक और अन्य रासायनिक compounds.
They consist of a tread और a body.
The tread provides traction जबकि the देह provides containment for a quantity of compressed air.
Before rubber was developed, the first versions of tires were simply bands of metal that fitted around लकड़ी पहियों to prevent पहनें और आंसू.
Early rubber tires were ठोस ( नहीं न्यूमेटिक ).
Today, the majority of tires are pneumatic inflatable structures, comprising a doughnut-shaped body of cords and wires encased in rubber and generally filled with compressed air to form an inflatable cushion.
Pneumatic tires are used on many types of वाहनों, सहित cars, bicycles, motorcycles, trucks, earthmovers, and aircraft.
Metal tires are still used on इंजनों और railcars, और ठोस रबर ( or other polymer ) tires are still used in various non-automotive applications, such as some casters, carts, lawnmowers, and wheelbarrows.
Dr. Joseph Warren ( June 11, 1741 – June 17, 1775 ) was an American doctor who निभाई a अग्रणी भूमिका in अमरीकी patriot संगठन in बोस्टन in जल्दी दिनों of the अमरीकी क्रान्ति, आखिरकार सेवारत as अध्यक्ष of the revolutionary Massachusetts Provincial Congress.
Warren enlisted Paul Revere और विलियम dawes on अप्रैल 18, 1775, to छोड़ बोस्टन और स्प्रेड the सचेतक कि the अंग्रेजों गैरीसन in बोस्टन was setting out to raid the town of Concord and arrest rebel leaders John Hancock and Samuel Adams.
Warren participated in the next day 's Battles of Lexington and concord, जिससे हैं commonly माना to be the opening engagements of the American Revolutionary War.
Warren had been commissioned a Major General in the उपनिवेश 's मिलिशिया shortly पहले the जून 17, 1775 Battle of Bunker Hill.
Rather than exercising his रैंक, वारेन परोसा in the बैटल as a निजी सिपाही, और थी killed in combat when British troops stormed the redoubt atop Breed 's Hill.
His death, immortalized in John Trumbull 's painting, The Death of सामान्य वारेन at the बैटल of बंकर 's हिल, जून 17, 1775, जस्ती the rebel forces, and he has been memorialized in many place names in the United States.

An organic semiconductor is an organic material with semiconductor गुण, कि is, साथ an विद्युत चालकता between कि of insulators and that of metals.
सिंगल अणुओं, short chain ( oligomers ) and organic polymers can be semiconductive.
Semiconducting small molecules ( aromatic hydrocarbons ) include the polycyclic aromatic यौगिकों pentacene, anthracene, and rubrene.
Polymeric organic semiconductors include poly ( 3-hexylthiophene ), बहु ( p-phenylene vinylene ), as well as polyacetylene and its derivatives.
There are two प्रमुख अतिव्यापी वर्ग of organic semiconductors.
These are organic charge-transfer complexes and various linear-backbone conductive polymers निकला इससे polyacetylene.
Linear backbone organic semiconductors शामिल polyacetylene itself and its derivatives polypyrrole, and polyaniline.
At least locally, charge-transfer complexes often exhibit समान conduction mechanisms to अकार्बनिक semiconductors.
Such mechanisms arise from the presence of hole and electron conduction परतों अलग by a band gap.
While such classic mechanisms are महत्वपूर्ण locally, as साथ अकार्बनिक amorphous semiconductors, tunnelling, localized states, mobility gaps, and phonon -assisted hopping also significantly contribute to conduction, particularly in polyacetylenes.
Like inorganic semiconductors, सशुल्क semiconductors can be doped.
Organic semiconductors susceptible to doping ऐसे as polyaniline ( ormecon ) और हैं भी ज्ञात as organic metals.
Typical current carriers in organic semiconductors हैं छेद और electrons in π-bonds.
लगभग सब सशुल्क solids are insulators.
But when their constituent molecules have π-conjugate systems, electrons can मूव via π-electron बादल overlaps, विशेषकर by hopping, tunnelling and related mechanisms.
Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons and phthalocyanine नमक crystals हैं उदाहरण of इस प्रकार of सशुल्क semiconductor.
Mainly due to low mobility, even unpaired electrons may be stable in charge-transfer देवालय.
Such unpaired electrons can फलन as वर्तमान वाहक.
This type of semiconductor is also obtained by pairing an electron donor molecule with an इलेक्ट्रॉन acceptor अणु.
Female ejaculation is the expulsion of द्रव by इंसान महिलाओं इससे the paraurethral नलिकाएं through और around the मादा urethra during or before an orgasm.
It is also known colloquially as gushing or squirting, although these are माना to be अलग phenomena in कुछ research publications.
The exact source and nature of the द्रव continue to be a टॉपिक of बहस among medical professionals, which is also related to doubts over the existence of the G-Spot.
The FIFA Women 's World Cup is an international association football competition contested by the senior women 's नेशनल टीमों of the सदस्यों of fédération internationale de फ़ुटबॉल संघ ( फीफा ), the खेल 's global governing body.
The championship has been awarded every four years चूंकि the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1991.
Japan won the 2011 tournament in a दंड गोलीबारी.
The current format of the tournament involves 16 teams competing for the title at venues within the host nation ( s ) over a period of about तीन सप्ताह ; – इस phase is प्रायः called the World Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, which currently takes place over the preceding three years, is used to determine जिससे टीमों qualify लिये the tournament together with the host nation ( s ).
The FIFA Women 's World Cup is recognized as the most important अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रतियोगिता in महिलाओं 's फ़ुटबॉल और is निभाई amongst महिलाओं 's नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल टीमों of the member states of FIFA, the sport 's global governing body.
The first Women 's World Cup tournament, named the Women 's World Championship, was held in 1991, sixty-one सालो बाद the मेन 's पहला फीफा संसार कप टूर्नामेंट in 1930.
The six World Cup tournaments have महरूम जीती by four different national teams.
The next संसार कप होगा be hosted by Canada in 2015.

'Son of man ' is the translation of various यहूदी और यूनानी वाक्यांश प्रयुक्त in both the Hebrew Bible and the New Testament.
It has diverse meanings, ranging from a सामान्य इंसान होने to a prophesied eternal, divine ruler.
The Hebrew expression `` son of man '' ( בן–אדם i.e. ben-'adam ) appears एक सौ and seven times in the Hebrew Bible.
This is the most common Hebrew निर्माण लिये the एकवचन लकिन is प्रयुक्त ज़्यादातर in ezekiel ( 93 टाइम्स ) और 14 times elsewhere.
In thirty two मामले the phrase appears in इंटरमीडिएट plural form `` sons of men '', i.e. human beings.
As generally interpreted by यहूदियों, it denotes humankind generally.
In the Koine Greek of the New Testament, `` the बेटे of man '' is invariably used as `` ὁ υἱὸς τοὺ ἀνθρώπου '' with a definite article.
The use of the definite आलेख in `` the बेटे of man '' in the ईसाई gospels is अनोखा, और पहले इसके उपयोग वहीँ, no रिकॉर्ड of its use in any of the surviving Greek documents of antiquity exist.
Geza Vermes has stated that `` the Son of man '' in the ईसाई gospels is unrelated to यहूदी बाइबल usages.
In Christian उपयोग, नापसंद the बेटे of परमेश्वर शीर्षक, जिससे रै महरूम an essential element of Christian creeds since the Apostolic age, the proclamation of `` Jesus as the Son of man '' has never been an article of faith in Christianity.
the निर्वचन of the उपयोग of `` the बेटे of man '' in the New Testament has remained challenging and after 150 years of debate no consensus on the issue has emerged among scholars.
Master of foxhounds leads the फ़ील्ड इससे powderham किला in Devon, England, with the hounds in front.
Fox hunting is an activity involving the tracking, chase, and sometimes हत्या of a फॉक्स, traditionally a रेड फॉक्स, by प्रशिक्षित foxhounds or अन्य सैंट hounds, and a group of unarmed followers led by a master of foxhounds, who follow the hounds on foot or on horseback.
Fox hunting originated in the form practised until recently in the संयुक्त किंगडम in the 16th सदी, लकिन is practised सब over the संसार, सहित in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, Canada, France, Ireland, Italy and the United States.
In Australia, the term also refers to the शिकार of foxes साथ firearms समान to spotlighting or deer hunting.
In much of the world hunting in general is understood to relate to any game animals or weapons ( e.g., हिरण शिकार साथ धनुष और तीर ) ; in ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड, `` शिकार '' बगैर qualification implies fox hunting ( or other forms of hunting with hounds- beagling, stag hunting, mink hunting, drag hunting or hunting the clean boot ) as described here.
The sport is विवादास्पद, विशेषकर in the uk, जहाँ it थी बैन in स्कॉटलैंड in 2002, और in इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स in November 2004 ( law enforced from February 2005 ), though shooting foxes as vermin remained legal.
Proponents of फॉक्स शिकार दृश्य it as an महत्वपूर्ण भाग of ग्रामीण संस्कृति and useful for reasons of conservation and pest control, while opponents argue that it is cruel and unnecessary.
Tobacco advertising is the विज्ञापन of तम्बाकू उत्पाद or उपयोग ( typically सिगरेट धूम्रपान ) by the तम्बाकू industry through a variety of media including sponsorship, particularly of sporting events.
It is now one of the most highly regulated फ़ॉर्म of marketing.
Some or all forms of तम्बाकू विज्ञापन are banned in many countries.
Bally Technologies, Inc. is a manufacturer of slot मशीने और अन्य गेमिंग प्रौद्योगिकी based in Las Vegas, Nevada.
The company was founded in 1968 as उन्नत पेटेंट Technology.
It eventually changed its name to Alliance Gaming and acquired, in 1996, बल्ली गेमिंग अंतरराष्ट्रीय, a पूर्व प्रभाग of बल्ली Manufacturing.
in 2006, the संपूर्ण company adopted the Bally name, a trademark that originated in 1932 by the Bally Manufacturing Corporation.
Gustave Doré 's engravings illustrated the Divine Comedy ( 1861–1868 ) ; यहाँ, दांते is खोया in canto 1 of the Inferno.
inferno ( इतालवी लिये `` Hell `` ) is the first part of Dante Alighieri 's 14th-century epic poem Divine Comedy.
It is followed by purgatorio and Paradiso.
It is an allegory telling of the यात्रा of Dante through Hell, guided by the Roman poet Virgil.
in the कविता, Hell is depicted as nine circles of suffering located within the Earth.
Allegorically, the दैवी कॉमेडी represents the यात्रा of the आत्मा towards God, with the Inferno describing the recognition and rejection of sin.
Smirnoff is a brand of vodka owned and produced by the अंग्रेजों कम्पनी diageo.
The Smirnoff brand began with a वोदका डिस्टिलरी संस्थापित in मास्को by Pyotr Arsenievich Smirnov ( 1831–1898 ).
It is now वितरित in 130 देशों.
It is produced in several countries including India, आयरलैंड, इटली, the संयुक्त किंगडम और the संयुक्त States.

In March 2006, Diageo North अमेरिका claimed कि स्मरनॉफ वोदका थी the best-selling distilled spirit brand in the world.

Bred by Dr. Gary B. Knapp 's Monticule Farms in lexington, केंटकी, he जीती उसके पहला पाँच race starts.

The serenity दुआ is the आम नाम लिये an originally untitled prayer by the American theologian Reinhold Niebuhr ( 1892–1971 ).
It has been adopted by alcoholics बेनाम और अन्य twelve-step programs.
The best-known form is : God, grant me the serenity to accept the things I can not change,
The courage to बदलें the things I can,
And wisdom to जान the अंतर.
The Declaration and Resolves of the First महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस ( भी ज्ञात as the घोषणा of औपनिवेशिक अधिकारों, or the घोषणा of अधिकारों ), थी a बयान अपनाया by the First Continental Congress on October 14, 1774, in response to the Intolerable Acts passed by the British Parliament.
The Declaration outlined औपनिवेशिक आपत्ति to the असहनीय अधिनियमों, सूचीबद्ध a colonial bill of rights, and provided a detailed list of grievances.
It was समान to the घोषणा of अधिकारों और Grievances, passed by the Stamp Act Congress a decade earlier.
The Declaration concluded with an outline of Congress 's योजनाएँ : to डालें into a बहिष्कार of अंग्रेजों व्यापार ( the महाद्वीपीय संघ ) जबतक उनके grievances यहूद redressed, to publish addresses to the people of Great Britain and British America, and to send a petition to the King.
Pulse pressure is the दबाव कि is लगा जब अहसास the pulse.
Measured in millimeters of mercury ( mmhg ), the दबाव अंतर between the systolic and diastolic pressures is the pressure change to create the pulse, which is the pulse pressure.
If resting blood pressure is ( systolic/diastolic ) 120/80 millimeters of पारा ( mmHg ), pulse pressure is 40.

The show uses a reality television format, following the personal lives of several young adults living in Los Angeles, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, लकिन tends towards a कथा स्वरूप अधिक commonly मिला in scripted जाति ऐसे as soap operas.
The series originally followed the निजी जीवन of पूर्व लगुना बीच स्टार लॉरेन कोनराड और उसके friends ' new lives in Los Angeles.
After five seasons, Conrad left the series and was replaced by another former Laguna Beach star, Kristin cavallari, शुरूआत in the दूसरी हाफ of the fifth season.
The series concluded at the समाप्त of the छठे ऋतु.

In poker, bad beat is a subjective पद लिये a हाथ in जिससे a player with what appear to be strong cards nevertheless loses.
It most often occurs where one player bets the clearly stronger हाथ and their opponent makes a poor call that eventually `` hits '' and wins.
There is no consensus among poker players as to what exactly constitutes a bad beat and often players होगा असहमत परिचय whether a particular हाथ थी a ख़राब ताल.
The goldfish ( Carassius auratus auratus ) is a freshwater मछली in the family Cyprinidae of order Cypriniformes.
It was one of the earliest मछली to be domesticated, and is one of the most commonly kept aquarium fish.
A relatively small member of the carp family ( which also includes the koi carp and the crucian carp ), the goldfish is a domesticated संस्करण of a less-colorful कार्प ( carassius auratus ) native to east Asia.
It was first domesticated in China more than a हजार सालो पहले, and several distinct breeds have since been developed.
Goldfish breeds vary greatly in size, body shape, fin configuration and coloration ( various combinations of white, पीला, नारंगी, रेड, भूरा, और ब्लैक हैं ज्ञात ).
Uncooked rouladen
Rouladen ( or Rinderroulade, singular : roulade ) is a German meat roulade usually consisting of bacon, onions, mustard and pickles wrapped in thinly sliced बीफ जिससे is then cooked.
In कुछ देशों, the roulade is also known as `` beef olive ''.
Beef or veal is used as meat though some food विद्वानों tend to मानना कि the असली संस्करण थी संभवतः venison or पोर्क, and pork is still popular in some areas.
The beef rouladen as we जान उन्हें आज have become popular over the last century.
The cut is usually topside बीफ or silverside चूंकि इस is the cheaper cut.
The more महंगी संस्करण होता be the round steak, also known as rump steak.
The मांस is काटें into विशाल, thin slices.
The filling is a mixture of smoked and cooked pork पेट, कटा प्याज और कटा अचार ( gurken ) जिससे is at times varied by adding minced meat, sausage meat, pine nuts and mustard.
The मिश्रण varies इससे प्रदेश to region.
Rouladen हैं traditionally served for dinner.
Red wine is प्रायः परोसा with this dish.
ठेठ eukaryotic cell.
सेल्यूलर श्वसन is the नियत of the metabolic प्रतिक्रियाएँ और प्रक्रियाओं that take place in the cells of organisms to convert biochemical energy from nutrients into adenosine triphosphate ( ATP ), and then release waste products.
The reactions involved in respiration are catabolic reactions, which break large अणुओं into छोटी ones, releasing उर्जा in the प्रक्रम as कमजोर so-called `` high-energy '' bonds हैं replaced by stronger bonds in the products.
श्वसन is एक of the कुंजी तरीके a कोशिका gains useful energy to fuel cellular activity.
Cellular respiration is माना an ऊष्माक्षेपी रेडॉक्स प्रतिक्रिया.
The overall reaction is broken into many smaller ones when it occurs in the देह, सबसे of जिससे हैं रेडॉक्स प्रतिक्रियाएँ themselves.
Although technically, cellular श्वसन is a दहन प्रतिक्रिया, it clearly करता नहीं resemble एक जब it occurs in a living cell.
This अंतर is क्युकी it occurs in many separate steps.
While the overall reaction is a दहन प्रतिक्रिया, no सिंगल प्रतिक्रिया कि comprises it is a combustion reaction.
Nutrients that are commonly used by animal and plant cells in respiration शामिल शुगर, अमीनो acids and fatty acids, and a common oxidizing agent ( electron acceptor ) is molecular oxygen ( O2 ).
The energy stored in ATP ( its third phosphate group is weakly bonded to the rest of the molecule and is cheaply टूटा allowing stronger bonds to रूप, thereby transferring उर्जा लिये उपयोग by the कोशिका ) can तब be प्रयुक्त to ड्राइव प्रक्रियाओं requiring उर्जा, सहित जैवसंश्लेषण, locomotion or transportation of molecules across cell membranes.
Countries by 2011 जीडीपी ( नाममात्र ) according to the CIA World Factbook.
This article शामिल a सूची of देशों in the संसार sorted by उनके सकल घरेलू product ( GDP ), the market value of all final goods and services from a nation in a given year.
The GDP dollar estimates प्रस्तुत यहाँ हैं calculated at market or government official exchange rates.
Several economies which are not माना to be देशों ( संसार, the eu, और कुछ dependent territories ) are included in the lists because they appear in the sources.
These economies are not ranked in the charts here, but are सूचीबद्ध जहाँ लागू.
The figures प्रस्तुत यहाँ do नहीं लो into खाता मतभेद in the लागत of जीना in अलग देशों, and the results can vary greatly from one year to another based on fluctuations in the exchange rates of the country 's currency.
Such fluctuations may change a country 's रैंकिंग इससे एक साल to the अगला, भी हालांकि वे प्रायः मेक छोटी or no difference to the standard of living of its population.
इसलिए ये आंकड़े should be used with caution.
Some countries/regions may have citizens which हैं on औसत wealthy.
These countries/regions could appear in this list as having a छोटी जीडीपी.
This would be because the country/region listed has a small जनसांख्यिकी, और इसलिए छोटी कुल अर्थव्यवस्था ; the जीडीपी is गणना as the population times the wealth per capita.
comparisons of नेशनल माल हैं भी अक्सर बना on the basis of purchasing power parity ( PPP ), to adjust for differences in the cost of living in different countries.
( See सूची of देशों by GDP ( PPP ) )
PPP largely removes the exchange rate problem, but has its own drawbacks ; it does not प्रतिबिंबित the मान of आर्थिक आउटपुट in अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार, और it भी requires अधिक estimation than nominal GDP.
On the whole, PPP per capita figures are अधिक narrowly स्प्रेड than नाममात्र GDP per capita figures.
The first list includes data compiled by the United राष्ट्र आंकडे प्रभाग for 2011.
The second list largely includes data ( estimate ) compiled by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Monetary Fund for 2012.
The third सूची shows the संसार बैंको 's ज़्यादातर 2011 estimates, and the fourth list includes mostly 2012 estimates from the CIA World Factbook.
Lapping is a machining प्रक्रम, in जिससे दो सतहों हैं मला साथ with an abrasive between them, by hand movement or by way of a machine.
This can लो two forms.
The first type of lapping ( traditionally called grinding ), typically involves rubbing a brittle material such as glass against a surface such as iron or glass itself ( भी ज्ञात as the `` गोद '' or पीस औजार ) साथ an अक्खड़ ऐसे as एल्यूमिनियम ऑक्साइड, जौहरियों 's रूज, optician 's rouge, emery, silicon carbide, diamond, etc., in between them.
This produces microscopic conchoidal fractures as the अक्खड़ रोल्स परिचय between the two surfaces and removes material from both.
The other form of lapping involves a softer सामग्री ऐसे as पिच or a ceramic for the lap, which is `` charged '' with the abrasive.
The गोद is तब used to cut a harder material—the workpiece.
The abrasive embeds within the softer material which holds it and permits it to स्कोर आरपार और काटें the harder सामग्री.
Taken to a finer limit, this will produce a polished surface such as साथ a पॉलिशिंग cloth on an ऑटोमोबाइल, or a पॉलिशिंग cloth or polishing pitch upon glass or steel.
Taken to the ultimate limit, with the aid of accurate interferometry और specialized पॉलिशिंग मशीने or skilled हाथ पॉलिशिंग, lensmakers can उपज सतहों कि are flat to better than 30 nanometers.
This is one twentieth of the wavelength of लाइट इससे the commonly used 632.8 nm helium neon laser light source.
Surfaces this flat can be molecularly bonded ( optically contacted ) by bringing उन्हें साथ अंतर्गत the सही conditions.
( This is not the same as the wringing प्रभाव of जोहानसन ब्लॉक, हालांकि it is similar ).
the पद `` अमेरिका 's टोली '' is a popular nickname in the United States that refers to the Dallas Cowboys in the National Football League.
The nickname originated with the team 's 1978 highlight film, where the narrator opens with the following परिचय : the पद is पहचाना और प्रायः प्रयुक्त by मीडिया आउटलेट, सहित ESPN, Yahoo !, HBO Sports, and Sports Illustrated.
My Babysitter 's a Vampire ( French : Ma gardienne est un पिशाच ) is a 2011 कनाडाई टेलीविज़न series, based on the television film of the same name.
In Canada, the series premiered in French on Télétoon on फ़रवरी 28, 2011, in अंग्रेज़ी on teletoon on कूच 14, 2011, and on Disney Channel in the United States on June 27, 2011.
The show was created by भैस tv, creators of 6teen and Total Drama.
The show follows Ethan Morgan ( Matthew Knight ), जो, in the टेलीविज़न फिल्मी, learns कि his babysitter Sarah ( Vanessa Morgan ) is a vampire.
In the film, he learns he is समर्थ to have visions और उसके बेहतरीन dost Benny Weir ( Atticus Mitchell ) is a spellmaster.
The series follows the three as they take on supernatural forces and have adventures, with occasional help इससे fellow vampires रोरी ( cameron कैनेडी ) और एरिका ( केट टॉड ), जबकि dealing with the troubles of regular high school life.

A pickup truck or pick-up, often simply referred to as a pickup, is a लाइट मोटर गाडी साथ an open-top, पश्च कार्गो क्षेत्रफल ( bed ).
In North America, the term pickup is used for light trucks with a lighter duty chassis and factory built, integrated bed, as खूब as लिये coupé यूटिलिटी वाहनों, प्रायः आधारित on a निजी car chassis, but also often on a special dedicated chassi for such use.
Some देशों have उनके अपना शर्तें समान to पिकअप, ऐसे as ute in ऑस्ट्रेलिया and New Zealand, or bakkie in South Africa.
Large pickup trucks are somewhat विरल in यूरोपीय, जहाँ वैन और light lorries are commonly used for similar roles.
The President of the United States of America ( POTUS ) is the सिर of राज्य और सिर of सरकारी of the United States.
The president leads the executive branch of the federal government and is the commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद शक्तियां.
Article II of the U.S. Constitution vests the executive power of the United States in the president and charges him with the execution of federal law, alongside the जिम्मेदारी of appointing संघीय कार्यपालिका, राजनयिक, नियामक, and judicial officers, and concluding treaties with foreign powers, with the advice and consent of the Senate.
The अध्यक्ष is further सशक्त to ग्रान्ट संघीय pardons and reprieves, and to convene and adjourn either or both houses of Congress under extraordinary circumstances.
Since the founding of the United States, the power of the president and the federal government have grown substantially और प्रत्येक आधुनिक अध्यक्ष, despite possessing no औपचारिक विधान शक्तियां परे हस्ताक्षर or vetoing congressionally passed बिल्स, is largely responsible for dictating the legislative agenda of his party and the foreign and domestic policy of the United States.
The president is frequently described as the सबसे शक्तिशाली व्यक्ति in the world.
The president is indirectly elected by the people through the Electoral College to a four-year पद, और is एक of तभी दो nationally elected federal officers, the other being the Vice President of the United States.
The Twenty-second Amendment, adopted in 1951, prohibits anyone इससे कभी होने निर्वाचित to the प्रेसिडेंसी for a third full term.
It also prohibits a person from being elected to the presidency more than once if that person previously had served as president, or एक्टिंग अध्यक्ष, लिये अधिक than दो सालो of another व्यक्ति 's पद as अध्यक्ष.
In सब, 43 individuals have served 55 four-year terms.
On January 20, 2009, बराक ओबामा became the 44th and current president.
On November 6, 2012, he was re-elected and is scheduled to serve जबतक जनवरी 20, 2017.
बोतलबंद खनिज water
Bottled water is drinking water ( e.g., well water, distilled water, Mineral water, or spring जल ) packaged in प्लास्टिक or glass water bottles.
Bottled water may be कार्बोनेटेड or not.
Sizes range from small single सेवारत बोतलों to विशाल carboys for water coolers.
Map of the प्रमुख नदियाँ, झीलों, and reservoirs in India
मैप प्रर्दशित नदियाँ और बाढ़ prone areas in India
नदियाँ of इण्डिया खेल an important role in the lives of the Indian people.
The river systems provide सिंचाई, potable जल, सस्ती परिवहन, विद्युत, और the livelihoods for a large number of people all over the country and to rural areas.
This easily explains why nearly all the प्रमुख शहरों of इण्डिया हैं स्तिथ by the banks of rivers.
The rivers भी have an महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in Hindu mythology and are considered holy by all Hindus in the country.
Seven प्रमुख नदियाँ साथ साथ उनके numerous tributaries make up the river system of India.
Most of the rivers pour their waters into the खाड़ी of बंगाल ; however, कुछ of the नदियाँ whose courses take them through the western part of the country and towards the east of the state of Himachal Pradesh empty into the Arabian Sea.
भाग of लद्दाख, उत्तरी भाग of the Aravlli range and the arid parts of the Thar Desert have inland drainage.
Dr.Francis Buchanan surveyed the courses of the rivers of India along with उनके tributaries और शाखाओं in 1810-11 AD and presented a minute account of it.
The shifting of the पाठ्यक्रम और bed over the centuries is very remarkable.
Many of the channels mentioned in कि सर्वेक्षण have अभी become मुर्दे, dried or even extinct.
All major rivers of India originate इससे एक of the three main watersheds :
The Himalaya और the काराकोरम ranges
Vindhya and Satpura ranges और chotanagpur पठार in central India
Sahyadri or पश्चिमी ghats in पश्चिमी India
The Bretton Woods system of monetary management established the rules for commercial and वित्तीय संबंध among the संसार 's प्रमुख औद्योगिक states in the mid-20th century.
The Bretton वुड्स प्रणाली थी the पहला उदाहरण of a fully negotiated monetary order intended to govern monetary relations among independent nation-states.
Preparing to rebuild the international economic system as World War II was still raging, 730 delegates from all 44 Allied nations gathered at the Mount Washington Hotel in Bretton वुड्स, नई हैम्पशायर, संयुक्त राज्य, लिये the संयुक्त राष्ट्र Monetary and Financial Conference.
The delegates deliberated दौरान 1–22 जुलाई 1944, and signed the Agreement on its final day.
Setting up a system of rules, institutions, and procedures to regulate the international monetary system, the planners at Bretton Woods established the International Monetary Fund ( IMF ) और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय बैंको लिये पुनर्निर्माण और विकास ( ibrd ), जिससे आज is भाग of the World Bank Group.
These organizations became operational in 1945 after a sufficient क्रमांक of देशों था ratified the अनुबंध.
The chief features of the Bretton Woods system were an obligation for प्रत्येक देश to अपनाना a मौद्रिक नीति कि कायम the एक्सचेंज रेट by tying इसके करेंसी to the U.S. dollar and the ability of the IMF to bridge temporary imbalances of payments.
On 15 August 1971, the United States unilaterally terminated convertibility of the US $ to gold.
This brought the bretton वुड्स प्रणाली to an समाप्त और saw the dollar become fiat currency.
This action, referred to as the निक्सन शॉक, निर्मित the हालात in जिससे the United States dollar became a reserve currency used by many states.
At the same समय, अनेक फिक्स्ड currencies ( such as GBP, for example ), also became free floating.
Ducati Motor Holding S.p.A. is an Italian कम्पनी कि डिजाइन and manufactures motorcycles.
Headquartered in बोलोग्ना, इटली, डुकाटी is owned by Audi through its Italian subsidiary Lamborghini.
A credit score is a numerical expression based on a statistical analysis of a person 's क्रेडिट फाइलें, to represent the creditworthiness of that person.
A credit score is primarily based on credit रपट सूचना typically sourced from credit bureaus.
Lenders, such as banks and credit card companies, use credit scores to evaluate the संभावित रिस्क posed by lending money to consumers and to mitigate losses due to bad debt.
Lenders उपयोग क्रेडिट स्कोर to determine जो qualifies for a loan, at what interest rate, and what credit limits.
Lenders also उपयोग क्रेडिट स्कोर to determine जिससे ग्राहक are likely to bring in the most revenue.
The use of क्रेडिट or पहचान स्कोरिंग prior to authorizing access or granting credit is an implementation of a trusted system.
Credit scoring is not limited to बैंको.
Other organizations, such as mobile phone companies, insurance companies, जमींदार, और सरकारी विभाग employ the same techniques.
Credit scoring also has a lot of ओवरलैप साथ आंकड़ा खनन, जिससे उपयोग अनेक similar techniques.
ये तकनीकों combine हज़ारों of factors but they are more or less similar or the same.
The seven SI base units and the interdependency of उनके परिभाषाएं : लिये उदाहरण, to निकालें the परिभाषा of the मीटर इससे the गति of लाइट, the परिभाषा of the दूसरी जरूर be ज्ञात जबकि the ampere and candela are both dependent on the definition of energy which in turn is defined in terms of length, mass and time.
The International System of Units ( SI ) defines seven इकाई of माप as a basic set from which all other SI units are derived.
These SI base इकाई और उनके शारीरिक quantities are:
metre for length ( US अंग्रेज़ी : मीटर )
kilogram for द्रव्यमान ( नोट : नहीं the gram )
दूसरी for time
ampere for electric current
केल्विन for temperature
candela for चमकदार intensity
mole for the amount of पदार्थ.
The SI base quantities रूप a नियत of mutually स्वतंत्र आयाम as required by dimensional analysis commonly employed in science and technology.
However, in a given realization of ये इकाई वे may well be interdependent, i.e. defined in terms of each other.
The names of SI units are written in lowercase characters ( the 'degree सेल्सियस ' meets इस नियम, as 'degree ' is the ईकाई, और 'celsius ' is a modifier ).
The symbols of units are written in lowercase ( e.g. metre रै the प्रतीक m ), मगर कि प्रतीकों लिये इकाई नामित बाद व्यक्तियों हैं लिखा with an initial capital letter ( e.g., the hertz has the uppercase symbol Hz ).
Many other units, such as the litre ( US English : लीनियर ), हैं formally नहीं भाग of the si, लकिन हैं स्वीकृत लिये use with SI.
स्मारक Canyon
Colorado National Monument ( locally referred to as The Monument ) is a part of the National Park सेवा निकट the नगर of ग्रैंड जंक्शन, कोलोराडो.
Spectacular canyons cut deep into sandstone and even granite–gneiss–schist rock formations, in some areas.
इस is an क्षेत्रफल of मरुस्थल जमीन high on the Colorado Plateau, with pinion and juniper forests on the plateau.
The park hosts a चौड़ी दायरा of वन्यजीव, सहित red-tailed चीलों और सुनहरी eagles, ravens, jays, desert bighorn sheep, and coyotes.
Activities include hiking, horseback सवारी, सड़क bicycling, और दर्शनीय ड्राइव ; a visitor center on the west side contains a natural history museum and gift shop.
There हैं भव्य दृश्य इससे trails and the Rim Rock Drive, which winds along the plateau.
Nearby are the Book Cliffs, और the largest flat-topped पहाड़ in the world, the Grand Mesa.
Its feature attraction is Monument Canyon, which runs the width of the park, and शामिल चट्टान formations ऐसे as स्वतंत्रता स्मारक, the Kissing Couple, and Coke Ovens.
The monument includes 20,500 acres ( 32 square miles ), much of which has been recommended to कॉंग्रेस लिये नामांकन as wilderness.
left to right : यूटिलिटी वर्दी, ब्लू पोशाक वर्दी, Service Uniform, and Evening Dress uniforms
The Uniforms of the संयुक्त राज्य समुद्री corps serve to फर्क Marines from members of other services.
Among current वर्दी in the संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद शक्तियां, the Marines ' uniforms have been in service the longest.
the समुद्री पोशाक ब्लू वर्दी रै, with few changes, been worn in essentially its current form since the 19th century.
North American टेलीफोन क्षेत्रफल कोड 419 और 567 serve the northwest quadrant of the U.S. state of Ohio.
The largest city served by these area codes is Toledo ( और इसके उपनगरों of हॉलैंड, maumee, northwood, Oregon, Ottawa Hills, Perrysburg, Rossford, Sylvania, Swanton, Waterville, and Whitehouse ).
Other cities served by these area codes include Ada, Ashland, Bellevue, Bluffton, बोलिंग ग्रीन, ब्रायन, bucyrus, celina, क्लाइड, crestline, defiance, delphos, एडिसन, erastus, findlay, fostoria, fremont, galion, kenton, लीमा, मैन्सफील्ड, माउंट gilead, नेपोलियन, नॉरवॉक, ओक हार्बर, Port Clinton, Sandusky, Shelby, St. Marys, Tiffin, Upper Sandusky, Van Wert, Wapakoneta, Wauseon, Willard.
Other areas served include the झील erie आइलैंड्स उत्तर of बंदरगाहों क्लिंटन और west of Sandusky.
The main area code, 419, was created as एक of the असली क्षेत्रफल कोड in अक्तूबर 1947 ; the overlay area code 567 was created on January 1, 2002.
Despite the presence of Toledo, the state 's fourth-largest city, 419 was the last of Ohio 's असली चार क्षेत्रफल कोड to have महरूम विभाजित or overlaid.
Mickey Leroy Gilley ( born कूच 9, 1936 ) is an American country music singer and musician.
Although he started out singing straight-up देश और पश्चिमी सामग्री in the 1970s, he स्थानांतरित towards a अधिक पॉप -friendly ध्वनि in the 1980s, bringing him further success on not just the country charts, but the pop charts as well.
Among his biggest hits are `` रूम पूरा of गुलाब, '' `` do n't the लड़कियों सब मिलेंगी prettier at closing Time, '' and the remake of the Soul hit `` Stand by Me ``.
He is also the cousin of Jerry Lee Lewis, कार्ल mcvoy, जिम gilley and Jimmy Swaggart.
According to the Federal Aviation Administration, Gilley is a licensed pilot, who holds an instrument rating with वाणिज्यिक पायलट privileges लिये multi-engine airplanes, as खूब as निजी पायलट privileges for single engine aircraft.
The September 11 attacks ( also referred to as September 11, September 11th, or 9/11 ) were a series of four coordinated terrorist attacks launched by the Islamic आतंकवादी समूह al-qaeda upon the संयुक्त राज्य in नई यॉर्क नगर और the वॉशिंगटन, d.C. area on September 11, 2001.
Four passenger airliners were hijacked by 19 al-qaeda आतंकवादी so वे could be flown into buildings in suicide attacks.
Two of those planes, American Airlines Flight 11 and United Airlines Flight 175, were crashed into the North and South towers, क्रमशः, of the संसार व्यापार बीच जटिल in नई यॉर्क नगर.
Within two hours, both towers collapsed with debris and the resulting fires causing partial or complete collapse of all other buildings in the wtc जटिल, as खूब as प्रमुख क्षति to टेन अन्य विशाल surrounding structures.
A third plane, American Airlines Flight 77, was crashed into the Pentagon ( the headquarters of the United States Department of रक्षा ), अग्रणी to a आंशिक पतन in its western side.
The fourth plane, United Airlines Flight 93, was targeted at the United States Capitol in वॉशिंगटन, d.C., लकिन क्रैश into a फ़ील्ड निकट shanksville, पेन्सिलवेनिया, बाद इसके यात्री tried to overcome the hijackers.
in कुल, लगभग 3,000 लोगों died in the हमले, including the 227 civilians and 19 hijackers aboard the four planes.
suspicion जल्दी fell on al-Qaeda.
Although the group 's leader, Osama bin Laden, initially denied any involvement, in 2004 he claimed जिम्मेदारी लिये the हमले.
Al-Qaeda and bin Laden cited u.S. support of इसराईल, the presence of U.S. troops in Saudi Arabia, and sanctions against Iraq as motives for the attacks.
the संयुक्त राज्य responded to the attacks by launching the War on Terror and invading Afghanistan to depose the Taliban, which had harbored al-Qaeda.
Many countries strengthened their anti-terrorism विधान and expanded law enforcement powers.
Having evaded capture for years, बिन लादेन थी स्तिथ और मारे by u.S. शक्तियां in may 2011.
The destruction of the Twin Towers और अन्य गुण caused गंभीर क्षति to the अर्थव्यवस्था of निम्नतर मैनहटन and had a significant effect on global markets.
Cleanup of the World Trade Center site was completed in May 2002, and the प्रस्तुतीकरण थी repaired within a year.
Numerous memorials have been constructed, including the National September 11 Memorial & Museum in New यॉर्क, the प्रस्तुतीकरण मेमोरियल, और the उड़ान 93 नेशनल मेमोरियल in पेन्सिलवेनिया.
After a lengthy delay, the One World Trade Center is expected to be completed at Ground Zero in New यॉर्क नगर in 2013.
Finding Nemo is a 2003 American computer-animated comedy-drama एडवेंचर फिल्मी लिखा और निर्देशित by एंड्रयू stanton, released by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी तस्वीरें, and the fifth film produced by Pixar Animation Studios.
It tells the story of the over-protective clownfish named marlin ( अल्बर्ट ब्रूक्स ) जो, साथ साथ a राजसी तंग नामित dory ( एलेन degeneres ), खोज लिये his abducted son Nemo ( Alexander Gould ) all the way to Sydney Harbour.
Along the way, marlin learns to लो risks and let Nemo take care of himself.
It is Pixar 's first film to be released in cinemas in the उत्तरी hemisphere summer.
The film was re-released लिये the पहला समय in 3d on सितंबर 14, 2012, and it was released on Blu-ray on December 4, 2012.
a sequel, ढूंढना dory, is फिलहाल in development, set to be released on November 25, 2015.
The film received universal critical acclaim and won the Academy Award for Best एनिमेटेड विशेषता, और थी मनोनीत in तीन अधिक श्रेणी सहित बेहतरीन असली Screenplay.
It थी the दूसरी highest-grossing फिल्मी of 2003, earning a total of $ 921 million worldwide.
Finding Nemo is also the best-selling dvd of सब समय, साथ over 40 लाख नक़ल बेची as of 2006, और was the highest-grossing G-rated film of all time before Pixar 's own Toy Story 3 overtook it.
It is also the 23rd highest-grossing film of all time, as well as the 3rd highest-grossing एनिमेटेड film.
In 2008, the American Film Institute named it the दसवाँ महानतम एनिमेटेड फिल्मी कभी बना during their Top 10.

auditions यहूद आयोजित in चार शहरों इससे जनवरी 21 through February 5 : Chicago, Houston, New York, and Los Angeles.
This season takes a अलग रूट इससे पास्ट seasons.

This season also features खास अतिथि दिखावे by विभिन्न म्यूज़िक हस्तियाँ सहित जस्टिन बीबर, the ब्लैक Eyed Peas, Katy Perry, Kesha, Nicki Minaj, and Kanye West.
Dominic `` D-Trix '' Sandoval, a पूर्व सदस्य of क्वेस्ट क्रू, the विजेता of the तीसरा ऋतु of America 's Best Dance Crew, joins returning judges Lil Mama and JC Chasez as the newest judge.

In the United States, Social Security refers to the Old-Age, survivors, और विकलांगता बीमे ( oasdi ) federal program.
The original Social सुरक्षा अधिनियम ( 1935 ) और the वर्तमान संस्करण of the Act, as amended, encompass several social welfare and social insurance programs.
Social Security is primarily वित्तपोषित through समर्पित payroll कर पुकारा संघीय Insurance Contributions Act tax ( FICA ).
Tax deposits are formally entrusted to the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund, the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund, the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund, or the संघीय अनुपूरक चिकित्सा बीमे विश्वास निधि जिससे comprise the Social Security Trust Fund.
Upward redistribution of income is responsible for परिचय 43 % of the प्रक्षिप्त सोशल सुरक्षा shortfall over the next 75 years.
According to economist Martin feldstein, the संयुक्त बिता लिये सब सोशल बीमे कार्यक्रम in 2003 गठित 37 % of government expenditure and 7 % of the gross domestic product.
Social Security is currently estimated to keep roughly 40 percent of all Americans age 65 or पुरानी आउट of गरीबी.
The Social सुरक्षा प्रशासन is headquartered in Woodlawn, Maryland, just west of Baltimore.
the दारू by volume shown on a bottle of absinthe.
Alcohol by volume ( abbreviated as ABV, abv, or alc/vol ) is a मानक माप of कैसा much दारू ( इथेनॉल ) is contained in an alcoholic beverage ( expressed as a percentage of total volume ).
The ABV मानक is प्रयुक्त विश्वव्यापी.
In some countries, alcohol by volume is referred to as degrees Gay-Lussac ( बाद the फ्रेंच केमिस्ट जोसेफ लुई gay-lussac ).
लॉरेल खोखला is a village in the Town of Oyster Bay in Nassau County, New York in the United States.
The population थी 1,952 at the 2010 census.
Charles John Huffam Dickens ( ; 7 फ़रवरी 1812 – 9 जून 1870 ) was an English writer and social critic.
He निर्मित कुछ of the संसार 's सबसे यादगार fictional characters and is generally regarded as the greatest novelist of the Victorian period.
During his life, his works enjoyed unprecedented कीर्ति, और by the बीसवीं सदी उसके साहित्यिक genius was broadly acknowledged by critics and scholars.
His novels and short stories continue to be widely लोकप्रिय.
Born in Portsmouth, इंग्लैण्ड, डिकेंस बाएँ school to work in a factory after his father was thrown into debtors ' prison.
Although he had little औपचारिक शिक्षा, उसके जल्दी impoverishment drove him to succeed.
Over his career he edited a weekly journal for 20 years, wrote 15 novels, 5 novellas and hundreds of short stories and non-fiction articles, lectured and performed extensively, was an indefatigable अक्षर लेखक, और campaigned vigorously लिये children 's अधिकारों, शिक्षा, और अन्य सोशल reforms.
डिकेंस sprang to कीर्ति साथ the 1836 serial publication of The Pickwick Papers.
Within a few years he had become an international literary celebrity, famous for his ह्यूमर, व्यंग्य, and keen observation of character and society.
His novels, most published in monthly or weekly किश्तों, pioneered the सीरियल प्रकाशन of narrative fiction, which became the dominant Victorian mode for novel publication.
The instalment format allowed Dickens to evaluate his audience 's reaction, and he often परिवर्धित उसके प्लाट और अक्षर development based on such feedback.
For example, when his wife 's chiropodist expressed distress at the way Miss Mowcher in दाउद कॉपरफील्ड लगा to प्रतिबिंबित उसके disabilities, Dickens went on to improve the character with positive lineaments.
Fagin in Oliver Twist apparently mirrors the famous fence Ikey Solomon ; His caricature of Leigh Hunt in the figure of Mr skimpole in bleak हाउस थी likewise toned down on advice from some of his friends, as they read episodes.
In the same novel, both Lawrence Boythorne and Mooney the beadle are drawn from real life – Boythorne इससे वाल्टर जंगली landor और मूनी इससे 'looney ', a beadle at Salisbury Square.
His plots यहूद carefully constructed, और डिकेंस प्रायः wove in तत्व from topical events into his narratives.
Masses of the illiterate poor chipped in ha'pennies to have each नई मासिक एपीसोड पढ़ा to उन्हें, खोलने up और प्रेरणादायी a नई class of readers.
Dickens was regarded as the literary colossus of उसके आयु.
His 1843 novella, A क्रिसमस कैरोल, is एक of the सबसे influential works ever written, and it remains popular and continues to inspire adaptations in every artistic genre.
His creative genius has been praised by fellow writers—from Leo Tolstoy to G. K. Chesterton and George Orwell —for its realism, comedy, गद्य स्टाइल, अद्वितीय characterisations, और सोशल आलोचना.
On the other hand Oscar Wilde, Henry James and Virginia Woolf complained of a कमी of मनोवैज्ञानिक गहराई, ढीला लिखने, और a vein of saccharine sentimentalism.
Martin Luther King and other civil rights leaders in front of the statue of अब्राहम lincoln, अगस्त 28, 1963
The सिविल अधिकारों गति थी a श्रेणी of विश्वव्यापी राजनैतिक आंदोलनों for equality before the law that peaked in the 1960s.
In many परिस्थितियों it took the रूप of अभियान of सिविल resistance aimed at achieving change by nonviolent forms of resistance.
In some situations it was accompanied, or followed, by सिविल अशांति and armed rebellion.
The process was long and tenuous in many countries, and many of these movements did not fully achieve उनके लक्ष्य हालांकि, the प्रयत्न of ये आंदोलनों किया सीसे to improvements in the legal rights of previously oppressed groups of people.
The main aim of the civil rights movement included, and शामिल, ensuring कि the अधिकारों of सब लोगों हैं बराबर protected by the law, including the rights of minorities.
Civil rights आंदोलनों ranging इससे the वैश्विक lgbt अधिकारों गति to the वैश्विक Women 's rights movement to various racial minority rights movements around the world continue.
The 2010 फीफा संसार कप थी the 19th फीफा संसार Cup, the world championship for men 's national association football teams.
It took place in South Africa from 11 जून to 11 जुलाई 2010.
The bidding process for hosting the tournament finals was open only to African nations ; in 2004, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय फ़ुटबॉल संघ, फीफा, चयनित दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी over मिश्र और मोरक्को to become the first African nation to host the finals.
The matches were played in ten stadiums in nine host cities around the country, with the final played at the सॉकर नगर स्टेडियम in दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी 's largest नगर, जोहान्सबर्ग.
thirty-two टीमों यहूद चयनित लिये भागीदारी via a worldwide qualification tournament that began in August 2007.
In the first round of the tournament finals, the टीमों competed in round-robin समूह of चार टीमों लिये अंक, साथ the top two teams in each group proceeding.
These sixteen teams advanced to the नॉकआउट स्टेज, जहाँ तीन rounds of खेल decided जिससे teams would participate in the final.
In the final, Spain, the यूरोपीय champions, पराजित third-time finalists the नीदरलैंड्स 1–0 बाद अतिरिक्त समय, साथ आन्द्रेस Iniesta 's goal in the 116th minute giving Spain their first world title, becoming the eighth nation to win the tournament, and the first European nation to win the tournament outside its home continent.
Host nation South Africa, 2006 world champions Italy and 2006 runners-up फ़्रांस यहूद सब eliminated in the पहला गोलाकार of the tournament.
It was the first time that the होस्ट यहूद eliminated in the first round.
New जीलैंड साथ उनके तीन draws यहूद the तभी अपराजित टोली in the tournament, but were also eliminated in the first round.
The McMuffin is a family of breakfast sandwiches in विभिन्न आकार और configurations, sold by the fast-food restaurant chain McDonald 's.
The Egg McMuffin is the signature breakfast sandwich ; it was invented by the लेट McDonald 's franchisee Herb Peterson in the late 1960s and was introduced nationwide in 1972.
John Lennon was an English musician who gained worldwide कीर्ति as एक of the संस्थापकों of the बीटल्स, लिये उसके subsequent सोलो करियर, and for his political activism and pacifism.
He was shot by चिह्नित दाउद chapman at the प्रवेश of the भवन where he lived, The Dakota, in New York City on 8 December 1980.
Lennon था बस लौटे इससे रिकार्ड संयंत्र स्टुडियो with his wife, Yoko Ono.
Lennon was pronounced dead on arrival at st. luke's-roosevelt हॉस्पिटल बीच, जहाँ it थी stated that nobody could have lived for more than a few minutes after sustaining such injuries.
Shortly after local न्यूज स्टेशन reported लेनन 's death, crowds gathered at Roosevelt Hospital and in front of the Dakota.
Lennon was cremated on 10 December 1980 at the Ferncliff Cemetery in Hartsdale, New York ; the राख यहूद दिए to ओनो, जो chose नहीं to थाम a अंत्येष्टि लिये him.
The first report of Lennon 's death to a U.S. national दर्शक थी घोषित by हावर्ड cosell, on एबीसी 's Monday Night Football.
New Orleans ( or, locally or ; ) is a प्रमुख संयुक्त राज्य बंदरगाहों और the largest नगर and metropolitan area in the state of Louisiana.
The population of the नगर थी 343,829 as of the 2010 U.S. Census.
The New Orleans metropolitan area ( New orleans–metairie–kenner महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल ) था a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,167,764 in 2010 and was the 46th largest in the United States.
The New Orleans–Metairie–Bogalusa Combined सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल, a larger व्यापार क्षेत्रफल, था a 2010 जनसांख्यिकी of 1,214,932.
The city is named after Orléans, a city located on the Loire River in Centre, France, and is खूब ज्ञात लिये इसके पृथक फ्रेंच क्रियोल वास्तुकला, as well as its cross-cultural and multilingual heritage.
New Orleans is also famous for its cuisine, म्यूज़िक ( विशेषकर as the जन्मस्थान of जैज़ ), और इसके सालाना जश्न और त्यौहार, most notably Mardi Gras.
The city is often referred to as the `` सबसे अद्वितीय '' in अमेरिका.
New ऑरलियन्स is स्तिथ in southeastern Louisiana, straddling the Mississippi River.
The city and ऑरलियन्स मोहल्ला ( ) are.
The city and parish are bounded by the parishes of St. Tammany to the north, St. Bernard to the ईस्ट, plaquemines to the दक्षिण और जेफरसन to the south and west.
Lake Pontchartrain, part of which is included in the city हद, झूठ to the उत्तर और झील borgne झूठ to the ईस्ट.
The संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्षीय चुनाव of 1968 was the 46th quadrennial presidential election, held on Tuesday, November 5, 1968.
The Republican nominee, पूर्व vice-president रिचर्ड निक्सन, जीती the election over the Democratic nominee, incumbent Vice-President Hubert Humphrey.
Nixon ran on a campaign that promised to restore विधि और अनुक्रम to the स्वदेश 's शहरों, torn by riots and crime.
Analysts have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning चुनाव as it permanently disrupted the New Deal Coalition that had dominated presidential politics for 36 years.
Coming four years after Democrat Lyndon B. Johnson won in a ऐतिहासिक भूस्खलन, the चुनाव देखी the लाज़िम अध्यक्ष मजबूर आउट of the रेस और a रिपब्लिकन elected for the first time in twelve years.
It was a wrenching national experience, conducted during a year of हिंसा कि शामिल the हत्या of सिविल अधिकारों नेता मार्टिन लूथर किंग, jr., और subsequent रेस दंगे आरपार the स्वदेश, the assasination of लोकतांत्रिक presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy, widespread opposition to the Vietnam War across university campuses, and violent confrontations between police and anti-war protesters at the 1968 Democratic National Convention as the Democratic party split again and again.
The election featured the strongest third पार्टी प्रयत्न चूंकि 1912 by पूर्व Alabama Governor George Wallace, a Democrat.
Because वालेस 's अभियान opposed संघीय हस्तक्षेप in the दक्षिण to समाप्त school segregation, he carried the Deep South and ran well in ethnic industrial districts in the North.
This was the last election in which New York had the सबसे मत in the चुनावी कॉलेज ( 43 votes ).
After the 1970 जनसांख्यिकी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया gained the सबसे चुनावी votes and has remained the most populous state since then.
This is the latest चुनाव जहाँ a अध्यक्षीय ticket won without carrying the vice presidential candidate 's home state.

Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20, 1967 – April 5, 1994 ) was an American musician and artist, best known as the lead singer, guitarist and प्राथमिक songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana.
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist Novoselic in एबरडीन, वॉशिंगटन in 1985 और स्थापित it as भाग of the Seattle music scene, having its debut album Bleach released on the independent record label Sub Pop in 1989.
After signing with major label DGC Records, the band found breakthrough success with `` Smells जैसे टीन स्पिरिट `` इससे इसके दूसरी एल्बम nevermind ( 1991 ).
Following the कामयाबी of nevermind, निर्वाण थी labeled `` the फ्लैगशिप band '' of Generation X, and Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation ''.
Cobain, however, was often uncomfortable and frustrated, believing his message and कलाकारी दृष्टि to have महरूम misinterpreted by the public, with his personal issues often subject to media attention.
he challenged निर्वाण 's audience with its final studio album In Utero ( 1993 ).
दौरान the पिछला सालो of उसके जीवन, Cobain struggled with heroin addiction, illness and depression.
He also had difficulty coping with his fame and public image, और the पेशेवर और lifelong निजी pressures surrounding खुद and his wife, musician Courtney Love.
On April 8, 1994, कोबेन थी मिला मुर्दे at उसके घर in सिएटल, the शिकार of कया was officially ruled a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head.
the हालातों of उसके मौत at age 27 have become a topic of public fascination and debate.
Since their debut, Nirvana, साथ कोबेन as a songwriter, रै बेची over 25 लाख albums in the U.S., and over 50 million worldwide.
A millwright is a craftsman or tradesman engaged with the construction and maintenance of machinery.
More generally in the English speaking world, early millwrights were specialist बढ़ई जो erected मशीने प्रयुक्त in कृषि, खाना प्रसंस्करण and processing lumber and paper.
In the early part of the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति, उनके कौशल यहूद दबाया into सेवा भवन the earliest powered textile mills.
Modern millwrights work with steel and other materials in addition to wood and must often combine the skills of several skilled ट्रेड in अनुक्रम to सफलतापूर्वक fabricate औद्योगिक मशीनरी or to इकट्ठे मशीने from pre-fabricated parts.
the आधुनिक millwright must also be able to read blueprints and other schematics to aid him in the construction of complex systems.
Millwrights are frequently unionized, with around 45 % unionized in the us, हालांकि अनुभवी millwrights often set themselves up as independent contractors.
The Adjustment Bureau is a 2011 American romantic action thriller film loosely based on the फिलिप K. लंड छोटी स्टोरी, `` समायोजन टोली ``.
The film was written and निर्देशित by जार्ज nolfi और सितारों Matt Damon and Emily Blunt.
The cast also includes Anthony Mackie, John slattery, माइकल केली, और टेरेंस Stamp.
The score was composed by Thomas न्युमैन, साथ दो गीतों by रिचर्ड ashcroft ( `` भविष्य 's उज्जवल '' लिये the खोलने sequence ; `` Are You Ready ? '' for the closing credits ).
Sodium azide is the inorganic यौगिक साथ the सूत्र NaN3.
This colorless salt is the gas-forming घटक in अनेक car airbag systems.
It is used for the तैयारी of अन्य azide यौगिकों.
It is an ionic substance, is highly घुलनशील in जल, और is very acutely toxic.
Double rainbow and supernumerary rainbows on the अंदर of the primary arc.
The shadow of the photographer 's head on the bottom marks the केन्द्र of the रेनबो वृत्त ( antisolar point ).
A rainbow is an optical and meteorological phenomenon that is caused by प्रतिबिंब of लाइट in जल droplets in the धरती 's माहौल, resulting in a वर्णक्रम of light appearing in the sky.
it takes the रूप of a multicoloured arc.
Rainbows caused by धूप सदा appear in the section of sky directly opposite the sun.
In a `` प्राथमिक रेनबो '', the चाप shows red on the outer part and violet on the inner side.
This rainbow is caused by light होने refracted जबकि प्रवेश a droplet of water, then reflected inside on the back of the droplet and refracted again when leaving it.
In a double rainbow, a second arc is seen outside the primary arc, and has the order of its रंग reversed, रेड facing toward the अन्य एक, in दोनो rainbows.
This दूसरी रेनबो is caused by light reflecting twice inside water droplets.
The Conservative Party, officially the Conservative and Unionist Party and colloquially referred to as the tory पार्टी or the tories, is a centre-right राजनैतिक party in the United Kingdom that espouses the philosophies of conservatism and British unionism.
it is the largest political party in the United Kingdom, being the largest single party in the House of Commons with 303 MPs, the largest party in local government with 9,391 councillors, and the largest अंग्रेजों पार्टी in the यूरोपीय पार्लियामेंट साथ 25 meps.
It governs in coalition with the Liberal Democrats, with party leader दाउद cameron as प्रधान Minister.
the रूढ़िवादी पार्टी थी संस्थापित in 1834, और was one of two dominant parties in the 19th century, along with the Liberal Party.
It changed its name to the Conservative और यूनियनिस्ट पार्टी in 1912 बाद विलय साथ the उदार यूनियनिस्ट पार्टी, हालांकि कि नाम is rarely used and it is generally referred to as simply the Conservative Party.
In the 1920s, the Liberal vote greatly diminished and the Labour Party became the Conservatives ' main rivals.
Conservative प्रधान मंत्रियों led सरकारें लिये 57 सालो of the 20th century, including Winston Churchill ( 1940–45, 1951–55 ) and Margaret Thatcher ( 1979–90 ).
Thatcher 's tenure led to wide-ranging आर्थिक उदारीकरण और saw the Conservatives become the most eurosceptic of the three major parties.
The party was returned to government in coalition, having failed to win a majority, in 2010 under the more `` उदार '' नेतृत्व of दाउद cameron.
In the European Parliament, the Conservatives are the largest British party with 25 MEPs, who sit with the soft eurosceptic European Conservatives and Reformists ( ECR ) parliamentary group, while the पार्टी itself is a सदस्य of the गठबंधन of यूरोपीय conservatives और reformists ( aecr ) europarty.
They are the third-largest पार्टी in the स्कॉटिश पार्लियामेंट and second-largest in the Welsh Assembly.
They were formally allied to the Ulster Unionist Party ( UUP ) as part of the Ulster conservatives और unionists व्यवस्था, साथ the uup फिलहाल participating in the five-party Northern Ireland Executive.
Destiny 's Child was an American R & B लड़की समूह जिनकी फाइनल, और शायद सबसे recognizable, line-up comprised Beyoncé Knowles, Kelly Rowland and Michelle Williams.
Formed in 1990 in Houston, टेक्सास, नियति 's चाइल्ड सदस्यों began उनके musical endeavors as Girl 's Tyme comprising, among others, Knowles, Rowland, LaTavia Roberson and LeToya Luckett.
After years of limited success, they were हस्ताक्षरित to कोलंबिया रिकॉर्ड as नियति 's Child.
Destiny 's Child was launched into mainstream recognition following the रिलीज of उनके best-selling दूसरी एल्बम, the लिखने 's on the वॉल, जिससे contained the number-one singles `` Bills, Bills, Bills `` and `` Say My Name ``.
Despite critical and commercial success, the समूह थी plagued by आतंरिक विरोध और विधिक turmoil, as Roberson and Luckett attempted to split from the group 's manager Mathew Knowles, citing favoritism of Knowles and Rowland, his daughter and niece, respectively.
Both Roberson and Luckett were soon replaced with Williams and Farrah Franklin ; however, in 2000, फ्रैंकलिन थी बर्खास्त, leaving उन्हें as a trio.
Their third album, उत्तरजीवी, जिससे contains विषयवस्तु the पब्लिक interpreted as a चैनल to the group 's experience, contains the worldwide hits `` Independent Women ``, `` Survivor `` and `` Bootylicious ``.
In 2002, they announced a hiatus and re-united two सालो बाद लिये the रिलीज of उनके चौथी स्टुडियो album, Destiny Fulfilled ( 2004 ).
Destiny 's Child has sold more than 50 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी to date.
Billboard पत्रिका बाँधने the समूह as एक of the महानतम musical trios of सब समय, the नवीं most successful artist/band of the 2000s, and placed the group 68th in its All-Time Hot 100 Artists list in 2008.
The Centers for बीमारी कंट्रोल और रोकथाम ( सीडीसी ) is a संयुक्त राज्य संघीय एजेंसी अंतर्गत the विभाग of स्वास्थ्य and Human Services headquartered in Druid Hills, unincorporated DeKalb County, Georgia, in Greater Atlanta.
It works to protect पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य और सुरक्षा by providing information to enhance health decisions, and it promotes health through partnerships with state health departments and other organizations.
The CDC focus national attention on developing and applying disease prevention and control ( especially infectious diseases and foodborne pathogens और अन्य सूक्ष्मजैविक infections ), पर्यावरणीय स्वास्थ्य, occupational सुरक्षा और स्वास्थ्य, स्वास्थ्य प्रमोशन, चोट रोकथाम and education activities designed to improve the health of the people of the United States.
The CDC is the United States ' national पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य संस्थान और is a founding सदस्य of the International Association of National Public Health Institutes.
Earthquake prediction `` is usually defined as the specification of the time, स्थान, और परिमाण of a भविष्य भूकंप भीतर stated हद '', और विशेषकर of `` the next strong earthquake to occur in a region. ''
This can be distinguished इससे भूकंप forecasting, जिससे is the probabilistic मूल्यांकन of general earthquake hazard, including the frequency and magnitude of damaging earthquakes, in a given area over periods of years or decades.
This can be further distinguished from real-time earthquake warning systems, which, upon detection of a कठोर भूकंप, can provide neighboring regions a few seconds warning of potentially significant shaking.
To be useful, an earthquake prediction must be precise enough to warrant the cost of increased precautions, including disruption of ordinary क्रियाएँ और कॉमर्स, और timely enough that preparation can be made.
Predictions must also be reliable, as false alarms and cancelled alarms are not only economically costly, लकिन seriously undermine विश्वास in, and thereby the effectiveness of, any kind of warning.
With over 7,000 earthquakes around the world each year with a magnitude of 4.0 or greater, trivial success in earthquake prediction is easily obtained using sufficiently व्यापक पैरामीटर्स of समय, स्थान, or परिमाण.
However, such trivial `` कामयाब predictions '' are not useful.
Major earthquakes are often followed by reports that they were predicted, or at least anticipated, but no claim of a कामयाब भविष्यवाणी of a प्रमुख earthquake has survived close inquiry.
In the 1970s there was intense optimism amongst scientists that कुछ विधि of predicting भूकंप might be मिला, but by the 1990s continuing failure led many scientists to question whether it was even possible.
While many scientists स्टिल थाम कि, दिए पर्याप्त संसाधन, prediction might be possible, many others maintain that earthquake prediction is inherently impossible.
Deborah Ann `` Debby '' Ryan ( born May 13, 1993 ) is an American अभिनेत्री, सिंगर, संगीतकार, songwriter and record producer.

She is also known for appearing in the 2008 विशेषता फिल्मी The Longshots as Edith.

Then, in 2010, she स्ट्रक्चर in the फिल्मी 16 बधाइयां, जिससे थी the सबसे देखी केबल program on the day of its premiere on the Disney Channel.
16 Wishes introduced Ryan to new audiences ; the movie received high viewership in the वयस्कों जनसांख्यिकी ( 18-34 ).
