Stührling tourbillon गति ( ).
In horology, a tourbillon ( ; `` whirlwind '' ) is an addition to the mechanics of a watch escapement.
Developed around 1795 by the French-Swiss watchmaker Abraham-Louis Breguet from an earlier idea by the English chronometer maker John अर्नाल्ड, a tourbillon aims to काउंटर the प्रभाव of गम्भीरता by mounting the escapement और संतुलन व्हील in a घूर्णन पिंजरा, to negate the effect of gravity when the timepiece ( thus the escapement ) is stuck in a certain position.
Originally an attempt to improve सटीकता, tourbillons हैं स्टिल शामिल in कुछ महंगी आधुनिक घड़ियाँ as a विलक्षणता and demonstration of watchmaking virtuosity.
The mechanism is usually exposed on the देखें 's फेस to दिखाएँ it off.
The Windows Installer ( previously known as microsoft installer ) is a तन्त्र घटक used for the installation, maintenance, and removal of software on modern Microsoft Windows systems.
The installation information, and often the फाइलें themselves, हैं packaged in संस्थापना पैकेज, loosely रिलेशनल databases संरचित as COM Structured Storages and commonly known as `` MSI files '', from their default file extension.
Windows Installer contains significant changes from its पूर्ववर्ती, सेटअप api.
New features include a GUI framework and automatic पीढी of the uninstallation अनुक्रम.
Windows Installer is positioned as an alternative to stand-alone executable installer frameworks ऐसे as पुरानी संस्करण of installshield and NSIS.
Microsoft encourages third parties to उपयोग खिड़कियाँ installer as the आधार लिये संस्थापना frameworks, so कि वे synchronize correctly with other installers and keep the internal database of installed products consistent.
Important features such as rollback and versioning निर्भर on a सतत internal database for reliable operation.
Furthermore, Windows Installer facilitates the principle of तनिक विशेषाधिकार by performing software installations by proxy for unprivileged users.
Four Loko is a लकीर of alcoholic पेय, originally marketed as energy drinks, sold by Phusion Projects of Chicago, Illinois.
Phusion operates as Drink चार brewing कम्पनी.
Four Loko, the company 's सबसे लोकप्रिय पेय, debuted in the United States market in 2005.
It is now sold in 48 states, and in Canada, The बहामा, बोलीविया, होंडुरास, और यूरोपीय.
The name `` Four '' is derived from the original energy drink 's four प्रमुख संघटक : दारू, कैफीन, taurine, and guarana.
Four branded products have been the object of legal, ethical, and health concerns related to the company allegedly marketing them to the underaged और the purported खतरे of combining दारू और कैफीन.
After the beverage was banned in several राज्य, a उत्पाद reintroduction in दिसम्बर 2010 removed कैफीन, taurine, and guarana as ingredients, and the malt beverage is no longer marketed as an energy drink.
The neck of a guitar showing the nut ( in the पृष्ठभूमि, coloured white ) and first four metal frets.
A fret is a raised element on the गर्दन of a stringed instrument.
Frets usually extend across the पूरा चौडाई of the गर्दन.
On most आधुनिक पश्चिमी fretted यंत्र, frets are metal strips inserted into the fingerboard.
On some historical instruments and non-european यंत्र, frets हैं बना of pieces of string tied around the neck.
Frets divide the neck into fixed खण्ड at intervals सम्बन्धित to a musical फ्रेमवर्क.
On instruments ऐसे as guitars, प्रत्येक fret represents one semitone in the standard western system where one octave is divided into twelve semitones.
Fret is often used as a verb, अर्थ बस `` to दबायें bas the string behind a fret. ''
Fretting प्रायः refers to the frets and/or their system of placement.
There was consumption of दारू दोनो दौरान and after prohibition.
The 18th Amendment prohibited the production, distribution and sale of alcoholic beverages in the United States and थी widely समर्थित by the अमरीकी पब्लिक जब it गई into effect in 1920.
The temperance movement had popularized the belief that alcohol was the major cause of most निजी और सोशल समस्याएं और निषेध थी देखी as the समाधान to the nation 's poverty, crime, violence, and other ills.
Upon ratification of the amendment, the famous evangelist Billy Sunday said that `` The slums होगा जल्द be only a memory.
We will turn our prisons into कारखानों और हमारी jails into storehouses and corncribs. ''
( Compare christianity और दारू. )
Since alcohol थी to be बैन और चूंकि it थी देखी as the कारण of most, if not all, crime, some communities sold their jails.
The nation was highly optimistic and the leading prohibitionist in the United States Congress confidently asserted कि `` वहीँ is as much मौका of repealing the eighteenth amendment as वहीँ is लिये a हमिंगबर्ड to मक्खी to the ग्रह Mars with the Washington Monument tied to its tail.”
The metre ( meter in American English ), ( SI unit symbol : m ; SI आयाम प्रतीक : l ), is the आधारभूत ईकाई of length in the International System of Units ( SI ).
Originally intended to be एक ten-millionth of the अलहदा इससे the धरती 's equator to the North Pole ( at sea level ), its definition has been periodically refined to reflect growing knowledge of metrology.
Since 1983, it has been पारिभाषित as `` the लंबाई of the पाथ travelled by light in vacuum during a time interval of 1/299,792,458 of a second. ''

Geologists explaining the महत्व of volcanic ash layers to students on field in Iceland
A geologist is a वैज्ञानिक जो अध्ययन the ठोस और द्रव पदार्थ कि constitutes the Earth as well as the processes and history that has shaped it.
Geologists usually engage in अध्ययन geology.
Geologists, studying अधिक of an लागू विज्ञान than a सैद्धांतिक एक, जरूर approach Geology using physics, chemistry and biology as well as other sciences.
Geologists, compared to scientists engaged in अन्य फ़ील्ड, हैं generally more exposed to the outdoors than staying in laboratories ; although some geologists prefer to perform most of their studies in the lab.
Geologists are engaged in exploration for खनन कंपनियाँ in search of metals, oils, and other Earth resources.
They are also in the forefront of natural hazards and आपदाओं चेतावनी और शमन, अध्ययन भूकंप, volcanic कार्यकलाप, tsunamis, मौसम तूफ़ान, और the जैसे ; उनके studies are used to warn the general public of the occurrence of these events.
Currently, geologists are also engaged in the discussion of जलवायु बदलें, as वे पढ़ाई the इतिहास और प्रमाण for this Earth process.

Modern vacuum tubes, ज़्यादातर miniature style
In electronics, a vacuum tube, electron tube ( in North America ), thermionic valve, tube, or वाल्व is a यंत्र controlling इलेक्ट्रिक वर्तमान through a वैक्यूम in a sealed container.
The container is प्रायः पतला पारदर्शी कांच in a roughly cylindrical shape.
The simplest vacuum tube, the diode, is essentially an incandescent लाइट bulb with an added electrode inside.
When the bulb 's filament is heated white-hot, electrons are `` boiled '' off its सतह और into the वैक्यूम अंदर the बल्ब.
If the electrode -- called a `` plate '' or `` anode '' -- is बना अधिक धनात्मक than the hot फिलामेंट, a direct current flows through the vacuum to the electrode ( a demonstration of the Edison effect ).
As the current only flows in एक दिशा, it makes it संभावित to बदलें an प्रत्यावर्ती current applied to the filament to direct current.
The introduction of a third electrode, a grid between the फिलामेंट और the थाली, yields another function.
A voltage लागू to the ग्रिड नियंत्रण the वर्तमान flowing from the filament to the plate.
Thus, it allows the device to be प्रयुक्त as an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक प्रवर्धक.
Vacuum tubes are thus used for rectification, amplification, switching, or समान प्रसंस्करण or सृष्टि of विद्युत signals.
The vast majority of modern day tubes consist of a sealed container with a vacuum inside, and essentially rely on तापायनिक उत्सर्जन of electrons इससे a hot फिलामेंट or a कैथोड heated by the filament.
Some exceptions to this are dealt साथ in the खण्ड परिचय gas-filled tubes below.
Vacuum tubes were नाजुक to the विकास of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक प्रौद्योगिकी, जिससे drove the expansion and commercialization of radio broadcasting, television, radar, sound reinforcement, sound recording and reproduction, large telephone networks, analog and digital computers, and industrial process control.
Although some अनुप्रयोग था counterparts using पहले technologies ऐसे as the चिंगारी gap transmitter or mechanical computers, it was the invention of the vacuum tube with three electrodes ( called a triode ) and its capability of electronic amplification that made these technologies widespread and practical.
In most अनुप्रयोग, solid-state डिवाइस ऐसे as transistors and other semiconductor devices have replaced tubes.
Solid-state devices last longer and are smaller, अधिक कुशल, अधिक विश्वसनीय, and cheaper than tubes.
Tubes can be fragile, sometimes generate significant अनावश्यक ऊष्मा, और can लो अनेक seconds—many मिनट्स in नाजुक applications—after powering on to warm to a temperature where they perform within operational tolerance.
However, tubes still find uses where solid-state devices have not been विकसित, हैं अव्यवहारिक, or जहाँ a ट्यूब रै श्रेष्ठ प्रदर्शन, as साथ कुछ डिवाइस in पेशेवर audio and high-power radio transmitters.
tubes हैं स्टिल उत्पादित for such applications.
Tubes are less likely than semiconductor devices to be नष्ट by the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक पल्स उत्पादित by नाभिकीय विस्फोट and geomagnetic storms produced by giant solar flares.

They have hard शुगर शेल जिससे carry the letter S.

Sir Winston Leonard Spencer-Churchill, ( 30 November 1874 – 24 January 1965 ) was a British राजनेता जो थी the प्रधान मंत्री of the संयुक्त किंगडम इससे 1940 to 1945 and again from 1951 to 1955.
Widely regarded as एक of the महानतम wartime नेताओ of the 20th सदी, चर्चिल was also an officer in the British Army, a historian, a writer, and an artist.
He is the only British Prime Minister in history to have प्राप्त the नोबेल पुरस्कार in साहित्य, and was also the first person to be made an Honorary Citizen of the United States.
Churchill was born into an aristocratic family as the पोता of the 7th ड्यूक of Marlborough.
His father, Lord Randolph Churchill, was a charismatic politician who served as Chancellor of the Exchequer ; his mother, Jennie जेरोम, थी an अमरीकी socialite.
As a यंग फौज अधिकारी, he देखी कार्रवाई in British India, The Sudan, and the Second Boer War.
He gained fame as a युद्ध correspondent और लिखा किताबे about his campaigns.
At the forefront of politics for fifty सालो, he आयोजित अनेक राजनैतिक और कैबिनेट positions.
Before the First World War, he served as President of the Board of व्यापार, घर सचिव, और पहला रब of the admiralty as भाग of the asquith Liberal government.
During the war, he continued as First Lord of the Admiralty until the disastrous gallipoli अभियान caused उसके प्रस्थान इससे सरकारी.
He then briefly resumed active army service on the Western सामने as कमांडर of the 6th बटालियन of the royal Scots Fusiliers.
He returned to government as Minister of Munitions, Secretary of राज्य लिये युद्ध, और सचिव of State for Air.
After the War, Churchill served as Chancellor of the Exchequer in the Conservative ( Baldwin ) government of 1924–29, controversially returning the pound sterling in 1925 to the सुनहरा मानक at इसके pre-war पैरिटी, a मूव widely देखी as बनाना deflationary pressure on the UK economy.
Also controversial was his opposition to increased home rule for India and his resistance to the 1936 abdication of एडवर्ड viii.
Out of office and politically `` in the wilderness '' during the 1930s, चर्चिल took the सीसे in चेतावनी परिचय नाजी जर्मनी और in campaigning लिये rearmament.
On the outbreak of the Second World War, he was again appointed पहला रब of the admiralty.
Following the resignation of नेविली चेम्बरलेन on 10 may 1940, Churchill became Prime Minister.
His steadfast refusal to consider defeat, surrender, or a compromise peace helped inspire British resistance, especially during the मुश्किल जल्दी दिनों of the युद्ध जब ब्रिटेन stood अलोन among European countries in its active opposition to Adolf Hitler.
Churchill was particularly विख्यात लिये उसके भाषणों और रेडियो प्रसारण, which helped inspire the British people.
He led Britain as Prime मंत्री जबतक विजय over Nazi Germany had been secured.
After the Conservative पार्टी खोया the 1945 चुनाव, he became Leader of the Opposition to the Labour ( Attlee ) government.
After जीतना the 1951 चुनाव, he again became प्रधान Minister, before retiring in 1955.
Upon his death, Elizabeth II granted him the honour of a state funeral, जिससे देखी एक of the largest सभाओं of world statesmen in history.
Named the Greatest Briton of all time in a 2002 poll, Churchill is widely regarded as होने among the सबसे influential लोगों in अंग्रेजों history.

Ford began sales of the Focus to Europe in July 1998 और in उत्तर अमेरिका दौरान 1999 लिये the 2000 model year.
In Europe, South America, North America and South Africa, the फ़ोकस replaced the विभिन्न संस्करण of the घाट अनुरक्षण बेची in those markets.
In Asia and Australasia, it replaced the घाट Laser.
As of the first half of 2012, the Focus surpassed the टोयोटा कोरोला to become the संसार 's बेहतरीन selling automobile nameplate.
The Focus has been considered one of the 50 महानतम गाड़ियाँ of the past fifty years by British magazine CAR.
An agar plate -- an उदाहरण of a bacterial growth medium.
specifically, it is a streak थाली ; the orange lines and dots are formed by bacterial colonies.
A growth medium or culture medium is a liquid or gel designed to support the विकास of microorganisms or कोशिकाएं, or छोटी पौधे जैसे the moss Physcomitrella patens.
There are different types of media for growing अलग प्रकार of कोशिकाएं.
There are two major types of विकास मीडिया : those प्रयुक्त लिये कोशिका संस्कृति, जिससे उपयोग विशिष्ट कोशिका प्रकार निकला from plants or animals, and microbiological culture, which are used for growing microorganisms, such as bacteria or yeast.
The most common growth media for microorganisms are nutrient broths and agar plates ; specialized media are sometimes जरूरी लिये microorganism और कोशिका culture growth.
Some organisms, termed fastidious organisms, require specialized environments due to जटिल nutritional आवश्यकताएँ.
Viruses, for example, are obligate intracellular parasites and require a growth मीडियम containing जीना कोशिकाएं.
A talent agent, or बुकिंग एजेंट, is a व्यक्ति जो पाता कार्य लिये अभिनेताओं, लेखक, फिल्मी निर्देशकों, संगीतकारों, models, producers, professional athletes, writers and other people in various entertainment businesses.
An agent also defends, supports and promotes the ब्याज of his/her क्लाइंट.
Agents can not produce their own shows due to विरोध of interest.
A talent agent जरूर be परिचित साथ उनके क्लाइंट.
An agent has to know what kind of work the client can और can नहीं do in अनुक्रम to मैच उन्हें साथ विभिन्न jobs.
Having an एजेंट is नहीं required, but does help the artist in getting jobs.
In many cases casting directors, or other व्यवसायों, go to हुनर एजेंसियों to find artists they are looking for.
The agent is paid a percentage of the star 's आय ( typically 10 % ).
Agents sometimes होगा be referred to as `` 10 percenters. ''
There are different regulations that govern different types of एजेंटों कि हैं स्थापित by कलाकार 's unions and the legal jurisdiction in which the agent operates.
There are also पेशेवर संगठन कि license talent agencies.
Since the decline in viewership in थिएटर, इससे the 1950s to 1960s, this caused a monumental shift in how studios would produce films and thus reducing the cost of exclusive and expensive actors.
Actors and अभिनेत्रियों यहूद working लिये the studios लकिन यहूद नहीं स्वामित्व by one major studio entity and so were able to work on within their time and with other studios.
Because of this, agents were now देखी as a necessity बजाय of an option.
एजेंटों अभी became तीसरा पार्टियों कि negotiated between studios and clients, this making their services imperative between each party.
Since talent agencies are working with lucrative contracts, all talent agencies must be licensed under special sections of the California Labor Code, which calls an agent a `` person or निगम जो engages in the occupation of procuring, offering, होनहार, or attempting to procure नियुक्ति लिये कलाकार or artists. ''
Mars has two known moons, Phobos और deimos, जिससे हैं विचार to be captured asteroids.
Both satellites were discovered in 1877 by Asaph Hall and are named after the characters Phobos ( panic/fear ) and Deimos ( terror/dread ) who, in यूनानी mythology, accompanied उनके पिता एरीस, परमेश्वर of war, into battle.
एरीस थी ज्ञात as Mars to the Romans.
It is possible that Mars may have moons smaller than 50 - 100 meters and a dust ring between phobos और deimos may be उपस्थित लकिन none have been discovered.
In law enforcement parlance, the term हत्या किताब refers to the मामला file of a murder investigation.
Typically, murder books include crime scene photographs and sketches, autopsy and forensic रिपोर्ट्स, transcripts of जांचकर्ताओं ' टीप और गवाह interviews.
The murder book encapsulates the पूरा पेपर ट्रेल of a हत्या छानबीन, from the time the murder is first reported through the arrest of a suspect.
Law enforcement agencies typically गार्ड हत्या किताबे carefully, और it is असामान्य लिये नागरिकों to be दिए unfettered access to these kinds of records, especially for unsolved cases.
A melon baller
Melon balls are balls of melon made using a melon baller कि varies इससे around 1 centimeter to 3 सेंटीमीटर ( about 3/8 inch to 1 inch ).
वे हैं generally used in fruit salad.
A KSA, or Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities, is a series of कथा कथन कि हैं जरूरी जब applying to United States Federal government job openings.
KSAs are used to determine, साथ साथ resumes, जो the बेहतरीन आवेदकों are when several candidates qualify for a job.
The knowledge, skills and abilities ( ksas ) जरुरी लिये the कामयाब performance of a position are contained on each job vacancy announcement.
In 2009 the Office of Personal Management asked federal agencies to stop requiring जॉब आवेदकों to भरण आउट the questionnaires, to be phased out within a year.
KSAs are brief and focused essays about one 's करियर और शैक्षणिक पृष्ठभूमि कि presumably qualify एक to perform the duties of the position being applied for.
A knowledge, कौशल, और abilities ( ksa ) is a संक्षिप्त essay about one 's talent and expertise and related experiences ( work, education, volunteer ) and accomplishments.
A series of ksa कथन हैं प्रायः जरूरी जब applying लिये सबसे federal government and some state and city government jobs.
KSAs are used as a yardstick to assess the सामर्थ्य of a prospective applicant in terms of likely ability to perform the duties of the job.
Most government hiring officials look लिये a छोटी, कुरकुरे और साफ ksa कि emphasizes results or accomplishments obtained in previous work.
KSA कथन हैं भी ज्ञात as Evaluation Factors.
Other एजेंसियों sometimes कॉल उन्हें `` दरजा कारकों '', `` विशेषता Ranking Factors '', `` Knowledge, Abilities, skills and Other Characteristics '', or `` Job Elements ''.
The नाम can be बस a नाम लकिन प्रायः it influences content and length of the essay.
Every agency has its own regulations but most of the time the each ksa फ़ैक्टर चाहिए be 1/2 to 11⁄2 pages long.
The below definitions are पारिभाषित by the u.S. दफ्तर of Personnel Management :
Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities ( KSAs ) - The attributes required to perform a job and are generally demonstrated through qualifying सेवा, शिक्षा, or training.
Knowledge - Is a body of सूचना लागू सीधे to the performance of a function.
Skill - Is an observable competence to perform a सीखे psychomotor अधिनियम.
क्षमता - is competence to perform an observable behavior or a behavior that results in an observable product.
The scoring of KSA essays is आधारित on a स्केल of इससे एक to 100.
जॉब आवेदकों जरूर स्कोर above 70 to be considered for the position.
High scores हैं निकला through answering the ksa सवाल as specifically as possible, providing examples from previous employment or training that clearly demonstrate you meet the qualifications.
When applying to federal government positions, a Federal Resume is usually जरूरी in जोड to ksa statements.

Love Always is the डेब्यू एल्बम of अमरीकी r & B duo K-Ci & JoJo, released on June 17, 1997, by MCA Records.
It was recorded at various studios in नई यॉर्क और the Los Angeles area in 1996 and 1997.
it थी उत्पादित by जोजो और अनेक others, including DeVante Swing, James Mtume, and Jeff Redd.
The duo were originally a भाग of jodeci before this album.
The album peaked at sixth on the US Billboard 200 and भी appeared on अंतरराष्ट्रीय charts.
The single `` सब my जीवन `` charted क्रमांक एक in अनेक देशों, और सब चार of the album 's singles peaked above the top 25 in the US Hot R & B/Hip-Hop Songs and the New Zealand Top 40 Singles.
Love Always was received favorably by critics, who praised the भाइयो ' गायन क्षमता और the उत्पादन.
The album has been certified तीन टाइम्स प्लेटिनम by the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ of America ( RIAA ) and gold by Music Canada and IFPI Sweden.
As of June 1999 it had sold 2.9 million copies in the संयुक्त राज्य.
A variable-rate mortgage, adjustable-rate mortgage ( ARM ), or tracker mortgage is a mortgage loan with the interest rate on the नोट periodically समायोजित आधारित on an अनुक्रमणिका जिससे reflects the cost to the lender of borrowing on the credit markets.
The loan may be offered at the lender 's standard variable rate/ base rate.
There may be a direct and legally-defined link to the underlying index, लकिन जहाँ the lender offers no विशिष्ट कड़ी to the underlying market or index the rate can be changed at the lender 's discretion.
The term `` variable-rate mortgage '' is most common outside the United States, whilst in the United States, `` adjustable-rate mortgage '' is most common, and implies a बंधक regulated by the संघीय सरकारी, साथ कैप्स on आरोप.
In many देशों, समायोज्य रेट mortgages हैं the norm, और in such places, may simply be referred to as mortgages.
Among the most common indices are the rates on 1-year constant-maturity Treasury ( CMT ) securities, the Cost of Funds Index ( cofi ), और the लंदन interbank Offered Rate ( LIBOR ).
A few lenders use their own cost of निधि as an अनुक्रमणिका, बल्कि than using other indices.
इस is किया to ensure a स्थिर हाशिया for the lender, whose own cost of funding will usually be related to the index.
नतीजतन, भुगतान बना by the borrower may change over time with the changing interest rate ( alternatively, the term of the loan may change ).
This is distinct from the graduated payment बंधक, जिससे offers बदलना भुगतान amounts but a fixed interest rate.
Other forms of mortgage loan include the interest only mortgage, the fixed रेट बंधक, the ऋणात्मक amortization बंधक, और the balloon payment mortgage.
Adjustable rates transfer part of the ब्याज रेट रिस्क इससे the lender to the borrower.
They can be used where मनमौजी ब्याज दरों मेक फिक्स्ड रेट लोन मुश्किल to obtain.
The borrower लाभ if the ब्याज रेट falls but loses if the interest rate increases.
The borrower लाभ इससे घटाया मार्जिन to the underlying cost of borrowing compared to fixed or capped rate mortgages.
The assassination of Robert Francis `` Bobby '' Kennedy, a United States Senator और bhai of assassinated अध्यक्ष जॉन fitzgerald `` जोकर '' कैनेडी, took प्लेस shortly बाद मध्यरात्रि on जून 5, 1968, in लॉस एंजिल्स, California, during the campaign season for the United States Presidential election, 1968.
After winning the California and South Dakota प्राथमिक चुनावों लिये the लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन लिये अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, कैनेडी थी शॉट as he walked through the kitchen of the Ambassador Hotel and died in the Good Samaritan Hospital twenty-six hours later.
Sirhan sirhan, a 24-year-old फिलीस्तीनी / जार्डन अप्रवासी, थी convicted of कैनेडी 's murder and is serving a life sentence for the crime.
sirhan 's वकील have released statements claiming evidence that he was framed.
The shooting was अंकित on ऑडियो टेप by a freelance समाचारपत्र रिपोर्टर, and the aftermath was captured on film.
Kennedy 's body lay in repose at St. Patrick 's Cathedral in नई यॉर्क लिये दो दिनों पहले a अंत्येष्टि mass was held on June 8.
His body was interred near his brother जॉन at आर्लिंगटन नेशनल Cemetery.
His death prompted the सुरक्षा of अध्यक्षीय उम्मीदवार by the संयुक्त States Secret Service.
Hubert humphrey गई on to जीत the लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन लिये the presidency, but ultimately narrowly lost the election to Richard Nixon.
As with his brother Jack 's death, Bobby 's हत्या और the हालातों surrounding it have spawned a variety of conspiracy theories.
As of 2013 Kennedy remains one of only two sitting United States सीनेटरों to be assassinated ( the अन्य होने huey long ).
The Modern आयु of कॉमिक किताबे is an अनौपचारिक नाम लिये the काल in the इतिहास of मुख्यधारा अमरीकी कॉमिक books generally considered to last from the mid-1980s until present day.
in इस काल, कॉमिक किताब वर्ण generally became गहरा और अधिक psychologically complex, creators became better-known and active in changing the industry, independent comics flourished, and larger publishing houses became more commercialized.
An alternate name for this काल is the अंधेरा आयु of कॉमिक किताबे, due to the popularity and artistic influence of grim titles, such as and Watchmen.
When Harry मिले सैली... is a 1989 American romantic comedy film written by Nora Ephron and directed by Rob Reiner.
It सितारों बिली क्रिस्टल as हैरी and Meg Ryan as Sally.
The story फ़ॉलो the शीर्षक वर्ण इससे the समय वे मिलें just before sharing a cross-country drive, through twelve years or so of chance encounters in New York City.
The film उठाता the सवाल `` can मेन और महिलाओं कभी बस be मित्रों ? '' और अग्रिम अनेक विचार परिचय संबंध that became household concepts, such as those of the `` '' girlfriend and the `` transitional person ''.
The origins of the film came from Reiner 's return to single life बाद a तलाक.
An interview ephron conducted साथ reiner provided the basis for Harry.
Sally was based on Ephron and कुछ of उसके मित्रों.
Crystal came on board और बना उसके अपना योगदान to the screenplay, making Harry funnier.
Ephron supplied the structure of the film with much of the संवाद आधारित on the real-life दोस्ती between reiner और क्रिस्टल.
The soundtrack consists of मानकों performed by हैरी connick, jr., साथ a big band and orchestra arranged by Marc Shaiman.
Connick won his first ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन जैज़ Male Vocal Performance.
Columbia Pictures released the film using the `` platform '' technique, which involved opening it in a few चुनें शहरों, letting धनात्मक शब्द of मुँह generate ब्याज, और तब gradually expanding distribution over subsequent weeks.
When Harry Met सैली... grossed a कुल of us $ 92.8 million in North America.
Ephron received a British Academy Film Award, an Oscar nomination, and a Writers Guild of अमेरिका पुरस्कार नामांकन लिये उसके पटकथा.
The film is ranked 23rd on AFI 's 100 Years... 100 Laughs list of the top comedy films in अमरीकी सिनेमा और क्रमांक 60 on Bravo 's `` 100 Funniest Movies ''.
in जल्दी 2004, the फिल्मी थी adapted for the stage in a production starring Luke Perry and Alyson Hannigan.

Hamburger Helper is a line of packaged food products primarily consisting of boxed पास्ता bundled साथ a पैकेट or packets of powdered sauce or seasonings.
The contents of each box are संयुक्त साथ browned मैदान बीफ, जल और milk to create a complete dish.
The product line also features उत्पाद साथ अन्य starches ऐसे as राइस or potatoes instead of pasta.
It is बना by General Mills.
Although the classic boxed हैमबर्गर हेल्पर उत्पाद तभी सप्लाई the मंड item and the sauce packets, some varieties of the product include ground beef.
These include a frozen food line, which features some of the brand 's classic varieties in a पूरा भोजन kit रूप, साथ frozen मैदान बीफ और frozen सॉस packaged separately from the noodles in the same bag.
There is also an `` instant '' version of Hamburger Helper containing dehydrated meat, noodles and seasonings in a small pouch, requiring तभी जल to be added.
The Hamburger Helper mascot is the `` Helping Hand '', an anthropomorphic animated, four fingered left-hand glove, which appears in the product 's टेलीविज़न commercials और on the पैकेज.

A dwarf planet is a planetary-mass object that is neither a ग्रह nor a उपग्रह.
More explicitly, the International Astronomical Union ( IAU ) defines a dwarf planet as a celestial body in direct orbit of the Sun that is massive enough for its आकार to be नियंत्रित by gravitation, लकिन कि नापसंद a ग्रह रै नहीं साफ इसके कक्षीय प्रदेश of other objects.
The term dwarf planet was adopted in 2006 as भाग of a three-way categorization of लाशें orbiting the Sun, brought about by an increase in discoveries of trans-Neptunian objects that rivaled Pluto in size, and finally precipitated by the discovery of an even more massive object, Eris.
This classification states that bodies large enough to have cleared the neighbourhood of उनके कक्षा हैं पारिभाषित as ग्रह, जबकि those that are not massive enough to be rounded by their own gravity are defined as small Solar System bodies.
Dwarf ग्रह आइये in between.
The exclusion of dwarf planets from the roster of planets by the IAU has been both praised and criticized ; it was said to be the `` right decision '' by Mike भूरा, जो खोजा और अन्य नई बौना ग्रह, लकिन रै महरूम अस्वीकृत by एलन stern, who had coined the term dwarf planet in 1990.
The IAU फिलहाल recognizes पाँच बौना planets in the Solar System :, Pluto,,, and.
However, only two of these bodies, Ceres and Pluto, have been observed in पर्याप्त विवरण to demonstrate कि वे fit the definition.
Eris has been accepted as a बौना ग्रह क्युकी it is more massive than Pluto.
The IAU subsequently decided that unnamed trans-Neptunian objects with an absolute परिमाण उज्जवल than +1 ( और hence a व्यास of ≥838 km assuming a geometric albedo of ≤1 ) are to be named under the assumption that they are dwarf planets.
The only two such वस्तुएँ ज्ञात at the समय, माकेमाके और हउमेया, गई through this naming procedure and were declared to be dwarf planets.
It is suspected that another सौ or so ज्ञात वस्तुएँ in the Solar System are dwarf planets.
Estimates are that up to 200 dwarf planets may be found when the entire प्रदेश ज्ञात as the kuiper बेल्ट is छान, और कि the क्रमांक may exceed 10,000 when objects scattered outside the Kuiper belt are considered.
Individual astronomers recognize several of these, और in अगस्त 2011 माइक भूरा प्रकाशित a सूची of 390 प्रत्याशी objects, ranging from `` nearly certain '' to `` possible '' dwarf planets. '
Brown identifies nine known objects – the पाँच स्वीकृत by the iau प्लस,,, और – as `` वस्तुतः certain '', with another two dozen highly likely, and there are probably a hundred or so such objects in total.
The classification of bodies in अन्य ग्रहीय प्रणालियों साथ the characteristics of dwarf planets has not been addressed.
A debit card ( also known as a bank card or जाँच कार्ड ) is a प्लास्टिक भुगतान कार्ड कि provides the cardholder electronic access to his or her bank account ( s ) at a financial institution.
Some cards have a भंडारित मान साथ जिससे a भुगतान is made, while most relay a message to the cardholder 's bank to withdraw funds from a payee 's designated bank account.
The card, where accepted, can be प्रयुक्त बजाय of नकदी जब बनाना purchases.
In some मामले, the प्राथमिक खाता क्रमांक is आबंटित exclusively for use on the Internet and there is no physical card.
In many countries, the use of debit cards has become so widespread that their volume has overtaken or entirely replaced cheques और, in कुछ उदाहरण, नकदी ट्रांजेक्शन.
The development of debit cards, unlike credit cards and charge cards, has generally महरूम देश विशिष्ट resulting in a क्रमांक of अलग प्रणालियों around the world, which were often incompatible.
Since the mid-2000s, a number of initiatives have allowed debit cards issued in one country to be प्रयुक्त in अन्य देशों और अनुमत उनके उपयोग लिये अंतरजाल और फोन purchases.
Unlike credit and charge ताश, भुगतान using a डेबिट कार्ड हैं तत्काल transferred इससे the cardholder 's designated bank account, instead of them paying the money back at a later date.
Debit cards usually also allow for तत्काल वापसी of नकदी, acting as the ATM card for withdrawing cash.
Merchants may also offer cashback facilities to customers, where a ग्राहक can withdraw नकदी साथ साथ उनके purchase.
Francois henri `` जोकर '' lalanne ( सितंबर 26, 1914 - जनवरी 23, 2011 ) थी an अमरीकी फ़िटनेस, कसरत, और nutritional विशेषज्ञ और motivational speaker who is sometimes called `` the godfather of fitness '' and the `` first fitness superhero. ''
He वर्णित खुद as होने a `` sugarholic '' and a `` junk food junkie '' until he was 15.
He also had behavioral problems, but `` turned his life around '' after listening to a पब्लिक लेक्चर by पॉल ब्रैग, a well-known पोषण speaker.
During his career, he came to believe that the country 's overall health depended on the health of its जनसांख्यिकी, लिखने कि `` शारीरिक संस्कृति और पोषण — is the मोक्ष of America. ''
Decades before health and fitness began being promoted by celebrities like जेन फोंडा और रिचर्ड सीमन्स, lalanne थी already widely recognized for publicly preaching the health benefits of regular exercise and a good diet.
He published numerous books on fitness and hosted a फ़िटनेस टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ between 1953 और 1985.
As early as 1936, at age 21, he opened one of the स्वदेश 's पहला फ़िटनेस gyms in ओकलैंड, California, which became a prototype for dozens of similar gyms using his name.
One of his 1950s television exercise programs was aimed toward महिलाओं, जिसको he भी प्रोत्साहित to join his health clubs.
He invented a क्रमांक of कसरत मशीने, including leg-extension and pulley devices.
Besides producing his own series of videos, he coached the elderly and disabled not to forgo कसरत, believing it होता enable उन्हें to बढ़ाएँ उनके strength.
lalanne भी gained मान्यता लिये his success as a bodybuilder, as well as for his prodigious feats of strength.
Arnold Schwarzenegger once stated, `` कि जोकर lalanne 's an एनिमल !, '' after LaLanne, at 54, beat a 21-year-old Schwarzenegger `` badly '' in an informal contest.
On the occasion of LaLanne 's death, Schwarzenegger credited LaLanne for being `` an apostle लिये फ़िटनेस '' by प्रेरणादायी `` अरबों सब over the संसार to सजीव healthier lives, '' and, as governor of California, had earlier placed him on his Governor 's Council on Physical Fitness.
Steve Reeves credited lalanne as उसके प्रेरणा to build his muscular physique while keeping a slim waist.
He थी inducted to the कैलिफ़ोर्निया हॉल of कीर्ति and has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
Air forces of most of the countries उपयोग प्रणाली समान to सेना.
However, the RAF and the air forces of many Commonwealth countries, or those formerly under a British influence, use a different set of ranks loosely based on naval equivalents ; Lieutenant, Commander, Captain and commodore हैं prefixed लिये एयर फ़ोर्स उपयोग साथ उड़ान, wing, समूह और एयर, क्रमशः ( the पहला तीन होने the इकाई that they used to command ).
Penélope Cruz Sánchez ( ; born अप्रैल 28, 1974 ) is a Spanish actress.
Signed by an agent at age 15, she made her acting debut at 16 on television and her विशेषता फिल्मी डेब्यू the following साल in jamón, jamón ( 1992 ), to critical acclaim.
Her subsequent roles in the 1990s and 2000s included Open Your Eyes ( 1997 ), The Hi-Lo Country ( 1999 ), The लड़की of अपना सपनो ( 2000 ) और स्त्री on शीर्ष ( 2000 ).
Cruz achieved recognition for her lead roles in the 2001 films वैनिला आसमान और उड़ा.
She has since built a successful career, appearing in films from a wide range of genres, including the कॉमेडी waking up in रेनो ( 2002 ), the thriller Gothika ( 2003 ), the Christmas movie Noel ( 2004 ), and the action adventure Sahara ( 2005 ).
She has received critical acclaim for her roles in volver ( 2006 ) और नौ ( 2009 ) receiving सुनहरी ग्लोब और अकादमी पुरस्कार nominations for each.
She won the Academy Award for Best supporting अभिनेत्री in 2008 लिये Vicky Cristina Barcelona.
She was the first Spanish actress in history to receive an Academy Award and the first Spanish actress to प्राप्त a स्टार at the हॉलीवुड Walk of Fame.
Cruz has modeled for companies such as Mango, Ralph लॉरेन और l'oréal.
Penélope and her younger sister Mónica Cruz have designed वस्तुएं लिये आम.
She रै दान दोनो उसके time and money to charities.
क्रूज़ रै volunteered in युगांडा और इण्डिया, where she spent one week working for Mother Teresa ; she donated her salary from ' to help fund the late nun 's mission.
A wax sculpture of Cruz will be placed in a premier spot in the grevin मोम संग्रहालय in Paris.
File Explorer, previously known as Windows Explorer, is a file manager application and also a नेविगेशन औजार कि is शामिल साथ रिलीज of the microsoft खिड़कियाँ ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली इससे खिड़कियाँ 95 onwards.
It provides a graphical user interface for accessing the संचिका systems.
It is also the component of the operating system that presents अनेक उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस वस्तुएं on the मॉनिटर ऐसे as the taskbar and desktop.
controlling the कंप्यूटर is संभावित बगैर खिड़कियाँ एक्सप्लोरर कार्यशील ( लिये उदाहरण, the File | Run command in Task Manager on NT-derived versions of Windows will function without it, as will commands typed in a command prompt window ).
Located in the c : \खिड़कीs निर्देशिका, it is sometimes referred to as the Windows shell, explorer.exe, or simply “Explorer”.
The Care Bears are characters created by American बधाई in 1981 लिये उपयोग on ग्रीटिंग cards.
The असली कलाकृति लिये the cards was painted by artist Elena Kucharik.
In 1983, Kenner turned the परवाह bears into plush टेडी bears.
The Care Bears appeared in their own TV specials called The Care Bears in the जमीन बगैर जज्बात ( 1983 ) and The Care Bears Battle the Freeze Machine ( 1984 ).
They also had their own television series from 1985 to 1988, in addition to three feature films : The Care Bears Movie ( 1985 ), Care Bears Movie II : A New Generation ( 1986 ), और the परवाह bears एडवेंचर in Wonderland ( 1987 ).
Each Care Bear comes in a different color and रै a specialized तमगा on इसके पेट कि represents इसके duty and personality.
This तमगा थी ज्ञात as उनके `` tummy symbol. ''
however, the फिल्म परवाह bears : oopsy Does It ! renamed them `` belly badges ''.
Adding to the Care Bear family are the `` Care Bear cousins '', जिससे विशेषता a शेर, खरगोश, पेंगुइन, raccoon, and other such animals created in the same style as the teddy bears.
In 2002, the bears यहूद reintroduced with new toys.
Made by Play-Along Toys, the नई खिलौने offered सुविधाएँ ऐसे as illuminated bellies upon touch, aerobic bears, and glow-in-the-dark bears.
As part of this comeback, the Bears have appeared in दो computer-animated फिल्मों : परवाह bears : यात्रा to joke-a-lot ( 2004 ) और The Care Bears ' Big Wish Movie ( 2005 ).
In 2007, the franchise celebrated its 25th anniversary ; another relaunch took प्लेस, as खूब as the रिलीज of परवाह Bears : Oopsy Does It !.
In mid-2011, AG announced a revival TV animated series titled `` परवाह bears : स्वागत to Care-a-Lot ``.
The premiere of the श्रेणी utilizes `` 30 years of caring ''.
It premiered on The Hub on June 2, 2012.
As of 2013, परवाह bears merchandise is still being marketed.
During 2008 and 2009, कनाडा 's कुकी जार Group and France 's MoonScoop Group attempted to acquire the franchise from AGC, with no apparent success.
Interstate 70 ( i-70 ) is an अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग in the संयुक्त राज्य that runs from Interstate 15 near Cove Fort, Utah, to a Park and Ride near Baltimore, Maryland.
It was the first Interstate राजमार्ग प्रोजेक्ट in the United States.
i-70 लगभग traces the पाथ of u.S. रूट 40 ( and also the old National Road ) east of the Rocky Mountains.
West of the Rockies, the route of I-70 was derived from अनेक स्त्रोत.
I-70 is the fifth longest अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग, बाद i-90, i-80, I-40, and I-10.
The construction of I-70 in Colorado and Utah is considered an engineering marvel as the रूट गुजरता through the आइज़नहावर टनल, Glenwood Canyon, and the San Rafael Swell.
The आइज़नहावर टनल is the उच्चतम पाइंट साथ the Interstate Highway system with an elevation of.
The sections of the interstate in Missouri and Kansas have laid claim to be the पहला अंतरराज्यीय in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Though disputed, the Federal Highway Administration has claimed the section of I-70 through Glenwood Canyon, completed in 1992, was the last piece of the अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग प्रणाली, as originally नियोजित, to खोलें to ट्रैफ़िक.
फ़ोटो of 1999 total eclipse
As seen from the धरती, a सौर ग्रहण occurs जब the चंद्रमा passes between the Sun and Earth, and the Moon fully or partially blocks ( `` occults `` ) the Sun.
इस can happen तभी at नई चंद्रमा, जब the Sun and the Moon are in conjunction as seen from Earth in an alignment referred to as syzygy.
In a total eclipse, the disk of the सूर्य is fully obscured by the Moon.
In partial और annular eclipses तभी भाग of the Sun is obscured.
If the Moon were in a perfectly circular orbit, a little closer to the Earth, and in the वही कक्षीय प्लेन, वहीँ होता be कुल solar eclipses every single month.
However, the Moon 's orbit is inclined ( tilted ) at अधिक than 5 डिग्री to धरती 's कक्षा around the Sun ( see ecliptic ) so its shadow at new moon usually misses Earth.
Earth 's orbit is called the ecliptic plane as the Moon 's orbit जरूर क्रॉस इस प्लेन in अनुक्रम लिये an ग्रहण ( both solar as well as lunar ) to occur.
In addition, the Moon 's actual orbit is elliptical, often taking it far enough away from Earth कि इसके apparent आकार is नहीं विशाल enough to block the Sun totally.
The orbital planes cross each year at a लकीर of नोड resulting in at तनिक दो, और up to पाँच, सौर eclipses occurring each year ; no more than two of which can be total eclipses.
However, total solar eclipses are rare at any particular स्थान क्युकी totality exists तभी साथ a सीमित पाथ on Earth 's surface traced by the Moon 's shadow or umbra.
An eclipse is a प्राकृतिक घटना.
Nevertheless, in some ancient and modern cultures, solar eclipses have महरूम attributed to अलौकिक कल्याणकारी or regarded as bad omens.
A total solar eclipse can be frightening to people who are unaware of its astronomical explanation, as the सूर्य seems to गायब दौरान the दिन और the आसमान darkens in a matter of minutes.
Because it is dangerous to look directly at the Sun, observers should use special eye protection or indirect viewing techniques when viewing a partial ग्रहण, or the आंशिक phases of a total eclipse.
It is safe to view the total phase of a total solar ग्रहण साथ the unaided नजर और बगैर protection, however.
People referred to as eclipse chasers or umbraphiles will सफर to रिमोट स्थितियाँ to observe or witness predicted central solar eclipses.
A political party ( from, Genitive partis, `` part '', `` portion '' ) is a political organization कि typically seeks to influence, or entirely कंट्रोल, सरकारी नीति, प्रायः by nominating candidates with aligned political views and trying to seat them in political office.
Parties participate in चुनावी अभियान और शैक्षणिक outreach or protest actions.
Parties often espouse an विचारधारा or दृष्टि, expressed in a party program, bolstered by a written platform with specific goals, forming a coalition among disparate interests.
The mango is a fleshy stone fruit belonging to the genus Mangifera, consisting of numerous तीव्र fruiting पेड़ in the flowering संयंत्र परिवार anacardiaceae.
The mango is native to South Asia, from where it रै महरूम वितरित worldwide to become one of the most cultivated fruits in the tropics.
While other Mangifera species ( e.g. horse mango, M. foetida ) हैं भी grown on a अधिक स्थानीयकृत आधार, Mangifera indica – the 'common mango ' or 'Indian mango ' – is the only mango tree commonly cultivated in many tropical and subtropical regions.
It is the नेशनल फल of इण्डिया, पाकिस्तानी and Philippines.
In several cultures, its fruit and leaves are ritually used as पुष्पक सजावट at विवाह, पब्लिक celebrations and religious ceremonies.
Gill Arnette Byrd, < ref name > एचटीटीपी : //www.pro-football-reference.com/players/b/byrdgi00.htm ( born February 20, 1961 in San Francisco, California ) is a former professional American football player.
He was a two time Pro Bowl cornerback in 1991 and 1992 for the सैन डिएगो chargers बाद graduating इससे सैन जोस राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों.
Byrd was inducted into the chargers Hall of Fame in 1998.
He was an all-city कार्यशील वापस और रक्षात्मक वापस at लोवेल ऊँची School ( San Francisco ), helping to lead the Cardinals to the city championship in his senior season of 1978.
संसार मैप showing the Tropic of Cancer
The Tropic of Cancer, also referred to as the उत्तरी tropic, is the वृत्त of अक्षांश on the धरती कि marks the most northerly position at which the Sun may appear directly overhead at its zenith.
This event occurs once per year, at the समय of the जून संक्रांति, जब the उत्तरी गोलार्ध is tilted toward the Sun to its maximum extent.
it फिलहाल ( साल 2013 ) झूठ at 23° 26′ 15.143′′ north of the Equator.
Its Southern गोलार्ध बंटवारा, अंकन the सबसे southerly position at which the Sun may appear directly overhead, is the Tropic of Capricorn.
These tropics are two of the पाँच प्रमुख उपाधि उपायों or प्रमुख वृत्त of अक्षांश कि चिह्नित मानचित्र of the धरती, besides the Arctic and Antarctic Circles and the Equator.
The positions of these circles of latitude ( अन्य than the equator ) हैं लिखवाई by the झुकाव of the धरती 's अक्ष of रोटेशन सापेक्ष to the plane of its orbit.
DVD-Video is a consumer video format used to store digital video on DVD discs, and is फिलहाल the प्रबल उपभोक्ता वीडियो स्वरूप in एशिया, उत्तर America, Europe, and Australia.
Discs using the DVD-Video specification require a DVD drive and an h.262/mpeg-2 भाग 2 डिकोडर ( e.g., a dvd खिलाड़ी, or a कंप्यूटर dvd ड्राइव साथ a software DVD player ).
Commercial dvd फिल्मों हैं एनकोडेड using a संयोजन of h.262/mpeg-2 Part 2 compressed video and audio of varying formats ( often multi-channel formats as described below ).
Typically, the data rate for DVD movies ranges इससे 3 mbit/s to 9.5 mbit/s, और the बिट रेट is usually adaptive.
It was first उपलब्धियाँ लिये खुदरा around 1997.
The DVD-Video specification थी निर्मित by dvd फ़ोरम and can be obtained from DVD Format/Logo Licensing Corporation for a fee of $ 5,000.
The specification is not publicly available, because every सदस्य जरूर चिह्न a non-disclosure agreement.
Certain information in the dvd किताब is मालिकाना and confidential.
In computing and specifically Internet, a leech is one who benefits, usually deliberately, from others ' सूचना or प्रयत्न लकिन करता नहीं प्रस्ताव anything in वापसी, or makes तभी टोकन offerings in an attempt to avoid being called a leech.
In economics, this type of बर्ताव is पुकारा `` फ़्री सवारी '' and is associated with the free rider problem.
Depending on context, leeching does not necessarily refer to illegal use of कंप्यूटर संसाधन, लकिन प्रायः बजाय to लालची उपयोग according to तहज़ीब : to wit, using too much of कया is freely given without contributing a reasonable amount back to the community that provides it.
The name derives from the जोंक, an एनिमल कि झंझट रक्त और तब tries to leave unnoticed.
Other terms are used, such as `` freeloader '', लकिन जोंक is the most common.

The United States Postal सेवा ( usps ), भी ज्ञात as the पोस्ट दफ्तर और u.S. मेल, is an independent agency of the United States federal government responsible for providing postal service in the United States.
It is one of the few government agencies explicitly प्राधिकृत by the संयुक्त States Constitution.
The USPS traces its roots to 1775 during the Second Continental कॉंग्रेस, जहाँ बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन थी नियुक्त the पहला postmaster general.
The cabinet-level पोस्ट दफ्तर विभाग थी निर्मित in 1792 इससे फ्रैंकलिन 's आपरेशन and transformed into its current form in 1971 under the Postal Reorganization Act.
The USPS employs over 574,000 मजदूर और operates over 260,000 vehicles.
The USPS is the ऑपरेटर of the largest vehicle fleet in the world.
The USPS is legally obligated to serve सब अमेरिकी, regardless of geography, at uniform price and quality.
The USPS has exclusive access to letter boxes marked `` U.S. Mail '' और निजी letterboxes in the संयुक्त States, but still competes against private package delivery services, such as UPS and FedEx.
The usps रै नहीं सीधे प्राप्त taxpayer-dollars चूंकि the early 1980s with the minor exception of subsidies for costs associated with the disabled and overseas voters.
Since the 2006 all-time peak mail volume, after which Congress passed the Postal Accountability and Enhancement Act ``, ( which mandated $ 5.5 billion per year to be paid into an account to pre-fund retiree health-care, 75 years into the future, a requirement unique among organizations and businesses in the U.S. ), revenue dropped sharply due to recession-influenced declining mail volume, prompting the डाक सेवा to dekh to अन्य स्त्रोत of आय जबकि कटिंग लागत to reduce its budget deficit.
Washington, D.C. रै महरूम the capital of the United States since 1800.
Eight other cities have served as the meeting place for कॉंग्रेस और हैं इसलिए माना to have once been the capital of the United States.
in जोड, प्रत्येक of the 50 U.S. states and the five principal territories of the United States maintains its own capital.
राजकुमारी काटें डायमंड set in a ring
The Princess cut is the second most popular cut shape लिये ईंट, अगला to a round brilliant.
The face-up shape of the princess cut is square or rectangular and the प्रोफ़ाइल or side-on आकार is समान to कि of an उलट पिरामिड साथ four beveled sides.
The princess cut is a relatively new diamond काटें, having महरूम निर्मित in the 1960s.
It has gained in popularity in recent years as a more distinctive alternative to the more लोकप्रिय गोलाकार शानदार काटें, in जिससे the शीर्ष of डायमंड, पुकारा the क्राउन, is काटें साथ a गोलाकार face-up आकार और the bottom, called the pavilion, is shaped similar to a cone.
A princess cut with the same चौडाई as the व्यास of a गोलाकार शानदार होगा तौल अधिक as it रै four corners which would otherwise have been cut off and rounded to form a round brilliant.
The princess cut is sometimes referred to as a वर्गाकार modified brilliant.
However, while displaying the same high degree of brilliance, its faceting स्टाइल is अद्वितीय और completely अलग इससे that of a round brilliant.
The Princess cut had its origins in the early `` French '' cut, having a step-modified `` Double-French '' or `` Cross '' cut crown and a series of unique, chevron-shaped facets in the मण्डप जिससे combine to दे a पृथक cross-shaped प्रतिबिंब जब the stone is viewed directly through the table.
Effectively, the Princess cut combines the ऊँची उपाधि of लाइट वापसी of a round brilliant cut with a distinctive square or rectangular shape.
The square princess cut diamond is usually slightly cheaper than गोलाकार शानदार काटें ईंट of the वही कैरेट वज़न because it retains about 80 % of the rough diamond, as opposed to the round brilliant which retains only about 50 % of the rough.
The ability to retain अधिक क्रिस्टल वज़न makes this shape popular amongst diamond cutters.
Accredited Gem Appraisers ( AGA ) and American Gem समाज प्रयोगशाला ( agsl ) और यूरोपीय gem Laboratories-USA ( EGL-USA ) are currently the only labs that grade the Princess cut for cut.
There is no universal definition of what measurements make an ideal princess cut diamond and many डायमंड निर्माताओं मार्केट आदर्श ईंट साथ differing facet पैटर्न and angles as `` ideal cut ''.
In contrast to the AGSL, AGA, and EGL-USA the Gemological Institute of America ( GIA ) has stated that there is not enough industry consensus or empirical data to specify cut grading standards लिये राजकुमारी काटें ईंट और to do so is at the रिस्क of उपभोक्ता जो may be धोखे by diamonds accompanied by unqualified Ideal or Excellent cut grades.
The name `` Princess Cut '' थी originally प्रयुक्त in कनेक्शन साथ another डायमंड काटें, otherwise known as the `` Profile '' cut, designed by Arpad Nagy, a London cutter, in 1961.
The same name was later used and बना लोकप्रिय by ygal पर्लमैन, betzalel Ambar, and Israel Itzkowitz in Israel in 1979.
A similar काटें साथ तभी 49 facets, as opposed to the असली 58 facets of the राजकुमारी काटें, थी बाद branded the `` Quadrillion '' and initially distributed by Ambar Diamonds in Los Angeles.
Three years of optical research yielded a square stone with faceting समान to कि of a round brilliant cut diamond.
A तुलना
The number of chevrons can affect the overall outlook of a princess cut diamond.
This can usually be determined by the wire आरेख कि is plotted in डायमंड grading reports.
By adding अधिक chevrons on the मण्डप पक्ष of the डायमंड, the individual facets of the diamond will now be broken down into smaller facets.
As a result, it can give a princess काटें डायमंड a `` कुचल बर्फ '' look.
Vice versa, जब a राजकुमारी काटें डायमंड रै lesser chevrons, it tends to give the diamond a chunky outlook due to broader facets.
the घरेलू श्वान ( canis lupus familiaris ) is a subspecies of the gray wolf ( Canis lupus ), a member of the Canidae family of the mammalian order Carnivora.
The term `` domestic dog '' is generally प्रयुक्त लिये दोनो domesticated and feral varieties.
The dog has been the first animal to be domesticated और रै महरूम the सबसे widely kept working, hunting, and pet animal in human history.
The word `` dog '' may also mean the male of a canine species, as opposed to the शब्द `` कुतिया '' लिये the मादा of the प्रजाति.
MtDNA evidence shows an evolutionary split between the modern श्वान 's lineage और the आधुनिक भेड़िया 's lineage around 100,000 सालो पहले लकिन,, the oldest चट्टान specimens genetically linked to the modern dog 's lineage date to approximately 33,000-36,000 years ago.
Dogs ' value to जल्दी इंसान hunter-gatherers led to उन्हें जल्दी बनने ubiquitous across world cultures.
Dogs perform many roles for people, such as hunting, herding, pulling loads, protection, assisting police and military, companionship, और, अधिक recently, aiding विकलांग individuals.
This impact on human समाज रै दिए उन्हें the उपनाम `` Man 's Best Friend '' in the Western world.
In कुछ संस्कृतियों, dogs are also a source of meat.
In 2001, there were estimated to be 400 लाख कुत्तो in the world.
Most breeds of dogs हैं at सबसे a few सौ सालो बूढ़ा, having महरूम artificially चयनित for particular morphologies and behaviors by people for specific functional roles.
Through this selective breeding, the श्वान रै विकसित into सैंकड़ों of varied breeds, and shows more behavioral and morphological variation than any other land mammal.
For example, height measured to the withers ranges from in the Chihuahua to about in the Irish Wolfhound ; color varies from white through grays ( usually called `` ब्लू '' ) to ब्लैक, और भूरा इससे लाइट ( तन ) to अंधेरा ( `` रेड '' or `` चॉकलेट '' ) in a चौड़ी विभिन्नता of पैटर्न ; coats can be short or long, coarse-haired to wool-like, straight, curly, or smooth.
It is common लिये सबसे breeds to shed this coat.

An electron microscope ( EM ) is a type of microscope that uses an electron beam to illuminate a नमूना और उपज a magnified image.
An EM has greater resolving power than a light microscope and can reveal the ढांचा of छोटी वस्तुएँ क्युकी electrons have wavelengths about 100,000 times shorter than visible light photons.
They can achieve better than 50 pm resolution and magnifications of up to about 10,000,000x whereas ordinary, non-confocal light microscopes are limited by विवर्तन to परिचय 200 nm रेज़ोल्यूशन and useful magnifications below 2000x.
The electron microscope uses electrostatic and इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक lenses to कंट्रोल the इलेक्ट्रॉन बीम and focus it to form an image.
These electron optical lenses are analogous to the कांच lenses of a light optical microscope.
Electron microscopes हैं प्रयुक्त to investigate the ultrastructure of a चौड़ी दायरा of biological and inorganic specimens including microorganisms, cells, large molecules, biopsy samples, metals, and crystals.
Industrially, the electron microscope is प्रायः प्रयुक्त लिये विशेषता कंट्रोल और विफलता analysis.
Modern electron microscopes उपज इलेक्ट्रॉन micrographs, using specialized डिजिटल कैमरे or frame grabbers to capture the image.
Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen is a chain of fried मुर्गा तेज़ खाना रेस्तरां संस्थापित in 1972 in New Orleans, Louisiana.
Often referred to as Popeyes and sometimes as Popeyes Chicken & Biscuits or Popeyes Chicken & seafood, it थी acquired by sandy स्रोतों, जॉर्जिया -based AFC Enterprises, originally America 's Favorite Chicken Company, in 1993.
According to a company press रिलीज दिनाँक जून 29, 2007, popeyes is the second-largest `` quick-service मुर्गा रेस्तरां समूह, measured by क्रमांक of इकाई '', साथ अधिक than 1,800 रेस्तरां in अधिक than 40 राज्य और the ज़िला of कोलंबिया, और over 22 देशों worldwide including Turkey, Northern Cyprus, Bahrain, China, Hong Kong, Iraq, Indonesia, Jordan, Kuwait, United Arab Emirates, Japan, Malaysia, Saudi Arabia, South Korea, Singapore, Canada, Jamaica, Guyana, Suriname, Mexico, Trinidad, Puerto Rico, Honduras, Vietnam, Panama, Peru, and Costa Rica.
About thirty स्थितियाँ हैं company-owned, the rest franchised.
The leg press is a weight training exercise in which the व्यक्तिगत pushes a वज़न or प्रतिरोध दूर इससे उन्हें using their legs.
The term leg press also refers to the apparatus प्रयुक्त to perform इस कसरत.
The leg press can be used to evaluate an athlete 's overall lower देह शक्ति ( इससे घुटना संयुक्त to hip ).
Using the diagonal sled-type लेग दबायें machine.
वहीँ हैं दो प्रमुख प्रकार of leg press:
The diagonal or vertical 'sled ' प्रकार लेग press.
Weight disks ( plates ) हैं संलग्न सीधे to the sled, which is mounted on rails.
The उपयोक्ता sits नीचे the sled और pushes it upward with their feet.
These machines normally include adjustable safety कोष्ठक कि prevent the उपयोक्ता इससे होने फंस under the weight.
The 'cable ' प्रकार लेग दबायें, or 'seated leg press ', commonly found on multigyms.
The user sits upright and pushes forward with their feet onto a plate that is संलग्न to the वज़न स्टेक by अर्थात् of a long steel cable.
Wendy Williams शिकारी ( born वेन्डी जोन विलियम्स ; जुलाई 18, 1964 ) is an American media personality, actress and author.
She hosts a syndicated टेलीविज़न बात दिखाएँ, The Wendy Williams Show.
Prior to television, विलियम्स थी a `` शॉक jockette `` on several radio shows.
Williams has gained notoriety for her on-air spats साथ हस्तियाँ.
She was the subject of the 2006 VH1 reality TV series called The Wendy Williams Experience which ब्रॉडकास्ट events surrounding her radio show.
She has written an autobiography और अनेक अन्य किताबे, और रै निर्मित a उत्पाद line called Adorn by Wendy Williams.
Patrick Henry `` Treason '' speech before the House of burgesses in an 1851 पेंटिंग by पीटर F. Rothermel
`` Give me liberty, or give me death ! '' is a quotation attributed to पैट्रिक हेनरी इससे a वाक he बना to the Virginia Convention.
On that day, at St. John 's Church in Richmond, Virginia, and is credited with having swung the संतुलन in convincing the वर्जिनिया हाउस of Burgesses to pass a resolution delivering the Virginia troops to the Revolutionary War.
Among the delegates to the convention were future US राष्ट्रपतियों थामस जेफरसन और जार्ज वॉशिंगटन.
न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador (, locally ) is the easternmost province of Canada.
Situated in the country 's Atlantic region, it incorporates the द्वीप of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और मेनलैंड Labrador to the northwest, with a combined area of.
in 2011, the प्रांत 's population was 514,536.
Approximately 92 percent of the province 's population lives on the Island of Newfoundland ( सहित इसके संबद्ध छोटी आइलैंड्स ), of जिससे अधिक than half live on the Avalon Peninsula.
The province is Canada 's most linguistically homogenous, with 97.6 % of residents reporting अंग्रेज़ी ( न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड अंग्रेज़ी ) as उनके माँ जीभ in the 2006 census ;.
Historically, Newfoundland was also home to अद्वितीय किस्में of फ्रेंच, और आयरिश, as खूब as the now-extinct Beothuk language.
In Labrador, local dialects of Innu-aimun and inuktitut हैं भी बोला.
न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador 's पूंजी और largest नगर, st. John 's, is Canada 's 20th-largest Census Metropolitan Area, and is home to almost 40 percent of the province 's population.
St. John 's is the seat of government, home to the House of Assembly of Newfoundland and labrador और the उच्चतम अदालत in the क्षेत्राधिकार, the न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड and Labrador Court of Appeal.
A former colony and dominion of the United Kingdom, Newfoundland and Labrador became the tenth प्रांत to डालें the कनाडाई कनफेडरेशन on कूच 31, 1949, as Newfoundland.
On December 6, 2001, an amendment थी बना to the Constitution of Canada to change the province 's official name to Newfoundland and Labrador.
In day-to-day conversation, however, canadians generally स्टिल refer to the प्रांत itself as Newfoundland and to the region on the Canadian mainland as Labrador.

Roosevelt, Jr. ( ; October 27, 1858—January 6, 1919 ) was the 26th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1901–1909 ).
He is noted for his exuberant personality, range of interests and achievements, and his leadership of the प्रगतिशील गति, as खूब as उसके `` काउंटी `` persona और मजबूत मर्दानगी.
He was a leader of the Republican Party and founder of the first अवतार of the short-lived प्रगतिशील ( `` सांड Moose '' ) Party of 1912.
Before becoming President, he held offices at the city, राज्य, और संघीय levels.
Roosevelt 's achievements as a naturalist, explorer, hunter, author, and soldier are as much a भाग of उसके कीर्ति as any office he held as a politician.
Roosevelt was 42 years old when sworn in as President of the संयुक्त राज्य in 1901, बनाना उसे the youngest president ever ; he beat out the youngest elected president, John F. Kennedy, by only one year.
रूज़वेल्ट थी भी the पहला of तभी तीन sitting presidents to have won the Nobel Peace Prize.
The Teddy bear is named after him, despite his अवमानना लिये होने पुकारा `` Teddy ''.
Born into a wealthy family in नई यॉर्क नगर, रूज़वेल्ट was a sickly child who suffered from asthma and stayed at home studying natural history.
To overcome his physical weakness, he embraced a ज़ोरदार जीवन.
Home-schooled, he became an eager छात्र of nature.
He attended Harvard विश्वविद्यालयों, जहाँ he पढ़ाई जीवविज्ञान, boxed और विकसित an ब्याज in naval affairs.
In 1881, one year out of Harvard, he was निर्वाचित to the नई यॉर्क राज्य सभा, जहाँ he became a नेता of the सुधार गुट of उसके रिपब्लिकन पार्टी ( the `` GOP '' ).
His The Naval War of 1812 ( 1882 ) established his पेशेवर प्रतिष्ठा as a गंभीर इतिहासकार ; he लिखा numerous किताबे on hunting, the outdoors, and current political issues, as well as frontier history.
In 1884, his first wife and his mother died on the वही दिन.
He temporarily बाएँ राजनीती और गई to the frontier, बनने a rancher in the `` Badlands '' in the Dakotas.
Returning to New York City, he ran for mayor in 1886, finishing तीसरा साथ 60,000 मत.
He बाद gained कीर्ति by taking vigorous charge of the city police.
At the national स्तर, he थी a नेता in civil service reform.
The Spanish–American War broke out in 1898 जबकि रूज़वेल्ट थी, effectively, कार्यशील the विभाग of the Navy.
He promptly resigned and formed the अशिष्ट राइडर्स – a स्वयंसेवी प्यादे रेजीमेंट that fought in Cuba.
The war hero was elected governor in 1898 और in 1900 was nominated for vice president.
He successfully energized the GOP base as a highly visible campaigner to reelect अध्यक्ष विलियम mckinley on a मंच of ऊँची tariffs, the सुनहरा मानक, साम्राज्यवाद, prosperity at home and victory abroad.
In 1901, President विलियम mckinley थी assassinated and Roosevelt became President.
He attempted to मूव the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी ( gop ) toward प्रगतिवाद, including trust busting and increased regulation of businesses.
Roosevelt became the पहला व्यक्ति निर्वाचित to a पद in उसके अपना सही in 1904 बाद having ascended to the Presidency ( from the Vice-Presidency ) upon the death of his predecessor, winning the largest percentage of the popular vote since the uncontested election of 1820.
Roosevelt coined the phrase `` वर्गाकार सौदे `` to describe उसके घरेलू कार्यसूची, emphasizing that the average citizen would get a fair share under his policies.
As an outdoorsman and naturalist, he प्रचारित the संरक्षण movement.
On the world stage, रूज़वेल्ट 's नीतियों यहूद characterized by उसके स्लोगन, `` बोलो softly and carry a big stick ``.
A cousin is a relative with whom a person shares one or more common ancestor ( s ) ( other than a parent, child/descendant, sibling, child/descendant of a सहोदर, or सहोदर of a parent/ancestor ).
However in common parlance, `` cousin '' सामान्यतः specifically means `` first cousin ''.
Systems of `` degrees '' and `` removals '' are used in the English-speaking world to describe the exact relationship between two cousins ( in the broad भाव ) और the पूर्वज वे have in आम.
Various governmental entities have established systems for legal use that can अधिक precisely बताएँ kinships साथ आम पूर्वजो मौजूदा कोई क्रमांक of पीढियां in the पास्ट, हालांकि आम उपयोग प्रायः eliminates the degrees and removals and refers to people with common ancestry as simply `` distant cousins '' or `` relatives ''.
Webster is an American situation comedy that aired on ABC from September 16, 1983 जबतक may 8, 1987, और in first-run अनुप्रयोग from September 21, 1987 until March 10, 1989.
The series थी निर्मित by Stu Silver.
The show stars Emmanuel Lewis in the title role as a young boy who, after losing his parents, is adopted by उसके एनएफएल -pro गॉडफादर, portrayed by एलेक्स karras, और उसके नई socialite wife, played by Susan Clark.
The focus was largely on how this impulsively married couple had to adjust to their new lives and sudden parenthood, लकिन it थी the अनुकूल वेबस्टर खुद जो drove much of the plot.
The series was produced by Georgian Bay Ltd., Emmanuel Lewis entertainment उद्यमों, Inc. ( 1986-1989 ) and Paramount Television.
Like NBC 's earlier hit Diff'rent Strokes, Webster प्रदर्शित a यंग african-american लड़के अपनाया by a white family.
Three types of कोशिका प्रभाग
Cell division is the प्रक्रम by जिससे a जनक कोशिका divides into two or more daughter cells.
कोशिका प्रभाग प्रायः occurs as part of a larger cell cycle.
In eukaryotes, there are two distinct type of cell division : a vegetative प्रभाग, whereby प्रत्येक बेटी कोशिका is genetically एकसमान to the parent cell ( mitosis ), and a reductive cell division, whereby the number of chromosomes in the daughter cells is reduced by half, to produce haploid gametes ( meiosis ).
दोनो of ये कोशिका प्रभाग चक्र हैं जरूरी in sexually reproducing जीवों at कुछ पाइंट in उनके जीवन साईकिल, और दोनो हैं believed to be present in the last eukaryotic common ancestor Prokaryotes also undergo a vegetative cell division known as binary fission, where their genetic material is segregated equally into two daughter cells.
All cell divisions, regardless of organism, हैं preceded by a सिंगल गोलाकार of डीएनए replication.
For simple unicellular organisms such as the amoeba, एक कोशिका प्रभाग is समतुल्य to reproduction – an entire new organism is created.
On a larger scale, mitotic cell division can create progeny from multicellular जीवों, ऐसे as पौधे कि grow इससे cuttings.
Cell division also enables sexually reproducing जीवों to develop इससे the one-celled zygote, which itself was produced by cell division from gametes.
And after growth, cell division allows for continual निर्माण और मरम्मत of the सजीव.
A human being 's body experiences about 10,000 खरब कोशिका विभाजन in a lifetime.
कोशिका प्रभाग रै been modeled by finite subdivision rules.
the प्राथमिक चिंता of cell division is the maintenance of the original cell 's genome.
Before प्रभाग can occur, the genomic सूचना कि is भंडारित in chromosomes must be replicated, and the duplicated genome must be separated cleanly between cells.
A great deal of cellular infrastructure is involved in keeping genomic information सतत between `` generations ''.

Howard Jones ( born John Howard जोन्स, 23 फ़रवरी 1955, southampton, हैम्पशायर, England ) is a British musician, singer and songwriter.
according to the गिनीज किताब of अंग्रेजों hit Singles & Albums, `` Jones is an accomplished singer-songwriter who was a regular chart visitor in the mid-1980s with his brand of synthpop.
Jones, who was equally popular in the U.S., appeared at Live Aid ``.
Allmusic journalist, Stephen Thomas Erlewine adds, `` Jones was एक of the धमक आंकड़े of mid-1980s synthpop.
His music मिलाया the प्रौद्योगिकी intensive ध्वनि of New Wave with the cheery optimism of hippies and late 1960s pop.
Jones racked up a string of hits in the मिड और लेट 1980s, पहले he retreated into being a cult figure in the 1990s ''.
The International Isle of Man TT ( Tourist Trophy ) Race is a motorcycle रेसिंग इवेंट आयोजित on the आइल of man और थी लिये अनेक सालो the सबसे prestigious motorcycle race in the world.
The event was part of the FIM Motorcycle Grand Prix World Championship during the period 1949–1976 before होने transferred to the संयुक्त किंगडम बाद सुरक्षा चिंताएं और चलाएं by the FIM as the British Grand Prix for the 1977 season.
The Isle of Man TT Races became part of the TT Formula 1 चैंपियनशिप इससे 1977 to 1990 to बचाना the इवेंट 's racing status.
From 1989 the racing has been developed by the आइल of man विभाग of पर्यटन as the Isle of Man TT Festival.
The race is run in a time-trial स्वरूप on पब्लिक सड़कें बंद लिये रेसिंग by the provisions of an Act of Tynwald ( the parliament of the Isle of Man ).
The first race was held on मंगलवार 28 may 1907 और थी पुकारा the International Auto-Cycle Tourist Trophy.
The event was organised by the Auto-Cycle Club over 10 laps of the st जॉन 's छोटी कोर्स of 15 मील 1,470 गज for road-legal touring motorcycles with exhaust silencers, saddles, pedals and mud-guards.
The winner of the single-cylinder class, and overall winner of the पहला इवेंट in 1907, थी चार्ली collier सवारी a matchless मोटरसाइकिल in a time of 4 hours, 8 minutes and 8 seconds at an average race speed of 38.21 mph.
The winner of the twin-cylinder class was Rem Fowler riding a Peugeot engined Norton in a समय of 4 घंटों 21 मिनट्स और 52 सेकेंड at an औसत रेस गति of 36.21 mph.
The trophy presented to Charlie Collier as the winner of the 1907 Isle of Man TT रेस, थी दान by the बिल्ले de mouzilly st. मंगल.
It featured a stylised version of ओलम्पिक परमेश्वर hermes by Giovanni Da Bologna as a silver figurine astride a winged wheel.
The trophy थी समान in डिज़ाइन to the 18 कैरेट सुनहरा montague ट्रॉफी प्रस्तुत to John Napier ( Arrol-Johnston ) as the inaugural winner of the Isle of Man Tourist Trophy car race in 1905 now known as the RAC Tourist Trophy.
The Marquis de Mouzilly St. Mars Trophy is now प्रस्तुत annually to the winner of the Isle of Man Senior TT Motor-Cycle Race.
The 2007 Isle of Man TT was the centenary इवेंट जिससे भागा between 26 may और 8 जून 2007 और प्रदर्शित a special Re-enactment of the 1907 Isle of Man TT Race held on the village green next to Tynwald Hill in St John 's on Monday 28 May 2007.
The vintage parade of 100 classic motorcycles for the Centenary Re-enactment on the original St John 's छोटी कोर्स थी flagged दूर by पूर्व संसार motor-cycle चैंपियन Geoff Duke.
The first of the participants to be flagged away थी the recently लौटी twin-cylinder peugeot-norton ridden by Rem Fowler during the first Isle of Man TT Race in 1907.
Also participating in the 2007 Re-enactment was TT race competitor Guy Martin riding a 1938 triumph बाघ 100 500 cc और अन्य पूर्व tt प्रतिस्पर्धी सहित एलन cathcart, सैमी मिलर, उपनाम Jefferies and Mick Grant also completed the Re-enactment lap.
