Unemployment ( or joblessness ) occurs when people are बगैर कार्य और actively seeking work.
The unemployment rate is a measure of the prevalence of unemployment and it is calculated as a percentage by dividing the number of unemployed individuals by सब individuals फिलहाल in the मजदूर फ़ोर्स.
During अवधि of मंदी, an अर्थव्यवस्था प्रायः अनुभवों a relatively high unemployment rate.
According to International श्रमिक संगठन रपट, अधिक than 197 million people globally are out of work or 6 % of the world 's workforce were without a job in 2012.
There remains considerable सैद्धांतिक बहस regarding the causes, consequences and solutions for unemployment.
Classical economics, New classical economics, and the आस्ट्रिया स्कूल of अर्थशास्त्र argue कि मार्केट mechanisms हैं विश्वसनीय means of resolving unemployment.
These theories argue against interventions imposed on the labor market from the outside, such as unionization, minimum wage laws, कर, और अन्य regulations कि वे अर्जी discourage the hiring of workers.
keynesian अर्थशास्त्र emphasizes the cyclical प्रकृति of बेरोजगारी and recommends government interventions in the economy that it claims will reduce unemployment during recessions.
This theory focuses on तूल झटके कि एकाएक reduce aggregate demand for goods and services and thus reduce demand for workers.
Keynesian models recommend government interventions designed to increase demand for workers ; these can include वित्तीय stimuli, सरेआम वित्तपोषित जॉब सृष्टि, और expansionist monetary policies.
In addition to ये व्यापक theories of बेरोजगारी, वहीँ हैं a few categorizations of बेरोजगारी that are used to more precisely model the effects of unemployment within the economic system.
the प्रमुख प्रकार of बेरोजगारी शामिल संरचनात्मक बेरोजगारी which focuses on structural problems in the economy and inefficiencies inherent in labour markets, including a mismatch between the supply and demand of laborers with necessary skill sets.
Structural arguments emphasize causes and समाधान सम्बन्धित to विघटनकारी technologies और globalization.
Discussions of frictional unemployment focus on voluntary decisions to work based on each individuals ' valuation of their अपना कार्य और कैसा कि compares to वर्तमान मजदूरी दरों प्लस the समय और प्रयत्न required to find a job.
Causes and solutions for frictional बेरोजगारी प्रायः पता जॉब प्रविष्टि threshold and wage rates.
Behavioral economists highlight individual biases in decision making, and often involve समस्याएं और समाधान concerning sticky wages and efficiency wages.
collectivism is कोई philosophic, राजनैतिक, धार्मिक, आर्थिक, or social outlook that emphasizes the interdependence of every human being in a society or civilization.
Collectivism is a मौलिक सांस्कृतिक तत्व कि exists as the रिवर्स of व्यक्तिगत in इंसान प्रकृति ( in the same way high context culture exists as the reverse of low context culture ).
Collectivist orientations stress the importance of cohesion within social groups ( such as an `` in-group '', in what specific context it is defined ) and in some cases, the priority of group goals over व्यक्तिगत लक्ष्य.
collectivists प्रायः फ़ोकस on जातियाँ, society, nation or country.
It has been used as an element in many different and diverse types of government and political, economic and educational philosophies throughout history and most human समाजों in अभ्यास contain तत्व of दोनो व्यक्तिगत and collectivism.
Some उदाहरण of collectivist cultures include India and Japan.
Collectivism can be divided into horizontal collectivism और लंबवत collectivism.
Horizontal collectivism stresses collective decision-making among equal individuals, and is यूँ प्रायः आधारित on decentralization and egalitarianism.
Vertical collectivism is based on hierarchical structures of शक्ति और on moral और सांस्कृतिक conformity, और is इसलिए based on centralization and hierarchy.
A cooperative enterprise would be an example of आड़ा collectivism, whereas a सैन्य पदानुक्रम would be an example of vertical collectivism.
Acute disseminated encephalomyelitis ( ADEM ) is an प्रतिरक्षा mediated बीमारी of the brain.
It usually occurs following a वाइरल संक्रमण लकिन may appear following टीकाकरण, bacterial or parasitic infection, or even appear spontaneously.
As it involves autoimmune demyelination, it is similar to multiple sclerosis, और is माना भाग of the अनेक काठिन्य borderline diseases.
The incidence rate is परिचय 8 प्रति 1,000,000 people per year.
Although it occurs in all ages, most reported मामले हैं in children और adolescents, साथ the average age around 5 to 8 years old.
The mortality rate may be as ऊँची as 5 %, पूरा रिकवरी is देखी in 50 to 75 % of मामले, जबकि up to 70 to 90 % recover with some minor residual disability.
The average समय to रिकवर is एक to six months.
ADEM produces अनेक जलन lesions in the brain and spinal cord, particularly in the white matter.
Usually these are found in the subcortical और सेंट्रल श्वेत पदार्थ और cortical gray-white जंक्शन of दोनो cerebral hemispheres, cerebellum, brainstem, and spinal cord, but periventricular white matter and gray matter of the cortex, thalami and basal ganglia may also be involved.
When the patient suffers more than one demyelinating episode, it is called तूल disseminated encephalomyelitis or multiphasic disseminated encephalomyelitis ( MDEM ).
The stomach is a muscular, hollow, dilated part of the पाचन प्रणाली जिससे कृत्यों as an महत्वपूर्ण organ of the digestive tract in some animals, including vertebrates, echinoderms, insects ( mid-gut ), and molluscs.
It is involved in the second phase of पाचन, following mastication ( chewing ).
The stomach is located between the ग्रासनाल and the small intestine.
It secretes protein-digesting enzymes called protease and strong acids to aid in food digestion, ( sent to it via esophageal peristalsis ) through चिकना muscular contortions ( पुकारा segmentation ) पहले sending partially digested food ( chyme ) to the small intestines.
The word stomach is derived from the Latin stomachus which is derived from the Greek word stomachos ( στόμαχος ), ultimately इससे stoma ( ), `` मुँह ''.
The words gastro- and gastric ( meaning related to the पेट ) हैं दोनो निकला इससे the Greek word gaster ( ).
1940 Pontiac खास श्रेणी 25 Woodie
A woodie is a car body style, especially a स्टेशन वैगन, जहाँ the पश्च bodywork is constructed of wood framework with infill panels of wood or painted metal.
After the demise of actual wood construction, निर्माताओं प्रयुक्त अनुकरण woodgrain चादर vinyl—sometimes augmented with three-dimensional, simulated framework—to recall wood construction.
In 2008, wood construction was evoked abstractly on the घाट फ्लेक्स साथ a श्रेणी of side and rear horizontal grooves.
A pearl is a hard object produced within the soft tissue ( specifically the mantle ) of a living shelled mollusc.
Just like the shell of a clam, a pearl is बना up of कैल्सियम कार्बोनेट in minute crystalline form, which has been deposited in concentric layers.
The ideal पर्ल is perfectly गोलाकार और चिकना, but many other shapes of pearls ( baroque pearls ) occur.
The finest quality natural pearls have been highly valued as gemstones and objects of beauty for many centuries, and because of this, the शब्द पर्ल रै become a रूपक लिये कुछ बहुत विरल, ठीक, सराहनीय, और valuable.
The most मूल्यवान मोती occur अनायास in the wild, but they are extremely rare.
These wild pearls are referred to as प्राकृतिक pearls.
Cultured or farmed pearls from pearl oysters और freshwater mussels मेक up the बहुमत of those that are currently sold.
नकल मोती हैं भी widely बेची in inexpensive आभूषण, but the quality of their iridescence is usually very poor, and often, artificial pearls are easily distinguished from genuine pearls.
Pearls have been harvested और cultivated primarily लिये use in jewelry, but in the past they were also stitched onto lavish clothing.
Pearls have भी महरूम कुचल और used in cosmetics, medicines, and in paint formulations.
whether जंगली or संस्कारी, gem quality pearls are almost always nacreous and, as is the interior of the shell that produces them.
However, almost all species of shelled molluscs हैं सक्षम of producing मोती ( formally referred to as `` calcareous concretions '' by some sources ) of lesser shine or less spherical shape.
Although these may also be legitimately referred to as `` pearls '' by gemological लैब्स और भी अंतर्गत u.S. संघीय व्यापार आयोग नियम, and are formed in the same way, most of them have no value, except as curiosities.
Bing ( known previously as Live Search, Windows Live Search, and MSN Search ) is a web search engine ( advertised as a `` decision engine `` ) इससे microsoft.
bing थी अनावरण by microsoft सीईओ स्टीव बाल्मर on may 28, 2009 at the All Things Digital conference in San Diego for release on June 1.
Notable परिवर्तन शामिल the लिस्टिंग of ढूंढें सुझाव while queries are entered and a list of related searches ( called `` Explore pane '' ) based on semantic technology from Powerset which Microsoft purchased in 2008.
On July 29, 2009, Microsoft and Yahoo ! announced a deal in जिससे bing होता शक्ति याहू ! Search.
All Yahoo ! Search global customers and partners are expected to have बना the परिवर्तन by जल्दी 2012.
In October 2011, Bing announced it was working on नई back-end ढूंढें अवसंरचना, with the goal of delivering faster and slightly more relevant search results for users.
Known as `` Tiger '', the new index-serving प्रौद्योगिकी रै महरूम incorporated into bing globally, since August 2011.
In May 2012, Bing announced another redesign of its search engine that includes `` Sidebar '', a social feature that खोज उपयोक्ता ' सोशल संजाल लिये सूचना प्रासंगिक to the ढूंढें क्वैरी.
A diagram showing an I Formation on offense and a 4-3 गठन on रक्षा
In American फ़ुटबॉल, प्रत्येक टोली रै ग्यारह players on the field at one time.
The specific role that a खिलाड़ी takes on the फ़ील्ड is called their position.
Under the modern rules of American football, teams are allowed unlimited subsititutions, कि is टीमों may बदलें कोई क्रमांक of players after any play.
This has resulted in the development of three `` platoons '' of players, the offense ( the team with the ball, जो is trying to स्कोर ), the रक्षा ( the टोली trying to prevent the other team from scoring, and to take the ball from them ), and the special teams ( who play in kicking situations ).
Within those platoons, विभिन्न विशिष्ट स्थितियाँ मौजूद depending on what the player 's main job is.
The Irish people ( or na hÉireannaigh ; Ulster-Scots : Airish fowk ) are an ethnic group who originate in आयरलैंड, an द्वीप in northwestern यूरोपीय.
आयरलैंड रै महरूम आबादी लिये around 9,000 years ( according to archaeological studies, see Prehistoric Ireland ).
The Irish people 's earliest ancestors are recorded in legends – they are claimed to be descended from groups ऐसे as the nemedians, fomorians, fir bolg, tuatha dé danann और the milesians.
Lebor gabála érenn, a किताब of आयरिश mythology tells that Milesians were Scythian descendants.
The main groups that interacted with the आयरिश in the मध्य आयु शामिल the Picts, Scots, and the Vikings.
Due to this contact, icelanders हैं विख्यात लिये having some Irish descent.
The anglo-norman आक्रमण of the ऊँची मध्य आयु, the अंग्रेज़ी बागानों and the subsequent English rule of the country introduced the Normans and Flemish into Ireland.
Welsh, picts, bretons, और छोटी पार्टियों of Gauls and even Anglo-Saxons are known in Ireland from much earlier times.
There have been अनेक notable आयरिश people throughout history.
The 6th century Irish monk and missionary Columbanus is regarded as एक of the `` fathers of यूरोपीय '', followed by Kilian of Würzburg and Vergilius of Salzburg.
The scientist Robert Boyle is considered the `` पिता of रसायन ``.
Famous Irish explorers शामिल ब्रेंडन the नाविक, रॉबर्ट McClure, Ernest Shackleton and Tom Crean.
By some accounts, the first European child born in North America था आयरिश descent on दोनो पहलू ; और an irishman थी the पहला यूरोपीय to set foot on American soil in Columbus ' expedition of 1492.
There are descendants of Irish people living in अनेक पश्चिमी देशों, विशेषकर in English-speaking countries.
Historically, emigration has been caused by politics, famine and आर्थिक मुद्दे.
An estimated 50 to 80 million people are descendants of आयरिश लोगों, primarily in the संयुक्त किंगडम, the संयुक्त राज्य, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, कनाडा और आइसलैंड ; there are also smaller numbers in Argentina, Chile, Mexico, Jamaica, Barbados, South Africa, New Zealand, France, Germany and Brazil.
The largest number of वंशजों of आयरिश लोगों live in the United States.
The number of people living in ऑस्ट्रेलिया जो हैं of आयरिश descent is उच्चतर, as a प्रतिशत of total population, than that of any other country.
लगभग चालीस प्रतिशत of the उपनिवेश population of Iceland came from Ireland or Scotland.
The very पहला निवासियों of Iceland were Irish.
The Hubble Space Telescope ( HST ) is a space telescope that was carried into orbit by a Space Shuttle in 1990 और remains in आपरेशन.
A aperture telescope in low Earth orbit, Hubble 's four प्रमुख यंत्र observe in the near ultraviolet, visible, and near infrared.
The telescope is named after the astronomer एडविन Hubble.
Hubble 's orbit outside the distortion of Earth 's atmosphere allows it to लो अत्यधिक शार्प बिंब साथ almost no background light.
Hubble 's Deep Field have महरूम कुछ of the सबसे detailed visible-light images ever, allowing a deep view into space and time.
Many Hubble observations have led to breakthroughs in astrophysics, such as accurately determining the rate of विस्तार of the ब्रह्मांड.
Although not the first स्पेस दूरदर्शी, हबल is एक of the largest और सबसे बहुमुखी, और is खूब ज्ञात as both a vital research tool and a public relations boon for astronomy.
The HST was built by the United States space agency NASA, with contributions इससे the यूरोपीय स्पेस एजेंसी, और is संचालित by the स्पेस दूरदर्शी Science Institute.
The HST is one of नासा 's ग्रेट observatories, साथ साथ the कॉम्पटन Gamma Ray Observatory, the Chandra X-ray Observatory, and the Spitzer Space Telescope.
Space telescopes यहूद प्रस्तावित as early as 1923.
Hubble was funded in the 1970s, with a proposed launch in 1983, but the project was beset by technical delays, बजट समस्याएं, and the Challenger disaster.
When finally launched in 1990, वैज्ञानिकों मिला कि the प्रमुख दर्पण था महरूम मैदान incorrectly, compromising the telescope 's capabilities.
the दूरदर्शी थी लौटी to इसके intended quality by a servicing mission in 1993.
Hubble is the only telescope designed to be सर्विस in space by astronauts.
Between 1993 and 2002, four missions repaired, upgraded, और replaced प्रणालियों on the दूरदर्शी ; a पांचवां मिशन थी रद्द on safety grounds following the Columbia disaster.
However, after spirited public discussion, NASA administrator माइक griffin स्वीकृत एक फाइनल servicing mission, completed in 2009 by Space Shuttle Atlantis.
The दूरदर्शी is अभी अपेक्षित to function until at least 2013.
Its scientific successor, the जेम्स webb स्पेस Telescope ( JWST ), is to be launched in 2018 or possibly later.
anti-inflammatory refers to the प्रॉपर्टी of a पदार्थ or treatment that reduces inflammation.
Anti-inflammatory drugs make up about half of analgesics, remedying pain by reducing सूजन as opposed to opioids, जिससे affect the central nervous system.
The Tonight Show is a US late-night बात दिखाएँ कि रै aired on NBC since 1954.
It is the longest currently running regularly scheduled entertainment program in the US and the third longest-running दिखाएँ on एनबीसी बाद मिलें the दबायें और Today.
The Tonight Show was hosted by स्टीव एलन ( 1954–1957 ), जोकर paar ( 1957–1962 ), जॉनी Carson ( 1962–1992 ), Jay Leno ( 1992–2009, 2010–present ), and Conan O'Brien ( 2009–2010 ).
Several guest hosts भी appeared, विशेषकर दौरान the Paar and Carson eras.
The longest-serving host to date was जॉनी कार्सन, जो hosted the tonight दिखाएँ अभिनीत Johnny Carson for 30 seasons from the fall of 1962 through the spring of 1992.
The वर्तमान मेजबान of the दिखाएँ is jay लीनो, जो था previously hosted the show from 1992 to 2009 and began his second tenure on March 1, 2010.
on अप्रैल 3, 2013, एनबीसी announced Jimmy Fallon would become the new host of The Tonight Show.
The Tonight दिखाएँ साथ jimmy fallon होगा प्रीमियर February 24, 2014, the day after the closing ceremonies of the 2014 Winter Olympics.
ss एंड्रिया Doria.
Pronounced was an ocean liner for the Italian Line ( Società di navigazione इटालिया ) घर ported in जेनोआ, इटली, सबसे प्रसिद्ध लिये इसके डूब in 1956, when 52 people died ( 51 from immediate impact ).
Named after the 16th-century Genoese admiral एंड्रिया डोरिया, the जलयान था a सकल register tonnage of 29,100 and a capacity of about 1,200 passengers and 500 crew.
For a country attempting to rebuild its economy and reputation after World War II, एंड्रिया डोरिया थी an प्रतीक of इतालवी नेशनल अभिमान.
Of all Italy 's जहाजों at the समय, एंड्रिया डोरिया थी the largest, तीव्रतम and supposedly safest.
Launched on 16 जून 1951, the जलयान undertook its maiden voyage on 14 January 1953.
On 25 July 1956, while the Andrea Doria was approaching the coast of nantucket, मैसाचुसेट्स, बंधी लिये नई यॉर्क नगर, the eastbound of the स्वीडिश American Line collided with it in what became one of history 's most infamous maritime disasters.
Struck in the side, the top-heavy Andrea Doria तत्काल प्रारंभ to सूची severely to starboard, which left half of its lifeboats unusable.
The consequent shortage of lifeboats might have resulted in significant loss of life, but the efficiency of the ship 's technical design allowed it to रहो afloat for over 11 hours after the ramming.
The good behavior of the crew, improvements in communications and the rapid जवाब of अन्य जहाजों averted a विपत्ति समान in scale to that of the in 1912.
1,660 passengers और क्रू यहूद बचाया और बच, while 46 people died as a consequence of the collision.
The evacuated लक्ज़री लाइनर capsized and sank the following morning.
This accident remains the worst मेरीटाइम विपत्ति to occur in संयुक्त राज्य waters since the sinking of the in 1915.
The incident and its aftermath यहूद heavily covered by the news media.
While the rescue efforts were both successful and commendable, the cause of the collision साथ the स्टॉकहोम और the घाटा of एंड्रिया डोरिया उत्पन्न much interest in the media and many lawsuits.
Largely because of an out-of-court settlement agreement between the दो शिपिंग कंपनियाँ दौरान hearings तत्काल बाद the disaster, no determination of the cause ( s ) was ever formally published.
Although greater दोष appeared initially to पतन on the इतालवी लाइनर, अधिक हाल discoveries have indicated कि a misreading of रडार on the स्वीडिश जलयान may have initiated the collision course, leading to errors on both ships.
Andrea Doria was the last major transatlantic passenger vessel to sink पहले वायुयान became the पसन्दीदा विधि of travel.
डायलिसिस tubing
Dialysis tubing is a type of semi- or partially permeable membrane tubing made from regenerated cellulose or cellophane.
It can be used for diffusion साथ solutes or परासरण if प्रयुक्त साथ जल only.
Osmosis is when water passes through a semi-permeable परत to reach equilibrium.
Diffusion, on the other hand, allows the movement of अणुओं इससे ऊँची विशेषज्ञता to कम विशेषज्ञता.
It will only allow molecules to pass through a semi-permeable झिल्ली or परत if the molecule is small enough to fit through the membrane or a membrane 's pore.
This usually results साथ the प्रभाव of diffusion through a झिल्ली तभी वाकई affects small molecules, and almost never larger molecules.
Dialysis tubing is प्रयुक्त in नैदानिक हालातों to ensure a filtered flow of molecules, preventing the flow of larger solute molecules.
Small molecules can be `` धोया '' आउट of a समाधान जिससे is उत्तेजित through the tubing into a solvent, usually water, which surrounds it and in which they can be flushed away.
in demonstrations of semi-permeable झिल्लियों, a समाधान containing several types of molecules, usually glucose and starch, is placed into a semi-permeable dialysis bag, such as a cellulose membrane with pores, and the bag is sealed with a knot or elastic band.
The sealed dialysis bag is placed in a संग्राहक of a अलग solution, or water.
Molecules small enough to pass through the tubing ( water, salts, monosaccharides, and other small molecules ) tend to move into or आउट of the डायलिसिस थैला in the direction of decreasing concentration, therefore displaying diffusion.
Larger molecules ( such as proteins, or polysaccharides ) that have dimensions significantly greater than the pore व्यास हैं retained अंदर the dialysis bag.
The water and smaller solutes in a hypotonic solution ( a solution that has a lesser solute concentration than the solution it is referenced to ) will cross a semi-permeable membrane, like dialysis tubing, into a hypertonic समाधान ( a समाधान कि रै a उच्चतर solute विशेषज्ञता than the समाधान it is संदर्भित to ) in an attempt to पहुँचें संतुलन, जहाँ the solute विशेषज्ञता of प्रत्येक समाधान is in संतुलन.
पारा प्रयोगशाला thermometer
A thermometer ( इससे the यूनानी, thermos, अर्थ `` hot '' और μἐτρον, metron, `` measure '' ) is a device that measures temperature or temperature gradient using a variety of different principles.
A thermometer has two important elements : the temperature sensor ( e.g. the bulb on a mercury-in-glass thermometer ) in जिससे कुछ शारीरिक बदलें occurs साथ तापमान, प्लस कुछ अर्थात् of converting इस शारीरिक बदलें into a numerical value ( e.g. the visible scale that is marked on a mercury-in-glass thermometer ).
वहीँ हैं अनेक प्रकार और अनेक uses for thermometers, as detailed below in sections of this article.
Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs is a 1937 अमरीकी एनिमेटेड musical काल्पनिक फिल्मी उत्पादित by वॉल्ट Disney and released by RKO Radio Pictures.
Based on the German fairy tale by the Brothers Grimm, it is the पहला full-length cel एनिमेटेड विशेषता फिल्मी और the earliest in the Walt Disney Animated Classics series.
The story was adapted by storyboard artists Dorothy Ann Blank, Richard Creedon, Merrill De मारिस, ओटो englander, अर्ल hurd, Dick Rickard, Ted Sears and Webb Smith.
David Hand was the supervising director, while William Cottrell, Wilfred Jackson, Larry Morey, perce pearce, और बेन sharpsteen निर्देशित the फिल्मी 's व्यक्तिगत sequences.
Snow White premiered at the carthay वृत्त थिएटर on दिसम्बर 21, 1937, followed by a देशभर रिलीज on फ़रवरी 4, 1938, and with international earnings of $ 8 million during its initial release briefly assumed the record of highest grossing sound film at the time.
The popularity of the फिल्मी रै led to it होने re-released theatrically many times, until its home video release in the 1990s.
Adjusted for महंगाई, it is एक of the top ten performers at the North American box office.
At the 11th Academy Awards, Walt Disney was awarded an मानद ऑस्कर, और the फिल्मी थी मनोनीत लिये बेहतरीन Musical Score.
It was added to the United States National Film Registry in 1989 and is ranked in the American Film Institute 's list of the 100 greatest American films, जो भी नामित the फिल्मी as the महानतम अमरीकी एनिमेटेड फिल्मी of सब समय in 2008.
Disney 's take on the fairy tale has had a big cultural impact, resulting in a लोकप्रिय थीम पार्क आकर्षण, a video game, and a Broadway musical.
प्रसव, श्रमिक, डिलीवरी, जनम, partus, or parturition is the culmination of a pregnancy period with the expulsion of one or more newborn infants from a woman 's uterus.
The process of normal childbirth is categorized in three stages of labour : the shortening and dilation of the cervix, descent और जनम of the शिशु, और birth of the placenta.
In many cases and with increasing आवृत्ति, प्रसव is हासिल through प्रेरण of मजदूर or caesarean खण्ड, which is the removal of the neonate through a surgical incision in the abdomen, rather than through vaginal birth.
Childbirth by C-Sections increased 50 % in the U.S. from 1996 to 2006, और comprise nearly 32 % of births in the U.S. and Canada.
With respect to induced labor, more than 22 % of महिलाओं undergo प्रेरण of labour in the United States.
Medical professional policy makers find that induced births and elective cesarean can be harmful to the भ्रूण और neonate as खूब as नुकसानदेह or बगैर लाभ to the माँ, और have स्थापित सख्त दिशानिर्देश लिये non-medically indicated induced births and elective cesarean before 39 weeks.
Viva La Bam was an MTV & Viva show which followed Bam Margera and his crew as they undertook challenges, performed स्टंट और traveled the world.
The show ran लिये 5 सीज़न between 2003 and 2005.
Flushed Away is a 2006 British/American computer animated action / एडवेंचर कॉमेडी फिल्मी निर्देशित by दाउद Bowers and Sam Fell.
It was made in the partnership between Aardman Animations और ड्रीमवर्क्स एनिमेशन, और is aardman 's पहला completely computer-animated feature as opposed to the usual stop-motion.
The film stars the voice talents of Hugh Jackman, केट विंसलेट, एंडी serkis, Bill Nighy, Ian McKellen, Shane Richie and Jean Reno.
The story was by Sam Fell, Peter Lord, Dick सहनशील, और इयान la frenais, और the पटकथा थी written by Dick Clement, Ian La Frenais, Christopher Lloyd, Joe Keenan, and William Davies.
the फिल्मी थी released in us on 3 नवम्बर 2006, और in uk on दिसम्बर 1 2006, and was distributed by Paramount Pictures, except for Switzerland, Spain, and the Netherlands, which were handled by Universal Pictures.
the अटलांटा braves are a professional baseball team based in Atlanta.
The Braves are a member of the पूर्वी प्रभाग of प्रमुख लीग Baseball 's National League.
The Braves have played in टर्नर फ़ील्ड since 1997.
The `` Braves '' name, which was पहला प्रयुक्त in 1912, originates from a term for a Native American warrior.
They are nicknamed `` the Bravos '', and often referred to as `` America 's Team `` in reference to the team 's खेल होने ब्रॉडकास्ट on the nationally उपलब्धियाँ tbs इससे the 1970s until 2007, gaining a wide fanbase.
From 1991 to 2005 the Braves were one of the सबसे कामयाब franchises in बेसबॉल, जीतना प्रभाग शीर्षक an unprecedented 14 लगातार टाइम्स in that period ( omitting the strike-shortened 1994 season in which there were no official division champions ).
the braves जीती the nl वेस्ट 1991–93 और the nl ईस्ट 1995–2005, और returned to the playoffs as the National League Wild Card in 2010.
The Braves advanced to the World Series five टाइम्स in the 1990s, जीतना the शीर्षक in 1995.
Since their debut in the National League in 1876, the मताधिकार रै जीती 16 डिवीजनल शीर्षक, 17 नेशनल लीग pennants, as खूब as three World Series championships—in 1914 as the Boston Braves, in 1957 as the Milwaukee Braves, and in 1995 in Atlanta.
The Braves are the only MLB मताधिकार to have won the World Series in three different home cities.
The club is one of the National League 's two remaining charter franchises ( the other being the Chicago Cubs ) and was founded in बोस्टन, मैसाचुसेट्स, in 1871 as the बोस्टन रेड stockings ( not to be confused with the American League 's Boston Red Sox ).
They are considered `` the oldest continuously playing team in प्रमुख उत्तर अमरीकी खेल. ''
There is an argument as to जो is दरअसल पुरानी क्युकी हालांकि the शावक हैं a पूरा ऋतु `` पुरानी '' ( formed as the Chicago White Stockings in 1870 ) Chicago lost two seasons to the Great Chicago Fire, thus the Braves have played more consecutive seasons.
After various name changes ( such as the बोस्टन beaneaters ), the टोली संचालित as the Boston Braves for most of the first half of the 20th century.
In 1953, the team moved to Milwaukee, Wisconsin and became the Milwaukee Braves, followed by the मूव to अटलांटा in 1966.
The team 's tenure in Atlanta is famous for Hank Aaron breaking Babe Ruth 's करियर घर चलाएं रिकार्ड in 1974, हालांकि the बहुमत of आरोन 's घर runs were hit while the team was in Milwaukee.
His record stood जबतक 2007, जब सैन फ्रांसिस्को बाएँ fielder Barry Bonds broke the record.
The पत्ते of a Beech tree
3D rendering of a μCT scan of a पत्ता टुकड़ा, resolution circa 40 μm/ voxel.
A पत्ता is an अंग of a vascular संयंत्र, as पारिभाषित in botanical terms, and in particular in plant morphology.
Foliage is a द्रव्यमान संज्ञा कि refers to leaves as a feature of plants.
Typically a leaf is a thin, flattened organ borne above ground and specialized लिये photosynthesis, लकिन अनेक प्रकार of पत्ते हैं adapted in तरीके लगभग unrecognisable in those शर्तें : some are not flat ( for example many succulent leaves and conifers ), some are not above ground ( such as bulb scales ), and some are without major photosynthetic function ( consider for example cataphylls, spines, and cotyledons ).
Conversely, many structures of non-vascular plants, or even of some lichens, which are not plants at सब ( in the भाव of होने सदस्यों of the किंगडम plantae ), do look and function much like leaves.
Furthermore, several structures found in vascular plants look like leaves but are not actually पत्ते ; वे differ इससे पत्ते in उनके structures और origins.
Examples शामिल phyllodes, cladodes, and phylloclades.

Our Gang ( also known as The Little Rascals or Hal Roach 's Rascals ) are a series of अमरीकी कॉमेडी छोटी films परिचय a समूह of ग़रीब पड़ोस children and their adventures.
निर्मित by कॉमेडी निर्माता एचएएल रोच, the श्रेणी is विख्यात लिये प्रर्दशित children behaving in a relatively natural way, as Roach and original director Robert F. McGowan worked to film the unaffected, raw nuances apparent in regular children rather than have them imitate adult acting styles.
In addition, Our Gang notably put लड़कों, लड़कियों, whites और अश्वेतों साथ in a समूह as बराबरी, कुछ कि `` broke new ground, '' according to film historian Leonard Maltin.
Such a thing had never महरूम किया पहले in सिनेमा लकिन has since been repeated after the success of Our Gang.
The पहला उत्पादन at the रोच स्टुडियो in 1922 was a series of silent short subjects.
When रोच बदला वितरकों इससे pathé to metro-goldwyn-mayer ( MGM ) in 1927, and converted the series to sound in 1929, the series took off even further.
Production जारी at the रोच स्टुडियो जबतक 1938, when the series was sold to MGM, who then continued producing the comedies until 1944.
The Our Gang series शामिल a कुल of 220 shorts and one feature film, General Spanky, featuring over forty-one child actors.
As MGM retained the rights to the Our Gang ट्रेडमार्क following उनके खरीदें of the उत्पादन अधिकारों, the 80 roach-produced `` टॉकीज़ '' यहूद syndicated for television under the title The Little Rascals beginning in 1955.
Both Roach 's The Little Rascals package ( now owned by CBS Television Distribution ) and MGM 's Our Gang package ( now owned by Warner Bros. Entertainment ) have since remained in syndication, with periodic new प्रोडक्शन्स आधारित on the शॉर्ट्स surfacing over the सालो, सहित a 1994 छोटी दुष्टों विशेषता फिल्मी released by Universal Pictures.
Zacharias Janssen ( also Zacharias Jansen or Sacharias Jansen ) ( b.1580-88, d.pre-1632 to 1638 ) was a Dutch spectacle-maker from middelburg संबद्ध साथ the आविष्कार of the पहला ऑप्टिकल दूरदर्शी.
janssen is sometimes भी credited for inventing the first truly compound microscope.
However, the origin of the सूक्ष्मदर्शी, बस जैसे the origin of the telescope, is a matter of debate.
Lake Tahoe ( ; Washo : dáʔaw ) is a विशाल freshwater झील in the सिएरा Nevada of the United States.
At a surface elevation of, it is located along the किनारा between कैलिफ़ोर्निया और नेवाडा, west of Carson City.
Lake tahoe is the largest alpine lake in North America.
Its गहराई is, बनाना it the संयुक्त राज्य 's second-deepest ( the deepest is Crater Lake in Oregon, being deeper, at ).
additionally, झील tahoe is listed as the 26th largest lake by volume in the world at.
The lake was formed about 2 million years ago and is a part of the Lake Tahoe Basin with the आधुनिक झील होने तराशा दौरान the बर्फ ages.
It is known for the clarity of its water and the panorama of surrounding kyu on सब sides.
The area surrounding the झील is भी referred to as झील tahoe, or simply Tahoe.
Lake Tahoe is a major पर्यटक आकर्षण in दोनो नेवाडा and California.
It is home to a number of ski resorts, summer outdoor मनोरंजन, और पर्यटक attractions.
Snow and skiing are a significant भाग of the क्षेत्रफल 's अर्थव्यवस्था और प्रतिष्ठा.
Mountain and झील नजारा हैं आकर्षण throughout the year.
the नेवाडा पक्ष भी includes large casinos.
Highways provide year-round अभिगम इससे रेनो, Carson City, and Sacramento.

The Twenty-seventh Amendment ( Amendment XXVII ) prohibits any law that increases or decreases the salary of members of the Congress from taking effect until the start of the अगला नियत of शर्तें of दफ्तर लिये प्रतिनिधि.
It is the most हाल amendment to the संयुक्त States Constitution.
It was सुपुर्द to the राज्य लिये अनुसमर्थन in 1789 and was adopted in 1992.
“First they came... ” is a famous बयान और उत्तेजक कविता attributed to पादरी मार्टिन niemöller ( 1892–1984 ) परिचय the सुस्ती of German intellectuals following the Nazis ' rise to power and the subsequent purging of their chosen targets, group after group.
There is some disagreement over the exact wording of the quotation and when it was निर्मित ; the सामग्री of the quotation may have महरूम presented differently by Niemöller on different occasions.

Four तिहाई logo
The Four Thirds system is a मानक निर्मित by ओलम्पस और कोडक लिये डिजिटल single-lens reflex camera ( DSLR ) design and development. < ref name='DPReview.com 2001-02-13 ' >
The system provides a मानक कि, साथ डिजिटल कैमरे और lenses available from multiple manufacturers, allows for the interchange of lenses and bodies from different manufacturers.
seems to cover the मानक.
Proponents describe it as an खोलें मानक, लकिन कंपनियाँ may only use it under a non-disclosure agreement.
Unlike older slr प्रणालियों, चार तिहाई रै महरूम designed इससे the मैदान up to be entirely digital.
Many lenses are extensively computerized, to the पाइंट कि ओलम्पस offers firmware updates for many of them.
Lens design has been tailored to the आवश्यकताएँ of डिजिटल सेंसर, सबसे notably through telecentric designs.
The size of the sensor is significantly smaller than for most DSLRs और इस implies कि lenses, विशेषकर telephoto lenses, can be छोटी.
For example, a Four Thirds लेंस साथ a 300 mm फोकल लंबाई होता कवर परिचय the वही कोण of view as a 600 mm focal length lens for the 35 mm film standard, and is correspondingly more compact.
Thus, the Four Thirds System has crop factor ( focal length multiplier ) of about 2, and while this enables longer focal लंबाई लिये वृहद आवर्धन, it करता n't सहायता the manufacture of चौड़ी कोण lenses.
The image sensor format, generally इंटरमीडिएट between those of larger SLRs and smaller compact cameras, generally gives levels of cost, performance and convenience intermediate between those two classes.
HVAC systems उपयोग वेंटिलेशन एयर नलिकाएं संस्थापित throughout a भवन to सप्लाई conditioned एयर to a room through outlet vents, called diffusers ; and ducts to remove air through return-air grilles.
hvac ( हीटिंग, वेंटिलेशन, और एयर कंडीशनिंग ) is the technology of indoor and automotive environmental comfort.
HVAC system design is a subdiscipline of mechanical engineering, based on the principles of thermodynamics, द्रव यांत्रिकी, और ऊष्मा ट्रांसफ़र.
Refrigeration is sometimes added to the field 's abbreviation as HVAC & R or HVACR, or ventilating is dropped as in HACR ( such as the नामांकन of hacr-rated सर्किट breakers ).
HVAC is महत्वपूर्ण in the डिज़ाइन of मीडियम to विशाल औद्योगिक और दफ्तर इमारतें ऐसे as skyscrapers और in marine environments such as aquariums, where safe and healthy building conditions are regulated with respect to temperature and humidity, using fresh air from outdoors.
Ventilation on the downdraught प्रणाली, by impulsion, or the 'plenum ' principle, applied to schoolrooms ( 1899 )
Heating, ventilating, and air conditioning is based on inventions and discoveries made by निकोलय lvov, माइकल फैराडे, विलिस वाहक, reuben Trane, James Joule, William Rankine, Sadi Carnot, and many others.
The invention of the components of HVAC systems went hand-in-hand with the industrial revolution, and new methods of modernization, higher दक्षता, और प्रणाली कंट्रोल हैं constantly introduced by कंपनियाँ और आविष्कारक worldwide.
The three central functions of heating, ventilating, और air-conditioning हैं interrelated, especially with the need to provide thermal comfort and acceptable indoor air quality within reasonable installation, operation, and maintenance costs.
HVAC systems can provide ventilation, reduce air घुसपैठ, और maintain दबाव संबंध between spaces.
The अर्थात् of एयर डिलीवरी and removal from spaces is known as room air distribution.
The starting point in carrying out an estimate both for cooling and हीटिंग depends on the exterior जलवायु और आंतरिक निर्दिष्ट conditions.
However before taking up the ऊष्मा लोड गणना, it is जरुरी to ढूँढें भैस एयर आवश्यकताएँ लिये each area in detail, as pressurization is an important consideration.
In modern buildings the design, installation, and कंट्रोल प्रणालियों of ये कृत्यों हैं एकीकृत into एक or अधिक HVAC systems.
For very small buildings, contractors normally क्षमता इंजीनियर और चुनें hvac systems and equipment.
For larger इमारतें, भवन सेवाएं designers और इंजीनियर्स, ऐसे as mechanical, architectural, or building services engineers analyze, design, and specify the HVAC systems, and specialty mechanical contractors fabricate and commission them.
Building permits और code-compliance inspections of the संस्थापना are normally required for all sizes of buildings.
The HVAC industry is a worldwide enterprise, with roles including operation and maintenance, system design and construction, उपकरण निर्माण और बिक्री, और in शिक्षा और research.
The HVAC industry was historically regulated by the manufacturers of HVAC equipment, but regulating and मानकों संगठन ऐसे as hardi, ashrae, smacna, एसीसीए, वर्दी mechanical कोड, अंतरराष्ट्रीय mechanical कोड, और amca have महरूम स्थापित to support the industry and encourage high standards and achievement.
Royal Navy कमांडर जेम्स बंध, cmg, rnvr, is a fictional अक्षर created by British journalist and novelist Ian Fleming in 1953.
He is the protagonist of the जेम्स बंध श्रेणी of novels, films, comics and video games.
Fleming wrote twelve बंध novels और दो छोटी स्टोरी संग्रहण पहले उसके मौत, हालांकि the last two books— The Man with the Golden Gun and Octopussy and The Living Daylights —were published posthumously.
The Bond character is a Secret Service agent, कोड क्रमांक 007, residing in लंदन but active internationally.
Bond was a composite character who was based on a number of commandos whom Fleming knew दौरान उसके सेवा in the नवल प्रज्ञा प्रभाग दौरान संसार युद्ध ii, to जिसको फ्लेमिंग added his own style and a number of his own tastes ; Bond 's name was appropriated from American ornithologist James Bond.
Bond रै a क्रमांक of अक्षर traits जिससे चलाएं throughout the किताबे, सहित an enjoyment of cars, a love of food and drink, and an average intake of sixty custom-made cigarettes a day.
Since Fleming 's death in 1964, there have been other authorised लेखक of बंध सामग्री, सहित जॉन गार्डनर, जो लिखा चौदह novels और दो novelizations and Raymond Benson, who wrote six novels, three novelizations and three short stories.
There have also been three authors who लिखा एक किताब प्रत्येक, किंग्सले एमिस ( लिखने as रॉबर्ट markham ), Sebastian Faulks and Jeffery Deaver.
additionally a श्रेणी of novels based on Bond 's youth— Young Bond —was written by Charlie Higson.
As spin-offs इससे the साहित्यिक works, वहीँ थी a टेलीविज़न अनुकूलन of the first novel, Casino Royale, in which Bond was played as an American agent.
A comic स्ट्रिप श्रेणी भी भागा in the रोज़ Express newspaper.
There have also been twenty-five Bond films ; सात अभिनेताओं have निभाई बंध in these films.
`` Nature Boy '' is a song by ईडन ahbez, published in 1947.
The song tells a fantasy of a `` strange enchanted boy... who wandered very far '' only to learn that `` the greatest thing... was just to love and be loved in वापसी ''.
Nat King Cole 's 1948 recording of the song was a प्रमुख hit और `` प्रकृति लड़के '' रै चूंकि become a पॉप और जैज़ मानक, with dozens of major artists interpreting the song.
Louisiana ( or ;, ; Louisiana Creole : Léta de la Lwizyàn ) is a state located in the southern प्रदेश of the संयुक्त States of America.
Louisiana is the 31st सबसे extensive और the 25th सबसे populous of the 50 United States.
Its capital is baton रूज और largest city is New Orleans.
louisiana is the तभी राज्य in the u.S. साथ राजनैतिक subdivisions termed parishes, which are local government 's equivalent to counties.
The largest parish by population is East Baton Rouge Parish, and the largest by जमीन क्षेत्रफल is cameron मोहल्ला.
Much of the state 's lands were formed इससे sediment धोया bas the मिसिसिपी नदी, leaving enormous deltas and vast areas of coastal marsh and swamp.
These contain a rich southern biota ; typical उदाहरण शामिल पक्षियों ऐसे as ibis and egrets.
There are also many species of tree मेंढक, और मछली ऐसे as sturgeon and paddlefish.
In more elevated areas, fire is a natural प्रक्रम in the लैंडस्केप, और रै उत्पादित extensive क्षेत्रों of longleaf pine forest and wet savannas.
These support an exceptionally large क्रमांक of संयंत्र प्रजाति, सहित अनेक प्रजाति of orchids और मांसाहारी plants.
Some Louisiana urban environments have a multicultural, multilingual heritage, being so strongly influenced by an जिसमें of 18th-century फ्रेंच, स्पेनी, देशी American ( Indian ) and African cultures that they are considered to be somewhat exceptional in the U.S.
Before the American purchase of the territory, the वर्तमान louisiana State had been both a Spanish and French colony.
In जोड, the पैटर्न of विकास शामिल importing numerous African slaves in the 18th century, with many from the same region of West Africa, thus concentrating their culture.
In the post-Civil War environment, Anglo-Americans increased the दबाव लिये anglicization, और in 1915, अंग्रेज़ी थी बना the only official language of the state.
Women 's rights are the rights and entitlements claimed for महिलाओं और लड़कियों of अनेक समाजों worldwide.
In some places these rights are institutionalized or supported by law, local custom, और आचरण, whereas in अन्य वे may be उपेक्षित or suppressed.
They differ from broader notions of human rights through दावा of an अंतर्निहित ऐतिहासिक और traditional bias against the exercise of rights by women and girls in favour of men and boys.
Issues commonly associated with notions of women 's rights include, though are not limited to, the right : to bodily integrity and autonomy ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to hold public office ; to work ; to fair wages or equal pay ; to own property ; to education ; to serve in the सैन्य or be conscripted ; to डालें into विधिक अनुबंध ; और to have वैवाहिक, parental and religious rights.
The laws of science or scientific laws are statements that describe, predict, and शायद बताइये क्यों, a दायरा of phenomena व्यवहार as वे appear to in nature.
the पद `` विधि '' रै विविध उपयोग in अनेक मामले : सन्निकट, सटीक, व्यापक or सीमित theories, in all natural scientific disciplines ( physics, chemistry, biology, geology, astronomy etc. ).
an analogous पद लिये a scientific law is a principle.
वैज्ञानिक विधिs:
summarize a large संग्रहण of तथ्य संकल्पित by experiment into a single statement,
can usually be formulated mathematically as one or several statements or equation, or at least stated in a single sentence, so that it can be used to predict the outcome of an प्रयोग, दिए the आरंभिक, boundary, और अन्य शारीरिक शर्तें of the processes which take place,
are strongly supported by empirical evidence - they are वैज्ञानिक ज्ञान कि प्रयोग have repeatedly सत्यापित ( and never falsified ).
उनके सटीकता करता नहीं बदलें जब नई theories हैं worked आउट, लकिन rather the scope of application, since the equation ( if any ) representing the law does not change.
As with other scientific knowledge, they do not have absolute certainty like mathematical theorems or identities, and it is सदा संभावित लिये a विधि to be विकल by future observations.
are often quoted as a आधारभूत controlling influence rather than a description of observed facts.
I.e. `` the कानून of गति require that ''
Laws differ from hypotheses और postulates, जिससे हैं प्रस्तावित दौरान the scientific process before and during validation by experiment and observation.
These are not laws since they have not been verified to the same उपाधि और may नहीं be fear सामान्य, हालांकि they may lead to the formulation of laws.
A law is a अधिक solidified और औपचारिक बयान, distilled from repeated experiment.
Although the concepts of a law or principle in nature is borderline to philosophy, and presents the गहराई to जिससे गणित can describe प्रकृति, वैज्ञानिक कानून हैं माना इससे a वैज्ञानिक परिप्रेक्ष्य और follow the वैज्ञानिक विधि ; वे `` serve उनके purpose '' बल्कि than `` questioning reality '' ( philosophical ) or `` statements of logical absolution '' ( mathematical ).
For example, whether a law `` refers to reality '' is a philosophical समस्या, बल्कि than scientific.
Fundamentally, all scientific laws follow इससे भौतिकी, कानून जिससे occur in other sciences ultimately follow from physical laws.
Often, from mathematically fundamental viewpoints, सार्वभौमिक स्थिरांक emerge इससे scientific laws.

Lauren Fenmore baldwin ( formerly विलियम्स और grainger ) is a fictional अक्षर from the CBS soap operas The Young and the Restless and The Bold and the Beautiful, portrayed by Tracey E. Bregman.
वो बना उसके डेब्यू दौरान the episode airing on January 21, 1983.

in 2013, it थी घोषित कि Bregman had been placed on contract.

The 2010 NBA Finals was the National Basketball संघ ( एनबीए ) चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी लिये the 2009–10 season.
The best-of-seven playoff थी लडे between the लॉस एंजिल्स लेकर्स, champions of the पश्चिमी Conference and defending NBA champions, and the Boston Celtics, champions of the Eastern Conference.
The Lakers defeated the सेल्टिक्स, चार खेल to तीन, to win the franchise 's 16th NBA championship.
The 64th edition of the championship series was played between June 3 and June 17, थी ब्रॉडकास्ट on एबीसी, और थी देखी by an औसत of 18.1 million people.
The Celtics earned their berth into the playoffs by winning the Atlantic Division.
The Lakers जीती the प्रशांत प्रभाग to earn their berth.
The Celtics reached the NBA Finals by defeating the Miami Heat in the best-of-seven Eastern सम्मेलन पहला गोलाकार, the क्लीवलैंड cavaliers in the best-of-seven पूर्वी सम्मेलन semifinals, and defending Eastern conference champion Orlando Magic in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference Finals.
The Lakers reached the NBA Finals by defeating the Oklahoma City Thunder in the best-of-seven Western सम्मेलन पहला गोलाकार, the यूटा जैज़ in the best-of-seven पश्चिमी सम्मेलन semifinals, and the Phoenix Suns in the best-of-seven Western Conference Finals.
The NBA Finals were scheduled in the Major League Baseball World Series 2–3–2 seven game format, with the Lakers possessing home-court लाभ as a बदला लिये finishing साथ better regular season record than the Celtics.
Repeated baskets from starters Kobe Bryant, Pau Gasol, and Ron Artest brought the Lakers close to विजय in खेल 1.
A record breaking performance from Ray Allen 's eight three-point baskets ensured the Celtics a Game 2 triumph.
Derek Fisher ’s 11 points in the चौथी क्वार्टर helped the लेकर्स जीत खेल 3.
The Celtics won Game 4 ; it did n't hurt that they netted an excellent performance in baskets by the team’s reserves, जबकि Paul Pierce led the team to a Game 5 win with 27 points on 57 % shooting from the floor.
The Lakers avoided elimination by winning a decisive Game 6 with 24 अंक contributed by उनके बेंच.
Although they trailed the Celtics by 13 points early in the third quarter, the Lakers rallied and won their second consecutive championship by taking over an exciting Game 7 aided by लेट योगदान on ठोकर by pau gasol और artest और rebounding.
Bryant was named सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी of the Finals for his second consecutive trophy.
This was the first NBA Finals to go the full seven खेल चूंकि और तभी the चौथी चूंकि the NBA Finals returned to a 2–3–2 format in.
The Laker franchise has 16 NBA Championships ( पाँच in मिनियापोलिस, 11 in लॉस एंजिल्स ) trailing the Celtics ' seventeen championships.
The NBA Finals used the `` World Series '' Format in 1949 Minneapolis Lakers defeated the Washington Capitols 4 games to 2 ; in 1953 मिनियापोलिस पराजित the नई यॉर्क knicks 4 खेल to 1 ; in 1954 मिनियापोलिस defeated the Syracuse Nationals 4 games to 3 ; and in 1955 Syracuse Nationals defeated the Fort Wayne Pistons 4 games to 3.
The NBA would return to the 2–2–1–1–1 National हॉकी लीग सात खेल श्रेणी format until 1985.
Black pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering बेल in the परिवार piperaceae, cultivated for its fruit, which is usually dried and used as a spice and seasoning.
The fruit, known as a peppercorn when dried, is लगभग in व्यास, अंधेरा रेड जब fully वयस्क, और, जैसे सब drupes, contains a single seed.
Peppercorns, and the ground pepper derived from them, may be वर्णित बस as pepper, or अधिक precisely as ब्लैक pepper ( cooked and dried unripe fruit ), green pepper ( dried unripe fruit ) and white pepper ( dried ripe seeds ).
Black pepper is native to south India, and is extensively cultivated वहीँ और elsewhere in tropical regions.
Currently Vietnam is the world 's largest producer and exporter of pepper, producing 34 % of the संसार 's पाइपर nigrum crop as of 2008.
Dried ground pepper रै महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि प्राचीनता for both its flavour and as a medicine.
Black pepper is the world 's सबसे traded मसाला.
It is one of the most common spices added to यूरोपीय भोजन और its descendants.
The spiciness of black pepper is due to the रासायनिक piperine, नहीं to be उलझन साथ the capsaicin that gives fleshy peppers theirs.
It is in the modern world, प्रायः युग्म साथ salt.
In cardiovascular physiology, ejection fraction ( EF ) represents the आयतनी भिन्न of रक्त उत्तेजित आउट of the ventricle ( दिल ) with each heart beat or cardiac cycle.
It can be applied to either the right ventricle जिससे ejects via the pulmonary वाल्व into the pulmonary परिसंचरण or the बाएँ ventricle which ejects via the aortic valve into the systemic circulation.
Imaging of the physiology of the mammalian heart is the art that allows सार्थक गणितीय अभिव्यक्ति धमक EF.
noninvasive हृदय इमेजिंग रै become a worldwide utility enabling study of cardiac performance reproducibly and inexpensively.
Simplified, Ejection भिन्न is a गणितीय उत्पाद अनुमत by cardiac imaging.
As a mathematical term, ejection भिन्न is an एक्सटेंशन of the work of Adolph Fick in cardiac output.
Dedicated technology such as इकोकार्डियोग्राफी, computed टोमोग्राफी, चुम्बकीय अनुनाद इमेजिंग और muga स्कैनिंग have definitively allowed clinically relevant mathematics regarding Ischemia, Congenital Heart Disease and Heart Failure.
The prosecutor is the chief विधिक प्रतिनिधि of the अभियोजन in countries with either the common law adversarial system, or the civil law inquisitorial system.
The prosecution is the legal party जिम्मेदार लिये पेश the मामला in a criminal trial against an individual accused of breaking the law.

Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd allāh इब्न ʿabd al-muṭṭalib इब्न hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 जून 632 ), भी transliterated as मुहम्मद ( ), थी a धार्मिक, political, and military leader from Mecca who unified Arabia into a single religious polity under Islam.
He is believed by मुसलमान और bahá'ís to be a messenger and prophet of God.
Muhammad is almost universally माना by मुसलमान as the पिछला prophet sent by God for mankind.
non-muslims लिहाज़ Muhammad as the founder of Islam.
Muslims consider him to be the restorer of an unaltered original monotheistic आस्था of आदम, नूह, अब्राहम, मूसा, यीशु, and other prophets.
Born in about 570 CE in the Arabian city of मक्का, he was orphaned at an early age and brought up under the care of his uncle Abu Talib.
He बाद worked ज़्यादातर as a merchant, as well as a shepherd, and was first married by age 25.
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a cave in the surrounding kyu लिये अनेक नाइट्स of seclusion और दुआ, he later reported that it was there, at age 40, that he received his first revelation from God.
Three years after this event मुहम्मद प्रारंभ उपदेश ये revelations publicly, proclaiming that `` God is One ``, that complete `` surrender '' to Him ( lit.
islām ) is the only रास्ता ( dīn ) स्वीकार्य to परमेश्वर, और कि he खुद was a prophet and messenger of God, in the same vein as other Islamic prophets.
Muhammad gained few followers early on, and was मिले साथ दुश्मनी इससे some Meccan tribes ; he and his followers were treated harshly.
To escape persecution, मुहम्मद भेजा कुछ of उसके अनुसरणकर्ता to अबीसीनिया पहले he and his followers in Mecca migrated to Medina ( then known as Yathrib ) in the year 622.
This event, the Hijra, marks the शुरूआत of the Islamic calendar, which is also known as the Hijri Calendar.
In मदीना, मुहम्मद संयुक्त the tribes under the Constitution of Medina.
After eight years of fighting with the Meccan tribes, his followers, who by then had grown to 10,000, took कंट्रोल of मक्का in the largely शांतिपूर्ण Conquest of Mecca.
he नष्ट the pagan मूर्तियों in the नगर और तब भेजा उसके अनुसरणकर्ता out to destroy all of the remaining pagan temples in Eastern Arabia.
In 632, a few months after returning to मदीना इससे the विदाई Pilgrimage, Muhammad fell ill and died.
By the time of his death, most of the Arabian Peninsula had converted to Islam, and he had united अरब into a सिंगल मुस्लिम religious polity.
The revelations ( or ayah, lit.
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — which Muhammad reported receiving जबतक उसके मौत – रूप the आयतें of the कुरान, regarded by मुसलमान as the `` शब्द of परमेश्वर '' और around which the religion is based.
Besides the Quran, Muhammad 's life ( sira ) and traditions ( sunnah ) हैं भी upheld by Muslims as the sources of sharia law.
They discuss Muhammad and अन्य नबियों of islam साथ reverence, adding the phrase peace be upon him whenever their names are mentioned.
While conceptions of मुहम्मद in मध्यकालीन christendom और premodern टाइम्स यहूद largely ऋणात्मक, appraisals in modern history have been far less so.
The ग्रेट किताबे ( दूसरी edition )
Great Books of the Western World is a series of किताबे originally प्रकाशित in the संयुक्त राज्य in 1952 by Encyclopædia Britannica Inc. to present the Great Books in a single package of 54 volumes.
The series is now in its दूसरी संस्करण और contains 60 volumes.
The original editors of the series chose three criteria for inclusion : a book must be प्रासंगिक to समकालीन मुद्दे, और नहीं तभी महत्वपूर्ण in इसके ऐतिहासिक कॉन्टेक्स्ट ; it जरूर बदला rereading ; and it must be a part of `` the great conversation about the great ideas, '' relevant to at least 25 of the 102 great ideas identified by the editors.
Books were not chosen on the basis of जातीय or सांस्कृतिक inclusiveness, ऐतिहासिक influence, or the editors ' agreement with the views expressed.
`` Cocaine '' is a song written and recorded by JJ Cale in 1976, लकिन भी ज्ञात as a कवर संस्करण अंकित by eric Clapton.
Allmusic calls the latter `` among [ Clapton 's ] most enduringly popular hits '' and notes that `` even for an artist जैसे क्लैप्टन साथ a विशाल देह of high-quality कार्य, 'cocaine ' बाँधने among his best. ''
Glyn Johns, who had previously worked साथ the जो, led zeppelin और the रोलिंग पत्थरों, उत्पादित the क्लैप्टन रिकॉर्डिंग, which was released on Clapton 's 1977 album Slowhand and as a single in 1980.
The live संस्करण of `` कोका '', इससे the बस एक रात्रि album recorded in Tokyo, charted on the Billboard Hot 100 as the B-side of `` Tulsa Time ``, which was a No. 30 hit in 1980. ``
Cocaine '' was one of several of cale 's गीतों अंकित by क्लैप्टन, सहित `` After Midnight `` and `` Travelin ' Light ''.
The attack on Pearl Harbor ( called Hawaii Operation or Operation AI by the Japanese इम्पीरियल सामान्य मुख्यालय ( आपरेशन z in नियोजन ) और the Battle of Pearl Harbor ) was a surprise military strike conducted by the Imperial Japanese Navy against the United States naval base at Pearl Harbor, Hawaii, on the morning of December 7, 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ).
From the standpoint of the defenders, the आक्रमण commenced at 7:48 a.m. Hawaiian Time.
The attack was intended as a preventive action in अनुक्रम to रखना the u.S. प्रशांत बेड़े इससे दखल साथ सैन्य क्रियाएँ the साम्राज्य of जापानी थी नियोजन in Southeast Asia against overseas territories of the United Kingdom, the Netherlands, and the United States.
The base was attacked by 353 Japanese fighters, bombers and torpedo planes in दो लहरें, शुभारम्भ from six aircraft carriers.
All आठ u.S. नेवी battleships were damaged, with four being sunk.
Two of these were बाद उठाया, और साथ the बाकी चार repaired, six battleships returned to service later in the war.
The Japanese भी sank or क्षतिग्रस्त तीन cruisers, three destroyers, an anti-aircraft training ship, and one minelayer.
188 u.S. वायुयान यहूद नष्ट ; 2,402 Americans were killed and 1,282 wounded.
Important base installations such as the power station, shipyard, maintenance, and fuel and torpedo storage सुविधाएं, as खूब as the पनडुब्बी पियर और headquarters building ( also home of the intelligence section ) were not attacked.
Japanese नुकसान यहूद लाइट : 29 वायुयान और पाँच midget submarines lost, and 65 servicemen killed or wounded.
One Japanese नाविक थी captured.
The attack came as a profound शॉक to the अमरीकी लोगों और led सीधे to the अमरीकी entry into World War II in both the Pacific and European theaters.
The following day ( December 8 ), the संयुक्त राज्य घोषित war on Japan.
Domestic support for non-interventionism, जिससे था महरूम दमदार, disappeared.
clandestine support of Britain ( for example the Neutrality Patrol ) was replaced by active alliance.
subsequent परिचालन by the u.S. prompted जर्मनी और इटली to declare war on the U.S. on December 11, which was reciprocated by the U.S. the same day.
There were numerous ऐतिहासिक precedents for unannounced military action by Japan.
However, the lack of any formal warning, particularly while negotiations were still apparently ongoing, led अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट to proclaim दिसम्बर 7, 1941, `` a date which will live in infamy ``.

ऋतु 2 began airing on December 7, 2005.
Following a nationwide search earlier in the year, sixteen designers were चुनी as semi-finalists और brought to नई यॉर्क City in June, 2005.

The winning designer, Chloe Dao, received $ 100,000 in seed money to help launch her own line, a 2007 Saturn Sky roadster, a spread in ELLE magazine, और a mentorship साथ the banana गणतंत्र डिज़ाइन टोली.

the चौथी judging सीट घुमाया each week, based on the challenge.
Tim Gunn, फ़ैशन कुर्सी at पार्सन्स the नई School for Design, returned as a mentor for the designers.

An example of a heraclius खच्चर
In numismatics, a खच्चर is a सिक्का or पदक minted साथ obverse and reverse designs not normally seen on the same piece.
These can be जानबूझकर or उत्पादित by error.
This type of error is अत्यधिक sought बाद, and examples can fetch steep prices from collectors.
The earliest mules are found among प्राचीन यूनानी और रोमन सिक्के.
Opinion is divided between those who think that they are accidental, the result of an incorrect combination of a new die with one that had officially been withdrawn from use, or the work of coiners working साथ मरता चुराया इससे an आधिकारिक मिंट, शायद at a समय जब एक of उन्हें should have been destroyed.
The name derives from the mule, the hybrid offspring of a horse and a गधा, due to ऐसे a सिक्का having दो पहलू intended लिये अलग coins, much as a mule has parents of two different species.
This page documents the tornadoes और बवंडर outbreaks of 2010.
The बहुमत of tornadoes रूप in the u.S., लकिन they can occur almost anywhere under the right conditions.
A lesser number occur outside the U.S., most notably in parts of neighboring southern Canada during the Northern गोलार्ध 's गर्मियाँ ऋतु, लकिन हैं भी ज्ञात in दक्षिण अमेरिका, यूरोपीय, एशिया, और ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
There were 1,531 tornadoes reported in the संयुक्त राज्य in 2010 ( of जिससे at तनिक 1,266 were confirmed ), with 45 confirmed fatalities.
elsewhere in the संसार, 11 लोगों यहूद मारे in tornadoes, छह in Argentina, three in the Bahamas, one in Bangladesh, and one in Germany.
The year was near average for tornadoes despite an extremely quiet early spring period, however such changed after a huge upswing starting in लेट अप्रैल और a व्यस्त लेट वसन्त और गर्मियाँ period.
The autumn months यहूद थोड़ा above average.
A lymphocyte is a प्रकार of श्वेत रक्त कोशिका in the vertebrate immune system.
अंतर्गत the सूक्ष्मदर्शी, lymphocytes can be divided into large lymphocytes and small lymphocytes.
Large granular lymphocytes शामिल प्राकृतिक कातिल कोशिकाएं ( nk कोशिकाएं ).
Small lymphocytes consist of t कोशिकाएं and B cells.
Windows PowerShell is Microsoft 's task automation framework, consisting of a command-line शेल और संबद्ध एनक्रिप्शन भाषा निर्मित on.NET Framework.
PowerShell provides full access to COM and WMI, enabling प्रशासकों to perform प्रशासनिक कार्य on दोनो लोकल और remote Windows systems.
In PowerShell, administrative tasks are generally performed by cmdlets ( सुनाया command-lets ), जिससे हैं specialized.neT वर्ग implementing a particular operation.
Sets of cmdlets may be combined together in scripts, executables ( which हैं स्टैंडअलोन applications ), or by instantiating regular.NET classes ( or WMI/COM Objects ).
These work by accessing data in different data stores, like the filesystem or registry, which are made available to the powershell runtime via खिड़कियाँ powershell providers.
Windows PowerShell also provides a hosting API with which the खिड़कियाँ powershell runtime can be अंतःस्थापित अंदर other applications.
These applications can then use Windows powershell कार्यक्षमता to implement निश्चित operations, including those exposed via the graphical interface.
This capability has been used by Microsoft Exchange Server 2007 to expose its management functionality as powershell cmdlets और प्रदाताओं और implement the आलेखीय management tools as PowerShell hosts which invoke the necessary cmdlets.
Other Microsoft applications including Microsoft SQL Server 2008 also expose their management इंटरफ़ेस via powershell cmdlets.
With powershell, आलेखीय interface-based प्रबन्धन applications on Windows are layered on top of Windows PowerShell.
A PowerShell scripting interface for Windows products is mandated by the आम अभियान्त्रिकी Criteria.
खिड़कियाँ powershell शामिल its own extensive, console-based help, similar to man pages in Unix shells, via the Get-Help cmdlet.
Mary Poppins is a 1964 musical film starring Julie Andrews, Dick Van Dyke, David Tomlinson, और glynis जॉन्स, उत्पादित by वॉल्ट Disney, and based on the Mary Poppins books series by P. L. Travers.
The film was directed by Robert Stevenson and written by Bill Walsh और डॉन dagradi, साथ गीतों by the शरमन भाइयो.
It was shot at वॉल्ट डिज़्नी studios in Burbank, California.
Julie Andrews won the Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance as Mary Poppins and the film also won Oscars for Best Film Editing, Original Music Score, Best Song for `` Chim chim cher-ee '' और बेहतरीन विज़ुअल प्रभाव, और प्राप्त a कुल of 13 nominations.
A story arc is an extended or continuing storyline in episodic storytelling media such as television, कॉमिक किताबे, कॉमिक स्ट्रिप्स, boardgames, वीडियो games, and in some cases, films.
On a television program, for example, the स्टोरी होता unfold over अनेक episodes.
In television, the use of the story arc is much more आम in dramas than in comedies, विशेषकर in soap operas.
Webcomics are more likely to use story arcs than समाचारपत्र कॉमिक्स, as सबसे वेब कॉमिक्स have पठनीय अभिलेख ऑनलाइन कि a newcomer to the strip can read in order to understand what is going on.
Although story arcs have existed for decades, the term `` स्टोरी चाप '' थी coined in 1988 in संबंध to the television series Wiseguy, and was quickly adapted for other uses.
अनेक अमरीकी कॉमिक किताब श्रेणी हैं अभी लिखा in चार or six-issue arcs, within a continuing series.
Short story arcs are easier to package as trade paperbacks for resale, and more accessible to the कैज़ुअल रीडर than the never-ending continuity that once characterised comics.
Black Friday is the day following थैंक्सगिविंग दिन in the संयुक्त राज्य, प्रायः regarded as the beginning of the Christmas shopping season.
In recent years, most major retailers have opened extremely early and offered promotional बिक्री to लात बंद the अवकाश खरीदारी ऋतु, similar to Boxing Day sales in many Commonwealth Nations.
Black Friday is not an official public holiday as such, but many non-retail employees and schools have both थैंक्सगिविंग और the दिन बाद बंद, followed by a weekend, thereby increasing the number of potential shoppers.
It has routinely been the busiest shopping day of the year since 2005, although news reports, which at that time were inaccurate, have वर्णित it as the busiest shopping day of the year for a much longer period of time.
The day 's name originated in फिलाडेल्फिया, जहाँ it originally थी प्रयुक्त to describe the heavy and disruptive pedestrian and vehicle traffic which would occur on the day after Thanksgiving.
Use of the term started पहले 1961 और began to देखिए broader use outside Philadelphia around 1975.
Later an alternative explanation began to be offered : कि `` ब्लैक शुक्रवार '' indicates the पाइंट at जिससे रिटेलर begin to turn a profit, or are `` ''.
For many years, it थी आम लिये रिटेलर to खोलें at 6:00 a.m., but in the late 2000s many had crept to 5:00 or even 4:00.
This थी लिया to a नई चरम in 2011, जब अनेक रिटेलर ( सहित Target, Kohl 's, Macy 's, Best Buy, and Bealls ) opened at midnight for the first time.
In 2012, Walmart and several other retailers announced that they would open most of their stores at 8:00 p.m. on Thanksgiving Day ( except in states where opening on Thanksgiving is prohibited due to blue laws, such as मैसाचुसेट्स जहाँ वे स्टिल खोली around मध्यरात्रि ), prompting काल्स लिये a walkout among कुछ मजदूर.
Black Friday shopping is known for attracting aggressive crowds, with annual reports of assaults, shootings, and throngs of लोगों trampling on अन्य shoppers in an attempt to मिलेंगी the बेहतरीन सौदे on a product before supplies run out.
The Family That Preys is a 2008 American movie drama लिखा, उत्पादित, और निर्देशित by Tyler Perry.
The पटकथा focuses on दो परिवारों, एक धनवान और the other working class, whose lives are intertwined in both love and business.
the फिल्म is the दूसरी of चार in जिससे पेरी 's हस्ताक्षर character, Madea, does not make an appearance.
It is also the second Perry-directed film ( alongside Daddy 's Little Girls ) that is not based on any of the फिल्मकार 's स्टेज plays.
Net 10, Net 15, जाल 30 और जाल 60 ( भी जाल 10 दिनों, et al ) हैं फ़ॉर्म of व्यापार क्रेडिट which specify that the net amount ( the total outstanding on the invoice ) is expected to be paid in full and received by the seller within 10, 15, 30 or 60 days after the goods are dispatched or service is completed.
Net 30 or Net 60 शर्तें हैं प्रायः coupled साथ a credit for early payment.
The word net in this sense means `` कुल बाद सब छूट. ''
It originally derives from the Latin nitere ( to shine ) and nitidus ( सुरुचिपूर्ण, trim ), और अधिक recently from the French net ( sharp, neat, clean ).

The British West Indies यहूद the आइलैंड्स in और around the Caribbean that were part of the British Empire.
In 1912, the British West Indies were divided into eight colonies : The Bahamas, Barbados, British Guiana, British Honduras, Jamaica ( with its dependencies the turks और caicos आइलैंड्स और the केमन आइलैंड्स ), त्रिनिदाद और टोबैगो, the windward आइलैंड्स and the Leeward Islands.
Between 1958 and 1962, all of the island territories except the British Virgin Islands, the Bahamas, British Honduras और अंग्रेजों guiana यहूद संगठित into the वेस्ट इंडीज संघ.
It was hoped that the Federation would become independent as a single स्वदेश, लकिन it था सीमित शक्तियां, अनेक व्यावहारिक समस्याएं, and a lack of popular support.
Consequently, the West Indies संघ थी dissolved.
Most of the territories, including all the larger ones, are now independent as separate countries, with membership to many international forums such as the Organization of American States, the Association of Caribbean States, the World Trade Organization, the United Nations, the caribbean जातियाँ, the राष्ट्रमंडल of राष्ट्र और the caribbean विकास Bank among others.
The शेष हैं अंग्रेजों overseas territories.
All the former nations of the British West Indies, except the राष्ट्रमंडल of डोमिनिकन, गुयाना और त्रिनिदाद and Tobago, are Commonwealth Realms.
The term is still प्रयुक्त लिये अंग्रेजों विदेशी Territories in the Caribbean, such as the Cayman Islands.

`` What a Wonderful World '' is a song written by Bob thiele ( as `` जार्ज डगलस '' ) and George David Weiss.
It was first recorded by लुई आर्मस्ट्रांग और released as a single in 1967.
Thiele and Weiss were both prominent in the म्यूज़िक संसार ( thiele as a निर्माता और Weiss as a composer/performer ).
आर्मस्ट्रांग 's रिकॉर्डिंग थी inducted in the Grammy Hall of Fame in 1999.
The प्रकाशन लिये इस सोंग is नियंत्रित by Memory Lane Music Group, Carlin Music Corp., and Bug Music, Inc.
उद्घाटन दिन 2009 on the west steps of the U.S. Capitol.
President George W. Bush and First Lady Laura Bush lead the inaugural parade down पेन्सिलवेनिया एवेन्यू to the श्वेत हाउस, 2005
The inauguration of the president of the United States is a ceremonial event marking the शुरुआत of a नई four-year पद of a अध्यक्ष of the United States.
The day a presidential inauguration occurs is ज्ञात as `` उद्घाटन दिन '' और occurs on January 20 ( or 21st if the 20th is a Sunday ).
( Prior to the Twentieth Amendment, the date was March 4, the day of the year on which the Constitution of the United States first took effect in 1789 ; the last inauguration to लो प्लेस on the पुरानी तिथि थी फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट 's पहला एक on कूच 4, 1933. )
The most recent public presidential inauguration ceremony, the swearing in of अध्यक्ष बराक ओबामा to शुरू his second four-year term in office, took place on Monday, January 21, 2013.
The only inauguration element mandated by the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान is कि the अध्यक्ष मेक an शपथ or प्रतिज्ञान पहले that person can `` enter on the Execution '' of the office of the presidency.
However, over the years, various traditions have arisen that have expanded the उद्घाटन इससे a सरल oath-taking रस्म to a day-long इवेंट, सहित parades, speeches, and balls.
From the presidency of Andrew Jackson through that of Jimmy Carter, the प्राथमिक उद्घाटन दिन रस्म took प्लेस on the कैपिटल 's ईस्ट Portico.
चूंकि the 1981 उद्घाटन of Ronald Reagan, the ceremony has been held at the Capitol 's West Front.
The inaugurations of William Howard Taft in 1909 and Reagan in 1985 यहूद स्थानांतरित indoors at the कैपिटल due to ठंडा weather.
The War of 1812 and World War II caused two inaugurations to be आयोजित at अन्य स्थितियाँ in वॉशिंगटन, D.C.
When George Washington was inaugurated, the oath was administered by Robert Livingston, Chancellor of New York State, in 1789, और by विलियम cushing, संबद्ध इंसाफ of the Supreme Court, in 1793.
Since Chief Justice Oliver Ellsworth swore in President John Adams, no chief justice has छूटी an उद्घाटन Day.
When Inauguration Day has fallen on a Sunday, the chief justice has administered the शपथ to the अध्यक्ष on the Sunday privately and then again the next day publicly.
When a new president takes over mid-term due to the death or resignation of a president, the oath of office is administered but formal, public उद्घाटन कार्यक्रम have नहीं महरूम held.
Stefani जोआन एंजेलीना germanotta ( ; born कूच 28, 1986 ), ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज name Lady Gaga, is an American singer, songwriter, record producer, dancer, activist, businesswoman, fashion designer, actress and philanthropist.
Born and raised in New York City, she primarily studied at the Convent of the Sacred Heart and briefly attended नई यॉर्क विश्वविद्यालयों 's tisch स्कूल of the Arts before withdrawing to focus on her musical career.
She soon began performing in the चट्टान म्यूज़िक झाँकी of मैनहटन 's निम्नतर East Side.
By the end of 2007, record executive and producer विंसेंट हर्बर्ट हस्ताक्षरित उसके to उसके लेबल streamline रिकॉर्ड, an imprint of Interscope Records.
Initially working as a songwriter at interscope रिकॉर्ड, उसके गायन abilities captured the attention of recording artist Akon, who also signed her to Kon Live Distribution, his own label under Interscope.
Lady गागा आए to prominence as a रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार following the रिलीज of उसके डेब्यू एल्बम, the कीर्ति ( 2008 ), जिससे was a critical and commercial success that topped charts around the world and included the international number-one singles `` Just Dance `` and `` Poker Face ``.
After embarking on the The Fame Ball Tour, she followed the एल्बम साथ the कीर्ति दानव ( 2009 ), जिससे शाखित the विश्वव्यापी hit singles `` ख़राब रोमांस ``, `` टेलीफोन ``, and `` Alejandro ``.
The Fame राक्षस कामयाबी अनुमत उसके to embark on the eighteen-month long दानव Ball Tour, which later became one of the highest-grossing concert tours of all time.
Her सबसे हाल एल्बम, born इस रास्ता ( 2011 ), अव्वल the चार्ट of most major markets and generated more international chart-topping singles, including `` Born This Way ``, `` Judas ``, and `` The Edge of Glory ``.
Influenced by Britney Spears, David Bowie, Michael Jackson, Madonna, and Queen, Lady Gaga is recognized for her flamboyant, diverse और outré योगदान to the म्यूज़िक उद्योग through उसके फ़ैशन, प्रदर्शन और म्यूज़िक videos.
As of October 2011, she has sold an estimated 23 million albums and 64 million singles विश्वव्यापी और उसके singles हैं कुछ of the best-selling worldwide.
Her achievements include five Grammy Awards और 13 एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार.
Lady Gaga has consecutively appeared on Billboard magazine 's Artists of the Year ( scoring the definitive title in 2010 ), ranked fourth in VH1 's list of 100 Greatest Women in Music, is the sixth best selling digital singles artist in US according to RIAA, is regularly placed on lists composed by Forbes magazine and was named one of the सबसे influential लोगों in the संसार by समय पत्रिका.
Besides her musical career, she involves herself साथ humanitarian causes and LGBT activism.

A चित्र of the 1924 Baseball team
The Florida Gators baseball team represents the विश्वविद्यालयों of फ्लोरिडा in the खेल of baseball.
The Florida Gators compete in Division I of the National Collegiate Athletics Association ( NCAA ), and the पूर्वी प्रभाग of the southeastern Conference ( SEC ).
They play their home games in Alfred A. McKethan स्टेडियम on the विश्वविद्यालयों 's gainesville, Florida campus, and are currently led by head coach Kevin O'Sullivan.
In the ninety-eight ऋतु इतिहास of the gators बेसबॉल कार्यक्रम, the टोली रै won twelve SEC championships and has appeared in eight College World Series tournaments.

a राजनैतिक अभियान is an व्यवस्थित effort which seeks to influence the decision making process within a specific group.
In democracies, राजनैतिक अभियान प्रायः refer to electoral campaigns, wherein representatives are chosen or referendums are decided.
In modern politics, the most high profile political campaigns are केन्द्रित on उम्मीदवार लिये सिर of राज्य or सिर of सरकारी, प्रायः a अध्यक्ष or Prime Minister.
Elizabeth Cady Stanton and her बेटी, harriot
Elizabeth Cady Stanton ( November 12, 1815 – October 26, 1902 ) थी an अमरीकी सोशल activist, abolitionist, and leading figure of the early women 's rights movement.
Her Declaration of Sentiments, presented at the first women 's rights convention held in 1848 in Seneca Falls, नई यॉर्क, is प्रायः credited साथ initiating the पहला व्यवस्थित महिलाओं 's अधिकारों और महिलाओं 's suffrage आंदोलनों in the United States.
Before Stanton narrowed her political focus almost exclusively to महिलाओं 's अधिकारों, वो थी an क्रियाशील abolitionist साथ साथ उसके husband, Henry Brewster Stanton and cousin, Gerrit Smith.
Unlike many of those involved in the women 's rights movement, Stanton addressed विभिन्न मुद्दे pertaining to women beyond voting rights.
Her चिंताएं शामिल महिलाओं 's parental और कस्टडी अधिकारों, प्रॉपर्टी rights, employment and income rights, divorce, the economic health of the family, and birth control.
She was also an outspoken समर्थक of the 19th-century temperance movement.
After the American Civil War, Stanton 's commitment to female suffrage caused a schism in the महिलाओं 's अधिकारों गति जब वो, साथ साथ सुसान B. एंथोनी, अस्वीकृत to support ड्योढ़ी of the Fourteenth and Fifteenth Amendments to the United States Constitution.
She opposed giving added विधिक सुरक्षा और मतदान rights to African American men while women, black and white, were denied those same rights.
Her position on this issue, together with her thoughts on organized Christianity and women 's issues beyond voting rights, led to the formation of two separate महिलाओं 's अधिकारों संगठन कि यहूद आखिरकार rejoined, साथ stanton as अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त संगठन, लगभग twenty years after her break from the original women 's suffrage movement.
Stanton died in 1902 having authored both The Woman 's Bible and उसके आत्मकथा, साथ साथ अनेक आलेख और pamphlets concerning मादा suffrage and women 's rights.
My Fair Lady is a musical based upon जार्ज बर्नार्ड शॉ 's pygmalion और साथ किताब और गीत by Alan Jay Lerner and music by Frederick Loewe.
The story concerns eliza doolittle, a काकनी flower girl who takes speech lessons from professor Henry Higgins, a phoneticist, so that she may pass as a well-born lady.
The musical 's 1956 Broadway production was a hit, setting कया थी तब the रिकार्ड लिये the longest चलाएं of any major musical theatre production in history.
It was followed by a hit लंदन उत्पादन, a popular film version, and numerous revivals.
It has been पुकारा `` the पूर्ण musical ''.
deregulation is the अधिनियम or प्रक्रम of निकालना or reducing state regulations.
It is therefore opposite of regulation, जिससे refers to the प्रक्रम of the सरकारी regulating certain activities.
The Boston Bruins Radio Network is a 25-station ( 17 a.M., 8 f.m. प्लस 2 f.m. अनुवादक ) सीबीएस रेडियो संजाल which carries live game broadcasts of the Boston Bruins.
The network 's फ्लैगशिप स्टेशन is wbz-fm /98.5- बोस्टन, Massachusetts.
