`` There Will Come Soft Rains '' is a short story by science fiction author Ray Bradbury जिससे थी पहला प्रकाशित in the May 6, 1950 issue of Collier 's.
Later that वही साल the स्टोरी was included in Bradbury 's The Martian Chronicles ( 1950 ).
With over 1.2 billion people, हान चाइनीज is the largest जातीय group in the world.
Pashtun people of the Pashtunistan region, जिससे sits in an क्षेत्रफल between दक्षिण of the हिन्दू कुश in अफगानिस्तान and the Indus River in Pakistan.
They number around 50 लाख.
The Korowai people of Papua numbered just around 3,000 लोगों, और were uncontacted until the 1970s.
Ethnicity or जातीय समूह is a socially पारिभाषित category based on common culture or nationality.
Ethnicity can, but does not have to, शामिल आम ancestry, रूप, भोजन, ड्रेसिंग स्टाइल, विरासत, history, language or dialect, religion, symbols, traditions, or other cultural factor.
Ethnic identity is constantly reinforced through आम विशेषताएँ which set the group apart from other groups.
The 19.9 MW gemasolar सौर संयंत्र in स्पेन सुविधाएँ 15 घंटों of storage and can supply power 24 hours a day.
Solar energy, radiant light and ऊष्मा इससे the सूर्य, रै महरूम harnessed by इंसानो चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स using a range of ever-evolving technologies.
Solar energy technologies include solar heating, solar photovoltaics, solar thermal electricity, solar architecture and कृत्रिम photosynthesis, जिससे can मेक considerable योगदान to solving कुछ of the सबसे urgent energy problems the world now faces.
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive solar or क्रियाशील सौर depending on the रास्ता वे कैप्चर, बदलें और वितरित solar energy.
Active solar techniques include the उपयोग of photovoltaic panels और सौर थर्मल collectors to harness the energy.
Passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun, selecting materials with favorable thermal mass or light dispersing properties, और डिजाइनिंग स्पेसेस कि naturally circulate air.
In 2011, the International Energy Agency said that `` the विकास of सस्ती, inexhaustible और साफ सौर उर्जा technologies will have huge longer-term benefits.
It will increase countries’ energy security through reliance on an indigenous, inexhaustible and mostly import-independent संसाधन, बढ़ाएँ स्थिरता, reduce प्रदूषण, lower the costs of mitigating climate change, and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise.
These लाभ हैं वैश्विक.
Hence the additional costs of the incentives for early deployment चाहिए be माना सीखना निवेश ; वे must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared ''.
The classical Latin वर्णमाला or रोमन वर्णमाला विकसित इससे a पश्चिमी किस्में of the यूनानी वर्णमाला पुकारा the Cumaean alphabet, which was adopted and modified by the Etruscans who ruled early Rome.
The Etruscan alphabet was in turn adopted and further परिवर्धित by the प्राचीन romans to लिखें the लैटिन language.
During the Middle Ages, the Latin alphabet was adapted to Romance languages, सीधा वंशजों of लैटिन, as खूब as to सेल्टिक, germanic, बाल्टिक, और some Slavic languages.
With the age of colonialism and Christian evangelism, the Latin script was spread overseas, and applied to indigenous American, ऑस्ट्रेलियाई, ऑस्ट्रोनीशियाई, austroasiatic, और अफ़्रीकी भाषाएं.
More recently, linguists have also tended to prefer the Latin script or the International Phonetic Alphabet ( itself largely based on Latin script ) जब transcribing or बनाना लिखा मानकों लिये non-european भाषाएं, ऐसे as the अफ़्रीकी सन्दर्भ वर्णमाला.
The term Latin alphabet may refer to either the alphabet used to write Latin ( as described in this article ), or other alphabets based on the Latin स्क्रिप्ट, जिससे is the मौलिक set of letters common to the various alphabets descended from the classical Latin one, such as the English alphabet.
These latin-derived alphabets may छोड़ें अक्षर, like the Rotokas alphabet, or add new letters, like the Danish and Norwegian alphabet.
Letter shapes have changed over the centuries, सहित the सृष्टि लिये मध्यकालीन लैटिन of निम्नतर मामला forms which did not exist in the Classical period.
The assassination of United States अध्यक्ष अब्राहम lincoln took प्लेस on शुभ शुक्रवार, अप्रैल 14, 1865, as the American Civil War was drawing to a close.
The assassination occurred five days after the कमांडर of the confederate फौज of उत्तरी वर्जिनिया, General Robert E. Lee, surrendered to Lieutenant General Ulysses S. Grant and the Union Army of the Potomac.
Lincoln was the first American president to be assassinated, though an unsuccessful attempt था महरूम बना on एंड्रयू जैक्सन 30 years before in 1835.
The हत्या थी नियोजित और carried आउट by the well-known स्टेज कर्ता John Wilkes Booth, as part of a larger conspiracy in a bid to revive the Confederate cause.
Booth 's co-conspirators were Lewis Powell and David Herold, who were assigned to kill Secretary of राज्य विलियम H. seward, और जार्ज atzerodt जो थी to मार वाइस अध्यक्ष एंड्रयू Johnson.
By simultaneously eliminating the top three people in the administration, Booth and his co-conspirators hoped to sever the निरंतरता of the संयुक्त राज्य सरकारी.
Lincoln was shot while watching the खेल हमारी अमरीकी cousin साथ उसके बीवी मरियम टॉड Lincoln at Ford 's Theatre in Washington, D.C. on the night of April 14, 1865.
He died जल्दी the अगला morning.
The rest of the conspirators ' plot failed ; Powell only managed to wound Seward, while atzerodt, जॉनसन 's would-be हत्यारे, खोया उसके तंत्रिका और fled वॉशिंगटन.
Add-on might mean:
Plug-in ( computing ), a piece of software जिससे enhances another तन्त्र अनुप्रयोग and usually can not be run independently
Browser extension, which modifies the इंटरफ़ेस and/or behavior of web browsers
Add-on ( Mozilla ), a piece of software कि enhances और customizes mozilla-based अनुप्रयोग
Add-ons for Firefox ( addons.mozilla.org ), the official Mozilla Foundation web साईट जिससे serves as a repository of add-ons लिये mozilla-based applications
Peripheral, an वैकल्पिक कंप्यूटर हार्डवेयर घटक कि significantly supplements or enhances the functionality of the original unit
Video game accessory, a टुकड़ा of हार्डवेयर प्रयुक्त in संयोजन साथ a video game console for playing video games
Club level seating is a खास खण्ड of seating in आधुनिक sports stadiums.
The Club Level is usually located towards the मध्य of the स्टेज of seating भाग, ऊपर the lower deck but below the upper deck.
They are प्रायः सही अगला to the लक्ज़री बाक्स, either right above, right below, or sandwiched between two levels of Luxury Boxes.
Club Level seating is considered as higher class than sitting anywhere else in the एरिना, लकिन निम्नतर क्लास compared to the Luxury Boxes.
Unlike the Luxury बाक्स, सबसे क्लबों स्तर do not wrap entirely around the arena.
Some क्लबों स्तर रोकें at a निश्चित पाइंट, giving रास्ता to an विस्तार of the Mezzanine, while others give way to lower class Luxury Boxes ( such as `` Party Suites '' ).
A notable exception to this is Emirates Stadium in London, which has a complete tier of club seating.
Club Levels allow प्रशंसक अनेक स्तर of entertainment.
Club Level seating is open to the elements, as opposed to the entirely enclosed लक्ज़री बाक्स, जिससे देता अधिक of an बाहरी impression at roofless and open-roof stadiums and arenas.
Club Level seating is normally bought on a contract basis to allow लिये अधिकतम profit on the part of the stadium.
The Club Level provides प्रशंसक साथ खास अभिगम to an अंदर भाग of the arena exclusive to fans with special tickets.
These areas are air conditioned and allow access to special रेस्तरां, merchandise स्टैंड, और लाउंज areas of the stadium that are not otherwise available.
Concession stands and vendors on the Club Level also often offer different menus than in other stands to दे अधिक of a खास महसूस to the Club.
These क्षेत्रों हैं बंद बंद to the बाकी of the स्टेडियम, and they usually can only be accessed through the exclusive, private club entrances.
Sophia Loren ( ; born Sofia Villani Scicolone ; 20 सितंबर 1934 ) is an इतालवी अभिनेत्री.
Loren is widely recognized as Italy 's most प्रसिद्ध और सम्मानित अभिनेत्री.
She was the first actress of the talkie era to win an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये a non-english-speaking प्रदर्शन, for her portrayal of Cesira in Vittorio De Sica 's Two Women.
Her other awards include a Grammy Award, five खास सुनहरी ग्लोब्स, a bafta पुरस्कार और a Laurel Award.
In 1995 she प्राप्त the सेसिल B. demille पुरस्कार लिये आजीवन उपलब्धियाँ, one of many such awards.
Her films include : houseboat ( 1958 ), el सीआईडी ( 1961 ), कल, Today and Tomorrow ( 1963 ), Marriage Italian-Style ( 1964 ), and A Special Day ( 1977 ).
In later years she has appeared in American blockbusters such as grumpier बूढ़ा मेन ( 1995 ), और नौ ( 2009 ).
In 1994 she starred in Robert Altman 's Prêt-à-Porter, which अर्जित उसके a सुनहरी ग्लोब nomination the same year.
She has also achieved critical and commercial कामयाबी in tv फिल्मों ऐसे as हिम्मत ( 1986 ).
Deaths for self-inflicted चोटों प्रति 100,000 निवासियों in 2004.
incidence of आत्महत्या is underreported due to both religious and social pressures, and possibly completely unreported in some areas.
Nevertheless, from reported cases, निश्चित रुझान हैं apparent.
Since the data is skewed, comparing आत्महत्या दरों between राष्ट्र is statistically unsound.
The trends themselves हैं नहीं the कारण, लकिन may be indicative of a root cause.
The Oprah Winfrey Leadership Academy for Girls - South Africa is a female boarding school founded in जनवरी 2007 और स्तिथ in henley on klip निकट meyerton, south of Johannesburg, South Africa.
The academy was founded by Oprah Winfrey with the goal of providing शैक्षणिक और नेतृत्व अवसर लिये academically gifted लड़कियों इससे impoverished पृष्ठभूमि.

Digicel is a mobile phone network प्रदाता ऑपरेटिंग in 31 बाज़ार आरपार the Caribbean, Central America, and Oceania regions.
The company is owned by Irishman Denis O'Brien, is incorporated in बरमूडा, और आधारित in Jamaica.
It has about 13 लाख बेतार उपयोक्ता.
As of 2012, Digicel 's markets comprise : Anguilla, Antigua and Barbuda, Aruba, Barbados, Bermuda, Bonaire, the British Virgin Islands, the Cayman Islands, Curacao, Dominica, El Salvador, Fiji, French Guiana, Grenada, guadeloupe, गुयाना, हैती, जमैका, मार्टीनिक, प्रकृति, पनामा, पापुआ नई गिनी, समोआ, संत किट्स और नेविस, संत लूसिया, संत विंसेंट और the grenadines, सूरीनाम, टोंगा, Trinidad & Tobago, Turks and Caicos, and Vanuatu.
इस is a सूची of records of the FIFA World Cup and its qualification matches.
Hospital Emergency Codes are प्रयुक्त in अस्पताल विश्वव्यापी to चेतावनी staff to various emergencies.
The use of कोड is intended to convey अनिवार्य information quickly and with minimal misunderstanding to staff, while preventing stress and panic among visitors to the hospital.
These codes may be posted on placards throughout the hospital, or printed on कर्मचारी पहचान बैज लिये ready reference.
Back of a हॉस्पिटल id बैज showing disaster codes.
Hospital emergency कोड may denote अलग कार्यक्रम at अलग अस्पताल, including nearby ones.
Because many physicians work at more than one सुविधा, इस may सीसे to भ्रम in emergencies, so uniform systems have been proposed.
The route of the Eifel aqueduct, with इसके औसत ढलान.
The Eifel जलसेतु थी एक of the longest aqueducts of the रोमन साम्राज्य.
The aqueduct, constructed in AD 80, carried water some from the hilly Eifel region of what is now Germany to the प्राचीन नगर of colonia claudia आरा agrippinensium ( present-day Cologne ).
If the auxiliary spurs to अतिरिक्त स्रोतों हैं शामिल, the length was.
The construction was almost entirely नीचे मैदान, और the प्रवाह of the जल was produced entirely by gravity.
a few पुलों, सहित एक up to in length, were needed to pass over valleys.
Unlike some of the other famous रोमन aqueducts, the eifel जलसेतु was specifically designed to minimize the above-ground portion to protect it from damage and freezing.
In chemistry, a disulfide bond ( br.e. disulphide बंध ) is a covalent बंध, usually derived by the coupling of two thiol groups.
The linkage is also called an ss-bond or disulfide सेतु.
The overall कनेक्टिविटी is therefore R-S-S-R.
The terminology is widely प्रयुक्त in biochemistry.
In formal terms, the connection is a persulfide, in analogy to इसके congener, परऑक्साइड ( r-o-o-r ), लकिन इस शब्दावली is अस्पष्ट और is no longer प्रयुक्त ( मगर in सन्दर्भ to R-S-S-H or H-S-S-H compounds ).
औपचारिक चित्रण of disulfide bond formation as an oxidation.

Religion in the United Kingdom and in the countries that preceded it, रै महरूम वर्चस्व, लिये over 1,400 years, by various forms of Christianity.
According to some surveys, a majority of citizens still पहचानो साथ christianity, हालांकि नियमित गिरिजाघर उपस्थिति रै गिरे dramatically चूंकि the middle of the 20th century, and immigration and demographic change have contributed to the growth of other faiths.
Religious affiliations of UK citizens are recorded by regular surveys, the four major ones being the UK Census, the श्रमिक फ़ोर्स सर्वेक्षण, the अंग्रेजों सोशल attitudes सर्वेक्षण और the यूरोपीय सोशल Survey.
according to the 2001 uk जनसांख्यिकी, christianity is the major religion, followed by Islam, Hinduism, Sikhism, Judaism and Buddhism in terms of number of adherents.
This, and the relatively large number of individuals with nominal or no religious affiliations has led commentators to variously describe the United किंगडम as a multi-faith, secularised, or post-christian society.
The United Kingdom was formed by the union of previously independent countries from 1707, and consequently most of the largest धार्मिक समूह do नहीं have UK-wide organisational structures.
While some groups have separate structures लिये the व्यक्तिगत देशों of the संयुक्त Kingdom, others may have a single structure covering England and Wales or Great Britain.
Similarly, due to the अपेक्षाकृत हाल सृष्टि of उत्तरी Ireland in 1921, most major religious groups in Northern Ireland are organised on an all-Ireland basis.
The 1967 Newark riots were a major civil disturbance that occurred in the city of Newark, New जर्सी between जुलाई 12 और July 17, 1967.
The six days of rioting, लूटने, और विनाश left 26 dead and hundreds injured.
In United States college athletics, redshirt is a delay or suspension of an खिलाड़ी 's भागीदारी in अनुक्रम to lengthen उसके or उसके काल of eligibility.
Typically, a student 's athletic eligibility in a given sport is four seasons, a number derived from the four सालो of अकादमिक वर्ग कि हैं सामान्यतः जरूरी to obtain a bachelor 's degree at an American college or university.
However, a student athlete may be offered the opportunity to redshirt for up to two years, which allows the खिलाड़ी to स्प्रेड those चार सालो of पात्रता over five, or sometimes six years.
In a redshirt year, a student athlete may attend वर्ग at the कॉलेज or university, practice with an athletic team, and dress for play but he or she may not compete during the game.
Using this mechanism, a student athlete has up to five academic years to use the चार सालो of पात्रता, thus becoming a fifth-year senior.
The term is used as a क्रिया, noun, and adjective.
For example, a coach may choose to redshirt a खिलाड़ी जो is तब referred to as a redshirt freshman or simply a redshirt.
The विपरीत of इस is a `` true freshman. ''
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in Europe that began on 28 July 1914 और lasted जबतक 11 नवम्बर 1918.
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from its occurrence until the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939, और the पहला संसार युद्ध or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, जिससे यहूद समवेत in दो opposing alliances : the allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम, फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but, as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement, Italy did not enter into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war : Italy, Japan and the United राज्य joined the allies, और the उस्मानी साम्राज्य और बुल्गारिया the सेंट्रल Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 लाख सैन्य कर्मियों, सहित 60 लाख Europeans, were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history.
अधिक than 9 लाख combatants यहूद मारे, largely because of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest विरोध in संसार इतिहास, subsequently paving the way for various political changes, such as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
One of the long-term कल्याणकारी of the युद्ध थी the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the foreign policies of the great powers of Europe.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक संकट जब austria-hungary subsequently वितरित an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the पिछला दशकों were invoked.
Within weeks, the major powers were at war and, via their colonies, the विरोध जल्द स्प्रेड around the world.
On 28 July, the austro-hungarians fired the पहला गोलियाँ of the war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a स्थिर बैटल of अपघर्षण साथ a गर्त लकीर कि बदला little until 1917.
On the पूर्वी सामने, the रूसी फौज थी कामयाब विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians, but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans.
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the युद्ध, खोलने up fronts in the काकेशस, Mesopotamia and the Sinai.
Italy and Bulgaria went to war in 1915 और रोमानिया in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर brought the russians to शर्तें साथ the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front, the Allies drove back the Germans in a श्रेणी of कामयाब offensives और अमरीकी शक्तियां began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had its own trouble साथ क्रांतिकारियों, agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in विजय लिये the Allies.
Events on the home fronts were as उग्र as on the बैटल fronts, as the भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war.
By the end of the war, four प्रमुख इम्पीरियल powers—the जर्मनी, रूसी, Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the former दो खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of central Europe थी redrawn into अनेक छोटी राज्य.
The League of Nations was formed in the आशा of preventing another ऐसे conflict.
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires, the repercussions of Germany 's defeat and problems with the सन्धि of versailles हैं सहमत to be कारकों contributing to World War II.
Map of countries that declared themselves to be socialist states under the marxist–leninist or माओवादी परिभाषा - that is to say, `` Communist states '' - between 1979 and 1983.
This period चिह्नित the महानतम territorial extent of Communist states.
A communist state is a state where the means of उत्पादन हैं collectively स्वामित्व by the society.
It has a form of government characterized by single-party rule or dominant-party नियम of a कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी ( referred as तानाशाही of the proletariat by इसके proponents ) and a professed allegiance to a Leninist or Marxist–Leninist ideology as the guiding principle of the state.
Technically, `` communist state '' is a contradictio in terminis as a कम्युनिस्ट समाज as पारिभाषित by दोनो Marxists and anarcho-communists is in principle stateless.
From this perspective, the term marxist-leninist राज्य is अधिक उचित.
Historically, a `` communist state '' referred to a system where public ownership of सब or सबसे अर्थात् of उत्पादन by the कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी -run राज्य is deemed जरुरी to further the रूचि of the working class ; today, a communist state can also, for instance, refer to contemporary China and Vietnam, where a Communist Party-run state exists alongside a mixed economy.
According to Marxist–Leninists, the state is a औजार in the हैंड्स of the सत्ताधारी क्लास, जिससे in a समाजवादी समाज is the working क्लास, so a socialist state is, according to Leninists, a state of the working class.
In practice, कम्युनिस्ट राज्य do नहीं actually refer to themselves as such.
They do this not to disguise the fact that the ruling party is communist, but बल्कि क्युकी वे do नहीं consider themselves to be a कम्युनिस्ट society at present.
Instead, they constitutionally पहचानो themselves as socialist states or workers ' states.
The primary goal of these राज्य, जिससे भी explains उनके आधिकारिक नाम, is to मार्गदर्शिका उनके संबंधित countries in the process of building socialism, ultimately leading to communism.
Communist states may have several legal political parties, but the communist party is प्रायः granted a खास or प्रबल भूमिका in सरकारी, प्रायः by statute or under the constitution.
नतीजतन, the संस्थानों of the राज्य और of the कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी become intimately entwined, such as in the development of parallel institutions.
In the 20th century, most कम्युनिस्ट राज्य अपनाया planned economies.
However, there यहूद अपवाद : the सोवियत संघ दौरान the 1920s और लेट 1980s और यूगोस्लाविया बाद World War II allowed limited markets and a degree of worker self-management, while China, Vietnam and Laos introduced far-reaching market reforms after the 1980s.
In the 21st century, China and वियतनाम have अनुमत a mixed economy to develop.
The fundamental concepts of communist states often diverge इससे the असली socio-economic विचारधाराओं from which they develop.
As a परिणाम, अनेक adherents of ये विचारधाराओं प्रायः oppose the political systems commonly associated with these states.
For example, dissenting communists such as Trotskyists were often opposed to the communist राज्य of the 20th सदी, claiming either कि वे था nothing to do साथ `` रियल '' साम्यवादी or कि the विचारधारा of such states had reached a point of irrevocable corruption.
Michael फ्रेड फेल्प्स ii ( born जून 30, 1985 ) is a रिटायर्ड अमरीकी swimmer and the most decorated Olympian of all time, with a total of 22 medals.
Phelps also holds the all-time records for Olympic gold medals ( 18, double the second highest record holders ), Olympic gold medals in individual events ( 11 ), और ओलम्पिक medals in व्यक्तिगत कार्यक्रम for a male ( 13 ).
In winning eight gold medals at the 2008 Beijing Games, फेल्प्स took the रिकार्ड लिये the सबसे first-place finishes at any single Olympic Games.
Five of those victories were in individual events, tying the सिंगल Games record.
In the 2012 Summer Olympics in London, Phelps won four golds and two चांदी medals, बनाना उसे the सबसे कामयाब खिलाड़ी of the खेल लिये the तीसरा ओलंपिक in a row.
Phelps is the long course world recordholder in the 100-meter तितली, 200-meter तितली और 400-meter व्यक्तिगत medley as well as the former long course world recordholder in the 200-meter freestyle and 200-meter individual medley.
He has won a total of 71 medals in major international long-course competition, 57 gold, 11 silver, and तीन कांस्य spanning the ओलंपिक, the संसार, और the पण प्रशांत championships.
Phelps 's international titles and record-breaking प्रदर्शन have अर्जित उसे the संसार तैराक of the साल पुरस्कार सात टाइम्स और अमरीकी तैराक of the Year Award nine times as well as the FINA Swimmer of the Year Award in 2012.
His unprecedented Olympic success in 2008 earned फेल्प्स खेल illustrated magazine 's Sportsman of the Year award.
After the 2008 Summer Olympics, Phelps started the Michael Phelps Foundation, which focuses on growing the खेल of तैराकी और promoting healthier lifestyles.
He expects to do further work with his न्यास बाद the 2012 ओलंपिक, which he has said will be his last.
Lenovo Group सीमित ( ) is a चाइनीज बहुराष्ट्रीय कंप्यूटर हार्डवेयर और इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स company with its headquarters in Beijing, China and Morrisville, North Carolina and its registered office in Hong Kong, China.
Its products include personal कंप्यूटर, टैब्लेट कंप्यूटर, मोबाईल फोन, workstations, सर्वर, इलेक्ट्रॉनिक storage devices, IT management software and smart televisions.
Lenovo is the world 's second-largest PC vendor by 2012 ईकाई बिक्री.
It markets the थिंकपैड लकीर of कोपी कंप्यूटर और the ThinkCentre line of desktops.
Lenovo has operations in more than 60 देशों और बिकता इसके products in around 160 countries.
लेनोवो थी संस्थापित in बीजिंग in 1984 और incorporated in Hong Kong in 1988 under its previous name, Legend.
Lenovo is listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the हैंग सेंग china-affiliated corporations अनुक्रमणिका.
Slug is a common name for an apparently shell-less स्थलीय gastropod mollusk.
The word `` slug '' is also often used as part of the common name of any gastropod mollusc that has no शेल, रै a बहुत घटाया शेल, or रै तभी a small internal shell.
( This is in contrast to the common name `` snail ``, which is applied to gastropods that have a नतीजे शेल कि is विशाल पर्याप्त कि the नरम भाग of the एनिमल can retract fully into it. )
Slugs exist on land and in the sea, and there is भी एक genus of freshwater slugs, Acochlidium.
The unadorned word `` slug '' is however लागू primarily to जमीन slugs, whereas slugs इससे the समुद्र or इससे freshwater are usually referred to as `` sea slugs `` and `` freshwater slugs ''.
Land gastropods साथ a शेल कि is नहीं काफी vestigial, लकिन is too छोटी to retract into ( like many in the family Urocyclidae ), are known as semislugs.
The various taxonomic परिवारों of slugs रूप भाग of अनेक काफी different evolutionary lineages which also include snails.
Thus, for example, the various families of land slugs are not very closely related to एक another, despite a सतही समानता in the overall body form.
The shell-less condition has arisen many times independently दौरान the विकासवादी पास्ट, और thus the category `` slug '' is emphatically a polyphyletic one.
Slugs, like all other gastropods, undergo torsion ( a 180° टेढ़ी of the internal organs ) during development.
Internally, slug anatomy clearly shows the effects of this rotation, but externally the bodies of land slugs appear to be more or less सममित, मगर लिये the positioning of the pneumostome, which is on one side of the animal, normally the right hand side.
The नरम, slimy लाशें of slugs हैं prone to desiccation, so land-living slugs are confined to moist environments and must retreat to damp hiding places when the weather is dry.
The subsequent information in this article applies to जमीन slugs.
is a Latin word that अर्थात् `` यूँ '' or, in लिखने, `` it was thus in the source material ''.

Sic, cluj, a कम्यून in Romania
SIC, the क्षेत्रीय कोड for Sicily
Sic ( noise artist ), styled as [ sic ], stage name of जेनिफर मॉरिस, a कनाडाई noise artist

`` ( sic ) '', a सोंग by अमरीकी बैंड Slipknot on the album Slipknot

Specific inductive capacity, abbreviated to SIC, which is more commonly ज्ञात as the relative permittivity or the dielectric constant
St ignatius ' कॉलेज, riverview, a जेसुइट स्कूल in Sydney, Australia
Imperial मानक of नेपोलियन I
Napoleon Bonaparte (, ; 15 August 1769 – 5 May 1821 ) was a French military and political leader who rose to prominence during the latter stages of the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति और इसके associated wars in Europe.
As Napoleon I, he was Emperor of the फ्रेंच इससे 1804 to 1815.
His legal reform, the napoleonic कोड, रै महरूम a प्रमुख influence on अनेक सिविल विधि jurisdictions worldwide, but he is best remembered for his role in the wars led against France by a series of coalitions, the so-called Napoleonic Wars.
He established hegemony over most of continental Europe and sought to spread the ideals of the French क्रान्ति, जबकि consolidating an इम्पीरियल साम्राज्य जिससे लौटी aspects of the deposed Ancien Régime.
Due to his success in these wars, often against numerically superior enemies, he is generally regarded as one of the महानतम सैन्य कमांडरों of सब समय, और उसके अभियान are studied at military academies worldwide.
Napoleon was born at Ajaccio in Corsica in a family of noble इतालवी ancestry जिससे था settled Corsica in the 16th century.
He trained as an तोपखाने अधिकारी in mainland France.
He rose to prominence under the French पहला गणतंत्र और led कामयाब अभियान विरूद्ध the पहला और दूसरी Coalitions arrayed against France.
He led a कामयाब आक्रमण of the Italian peninsula.
In 1799, he staged a coup d'état and installed himself as First Consul ; five years later the फ्रेंच सीनेट proclaimed उसे सम्राट, following a plebiscite in his favour.
In the first decade of the 19th century, the French Empire under Napoleon engaged in a series of conflicts—the Napoleonic Wars —that involved every प्रमुख यूरोपीय power.
After a streak of victories, France secured a dominant position in continental Europe, and Napoleon maintained the French sphere of influence through the formation of extensive alliances और the नियुक्ति of मित्रों और परिवार सदस्यों to नियम अन्य यूरोपीय देशों as फ्रेंच client states.
The प्रायद्वीपीय युद्ध और 1812 फ्रेंच आक्रमण of Russia marked turning points in Napoleon 's fortunes.
His Grande Armée थी badly क्षतिग्रस्त in the अभियान and never fully recovered.
In 1813, the Sixth Coalition defeated his forces at Leipzig ; the following साल the गठबन्धन invaded फ़्रांस, मजबूर नेपोलियन to abdicate और exiled him to the island of Elba.
Less than a year later, he escaped Elba and लौटे to शक्ति, लकिन थी पराजित at the बैटल of वाटरलू in June 1815.
Napoleon spent the last six years of his जीवन in कारावास by the अंग्रेजों on the island of Saint Helena.
An autopsy concluded he died of stomach cancer, but there has महरूम कुछ बहस परिचय the कारण of उसके मौत, as कुछ विद्वानों have speculated that he was a victim of arsenic poisoning.
इस is a कालानुक्रमिक listing of the United States Senators from Pennsylvania.
United States सीनेटरों हैं popularly निर्वाचित, for a six-year term, beginning January 3.
Elections are आयोजित the पहला मंगलवार after November 1.
Before 1914, they यहूद चुनी by the पेन्सिलवेनिया सामान्य सभा, और पहले 1935, their terms began March 4.
The South Africa नेशनल रग्बी संघ टोली ( ज्ञात as the springboks ) represents South Africa in rugby union.
They compete in the सालाना रग्बी चैंपियनशिप, along with southern-hemisphere counterparts Argentina, Australia and New Zealand.
They have won this championship on तीन अवसरों in सोलह सालो.
They are currently ranked second in the world by the International रग्बी फलक, और यहूद नामित 2008 संसार टोली of the साल at the Laureus World Sports Awards.
Although South Africa was instrumental in the creation of the Rugby World Cup competition, the Springboks did not compete in the first two World Cups in 1987 और 1991 क्युकी of anti-apartheid sporting boycotts of South Africa.
The team made its संसार कप डेब्यू in 1995, when the newly democratic South Africa hosted the tournament.
The Springboks then पराजित the सब अश्वेतों 15–12 in the फाइनल, जिससे is now remembered as one of the greatest moments in South Africa 's sporting history, and a watershed moment in the post-Apartheid nation-building process.
South Africa regained their title as champions 12 years later, when वे पराजित इंग्लैण्ड 15–6 in the 2007 फाइनल.
As a result of the 2007 World Cup tournament the Springboks were promoted to first place in the IRB World Rankings, a स्थिति वे आयोजित जबतक जुलाई the following साल जब नई जीलैंड regained the top spot.
The Springboks play in green and सुनहरा jerseys, और उनके प्रतीक हैं the Springbok and the Protea.
The side has been playing international rugby since 1891, when a British Isles side toured the स्वदेश, playing दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी in उनके पहला परीक्षण on 30 July.
South Africa was coached by Jake White, who led the Boks to the 2007 World Cup title, announcing उसके इस्तीफा effectively from the end of 2007.
His replacement 's ( Peter de Villiers ) contract expired in 2011, following a 11–9 शिकस्त to ऑस्ट्रेलिया in the रग्बी संसार कप quarter-final, who then stated he would not be signing a new deal.
The previous captain was John Smit, who before he retired in 2011 निभाई वेश्या लिये सबसे of उसके करियर, हालांकि he रै भी महरूम a prop, mainly in 2008 and 2009.
Due to Smit being अनुपलब्ध लिये the नवम्बर 2010 Tests after surgery, lock Victor Matfield took Smit 's place as captain for that tour.
The current कप्तान is जां de Villiers.
The Battle of Gettysburg (, with an sound ), was fought July 1–3, 1863, in और around the कस्बा of gettysburg, पेन्सिलवेनिया.
It was the battle with the largest क्रमांक of हताहत in the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध और is प्रायः वर्णित as the war 's turning point.
Union Maj. Gen. जार्ज गॉर्डन meade 's फौज of the potomac पराजित हमले by confederate gen. रॉबर्ट E. ली 's Army of Northern Virginia, ending Lee 's invasion of the North.
After his कामयाबी at chancellorsville in वर्जिनिया in may 1863, ली led his army through the Shenandoah Valley to begin his second invasion of the North—the Gettysburg Campaign.
With his army in high spirits, Lee intended to shift the focus of the summer campaign from war-ravaged उत्तरी वर्जिनिया और hoped to influence उत्तरी राजनेता to दे up उनके अभियोजन of the युद्ध by penetrating as far as Harrisburg, Pennsylvania, or even Philadelphia.
Prodded by President Abraham lincoln, maj. gen. जोसेफ वेश्या स्थानांतरित his army in pursuit, but was relieved just three days before the battle and replaced by Meade.
Elements of the two armies initially collided at Gettysburg on July 1, 1863, as ली तत्काल concentrated उसके शक्तियां वहीँ, उसके उद्देश्य being to engage the Union army and destroy it.
Low ridges to the northwest of town were defended initially by a Union cavalry division अंतर्गत ब्रिगेडियर. gen. जॉन buford, और जल्द reinforced साथ दो corps of संघ infantry.
However, two large Confederate corps assaulted them from the northwest and north, collapsing the hastily developed Union lines, sending the defenders retreating through the गलियों of town to the hills just to the south.
On the दूसरी दिन of बैटल, most of both armies had assembled.
The Union line was laid out in a defensive formation resembling a fishhook.
In the late afternoon of July 2, Lee launched a heavy उत्पीड़न on the संघ बाएँ पार्श्व, और fierce लड़ raged at छोटी गोलाकार शीर्ष, the wheatfield, Devil 's Den, and the Peach Orchard.
On the Union right, demonstrations escalated into full-scale assaults on culp 's Hill and Cemetery Hill.
All across the battlefield, despite significant नुकसान, the संघ defenders held their lines.
On the third day of battle, July 3, fighting resumed on Culp 's Hill, and cavalry battles raged to the east and south, but the प्रमुख इवेंट थी a नाटकीय infantry उत्पीड़न by 12,500 confederates विरूद्ध the बीच of the Union line on Cemetery Ridge, known as Pickett 's Charge.
The charge was repulsed by Union राइफल और तोपखाने आग, at ग्रेट losses to the Confederate army.
Lee led उसके फौज on a torturous retreat back to Virginia.
Between 46,000 and 51,000 soldiers from both armies were हताहत in the three-day battle.
That November, President Lincoln used the dedication ceremony for the gettysburg नेशनल कब्रिस्तान to सम्मान the गिरे संघ सैनिको and redefine the purpose of the war in his historic Gettysburg Address.
An academic अनुशासन, or फ़ील्ड of पढ़ाई, is a शाखा of knowledge that is taught and researched at the college or university level.
Disciplines are पारिभाषित ( in भाग ), और पहचाना by the अकादमिक जर्नल्स in जिससे शोध is published, and the learned societies and academic departments or faculties to which their practitioners belong.
However, there exists no formal मापदण्ड लिये जब शैक्षणिक कार्यक्रम और scholarly journals form an academic discipline.
A huge difference exists between, on the one hand, खूब स्थापित disciplines कि मौजूद in लगभग सब विश्वविद्यालयों सब over the world, have a long history, and have a well established set of journals and conferences, and, on the other hand, suggestions for new fields supported only by few universities and publications.
Fields of study usually have several sub-disciplines or branches, and the distinguishing lines between these हैं प्रायः दोनो मनमानी और अस्पष्ट.
PHP is a server-side scripting language designed for web development but also प्रयुक्त as a general-purpose प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा.
PHP is now installed on more than 244 million वेबसाइटों और 2.1 लाख वेब servers.
Originally created by Rasmus Lerdorf in 1995, the reference implementation of PHP is अभी उत्पादित by the पीएचपी समूह.
While PHP originally stood लिये निजी घर पेज, it अभी स्टैंड लिये पीएचपी : हाइपरटेक्स्ट Preprocessor, a recursive acronym.
PHP code is interpreted by a वेब सर्वर साथ a पीएचपी प्रोसेसर module which generates the resulting web page : PHP commands can be embedded directly into an HTML source document rather than calling an external file to process data.
It has also evolved to include a command-line interface काबिलियत और can be प्रयुक्त in स्टैंडअलोन graphical applications.
PHP is free software released under the PHP अनुज्ञा, जिससे is असंगत साथ the ग्नू सामान्य पब्लिक अनुज्ञा ( जीपीएल ) due to restrictions on the usage of the term PHP.
PHP can be deployed on most web सर्वर और भी as a स्टैंडअलोन शेल on लगभग प्रत्येक ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली and platform, free of charge.
John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May 29, 1917 – November 22, 1963 ), often referred to by उसके आद्याक्षर jfk, थी the 35th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, सेवारत इससे 1961 until his death in 1963.
After military service as commander of the Motor torpedo नौकाएँ pt-109 और pt-59 दौरान संसार युद्ध ii in the दक्षिण प्रशांत, कैनेडी represented मैसाचुसेट्स ' 11th congressional ज़िला in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a Democrat.
Thereafter, he परोसा in the u.S. सीनेट from 1953 until 1960.
कैनेडी पराजित वाइस अध्यक्ष और रिपब्लिकन प्रत्याशी Richard Nixon in the 1960 U.S. presidential election.
At 43 years of age, he is the youngest to have been elected to the office, the second-youngest अध्यक्ष ( बाद थियोडोर Roosevelt ), and the first person born in the 20th century to serve as president.
A Catholic, Kennedy is the only non- प्रोटोस्टेंट अध्यक्ष, और is the तभी अध्यक्ष to have won a Pulitzer Prize.
Events during his presidency included the Bay of Pigs Invasion, the Cuban Missile Crisis, the भवन of the बर्लिन वॉल, the स्पेस रेस, the african-american सिविल अधिकारों गति, और early stages of the Vietnam War.
Therein, Kennedy increased the number of military advisers, खास आपरेशन शक्तियां, और helicopters in an प्रयत्न to curb the spread of communism in South East Asia.
The Kennedy administration adopted the policy of the Strategic हैमलेट कार्यक्रम जिससे थी implemented by the South Vietnamese government.
It involved certain forced relocation, village internment, and segregation of ग्रामीण दक्षिण वियतनामी इससे the northern and southern communist insurgents.
Kennedy was assassinated on November 22, 1963 in डलास, Texas.
Lee Harvey Oswald was charged with the crime, but he was shot and killed by Jack Ruby two days बाद, पहले a विचारण could लो place.
The FBI and the Warren Commission officially concluded कि Oswald was the lone assassin.
However, the United राज्य हाउस चुनें कमेटी on assassinations ( hsca ) concluded that those investigations were flawed and that Kennedy was probably assassinated as the result of a conspiracy.
However, ABC News in their investigation, The Kennedy Assassination : Beyond Conspiracy, पुष्टि the निष्कर्षों of the वारेन आयोग ; having concluded ओसवाल्ड acted alone.
Kennedy 's controversial Department of Defense TFX सेनानी bomber कार्यक्रम led to a congressional investigation that lasted from 1963 to 1970.
Since the 1960s सूचना concerning Kennedy 's private life has come to light.
Details of Kennedy 's health problems in which he struggled have become बेहतर ज्ञात, विशेषकर since the 1990s.
Although initially kept रहस्य इससे the सामान्य पब्लिक, रिपोर्ट्स of Kennedy 's philandering have garnered much press.
Kennedy ranks highly in public राय दरजा of u.S. presidents.
`` Stand by Me '' is a song originally performed by Ben E. किंग और लिखा by किंग, जेरी leiber, और माइक stoller, प्रेरित by the spiritual `` Lord Stand by Me, '' plus two lines rooted in Psalms 46:2–3.
वहीँ have महरूम over 400 recorded versions of the song.
A political कार्टून इससे an 1894 पक पत्रिका by इलस्ट्रेटर s.d. ehrhart, shows a farm woman labeled `` Democratic Party '' sheltering from a tornado of political change.
A metaphor is a figure of speech that describes a विषय by asserting कि it is, on कुछ point of comparison, the same as another otherwise unrelated object.
Metaphor is a type of analogy and is closely related to other rhetorical आंकड़े of वाक कि achieve their effects via association, comparison or resemblance including allegory, hyperbole, and simile.
In simpler terms, a metaphor compares दो वस्तुएँ or बाते बगैर using the words `` like '' or `` as ''.
One of the most prominent examples of a metaphor in English literature is the All the world 's a स्टेज monologue इससे as तुम Like It :
सब the world 's a stage,
And all the men and महिलाओं merely खिलाड़ी ;
They have उनके exits और उनके entrances ; — William Shakespeare, As You Like It, 2/7
This quote is a metaphor because the संसार is नहीं वस्तुतः a स्टेज.
By figuratively asserting कि the संसार is a स्टेज, शेक्सपियर उपयोग the अंक of तुलना between the संसार और a stage to convey an understanding about the mechanics of the world and the lives of the people within it.
माउंट फुजी, इससे the Thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji, color woodcut by Katsushika Hokusai
Rembrandt van Rijn, self-portrait, etching, c.1630
फ्रांसिस्को गोया, वहीँ is no एक to सहायता उन्हें, Disasters of War series, aquatint c.1810
Felix vallotton, la raison probante ( the cogent कारण ), woodcut from the series Intimités, 1898
printmaking is the प्रक्रम of making artworks by printing, normally on paper.
printmaking सामान्यतः कवर तभी the प्रक्रम of बनाना prints with an element of originality, rather than just being a photographic reproduction of a painting.
Except in the मामला of monotyping, the प्रक्रम is सक्षम of producing multiples of the same piece, which is called a print.
Each print produced is not माना a `` नक़ल '' लकिन बल्कि is माना an `` original ''.
This is because typically each print varies to an extent due to variables intrinsic to the printmaking प्रक्रम, और भी क्युकी the imagery of a छपाई is typically नहीं बस a जनन of another work but rather is often a unique image designed from the start to be expressed in a particular printmaking technique.
A print may be known as an छाप.
Printmaking ( other than monotyping ) is not chosen only for its ability to produce multiple impressions, but rather for the unique qualities कि प्रत्येक of the printmaking प्रक्रियाओं lends itself to.
Prints are created by transferring ink इससे a मेट्रिक्स or through a prepared स्क्रीन to a sheet of paper or other material.
आम प्रकार of matrices शामिल : मेटल प्लेटों, प्रायः तांबे or जस्ता, or पॉलिमर plates for engraving or etching ; stone, aluminum, or polymer for lithography ; blocks of wood for woodcuts and wood engravings ; and linoleum for linocuts.
Screens made of silk or synthetic fabrics are प्रयुक्त लिये the screenprinting process.
Other types of matrix substrates और सम्बन्धित प्रक्रियाओं हैं discussed below.
Multiple impressions printed from the वही मेट्रिक्स रूप an edition.
Since the late 19th century, artists have generally signed व्यक्तिगत impressions इससे an संस्करण और प्रायः क्रमांक the impressions to form a limited edition.
Prints may also be printed in book form, ऐसे as illustrated किताबे or artist 's books.
Il Divo is an English multinational operatic pop गायन समूह निर्मित by music manager, executive, and reality TV star Simon Cowell.
Formed in the United Kingdom, they are also signed to cowell 's रिकार्ड लेबल, Syco Music.

An interceptor aircraft ( or simply interceptor ) is a type of fighter aircraft designed specifically to prevent मिशन of दुश्मन वायुयान, विशेषकर बमवर्षक और reconnaissance aircraft, and destroy them, relying usually on great speed and powerful armament.
Being used since the First World War, after the late 1960s, interceptors became कम महत्वपूर्ण due to shifting इससे बमवर्षक to इंटरकांटिनेंटल ballistic missiles ( ICBMs ) for nuclear warfare.
A Vietnamese अमरीकी ( ) is an अमरीकी of Vietnamese descent.
They make up about half of all विदेशी वियतनामी ( người việt hải ngoại ) and are the fourth-largest Asian American group.
Mass Vietnamese immigration to the संयुक्त राज्य प्रारंभ after 1975, after the end of the Vietnam War.
जल्दी आप्रवासियों यहूद शरणार्थी नाव people fleeing persecution or poverty.
Forced to flee from their homeland and often thrust into poor urban neighborhoods, these newcomers have nevertheless managed to स्थापित दमदार समुदायों in a छोटी राशि of समय.
More than sixty percent of वियतनामी अमेरिकी reside in the राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, टेक्सास, वॉशिंगटन, Florida, and Virginia.

Adolf Hitler committed suicide by gunshot on 30 अप्रैल 1945 in his Führerbunker in Berlin.
His wife एवा ( née braun ) वचनबद्ध suicide with him by ingesting cyanide.
That afternoon, in accordance with Hitler 's prior instructions, their remains were carried up the stairs through the bunker 's emergency exit, doused in पेट्रोल और नियत alight in the reich chancellery garden outside the bunker.
The Soviet archives record that their burnt remains यहूद बरामद और interred in successive स्थितियाँ जबतक 1970 जब वे यहूद again exhumed, cremated and the ashes scattered.
Accounts differ as to the cause of death ; one that he died by poison only and another that he died by a self-inflicted gunshot, जबकि biting down on a cyanide capsule.
Contemporary historians have rejected ये खाते as होने either सोवियत प्रचार or an attempted compromise in order to reconcile the different conclusions.
One eye-witness recorded that the body showed लक्षण of having been shot through the mouth, but this has been proven unlikely.
There is also विवाद regarding the authenticity of skull and jaw fragments which were recovered.
In 2009, DNA परीक्षण यहूद performed on a कपाल सोवियत officials था long believed to be Hitler 's.
The tests revealed that the skull was actually कि of a स्त्री कम than 40 years old.
स्थान of मिसौरी
The alcohol कानून of मिसौरी हैं among the तनिक प्रतिबंधक and most lax and permissive in the United States.
Missouri is known throughout the Midwest for its largely laissez-faire approach to दारू विनियमन, in शार्प कंट्रास्ट to the बहुत सख्त दारू laws of some of its neighbors, like Kansas and Oklahoma.
Necrotizing fasciitis ( or ) or NF, commonly known as flesh-eating disease or flesh-eating bacteria syndrome, is a rare infection of the deeper layers of skin and subcutaneous ऊतकों, easily spreading आरपार the fascial प्लेन भीतर the subcutaneous tissue.
Necrotizing fasciitis is quickly progressing, having greater risk of विकासशील in the immunocompromised due to conditions like diabetes, cancer, etc.
It is a severe बीमारी of अचानक onset और is प्रायः treated तत्काल with high doses of intravenous antibiotics.
Type i describes a polymicrobial संक्रमण, whereas प्रकार ii describes a monomicrobial infection.
Many types of जीवाणु can कारण necrotizing fasciitis ( e.g., समूह a streptococcus ( streptococcus pyogenes ), Staphylococcus aureus, Clostridium perfringens, Bacteroides fragilis, Aeromonas hydrophila ).
Such infections are more likely to occur in लोगों साथ compromised immune systems.
Historically, समूह a streptococcus made up most cases of Type II infections.
However, since as early as 2001, another serious form of monomicrobial necrotizing fasciitis has been observed with increasing आवृत्ति, caused by methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus ( MRSA ).
Some published case reports have implied a possible link between use of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs and NF, though the evidence of the link was said to be weak because of a छोटी क्रमांक of मामला मरीजों और it थी unclear whether the दवाएँ बस नकाबपोश the लक्षण of a द्वितीयक संक्रमण or यहूद a कारण per se.
World युद्ध ii ( wwii or ww2 ), भी ज्ञात as the दूसरी World War, was a global war that lasted from 1939 to 1945.
It involved the vast majority of the world 's nations —including all of the great powers —eventually forming दो opposing सैन्य alliances : the Allies and the Axis.
It was the most widespread war in इतिहास, साथ अधिक than 100 लाख people serving in military units from over 30 different countries.
In a state of `` कुल युद्ध ``, the प्रमुख भागीदार लगाई उनके संपूर्ण आर्थिक, औद्योगिक, and scientific capabilities at the service of the war effort, erasing the distinction between civilian and military resources.
Marked by mass मौतों of नागरिकों, सहित the holocaust और the only use of nuclear weapons in warfare, it resulted in 50 million to over 75 million fatalities.
These deaths make World War II by far the deadliest विरोध in इंसान इतिहास.
The Empire of Japan aimed to dominate ईस्ट एशिया और थी already at युद्ध साथ the गणतंत्र of चीन in 1937, लकिन the संसार war is generally said to have begun on 1 September 1939 with the invasion of Poland by Germany and subsequent declarations of war on Germany by France and Britain.
From late 1939 to early 1941, in a series of campaigns और treaties, जर्मनी formed the अक्ष गठबंधन साथ Italy, conquering or subduing much of continental Europe.
Following the Molotov–Ribbentrop Pact, जर्मनी और the सोवियत संघ partitioned और annexed territories between themselves of their European neighbours, including Poland.
The संयुक्त किंगडम और the अन्य सदस्यों of the अंग्रेजों राष्ट्रमंडल यहूद the तभी major Allied forces continuing the fight against the Axis, with battles taking place in North Africa as well as the long-running Battle of the Atlantic.
In June 1941, the European Axis launched an invasion of the Soviet Union, giving a start to the largest जमीन थिएटर of युद्ध in इतिहास, जिससे tied bas the प्रमुख भाग of the अक्ष ' military forces for the rest of the war.
In December 1941, जापानी joined the अक्ष, attacked the United States and European territories in the Pacific Ocean, and quickly conquered much of the Western Pacific.
The Axis advance was stopped in 1942, after जापानी खोया a श्रेणी of नवल लड़ाइयों और यूरोपीय Axis troops were defeated in North Africa and, decisively, at Stalingrad.
in 1943, साथ a श्रेणी of जर्मनी defeats in पूर्वी यूरोपीय, the अलाइड आक्रमण of Italy, and American victories in the Pacific, the Axis lost the initiative and undertook strategic retreat on all fronts.
In 1944, the Western Allies invaded France, while the Soviet Union regained all of इसके territorial नुकसान और invaded जर्मनी और its allies.
During 1944 and 1945 the United States defeated the जापानी नेवी और captured कुंजी पश्चिमी Pacific islands.
The war in Europe ended with the capture of Berlin by Soviet and Polish troops और the subsequent जर्मनी unconditional आत्मसमर्पण on 8 May 1945.
Following the Potsdam Declaration by the Allies on 26 जुलाई 1945, the संयुक्त राज्य dropped परमाणु बम on the जापानी शहरों of Hiroshima on 6 August, and Nagasaki on 9 August.
With an invasion of the Japanese archipelago निकट, और the सोवियत संघ having घोषित युद्ध on जापानी by आक्रमणकारी मंचूरिया, Japan surrendered on 15 August 1945, ending the war in Asia and cementing the total victory of the Allies over the Axis.
संसार युद्ध ii altered the political alignment and social structure of the world.
The United Nations ( UN ) was स्थापित to फोस्टर अंतरराष्ट्रीय सहयोग and prevent future conflicts.
The great powers that were the victors of the war—the संयुक्त राज्य, the सोवियत संघ, चीन, the संयुक्त किंगडम, और france—became the permanent members of the United Nations Security Council.
The Soviet Union and the United States emerged as प्रतिद्वंद्वी superpowers, सेटिंग the स्टेज लिये the ठंडा War, which lasted for the next 46 years.
meanwhile, the influence of यूरोपीय ग्रेट शक्तियां प्रारंभ to decline, while the decolonisation of Asia and Africa began.
Most countries whose industries था महरूम क्षतिग्रस्त स्थानांतरित towards economic recovery.
Political integration, विशेषकर in यूरोपीय, उभरा as an प्रयत्न to stabilise postwar relations and fight more effectively in the Cold War.
A limited liability company ( LLC ) is a लचीली रूप of एंटरप्राइज़ that blends elements of partnership and corporate structures.
Note than an LLC is not a corporation, और कॉलिंग an llc a निगम is technically incorrect.
An LLC is a legal form of company that provides limited liability to its owners in the विशाल बहुमत of संयुक्त राज्य jurisdictions.
LLCs do नहीं need to be organized for profit.
पाँच k-cups
The inside of a used K-Cup, with the top foil और the प्रयुक्त कॉफी grounds removed.
This shows the filter inside the k-cup.
K-Cup portion packs are used with Keurig or other single cup brewing प्रणालियों to brew a cup of coffee, tea, or hot chocolate.
प्रत्येक k-cup is a प्लास्टिक container with a coffee filter inside.
Ground coffee beans are packed in the k-cup और sealed air-tight with a combination plastic and foil lid.
When the K-Cup is placed in a Keurig brewer, the brewer punctures the foil lid and the bottom of the K-Cup और शक्तियां hot जल अंतर्गत दबाव through the k-cup and into a mug.
Keurig licenses its K-Cup technology to coffee roasters and tea makers such as Green Mountain Coffee Roasters, Diedrich/ Gloria Jeans, Timothy 's World कॉफी, वैन houtte, हिरण कॉफी, celestial seasonings, bigelow चाय Company, Twinings, Tully 's, Coffee People and Newman 's Own.
Keurig 's patents on the original K-Cup डिज़ाइन समाप्त in सितंबर 2012.
Keurig holds at तनिक एक अतिरिक्त, still-active us पेटेंट और another पेटेंट application, detailing improvements that have subsequently been incorporated in their K-Cup design.

A chronograph is a specific type of watch that is प्रयुक्त as a stopwatch संयुक्त साथ a प्रदर्शक देखें.
A basic chronograph has an independent sweep second hand ; it can be started, stopped, and लौटे to शून्य by successive pressure on the stem.
Louis moinet invented the chronograph in 1816
Conventional PCI ( PCI is an initialism formed इससे परिधीय घटक इंटरकनेक्ट, भाग of the पीसीआई लोकल बस मानक और प्रायः shortened to just PCI ) is a local computer bus for attaching hardware devices in a computer.
The पीसीआई बस supports the कृत्यों मिला on a प्रोसेसर बस, लकिन in a standardized format that is independent of any particular processor.
Devices connected to the bus appear to the processor to be connected directly to the प्रोसेसर बस, और हैं आबंटित पता in the प्रोसेसर 's पता स्पेस.
Attached devices can take either the form of an एकीकृत सर्किट fitted onto the मदरबोर्ड itself, पुकारा a planar device in the PCI specification, or an expansion card that fits into a slot.
The PCI Local Bus was पहला implemented in ibm pc compatibles, जहाँ it displaced the combination of ISA plus one VESA Local Bus as the bus configuration.
It has subsequently been adopted for अन्य कंप्यूटर प्रकार.
PCI and PCI-X are being replaced by पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस, लकिन, सबसे motherboards हैं स्टिल बना साथ एक or अधिक पीसीआई स्लॉट, which are sufficient for many uses.
The PCI specification covers the physical size of the bus ( including the size and spacing of the circuit board edge विद्युत सम्पर्क ), विद्युत विशेषताएँ, बस समय, and protocols.
The specification can be purchased from the PCI खास ब्याज समूह ( PCI-SIG ).
Typical PCI ताश प्रयुक्त in pcs शामिल : संजाल ताश, ध्वनि ताश, modems, extra ports such as USB or serial, TV tuner cards and disk controllers.
PCI video cards replaced ISA and VESA cards, until growing bandwidth requirements outgrew the capabilities of PCI ; the preferred interface for video ताश became अगप, और तब पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस.
PCI video cards remain available for use with old PCs बगैर अगप or पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस स्लॉट.
Many devices previously provided on PCI expansion cards are now commonly integrated onto motherboards or उपलब्धियाँ in सार्वभौमिक सीरियल बस और पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस संस्करण.
Michael Whitaker Smith ( born October 7, 1957 ) is an American contemporary Christian musician, who has charted primarily in the contemporary Christian and occasionally in the मुख्यधारा चार्ट.
His biggest कामयाबी in मुख्यधारा म्यूज़िक थी in 1991 when `` Place in this World '' hit No. 6 on the Billboard Hot 100.
Smith is a three-time ग्रैमी पुरस्कार विजेता, and has earned 40 Dove Awards.
Over the course of his career, he sold more than 13 million albums और अंकित 29 no. 1 hit गीतों, चौदह सुनहरा albums, and five platinum albums.
Smith is an American Music Award recipient ; he थी भी नामित एक of लोगों magazine 's `` Most Beautiful People ''.

Sabotage is a deliberate action aimed at weakening another entity through subversion, obstruction, disruption, or destruction.
In a workplace setting, sabotage is the conscious withdrawal of efficiency generally directed at causing कुछ बदलें in कार्यस्थल conditions.
One who engages in तोड़फोड़ is a saboteur.
As a rule, saboteurs try to conceal their identities because of the consequences of उनके क्रियाएँ.
For example, whereas an environmental pressure group might be happy to be identified with an act of sabotage, it होता नहीं want the व्यक्तिगत पहचान of the perpetrators known.
Patrick Henry College ( PHC ) is a private, independent कॉलेज साथ an धर्मान्तरण ईसाई आधार कि focuses on शिक्षण classical liberal arts and government, located in Purcellville, Virginia, United States.
Patrick Henry is known for its रूढ़िवादी धर्मान्तरण ईसाई focus.
As of April 17, 2007, the college was accredited by the Transnational Association of Christian Colleges and Schools, a national faith-related accrediting organization पहचाना by the विभाग of शिक्षा और the परिषद लिये उच्चतर शिक्षा Accreditation.
The school was founded with the help of the Home School Legal Defense Association, and now serves as the headquarters लिये the संगठन, साथ जिससे it is स्टिल closely कनेक्ट.
The history of television comprises the कार्य of numerous इंजीनियर्स और आविष्कारक in several countries over many decades.
The earliest proposal was in 1908, in a पेपर by a. A. campbell-swinton and postulated the use of cathode rays.
The first practical demonstrations of television, however, were developed using electromechanical विधि to स्कैन, संचारण, और reproduce an चित्र.
As electronic camera and display tubes were perfected, electromechanical टेलीविज़न दिया रास्ता to all-electronic प्रणालियों in nearly all applications.

A cinema in ऑस्ट्रेलिया
A ठेठ मल्टीप्लेक्स ( एएमसी सैर 16 in Woodland Hills, Los Angeles, U.S. )
A movie theater ( भी पुकारा a सिनेमा, फिल्म हाउस, फिल्मी हाउस, film theater or picture house ) is a venue, usually a building, for viewing films.
Most but not all movie थिएटर हैं वाणिज्यिक परिचालन केटरिंग to the general public, who attend by purchasing a ticket.
The movie is projected with a movie projector onto a विशाल प्रक्षेप स्क्रीन at the सामने of the auditorium.
Most movie theaters are now equipped for digital सिनेमा प्रक्षेप, निकालना the need to बनाएँ और हस्तांतरण a physical film print.

Lyme disease, Lyme borreliosis is an संक्रामक बीमारी caused by at तनिक तीन प्रजाति of जीवाणु belonging to the genus Borrelia.
Borrelia burgdorferi sensu stricto is the main cause of Lyme disease in North America, whereas Borrelia afzelii और borrelia garinii कारण सबसे यूरोपीय cases.
The disease is named after the towns of lyme और बूढ़ा lyme, कनेक्टिकट, USA, where a number of cases were identified in 1975.
Although एलन steere realized that Lyme disease was a tick-borne disease in 1978, the cause of the disease remained a mystery until 1981, when B. burgdorferi was identified by Willy Burgdorfer.
Lyme disease is the most common tick-borne बीमारी in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध.
borrelia is transmitted to इंसानो by the काटना of संक्रमित ticks belonging to a few species of the genus Ixodes ( `` hard ticks '' ).
Early symptoms may शामिल ज्वर, सिरदर्द, fatigue, depression, and a characteristic circular skin rash called erythema migrans ( EM ).
Left untreated, बाद लक्षण may involve the joints, heart, and central nervous system.
In सबसे मामले, the संक्रमण और इसके लक्षण are eliminated by antibiotics, especially if the illness is treated early.
Delayed or inadequate treatment can lead to more serious symptoms, which can be disabling और मुश्किल to treat.
Penises of minke whales on display at the आइसलैंडिक phallological संग्रहालय
Penis ( plural penises or penes ) is a सामान्य पद लिये the अंगों साथ जिससे पुरूष और उभयलिंगी animals introduce sperm into receptive females during copulation.
Such organs occur in many animals, both vertebrate and invertebrate, but males do not bear a penis in every animal species, and in those species in which the male does भालू a so-called शिश्न, the penes in the विभिन्न प्रजाति हैं not necessarily homologous.
For example, the penis of a mammal is at most analogous to the शिश्न of a पुरूष कीट or barnacle.
The term penis applies to many reproductive intromittent organs, but not to all ; for उदाहरण the intromittent अंग of सबसे cephalopoda is the hectocotylus, a specialised arm, and male spiders use their pedipalps.
In most species of animals in which there is an organ that might reasonably be described as a penis, it has no major function other than intromission, or at least conveying the sperm to the female, but in the placental mammals the penis bears the distal भाग of the urethra, जिससे discharges दोनो मूत्र दौरान urination और वीर्य दौरान copulation as the occasion requires.
Artists and repertoire ( a & r ) is the प्रभाग of a रिकार्ड लेबल or म्यूज़िक प्रकाशन कम्पनी कि is responsible for talent scouting and overseeing the artistic development of recording artists and/or songwriters.
It also acts as a liaison between artists and the record लेबल or प्रकाशन कम्पनी ; प्रत्येक कार्यकलाप involving कलाकारों to the पाइंट of एल्बम रिलीज is generally considered under the purview of, and responsibility of, A & R.
A furlong is a measure of distance in imperial units and U.S. customary units equal to one-eighth of a मील, समतुल्य to 220 गज, 660 फीट, 40 छड़, or 10 जंजीरों.
The exact value of the furlong varies slightly among english-speaking countries.
Five furlongs are approximately 1 किलोमीटर ( 1.0058 km is a closer approximation ).
Since the original definition of the मीटर थी one-quarter of एक ten-millionth of the परिधि of the धरती ( साथ the ग्रेट वृत्त coincident with the meridian of longitude passing through Paris ), the circumference of the Earth is about 40,000 km or about 200,000 furlongs.
CR2032 lithium बटन कोशिका बैटरी
लिथियम 9 वोल्ट, AA, & AAA sizes
Lithium batteries are disposable ( primary ) batteries that have lithium metal or लिथियम यौगिकों as an anode.
They stand अलावा इससे अन्य बैटरी in उनके high charge density ( long life ) and high cost per unit.
Depending on the design and chemical compounds used, lithium cells can produce voltages from 1.5 V ( comparable to a zinc–carbon or क्षारीय बैटरी ) to परिचय 3.7 V. लिथियम बैटरी हैं widely used in products such as portable consumer electronic devices.
Raymond `` रे '' चार्ल्स जोकर LaMontagne ( ; born June 18, 1973 ) is an American singer-songwriter.
LaMontagne has released four studio albums, Trouble, Till the Sun Turns Black, Gossip in the Grain and God willin ' & the क्रीक do n't वृद्धि.
He was born in नई हैम्पशायर और थी प्रेरित to create music after hearing an album by Stephen Stills.
Critics have compared LaMontagne 's म्यूज़िक to कि of the बैंड, Van Morrison, Nick Drake, and Tim Buckley.
He जीवनदान in मैसाचुसेट्स साथ his wife and two children.

It is the precursor to the झील हाउस and inspired the Maximum Ride series.

Over the course of the team 's history, the team has had अनेक लोगो जबकि wearing वस्तुतः the वही वर्दी over the years, with subtle changes made to give the uniforms an updated look.
