Facebook on the ad-tech 2010
Facebook is an online social networking service, whose name stems from the colloquial name for the book given to students at the start of the academic year by some university administrations in the संयुक्त राज्य to help students get to know each other.
It was founded in February 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg with his कॉलेज roommates और fellow हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों विद्यार्थी एडुआर्डो saverin, एंड्रयू McCollum, Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes.
The website 's membership was initially limited by the संस्थापकों to हार्वर्ड विद्यार्थी, लकिन थी विस्तारित to other colleges in the Boston area, the Ivy League, and Stanford University.
It gradually added support for विद्यार्थी at विभिन्न अन्य विश्वविद्यालयों पहले खोलने to ऊँची स्कूल विद्यार्थी, and eventually to anyone aged 13 and over.
Facebook now allows any users who declare themselves to be at तनिक 13 सालो बूढ़ा to become registered users of the site.
Users must register before using the site, after which they may create a personal profile, add other users as मित्रों, और एक्सचेंज संदेश, सहित automatic notifications when they update their profile.
Additionally, users may join common-interest user groups, organized by workplace, school or college, or अन्य विशेषताएँ, और categorize उनके मित्रों into सूचियाँ ऐसे as `` लोगों इससे Work '' or `` Close Friends ''.
As of सितंबर 2012, फेसबुक has over one billion active users.
According to a May 2011 Consumer Reports survey, there are 7.5 लाख children अंतर्गत 13 साथ खाते और 5 million under 10, violating the site 's terms of service.
In May 2005, Accel partners invested $ 12.7 million in Facebook, और जिम breyer added $ 1 लाख of his own money to the pot.
A January 2009 Compete.com study ranked फेसबुक as the सबसे प्रयुक्त सोशल networking service by worldwide monthly active users.
Entertainment Weekly included the site on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list, saying, `` कैसा on धरती किया we stalk हमारी exes, याद हमारी co-workers ' जन्मदिन, कीड़ा हमारी friends, and play a rousing game of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
Critics, such as Facebook Detox, state that Facebook has turned into a नेशनल obsession in the संयुक्त राज्य, resulting in vast amounts of time lost and encouraging narcissism.
Quantcast estimates Facebook has 138.9 लाख मासिक अद्वितीय U.S. visitors in May 2011.
According to Social Media Today, in April 2010 an estimated 41.6 % ( 129.5 लाख ) of the u.S. जनसांख्यिकी था a फेसबुक account.
Nevertheless, Facebook 's market growth started to stall in some regions, साथ the साईट खोने 7 लाख क्रियाशील users in the United States and Canada in May 2011.
Facebook eventually filed for an initial पब्लिक offering on फ़रवरी 1, 2012, और थी headquartered in Menlo Park, California.
Facebook Inc. began selling भण्डार to the पब्लिक और व्यापार on the NASDAQ on May 18, 2012.
Erwin Johannes Eugen Rommel ( 15 November 1891 – 14 अक्तूबर 1944 ), popularly ज्ञात as the मरुस्थल फॉक्स ( wüstenfuchs, ), थी a German Field Marshal of World War II.
He earned the respect of both his own troops और the दुश्मनों he लड़ा.
Rommel थी a अत्यधिक सजा अधिकारी in संसार युद्ध i और थी awarded the Pour le Mérite for his exploits on the Italian front.
In World War II, he further distinguished himself as the commander of the 7th panzer प्रभाग दौरान the 1940 invasion of France.
His नेतृत्व of जर्मनी और इतालवी शक्तियां in the उत्तर अफ़्रीकी अभियान स्थापित उसे as one of the most able commanders of the war, and earned him the appellation of the Desert Fox.
He is regarded as one of the most skilled कमांडरों of मरुस्थल warfare in the विरोध.
He later commanded the German forces opposing the अलाइड cross-channel आक्रमण in Normandy.
His assignments never took उसे to the Eastern Front.
Rommel is regarded as having been a दयालु और पेशेवर officer.
His Afrika Korps was never accused of war crimes, और सैनिको captured दौरान उसके अफ़्रीकी अभियान were reported to have been treated humanely.
Orders to kill Jewish soldiers, civilians and captured कमांडो यहूद उपेक्षित.
Late in the war, ख़बरों थी linked to the षड्यंत्र to assassinate Adolf Hitler.
Since Rommel was a national hero, Hitler desired to eliminate उसे चुपचाप.
He forced Rommel to commit suicide साथ a साइनाइड pill, in return for assurances that Rommel 's family would not be persecuted following his death.
Stained glass प्रतिनिधित्व of the Holy Spirit as a dove, c. 1660.
The seven gifts of the Holy Spirit is an enumeration of seven spiritual gifts originating साथ patristic लेखक, बाद elaborated by पाँच बौद्धिक virtues and four other groups of ethical characteristics.
They are : wisdom, समझना, अचरज और डरते ( भय of the रब ), counsel, ज्ञान, fortitude, and piety ( reverence ).
The Earth Day Flag, the latest proposal of जॉन mcconnell लिये a ध्वज of Earth Day
Earth Day is an annual event, celebrated on April 22, on जिससे कार्यक्रम हैं आयोजित विश्वव्यापी to demonstrate support for environmental protection.
It was first celebrated in 1970, and is now coordinated globally by the Earth Day संजाल, और मनाये in अधिक than 192 countries each year.
In 1969 at a युनेस्को सम्मेलन in सैन फ्रांसिस्को, the तिथि प्रस्तावित थी कूच 21, 1970, the first day of spring in the northern hemisphere.
This day of nature 's equipoise was later मंजूर in a उदघोषणा signed by Secretary General U Thant at the United Nations.
A month later a separate Earth Day was founded by United States Senator Gaylord Nelson as an पर्यावरणीय teach-in पहला आयोजित on अप्रैल 22, 1970.
नेल्सन थी बाद awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom Award in recognition of his work.
While this April 22 Earth Day was focused on the United States, an organization launched by Denis Hayes, जो थी the असली नेशनल समन्वयक in 1970, took it अंतरराष्ट्रीय in 1990 and organized events in 141 nations.
Numerous समुदायों celebrate धरती सप्ताह, an entire week of activities focused on environmental issues.
Iodine is a chemical तत्व with symbol I and atomic number 53.
The name is इससे यूनानी ioeidēs, अर्थ बैंगनी or purple, due to the color of elemental iodine vapor.
Iodine and its compounds are primarily used in पोषण, और industrially in the production of acetic acid and certain polymers.
आयोडीन 's अपेक्षाकृत ऊँची परमाणु क्रमांक, कम toxicity, और आसानी of अनुलग्नक to organic compounds have made it a part of many X-ray contrast materials in modern medicine.
Iodine has only one stable समस्थानिक.
A number of iodine radioisotopes हैं भी प्रयुक्त in चिकित्सा applications.
Iodine is मिला on धरती मुख्यतः as the अत्यधिक water-soluble iodide ion, I−, which concentrates it in oceans and brine pools.
Like the other halogens, free iodine occurs mainly as a diatomic molecule I2, and then only momentarily after होने oxidized इससे आयोडाइड by an oxidant जैसे free oxygen.
In the universe and on Earth, iodine 's ऊँची परमाणु क्रमांक makes it a अपेक्षाकृत rare element.
However, its presence in ocean जल रै दिए it a भूमिका in biology.
It is the heaviest अनिवार्य तत्व utilized widely by जीवन in biological कृत्यों ( तभी tungsten, employed in enzymes by a few species of bacteria, is heavier ).
Iodine 's rarity in अनेक soils, due to आरंभिक कम प्रचुरता as a crust-element, and also leaching of soluble iodide by rainwater, has led to many deficiency problems in land animals and inland human populations.
Iodine कमियां affects परिचय दो अरब लोगों और is the अग्रणी preventable cause of intellectual disabilities.
Iodine is required by higher animals, which use it to synthesize thyroid hormones, जिससे contain the तत्व.
Because of this function, radioisotopes of आयोडीन हैं concentrated in the थायराइड gland along with nonradioactive iodine.
If inhaled, the radioisotope iodine-131, which has a high परिवर्द्धन उत्पाद उपज, concentrates in the थायराइड, लकिन is easily remedied साथ पोटैशियम आयोडाइड treatment.
Lobbying ( also lobby ) is the अधिनियम of attempting to influence निर्णय बना by officials in the government, most often legislators or members of regulatory agencies.
Lobbying is done by many different types of लोगों और व्यवस्थित समूह, सहित individuals in the निजी सेक्टर, corporations, fellow legislators or government officials, or advocacy groups ( interest groups ).
Lobbyists may be among a विधायक 's constituencies, अर्थ a वोटर or bloc of मतदाता within his or her electoral district, or not ; they may engage in lobbying as a business, or not.
Professional lobbyists are people whose कारोबार is trying to influence विधान on behalf of a group or individual who hires them.
Individuals and nonprofit organizations can also lobby as an act of volunteering or as a small part of उनके सामान्य जॉब ( लिये उदाहरण, a सीईओ बैठक साथ a प्रतिनिधि परिचय a प्रोजेक्ट महत्वपूर्ण to his/her कम्पनी, or an activist meeting with his/her legislator in an unpaid capacity ).
सरकारें प्रायः define and regulate organized group lobbying that has become influential.
The ethics और नैतिकता of lobbying are.
Lobbying is often spoken of with contempt, when the implication is that people with inordinate socioeconomic शक्ति हैं corrupting the विधि ( टेढ़ी it away from fairness ) in order to serve their own conflict of interest.
But another side of lobbying is बनाना यकीनन कि अन्य ' रूचि are duly defended against others ' corruption, or even simply making sure that minority interests are fairly defended against mere tyranny of the majority.
For example, a medical association, or a trade संघ of स्वास्थ्य बीमे कंपनियाँ, may लॉबी a विधानमंडल in अनुक्रम to counteract the influence of tobacco companies, in which case the lobbying would be viewed by most people as justified ( duly defending against others ' corruption ).
The difficulty in drawing objective lines between which lobbyists are `` good lobbyists '' and which ones are `` bad ones '' is compounded by the cleverness साथ जिससे lobbyists or उनके क्लाइंट can argue कि उनके अपना lobbying is of the `` good '' kind.
At heart, the effort to influence विधान is a शक्ति struggle.
As in other forms of power struggle, such as war or law enforcement, motives दायरा इससे to self-defense to लड़ लिये इंसाफ, और the dividing लकीर between predation और justice is subject to rationalization.
Sunshine of your प्रेम गिटार riff
Cream were a 1960s अंग्रेजों चट्टान supergroup consisting of bassist/vocalist Jack Bruce, guitarist/vocalist Eric Clapton, and drummer Ginger Baker.
Their sound was characterised by a संकर of ब्लूज़ चट्टान, मुश्किल चट्टान और साइकेडेलिक चट्टान, combining the psychedelia-themed गीत, Eric Clapton 's blues guitar playing and vocals, Jack Bruce 's voice and prominent bass playing and Ginger Baker 's jazz -influenced drumming.
The group 's third album, Wheels of Fire, थी the संसार 's पहला platinum-selling double album.
Cream are widely regarded as होने the संसार 's first successful supergroup.
In their career, वे बेची over 15 million albums worldwide.
Cream 's music included songs based on traditional blues such as `` Crossroads `` and `` Spoonful ``, and modern blues ऐसे as `` born अंतर्गत a ख़राब चिह्न ``, as खूब as अधिक eccentric गीतों ऐसे as `` अजीब काढ़ा ``, `` किस्से of वीर ulysses `` and `` Toad ``.
Cream 's biggest hits were `` I Feel Free `` ( UK, number 11 ), `` Sunshine of Your Love `` ( US, क्रमांक 5 ), `` श्वेत रूम `` ( us, number 6 ), `` Crossroads '' ( US, number 28 ), and `` Badge `` ( UK, number 18 ).
Cream made a significant impact on the popular music of the time, and, along with Jimi Hendrix, and टेरी कठ of शिकागो, popularised the उपयोग of the wah-wah पैदल.
They provided a heavy yet technically proficient musical theme that foreshadowed and influenced the emergence of British bands such as the जेफ़ बेक समूह in the लेट 1960s.
The band 's live प्रदर्शन बहकावे प्रगतिशील rock acts such as Rush.
Cream were inducted into the चट्टान and Roll Hall of Fame in 1993.
They were included in both Rolling Stone and vh1 's सूचियाँ of the `` 100 महानतम कलाकारों of All Time ''.
They were also ranked number 16 on VH1 's `` 100 महानतम कलाकारों of मुश्किल चट्टान ''.
Hairspray is a 1988 कॉमेडी फिल्मी लिखा और निर्देशित by जॉन waters, and starring Ricki Lake, Sonny Bono, Debbie Harry, Michael St. Gerard, Shawn Thompson, Colleen Fitzpatrick, Jerry Stiller, and in his last film role, Divine.
Hairspray was a dramatic departure from waters ' पहले works, साथ a much broader intended दर्शक.
In fact, hairsprays pg is the mildest rating a Waters film has received ; most of his previous films were rated X by the MPAA.
Set in 1962 Baltimore, Maryland, the film revolves around self-proclaimed `` pleasantly plump '' teenager Tracy turnblad as वो pursues स्टारडम as a नर्तकी on a लोकल tv दिखाएँ और rallies against racial segregation.
Hairspray was only a moderate success upon its initial नाट्य रिलीज, कमाई a modest gross of $ 8 million.
However, it managed to attract a larger दर्शक on घर वीडियो in the जल्दी 1990s and became a cult classic.
Most critics praised the film, although some यहूद displeased साथ the overall campiness.
In 2002, the film was adapted into a Broadway musical of the वही नाम, जिससे जीती आठ टोनी Awards, including Best Musical in 2003.
A second film version of Hairspray, an adaptation of the stage musical, थी भी released by नई लकीर सिनेमा in 2007, जिससे शामिल अनेक परिवर्तन of scripted items from the original.
The film also ranks # 444 on साम्राज्य पत्रिका 's 2008 सूची of the 500 महानतम movies of all time.
A Christian denomination is an identifiable religious body अंतर्गत a आम नाम, ढांचा, और doctrine within Christianity.
कुछ समूह शामिल do नहीं consider themselves a denomination ( e.g., the कैथोलिक Church considers itself the one true church and the Apostolic See, and as pre-denominational ).
Some groups viewed by non-adherents as denominational actively resist होने पुकारा a denomination और do नहीं have कोई औपचारिक denominational ढांचा, प्राधिकार, or record-keeping beyond the local congregation ; several groups within Restoration Movement fall into this category.
Some groups are large ( e.g. Catholics, lutherans, anglicans or baptists ), जबकि अन्य हैं बस a few छोटी चर्च, और in most cases the relative size is not evident in this list.
Modern movements ऐसे as fundamentalist christianity, pietism, evangelicalism, pentecostalism और the पवित्रता गति sometimes क्रॉस denominational lines, or in some cases create new denominations out of two or more continuing groups, ( as is the case for many United and uniting churches, for example ).
Such subtleties और complexities हैं not clearly depicted here.
Major विभाजन within Christianity.
Note : This is not a complete सूची, लकिन aims to provide a comprehensible अवलोकन of the विविधता among denominations of Christianity.
As there are reported to be approximately 41,000 Christian denominations, many of which can not be verified to be significant, only those denominations with Wikipedia articles will be listed in अनुक्रम to ensure कि सब प्रविष्टियां on इस सूची हैं notable और verifiable.
Between denominations, theologians, and comparative religionists there are considerable disagreements about which groups can be properly पुकारा ईसाई, disagreements arising primarily from doctrinal differences between groups.
For the purpose of simplicity, this list is intended to reflect the self-understanding of प्रत्येक denomination.
Explanations of different opinions concerning their status as Christian denominations can be मिला at उनके संबंधित आलेख.
There is no official recognition in most parts of the संसार लिये धार्मिक लाशें, और वहीँ is no आधिकारिक clearinghouse which could determine the status or respectability of religious bodies.
Often there is considerable disagreement between various churches about whether other churches should be labeled with pejorative शर्तें ऐसे as `` cult '', or परिचय whether इस or कि group enjoys some measure of respectability.
Such considerations often vary from place to place, where one religious group may enjoy majority औकात in एक प्रदेश, लकिन be widely regarded as a `` dangerous cult '' in another part of the world.
समावेश on इस सूची करता नहीं indicate कोई निर्णय परिचय the size, importance, or character of a group or its members.
1804 map of `` louisiana ``, edged on the वेस्ट by the Rocky Mountains.
The louisiana खरीदें ( `` बिक्री of louisiana '' ) was the acquisition by the United States of America in 1803 of of France 's claim to the territory of Louisiana.
The U.S. paid 50 million francs ( $ 11,250,000 ) plus cancellation of debts worth 18 million francs ( $ 3,750,000 ), for a total sum of 15 million dollars ( less than 3 सेंट प्रति एकड़ ) लिये the louisiana territory ( $ लाख in डॉलर, less than 42 cents per acre ).
The Louisiana territory encompassed all or part of 15 present U.S. राज्य और दो कनाडाई प्रांतों.
The land purchased contained all of present-day Arkansas, Missouri, Iowa, Oklahoma, Kansas, and Nebraska ; parts of Minnesota that were west of the Mississippi River ; most of North Dakota ; most of South Dakota ; northeastern New Mexico ; northern Texas ; the portions of मोंटाना, व्योमिंग, और कोलोराडो ईस्ट of the महाद्वीपीय divide ; louisiana वेस्ट of the मिसिसिपी नदी, सहित the नगर of नई ऑरलियन्स ; और छोटी portions of जमीन कि होता आखिरकार become भाग of the Canadian provinces of Alberta and Saskatchewan.
France controlled this vast area from 1699 until 1762, the साल it दिया the territory to इसके ally Spain.
Under नेपोलियन बोनापार्ट, फ़्रांस took back the territory in 1800 in the hope of building an empire in North America.
A slave revolt in हैती और an impending युद्ध साथ ब्रिटेन, however, led फ़्रांस to लापरवाही ये plans and sell the entire territory to the United States, who had originally intended only to seek the purchase of New Orleans and its adjacent lands.
The purchase of the territory of louisiana took प्लेस during the presidency of Thomas Jefferson.
At the time, the purchase faced घरेलू विपक्ष क्युकी it थी thought to be unconstitutional.
Although he agreed that the U.S. संविधान किया नहीं contain प्रावधानों लिये acquiring territory, जेफरसन decided to go ahead साथ the खरीदें anyway in order to remove France 's presence in the region and to protect both U.S. trade access to the port of New Orleans and free passage on the Mississippi River.
Ceremony at Place d'Armes, New Orleans marking transfer of Louisiana to the United राज्य, 10 कूच 1804, as चित्रित by Thure de Thulstrup.
`` Cool Jerk '' is a लोकप्रिय सोंग लिखा by डोनाल्ड Storball and originally performed by The Capitols.
Released in 1966, it पहुँचे no. 2 on the अमरीकी r & b चार्ट and No. 7 on the pop chart.
The backing track for this song was actually recorded ( secretly ) by the motown हाउस band The Funk Brothers.
Per one of the दुर्गंध भाइयो, the song was originally to be called `` Pimp Jerk. ''
This was taken from watching neighborhood pimps, जो होता नृत्य in the क्लब, लकिन यहूद too `` कूल '' to do the jerk like regular folks.
उनके संस्करण थी subsequently named `` the Pimp Jerk. ''
The producer was afraid that a song with the word pimp in the title would be बैन or नहीं प्राप्त much positive attention, and had the title changed to its current form.
The Go-Go 's, Todd Rundgren, Big Trouble, Human Sexual Response, The La De Da 's, The Creation, and The Coasters have covered the song.
Todd Rundgren did his version in an odd time signature ( 7/4 ), giving an obviously jerky महसूस to the song.
The Go-Go 's covered the song लिये उनके 1982 एल्बम अवकाश और बाद re-recorded it लिये उनके 1990 album Greatest.
In the feature film Home Alone 2 : Lost in New York, ताऊ फ़्रैंक ( gerry bamman ) गाती `` कूल Jerk '' in the shower.
A version of the song with अलग गीत ( `` do the कूल चाबुक '' ) is used in Cool Whip commercials.
A recording of `` कूल झटका '' by रिकार्डो रे is प्रदर्शित in the feature film Donnie Brasco ( 1997 ).
The सोंग सुविधाएँ in the फिल्मी खड़ा in the Shadows of Motown, performed by the Funk Brothers with lead vocals by Bootsy Collins.
The song is heard briefly in the एनिमेटेड विशेषता, मेडागास्कर 3 : Europe 's Most Wanted.
Despite this कारण, it is सूचीबद्ध in कुछ विसंगतियाँ of the film 's soundtrack.
a लीग is a unit of length ( or, rarely, area ).
It was long common in Europe and Latin अमेरिका, लकिन it is no longer an आधिकारिक unit in any nation.
The league originally referred to the distance a person could walk in an hour.
Since the Middle Ages, अनेक मान have महरूम specified in several countries.
In the context of nautical distances, the 3 mile ( 4.8 km ) distance corresponds to how far an observer of average height ( 5'9 '' or 1.78 m ) can देखिए जब खड़ा at समुद्र स्तर.
Thus, a ship traveling one `` league '' has reached कया थी previously the farthest दृश्य distance on the horizon.
The lack of a ऐतिहासिक और वैश्विक मानक लिये the सटीक माप of a `` लीग '' can be accounted for by the variable elevation of the observer ( i.e., sightings from a ship 's deck vs. masthead ).
The Irish state came into being in 1922 as the Irish Free State, a dominion of the British Commonwealth, having seceded इससे the संयुक्त किंगडम अंतर्गत the anglo-irish सन्धि.
It comprises 26 of आयरलैंड 's 32 काउंटी.
Since 1949 it has existed as the गणतंत्र of आयरलैंड.
From its foundation, the Irish Free State was embroiled in a civil war between राष्ट्रवादियों supporting the सन्धि और प्रतिद्वंद्वियों जो समर्थित a republic.
the pro-treaty पक्ष, संगठित as cumann na nGaedheal emerged victorious from the conflict and won subsequent elections.
वे formed the सरकारी of the राज्य जबतक 1932, जब वे peacefully handed over power to the anti-Treaty faction in Fianna Fáil, who defeated them in an election.
The Irish state, despite its violent beginnings, रै remained a उदार लोकतंत्र throughout its existence.
A new constitution in 1937 removed many of the links with Britain established under the Treaty and Ireland 's neutrality in the Second World War demonstrated इसके स्वतंत्रता in विदेशी नीति matters इससे ब्रिटेन.
In 1948 Ireland formally left the British Commonwealth and adopted the शीर्षक of `` गणतंत्र ''.
In the आर्थिक गोला, the आयरिश state has had a mixed performance.
On independence, it was एक of the wealthier देशों in Europe per head of population.
However it also inherited from British rule the problems of unemployment, करणों, uneven भौगोलिक विकास और कमी of a देशी औद्योगिक base.
For much of its history, the state struggled to rectify ये problems.
Particular peaks of करणों यहूद अंकित दौरान the लेट 1930s, 1950s and 1980s, when the Irish economy recorded little growth.
In the 1930s, Fianna Fáil governments attempted to बनाएँ आयरिश घरेलू उद्योग using subsidies and protective tarifs.
In the late 1950s, these policies were dropped in favour of free trade with selected देशों और प्रोत्साहित of विदेशी निवेश with low taxes.
This was expanded when Ireland entered the यूरोपीय आर्थिक जातियाँ in 1972.
In the 1990s and 2000s, आयरलैंड अनुभवी an आर्थिक बूम ज्ञात as the सेल्टिक बाघ, in which the country 's GDP surpassed many of its European neighbours.
Immigration also surpassed करणों, bringing the राज्य 's जनसांख्यिकी up to over 4 million.
However, since 2008, Ireland has experienced a कठोर संकट in the बैंकिंग सेक्टर और साथ sovereign debt.
The resultant economic slump has deepened the प्रभाव of the संसार मंदी on Ireland.
From 1937 to 1998, the आयरिश संविधान included a claim on Northern Ireland as a part of the national territory.
however, the राज्य भी opposed और प्रयुक्त इसके सुरक्षा forces against those armed groups - principally the Provisional Irish Republican Army, who tried to unite Ireland by force.
This occurred in the 1950s, throughout the 1970s और 1980s and has continued on a reduced scale.
Irish सरकारें meanwhile आजमाया to दलाली an अनुबंध to the विरोध known as The Troubles within Northern Ireland from 1968 to the late 1990s.
The British government officially recognised the सही of the आयरिश सरकारी to be a पार्टी to the Northern negotiations in the Anglo-Irish Agreement of 1985.
In 1998, as part of the Good Friday Agreement, the Irish constitution was altered by referendum to remove the territorial claim to Northern Ireland and instead extend the सही of आयरिश नागरिकता to सब the लोगों of the द्वीप चाहिए वे काश to have it.
John Quincy Adams ( July 11, 1767february 23, 1848 ) थी the छठे अध्यक्ष of the United States ( 1825–1829 ).
He served as American राजनयिक, सीनेटर, और congressional representative.
He was a member of the Federalist, democratic-republican, नेशनल रिपब्लिकन, and later Anti-Masonic and Whig parties.
Adams was the son of former President John एडम्स और अबीगैल एडम्स.
As a diplomat, Adams played an important role in negotiating many international treaties, most notably the Treaty of Ghent, जिससे ended the युद्ध of 1812.
As सचिव of राज्य, he negotiated साथ the संयुक्त किंगडम over अमेरिका 's उत्तरी किनारा with Canada, negotiated with Spain the annexation of Florida, and authored the Monroe Doctrine.
Historians agree he was one of the greatest राजनयिकों और secretaries of राज्य in अमरीकी history.
As president, he sought to modernize the American economy and promoted education.
Adams enacted a part of his agenda और सशुल्क बंद much of the national debt.
He was stymied by a कॉंग्रेस नियंत्रित by उसके दुश्मनों, and his lack of patronage networks helped politicians eager to undercut him.
He lost उसके 1828 बोली लिये re-election to Andrew Jackson.
in doing so, he became the first president since his father to serve a single term.
Adams is best known as a राजनयिक जो तराशा अमेरिका 's विदेशी नीति in लकीर साथ उसके ardently nationalist commitment to America 's republican values.
More recently होवे ( 2007 ) portrayed एडम्स as the exemplar and moral leader in an era of modernization.
During Adams ' lifetime, technological नवप्रवर्तनों और नई अर्थात् of संचार स्प्रेड संदेश of धार्मिक revival, social reform, and party politics.
goods, धन, और लोगों traveled more rapidly and efficiently than ever before.
Adams was निर्वाचित a u.S. प्रतिनिधि इससे मैसाचुसेट्स बाद leaving दफ्तर, सेवारत for the last 17 years of his life with far greater acclamation than he had achieved as president.
He is, so far, the only president later elected to the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि ( हालांकि जॉन टायलर थी निर्वाचित to the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि of the Confederate States just before his death in 1862 ).
Animated by his growing revulsion against slavery, Adams became a अग्रणी प्रतिद्वन्दी of the स्लेव शक्ति.
He predicted that if a civil war were to break out, the president could abolish गुलामी by using उसके युद्ध powers.
Adams also predicted the Union 's dissolution over the गुलामी समस्या, लकिन कहा कि if the दक्षिण became independent there would be a series of bloody slave revolts.
खिड़कियाँ अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर 9 ( ie9 ) is a version of the Internet Explorer web browser from Microsoft.
It थी released to the public on March 14, 2011.
Microsoft has released Internet Explorer 9 as a major out-of-band version that is नहीं tied to the रिलीज अनुसूची of कोई particular संस्करण of Windows, unlike previous versions.
It is the first version since Internet एक्सप्लोरर 2 to नहीं be bundled साथ a खिड़कियाँ ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली, हालांकि कुछ oems have installed it with Windows 7 on their PCs, as well as new Windows 7 laptops.
The system requirements for Internet Explorer 9 are Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 r2, खिड़कियाँ विस्टा सेवा Pack 2 or Windows Server 2008 SP2 with the Platform Update.
Windows XP और पहले हैं नहीं समर्थित.
Internet Explorer 9 is the last version of अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर to be समर्थित on Windows Vista.
Both IA-32 और x64 builds are available.
Internet Explorer 9 supports several CSS 3 properties, embedded ICC v2 or v4 color प्रोफ़ाइल support via खिड़कियाँ रंग प्रणाली, और has improved JavaScript performance.
It is the last of the five major web browsers to implement support लिये स्केलेबल वेक्टर ग्राफिक्स ( SVG ).
It also features hardware-accelerated graphics rendering using Direct2D, hardware-accelerated text rendering using DirectWrite, hardware-accelerated video rendering using Media न्यास, इमेजिंग support provided by खिड़कियाँ इमेजिंग घटक, और ऊँची वफ़ादारी मुद्रण संचालित by the XML Paper Specification ( XPS ) print pipeline.
Internet Explorer 9 also supports the html5 वीडियो and audio tags and the Web Open Font Format.
Alka-Seltzer is an effervescent antacid और पीड़ा reliever पहला marketed by the Dr. Miles Medicine Company.
It was developed by मौरिस treener, सिर केमिस्ट at मील, in elkhart, Indiana.
Alka-Seltzer is marketed for relief of minor aches, pains, inflammation, fever, headache, heartburn, sour stomach, indigestion, और hangovers, जबकि neutralizing excess पेट एसिड.
it थी launched in 1931.
A spin-off of Alka-Seltzer made to relieve colds and फ्लू, alka-seltzer प्लस, थी बाद introduced.
A short-lived antacid non-aspirin variant, alka-mints, थी introduced in 1994 और discontinued in 1997.
alka-seltzer is फिलहाल owned by Bayer Schering Pharma AG, Germany.
The name `` Alka-Seltzer '' has been extended to incorporate an entire line of medications बेची over the काउंटर और लिया by अर्थात् of rapidly dissolving टैबलेट कि रूप a कार्बोनेटेड solution in water.

A stalactite (, ; from the यूनानी stalasso, ( σταλάσσω ), `` to ड्रिप '', और meaning `` that which drips '' ) is a type of speleothem ( secondary mineral ) that hangs from the ceiling of limestone caves.
It is a type of dripstone.
The corresponding formation on the floor of the cave is ज्ञात as a stalagmite.
Degree abbreviations are used as an वैकल्पिक रास्ता to बताएँ an अकादमिक उपाधि बजाय of स्पेलिंग आउट the शीर्षक in पूरा, such as in reference books like Who 's Who and on business cards.
Many डिग्री have अधिक than one abbreviation.
In the UK, it is नहीं generally the कस्टम to punctuate abbreviations for degrees with full stops ( e.g. `` BSc '' rather than `` B.Sc. ``.
Race is a classification system used to categorize humans into large and distinct populations or groups by anatomical, cultural, जातीय, जेनेटिक, भौगोलिक, ऐतिहासिक, भाषाई, धार्मिक, or social affiliation.
First used to denote नेशनल संबद्धों, the term began to be used to relate to physical traits in the 17th century.
In the early 20th century the term was often used, in a taxonomic भाव, to denote genetically differentiated human populations defined by phenotype.
While biologists sometimes use the अवधारणा of रेस to मेक भेद among फजी सेट of traits, अन्य in the वैज्ञानिक जातियाँ सुझाएँ कि the विचार of रेस प्रायः is प्रयुक्त in a भोली or simplistic way, i.e. that among humans, race has no taxonomic significance : all living humans belong to the same species, Homo sapiens and subspecies, Homo sapiens sapiens.
Social conceptions and groupings of दौड़ vary over समय, involving folk taxonomies
that define of individuals आधारित on आभास traits.
Scientists consider biological essentialism obsolete, and generally discourage racial explanations for collective differentiation in दोनो शारीरिक और behavioral traits.
Since the second half of the 20th century the associations of race with the विचारधाराओं और theories कि grew आउट of the कार्य of 19th-century विज्ञानियों और physiologists रै led to the use of the word race itself becoming problematic.
Although still used in general contexts, it is now often replaced by other words which are कम अस्पष्ट और emotionally चार्ज, ऐसे as populations, लोगों ( s ), ethnic groups or communities depending on context.
Lucy Stone ( August 13, 1818 – October 19, 1893 ) was a prominent अमरीकी abolitionist और suffragist, और a गायन एडवोकेट और organizer promoting rights for women.
In 1847, Stone became the पहला स्त्री इससे मैसाचुसेट्स to earn a college degree.
She spoke out for women 's rights and against गुलामी at a समय जब महिलाओं यहूद हतोत्साहित and prevented from public speaking.
Stone was the first अंकित अमरीकी स्त्री to retain her own last name after marriage.
Stone 's organizational activities for the cause of महिलाओं 's अधिकारों yielded ठोस gains in the difficult political environment of the 19th century.
Stone helped initiate the first नेशनल महिलाओं 's अधिकारों सम्मेलन और वो समर्थित और sustained it annually along with a number of other local, state and regional activist conventions.
Stone spoke in front of a number of legislative लाशें to प्रचार कानून giving अधिक अधिकारों to women.
She assisted in establishing the Woman 's National Loyal League to help pass the Thirteenth Amendment and thereby abolish slavery, after which वो helped रूप the largest समूह of like-minded महिलाओं 's अधिकारों reformers, the नीतियां मॉडरेट अमरीकी स्त्री suffrage Association, which worked for decades at the state level in favor of women 's right to vote.
Stone wrote extensively परिचय a चौड़ी दायरा of महिलाओं 's अधिकारों, प्रकाशन और distributing भाषणों by herself and others, and convention proceedings.
In the long-running and influential Woman 's Journal, a weekly periodical that she स्थापित और प्रचारित, स्टोन aired दोनो उसके अपना and differing views about women 's rights.
Called `` the orator '' and `` the morning star of the woman 's rights movement '', Stone delivered a वाक जिससे sparked सुसान B. एंथोनी to लो up the कारण of women 's suffrage.
Elizabeth Cady Stanton wrote कि `` लुसी स्टोन थी the पहला व्यक्ति by जिसको the दिल of the American public was deeply stirred on the woman question. ''
Together, Anthony, Stanton, and Stone have been called the 19th सदी `` triumvirate `` of women 's suffrage and feminism.
In finance, a bond is an यंत्र of indebtedness of the bond issuer to the holders.
It is a debt security, under which the issuer owes the holders a debt and, depending on the शर्तें of the बंध, is obliged to अदा उन्हें ब्याज ( the coupon ) or to repay the principal at a later date, termed the maturity.
Interest is usually देय at फिक्स्ड intervals ( semiannual, annual, sometimes monthly ).
Very often the bond is negotiable, i.e. the ownership of the यंत्र can be transferred in the secondary market.
Thus a bond is a form of ऋण or iou : the होल्डर of the बंध is the lender ( creditor ), the जारीकर्ता of the bond is the borrower ( debtor ), and the coupon is the interest.
Bonds provide the borrower with external funds to वित्त long-term निवेश, or, in the case of government bonds, to finance current expenditure.
Certificates of deposit ( CDs ) or short term commercial paper are considered to be money मार्केट यंत्र और नहीं bonds : the प्रमुख अंतर is in the लंबाई of the पद of the instrument.
Bonds and stocks are both securities, but the major difference between the two is that ( capital ) stockholders have an इक्विटी हिस्सेदारी in the कम्पनी ( i.e. वे are owners ), whereas bondholders have a creditor stake in the company ( i.e. they are lenders ).
Another difference is कि bonds प्रायः have a पारिभाषित पद, or परिपक्वता, बाद जिससे the bond is redeemed, whereas stocks may be outstanding indefinitely.
An exception is an irredeemable bond, such as Consols, which is a perpetuity, i.e. a बंध साथ no maturity.
