A scale model is a physical model, a representation or copy of an object that is larger or छोटी than the वास्तविक आकार of the ऑब्जेक्ट, जिससे seeks to maintain the सापेक्ष proportions ( the scale factor ) of the physical size of the original object.
Very often the scale model is used as a guide to बनाना the ऑब्जेक्ट in पूरा आकार.
Scale मॉडल हैं निर्मित or collected for many reasons.
The Zune HD was a portable media player in the zune उत्पाद परिवार released on September 15, 2009 by Microsoft.
It was a direct competitor with the Apple iPod and iphone श्रेणी of mobile devices.
It was initially released in 16 and 32 GB capacities.
A 64 GB version was released on अप्रैल 9, 2010.
It utilized a टचस्क्रीन इंटरफ़ेस लिये नेविगेशन and included Wi-Fi for synchronization, access to the Zune Marketplace and Web browsing.
The Zune HD utilized the Nvidia Tegra APX 2600 chip, allowing it to play 720p video through the वैकल्पिक hdmi zune डॉक on a high-definition television.
Otherwise, content would be scaled down to 480x272 pixels on the खिलाड़ी 's oled टचस्क्रीन.
बूढ़ा sparky, the इलेक्ट्रिक chair used at Sing Sing prison
Execution by electrocution, प्रायः performed using an इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी, is an निष्पादन method originating in the United States in which the condemned person is strapped to a specially built wooden chair and electrocuted through electrodes placed on the body.
This execution method was created by employees of Thomas एडिसन दौरान the युद्ध of currents, और रै महरूम प्रयुक्त तभी in the संयुक्त राज्य और, लिये a काल of अनेक decades, in the Philippines ( its first use there in 1924 under American occupation, last in 1976 ).
Historically, once the condemned person was attached to the chair, various cycles ( differing in voltage and duration ) of प्रत्यावर्ती वर्तमान होता be passed through the व्यक्तिगत 's देह, in अनुक्रम to कारण fatal क्षति to the आतंरिक organs ( including the brain ).
The first धक्का of इलेक्ट्रिक वर्तमान थी designed to कारण तात्कालिक unconsciousness और दिमाग death ; the second one was designed to cause fatal damage to the vital organs.
Death was frequently caused by विद्युत overstimulation of the दिल.
हालांकि in the संयुक्त States the electric chair has become a symbol of the death penalty, its use is in decline due to the rise of lethal injection, which is widely believed to be a more humane method of execution.
Although some states still maintain electrocution as a विधि of निष्पादन, आज it is तभी कायम as a secondary method that may be chosen over lethal injection at the request of the prisoner.
As of 2010, electrocution is an वैकल्पिक रूप of निष्पादन in अलबामा, फ्लोरिडा, दक्षिण Carolina and Virginia.
They allow the prisoner to choose lethal इंजेक्शन as an वैकल्पिक method.
In the states of Kentucky and Tennessee, the electric chair has been रिटायर्ड मगर लिये those जिनकी पूंजी अपराधों यहूद वचनबद्ध prior to legislated तिथियाँ in 1998 ( Kentucky : March 31, 1998 ; Tennessee : December 31, 1998 ) and who chose electrocution.
In both states, inmates जो do नहीं चुनें electrocution or inmates जो वचनबद्ध their crimes after the designated date are killed by lethal injection.
The electric chair is an वैकल्पिक रूप of निष्पादन approved for potential use in Arkansas and Oklahoma if other forms of execution are found unconstitutional in the state at the time of execution.
It is the sole method of execution in Vermont, where देशद्रोह is the तभी capital crime.
On February 8, 2008, the Nebraska Supreme Court determined that execution by electric कुर्सी थी a `` बेदर्द और असामान्य दंड '' under the state 's constitution.
This brought executions of this type to an end in Nebraska, the only बाकी राज्य to retain electrocution as इसके एकमात्र method of execution for murder.
The Maryland House of Delegates is the lower house of the General Assembly, the state legislature of the अमरीकी राज्य of मेरीलैंड, और is रचित of 141 delegates निर्वाचित इससे 47 districts.
The House of Delegates कक्ष is स्तिथ in the मेरीलैंड राज्य हाउस ( राज्य कैपिटल ) on State Circle in Annapolis, which is the state capital.
The State House also houses the Maryland State Senate Chamber and the कार्यालयों of the राज्यपाल और लेफ्टिनेंट राज्यपाल of the राज्य of मेरीलैंड.
Each Delegate has offices in Annapolis, in the nearby कैस्पर R. टेलर, jr. हाउस दफ्तर भवन.
The Liberation of Paris ( also known as the Battle for Paris ) took place दौरान संसार युद्ध ii इससे 19 अगस्त 1944 जबतक the surrender of the occupying German garrison on 25 August.
The मुक्ति of पेरिस प्रारंभ साथ an uprising by the French Resistance against the German garrison.
On 24 August, the फ्रेंच शक्तियां of the आंतरिक ( शक्तियां françaises de l'intérieur, ffi ) प्राप्त सुदृढीकरण इससे the फ़्री French Army of Liberation and from the U.S. Third Army under General Patton.
The capital region of France था महरूम governed by नाजी जर्मनी चूंकि the हस्ताक्षर of the दूसरी compiègne armistice in जून 1940, when the German Army occupied northern and westernmost France, and when the puppet regime of Vichy France was established in the town of Vichy in central France.
This battle marked the liberation of Paris and the निर्वासन of the vichy सरकारी to sigmaringen in Germany.
However, there was still much heavy fighting to be किया पहले फ़्रांस थी liberated, सहित the अभियान in दक्षिणी फ़्रांस दौरान august-september ( in provence और extending into the southwestern प्रदेश of the vosges kyu ), साथ the german-held seaports of western France ( such as at Brest and Dunkirk ), in Alsace and Lorraine in eastern France, and in northeastern France, such as along the Rhine and Moder Rivers.
The German Army and SS fought doggedly in these क्षेत्रों लिये the शेष of 1944 और into 1945.
`` Feelin ' Alright ? '' भी ज्ञात as `` अहसास alright '' is a सोंग written by Dave Mason of the English rock band Traffic from their eponymous 1968 album, Traffic.
The song was also a hit single for several performers : Joe cocker ( 1969, # 69, recharted in 1972, us # 33 ), mongo Santamaría ( 1969, # 95 ) and Grand Funk Railroad ( 1971, US # 54 ).
It has also been recorded by Three Dog Night ( 1969 ), The 5th Dimension ( 1970 ), Lou Rawls, Freddie King, Paul Weller, Lulu, Chairmen of the फलक ( 1970 ), विरल धरती, the इलेक्ट्रिक अवधारणा ऑर्केस्ट्रा, माँ 's finest ( 1973 ), the ओहियो खिलाड़ी ( 1971 ), डायना रॉस with the Jackson 5 ( 1971 ), Maceo Parker, Gladys Knight & the Pips, Widespread Panic and The Black Crowes.
A Steel Drum version by Trinidad Oil Company was reissued on the dancefloor जैज़ compilation Blue Juice 2.
It was also featured in the 2000 फिल्मी duets, सुंग by Huey Lewis.
दोनो the असली और the जो Cocker cover were featured in the movie Flight, starring Denzel Washington.
Devon Werkheiser ( born March 8,1991 ) is an American actor, voice actor, singer, songwriter and musician, best known for his अभिनीत भूमिका as ned bigby on the निकलोडियन sitcom ned 's declassified स्कूल अस्तित्व मार्गदर्शिका और लिये उसके भूमिका in the 2007 TV Movie Shredderman Rules, as the lead character Nolan Byrd.
Werkheiser also played Peter Parkes in the fourth और फाइनल ऋतु of the एबीसी परिवार दिखाएँ Greek.
Sample view of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य record based on images
Sample दृश्य of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक health record
an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य रिकार्ड ( ehr ) is an evolving अवधारणा defined as a systematic collection of electronic health information about individual patients or populations.
it is a रिकार्ड in डिजिटल स्वरूप कि is theoretically capable of being shared across different health care settings.
In some cases this sharing can occur by way of network-connected enterprise-wide सूचना प्रणालियों और अन्य सूचना networks or exchanges.
EHRs may शामिल a दायरा of आंकड़ा, सहित जनसांख्यिकी, चिकित्सा इतिहास, दवा और allergies, immunization status, laboratory test results, radiology images, vital signs, personal stats like age and weight, and billing information.
ऋण origination is the प्रक्रम by जिससे a borrower applies for a new loan, and a lender processes that application.
Origination generally includes all the कदम इससे लेने a ऋण अनुप्रयोग up to disbursal of funds ( or declining the application ).
Loan servicing covers सबकुछ बाद disbursing the funds until the loan is fully paid off.
Loan origination is a specialized version of new account opening for वित्तीय सेवाएं संगठन.
Certain people and organizations specialize in ऋण origination.
Mortgage brokers and other बंधक originator कंपनियाँ serve as a prominent example.
There हैं अनेक अलग types of loans.
For more information on loan types, see the loan और उपभोक्ता lending आलेख.
Steps involved in originating a loan vary by loan type, various kinds of loan risk, नियामक, lender नीति, और अन्य कारकों.
Top left : The Tennessee Valley Authority, part of the New Deal, होने हस्ताक्षरित into law in 1933.
Top right : Franklin delano रूज़वेल्ट, जो थी जिम्मेदार for initiatives and programs collectively known as the New Deal.
Bottom : A public mural from one of the कलाकारों employed by the New Deal.
The New Deal was a series of economic programs enacted in the संयुक्त राज्य between 1933 and 1936.
They involved presidential कार्यपालिका आदेश or कानून passed by कॉंग्रेस दौरान the पहला पद of President Franklin D. Roosevelt.
The programs were in जवाब to the ग्रेट अवसाद, और केन्द्रित on कया इतिहासकारों कॉल the `` 3 rs '' : Relief, Recovery, and Reform.
That is राहत लिये the बेरोजगार और ग़रीब ; रिकवरी of the economy to normal levels ; and Reform of the financial system to prevent a repeat depression.
The New Deal produced a political realignment, making the Democratic Party the majority ( as well as the party that held the White हाउस लिये सात आउट of नौ अध्यक्षीय शर्तें इससे 1933 to 1969 ), साथ इसके आधार in उदार विचार, the श्वेत दक्षिण, परंपरागत डेमोक्रेट, बिग नगर machines, and the newly empowered labor unions and ethnic minorities.
The Republicans were split, with conservatives opposing the entire New सौदे as an दुश्मन of कारोबार और विकास, और उदारवादियों accepting some of it and promising to make it more efficient.
The realignment crystallized into the नई सौदे गठबन्धन कि वर्चस्व सबसे अध्यक्षीय चुनावों into the 1960s, while the opposition Conservative Coalition largely controlled Congress from 1937 to 1963.
By 1936 the पद `` उदार '' typically was used for supporters of the New Deal, and `` conservative `` for its opponents.
From 1934 to 1938, Roosevelt was assisted in उसके endeavours by a “pro-spender” बहुमत in कॉंग्रेस ( drawn इससे two-party, competitive, non-machine, Progressive, and Left party districts ).
As noted by Alexander Hicks, “Roosevelt, backed by rare, non-Southern Democrat majorities — 270 non-Southern Democrat representatives and 71 non-Southern Democrat senators — spelled दूसरी नई सौदे reform.”
Many historians distinguish between a `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) and a `` दूसरी नई सौदे '' ( 1935–38 ), साथ the दूसरी एक अधिक liberal and more controversial.
The `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) dealt साथ विविध समूह, इससे बैंकिंग और railroads to उद्योग and farming, all of which demanded help for economic survival.
The Federal Emergency Relief Administration, for उदाहरण, provided $ 500 लाख लिये राहत परिचालन by राज्य और शहरों, जबकि the short-lived CWA ( Civil Works Administration ) gave localities money to operate make-work projects in 1933-34.
The `` Second New Deal `` in 1935–38 included the Wagner Act to promote labor unions, the works प्रगति प्रशासन ( wpa ) राहत कार्यक्रम ( जिससे बना the संघीय सरकारी by far the largest single employer in the nation ), the Social Security Act, and new programs to aid tenant farmers and migrant workers.
The final major items of New Deal legislation were the creation of the United States Housing Authority और फार्म सुरक्षा प्रशासन, दोनो in 1937, और the मेला मजदूर मानकों अधिनियम of 1938, जिससे नियत अधिकतम घंटों and minimum wages for most categories of workers.
The economic downturn of 1937–38, and the bitter विभाजित between the afl और cio मजदूर संघ led to major Republican gains in Congress in 1938.
Conservative Republicans and Democrats in Congress joined in the अनौपचारिक रूढ़िवादी गठबन्धन.
By 1942–43 they shut down relief programs such as the WPA and CCC and अवरोधित प्रमुख उदार प्रस्ताव.
Roosevelt himself turned उसके ध्यान to the war effort, and won reelection in 1940 and 1944.
The Supreme Court declared the नेशनल रिकवरी प्रशासन ( nra ) और the पहला संस्करण of the Agricultural Adjustment Act ( AAA ) unconstitutional, however the AAA was rewritten and then upheld.
As the first Republican president elected after FDR, Dwight D. Eisenhower ( 1953–61 ) बाएँ the नई सौदे largely बरकरार, भी expanding it in some areas.
In the 1960s, Lyndon B. Johnson 's Great Society used the New Deal as प्रेरणा लिये a नाटकीय विस्तार of उदार कार्यक्रम, जिससे रिपब्लिकन Richard M. Nixon generally retained.
After 1974, however, the कॉल लिये deregulation of the economy gained bipartisan support.
The New Deal regulation of banking ( Glass–Steagall अधिनियम ) थी निलंबित in the 1990s.
Many New Deal programs remain क्रियाशील, साथ कुछ स्टिल ऑपरेटिंग अंतर्गत the असली names, सहित the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation ( FDIC ), the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation ( FCIC ), the Federal Housing Administration ( FHA ), and the Tennessee Valley Authority ( TVA ).
The largest कार्यक्रम स्टिल in अस्तित्व आज हैं the सोशल सुरक्षा प्रणाली and the Securities and Exchange Commission ( SEC ).
A woman ( ), pl : महिलाओं ( ) is a मादा human.
The term woman is usually reserved for an adult, with the पद लड़की होने the usual पद लिये a मादा child or adolescent.
however, the पद स्त्री is भी sometimes प्रयुक्त to identify a female human, regardless of age, as in phrases such as `` Women 's rights ``.
Women are typically capable of giving birth, though पुरानी महिलाओं जो have गए through रजोनिवृत्ति और कुछ intersex women can not.
`` I Do n't Want to Miss a Thing '' is a सोंग performed by अमरीकी rock band Aerosmith for the 1998 film Armageddon.
Written by Diane Warren, the song debuted at number one on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 ( the पहला # 1 लिये the band after 28 years together ).
The song stayed at क्रमांक एक लिये चार सप्ताह इससे सितंबर 5 to September 26, 1998.
The song also ठहरे at क्रमांक 1 लिये अनेक weeks in several other countries.
In the UK, the song peaked at number four, becoming Aerosmith 's highest charting song in the uk, जहाँ it थी the 17th best-selling सिंगल of 1998, and has sold over a million copies.
Although not used by the majority of the संसार 's देशों, daylight छायांकन time is common in the Western world.
Daylight saving time ( DST ) —also summer time in British English — is the practice of advancing clocks दौरान the हल्का महीने so कि evenings have अधिक daylight and mornings have less.
Typically clocks are adjusted forward one hour निकट the प्रारंभ of वसन्त और हैं समायोजित backward in autumn.
The modern idea of daylight saving was first proposed in 1895 by जार्ज vernon हडसन और it थी पहला implemented दौरान the First World War.
Many countries have used it at विभिन्न टाइम्स चूंकि then.
Much of the United States used DST in the 1950s and 1960s, and DST use expanded following the 1970s energy crisis और रै महरूम widely प्रयुक्त in उत्तर अमेरिका और यूरोपीय चूंकि तब.
The practice has been दोनो praised और criticized.
Adding daylight to evenings benefits retailing, sports, and other क्रियाएँ कि exploit धूप बाद working hours, but can cause problems for evening entertainment and other occupations tied to the sun.
Although an early goal of DST was to reduce संध्या उपयोग of incandescent lighting ( formerly a प्राथमिक उपयोग of विद्युत ), आधुनिक हीटिंग और कूलिंग usage patterns differ greatly, and research about how DST currently affects energy use is limited or contradictory.
DST clock shifts present अन्य चुनौतियां.
They complicate timekeeping, and can disrupt meetings, travel, बिलिंग, रिकार्ड keeping, चिकित्सा डिवाइस, भारी उपकरण, और नींद patterns.
तन्त्र can प्रायः समायोजन कंप्यूटर clocks automatically, but this can be limited and error-prone, particularly when DST dates are changed.
floorplan of the château de Montargis
montargis is a कम्यून in the loiret विभाग in north-central France on the Loing river.
The town is located about south of Paris और ईस्ट of orléans in the Gâtinais.
Montargis is the second largest नगर in the loiret, after Orléans.
It is near a large forest, and contains लाइट उद्योग और खेती, including saffron.
Due to its numerous नहरों और पुलों, montargis sometimes bills itself as the `` Venice of the Gâtinais. ''
Though quite modern, it retains a मध्यकालीन आकर्षण in its downtown area.
In computer storage, a logical unit number, or LUN, is a number used to identify a logical unit, which is a device addressed by the scsi प्रोटोकॉल or प्रोटोकॉल जिससे encapsulate scsi, ऐसे as Fibre Channel or iSCSI.
A LUN may be used with any device which supports read/write operations, such as a tape ड्राइव, लकिन is सबसे प्रायः प्रयुक्त to refer to a लॉजिकल डिस्क as created on a SAN.
Though not technically सही, the पद `` lun '' is often also used to refer to the logical disk itself.
The Gospel According to Mark (,, to euangelion kata markon ), commonly shortened to the इन्जील of चिह्नित or simply Mark, is the second book of the New Testament.
This canonical account of the life of Jesus of Nazareth is one of the तीन synoptic gospels.
It was thought to be an epitome, which खाते लिये इसके प्लेस as the दूसरी gospel in the Bible.
however, सबसे समकालीन विद्वानों now regard it as the earliest of the canonical gospels ( c 70 ).
That Mark was used as a source for the other synoptic gospels Gospel of Matthew and Gospel of ल्यूक is widely आयोजित by अनेक, हालांकि नहीं सब, नई वसीयत scholars.
The Gospel of Mark narrates the Ministry of यीशु इससे उसके बपतिस्मा by जॉन the बैपटिस्ट to his death and resurrection.
It focuses विशेषकर on the last week of his life ( chapters 11–16 ) in Jerusalem.
Its स्विफ्ट कथा portrays यीशु as a heroic man of action, an exorcist, healer and miracle worker.
An important theme of Mark is the मुक्तिदाता रहस्य.
Jesus silences the demoniacs he heals, tries unsuccessfully to keep his messianic identity रहस्य, और conceals उसके संदेश साथ parables.
Meanwhile, the disciples fail to understand both the implication of the चमत्कार of यीशु और the meaning of the things he predicts about his arrest, death and resurrection.
Most scholars believe that the original text of the gospel ends at चिह्नित 16:8 साथ the डिस्कवरी of यीशु ' खाली मकबरा और कि the following account of his resurrection appearances is a later addition.
According to tradition and some जल्दी गिरिजाघर लेखक, the लेखक is Mark the Evangelist, the companion of the apostle Peter.
The gospel, however, appears to rely on several underlying sources, varying in रूप और in धर्मशास्त्र, जिससे tells विरूद्ध the परंपरा कि the gospel was based on Peter 's preaching.
The text is a compilation which may include eye-witness accounts as well as ज्ञात अपोस्टोलिक preachings, और pre-existing लिखा रिकॉर्ड कि do नहीं मौजूद today but can be confirmed from 2nd-century commentators.
Some of the कहानियां in the इन्जील may have महरूम transmitted orally before being written down.
Various elements within the इन्जील सुझाएँ कि the लेखक लिखा in Syria or Palestine for a non-Jewish Christian community.
The Lord of the Rings is an epic ऊँची काल्पनिक अनोखा लिखा by अंग्रेज़ी भाषाशास्त्री and University of Oxford professor J. R. R. Tolkien.
The story began as a sequel to tolkien 's 1937 children 's काल्पनिक अनोखा the होब्बिट, लकिन आखिरकार developed into a much larger work.
It was written in stages between 1937 और 1949, much of it during World War II.
It is the second best-selling अनोखा कभी लिखा, साथ over 150 लाख copies sold.
The title of the novel refers to the story 's main antagonist, the Dark Lord Sauron, who had in an earlier age निर्मित the एक रिंग to नियम the अन्य बजती of शक्ति as the परम हथियार in his campaign to conquer and rule all of Middle-earth.
From quiet beginnings in the Shire, a Hobbit land not unlike the English countryside, the story ranges across north-west Middle-earth, following the course of the War of the Ring through the eyes of its characters, notably the hobbits Frodo Baggins, Samwise `` Sam '' Gamgee, Meriadoc `` Merry '' Brandybuck and Peregrin `` Pippin '' Took, but also the hobbits ' chief allies and यात्राएं companions : aragorn, a इंसान रेंजर ; boromir, a man इससे gondor ; gimli, a Dwarf warrior ; Legolas, an Elven prince ; and Gandalf, a Wizard.
The work was initially intended by tolkien to be एक आवाज़ of a two-volume नियत, साथ the other being The Silmarillion, but this idea was dismissed by his publisher.
It was decided for economic कारण to प्रकाशित the रब of the बजती as three volumes over the course of a year from 29 July 1954 to 20 October 1955, thus creating the now familiar Lord of the Rings trilogy.
The three volumes were हकदार the फेलोशिप of the रिंग, the दो मीनारें, and The Return of the King.
Structurally, the novel is divided internally into six books, दो प्रति आवाज़, साथ अनेक appendices of background material included at the end of the third volume.
The Lord of the Rings has since been reprinted numerous टाइम्स और अनूदित into अनेक languages.
Tolkien 's work has been the subject of extensive विश्लेषण of इसके विषयवस्तु and origins.
Although a major work in itself, the story was only the last movement of a larger epic tolkien था worked on चूंकि 1917, in a प्रक्रम he described as mythopoeia.
Influences on this earlier work, and on the story of The Lord of the Rings, include philology, mythology, religion and the लेखक 's distaste लिये the प्रभाव of industrialization, as खूब as पहले काल्पनिक works and Tolkien 's experiences in World War I.
The Lord of the Rings in its turn is considered to have had a great effect on modern काल्पनिक ; the प्रभाव of tolkien 's works is ऐसे कि the उपयोग of the शब्द `` tolkienian '' and `` Tolkienesque '' have been recorded in the Oxford English Dictionary.
The enduring popularity of The Lord of the Rings has led to numerous references in popular culture, the founding of अनेक समाजों by प्रशंसक of tolkien 's works, और the प्रकाशन of अनेक किताबे परिचय Tolkien and his works.
The Lord of the Rings has प्रेरित, और continues to inspire, कलाकृति, म्यूज़िक, films and television, video games, and subsequent literature.
Award-winning adaptations of The Lord of the Rings have been made for radio, थिएटर, and film.
The following is an episode list for the निकलोडियन sitcom Drake & Josh.
The series debuted on January 11, 2004.
A TV film Merry Christmas, ड्रेक & जोश थी बना अलावा इससे the नियमित series on December 5, 2008.
There are a total of 60 episodes यहूद उत्पादित spanning four seasons.
Drake Bell, जोश पेक, और मिरांडा cosgrove यहूद the only actors to appear in all 60 episodes.
The San Francisco 49ers conduct प्रशिक्षण शिविर at the टोली 's मुख्यालय और अभ्यास सुविधा in Santa Clara, California in August 2010.
The offense is wearing red jerseys साथ the एक्सेप्शन of क्वार्टरबैक एलेक्स स्मिथ, who is in a black jersey ; the defense in white.
in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल League, training camp refers to the time before the season commences.
During this time, teams will sometimes congregate at an outside स्थान, प्रायः a विश्वविद्यालयों, to conduct प्रशिक्षण camp for at least the first few weeks.
This is similar to बेसबॉल 's वसन्त प्रशिक्षण.
Training शिविर is used in several different ways.
New players and coaches use it to acclimate themselves to new teammates and systems.
For younger खिलाड़ी, it serves as a period of evaluation ; for veterans, it is time to round back into form.
प्रशिक्षण शिविर is विभाजित into several different components.
The first is scrimmages.
These are pseudo-games where टीमों चलाएं nearly full games ' worth of plays.
Sometimes, two practice सत्र हैं आयोजित on the वही day.
This concept is referred to as two-a-days.
Other parts of training camp include drills, meetings with coaches and अन्य खिलाड़ी at एक 's स्थिति, वज़न प्रशिक्षण, and pre-season games.
the latter हाफ of training camp leads directly into the exhibition season.
With एनएफएल प्रशिक्षण शिविरों starting in late-July, the biggest concern has been dehydration.
In 2001, Minnesota Vikings player Korey Stringer died of a चिकित्सा कंडीशन आधारित इससे निर्जलीकरण और heatstroke.
The death of stringer prompted the एनएफएल to change their training policies.
At each practice, every team must have the team डॉक्टर और प्रशिक्षकों on the फ़ील्ड ; additionally, an ambulance must be present during practices.
With NFL training camps beginning in late July, severe मौसम can affect अभ्यास and exhibition games.
In 2002, a Cleveland Browns exhibition game ended due to बिजली निकट क्लीवलैंड भूरा स्टेडियम, और कठोर storms have been known to disrupt training camps.
Fans are often able to visit their favorite team 's training camp to catch an early look at the players ; admission to practices is प्रायः फ़्री or substantially कम महंगी than a खेल ticket, making training camp trips a popular option for fans who can not attend many games due to financial or other reasons.
NFL teams often sell souvenirs and concessions at camp साइट साथ साथ offering क्रियाएँ और कार्यक्रम to make training camp a more fan-friendly experience.
In कम्प्यूटिंग, a संचिका प्रणाली ( or filesystem ) is a type of data store which can be used to store, retrieve and update a set of files.
The term could refer to the अमूर्त आंकड़ा structures प्रयुक्त to define फाइलें, or to the actual software or firmware components that implement the abstract ideas.
Some file systems are used on local आंकड़ा भंडार डिवाइस ; अन्य provide संचिका अभिगम via a network protocol ( e.g. NFS, SMB, or 9P clients ).
Some file प्रणालियों हैं `` आभासी '', in कि the `` फाइलें '' supplied are computed on request ( e.g. procfs ) or are merely a mapping into a different file system used as a backing store.
The file system manages access to both the content of files और the मेटाडेटा परिचय those फाइलें.
It is responsible for arranging storage space ; reliability, दक्षता, और ट्यूनिंग साथ लिहाज़ to the physical storage medium are important design considerations.
William Howard Taft ( September 15, 1857 – March 8, 1930 ) was the 27th President of the United States ( 1909–1913 ) and later the tenth Chief इंसाफ of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1921–1930 ).
He is the only person to have परोसा in both of these offices.
Before becoming President, Taft, a Republican, was चयनित to serve on the श्रेष्ठ अदालत of सिनसिनाटी in 1887.
In 1890, taft थी नियुक्त solicitor सामान्य of the संयुक्त राज्य और in 1891 a judge on the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit.
In 1900, President William McKinley नियुक्त taft governor-general of the Philippines.
In 1904, President Theodore Roosevelt appointed Taft Secretary of War in an प्रयत्न to दूल्हे taft, तब उसके बंद राजनैतिक ally, into उसके handpicked अध्यक्षीय successor.
Taft assumed a prominent भूमिका in प्रॉब्लम solving, assuming on कुछ अवसरों the भूमिका of एक्टिंग Secretary of State, while declining repeated offers from Roosevelt to serve on the Supreme Court.
सवारी a वेव of लोकप्रिय support लिये fellow रिपब्लिकन Roosevelt, Taft won an easy victory in his 1908 bid for the presidency.
In his only term, Taft 's घरेलू कार्यसूची emphasized trust-busting, सिविल सेवा सुधार, strengthening the Interstate Commerce Commission, improving the performance of the postal service, and passage of the Sixteenth Amendment.
Abroad, Taft sought to further the economic development of nations in Latin America and Asia through `` डालर कूटनीति ``, और दिखाया decisiveness और संयम in response to revolution in Mexico.
The task-oriented taft थी बेख़बर to the राजनैतिक ramifications of उसके निर्णय, प्रायः alienated his own key constituencies, and was overwhelmingly defeated in his bid for a second term in the presidential election of 1912.
In surveys of presidential scholars, Taft is usually क्रमित निकट the मध्य of सूचियाँ of सब अमरीकी राष्ट्रपतियों.
After leaving दफ्तर, taft खर्च उसके समय in academia, मध्यस्थता, और the ढूंढें for world peace through his self-founded League to Enforce Peace.
In 1921, after the First World War, President Warren G. Harding appointed taft मुख्य इंसाफ of the United States.
Taft served in इस क्षमता जबतक shortly before his death in 1930.
The Ten Commandments is a 1956 epic film produced and directed by Cecil B. DeMille that dramatized the biblical story of the exodus, in जिससे the hebrew-born मूसा, an अपनाया मिश्र प्रिंस, becomes the deliverer of the Hebrew slaves.
It starred Charlton Heston in the lead role, Yul Brynner as his adoptive bhai, pharaoh rameses ii, ऐनी बैक्सटर as nefretiri, एडवर्ड G. रॉबिन्सन as dathan, Yvonne De Carlo as Sephora, Debra Paget as Lilia, and John Derek as Joshua.
The supporting cast includes Sir Cedric Hardwicke as Pharaoh सेती i, नीना foch as bithiah, मार्था स्कॉट as yoshebel, जूडिथ एंडरसन as Memnet, Vincent Price as Baka, and John Carradine as Aaron.
The film was released by Paramount Pictures in vistavision on अक्तूबर 5, 1956.
The Ten Commandments, which DeMille narrated, was the पिछला फिल्मी कि he निर्देशित.
He was set to direct the 1958 remake of उसके 1938 फिल्मी the buccaneer, लकिन उसके फाइनल बीमारी forced him to relinquish the directing chores to his son-in-law, actor Anthony Quinn.
DeMille had also planned to film the जीवन of रब baden पावेल, the संस्थापक of the स्काउट movement, with David Niven ; this project was never realized.
the टेन आयतें is a partial remake of DeMille 's 1923 silent film.
Some of the cast and crew of the 1956 संस्करण worked on the original.
It has since been remade as a टेलीविज़न miniseries broadcast in April 2006.
The Ten आयतें is एक of the सबसे financially कामयाब films ever made, grossing over $ 65 million at the U.S. box office.
Adjusting for महंगाई, इस makes it the छठे highest-grossing film domestically, with an adjusted total of $ 1,025,730,000 in 2012.
The box office जालस्थल `` the संख्याएँ '' lists the domestic gross at $ 80 million.
In 1999, The Ten Commandments was selected for preservation in the United States National Film Registry by the Library of कॉंग्रेस as होने `` culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant ''.
In June 2008, the American फिल्मी संस्थान नाज़िल इसके `` टेन शीर्ष टेन `` —the best ten films in ten American film genres—after polling over 1,500 people from the creative community.
The Ten Commandments was listed as the दसवाँ बेहतरीन फिल्मी in the epic genre.
The film received seven Academy Award nominations including Best Picture, और जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन विज़ुअल प्रभाव.
Charlton Heston was nominated for a सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन गति चित्र Actor in the drama category.
Yul Brynner won the National Board of Review Award for Best Actor for his role as Rameses, along with his अन्य भूमिकाएँ in the किंग और i और अनास्तासिया.
Louisville (, or ) is a major city and the largest city in the U.S. राज्य of केंटकी और the काउंटी सीट of जेफरसन County.
Since 2003, the city 's borders have been with those of the काउंटी क्युकी of a city-county merger.
The city 's total संचित जनसांख्यिकी at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी थी 741,096 ( louisville 's संतुलन कुल, 602,011, excludes semi-autonomous towns and is the population listed in most sources and national rankings ).
As of 2010, the Louisville metropolitan क्षेत्रफल ( एमएसए ) था a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,307,647 ranking 42nd nationally.
The metro area includes Louisville-Jefferson County and 12 surrounding काउंटी, आठ in केंटकी और चार in दक्षिणी इंडियाना ( see Geography below ).
The Louisville संयुक्त सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल, having a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,451,564, शामिल the एमएसए, Hardin County and Larue County in Kentucky, and Scott County, Indiana.
An important internal shipping port in the 19th century, louisville आज is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the स्थान of the केंटकी डर्बी, the पहला of तीन सालाना thoroughbred horse races making up the Triple Crown.
A ठेठ प्रायोगिक सेटअप for an aldol reaction.
Both flasks are submerged in a dry ice/acetone cooling bath ( −78 °C ) the temperature of जिससे is होने monitored by a तापयुग्म ( the तार on the left ).
A cooling bath, in laboratory chemistry ( often but not always organic chemistry ) practice, is a liquid मिश्रण जिससे is प्रयुक्त to maintain कम temperatures, typically between 13 °c और −196 °C.
These low temperatures are used to collect liquids after distillation, to हटाएँ सॉल्वैंट्स using a रोटरी evaporator, or to perform a रासायनिक प्रतिक्रिया नीचे room temperature ( see : kinetic control ).
Cooling baths are generally one of two types : ( a ) a ठंडा द्रव ( विशेषकर द्रव नाइट्रोजन, जल, or भी एयर ) — लकिन सबसे commonly the पद refers to ( b ) a मिश्रण of 3 components : ( 1 ) a कूलिंग एजेंट ( ऐसे as शुष्क बर्फ or water ice ) ; ( b ) a liquid 'carrier ' ( such as liquid water, ethylene glycol, acetone, etc. ), which transfers heat between the bath and the vessel ; ; and ( c ) an additive to depress the melting-point of the solid/liquid system.
( A familiar example of इस is the उपयोग of an ice/rock-salt mixture to freeze ice cream.
The phase-change of बर्फ into द्रव जल requires उर्जा, 'pulling ' heat from the system.
Adding salt lowers the अस्थायी at जिससे इस happens, अर्थ more energy has to be absorbed from the environment in order to melt the ice.
This effectively makes the ice 'colder ' — it must 'pull ' अधिक ऊष्मा इससे इसके पर्यावरण to become द्रव. )
Eating disorders are conditions defined by असामान्य खाने आदतें कि may involve either अपर्याप्त or excessive food intake to the detriment of an individual 's physical and mental health.
Bulimia nervosa and एनोरेक्सिया नर्वोज़ा हैं the सबसे आम specific forms in the United Kingdom.
Other प्रकार of खाने विकार include binge eating disorder and eating disorder not otherwise specified.
Bulimia नर्वोज़ा is a विकार characterized by binge eating and purging.
Purging can include self-induce vomiting, over-exercising, और the उपयोग of diuretics, enemas, and laxatives.
Anorexia nervosa is characterized by extreme food restriction to the point of self-starvation और excessive वज़न घाटा.
Though primarily thought of as affecting महिलाओं ( an अनुमानित 5–10 लाख होने affected in the U.K. ), eating disorders affect males as well.
An estimated 10 – 15 % of people with eating disorders are males ( गोर्गान, 1999 ).
( an estimated 1 million u.K. males होने प्रभावित ).
Although eating disorders are increasing all over the world among both men and women, there is evidence to suggest that it is महिलाओं in the पश्चिमी संसार जो हैं at the उच्चतम रिस्क of विकासशील उन्हें और the उपाधि of westernization increases the risk.
Nearly half of all Americans personally जान किसी साथ an खाने विकार.
The skill to comprehend the central processes of appetite has increased tremendously चूंकि लेप्टिन थी खोजा, और the कौशल to observe the functions of the brain as well.
Interactions between motivational, homeostatic और self-regulatory कंट्रोल प्रक्रियाओं हैं शामिल in खाने आचरण, which is a key component in eating disorders.
The precise कारण of खाने विकार is नहीं entirely understood, but there is evidence that it may be linked to other medical conditions and situations.
Cultural idealization of thinness and youthfulness have contributed to खाने विकार affecting diverse populations.
One study showed that girls with ADHD have a greater chance of getting an खाने विकार than those not affected by ADHD.
Another study suggested that women साथ ptsd, विशेषकर due to sexually सम्बन्धित trauma, are more likely to develop anorexia nervosa.
One study showed that foster लड़कियों हैं अधिक संभावित to develop bulimia nervosa.
Some think that peer दबाव और idealized body-types देखी in the मीडिया हैं also a significant factor.
Some शोध दिखाएँ कि लिये निश्चित people there are genetic reasons why they may be prone to developing an eating disorder.
हाल अध्ययन have मिला प्रमाण a सहसंबंध between patients with bulimia nervosa and substance use disorders.
In addition, anxiety विकार और व्यक्तित्व विकार हैं आम occurrences with clients of eating disorders.
जबकि उचित उपचार can be अत्यधिक प्रभावी लिये अनेक कष्ट इससे विशिष्ट प्रकार of खाने विकार, the consequences of eating disorders can be severe, including death ( whether from direct medical effects of disturbed eating habits or from comorbid conditions such as suicidal thinking ).
Slavery in the संयुक्त राज्य existed इससे the जल्दी सालो of the colonial period ; it was firmly established by the time the United States sought independence from Great Britain in 1776.
However, by 1804, all states north of the Mason and Dixon लकीर था either abolished गुलामी outright or passed laws for the gradual abolition of slavery.
In 1787 Congress prohibited slavery in the उत्तरपश्चिम territory.
But slavery gained new life in the South with the कपास उद्योग बाद 1800, और विस्तारित into the Southwest.
The nation was polarized into स्लेव और फ़्री states along the Mason-Dixon Line, which separated Pennsylvania and Maryland.
The United States and Great Britain both prohibited the international slave trade in 1808, but the घरेलू व्यापार, साथ बिक्री to the गहन दक्षिण, विस्तारित dramatically, and many captives were shipped by the coastwise slave trade.
Before the 1840s, the South was vigorously defending गुलामी और इसके विस्तार into the territories.
In the North some abolitionists denounced it as sinful, and numerous anti-slavery शक्तियां अस्वीकृत it as हानिकारक to the अधिकारों of free men.
After विफल compromises और अब्राहम lincoln 's चुनाव, in 1861 eleven slave states broke away to form the Confederate States of America, leading to the American Civil War.
The federal सरकारी in 1862 made abolition of slavery a war goal.
In January 1863 अध्यक्ष lincoln freed स्लेव in the confederacy through the Emancipation Proclamation.
After the war, the Thirteenth Amendment, effective December 1865, abolished गुलामी throughout the संपूर्ण संयुक्त राज्य, including the Border states and the Indian territories.
From the 16th to the 19th सदियां, an अनुमानित 12 million Africans were shipped as slaves to the Americas.
See गुलामी in the americas.
The ग्रेट बहुमत गई to the शुगर बागानों of the West Indies or Brazil, where mortality was high.
About 645,000 were brought to कया is अभी the United States.
By the 1860 United States Census, the स्लेव जनसांख्यिकी in the अमरीकी South had grown to four million.
Of all 1,515,605 families in the 15 slave states, nearly 400,000 आयोजित स्लेव ( roughly एक in चार ), amounting to 8 % of all American families.
While some slaves worked as house servants and शहरी शिल्पकार, the ग्रेट बहुमत worked on बागानों or विशाल खेतो, cultivating lucrative cash crops, such as rice, tobacco, sugar and, after 1800, chiefly cotton.
By 1860 most slaves were held in the Deep South, where they served in work-gangs ; two-thirds worked in कपास.
In small operations, वे worked with their owners.
In large plantations they were directed by श्वेत सशुल्क overseers.
Under the system that became chattel slavery ( स्वामित्व of a इंसान होने, और of his/her वंशजों ), a जातिगत तत्व थी आधारभूत : slaves were blacks of African descent and owned, almost universally, by whites of European descent.
In the 17th century, Virginia, followed by अन्य दक्षिणी colonies, enacted विधि कि children of slave mothers were born into slavery.
Slaves could gain freedom only by running away ( which was difficult and illegal to do ), or by manumission by owners, which was regulated by राज्य, और became increasingly difficult or prohibited.
In the earliest era of chattel slavery, the colonies also organized कार्य by a प्रणाली of बंधुआ मजदूर ज्ञात as indentured servitude.
This typically lasted लिये अनेक सालो लिये दोनो ग़रीब Europeans and Africans alike, to pay off the costs of transport to the colonies.
They contracted for such arrangements क्युकी of ग़रीब economies in उनके घर countries.
Between 1680 and 1700, as fewer Europeans migrated to the colonies, planters began to आयात अधिक africans as slaves.
Recognizing the importance of slavery, the House of Burgesses in वर्जिनिया enacted a नई स्लेव कोड in 1705 ; it संयुक्त a किस्में of विधान और added नई provisions enforcing white supremacy in the law.
schematic क्रॉस खण्ड of भाग of leaf, xylem shown as red circles at figure 8.
Xylem is one of the two प्रकार of हस्तांतरण ऊतक in vascular plants ( phloem is the other ).
The शब्द जाइलम is निकला इससे the यूनानी शब्द ξύλον ( xylon ), अर्थ `` लकडी '' ; the best-known xylem tissue is wood, though it is found throughout the plant.
Its basic फलन is to हस्तांतरण जल, but it also transports some nutrients through the plant.
This clock representation shows some of the major इकाई of geological समय और निर्णायक कार्यक्रम of धरती history.
The Hadean eon represents the time before fossil record of जीवन on धरती ; इसके अपर boundary is अभी regarded as 4.0 Ga ( billion years ago ).
Other subdivisions reflect the एवोल्यूशन of जीवन ; the archean और proterozoic are both eons, the Palaeozoic, Mesozoic and Cenozoic are eras of the Phanerozoic eon.
The two million year Quaternary period, the time of recognizable इंसानो, is too छोटी to be दृश्य at इस scale.
The geologic time scale is a system of chronological measurement that relates stratigraphy to time, and is used by geologists, paleontologists, and other earth scientists to describe the timing and relationships between कार्यक्रम कि have occurred throughout धरती 's इतिहास.
The table of geologic time spans presented here agrees with the dates and nomenclature set forth by the International Commission on स्तरिकी मानक रंग कोड of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय आयोग on स्तरिकी.
Evidence from radiometric डेटिंग indicates that the Earth is about 4.54 billion years old.
The geology or deep time of Earth 's past has been व्यवस्थित into विभिन्न units according to events which took place in each period.
Different spans of time on the GTS are usually delimited by changes in the composition of strata जिससे correspond to उन्हें, indicating प्रमुख geological or paleontological events, such as mass extinctions.
For example, the boundary between the Cretaceous काल और the paleogene काल is defined by the Cretaceous–Paleogene extinction event, which marked the demise of the dinosaurs and many other groups of life.
Older time spans which predate the reliable fossil रिकार्ड ( पहले the proterozoic इओन ) हैं पारिभाषित by absolute age.
The TI-82 is a graphing calculator made by Texas Instruments.
The TI-82 was designed in 1993 as a stripped down, more user दोस्ताना संस्करण of the ti-85, और as a replacement for the TI-81.
It was the direct पूर्ववर्ती of the TI-83.
It shares with the ti-85 a 6 mhz zilog Z80 microprocessor.
Like the TI-81, the TI-82 features a 96x64 pixel display, and the core feature set of the ti-81 साथ अनेक नई सुविधाएँ.
The cast of characters of The किंग of सेनानी XI.
The King of Fighters fighting game series, produced by SNK Playmore, शामिल a चौड़ी डाल of वर्ण, some of which are taken from other SNK games.
The story takes place in a fictional ब्रह्मांड in which an annual series of 3-on-3 or 4-on-4 fighting tournaments are held.
The first game in the series introduces the आरंभिक प्रमुख अक्षर of the श्रेणी, kyo kusanagi, a young Japanese fighter who is the heir to a powerful group of martial artists having pyrokinetic abilities.
Kyo झगड़े विरूद्ध the kusanagi गोत्र 's दुश्मनों, उसके rival Iori Yagami, and the god Orochi and its human followers, among others.
The first four games in the series revolve about these fights, while The King of Fighters '99 introduces a new story arc, घूमती around k ', a यंग man जो seeks to नष्ट the रहस्यमय nests organization because they kidnapped him at an early age and stripped him of his past memories, so that they could force him to be a fighter under their control.
In The किंग of सेनानी 2003, a नई अक्षर नामित राख crimson enters the tournament, to steal the powers of the clans who sealed the Orochi in the past for an unknown reason.
A new group of antagonists, ज्ञात as those इससे the पास्ट, भी appears in the series ; they want to obtain Orochi 's power for the purpose of giving it to their unknown master.
The plot and the characters came from the yamata no orochi लेजेंड.
There are also several characters in the games that are parodies or homages to अनेक लोकप्रिय दुश्मनी, manga, and films.
Merchandise based on the characters has also महरूम released, सहित कार्रवाई आंकड़े और keychains.
The characters have garnered praise इससे अनेक वीडियो खेल publications for the quality of their designs and movesets.
Comments focused on the lack of improvements in कुछ of the वर्ण, लकिन added कि the roster is greatly diverse.
व्हेल युद्धों is a साप्ताहिक अमरीकी documentary-style reality television series that premiered on November 7, 2008 on the Animal Planet cable channel.
The program follows Paul Watson, founder of the Sea Shepherd Conservation Society, as he and the क्रू सवार उनके विभिन्न बरतन harass जापानी whalers बंद the coast of Antarctica.
On January 5, 2013, Animal Planet नवीनीकृत the श्रेणी for a sixth season.
The Harpy त्रिभुज ( harpia harpyja ) is a neotropical species of eagle.
It is sometimes known as the American Harpy Eagle to distinguish it from the Papuan त्रिभुज जिससे is sometimes ज्ञात as the नई गिनी harpy त्रिभुज or पापुआई Harpy Eagle.
It is the largest और सबसे शक्तिशाली रैप्टर मिला in the americas, and among the largest extant species of eagles in the world.
It usually inhabits tropical lowland rainforests in the अपर ( emergent ) canopy layer.
Destruction of its natural habitat has seen it vanish from अनेक भाग of इसके पूर्व दायरा, और it is nearly extirpated in Central America.
Biological classification, or वैज्ञानिक वर्गीकरण in जीवविज्ञान, is a विधि of वैज्ञानिक taxonomy used to group and categorize organisms into groups such as genus or species.
These groups हैं ज्ञात as taxa ( singular : taxon ).
Modern biological classification has its root in the work of Carolus Linnaeus, जो grouped प्रजाति according to साझा physical characteristics.
ये groupings have चूंकि महरूम संशोधित to improve consistency with the Darwinian principle of common descent.
With the introduction of the cladistic method in the लेट 20th सदी, phylogenetic taxonomy in जिससे जीवों हैं grouped आधारित purely on inferred evolutionary relatedness, ignoring morphological similarity, has become common in some areas of biology.
आणविक phylogenetics, जिससे उपयोग DNA sequences as data, has also driven many recent revisions and is likely to continue doing so.
biological वर्गीकरण belongs to the science of biological systematics.

John Winston Ono Lennon, ( born John Winston Lennon ; 9 October 1940 – 8 December 1980 ) was an English musician, singer and songwriter who rose to worldwide fame as a संस्थापक सदस्य of the बीटल्स, एक of the सबसे commercially successful and critically acclaimed acts in the history of popular music.
With Paul McCartney, he formed एक of the सबसे मनाये songwriting partnerships of the 20th century.
Born and उठाया in लिवरपूल, as a किशोरावस्था Lennon became involved in the skiffle craze ; his first band, the Quarrymen, evolved into the Beatles in 1960.
As the group disintegrated towards the end of the decade, Lennon embarked on a solo career that produced the critically acclaimed एल्बम जॉन lennon/plastic ओनो बैंड और imagine, और iconic गीतों such as `` Give Peace a Chance `` and `` Imagine ``.
After his marriage to योको ओनो in 1969, he बदला his name to John Ono Lennon.
Lennon disengaged himself from the music business in 1975 to devote time to उठाने उसके शिशु बेटे शॉन, लकिन re-emerged साथ ओनो in 1980 with the new album Double Fantasy.
He was murdered तीन सप्ताह after its release.
Lennon revealed a rebellious nature और acerbic wit in उसके म्यूज़िक, लिखने, drawings, on film and in interviews.
Controversial through his political and peace activism, he moved to New York City in 1971, जहाँ उसके आलोचना of the वियतनाम युद्ध resulted in a lengthy attempt by रिचर्ड Nixon 's administration to deport him, while some of his songs were adopted as anthems by the anti-war movement.
As of 2012, Lennon 's solo album sales in the United States exceed 14 million इकाई, और as लेखक, co-writer or यजमान, he is जिम्मेदार लिये 25 number-one singles on the US Hot 100 chart.
In 2002, a BBC पोल on the 100 महानतम britons voted उसे आठवीं, और in 2008, रोलिंग Stone ranked him the fifth-greatest singer of all time.
He was posthumously inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 1987 और into the चट्टान और फेंकें हॉल of Fame in 1994.

`` Rip Van Winkle '' is a short story by American author Washington Irving published in 1819, as खूब as the नाम of the स्टोरी 's fictional protagonist.
Written while Irving was जीना in बर्मिंघम, इंग्लैण्ड, it थी part of a collection entitled The Sketch Book of Geoffrey Crayon.
Although the story is set in New York 's Catskill Mountains, Irving later admitted, `` When I wrote the स्टोरी, i था never महरूम on the catskills. ''

This page only शामिल the प्रतिस्पर्धी awards won by various artists.
This does not include the विभिन्न खास पुरस्कार कि हैं प्रस्तुत by the नेशनल अकादमी of रिकॉर्डिंग कला और sciences ऐसे as Lifetime Achievement Awards, Trustees Awards, Technical Awards or Legend Awards.

Pee-wee Herman is a comic fictional अक्षर निर्मित and portrayed by American comedian Paul Reubens.
He is बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके दो टेलीविज़न series and film series during the 1980s.
The childlike Pee-wee Herman अक्षर विकसित as a स्टेज अधिनियम कि quickly led to an HBO special in 1981.
As the stage performance gained further popularity, Reubens took the character to गति चित्र साथ Pee-wee 's Big Adventure in 1985, toning down the adult innuendo for the appeal of children.
This प्रशस्त the रास्ता लिये pee-wee 's playhouse, an Emmy Award winning children 's series that ran on CBS from 1986-1991.
another फिल्मी, बिग शीर्ष pee-wee, was released in 1988.
Due to negative media attention following a scandal in 1991, Reubens decided to shelve his alter ego during the 1990s, और तब धीरे resurrected it दौरान the following decade.
It was at that time that Reubens addressed plans to लिखें a नई pee-wee फिल्मी, pee-wee 's playhouse : The Movie.
In June 2007, Reubens appeared as Pee-wee Herman for the first time since 1991 at स्पाइक tv 's यारों ' चुनाव Awards.
That '70s Show is an American television period sitcom that centers on the lives of a group of teenage friends जीना in the fictional suburban कस्बा of पाइंट प्लेस, विस्कॉन्सिन, इससे may 17, 1976, to December 31, 1979.
It debuted on the Fox television network, पहला airing on अगस्त 23, 1998, कार्यशील for eight consecutive seasons, and concluding with the 200th episode on May 18, 2006.
The main teenage cast members were Topher Grace, Mila kunis, एश्टन कूचर, डैनी masterson, लौरा Prepon, and Wilmer Valderrama.
The main adult cast members were Debra Jo Rupp, Kurtwood Smith, Don Stark and, दौरान the पहला तीन seasons, Tanya Roberts.
Kansas ( ) is a U.S. state स्तिथ in the midwestern संयुक्त States.
It is named after the Kansas River which flows through it, जिससे in फेरे थी नामित बाद the कंस देशी अमरीकी tribe, which inhabited the area.
The tribe 's name ( natively kką : ze ) is प्रायः कहा to औसत `` लोगों of the हवा '' or `` लोगों of the south wind, '' although this was probably not the term 's original meaning.
Residents of Kansas are पुकारा `` kansans. ''
For thousands of सालो कया is अभी कान्सास थी घर to numerous and diverse Native American tribes.
Tribes in the Eastern भाग of the राज्य generally lived in villages along the river valleys.
Tribes in the Western part of the state were सेमi- nomadic और hunted विशाल herds of bison.
Kansas was first settled by European Americans in the 1830s, but the pace of उपनिवेश त्वरित in the 1850s, in the midst of political wars over the slavery issue.
When officially opened to settlement by the U.S. government in 1854, abolitionist Free-Staters from New England and pro-slavery settlers इससे neighboring मिसौरी rushed to the territory to determine if कान्सास होता become a फ़्री राज्य or a स्लेव state.
Thus, the क्षेत्रफल थी a hotbed of हिंसा और chaos in its early days as these forces collided, and was known as Bleeding Kansas.
The abolitionists eventually prevailed और on जनवरी 29, 1861, कान्सास entered the Union as a free state.
बाद the सिविल युद्ध, the जनसांख्यिकी of कान्सास grew rapidly, when waves of immigrants turned the prairie into farmland.
आज, कान्सास is एक of the सबसे उत्पादक agricultural राज्य, producing high yields of wheat, sorghum and sunflowers.
Kansas is the 15th most extensive and the 33rd most populous of the 50 संयुक्त राज्य.
Psychology is an academic and applied discipline that involves the scientific पढ़ाई of दिमागी कृत्यों और व्यवहार.
Psychology has the immediate goal of understanding individuals and groups by both establishing सामान्य सिद्धान्त और researching विशिष्ट मामले, और by many accounts it ultimately aims to benefit society.
In this field, a professional or शोधकर्ता is पुकारा a मनोवैज्ञानिक और can be वर्गीकृत as a social, behavioral, or cognitive scientist.
Psychologists attempt to understand the भूमिका of दिमागी कृत्यों in व्यक्तिगत और सोशल बर्ताव, जबकि भी exploring the physiological and neurobiological processes that underlie certain cognitive functions and behaviors.
Psychologists explore concepts such as perception, cognition, attention, emotion, phenomenology, प्रेरणा, दिमाग कामकाज, व्यक्तित्व, behavior, and interpersonal relationships.
Psychologists of diverse stripes also consider the बेहोश दिमाग.
Psychologists employ empirical methods to infer causal और correlational relationships between psychosocial variables.
In addition, or in opposition, to employing empirical and deductive methods, some—especially clinical and counseling psychologists—at टाइम्स rely upon symbolic interpretation and other inductive techniques.
Psychology has been described as a `` hub science '', with psychological findings linking to शोध और perspectives इससे the सोशल sciences, प्राकृतिक sciences, आयुर्विज्ञान, और the मानवता, such as philosophy.
While psychological knowledge is often applied to the assessment and उपचार of दिमागी स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं, it is भी निर्देशित towards समझना and solving problems in many different spheres of human activity.
the बहुमत of psychologists हैं शामिल in कुछ दयालु of therapeutic role, practicing in clinical, counseling, or school settings.
Many do scientific research on a wide range of topics related to mental processes and behavior, और typically कार्य in विश्वविद्यालयों मनोविज्ञान विभाग or सिखा in other academic settings ( e.g., medical schools, hospitals ).
Some are employed in industrial and organizational settings, or in other areas such as human development and aging, sports, health, and the मीडिया, as खूब as in forensic investigation and other aspects of law.
Thomas Jefferson ( April 13, 1743 ( April 2, 1743 O.S. ) – July 4, 1826 ) थी an अमरीकी founding पिता, the प्रिंसिपल लेखक of the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता ( 1776 ) and the third President of the United States ( 1801–1809 ).
At the beginning of the American Revolution, he served in the Continental Congress, representing Virginia and then served as a wartime राज्यपाल of वर्जिनिया ( 1779–1781 ).
Just after the war ended, इससे mid-1784 जेफरसन परोसा as a राजनयिक, stationed in Paris.
In May 1785, he became the United States मंत्री to फ़्रांस.
Jefferson was the first United States Secretary of State ( 1790–1793 ) सेवारत अंतर्गत अध्यक्ष George Washington.
With his close friend James Madison he organized the Democratic-Republican Party, और subsequently resigned इससे वॉशिंगटन 's cabinet.
Elected Vice President in 1796, when he came in second to John Adams of the Federalists, Jefferson opposed Adams and with Madison secretly wrote the Kentucky and वर्जिनिया रिज़ॉल्यूशन, जिससे attempted to nullify the एलियन और राजद्रोह Acts.
Elected president in what Jefferson called the Revolution of 1800, he oversaw the खरीदें of the विशाल louisiana territory इससे फ़्रांस ( 1803 ), and sent the Lewis and Clark Expedition ( 1804–1806 ) to explore the new west.
His second term was beset with troubles at home, ऐसे as the विफल देशद्रोह विचारण of उसके former Vice President Aaron Burr.
With escalating trouble with Britain who was challenging American neutrality and threatening shipping at समुद्र, he आजमाया आर्थिक warfare साथ उसके embargo laws which only damaged American trade.
In 1803, President Jefferson initiated a process of Indian tribal removal and relocation to the Louisiana territory वेस्ट of the मिसिसिपी नदी, in अनुक्रम to खोलें lands लिये eventual अमरीकी settlers.
A leader in the Enlightenment, Jefferson was a polymath who spoke five languages fluently and was deeply interested in विज्ञान, आविष्कार, वास्तुकला, धर्म और दर्शनशास्त्र, रूचि कि led उसे to the founding of the University of Virginia after his presidency.
He designed his own large mansion on a 5,000 acre वृक्षारोपण निकट charlottesville, Virginia, which he named Monticello.
While not a notable orator, Jefferson was a skilled writer और corresponded साथ अनेक influential लोगों in अमेरिका and Europe throughout his adult life.
Though Jefferson owned many slaves, he opposed the संस्था सब उसके जीवन और नतीजतन treated and took care of them very well and expected them to work no more than free farmers.
Since 1802 historians and others have been divided over the controversy of whether जेफरसन थी the पिता of एक or अधिक children belonging to Sally Hemings, a slave at Monticello. ''
Historians are also in disagreement with how much जेफरसन थी वचनबद्ध to the anti-slavery cause.
In 1807, President Jefferson signed into law a bill that banned the importation of स्लेव into the United States.
After Martha Jefferson, his wife of eleven years, died in 1782, Jefferson remained a widower for the rest of his life ; their विवाह उत्पादित छह children, of जिसको दो survived to adulthood.
Though Jefferson रै महरूम criticized by अनेक आधुनिक दिन विद्वानों over the issue of slavery, he remains rated as one of the greatest U.S. presidents.
`` Sun City '' is a 1985 protest song written by Steven Van Zandt, produced by Van Zandt and Arthur Baker and अंकित by कलाकारों संयुक्त विरूद्ध रंगभेद to convey विपक्ष to the दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी नीति of रंगभेद.
The primary means of that opposition is to declare that all the artists involved होता इंकार कोई और सब offers to perform at सूर्य नगर, a रिज़ॉर्ट जिससे थी स्तिथ in bantustan of Bophuthatswana, one of a number of internationally unrecognized supposed `` independent '' states created by the South African government to forcibly relocate its black population.

The National Basketball Association ( NBA ) is a प्रमुख पेशेवर बास्केट league in North America.
It was founded in 1946 as the बास्केट संघ of America ( BAA ).
The league adopted its current name at the start of the when it मिलाया साथ the नेशनल बास्केट लीग ( NBL ).
The NBA Finals is the championship series for the NBA और the निष्कर्ष of the sport 's postseason.
The winning team of the series receives the लैरी O'Brien Championship Trophy.
Players from the winning टोली प्रायः प्राप्त चैंपियनशिप बजती इससे the टोली honoring their contribution.
However, in some rare अवसर, the टीमों opted to दिया अन्य commemorative items, such as wrist watches, instead of rings.
The number of championships won by NBA superstars is often used as a मापन of उनके विशालता.
Boston Celtics center Bill Russell holds the रिकार्ड लिये the सबसे एनबीए championships जीती साथ 11 शीर्षक दौरान his 13-year playing career.
He won his first championship with the बोस्टन सेल्टिक्स in उसके रुकी year.
Afterwards, he went on to जीत 10 championships in the अगला 12 years, including eight consecutive championships from 1959 to 1966.
He won the last two championships in 1968 and 1969 as player-coach.
Russell 's teammate, sam जोन्स, जीती 10 championships from 1959 to 1969, the second most in NBA history.
चार सेल्टिक्स खिलाड़ी, tom heinsohn, K. C. जोन्स, Satch Sanders and John Havlicek, won eight championships each.
दो अन्य सेल्टिक्स, जिम loscutoff और फ़्रैंक Ramsey, won seven championships each.
Four players, Bob Cousy, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, Michael जॉर्डन और scottie pippen, जीती six championships each.
Jordan and Pippen हैं सदस्यों of the शिकागो bulls team who won three consecutive championships twice in the 1990s.
रॉबर्ट horry और जॉन salley हैं the only players to have won the championships with three different teams.
Horry won seven championships साथ the ह्यूस्टन rockets, the लॉस एंजिल्स लेकर्स और the सैन अंतोनियो स्पर्स, जबकि salley जीती four championships with the Detroit Pistons, the Bulls and the Lakers.
फ़्रैंक शाऊल और स्टीव केर हैं the तभी खिलाड़ी to जीत दो championships with two different teams in consecutive seasons.

Accuracy indicates proximity of मापन परिणाम to the सच्चा मान, precision to the repeatability, or reproducibility of the measurement
In the fields of science, engineering, industry, and statistics, the accuracy of a measurement system is the उपाधि of निकटता of माप of a मात्रा to कि मात्रा 's वास्तविक ( true ) value.
The precision of a measurement system, also called reproducibility or repeatability, is the उपाधि to जिससे दोहराया measurements under unchanged conditions show the same results.
हालांकि the दो शब्द reproducibility और repeatability can be synonymous in colloquial use, they are deliberately contrasted in the context of the scientific method.
A मापन प्रणाली can be सटीक लकिन नहीं precise, precise but not accurate, neither, or both.
For example, if an experiment contains a व्यवस्थित गलती, तब increasing the sample size generally increases precision but does not improve accuracy.
The result would be a consistent yet inaccurate स्ट्रिंग of results from the flawed experiment.
eliminating the व्यवस्थित error improves accuracy but does not change precision.
A measurement system is designated मान्य if it is दोनो सटीक and precise.
Related terms include bias ( non- random or directed effects caused by a factor or कारकों unrelated to the स्वतंत्र परिवर्तनीय ) और गलती ( random variability ).
The terminology is also applied to indirect measurements—that is, values प्राप्त by a कम्प्यूटेशनल कार्यविधि from observed data.
In addition to सटीकता और परिशुद्धता, माप may भी have a measurement resolution, which is the smallest change in the underlying physical quantity that produces a response in the measurement.
In the case of full reproducibility, ऐसे as जब rounding a क्रमांक to a representable फ्लोटिंग पाइंट क्रमांक, the word precision has a meaning not related to reproducibility.
For example, in the IEEE 754-2008 standard it means the number of bits in the significand, so it is used as a measure लिये the सापेक्ष सटीकता साथ जिससे an मनमानी number can be represented.
Fuck in इसके शाब्दिक अर्थ refers to the act of sexual intercourse.
It is an English word कि is प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a profanity, either to denote disdain or as an intensifier.
The origin of the शब्द is obscure.
It is usually considered to be first attested to around 1475, but it may be considerably पुरानी.
In modern usage, fuck and its derivatives ( such as fucker and fucking ) can be प्रयुक्त in the position of a noun, a verb, an adjective or an adverb.
There are अनेक आम वाक्यांश जिससे मेक उपयोग of the शब्द, as well as a number of compounds incorporating it, such as motherfucker.
Animated, color-coded मैप प्रर्दशित the various continents and regions.
Depending on the convention and model, some continents may be संचित or subdivided : लिये उदाहरण, यूरेशिया is सबसे प्रायः subdivided into Europe and Asia ( red shades ), while North and South America are sometimes recognized as one American continent ( green shades ).
A continent is एक of अनेक बहुत विशाल landmasses on Earth.
They are generally identified by convention rather than any strict criteria, with up to सात regions commonly regarded as continents—they हैं ( इससे largest in आकार to smallest ) : एशिया, Africa, North America, South America, Antarctica, Europe, and Australia.
In geology, महाद्वीपों हैं वर्णित by means of tectonic plates.
Plate tectonics is the process and study of the गति, टक्कर और प्रभाग of continents, earlier known as continental drift.

Community property is a marital property regime that originated in civil law jurisdictions and is अभी भी मिला in कुछ आम विधि jurisdictions.
The states of the United राज्य कि recognize जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी हैं primarily in the वेस्ट ; it थी inherited from Mexico 's ganancial community system, which itself was inherited from Spanish law ( a Roman -derived civil law system ) and ultimately from the Visigoths.
While under Spanish rule Louisiana adopted the ganancial जातियाँ प्रणाली of acquests और gains, जिससे replaced the परंपरागत फ्रेंच जातियाँ of movables and acquests in its civil law system.
Map of the United राज्य साथ जातियाँ property states highlighted in red.
In addition to the highlighted राज्य, अलास्का is a separate property state that permits couples to opt into a community property arrangement.
In a community property jurisdiction, most प्रॉपर्टी acquired दौरान the विवाह ( मगर लिये उपहार or inheritances ) —the जातियाँ, or communio bonorum—is owned jointly by both spouses and is divided upon divorce, annulment or death.
Joint ownership is automatically presumed by law in the अनुपस्थिति of विशिष्ट प्रमाण कि होता पाइंट to a contrary conclusion for a particular piece of property.
Division of community property may take place by item, by splitting सब वस्तुएं or by value.
In some jurisdictions, such as California, a 50/50 प्रभाग of जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी is सख्ती mandated by statute, meaning that the focus then shifts to whether particular items are to be classified as community or separate property.
In other jurisdictions, ऐसे as टेक्सास, a तलाक अदालत may डिक्री an `` निष्पक्ष distribution `` of community property, which may result in an unequal division of such.
In non-community प्रॉपर्टी states property may be divided by equitable distribution.
Generally speaking, the property that each partner brings into the marriage or receives by gift, bequest or devise during विवाह is पुकारा पृथक प्रॉपर्टी ( i.e., नहीं जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी ).
See division of प्रॉपर्टी.
Division of community debts may नहीं be the वही as division of community property.
For example, in California, community property is required to be divided `` बराबर '' जबकि जातियाँ कर्ज़ is जरूरी to be divided `` equitably ''.
Property that is owned by एक जीवनसाथी पहले the marriage is the separate property of that spouse, unless the property is `` transmuted '' into community property.
The rules for this vary इससे क्षेत्राधिकार to jurisdiction.
The ड्यूक और duchess of कैम्ब्रिज हिलाता to the crowd at The Mall shortly after the wedding.
The wedding of Prince William, Duke of Cambridge, and Catherine Middleton took place on 29 अप्रैल 2011 at वेस्टमिंस्टर ऐबी in London.
The groom, Prince William, Duke of Cambridge, is the eldest son of Charles, Prince of Wales, and is second in the लकीर of उत्तराधिकार to the अंग्रेजों सिंहासन और the तख्तों of fifteen other Commonwealth realms.
The bride, Catherine `` Kate '' Middleton is the ज्येष्ठ of तीन children of माइकल और carole मिडलटन of Bucklebury, Berkshire.
The Dean of Westminster, John Hall, presided at the service ; the Archbishop of Canterbury, Rowan विलियम्स, conducted the विवाह ; रिचर्ड chartres, the बिशप of लंदन, preached the उपदेश ; और a पढना थी दिए by the bride 's brother, James.
William 's बेहतरीन man थी उसके bhai, प्रिंस Harry, while the bride 's sister, Pippa, was maid of honour.
The ceremony was attended by the bride 's और दूल्हे 's परिवारों, as खूब as अनेक विदेशी royals, diplomats, and the couple 's chosen personal guests.
After the ceremony, the couple बना the परंपरागत रूप on the balcony of Buckingham Palace.
As Prince William was not the heir apparent to the सिंहासन, the विवाह थी नहीं a पूरा state occasion and many details were left to the couple to decide, such as much of the guest list of about 1,900.
Prince William और केट मिडलटन met in 2001.
Their engagement on 20 October 2010 थी घोषित on 16 November 2010.
The build-up to the wedding and the occasion itself attracted much media attention, being compared in many ways with the 1981 विवाह of विलियम 's अभिभावक.
The occasion was a public holiday in the United Kingdom and featured many ceremonial aspects, including use of the राज्य carriages और भूमिकाएँ लिये the पैर Guards and Household Cavalry.
Events were held around the Commonwealth to चिह्नित the विवाह ; संगठनों और होटल आयोजित कार्यक्रम आरपार कनाडा, over 5,000 गली पार्टियों यहूद held throughout the United Kingdom, and one million people lined the route between Westminster Abbey and Buckingham Palace.
The ceremony was viewed सजीव by tens of लाखो अधिक around the world, including 72 million on the YouTube Royal Channel.
In the United Kingdom, टेलीविज़न ऑडियंस peaked at 26.3 लाख दर्शक, साथ a कुल of 36.7 million watching part of the coverage.

A hand ( med. / lat. : manus, pl. manūs ) is a prehensile, multi- fingered extremity स्तिथ at the समाप्त of an भुजा or forelimb of primates और humans, chimpanzees, monkeys, and lemurs.
A few other vertebrates such as the koala ( which has दो opposable thumbs on प्रत्येक `` हाथ '' और फिंगरप्रिंट remarkably समान to इंसान फिंगरप्रिंट ) हैं प्रायः described as having either `` hands '' or `` paws '' on their front limbs.
हैंड्स हैं the प्रमुख structures लिये physically manipulating the environment, used for both gross motor skills ( such as grasping a large object ) and fine motor skills ( such as picking up a small pebble ).
The fingertips contain some of the densest areas of तंत्रिका endings on the देह, हैं the richest सोर्स of tactile प्रतिक्रिया, और have the greatest positioning capability of the body ; thus the sense of touch is intimately associated with hands.
Like other paired organs ( eyes, feet, legs ), each hand is dominantly controlled by the opposing brain hemisphere, so that handedness, or the preferred hand choice for single-handed क्रियाएँ ऐसे as लिखने साथ a पेंसिल, reflects व्यक्तिगत दिमाग कामकाज.
कुछ विकासवादी anatomists उपयोग the पद हाथ to refer to the appendage of digits on the forelimb more generally — for example, in the context of whether the three digits of the bird hand involved the same homologous loss of two digits as in the dinosaur hand.
The human hand has 27 bones, not सहित the sesamoid हड्डियों जिससे क्रमांक varies between people.
14 of which are the phalanges ( proximal, इंटरमीडिएट and distal ) of the fingers.
The metacarpals हैं the हड्डियों कि connects the fingers and the wrist.
प्रत्येक इंसान हाथ रै 5 metacarpals and 8 carpal bones.
