Basic digital alarm क्लॉक बगैर a radio.
the चिह्नित in the top-left of the display indicates that the time is 4:00pm, not 4:00am.
A 1969 radio alarm clock ( Sony Digimatic 8FC-59W ) with an जल्दी mechanical-digital प्रदर्शक.
A digital clock is a type of clock that displays the time digitally, i.e. in numerals or अन्य प्रतीकों, as opposed to an analog clock, where the time is indicated by the positions of rotating hands.
Digital clocks are often associated with electronic drives, but the `` digital '' वर्णन refers तभी to the प्रदर्शक, नहीं to the ड्राइव mechanism.
( Both analog and digital clocks can be driven either mechanically or electronically, but `` clockwork '' mechanisms साथ डिजिटल प्रदर्शक are rare. )
The biggest digital clock is the Lichtzeitpegel ( `` Light Time Level '' ) on the television मीनार rheinturm düsseldorf, जर्मनी.
Family Guy निर्माता सेठ macfarlane भी provides the voices of Peter Griffin, Stewie Griffin, Brian Griffin, and Glenn Quagmire.
Family Guy is an American animated sitcom कि सुविधाएँ पाँच प्रमुख आवाज़ अभिनेताओं, और numerous regular cast and recurring guest stars.
The principal voice cast consists of show creator Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green, Mila Kunis ( who replaced लेसी chabert बाद the पहला ऋतु ) और माइक हेनरी और अभी, the नई कर्ता beau ओसबोर्न.
Recurring voice actors include Patrick Warburton, Adam West, John G. ब्रेनन, निकोल सुलीवान और जेनिफर Tilly, and repeat guest stars include Phyllis Diller, Charles Durning, Rush Limbaugh, and Phil LaMarr.
Many cast members provide voices for अनेक वर्ण.
The voice actors, in portraying the various अक्षर personalities on the show, draw inspiration from celebrities and pop culture.
Family Guy वर्ण have महरूम निभाई by अधिक than एक actor, after members of the show left the series or had conflicting obligations.
Kunis was nominated for an Annie Award for voicing Meg Griffin in the season 5 episode `` Barely Legal `` and MacFarlane has also जीती an एमी पुरस्कार लिये बकाया voice-over प्रदर्शन और an एनी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन आवाज़ एक्टिंग in an एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न उत्पादन, though no other cast member has won an award for their work on the series.
The five sets of the board game Monopoly depicted here show the एवोल्यूशन of the खेल 's कलाकृति और डिजाइन in the संयुक्त States from 1935–2005.
The history of the board खेल एकाधिकार can be traced back to the early 20th century.
The earliest known design was by the American, एलिज़ाबेथ magie, patented in 1904 लकिन मौजूदा as early as 1902.
Magie 's original intent was to publish a board game to illustrate an economic principle, namely the georgist concept of a single land value tax.
A series of board games were developed from 1906 through the 1930s that शामिल the खरीदे और selling of जमीन और the विकास of that land.
By 1934, a फलक खेल था महरूम निर्मित much जैसे the version of Monopoly sold by Parker Brothers and its related companies through the rest of the 20th century, and into the 21st.
Several people, mostly in the midwestern संयुक्त राज्य and near the East Coast, contributed to the game 's design and evolution.
By the 1970s, the idea that the game had been created solely by Charles Darrow had become popular folklore ; it थी मुद्रित in the खेल 's निर्देश लिये अनेक सालो, in a 1974 किताब devoted to एकाधिकार, और थी cited in a general book about toys even as recently as 2007.
Even a guide to family games published for Reader 's Digest in 2003 only gave credit to Darrow and Elizabeth Magie, erroneously stating कि magie 's असली खेल थी निर्मित in the 1800s, और नहीं acknowledging any of the game 's development between Magie 's creation of the game, and the eventual publication by Parker Brothers.
Also in the 1970s, Professor Ralph Anspach, जो था खुद प्रकाशित a फलक खेल intended to illustrate the principles of both monopolies and trust busting, fought Parker Brothers and its then parent company, General Mills, over the trademarks of the Monopoly board game.
Through the research of anspach और अन्य, much of the early history of the game was `` rediscovered ''.
Anspach confronted maxine ब्रैडी, लेखक of the 1974 किताब the Monopoly Book : Strategy and Tactics of the World 's Most Popular Game over the actual history of the game on Barry Farber 's New York City talk show in 1975.
Because of the lengthy अदालत प्रक्रम, सहित appeals, the legal status of Parker Brothers ' trademarks on the game was not settled until 1985.
The game 's name remains a registered trademark of पार्कर भाइयो, as do इसके विशिष्ट डिज़ाइन elements.
At the conclusion of the court case, the game 's logo and ग्राफिक डिज़ाइन तत्व became भाग of a larger एकाधिकार ब्रांड, licensed by Parker Brothers ' parent companies onto a variety of items through the present day.
Despite the `` rediscovery '' of the board खेल 's जल्दी इतिहास in the 1970s और 1980s, और अनेक किताबे और जर्नल आलेख on the विषय, हास्ब्रो ( पार्कर भाइयो ' वर्तमान जनक company ) did not acknowledge any of the game 's history before Charles Darrow on its official Monopoly website as recently as June 2012.
Nor did Hasbro acknowledge anyone अन्य than darrow in सामग्री प्रकाशित or प्रायोजित by them, at least as recently as 2006.
International tournaments, first आयोजित in the जल्दी 1970s, continue to the present, with the next world championship likely scheduled for 2013.
Starting in 1985, a new generation of spin-off board games and card games appeared on दोनो पहलू of the Atlantic Ocean.
In 1989, the first of many वीडियो खेल और कंप्यूटर game editions was published.
Since 1994, many official variants of the खेल, आधारित on स्थितियाँ अन्य than अटलांटिक नगर, नई जर्सी ( the आधिकारिक U.S. setting ) or London ( the official Commonwealth setting, excepting Canada ), have been published by Hasbro or its licensees.
In 2008, Hasbro permanently changed the color scheme and some of the gameplay of the standard U.S. Edition of the game to match the uk संस्करण, हालांकि the u.S. मानक संस्करण maintains the Atlantic City property names.
Hasbro also modified the official logo to give the `` Mr. एकाधिकार '' अक्षर a 3-d computer-generated dekh, जिससे रै चूंकि been adopted by licensees USAopoly, Winning Moves and Winning Solutions.
And Hasbro has also been including the Speed Die, introduced in 2006 's Monopoly : The आचमन संस्करण by जीतना चालें खेल, in संस्करण उत्पादित directly by Hasbro ( such as the 2009 Championship Edition ).
In baseball, a बलिदान मक्खी is a batted ball that satisfies four criteria:
There are fewer than two outs जब the बॉल is hit.
The ball is hit to the outfield ( fair or foul ), or to infield बेईमानी territory.
The batter is put out because an outfielder ( or an infielder running in the outfield, or foul territory ) catches the बॉल on the मक्खी ( alternatively if the batter would have been out if not for an error or if the outfielder drops the ball and another runner is put out ).
A runner who is already on आधार स्कोर on the play.
It is called a `` sacrifice '' fly क्युकी the बैटर presumably intends to कारण a teammate to score a run, while sacrificing his own ability to do so.
Minnesota ( ) is a U.S. state located in the midwestern United States.
Minnesota was carved आउट of the पूर्वी हाफ of the मिनेसोटा territory and admitted to the Union as the 32nd state on May 11, 1858.
Known as the `` जमीन of 10,000 झीलों '', the राज्य 's name comes from a Dakota word for `` sky-tinted water ''.
Those waters, साथ साथ वनों, पार्क, और wilderness क्षेत्रों, offer residents and tourists a variety of outdoor recreational opportunities.
Minnesota is the 12th most extensive और the 21st most populous of the U.S. states.
Nearly 60 % of its residents live in the Minneapolis–Saint Paul metropolitan area ( ज्ञात as the `` जुड़वा शहरों '' ), the बीच of परिवहन, कारोबार, उद्योग, शिक्षा, government and home to an internationally known arts community.
The remainder of the state consists of western prairies now given over to intensive agriculture ; deciduous forests in the southeast, अभी साफ, farmed और settled ; और the कम populated North Woods, used for mining, forestry, and recreation.
Minnesota is known for its relatively mixed social and political orientations, और रै a ऊँची रेट of civic participation and voter turnout.
मिनेसोटा बाँधने among the healthiest राज्य, और has a highly literate population.
The large majority of निवासियों हैं of scandinavian and German descent.
The state is known as a center of scandinavian अमरीकी culture.
Ethnic diversity has increased in हाल दशकों.
Substantial influxes of एशियाई, अफ़्रीकी, और लैटिन अमरीकी आप्रवासियों have joined the descendants of European settlers and the original Native American inhabitants.
Grants are non-repayable funds by one party ( grant makers ), often a सरकारी विभाग, निगम, न्यास or विश्वास, to a, प्रायः ( लकिन नहीं सदा ) a nonprofit entity, educational institution, business or an individual.
In order to receive a grant, some form of `` Grant Writing '' often referred to as either a प्रस्ताव or an अनुप्रयोग is usually required.
Most grants are made to fund a specific project and आवश्यकता कुछ स्तर of अनुपालन और रिपोर्टिंग.
the ग्रान्ट लिखने प्रक्रम involves an आवेदक submitting a proposal ( or submission ) to a potential funder, either on the applicant 's own initiative or in response to a Request for Proposal from the funder.
Other grants can be given to individuals, such as पीड़ितों of प्राकृतिक आपदाओं or individuals who seek to open a small business.
Sometimes grant makers require grant seekers to have some रूप of tax-exempt औकात, be a पंजीकृत nonprofit संगठन or a local government.
For example, tiered funding for a freeway are very large अनुदान negotiated at सरकारी नीति level.
However smaller grants may be provided by a सरकारी agency ( e.g. municipal government ).
project-related funding involving सरकारें, कारोबार, समुदायों, और individuals is often arranged by application either in writing or online.
Naturally occurring cobalt ( Co ) is composed of 1 stable isotope, 59Co. 28 radioisotopes have महरूम characterized साथ the सबसे stable होने 60co साथ a half-life of 5.2714 सालो, 57co साथ a half-life of 271.79 days, 56Co with a half-life of 77.27 days, and 58Co with a half-life of 70.86 days.
All of the remaining radioactive isotopes have half-lives that are कम than 18 घंटों और the बहुमत of ये have half-lives that are less than 1 second.
This element also has 11 मेटा राज्य, सब of जिससे have half-lives कम than 15 minutes.
The isotopes of cobalt range in परमाणु वज़न from 47Co to 75Co.
The primary decay mode for isotopes with atomic mass unit values less than that of the most abundant stable isotope, 59Co, is इलेक्ट्रॉन कैप्चर और the प्राथमिक विधि of क्षय लिये those of वृहद than 59 atomic mass units is beta decay.
The primary decay products before 59Co are iron isotopes and the primary उत्पाद बाद हैं निकल isotopes.

Who Moved My चीज ?
An Amazing Way to Deal with Change in Your Work and in Your Life, published in 1998, is a प्रेरक किताब by स्पेंसर जॉनसन लिखा in the style of a parable or business fable.
It describes change in one 's work and life, and four typical प्रतिक्रियाएँ to कहा बदलें by दो चूहे और two `` littlepeople '', during their hunt for cheese.
A New यॉर्क टाइम्स कारोबार बेस्टसेलर since release, Who Moved My Cheese ?
remained on the list for almost five years and खर्च over 200 सप्ताह on Publishers Weekly 's hardcover nonfiction list.
It has sold more than 26 लाख नक़ल विश्वव्यापी in 37 भाषाएं and remains to be one of the best-selling business books.
Nikita sergeyevich khrushchev ( – सितंबर 11, 1971 ) led the Soviet Union during part of the Cold War.
He served as First Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union from 1953 to 1964, और as अध्यक्ष of the परिषद of मंत्रियों, or Premier, from 1958 to 1964.
Khrushchev was responsible for the partial de-Stalinization of the Soviet Union, for backing the progress of the early Soviet space program, and for अनेक अपेक्षाकृत उदार reforms in क्षेत्रों of घरेलू नीति.
Khrushchev 's party colleagues removed him from power in 1964, replacing him साथ लियोनिद brezhnev as पहला सचिव और एलेक्सी kosygin as प्रीमियर.
Khrushchev was born in the Russian village of kalinovka in 1894, बंद to the present-day border between Russia and Ukraine.
He was employed as a metalworker in उसके युवावस्था, और दौरान the Russian Civil War was a political commissar.
With the help of Lazar Kaganovich, he worked उसके रास्ता up the सोवियत पदानुक्रम.
He supported Joseph Stalin 's purges, and स्वीकृत हज़ारों of रखवाले.
In 1939, स्टालिन भेजा उसे to govern युक्त, और he continued the purges there.
During what was known in the Soviet Union as the Great Patriotic War ( Eastern Front of World युद्ध ii ), khrushchev थी again a commissar, सेवारत as an intermediary between Stalin and his generals.
Khrushchev was present at the खूनी रक्षा of stalingrad, a fact he took great pride in throughout his life.
After the युद्ध, he लौटे to युक्त पहले होने recalled to Moscow as one of Stalin 's close advisers.
In the शक्ति संघर्ष triggered by स्टालिन 's death in 1953, Khrushchev, after several years, emerged victorious.
On February 25, 1956, at the 20th Party Congress, he delivered the `` रहस्य वाक, '' denouncing स्टालिन 's purges और ushering in a कम repressive era in the Soviet Union.
His domestic नीतियों, aimed at bettering the जीवनदान of ordinary citizens, were often ineffective, especially in the area of agriculture.
Hoping eventually to rely on मिसाइलें लिये नेशनल रक्षा, Khrushchev ordered major cuts in conventional forces.
Despite the cuts, khrushchev 's नियम देखी the tensest years of the Cold War, culminating in the Cuban Missile Crisis.
Some of Khrushchev 's policies were seen as erratic, particularly by his उभरते विरोधियों, जो चुपचाप रोज़ in शक्ति और अपदस्थ उसे in October 1964.
He did not suffer the deadly fate of some previous losers of सोवियत शक्ति struggles, but was pensioned off with an apartment in Moscow and a dacha in the countryside.
His lengthy memoirs were smuggled to the वेस्ट और published in part in 1970.
Khrushchev died in 1971 of दिल बीमारी.
Upper gastrointestinal ( gi ) bleeding refers to hemorrhage in the upper gastrointestinal tract.
The anatomic cut-off for upper GI bleeding is the स्नायु of treitz, जिससे connects the चौथी portion of the duodenum to the diaphragm near the splenic flexure of the colon.
Upper GI bleeds are considered medical emergencies, and require प्रवेश to हॉस्पिटल लिये तात्कालिक diagnosis and management.
Due to advances in medications और endoscopy, अपर GI hemorrhage is now usually treated without surgery.
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100, based on UN 2010 projections ( red, orange, green ) और us जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ऐतिहासिक estimates ( black ).
Actual recorded जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़े हैं in blue.
According to the highest estimate, the world population may rise to 16 billion by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate, it may decline to 6 billion.
The संसार जनसांख्यिकी is the कुल number of living humans on Earth.
As of today, it is estimated to क्रमांक अरब by the संयुक्त राज्य Census Bureau ( USCB ).
The USCB estimates कि the संसार जनसांख्यिकी exceeded 7 अरब on March 12, 2012.
According to a separate estimate by the United Nations Population निधि, it पहुँचे इस पड़ाव on October 31, 2011.
The world population has experienced निरन्तर विकास चूंकि the समाप्त of the ग्रेट अकाल और the Black Death in 1350, when it stood at around 370 million.
The उच्चतम दरों of विकास – वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी increases above 1.8 % per year – were seen briefly during the 1950s, and for a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s.
The growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, और था अस्वीकृत to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total annual births were highest in the late 1980s at about 138 million, and are now expected to remain essentially निरंतर at उनके 2011 स्तर of 134 लाख, जबकि मौतों क्रमांक 56 लाख प्रति year, and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040.
Current projections show a continued increase in जनसांख्यिकी in the निकट भविष्य ( लकिन a steady decline in the population growth rate ), with the global population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates predict further growth, stagnation, or even overall decline in the global population by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world population विकास, citing the growing pressures on the पर्यावरण, global food supplies, and energy resources.
Philips Lumileds Lighting Company is the manufacturer of a चौड़ी दायरा of high-power/high-efficiency light-emitting diodes ( LEDs ).
It is a now a fully स्वामित्व प्रभाग of Philips Lighting.
Knuckle mnemonic लिये the क्रमांक of दिनों in प्रत्येक month of the Gregorian Calendar.
Each projecting knuckle represents a 31-day माह.
A mnemonic (, with a silent `` m '' ), or mnemonic device, is any सीखना तकनीक कि एड्स सूचना retention.
Mnemonics aim to translate सूचना into a रूप कि the इंसान दिमाग can retain better than its original form.
Even the प्रक्रम of applying इस परिवर्तन might already aid the transfer of information to long-term memory.
Commonly encountered mnemonics are often for lists and in auditory form, such as short poems, acronyms, or memorable phrases, but mnemonics can भी be लिये अन्य प्रकार of सूचना और in visual or kinesthetic forms.
Their use is based on the observation that the human mind more easily remembers spatial, personal, आश्चर्यजनक, शारीरिक, यौन, humorous, or otherwise 'relatable ' information, rather than more abstract or impersonal forms of information.
The word mnemonic is derived from the Ancient Greek word μνημονικός ( mnēmonikos ), meaning `` of मेमोरी '' और is सम्बन्धित to mnemosyne ( `` स्मरण '' ), the नाम of the goddess of memory in Greek mythology.
Both of these शब्द हैं निकला इससे μνήμη ( mnēmē ), `` remembrance, memory ''.
Mnemonics in प्राचीनता यहूद सबसे प्रायः माना in the context of what is today known as the Art of memory.
प्राचीन Greeks and Romans distinguished between two types of memory : the 'natural ' memory and the 'artificial ' memory.
The former is inborn, and is the one कि everyone उपयोग automatically and without thinking.
The कृत्रिम मेमोरी in कंट्रास्ट रै to be प्रशिक्षित और developed through the learning and practicing of a variety of mnemonic techniques.
Mnemonic systems are special techniques or strategies consciously प्रयुक्त to improve मेमोरी, it helps employ सूचना already भंडारित in long-term memory to make memorization an easier task.
President Bush signing the No Child Left पीछे अधिनियम at हैमिल्टन h.s. in हैमिल्टन, Ohio.
The No Child Left पीछे अधिनियम of 2001 ( nclb ) is a संयुक्त राज्य अधिनियम of कॉंग्रेस कि is a reauthorization of the elementary और Secondary Education Act, which included Title I, the government 's flagship aid program for disadvantaged students.
NCLB supports standards-based education reform based on the premise that setting high standards and establishing measurable लक्ष्य can improve व्यक्तिगत outcomes in शिक्षा.
The Act requires states to develop आकलन in मौलिक skills.
States जरूर दे ये आकलन to सब विद्यार्थी at चुनें ग्रेड levels in order to receive federal school funding.
The Act does not assert a national achievement standard ; मानकों हैं नियत by प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत राज्य.
NCLB expanded the federal role in public education through annual testing, annual academic progress, report cards, टीचर योग्यता, और funding परिवर्तन.
The bill passed in the u.S. कॉंग्रेस साथ bipartisan support.

A pickup truck or pick-up, प्रायः बस referred to as a पिकअप, is a लाइट मोटर vehicle with an open-top, rear cargo area ( bed ).
In North America, the term pickup is प्रयुक्त लिये लाइट ट्रक साथ a हल्का ड्यूटी chassis और फैक्टरी निर्मित, एकीकृत bed, as खूब as लिये coupé utility vehicles, often based on a personal car chassis, but also often on a special dedicated chassi for such use.
Some countries have their own terms similar to पिकअप, ऐसे as ute in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई Zealand, or bakkie in South Africa.
Large पिकअप ट्रक हैं somewhat विरल in यूरोपीय, जहाँ वैन and light lorries are commonly used for similar roles.
This 15th-century depiction of Charlemagne and Pope Adrian I shows a well-bred medieval horse with मेहराबदार गर्दन, परिष्कृत सिर और सुरुचिपूर्ण gait.
Horses in the Middle Ages differed in आकार, निर्माण और नस्ल इससे the आधुनिक घोड़ा, और were, on average, smaller.
They were also more central to society than उनके आधुनिक counterparts, होने अनिवार्य लिये युद्ध, agriculture, and transport.
Consequently, विशिष्ट प्रकार of घोड़ा developed, many of which have no modern equivalent.
जबकि an समझना of आधुनिक घोड़ा breeds और equestrianism is vital लिये कोई विश्लेषण of the मध्यकालीन horse, researchers also need to consider documentary ( both written and pictorial ) and archaeological evidence.
घोड़े in the मध्य आयु यहूद rarely differentiated by breed, but rather by use.
This led them to be described, for example, as `` chargers `` ( युद्ध घोड़े ), `` palfreys `` ( riding horses ), cart horses or packhorses.
Reference is also given to their place of origin, such as `` स्पेनी घोड़े, '' लकिन whether इस referred to one breed or several is unknown.
Another difficulty arising दौरान कोई पढ़ाई of मध्यकालीन documents or literature is the flexibility of the medieval languages, where several words can be used for one thing ( or, conversely, several objects are referred to by one word ).
Words such as ' courser ' and 'charger ' are used interchangeably ( even भीतर एक दस्तावेज़ ), और जहाँ एक epic may speak disparagingly of a rouncey, another praises its skill and swiftness.
Significant technological अग्रिम in घुड़सवार उपकरण, प्रायः introduced इससे अन्य संस्कृतियों, allowed for significant changes in both warfare and agriculture.
In particular, improved designs for the solid-treed काठी as खूब as the आगमन of the रकाब, नाल और घोड़ा कॉलर यहूद significant अग्रिम in medieval society.
Consequently, the assumptions and theories विकसित by इतिहासकारों हैं नहीं निर्णायक, और बहस स्टिल rages on अनेक मुद्दे, ऐसे as the breeding or size of the horse, and a number of sources must be consulted in order to understand the breadth of the subject.
The म्यूज़िक man is a musical with book, music, and lyrics by Meredith Willson, based on a story by Willson and Franklin Lacey.
The plot concerns con man Harold Hill, who poses as a boys ' band organizer and leader and sells band यंत्र और वर्दी to भोली townsfolk पहले skipping कस्बा साथ the cash.
In River City, Iowa, prim librarian and piano teacher Marian Paroo sees through him, but when Hill helps उसके younger bhai overcome उसके भय of सोशल interactions due to his lisp, Marian begins to fall in love with Harold.
Harold, in turn falling for marian, risks होने caught to win her.
In 1957, the show became a hit on Broadway, जीतना पाँच टोनी पुरस्कार, सहित Best Musical, and running for 1,375 performances.
The cast album won the first ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये `` बेहतरीन असली डाल एल्बम '' and was number one on the Billboard charts for 245 weeks.
The show 's success led to revivals and a लोकप्रिय 1962 फिल्मी अनुकूलन and a 2003 television remake.
It अक्सर is उत्पादित by both professional and amateur theater companies.
Surveyor 's व्हील
A surveyor 's wheel, also called a clickwheel, hodometer, waywiser, trundle व्हील, measuring wheel, or perambulator is a device for measuring distance.
Largest non-polar रेगिस्तान
Sand dunes in the rub ' al खली ( `` खाली quarter '' ) of Saudi Arabia.
Makhtesh रेमन, negev desert, Israel
A desert is a landscape or प्रदेश of जमीन कि is बहुत शुष्क क्युकी of कम वर्षा amounts ( वर्षण ), often has little coverage by plants, and in which streams dry up unless they are supplied by water from outside areas.
Deserts can also be described as क्षेत्रों जहाँ अधिक जल is खोया by evapotranspiration than falls as precipitation.
Desert plants must have special adaptations to जीवित साथ इस छोटी जल.
Deserts generally receive कम than 25 cm of बरसात ( वर्षण ) each year.
Semideserts or steppes are regions जिससे प्राप्त between and.
In the Köppen जलवायु वर्गीकरण प्रणाली, रेगिस्तान are classed as BWh ( hot desert ) or BWk ( temperate desert ).
In the thornthwaite जलवायु वर्गीकरण प्रणाली, रेगिस्तान would be classified as arid megathermal climates.
World War I ( WWI ) was a वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित in यूरोपीय कि began on 28 जुलाई 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from its occurrence until the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939, और the पहला संसार युद्ध or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम, फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but, as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement, Italy did not enter into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war : इटली, जापानी और the संयुक्त राज्य joined the allies, and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 million military personnel, including 60 लाख europeans, यहूद mobilised in एक of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely क्युकी of technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history, subsequently paving the way for various political changes, such as revolutions in अनेक of the nations involved.
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी नीतियों of the great powers of Europe.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke Franz फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया, the वारिस to the सिंहासन of austria-hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the पिछला दशकों यहूद invoked.
Within weeks, the प्रमुख शक्तियां यहूद at युद्ध और, via their colonies, the conflict soon spread around the world.
On 28 July, the austro-hungarians fired the पहला shots of the war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's घोषणा of war against Germany.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a स्थिर बैटल of अपघर्षण साथ a गर्त लकीर कि बदला little until 1917.
On the Eastern Front, the Russian army was successful against the Austro-Hungarians, but was रोका in इसके आक्रमण of ईस्ट prussia by the Germans.
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the युद्ध, खोलने up fronts in the Caucasus, Mesopotamia and the Sinai.
इटली और बुल्गारिया went to war in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in नवम्बर brought the russians to शर्तें साथ the सेंट्रल शक्तियां.
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front, the Allies drove back the Germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began प्रवेश the trenches.
Germany, which had its own trouble with क्रांतिकारियों, सहमत to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in विजय for the Allies.
कार्यक्रम on the घर fronts यहूद as उग्र as on the battle fronts, as the participants tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war.
By the end of the war, four major imperial powers—the German, Russian, austro-hungarian और उस्मानी empires—ceased to exist.
the successor राज्य of the पूर्व दो खोया a great amount of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of central Europe थी redrawn into several smaller states.
The League of Nations was formed in the hope of preventing another ऐसे विरोध.
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires, the repercussions of Germany 's defeat and problems with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II.
`` Girls Just Want to Have Fun '' is a 1979 song originally लिखा by रॉबर्ट Hazard and made famous by singer Cyndi Lauper.
It was the first major single released by Lauper as a solo artist and the lead-off single from her डेब्यू एल्बम वो 's so असामान्य.
Lauper’s संस्करण gained मान्यता as a feminist anthem and promoted by an award-winning video.
It has been covered on either an एल्बम or in सजीव कॉन्सर्ट by over 30 other artists.
The सिंगल थी lauper 's भेदन hit, reaching # 2 on the Billboard Hot 100 and becoming a worldwide hit throughout late 1983 and early 1984.
It remains one of lauper 's हस्ताक्षर गीतों और थी a widely लोकप्रिय song during the era of its release, the 1980s.
The `` Rolling Stone & MTV : '100 Greatest Pop Songs ' : 1-50 '', `` Rolling स्टोन : `` the 100 शीर्ष म्यूज़िक वीडियो '' '' और the `` vh1 : 100 महानतम वीडियो '' सूचियाँ क्रमित the song at # 22, # 39 and # 45, respectively.
The song received a Grammy Award nomination लिये रिकार्ड of the साल और बेहतरीन मादा Pop Vocal Performance.
View of defibrillator एलेक्ट्रोड स्थिति and placement.
Defibrillation is a आम उपचार लिये life-threatening cardiac dysrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, and pulseless ventricular tachycardia.
defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic dose of electrical energy to the affected heart with a device called a defibrillator.
This depolarizes a नाजुक द्रव्यमान of the दिल मांसपेशी, terminates the dysrhythmia, और allows सामान्य sinus rhythm to be reestablished by the body 's natural pacemaker, in the sinoatrial node of the heart.
Defibrillators can be external, transvenous, or implanted, depending on the प्रकार of यंत्र प्रयुक्त or needed.
Some external units, known as automated बाह्य defibrillators ( aeds ), automate the निदान of treatable लय, अर्थ that lay responders or bystanders are able to use them successfully with little, or in some cases no training at all.
The Cato Institute is an अमरीकी libertarian सोचो टैंक headquartered in वॉशिंगटन, D.C.
It was founded as the Charles Koch Foundation in 1974 by Murray Rothbard, Ed Crane and Charles Koch, अध्यक्ष of the फलक और मुख्य कार्यपालिका officer of the conglomerate Koch Industries, Inc..
In July 1976, the name थी बदला to the केटो Institute.
According to the 2011 वैश्विक go to सोचो टैंक अनुक्रमणिका, केटो is the 6th सबसे influential US based think tank, ranking 3rd in Economic Policy and 2nd in Social Policy.
The Institute 's stated mission is `` to increase the समझना of पब्लिक नीतियों आधारित on the सिद्धान्त of सीमित सरकारी, फ़्री markets, individual liberty, and peace.
The Institute will use the most effective means to originate, advocate, promote, and disseminate लागू नीति प्रस्ताव that create free, open, and civil societies in the United States and throughout the world. ''
Cato scholars were critical of George W. Bush 's Republican प्रशासन ( 2001–2009 ) on अनेक मुद्दे, सहित the इराकी युद्ध, सिविल लिबर्टीज, शिक्षा, agriculture, energy policy, and excessive government spending.
On other issues, they supported Bush administration initiatives, most notably स्वास्थ्य परवाह, सोशल सुरक्षा, वैश्विक वार्मिंग, tax policy, and immigration.
During the 2008 U.S. presidential election, Cato विद्वानों criticized दोनो major-party उम्मीदवार, John McCain and Barack Obama.
Cato has criticized President Obama 's stances on policy issues since उसके उद्घाटन, ऐसे as फिस्कल stimulus, healthcare सुधार, विदेशी नीति, और the युद्ध on दवाएँ, while supporting his stance on the repeal of Do n't Ask, Do n't Tell and liberal immigration policy.
ड्रैकुला is an 1897 गोथिक हॉरर novel by Irish author Bram Stoker.
Famous for introducing the character of the vampire Count Dracula, the novel tells the story of Dracula 's attempt to relocate इससे transylvania to इंग्लैण्ड, और the बैटल between ड्रैकुला और a छोटी group of men and women led by Professor Abraham Van Helsing.
Dracula has been assigned to many literary genres including पिशाच साहित्य, हॉरर fiction, the gothic novel and invasion literature.
The novel छू on विषयवस्तु ऐसे as the role of women in Victorian culture, sexual conventions, immigration, colonialism, and post-colonialism.
Although Stoker did not invent the vampire, he defined its modern form, and the novel has spawned numerous theatrical, film and टेलीविज़न interpretations.
Quidditch is a competitive sport in the wizarding world of the Harry Potter ब्रह्मांड, और is इससे the श्रेणी of children 's novels and movies.
It is an अत्यधिक अशिष्ट लकिन बहुत लोकप्रिय semi-contact खेल, played by wizards and witches.
Matches are played between two teams of seven players riding flying broomsticks, using चार गेंदें और छह elevated ring-shaped लक्ष्य, तीन on प्रत्येक पक्ष of the Quidditch pitch ( field ).
In the Harry Potter universe, Quidditch holds a fervent following समान to the स्थिति कि संघ फ़ुटबॉल holds as a globally popular sport.
The sport is monumental throughout the wizarding world.
Harry plays an महत्वपूर्ण स्थिति लिये उसके हाउस टोली at हॉग्वार्ट्स : he is the seeker and becomes the captain in his sixth year there.
क्षेत्रीय और अंतरराष्ट्रीय competitions are mentioned throughout the series.
In Goblet of Fire, Quidditch at हॉग्वार्ट्स is रद्द लिये the Tri-Wizard Tournament, but Harry and the Weasleys attend the Quidditch World Cup.
In addition, Harry uses his Quidditch skills to capture a golden egg from a dragon called the Hungarian Horntail ( in the पहला कार्य of the tri-wizard टूर्नामेंट ), to कैप्चर a उड़ती कुंजी in पारस 's स्टोन, और on दो कुंजी अवसरों in deathly hallows — getting थाम of ravenclaw 's Diadem, and during the final fight with Voldemort — the `` unerring skill of the Seeker '' is useful to him in snatching the Elder Wand out of the air.
Harry Potter has owned two broomsticks, the Nimbus 2000 and the firebolt, दोनो of जिससे हैं नष्ट by the series ' end.
The game has been adopted in the real world in the रूप of मगलू quidditch.
The United States Congress is the bicameral legislature of the संघीय सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य consisting of दो घरों : the निम्नतर हाउस known as the House of Representatives and the upper house known as the Senate.
कॉंग्रेस meets in the कैपिटल in Washington, D.C.
Both representatives and senators are chosen through सीधा चुनाव.
Congress has a total of 535 voting members : 435 members in the House of प्रतिनिधि और 100 सदस्यों in the सीनेट.
Members of the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि serve two-year terms representing the people of a district.
Congressional districts हैं apportioned to राज्य by जनसांख्यिकी using the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी results, each state in the union having at least one representative in the House of Representatives.
Regardless of population, each of the 50 states has दो सीनेटरों ; the 100 सीनेटरों प्रत्येक serve a six-year पद.
The terms are लड़खड़ाते so प्रत्येक दो सालो लगभग one-third of the Senate is up for election.
Each लड़खड़ाते समूह of one-third of the senators are called 'classes '.
No राज्य of the संयुक्त राज्य has two senators from the same class.
Most incumbents seek re-election, और उनके ऐतिहासिक likelihood of winning subsequent elections exceeds 90 percent.
In August 2012, a Gallup poll reported that Congress’s approval दरजा amongst अमेरिकी थी at 10 %, matching a 38-year low reached in November 2011.
`` A Little More Country Than That '' is the title of a song written by Joey + Rory 's Rory Lee Feek, Wynn Varble, and Don Poythress, और अंकित by अमरीकी देश कलाकार ईस्टन Corbin.
it थी released in अगस्त 2009 as कोर्बिन 's debut single and is included on his self-titled debut album.
In April 2010, the सोंग पहुँचे क्रमांक एक on the देश म्यूज़िक charts, making Corbin the first male solo artist in seven years to send a debut single to Number One.
It has been certified सुनहरा by the RIAA.
The BlackBerry is a line of wireless handheld devices and services designed and marketed by शोध in गति सीमित ( रिम ) ऑपरेटिंग as BlackBerry.
The first BlackBerry device, an email पेजर, थी released in 1999 ; the सबसे हाल ब्लैकबेरी डिवाइस, the Z10 and Q10, were announced on January 30, 2013.
The user interface varies by मॉडल ; सबसे विशेषता a शारीरिक क्वर्टी कुंजीपटल, जबकि नए generations have relied on a multi-touch screen and virtual keyboard.
A BlackBerry can shoot video, take photos, खेल म्यूज़िक, और perform ऑनलाइन functions such as web-browsing and emailing.
They can also send and receive push ईमेल और तत्काल संदेश जबकि maintaining a ऊँची level of security through on-device message encryption, and are designed to function as personal digital assistants.
BlackBerry devices support a large किस्में of तत्काल messaging सुविधाएँ, साथ the सबसे लोकप्रिय होने the मालिकाना BlackBerry Messenger service.
The BlackBerry PlayBook is a tablet computer offered by the कम्पनी.
The 100 millionth ब्लैकबेरी स्मार्टफोन थी shipped in जून क्वार्टर of 2010 and the 200 millionth smartphone was shipped in September quarter of 2012.
BlackBerry accounts for 3 % of मोबाईल यंत्र बिक्री विश्वव्यापी in 2011, बनाना इसके manufacturer the sixth most popular device maker ( 25 % of mobile device sales are smartphones ).
The consumer BlackBerry Internet Service is available in 91 देशों विश्वव्यापी on over 500 मोबाईल सेवा ऑपरेटर using various mobile technologies.
As of September 2012, there were eighty million सदस्य विश्वव्यापी to ब्लैकबेरी.
In 2011 the Caribbean और लैटिन अमेरिका था the उच्चतम penetrations of ब्लैकबेरी स्मार्टफ़ोन worldwide, with up to about 45 per cent in the region having a RIM device.
BlackBerry, iPhone, एंड्रॉइड, और खिड़कियाँ फोन are considered the four major smartphone brands.
BlackBerry is widely referred to as `` CrackBerry '' in the United राज्य, जिससे alludes to इसके excessive उपयोग by its owners and is a reference to the addictiveness of crack cocaine.
Use of the term CrackBerry became so फैली कि in नवम्बर 2006 वेबस्टर 's नई संसार कॉलेज Dictionary named `` crackberry '' the `` New Word of the Year. ''
An example of a माँग curve shifting.
The shift from D1 To D2 means an increase in demand with consequences लिये the अन्य परिवर्तनीय
In economics, the demand curve is the graph depicting the संबंध between the price of a certain commodity and the amount of it that consumers are willing and able to purchase at that given price.
It is a ग्राफिक प्रतिनिधित्व of a demand schedule.
The demand curve for all consumers together follows from the demand curve of every individual consumer : the व्यक्तिगत मांगे at प्रत्येक दाम हैं added साथ.
Demand curves are used to estimate behaviors in competitive markets, and are often combined with supply curves to estimate the equilibrium price ( the price at which sellers together are willing to sell the same amount as buyers together are willing to buy, also known as market clearing price ) and the equilibrium quantity ( the राशि of कि शुभ or सेवा कि होगा be उत्पादित और खरीदा बगैर surplus/excess सप्लाई or shortage/excess माँग ) of that market.
In a monopolistic market, the demand curve facing the monopolist is बस the मार्केट demand curve.
historia
by Nikolaos Gysis ( 1892 )
History ( from Greek - historia, meaning `` inquiry, knowledge acquired by छानबीन '' ) is an छतरियाँ पद कि relates to past events as well as the discovery, collection, organization, and presentation of information about these events.
The term includes cosmic, भूगर्भिक, और सशुल्क इतिहास, but is often generically implied to mean human history.
Scholars who लिखें परिचय इतिहास are called historians.
History can also refer to the academic discipline which uses a कथा to जाँचें और analyse a अनुक्रम of पास्ट कार्यक्रम, और objectively determine the पैटर्न of cause and effect that determine them.
Historians sometimes debate the nature of history and its usefulness by discussing the study of the discipline as an end in itself और as a रास्ता of providing `` परिप्रेक्ष्य '' on the समस्याएं of the present.
Stories common to a particular संस्कृति, लकिन नहीं समर्थित by बाह्य स्त्रोत ( ऐसे as the किस्से surrounding किंग आर्थर ) हैं प्रायः वर्गीकृत as cultural heritage or legends, because they do not support the `` disinterested investigation '' required of the discipline of history.
Events occurring prior to लिखा रिकार्ड हैं considered prehistory.
Herodotus, a 5th century B.C. Greek historian is considered within the Western परंपरा to be the `` पिता of इतिहास '', और, साथ साथ उसके समकालीन thucydides, helped form the foundations for the modern study of human history.
Their work continues to be read today and the divide between the culture-focused Herodotus and the military-focused thucydides remains a पाइंट of contention or approach in modern historical writing.
In the Eastern tradition, a state chronicle the Spring and Autumn Annals was known to be compiled from as early as 722 BCE हालांकि तभी 2nd सदी bce ग्रन्थ survived.
Ancient influences have helped spawn variant interpretations of the nature of history which have विकसित over the सदियां और continue to बदलें today.
The modern study of history is wide-ranging, and includes the study of विशिष्ट regions और the पढ़ाई of निश्चित topical or thematical elements of historical investigation.
Often history is taught as part of primary and secondary education, and the academic study of इतिहास is a प्रमुख अनुशासन in विश्वविद्यालयों अध्ययन.
Malcolm X ( ; May 19, 1925February 21, 1965 ), born Malcolm Little and also known as El-Hajj Malik el-shabazz ( ), थी an african-american मुस्लिम मंत्री और इंसान rights activist.
To his admirers, he was a साहसी एडवोकेट लिये the अधिकारों of अश्वेतों, a man who indicted white America in the harshest terms for its crimes against black Americans.
Detractors accused him of preaching racism, ब्लैक सर्वोच्चता, और हिंसा.
He has been called one of the greatest and most influential अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी in history.
Malcolm X 's father died—killed by white supremacists, it was rumored—when he थी यंग, और at तनिक एक of his uncles was lynched.
When he was 13, his mother was placed in a mental hospital, and he was लगाई in a श्रेणी of फोस्टर घरों.
In 1946, at age 20, he गई to थाना for breaking and entering.
in थाना, मैल्कम x became a member of the Nation of Islam ; after his parole in 1952, he quickly rose to become one of its leaders.
For a dozen years, Malcolm X was the पब्लिक फेस of the विवादास्पद समूह, लकिन मोहभंग साथ स्वदेश of islam सिर इलियास मुहम्मद led him to leave the Nation in March 1964.
After a period of travel in Africa and the मध्य ईस्ट, he लौटे to the संयुक्त राज्य, where he founded Muslim Mosque, Inc. and the Organization of Afro-American Unity.
In February 1965, less than a year after leaving the स्वदेश of islam, he थी assassinated by तीन सदस्यों of the group.
Malcolm X 's expressed मान्यताओं बदला substantially over time.
As a spokesman लिये the स्वदेश of islam he सिखाया ब्लैक सर्वोच्चता और advocated विरह of ब्लैक और श्वेत Americans —in contrast to the civil rights movement 's emphasis on integration.
After breaking with the Nation of Islam in 1964—saying of उसके संघ साथ it, `` i किया many things as a [ Black ] Muslim that I 'm sorry for now.
I was a zombie then... pointed in a certain direction and told to march '' —and becoming a Sunni Muslim, he disavowed जातिवाद और expressed willingness to कार्य साथ सिविल अधिकारों नेताओ, he जारी to emphasize pan-africanism, ब्लैक self-determination, and self-defense.
Henry Merritt `` Hank '' Paulson, jr. ( born कूच 28, 1946 ) is an अमरीकी banker who served as the 74th United States Secretary of the Treasury.
He had served as the Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Goldman Sachs, and is now chairman of the Paulson Institute, which he founded in 2011 to promote sustainable आर्थिक विकास और a क्लीनर पर्यावरण around the संसार, साथ an आरंभिक फ़ोकस on the United States and China.
A virtual machine ( VM ) is a software implemented abstraction of the underlying हार्डवेयर, जिससे is प्रस्तुत to the अनुप्रयोग layer of the system.
Virtual machines may be based on specifications of a hypothetical computer or emulate the कंप्यूटर वास्तुकला और कृत्यों of a real world computer.
Spiders ( order Araneae ) are air-breathing arthropods कि have आठ टाँगे और chelicerae with fangs that inject venom.
They are the largest order of arachnids और रैंक सातवाँ in कुल प्रजाति विविधता among all other groups of organisms.
Spiders are found worldwide on every continent except for Antarctica, and have become स्थापित in nearly प्रत्येक habitat with the exception of air and sea colonization.
As of 2008, at least 43,678 मकड़ी प्रजाति, और 109 परिवारों have महरूम अंकित by taxonomists ; however, वहीँ रै महरूम भ्रम भीतर the वैज्ञानिक जातियाँ as to कैसा all these families should be classified, as evidenced by the over 20 different classifications that have been proposed since 1900.
Anatomically, spiders differ from other arthropods in that the usual body खण्ड हैं fused into दो tagmata, the cephalothorax और उदर, and joined by a small, cylindrical pedicel.
Unlike insects, मकड़ियों do not have antennae.
In all except the most primitive group, the mesothelae, मकड़ियों have the सबसे centralized बेचैन प्रणालियों of सब arthropods, as all their ganglia are fused into one mass in the cephalothorax.
Unlike most arthropods, मकड़ियों have no extensor muscles in their limbs and instead extend them by hydraulic pressure.
Their abdomens bear appendages that have been परिवर्धित into spinnerets कि extrude रेशा इससे up to six types of silk glands within their abdomen.
Spider webs vary widely in आकार, आकार and the amount of sticky thread used.
It now appears that the spiral orb web may be one of the earliest forms, and spiders that उपज उलझे cobwebs हैं अधिक abundant और विविध than orb-web spiders.
Spider-like arachnids with silk-producing spigots appeared in the Devonian period about, but these animals जाहिर lacked spinnerets.
True spiders have महरूम मिला in carboniferous रॉक्स इससे, and are very similar to the most primitive surviving order, the Mesothelae.
The main groups of modern spiders, Mygalomorphae and Araneomorphae, पहला appeared in the triassic period, before.
A herbivorous species, Bagheera kiplingi, was described in 2008, लकिन सब अन्य ज्ञात प्रजाति हैं परभक्षी, ज़्यादातर preying on कीट और on अन्य मकड़ियों, हालांकि a few large species also take birds and lizards.
Spiders उपयोग a चौड़ी दायरा of रणनीति to कैप्चर शिकार : trapping it in स्टिकी webs, lassoing it with sticky bolas, mimicking the prey to avoid detection, or running it down.
सबसे detect शिकार मुख्यतः by संवेदन कंपन, लकिन the active hunters have acute vision, and hunters of the genus Portia show signs of intelligence in their choice of tactics and ability to develop new ones.
Spiders ' guts are too narrow to take solids, and they liquidize their food by flooding it with digestive enzymes and grinding it साथ the bases of उनके pedipalps, as वे do not have true jaws.
Male spiders पहचानो themselves by a variety of complex courtship rituals to avoid being eaten by the females.
Males of most species survive a few matings, limited mainly by उनके छोटी life spans.
महिलाओं बुनते रेशा egg-cases, प्रत्येक of which may contain hundreds of eggs.
Females of many species care for their young, for example by carrying उन्हें around or by sharing food with them.
A minority of species are social, building सांप्रदायिक webs कि may हाउस anywhere इससे a few to 50,000 individuals.
Social बर्ताव सीमाएँ इससे precarious toleration, as in the widow spiders, to co-operative hunting and food-sharing.
Although most spiders live for at most two years, tarantulas and अन्य mygalomorph मकड़ियों can सजीव up to 25 years in captivity.
While the venom of a few species is dangerous to इंसानो, वैज्ञानिकों हैं अभी researching the उपयोग of मकड़ी venom in medicine and as non-polluting pesticides.
Spider silk provides a combination of lightness, strength and elasticity that is superior to that of synthetic materials, and spider silk genes have been inserted into स्तनधारियों और पौधे to see if these can be used as silk factories.
As a result of their wide range of behaviors, spiders have become common symbols in art and mythology symbolizing विभिन्न combinations of patience, cruelty and creative powers.
Donna Marie Pinciotti ( Born February 13, 1960 ) is a fictional अक्षर and one of the two female leads in the Fox sitcom That '70s Show, appearing in all eight seasons.
Portrayed by लौरा prepon, Donna is the love interest to Eric Forman.
US county household मध्य income 2009.
Median us household income, 2001-2011
Household income is a measure commonly used by the संयुक्त राज्य सरकारी and private institutions.
Each household is measured by the आय of every resident over the age of 15.
Income includes wages and salaries, unemployment insurance, disability payments, child support payments received, regular rental receipts, as खूब as कोई निजी कारोबार, निवेश, or अन्य kinds of आय प्राप्त routinely.
While inflation-adjusted ( `` real '' ) household income had been increasing almost every साल इससे 1945 to 1999, it रै चूंकि महरूम flat and even decreased recently.
U.S. median household income fell from $ 51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011.
Extreme poverty in the United राज्य, अर्थ households जीना on कम than $ 2 प्रति दिन पहले सरकारी लाभ, doubled इससे 1996 to 1.5 million households in 2011, including 2.8 million children.
The निवासियों of the household do नहीं have to be सम्बन्धित to the सिर of the household for their earnings to be considered part of the household 's income.
As households tend to share a similar economic context, the use of household आय remains among the most widely accepted measures of income.
That the size of a household is not commonly taken into account in such measures may distort any analysis of fluctuations within or among the household आय श्रेणी, और may रेंडर सीधा comparisons between quintiles मुश्किल or भी impossible.
A registered agent, also known as a resident agent or statutory agent, in United States business law, is a business or individual designated to प्राप्त सेवा of प्रक्रम ( sop ) जब a कारोबार एंटिटी is a पार्टी in a legal action such as a lawsuit or summons.
the पंजीकृत एजेंट 's पता may भी be जहाँ the राज्य होगा send the paperwork for the yearly renewal of the business entity 's charter.
The registered agent for a business entity may be an व्यक्तिगत सदस्य of the कम्पनी, or ( अधिक often ) a third party, such as the organization 's lawyer or a service company.
Failure to properly maintain a पंजीकृत एजेंट can affect a company negatively.

`` Life, Liberty, and the pursuit of Happiness '' is a well-known phrase in the संयुक्त राज्य घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता.
The phrase is meant to exemplify the `` unalienable rights '' with जिससे सब इंसान beings हैं endowed by उनके निर्माता लिये उनके सुरक्षा of जिससे वे संस्थान governments.
Fencing, is typically विभाजित into ओलम्पिक fencing, Classical fencing and historical fencing,.
The sport of fencing ( commonly पुकारा ओलम्पिक तलवारबाजी or प्रतिस्पर्धी fencing ) is divided into three weapon categories : foil, sabre and épée.
Classical fencing uses the same three हथियार, लकिन approaches तलवारबाजी as a martial आर्ट.
Competitive Fencing is one of five sports which has been featured at every one of the modern ओलम्पिक खेल, the अन्य चार होने एथलेटिक्स, साइकिलिंग, Swimming, and Gymnastics.
The quadriceps femoris ( Latin for `` four-headed muscle of the femur `` ), also called simply the quadriceps, quadriceps extensor, quads, is a विशाल मांसपेशी समूह कि शामिल the four prevailing muscles on the front of the thigh.
It is the great extensor muscle of the घुटना, forming a विशाल मांसल द्रव्यमान जिससे कवर the front and sides of the femur.
The proper Latin plural form of the क्रियाशील quadriceps होता be quadricipites.
In modern English उपयोग, quadriceps is प्रयुक्त in दोनो एकवचन and plural.
The singular form quadricep, produced by hypercorrection, is अक्सर प्रयुक्त.
RMS Titanic was a British passenger liner that sank in the North Atlantic Ocean on 15 April 1912 after colliding साथ an हिमशैल दौरान उसके maiden voyage इससे southampton, UK to New York City, US.
The sinking of Titanic caused the deaths of 1,502 लोगों in एक of the deadliest peacetime maritime disasters in modern history.
The RMS टाइटैनिक थी the largest जलयान afloat at the time of her maiden voyage.
वो थी the दूसरी of तीन ओलम्पिक क्लास समंदर liners संचालित by the श्वेत स्टार Line, and she was built by the Harland and Wolff shipyard in Belfast with Thomas Andrews, who perished with the ship, as her naval architect.
On her maiden voyage, she carried 2,224 यात्री और क्रू.
Under the command of Edward Smith, her passengers शामिल कुछ of the wealthiest लोगों in the संसार, as खूब as सैंकड़ों of emigrants from Great Britain and Ireland, Scandinavia and elsewhere throughout Europe seeking a new life in North America.
The जलयान थी designed to be the पिछला शब्द in सुकून और लक्ज़री, with an on-board gymnasium, swimming pool, libraries, high-class restaurants and opulent cabins.
She also had a powerful wireless telegraph provided for the convenience of यात्री as खूब as लिये operational use.
Though she had advanced safety सुविधाएँ ऐसे as watertight compartments and remotely activated watertight doors, she lacked enough lifeboats to accommodate all of those aboard.
Because of outdated maritime safety regulations, she carried only enough lifeboats लिये 1,178 people—slightly अधिक than half of the number travelling on the maiden voyage, and one-third her total passenger and crew capacity.
After leaving Southampton on 10 April 1912, Titanic called at Cherbourg in France and Queenstown ( now cobh ) in आयरलैंड पहले heading westwards towards नई York.
On 14 April 1912, four days into the क्रासिंग और परिचय 375 मील ( 600 km ) south of Newfoundland, she hit an iceberg at 11:40 pm ship 's time.
The glancing collision caused Titanics hull plates to buckle inwards along her starboard side and opened पाँच of उसके सोलह watertight compartments to the sea ; the ship gradually filled with water.
Meanwhile, passengers और कुछ क्रू सदस्यों यहूद evacuated in lifeboats, अनेक of which were launched only partly loaded.
A disproportionate number of men were left aboard because of a `` women and children first `` protocol followed by some of the अधिकारियों लदान the lifeboats.
By 2:20 AM, she broke apart and foundered, साथ खूब over एक हजार people still aboard.
Just under two hours after the Titanic foundered, the Cunard liner RMS Carpathia arrived on the scene of the डूब, जहाँ she brought aboard an estimated 705 survivors.
The disaster was greeted साथ विश्वव्यापी शॉक और आक्रोश at the huge loss of life and the regulatory and operational failures that had led to it.
Public inquiries in Britain and the United States led to major improvements in मेरीटाइम सुरक्षा.
One of their most important legacies was the establishment in 1914 of the International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea ( solas ), जिससे स्टिल governs मेरीटाइम सुरक्षा today.
additionally, अनेक नई बेतार regulations were passed around the world in an effort to learn from the many missteps in wireless communications -- -which could have saved many more passengers.
Many of the survivors lost all of their money and possessions and were left destitute ; many families, विशेषकर those of क्रू सदस्यों इससे southampton, खोया उनके प्राथमिक bread-winners.
They were helped by an outpouring of public sympathy and charitable दान.
Some of the male survivors were accused of cowardice for leaving the ship while people were still on board ; the श्वेत स्टार लकीर 's अध्यक्ष, J. ब्रूस ismay, faced सोशल ostracism लिये the बाकी of his life.
The wreck of the Titanic remains on the seabed, split in दो और धीरे disintegrating at a गहराई of.
Since its discovery in 1985, हज़ारों of artefacts have महरूम बरामद और put on display at museums around the world.
Titanic has become one of the most famous ships in history, her memory kept alive by numerous books, लोक गीतों, films, दर्शाती, और memorials.
The human leg is the entire निम्नतर extremity or limb of the इंसान देह, सहित the foot, thigh and even the hip or gluteal region ; however, the precise definition in human anatomy refers only to the section of the lower limb extending from the knee to the ankle.
Legs are used for standing, walking, कूद, कार्यशील, kicking, और समान activities, and constitute a significant portion of a person 's mass.
This article is about the demographic features of the population of तुर्कों, सहित जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व, ethnicity, education level, health of the populace, economic status, religious affiliations and other aspects of the population.
As of 2010, the जनसांख्यिकी of तुर्कों is अनुमानित to be 73.7 million with a growth rate of 1.21 % per annum ( 2009 figure ).
The population is relatively young with 26.6 % गिरना in the 0-14 आयु bracket.

In the United States, the EPA uses the पद `` विशाल car '' to denote full-size cars.
Joel Grey ( born April 11, 1932 ) is an American stage and screen actor, सिंगर, और नर्तकी, ज्ञात लिये उसके भूमिका as the निपुण of Ceremonies in both the stage and film adaptation of the Kander & Ebb musical Cabaret.

James Madison, Jr. ( March 16, 1751 ( o.s. कूच 5 ) – जून 28, 1836 ) थी an American statesman and political theorist, the fourth President of the United States ( 1809–1817 ).
He is hailed as the “Father of the Constitution” for होने इंस्ट्रूमेंटल in the drafting of the United States Constitution and as the key champion and author of the United States Bill of Rights.
He served as a politician much of उसके वयस्क जीवन.
After the constitution had been drafted, मैडिसन became एक of the नेताओ in the movement to ratify it.
His collaboration with सिकंदर हैमिल्टन और जॉन jay उत्पादित the Federalist Papers ( 1788 ).
Circulated only in New York at the समय, वे होता बाद be माना among the most important polemics in support of the Constitution.
He was also a delegate to the वर्जिनिया संवैधानिक ratifying सम्मेलन, और थी इंस्ट्रूमेंटल to the successful ratification effort in Virginia.
Like most of his contemporaries, मैडिसन बदला उसके political views during his life.
During the drafting and ratification of the constitution, he favored a strong national government, though later he grew to favor stronger state governments, before settling between the two extremes late in his life.
In 1789, मैडिसन became a नेता in the नई House of Representatives, drafting many basic laws.
He is notable for drafting the first ten amendments to the संविधान, और यूँ is ज्ञात as the `` Father of the Bill of Rights ``.
Madison worked closely with President George वॉशिंगटन to व्यवस्थित the new federal government.
Breaking with Hamilton and what became the federalist पार्टी in 1791, मैडिसन और थामस जेफरसन व्यवस्थित कया वे पुकारा the Republican Party ( later called by historians the Democratic-Republican Party )
As Jefferson’s सचिव of राज्य ( 1801–1809 ), मैडिसन पर्यवेक्षित the Louisiana Purchase, which doubled the nation’s size.
After his election to the प्रेसिडेंसी, he presided over नवीनीकृत समृद्धि for several years.
As president ( 1809–17 ), after the failure of diplomatic protests and a trade embargo विरूद्ध ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, he led the nation into the War of 1812.
He was responding to British encroachments on American honor and rights ; in addition, he चाही to समाप्त the influence of the अंग्रेजों among उनके भारतीय allies, जिनकी प्रतिरोध blocked United States settlement in the Midwest around the Great Lakes.
Madison found the war to be an प्रशासनिक दुःस्वप्न, as the संयुक्त राज्य था neither a दमदार फौज nor financial system ; as a result, he afterward supported a stronger national government and a strong military, as well as the national bank, which he had long opposed.
Like other Virginia statesmen in the slave समाज, he थी a slaveholder जो inherited उसके वृक्षारोपण ज्ञात as montpelier, and owned hundreds of slaves during his lifetime to cultivate tobacco and other crops.
Madison supported the three-fifths compromise that allowed three-fifths of the enumerated जनसांख्यिकी of स्लेव to be counted for representation.
`` रोमन 's बदला '' is a सोंग performed by American rapper Nicki Minaj from her debut studio album Pink Friday.

Hydraulic द्रव होने poured.
Hydraulic fluids, also called hydraulic liquids, are the मीडियम by जिससे शक्ति is transferred in हाइड्रोलिक मशीनरी.
आम हाइड्रोलिक fluids हैं आधारित on mineral oil or water.
Examples of equipment that might use hydraulic fluids include excavators और backhoes, हाइड्रोलिक brakes, शक्ति परिचालन प्रणालियों, ट्रांसमिशन, कचरा trucks, aircraft flight control systems, lifts, and industrial machinery.
Hydraulic systems like the ones mentioned above will work most efficiently if the हाइड्रोलिक द्रव प्रयुक्त रै no compressibility
महिंद्रा ट्रैक्टर
Mahindra tractors, the फार्म उपकरण प्रभाग of महिंद्रा & महिंद्रा, builds and sources tractors that are sold worldwide across six continents.
Mahindra is also among the शीर्ष तीन ट्रैक्टर manufacturers in the world.
Mahindra has a विशाल उपभोक्ता आधार in इण्डिया, चीन and America and a growing base in Australia.
The company builds अधिक tractors in इण्डिया than any other manufacturer, and has the capacity to build 150,000 tractors a year.
In 1963, M & M formed a joint venture with अंतरराष्ट्रीय harvester to manufacture tractors carrying the महिंद्रा nameplate for the Indian market.
Armed with engineering, tooling and manufacturing know-how gained इससे इस संबंध, m & m विकसित its first tractor, the B-275.
Mahindra tractors साथ बिक्री of nearly 85,000 इकाई annually is one of the largest tractor companies in the world, and is number one in sales in India - the largest tractor market in the world.
To expand into the growing tractor market in China, Mahindra acquired बहुमत हिस्सेदारी in jiangling.
To raise awareness about Mahindra in the US, Mahindra USA announced its new sponsorship in the NASCAR Nationwide श्रेणी साथ r3 मोटरस्पोर्ट, जिससे is participating साथ a # 23 Mahindra Tractors Chevrolet.
The car will be driven by Robert Richardson, Jr. महिंद्रा यूएसए, inc. घोषित a 17-race प्राथमिक और 18-race संबद्ध प्रायोजन for the 2009 NASCAR Nationwide Series.
With इस प्रायोजन, Mahindra was the first Indian company to sponsor a car in NASCAR.
In 2008, Mahindra was a sponsor of the McDonald Motorsports टोली जिससे भागा the # 81 car in the NASCAR Nationwide Series.
The power6 is a माइक्रोप्रोसेसर developed by IBM that implemented the Power ISA v.2.03.
When it became available in systems in 2007, it succeeded the शक्ति5+ as ibm 's फ्लैगशिप शक्ति माइक्रोप्रोसेसर.
It is part of the eCLipz project, said to have a लक्ष्य of converging ibm 's सर्वर हार्डवेयर जहाँ practical ( hence `` ipz '' in the acronym : iSeries, pSeries, and zSeries ).
The American middle क्लास is a सोशल क्लास in the United States.
While the concept is typically ambiguous in popular opinion and common language use, समकालीन सोशल वैज्ञानिकों have put आगे अनेक, अधिक or कम congruent, theories on the American middle class.
depending on क्लास मॉडल प्रयुक्त, the मध्य class may constitute anywhere from 25 % to 66 % of households.
One of the first major studies of the middle class in America was White Collar : The American मध्य वर्ग, प्रकाशित in 1951 by समाजशास्त्री C. राइट wright_mills मिलों wright_mills.
Later sociologists such as Dennis Gilbert of Hamilton कॉलेज commonly divide the मध्य क्लास into two sub-groups.
Constituting roughly 15 % to 20 % of households is the upper or पेशेवर मध्य क्लास consisting of अत्यधिक शिक्षित, salaried professionals and managers.
Constituting roughly one third of households is the निम्नतर मध्य क्लास consisting ज़्यादातर of semi-professionals, skilled कारीगरों and lower-level management.
Middle-class persons commonly have a comfortable standard of living, significant economic security, considerable work स्वायत्तता और rely on उनके विशेषज्ञता to sustain themselves.
Members of the मध्य क्लास belong to diverse groups which overlap with each other.
Overall, middle-class persons, especially upper-middle-class individuals, are characterized by conceptualizing, बनाना और consulting.
Thus, college education is one of the प्रमुख indicators of middle-class status.
Largely attributed to the nature of middle-class occupations, middle class values tend to emphasize independence, adherence to मूलभूत मानकों, valuing नवीनता and respecting non-conformity.
Politically more active than other demographics, college educated मध्य क्लास पेशेवर हैं विभाजित between the दो प्रमुख पार्टियों.
Income varies considerably from near the नेशनल मध्य to खूब in excess of $ 100,000.
Household income figures, however, do not always reflect class status and standard of living, as they are largely influenced by the क्रमांक of आय earners और असफल to recognize household आकार.
It is therefore possible for a large, dual-earner, निम्नतर मध्य क्लास household to out-earn a small, one-earner, upper middle class household.
The middle classes are very influential, as वे encompass the बहुमत of मतदाता, लेखक, teachers, journalists, and editors.
Most societal trends in the US originate within the मध्य वर्ग.
the following is a सूची of Saturday Night Live cast members, past and present.
