तबाह इससे the 1906 सैन फ्रांसिस्को earthquake, remembered as one of the worst natural disasters in United States history
A disaster is a natural or man-made ( or technological ) hazard resulting in an event of substantial extent causing significant शारीरिक क्षति or destruction, loss of life, or drastic change to the environment.
A disaster can be ostensively पारिभाषित as कोई tragic इवेंट stemming इससे कार्यक्रम ऐसे as earthquakes, floods, catastrophic accidents, fires, or explosions.
It is a phenomenon that can cause damage to जीवन और प्रॉपर्टी और नष्ट the आर्थिक, सोशल और सांस्कृतिक life of people.
In समकालीन academia, आपदाओं हैं देखी as the consequence of inappropriately managed risk.
ये risks हैं the product of a combination of both hazard/s and vulnerability.
जोखिमों कि स्ट्राइक in क्षेत्रों साथ कम vulnerability will never become disasters, as is the case in uninhabited regions.
Developing countries suffer the greatest costs when a disaster hits – more than 95 percent of all deaths caused by आपदाओं occur in विकासशील देशों, और नुकसान due to प्राकृतिक आपदाओं are 20 times greater ( as a percentage of GDP ) in developing countries than in industrialized countries.
In computing, booting ( भी ज्ञात as booting up ) is the आरंभिक नियत of परिचालन कि a कंप्यूटर system performs when electrical power to the CPU is switched on.
The process begins when a कंप्यूटर is turned on लिये the पहला समय or is re-energized बाद होने turned बंद, और ends जब the कंप्यूटर is ready to perform its normal operations.
On modern general purpose computers, this can take tens of seconds and typically involves performing a power-on self-test, locating और initializing परिधीय डिवाइस, और तब ढूंढना, loading and starting an operating system.
अनेक कंप्यूटर प्रणालियों भी allow ये परिचालन to be initiated by a तन्त्र कमांड बगैर cycling power, in what is known as a soft reboot, though some of the initial operations might be skipped on a soft reboot.
A boot loader is a computer program that loads the main operating system or runtime environment for the कंप्यूटर बाद पूर्णता of the self-tests.
The computer term boot is short for बूटस्ट्रैप or बूटस्ट्रैप लोड और गर्भाशयी इससे the phrase to pull oneself up by one 's bootstraps.
The usage calls attention to the requirement that, if सबसे तन्त्र is loaded onto a कंप्यूटर by अन्य तन्त्र already running on the computer, some mechanism must exist to load initial software onto the computer.
Early computers used a variety of ad-hoc methods to get a small program into मेमोरी to solve इस प्रॉब्लम.
The invention of integrated circuit read-only मेमोरी ( rom ) of विभिन्न प्रकार हल इस विरोधाभास by allowing कंप्यूटर to be shipped with a start up program that could not be erased.
Growth in the capacity of ROM has अनुमत कभी अधिक elaborate start up procedures to be implemented.
On general purpose computers, the boot process begins with the execution of an initial program stored in बूट roms or पढ़ा in another फ़ैशन.
In some older computers, the initial program might have महरूम the अनुप्रयोग to run, if no operating system was used, or the operating system.
In other computers, the initial program is a boot loader that may then load into random-access memory ( RAM ), from nonvolatile secondary storage ( such as a hard disk drive ) or, in some older computers, from a medium such as punched ताश, punched टेप, or चुम्बकीय टेप in older computers, the binary code of an operating system or runtime environment and then execute it.
If the boot loader is limited in its size and capabilities, it may, बजाय, लोड a larger और अधिक capable secondary boot loader, which would then load the operating system or runtime environment.
Some embedded systems do not आवश्यकता a noticeable बूट अनुक्रम to begin functioning and when turned on may simply run operational programs that are stored in ROM.
Firebird is an खोलें सोर्स एसक्यूएल रिलेशनल डेटाबेस प्रबन्धन प्रणाली कि runs on Linux, Windows, and a variety of Unix.
The database forked from Borland 's open source संस्करण of interbase in 2000, but since Firebird 1.5 the code has been largely rewritten.
Outsourcing is the contracting आउट of an internal business process to a third-party organization.
The practice of contracting a business process out to a third party rather than staffing it internally is आम in the modern economy.
The term `` outsourcing '' became popular in the United States near the फेरे of the 21st सदी.
Outsourcing sometimes involves transferring कर्मचारी और एसेट from one firm to another, but not always.
the परिभाषा of आउटसोर्सिंग शामिल दोनो विदेशी and domestic contracting, and sometimes includes offshoring, which means relocating a business function to another country.
Financial savings from lower international labor rates is a बिग प्रेरणा लिये outsourcing/offshoring.
The विपरीत of आउटसोर्सिंग is पुकारा insourcing, जिससे entails bringing प्रक्रियाओं संभाला by third-party firms in-house, and is sometimes accomplished via vertical integration.
However, a कारोबार can provide a अनुबंध सेवा to another business without necessarily insourcing that business process.
Human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) is a lentivirus ( slowly replicating retrovirus ) that causes acquired immunodeficiency syndrome ( AIDS ), a condition in humans in which प्रगतिशील विफलता of the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली allows life-threatening opportunistic infections और cancers to thrive.
Infection with HIV occurs by the transfer of blood, semen, vaginal द्रव, pre-ejaculate, or स्तन milk.
भीतर ये bodily fluids, HIV is present as both free virus particles and virus within infected immune cells.
HIV infects vital cells in the human immune system such as helper t कोशिकाएं ( specifically cd4 + t कोशिकाएं ), macrophages, और dendritic cells.
HIV infection leads to low levels of CD4+ T cells through a number of mechanisms including : apoptosis of uninfected bystander कोशिकाएं, सीधा वाइरल हत्या of संक्रमित कोशिकाएं, और हत्या of संक्रमित CD4+ T cells by CD8 cytotoxic lymphocytes that recognize infected cells.
When CD4+ T cell numbers decline below a critical level, cell-mediated immunity is lost, and the body becomes progressively अधिक susceptible to opportunistic infections.
The firepole in a आग स्टेशन in Toronto
A fireman 's pole ( also called a sliding pole or firepole ) is a wooden pole or a metal tube or pipe installed between floors in fire स्टेशन, allowing अग्निशमन responding to an सचेतक to जल्दी descend to the मैदान मंजिल तेज़ than by using a standard staircase.
The device was invented in the 1870s by David Kenyon, in Chicago, Illinois, although it is often incorrectly credited to the बोस्टन आग Department.
Mary Poppins is the title character of a series of children 's किताबे written by P. L. Travers.
Throughout the Mary Poppins श्रेणी, जिससे lasted इससे 1934 to 1988, Mary Shepard was the illustrator and acted as a second author.
The books centre on a जादुई अंग्रेज़ी नैनी, मरियम Poppins.
She is blown by the East wind to Number Seventeen चेरी पेड़ लेन, लंदन, और into the Banks ' household to care for their children.
Encounters with chimney sweeps, shopkeepers and विभिन्न adventures follow जबतक मरियम poppins abruptly पत्ते, i.e., `` pops-out ''.
The adventures take place over a total of आठ किताबे.
However, only the पहला तीन किताबे विशेषता मरियम poppins arriving and leaving.
The later five books recount previously unrecorded adventures from her original three visits.
As P. L. Travers explains in her introduction to Mary Poppins in the पार्क, `` वो can नहीं forever arrive और निकलें. ''
The books were adapted in 1964 into a musical डिज़्नी फिल्मी अभिनीत जूली एंड्रयूज और Dick Van Dyke.
In 2004, Disney Theatrical produced a स्टेज musical adaptation in the West End theatre.
The stage musical थी transferred to ब्रॉडवे in 2006 where it ran until its closing on March 3, 2013.
It has been highly कामयाब, as थी the 1964 film.
The Last Song is a 2010 अमरीकी coming of आयु टीन रोमांटिक नाटक फिल्मी विकसित alongside Nicholas Sparks ' novel by the same name.
The film was directed by जूली ऐनी रॉबिन्सन in उसके विशेषता film directorial debut and co-written by Sparks and Jeff Van Wie.
The Last Song stars Miley Cyrus, Liam Hemsworth, and Greg Kinnear and follows a troubled teenager as वो reconnects साथ उसके estranged पिता और जलप्रपात in प्रेम दौरान a summer in a quiet Southern United States beach town.
The film is distributed by touchstone तस्वीरें.
Sparks was approached to write both the फिल्मी 's पटकथा और the novel.
Sparks completed the screenplay in जनवरी 2009, prior to the पूर्णता of the अनोखा, बनाना the पिछला सोंग उसके पहला script to be optioned for film.
The setting, originally in North Carolina like the novel, moved to Georgia after the राज्य था campaigned लिये महीने to मेजबान उत्पादन.
Upon beginning production in Tybee Island, जॉर्जिया और आसपास savannah, the पिछला सोंग became the first movie to be both shot and set in Tybee Island.
Filming lasted from June 15 to अगस्त 18, 2009 साथ much of it occurring on the island 's beach and pier.
The Last Song थी originally अनुसूचित लिये चौड़ी रिलीज on जनवरी 8, 2010, but was postponed to March 31, 2010.
लिखा Simlish
Simlish is a fictional भाषा प्रदर्शित in EA Games ' Sim series of games.
It debuted in SimCopter, and has been especially prominent in the सीम, the सीम 2 and The Sims 3.
The Sims development team created the अद्वितीय simlish भाषा by experimenting साथ fractured यूक्रेनी, French, Latin, Finnish, English, Fijian, Cebuano, and Tagalog.
Simlish can also be heard in SimCity 4, simcity समाजों और simcity 2013, but far less frequently.
Civilized Creatures in Spore can also be taught to बोलो simlish.
It is also प्रदर्शित to an extent in firaxis खेल ' सिड Meier 's SimGolf.
Designer Will Wright was conscious of the need लिये संवाद in the खेल, लकिन विचार कि using a रियल भाषा would make it sound too repetitive and would also be too costly to hire translators for world languages.
Initially, inspired by the Native American code talkers of संसार युद्ध ii, सीम निर्माता होगा राइट और भाषा विशेषज्ञ मार्क gimbel सुझाया experimenting with the Navajo language to create Simlish.
However, वे ultimately decided कि simlish worked बेहतरीन as a `` language '' made up of gibberish words that could n't be translated, so that its meaning would be left open to the imagination of the player.
Wright later commented that using `` nonsense भाषा '' turned आउट to be the सही विकास चुनाव, as लोगों were capable of imagining it more realistically than a computer could simulate a real one.
The actual sound of simlish थी निर्मित improvisationally by voice actors Stephen Kearin and Gerri Lawlor.
An example of अल्ट्रासोनिक परीक्षण ( UT ) on blade roots of a V2500 IAE aircraft engine.
Step 1 : The ut जांच is लगाई on the रूट of the ब्लेड to be inspected साथ the help of a special borescope tool ( video probe ).
कदम 2 : यंत्र जमावट are input.
Step 3 : The probe is scanned over the ब्लेड root.
In this case, an indication ( शिखर in the आंकड़ा ) through the red line ( or gate ) indicates a good blade ; an indication to the left of that range indicates a crack.
Principle of अल्ट्रासोनिक परीक्षण.
LEFT : A probe sends a ध्वनि वेव into a परीक्षण सामग्री.
There are two indications, one from the आरंभिक पल्स of the जांच, and the second due to the back wall echo.
RIGHT : a defect creates a तीसरा indication और simultaneously reduces the amplitude of the back wall indication.
The depth of the defect is determined by the अनुपात d/e
In ultrasonic testing ( UT ), very छोटी अल्ट्रासोनिक pulse-waves साथ बीच बारंबारता ranging इससे 0.1-15 mhz and occasionally up to 50 MHz are launched into materials to detect internal flaws or to characterize materials.
A common example is ultrasonic मोटाई मापन, जिससे परीक्षण the मोटाई of the test object, for example, to monitor pipework corrosion.
Ultrasonic testing is often performed on steel and other metals and alloys, though it can भी be प्रयुक्त on कंक्रीट, लकडी and composites, albeit with less resolution.
It is a form of non-destructive testing used in many industries including aerospace, ऑटोमोटिव और अन्य परिवहन सेक्टर.
The vas deferens ( plural : vasa deferentia ), also called ductus deferens ( Latin : `` carrying-away vessel '' ; plural : ductus deferentes ), is part of the male anatomy of many vertebrates ; वे हस्तांतरण शुक्राणु इससे the epididymis in पुट of ejaculation.
Vascular ischemia of the toes with characteristic cyanosis.
In medicine, ischemia, also spelled as ischaemia or ischæmia, ( ; इससे यूनानी भाषा ισχαιμία, ischaimía ; isch- रूट denoting a प्रतिबंध or thinning or to मेक or grow thin/lean, haema blood ) is a restriction in blood supply to tissues, causing a shortage of oxygen and glucose needed for cellular metabolism ( to keep tissue alive ).
Ischemia is generally caused by समस्याएं with blood vessels, with resultant damage to or dysfunction of tissue.
It also means local anemia in a given part of a देह sometimes resulting इससे जमघट ( such as vasoconstriction, thrombosis or embolism ).
Down syndrome ( DS ) or Down 's syndrome, also known as trisomy 21, is a जेनेटिक विकार caused by the उपस्थिति of सब or भाग of a तीसरा copy of chromosome 21.
Down syndrome is the most आम chromosome तबदीली in humans.
It is typically संबद्ध साथ a विलंब in संज्ञानात्मक क्षमता ( दिमागी retardation, or MR ) and physical growth, and a particular set of facial characteristics.
The औसत iq of यंग वयस्कों with Down syndrome is around 50, whereas young adults without the condition typically have an IQ of 100.
( MR has historically महरूम पारिभाषित as an IQ below 70. )
A large proportion of individuals with Down syndrome have a कठोर उपाधि of बौद्धिक विकलांगता.
Down सिंड्रोम is नामित बाद जॉन langdon bas, the अंग्रेजों physician who described the syndrome in 1866.
The कंडीशन थी clinically वर्णित पहले by जां Etienne Dominique Esquirol in 1838 and Edouard Seguin in 1844.
Down syndrome was identified as a chromosome 21 trisomy by dr. jérôme Lejeune in 1959.
Down syndrome can be identified in a baby at जनम or पहले जनम by prenatal screening.
Pregnancies with this निदान हैं प्रायः terminated.
The CDC estimates कि परिचय एक of प्रत्येक 691 शिशु born in the United States each year is born with Down syndrome.
Many children with Down syndrome are educated in regular school classes while अन्य आवश्यकता specialised शैक्षणिक सुविधाएं.
Some children graduate from high school, and, in the us, वहीँ हैं increasing अवसर for participating in post-secondary education.
Education and proper care has महरूम दिखाया to improve विशेषता of जीवन significantly.
Many adults साथ bas सिंड्रोम हैं समर्थ to कार्य at paid employment in the community, while others require a more sheltered work environment.
Hot flashes ( also known as hot flushes, or night sweats if they happen at night ) are a symptom which may have several other causes, लकिन जिससे is प्रायः caused by the बदलना हार्मोन स्तर कि हैं characteristic of रजोनिवृत्ति.
The Servicemen 's Readjustment Act of 1944 ( P.L. 78-346, 58 Stat. 284m ), known informally as the g.i. विधेयक, थी a विधि कि provided a दायरा of लाभ लिये returning संसार War II veterans ( commonly referred to as G.I.s ).
Benefits included low-cost mortgages, low-interest loans to start a business or फार्म, नकदी भुगतान of ट्यूशन और जीना खर्च to attend college, high school or vocational education, as well as one year of unemployment compensation.
It थी उपलब्धियाँ to प्रत्येक veteran who had been on active duty during the war years for at least ninety days and had not been dishonorably discharged ; combat was not required.
By the end of the program in 1956, roughly 2.2 million veterans had used the G.I. Bill education benefits in अनुक्रम to attend कॉलेजों or विश्वविद्यालयों, और an additional 6.6 million used these benefits for some kind of training program.
Since the original 1944 law, the term has come to include other veteran benefit programs created to assist दिग्गजों of subsequent युद्धों as खूब as peacetime service.
Historians and economists consider the g.i. विधेयक a प्रमुख राजनैतिक success—especially in कंट्रास्ट to the treatments of World War I veterans—and a major contribution to America 's stock of human capital that sped long-term economic growth.
The Watergate scandal was a political scandal that occurred in the United States in the 1970s as a result of the जून 17, 1972 break-in at the लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल कमेटी मुख्यालय at the वाटरगेट दफ्तर जटिल in वॉशिंगटन, d.C., और the Nixon administration 's attempted cover-up of its involvement.
The scandal eventually led to the इस्तीफा of रिचर्ड निक्सन, the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, on August 9, 1974 — the only resignation of a U.S. President.
The scandal also resulted in the indictment, विचारण, conviction, और incarceration of forty-three persons, dozens of whom were Nixon 's top administration officials.
the affair began साथ the गिरफ़्तार of five men for breaking and entering into the Democratic National Committee ( DNC ) headquarters at the Watergate complex on June 17, 1972.
The Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) connected cash found on the burglars to a slush fund used by the Committee for the Re-Election of the President, the आधिकारिक संगठन of निक्सन 's अभियान.
In July 1973, as evidence mounted against the president 's स्टाफ, सहित गवाही provided by पूर्व स्टाफ सदस्यों in an छानबीन conducted by the Senate Watergate Committee, it was revealed that President Nixon had a tape-recording system in his offices and he had recorded many conversations.
Recordings from these tapes implicated the president, revealing he had attempted to कवर up the questionable ( और illegal ) goings-on कि था लिया प्लेस दौरान उसके प्रशासन, दोनो पहले और after the break-in.
After a protracted series of bitter court battles, the U.S. Supreme Court unanimously ruled that the president था to हाथ over the टेपों to सरकारी जांचकर्ताओं ; he ultimately complied.
Facing near-certain impeachment in the House of Representatives और a दमदार सम्भावना of a conviction in the सीनेट, निक्सन resigned the presidency on August 9, 1974.
His successor, जेराल्ड घाट, तब issued a pardon to him.
Elizabeth Imogene Webber ( formerly Lansing and Spencer ) is a fictional अक्षर on the एबीसी दिन साबुन ओपेरा सामान्य हॉस्पिटल.
Elizabeth is the पोती of dr. स्टीव हार्डी ( John Beradino ), one of the originating core characters of the series.
Rebecca herbst originated the अक्षर on अगस्त 1, 1997 and has been the only contract actress to play the role.
Elizabeth is part of two supercouple pairings, Lucky Spencer and Elizabeth webber और जेसन मॉर्गन और एलिज़ाबेथ webber.
The United States प्रेसिडेंसी of रोनाल्ड reagan, भी ज्ञात as the reagan प्रशासन, थी a रिपब्लिकन administration headed by Ronald Reagan from January 20, 1981, to January 20, 1989.
Domestically, the administration favored reducing सरकारी कार्यक्रम और introduced the largest across-the-board tax cuts in American history.
The economic policies enacted in 1981, ज्ञात as `` reaganomics ``, यहूद an उदाहरण of supply-side economics.
reagan aimed to प्रोत्साहित उद्यमिता और सीमा the growth of social spending, as well as the reduction of regulation and inflation.
Economic growth देखी a दमदार रिकवरी in the 1980s, helping Reagan to win a landslide re-election.
The national debt increased significantly, however.
Regarding foreign policy, the administration was steadfastly anti-communist, कॉलिंग the सोवियत संघ an `` दुष्ट साम्राज्य `` और समाप्ति 1970s détente.
Reagan accelerated the massive buildup of the military started by his पूर्ववर्ती, सहित an आक्रमण of हरा, the पहला प्रमुख विदेशी कार्रवाई by u.S. सैनिकों चूंकि the समाप्त of the Vietnam War.
The `` Reagan Doctrine `` controversially granted aid to paramilitary forces seeking to overthrow communist governments, particularly in war-torn सेंट्रल अमेरिका और अफगानिस्तान.
Reagan also प्रचारित नई technologies ऐसे as मिसाइल रक्षा प्रणालियों in अनुक्रम to confront the Soviets and their allies.
In diplomacy, Reagan forged a strong alliance with UK Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher, and he met with सोवियत सामान्य सचिव मिखाइल गोर्बाचेव चार टाइम्स, aiming to shrink the superpowers ' nuclear arsenals.
Reagan 's presidency has been termed the `` Reagan Revolution '', or the Age of Reagan in recognition of the राजनैतिक realignment both within and beyond the U.S. in favor of his brand of conservatism and his faith in free markets.
The Reagan administration worked toward the पतन of सोवियत साम्यवादी, और it किया collapse just as he left office.
Victory in the Cold War led to a unipolar world साथ the u.S. as the संसार 's एकमात्र महाशक्ति.
While the damaging iran-contra affair engulfed अनेक reagan aides दौरान उसके दूसरी पद, reagan himself left office with a 63 percent approval rating, one of the higher approval ratings of departing presidents.
After years of unstinting praise from the right, and unrelenting आलोचना इससे the बाएँ, इतिहासकार दाउद हेनरी पाता कि by 2009 a सर्वसम्मति था उभरा among विद्वानों कि reagan revived कोसा और turned the स्वदेश to the सही by demonstrating a `` pragmatic conservatism '' that promoted ideology within the constraints imposed by the divided political system.
Furthermore, says Henry, the सर्वसम्मति viewpoint agrees कि he revived आस्था in the प्रेसिडेंसी and American self-confidence, and contributed critically to ending the Cold War.
Crude death रेट by देश ( 2006 ).
Mortality रेट is a माप of the क्रमांक of मौतों ( in general, or due to a specific cause ) in a population.
scaled to the आकार of that population, per unit of time.
Mortality rate is typically expressed in units of deaths per 1000 individuals per year ; thus, a mortality rate of 9.5 ( out of 1000 ) in a population of 1,000 होता औसत 9.5 मौतों प्रति साल in कि संपूर्ण जनसांख्यिकी, or 0.95 % out of the total.
It is distinct from morbidity रेट, जिससे refers to the क्रमांक of individuals in ग़रीब स्वास्थ्य दौरान a दिए समय काल ( the prevalence rate ) or the number of newly appearing cases of the disease per unit of time ( incidence rate ).
the पद `` मृत्यु `` is भी sometimes inappropriately प्रयुक्त to refer to the number of deaths among a set of diagnosed hospital cases for a disease or injury, rather than for the general population of a country or ethnic group.
This disease mortality statistic is अधिक precisely referred to as `` case fatality rate `` ( CFR ).
One distinguishes:
The crude death rate, the total number of deaths per year प्रति 1000 लोगों.
the crude death rate for the पूरे संसार is परिचय 8.37 प्रति 1000 प्रति साल according to the current CIA World Factbook.
The perinatal mortality rate, the sum of neonatal deaths and fetal मौतों ( stillbirths ) प्रति 1000 births.
The maternal mortality ratio, the number of maternal deaths per 100,000 सजीव births in वही समय period.
The maternal mortality rate, the number of मातृ मौतों प्रति 1,000 महिलाओं of reproductive age in the population ( generally defined as 15–44 years of age ).
The infant mortality rate, the number of मौतों of children कम than 1 साल old per 1000 live births.
The child mortality rate, the number of मौतों of children कम than 5 सालो बूढ़ा प्रति 1000 live births.
The standardised mortality ratio ( SMR ) - This represents a proportional comparison to the numbers of मौतों कि होता have महरूम अपेक्षित if the जनसांख्यिकी था महरूम of a मानक संयोजन in शर्तें of age, gender, etc.
The age-specific मृत्यु रेट ( asmr ) - इस refers to the कुल क्रमांक of मौतों per year per 1000 people of a given age ( e.g. age 62 last birthday ).
In regard to the or failure of medical treatment or प्रक्रियाओं, एक would also distinguish:
The early मृत्यु रेट, the कुल क्रमांक of मौतों in the early stages of an ongoing treatment, or in the period immediately following an treatment.
the लेट मृत्यु रेट, the कुल क्रमांक of मौतों in the late stages of an ongoing treatment, or a significant length of time after an acute treatment.
Note that the crude death rate as defined above and applied to a पूरे जनसांख्यिकी can दे a भ्रामक छाप.
The crude death rate depends on the age ( and gender ) specific mortality rates and the age ( and लिंग ) वितरण of the जनसांख्यिकी.
The number of deaths per 1000 people can be higher for developed nations than in less-developed countries, despite जीवन प्रत्याशा होने उच्चतर in developed countries due to standards of health being better.
This happens because developed देशों typically have a completely अलग जनसांख्यिकी आयु वितरण, with a much higher proportion of older people, due to both lower recent birth rates and lower mortality rates.
A more complete picture of mortality is given by a life table जिससे shows the मृत्यु रेट separately for each age.
A जीवन तालिका is जरुरी to give a good estimate of life expectancy.
An otoacoustic उत्सर्जन ( oae ) is a ध्वनि which is generated from within the inner ear.
Having been predicted by Thomas Gold in 1948, its existence was first demonstrated experimentally by David Kemp in 1978 and otoacoustic emissions have चूंकि महरूम दिखाया to उठता by a क्रमांक of different cellular mechanisms within the inner ear.
Studies have shown that OAEs disappear after the inner ear has been damaged, so OAEs are प्रायः प्रयुक्त in the प्रयोगशाला और the क्लिनिक as a measure of inner ear health.
Broadly बोलना, वहीँ हैं दो प्रकार of otoacoustic emissions : spontaneous otoacoustic emissions ( soaes ), जिससे can occur without external stimulation, and evoked otoacoustic emissions ( EOAEs ), which require an evoking stimulus.
Hurricane Tomas was the nineteenth named storm and twelfth hurricane of the 2010 अटलांटिक hurricane ऋतु.
Tomas developed from a तीव्र वेव ईस्ट of the windward आइलैंड्स on October 29.
Quickly intensifying into a hurricane, it moved through the Windward Islands and passed very निकट Saint Lucia.
After reaching Category 2 status on the Saffir-Simpson scale, Tomas जल्दी weakened to a तीव्र तूफ़ान in the सेंट्रल caribbean समुद्र, due to दमदार wind shear and dry air.
Tomas later regained hurricane औकात as it reorganized near the Windward passage.
Throughout the hurricane 's पाथ, 71 लोगों हैं ज्ञात to have been killed, 14 of whom were in Saint Lucia.
Monetary losses throughout the windward आइलैंड्स यहूद अनुमानित at us $ 588 million, mainly in Saint Lucia.
In the wake of the storm in हैती, बाढ़ intensified an जारी cholera outbreak indirectly causing more fatalities.
According to a report released in December 2010, 55 लोगों यहूद मारे in क्यूबा और hispanola, though the distribution of these fatalities are unknown.
Overall damage from the तूफ़ान थी at तनिक $ 741 million.
Victoria Jackson ( born August 2, 1959 ) is an American comedian, actress, satirist, singer and internet blogger बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a डाल सदस्य of the एनबीसी टेलीविज़न स्केच कॉमेडी श्रेणी शनिवार Night Live ( SNL ) from 1986 to 1992.
She has received attention as a गायन आलोचक of अध्यक्ष बराक ओबामा, and is an active participant in the Tea Party movement.
Postmodern literature is साहित्य characterized by भारी रिलायंस on तकनीकों जैसे fragmentation, विरोधाभास, और questionable narrators, and is often ( though not exclusively ) defined as a style or trend which emerged in the post–World War II era.
Postmodern works हैं देखी as a प्रतिक्रिया विरूद्ध आत्मज्ञान thinking and Modernist approaches to literature.
Postmodern literature, like postmodernism as a whole, tends to resist परिभाषा or वर्गीकरण as a `` गति ''.
Indeed, the अभिसरण of postmodern साहित्य साथ विभिन्न मोड्स of नाजुक सिद्धान्त, विशेषकर reader-response and deconstructionist approaches, and the subversions of the implicit contract between author, text and reader by which its works are often characterised, have led to pre-modern fictions such as Cervantes ' Don Quixote ( 1605,1615 ) and Laurence Sterne 's eighteenth-century satire Tristram Shandy being retrospectively inducted into the fold.
While there is little consensus on the precise characteristics, scope, and importance of postmodern literature, as is प्रायः the मामला साथ कलाकारी आंदोलनों, postmodern साहित्य is commonly defined in relation to a precursor.
For example, a postmodern साहित्यिक कार्य tends नहीं to conclude साथ the neatly tied-up ending as is often found in modernist literature, but often parodies it.
Postmodern authors tend to celebrate मौका over शिल्प, और further employ metafiction to undermine the writer 's authority.
Another characteristic of postmodern literature is the questioning of भेद between ऊँची और कम संस्कृति through the use of pastiche, the combination of subjects and genres not previously deemed fit for literature.
Enigma is an electronic musical प्रोजेक्ट संस्थापित in जर्मनी by माइकल cretu, दाउद Fairstein and Frank Peterson in 1990.
The Romanian-born Cretu conceived the Enigma project while working in Germany, but based his recording studio a.r.t. studios in ibiza, स्पेन, इससे the जल्दी 1990s जबतक may 2009, जहाँ he रै अंकित सब of पहेली 's स्टुडियो releases to date.
Cretu is both the composer and the निर्माता of the प्रोजेक्ट.
His former wife, pop सिंगर सैंड्रा, प्रायः provided vocals on Enigma tracks.
जेंस gad co-arranged और निभाई guitar on three of the Enigma albums.
Peter Cornelius also contributed to पहेली during the 1990s.
Seven studio albums have been उत्पादित अंतर्गत the नाम of the project.
Scooby-Doo is an American animated कार्टून मताधिकार, comprising several animated television series produced from 1969 to the present day.
The original series, scooby-doo, जहाँ हैं You !
, थी निर्मित लिये hanna-barbera प्रोडक्शन्स by writers Joe Ruby and Ken Spears in 1969.
This Saturday morning cartoon series featured four teenagers— Fred Jones, Daphne Blake, Velma Dinkley, and Norville `` Shaggy '' Rogers — and their talking brown Great Dane श्वान नामित scooby-doo, जो solve रहस्यों involving माना supernatural creatures through a series of antics and missteps.
Following the success of the original series, Hanna-Barbera and इसके successor warner ब्रदर्स. एनिमेशन have उत्पादित numerous follow-up और spin-off एनिमेटेड श्रेणी और अनेक सम्बन्धित works, सहित television specials and telefilms, a line of direct-to-video films, and two Warner Bros. –produced theatrical feature films.
Some versions of Scooby-Doo विशेषता अलग विसंगतियाँ on the दिखाएँ 's अलौकिक थीम, और शामिल वर्ण ऐसे as स्कूबी 's cousin Scooby-Dum and nephew Scrappy-Doo in addition to or instead of some of the original characters.
Scooby-Doo was originally ब्रॉडकास्ट on सीबीएस from 1969 to 1976, when it moved to ABC.
ABC aired the show जबतक canceling it in 1986, और प्रस्तुत a spin-off featuring the characters as children, A Pup Named Scooby-Doo, from 1988 until 1991.

and Shaggy and scooby-doo मिलेंगी a a सुराग ! ] ], aired as भाग of बच्चे wb on The WB network and its successor, The CW network, from 2002 until 2008.

Mystery incorporated, aired on कार्टून संजाल from 2010 to 2013.

Call of Duty is a first-person और third-person शूटर computer/ video game franchise.
the श्रेणी began on the pc, और बाद expanded to consoles and handhelds.
Several spin-off games have भी महरूम released.
The earlier games in the series are set primarily in World War II, this शामिल : कॉल of ड्यूटी, कॉल of ड्यूटी 2, और कॉल of ड्यूटी 3.
Beginning with Modern warfare, जिससे is set in modern times, the series has shifted focus away from World War II.
Call of Duty 4 : Modern Warfare ( released November 2007 ) was followed by Call of Duty : संसार at युद्ध और कॉल of ड्यूटी : Modern Warfare 2.
Black Ops ( released November 2010 ) takes place in the Cold War, while Modern Warfare 3 ( released नवम्बर 2011 ) takes place in the near-future setting.
Black Ops 2 ( released नवम्बर 13, 2012 ) takes place in the year 2025.
The Call of Duty games are published and owned by एक्टिविजन साथ aspyr मीडिया प्रकाशन it for Apple OS X.
While the studio Infinity Ward primarily still develops them, Treyarch has also developed several of the शीर्षक साथ the रिलीज of the studios ' खेल interlaced with each other.
Some games have been developed by Gray Matter Interactive, Spark Unlimited, विस्मित entertainment, n-space, विद्रोह developments, ideaworks खेल स्टुडियो, sledgehammer Games and nStigate Games.
The games use a variety of engines, सहित the id तकनीक 3, the treyarch ngl, और the IW 5.0.
Other products in the franchise include a line of action figures designed by plan-b खिलौने, a कार्ड खेल निर्मित by अपर डेक, और a कॉमिक book mini-series published by WildStorm.
as of नवम्बर 11, 2011, the कॉल of Duty series have sold over 100 million copies.

Over 1.6 billion hours of online gameplay have been logged आधुनिक warfare 3 since its 2011 release.
The estate tax in the United States is a tax imposed on the transfer of the `` taxable estate `` of a deceased person, whether such property is transferred via a होगा, according to the राज्य कानून of intestacy or वरना बना as an घटना of the मौत of the मालिक, ऐसे as a ट्रांसफ़र of प्रॉपर्टी इससे an intestate estate or trust, or the payment of certain life insurance benefits or financial account sums to beneficiaries.
The estate tax is one part of the एकीकृत तोहफा और एस्टेट कर प्रणाली in the United States.
The other part of the system, the gift tax, imposes a tax on हस्तांतरण of प्रॉपर्टी दौरान a व्यक्ति 's जीवन ; the तोहफा कर रोकता avoidance of the एस्टेट कर चाहिए a person want to give away his/her estate.
In addition to the federal government, many states also impose an estate tax, with the state version called either an एस्टेट कर or an inheritance tax.
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों of the एस्टेट कर कॉल it the `` death tax ''.
If an asset is left to a spouse or a federally पहचाना दान, the कर प्रायः does not apply.
In जोड, up to $ 5,250,000 can be दिए by an व्यक्तिगत, before and/or upon their death, without incurring federal gift or estate taxes.
Gavin मैकग्रेगर rossdale ( born 30 अक्तूबर 1967 ) is an अंग्रेज़ी कर्ता और संगीतकार, ज्ञात as the lead singer and rhythm guitarist of the rock band Bush.
Following Bush 's separation in 2002, which lasted for eight years, he was the lead सिंगर और guitarist लिये संस्थान, और later began a solo career.
When performing solo, गेविन plays गीतों इससे उसके extensive musical libraries.
Rossdale has been क्रमित in the शीर्ष 100 भारी Metal Vocalists by Hit Parader ( # 75 ).
Raffaello sanzio da urbino ( अप्रैल 6 or कूच 28, 1483 – अप्रैल 6, 1520 ), बेहतर known simply as Raphael, was an Italian painter and architect of the High Renaissance.
His work is admired for its clarity of form and आसानी of संयोजन और लिये इसके विज़ुअल उपलब्धि of the neoplatonic ideal of human grandeur.
Together with michelangelo और लियोनार्डो da विंची, he forms the traditional trinity of great masters of that period.
राफेल थी enormously उत्पादक, कार्यशील an unusually large workshop, and despite his death at 37, a large body of his work remains.
Many of his works are found in the Vatican Palace, where the frescoed राफेल कक्ष यहूद the सेंट्रल, और the largest, work of his career.
The best known work is The School of Athens in the वेटिकन stanza देला segnatura.
After his early years in Rome much of his work was self-designed, लकिन लिये the सबसे भाग चलाया by the कार्यशाला from his drawings, with considerable loss of quality.
He was extremely influential in उसके आजीवन, हालांकि बाहर Rome his work was mostly known from his collaborative printmaking.
After his death, the influence of उसके ग्रेट प्रतिद्वंद्वी michelangelo was more widespread until the 18th and 19th centuries, when Raphael 's more serene and harmonious qualities were again regarded as the highest models.
His career falls naturally into three phases and three styles, first described by Giorgio Vasari : his early years in Umbria, then a period of about four years ( from 1504–1508 ) absorbing the कलाकारी परंपराओं of Florence, followed by his last hectic and triumphant twelve years in Rome, working for two Popes and their close associates.
Julia फिओना रॉबर्ट्स ( born अक्तूबर 28, 1967 ) is an American actress.
She became a Hollywood star after headlining the romantic कॉमेडी pretty स्त्री ( 1990 ), जिससे grossed $ 464 million worldwide.
After receiving Golden Globe Awards and Academy Award nominations for Steel Magnolias ( 1989 ) and Pretty Woman, वो जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in Erin Brockovich ( 2000 ).
Her films The Pelican Brief ( 1993 ), My Best Friend 's Wedding ( 1997 ), Mystic Pizza ( 1988 ), Notting Hill ( 1999 ), Runaway Bride ( 1999 ), Ocean 's Eleven ( 2001 ), Ocean 's Twelve ( 2004 ), Charlie विल्सन 's युद्ध ( 2007 ), वेलेंटाइन 's दिन ( 2010 ), खा दुवा प्रेम ( 2010 ), और दर्पण दर्पण ( 2012 ) have collectively brought box office receipts of over $ 2.6 billion, making her one of the most successful actresses in terms of box office receipts.
Roberts had become one of the highest-paid अभिनेत्रियों in the संसार, टॉपिंग the हॉलीवुड पत्रकारों सालाना `` शक्ति list '' of top-earning female stars from 2005 to 2006.
Her शुल्क लिये 1990 's pretty स्त्री थी $ 300,000 ; in 2003, she was paid an unprecedented $ 25 million for her role in Mona Lisa Smile ( 2003 ).
As of 2010, Roberts 's जाल लायक थी अनुमानित to be $ 140 million.
Roberts has been named one of People magazine 's `` 50 सबसे खूबसूरत लोगों in the World '' eleven times, tied with Halle Berry.
In 2011, she was named one of the `` 100 hottest महिलाओं of all-time '' by मेन 's Health.
In 2001, महिलाओं घर जर्नल क्रमित उसके as the 11th most powerful woman in the United States.
Mark Elliot Zuckerberg ( born May 14, 1984 ) is an American computer प्रोग्रामर और अंतरजाल उद्योगों.
He is best known as one of five co-founders of the सोशल नेटवर्किंग website Facebook.
As of April 2013, Zuckerberg is the chairman and chief executive of Facebook, Inc. and in 2013 his personal wealth was अनुमानित to be us $ 13.3 billion.
Together with his college roommates and fellow Harvard University students Eduardo Saverin, Andrew mccollum, डस्टिन moskovitz और क्रिस ह्यूजेस, zuckerberg launched Facebook from Harvard 's dormitory rooms.
The group then introduced Facebook onto other campuses nationwide and moved to Palo Alto, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, संयुक्त राज्य ( u.S. ) shortly afterwards.
In 2007, at the age of twenty-three years, Zuckerberg became a billionaire as a result of Facebook और the क्रमांक of फेसबुक उपयोक्ता विश्वव्यापी पहुँचे a कुल of one billion in 2012.
Zuckerberg was involved in various legal disputes that were initiated by अन्य in the समूह, जो claimed a share of the company based upon their involvement during the development phase of Facebook.
Since 2010, Zuckerberg has been named among the 100 wealthiest and most influential people in the world by Time magazine as a part of its Person of the साल accolade.
Zuckerberg was played by actor Jesse Eisenberg in the 2010 हॉलीवुड फिल्मी the सोशल संजाल in which the rise of Facebook is portrayed.
The Mayflower was the ship that in 1620 transported 102 अंग्रेज़ी तीर्थयात्रियों, सहित a कोर समूह of separatists, to New England.
Their story is one of travail और अस्तित्व in a हर्ष नई संसार पर्यावरण.

कमेटी of तरीके और अर्थात् is the मुख्य कर -writing committee of the United States House of Representatives.
Members of the Ways and Means Committee are not allowed to serve on any other House Committees unless they apply for a waiver from उनके पार्टी 's congressional leadership.
The Committee has jurisdiction over all कराधान, tariffs और अन्य revenue-raising measures, as well as a number of other programs including:
सोशल सुरक्षा
बेरोजगारी लाभ
medicare
प्रवर्तन of child support laws
अस्थाई सहायता लिये मोहताज परिवारों, a federal welfare program
फोस्टर परवाह और अपनाना programs
The U.S. Constitution requires that all bills regarding taxation must originate in the हाउस of Representatives.
Since House procedure is that all bills regarding taxation must go through this committee, the कमेटी is बहुत influential, as is इसके सीनेट बंटवारा, the u.S. सीनेट कमेटी on वित्त.
The Ways and Means Committee in the 111th Congress was chaired by चार्ली rangel, जो था लिया a छोड़ of अनुपस्थिति as chairman until House ethics violations were resolved.
However, his leave of absence as chairman was शासित to be a इस्तीफा.
Pete स्टार्क resigned as एक्टिंग chairman, so Sander Levin held that position until the start of the 112th Congress.
Dave Camp became the committee कुर्सी लिये the 112th कॉंग्रेस, after the Republicans won control of the House in the 2010 election.
The blue whale ( Balaenoptera musculus ) is a marine mammal belonging to the suborder of baleen whales ( पुकारा mysticeti ).
At in length and or more in weight, it is the largest known animal to have ever existed.
Long and slender, the blue whale 's body can be various shades of bluish-grey dorsally और somewhat lighter underneath.
There are at least three distinct subspecies : B. m. musculus of the North Atlantic and उत्तर प्रशांत, B. m. intermedia of the दक्षिणी समंदर और B. m. brevicauda ( भी ज्ञात as the सानो ब्लू व्हेल ) मिला in the Indian Ocean and South Pacific Ocean.
B. m. indica, found in the भारतीय समंदर, may be another subspecies.
As with other baleen whales, its diet consists लगभग exclusively of छोटी crustaceans known as krill.
Blue whales were abundant in nearly all the oceans on Earth जबतक the शुरूआत of the twentieth century.
For over a century, they were hunted almost to extinction by whalers जबतक सुरक्षित by the international community in 1966.
A 2002 report estimated there were 5,000 to 12,000 blue whales विश्वव्यापी, स्तिथ in at तनिक पाँच समूह.
अधिक हाल शोध into the सानो subspecies suggests this may be an underestimate.
Before whaling, the largest जनसांख्यिकी थी in the अंटार्कटिक, numbering approximately 239,000 ( range 202,000 to 311,000 ).
There remain only much smaller ( around 2,000 ) एकाग्रता in प्रत्येक of the पूर्वी उत्तर Pacific, Antarctic, and Indian Ocean groups.
There are two more groups in the North अटलांटिक, और at तनिक दो in the Southern Hemisphere.
The globe artichoke ( Cynara cardunculus var. scolymus ) is a किस्में of a प्रजाति of thistle cultivated as a food.
The edible matter is buds that form within the flower heads पहले the पुष्प आइये into bloom.
The buds go away or change to a coarse, barely खाद्य रूप जब the पुष्प blooms.
The uncultivated or wild variety of the species is called a cardoon.
It is a perennial plant देशी to the भूमध्यसागरीय region.
The United States one hundred-dollar विधेयक ( $ 100 ) is a denomination of United States currency.
U.S. statesman, आविष्कारक, और राजनयिक बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन is currently featured on the obverse of the bill.
on the रिवर्स of the banknote is an image of Independence Hall.
The $ 100 bill is the largest denomination that has been printed since July 13, 1969, जब the denominations of $ 500, $ 1,000, $ 5,000, and $ 10,000 were retired.
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the average life of a $ 100 bill in परिसंचरण is 90 महीने ( 7.5 सालो ) पहले it is replaced due to wear and tear.
The bills are also commonly referred to as `` benjamins '', in सन्दर्भ to the उपयोग of Benjamin Franklin 's portrait on the denomination, or `` C-Notes '', based on the Roman numeral for 100.
The bill is one of two denominations printed today that does not feature a अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ; the अन्य is the $ 10 bill, featuring Alexander Hamilton.
The time on the clock of Independence Hall on the reverse, according to the u.S. ब्यूरो of नक्काशी और मुद्रण, shows approximately 4:10.
One hundred hundred-dollar बिल्स हैं वितरित by Federal Reserve Banks in mustard-colored straps ( $ 10,000 ).
The Series 2009 $ 100 bill redesign was unveiled on April 21, 2010, और थी to be जारी to the पब्लिक on फ़रवरी 11, 2011, लकिन उत्पादन थी shut down in December 2010 because as many as 30 % were unusable due to a manufacturing flaw.
A vertical crease in the paper reveals a रिक्त स्पेस on the विधेयक जब pulled out.
In their replacement, and continuing the high demand of this denomination, the श्रेणी 2006a थी शुभारम्भ retaining the पिछला design ( 1996-generation ).
On April 24, 2013, the संघीय आरक्षित घोषित the नई $ 100 विधेयक would enter circulation on October 8, 2013.

miniature इससे the Paris Psalter.
David ( ; ISO 259-3 Dawid ; ' ; Strong 's : Daveed ) according to the Hebrew Bible, was the second king of the United किंगडम of इसराईल, और according to the नई वसीयत gospels of मैथ्यू और ल्यूक, an पूर्वज of Jesus.
His life is conventionally dated to c. 1040–970 BCE, his reign over Judah c. 1010–1002 BCE, and his reign over the संयुक्त किंगडम of इसराईल c. 1002–970 BCE.
The Books of सैमुएल, 1 किंग्स, और 1 क्रॉनिकल्स हैं the तभी sources of information on David, although the Tel Dan stele ( dated c. 850–835 BCE ) contains the phrase ( bytdwd ), read as `` House of David '', which most scholars take as confirmation of the existence in the mid-9th century BCE of a Judean royal dynasty called the House of David.
He is depicted as a righteous king, although not without faults, as well as an acclaimed warrior, musician, और कवि, traditionally credited लिये composing अनेक of the ज़बूर contained in the Book of Psalms.
David is central to Jewish, Christian, और इस्लामी doctrine and culture.
Biblical परंपरा maintains कि a सीधा descendant of David will be the Messiah.
in islam he is माना to be a prophet and the king of a nation.
Kathmandu ( ; ) is the पूंजी और largest शहरी agglomerate of नेपाल.
The agglomerate consists of Kathmandu महानगर नगर at इसके कोर, और इसके सिस्टर cities Patan, Kirtipur, Thimi, and Bhaktapur.
It also includes the recently recognized urban areas of shankhapur, karyabinayak, और champapur.
Banepa, dhulikhel, और panauti हैं उपग्रह शहरी areas of Kathmandu located just outside the Kathmandu valley.
Kathmandu is also known informally as `` ktm '' or the `` tri-city ''.
According to a census conducted in 2011, Kathmandu metropolis अलोन रै 975,453 निवासियों ; और the agglomerate रै a population of more than 2.5 million inhabitants.
The metropolitan city area is और रै a जनसांख्यिकी density of 19,250 per km2.
The city stands at an उन्नयन of लगभग in the bowl-shaped काठमांडू Valley of central Nepal.
It is surrounded by four major mountains : Shivapuri, phulchoki, nagarjun, and Chandragiri.
Kathmandu Valley is part of three districts ( Kathmandu, Lalitpur, और भक्तपुर ), रै the उच्चतम जनसांख्यिकी density in the country, and is home to about a twelfth of Nepal 's population.
During Rana and Shah eras, the name `` Nepal '' referred only to the Kathmandu Valley ; it was what people who जिया बाहर the घाटी पुकारा it.
During this period, British historians called the घाटी itself `` नेपाल उचित ''.
Today, Kathmandu is not only the capital of the Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal, लकिन भी the मुख्यालय of the सेंट्रल विकास प्रदेश of Nepal.
the सेंट्रल प्रदेश comprises three zones : Bagmati, Narayani, and Janakpur.
काठमांडू is स्तिथ in the Bagmati Zone.
Kathmandu is the गेटवे to पर्यटन in Nepal.
It is भी the तंत्रिका center of the country 's economy.
It रै the सबसे उन्नत अवसंरचना of कोई शहरी क्षेत्रफल in नेपाल, and its economy is focused on tourism, which accounted for 3.8 % of Nepal 's GDP in 1995–96.
( Tourism in Kathmandu declined thereafter during a काल of राजनैतिक अशांति, लकिन चूंकि then has improved. )
The city has a समृद्ध इतिहास, spanning nearly 2000 years, as inferred from inscriptions found in the valley.
Religious and cultural festivities form a major part of the जीवनदान of लोगों residing in Kathmandu.
Most of Kathmandu 's people follow Hinduism और अनेक अन्य follow buddhism.
There are people of other religious beliefs as खूब, giving काठमांडू a कॉस्मोपॉलिटन संस्कृति.
नेपाली is the सबसे commonly spoken language in the city.
Nepal Bhasa is the indigenous language बोला by the Newar people.
Hindi is widely understood और अंग्रेज़ी is समझा by काठमांडू 's educated residents.
The city 's साक्षरता रेट is 98 %.
Kathmandu 's sister cities ( Lalitpur Patan ) and Bhaktapur are integral to Kathmandu 's cultural heritage, tourism industry, and economy ; therefore युनेस्को 's संसार विरासत साईट सूचियाँ सब तीन शहरों ' स्मारक और आकर्षण साथ अंतर्गत एक heading, `` काठमांडू valley- युनेस्को World Heritage Site ``.
Field hockey, usually referred to simply as hockey, is a team sport of the hockey परिवार जिससे is निभाई between दो टीमों of eleven players with hockey sticks and a hard, solid plastic ball.
At the turn of the 21st century, the game is played globally, साथ particular लोकप्रियता throughout यूरोपीय, एशिया, महासागरीय, और South America – in addition to being the national sport of Pakistan and India.
The term `` field hockey '' is used primarily in कनाडा, the संयुक्त राज्य, और अन्य regions of the world where the sport of ice hockey is more popular.
During play, goal keepers are the only खिलाड़ी जो हैं अनुमत to टच the बॉल साथ कोई भाग of उनके देह ( साथ the एक्सेप्शन of a खिलाड़ी 's हाथ माना 'part of the स्टिक ' ), with this only applying within the shooting circle ( also known as the D, or shooting arc, or just the circle ), while field players play the ball with the flat side of their stick.
The team that scores the सबसे लक्ष्य by the समाप्त of the मैच wins.
if the स्कोर is tied at the समाप्त of the खेल, either a चित्रण is घोषित or the game goes into extra time and/or a penalty shootout, depending on the competition 's format.
The governing body of hockey is the International Hockey Federation ( FIH ), with men and women being represented internationally in competitions including the Olympic खेल, राष्ट्रमंडल खेल, हॉकी संसार कप, champions ट्रॉफी और जूनियर हॉकी संसार कप, साथ अनेक देशों कार्यशील extensive junior, senior, and masters ' club competitions.
The FIH is भी जिम्मेदार लिये organising the हॉकी नियम Board and developing the rules for the sport.
A popular variant of field hockey is indoor hockey, which differs in a number of respects जबकि मूर्त the प्राथमिक सिद्धान्त of hockey.
Indoor hockey is a 6-a-side variant, साथ a फ़ील्ड जिससे is घटाया to लगभग 40m × 20m.
With अनेक of the नियम बाकी the वही, सहित रुकावट और फीट, वहीँ हैं अनेक कुंजी विसंगतियाँ - खिलाड़ी may नहीं उठाएँ the ball unless shooting on goal, players may not hit the ball ( instead utilising pushes to transfer the ball ), and the sidelines are replaced with solid barriers which the ball will rebound off.
ethan `` cane '' ashby ( né Atkinson ) is a fictional character from the American CBS soap opera The Young and the Restless.
He is portrayed by Australian actor Daniel Goddard, who originally auditioned लिये ब्रैड स्नाइडर on as the संसार turns लकिन थी अनुशंसित लिये a भूमिका on the यंग and the Restless instead.
The role was to be portrayed as an American, but Goddard 's ऑस्ट्रेलियाई descent बहकावे the अक्षर 's पृष्ठभूमि.
Former head writer Lynn Marie Latham introduced उसे दौरान the एपीसोड airing on जनवरी 12, 2007 as an Australian bartender in search of his family, a debut that received a mixed response.
Latham created Cane as the बेटे of फिलिप चांसलर ii ( donnelly rhodes ) और jill फोस्टर Abbott ( Jess Walton ) but the character 's background was rewritten by Maria Arena Bell in 2009, reestablishing him as the son of Colin and Genevieve Atkinson ( Tristan Rogers and Genie Francis ).
Though characterized as `` mysterious '', Cane is `` वफ़ादार और समर्पित '', जबकि गोडार्ड वर्णित the अक्षर as a `` ठेठ Australian, working-class kind of guy ''.
He थी the पहला सदस्य of the एटकिन्सन परिवार to appear on the series, followed by his parents and identical twin brother.
Soon after his debut, he became a leading अक्षर, a निर्णय praised by दर्शक and critics.
The character has been involved with Amber Moore ( Adrienne Frantz ), Chloe Mitchell ( Elizabeth Hendrickson ) and most notably लिली सर्दियों ( christel खलील ), a रोमांस कि garnered significant प्रशंसक attention.
In 2009, Cane and Lily were married ; Global BC would later call लिली the प्रेम of cane 's life.
The pair था दो children, चार्ली and Mattie Ashby.
In 2011, the actor was fired, and Cane was शॉट to मौत onscreen.
However, Goddard थी rehired जल्द बाद दर्शक campaigned लिये उसके वापसी, revealing that Cane 's identical twin brother was in fact the man who died.
This sacrificed his marriage to Lily, but the युगल यहूद remarried on वेलेंटाइन 's दिन in 2012.
Goddard has been widely acclaimed for his portrayal ; canyon न्यूज कहा कि he portrays the अक्षर honestly, and is `` always dependable, on fire and exciting ''.
John Christopher `` Johnny '' Depp II ( born June 9, 1963 ) is an अमरीकी कर्ता, फिल्मी निर्माता, and musician.
He has won the सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार and Screen Actors Guild award for Best Actor.
Depp rose to prominence on the 1980s television series 21 जम्प गली, बनने a टीन आइडल.
Dissatisfied with that status, Depp turned to film for more challenging roles ; he played the title character of the acclaimed Edward Scissorhands ( 1990 ) and later found box office कामयाबी in films ऐसे as sleepy खोखला ( 1999 ), चार्ली और the चॉकलेट फैक्टरी ( 2005 ), ऐलिस in वंडरलैंड ( 2010 ), Rango ( 2011 ) and the Pirates of the Caribbean film series ( 2003–present ).
He has collaborated with director and friend Tim Burton in आठ films ; the सबसे हाल होने अंधेरा साए ( 2012 ).
Depp has gained acclaim for his portrayals of such people as Ed Wood in Ed Wood, Joseph D. Pistone in Donnie Brasco, Hunter S. Thompson in भय और loathing in लास वेगास, जार्ज जंग in उड़ा, और the बैंको डाकू जॉन dillinger in माइकल मन 's पब्लिक Enemies.
films featuring Depp have grossed over $ 3.1 billion at the United States box office and over $ 7.6 billion worldwide.
He has been nominated for top awards many times, जीतना the बेहतरीन कर्ता पुरस्कार इससे the सुनहरी –_motion_picture_musical_or_comedy ग्लोब्स –_motion_picture_musical_or_comedy लिये स्वीनी Todd : The Demon Barber of Fleet Street and from the Screen Actors Guild for Pirates of the Caribbean : The Curse of the Black Pearl.
He also has garnered a sex प्रतीक status in American cinema, being twice named as the `` Sexiest Man Alive `` by People magazine in 2003 and 2009.
He रै महरूम सूचीबद्ध in the 2012 गिनीज किताब of World Records as the highest paid actor, with $ 75 million.
The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as www or w3, commonly ज्ञात as the वेब ), is a system of interlinked hypertext documents accessed via the Internet.
साथ a वेब ब्राउजर, एक can दृश्य वेब पृष्ठों कि may contain text, images, videos, and other multimedia, and navigate between them via hyperlinks.
Using concepts from his earlier hypertext systems like ENQUIRE, British engineer, computer scientist and at that time employee of the CERN, Sir Tim Berners-Lee, now Director of the संसार चौड़ी वेब consortium ( w3c ), लिखा a प्रस्ताव in कूच 1989 लिये कया would eventually become the World Wide Web.
At CERN, a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France and Switzerland, Berners-Lee and Belgian computer scientist रॉबर्ट cailliau प्रस्तावित in 1990 to उपयोग हाइपरटेक्स्ट `` to कड़ी और अभिगम सूचना of विभिन्न kinds as a वेब of नोड in which the user can browse at will '', and they publicly introduced the project in December of the same year.
Mark Travis John Sanchez ( born November 11, 1986 ) is an American football quarterback for the New York jets of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ).
He was drafted in the first round of the 2009 एनएफएल ड्राफ्ट as the पांचवां overall चयन by the jets और the second quarterback taken overall.
He played college football at the विश्वविद्यालयों of दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया ( USC ).
Sanchez grew up in a well-disciplined and athletic family.
In the eighth grade, he began to play football and learn the intricacies of the क्वार्टरबैक स्थिति, प्रशिक्षण साथ उसके पिता, Nick.
A well-regarded prospect, Sanchez committed to Southern California following his successful high school करियर in जिससे he led उसके टोली to a चैंपियनशिप title during his final season.
At USC, Sanchez was relegated as the backup quarterback during his first three years though he rose to prominence due to his brief appearances on the फ़ील्ड in 2007 due to चोटों suffered by starting क्वार्टरबैक जॉन दाउद Booty.
Sanchez also became popular भीतर the जातियाँ due to उसके mexican-american heritage.
Named the starter in 2008, Sanchez led यूएससी to a 12–1 रिकार्ड और जीती the Rose Bowl against Penn State for which Sanchez was awarded the Most Valuable Player award for his performance on offense.
Although many considered him too अनुभवहीन, सांचेज़ घोषित his intention to enter the 2009 NFL Draft.
He was selected by the Jets after they traded up with the Cleveland भूरा, और थी नामित the starting क्वार्टरबैक prior to the प्रारंभ of the season.
Despite a subpar performance, Sanchez led the Jets to the AFC Championship Game, a losing effort to the Indianapolis Colts, becoming the fourth रुकी क्वार्टरबैक in एनएफएल इतिहास to जीत उसके पहला playoff खेल और the second to win two playoff games.
In his second season, Sanchez continued to develop and led the Jets to the playoffs and the टोली 's दूसरी लगातार afc चैंपियनशिप खेल जहाँ वे narrowly खोया to the पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स, 24–19.
With the win over the New इंग्लैण्ड देशप्रेमी the सप्ताह prior, सांचेज़ tied चार अन्य quarterbacks for the second most post-season road victories by a quarterback in NFL history.
In leading the Jets to two consecutive conference championships, सांचेज़ joined क्वार्टरबैक बेन roethlisberger as the तभी दो quarterbacks in NFL history to reach the conference championship in their first two seasons in the league.
The next two seasons would be a regression for दोनो the टोली और सांचेज़ as वे विफल to पहुँचें the playoffs.
प्रशंसक और मीडिया आलोचकों पुकारा for a struggling Sanchez to be benched.
He eventually was replaced towards the end of the 2012 ऋतु साथ ग्रेग mcelroy.
Paul Avery ( April 2, 1934December 10, 2000 ) was an अमरीकी पुलिस रिपोर्टर, बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके कहानियां on the infamous serial killer known as the Zodiac, and later for his work on the Patricia Hearst kidnapping.
A small submersible AC sump pump साथ a गार्डन नली connector
A sump pump is a pump used to remove जल कि रै संचित in a जल collecting sump basin, commonly found in the basement of homes.
The water may enter via the perimeter drains of a basement waterproofing system, funneling into the जलाशय or क्युकी of बरसात or प्राकृतिक मैदान जल, if the तहखाने is नीचे the water table level.
Sump pumps are used where basement flooding happens regularly और to उपाय dampness जहाँ the जल तालिका is ऊपर the foundation of a home.
Sump pumps send water दूर इससे a हाउस to कोई प्लेस जहाँ it is no longer समस्यापूर्ण, such as a municipal storm drain or a dry well.
Pumps may discharge to the sanitary sewer in पुरानी संस्थापना.
Once considered acceptable, this practice may now violate the plumbing कोड or नगरपालिका bylaws, because it can overwhelm the municipal sewage treatment system.
Municipalities urge homeowners to disconnect और reroute sump पंप discharge away from sanitary sewers.
जुर्माना may be imposed for noncompliance.
Many homeowners have inherited their sump pump configurations और do नहीं एहसास कि the पंप discharges to the सीवर.
If the discharge is fed to a laundry डूबना in the तहखाने, it 's likely going to the sewer.
Usually hardwired into a घर 's विद्युत प्रणाली, sump pumps may have a battery backup.
The home 's pressurized जल सप्लाई शक्तियां कुछ पंपों, eliminating the need लिये विद्युत at the expense of using potable water, potentially making them more expensive to operate than electrical pumps and creating an additional water disposal problem.
Since a sump basin may overflow if not constantly pumped, a backup system is important for मामले जब the प्रमुख शक्ति is आउट लिये prolonged अवधि of समय, as during a severe storm.
There are generally two types of sump pumps — pedestal और submersible.
The pedestal पंप 's motor is mounted above the sump, where it is more easily serviced, but is also more conspicuous.
The pump impeller is चलित by a long, लंबवत extension shaft and the impeller is in a scroll housing in the base of the pump.
The submersible pump is entirely आरोहित अंदर the sump, और is specially sealed to prevent electrical short circuits.
Sump pump systems are also utilized in industrial and commercial अनुप्रयोग to कंट्रोल जल तालिका -सुनानाd problems in surface soil.
An artesian aquifer or periodic high water table situation can कारण the मैदान to become unstable due to water saturation.
As long as the पंप कृत्यों, the सतह soil will remain stable.
These sumps are typically ten फीट in गहराई or अधिक ; lined साथ corrugated metal pipe that contains perforations or drain holes throughout.
They may include electronic control systems with visual और audible सचेतक और हैं प्रायः covered to prevent मलबा और पशु from falling in.
Bleeding Kansas, Bloody Kansas or the Border War, was a series of violent political confrontations involving anti-slavery Free-Staters and pro-slavery `` किनारा ruffian `` तत्व, कि took प्लेस in the कान्सास territory और the neighboring towns of Missouri between 1854 and 1861.
At the heart of the conflict was the question of whether Kansas would enter the संघ as a फ़्री राज्य or स्लेव राज्य.
As such, Bleeding Kansas was a proxy war between Northerners and southerners over the समस्या of slavery in the United States.
The term `` Bleeding Kansas '' was coined by Horace Greeley of the New York Tribune ; the events it encompasses सीधे presaged the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध.
Congress had long struggled to संतुलन the रूचि of pro-slavery forces and anti-slavery forces.
The events later known as Bleeding Kansas यहूद नियत into गति by the kansas–nebraska अधिनियम of 1854, जिससे nullified the Missouri Compromise and instead implemented the concept of popular sovereignty.
An ostensibly democratic idea, popular sovereignty stated that the inhabitants of each territory or state should decide whether it होता be a फ़्री or स्लेव राज्य ; however, इस resulted in आव्रजन en masse to Kansas by activists from both sides.
At one point, कान्सास था दो पृथक सरकारें, प्रत्येक with its own constitution, although only one was federally recognized.
On January 29, 1861, कान्सास थी admitted to the Union as a free state, less than three months before the Battle of Fort Sumter which began the Civil War.
Benzene is an organic रासायनिक यौगिक साथ the आणविक formula C6 H|Hydrogen|H6.
Its molecule is composed of 6 carbon atoms joined in a ring, with 1 हाइड्रोजन अणु संलग्न to each carbon atom.
Because its molecules contain only कार्बन और हाइड्रोजन अणु, बेंजीन is classed as a hydrocarbon.
Benzene is a प्राकृतिक constituent of crude oil, and is one of the most basic petrochemicals.
Benzene is an aromatic hydrocarbon and the second [ n ] - annulene ( [ 6 ] -annulene ), a चक्रीय हाइड्रोकार्बन साथ a निरन्तर pi bond.
It is sometimes abbreviated Ph –H. Benzene is a colorless और अत्यधिक ज्वलनशील द्रव साथ a sweet smell.
It is mainly used as a precursor to heavy chemicals, such as ethylbenzene and cumene, which हैं उत्पादित on a अरब किलोग्राम स्केल.
क्युकी it रै a ऊँची ऑक्टेन क्रमांक, it is an important component of gasoline, composing a few percent of its mass.
Most non-industrial applications have been सीमित by बेंजीन 's carcinogenicity.
giovanni virginio स्क्यापारेल्ली ( ; 14 March 1835 – 4 July 1910 ) was an Italian astronomer and science historian.
Wii homebrew refers to the reuse of निन्टेंडो 's वी खेल कंसोल to run software that has not been authorized by Nintendo.
It achieves this by defeating the Wii 's copy protection और कोड हस्ताक्षर उपायों.
In more general terms, Wii Homebrew refers to the उपयोग of the वी 's हार्डवेयर, accessories और तन्त्र for purposes outside those intended by the manufacturer.
Original efforts focused on using the Wii Remote as a इंगित यंत्र on अन्य ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों, or कार्यशील web-based games in the built-in web browser.
Subsequent developments in games exploits, such as the `` Twilight hack ``, `` Bannerbomb '' and its later incarnation `` LetterBomb '', `` Smash Stack '', `` इंडियाना pwns '', `` yu-gi-owned '', `` bathaxx '', और `` वापसी of the jodi '', बना installing the `` Homebrew Channel `` possible.
Hadley ( right ) discussing the 2006 israel-lebanon संकट साथ बुश and Rice.
Stephen John Hadley ( born February 13, 1947 ) was the 21st u.S. सहायक to the अध्यक्ष लिये नेशनल सुरक्षा अफेयर्स ( commonly referred as National Security Advisor ), serving under President George W. Bush.
Take identical growing plants and give उर्वरक to हाफ of them.
If वहीँ हैं मतभेद between the निषेचित plant group and the unfertilized `` control '' group, these differences may be due to the fertilizer.
A scientific control is an प्रयोग or अवलोकन designed to minimize the effects of variables other than the single independent variable.
This increases the reliability of the results, often through a तुलना between control measurements and the other measurements.
Scientific controls are a part of the वैज्ञानिक विधि.
For example, during drug testing, scientists will try to कंट्रोल दो समूह to रखना उन्हें as एकसमान as संभावित, then allow one group to try the drug.
Another example might be testing plant fertilizer by giving it to only half the plants in a गार्डन : the पौधे कि प्राप्त no उर्वरक हैं the कंट्रोल group, because they establish the baseline level of growth that the fertilizer-treated plants will be compared against.
Without a control group, the experiment can not determine whether the fertilizer-treated पौधे grow अधिक than they would have if untreated.
Ideally, all variables in an experiment will be controlled ( accounted लिये by the कंट्रोल माप ) और none होगा be uncontrolled.
In such an experiment, if all the controls work as अपेक्षित, it is संभावित to conclude कि the प्रयोग is working as intended और कि the results of the experiment are due to the effect of the variable being tested.
That is, scientific controls allow an investigator to मेक a अर्जी जैसे `` दो परिस्थितियों यहूद एकसमान जबतक factor X occurred.
चूंकि फ़ैक्टर x is the तभी अंतर between the two situations, the new outcome was caused by factor X. ''

John Adams ( October 30, 1735 ( o.s. अक्तूबर 19, 1735 ) – जुलाई 4, 1826 ) was the second president of the United States ( 1797–1801 ), having earlier served as the first vice president of the United States.
An American Founding Father, he was a statesman, diplomat, and a leading advocate of American स्वतंत्रता from Great Britain.
Well शिक्षित, he थी an आत्मज्ञान राजनैतिक theorist जो प्रचारित republicanism और लिखा prolifically परिचय उसके प्रायः seminal ideas, both in published works and in letters to his wife and key adviser Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers.
Adams came to prominence in the early stages of the अमरीकी क्रान्ति.
A lawyer और पब्लिक फिगर in बोस्टन, as a प्रतिनिधि इससे मैसाचुसेट्स to the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस, he played a leading role in persuading Congress to declare independence.
He assisted Thomas Jefferson in drafting the Declaration of स्वतंत्रता in 1776, और थी इसके प्राथमिक advocate in the Congress.
Later, as a diplomat in यूरोपीय, he helped negotiate the eventual सलाम सन्धि साथ ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, और थी जिम्मेदार for obtaining vital governmental loans from Amsterdam bankers.
A political theorist और इतिहासकार, एडम्स largely लिखा the मैसाचुसेट्स संविधान in 1780, जिससे साथ with his earlier Thoughts on Government, influenced American political thought.
One of his महानतम भूमिकाएँ थी as a न्यायधीश of अक्षर : in 1775, he मनोनीत जार्ज Washington to be commander-in-chief, and 25 years later nominated John Marshall to be Chief Justice of the United States.
Adams ' revolutionary credentials secured him two terms as George Washington 's vice president and उसके अपना चुनाव in 1796 as the दूसरी अध्यक्ष.
During his one term, he encountered ferocious attacks by the jeffersonian republicans, as खूब as the प्रबल गुट in उसके अपना Federalist Party led by his bitter enemy Alexander Hamilton.
Adams हस्ताक्षरित the विवादास्पद एलियन और राजद्रोह अधिनियमों, और निर्मित up the army and navy especially in the face of an undeclared naval war ( called the `` Quasi-War `` ) with France, 1798–1800.
The major accomplishment of his presidency was उसके शांतिपूर्ण रेज़ोल्यूशन of the conflict in the face of Hamilton 's opposition.
In 1800, एडम्स थी पराजित for re-election by Thomas Jefferson and retired to Massachusetts.
He later resumed उसके दोस्ती with Jefferson.
He and his wife, Abigail Adams, founded an accomplished family line of राजनेता, राजनयिकों, और इतिहासकारों अभी referred to as the Adams political family.
Adams was the father of John Quincy Adams, the sixth अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States.
His achievements have received greater recognition in modern times, though उसके योगदान यहूद नहीं initially as मनाये as those of other Founders.
एडम्स थी the पहला u.S. अध्यक्ष to reside in the building that eventually became known as the White House.
a वाट steam engine.
The steam engine, fuelled primarily by coal, propelled the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति in ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और the world.
The Industrial Revolution was the transition to new manufacturing प्रक्रियाओं कि occurred in the काल इससे परिचय 1760 to कुछ समय between 1820 and 1840.
This transition included going from hand production methods to मशीने, नई रासायनिक निर्माण और आयरन उत्पादन प्रक्रियाओं, improved efficiency of water power, the increasing use of steam power and development of machine tools.
The परिवर्तन भी शामिल the change from wood and other bio-fuels to coal.
The Industrial revolution began in Britain और भीतर a few दशकों स्प्रेड to पश्चिमी यूरोपीय and the United States.
The Industrial Revolution marks a major turning पाइंट in इतिहास ; लगभग प्रत्येक पहलू of daily life was influenced in some way.
Most notably, औसत आय और जनसांख्यिकी began to exhibit unprecedented sustained growth.
In the words of Nobel Prize winner Robert E. Lucas, Jr., `` For the first time in history, the living standards of the masses of ordinary लोगों have begun to undergo sustained विकास... nothing remotely जैसे इस आर्थिक बर्ताव is उल्लेखित by the शास्त्रीय अर्थशास्त्रियों, भी as a सैद्धांतिक possibility. ''
William Bell स्कॉट आयरन और कोयले, 1855-60
The period of समय covered by the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति varies with different historians.
Eric Hobsbawm held that it 'broke out ' in Britain in the 1780s and was not fully लगा जबतक the 1830s or 1840s, जबकि T. S. एश्टन आयोजित कि it occurred roughly between 1760 and 1830.
Some 20th-century इतिहासकारों ऐसे as जॉन clapham and Nicholas Crafts have argued that the process of economic and social change took place gradually and the term revolution is a misnomer.
इस is स्टिल a subject of debate among historians.
GDP per capita was broadly stable before the Industrial Revolution और the emergence of the आधुनिक पूंजीवादी अर्थव्यवस्था.
The Industrial Revolution began an era of per-capita आर्थिक विकास in capitalist economies.
Economic historians are in agreement that the onset of the Industrial क्रान्ति is the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण इवेंट in the इतिहास of मानवता चूंकि the domestication of animals and plants.
the पहला औद्योगिक क्रान्ति विकसित into the दूसरी औद्योगिक क्रान्ति in the परिवर्तन सालो between 1840 and 1870, when technological and economic progress gained momentum with the increasing adoption of steam-powered boats, ships and railways, the large scale manufacture of machine tools and the increasing use of steam powered factories.
Juliet AnnMarie Huddy ( born September 27, 1969 ), is an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न न्यूज रिपोर्टर, currently appearing on Fox News Channel.
This list ranks U.S. cities by जमीन क्षेत्रफल ( नहीं सहित लाशें of जल ).
Total areas ( including जल ) हैं भी दिए, लकिन नोट कि, जब क्रमित by total area, a number of coastal cities appear disproportionately `` larger ''.
San Francisco is an extreme उदाहरण ; जल makes up nearly 80 % of its total area of 232 square miles ( 601 km2 ).
Note also that in many cases a city may be geographically large primarily क्युकी इसके नगरपालिका सरकारी रै मिलाया साथ the सरकारी of the surrounding county.
In some cases the county no longer exists, जबकि in अन्य the व्यवस्था रै formed a संचित city–county ( or city- borough in Alaska, or city- parish in Louisiana ).
These are shown in bold in the सूची नीचे ( लकिन नहीं सब उदाहरण may be indicated ).
** These are independent शहरों, अर्थ वे हैं नहीं a part of any county.
The विशाल आंत ( or bowel, कोलन ) is the last part of the digestive system in vertebrate animals.
Its function is to absorb water from the remaining indigestible खाना पदार्थ, और तब to pass व्यर्थ बर्बाद सामग्री इससे the body.
This article is primarily about the human आंत, हालांकि the सूचना परिचय इसके processes are directly applicable to most mammals.
The विशाल आंत consists of the cecum, rectum and anal canal.
It starts in the right iliac region of the pelvis, just at or below the right कमर, जहाँ it is joined to the नीचे end of the small intestine.
From here it continues up the उदर, तब आरपार the चौडाई of the abdominal गुहा, and then it turns down, continuing to its endpoint at the anus.
The large intestine is about long, which is about one-fifth of the पूरे लंबाई of the intestinal canal.
In Terminologia Anatomica the large आंत शामिल the cecum, कोलन, rectum, and anal canal.
However, कुछ स्त्रोत exclude the anal canal.
The Green Bay पैकर्स हैं an अमरीकी football team based in Green Bay, Wisconsin.
They are members of the North Division of the National Football सम्मेलन ( nfc ) in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ).
Green Bay is the third-oldest franchise in the एनएफएल, having महरूम व्यवस्थित और playing in 1919.
The पैकर्स हैं the तभी non-profit, community-owned major league professional sports team in the United States.
the पैकर्स हैं the पिछला vestige of `` small town teams '' that were once common in the NFL during the 1920s and 1930s.
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the नाम lambeau फ़ील्ड on जिससे the टोली plays ) और George Whitney Calhoun, the Green Bay Packers can trace their lineage to other semi-professional teams in Green Bay dating back to 1896.
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers competed as a semi-professional football टोली विरूद्ध क्लब इससे around विस्कॉन्सिन and the Midwest.
They joined the American Professional Football Association ( apfa ) in 1921, the forerunner to what is known today as the National Football League ( NFL ).
Although Green Bay is the last NFL `` छोटी कस्बा '' टोली, इसके लोकल प्रशंसक आधार और मीडिया extends into आसपास मिल्वौकी ; the team also played selected home games there between 1933 and 1994.
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than any other team in the एनएफएल ), सहित नौ एनएफएल championships prior to the Super Bowl era and four Super Bowl victories —in 1967 ( Super Bowl I ), 1968 ( Super Bowl II ), 1997 ( Super Bowl XXXI ) and 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ).
The Packers have long-standing, bitter rivalries with their NFC North ( formerly the NFC Central ) opponents, the शिकागो bears, मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स और the Detroit Lions.
The Bears-Packers rivalry is one of the oldest rivalries in एनएफएल इतिहास, डेटिंग वापस to 1921.
The San Fernando Valley ( locally known as `` The Valley '' ) is an urbanized valley स्तिथ in the लॉस एंजिल्स महानगर क्षेत्रफल of दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, United States, defined by the mountains of the Transverse Ranges circling it.
Home to 1.76 लाख लोगों, it झूठ north of the larger and more populous Los Angeles Basin.
Nearly two thirds of the Valley 's land area is भाग of the नगर of लॉस Angeles.
The other incorporated cities in the valley हैं ग्लेनडेल, Burbank, San Fernando, Hidden Hills and Calabasas.

The World of coca-cola, is a स्थाई exhibition featuring the history of The Coca-Cola Company.

It is set in a future dystopian world in which everyone is turned `` Pretty '' by extreme cosmetic सर्जरी upon reaching आयु 16.
