Susan Leigh Vaughan Smith ( born September 26, 1971 ) is an American woman sentenced to जीवन in थाना लिये murdering her children.
Born in Union, South Carolina, and a former student of the University of South Carolina Union, she was convicted on July 22, 1995 for murdering उसके दो बेटे, 3-year-old माइकल डेनियल स्मिथ, born अक्तूबर 10, 1991, और 14-month-old सिकंदर टायलर स्मिथ, born अगस्त 5, 1993.
The case gained worldwide attention shortly after it developed, due to उसके claiming कि a ब्लैक man stole her car and kidnapped her sons.
She later claimed that she suffered from mental health मुद्दे कि impaired उसके निर्णय.
According to the South Carolina Department of Corrections, स्मिथ होगा be योग्य लिये पैरोल on November 4, 2024, after serving a minimum of thirty years.
She is incarcerated at South कैरोलिना 's leath correctional संस्था, near Greenwood.
Mount McKinley ( also known as Denali taken from the Inuit Koyukon Athabaskan language अर्थ `` the ग्रेट एक '' ) is the उच्चतम पहाड़ शिखर in the संयुक्त राज्य और in उत्तर अमेरिका साथ a समिट elevation of above sea level.
At some, the base to peak rise is considered the largest of any mountain situated entirely ऊपर समुद्र स्तर.
Measured by स्थलाकृतिक prominence, it is the तीसरा सबसे prominent peak after Mount Everest and Aconcagua.
Located in the अलास्का दायरा in the आंतरिक of us राज्य of अलास्का, it is the centerpiece of Denali National Park and Preserve.
The first यूरोपीय to दस्तावेज़ sighting the mountain was George Vancouver in 1794.
In 1903, जेम्स wickersham अंकित the first attempt at climbing McKinley which was unsuccessful.
In 1906, फ्रेडरिक कुक claimed the first ascent which was later proven to be false.
The first verifiable ascent to McKinley 's summit was achieved on June 7, 1913 by चढना हडसन stuck, हैरी karstens, Walter Harper, and Robert Tatum.
In 1951, Bradford Washburn pioneered the West Buttress route माना to be the safest और easiest रूट और इसलिए the most popular currently in use.
The Honda S600 is an ऑटोमोबाइल manufactured by Honda.
It was शुभारम्भ in March 1964.
Available as a roadster – bearing दमदार प्रतिरूप to the होंडा s500 – और as a fastback coupé – introduced in March 1965 – the S600 was the first Honda available in two trim levels.
दौरान इसके उत्पादन चलाएं up to 1966, the मॉडल स्टाइलिंग would remain pretty much the same, with the most notable changes coming to the front grille, bumper, and headlights.
Powered by a DOHC, water-cooled, four-cylinder इनलाइन इंजन साथ चार carburetors, the इंजन capacity was increased to 606 cc from the S500 's 531 cc.
The engine उत्पादित at 8,500 आरपीएम और had a top speed of.
With the convertible weighing in at mere, the अतिरिक्त चादर मेटल of the कूप तभी added to the overall वज़न.
Suspension was स्वतंत्र साथ sealed roller chain drive to each rear wheel.
The S600 was the first द्रव्यमान marketed होंडा car.
First offered तभी in right-hand ड्राइव, it soon became available in left-hand drive to appeal to export markets.
There were a few pre-production S500s manufactured in left hand drive, दो or तीन भी होने दिखाया in कुछ जल्दी बिक्री विवरणिका.
Both the S600 roadster and coupé यहूद उपलब्धियाँ in मानक trim और a खास, upgraded पैकेज पुकारा the sm600 जिससे शामिल, among अन्य items, special paint colors, exclusive badging, a standard radio and speaker, a special antenna in the passenger side sun visor, standard reversing lights, a standard cigarette lighter, a standard heater, better cushioned seats, and a detachable seat track for quick removal of the passenger seat.
Honda built 3,912 roadsters in 1964, with production climbing to 7,261 convertibles and 1,519 coupes in 1965.
Production dropped off in 1966 ( as they were shifting to the S800 ) with only 111 roadsters and 281 coupes, giving tallies of 11,284 convertibles और 1,800 coupes लिये the 3 year span.
Everybody Hates Chris is an American television period sitcom that depicts the teenage experiences of comedian Chris Rock ( who is also the narrator ) जबकि growing up in the bedford-stuyvesant पड़ोस of ब्रुकलीन, New York.
The show is नियत between 1983 और 1987 ; however, चट्टान खुद was a teenager between 1978 and 1983.
Rock grew up साथ a लड़के नामित केनी montero, whom he has often referred to as the inspiration for a lot of the episodes.
In many interviews, Rock has वर्णित केनी as the कारण he got into comedy in the first place.
The show 's title parodies the सीबीएस sitcom everybody loves रेमंड.
Rock stated : `` everybody loves Raymond but Everybody Hates Chris ! ``.
The show 's lead actors are Tyler James Williams, Terry Crews, Tichina Arnold, Tequan रिचमंड, imani हकीम, और विंसेंट martella.
In Fall 2008, the The cw स्थानांतरित everybody hates क्रिस and The Game to the Friday night death slot.
The fourth ऋतु of the श्रेणी premiered शुक्रवार, October 3, 2008, at 8:00PM Eastern/7:00PM Central.
On May 21, 2009, The cw घोषित कि it था cancelled Everybody Hates Chris.
Prior to this, executive producer Chris Rock announced that the end of season 4 matched up with his own past—dropping आउट of ऊँची स्कूल to become a comedian—and that it was time to end the show.
Pleural effusion is excess द्रव कि accumulates between the दो pleural layers, the fluid-filled space that surrounds the lungs.
Excessive amounts of such fluid can impair श्वास by limiting the विस्तार of the lungs during ventilation.
Beowulf ( ; in Old English or ) is the conventional title of an बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी वीर एपिक कविता consisting of 3182 alliterative long लाइनों, नियत in scandinavia, commonly cited as one of the most important works of Anglo-Saxon literature.
It survives in a single manuscript known as the nowell Codex.
Its composition by an anonymous anglo-saxon कवि is दिनाँक between the 8th and the early 11th century.
In 1731, the manuscript was badly damaged by a fire that swept through a building housing a संग्रहण of मध्यकालीन पांडुलिपियों समवेत by सर Robert Bruce Cotton.
The poem fell into obscurity for decades, and its existence did not become widely known again जबतक it थी मुद्रित in 1815 in an संस्करण prepared by the icelandic-danish scholar Grímur Jónsson Thorkelin.
In the poem, Beowulf, a hero of the Geats in scandinavia, आता to the सहायता of hroðgar, the किंग of the danes, जिनकी मीड हॉल ( in heorot ) has been under attack by a monster known as Grendel.
बाद बियोवुल्फ़ जानबूझ him, Grendel 's mother attacks the hall and is then also defeated.
Victorious, बियोवुल्फ़ goes घर to geatland in स्वीडन and later becomes king of the Geats.
After a period of fifty years has passed, Beowulf defeats a ड्रैगन, लकिन is fatally wounded in the battle.
After his death, his attendants bury उसे in a tumulus, a दफ़न mound, in Geatland.
Shem Ham and Japheth by जेम्स tissot 1904.
Shem ( ; Sēm ; Arabic : Sām ; Ge'ez : ሴም, Sēm ; `` renown ; prosperity ; name '' ) was one of the sons of Noah in the Hebrew बाइबल as खूब as in इस्लामी साहित्य.
He is most popularly regarded as the eldest son, हालांकि कुछ परंपराओं लिहाज़ him as the second son.
Genesis 10:21 refers to सापेक्ष आयु of shem और उसके bhai japheth, लकिन साथ sufficient ambiguity to have yielded different translations.
The verse is translated in the KJV as `` Unto Shem also, the father of all the children of eber, the bhai of japheth the elder, even to him were children born. ``.
However, the New American Standard Bible gives, `` Also to Shem, the father of all the children of eber, और the पुरानी brother of Japheth, children were born. ''
Genesis 11:10 records that Shem was still 100 years old at the birth of Arphaxad, ( but nearly 101 - देखिए कालक्रम नोट, ) दो सालो बाद the बाढ़, बनाना उसे मुश्किल 99 at the समय the बाढ़ began ; and that he lived for another 500 years after this, making his age at death 600 years.
The children of Shem were Elam, asshur, arphaxad, lud, and Aram, in addition to daughters.
Abraham, the patriarch of the hebrews और arabs, थी एक of the वंशजों of Arphaxad.
इस्लामी साहित्य describes shem as one of the believing sons of Noah.
Some स्त्रोत भी पहचानो shem as a नबी in उसके अपना right and that he was the next prophet after his father.
In one Muslim legend, Shem was one of the people that God बना यीशु उठाएगा as a चिह्न to the Children of Israel.
The 1st century historian Flavius Josephus, among many others, recounted the परंपरा कि ये पाँच बेटे यहूद the progenitors of the nations of Elam, Assyria, Chaldea, Lydia, and Syria, respectively.
Semitic is still a commonly used term for the Semitic languages, as a उपसमुच्चय of the afro-asiatic भाषाएं, denoting the आम भाषाई heritage of Arabic, Aramaic, Akkadian, Ethiopic, Hebrew and Phoenician languages.
According to some Jewish traditions ( e.g., B. Talmud Nedarim 32b ; Genesis Rabbah 46:7 ; Genesis Rabbah 56:10 ; Leviticus Rabbah 25:6 ; Numbers rabbah 4:8. ), shem is believed to have महरूम melchizedek, किंग of सलेम जिसको अब्राहम is अंकित to have मिले बाद the बैटल of the four kings.
In a few of the अनेक extra-biblical स्त्रोत कि describe him, Shem is also credited with killing Nimrod, son of Cush.
shem is उल्लेखित in उत्पत्ति 5:32, 6:10 ; 7:13 ; 9:18,23,26-27 ; 10 ; 11:10 ; also in 1 Chronicles 1:4.
Geographic identifications of Flavius Josephus, c. 100 AD ; Japheth 's sons shown in red, Ham 's बेटे in ब्लू, shem 's बेटे in ग्रीन.
Go Daddy or Go Daddy समूह inc. is a privately आयोजित कम्पनी कि is primarily an internet domain registrar and web hosting company.
Go Daddy Group Inc. filed for an IPO in 2006, but later रद्द it, due to `` मार्केट uncertainties ''.
In addition to डोमेन पंजीकरण और होस्टिंग go पापा also sells e-business related software and services.
On June 24, 2011, The Wall Street Journal reported कि private-equity firms केकेआर और चांदी झील साझेदार, साथ साथ a तीसरा investor, were nearing a deal to buy the company for between $ 2–2.5 billion.
On July 1, 2011 Go Daddy confirmed that KKR, Silver Lake साझेदार और प्रौद्योगिकी क्रॉसओवर Ventures had closed the deal.
हालांकि the खरीदें दाम थी नहीं officially announced it was reported to be $ 2.25 billion, for 65 % of the company.
, Bob Parsons had ceded the CEO role of Go Daddy to Warren Adelman, who था महरूम साथ the कम्पनी लिये about 10 years.

Andorra ( ;, ), officially the Principality of Andorra ( ), also called the Principality of the Valleys of Andorra, ( ), is a landlocked microstate in southwestern यूरोपीय, स्तिथ in the पूर्वी pyrenees kyu और bordered by Spain and France.
It is the sixth smallest nation in Europe, having an क्षेत्रफल of और an अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी of 85,000 in 2012.
Its पूंजी, अंडोरा la वेला, is the उच्चतम capital city in Europe, at an elevation of above sea level.
The official language is Catalan, हालांकि स्पेनी, पुर्तगाली, और फ्रेंच हैं भी commonly spoken.
Created under a charter in 988, the उपस्थित principality थी formed in 1278.
It is known as a principality as it is a monarchy headed by दो co-princes – the बिशप of urgell and the President of France.
Andorra is a prosperous country mainly क्युकी of इसके पर्यटन उद्योग, जिससे services an estimated 10.2 million visitors annually, and also because of its status as a tax haven.
It is not a member of the यूरोपीय संघ, लकिन the euro is the de facto currency.
The people of Andorra have the 4th highest human life expectancy in the संसार — 82 सालो at जनम.
The George Washington University ( GW, GWU, or जार्ज वॉशिंगटन ) is a व्यापक निजी, coeducational शोध university located in Washington, D.C..
It awards certificates, स्नातक डिग्री, मास्टर्स डिग्री, और phds across several dozen disciplines.

Kimberly Noel `` Kim '' Kardashian ( born अक्तूबर 21, 1980 ) is an अमरीकी socialite, टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व and occasional actress.
In 2007, she gained notoriety as the subject of a sex टेप कि subsequently resulted in a अदालत awarding her $ 5 million ; later in that same year, she and her family rose to prominence with their E !
reality television series Keeping Up with the Kardashians, and its subsequent spin-offs, सहित कोर्टनी और किम लो New York and Kourtney and Kim Take Miami.
In 2010, Kardashian was the highest-earning वास्तविकता स्टार, साथ अनुमानित आय of $ 6 million.
With sisters कोर्टनी और khloé, कार्दशियन co-owns the fashion boutique chain D-A-S-H.
She has been involved in the production of अनेक लाइनों of कपडे and fragrances.
In August 2011, Kardashian शादीशुदा बास्केट खिलाड़ी क्रिस humphries in a widely publicized ceremony.
That अक्तूबर, कार्दशियन दायर लिये divorce following 72 days of marriage.
The move garnered significant backlash इससे the media, who labeled it a `` publicity stunt ''.
After 536 days, Kardashian and Humphries reached an undisclosed settlement at the Los Angeles Superior Court, finalizing the तलाक in अप्रैल 2013.

Oahu ( ) or Oahu, known as `` The महफ़िल प्लेस '', is the तीसरा largest of the Hawaiian Islands and the most populous of the islands in the U.S. state of Hawaii.
The state पूंजी, होनोलूलू, is on Oahu 's southeast coast.
Including small close-in offshore islands such as Ford Island and the islands in Kaneohe Bay and off the eastern ( windward ) coast, it has a total land area of, बनाना it the 20th largest द्वीप in the United States.
In the greatest dimension, this volcanic द्वीप is long और आरपार.
The length of the shoreline is.
The island is the result of two separate shield volcanoes : Waianae and Koolau, with a broad `` valley '' or saddle ( the सेंट्रल oahu मैदान ) between उन्हें.
The highest point is Mt. ka'ala in the waianae दायरा, उठती to above sea level.
The base करेंसी of the संयुक्त राज्य is the u.S. dollar, and is printed on bills in denominations of $ 1, $ 2, $ 5, $ 10, $ 20, $ 50, and $ 100.
At one time, however, u.S. currency included five larger denominations.
Notes in the denominations of $ 500, $ 1,000, $ 5,000, और $ 10,000 यहूद मुद्रित लिये सामान्य उपयोग, और a $ 100,000 नोट थी printed for certain internal transactions.
British होंडुरास थी a British colony in Central America.
In 1981, the colony gained full independence, और is अभी the स्वतंत्र nation of Belize.
First colonised by Spaniards in the 17th सदी, the territory on the ईस्ट coast of सेंट्रल अमेरिका, दक्षिण of Mexico, became a British crown colony in 1862.
In 1964, it became a self-governing उपनिवेश.
बेलीज़ became fully independent from the United Kingdom in 1981.
Belize was the last महाद्वीपीय कब्ज़ा of the United Kingdom in the Americas.
Spelt, also known as dinkel wheat, or hulled गेहूं, is an प्राचीन प्रजाति of गेहूं from the fifth millennium BC.
Spelt was an important staple in parts of Europe from the Bronze Age to मध्यकालीन टाइम्स ; it अभी survives as a relict क्रॉप in सेंट्रल यूरोपीय और उत्तरी स्पेन और रै मिला a नई मार्केट as a health food.
Spelt is sometimes considered a subspecies of the closely सम्बन्धित प्रजाति आम गेहूं ( T. aestivum ), in जिससे मामला इसके वनस्पति name is considered to be Triticum aestivum subsp. spelta.
It is a hexaploid wheat, which means it रै छह सेट of गुणसूत्रों.
Sherlock Holmes ( or ) is a fictional detective created by author and चिकित्सक सर आर्थर कोनन डोयल.
A london-based `` परामर्श जासूस '' जिनकी abilities किनारा on the fantastic, holmes is प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके कुटिल लॉजिकल तर्क, उसके क्षमता to adopt almost any disguise, and his use of forensic science skills to solve difficult cases.
Holmes, जो पहला appeared in प्रकाशन in 1887, थी प्रदर्शित in four novels and 56 short stories.
The first novel, A Study in Scarlet, appeared in beeton 's क्रिसमस सालाना in 1887 और the दूसरी, The Sign of the Four, in Lippincott 's Monthly Magazine in 1890.
The character grew tremendously in popularity with the पहला श्रेणी of छोटी कहानियां in the strand पत्रिका, शुरूआत साथ a कांड in बोहेमिया in 1891 ; further series of short stories and two novels published in serial form appeared between then and 1927.
The stories cover a काल इससे around 1880 up to 1914.
All but four stories are narrated by Holmes 's friend and biographer, Dr. John H. Watson ; two are narrated by Holmes himself ( `` The Blanched Soldier `` and `` The Lion 's Mane `` ) and two others are written in the तीसरा व्यक्ति ( `` the mazarin स्टोन `` and `` His Last Bow `` ).
In two stories ( `` The Musgrave Ritual `` and `` The Gloria Scott `` ), holmes tells वाटसन the प्रमुख स्टोरी इससे उसके यादें, while Watson becomes the narrator of the frame story.
The पहला और चौथी novels, a पढ़ाई in स्कारलेट और the घाटी of भय, प्रत्येक शामिल a long interval of omniscient narration recounting events unknown to either Holmes or Watson.
The United States हाउस of प्रतिनिधि is एक of the दो घरों of the United States Congress ( a bicameral legislature ).
It is अक्सर referred to as the House.
The other house is the सीनेट.
The composition and powers of the House are स्थापित in आलेख एक of the संयुक्त States Constitution.
The major power of the House is to pass federal legislation that affects the entire country although its bills जरूर भी be passed by the सीनेट और further सहमत to by the u.S. अध्यक्ष पहले बनने विधि ( जबतक दोनो the हाउस and Senate re-pass the legislation with a two-thirds majority in each chamber ).
The House has several exclusive powers : the power to initiate revenue bills, to impeach officials, and to elect the U.S. अध्यक्ष in मामला वहीँ is no बहुमत in the Electoral College.
Each U.S. state is represented in the House in proportion to its population but is हकदार to at तनिक एक प्रतिनिधि.
The most populous राज्य, California, currently has 53 representatives.
The total number of voting प्रतिनिधि is फिक्स्ड by विधि at 435.
Each प्रतिनिधि serves लिये a two-year term.
the स्पीकर of the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि, जो presides over the कक्ष, is elected by the members of the House, and is therefore traditionally the leader of the House Democratic Caucus or the House Republican Conference, whichever party has more voting members.
The House meets in the south wing of the United राज्य कैपिटल.
Jell-O is a brand name belonging to u.s.-based kraft भोजन लिये a क्रमांक of जिलेटिन desserts, including fruit gels, puddings and no-bake cream pies.
The brand 's popularity has led to it being used as a जेनेरिक पद लिये जिलेटिन मिठाई आरपार the u.S. और कनाडा.
Kennywood is an amusement park located in West mifflin, पेन्सिलवेनिया, a उपनगरीय of Pittsburgh.
The पार्क पहला खोली in 1898 as a `` ट्राली park '' attraction at the end of the Mellon family 's Monongahela Street Railway.
The park was purchased in 1906 by F. W. Henninger and Andrew McSwigan and thus began the Kennywood Entertainment कम्पनी कि रै remained a closely आयोजित परिवार कारोबार for over 100 years.
This traditional amusement park स्टिल रै structures और यात्राएँ डेटिंग वापस to इसके खोलने and the early 1900s.
Along with Rye Playland Park, it is one of only two amusement parks सूचीबद्ध in the नेशनल पंजीकरण of ऐतिहासिक Places.
Kennywood is owned by kennywood entertainment कम्पनी, which until December 2007 was a closely held family business owned by the Henninger and McSwigan families.
Kennywood Entertainment is अभी संचालित by california-based राजमहल entertainment, a subsidiary of Parques Reunidos, an international amusement park company based in Madrid, Spain.
Parque Reunidos is in turn a subsidiary of candover निवेश, an निवेश fund based in the UK.
A Social Security card issued by the Railroad Retirement फलक in 1943 to a अभी deceased person.
In the United States, a Social Security number ( SSN ) is a nine-digit क्रमांक जारी to u.S. नागरिकों, स्थाई निवासियों, and temporary ( working ) residents under section 205 ( c ) ( 2 ) of the Social Security Act, codified as.
The number is issued to an individual by the Social Security Administration, an स्वतंत्र एजेंसी of the संयुक्त राज्य सरकारी.
Its primary purpose is to track individuals for Social Security purposes.
A Social Security number may be obtained by applying on रूप ss-5, `` अनुप्रयोग लिये a सोशल सुरक्षा Number Card ''.
Minimalism describes movements in various forms of art और डिज़ाइन, विशेषकर विज़ुअल आर्ट और म्यूज़िक, जहाँ the कार्य is set out to expose the essence or identity of a subject through eliminating all non-essential forms, features or concepts.
Minimalism is कोई डिज़ाइन or स्टाइल in which the simplest and fewest elements are used to create the maximum effect.
As a specific movement in the arts it is identified with developments in post–world युद्ध ii पश्चिमी आर्ट, सबसे strongly साथ अमरीकी विज़ुअल कला in the 1960s and early 1970s.
Prominent artists associated with this movement include Donald Judd, John McCracken, Agnes Martin, Dan Flavin, Robert Morris, ऐनी truitt, और फ़्रैंक Stella.
It is rooted in the reductive aspects of Modernism, and is often interpreted as a प्रतिक्रिया विरूद्ध अमूर्त अभिव्यंजनावाद and a bridge to Postminimal art practices.
The terms have expanded to encompass a movement in म्यूज़िक जिससे सुविधाएँ repetition और iteration, as in the compositions of La Monte Young, Terry Riley, Steve Reich, Philip Glass, and John Adams.
अल्पतम रचनाएं are sometimes known as systems music.
The term `` minimalist '' is often applied colloquially to designate anything कि is अतिरिक्त or stripped to its essentials.
It has also been used to describe the plays and novels of Samuel Beckett, the films of Robert bresson, the कहानियां of रेमंड carver, और भी the ऑटोमोबाइल डिजाइन of कोलिन Chapman.
The word was first used in अंग्रेज़ी in the जल्दी 20th century to describe the Mensheviks.
In chemistry and physics, Dalton 's law ( also called Dalton 's law of आंशिक pressures ) राज्य कि the कुल दबाव exerted by the मिश्रण of non-reactive गैसों is बराबर to the sum of the partial pressures of individual gases.
This empirical law थी observed by जॉन डाल्टन in 1801 and is related to the ideal gas laws.
mathematically, the दबाव of a mixture of gases can be defined as the summation
or
where represent the partial pressure of प्रत्येक घटक.
It is assumed that the gases do नहीं प्रतिक्रिया साथ प्रत्येक अन्य
where is the mole fraction of the i-th component in the कुल मिश्रण of n components.
The संबंध नीचे provides a रास्ता to determine the volume based concentration of any individual gaseous component
where is the विशेषज्ञता of the i-th घटक expressed in ppm.
Dalton 's law is not exactly followed by रियल गैसों.
Those deviations हैं considerably large at high pressures.
In such conditions, the आवाज़ occupied by the अणुओं can become significant compared to the free space between them.
In particular, the short average distances between molecules raises the intensity of intermolecular शक्तियां between गैस अणुओं पर्याप्त to substantially change the pressure exerted by them.
Neither of those प्रभाव हैं माना by the ideal gas model.
This is a list of the largest United राज्य कॉलेजों और विश्वविद्यालयों by नामांकन लिये कॉलेजों और universities in the United States.
कया इस list includes:
Colleges and universities भीतर the संयुक्त राज्य
University प्रणालियों if the प्रणाली is चलाएं under a single administration
Enrollment is the योग of the headcount of undergraduate and graduate students
Enrollment is गिने by the एकीकृत Post-secondary Education System within the U.S. Department of Education.
Enrollment is the 12-month unduplicated headcount, indicating the number of अद्वितीय विद्यार्थी जो attended the विश्वविद्यालयों दौरान the year.

Any indication of how many of the नामांकित विद्यार्थी हैं पूरा or भाग समय ( e.g., कुछ विश्वविद्यालयों may have a high enrollment, but have most students enrolled in only a single class )

`` Right Round '' is a song performed by अमरीकी rapper flo rida, released as the सीसे single from his second studio album, R.O.O.T.S. ( 2009 ).
the सोंग सुविधाएँ अतिथि vocals from Kesha.
It was released to radio on 27 January 2009 and was digitally released on 10 फ़रवरी by पो लड़के entertainment and Atlantic Records.
The song lyrically speaks of Flo Rida 's net ball referee enthusiasm, while adapting the कोरस of the 1984 मुर्दे or जिंदा सोंग `` You Spin Me Round ( Like a Record ) `` in its hook.
According to one of the song 's writers, the कोरस refers to मौखिक sex.
Kesha contributed guest vocals to the song, but in the United States, during the run atop the चार्ट, kesha थी uncredited.
The song प्राप्त ज़्यादातर negative reviews from critics, who claimed it was kitsch and misogynistic.
However, it was a commercial success, reaching the शीर्ष टेन of the चार्ट in nineteen countries worldwide.
In the United States, it became flo rida 's दूसरी number-one सिंगल और broke the रिकार्ड for first-week sales when it was released to digital retailers.
The single 's accompanying music video was directed by मैल्कम जोन्स और मनोनीत for an MTV Video Music Award.
The song has been प्रयुक्त in अनेक फिल्मों, ऐसे as the hangover, The Ugly Truth and the Telugu movie Pilla Zamindar.
In the movie Pitch Perfect, the song is performed by the a cappella समूह the Treblemakers.
The Chief Justice of the United States is the सिर of the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय अदालत प्रणाली ( the न्यायिक शाखा of the संघीय सरकारी of the United States ) and the chief judge of the Supreme Court of the United States.
The Chief Justice is एक of नौ परम् अदालत justices ; the other eight are the Associate Justices of the Supreme Court of the United States.
From 1789 until 1866, the office was ज्ञात as the मुख्य इंसाफ of the परम् Court.
The मुख्य इंसाफ is the उच्चतम न्यायिक अधिकारी in the देश, और अधिनियमों as a मुख्य प्रशासनिक अधिकारी लिये the federal courts and as head of the Judicial Conference of the United States appoints the director of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts.
The Chief इंसाफ भी serves as a प्रवक्ता for the judicial branch.
The Chief Justice लीड the कारोबार of the Supreme Court.
He presides over oral वितर्क पहले the अदालत.
When the अदालत renders an राय, the मुख्य justice—when in the majority—decides who writes the court 's opinion.
The Chief Justice also has significant agenda-setting शक्ति over the अदालत 's बैठक.
In the case of an महाभियोग of a अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, जिससे रै occurred twice, the Chief Justice presides over the trial in the Senate.
In modern tradition, the Chief Justice has the ceremonial duty of administering the शपथ of दफ्तर of the President of the United States.
The first मुख्य इंसाफ थी John Jay.
The 17th and current Chief इंसाफ is जॉन G. रॉबर्ट्स, Jr.
