Prudhoe Bay Oil Field is a large आयल फ़ील्ड on अलास्का 's North Slope.
It is the largest आयल फ़ील्ड in दोनो the संयुक्त राज्य और in उत्तर अमेरिका, covering and originally containing approximately of oil.
The amount of recoverable आयल in the फ़ील्ड is अधिक than दोगुना कि of the अगला largest field in the United States, the East Texas oil field.
The फ़ील्ड is संचालित by bp ; साझेदार are ExxonMobil and ConocoPhillips Alaska.
मजदूर संघ हैं legally पहचाना as प्रतिनिधि of workers in many industries in the United States.
Their activity today centers on सामूहिक bargaining over मजदूरी, लाभ, और working शर्तें for their membership, and on representing their members in disputes with management over violations of contract provisions.
Larger unions also typically engage in lobbying activities और electioneering at the राज्य और संघीय level.
Most संघ in अमेरिका हैं लकीर साथ एक of दो larger umbrella organizations : the AFL-CIO created in 1955, and the Change to Win Federation which split from the AFL-CIO in 2005.
Both advocate policies and विधान on निमित्त of मजदूर in the संयुक्त States and Canada, and take an active role in politics.
The AFL-CIO is especially concerned with global trade issues.
In 2010, the percentage of workers belonging to a संघ in the संयुक्त राज्य ( or कुल मजदूर संघ `` घनत्व '' ) थी 11.4 %, compared to 18.4 % in Germany, 27.5 % in Canada, and 70 % in Finland.
Union membership in the private sector has गिरे अंतर्गत 7 % — स्तर नहीं seen since 1932.
Unions allege that employer-incited विपक्ष रै contributed to इस मनाही in membership.
The most prominent unions are among पब्लिक सेक्टर कर्मचारी such as teachers and police.
Members of unions are disproportionately older, पुरूष और निवासियों of the पूर्वोत्तर, the मिडवेस्ट, and California.
Union workers average 10-30 % उच्चतर अदा than non-union in अमेरिका बाद controlling for individual, job, and labor market characteristics.
Although much smaller compared to their peak membership in the 1950s, American unions remain a prominent राजनैतिक फ़ैक्टर, दोनो through mobilization of उनके अपना सदस्यताएँ और through coalitions with like-minded activist organizations around issues such as immigrant rights, trade policy, health care, and living wage campaigns.
To fight alleged employer anti-union programs, unions are currently advocating new `` card जाँच `` संघीय विधान कि होता आवश्यकता नियोक्ता to सौदेबाजी साथ a संघ if अधिक than 50 % of मजदूर signed forms, or `` cards, '' stating they wish to be represented by that union.
The current कार्यविधि involves प्रतीक्षारत 45 to 90 दिनों लिये a federally supervised secret-ballot employee referendum on the subject.
The economist Joseph Stiglitz has asserted that, `` Strong unions have helped to reduce असमानता, whereas weaker संघ have बना it easier लिये ceos, sometimes working साथ market forces that they have helped shape, to increase it. ''
The decline in unionization since WWII in the United States has been associated with a सुनाया वृद्धि in आय और माल असमानता.
A Christian lacroix फ़ैशन boutique
A boutique is a small shopping outlet, विशेषकर एक कि specializes in elite and fashionable items such as clothing and jewelry.
The word is French for `` shop '', via Latin from Greek ἀποθήκη ( apothēkē ), `` storehouse ''.
The term entered into रोज अंग्रेज़ी उपयोग in the लेट 1960s जब, लिये a brief period, London was the centre of the fashion trade.
Carnaby Street and the Kings सड़क यहूद the focus of much media attention as home to the most fashionable boutiques of the era.
Now the East of London has been regenerated and more Boutiques पॉप up in फैशनेबल क्षेत्रों, ऐसे as Tower Bridge Road.
it can भी refer to a specialised firm such as a boutique investment bank or boutique law firm.
The word is often used to describe a प्रॉपर्टी in the स्वतंत्र खण्ड of the होटल मार्केट ( ऐसे as the Rockwell in London ) in order to distinguish themselves from larger chains ( such as Hilton Hotels ).
In such cases the establishments उद्देश्य to convey the विचार कि the आपरेशन is elite and highly specialised.
In the strictest sense of the word, boutiques होता be one-of-a-kind लकिन अधिक generally बोलना, कुछ जंजीरों can be referred to as boutiques if they specialize in particular styles.
Recently, the term `` boutique '' has started being applied to normally-mass-market items that are either niche or उत्पादित in intentionally छोटी संख्याएँ at बहुत high prices.
This may be referred to as बुटीक manufacturing.
For example, before the release of the Wii, a Time Magazine article suggested that Nintendo could become a `` बुटीक video-game कम्पनी '', producing खेल लिये niche audiences, rather than trying to compete directly with Microsoft and Sony.
In the traditional luxury- watch industry Scalfaro International is considered as the precursor in निर्माण और बिक्री of bespoke watches.
The Swiss company uses a highly flexible boutique manufacturing site, जिससे allows producing छोटी श्रेणी or भी अद्वितीय timepieces.
Although some boutiques specialise in hand-made items और अन्य truly one-of-a-kind वस्तुएं, अन्य बस उपज t-shirts, स्टिकर, और अन्य फ़ैशन accessories in artificially small runs and sell them at unusually high prices.
In the early 1990s Selena प्रारंभ निर्माण उसके own line of women 's clothing.
Opening two boutiques labeled as `` Selena Etc. बुटीक & सैलून '' एक स्तिथ in कॉर्पस christi और एक स्तिथ in San Antonio, Texas.
One थी due to खोलें in Monterrey, Mexico, in 1995 but due to her death it was not opened.
Around 1999 the सैन अंतोनियो स्थान बंद और the कॉर्पस Christi location was closed in 2009.
In late 1990s some European retail traders developed the idea of tailoring a shop towards a lifestyle theme, in the form of `` concept stores '', which specialised in cross-selling बगैर using पृथक विभाग.
One of the first concept stores was 10 Corso Como in Milan, इटली followed by colette in पेरिस और quartier 206 in Berlin.
Several well-known American chains such as Urban Outfitters, D-A-S-H, and The Gap, Australian chain Billabong and, though less common, Lord & Taylor adapted to the concept store trend after 2000.
Navy Federal Credit संघ ( or नेवी संघीय ) is a क्रेडिट संघ headquartered in वियना, वर्जिनिया, chartered and regulated under the authority of the National Credit Union Administration ( NCUA ) of the U.S. federal government.
Navy Federal is the largest natural सदस्य ( or खुदरा ) क्रेडिट संघ in the संसार, दोनो in asset size and in membership.
As of September 2012, Navy Federal had over $ 50 billion usd in एसेट, और over 4 लाख members.
Stevland Hardaway Morris ( born May 13, 1950 as Stevland Hardaway Judkins ), known by his stage name Stevie Wonder, is an American singer, songwriter, and multi-instrumentalist, a चाइल्ड prodigy जो विकसित into एक of the सबसे रचनात्मक musical आंकड़े of the लेट 20th century.
Blind since shortly after birth, Wonder signed with Motown 's tamla लेबल at the आयु of ग्यारह, और continues to perform and record for Motown to this day.
Among Wonder 's best known works are singles such as `` Superstition ``, `` Sir Duke ``, `` You हैं the सनशाइन of my जीवन `` और `` i बस पुकारा to Say I Love You ``.
Well known albums also include Talking Book, innervisions और गीतों in the कुंजी of जीवन.
he रै अंकित अधिक than तीस u.S. शीर्ष टेन हिट्स और प्राप्त twenty-two Grammy Awards, the most ever awarded to a male solo artist.
Wonder is also noted for his work as an activist for political causes, including his 1980 campaign to make Martin Luther किंग, jr. 's जन्मदिवस a अवकाश in the United States.
In 2009, अचरज थी नामित a United Nations Messenger of Peace.
In 2008, Billboard magazine released a list of the Hot 100 all-time शीर्ष कलाकारों to celebrate the us singles चार्ट 's fiftieth anniversary, with Wonder at number five.
By popular vote, Stevie was inducted into The soulmusic हॉल of कीर्ति at soulmusic.com in December 2012.
Psychosis ( from the यूनानी ψυχή `` psyche '', लिये mind/soul, और -ωσις `` -ओएसआईs '', लिये असामान्य कंडीशन or derangement ) refers to an abnormal condition of the mind, and is a generic psychiatric term for a mental state often described as involving a `` loss of contact with reality ``.
People suffering from psychosis are वर्णित as psychotic.
Psychosis is given to the more severe forms of मनोरोग विकार, दौरान जिससे मति and delusions, gross excitement or stupor and impaired insight may occur.
The term `` psychosis '' is very broad and can mean anything from relatively सामान्य aberrant अनुभवों through to the complex and catatonic expressions of schizophrenia and bipolar type 1 disorder.
Moreover a wide किस्में of सेंट्रल बेचैन प्रणाली रोगों, इससे दोनो external substances and internal physiologic illness, can produce symptoms of psychosis.
This led many professionals to say that psychosis is not specific enough as a निदान पद.
Despite this, `` psychosis '' is generally given to noticeable deficits in normal behavior ( ऋणात्मक लक्षण ) और अधिक commonly to विविध प्रकार of मति or delusional मान्यताओं ( e.g. grandiosity, delusions of persecution ).
Someone exhibiting बहुत स्पष्ट लक्षण may be वर्णित as `` frankly psychotic '', whereas one exhibiting very subtle signs could be classified in the category of an `` attenuated psychotic risk syndrome ''.
An excess in dopaminergic signalling is traditionally linked to the धनात्मक लक्षण of मनस्ताप, विशेषकर those of schizophrenia.
इस is विचार to occur through a यांत्रिकी of aberrant salience of environmental stimuli.
Many antipsychotic drugs तदनुसार निशाना the dopamine प्रणाली ; meta-analyses of placebo-controlled ट्रायल of these drugs, however, show either no significant difference between drug and placebo, or a very small effect size, suggesting that the pathophysiology of psychosis is much more complex than an overactive dopamine system.
People experiencing psychosis may प्रदर्शनी कुछ व्यक्तित्व changes and thought disorder.
Depending on इसके गंभीरता, इस may be accompanied by असामान्य or विचित्र बर्ताव, as well as difficulty with social interaction and impairment in carrying out daily life activities.
General Grievous is a fictional अक्षर in the Star Wars universe.
A recurring antagonist, he is the Supreme Commander of the Confederacy of Independent Systems, a राजनैतिक गुट of ग्रहीय प्रणालियों waging war on the Galactic Republic.
Trained in all seven forms of lightsaber combat by Count Dooku, he is a निष्ठुर और शक्तिशाली योद्धा devoted to जेडी 's विनाश दौरान the Clone Wars.
His acts of wanton आक्रामकता और ऊँची जेडी देह गिनती would prompt the galaxy to give him the nickname the Knightslayer.
Though the notorious Jedi slayer was the being in the galaxy during the Clone Wars who had killed the सबसे जेडी in सिंगल कॉम्बैट, he किया नहीं संकोच to भागो इससे लड़ाइयों he knew he would lose.
Statistics play an important role in summarizing baseball प्रदर्शन और evaluating खिलाड़ी in the sport.
Since the flow of a baseball game has natural breaks to it, and normally players act individually बल्कि than performing in क्लस्टर, the खेल lends itself to easy record-keeping and statistics.
Statistics have been kept for professional baseball since the सृष्टि of the नेशनल लीग और अमरीकी लीग, अभी भाग of Major League Baseball.
Many statistics are also available from outside of Major League Baseball, from लीग ऐसे as the नेशनल संघ of पेशेवर Base Ball Players and the Negro Leagues.
Dorothea Lange 's Migrant Mother depicts अक्षम मटर pickers in कैलिफ़ोर्निया, centering on फ्लोरेंस ओवेन्स थॉम्पसन, age 32, a mother of seven children, in Nipomo, California, March 1936.
USA annual real GDP from 1910–60, with the सालो of the ग्रेट अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
The बेरोजगारी रेट in the us 1910–1960, साथ the years of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
The Great Depression was a severe worldwide आर्थिक अवसाद in the दशक preceding World War II.
The timing of the Great Depression varied across nations, but in most countries it started in 1930 and lasted until the लेट 1930s or मध्य 1940s.
It was the longest, सबसे फैली, and deepest depression of the 20th century.
In the 21st century, the ग्रेट अवसाद is commonly प्रयुक्त as an example of how far the world 's economy can decline.
The depression originated in the U.S., after the fall in भण्डार कीमतें कि began around सितंबर 4, 1929, और became विश्वव्यापी news with the stock market crash of October 29, 1929 ( known as Black Tuesday ).
The Great Depression had विनाशकारी effects in countries rich and poor.
Personal income, tax revenue, profits और prices dropped, while international trade plunged by more than 50 %.
Unemployment in the U.S. rose to 25 %, और in कुछ देशों रोज़ as high as 33 %.
Cities all around the संसार यहूद hit मुश्किल, especially those dependent on heavy industry.
Construction was virtually halted in अनेक देशों.
Farming and rural areas suffered as crop कीमतें गिरी by लगभग 60 %.
Facing plummeting demand with few alternate sources of jobs, areas निर्भर on प्राथमिक सेक्टर उद्योग ऐसे as नकदी cropping, mining and logging suffered the most.
Some economies प्रारंभ to recover by the mid-1930s.
In many countries, the negative effects of the Great अवसाद lasted जबतक the समाप्त of World War II.
A premature ventricular contraction ( PVC ), also ज्ञात as a असामयिक ventricular जटिल, ventricular असामयिक संकुचन ( or जटिल or देवालय ) ( vpc ), ventricular असामयिक ताल ( vpb ), or ventricular extrasystole ( ves ), is a अपेक्षाकृत common event where the heartbeat is initiated by Purkinje fibres in the ventricles rather than by the sinoatrial node, the normal heartbeat initiator.
The electrical events of the heart detected by the electrocardiogram allow a पीवीसी to be easily distinguished from a normal heart beat.
A PVC may be perceived as a `` skipped beat `` or felt as palpitations in the छाती.
In a normal heartbeat, the ventricles अनुबंध बाद the atria have helped to भरण उन्हें by contracting ; in इस रास्ता the ventricles can pump a maximized amount of blood both to the lungs and to the rest of the body.
In a PVC, the ventricles contract first और पहले the atria have optimally filled the ventricles with blood, which means that circulation is inefficient.
However, सिंगल ताल पीवीसी arrhythmias do नहीं प्रायः pose a danger and can be asymptomatic in healthy individuals.
William Gary Busey ( born June 29, 1944 ), better known as गेरी busey, is an अमरीकी फिल्मी और स्टेज actor, and artist.
He has appeared in a किस्में of films, सहित lethal हथियार, पाइंट ब्रेक, and Under Siege, as well as guest appearances on Gunsmoke, Walker, Texas Ranger, Law & Order, and Entourage.
He was मनोनीत लिये an अकादमी Award for Best Actor in 1978 for his role in The Buddy Holly Story.
The Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement ( ACTA ), is a multinational treaty for the purpose of establishing international standards लिये बौद्धिक प्रॉपर्टी अधिकारों enforcement.
The agreement aims to establish an international legal framework for targeting counterfeit goods, generic medicines and copyright infringement on the Internet, and would create a new governing body outside existing forums, such as the World Trade Organization, the संसार बौद्धिक प्रॉपर्टी संगठन, or the संयुक्त राष्ट्र.
The agreement was signed in October 2011 by ऑस्ट्रेलिया, कनाडा, जापानी, Morocco, New Zealand, Singapore, South Korea, and the United States.
in 2012, मैक्सिको, the European Union and 22 countries which are member states of the European Union signed as well.
One signatory ( जापानी ) रै ratified ( formally स्वीकृत ) the agreement, which would come into force in countries that ratified it after ratification by six countries.
Supporters have वर्णित the अनुबंध as a जवाब to `` the increase in global trade of counterfeit goods and pirated copyright protected works ''.
Trades Unions representing workers in the music, film and TV industries and large intellectual property-based organizations ऐसे as the गति चित्र संघ of अमेरिका और फार्मास्युटिकल Research and Manufacturers of America were active in the treaty 's development.
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों कह the सम्मेलन adversely affects आधारभूत rights including freedom of expression and privacy.
ACTA has also been criticised by डॉक्टर बगैर सीमायें लिये endangering अभिगम to medicines in developing countries.
The secret nature of negotiations रै excluded सिविल समाज समूह, विकासशील देशों और the सामान्य पब्लिक इससे the अनुबंध 's negotiation प्रक्रम और it has been described as policy laundering by critics including the Electronic Frontier Foundation and the Entertainment Consumers Association.
The हस्ताक्षर of the eu और अनेक of इसके सदस्य राज्य resulted in the इस्तीफा in विरोध of the European Parliament 's appointed chief investigator, rapporteur Kader Arif, as well as widespread protests across Europe.
In 2012 the newly-appointed rapporteur, British MEP David Martin, recommended against the treaty, stating : `` The intended benefits of this अंतरराष्ट्रीय अनुबंध हैं दूर outweighed by the संभावित खतरे to civil liberties ''.
On 4 July 2012, the European Parliament rejected the agreement in plenary session, with 478 मतदान विरूद्ध the सन्धि, 39 in favour and 165 MEPs abstaining.
FAW semi-trailer truck in चीन
Tractor with side डम्प ट्रेलर semi-trailer
A ट्रैक्टर साथ an auto-transport semi-trailer.
Semi-trailer truck साथ स्लीपर behind the cab.
A semi-trailer truck is an articulated vehicle that consists of a towing engine, known as a tractor in the United States और ट्रक in अनेक अन्य स्थान, संलग्न to एक or अधिक semi-trailers to carry भाड़ा.
It is also known as a transport in Canada, prime mover in Australia, semi, tractor-trailer, truck and trailer, transfer truck, 18-wheeler, mack truck, big रिग in the संयुक्त राज्य, or artic, छोटी लिये articulated lorry, in Britain and Ireland.
A semi-trailer does नहीं ट्रेल completely पीछे the towing गाडी, लकिन is संलग्न at a पाइंट that is just forward of the rear-most axle of the towing unit.
This is done so that a fraction of the वज़न of the ट्रेलर is carried by the prime mover.
This व्यवस्था अर्थात् कि दोनो ट्रैक्टर और semi-trailer will have a distinctly different design than a rigid truck and trailer.
The Pittsburgh Steelers are a पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल टोली आधारित in पिट्सबर्ग, Pennsylvania.
The team currently belongs to the North Division of the American फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ) in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल League ( NFL ).
Founded in, the स्टीलर्स हैं the oldest मताधिकार in the AFC.
Pittsburgh has won more Super Bowl titles ( six ), won more AFC Championship Games ( eight ) and played in ( fifteen ) and hosted more ( eleven ) सम्मेलन चैंपियनशिप खेल than कोई अन्य afc or nfc टोली.
The स्टीलर्स share the record for most Super Bowl appearances with the Dallas Cowboys ( eight ).
The Steelers won their most recent चैंपियनशिप, सुपर कटोरी xliii, on February 1, 2009.
The Steelers were founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates on July 8, 1933, by आर्ट रूनी, लेने इसके असली नाम from the baseball team of the same name, as was common practice for NFL teams to do at the time.
The ownership of the Steelers रै remained भीतर the रूनी परिवार since its founding.
The current owner is Art 's son, Dan रूनी, जो रै दिए much कंट्रोल of the franchise to his son Art Rooney II.
Long one of the NFL 's फ्लैगशिप टीमों, the स्टीलर्स आनंद a large, widespread fanbase nicknamed Steeler Nation.
The Steelers फिलहाल खेल उनके घर खेल at हाइन्ज़ फ़ील्ड on पिट्सबर्ग 's North Side in the North Shore neighborhood, which also hosts the University of Pittsburgh Panthers.
Built in 2001, the stadium replaced तीन नदियाँ स्टेडियम which hosted the Steelers for 31 seasons.
Prior to Three Rivers, the स्टीलर्स था निभाई their games in Pitt Stadium and Forbes Field.
Three अलग kinds of गेहूं and rye flour
Flour is a powder which is made by grinding cereal grains, or अन्य बीज or जड़ें ( like Cassava ).
It is the main ingredient of bread, which is a staple food for many cultures, बनाना the उपलब्धता of पर्याप्त आपूर्तियाँ of flour a major economic and political issue at various times throughout history.
Wheat flour is one of the most important foods in European, North American, Middle Eastern, भारतीय और उत्तर अफ़्रीकी संस्कृतियों, और is the धमक ingredient in most of their styles of breads and pastries.
While wheat is the most common base for flour, corn flour has been important in Mesoamerican cuisine since ancient times, और remains a स्टेपल throughout the americas.
Rye flour is an important constituent of bread in much of central Europe, and rice can also be प्रयुक्त in आटा, हालांकि इस is अपेक्षाकृत uncommon.
Heart rate is the number of heartbeats per unit of time, typically expressed as बीट्स प्रति मिनट ( bpm ).
Heart rate can vary as the देह 's need to अवशोषित ऑक्सीजन और excrete कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड परिवर्तन, such as during physical exercise, sleep, illness, or as a result of ingesting drugs :
Central nervous प्रणाली stimulants ऐसे as amphetamines increase heart rate.
Central nervous system depressants or sedatives decreases the दिल रेट ( अलावा इससे कुछ विशेषकर strange ones with equally strange effects, such as ketamine which can cause - amongst many other things - stimulant-like effects such as tachycardia ).
वहीँ हैं अनेक ways in which the heart rate speeds up or slows down.
Most involve stimulant-like endorphins and hormones being released in the brain, अनेक of जिससे हैं those कि हैं 'forced'/'enticed ' out by the ingestion and processing of drugs.
Due to individuals having a constant blood volume, one of the physiological तरीके to उद्धार अधिक oxygen to an organ is to increase heart rate to permit blood to pass by the organ more often.
Normal resting heart rates दायरा इससे 60-100 bpm.
Bradycardia is defined as a resting दिल rate below 60 bpm.
However, heart rates from 50 to 60 bpm are common among स्वस्थ लोगों और do नहीं necessarily आवश्यकता खास ध्यान.
Tachycardia is defined as a resting दिल रेट ऊपर 100 bpm, हालांकि persistent rest rates between 80-100 bpm, mainly if they are present during sleep, may be signs of hyperthyroidism or anemia ( see below ).
Catherine II 's carved, painted and gilded राजतिलक कोच ( hermitage संग्रहालय )
A carriage is a wheeled गाडी लिये लोगों, प्रायः horse-drawn ; litters ( palanquins ) and sedan chairs are excluded, since they are wheelless vehicles.
The carriage is विशेषकर designed लिये निजी यात्री उपयोग and for comfort or elegance, though some are also used to transport goods.
It may be light, smart and fast or heavy, विशाल और आरामदायक.
Carriages normally have suspension using leaf springs, अंडाकार स्रोतों ( in the 19th सदी ) or leather strapping.
A public passenger vehicle would not प्रायः be पुकारा a carriage – शर्तें लिये ऐसे शामिल stagecoach, charabanc and omnibus.
Working वाहनों ऐसे as the ( four-wheeled ) वैगन और ( two-wheeled ) कार्ट share important parts of the history of the carriage, as is the fast ( two-wheeled ) chariot.
The 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake was an undersea megathrust earthquake that occurred at 00:58:53 utc on संडे, 26 दिसम्बर 2004, साथ an epicentre off the west coast of Sumatra, Indonesia.
The quake itself is known by the वैज्ञानिक जातियाँ as the Sumatra–Andaman earthquake.
The resulting tsunami was given various names, including the 2004 भारतीय समंदर सुनामी, दक्षिण एशियाई सुनामी, इंडोनेशियाई tsunami, and the Boxing Day tsunami.
The earthquake was caused by subduction और triggered a श्रेणी of विनाशकारी tsunamis साथ the coasts of सबसे landmasses bordering the Indian Ocean, killing over 230,000 people in fourteen countries, and inundating coastal communities with waves up to high.
It was एक of the deadliest प्राकृतिक आपदाओं in recorded history.
Indonesia was the hardest-hit देश, followed by श्री Lanka, India, and Thailand.
With a magnitude of Mw 9.1–9.3, it is the तीसरा largest भूकंप ever recorded on a seismograph.
The earthquake had the longest duration of faulting कभी observed, between 8.3 and 10 minutes.
It caused the entire planet to vibrate as much as और triggered अन्य भूकंप as far away as Alaska.
इसके epicentre थी between simeulue and mainland Indonesia.
The plight of the affected people और देशों prompted a worldwide humanitarian response.
In all, the विश्वव्यापी जातियाँ दान अधिक than $ 14 billion ( 2004 US $ ) in humanitarian aid.
Steam rising from the nesjavellir Geothermal Power Station in Iceland.
geothermal उर्जा is थर्मल energy generated and stored in the Earth.
थर्मल energy is the energy that determines the temperature of matter.
the geothermal उर्जा of the धरती 's क्रस्ट originates from the original formation of the planet ( 20 % ) and from radioactive decay of minerals ( 80 % ).
The geothermal gradient, which is the अंतर in तापमान between the कोर of the ग्रह और इसके surface, drives a continuous conduction of thermal energy in the form of heat from the core to the surface.
The adjective geothermal originates from the Greek roots γη ( ge ), अर्थ धरती, और θερμος ( thermos ), meaning hot.
At the कोर of the धरती, थर्मल energy is created by radioactive decay and temperatures may reach over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ).
Heat conducts from the core to surrounding कूलर चट्टान.
The ऊँची तापमान और दबाव कारण some rock to melt, creating magma convection upward since it is lighter than the solid rock.
The मैग्मा heats चट्टान और जल in the crust, sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ).
From hot springs, geothermal उर्जा रै महरूम प्रयुक्त for bathing since Paleolithic times and for space heating since ancient Roman times, but it is now better known for electricity generation.
Worldwide, about 10,715 megawatts ( mw ) of geothermal शक्ति is ऑनलाइन in 24 countries.
An additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal heating capacity is installed for district heating, space हीटिंग, स्पा, औद्योगिक प्रक्रियाओं, desalination and agricultural applications.
Geothermal power is cost effective, reliable, sustainable, and environmentally friendly, but has historically महरूम सीमित to क्षेत्रों निकट tectonic थाली सीमाएँ.
Recent technological advances have dramatically विस्तारित the दायरा और आकार of सुगठित संसाधन, विशेषकर लिये अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as घर heating, opening a potential for widespread exploitation.
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases trapped deep within the धरती, लकिन ये emissions हैं much निम्नतर प्रति उर्जा unit than those of fossil fuels.
As a परिणाम, geothermal शक्ति रै the potential to help mitigate global warming if widely deployed in place of fossil fuels.
The धरती 's geothermal संसाधन are theoretically more than adequate to supply humanity 's energy needs, but only a very small fraction may be profitably exploited.
Drilling and खोजी लिये गहन संसाधन is very expensive.
Forecasts for the भविष्य of geothermal शक्ति निर्भर on assumptions about technology, energy prices, subsidies, and interest rates.
Pilot programs like EWEB 's customer opt in Green Power Program show that customers होता be willing to अदा a छोटी अधिक लिये a बेदर्दी energy source like geothermal.
But as a result of government assisted research and industry अनुभव, the लागत of generating geothermal शक्ति has decreased by 25 % over the past two decades.
In 2001, geothermal energy लागत between दो और टेन सेंट per kwh.
the पद घन पैर is an इम्पीरियल और us प्रथागत ( non- metric ) unit of volume, used in the United States and the United Kingdom.
It is पारिभाषित as the आवाज़ of a cube with sides of one foot ( 0.3048 m ) in length.
To calculate cubic feet गुणा लंबाई x width X height.
Hồ Chí Minh ( Northern Vietnamese pronunciation :, Southern Vietnamese pronunciation : ) ; 19 May 1890 – 2 September 1969 ), born Nguyễn Sinh Cung and also known as Nguyễn Tất thành और nguyễn ái quốc, थी a वियतनामी कम्युनिस्ट क्रांतिकारी नेता जो थी प्रधान मंत्री ( 1945–1955 ) और अध्यक्ष ( 1945–1969 ) of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam ( North Vietnam ).
He was a key figure in the foundation of the लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of वियतनाम in 1945, as खूब as the people’s फौज of वियतनाम ( PAVN ) and the Việt Cộng ( NLF or VC ) during the Vietnam War.
He led the Việt Minh स्वतंत्रता गति इससे 1941 onward, establishing the कम्युनिस्ट -नियमd लोकतांत्रिक Republic of Vietnam in 1945 and defeating the French Union in 1954 at the battle of Điện Biên Phủ.
He officially stepped down from power in 1955 due to health problems, but remained a highly visible figurehead and inspiration for those Vietnamese लड़ लिये उसके cause—a संयुक्त, कम्युनिस्ट Vietnam—until his death.
After the war, Saigon, capital of the गणतंत्र of वियतनाम, थी renamed Hồ Chí Minh City.
All सड़कें सीसे घर is a feature film released on September 26, 2008.
Directed by Dennis Fallon, it stars Peter Boyle, Patton Oswalt, Jason London, Vivien cardone, वैनेसा शाखा, पीटर कायोटी, स्टीफन Milton, and Allan Kayser.
The movie was filmed in and around कान्सास नगर, मिसौरी.
The movie made इसके संसार प्रीमियर जनवरी 27 at the Santa Barbara International Film Festival.
The फिल्मी रै भी recently महरूम in several film festivals, and has received bad reviews.
Peter Boyle died पहले the movie 's release.
It was the last फिल्म he appeared in.
Sales taxes in the United States are taxes placed on the बिक्री or पट्टे of goods और सेवाएं in the United States.
While no national सामान्य बिक्री कर exists, the संघीय सरकारी levies several national selective sales taxes on the sale or lease of particular goods and services.
Furthermore, forty-five states, the District of Columbia, and Guam थोपने सामान्य बिक्री कर कि लागू to the बिक्री or पट्टे of सबसे goods और कुछ सेवाएं, and states also may levy selective sales taxes on the sale or lease of particular goods or services.
States may also delegate to local governments the प्राधिकार to थोपने अतिरिक्त सामान्य or selective sales taxes.
Sales tax is गणना by multiplying the purchase price by the applicable tax rate.
Tax rates vary widely by क्षेत्राधिकार और दायरा इससे less than 1 % to over 10 %.
Sales कर is एकत्रित by the seller at the time of sale.
Use tax is self assessed by a buyer who रै नहीं सशुल्क बिक्री कर on a taxable खरीदें.
Unlike the value added tax, a sales कर is imposed तभी एकबार, at the retail level.
However, in cases where वस्तुएं हैं बेची at खुदरा अधिक than एकबार, such as used cars, the sales tax can be charged on the same item indefinitely.
The definition of retail sales और कया goods और सेवाएं हैं taxable vary among the states.
Nearly all jurisdictions provide numerous श्रेणी of goods and services that are exempt from sales tax, or taxed at reduced rates.
The purchase of goods for further manufacture or लिये पुनर्विक्रय is uniformly exempt from sales tax.
Most jurisdictions exempt food sold in grocery stores, prescription medications, और अनेक agricultural आपूर्तियाँ.
Sales taxes, including those imposed by local governments, are generally administered at the राज्य स्तर.
States imposing sales कर आवश्यकता खुदरा विक्रेता to collect tax from customers, file returns, and remit the tax to the state.
प्रक्रियात्मक नियम vary widely.
Sellers generally must collect कर इससे in-state purchasers जबतक the क्रेता provides an exemption certificate.
Most states allow or require इलेक्ट्रॉनिक remittance.
A central processing unit ( CPU ), भी referred to as a सेंट्रल प्रोसेसर ईकाई, is the हार्डवेयर भीतर a कंप्यूटर कि carries आउट the निर्देश of a कंप्यूटर कार्यक्रम by performing the basic arithmetical, logical, and input/output operations of the system.
The term has महरूम in उपयोग in the कंप्यूटर उद्योग at least since the early 1960s.
The form, design, and implementation of CPUs have changed over the कोर्स of उनके इतिहास, लकिन उनके आधारभूत operation remains much the same.
A computer can have अधिक than एक cpu ; इस is called multiprocessing.
Some integrated circuits ( ICs ) can contain अनेक cpu on a single chip ; those ICs are called multi-core processors.
Two typical components of a cpu हैं the गणित लॉजिक ईकाई ( alu ), जिससे performs गणित and logical operations, and the control unit ( CU ), which extracts instructions from memory and decodes and executes them, calling on the ALU when necessary.
Not all computational systems rely on a सेंट्रल प्रसंस्करण ईकाई.
An array processor or vector processor has multiple parallel कम्प्यूटिंग तत्व, साथ no एक ईकाई माना the `` बीच ''.
In the वितरित कम्प्यूटिंग मॉडल, समस्याएं हैं solved by a distributed interconnected set of processors.
RFID chip next to a अनाज of राइस.
This chip contains a radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड कुंडली कि modulates an external magnetic field to transfer a coded identification number when queried by a reader device.
This small type is incorporated in consumer products, और implanted in पालतु, लिये पहचान purposes.
Radio-frequency identification ( RFID ) is the wireless non-contact उपयोग of radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र आंकड़ा, लिये the purposes of automatically identifying and tracking tags attached to objects.
the टैग contain electronically stored information.
Some tags are powered and read at छोटी सीमाएँ ( a few मीटर ) via magnetic fields ( electromagnetic induction ).
Others use a local power source such as a battery, or else have no battery but collect energy from the interrogating em फ़ील्ड, और तब अधिनियम as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or UHF radio waves ( i.e., electromagnetic radiation at high frequencies ).
Battery powered tags may operate at सैंकड़ों of मीटर.
Unlike a bar code, the tag does नहीं necessarily need to be भीतर line of sight of the reader, and may be embedded in the tracked object.
RFID tags are used in अनेक उद्योग.
An RFID tag attached to an automobile during production can be used to track इसके प्रगति through the सभा लकीर.
Pharmaceuticals can be tracked through warehouses.
Livestock and पालतु may have टैग injected, allowing positive identification of the animal.
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing, possessions, or even implanted भीतर लोगों, the सम्भावना of पढना personally-linked सूचना without consent has raised privacy concerns.
ओवरटाइम is the राशि of time someone works beyond normal working hours.
सामान्य घंटों may be संकल्पित in several ways:
by कस्टम ( कया is considered healthy or reasonable by society ),
by practices of a दिए व्यापार or profession,
by legislation,
by agreement between employers and मजदूर or उनके प्रतिनिधि.
Most nations have overtime labor laws designed to dissuade or prevent नियोक्ता इससे forcing उनके कर्मचारी to कार्य excessively long घंटों.
These laws may take into account other considerations than the humanitarian, ऐसे as preserving the स्वास्थ्य of मजदूर so कि वे may continue to be productive, or increasing the overall level of employment in the economy.
One common दृष्टिकोण to regulating ओवरटाइम is to require employers to pay workers at a higher hourly rate for overtime work.
Companies may choose to pay workers higher overtime pay even if not obliged to do so by विधि, विशेषकर if वे मानना कि वे फेस a पिछड़ा झुकने सप्लाई curve of labour.
Overtime pay rates can कारण मजदूर to कार्य longer hours than they would at a flat hourly rate.
Overtime laws, attitudes toward overtime and hours of work vary greatly इससे देश to देश और between अलग economic sectors.
Visualization of links between पृष्ठों on a विक using a force-directed layout.
Force-directed graph drawing algorithms are a क्लास of algorithms for drawing graphs in an aesthetically pleasing way.
Their purpose is to position the nodes of a graph in two-dimensional or three-dimensional space so that all the edges are of more or less equal length and there are as few crossing edges as possible, by assigning शक्तियां among the नियत of किनारे और the नियत of नोड, आधारित on उनके सापेक्ष स्थितियाँ, और तब using ये शक्तियां either to सिमुलेट the motion of the edges and nodes or to minimize their energy.
While graph drawing can be a difficult problem, force-directed algorithms, being physical simulations, usually require no खास ज्ञान परिचय आलेख सिद्धान्त ऐसे as planarity.
Purchasing power ( sometimes retroactively पुकारा समायोजित लिये महंगाई ) is the राशि of goods or services that can be purchased with a unit of currency.
For उदाहरण, if तुम था लिया एक डालर to a स्टोर in the 1950s, तुम होता have महरूम able to buy a greater number of items than you would today, indicating that you would have had a greater purchasing power in the 1950s.
Currency can be either a commodity money, like gold or silver, or fiat करेंसी, or free-floating market-valued करेंसी like US dollars.
As Adam Smith विख्यात, having धन देता एक the क्षमता to `` कमांड '' अन्य ' labor, so purchasing power to some extent is power over other people, to the extent that they are willing to trade their labor or goods for money or currency.
If one 's monetary income stays the वही, लकिन the दाम स्तर increases, the खरीदना power of that income falls.
Inflation does not always imply falling purchasing power of one 's धन आय चूंकि it may वृद्धि faster than the price level.
A higher real income means a higher purchasing power since real income refers to the आय समायोजित लिये महंगाई.
For a price index, its value in the आधार साल is प्रायः normalized to a value of 100.
The purchasing power of a unit of करेंसी, कह a डालर, in a दिए साल, expressed in dollars of the base year, is 100/P, where P is the price index in that year.
So, by definition the purchasing शक्ति of a डालर decreases as the price level rises.
The purchasing power in today 's money of an amount C of money, t years into the भविष्य, can be computed साथ the सूत्र लिये the उपस्थित value :
where in this case i is an assumed future annual महंगाई रेट.
Education in South Korea is viewed as being crucial for success and प्रतियोगिता is consequently very heated and fierce.
A central administration oversees the process for the शिक्षा of children इससे kindergarten to the third and final year of high school.
Mathematics, science, Korean, अंग्रेज़ी, और सोशल अध्ययन हैं generally माना to be the most important subjects.
Normally physical education is not considered important as it is not recognised, by the generally academic elitist दक्षिण कोरियाई populace, as शिक्षा और इसलिए अनेक स्कूलों lack high-quality gymnasiums and varsity athletics.
South Korea was the first country in the world to provide high-speed अंतरजाल अभिगम to सब प्राथमिक, जूनियर, and high schools.
Although South Korean विद्यार्थी प्रायः रैंक अत्यधिक on अंतरराष्ट्रीय तुलनात्मक आकलन जब compared to students of most Western education systems, the South Korean education system is criticised for emphasising too much upon passive learning and memorisation.
The South Korean education system is rather notably strict and overly structured as compared to इसके counterparts in सबसे पश्चिमी societies.
Also, the prevalence of non-school for-profit private institutes ऐसे as अकादमियों or cram-schools ( hagwon [ 학원 ] ), जिससे too emphasise on passive memorisation, as opposed to conceptual understanding, in students are criticised as a major social problem.
The My Lai Massacre (, ;,, or ) थी the वियतनाम युद्ध द्रव्यमान हत्या of between 347 और 504 निहत्थे civilians in South Vietnam on March 16, 1968, by United States Army soldiers of `` Charlie '' Company of 1st Battalion, 20th Infantry Regiment, 11th Brigade of the Americal Division.
Victims शामिल महिलाओं, मेन, children, and infants.
Some of the women were gang-raped and their bodies were later found to be mutilated और अनेक महिलाओं यहूद allegedly raped prior to the हत्याओं.
While 26 U.S. soldiers were initially चार्ज साथ दण्ड offenses लिये उनके क्रियाएँ at Mỹ Lai, only Second Lieutenant William Calley, a platoon leader in Charlie Company, was convicted.
Found guilty of killing 22 villagers, he was originally दिए a जीवन वाक्य, लकिन तभी परोसा three and a half years under house arrest.
The नरसंहार took प्लेस in the hamlets of My Lai and My Khe of Son My village.
The event is also ज्ञात as the बेटे my नरसंहार, विशेषकर in the Vietnamese state media.
the u.S. सैन्य codeword for the `` Viet Cong stronghold '' was `` Pinkville ''.
The incident prompted global आक्रोश जब it became पब्लिक knowledge in 1969.
The massacre also increased domestic विपक्ष to the u.S. भागीदारी in the वियतनाम War.
Three U.S. servicemen who had tried to halt the massacre and protect the wounded were initially denounced by अनेक u.s. कांग्रेसियों as traitors.
They received hate mail and death threats and found mutilated पशु on उनके doorsteps.
The three were later widely praised and सजा by the फौज लिये उनके heroic actions.
The hijackers in the September 11 attacks were 19 men संबद्ध साथ al-qaeda, और 15 of the 19 यहूद citizens of Saudi Arabia.
अन्य यहूद इससे Egypt, Lebanon, and the UAE.
The hijackers were व्यवस्थित into चार टीमों, प्रत्येक led by a pilot-trained hijacker साथ चार `` muscle hijackers '' who were trained to help subdue the pilots, passengers, and crew.
The first hijackers to arrive in the United States were Khalid al-Mihdhar and Nawaf al-hazmi, जो settled in the सैन डिएगो क्षेत्रफल in January 2000.
They were followed by three hijacker-pilots, Mohamed Atta, Marwan al-shehhi, और ziad jarrah जल्दी in the गर्मियाँ of 2000 to undertake flight training in south Florida.
The fourth hijacker-pilot, hani hanjour, arrived in San Diego in December 2000.
The rest of the `` muscle hijackers '' arrived in the spring and early गर्मियाँ of 2001, बस महीने before the September 11 attacks.
Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd allāh इब्न ʿabd al-muṭṭalib इब्न hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 June 632 ), also transliterated as Muhammad ( ), was a religious, political, and military leader from Mecca who unified Arabia into a single religious polity under Islam.
he is believed by मुसलमान and Bahá'ís to be a messenger and prophet of God.
Muhammad is लगभग universally माना by मुसलमान as the last prophet sent by God for mankind.
Non-Muslims लिहाज़ मुहम्मद as the founder of Islam.
Muslims consider उसे to be the restorer of an अनछुए असली monotheistic faith of Adam, Noah, Abraham, Moses, Jesus, and other prophets.
Born in about 570 CE in the Arabian नगर of मक्का, he थी अनाथ at an जल्दी आयु and brought up under the care of his uncle Abu Talib.
He later worked mostly as a व्यापारी, as खूब as a गड़रिये, और was first married by age 25.
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a गुफा in the surrounding kyu लिये अनेक नाइट्स of seclusion और दुआ, he later reported that it was there, at age 40, that he received his first revelation from God.
Three सालो बाद इस इवेंट मुहम्मद प्रारंभ preaching these revelations publicly, proclaiming that `` God is One ``, that complete `` surrender '' to Him ( lit.
islām ) is the only way ( dīn ) स्वीकार्य to परमेश्वर, और कि he खुद थी a नबी और मेसेंजर of परमेश्वर, in the same vein as other Islamic prophets.
Muhammad gained few followers early on, and was met with दुश्मनी इससे कुछ meccan जनजातियों ; he और उसके अनुसरणकर्ता यहूद treated harshly.
To escape persecution, मुहम्मद भेजा कुछ of उसके अनुसरणकर्ता to अबीसीनिया before he and his followers in Mecca migrated to Medina ( then known as Yathrib ) in the year 622.
This event, the Hijra, marks the शुरूआत of the इस्लामी calendar, which is also known as the Hijri Calendar.
In Medina, Muhammad united the tribes under the संविधान of मदीना.
After eight years of fighting with the meccan जनजातियों, उसके अनुसरणकर्ता, जो by तब था grown to 10,000, took कंट्रोल of मक्का in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca.
He destroyed the pagan idols in the city and then sent his followers आउट to नष्ट सब of the बाकी pagan मंदिरों in Eastern Arabia.
In 632, a few months after returning to Medina from the विदाई यात्राएं, मुहम्मद fell ill and died.
By the time of his death, most of the Arabian प्रायद्वीप था परिवर्तित to islam, और he था संयुक्त अरब into a single Muslim religious polity.
The revelations ( or ayah, lit.
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — which Muhammad reported receiving until his death – form the verses of the कुरान, regarded by मुसलमान as the `` शब्द of परमेश्वर '' और around which the religion is based.
Besides the Quran, Muhammad 's life ( सिरा ) और परंपराओं ( सुन्नत ) हैं भी upheld by मुसलमान as the sources of sharia law.
They discuss Muhammad और अन्य नबियों of islam साथ reverence, adding the phrase peace be upon him whenever their names are mentioned.
While conceptions of Muhammad in medieval Christendom and premodern times were largely ऋणात्मक, appraisals in आधुनिक इतिहास have महरूम दूर कम so.
This is a सूची of टेबल of the सत्यापित oldest लोगों in the world in ordinal rank, such as oldest person or oldest man.
In these tables, a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if his or her claim has been validated by an अंतरराष्ट्रीय देह कि specifically सौदे in आयु शोध, ऐसे as the जराविद्या Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records.
The longest unambiguously प्रलेखित इंसान जीवनकाल is कि of Jeanne Calment of France ( 1875–1997 ), who died at age 122 years, 164 days.
She met Vincent van Gogh जब वो थी 12 or 13.
This led to news media ध्यान in 1985, बाद calment turned 110.
subsequent छानबीन मिला दस्तावेज़ीकरण लिये calment 's age, beyond any reasonable question, in the records of her native city, Arles, France.
More evidence of Calment 's lifespan has been produced than for any other supercentenarian ; उसके मामला serves as an archetype in the methodology लिये verifying the आयु of the world 's oldest people.
The longest undisputed lifespan for male supercentenarians is that of jiroemon किमुरा, जो फिलहाल जीवनदान in जापानी और is आयु as of.
Since the death of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of the United States, on 17 December 2012, Kimura, born 19 April 1897, is the oldest जीना व्यक्ति in the world whose age can be documented.
he रै भी महरूम the oldest जीना man चूंकि the death of 114-year old Walter Breuning on 14 April 2011.
Since the death of 115-year बूढ़ा koto okubo of जापानी on 12 जनवरी 2013, the oldest living woman has been -year-old Misao Okawa, also from Japan, born on 5 March 1898.
इस is a समयरेखा of the African-American Civil Rights Movement.
The सिविल अधिकारों गति थी a स्वतंत्रता struggle by African Americans in the 1950s and 1960s to gain equality.
The goals of the movement were स्वतंत्रता इससे पक्षपात, बराबर अवसर in नियुक्ति, शिक्षा और housing, the right to vote and equal access to public facilities.
Heavy metal ( often referred to as metal ) is a विधा of चट्टान म्यूज़िक कि विकसित in the लेट 1960s और जल्दी 1970s, largely in the United Kingdom and in the United States.
With roots in blues चट्टान और साइकेडेलिक चट्टान, the bands कि निर्मित भारी मेटल developed a thick, massive sound, characterized by highly amplified distortion, extended guitar solos, emphatic beats, and overall loudness.
Heavy metal lyrics and performance शैलियाँ हैं generally संबद्ध with masculinity and machismo.
The first heavy metal bands such as Led Zeppelin, Deep Purple and ब्लैक sabbath आकर्षित विशाल ऑडियंस, हालांकि they were often derided by critics, a status common throughout the history of the genre.
In the mid-1970s Judas Priest helped spur the विधा 's एवोल्यूशन by discarding much of its blues influence ; Motörhead introduced a punk rock sensibility and an increasing emphasis on speed.
Bands in the New Wave of British Heavy Metal such as आयरन maiden followed in a similar vein.
Before the end of the decade, heavy metal fans became known as `` metalheads `` or `` headbangers ``.
During the 1980s, glam मेटल became a वाणिज्यिक फ़ोर्स साथ समूह जैसे Mötley Crüe and Poison.
Underground scenes produced an array of more extreme, aggressive styles : thrash मेटल broke into the मुख्यधारा साथ bands ऐसे as मेटालिका, मेगाडेथ, slayer, और एंथ्रेक्स, जबकि other styles of the most extreme subgenres of metal like death metal and black metal remain subcultural phenomena.
Since the mid-1990s, popular styles such as nu metal, which often incorporates elements of grunge and hip hop ; and metalcore, which blends extreme मेटल साथ हार्डकोर पंक, have further विस्तारित the परिभाषा of the genre.
the far-right ( भी ज्ञात as the चरम right ) refers to the highest degree of rightism in right-wing politics.
Far right politics involves support of strong or complete social hierarchy in society, and supports supremacy of certain individuals or समूह deemed to be innately श्रेष्ठ or preferable who are to be more valued than those deemed to be innately inferior or undesirable.
the दूर सही 's वकालत of supremacism is आधारित on कया इसके adherents perceive as स्वाभाविक characteristics of people that can not be changed.
This stands as a point of difference with the centre-right 's attribution of behaviours, such as आलस्य or decadence, as the प्राथमिक स्त्रोत of social inequalities.
The centre right—unlike the दूर right—claims कि लोगों can समाप्त their behavioural inferiority through changing their habits and choices.
The original far right, which emerged in फ़्रांस बाद the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति, refused to accept the फ्रेंच गणतंत्र और समर्थित a counter-revolution to restore the French monarchy and aristocracy.
The far right is commonly संबद्ध साथ व्यक्तियों or समूह जो थाम चरम राष्ट्रवादी, xenophobic, racist, religious fundamentalist or reactionary views.
The most extreme-right movements have pursued दमन और नरसंहार विरूद्ध समूह of लोगों on the basis of their alleged inferiority.
Thomas Hobbes of Malmesbury ( 5 April 1588 – 4 December 1679 ), in some older texts Thomas Hobbs of Malmsbury, थी an अंग्रेज़ी पारस, बेहतरीन ज्ञात आज लिये उसके कार्य on राजनैतिक philosophy.
His 1651 book Leviathan स्थापित the न्यास लिये सबसे of पश्चिमी political philosophy from the perspective of social contract theory.
Hobbes was a champion of absolutism for the sovereign, but he also developed some of the fundamentals of European liberal thought : the right of the individual ; the natural equality of all men ; the artificial character of the political order ( which led to the later distinction between civil society and the state ) ; the view कि सब legitimate राजनैतिक शक्ति जरूर be `` प्रतिनिधि '' और आधारित on the सहमति of the लोगों ; और a उदार interpretation of law which leaves people free to do whatever the law does not explicitly forbid.
He was one of the संस्थापकों of आधुनिक political philosophy.
His understanding of humans as being matter and motion, obeying the same शारीरिक कानून as अन्य पदार्थ और गति, remains influential ; and his account of human nature as self-interested cooperation, and of political communities as being based upon a `` social contract `` remains one of the major topics of political philosophy.
In addition to political philosophy, Hobbes also contributed to a diverse array of other fields, सहित इतिहास, भूगोल, the physics of gases, theology, ethics, and general philosophy.
Emotional intelligence ( EI ) is the ability to identify, assess, और कंट्रोल the भाव of oneself, of अन्य, और of groups.
It can be divided into क्षमता EI and trait EI.
Ability EI is usually measured using maximum performance tests and has stronger relationships with traditional intelligence, whereas trait ei is प्रायः measured using self-report questionnaires और रै stronger संबंध with personality.
Criticisms have centered on whether ei is a रियल प्रज्ञा और whether it रै वृद्धिशील validity over IQ and the Big Five personality traits.
Heredity is the passing of traits to offspring इससे इसके अभिभावक or पूर्वज.
This is the process by which an offspring cell or organism acquires or becomes predisposed to the विशेषताएँ of its parent cell or organism.
Through heredity, विसंगतियाँ exhibited by individuals can accumulate and cause some species to evolve.
The study of आनुवंशिकता in जीवविज्ञान is पुकारा आनुवंशिकी, which includes the field of epigenetics.
For United States individual income tax, adjusted gross income ( agi ) is कुल सकल आय minus specific reductions.
Taxable income is adjusted gross आय ऋण भत्तों for personal exemptions and itemized deductions.
For most individual tax purposes, AGI is more प्रासंगिक than सकल आय.
Gross income is sales price of goods or प्रॉपर्टी, ऋण cost of the property sold, plus other income.
It includes wages, interest, dividends, business income, rental income, and all अन्य प्रकार of income.
Adjusted gross income is gross income less deductions from a कारोबार or rental कार्यकलाप और 21 अन्य विशिष्ट वस्तुएं.
Several deductions ( e.g. medical खर्च और विविध itemized deductions ) are limited based on a percentage of AGI.
Certain phase outs, सहित those of निम्नतर कर दरों and itemized deductions, are based on levels of AGI.
Many states base state आय कर on AGI with certain deductions.
`` Lazy Eye '' is the तीसरा सिंगल इससे silversun Pickups ' debut album Carnavas.
The band performed the song on the Late Show with David लेटरमैन, the tonight दिखाएँ साथ jay लीनो, बाद साथ jools हॉलैंड, और पिछला कॉल with Carson Daly.
The song is a playable track on Rock Band 2 and Guitar नायिका : संसार दौरे.
An alternate version of the सोंग, साथ a लंबाई of 7:27, थी निभाई on xmu पहले the shorter version was played on FM and other XM channels.
This version was प्रदर्शित on उनके डेमो cd ( जिससे प्रदर्शित early versions of four tracks ).
A telephone prefix is the पहला नियत of अंक of a टेलीफोन क्रमांक ; in the उत्तर अमरीकी क्रमांकन योजना countries ( country code 1 ), it is the first three digits of a seven-digit phone number.
In other countries दोनो the उपसर्ग और the क्रमांक may have different lengths.
It shows which एक्सचेंज the बाकी संख्याएँ refer to.
A full telephone number is usually made up of country code ( required for international काल्स तभी ), क्षेत्रफल कोड ( जरूरी लिये काल्स between टेलीफोन areas ), prefix, and subscriber number.
Some places restrict certain prefixes to fax numbers or cell फोन तभी ; in अन्य स्थान ऐसे समर्पित prefixes are not used.
As telephone प्रौद्योगिकी उन्नत, the precise significance of the उपसर्ग became धुंधला in अनेक स्थान ; 485 in London, UK, was once the GULliver exchange, but now 44207485xxxx is just considered one of many number blocks served by the CLKEN Kentish Town exchange ; 4420770703xx is another.
Metformin ( BP, pronounced, ; originally बेची as glucophage ) is an मौखिक antidiabetic drug in the biguanide class.
It is the first-line drug of choice for the उपचार of प्रकार 2 diabetes, in particular, in overweight and obese people and those with normal kidney function.
Its use in गर्भकालीन मधुमेह has been limited by safety concerns.
It is also used in the treatment of polycystic ovary syndrome, and रै महरूम investigated लिये अन्य रोगों जहाँ इंसुलिन प्रतिरोध may be an important factor.
Metformin works by suppressing ग्लूकोज उत्पादन by the liver.
Metformin is the तभी antidiabetic ड्रग कि रै been conclusively shown to prevent the cardiovascular complications of diabetes.
It helps reduce LDL cholesterol and triglyceride स्तर, और is नहीं associated with weight gain.
, metformin is एक of तभी दो मौखिक antidiabetics in the संसार स्वास्थ्य Organization Model List of Essential Medicines ( the other being glibenclamide ).
When prescribed appropriately, metformin कल्याणकारी few प्रतिकूल प्रभाव ( the सबसे आम is जठरांत्र upset ) and is associated with a low risk of hypoglycemia.
Lactic acidosis ( a buildup of lactate in the रक्त ) can be a गंभीर चिंता in overdose और जब it is विहित to people with contraindications, but otherwise, there is no significant risk.
First synthesized and found to reduce रक्त शुगर in the 1920s, metformin थी forgotten लिये the अगला दो दशकों as research shifted to insulin and other antidiabetic drugs.
Interest in metformin was rekindled in the late 1940s after several reports that it could reduce blood sugar levels in people, and in 1957, French चिकित्सक जां sterne प्रकाशित the पहला नैदानिक विचारण of metformin as a उपचार लिये मधुमेह.
It was introduced to the संयुक्त किंगडम in 1958, कनाडा in 1972, और the United States in 1995.
Metformin is now believed to be the most widely prescribed antidiabetic drug in the world ; in the United States alone, more than 48 लाख prescriptions यहूद भर in 2010 लिये इसके जेनेरिक formulations.
The Mount Rushmore National मेमोरियल is a मूर्तिकला carved into the granite face of Mount Rushmore near Keystone, South Dakota, in the United States.
Sculpted by Danish-American Gutzon Borglum and his son, Lincoln Borglum, माउंट rushmore सुविधाएँ sculptures of the heads of चार संयुक्त राज्य राष्ट्रपतियों : George Washington, Thomas Jefferson, Theodore Roosevelt and Abraham Lincoln.
The संपूर्ण मेमोरियल कवर and is above sea level.
The tallest पहाड़ in the प्रदेश is Harney Peak ( ).
South Dakota historian Doane Robinson is credited with conceiving the idea of नक्काशी the likenesses of प्रसिद्ध लोगों into the ब्लैक पहाड़ियाँ प्रदेश of दक्षिण डकोटा in order to promote tourism in the region.
रॉबिन्सन 's आरंभिक विचार थी to sculpt the needles ; however, gutzon borglum अस्वीकृत the needles साईट क्युकी of the poor quality of the granite and strong opposition from environmentalists and Native American groups.
They settled on the माउंट rushmore स्थान, जिससे भी रै the advantage of facing southeast for maximum sun exposure.
Robinson wanted it to feature western heroes like Lewis and Clark, Red Cloud and Buffalo Bill Cody but Borglum decided the मूर्तिकला चाहिए have a अधिक नेशनल फ़ोकस, और chose the four presidents whose likenesses would be carved into the mountain.
बाद securing संघीय funding, निर्माण on the memorial began in 1927, and the presidents ' faces were completed between 1934 and 1939.
Upon Gutzon Borglum 's death in March 1941, उसके बेटे lincoln borglum took over construction.
Although the initial concept called for each president to be depicted from head to कमर, कमी of funding मजबूर निर्माण to समाप्त in लेट अक्तूबर 1941.
The U.S. National Park Service took control of the मेमोरियल in 1933, जबकि it थी स्टिल अंतर्गत निर्माण, and has managed the memorial to the present day.
It attracts nearly तीन लाख people annually.

A shirt, dress shirt, button-front, button-front कमीज़, or button-up कमीज़ is a परिधान साथ a कॉलर, a full-length opening at the front from the collar to the hem, and sleeves with cuffs.
शर्ट हैं predominantly used by men, since women usually wear blouses.
The front खोलने is fastened using buttons or studs, and the cuffs close with buttons or cuff links.
Shirts are normally made from woven cloth, और हैं प्रायः accompanied by a jacket and tie, for example with a suit or formalwear, but shirts are also worn more casually.
In British English, dress shirt means specifically the more formal संध्या परिधान worn साथ black- or white- टाई, भी discussed below.
Some of these formal shirts have stiff fronts and detachable छल्लों संलग्न साथ कॉलर studs.
The term `` button-down '' ( which refers a type of shirt which has a collar fastened down by buttons ) is sometimes used in error to apply to all shirts ( साथ or बगैर buttoned bas छल्लों ), होने प्रयुक्त as a पर्याय लिये `` button-up '' or `` button-front ''.
Administrative Professionals Day ( also known as Secretaries Day or एडमिन दिन ) is an unofficial धर्मनिरपेक्ष अवकाश observed in अनेक countries to recognize the work of secretaries, administrative assistants, receptionists, and other administrative support professionals.
In North America, it is celebrated on the बुधवार of the पिछला पूरा सप्ताह of अप्रैल ( अप्रैल 24 in 2013 ).
In France it is मनाये on the तीसरा गुरुवार in अप्रैल ( April 18 in 2013 ).
In Australia it is मनाये on the first Friday in May

Nicolas Poussin ( ; 15 June 1594 – 19 November 1665 ) थी the अग्रणी चित्रकार of the शास्त्रीय फ्रेंच बरॉक स्टाइल, हालांकि he खर्च most of his working life in Rome.
His work is characterized by स्पष्टता, लॉजिक, और अनुक्रम, and favors line over color.
जबतक the 20th सदी he remained a प्रमुख प्रेरणा लिये ऐसे classically oriented artists as Jacques-Louis David, Jean-Auguste-Dominique Ingres and Paul Cézanne.
he worked in रोम लिये a वृत्त of अग्रणी collectors वहीँ और elsewhere, मगर for a short period when Cardinal Richelieu ordered him back to France to serve as First Painter to the King.
Most of उसके works हैं इतिहास paintings of धार्मिक or पौराणिक subjects that very often have a large landscape element.
Jackie Keith Whitley ( July 1, 1954Stambler, इरविन, और grelun landon ( 2000 ). - देश म्यूज़िक : the ज्ञानकोष. - नई यॉर्क : st. मार्टिन 's दबायें. - p.533. - isbn 978-0-312-26487-1.—carlin, रिचर्ड ( 2003 ). - देश म्यूज़िक : a biographical शब्दकोष. - नई यॉर्क : routledge - p.427. - isbn 978-0-415-93802-0.—larkin, कोलिन ( 1995 ). - the गिनीज ज्ञानकोष of लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक. - नई यॉर्क : स्टॉकटन दबायें - P.4462. - ISBN 978-0-85112-662-3.—Stanton, Scott ( 2003 ). - The Tombstone Tourist : Musicians. - New York : Pocket Books. - p.395. - ISBN 978-0-7434-6330-0.—Hicks, Jack. - `` Singer Keith Whitley 's Memory Alive Through Songs, Love in Home Town ''. - The Kentucky Post. - September 25, 1991.— '' Country Music Star Keith Whitley Dead at 33 ''. - Lexington Herald-Leader. - May 10, 1989.——Hurst, Jack. - `` Whitley 's Last Days ''. - Chicago Tribune. - May 14, 1989.— '' Alcohol Kills Country Singer Keith Whitley ''. - United Press International. - ( c/o The San Francisco Chronicle ). - May 10, 1989. — May 9, 1989 ), known professionally as Keith Whitley, was an American country music singer.

A statute is a formal written enactment of a विधान प्राधिकार कि governs a state, city, or county.
Typically, statutes command or prohibit कुछ, or declare policy.
The word is often used to distinguish law made by legislative bodies इससे मामला विधि, decided by न्यायालयों, and regulations issued by government agencies.
statutes हैं sometimes referred to as legislation or `` black letter law. ''
As a source of law, statutes are considered primary authority ( as opposed to द्वितीयक प्राधिकार ).
Ideally all statutes must be in सामंजस्य साथ the आधारभूत law of the land ( constitutional ).
This word is प्रयुक्त in contradistinction to the common law.
Statutes acquire उनके फ़ोर्स इससे the समय of उनके ड्योढ़ी, however unless otherwise provided.
Statutes are of अनेक kinds ; namely, Public or private.
Declaratory or remedial.
अस्थाई or perpetual.
A temporary statute is एक जिससे is सीमित in इसके अवधि at the time of its enactment.
It continues in force until the time of इसके limitation रै समाप्त, unless sooner repealed.
A perpetual statute is one for the continuance of जिससे वहीँ is no सीमित समय, हालांकि it may नहीं be expressly declared to be so.
If, however, a statute which did not itself contain any limitation is to be governed by another जिससे is अस्थाई तभी, the पूर्व होगा भी be अस्थाई और निर्भर upon the existence of the latter.
पहले a statute becomes विधि in कुछ देशों, it must be agreed upon by the highest executive in the government, and finally published as part of a code.
In many countries, statutes are organized in topical arrangements ( or `` संहिताबद्ध '' ) भीतर publications पुकारा कोड, ऐसे as the United States Code.
In many nations statutory law is विशिष्ट इससे और अधीनस्थ to constitutional law.
The बाह्य iliac धमनियों हैं दो प्रमुख धमनियों जिससे bifurcate बंद the आम iliac arteries anterior to the sacroiliac joint of the pelvis.
They proceed anterior and अवर साथ the medial किनारा of the psoas major muscles.
They exit the pelvic girdle posterior and inferior to the वंक्षण स्नायु परिचय एक तीसरा laterally from the insertion point of the inguinal ligament on the pubic tubercle at which point they are referred to as the femoral arteries.
The external iliac artery is usually the artery used to attach the renal धमनी to the प्राप्तकर्ता of a गुर्दा प्रत्यारोपण.
Steam is a digital distribution, डिजिटल अधिकारों प्रबन्धन, एकाधिक and communications platform developed by Valve Corporation.
It is used to वितरित खेल और सम्बन्धित मीडिया ऑनलाइन, इससे छोटी स्वतंत्र डेवलपर to larger software houses ; in October 2012, Valve expanded the service to include non-gaming software.
Steam provides the user साथ संस्थापना और स्वचालित प्रबन्धन of तन्त्र आरपार अनेक कंप्यूटर, community features such as friends lists and groups, cloud saving, and in-game voice and chat functionality.
The software provides a freely available application programming interface, Steamworks, that developers can take advantage of to integrate many of Steam 's functions भीतर उनके तन्त्र उत्पाद, सहित नक़ल सुरक्षा, नेटवर्किंग और matchmaking, in-game achievements and micro-transactions, and support for user-created content through Steam Workshop.
Though initially developed for use on Microsoft Windows, the client has expanded to include OS X and Linux versions, and clients with सीमित कार्यक्षमता on the प्लेस्टेशन 3 कंसोल और लिये दोनो आईओएस and Android mobile devices.
In जोड to होने a सेंट्रल हब लिये गेमिंग तन्त्र, वाल्व रै निर्मित a संस्करण of भाप साथ altered functionality to be used in schools for educational software, including a modified version of Portal 2 for teaching science and critical thinking lessons.
, there are nearly 2000 games available through Steam, and 54 लाख क्रियाशील उपयोक्ता खाते.
As of January 2013, भाप रै देखी over 6.6 million concurrent players.
Steam has an estimated 50–70 % share of the डिजिटल वितरण market for video games.
The Steam logo is a stylised left-side fly-crank and rod from the Walschaerts valve gear of a steam locomotive.
Jerry Lewis ( born March 16, 1926 ) is an American comedian, actor, singer, फिल्मी निर्माता, screenwriter और फिल्मी निदेशक.
He is known for his slapstick ह्यूमर in film, television, stage and radio.
he थी originally युग्म up साथ Dean Martin in 1946, forming the famed comedy team of Martin and Lewis.
In addition to the duo 's लोकप्रिय nightclub कार्य, वे starred in a successful series of comedy films for Paramount Pictures.
Lewis is also known for his charity fund-raising telethons और स्थिति as नेशनल अध्यक्ष लिये the muscular Dystrophy Association ( MDA ).
Lewis has won several awards for आजीवन उपलब्धियाँ इससे the अमरीकी कॉमेडी पुरस्कार, लॉस एंजिल्स Film Critics Association, and Venice Film Festival, and he has two stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
In 2005, he प्राप्त the राज्यपालों पुरस्कार of the अकादमी of टेलीविज़न कला & Sciences Board of Governors, which is the highest Emmy Award presented.
On February 22, 2009, the अकादमी of गति चित्र कला and Sciences awarded Lewis the Jean Hersholt Humanitarian Award.
The Rhine ( ; ; ) is a European river that runs from the Swiss canton of Grisons in the southeastern Swiss Alps through जर्मनी और आखिरकार बहती into the उत्तर समुद्र coast in the नीदरलैंड्स और is the बारहवीं longest नदी in यूरोपीय, at about, with an average discharge of more than.
The Rhine and the डेन्यूब formed सबसे of the उत्तरी अंतर्देशीय frontier of the Roman Empire and, since those days, the Rhine has been a vital and navigable waterway carrying trade and goods deep inland.
It has भी परोसा as a रक्षात्मक विशेषता and has been the basis for regional and international borders.
The many castles और प्रागैतिहासिक fortifications along the Rhine testify to its importance as a waterway.
River traffic could be stopped at these locations, usually for the purpose of collecting tolls, by the राज्य कि नियंत्रित कि portion of the river.
Sri ( सिंहली )
Sri ( Devanagari : श्री, IAST ; Śrī ), also transliterated as Sree or Shri or Shree is a word of Sanskrit origin, used in the Indian subcontinent as polite form of address समतुल्य to the अंग्रेज़ी `` mr. '' in लिखा और बोला भाषा, or as a title of veneration for deities ( usually translated as `` Holy '' ).

Civil engineering is a professional engineering अनुशासन कि सौदे साथ the डिज़ाइन, निर्माण, और मेंटेनेंस of the physical and naturally built environment, including works like roads, bridges, canals, dams, and buildings.
Civil engineering is the oldest engineering discipline after military engineering, and it was पारिभाषित to फर्क non-military अभियान्त्रिकी इससे सैन्य अभियान्त्रिकी.
It is traditionally broken into several sub-disciplines including environmental engineering, geotechnical engineering, geophysics, geodesy, कंट्रोल अभियान्त्रिकी, संरचनात्मक अभियान्त्रिकी, biomechanics, nanotechnology, परिवहन अभियान्त्रिकी, धरती science, atmospheric sciences, forensic engineering, municipal or urban engineering, water resources engineering, materials engineering, coastal engineering, surveying, and construction engineering.
Civil engineering takes place on all levels : in the public sector from municipal through to national governments, and in the private sector from individual homeowners through to international companies.
