Katherine Dunham ( जून 22, 1909 – may 21, 2006 ) was an American dancer, choreographer, author, educator, and social activist.
Dunham had one of the most कामयाब नृत्य करियर in अमरीकी और यूरोपीय theater of the 20th century, and directed her own dance company for many years.
She has been called the `` matriarch और queen mother of black dance ''.
During her heyday in the 1940s and 1950s, Dunham was renowned throughout Europe and Latin America and was widely लोकप्रिय in the संयुक्त राज्य, जहाँ the वॉशिंगटन पोस्ट पुकारा उसके `` नर्तकी कैथरीन the ग्रेट ''.
For almost thirty years she maintained the Katherine Dunham Dance Company, the only self-supported अमरीकी ब्लैक नृत्य troupe at कि समय, और over her long career she choreographed more than ninety individual dances.
Dunham was an innovator in african-american आधुनिक नृत्य as खूब as a नेता in the फ़ील्ड of नृत्य anthropology, or ethnochoreology.
Sphagnum is a genus of between 1510 and 3500 species of mosses, commonly पुकारा peat मॉस due to its prevalence in wet habitats where it contributes to the formation of peat bogs and mires.
Sphagnum accumulations can store water, since both living and dead plants can hold large quantities of water inside उनके कोशिकाएं ; पौधे may थाम इससे 16-26 टाइम्स as much जल as उनके शुष्क वज़न depending on the species.
The empty cells help retain जल in drier conditions.
Hence, as sphagnum moss grows, it can धीरे स्प्रेड into drier शर्तें, forming larger peatlands, both raised bogs and blanket bogs.
These peat accumulations then provide habitat for a wide array of peatland पौधे, सहित sedges और ericaceous shrubs, as खूब as orchids and carnivorous plants.
Sphagnum and the peat formed from it do not decay readily because of the phenolic यौगिकों अंतःस्थापित in the मॉस 's cell walls.
In addition, bogs, like all wetlands, develop anaerobic soil conditions, which produces slower anaerobic क्षय बल्कि than एरोबिक सूक्ष्मजैविक कार्रवाई.
Peat moss can भी acidify इसके परिवेश by लेने up cations, such as calcium and magnesium, and releasing hydrogen ions.
Under the सही शर्तें, peat can accumulate to a depth of many meters.
Different species of Sphagnum have different tolerance limits for flooding and pH, so कोई एक peatland may have a क्रमांक of अलग Sphagnum species.
Individual peat moss plants consist of a main stem, with tightly arranged clusters of branch fascicles प्रायः consisting of दो or तीन spreading शाखाओं और दो to चार फांसी शाखाओं.
The top of the plant, or capitulum, रै कॉम्पैक्ट क्लस्टर of young branches.
Along the stem are बिखरे पत्ते of विभिन्न आकार, named stem leaves ; the shape varies according to species.
The leaves consist of two kinds of cells ; small, ग्रीन, जीना कोशिकाएं ( chlorophyllose कोशिकाएं ), और large, clear, structural, dead cells ( hyaline cells ).
The latter have the large water-holding क्षमता.
The earliest version of the संजाल कार्ड, जारी हस्तचालित rather than through an APTIS machine.
The first APTIS version of the संजाल कार्ड.
This थी प्रयुक्त इससे the प्रारंभ of the aptis era in 1986/1987 जबतक खूब into the 1990s, as स्टॉक्स had to be used up despite the introduction of the new-look orange-banded version in 1991.
The introduction of the weekday minimum fare condition in 2002 resulted in a नाबालिग बदलें : the red `` R '' shows that this is the `` Revised '' version of the railcard.
This version is still in उपयोग as of 2007.
The Network Railcard is a discount card introduced in 1986 by अंग्रेजों रेल, upon the सृष्टि of उनके संजाल southeast क्षेत्रफल around London, England.
The card is intended to encourage leisure travel by रेल by offering छूट लिये वयस्कों और accompanying children on a wide range of off-peak fares.
The range of discounts available, and the price of the card, have varied चूंकि कि समय, लकिन the कार्ड रै always been valid for a year 's unlimited use.
It can be purchased by any person aged 16 or over from any staffed National Rail station or Rail Appointed Travel Agent, by completing an application form - no फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक पहचान or अन्य दस्तावेज़ीकरण is needed to ख़रीदे or उपयोग the card.
It is one of a number of concessionary fare schemes उपलब्धियाँ on the अंग्रेजों railway system.
The United Nations ( UN ; French : Organisation des राष्ट्र unies, onu ) is the संसार 's largest, foremost, and most prominent international organization.
The stated aims of the United Nations include promoting and facilitating cooperation in international law, international security, economic development, social प्रगति, इंसान अधिकारों, सिविल अधिकारों, सिविल लिबर्टीज, political freedoms, democracy, and the achievement of lasting world peace.
The UN was founded in 1945 after World War II to replace the League of Nations, to stop wars between देशों, और to provide a मंच for dialogue.
It contains multiple subsidiary संगठन to carry आउट इसके missions.
At its founding, the UN था 51 सदस्य राज्य ; as of 2011, there are 193.
From its offices around the world, the UN and its specialized agencies decide on सत्य और प्रशासनिक मुद्दे in नियमित बैठक held throughout the year.
The organization has six principal organs : the General Assembly ( the main deliberative assembly ) ; the Security Council ( for deciding certain resolutions for peace and security ) ; the Economic and Social परिषद ( लिये assisting in promoting अंतरराष्ट्रीय आर्थिक और सोशल सहयोग और विकास ) ; the सचिवालय ( लिये providing अध्ययन, सूचना, और सुविधाएं needed by the UN ) ; the International Court of Justice ( the primary judicial organ ) ; and the United Nations Trusteeship Council ( which is currently inactive ).
Other prominent UN System agencies include the World Health Organization ( जो ), the संसार खाना कार्यक्रम ( WFP ) and United Nations Children 's Fund ( UNICEF ).
The UN 's most prominent position is that of the office of secretary-general जिससे रै महरूम आयोजित by बैन ki-moon of दक्षिण कोरियाई since 2007.
The United Nations Headquarters resides in international territory in नई यॉर्क नगर, साथ further प्रमुख offices at Geneva, Nairobi, and Vienna.
The organization is financed from assessed and voluntary योगदान इससे इसके सदस्य राज्य, और रै छह आधिकारिक भाषाएं : अरबी, Chinese, English, French, Russian, and Spanish.
South Beach, भी nicknamed sobe, is a पड़ोस in the नगर of मियामी Beach, Florida, United States, located due east of Miami city proper between Biscayne Bay and the Atlantic Ocean.
The area encompasses all of the barrier आइलैंड्स of मियामी बीच दक्षिण of भारतीय Creek.
This area was the first section of Miami Beach to be developed, starting in the 1910s, thanks to the development efforts of Carl G. फिशर, the lummus भाइयो, और जॉन S. कॉलिन्स, the latter whose construction of the Collins Bridge provided the first vital land link between mainland Miami and the beaches.
The area has गए through numerous कृत्रिम और प्राकृतिक परिवर्तन over the सालो, including a booming regional economy, increased tourism, and the 1926 hurricane, which destroyed much of the area.
As of 2010, about 39,186 निवासियों सजीव in दक्षिण बीच.
The United States presidential election of 1960 was the 44th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, आयोजित on मंगलवार, नवम्बर 8, 1960.
The Republican Party nominated incumbent Vice-President Richard निक्सन, जबकि the लोकतांत्रिक Party nominated John F. Kennedy, Senator from Massachusetts.
The incumbent President, Republican Dwight D. Eisenhower, was not eligible for re-election after serving the अधिकतम दो शर्तें अनुमत by the twenty-second Amendment.
Kennedy was elected with a lead of 112,827 votes, or 0.17 % of the popular vote, giving उसे a विजय of 303 to 219 in the चुनावी कॉलेज, the closest since 1916.
This was the पहला चुनाव in जिससे सब पचास of the current United States participated.
A number of factors बताइये क्यों the चुनाव थी so close.
Kennedy gained since there was an economic recession which hurt the incumbent Republican, and he had the लाभ of 17 लाख अधिक पंजीकृत डेमोक्रेट than republicans.
Furthermore, the new votes that Kennedy gained among Catholics almost neutralized the नई मत Nixon gained among Protestants.
Kennedy 's campaigning कौशल decisively outmatched Nixon 's.
In the end, Nixon 's emphasis on उसके अनुभव carried छोटी वज़न, and he wasted energy by campaigning in all 50 states instead of concentrating on the swing states.
Kennedy used his large, well-funded campaign संगठन to जीत the नामांकन, सुरक्षित समर्थन, और, साथ the aid of the last of the big-city bosses, to get out the vote in the big cities.
He relied on running mate lyndon B. जॉनसन to थाम the South and used television effectively.
This election is notable as being the first time in U.S. history that two sitting U.S. Senators ( Kennedy and Johnson ) were elected as president and vice-president, a घटना कि रै महरूम दोहराया एकबार, by बराक ओबामा और जो बिडेन in 2008 ( in दोनो cases, the president was the younger, more junior senator ).
A पोस्टर लिये a c. 1884 अमरीकी production of Macbeth, starring Thomas W. Keene.
चित्रित, काउंटर clockwise इससे top-left, हैं : मैकबेथ और banquo meet the witches ; just after the murder of Duncan ; Banquo 's ghost ; Macbeth duels Macduff ; and Macbeth.
Macbeth is a खेल लिखा by विलियम शेक्सपियर.
It is considered one of his darkest और सबसे शक्तिशाली tragedies.
Set in Scotland, the play dramatizes the corroding psychological and political effects produced when its protagonist, the स्कॉटिश रब मैकबेथ, chooses दुष्ट as the रास्ता to fulfill उसके महत्वाकांक्षा लिये power.
He commits regicide to become king and then furthers his moral descent साथ a शासनकाल of murderous आतंक to रहो in power, eventually plunging the country into civil war.
In the end, he loses सबकुछ कि देता meaning and purpose to his life before losing his life itself.
The play is believed to have महरूम लिखा between 1603 और 1607, and is most commonly dated 1606.
The earliest account of a performance of what was संभवतः शेक्सपियर 's खेल is अप्रैल 1611, when Simon Forman recorded seeing such a play at the Globe Theatre.
It was first published in the folio of 1623, possibly from a prompt book.
It was most संभावित लिखा दौरान the शासनकाल of जेम्स i, जो था महरूम James VI of Scotland before he succeeded to the English throne in 1603.
James was a patron of Shakespeare’s acting company, and of all the plays Shakespeare wrote during James’s reign, मैकबेथ सबसे clearly reflects the playwright’s relationship with the sovereign.
मैकबेथ is shakespeare’s shortest त्रासदी, और tells the स्टोरी of a वीर Scottish general named Macbeth who receives a prophecy from a trio of witches that one day he will become King of Scotland.
खपत by महत्वाकांक्षा और spurred to कार्रवाई by उसके बीवी, Macbeth murders King Duncan and takes the throne for himself.
His reign is racked साथ guilt और paranoia, और he जल्द becomes a tyrannical ruler as he is forced to commit more and more murders to protect himself from enmity and suspicion.
The bloodbath swiftly takes मैकबेथ और महिला मैकबेथ into realms of arrogance, madness, and death.
Shakespeare 's source for the tragedy is the account of King Macbeth of Scotland, Macduff, and डंकन in holinshed 's क्रॉनिकल्स ( 1587 ), a इतिहास of इंग्लैण्ड, स्कॉटलैंड और आयरलैंड परिचित to शेक्सपियर और उसके contemporaries, although the events in the play differ extensively from the history of the real Macbeth.
In the backstage world of theatre, some believe that the play is शापित, और होगा नहीं जिक्र इसके शीर्षक aloud, referring to it instead as `` the Scottish play ``.
Over the course of many centuries, the play has attracted some of the most renowned अभिनेताओं to the भूमिकाएँ of मैकबेथ और महिला Macbeth.
It has been adapted to film, television, ओपेरा, novels, कॉमिक किताबे, और other media.
The Milton Hershey School is a private परोपकारी ( pre-k through 12 ) boarding school in Hershey, Pennsylvania.
Originally named the Hershey Industrial School, the संस्था थी संस्थापित और वित्तपोषित by चॉकलेट उद्योगपति Milton Snavely Hershey and his wife, Catherine Sweeney Hershey.
The school was originally established for impoverished, healthy, Caucasian, male orphans, while आज it serves विद्यार्थी of विभिन्न पृष्ठभूमि.
The Milton Hershey School Trust, which funds the school, owns controlling ब्याज in the hershey कम्पनी and owns the Hershey Entertainment and Resorts Company ( HERCO ) which oversees many of the area hotels along with a theme park called Hersheypark.
With over six billion dollars in assets, the Milton Hershey School is one of the wealthiest स्कूलों in the world.
The स्कूल is overseen by a Board of Managers.
the स्कूल फिलहाल serves 1,818 students, and plans to grow to 2,100 students by 2013.
A member of CORE : Coalition for Residential Education, it is the largest आवासीय शिक्षा program in the US.
Epub may refer to:
EPUB, a free और खोलें e-book standard
इलेक्ट्रॉनिक आलेख, आलेख in scholarly journals or magazines that can be accessed via electronic transmission
the नियंत्रित substances अधिनियम ( सीएसए ) थी enacted into विधि by the कॉंग्रेस of the United States as Title II of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970.
The CSA is the federal u.S. ड्रग नीति अंतर्गत जिससे the manufacture, importation, possession, use and distribution of certain substances is regulated.
The Act भी परोसा as the नेशनल implementing legislation for the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs.
The legislation created पाँच schedules ( classifications ), साथ varying योग्यता लिये a पदार्थ to be included in each.
Two federal agencies, the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration, determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules, though the statute passed by Congress created the initial listing, and Congress has sometimes scheduled other substances through legislation such as the hillory J. farias और सामन्था reid date-rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000, जिससे लगाई गामा hydroxybutyrate in अनुसूची i. वर्गीकरण निर्णय हैं जरूरी to be बना on मापदण्ड सहित संभावित लिये गाली ( an undefined term ), currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States, and international treaties.
Second-language अधिग्रहण or second-language सीखना is the प्रक्रम by which people learn a second language.
Second-language अधिग्रहण ( प्रायः abbreviated to sla ) भी refers to the scientific discipline devoted to studying that process.
Second language refers to any language learned in addition to a person 's first language ; although the concept is named second-language अधिग्रहण, it can भी चरितार्थ the सीखना of तीसरा, चौथी, or subsequent languages.
Second-language acquisition refers to what learners do ; it करता नहीं refer to practices in language teaching.
The academic discipline of second-language अधिग्रहण is a subdiscipline of applied linguistics.
It is broad-based और अपेक्षाकृत नई.
As well as the various branches of linguistics, second-language acquisition is also closely सम्बन्धित to psychology, cognitive psychology, and education.
To separate the academic discipline from the सीखना प्रक्रम itself, the शर्तें second-language अधिग्रहण शोध, second-language studies, and second-language acquisition studies are also used.
SLA research began as an interdisciplinary फ़ील्ड, और क्युकी of इस it is मुश्किल to identify a precise starting date.
However, it does appear to have developed a great सौदे चूंकि the mid-1960s.
The term acquisition was originally प्रयुक्त to emphasize the अवचेतन प्रकृति of the सीखना प्रक्रम, but in recent years learning and acquisition have become largely synonymous.
Second-language acquisition can चरितार्थ विरासत भाषा सीखना, लकिन it does not usually incorporate bilingualism.
Most SLA researchers see bilingualism as होने the समाप्त परिणाम of सीखना a भाषा, नहीं the process itself, and see the term as referring to native-like fluency.
Writers in फ़ील्ड ऐसे as शिक्षा और मनोविज्ञान, however, often use bilingualism loosely to refer to all forms of multilingualism.
Second-language acquisition is also not to be contrasted with the acquisition of a foreign भाषा ; बल्कि, the सीखना of दूसरी भाषाएं और the सीखना of विदेशी भाषाएं involve the वही आधारभूत प्रक्रियाओं in different situations..
There has been much debate about exactly कैसा भाषा is सीखे, and many issues are still unresolved.
There are अनेक theories of second-language अधिग्रहण, but none are accepted as a complete explanation by all SLA researchers.
Due to the interdisciplinary nature of the फ़ील्ड of second-language acquisition, this is not expected to happen in the foreseeable future.
Forbes list of billionaires is an annual ranking of the world 's wealthiest people, compiled and प्रकाशित by फोर्ब्स, an अमरीकी नेशनल business magazine.
The total net लायक of प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत on the सूची is अनुमानित, in United States dollars, based on their assets and accounting for debt.
The list only represents प्रत्येक व्यक्ति 's valuation on a सिंगल दिन, due to daily fluctuations among exchange rates and stock valuations.
The United States Secret Service is a U.S. federal law प्रवर्तन एजेंसी कि is भाग of the संयुक्त States Department of Homeland Security.
The sworn members are divided among the Special एजेंटों और the uniformed Division.
जबतक कूच 1, 2003, the सेवा was part of the United States Department of the Treasury.
The U.S. Secret Service has two distinct क्षेत्रों of responsibility:
Financial Crimes, covering missions such as रोकथाम और छानबीन of counterfeiting of u.S. currency and U.S. treasury securities, and investigation of major fraud.
Protection, which entails ensuring the safety of current and former national leaders and their families, such as the President, past राष्ट्रपतियों, वाइस राष्ट्रपतियों, अध्यक्षीय उम्मीदवार, visiting heads of राज्य, और विदेशी embassies ( per an agreement with the U.S. State Department 's Bureau of Diplomatic Security ( DS ) Office of Foreign Missions ( OFM ), etc. )
the रहस्य सेवा 's आरंभिक जिम्मेदारी थी to investigate counterfeiting of U.S. currency, which was rampant following the U.S. Civil War.
The agency then evolved into the United राज्य ' पहला घरेलू प्रज्ञा and counterintelligence agency.
Many of the agency 's missions were later taken over by subsequent agencies such as the Federal ब्यूरो of छानबीन ( एफबीआई ), ब्यूरो of दारू, तम्बाकू, firearms और विस्फोटक ( ATF ), Immigration and Customs Enforcement ( ICE ), and Internal Revenue Service ( IRS ).
`` Me and Bobby mcgee '' is a सोंग लिखा by क्रिस kristofferson और Fred Foster, originally performed by Roger Miller.
Others performed the song later, including Kristofferson himself, and Janis Joplin who topped the U.S. singles chart with the song in 1971 after her मौत, बनाना the सोंग the दूसरी posthumous number-one सिंगल in u.S. चार्ट इतिहास बाद `` ( sittin ' On ) The Dock of the Bay `` by Otis Redding.
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30, 1882 – April 12, 1945 ), also known by his initials, FDR, थी the 32nd अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1933–1945 ) और a सेंट्रल फिगर in संसार कार्यक्रम दौरान the mid-20th century, leading the United States during a time of worldwide economic depression and total war.
A dominant leader of the Democratic Party and the only American president elected to more than two terms, he built a New Deal Coalition that realigned अमरीकी राजनीती after 1932, as his domestic policies defined American liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century.
With the bouncy popular song `` Happy Days Are Here again `` as उसके अभियान थीम, fdr पराजित लाज़िम रिपब्लिकन Herbert Hoover in November 1932, at the depth of the Great Depression.
Energized by his personal victory over polio, fdr 's unfailing आशावाद और सक्रियता contributed to a renewal of the national spirit.
He worked closely with अंग्रेजों प्रधान मंत्री विंस्टन चर्चिल and Soviet General Secretary Joseph Stalin in leading the Allies against Germany and Japan in World War II, and restoring prosperity to the nation 's economy.
In his first hundred days in office, which began March 4, 1933, रूज़वेल्ट पथप्रदर्शन प्रमुख विधान और जारी a profusion of कार्यपालिका आदेश कि instituted the नई सौदे —a किस्में of कार्यक्रम designed to produce relief ( government jobs for the unemployed ), recovery ( economic growth ), and reform ( through regulation of Wall Street, banks and transportation ).
The अर्थव्यवस्था improved rapidly इससे 1933 to 1937, but then relapsed into a deep recession.
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his packing the Supreme Court or गुजर कोई considerable विधान ; it abolished अनेक of the राहत programs when unemployment diminished during World War II.
Most of the regulations on कारोबार यहूद ended परिचय 1975–85, मगर for the regulation of Wall Street by the Securities and Exchange Commission, which still exists.
Along with several smaller programs, major surviving programs include the Federal Deposit Insurance निगम, जिससे थी निर्मित in 1933, और सोशल सुरक्षा, जिससे कॉंग्रेस passed in 1935.
As World War II loomed after 1938, with the Japanese invasion of China and the aggression of Nazi Germany, FDR gave strong diplomatic and वित्तीय support to चीन और ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, जबकि remaining officially neutral.
His goal was to make America the `` Arsenal of Democracy `` which होता सप्लाई munitions to the Allies.
In March 1941, Roosevelt, with congressional स्वीकृति, provided lend-lease सहायता to the देशों लड़ against Nazi Germany with Britain.
With very strong national support, he made war on Japan and Germany after the Japanese आक्रमण on पर्ल हार्बर on दिसम्बर 7, 1941, कॉलिंग it a `` तिथि जिससे होगा सजीव in infamy ``.
He supervised the mobilization of the U.S. economy to support the Allied युद्ध प्रयत्न.
As an active military leader, Roosevelt implemented an overall war strategy on two fronts कि ended in the शिकस्त of the अक्ष शक्तियां और the विकास of the world 's first atom bomb.
In 1942 रूज़वेल्ट ordered the internment of 100,000 Japanese American civilians.
Unemployment dropped to 2 %, राहत कार्यक्रम largely ended, और the औद्योगिक अर्थव्यवस्था grew rapidly to new heights as millions of people moved to new jobs in war centers, and 16 million men and 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered for military service.
Roosevelt dominated the American political scene not only during the twelve सालो of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी, but also for decades afterward.
He orchestrated the realignment of voters that created the Fifth Party System.
FDR 's New Deal Coalition united labor unions, big city machines, white ethnics, African Americans और ग्रामीण श्वेत southerners.
He also influenced the later creation of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र और bretton वुड्स.
Roosevelt is consistently rated by विद्वानों as एक of the शीर्ष तीन u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों, along with Abraham Lincoln and George Washington.
A liberal Democrat, Roosevelt पारिभाषित उसके वैचारिक स्थिति as `` a little left of center. ''
Mara Salvatrucha ( commonly abbreviated as MS, Mara, and MS-13 ) is a transnational criminal gang that originated in लॉस एंजिल्स और रै spread to other parts of the United States, Canada, Mexico, and Central America.
The majority of the gang is ethnically composed of Central अमेरिकी और क्रियाशील in शहरी और suburban areas.
In the U.S., the MS-13 has an especially heavy presence in Los Angeles County and the San Francisco Bay Area in उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया ; the वॉशिंगटन, d.C. महानगर क्षेत्रों of फेयरफैक्स काउंटी, वर्जिनिया, मोंटगोमरी काउंटी, मेरीलैंड, और प्रिंस George 's County, Maryland ; Long Island, New York ; the Boston, Massachusetts area ; Charlotte, North Carolina ; and Houston, Texas.
There is also a presence of MS-13 in टोरंटो, ओंटारियो, Canada.
Members of MS distinguish themselves by tattoos covering the देह और भी प्रायः the फेस, as खूब as the use of their own sign language.
They are notorious for their use of violence and a subcultural moral कोड कि predominantly consists of merciless revenge and cruel retributions.
This cruelty of the विशिष्ट सदस्यों of the `` maras '' or `` mareros '' अर्जित उन्हें a path to be recruited by the Sinaloa Cartel battling against Los Zetas in an ongoing drug war south of the United States border.
Their wide-ranging activities have drawn the ध्यान of the एफबीआई और आव्रजन और कस्टम Enforcement, who have initiated wide-scale raids against known and suspected gang members – netting hundreds of arrests across the country.
Bones is an American crime comedy-drama टेलीविज़न श्रेणी कि premiered on the Fox network in the United States on September 13, 2005.
The show is based on forensic मानवशास्त्र और forensic पुरातत्व, साथ प्रत्येक एपीसोड focusing on an एफबीआई मामला file concerning the mystery behind human remains brought by FBI Special Agent Seeley Booth ( David Boreanaz ) to the forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance `` Bones '' Brennan ( Emily Deschanel ).
The rest of the main cast includes Michaela Conlin, T. J. Thyne, Eric millegan, tamara टेलर, जोनाथन Adams, and John Francis Daley.
Created by Hart Hanson, the series is very loosely आधारित on the जीवन और कृतियाँ of उपन्यासकार और forensic anthropologist Kathy Reichs, who also produces the show.
Its title अक्षर, temperance Brennan, is named after the protagonist of Reichs ' crime novel series.
Conversely, Dr. Brennan writes successful mystery novels आधारित around a fictional ( in the हड्डियों universe ) forensic anthropologist named Kathy Reichs.
Bones is a संयुक्त उत्पादन by जोसेफसन entertainment, Far Field Productions and 20th Century Fox Television.
The series has completed airing इसके आठवीं season and has been renewed for a ninth season.
Super Bowl XXV was an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल खेल between the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ) champion Buffalo Bills and the National Football Conference ( NFC ) champion New York Giants to decide the National Football League ( NFL ) champion for the 1990 season.
The Giants defeated the Bills by the score of 20–19, जीतना उनके दूसरी कभी सुपर Bowl.
it is the तभी सुपर कटोरी decided by one point.
The game was held at Tampa Stadium in Tampa, फ्लोरिडा, on जनवरी 27, 1991, during the height of the Gulf War.
It was thus निभाई अंतर्गत much patriotic fervor.
The proceedings included a rousing rendition of `` The star-spangled ध्वज `` by व्हिटनी ह्यूस्टन दौरान the pregame ceremonies.
The Bills and their explosive no-huddle ठोकर यहूद बनाना their first Super Bowl appearance after finishing the regular season with a 13-3 record, and leading the league in total points scored with 428.
In advancing to their second Super Bowl, the Giants also posted a 13-3 regular season रिकार्ड, लकिन साथ a ball-control ठोकर और a रक्षा कि अनुमत a league low 211 points.
The game is best remembered for Bills placekicker Scott Norwood 's last-second field goal attempt which went wide right of the uprights, leading to a Giants विजय, और starting a four-game खोने streak in the सुपर कटोरी लिये the Bills.
The Giants set a Super Bowl record holding कब्ज़ा of the बॉल लिये 40 मिनट्स and 33 seconds.
New York also overcame a 12-3 second-quarter deficit, and made a 75-yard touchdown ड्राइव कि consumed a Super Bowl record 9:29 off the clock.
Giants running back Ottis Anderson, जो carried the बॉल 21 टाइम्स लिये 102 गज और एक touchdown, was named Super Bowl MVP.
he थी the पहला awardee to प्राप्त the newly named `` Pete Rozelle Trophy '' ( named for the former commissioner ).
Anderson also अंकित एक रिसेप्शन लिये seven yards.
Malcolm X ( ; May 19, 1925February 21, 1965 ), born Malcolm Little and also known as el-hajj malik el-shabazz ( ), थी an african-american Muslim minister and human rights activist.
To his admirers, he was a courageous advocate for the rights of blacks, a man who indicted white America in the harshest शर्तें लिये इसके अपराधों विरूद्ध ब्लैक Americans.
Detractors accused him of उपदेश जातिवाद, ब्लैक supremacy, and violence.
He has been called one of the महानतम और सबसे influential African Americans in history.
Malcolm X 's father died—killed by white supremacists, it was rumored—when he was young, और at तनिक एक of उसके uncles थी lynched.
When he was 13, his माँ थी लगाई in a दिमागी हॉस्पिटल, और he थी लगाई in a series of foster homes.
In 1946, at age 20, he went to थाना लिये तोड़कर और प्रवेश.
In prison, Malcolm x became a सदस्य of the स्वदेश of islam ; बाद उसके पैरोल in 1952, he quickly rose to become one of its leaders.
For a dozen years, Malcolm X was the पब्लिक फेस of the विवादास्पद समूह, but disillusionment with Nation of Islam head Elijah Muhammad led him to leave the Nation in March 1964.
After a period of travel in Africa and the Middle East, he returned to the United States, where he संस्थापित मुस्लिम मस्जिदे, inc. और the संगठन of afro-american एकता.
In February 1965, कम than a साल बाद leaving the स्वदेश of Islam, he was assassinated by three members of the group.
Malcolm X 's expressed मान्यताओं बदला substantially over time.
As a spokesman for the Nation of Islam he taught black supremacy and advocated विरह of ब्लैक और श्वेत अमेरिकी —in कंट्रास्ट to the civil rights movement 's emphasis on integration.
After breaking साथ the स्वदेश of islam in 1964—saying of उसके संघ साथ it, `` I did many things as a [ Black ] Muslim that I 'm sorry for now.
I was a zombie then... pointed in a certain direction and told to march '' —and becoming a Sunni Muslim, he disavowed racism and expressed willingness to कार्य साथ सिविल अधिकारों नेताओ, he जारी to emphasize pan-africanism, black self-determination, and self-defense.
The third season of 90210, an American television series, premiered on Monday September 13, 2010.
The cw officially नवीनीकृत the दिखाएँ for a third season on February 16, 2010.
With the reveal of the networks fall 2010 schedule, वे घोषित उनके निर्णय to move 90210 to Monday nights at 8:00 pm, as a lead-in to Gossip Girl.
It premiered on September 13, 2010 and was मिले साथ generally धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ from critics.
The season picks up at the समाप्त of गर्मियाँ और focuses on the विद्यार्थी senior year of high school.
It follows Adrianna 's वृद्धि to कीर्ति, a नई संबंध between चांदी और navid और a उलझन Teddy who decides to reveal to his family and friends he is gay.
It also deals साथ the aftermath of Naomi Clark 's assault.
Regular cast members for the season included Shenae Grimes, Tristan Wilds, annalynne mccord, रयान eggold, जेसिका stroup, माइकल steger, जेसिका Lowndes, Matt Lanter, Gillian Zinser, Trevor Donovan and Lori Loughlin.
Rebecca Sinclair जारी उसके भूमिका as कार्यपालिका producer for the season.
The ऋतु premiered to 1.96 million viewers and a 0.9 rating in the adults 18–49 demographic.
Christmas-themed episode `` Holiday Madness '', hit ऋतु highs in सब कुंजी demos साथ 2.1 in The CW 's target demo of women 18–34, a 1.4 in adults 18–34 and a 1.1 in adults 18–49.
It was also the most देखी एपीसोड in over a साल with 2.2 million viewers tuning in.
The season finale aired on may 16, 2011.
The season averaged 1.75 लाख सजीव दर्शक and a 0.9 adults 18–49 rating.
It was released on DVD in the United राज्य on अगस्त 30, 2011.
Elizabeth II ( Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the constitutional monarch of 16 sovereign states, known as the Commonwealth realms, और उनके territories और dependencies, और head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations.
She is Supreme Governor of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड और, in कुछ of उसके realms, carries the शीर्षक of Defender of the Faith as part of her full title.
On her accession on 6 February 1952, Elizabeth became Head of the Commonwealth and queen regnant of seven स्वतंत्र राष्ट्रमंडल देशों : the संयुक्त किंगडम, कनाडा, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, नई जीलैंड, South Africa, Pakistan and Ceylon.
From 1956 to 1992, the number of her realms varied as territories gained स्वतंत्रता और कुछ realms became republics.
At present, in addition to the first four aforementioned countries, Elizabeth is महारानी of जमैका, बारबाडोस, the बहामा, हरा, पापुआ नई गिनी, the सुलेमान आइलैंड्स, तुवालू, संत लूसिया, संत विंसेंट and the Grenadines, Belize, Antigua and Barbuda and Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Her reign of years is currently the दूसरी longest लिये a अंग्रेजों monarch ; तभी महारानी विक्टोरिया has reigned longer at over 63 years.
एलिज़ाबेथ थी born in लंदन and educated privately at home.
Her father acceded to the throne as George VI in 1936 on the abdication of उसके bhai एडवर्ड viii, इससे जिससे समय वो थी the heir presumptive.
She began to undertake public duties during the Second World युद्ध, in जिससे वो परोसा in the auxiliary Territorial Service.
In 1947, she married Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh, with whom she has four children : चार्ल्स, ऐनी, एंड्रयू, और एडवर्ड.
उसके राजतिलक सेवा took place in 1953 and was the first to be televised.
The महारानी 's अनेक ऐतिहासिक विज़िट और बैठक शामिल a राज्य विज़िट to the Republic of Ireland and reciprocal visits to and from the Pope.
The Queen has seen major constitutional changes in उसके realms, ऐसे as devolution in the संयुक्त किंगडम और the patriation of the Canadian constitution.
Times of personal significance have शामिल the births और विवाह of उसके children, the births of उसके grandchildren, the investiture of the Prince of Wales, and the celebration of milestones such as her Silver, Golden, and Diamond Jubilees in 1977, 2002, and 2012, respectively.
Major events in the Queen 's reign have included the Troubles in Northern Ireland, the falklands युद्ध, युद्धों साथ इराकी और the युद्ध in अफगानिस्तान.
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which include the death of her father at 56, the assassination of Prince Philip 's uncle, Lord Mountbatten, the breakdown of her children 's marriages in 1992 ( a साल deemed उसके annus horribilis ), the मौत in 1997 of उसके पूर्व daughter-in-law, डायना, राजकुमारी of वेल्स, और the मौतों of उसके माँ और सिस्टर in 2002.
The Queen has occasionally faced कठोर दबायें आलोचना of the royal family and republican sentiments, but support for the monarchy and her personal popularity remain high.
The 2010 United States Senate election in Florida took place on नवम्बर 2, 2010 साथ साथ अन्य चुनावों to the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट in अन्य राज्य as well as all elections to the United States House of Representatives and various state and local elections.
Republican Marco Rubio, former स्पीकर of the फ्लोरिडा House of Representatives, defeated independent Charlie Crist and Democrat Kendrick Meek in a three-way race.
One term Senator Mel मार्टिनेज थी निर्वाचित in a बहुत बंद रेस against Democrat Betty Castor in 2004 with 49 % of the vote.
मार्टिनेज घोषित on दिसम्बर 2, 2008 कि he होता नहीं तलाश re-election to the Senate, and would resign prior to the end of his term.
In August 2009, Governor Charlie Crist घोषित कि he होता नियुक्त उसके पूर्व मुख्य of स्टाफ, George LeMieux, a Republican, to the Senate seat being vacated by Martinez.
Governor Crist publicly घोषित he थी कार्यशील for the seat in mid-2009.
At the time he received many Republican endorsements, such as the National Republican Senatorial Committee, Martinez, and the 2008 रिपब्लिकन अध्यक्षीय nominee जॉन मैक्केन.
His support of the अमरीकी रिकवरी और reinvestment Act of 2009 hurt his popularity among conservatives, and candidate Marco Rubio surged.
In April 2010 Crist announced he would drop आउट of the रिपब्लिकन प्राथमिक और चलाएं as an independent.
the नेशनल रिपब्लिकन senatorial कमेटी withdrew इसके समर्थन of crist and demanded a refund of its campaign funds that it provided for the Crist campaign.
Congressman Kendrick Meek was the first Democrat to घोषित उसके इरादे to चलाएं.
Alexander Snitker was the first member of the Libertarian पार्टी on the बैलट लिये सीनेटर in Florida 's history.
Satellite दृश्य of दोहा
Doha (, ' or ', literally : `` the बिग पेड़ '' ) is the पूंजी city of the state of Qatar.
Located on the coast of the पारसी Gulf,
it had a population of 998,651 in 2008, and is भी एक of the municipalities of Qatar.
Doha is Qatar 's largest city, with over 60 % of the nation 's population residing in Doha or इसके surrounding उपनगरों, और is भी the economic centre of the country.
Doha also serves as the सीट of सरकारी of क़तर, जिससे is शासित by शेख़ Hamad bin Khalifa Al Thani.
Doha is home to the शिक्षा नगर, an क्षेत्रफल devoted to शोध and education.
Doha was the site of the first ministerial-level बैठक of the दोहा विकास Round of World Trade Organization negotiations.
The city of Doha held the 2006 Asian Games, जिससे थी the largest एशियाई खेल ever held.
Doha also hosted the 2011 Pan Arab खेल और सबसे of the खेल at the 2011 AFC Asian Cup.
Doha hosted the unfccc जलवायु Negotiations ( COP 18 ) December 2012 and will host a large number of the venues for the 2022 FIFA World Cup.
The World Petroleum Council held the 20th World पेट्रोलियम सम्मेलन in Doha in December 2011.
paranasal साइनस हैं a समूह of चार युग्म air-filled स्पेसेस कि surround the nasal cavity ( maxillary sinuses ), above the eyes ( frontal sinuses ), between the eyes ( ethmoid sinuses ), and behind the ethmoids ( sphenoid sinuses ).
The sinuses are named लिये the फेशियल हड्डियों in जिससे they are located.
Lean manufacturing, lean enterprise, or lean production, often simply, `` Lean, '' is a production practice that considers the expenditure of resources for any goal अन्य than the सृष्टि of मान लिये the समाप्त ग्राहक to be अपव्यय, और यूँ a निशाना लिये विलोपन.
Working from the परिप्रेक्ष्य of the ग्राहक जो consumes a उत्पाद or सेवा, `` value '' is defined as any action or process that a customer would be willing to pay for.
Essentially, lean is centered on preserving मान साथ कम work.
Lean manufacturing is a management philosophy derived mostly from the Toyota Production System ( tps ) ( hence the पद toyotism is भी प्रचलित ) और पहचाना as `` Lean '' only in the 1990s.
TPS is renowned for its focus on reduction of the original Toyota seven wastes to improve overall ग्राहक मान, लकिन वहीँ are varying perspectives on how this is best achieved.
The steady विकास of टोयोटा, इससे a छोटी कम्पनी to the world 's largest automaker, has focused attention on how it has achieved this success.
icarly लोगो
iCarly is an American sitcom that airs on Nickelodeon, which premiered on सितंबर 8, 2007.
Nickelodeon promoted many episodes so far such as `` iDo '', `` iHire an Idiot '', `` ipity the nevel '', `` idate sam & फ्रेडी '', इत्यादि. as specials, despite उनके होने regular episodes.
Every episode title begins with a lower case i which represents the अंतरजाल, as in `` iCarly ''.
The show was nominated for an Emmy award for बकाया children 's कार्यक्रम in 2009.
The श्रेणी अभिनीत मिरांडा cosgrove as Carly Shay, a 13-year-old who becomes an Internet star.
The series ended on November 23, 2012 with the one-hour खास एपीसोड `` iGoodbye ''.
A total of 7 सीज़न और 109 episodes were broadcast.
The largest audience of the series was 11.2 लाख दर्शक, साथ the special episode `` iSaved Your Life '' premiered in January 2010.
When Carly ( Miranda Cosgrove ) and her sassy best friend Sam ( Jennette McCurdy ) act funny at a school talent show audition, tech-savvy फ्रेडी ( नाथन kress ) टेपों it and posts it online without telling them.
After seeing the girls ' strong chemistry and banter, the ऑनलाइन दर्शक clamors लिये अधिक और the icarly webcast is born.
While grappling with typical issues of adolescence, Carly, Sam, and Freddie find out that they have also become online celebrities as उनके दिखाएँ – जिससे सुविधाएँ हुनर प्रतियोगिताओं, व्यंजनों, problem-solving, और यादृच्छिक नाचना – garners international accolades.
Carly lives in Seattle, Washington with her 26-year-old brother and guardian Spencer ( जेरी trainor ) और produces the दिखाएँ in a makeshift third-floor studio loft in their apartment.
Their माँ रै never महरूम देखी or उल्लेखित, लकिन उनके पिता, स्टीवन शे ( David Chisum ), is a U.S. Air Force officer temporarily stationed on a submarine, and is often mentioned but is only seen in person during the series finale episode, `` iGoodbye ''.
Westlife were an आयरिश लड़के बैंड जिससे formed in 1998 and disbanded in 2012.
Originally signed by Simon cowell और प्रबंधित by लुई वाल्श, the समूह 's फाइनल line-up consisted of Nicky Byrne, Kian Egan, Mark Feehily and Shane Filan.
Brian mcfadden थी a सदस्य इससे 1998 until his departure in 2004.
westlife बेची over 50 लाख records worldwide, a total that included studio albums, singles, video releases, and compilation albums.
The group accumulated 14 number-one singles in the United Kingdom ( the third-highest in UK history ), tying with चट्टान रिचर्ड और रैंकिंग बस पीछे the बीटल्स और एल्विस Presley.
They achieved a total of 26 शीर्ष टेन singles over उनके 14-year career.
By 2010, westlife थी सूचीबद्ध in the गिनीज World Records, as the UK 's top-selling album group of the 21st century.
They also won The Record of the Year ( the only music award based on public votes in the UK ) a record-breaking चार टाइम्स और in 2012, the आधिकारिक चार्ट कम्पनी सूचीबद्ध westlife 34th amongst the biggest-selling singles artists in British music history.
Despite their European and एशियाई कामयाबी, westlife never प्रबंधित to ब्रेक into the U.S. market, achieving only one hit single in 2000 : `` Swear It Again ``.
In October 2011, Westlife announced their intention to split in 2012, following उनके महानतम हिट्स दौरे और the release of their Greatest Hits album.
The boyband 's final concerts were held on 22 and 23 June 2012 at Croke पार्क Stadium in Dublin.
The first farewell concert, offering 85,000 tickets, बेची आउट in a record-breaking 5 मिनट्स और the latter screened live in cinemas worldwide.
Vitamin A is a group of nutritionally असंतृप्त hydrocarbons, which include retinol, retinal, retinoic acid and several provitamin A carotenoids among which beta-carotene is the most important.
Vitamin A has multiple functions, it is महत्वपूर्ण लिये विकास और विकास, for the maintenance of the immune system and good vision.
Vitamin A is needed by the retina of the eye in the form of retinal, which combines with protein opsin to form rhodopsin the light-absorbing अणु, कि is जरुरी लिये दोनो low-light ( scotopic दृष्टि ) and color vision.
Vitamin A also functions in a very different role as an irreversibly oxidized form of retinol known as retinoic acid, which is an महत्वपूर्ण hormone-like विकास फ़ैक्टर लिये epithelial और अन्य कोशिकाएं.
In foods of animal origin, the major form of विटामिन a is an ester, primarily retinyl palmitate, जिससे is परिवर्तित to retinol ( chemically an alcohol ) in the small intestine.
The retinol form functions as a storage रूप of the विटामिन, और can be परिवर्तित to और from its visually active aldehyde form, retinal.
The associated एसिड ( retinoic एसिड ), a metabolite कि can be irreversibly synthesized from vitamin A, has only partial vitamin A activity, and does not function in the retina for the visual cycle.
Retinoic acid is used for growth and सेल्यूलर differentiation.
All forms of vitamin A have a beta-ionone ring to जिससे an isoprenoid कड़ी is attached, called a retinyl group.
Both structural सुविधाएँ हैं essential for vitamin activity.
The orange pigment of carrots – beta-carotene – can be represented as two connected retinyl समूह, जिससे हैं प्रयुक्त in the देह to योगदान to vitamin A levels.
Alpha-carotene and gamma-carotene also have a single retinyl समूह, जिससे दे उन्हें कुछ vitamin activity.
None of the other carotenes have विटामिन activity.
The carotenoid beta- cryptoxanthin possesses an ionone समूह और रै विटामिन activity in humans.
Vitamin A can be found in two प्रिंसिपल फ़ॉर्म in भोजन :
रेटिनॉल, the रूप of विटामिन a अवशोषित जब eating animal food sources, is a yellow, fat-soluble substance.
चूंकि the pure दारू रूप is unstable, the vitamin is found in tissues in a form of retinyl ester.
It is also commercially produced and administered as esters ऐसे as retinyl acetate or palmitate.
The carotenes alpha-carotene, beta-carotene, gamma-carotene ; and the xanthophyll beta-cryptoxanthin ( all of which contain beta-ionone rings ), but no अन्य carotenoids, फलन as provitamin a in herbivores और सर्वाहारी पशु, जिससे possess the एंजाइम ( 15-15'-dioxygenase ) जिससे cleaves beta-carotene in the intestinal mucosa and converts it retinol.
In general, carnivores are poor converters of ionine-containing carotenoids, and pure carnivores such as cats and ferrets lack 15-15'-dioxygenase और can नहीं बदलें कोई carotenoids to retinal ( resulting in none of the carotenoids होने फ़ॉर्म of विटामिन a for these species ).
Selena Marie Gomez ( born July 22, 1992 ) is an अमरीकी सिंगर and actress.
She made her डेब्यू as a चाइल्ड अभिनेत्री in Barney & Friends.
In 2007, Gomez आए to prominence as a अभिनीत डाल सदस्य in the टेलीविज़न series Wizards of Waverly Place.
She signed to Hollywood Records the following year, and became the founder and lead singer of the पॉप बैंड सेलिना गोमेज़ & the झाँकी.
Their studio albums Kiss & Tell ( 2009 ), A Year Without Rain ( 2010 ), and When the Sun Goes Down ( 2011 ) were certified Gold by the Recording Industry Association of America ( RIAA ) and have शाखित platinum-certified singles `` naturally ``, `` जो says ``, और `` प्रेम तुम जैसे a प्रेम सोंग ``.
After the release of टेलीविज़न films और उनके accompanying soundtracks, गोमेज़ बना उसके नाट्य फिल्मी debut in Ramona and Beezus in 2010 and starred in Monte Carlo in 2011.
Upon the conclusion of Wizards of Waverly Place and the hiatus of Selena Gomez & the Scene in 2012, she focused on her film career, सेवारत as a आवाज़ अभिनेत्री in होटल transylvania और अभिनीत in वसन्त ब्रेकर्स the following साल.
Her debut solo album is tentatively scheduled to be released in गर्मियाँ 2013, और is preceded by इसके सीसे सिंगल `` आइये & मिलेंगी It ``.
Outside of her work in the entertainment industry, गोमेज़ is शामिल in परोपकारी क्रियाएँ through charity work and various social and environmental causes.
Tracie Monique Spencer ( born July 12, 1976 ) is an American r & b और पॉप singer-songwriter, अभिनेत्री, और model.
Sacramento is the capital city of the U.S. राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the सीट of सरकारी of Sacramento County.
It is located at the confluence of the Sacramento River and the American River in the northern portion of कैलिफ़ोर्निया 's expansive सेंट्रल घाटी.
With an estimated 2011 population of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest नगर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया and the 35th largest city in the United States.
Sacramento is the core cultural and आर्थिक बीच of the sacramento महानगर area which includes seven counties with an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123.
Its metropolitan area is the fourth largest in कैलिफ़ोर्निया बाद the वृहद लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल, सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल, और the सैन डिएगो महानगर क्षेत्रफल, as खूब as the 25th largest in the United States.
Sacramento was cited by समय पत्रिका as अमेरिका 's most ethnically and racially integrated city in 2002.
Sacramento became a city through the efforts of the स्विस अप्रवासी जॉन sutter, sr., उसके बेटे जॉन Sutter, Jr., and James W. Marshall.
Sacramento grew जल्दी धन्यवाद to the सुरक्षा of Sutter 's Fort, which was established by Sutter in 1839.
During the California Gold Rush, Sacramento was a major distribution point, a commercial and agricultural बीच, और a टर्मिनस लिये वैगन रेल, stagecoaches, riverboats, the telegraph, the Pony Express, and the First Transcontinental Railroad.
California State University, sacramento, अधिक commonly ज्ञात as sacramento State or Sac State, is the largest local university.
It is one of the twenty-three campuses of the California State University system.
Drexel University Sacramento is स्तिथ in Downtown, Sacramento.
विश्वविद्यालयों of the प्रशांत 's mcgeorge School of Law is located in the Oak Park neighborhood.
In addition, the University of California, Davis is स्तिथ in आसपास डेविस, वेस्ट of the पूंजी.
The UC Davis Medical Center, a world-renowned शोध हॉस्पिटल, is स्तिथ in the city of Sacramento.
Memorial Day is a United States federal अवकाश जिससे occurs प्रत्येक year on the final Monday of May.
मेमोरियल दिन is a दिन of remembering the men and women who died while serving in the United States Armed Forces.
Formerly known as Decoration Day, it originated बाद the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध to commemorate the Union and Confederate soldiers who died in the Civil War.
By the 20th century Memorial Day had been विस्तारित to सम्मान सब अमेरिकी who have died in all wars.
It typically marks the start of the summer vacation ऋतु, जबकि मजदूर दिन marks its end.
Many people visit कब्रिस्तान और memorials, विशेषकर to सम्मान those who have died in military service.
Many volunteers प्लेस an अमरीकी ध्वज on प्रत्येक grave in national cemeteries.
By the early 20th century, Memorial Day was an occasion for more सामान्य expressions of मेमोरी, as लोगों visited the क़ब्रों of their deceased relatives in church cemeteries, whether they had served in the military or not.
It भी became a long वीकेंड increasingly devoted to shopping, family gatherings, fireworks, trips to the beach, and national media events.
Annual Decoration Days for particular कब्रिस्तान हैं आयोजित on a संडे in लेट वसन्त or जल्दी गर्मियाँ in कुछ ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों of the American South, notably in the mountains.
In cases involving a family graveyard जहाँ रिमोट पूर्वजो as खूब as those जो यहूद मृतक more recently are buried, this may take on the character of an extended family reunion to which some people travel hundreds of miles.
People gather on the designated दिन और put पुष्प on क़ब्रों and renew contacts with kinfolk and others.
There often is a religious service and a `` डिनर on the मैदान, '' the परंपरागत पद लिये a potluck meal in which people used to spread the dishes out on sheets or tablecloths on the grass.
It is believed कि इस अभ्यास began before the American Civil War and thus may reflect the real origin of the `` memorial day '' idea.
Memorial Day is not to be confused with Veterans Day ; Memorial Day is a day of remembering the men and women who died while serving, while Veterans दिन मनाता the सेवा of सब u.S. सैन्य दिग्गजों, living or dead.
Mt. Zion Church state history marker near Philadelphia, मिसिसिपी.
Freedom Summer ( भी ज्ञात as the मिसिसिपी गर्मियाँ प्रोजेक्ट ) थी a अभियान in the संयुक्त राज्य शुभारम्भ in जून 1964 to attempt to register as many African American voters as possible in Mississippi, which had historically excluded most blacks from voting.
The project also set up dozens of Freedom Schools, Freedom Houses, and जातियाँ centers in छोटी कस्बों throughout Mississippi to aid the local black population.
The project was organized by the Council of Federated Organizations ( COFO ), a coalition of the मिसिसिपी शाखाओं of the चार प्रमुख सिविल अधिकारों organizations ( SNCC, CORE, NAACP and SCLC ).
Most of the impetus, नेतृत्व, और financing लिये the Summer Project came from the SNCC.
Robert Parris Moses, sncc फ़ील्ड सचिव and co-director of COFO, directed the summer project.
Blues is the name given to both a musical form and a music genre that originated in समुदायों of primarily the `` गहन दक्षिण `` of the United States around the end of the 19th century from spirituals, work songs, field hollers, shouts and chants, and rhymed simple narrative ballads.
The blues form, ubiquitous in jazz, rhythm and blues, and चट्टान और फेंकें is characterized by विशिष्ट कॉर्ड progressions, of जिससे the twelve-bar blues chord progression is the most common.
The blue notes that, for expressive purposes are sung or played flattened or धीरे bent ( minor 3rd to major 3rd ) in relation to the pitch of the major scale, are also an important part of the sound.
The blues genre is based on the ब्लूज़ रूप लकिन possesses अन्य विशेषताएँ ऐसे as specific lyrics, bass lines, and instruments.
Blues can be subdivided into अनेक subgenres ranging इससे देश to शहरी ब्लूज़ that were more or less popular during different periods of the 20th century.
Best known are the डेल्टा, piedmont, Jump, and Chicago blues styles.
World War II marked the transition from acoustic to electric blues and the progressive opening of blues म्यूज़िक to a wider दर्शक, विशेषकर श्वेत श्रोता.
In the 1960s and 1970s, a hybrid form पुकारा blues-rock विकसित.
The term `` the blues '' refers to the `` blue devils '', meaning melancholy and sadness ; an early use of the term in इस भाव is मिला in जार्ज colman 's one-act farce Blue Devils ( 1798 ).
Though the use of the phrase in african-american म्यूज़िक may be पुरानी, it रै महरूम attested to since 1912, when Hart Wand 's `` Dallas Blues `` became the first copyrighted blues composition.
In lyrics the phrase is प्रायः प्रयुक्त to describe a depressed mood.
A quarter डालर, commonly shortened to क्वार्टर, is a coin worth 1⁄4 of a United States dollar or 25 cents.
the क्वार्टर रै been produced since 1796.
The choice of 25¢ as a denomination, as opposed to 20¢ which is more common in अन्य भाग of the संसार, originated साथ the अभ्यास of dividing स्पेनी milled डॉलर into आठ कील तराशा खण्ड ( cf. `` pieces of eight `` ).
At one time `` two bits ``, i.e. two wedges, each wedge an आठवीं, यूँ a क्वार्टर of the स्पेनी रियल, थी a आम nickname for a quarter.
Day of the Dead ( ) is a Mexican अवकाश मनाये throughout Mexico and around the world in other cultures.
The holiday focuses on gatherings of family and friends to pray for और याद मित्रों और परिवार सदस्यों who have died.
it is विशेषकर मनाये in मैक्सिको, where it is a national holiday, and all banks are closed.
The celebration takes place on November 1 and 2, in connection with the Catholic holidays of All Saints ' दिन और All Souls ' Day.
Traditions connected with the holiday include building private altars honoring the मृतक using शुगर skulls, marigolds, and the favorite foods and beverages of the departed and visiting graves with these as gifts.
They also leave possessions of the deceased.
Scholars trace the origins of the modern Mexican holiday to indigenous observances डेटिंग वापस सैंकड़ों of सालो और to an एज़टेक पर्व dedicated to the goddess Mictecacihuatl.
The holiday has spread throughout the world : In Brazil, Dia de Finados is a public holiday कि अनेक brazilians celebrate by visiting कब्रिस्तान and churches.
In Spain, there are festivals और parades, और, at the समाप्त of the दिन, people gather at cemeteries and pray for their dead loved ones.
Similar observances occur elsewhere in Europe, and similarly themed celebrations appear in many Asian and African cultures.
ANITA mk viii.
The ANITA Mark VII and ANITA Mark VIII calculators were launched simultaneously in लेट 1961 as the संसार 's पहला all- इलेक्ट्रॉनिक डेस्कटॉप calculators.
Designed and built by the घंटी पंच co.
in Britain, and marketed through its Sumlock Comptometer division, वे प्रयुक्त वैक्यूम tubes और cold-cathode switching tubes in उनके लॉजिक circuits and nixie tubes for their numerical displays.
They were the पहला of a श्रेणी of डेस्कटॉप और hand-held इलेक्ट्रॉनिक calculators that the company was to develop and sell under the ANITA name into the mid-1970s.
George Washington ( –, 1799 ) was the first President of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1789–1797 ), the commander-in-chief of the Continental Army during the American Revolutionary War, and one of the Founding Fathers of the United States.
He presided over the convention that drafted the Constitution, which replaced the आलेख of कनफेडरेशन और स्थापित the स्थिति of President.
Washington was elected President as the unanimous choice of the 69 निर्वाचक in 1788, और he served two terms in office.
He oversaw the creation of a strong, well-financed national government that maintained neutrality in the wars raging in यूरोपीय, suppressed विद्रोह, और जीती स्वीकृति among अमेरिकी of all types.
His leadership style established many forms and rituals of government that have been used since, such as using a कैबिनेट प्रणाली और delivering an inaugural पता.
Further, the peaceful transition इससे उसके प्रेसिडेंसी to the प्रेसिडेंसी of John Adams established a tradition that continues into the 21st century.
Washington was hailed as `` father of his country `` भी दौरान उसके आजीवन.
Washington was born into the प्रांतीय gentry of औपनिवेशिक वर्जिनिया ; his wealthy planter family owned tobacco plantations and slaves.
After both his पिता और पुरानी bhai died जब he was young, Washington became personally and professionally attached to the powerful William Fairfax, who promoted his career as a surveyor and soldier.
Washington quickly became a senior अधिकारी in the औपनिवेशिक शक्तियां दौरान the पहला stages of the French and Indian War.
Chosen by the Second Continental Congress in 1775 to be commander-in-chief of the महाद्वीपीय फौज in the अमरीकी क्रान्ति, वॉशिंगटन managed to force the British out of Boston in 1776, but was defeated and almost captured later that year when he lost New York City.
After crossing the Delaware River in the dead of winter, he पराजित the अंग्रेजों in दो लड़ाइयों, retook नई जर्सी और लौटी आवेग to the Patriot cause.
Because of his रणनीति, क्रांतिकारी शक्तियां captured दो प्रमुख British armies at Saratoga in 1777 and Yorktown in 1781.
Historians laud Washington for his selection and supervision of his generals, encouragement of morale and ability to hold together the army, coordination with the state governors and राज्य मिलिशिया इकाई, संबंध साथ कॉंग्रेस और ध्यान to आपूर्तियाँ, लोजिस्टिक्स, और प्रशिक्षण.
In battle, however, Washington was repeatedly outmaneuvered by अंग्रेजों सेनापतियों साथ larger armies.
After victory had been finalized in 1783, वॉशिंगटन resigned as commander-in-chief बल्कि than seize power, proving his opposition to dictatorship and his commitment to American republicanism.
Dissatisfied with the weaknesses of the Articles of Confederation, in 1787 Washington presided over the Constitutional सम्मेलन कि drafted the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान.
Elected unanimously as the पहला अध्यक्ष of the United States in 1789, he attempted to bring rival factions together to unify the nation.
He supported Alexander हैमिल्टन 's programs to pay off all state and national debt, to implement an effective tax system and to create a national bank ( despite opposition from Thomas Jefferson ).
Washington proclaimed the United States neutral in the युद्धों raging in यूरोपीय बाद 1793.
He avoided war with Great Britain and guaranteed a decade of peace and profitable trade by securing the Jay Treaty in 1795, despite तीव्र विपक्ष इससे the jeffersonians.
Although never officially joining the federalist पार्टी, he supported its programs.
Washington 's Farewell Address was an influential primer on republican virtue and a warning against partisanship, sectionalism, और भागीदारी in विदेशी युद्धों.
He retired from the presidency in 1797 and returned to his घर, माउंट vernon, और उसके घरेलू जीवन where he managed a variety of enterprises.
He freed all his slaves by उसके फाइनल will.
Washington had a vision of a great and powerful nation that would be निर्मित on रिपब्लिकन लाइनों using संघीय power.
He sought to use the national government to preserve liberty, improve infrastructure, open the western lands, promote कॉमर्स, मिला a स्थाई पूंजी, reduce क्षेत्रीय तनाव and promote a spirit of American nationalism.
At his death, Washington was eulogized as `` first in war, first in peace, and first in the दिल of उसके देशवासियों '' by Henry Lee.
the federalists बना उसे the प्रतीक of उनके पार्टी but for many years, the Jeffersonians continued to distrust his influence and delayed building the Washington Monument.
As the leader of the पहला कामयाब क्रान्ति विरूद्ध a colonial empire in world history, Washington became an international icon for liberation and nationalism, especially in France and Latin America.
Fiscal Year 2012 u.S. संघीय बिता – Cash or Budget Basis.
Fiscal साल 2012 u.S. संघीय Receipts.
The Budget of the United States Government often begins as the President 's proposal to the U.S. Congress which अनुशंसा funding स्तर लिये the अगला fiscal year, beginning October 1.
However, Congress is the body required by law to pass a budget annually and to submit the बजट passed by दोनो घरों to the अध्यक्ष लिये signature.
Congressional निर्णय हैं governed by rules and legislation regarding the federal budget process.
Budget committees set spending limits for the हाउस और सीनेट समितियों और लिये appropriations subcommittees, which then approve individual appropriations bills to allocate funding to various federal programs.
If Congress fails to pass an annual budget ( as has been the case since 2009 ), a series of Appropriations बिल्स जरूर be passed as `` रोकें गैप '' उपायों.
After Congress approves an appropriations bill, it is sent to the President, who may sign it into विधि, or may वीटो it ( as he होता a बजट जब passed by the Congress ).
A vetoed विधेयक is भेजा वापस to कॉंग्रेस, जिससे can pass it into law with a two-thirds majority in each chamber.
Congress may also combine all or some appropriations बिल्स into an omnibus reconciliation bill.
In addition, the president may request and the Congress may pass supplemental appropriations बिल्स or आपात supplemental appropriations bills.
Several सरकारी एजेंसियों provide budget data and analysis.
These include the Government Accountability Office ( GAO ), Congressional Budget Office, the दफ्तर of प्रबन्धन और बजट ( omb ) और the u.S. राजकोष Department.
These agencies have reported that the federal government is facing a श्रेणी of महत्वपूर्ण financing challenges.
In the short-run, tax revenues have declined significantly due to a severe recession and tax policy चुनाव, जबकि expenditures have विस्तारित लिये युद्धों, बेरोजगारी बीमे and other safety net spending.
In the long-run, expenditures related to healthcare programs such as Medicare and Medicaid are projected to grow faster than the अर्थव्यवस्था overall as the population matures.
New Guinea ( also, Tok Pisin : Niugini, Dutch : nieuw गिनी, और ; historically : पापुआ ) is the संसार 's दूसरी largest island, after Greenland, covering a land area of 786,000 km2.
Located in the southwest Pacific Ocean, it lies geographically to the east of the मलय द्वीपसमूह, साथ जिससे it is sometimes included as part of a greater Indo-Australian Archipelago.
Geologically it is a part of the वही tectonic थाली as ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
When world sea levels were low, the two shared shorelines ( which now lie 100 to 140 metres below समुद्र स्तर ), combining साथ lands अभी inundated into the tectonic continent of Sahul, also known as Greater Australia.
The two landmasses became separated when the area now known as the Torres Strait flooded बाद the समाप्त of the पिछला glacial period.
Anthropologically, New Guinea is माना भाग of मॅलानिशिया.
Politically, the western half of the island comprises two Indonesian प्रांतों : पापुआ और West Papua.
The eastern half forms the mainland of the देश of पापुआ नई गिनी.
The island has a population of about 7.5 लाख, साथ a बहुत कम जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व of only 8 inh/km2.
New गिनी is differentiated इससे इसके drier, खुशामद, और कम fertile दक्षिणी बंटवारा, Australia, by its much higher rainfall and its active volcanic geology, with its highest point, Puncak Jaya, reaching an elevation of 4,884 m ( 16,023 ft ).
Yet the two जमीन masses share a समान एनिमल fauna, साथ marsupials, including wallabies and possums, and the egg-laying monotreme, the spiny anteater, or echidna.
Other than bats and some दो दर्जन स्वदेशी कृंतक genera, वहीँ हैं no pre-human स्वदेशी placental mammals.
Pigs, several additional species of rats, and the पूर्वज of the नई गिनी गायन श्वान यहूद introduced साथ human colonization.
The human presence on the island dates back at least 40,000 years to the oldest इंसान migrations आउट of अफ़्रीकी.
Research indicates that the हाइलैंड्स यहूद an जल्दी और स्वतंत्र बीच of कृषि, साथ evidence of irrigation going back at least 10,000 years.
Because of the समय गहराई of इसके inhabitation और इसके अत्यधिक fractured landscape, an unusually high number of languages are spoken on the island, with some 1,000 languages ( a figure higher than that of most continents ) having been catalogued out of an estimated world-wide pre-Columbian total of 6,000 human dialects.
Most are classified as Papuan भाषाएं, a generally स्वीकृत भौगोलिक पद जिससे a अल्पसंख्यक of authors hold to be a genetic one.
A number of Austronesian languages are spoken on the coast और on offshore islands.
In the 16th century स्पेनी explorers खोजा the island and called it Nueva Guinea.
In recent history पश्चिमी नई गिनी थी शामिल in the Dutch East Indies colony.
The Germans annexed the northern coast of the eastern half of the island as German New Guinea in उनके pre–world युद्ध i प्रयत्न to स्थापित themselves as a औपनिवेशिक शक्ति, whilst the दक्षिण eastern portion was reluctantly claimed by Britain.
Following the Treaty of Versailles, the German portion was awarded to ऑस्ट्रेलिया ( जिससे थी already शासी the अंग्रेजों अर्जी, नामित the Territory of Papua ) as a League of Nations mandate.
The eastern half of the island was granted independence from Australia as पापुआ नई गिनी in 1975.
The western half gained independence from the Dutch in 1961, लकिन became भाग of इंडोनेशिया जल्द afterwards in controversial circumstances.
`` The Van Buren Boys '' is the 148th episode of the sitcom seinfeld, और नाम of a fictional New York street gang.
Their चिह्न is क्रासिंग the हैंड्स, साथ एक हाथ साथ all the fingers 'up ' and spread out.
The other hand has all but the thumb और सूचक उंगली up, लिये a कुल of eight ( 8 ).
The gang is named for the 8th President of the United States, Martin Van Buren ( who थी the पहला अध्यक्ष इससे New York ).
This was the 14th एपीसोड लिये the 8th ऋतु.
It aired on फ़रवरी 6, 1997.
bevo sign
Bevo was a non-alcoholic malt beverage, or near बियर, brewed in the संयुक्त राज्य by the Anheuser-Busch company beginning in the early 20th century.
Bevo enjoyed its greatest success during the समय of निषेध, जब बियर, वाइन और आसुत liquors, were made illegal for thirteen years.
The anheuser-busch कम्पनी प्रारंभ brewing bevo जब alcoholic पेय were prohibited in 1916 by the United States armed forces.
Production rose greatly with national prohibition in 1919, and Bevo was by far the most popular of the अनेक `` खाद्यान्न पेय '' or `` near beers '' of the time.
At the peak of इसके लोकप्रियता in the जल्दी 1920s, more than five million cases of Bevo were sold annually.
Renard साथ a मग of bevo, depicted in terra cotta on the interior walls of the Bevo building, St. Louis
Labels on the बोतलों billed it as `` bevo the Beverage ''.
The name `` Bevo '' was coined from the word `` beverage '' and the स्लावी भाषा word for beer `` pivo '', and was pronounced `` Bee-vo ''.
Some Bevo advertising featured the character `` Renard the Fox `` ( based on the समर्थक of a मध्यकालीन फ्रेंच folk-tale ), और promotional मग साथ इस अक्षर यहूद manufactured.
In 1930 anheuser-busch निर्मित a श्रेणी of boat-bodied गाड़ियाँ in इसके st. Louis shops called the `` Bevo Boats '' which were used for promotion.
Seven are believed to have महरूम निर्मित on pierce-arrow 8-cylinder chassis जबकि one surviving example was based upon 1930 Cadillac 353 V8.
Billboard advertising Bevo in trenton, नई जर्सी, 1917
A समकालीन विज्ञापन पढ़ा `` कूलिंग और invigorating, Bevo the Beverage.
Order by the case from your grocer, druggist, or dealer. ''
The paper label on the वापस of the बोतल पढ़ा `` the All-Year-Round Soft Drink.
Appetizing - Healthful - पौष्टिक - ताज़ा.
Milk or water may contain जीवाणु.
bevo never does. ''
Bevo became part of the popular culture of the समय, और is उल्लेखित in विभिन्न लोकप्रिय songs and Vaudeville skits of the era.
This led to secondary slang uses of the शब्द ; लिये उदाहरण, in अमरीकी सैन्य slang a young and inexperienced officer was called a `` Bevo ''.
The University of Texas named इसके शुभंकर `` bevo '', a नाम which has stuck to this day.
Irving Berlin included a paean to the drink, `` तुम ca n't रहो up on bevo '', in his 1917 army revue, Yip Yip Yaphank.
In the late 1920s smuggled bootleg beer and liquor as well as `` homebrew ``, काटें into bevo 's marketshare.
With sales flattening to 100,000 cases by 1929, anheuser-busch रोका उत्पादन.
The Bevo मिल, st. Louis, in 2008
The Bevo building, with the Renard character prominently displayed at the corners, still operates as a bottling facility at उनके प्रमुख ब्रेवरी in st. Louis, Missouri.
The landmark Bevo Mill, constructed by August anheuser बुच, sr. in 1917.
It was closed in 2009, लकिन it reopened in अक्तूबर 2009 under new owners.
bevo is भी उल्लेखित in the छोटी स्टोरी `` the हत्यारे `` by Ernest Hemingway ; as well as in Babbitt by Sinclair Lewis.

Milk is a श्वेत द्रव उत्पादित by the mammary glands of mammals.
It is the primary source of nutrition लिये यंग स्तनधारियों पहले they are able to digest other types of food.
Early- lactation milk contains colostrum, which carries the mother 's antibodies to the baby and can reduce the risk of many diseases in the baby.
It also contains अनेक अन्य nutrients.
As an agricultural product, milk is निकाली इससे स्तनधारियों और प्रयुक्त as food for humans.
Worldwide, dairy farms produced about 730 लाख टन of मिल्क in 2011.
India is the संसार 's largest निर्माता और उपभोक्ता of मिल्क, yet neither exports nor imports milk.
New Zealand, the European Union 's 27 member states, Australia, and the United States are the world 's largest निर्यातक of milk and milk products.
China and Russia are the संसार 's largest importers of milk and milk products.
Throughout the world, there are more than 6 अरब उपभोक्ता of मिल्क और मिल्क उत्पाद.
Over 750 million people सजीव भीतर दुग्ध खेती households.
Milk is a key contributor to improving पोषण और खाना सुरक्षा विशेषकर in developing countries.
Improvements in livestock and dairy technology offer significant promise in reducing गरीबी और कुपोषण in the world.
Motorcycle speedway, प्रायः referred to as स्पीडवे, is a मोटरसाइकिल sport involving four and sometimes up to six riders competing over four anti-clockwise laps of an oval circuit.
Speedway motorcycles use only one gear and have no brakes and racing takes place on a चपटा ओवल track प्रायः consisting of मैल or loosely packed shale.
Competitors use this surface to slide their machines बगलों, powersliding or broadsiding into the bends.
On the straight sections of the track the motorcycles reach speeds of up.
The exact origins of the sport are unknown but there is evidence of a प्रकार of स्पीडवे रेसिंग होने practised in the यूएसए पहले the पहला संसार युद्ध और in ऑस्ट्रेलिया in the late 1910s and early 1920s.
There are now both domestic and international competitions in a number of countries सहित the स्पीडवे संसार कप whilst the उच्चतम overall स्कोरिंग व्यक्तिगत in the Speedway Grand Prix events is pronounced the world champion.
Speedway is popular in central and northern Europe and to a lesser extent in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और उत्तर अमेरिका.
A variant of track racing, स्पीडवे is administered internationally by the Fédération Internationale de Motocyclisme ( FIM ).
Domestic speedway events are regulated by FIM affiliated नेशनल मोटर खेल federations.
Vitamin D is a group of fat-soluble secosteroids responsible लिये intestinal अवशोषण of कैल्सियम and phosphate.
In इंसानो, the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण सम्बन्धित यौगिकों of vitamin D are vitamin D2 and vitamin D3.
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) and ergocalciferol ( vitamin D2 ) are unique as they constitute कया we जान as विटामिन d और can be ingested from the diet and/or supplements.
The body can also synthesize विटामिन d ( इससे कोलेस्ट्रॉल ) जब सूर्य एक्सपोज़र is adequate ( hence its nickname, the `` sunshine vitamin '' ).
Although विटामिन d is commonly पुकारा a विटामिन, it is नहीं दरअसल an essential dietary vitamin in the strict sense, as it can be synthesized in adequate amounts by most mammals exposed to sunlight.
( Cats and dogs can not synthesize विटामिन d efficiently और जरूर receive it in their diet. )
An सशुल्क रासायनिक यौगिक ( or सम्बन्धित नियत of यौगिकों ) is तभी scientifically called a vitamin when it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism, and must be obtained from their diet.
However, as with other compounds commonly called vitamins, vitamin D was discovered in an effort to ढूँढें the dietary पदार्थ कि थी lacking in a बीमारी, namely, rickets, the childhood form of osteomalacia.
additionally, जैसे अन्य यौगिकों पुकारा vitamins, in the developed world vitamin D is added to staple foods, such as milk, to avoid disease due to deficiency.
Measures of serum levels reflect endogenous synthesis from exposure to sunlight as well as intake इससे the आहार, और it is believed कि संश्लेषण may योगदान generally to the मेंटेनेंस of adequate serum concentrations.
The प्रमाण indicates कि the संश्लेषण of विटामिन d इससे सूर्य एक्सपोज़र works in a प्रतिक्रिया लूप कि रोकता toxicity लकिन, क्युकी of अनिश्चितता about the cancer risk from sunlight, no recommendations are issued by the Institute of Medicine, USA, for the amount of sun exposure required to meet vitamin D requirements.
Accordingly, the Dietary Reference Intakes for vitamin D assume that no संश्लेषण occurs और कि सब of a व्यक्ति 's विटामिन d is from their diet, although that will rarely occur in practice.
In the liver vitamin D is converted to calcidiol, which is also known as calcifediol ( INN ), 25-hydroxycholecalciferol, or 25-hydroxyvitamin d—abbreviated 25 ( oh ) d ; और जिससे is the विशिष्ट विटामिन d metabolite कि is measured in सीरम to determine a व्यक्ति 's vitamin D status.
Part of the calcidiol is converted by the kidneys to calcitriol, the biologically active form of vitamin D. Calcitriol circulates as a hormone in the blood, regulating the concentration of कैल्सियम और फास्फेट in the bloodstream और promoting the स्वस्थ विकास और remodeling of अस्थि.
Calcidiol is also converted to calcitriol outside of the kidneys for other purposes, such as the अप्रसार, differentiation और apoptosis of कोशिकाएं ; calcitriol also affects neuromuscular function and inflammation.
Beyond its use to prevent osteomalacia or rickets, the प्रमाण लिये अन्य स्वास्थ्य प्रभाव of vitamin D supplementation in the general population is inconsistent.
The best evidence of benefit is for अस्थि स्वास्थ्य और a घटी in mortality in elderly women.
the duramax is a सामान्य मोटर्स diesel engine family for light- and medium duty trucks, designed by Isuzu.
The 6.6-liter Duramax is produced by DMAX, a joint venture between gm और isuzu in Moraine, Ohio.
This engine was initially installed in 2001 model year Chevy and GMC trucks और रै महरूम an विकल्प चूंकि तब in pickups, वैन, and medium-duty trucks.
In 2006, production at moraine थी reportedly सीमित to लगभग 200,000 engines per year.
On May 9, 2007, DMAX announced the उत्पादन of the 1,000,000th duramax V-8 diesel at its Moraine facility.

Balto ( 1919 – March 14, 1933 ) was a Siberian हस्की sled श्वान जो led उसके टोली on the फाइनल लेग of the 1925 सीरम चलाएं to nome, in which diphtheria antitoxin was transported from Anchorage, Alaska, to Nenana, Alaska, by train and then to Nome by dog sled to combat an outbreak of the disease.
The run is commemorated by the सालाना iditarod ट्रेल sled Dog Race.
Balto was named after the Sami एक्सप्लोरर सैमुएल balto.
balto died at the age of 14.
