propolis as hive sealing
Propolis is a resinous mixture that honey bees collect from tree कलियों, sap बहती, or अन्य वनस्पति स्त्रोत.
It is used as a sealant लिये अनावश्यक खोलें स्पेसेस in the hive.
Propolis is used for small gaps ( approximately or less ), while larger spaces are प्रायः भर साथ beeswax.
Its color varies depending on its botanical source, the most आम होने अंधेरा भूरा.
Propolis is sticky at और ऊपर रूम तापमान,.
at निम्नतर temperatures, it becomes hard and very brittle.
स्टीवन टायलर ( born स्टीवन विक्टर tallarico ; कूच 26, 1948 ) is an American singer, songwriter, and multi-instrumentalist, best known as the frontman and lead singer of the Boston -based rock band Aerosmith, in which he also plays the harmonica, and occasional piano and percussion.
He is known as the `` Demon of Screamin ' '' due to his high चिल्लाती और उसके चौड़ी गायन range.
He is also known for उसके on-stage acrobatics.
During his high-energy प्रदर्शन, he प्रायः पोशाक in उज्जवल, रंगीन outfits with his trademark scarves hanging from his microphone stand.
In the 1970s, Tyler rose to prominence as the frontman of Aerosmith, which released such milestone मुश्किल चट्टान एल्बम as खिलौने in the अटारी और रॉक्स.
In the late 1970s and जल्दी 1980s, टायलर था a भारी ड्रग and alcohol addiction, and the band 's popularity waned.
He completed drug rehabilitation in 1986 and subsequently maintained sobriety for over 20 years, but had a पतन साथ नुस्खा painkillers in the लेट 2000s, लिये जिससे he successfully received treatment in 2009.
After Aerosmith launched a remarkable comeback in the late 1980s and जल्दी 1990s साथ the एल्बम स्थाई अवकाश, पंप, और मिलेंगी a पकड़, टायलर became a household name and has remained a relevant rock icon.
As a result, he has since embarked on several solo endeavors सहित अतिथि दिखावे on अन्य artists ' music, film and TV roles ( including as a judge on American Idol ), authoring a bestselling book, and solo work ( including a Top 40 hit single in 2011 ).
However, he has continued to रिकार्ड म्यूज़िक और perform साथ एरोस्मिथ, बाद अधिक than 43 years in the band.
The band 's latest album, Music इससे another आयाम !
, was released on नवम्बर 6, 2012.
Tyler is included among Rolling Stones 100 महानतम Singers.
He was also ranked 3rd on Hit Parader 's Top 100 मेटल vocalists of सब समय.
In 2001 he was inducted into the चट्टान और फेंकें हॉल of कीर्ति साथ Aerosmith, and he was the presenter when AC/DC was inducted into the Hall of Fame in 2003.
In 2013, Tyler and his songwriting partner Joe Perry will be recipients of the ascap संस्थापकों पुरस्कार और will also be inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame.
The liver produces यूरिया in the यूरिया साईकिल as a बर्बाद उत्पाद of the digestion of protein.
Normal human adult blood should contain between 7 to 21 mg of यूरिया नाइट्रोजन प्रति 100 ml ( 7–21 mg/ dL ) of blood.
Individual laboratories may have अलग सन्दर्भ ranges, and this is because the procedure may vary.
Wayne Fontes ( born February 2, 1940 ) is a former American football coach and college और पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल खिलाड़ी जो was the head coach of the NFL 's Detroit Lions from 1988 to 1996.
His 67 wins and 71 losses are each the सबसे लिये a सिर कोच in टोली history.
The Jews ( आईएसओ 259-3 israeli उच्चारण ), also known as the Jewish people, are a nation and an ethnoreligious group, originating in the Israelites or Hebrews of the Ancient Near East.
The यहूदी नस्ल, राष्ट्रीयता, और धर्म are strongly interrelated, as Judaism is the traditional faith of the Jewish nation.
Converts to Judaism, whose status as Jews within the Jewish ethnos is equal to those born into it, have महरूम अवशोषित into the यहूदी लोगों throughout the millennia.
In Jewish tradition, Jewish ancestry is traced to the biblical patriarchs अब्राहम, Isaac and Jacob in the second millennium BCE.
The modern राज्य of इसराईल थी स्थापित as a यहूदी nation-state, और defines itself as such in its Basic Laws.
Its Law of Return grants the right of citizenship to any Jew who निवेदन it.
Israel is the तभी देश जहाँ यहूदियों हैं a majority of the population.
Jews also enjoyed political स्वायत्तता twice पहले in ancient history.
the पहला of ये अवधि lasted इससे 1350 to 586 bce, और encompassed the अवधि of the Judges, the United Monarchy, and the Divided Monarchy of the Kingdoms of Israel and Judah, ending with the destruction of the First Temple.
The second was the period of the Hasmonean Kingdom spanning इससे 140 to 37 bce.
Since the destruction of the First Temple, most Jews have जिया in diaspora.
A अल्पसंख्यक in प्रत्येक देश in जिससे वे सजीव ( except Israel ), they have frequently experienced persecution throughout history, resulting in a population that has fluctuated both in numbers and distribution over the centuries.
The world Jewish population reached a peak of 15 million prior to the दूसरी संसार युद्ध, लकिन छह लाख यहूदियों यहूद मारे in the holocaust.
Since then the population has risen again and, was estimated at 13.4 million by the North American Jewish आंकड़ा बैंको, or कम than 0.2 % of the कुल संसार जनसांख्यिकी ( roughly एक in every 514 people ).
According to this report, about 42.5 % of all Jews reside in Israel ( 5.7 million ), and 39.3 % in the United States ( 5.3 लाख ), साथ सबसे of the शेष जीना in यूरोपीय ( 1.5 million ) and Canada ( 0.4 million ).
These numbers include all those who consider themselves Jews, whether or नहीं वे हैं संबद्ध with a Jewish organization.
The total world यहूदी जनसांख्यिकी, however, is difficult to measure.
In जोड to मुद्दे साथ जनसांख्यिकी methodology, वहीँ हैं halakhic विवादों regarding who is a Jew and secular, political, and ancestral identification factors that may affect the figure considerably.
कॉर्पस christi procession.

Corpus Domini redirects यहाँ.
For other uses see कॉर्पस domini ( बहुविकल्पी )
The Feast of Corpus Christi ( Latin for Body of Christ ), also known as कॉर्पस domini, is a लैटिन रीति liturgical solemnity celebrating the परंपरा और विश्वास in the देह and blood of Jesus Christ and his Real Presence in the Eucharist.
It emphasizes the joy of the institution of the Eucharist, which was observed on पावन गुरुवार in the somber माहौल of the nearness of Good Friday.
In the present Roman Missal, the feast is designated the solemnity of the सबसे पावन देह और रक्त of Christ.
It is also मनाये in कुछ anglican, लूथरन, and Old Catholic Churches that hold similar beliefs regarding the Real Presence.
The feast is liturgically celebrated on the Thursday after Trinity Sunday or, `` where the Solemnity of the Most Holy Body and Blood of मसीह is नहीं a पावन दिन of दायित्व, it is आबंटित to the संडे बाद the सबसे पावन ट्रिनिटी as इसके उचित day ''.
At the end of Holy Mass, there is often a procession of the धन्य sacrament, generally प्रदर्शित in a monstrance.
The procession is followed by सुनाकर of the धन्य sacrament.
A notable Eucharistic procession is that presided over by the Pope each year in Rome, where it begins at the Archbasilica of St. John lateran और makes इसके रास्ता to the basilica of संत मरियम प्रमुख, जहाँ it concludes with Benediction.
C-reactive protein ( CRP ) is a protein found in the blood, the levels of which rise in जवाब to सूजन ( i.e. c-reactive प्रोटीन is an acute-phase protein ).
Its physiological role is to bind to phosphocholine expressed on the surface of dead or dying cells ( and कुछ प्रकार of जीवाणु ) in अनुक्रम to activate the complement system via the C1Q complex.
CRP is synthesized by the liver in जवाब to कारकों released by macrophages and fat cells ( adipocytes ).
It is a सदस्य of the pentraxin family of proteins.
It is not related to c-peptide or प्रोटीन C.
c-reactive प्रोटीन थी the पहला पैटर्न recognition receptor ( PRR ) to be identified.
The start of the systematic European colonization of the Americas is typically dated to 1492, when a Spanish expedition headed by क्रिस्टोफर कोलंबस sailed लिये इण्डिया to खोलें व्यापार लकिन inadvertently खोजा the Americas.
European conquest, large-scale खोजी और colonization जल्द followed.
Seeing that यूरोपीय थी preoccupied साथ अनेक आतंरिक युद्धों और थी धीरे recovering इससे the many deaths that the bubonic plague caused, the rapid expansion at which it grew in wealth and power was unforeseeable in the early 1400s.
The first रिझाने occurred साथ the caribbean coasts on the islands of Hispaniola, Puerto Rico and Cuba, and after 1500 extended into the interiors of both North and South America.
In 1497, sailing from the north on behalf of England, John Cabot landed on the North अमरीकी coast, और a साल बाद, कोलंबस 's तीसरा voyage पहुँचे the दक्षिण अमरीकी coast.
France founded colonies in much of eastern North America, on a क्रमांक of caribbean आइलैंड्स, और in South America.
Portugal colonized ब्राज़ील.
Eventually, the entire Western गोलार्ध आए अंतर्गत the कंट्रोल of यूरोपीय सरकारें, leading to profound changes to its landscape, population, and plant and animal life.
In the 19th century अलोन over 50 लाख लोगों बाएँ Europe for the Americas.
The post-1492 era is known as the काल of the columbian एक्सचेंज.
Keith Richards ( born 18 दिसम्बर 1943 ) is an अंग्रेज़ी संगीतकार, singer-songwriter and founder member of the English rock band the Rolling Stones.
रोलिंग स्टोन पत्रिका said Richards had created `` rock 's greatest single body of riffs '', ranking him 4th on its list of 100 best guitarists.
Fourteen songs Richards wrote with the Rolling Stones ' सीसे vocalist मिक जैगर हैं सूचीबद्ध among रोलिंग स्टोन पत्रिका 's `` 500 Greatest Songs of All Time ``.
Richards ' notoriety for illicit drug use stems in part from several drug busts during the late 1960s and 1970s and his candour regarding his व्यसन to और eventual abstinence इससे heroin.
Testosterone is a steroid hormone from the androgen group and is found in स्तनधारियों, सरीसृपों, पक्षियों, और अन्य vertebrates.
In mammals, testosterone is primarily स्रावित in the अंडकोष of males और the अंडाशय of महिलाओं, हालांकि छोटी amounts हैं भी secreted by the adrenal glands.
It is the प्रिंसिपल male sex hormone and an anabolic steroid.
In men, टेस्टोस्टेरोन plays a कुंजी भूमिका in the विकास of पुरूष reproductive tissues such as the testis and prostate as well as promoting secondary sexual characteristics such as increased muscle, bone mass, and the growth of body hair.
In जोड, टेस्टोस्टेरोन is अनिवार्य लिये स्वास्थ्य and well-being as well as the prevention of osteoporosis.
On average, in adult human males, the plasma concentration of testosterone is about 7–8 times as great as the विशेषज्ञता in वयस्क इंसान महिलाओं ' प्लाज्मा, लकिन as the metabolic consumption of testosterone in males is greater, the daily production is about 20 times greater in men.
Females also are more संवेदनशील to the hormone.
टेस्टोस्टेरोन is observed in most vertebrates.
Fish make a slightly different form पुकारा 11-ketotestosterone.
Its बंटवारा in कीट is ecdysone.
These ubiquitous steroids सुझाएँ कि sex हार्मोन have an प्राचीन evolutionary history.
Cluster sampling is a sampling technique used when `` प्राकृतिक '' लकिन अपेक्षाकृत समरूप groupings are evident in a statistical population.
It is often used in विपणन शोध.
In this तकनीक, the कुल जनसांख्यिकी is विभाजित into these groups ( or clusters ) and a simple random sample of the groups is selected.
Then the required सूचना is एकत्रित इससे a सरल यादृच्छिक नमूना of the elements within each selected group.
This may be done for every तत्व in ये समूह or a subsample of तत्व may be selected within each of these groups.
A common motivation for cluster sampling is to reduce the total क्रमांक of साक्षात्कार और लागत given the desired accuracy.
Assuming a fixed sample size, the technique gives more accurate results when most of the विभिन्नता in the जनसांख्यिकी is भीतर the groups, not between them.
Jamestown is a town in Guilford County, North Carolina, United States, and is a suburb of the nearby cities of greensboro और ऊँची Point.
The population was 3,382 at the 2010 census.
Natalie Portman ( born Natalie Hershlag ; ; June 9, 1981 ) is an actress and model साथ डुअल अमरीकी और israeli नागरिकता.
Her first role was as an orphan लिया in by a हिटमैन in the 1994 कार्रवाई फिल्मी, लकिन मुख्यधारा कामयाबी came when she was cast as Padmé Amidala in the Star Wars prequel trilogy ( released in 1999, 2002 and 2005 ).
In 1999, she enrolled at Harvard University to पढ़ाई मनोविज्ञान जबकि स्टिल working as an actress.
She completed उसके स्नातक 's degree in 2003.
In 2001, पोर्टमैन खोली in नई York City 's Public Theater production of Anton Chekhov 's The Seagull.
In 2005, Portman received a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Supporting अभिनेत्री और जीती the Golden Globe Award for Best Supporting Actress - Motion Picture for the drama Closer.
She won a Constellation Award for बेहतरीन मादा प्रदर्शन और a शनि पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री for her starring role in V for Vendetta ( 2006 ).
She निभाई अग्रणी भूमिकाएँ in the ऐतिहासिक dramas गोया 's Ghosts ( 2006 ) and The Other Boleyn Girl ( 2008 ).
In May 2008, वो परोसा as the youngest member of the 61st Annual Cannes Film Festival jury.
Portman 's directorial डेब्यू, संध्या, खोली the 65th Venice International Film Festival 's shorts competition in 2008.
Portman directed a segment of the collective फिल्मी नई यॉर्क, i प्रेम You.
In 2011, Portman won the Academy Award, the Golden ग्लोब पुरस्कार, the bafta पुरस्कार, the स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार, and the Independent Spirit Award for her lead performance as Nina Sayers in Black Swan.
Copper is a chemical element with the symbol cu ( इससे ) और परमाणु क्रमांक 29.
It is a ductile metal with very ऊँची थर्मल और विद्युत चालकता.
Pure तांबे is नरम और malleable ; a freshly उजागर surface has a reddish-orange color.
It is used as a conductor of heat and विद्युत, a building material, and a constituent of various metal alloys.
The metal और इसके alloys have महरूम प्रयुक्त for thousands of years.
In the Roman era, copper was प्रधानतया mined on साइप्रस, hence the उत्पत्ति of the name of the metal as сyprium ( metal of Cyprus ), later shortened to сuprum.
Its compounds are commonly encountered as copper ( II ) salts, which often impart blue or ग्रीन रंगों to खनिज ऐसे as azurite और फ़िरोज़ा और have been widely used historically as pigments.
Architectural structures निर्मित साथ तांबे corrode to give green verdigris ( or patina ).
Decorative art prominently सुविधाएँ तांबे, both by itself and as part of pigments.
Copper is essential to all living organisms as a trace dietary mineral because it is a key constituent of the respiratory एंजाइम जटिल cytochrome c oxidase.
In molluscs and crustacea copper is a constituent of the blood pigment hemocyanin, जिससे is replaced by the iron-complexed हीमोग्लोबिन in fish and other vertebrates.
The main क्षेत्रों जहाँ तांबे is मिला in vertebrates are liver, muscle and bone.
In sufficient विशेषज्ञता, तांबे यौगिकों हैं poisonous to higher organisms and are used as bacteriostatic substances, fungicides, and wood preservatives.
The major professional खेल लीग, or बस प्रमुख लीग, in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा हैं the उच्चतम professional competitions of team sports in the two countries.
Although individual sports such as golf, tennis, and auto racing are also very लोकप्रिय, the पद is प्रायः सीमित to टोली sports.
The term `` प्रमुख लीग '' थी पहला used in 1921 in reference to Major League Baseball ( MLB ), the top level of professional American baseball.
Today, the major northern North America पेशेवर टोली खेल लीग हैं प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल ( एमएलबी ), the नेशनल बास्केट संघ ( एनबीए ), the National Football League ( NFL ), and the National Hockey League ( NHL ).
Other notable leagues include Major League Soccer ( MLS ), the Canadian Football League ( CFL ), the Arena Football League, प्रमुख लीग lacrosse, the नेशनल lacrosse लीग और the महिलाओं 's नेशनल बास्केट संघ.
The NFL, MLB, NBA, and NHL are commonly referred to as the बिग Four.
Each of these is the richest professional club competition in its खेल विश्वव्यापी.
The best players can become cultural icons in both countries and elsewhere in the संसार, क्युकी the लीग आनंद a significant प्लेस in लोकप्रिय संस्कृति in the us and Canada.
The NFL has 32 teams, and the अन्य have 30 each.
The vast majority of major लीग टीमों हैं concentrated in the सबसे populous महानगर areas of the United States.
Baseball, football, hockey, and soccer have had professional leagues for over 100 years ; early leagues such as the नेशनल संघ, ओहियो लीग, और नेशनल हॉकी संघ formed the आधार of the modern MLB, NFL and NHL respectively.
Soccer was first professionalized in 1894, but leagues suffered greatly इससे कमी of स्थिरता और seldom lasted अधिक than a decade.
Soccer 's greatest successes यहूद in the रूप of the अमरीकी सॉकर लीग ( 1921-1933 ), the असली उत्तर अमरीकी सॉकर लीग ( 1968-1984 ), the नेशनल पेशेवर Soccer League ( 1984-2001 ) and, currently, Major League Soccer ( 1996-present ).
बास्केट is a अपेक्षाकृत नई विकास ; the एनबीए विकसित इससे the National Basketball League and its splinter group the Basketball Association of America, taking on its current form in 1949.
Every major league averages 15,000 प्रशंसक in उपस्थिति per game or higher as of 2011.
Meridian Altitude is an astronomical navigation method of calculating an निरीक्षक 's अक्षांश.
Earned value management ( EVM ), or Earned value project/performance प्रबन्धन ( evpm ) is a प्रोजेक्ट प्रबन्धन तकनीक लिये measuring project performance and progress in an objective manner.
Because EVM has the क्षमता to combine माप of :
पैमाना
अनुसूची
and cost,
in a single integrated system, Earned Value Management is able to provide accurate forecasts of प्रोजेक्ट प्रदर्शन समस्याएं, जिससे is an important contribution for project management.
Early EVM research showed that the areas of planning and control are significantly impacted by its use ; and similarly, using the methodology improves दोनो पैमाना परिभाषा as खूब as the विश्लेषण of overall प्रोजेक्ट प्रदर्शन.
More recent research studies have shown that the सिद्धान्त of evm हैं धनात्मक predictors of प्रोजेक्ट success.
Popularity of EVM has grown significantly in recent years beyond government contracting, in which sector its importance continues to rise ( e.g., recent new DFAR rules ), in part because evm can भी सतह in और सहायता substantiate अनुबंध विवादों.

Spring is एक of the चार conventional शीतोष्ण seasons, following winter and preceding summer.
There are various technical परिभाषाएं of वसन्त, लकिन लोकल उपयोग of the term varies according to local climate, cultures and customs.
When it is वसन्त in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध, it will be autumn in the southern hemisphere.
At the वसन्त विषुव, दिनों हैं बंद to 12 घंटों long with day length increasing as the season progresses.
Spring and `` springtime '' refer to the season, and also to ideas of rebirth, कायाकल्प, नवीकरण, क़यामत, और regrowth, साथ त्यौहार ऐसे as कार्निवल, Easter and Holi being celebrated at this time.
Jamestown थी a उपनिवेश in the उपनिवेश of Virginia, the first permanent English settlement in the Americas.
Established by the Virginia Company of London as `` James Fort '' on May 14, 1607 ( o.s., may 24, 1607 n.s. ), it followed अनेक पहले विफल कोशिशें, सहित the Lost Colony of Roanoke.
Jamestown served as the capital of the उपनिवेश लिये 83 सालो, इससे 1616 until 1699.
The settlement was located within the territory of a political entity known as tsenacommacah, the राज्य of the powhatan confederacy, साथ around 14,000 देशी निवासियों, और specifically थी in भाग of the subdivision known as the Paspahegh tribe.
The natives initially welcomed the colonists with dancing, feasting and tobacco ceremonies, and they provided crucial प्रावधानों और support लिये the अस्तित्व of the colonists, जो यहूद नहीं agriculturally inclined, although relations with the newcomers also soured fairly early on, leading to the total annihilation of the Paspahegh in warfare within 3 years.
Within a year of Jamestown 's founding, the Virginia कम्पनी brought पॉलिश और डच colonists to सहायता improve the settlement.
In 1619, the first documented Africans were brought to Jamestown, though the modern धारणा of गुलामी in the भविष्य संयुक्त States did not begin in Virginia until 1660.
जब the उपनिवेश थी subdivided into the असली eight shires of Virginia in 1634, the town became located in the eponymous James City Shire.
The London Company 's second settlement, बरमूडा, दावा to be the साईट of the oldest town in the English New World, as St. George 's, Bermuda was officially established ( as New London ) in 1612, whereas James Fort, in Virginia, was not to be converted into James towne until 1619, and further did not survive into the present day.
In 1699, the capital was relocated from Jamestown to what is today Williamsburg, after which Jamestown ceased to मौजूद as a उपनिवेश, मौजूदा आज तभी as an archaeological site.
Today, Jamestown is एक of तीन स्थितियाँ comprising the ऐतिहासिक Triangle of Colonial Virginia, along with Williamsburg and Yorktown, with two primary heritage sites.
Historic Jamestowne, the archaeological site on Jamestown Island, is a cooperative effort by Jamestown National ऐतिहासिक साईट ( भाग of औपनिवेशिक नेशनल ऐतिहासिक पार्क ), और संरक्षण Virginia.
The Jamestown Settlement, a जीना इतिहास interpretive साईट, is संचालित by the jamestown yorktown Foundation in conjunction with the Commonwealth of Virginia.
James Christopher Frey ( born September 12, 1969 ) is an अमरीकी writer.
His books A Million Little Pieces ( 2003 ) and My Friend Leonard ( 2005 ), as खूब as उज्जवल चमकदार morning ( 2008 ), were bestsellers.
He was the subject of a scandal when investigators discovered that prison time and the extent of certain चोटों यहूद अतिरंजित in a लाख छोटी टुकड़े, a अधिकारीगण autobiographical खाता of the लेखक 's struggle with addiction.
Deere & Company, सबसे commonly ज्ञात by इसके नाम जॉन deere, is an अमरीकी निगम आधारित in moline, इलिनोइस, and one of the largest manufacturers of agricultural machinery in the world.
In 2012, it was listed as 97th in the Fortune 500 America 's ranking and 190th in the सौभाग्य 500 Global ranking.
Deere and Company agricultural उत्पाद, बेची अंतर्गत the जॉन deere नाम, शामिल tractors, combine हार्वेस्टर, cotton harvesters, balers, planters / seeders, sprayers, and UTVs.
The company is also a manufacturer of construction equipment and forestry equipment, as well as a supplier of diesel engines and drivetrains ( axles, ट्रांसमिशन, gearboxes ) प्रयुक्त in heavy equipment.
Additionally, जॉन deere manufactures उपकरण प्रयुक्त in लॉन, grounds, और turf परवाह, ऐसे as walk-behind lawn mowers, zero-turn lawn mowers, lawn tractors, and snowthrowers.
To support the core businesses, John Deere also provides financial सेवाएं और अन्य सम्बन्धित क्रियाएँ.
the कम्पनी 's स्लोगन is `` nothing रनों जैसे a Deere '' and has a picture of a leaping deer as a logo, a word play pun on `` nothing runs like a deer ''.
Carl Westby coined the phrase `` Nothing रनों जैसे a deere '' लिये a विपणन अभियान to sell snowmobiles.
The company 's products are भी identifiable by इसके distinctive शेड of ग्रीन पेंट, प्रायः augmented by yellow trim.
The United States ten-dollar bill ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of संयुक्त राज्य currency.
The first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury ( 1789–95 ), Alexander Hamilton, is currently प्रदर्शित on the obverse of the विधेयक, जबकि the u.S. राजकोष भवन is प्रदर्शित on the reverse.
( Hamilton is एक of दो non-presidents प्रदर्शित on currently issued U.S. bills.
The other is बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन, on the $ 100 bill.
Hamilton is one of only four people featured on U.S. paper currency ( 1861 to the उपस्थित ) जो थी not born in the continental United States, as he was from the West Indies.
The others are : Albert Gallatin, Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal Tender ) ; George Meade, Spain ( $ 1,000 1890/91 राजकोष नोट ) ; और रॉबर्ट मॉरिस, इंग्लैण्ड ( $ 1,000 1862/63 विधिक Tender ; $ 10 1878/80 Silver Certificate ).
In जोड, kamehameha i, appears on the 2008 Hawaii state quarter. )
All $ 10 बिल्स जारी आज हैं Federal Reserve Notes.
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the average जीवन of a $ 10 विधेयक in परिसंचरण is 18 months before it is replaced due to wear.
Approximately 6 % of सब us banknotes मुद्रित in 2009 were $ 10 bills.
Ten डालर बिल्स हैं वितरित by Federal Reserve Banks in yellow straps.
The source of the face on the $ 10 विधेयक is जॉन trumbull ’s 1805 पोर्ट्रेट of हैमिल्टन कि belongs to the portrait collection of New York City Hall.
The $ 10 bill is the only U.S. paper currency in परिसंचरण in जिससे the पोर्ट्रेट चेहरों to the बाएँ ( the $ 100,000 bill featured a portrait of Woodrow Wilson facing to the left, but was used only for intra-government transactions ).
Andy सैमुएल ग्रिफ़िथ ( जून 1, 1926 – जुलाई 3, 2012 ) was an American actor, television producer, Grammy Award -winning Southern-gospel singer, and writer.
He was a Tony Award nominee for two roles, and gained prominence in the अभिनीत भूमिका in निदेशक एलिया कज़न 's फिल्मी a फेस in the भीड ( 1957 ) before he became better known for his television roles, playing the lead characters in the 1960–1968 situation comedy The Andy Griffith Show and in the 1986–1995 legal drama Matlock.
Theresa Penelope `` Terri '' Irwin, ( née Raines ; born July 20, 1964 ) is an ऑस्ट्रेलियाई -आधारd, अमरीकी -born naturalist, लेखक, the widow of Australian naturalist Steve Irwin and owner of Australia Zoo at Beerwah, Queensland, Australia.
She co-starred with her husband on The Crocodile Hunter, their unconventional टेलीविज़न प्रकृति वृत्तचित्र श्रेणी साथ with its spin-off series, Croc Files and The Crocodile Hunter Diaries.
She has lived in ऑस्ट्रेलिया चूंकि 1992, when she married Steve Irwin.
Andreas Cellarius 's illustration of the Copernican system, from the harmonia macrocosmica ( 1660 ).
Heliocentrism, or heliocentricism, is the astronomical model in which the Earth and planets revolve around a अपेक्षाकृत stationary सूर्य at the बीच of the सौर प्रणाली.
The word comes from the Greek ( helios `` सूर्य '' और kentron `` center '' ).
Historically, heliocentrism was opposed to geocentrism, जिससे लगाई the Earth at the center.
The notion that the Earth घूमती around the सूर्य था महरूम प्रस्तावित as जल्दी as the 3rd सदी bc by aristarchus of samos, लकिन Aristarchus 's heliocentrism attracted little attention until Copernicus revived and elaborated it.
Lucio Russo, however, argues that इस is a भ्रामक छाप resulting इससे the loss of scientific works of the Hellenistic Era.
Using अप्रत्यक्ष प्रमाण he argues that a heliocentric view was expounded in Hipparchus 's work on gravity.
It was not until the 16th सदी कि a fully predictive गणितीय मॉडल of a heliocentric प्रणाली थी प्रस्तुत, by the Renaissance mathematician, astronomer, and Catholic cleric Nicolaus Copernicus of Poland, leading to the Copernican Revolution.
In the following century, Johannes Kepler elaborated upon और विस्तारित इस मॉडल to शामिल अंडाकार orbits, and supporting observations made using a telescope were presented by Galileo Galilei.
With the observations of विलियम हर्शेल, फ्रेडरिक bessel, और अन्य, खगोलशास्त्रियों एहसास that the sun was not the center of the universe and by the 1920s Edwin Hubble had shown that it was part of a galaxy ( the Milky Way ) that was only one of many billions.
Norah Jones ( born Geetali Norah Jones Shankar ; March 30, 1979 ) is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter, pianist, and actress.
वो is the बेटी of Indian sitar player Ravi Shankar and Sue Jones.
She is भी anoushka शंकर 's half-sister.
In 2002, she launched her solo music career with the release of the commercially कामयाब और critically acclaimed एल्बम आइये दूर साथ Me, a fusion of country music and pop with elements of jazz which was certified diamond album, selling over 26 million copies.
The record earned Jones पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, सहित the Album of the Year, Record of the Year, and Best New Artist.
Her subsequent studio albums, Feels Like Home, released in 2004, Not Too Late, released in 2007, the same साल वो बना उसके फिल्मी डेब्यू in my ब्लूबेरी नाइट्स, and her 2009 release The Fall all gained Platinum status, selling over a million copies and were generally well received by critics.
Jones ' fifth स्टुडियो एल्बम, छोटी टूटा दिल, थी released on April 27, 2012.
Jones has जीती नौ ग्रैमी पुरस्कार और थी 60th on बिलबोर्ड magazine 's artists of the 2000–2009 decade chart.
Throughout her career, Jones has won numerous awards and has sold more than 50 million एल्बम विश्वव्यापी.
Billboard named उसके the शीर्ष जैज़ कलाकार of the 2000–2009 decade.
Not to be उलझन with Dimension of a physical quantity.
For other uses, see Dimension ( बहुविकल्पी ).
From left to right, the वर्गाकार, the घन, और the tesseract.
The square is bounded by 1-dimensional लाइनों, the घन by 2-dimensional areas, and the tesseract by 3-dimensional volumes.
A projection of the घन is दिए चूंकि it is viewed on a two-dimensional screen.
The same applies to the tesseract, which additionally can only be दिखाया as a प्रक्षेप भी in three-dimensional space.
A diagram showing the पहला चार स्थानिक आयाम.
In physics and mathematics, the dimension of a space or object is informally पारिभाषित as the न्यूनतम क्रमांक of निर्देशांक needed to बताएँ कोई point within it.
Thus a line has a आयाम of एक क्युकी तभी एक निर्देशांक is needed to बताएँ a पाइंट on it ( for example, the point at 5 on a number line ).
A surface such as a plane or the सतह of a बेलन or गोला रै a आयाम of दो क्युकी दो निर्देशांक हैं needed to बताएँ a पाइंट on it ( for example, to locate a point on the surface of a sphere you need both its latitude and its longitude ).
The inside of a cube, a cylinder or a sphere is three-dimensional क्युकी तीन निर्देशांक हैं needed to locate a point within these spaces.
In physical terms, dimension refers to the constituent structure of all space ( volume ) and its स्थिति in समय ( आभास as a अदिश आयाम साथ the t-axis ), as खूब as the spatial constitution of objects within—structures that correlate with both particle and field conceptions, interact according to relative properties of mass —and are fundamentally mathematical in description.
These, or other axes, may be referenced to uniquely पहचानो a पाइंट or ढांचा in इसके रवैया और संबंध to other objects and occurrences.
Physical theories that incorporate time, such as सामान्य आपेक्षिकता, हैं कहा to कार्य in 4-dimensional `` spacetime ``, ( defined as a Minkowski space ).
Modern theories tend to be `` higher-dimensional '' सहित क्वांटम फ़ील्ड और स्ट्रिंग theories.
The state-space of क्वांटम यांत्रिकी is an infinite-dimensional function space.
The concept of dimension is not restricted to शारीरिक वस्तुएँ.
High-dimensional spaces occur in mathematics and the sciences for many reasons, frequently as configuration spaces such as in Lagrangian or Hamiltonian mechanics ; these are abstract spaces, independent of the physical space we live in.
Fontana ( ) is a नगर of 200,762 residents in San Bernardino County, California.
Founded in 1913, it remained essentially rural until World War II, when उद्योगों हेनरी J. कैसर निर्मित a विशाल स्टील मिल in the area.
It is now a regional hub of the trucking उद्योग, साथ अंतरराज्यीय 10 और राज्य रूट 210 transecting the city from east to west, and Interstate 15 passing diagonally through its northwestern quadrant.
It is home to the largest of the San Bernardino County system libraries, a renovated historic theater, a नगरपालिका पार्क, और the स्वचालित क्लबों स्पीडवे on the site of the Kaiser Steel Mill.
Fontana also hosts the fontana दिनों हाफ Marathon and 5K run.
This race is the fastest half-marathon कोर्स in the world.
The U.S. 2012 Census reported कि fontana 's जनसांख्यिकी थी 200,762 in 2012, बनाना it the second most populous city in San Bernardino county county and 14th in the state.
Cowboys Stadium is a stadium with a retractable छत in आर्लिंगटन, Texas.
It serves as the home of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग 's Dallas Cowboys.
it replaced the partially covered Texas Stadium, which opened in 1971, and served as the Cowboys ' home through the 2008 season.
It was समाप्त on May 27, 2009.
The stadium seats 85,000, making it the third largest स्टेडियम in the एनएफएल by seating क्षमता.
The maximum capacity of the स्टेडियम, सहित standing room, is 105,000.
The Party Pass ( open areas ) sections are behind सीटे in प्रत्येक समाप्त मण्डल और on a series of six elevated platforms connected by stairways.
It has the world 's largest column-free आंतरिक और the चौथी largest ऊँची definition video screen, which hangs from 20 yard line to 20 yard line.
The facility can also be used for a variety of other activities outside of its main purpose ( पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल ) ऐसे as कॉन्सर्ट, बास्केट खेल, मुक्केबाज़ी मिलान, कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल and high school football contests, soccer matches, and motocross races.
Canadian historians until the 1980s tended to focus on economic इतिहास, सहित श्रमिक इतिहास.
In part this is क्युकी कनाडा has had far fewer political or military conflicts than other societies.
This was especially true in the first half of the बीसवीं सदी जब आर्थिक इतिहास was overwhelmingly dominant.
Many of the most prominent English Canadian historians from this period were economic historians, such as हेरोल्ड innis, डोनाल्ड creighton और आर्थर R. M. Lower
Scholars of Canadian history were heirs to the traditions that developed in Europe and the United States, लकिन frameworks कि worked खूब elsewhere प्रायः विफल in Canada.
The heavily Marxist influenced economic history that dominates Europe has छोटी प्रासंगिकता to सबसे of कनाडाई history.
A focus on class, urban areas, and उद्योग fails to पता कनाडा 's ग्रामीण और संसाधन आधारित economy.
Similarly, the monetarist स्कूल कि is प्रबल in the United States also has been difficult to transfer north of the border.
The study of economic history in Canada became highly focused on economic geography, और लिये अनेक सालो the प्रबल स्कूल of thought has been the staples thesis.
This स्कूल of विचार bases the पढ़ाई of the Canadian economy on the study of natural resources.
This approach has since also become used outside of कनाडा in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और in many developing nations.
Before the arrival of Europeans, the First Nations of what would become कनाडा था a विशाल और हर्षोल्लास व्यापार संजाल.
Furs, tools, decorative items, and other goods were often transported हज़ारों of किलोमीटर, ज़्यादातर by कैनो throughout the अनेक नदियाँ and lakes of the region.
The early European history of the Canadian economy is usually studied through the स्टेपल्स लेख जिससे argues the कनाडाई अर्थव्यवस्था विकसित through the शोषण of a series of staples that would be exported to Europe.
carbon-14, 14c, or radiocarbon, is a radioactive isotope of carbon with a nucleus containing 6 protons and 8 neutrons.
Its presence in organic materials is the basis of the radiocarbon dating method pioneered by willard लिब्बी और सहयोगियों ( 1949 ) to date archaeological, geological and hydrogeological samples.
Carbon-14 was discovered on 27 February 1940, by Martin Kamen and Sam Ruben at the University of कैलिफ़ोर्निया विकिरण प्रयोगशाला in बर्कली, हालांकि its existence had been suggested by Franz Kurie in 1934.
There are three naturally occurring isotopes of carbon on Earth : 99 % of the carbon is carbon-12, 1 % is carbon-13, और carbon-14 occurs in ट्रेस amounts, i.e., बनाना up परिचय 1 भाग प्रति खरब ( 0.0000000001 % ) of the carbon in the atmosphere.
The half-life of carbon-14 is 5,730±40 सालो.
Carbon-14 decays into nitrogen-14 through बीटा decay.
The primary natural source of carbon-14 on धरती is लौकिक रे कार्रवाई upon नाइट्रोजन in the माहौल, और it is therefore a cosmogenic nuclide.
However, open-air nuclear परीक्षण between 1955–1980 contributed to this pool.
The different isotopes of carbon do not differ appreciably in उनके रासायनिक properties.
This is used in chemical and biological research, in a technique पुकारा कार्बन labeling : carbon-14 अणु can be प्रयुक्त to बदलें nonradioactive कार्बन, in अनुक्रम to ट्रेस chemical and biochemical reactions involving carbon atoms from any given organic compound.
बिजली is a अत्यधिक visible form of energy transfer
बिजली हमलों हैं विद्युत discharges on a विशाल scale between the atmosphere and an earth-bound object.
They mostly originate in thunderclouds और terminate on the मैदान, पुकारा बादल to Ground ( CG ) lightning.
however, वे may भी be initiated इससे a very tall grounded object and reach into the clouds.
हालांकि `` a बिजली स्ट्राइक '' is commonly प्रयुक्त to describe सब बिजली, it is बल्कि erroneous and a misnomer, as only about 25 % of all lightning events worldwide are CG, the large bulk of lightning events are Intracloud ( IC ) or Cloud to Cloud ( CC ), where discharge only occurs high in the atmosphere.
The scientific name for the complete process of a single बिजली इवेंट is a और it is a बहुत जटिल, अनेक stepped interaction, which is not completely understood.
Most CG flashes तभी `` स्ट्राइक '' एक शारीरिक location, referred to as a termination.
The primary conducting channel, the उज्जवल coursing लाइट तुम may देखिए और कॉल a `` स्ट्राइक '', is तभी परिचय 1 इंच in diameter, although to our eyes it looks much larger.
They are miles long, upwards of tens of मील.
And the entire flash, lasts only a few fractions of a second, most of जिससे is नहीं दृश्य to human eyes.
थंडर is सदा produced by lightning.
Just like lightning, that deceives our eyes, usually looking larger or करीब than it वाकई is, the धरती 's माहौल और हमारी दिमाग 's बोध of the outside world, ultimately determines whether it is `` heard '' or not.
Lightning can not happen in a vacuum devoid of ions, nor can थंडर occur बगैर molecules to vibrate.
Thunder is a physical निरपेक्ष लिये प्रत्येक सिंगल फ्लैश of lightning.
Contrary to popular belief, a lightning strike itself is प्रायः नहीं जिम्मेदार लिये अनेक मौतों or injuries from a single event.
It होता be नामुमकिन दिए the प्राकृतिक tendencies of a फ्लैश, जबतक people or animals were stacked on top of each other, or they were somehow arranged vertically and part of the flash channel.
When बिजली ignites an उपलब्धियाँ ईंधन सोर्स और an विस्फोट occurs, it is the shock wave or fire causing the injuries, not the strike itself.
Ground Currents, also called step potential, of an earth termination is कया truly कल्याणकारी सबसे चोटों or मौत to humans and animals.
The near instantaneous rush of surface charges, induced by the overhead thundercloud itself, race to the strike पाइंट इससे सैंकड़ों to हज़ारों of फीट away during discharge.
इस वर्तमान, caused दौरान प्रत्येक स्ट्रोक, takes the पाथ of least resistance, which may be ion rich human or animal legs, over poorly conducting earth.
This is why it is best to crouch, साथ फीट बंद साथ, if ever caught in the open during a thunderstorm.
Unfortunately, most reports do not draw a distinction between the real cause of injury or death, be it the strike itself, a resulting विस्फोट or आग, or प्रायः जिम्मेदार कदम संभावित.
Peter F. Kilmartin ( born 1962 ) is the वर्तमान attorney सामान्य of Rhode Island.
Kilmartin is also a retired police captain and a former member of the rhode द्वीप हाउस of प्रतिनिधि.

Sealing is an ordinance ( अनुष्ठान ) performed in latter Day Saints temples by a person holding the sealing authority.
The purpose of this ordinance is to seal familiar relationships, making संभावित the अस्तित्व of परिवार संबंध throughout शाश्वत.
LDS शिक्षाओं प्लेस great importance on the specific authority required to perform these sealings.
Church doctrine सिखाती कि इस प्राधिकार, पुकारा the Priesthood, corresponds to that given to Saint Peter in.
Sealings are typically performed as विवाह or as sealing of children to parents.
They were performed prior to the death of जोसेफ स्मिथ, jr. ( the प्रमुख संस्थापक of the latter Day Saint movement ), and are currently performed in The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.
Although some other denominations, such as the Community of Christ, दृश्य sealing as an centuries of स्मिथ 's practice of plural marriage, some do still perform them.
The 2000s, pronounced `` दो हज़ारों '', थी a दशक that began on January 1, 2000, and ended on December 31, 2009.
Globalization, which had accelerated after the early 1990s fall of साम्यवादी, जारी to be a force in the 2000s.
The growth of the अंतरजाल थी एक of the प्रधान योगदानकर्ता to वैश्वीकरण दौरान the दशक, बनाना it संभावित लिये लोगों to interact साथ अन्य लोगों, एक्स्प्रेस विचार, introduce अन्य to अलग cultures and backgrounds, use goods and services, sell and buy online, research and learn about things, along with experiencing the world without having to leave home.
The institutions, linkages and technologies that emerged or were redefined पहले होता subsequently in इस दशक लाभ many countries, in particular China and India.
However, in other parts of the world such progress failed to address ongoing struggles साथ आधुनिकता, सबसे notably characterized by the rise of al-Qaeda and other Islamist groups.
The September 11 attacks in 2001 led to the United States, United Kingdom, Spain, Canada and other nations invading अफगानिस्तान, as खूब as implementing विभिन्न anti-terrorist उपायों at home and abroad in what was known as the War on Terror.
The European Union saw further integration and expansion throughout much of Europe.
The economic growth of the 2000s had considerable environmental consequences, raised demand for घटाते उर्जा संसाधन, और थी स्टिल दिखाया to be vulnerable as demonstrated दौरान the Global Financial Crisis of the late 2000s.
The Gunfight at the o.k. corral थी a gunfight कि took प्लेस at परिचय 3:00 p.m. on बुधवार, अक्तूबर 26, 1881, in Tombstone, Arizona Territory, and is generally regarded as the most famous gunfight in the history of the American Old West.
The gunfight, believed to have lasted तभी परिचय तीस सेकेंड, थी लड़ा between the गैरकानूनी cowboys बिली claiborne, आइक और बिली clanton, और tom और फ़्रैंक mclaury, और the opposing कस्बा मार्शल Virgil Earp and his brothers Assistant Town Marshal Morgan and temporary lawman Wyatt, aided by Doc Holliday designated as a temporary marshal by Virgil.
Ike Clanton and Billy claiborne भागा इससे the लड़ो unharmed, लकिन आइक 's brother Billy Clanton was killed, along with both McLaurys.
Lawmen Virgil and Morgan Earp and Doc हॉलिडे यहूद wounded.
Only Wyatt Earp came through the लड़ो unharmed.
The fight has come to represent a time in American history when the frontier was open range for outlaws opposed by law enforcement that was spread thin over विशाल territories, leaving कुछ क्षेत्रों unprotected.
The gunfight was not well known to the American public until 1931 when author Stuart झील प्रकाशित कया रै चूंकि महरूम संकल्पित to be a largely fictionalized जीवनी, Wyatt Earp : Frontier Marshal, two years after Earp 's death.
Lake retold his story in a 1946 book that निदेशक जॉन घाट विकसित into the movie My Darling Clementine.
After the movie gunfight at the o.k. corral थी released in 1957, the shootout came to be known by that name.
Since then, the conflict has been portrayed with varying degrees of सटीकता in numerous पश्चिमी films and books.
Despite its name, the gunfight actually occurred in a narrow lot six doors west of the पश्च प्रवेश to the o.k. corral on Fremont Street, and also in the street.
The two opposing parties यहूद initially तभी about apart.
About तीस गोलियाँ यहूद fired in thirty seconds.
Ike Clanton filed murder charges against the Earps and Doc हॉलिडे लकिन वे यहूद eventually exonerated by a local judge after a 30-day preliminary hearing and then again by a local grand jury.
On December 28, 1881, Virgil Earp was maimed in an assassination attempt by the गैरकानूनी cowboys, और on कूच 18, 1882, वे assassinated Morgan Earp.
The suspects furnished solid alibis, and newly नियुक्त डिप्टी u.s. मार्शल व्याट earp took matters into his own hands during the Earp Vendetta Ride, ironically pursued by county Sheriff Johnny Behan with warrants for the Earp 's arrest.
HDMI ( High-Definition Multimedia Interface ) is a compact audio/video interface for transferring uncompressed video data and compressed/uncompressed डिजिटल ऑडियो आंकड़ा इससे a hdmi-compliant यंत्र ( `` the सोर्स यंत्र '' ) to a compatible computer monitor, video projector, digital television, or digital audio device.
HDMI is a डिजिटल बदलना for existing analog video standards.
There are a number of HDMI-standard cable connectors available, each of which can be used for any uncompressed TV or PC video format, including standard, enhanced, high definition, और 3d वीडियो सिग्नल ; up to 8 चैनल्स of संपीडित or uncompressed डिजिटल ऑडियो ; a cec ( उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स कंट्रोल ) कनेक्शन ; and an Ethernet data connection.
HDMI implements the EIA/CEA-861 standards, जिससे define वीडियो स्वरुप और waveforms, transport of compressed, uncompressed, and LPCM audio, auxiliary data, and implementations of the VESA EDID.
The CEC allows HDMI devices to control each other when necessary and allows the user to operate multiple devices with one रिमोट कंट्रोल handset.
Because HDMI is electrically compatible with the CEA-861 signals used by digital visual interface ( DVI ), no signal conversion is necessary, nor is वहीँ a घाटा of वीडियो विशेषता जब a DVI-to-HDMI adapter is used.
As an uncompressed CEA-861 connection, HDMI is independent of the various digital television standards used by individual devices, such as ATSC and DVB, as these are encapsulations of compressed MPEG वीडियो स्ट्रीम ( जिससे can be decoded और आउटपुट as an uncompressed video stream on HDMI ).
Production of उपभोक्ता hdmi उत्पाद प्रारंभ in late 2003.
In Europe either DVI-HDCP or HDMI is included in the HD ready in-store labeling specification लिये tv सेट लिये hdtv, प्रतिपादित by EICTA with SES Astra in 2005.
hdmi began to appear on उपभोक्ता HDTV camcorders and digital still cameras in 2006.
As of January 8, 2013, which is ten years after the release of the first HDMI specification, over 3 अरब hdmi डिवाइस have shipped चूंकि the लॉन्च of the hdmi मानक.
Bree Van de Kamp ( née Mason ; also known in the series as Bree Hodge and Bree Weston ) is a fictional character and one of the four protagonists on the एबीसी टेलीविज़न श्रेणी हताश housewives.
She is played by actress Marcia Cross, who has received multiple awards and nominations for her portrayal, including an Emmy पुरस्कार नामांकन, तीन सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार nominations, और दो स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड Awards.
Cross 's portrayal of Bree has been widely praised by आलोचकों and fans.
Cross originally auditioned for the role of Mary Alice Young, but series creator Marc चेरी विचार वो थी बेहतर suited for the role of Bree.
Dana Delany, who eventually was cast as Katherine Mayfair, was originally चुनी लिये the भूमिका लकिन turned it bas, saying it was too similar to her role in Pasadena.
Bree 's main struggle throughout the series has been उसके कोशिशें to maintain a पूर्ण जीवन despite विभिन्न obstacles such as widowhood, divorce, and alcoholism hindering her.
She has been married three टाइम्स ; to रेक्स वैन de kamp ( स्टीवन culp ), Orson Hodge ( Kyle MacLachlan ) and Trip Weston ( Scott Bakula ).

Algoma is a city in kewaunee काउंटी in the u.S. राज्य of Wisconsin.
The population was 3,167 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
Algoma is part of the Green Bay महानगर सांख्यिकीय Area.
The hangover भाग ii is a 2011 American comedy film produced by Legendary Pictures and distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures.
It is the sequel to 2009 's The Hangover and the दूसरी फिल्मी in the hangover franchise.
Todd Phillips directed the फिल्मी in जोड to co-authoring the स्क्रिप्ट with Craig Mazin, and Scot Armstrong.
The film stars Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, Ken Jeong, जेफरी tambor, जस्टिन bartha और पॉल giamatti.
The Hangover Part II tells the स्टोरी of फिल, stu, एलन, और डग as वे सफर to Thailand for Stu 's wedding.
After the bachelor party in Las वेगास, stu takes no संभावना और opts लिये a safe, subdued pre-wedding brunch.
However, things do not go as planned, resulting in another ख़राब hangover साथ no यादें of the previous night.
Development of The Hangover भाग ii began in अप्रैल 2009, दो महीने पहले the hangover was released.
The principal actors were cast in कूच 2010 to reprise उनके roles from the first film.
Production began in October 2010, in ओंटारियो, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, before moving on location in Thailand.
The film was released on May 26, 2011 and, despite receiving mostly negative reviews from critics, it became the highest-grossing r-rated कॉमेडी दौरान इसके नाट्य run.

The English पुनर्जागरण थी a सांस्कृतिक और कलाकारी गति in इंग्लैण्ड dating from the late 15th and early 16th centuries to the early 17th century.
It is संबद्ध साथ the pan-european पुनर्जागरण that is usually regarded as beginning in Italy in the late 14th century.
जैसे सबसे of उत्तरी यूरोपीय, इंग्लैण्ड देखी छोटी of these developments until more than a century later.
The beginning of the English Renaissance is often taken, as a convenience, to be 1485, जब the बैटल of bosworth फ़ील्ड ended the युद्धों of the गुलाब and inaugurated the Tudor Dynasty.
Renaissance style and ideas, however, यहूद slow in penetrating इंग्लैण्ड, और the elizabethan era in the second half of the 16th century is usually regarded as the height of the English Renaissance.
Elizabeth Ann Bloomer वारेन `` बेट्टी '' घाट ( अप्रैल 8, 1918 – जुलाई 8, 2011 ), थी पहला महिला of the United States from 1974 to 1977 during the presidency of her husband Gerald Ford.
As First Lady, she was active in social नीति और निर्मित precedents as a नीतियां active presidential wife.
Throughout her husband 's term in office, she maintained high approval ratings despite opposition from some conservative republicans जो objected to उसके अधिक मॉडरेट और liberal positions on social issues.
Ford was noted for raising breast cancer awareness following her 1974 mastectomy and was a passionate समर्थक of, और activist लिये, the बराबर अधिकारों amendment ( era ).
Pro-choice on abortion and a leader in the Women 's Movement, she gained fame as one of the most candid first महिलाओं in इतिहास, commenting on प्रत्येक hot-button समस्या of the समय, सहित नारीवाद, equal pay, the ERA, sex, drugs, abortion, and gun control.
She also raised awareness of addiction when she announced her long-running बैटल साथ alcoholism in the 1970s.
Following her White House years, she continued to lobby for the ERA और remained क्रियाशील in the feminist movement.
She was the founder, and served as the first chair of the फलक of निर्देशकों, of the बेट्टी घाट बीच लिये पदार्थ गाली और व्यसन और is a प्राप्तकर्ता of the congressional सुनहरा पदक ( co-presentation with her husband, Gerald R. Ford, October 21, 1998 ) and the Presidential Medal of Freedom ( alone, presented 1991, by George H. W. Bush ).
Platelet endothelial कोशिका adhesion अणु ( PECAM-1 ) also known as cluster of differentiation 31 ( CD31 ) is a protein that in human is encoded by the PECAM1 gene found on chromosome 17.
PECAM-1 plays a कुंजी भूमिका in निकालना aged neutrophils from the body.

The Miss फ्लोरिडा यूएसए प्रतियोगिता is the pageant कि selects the representative for the state Florida in the Miss USA pageant.
जबकि फ्लोरिडा रै महरूम कामयाब in शर्तें of runners-up, finalists और semi-finalists, the state has never won the Miss USA pageant, although Cheryl Patton became Miss USA after Sylvia Hitchcock won Miss Universe.
Florida 's बेहतरीन परिणाम यहूद दौरान the mid-1960s to mid-1970s.
Their most recent finalist was Lissette Garcia who placed in the शीर्ष 16 in 2011.
Two पूर्व मिस फ्लोरिडा टीन यूएसए titleholders have won this competition, and three titleholders have also competed at Miss America.
The वर्तमान titleholder is Michelle Aguirre of Hialeah.
Anglo-Saxon England refers to the period of the history of the भाग of ब्रिटेन कि became ज्ञात as इंग्लैण्ड, स्थायी इससे the समाप्त of रोमन occupation और स्थापना of anglo-saxon kingdoms in the 5th century until the Norman conquest of England in 1066 by William the Conqueror.
Anglo-Saxon is a सामान्य पद referring to the Germanic peoples who came to Britain during the 5th and 6th centuries, including Angles, Saxons, Frisii, and Jutes.
The term also refers to the language spoken at the time in England, which is now पुकारा बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी, और to the संस्कृति of the era, जिससे रै long attracted popular and scholarly attention.
Until the 9th century Anglo-Saxon England was dominated by the heptarchy, the kingdoms of नॉर्थम्ब्रिया, mercia, ईस्ट anglia, एसेक्स, केंट, ससेक्स, और Wessex.
In terms of religion the kingdoms followed Anglo-Saxon paganism दौरान the जल्दी काल, but converted to Christianity during the 7th century.
Paganism had a final stronghold in a period of Mercian hegemony during the 640s, ending with the मौत of पेंदा of mercia in 655.
Facing the threat of Viking invasions, the House of Wessex became प्रबल दौरान the 9th सदी, अंतर्गत the नियम of Alfred the Great.
During the 10th century, the individual kingdoms unified under the rule of wessex into the किंगडम of इंग्लैण्ड, जिससे stood opposed to the danelaw, the Viking kingdoms established from the 9th century in the north and east of England.
The Kingdom of England fell in the Viking invasion from Denmark in 1013 and थी शासित by the हाउस of डेनमार्क जबतक 1042, जब the anglo-saxon House of Wessex was restored.
The last anglo-saxon किंग, हेरोल्ड godwinson, was killed in 1066 at the Battle of Hastings.

स्मोक्ड सामन is a तैयारी of सामन, typically a fillet that has been cured and hot or cold smoked.
Due to its मध्यम ऊँची दाम, smoked salmon is considered a delicacy.
Although the term lox is sometimes लागू to स्मोक्ड सामन, they are different products.
View of defibrillator एलेक्ट्रोड position and placement.
Defibrillation is a common उपचार लिये life-threatening हृदय dysrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, and pulseless ventricular tachycardia.
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic dose of electrical उर्जा to the प्रभावित दिल साथ a device called a defibrillator.
This depolarizes a critical mass of the दिल मांसपेशी, terminates the dysrhythmia, और allows सामान्य sinus लय to be reestablished by the body 's natural pacemaker, in the sinoatrial node of the heart.
Defibrillators can be external, transvenous, or implanted, depending on the प्रकार of यंत्र प्रयुक्त or needed.
Some external units, known as automated external defibrillators ( AEDs ), automate the diagnosis of treatable rhythms, meaning that lay responders or bystanders are able to use उन्हें सफलतापूर्वक साथ छोटी, or in कुछ मामले no प्रशिक्षण at सब.
Gabrielle `` Coco '' Bonheur Chanel ( August 19, 1883 – जनवरी 10, 1971 ) was a French fashion designer and founder of the Chanel brand.
She was the only fashion designer to appear on समय पत्रिका 's सूची of the 100 most influential people of the 20th century.
Along with Paul Poiret, Chanel was credited with liberating women from the constraints of the `` corseted silhouette '' और popularizing the स्वीकृति of a sportive, casual chic as the feminine standard in the post- World War I era.
A prolific fashion निर्माता, चैनल 's influence विस्तारित परे couture clothing.
Her design aesthetic was एहसास in आभूषण, हैंडबैग, और fragrance.
Her हस्ताक्षर सैंट, चैनल no. 5, has become an iconic product.
Chanel was known for उसके lifelong determination, महत्वाकांक्षा and energy which she applied to her professional and social life.
She achieved both success as a businesswoman और सोशल prominence धन्यवाद to the connections she made through her work.
These included many artists and craftspeople to जिसको वो became a patron.
however, चैनल 's अत्यधिक प्रतिस्पर्धी, opportunistic व्यक्तित्व led उसके to मेक questionable life choices which have generated controversy around her reputation, particularly her behaviour during the German occupation of France in World War II.
Allied Mills flour मिल on the बैंको of the मैनचेस्टर Ship Canal
A gristmill ( भी : grist मिल, corn mill or flour mill ) grinds grain into flour.
The term can refer to both the पीस यांत्रिकी और the भवन that holds it.
रोमानिया ( ; दिनाँक spellings roumania और rumania ; ) is a country located at the intersection of Central and Southeastern Europe, bordering on the Black Sea.
Romania shares a किनारा साथ हंगेरियाई और सर्बिया to the west, Ukraine and Moldova to the northeast and east, and Bulgaria to the south.
At, Romania is the आठवीं largest देश of the यूरोपीय संघ by क्षेत्रफल, और has the seventh largest population of the European Union with more than 19 million people.
Its capital और biggest city is Bucharest, the 11th largest city in the EU.
The United Principalities emerged when the territories of moldavia और wallachia यहूद united under Prince Alexander Ioan Cuza in 1859.
In 1866 प्रिंस karl of hohenzollern-sigmaringen थी पुकारा to the throne as the Ruling Prince of the Romanian Principate and in 1881 he was finally crowned as King Carol I the first monarch of the Kingdom of Romania.
Independence इससे the उस्मानी साम्राज्य थी घोषित on 9 may 1877, and was internationally recognized the following year.
At the end of World War I, Transylvania, Bukovina और bessarabia संयुक्त साथ the किंगडम of Romania.
World War II gave cause to the rise of a military dictatorship in Romania under fascist General आयन antonescu, जो chose to fight on the side of the Axis powers from 1941 to 1944.
After his हटाना, रोमानिया switched sides in 1944 and joined the Allies.
By the समाप्त of the युद्ध, कुछ formerly रोमानियाई northeastern territories were occupied by the Soviet Union, with Red Army units stationed on Romanian soil.
In 1947 Romania forcibly became a People 's Republic ( 1947-1965 ) और a सदस्य of the वॉरसॉ Pact.
In 1965 Nicolae Ceauşescu became सामान्य सचिव of the रोमानियाई कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी, और the हर्ष austerity उपायों, राजनैतिक दमन, and cult of personality he implemented led to the Socialist Republic of Romania ( 1965-1989 ) becoming the most Stalinist police state in the Eastern bloc.
आखिरकार उसके सत्तावादी government was toppled in December 1989 during the Romanian Revolution of 1989.
With the fall of the आयरन पर्दा, रोमानिया began इसके परिवर्तन towards democracy and a capitalist market economy.
After a decade of post-revolution economic problems and living-standards decline, extensive reforms fostered economic recovery.
As of 2010, रोमानिया is an upper-middle-income country with a high human development index.
Romania joined नाटो on 29 कूच 2004, and the European Union on 1 January 2007.
It is also a member of the : Latin संघ, francophonie, osce, wto, bsec, संयुक्त Nations, etc.
Today, Romania is a unitary semi-presidential republic, in जिससे the कार्यपालिका शाखा consists of the President and the Government.
`` प्राचीन '' redirects here.
For other उपयोग, देखिए प्राचीनता ( disambiguation ).
The times before लिखने belong either to protohistory or to prehistory.
Khafre 's Pyramid ( 4th राजवंश ) और ग्रेट sphinx of गीज़ा ( c. 2500 bc or perhaps earlier )
Ancient history is the study of the written past from the शुरूआत of अंकित इंसान इतिहास to the Early Middle Ages.
The span of recorded history is roughly 5,000 years, with cuneiform स्क्रिप्ट, the oldest खोजा रूप of सुसंगत लिखने, इससे the protoliterate period around the 30th century BC.
This is the शुरूआत of इतिहास, as opposed to prehistory, according to the definition used by most historians.
The term classical antiquity is often used to refer to history in the Old संसार इससे the शुरूआत of अंकित यूनानी इतिहास in 776 bc ( First Olympiad ).
This roughly coincides with the traditional date of the founding of रोम in 753 bc, the शुरूआत of the इतिहास of प्राचीन रोम, और the शुरूआत of the Archaic period in Ancient Greece.
Although the ending date of ancient history is disputed, some Western scholars use the fall of the Western Roman Empire in 476 AD, the closure of the Platonic Academy in 529 AD, the death of the सम्राट जुस्तिनियन i, the coming of islam or the वृद्धि of शारलेमेन as the end of ancient and Classical European history.
In India, the period includes the जल्दी काल of the मध्य kingdoms, और, in China, the time up to the Qin Dynasty is included.
methylcobalamin ( दिखाया ) is a form of vitamin B12.
Physically it resembles the अन्य फ़ॉर्म of विटामिन B12, occurring as dark red crystals that freely form cherry-colored transparent solutions in water.
Vitamin B12, vitamin B12 or vitamin B-12, also called cobalamin, is a water-soluble विटामिन साथ a कुंजी भूमिका in the सामान्य कामकाज of the brain and nervous system, and for the formation of blood.
It is one of the eight B विटामिन.
it is सामान्यतः शामिल in the चयापचय of प्रत्येक cell of the human body, especially affecting DNA synthesis and regulation, but also fatty acid synthesis and energy production.
Neither fungi, पौधे, nor animals are capable of producing vitamin B12.
Only bacteria and archaea have the एंजाइमों जरूरी लिये इसके संश्लेषण, हालांकि many foods are a natural source of B12 because of bacterial symbiosis.
The vitamin is the largest and most structurally complicated vitamin and can be produced industrially तभी through बैक्टीरियल fermentation-synthesis.
Vitamin B12 consists of a क्लास of chemically सम्बन्धित यौगिकों ( vitamers ), all of which have vitamin activity.
It contains the biochemically विरल element cobalt.
Biosynthesis of the मौलिक ढांचा of the विटामिन is संपन्नता तभी by bacteria ( which usually produce hydroxocobalamin ), but conversion between different forms of the vitamin can be accomplished in the human body.
A common semi-synthetic रूप of the विटामिन, cyanocobalamin, does not occur in nature, but is produced from bacterial hydroxocobalamin and then used in many pharmaceuticals and supplements, and as a food additive, because of its stability and lower production cost.
In the body it is converted to the human physiological फ़ॉर्म methylcobalamin और adenosylcobalamin, leaving पीछे the cyanide, albeit in minimal concentration.
More recently, hydroxocobalamin, methylcobalamin, और adenosylcobalamin can be found in more expensive pharmacological products and food supplements.
The अतिरिक्त यूटिलिटी of ये is currently debated.
Vitamin B12 was discovered from its relationship to the disease pernicious anemia, which is an autoimmune disease in which parietal cells of the पेट responsible for secreting intrinsic factor are destroyed.
Intrinsic फ़ैक्टर is निर्णायक लिये the सामान्य अवशोषण of b12, so a कमी of intrinsic factor, as seen in pernicious anemia, causes a vitamin B12 deficiency.
Many अन्य subtler kinds of विटामिन b12 कमियां और their biochemical effects have since been elucidated.
the रोमन साम्राज्य ( ) थी the post- रिपब्लिकन काल of the ancient Roman civilization, characterised by an autocratic form of government and large territorial holdings around the Mediterranean in Europe, Africa, and Asia.
The 500-year-old Roman Republic, which preceded it, had महरूम destabilized through a श्रेणी of civil wars.
Several events marked the परिवर्तन इससे गणतंत्र to साम्राज्य, सहित जूलियस सीज़र 's नियुक्ति as perpetual तानाशाह ( 44 bc ) ; the बैटल of Actium ( 31 BC ) ; and the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the Roman Senate ( 27 BC ).
The पहला दो सदियां of the साम्राज्य यहूद a काल of unprecedented stability and prosperity known as the Pax Romana ( `` Roman Peace '' ).
It reached its महानतम expanse दौरान the शासनकाल of Trajan ( 98–117 AD ).
In the 3rd सदी, the साम्राज्य underwent a संकट कि threatened its existence, but was reunified and stabilized under the emperors Aurelian and Diocletian.
Christians rose to power in the 4th सदी, दौरान जिससे समय a प्रणाली of डुअल rule was developed in the Latin West and Greek East.
After the collapse of central government in the वेस्ट in the 5th सदी, the पूर्वी हाफ जारी as what would later be known as the Byzantine Empire.
Because of the Empire 's vast extent and long endurance, the institutions and culture of रोम था a profound और स्थायी influence on the विकास of भाषा, धर्म, वास्तुकला, दर्शनशास्त्र, विधि, और फ़ॉर्म of सरकारी in the territory it governed, particularly Europe, and by means of European expansionism throughout the modern world.
Total body सतह क्षेत्रफल ( tbsa ) is an मूल्यांकन measure of burns of the skin.
In वयस्कों, the `` नियम of nines '' is प्रयुक्त to determine the total percentage of area burned for each major section of the body.
In some cases, the burns may cover more than one body part, or may not fully cover such a part ; in these cases, burns are measured by using the casualty 's ताड़ as a सन्दर्भ point for 1 % of the body.
For children और infants, the lund-browder chart is used to assess the burned body surface area.
Different percentages are used because the ratio of the combined surface area of the head और गर्दन to the सतह क्षेत्रफल of the limbs is typically larger in children than कि of an adult.
ठेठ मान लिये आम समूह of humans follow.
( Due to rounding, मान may not add to 100 %. )
