Jonah Kirsten Sorrentino ( born जून 26, 1975 ), बेहतर known by his stage name KJ-52, is a Christian rapper from Tampa, Florida.
The `` KJ '' part of his name refers to his old rap alias, `` King J. Mac, '' a name which he बाद वर्णित in एक of उसके podcasts as `` horribly cheesy. ''
`` 52 '', which is pronounced `` five two '', not `` fifty-two '', is a सन्दर्भ to the biblical स्टोरी of यीशु feeding the multitude with five loaves and two fish, which is also sung about in his song `` Push Up '' from The Yearbook and in the `` KJ Five Two '' on It 's Pronounced 'Five Two.
He थी awarded the rap/hip हॉप अंकित सोंग of the साल लिये `` Never Look Away '' and Rap/Hip Hop Album of the Year at the GMA Dove Awards of 2007.
On July 28, 2009, KJ-52 released `` समाप्त of my रस्सी '', जिससे is the पहला सिंगल लिये उसके album Five-Two Television.
His song `` डिअर पतला '' is आधारित on एमिनेम 's सोंग `` Stan `` and is a sort of personal message from KJ-52 to Eminem.
The degree symbol ( ° ) is a typographical symbol that is प्रयुक्त, among अन्य बाते, to represent डिग्री of चाप ( e.g. in भौगोलिक निर्देशांक systems ), hours ( in the medical field ), or degrees of temperature.
The symbol consists of a small raised circle, historically a शून्य glyph.
In Unicode it is एनकोडेड at.
This is a list of roots, suffixes, and prefixes प्रयुक्त in चिकित्सा शब्दावली, their meanings, and their etymology.
There are a few rules when using चिकित्सा जड़ें.
Firstly, prefixes and suffixes, primarily in यूनानी, लकिन भी in लैटिन, have a droppable -o-.
As a सामान्य नियम, इस -o- लगभग सदा अधिनियमों as a joint-stem to connect two consonantal roots, e.g. arthr- + -o- + logy = arthrology.
But generally, the -o- is dropped when connecting to a vowel-stem ; e.g. arthr- + itis = गठिया, instead of arthr-o-itis.
Secondly, medical जड़ें generally go साथ according to भाषा : यूनानी prefixes go with Greek suffixes and Latin prefixes with Latin suffixes.
Although international scientific vocabulary is not stringent about segregating combining forms of different languages, it is advisable जब coining नई शब्द नहीं to मिक्सर अलग lingual roots.
Stomach cancer, or gastric कर्कट, refers to cancer arising from any part of the stomach.
Stomach cancer causes परिचय 800,000 मौतों विश्वव्यापी per year.
Prognosis is ग़रीब ( 5-year अस्तित्व < 5 to 15 % ) because most patients present with advanced disease.
Sara Lynn Evans ( born February 5, 1971 ) is an अमरीकी देश सिंगर and songwriter.
For her entire career, she has महरूम हस्ताक्षरित to आरसीए रिकॉर्ड नैशविले.
Evans ' debut, Three Chords and the Truth, did नहीं उपज a शीर्ष 40 hit on the hot देश Songs charts.
वो followed इस up साथ no प्लेस कि दूर ( 1998 ), Born to Fly ( 2000 ), Restless ( 2003 ) and Real Fine Place ( 2005 ).
No Place That Far received a gold प्रमाणन इससे the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ of America ( RIAA ), while the other three albums all were certified platinum.
These discs include the number 1 singles `` no प्लेस कि दूर ``, `` born to मक्खी ``, `` suds in the बाल्टी `` और `` a रियल ठीक प्लेस to प्रारंभ ``, प्लस the top 10 hits `` I Could Not Ask for More `` ( a cover of the Edwin McCain song ), `` I Keep Looking ``, `` Perfect `` and `` Cheatin ' ``.
Her 2007 Greatest Hits included the शीर्ष 15 हिट्स `` तुम 'll सदा be my Baby `` and `` As If ``.
Stronger ( 2011 ) included her fifth number 1 hit, `` a छोटी बिट stronger ``, which was co-written by Hillary Scott of Lady Antebellum.
Evans has also won one award each इससे बिलबोर्ड, the अकादमी of देश म्यूज़िक, Country Music Association, Broadcast Music Incorporated ( BMI ) and a Dove Award.
The संसार 's प्रिंसिपल धर्मों और आध्यात्मिक परंपराओं may be वर्गीकृत into a small number of major groups, although this is by no means a uniform practice.
This theory began in the 18th सदी साथ the लक्ष्य of recognizing the relative levels of civility in societies.
Berliners watching a c-54 जमीन at tempelhof Airport ( 1948 )
The Berlin blockade ( 24 June 1948 – 12 May 1949 ) थी एक of the पहला प्रमुख अंतरराष्ट्रीय crises of the Cold War.
दौरान the बहुराष्ट्रीय occupation of post–World War II Germany, the Soviet Union blocked the Western Allies ' railway, road, and canal access to the sectors of Berlin under Allied control.
उनके उद्देश्य थी to फ़ोर्स the पश्चिमी शक्तियां to allow the सोवियत मण्डल to प्रारंभ supplying Berlin with food and fuel, thereby giving the Soviets practical control over the entire city.
In जवाब, the पश्चिमी allies व्यवस्थित the बर्लिन airlift to carry supplies to the people in West Berlin.
Aircrews from the United States Air Force, the British Royal Air Force, the Royal Australian एयर फ़ोर्स, the royal कनाडाई एयर फ़ोर्स, the royal नई जीलैंड एयर फ़ोर्स, और the दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी एयर फ़ोर्स उड़ाया over 200,000 फ़्लाइट in एक साल, providing up to 4700 tons of daily necessities such as fuel and food to the Berliners.
By the spring of 1949, the प्रयत्न थी clearly succeeding और, by अप्रैल, the airlift was delivering more cargo than had previously been transported into the city by rail.
The success of the बर्लिन एयरलिफ्ट brought शर्मिंदगी to the Soviets who had refused to believe it could make a difference.
The blockade was lifted in May 1949 और resulted in the सृष्टि of two separate German states.
The Federal Republic of Germany ( West Germany ) and the German लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र ( ईस्ट जर्मनी ) विभाजित up बर्लिन.
In स्मरण of the एयरलिफ्ट, तीन एयरपोर्ट in the पूर्व western zones of the city served as the primary gateways to Germany for another fifty years.
The euro sign ; logotype और हस्तलिखित.
The euro sign is the currency sign used for the euro, the official करेंसी of the eurozone in the European Union ( EU ).
The design was presented to the public by the यूरोपीय आयोग on 12 December 1996.
The international three-letter कोड ( according to आईएसओ standard ISO 4217 ) for the euro is EUR.
In Unicode it is एनकोडेड at.
In अंग्रेज़ी, the चिह्न precedes the value.
in कुछ styleguides, लकिन नहीं others, the euro sign is unspaced.
Mate (, ; sometimes also spelled maté ), also known as chimarrão ( ) or cimarrón ( ), is a traditional South American infused drink, particularly in अर्जेंटीना, उरुग्वे, पैराग्वे और the दक्षिणी राज्य of ब्राज़ील और to a lesser उपाधि in दक्षिण of चिली, the bolivian chaco, सीरियाई और लेबनान.
It is prepared इससे steeping सूखी पत्ते of yerba mate ( llex paraguariensis, known in Portuguese as erva-mate ) in hot water.
Mate is served with a मेटल स्ट्रॉ इससे a साझा hollow calabash gourd.
The straw is called a bombilla in कुछ लैटिन अमरीकी देशों, a bomba in Portuguese, and a bombija or, more generally, a masassa ( type of straw ) in Arabic.
The straw is traditionally बना of silver.
Modern, commercially available straws are typically बना of निकल चांदी, पुकारा Alpaca ; stainless steel, or hollow-stemmed cane.
The gourd is known as a mate or a guampa ; while in Brazil, it has the specific name of cuia, or also cabaça ( the name for Indigenous-influenced calabash gourds in अन्य regions of ब्राज़ील, स्टिल प्रयुक्त लिये सामान्य खाना और पेय in remote regions ).
Even if the water is supplied from a modern thermos, the infusion is traditionally नशे from mates or cuias.
As with other brewed herbs, yerba mate leaves हैं सूखी, कटा, और मैदान into a powdery mixture called yerba.
The bombilla acts as दोनो a स्ट्रॉ और a sieve.
The submerged end is flared, with छोटी छेद or स्लॉट कि allow the brewed द्रव in, लकिन block the chunky matter that makes up much of the mixture.
A modern bombilla डिज़ाइन उपयोग a सीधा ट्यूब साथ छेद, or spring sleeve to act as a sieve.
`` Tea-bag '' प्रकार infusions of mate ( mate cocido ) have महरूम on the मार्केट in अर्जेंटीना, पैराग्वे और उरुग्वे for many years under such trade names as `` Taragüí Vitality '' in Argentina, `` Pajarito '' and `` Kurupí '' in Paraguay, and in Brazil under the name `` Mate Leão ''.
This is माना a completely अलग drink.
It is never drunk इससे cuias or पुकारा chimarrão, nor is it संबद्ध with the gaucho/gaúcho culture.
The automotive industry is a term that covers a wide range of companies and organisations involved in the डिज़ाइन, विकास, manufacture, विपणन, और selling of मोटर वाहनों, towed vehicles, motorcycles and mopeds.
It is one of the संसार 's most important economic sectors by revenue.
The term automotive industry usually does not include industries dedicated to the मेंटेनेंस of ऑटोमोबाइल following डिलीवरी to the end-user, ऐसे as मरम्मत दुकानें और मोटर fuel filling stations.
The term automotive was created from Greek autos ( self ), and लैटिन motivus ( of गति ) to represent any form of self-powered vehicle.
This term थी प्रस्तावित by sae member Elmer Sperry.
David Michael `` Dave '' Bautista, Jr. ( born January 18, 1969 ), is an American mixed martial artist, bodybuilder, actor, and former professional wrestler best known for his समय in संसार कुश्ती entertainment स्पर्धा अंतर्गत the ring name Batista.
In WWE, he became a six-time world champion, जीतना the संसार हेवीवेट चैंपियनशिप चार टाइम्स, and the WWE Championship two times.
He is the longest-reigning संसार हेवीवेट Champion in WWE history.
In addition to these championships, Batista has won the World Tag Team चैंपियनशिप तीन टाइम्स ( twice साथ ric फ्लेयर और एकबार साथ जॉन सीना ) और the WWE Tag Team Championship once ( with Rey Mysterio ).
Batista was also the winner of the 2005 Royal Rumble match and गई on to शीर्षक रेसलमेनिया 21, एक of the top five highest-grossing pay-per-view events in pro wrestling history.
After trying out at World Championship Wrestling 's Power Plant, Batista signed a contract with the wwf in 2000 और थी भेजा to इसके developmental territory, ओहियो घाटी कुश्ती ( ovw ), जहाँ he won the OVW Heavyweight Championship.
In August 2012, bautista हस्ताक्षरित a अनुबंध with Classic Entertainment & Sports to fight in mixed martial arts.
He won his MMA debut on अक्तूबर 6, 2012, defeating Vince Lucero via TKO in the first round.
Henry T. थामस sampson, jr. ( born in जैक्सन, Mississippi in 1934 ) is an African-American inventor.
He graduated from high school in 1951 from Lanier High School in जैक्सन, मिसिसिपी.
He then attended Morehouse College for a युगल of सालो पहले transferring to purdue विश्वविद्यालयों where he became a member of the Omega Psi Phi fraternity.
He received a Bachelor 's उपाधि in विज्ञान इससे purdue विश्वविद्यालयों in 1956.
He graduated with an MS उपाधि in अभियान्त्रिकी इससे the University of California, Los Angeles in 1961.
Sampson also received his MS in Nuclear अभियान्त्रिकी इससे the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign in 1965, and his PhD in 1967.
He is the पहला अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी to earn a ph.d.in नाभिकीय Engineering in the United States.
Some of his accomplishments include being a member of the संयुक्त राज्य नेवी between the सालो 1962 and 1964 and earning an Atomic Energy Commission honor between 1964 and 1967.
Later he was awarded the Black Image पुरस्कार इससे aerospace निगम in 1982.
He was awarded the Blacks in Engineering, Applied Science Award, and prize for शिक्षा, by the लॉस एंजिल्स परिषद of ब्लैक पेशेवर Engineers in 1983.
In June 2007, sampson थी शादीशुदा to लौरा howzell Young in St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands.
Young-Sampson is a professor in the कॉलेज of शिक्षा at कैलिफ़ोर्निया राज्य University San Bernardino.
Robert Lane Gibbs ( born March 29, 1971 ) is a वरिष्ठ अभियान adviser लिये us अध्यक्ष Barack Obama.
previously, he थी the 28th White House Press Secretary.
Gibbs was the communications director for then- u.s. सीनेटर Obama and his 2008 presidential campaign.
Gibbs, who has worked with Obama since 2004, was press secretary of John Kerry 's 2004 presidential campaign and has previously specialized in Senate campaigns, having served as संचार निदेशक लिये the लोकतांत्रिक senatorial अभियान कमेटी और लिये चार व्यक्तिगत सीनेट अभियान, सहित those of ओबामा in 2004 and Fritz Hollings in 1998.
Gibbs was भी the दबायें सचिव of Representative Bob Etheridge.
On November 22, 2008, Gibbs was घोषित as the दबायें सचिव of the Obama administration.
He assumed the role of press secretary on जनवरी 20, 2009, और दिया उसके पहला आधिकारिक briefing on January 22.
On January 5, 2011, Gibbs announced that he would छोड़ the श्वेत हाउस to become an बाहर adviser to the प्रशासन.
He left on फ़रवरी 11, 2011.
On February 12, 2013, it was announced कि गिब्स था महरूम नियुक्त as a contributor for cable-news channel MSNBC.
His first appearance was on the same night prior to the 2013 राज्य of the Union Address.
Armando Pérez ( born January 15, 1981 ), better ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम pitbull, is an American rapper, songwriter, and record producer.
His first recorded performance was from the Lil Jon album Kings of Crunk in 2002.
In 2004, he released his debut album titled M.I.A.M.I. ( छोटी लिये धन is a प्रमुख समस्या ) under TVT Records.
Since then, he has released three other एल्बम अंतर्गत the लेबल : el mariel in 2006, the boatlift in 2007, और Planet Pit in 2011.
He released rebelution in 2009, जिससे शामिल singles `` I Know You Want Me ( Calle Ocho ) `` and `` Krazy ``.
The latter peaked at No. 30 on the Hot 100 and No. 11 on the Hot Rap Tracks charts while `` I Know You want me '' peaked at no. 2 on the hot 100 और peaked भीतर the शीर्ष टेन धब्बे of चार्ट in the uk, कनाडा, Italy, and the Netherlands.
The song पहुँचे no. 1 in फ़्रांस और the European Hot 100 on the week ending August 29, 2009 according to Billboard magazine.
He बाद हस्ताक्षरित साथ पोलो grounds Music through Sony Music and created his own label Mr. 305 Inc.
Another सिंगल इससे rebelution थी `` Hotel Room Service ``, which peaked at No. 8 on the Hot 100.
Rebelution went on to sell over 7.5 million विश्वव्यापी डिजिटल singles और albums combined.
nevertheless, he dropped a smash called `` Give Me Everything '' which reached # 1 worldwide, and featured artists Ne-yo, Nayer, and Afrojack.
He has also performed as a प्रदर्शित कलाकार in the remixes of अनेक अन्य hit गीतों, जैसे tik टोक, चीख & Shout, Lo Hecho Esta Hecho, Bad, Papi, Diamonds, How Low, Tonight ( I 'm Lovin ' You ), Video Phone, Over To You Now and Bumpy Ride.
Pérez is also the मेजबान of उसके अपना spanish-language कार्यक्रम on the केबल चैनल Mun2 titled La Esquina ( Spanish for The Corner ).
In 2005 Pérez and rapper Sean 'Diddy ' combs co-founded ख़राब लड़के लातीनी, a subsidiary of combs ' ख़राब लड़के रिकॉर्ड label.
It primarily focuses on Latin hip hop, Latin soul, Latin pop and other तीव्र म्यूज़िक, और रै कार्यालयों in नई यॉर्क और Miami, Florida.
Along with co-founding it, Pérez फिलहाल heads the a & r प्रभाग of the label.
Pérez has become a product endorser, representing alongside ड्रेक, रिहाना, और trey songz the “so kodak” अभियान लिये the कोडक ब्रांड और embarking on a साझेदारी साथ the नरम drink giant Dr Pepper as part of the campaign “ Vida 23 ” for which he recorded the song specifically featured on his album Armando.
Pitbull also announced he has become the spokesperson for Voli Vodka, in which he holds a majority इक्विटी हिस्सेदारी, और budweiser रै चुनी pitbull to प्रचार its Bud Light line of beer.
The commercials currently highlight Pitbull dancing and gyrating on स्टेज पकड़कर up a बोतल of Bud Light.
Pitbull has also खरीदा an इक्विटी हिस्सेदारी in मियामी subs Pizza and Grill.
Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All Hallows ' Evening `` ), also known as All Hallows ' Eve, is a yearly celebration observed in a number of countries on October 31, the eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of hallowmas.
According to many scholars, All Hallows ' Eve is a Christianised feast originally बहकावे by पश्चिमी यूरोपीय कटाई त्यौहार, and festivals of the dead with possible pagan roots, particularly the Celtic Samhain.
Other scholars maintain that it originated independently of samhain और रै solely Christian roots.
Typical festive Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ), attending costume parties, carving pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, ठहराना bobbing, visiting haunted आकर्षण, playing pranks, telling scary stories, and watching horror films.
Freedom of speech is the political right to communicate one 's opinions और विचार using एक 's देह और प्रॉपर्टी to anyone जो is willing to प्राप्त them.
The term freedom of expression is sometimes used synonymously, लकिन शामिल कोई अधिनियम of seeking, receiving और imparting information or ideas, regardless of the medium used.
In practice, the right to freedom of speech is not absolute in any country and the right is commonly subject to limitations, as with libel, slander, obscenity, sedition ( including, for example inciting ethnic hatred ), copyright violation, revelation of सूचना कि is वर्गीकृत or वरना.
The right to freedom of expression is recognized as a human right under Article 19 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights and पहचाना in अंतरराष्ट्रीय इंसान अधिकारों विधि in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय वचन on सिविल और राजनैतिक अधिकारों ( ICCPR ).
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the सही to थाम राय बगैर हस्तक्षेप '' और `` everyone shall have the सही to स्वतंत्रता of अभिव्यक्ति ; इस सही shall include freedom to seek, receive and impart information and ideas of all kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in writing or in print, in the form of art, or through any other media of his choice ''.
Article 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these rights carries `` special duties and responsibilities `` and may `` therefore be विषय to निश्चित प्रतिबंध '' जब जरुरी `` [ f ] or आदर of the अधिकारों or प्रतिष्ठा of अन्य '' or `` [ f ] or the protection of national security or of public order ( order public ), or of public health or morals ''.
Freedom of speech may be legally curtailed in some religious legal systems and in secular jurisdictions where it is found to cause religious ठोकर, ऐसे as the अंग्रेजों जातिगत और धार्मिक द्वेष अधिनियम 2006.
Sydney Harbour from the air, showing the Opera House, the CBD, Circular Quay, the सेतु, the parramatta नदी, उत्तर सिडनी और kirribilli in the अग्रभूमि
The Sydney Harbour Bridge is a steel through arch bridge across सिडनी harbour कि carries रेल, vehicular, सायकिल और पैदल traffic between the Sydney central business district ( CBD ) and the North Shore.
The dramatic view of the सेतु, the harbour, और the आसपास सिडनी ओपेरा हाउस is an iconic image of Sydney, New South Wales, and Australia.
The bridge is nicknamed `` the coathanger '' because of its arch-based design.
अंतर्गत the दिशानिर्देश of dr j.j.c. bradfield of the nsw Department of Public Works, the bridge was designed and built by British firm Dorman Long and Co Ltd of Middlesbrough and opened in 1932.
The bridge 's डिज़ाइन थी बहकावे by the नरक फाटक सेतु in New York.
It was the world 's widest long-span bridge, at 48.8 मीटर ( 160 फीट ) चौड़ी, जबतक निर्माण of the नई बंदरगाहों मन सेतु in Vancouver.
It is also the fifth longest spanning-arch bridge in the world, और it is the tallest स्टील मेहराब सेतु, measuring इससे शीर्ष to जल स्तर.
Until 1967 the harbour सेतु was Sydney 's tallest structure.
The Hawaii hotspot is a volcanic hotspot located near the namesake हवाई आइलैंड्स, in the उत्तरी प्रशांत समंदर.
One of the most well-known and heavily पढ़ाई हॉटस्पॉट in the संसार, the हवाई plume is जिम्मेदार लिये the सृष्टि of the हवाई – सम्राट seamount कड़ी, an over 5,800 किलोमीटर ( 3,600 mi ) long chain of volcanoes, four of which are active, two of which are dormant, and more than 123 of which are extinct, many having since been ground beneath the waves by erosion as seamounts and atolls.
The chain extends from south of the island of Hawaii to the किनारे of the aleutian गर्त, निकट the पूर्वी किनारे of रूस.
While most volcanoes are created by geological activity at tectonic plate boundaries, the Hawaii hotspot is located far from nearby plate boundaries ; the classic hotspot theory, first proposed in 1963 by जॉन tuzo विल्सन, proposes कि a सिंगल, फिक्स्ड mantle plume builds ज्वालामुखी कि तब, काटें बंद इससे उनके source by the movement of the Pacific Plate, become increasingly inactive and eventually erode below sea level over millions of years.
according to इस सिद्धान्त, the nearly 60° बेंड separating the Emperor and Hawaiian segments of the chain was caused by a sudden shift in the movement of the Pacific Plate.
In 2003, fresh investigations of this irregularity led to the proposal of a mobile hotspot theory, suggesting कि हॉटस्पॉट हैं मोबाईल, not fixed, and that the 47 million year old bend was caused by a shift in the hotspot 's motion rather than the plate 's.
Ancient Hawaiians were the first to recognize the increasing आयु और weathered राज्य of the ज्वालामुखी to the north as they progressed on fishing expeditions along the islands.
the volatile राज्य of the हवाई volcanoes and their constant battle with the sea was a major element in Hawaiian mythology, embodied in Pele, the deity of volcanoes.
After the arrival of Europeans on the island, in 1880-1881 James Dwight Dana निर्देशित the पहला औपचारिक geological पढ़ाई of the हॉटस्पॉट 's volcanics, confirming the relationship long observed by the natives.
1912 marked the founding of the Hawaiian Volcano Observatory by volcanologist थामस jaggar, initiating निरन्तर वैज्ञानिक अवलोकन of the islands.
In the 1970s, a मानचित्रण प्रोजेक्ट थी initiated to लाभ अधिक information about the complex geology of Hawaii 's seafloor.
The hotspot has since been tomographically imaged, showing it to be wide and up to गहन, और ओलीवाइन and garnet -based studies have shown its magma chamber is approximately.
In its at least 85 million years of activity the हॉटस्पॉट रै उत्पादित an estimated of rock.
The chain 's rate of drift has धीरे increased over समय, causing the राशि of समय प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत ज्वालामुखी is क्रियाशील to घटी, इससे 18 लाख सालो लिये the 76 लाख year old Detroit Seamount, to just under 900,000 for the one million year-old Kohala ; on the other hand, eruptive volume has increased from per year to about.
Overall, this has caused a trend towards more active but quickly-silenced, closely spaced volcanoes—whereas volcanoes on the near side of the hotspot overlap each other ( forming such superstructures as हवाई द्वीप और the प्राचीन मावी नुई ), the oldest of the Emperor seamounts are spaced as far as apart.

Petitions are being signed to bring the दिखाएँ लिये a पांचवां ऋतु.

Osteonecrosis of the जबड़ों ( ONJ ) is a severe bone disease that affects the maxilla and the mandible.
Various फ़ॉर्म of onj have महरूम वर्णित over the पिछला 160 years, and a number of causes have been suggested in the literature.
Osteonecrosis of the jaws associated with bisphosphonate therapy, required by some cancer treatment regimens, has been पहचाना और पारिभाषित as a pathological एंटिटी चूंकि 2003.
The संभावित रिस्क इससे निम्नतर मौखिक doses of bisphosphonates, taken by patients to prevent or treat osteoporosis, remains uncertain.
Various treatment options have been explored, however severe cases of ONJ स्टिल आवश्यकता सर्जिकल हटाना of the प्रभावित bone.
A thorough history and assessement of pre-existing प्रणालीगत समस्याएं और संभावित साइट of दंत संक्रमण हैं जरूरी to help prevent the condition, especially if bisphosphonate therapy is considered.
The Boston Red Sox are a professional baseball टोली आधारित in बोस्टन, मैसाचुसेट्स, और a सदस्य of Major League Baseball 's American League Eastern Division.
Founded in as one of the American लीग 's आठ चार्टर franchises, the Red Sox 's home ballpark has been Fenway Park since.
The `` Red sox '' नाम थी चुनी by the टोली मालिक, जॉन I. टेलर, around, following previous Boston teams that had been known as the `` Red Stockings ``.
They have played in 11 संसार श्रेणी, winning 7.
Boston was a dominant team in the new league, defeating the पिट्सबर्ग pirates in the पहला संसार श्रेणी in और जीतना four more championships by.
However, they then went into एक of the longest चैंपियनशिप droughts in बेसबॉल इतिहास, पुकारा by कुछ the `` अभिशाप of the bambino `` बाद इसके कथित beginning with the Red Sox 's sale of Babe Ruth to the rival Yankees two years after their world championship in 1918, an 86-year wait before the team 's sixth World Championship in.
However, the team 's history during कि काल थी hardly एक of futility, लकिन थी बल्कि punctuated साथ कुछ of the सबसे यादगार moments in World Series history, including Enos Slaughter 's `` mad dash `` in, the `` Impossible Dream `` of, Carlton Fisk 's home run in, and Bill Buckner 's error in.
Red Sox history has भी महरूम चिह्नित by the टोली 's तीव्र फंसने साथ the नई यॉर्क यांकीज़, arguably the fiercest and most historic in North American professional sports.
The Boston Red Sox are स्वामित्व by fenway खेल समूह, जो भी अपना लिवरपूल Football Club of the Premier League in England.
The Red Sox are consistently one of the top MLB teams in average road attendance, while the छोटी क्षमता of fenway पार्क रोकता उन्हें from leading in overall attendance.
From May 15, 2003 to April 10, 2013, the Red Sox sold out every home game-a total of 820 games ( 794 नियमित ऋतु ) लिये a प्रमुख पेशेवर खेल रिकार्ड कि lasted almost a decade.
Mince पाई भर साथ mincemeat
Mincemeat is a मिश्रण of कटा सूखी फल, आसुत spirits and spices, and sometimes beef suet, beef, or venison.
Originally, mincemeat सदा contained meat.
अनेक आधुनिक व्यंजनों contain बीफ suet, though vegetable shortening is sometimes used in its place.
Variants of mincemeat are मिला in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, ब्रिटनी, कनाडा, उत्तरी यूरोपीय, आयरलैंड, South Africa, the United Kingdom and the United States.
In some countries the पद mincemeat refers to minced or ground meat.
Diana, Princess of Wales ( Diana frances ; née स्पेंसर ; 1 जुलाई 1961 – 31 अगस्त 1997 ) was the first wife of Charles, Prince of Wales, the eldest son and heir apparent of Queen Elizabeth II.
She was well known for her fund-raising कार्य लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय धर्मार्थ और as an eminent celebrity of the late 20th century.
Her wedding to the Prince of Wales on 29 जुलाई 1981 थी आयोजित at st पॉल 's गिरजाघर और देखी by a वैश्विक television audience of over 750 million.
While married she bore the titles Princess of Wales, Duchess of कॉर्नवॉल, duchess of rothesay, countess of चेस्टर and Baroness of Renfrew.
The marriage produced two बेटे, the princes विलियम और हैरी, जो became second and third in line to the British throne.
Diana was born into an aristocratic अंग्रेज़ी परिवार साथ royal ancestry.
She was the fourth child of John Spencer, 8th Earl स्पेंसर और उसके बीवी frances, बेटी of मौरिस रोश, 4th Baron Fermoy.
She became a public फिगर साथ the घोषणा of her engagement.
She also received recognition लिये उसके दान कार्य और for her support of the International Campaign to Ban Landmines.
From 1989, she was the president of the ग्रेट ormond गली हॉस्पिटल लिये children, in addition to dozens of other charities.
Diana remained the object of विश्वव्यापी मीडिया scrutiny during and after her marriage, which ended in divorce on 28 August 1996.
Media attention and public mourning were considerable following उसके मौत in a car crash in Paris on 31 August 1997.
अर्जेंटीना, officially the अर्जेंटाइन गणतंत्र ( ), is the दूसरी largest देश in both South America and the Latin America region.
The country is a federation of 23 प्रांतों और the autonomous city of Buenos Aires, its capital and largest city.
It is the eighth -largest country in the world by land area and the largest among Spanish-speaking nations by geographical area of 2,780,400 km2 और is the चौथी by population, with over 41 million people.
अर्जेंटीना is a founding सदस्य of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र, mercosur, the संघ of दक्षिण अमरीकी राष्ट्र, the Organization of Ibero-American States, the World Bank Group and the World Trade Organization, and is one of the G-15 and G-20 major economies.
Argentina is located in South America, bordered by चिली to the वेस्ट और दक्षिण, बोलीविया और पैराग्वे to the north and Brazil and Uruguay to the northeast.
Argentina claims sovereignty over part of Antarctica, the फ़ॉकलैंड आइलैंड्स ( ) और दक्षिण जॉर्जिया और the South Sandwich Islands.
Argentina is the successor state of the viceroyalty of the río de la प्लाटा, an overseas colony of the Spanish Empire.
Argentina declared independence during the अर्जेंटाइन युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता, जिससे थी followed by the Argentine Civil Wars during most of the 19th century.
The country faced several military coups and political instability दौरान the 20th सदी, साथ साथ आवधिक आर्थिक crisis that continue to this day.
A recognized दक्षिणी कोन शक्ति, और मध्य शक्ति, अर्जेंटीना is Latin America 's third-largest economy, with a `` very high '' rating on the Human development index.
Within Latin America, Argentina रै the पांचवां उच्चतम नाममात्र जीडीपी प्रति capita और the highest in purchasing power terms.
The Legatum Institute have argued that the country has a `` foundation for future growth due to its market size, levels of foreign direct निवेश, और प्रतिशत of high-tech निर्यात as share of कुल manufactured goods '', and it is classed by investors as middle emerging economy.
अर्जेंटीना is the लैटिन अमरीकी देश साथ the सबसे नोबेल पुरस्कार, लिये a कुल of five, all obtained during the second half of the twentieth century.
The country has three नोबेल पुरस्कार in विज्ञान and two of peace.
The most important पहलुओं of विज्ञान और प्रौद्योगिकी in अर्जेंटीना हैं चिंतित साथ आयुर्विज्ञान, नाभिकीय भौतिकी, जैवप्रौद्योगिकी, nanotechnology, स्पेस और प्रक्षेपास्त्र प्रौद्योगिकी और several fields related to the country 's Main Economic Activities.
The country also has the mega exhibition center of विज्ञान, प्रौद्योगिकी, उद्योग और आर्ट कि are Latin America 's largest.
hickory is a नगर in catawba काउंटी, with parts also in Burke County and Caldwell County.
The city 's 2010 estimated जनसांख्यिकी is 40,010.
Hickory is the principal city in the Hickory-Lenoir-Morganton MSA, in जिससे the जनसांख्यिकी at the 2010 Census was 365,497.
Polyethylene terephthalate ( sometimes written poly ( ethylene terephthalate ) ), commonly abbreviated PET, PETE, or the obsolete PETP or PET-P, is a thermoplastic polymer राल of the पॉलिएस्टर परिवार और is प्रयुक्त in सिंथेटिक fibers ; beverage, food and other liquid containers ; thermoforming applications ; and engineering resins often in combination with glass fiber.
the पद polyethylene terephthalate is a सोर्स of confusion because this substance, PET, does not contain polyethylene.
Thus, the alternate form, poly ( ethylene terephthalate ), is प्रायः प्रयुक्त in scholarly जर्नल्स for the sake of accuracy and clarity.
Depending on its processing and thermal history, polyethylene terephthalate may मौजूद दोनो as an amorphous ( पारदर्शी ) and as a semi-crystalline polymer.
The semicrystalline material might appear पारदर्शी ( कण आकार < 500 nm ) or अपारदर्शी और श्वेत ( कण size up to a few microns ) depending on its crystal structure and particle size.
Its monomer ( bis-β-hydroxyterephthalate ) can be synthesized by the esterification reaction between terephthalic acid and ethylene glycol with water as a byproduct, or by transesterification reaction between ethylene glycol and dimethyl terephthalate with methanol as a byproduct.
Polymerization is through a polycondensation reaction of the monomers ( done immediately बाद esterification/transesterification ) साथ जल as the byproduct.
The majority of the world 's PET production is for synthetic fibers ( in excess of 60 % ), साथ बोतल उत्पादन हिसाब लिये around 30 % of वैश्विक माँग.
In the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of वस्त्र अनुप्रयोग, पालतु is referred to by its common name, `` polyester, '' whereas the acronym `` PET '' is generally used in relation to packaging.
Polyester makes up about 18 % of world polymer उत्पादन और is the third-most-produced पॉलिमर ; polyethylene ( pe ) और polypropylene ( PP ) are first and second, respectively.
PET consists of polymerized units of the मोनोमर एथिलीन terephthalate, साथ repeating C10H8O4 units.
PET is commonly recycled, और रै the क्रमांक `` 1 '' as its recycling symbol.
Louisiana was admitted to the संघ on अप्रैल 30, 1812, और elects senators to Classes 2 and Class 3.
Its current senators are Democrat Mary landrieu और रिपब्लिकन दाउद vitter.
Black pudding, blood pudding or blood sausage is a type of sausage made by cooking blood or dried blood साथ a फिलर जबतक it is मोटा पर्याप्त to congeal when cooled.
The dish exists in various cultures from एशिया to यूरोपीय और the americas.
Pig, cattle, sheep, duck, and goat रक्त can be प्रयुक्त depending on different countries.
In Europe and the Americas, typical fillers include meat, fat, suet, bread, cornmeal, मीठी आलू, प्याज, chestnuts, जौ, और oatmeal.
In Spain, Portugal और एशिया, आलू is प्रायः replaced by rice.
Stakeholder may refer to:
Stakeholder ( corporate ), a person, group, organization, member or system who affects or can be प्रभावित by an संगठन 's क्रियाएँ
शेयरधारक, an एंटिटी कि can be प्रभावित by the results of that in which they are said to be stakeholders, i.e., that in which they have a stake.
Project stakeholder, a person, group or organization साथ an ब्याज in a project
Stakeholder theory, a सिद्धान्त कि identifies और मॉडल the समूह जिससे हैं stakeholders of a corporation or project
Stakeholder विश्लेषण, the प्रक्रम of identifying those affected by a project or event
Stakeholder ( law ), a third party जो temporarily holds धन or प्रॉपर्टी while its owner is still being determined
Jack Smight ( March 9, 1925 - सितंबर 1, 2003 ) was an American theatre and film director.
Smight थी born in मिनियापोलिस, मिनेसोटा and went to school with future actor Peter Graves.
His film credits include The Traveling Executioner, Rabbit, Run, Loving Couples, Midway, Harper, विमानक्षेत्र 1975, फटकार alley और the एमी पुरस्कार -winning Eddie, as well as many episodes of television series such as The Twilight Zone and The Alfred Hitchcock Hour.
He also directed the 1960 Broadway play The 49th Cousin and composed the music for the film adaption of फेंकें of थंडर Hear My Cry.
Smight died from कर्कट in लॉस एंजिल्स, California.
Dmitri Ivanovich Mendeleev ( ; 8 February 1834 – 2 February 1907 O.S. 27 January 1834 – 20 January 1907 ) थी a रूसी केमिस्ट और आविष्कारक.
He formulated the Periodic Law, created his own version of the periodic table of elements, and used it to correct the गुण of कुछ already खोजा तत्व और भी to भविष्यवाणी the properties of elements yet to be discovered !
Modesto ( Spanish for `` modest '' ), officially the City of Modesto, is the county seat and largest city of stanislaus काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, संयुक्त States.
With a population of approximately 201,165 at the 2010 census, modesto बाँधने as the 18th largest नगर in the राज्य of California.
The Modesto Census County Division, जिससे शामिल the शहरों of ceres और riverbank, has a population of 312,842 as of 2010.
Modesto is located in the central valley area of उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, 90 मील उत्तर of fresno, 92 मील ईस्ट of सैन फ्रांसिस्को, 68 मील south of the state capital of Sacramento, 66 miles west of Yosemite National Park, and 24 miles south of Stockton.
modesto, a 29-time पेड़ नगर यूएसए honoree, is घिरी by समृद्ध farmland, lending to a ranking for the county as 6th among all California counties in farm production.
Led by milk, almonds, मुर्गियों, अखरोट, और मकई साइलेज, the काउंटी grossed nearly $ 3.1 billion in agricultural production in 2011.
modesto थी immortalized in the 1973 George Lucas film American Graffiti.
The award winning film captured the स्पिरिट of `` cruising '' और दोस्ती on 10th और 11th गलियों in 1962 and led to the revival of 1950 's nostalgia that included the TV show Happy Days and the other spin-offs.
Ron Howard, Harrison Ford and Richard dreyfuss स्ट्रक्चर in the film.
The soundtrack was a विशाल कामयाबी.
Director George Lucas is a native of modesto, graduating इससे downey High School in 1962.
The Gallup-Healthways Well-Being Index for 2011, जिससे साक्षात्कार 1,000 भागीदार रोज़ और asks individuals to assess उनके jobs, finances, physical health, emotional state of mind and communities, ranked Modesto 126 out of the 190 cities surveyed.
in दिसम्बर 2009, फोर्ब्स क्रमित modesto 48th out of 100 among `` Best Bang-for-the-Buck Cities ''.
In this ranking, Modesto ranked 8th in housing affordability and travel time लकिन भी क्रमित 86th in जॉब भविष्यवाणी विकास और 99th in foreclosures.
Independence Day, commonly ज्ञात as the चौथी of जुलाई, is a संघीय अवकाश in the संयुक्त राज्य commemorating the adoption of the Declaration of Independence on July 4, 1776, declaring independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain.
स्वतंत्रता दिन is commonly संबद्ध साथ आतिशबाजी, parades, barbecues, carnivals, मेलों, picnics, कॉन्सर्ट, बेसबॉल खेल, परिवार reunions, and political speeches and ceremonies, in addition to various other public and private events celebrating the history, government, and traditions of the United States.
Independence Day is the नेशनल दिन of the संयुक्त States.
A लिंग प्रतीक denotes the sex of an organism or characterizes an agent by gender.
The two मानक लिंग प्रतीकों denoting पुरूष ♂ और मादा ♀ हैं derived from astrological symbols, denoting the classical planets Mars and Venus, respectively.
These symbols have been in use since the Renaissance also denoting तत्व in alchemy, specifically the metals iron and copper.
They were first used to denote the effective gender of plants ( i.e. sex of individual in a given crossbreed, चूंकि सबसे पौधे हैं hermaphroditic ) by carolus लीनियस in 1751.
A leasehold estate is an ownership of a temporary right to hold land or property in which a lessee or a किरायेदार holds अधिकारों of रियल प्रॉपर्टी by कुछ form of title from a lessor or landlord.
Although a tenant does थाम अधिकारों to रियल प्रॉपर्टी, a leasehold estate is typically considered personal property.
Leasehold is a form of land कार्यकाल or प्रॉपर्टी कार्यकाल जहाँ एक पार्टी खरीदता the सही to occupy land or a building for a given length of time.
As lease is a legal एस्टेट, leasehold estate can be bought and sold on the open market.
A leasehold thus differs from a freehold or fee simple where the ownership of a property is खरीदा outright और thereafter आयोजित for an indeterminate length of time, and also differs from a tenancy where a property is let ( rented ) on a periodic basis such as weekly or monthly.
Until the end of the lease period ( often measured in decades or centuries ; a 99 year lease is काफी आम ) the leaseholder रै the सही to remain in occupation as an assured tenant paying an agreed rent to the owner.
Terms of the agreement are contained in a lease, जिससे रै तत्व of अनुबंध and property law intertwined.
The term estate for years may occasionally be प्रयुक्त.
This refers to a leasehold एस्टेट लिये कोई विशिष्ट period of time ( the word `` years '' is misleading ).
An estate for सालो is नहीं automatically renewed.
Colloquially, `` lease '' and `` leasing `` are often a formalization of a longer, specific period as compared with a `` rental '' कि निर्मित a tenancy at होगा, terminable or बेदर्दी at the समाप्त of a छोटी काल.
Olivia ( also known as Welcome to the World of the Pig Olivia ) is a British-American children 's एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न श्रेणी उत्पादित by मीडिया कम्पनी chorion और based on Ian Falconer 's books.
It is देखी on उपनाम jr. in the US, Milkshake !
, Nick Jr. in the uk और आयरलैंड, और डिज़्नी Junior in Latin America and Brazil, Treehouse TV in Canada.
The show रै जीती a चांदी अभिभावक ' चुनाव पुरस्कार लिये its positive story lines and characters.
Location of Panama between Pacific ( bottom ) and caribbean ( शीर्ष ), साथ canal at top center
The Panama Canal ( ) is a ship कनाल in पनामा कि connects the Atlantic Ocean ( via the Caribbean Sea ) to the Pacific Ocean.
The canal कटौती आरपार the isthmus of Panama and is a key conduit for international maritime trade.
There are locks at each end to लिफ्ट जहाजों up to gatun Lake ( above sea-level ).
Gatun Lake was created to reduce the amount of कार्य जरूरी लिये the canal.
The current ताले हैं wide.
A तीसरा, wider लेन of ताले is being built.
France began work on the canal in 1881, but had to stop because of अभियान्त्रिकी समस्याएं और ऊँची मृत्यु due to disease.
The United States ( US ) later took over the project and took a decade to complete the canal in 1914, enabling जहाजों to avoid the lengthy केप सींग रूट around the southernmost टिप of दक्षिण अमेरिका ( via the Drake Passage ) or to navigate the Strait of Magellan.
One of the largest and most difficult engineering प्रोजेक्ट कभी undertaken, the पनामा कनाल शॉर्टकट बना it संभावित for ships to travel between the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans in half the time previously required.
The shorter, faster, safer route to the US West Coast and to nations in and along the Pacific Ocean allowed those स्थान to become अधिक एकीकृत साथ the संसार economy.
During this time, ownership of the territory that is now the Panama Canal was first Colombian, then French, और तब अमरीकी ; the संयुक्त राज्य समाप्त the construction.
The canal was taken over in 1999 by the panamanian सरकारी, as long planned.
Annual traffic has risen from about 1,000 जहाजों जब the कनाल खोली in 1914, to 14,702 बरतन in 2008, the latter measuring a total of 309.6 million Panama Canal/Universal Measurement System ( PC/UMS ) tons.
By 2008, more than 815,000 vessels था passed through the कनाल, अनेक of उन्हें much larger than the असली planners could have envisioned ; the largest ships that can transit the canal today are called Panamax.
The American Society of Civil Engineers रै नामित the पनामा कनाल one of the seven wonders of the modern world.
Benjamin Franklin ( अप्रैल 17, 1790 ) थी एक of the Founding Fathers of the United States.
A noted polymath, Franklin was a leading author, printer, political theorist, politician, postmaster, वैज्ञानिक, संगीतकार, आविष्कारक, satirist, civic activist, statesman, and diplomat.
As a वैज्ञानिक, he थी a प्रमुख फिगर in the अमरीकी आत्मज्ञान and the history of physics for his discoveries and theories regarding electricity.
He invented the lightning rod, bifocals, the फ्रैंकलिन स्टोव, a carriage ओडोमीटर, and the glass 'armonica '.
He facilitated अनेक नागरिक संगठन, सहित a fire department and a university.
Franklin earned the title of `` the पहला अमरीकी '' लिये उसके जल्दी और indefatigable campaigning लिये औपनिवेशिक unity ; as an author and spokesman in London for several colonies, then as the first United States Ambassador to France, he exemplified the emerging American nation.
Franklin was foundational in defining the American ethos as a marriage of the practical values of thrift, hard work, education, community spirit, self-governing संस्थानों, और विपक्ष to authoritarianism दोनो राजनैतिक और धार्मिक, साथ the वैज्ञानिक और tolerant values of the Enlightenment.
In the words of historian Henry स्टील commager, `` in a फ्रैंकलिन could be मिलाया the virtues of Puritanism without its defects, the illumination of the Enlightenment without its heat. ''
To Walter Isaacson, this makes Franklin `` the most संपन्नता अमरीकी of उसके आयु और the सबसे influential in inventing the type of society America would become. ''
Franklin, always proud of his working क्लास जड़ें, became a कामयाब समाचारपत्र एडिटर और मुद्रक in फिलाडेल्फिया, the leading city in the colonies.
He was also partners with William Goddard and जोसेफ गैलोवे the तीन of जिसको प्रकाशित the पेन्सिलवेनिया वृत्तान्त, a समाचारपत्र कि थी ज्ञात लिये its revolutionary sentiments and criticisms of the British monarchy in the American colonies.
He became धनवान प्रकाशन Poor Richard 's Almanack and The Pennsylvania Gazette.
Franklin gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय renown as a वैज्ञानिक लिये उसके प्रसिद्ध प्रयोग in electricity and for his many inventions, especially the lightning rod.
He played a major role in establishing the विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया और थी निर्वाचित the first president of the American Philosophical Society.
फ्रैंकलिन became a नेशनल नायिका in अमेरिका जब he spearheaded the effort to have Parliament repeal the unpopular Stamp Act.
An accomplished diplomat, he was widely admired among the फ्रेंच as अमरीकी मंत्री to पेरिस and was a major figure in the development of positive Franco-American relations.
For अनेक सालो he थी the British postmaster for the colonies, which enabled him to set up the first national communications network.
He was active in जातियाँ अफेयर्स, औपनिवेशिक और state politics, as well as national and international affairs.
From 1785 to 1788, he परोसा as राज्यपाल of Pennsylvania.
Toward the समाप्त of उसके जीवन, he freed his slaves and became one of the most prominent abolitionists.
His colorful life and legacy of scientific and political achievement, and status as one of America 's most influential Founding Fathers, have seen फ्रैंकलिन सम्मानित on coinage और धन ; warships ; the names of अनेक कस्बों, काउंटी, शैक्षणिक संस्थानों, namesakes, और कंपनियाँ ; and more than two centuries after his death, countless cultural references.
दण्ड minds is an अमरीकी पुलिस procedural television program that premiered September 22, 2005, on CBS.
The series follows a team of profilers इससे the एफबीआई 's Behavioral Analysis Unit ( BAU ) based in Quantico, Virginia.
the bau is भाग of the एफबीआई नेशनल Center for the Analysis of Violent Crime.
The show differs from many procedural dramas by focusing on प्रोफाइलिंग the दण्ड, बल्कि than the crime itself.
the दिखाएँ is उत्पादित by the चिह्नित गॉर्डन कम्पनी in संघ साथ सीबीएस टेलीविज़न Studios ( originally Paramount Network Television then CBS Paramount Network Television ) and ABC Studios ( originally Touchstone Television ).
CBS announced in October 2009 कि विरासत इंटरैक्टिव होता develop a video game based on the show.
The game would require players to जाँचें अपराधों दृश्यों लिये clues to help solve murder mysteries.
The interactive puzzle game was released in 2012, but did not feature any of the voices of the दिखाएँ 's डाल, nor थी the डाल शामिल with the project.
On March 14, 2012, CBS renewed दण्ड minds लिये an आठवीं ऋतु, जिससे premiered on September 26, 2012.
`` Heart-Shaped Box '' is a सोंग by the अमरीकी grunge बैंड निर्वाण, written by vocalist and guitarist Kurt Cobain.
The song was released as the first single from the समूह 's तीसरा और फाइनल स्टुडियो एल्बम, In Utero, in 1993.
It was one of two songs from the album mixed by Scott Litt in order to augment the असली उत्पादन by निर्माता स्टीव Albini.
While Nirvana 's label DGC Records did not release a physical single for sale in the संयुक्त राज्य, `` heart-shaped बक्सा '' प्राप्त much American radio airplay, reaching number one on the Billboard Modern Rock Tracks chart.
The international release of the single reached क्रमांक पाँच on the uk singles चार्ट.
The song 's music video, directed by एंटोन corbijn, garnered नाजुक plaudits.
The orbital speed of a body, generally a planet, a natural satellite, an artificial satellite, or a multiple star, is the गति at जिससे it orbits around the barycenter of a system, usually around a more massive body.
It can be used to refer to either the mean orbital speed, the average speed as it completes an कक्षा, or instantaneous कक्षीय गति, the गति at a particular point in its orbit.
The orbital speed at any position in the orbit can be computed इससे the अलहदा to the सेंट्रल देह at कि स्थिति, और the विशिष्ट orbital energy, which is independent of position : the kinetic energy is the total energy minus the potential energy.
Brown Palace आंतरिक और Atrium
Brown Palace Hotel is the second-oldest operating hotel in Denver, कोलोराडो और is एक of the पहला atrium-style होटल कभी built.
It is now operated by कोरम होटल और रिसॉर्ट.
it थी निर्मित in 1892, एक साल later than the Oxford Hotel.
It थी नामित लिये इसके असली मालिक, हेनरी C. भूरा, और was designed with its odd triangular shape by architect Frank Edbrooke.
The hotel is located at 321 17th St, Denver, CO between 17th गली, ब्रॉडवे और tremont street/pl in शहर Denver behind the Republic Plaza.
The प्रमुख प्रवेश द्वार is on Tremont Street.
DVD-Video is a consumer video format used to store digital video on DVD discs, and is currently the dominant consumer वीडियो स्वरूप in एशिया, उत्तर अमेरिका, यूरोपीय, और Australia.
Discs using the DVD-Video specification require a DVD drive and an h.262/mpeg-2 भाग 2 डिकोडर ( e.g., a dvd खिलाड़ी, or a कंप्यूटर DVD drive with a software DVD player ).
Commercial DVD movies हैं एनकोडेड using a संयोजन of h.262/mpeg-2 भाग 2 संपीडित video and audio of varying formats ( often multi-channel formats as described below ).
Typically, the data rate for dvd फिल्मों सीमाएँ इससे 3 mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s, and the bit rate is usually adaptive.
It was पहला उपलब्धियाँ लिये खुदरा around 1997.
The DVD-Video specification थी निर्मित by dvd Forum and can be obtained from DVD Format/Logo Licensing Corporation for a fee of $ 5,000.
The specification is नहीं सरेआम उपलब्धियाँ, because every subscriber must sign a non-disclosure agreement.
Certain information in the dvd किताब is मालिकाना and confidential.
The nautical mile ( प्रतीक m, nm or nmi ) is a ईकाई of लंबाई कि is परिचय एक मिनट of arc of latitude measured along any meridian, or about one minute of arc of longitude at the equator.
By international agreement it रै महरूम नियत at 1,852 मीटर exactly ( about 6,076 feet ).
It is a non- SI unit ( although accepted for use in the International System of Units by the BIPM ) प्रयुक्त विशेषकर by navigators in the शिपिंग और विमानन उद्योग, और also in polar exploration.
It is commonly used in अंतरराष्ट्रीय विधि और treaties, विशेषकर regarding the limits of territorial waters.
It विकसित इससे the समुद्र mile and the related geographical mile.
The nautical मील remains in उपयोग by समुद्र और एयर navigators विश्वव्यापी because of its convenience when working with charts.
सबसे nautical चार्ट उपयोग the मर्केटर प्रक्षेप जिनकी स्केल varies by परिचय a factor of six from the equator to 80° latitude, so charts covering large areas can not use a single linear scale.
The nautical mile is nearly equal to a minute of अक्षांश on a चार्ट, so a अलहदा measured साथ a चार्ट divider can be roughly परिवर्तित to nautical miles using the chart 's latitude scale.
shippensburg is a बरो in Cumberland and Franklin counties in the U.S. state of Pennsylvania.
Settled in 1730, Shippensburg lies in the Cumberland Valley, 41 मील ( 66 km ) west-southwest of harrisburg, और is part of the Harrisburg– Carlisle Metropolitan Statistical Area.
In 1900, 3,228 people lived there ; in 1910, 3,457 ; और in 1940, 5,244 people lived there.
the जनसांख्यिकी was 5,492 at the 2010 census.
Shippensburg was incorporated as a बरो on जनवरी 21, 1819.
In the past, there were फर्नीचर कारखानों, इंजन और पंप works, and other industrial works located within the town.
Shippensburg is also the home of The Beistle Company, the oldest and largest manufacturer of सजावट और पार्टी goods, जिससे बिकता इसके distinctive मधुकोश पेपर सजावट worldwide.
It is also the location of Pague and Fegan, the oldest लगातार संचालित हार्डवेयर स्टोर in Pennsylvania.
In May 2012, Volvo निर्माण उपकरण began a $ 100 लाख विस्तार प्रोजेक्ट to लाओ इसके अमरीकी headquarters to Shippensburg.
Shippensburg is also home to Shippensburg University of पेन्सिलवेनिया, एक of 14 विश्वविद्यालयों of the पेन्सिलवेनिया State System of Higher Education.
Yearly the last full week of जुलाई, the shippensburg Community Fair is held.
Begun in 1958, the fair bills itself as पेन्सिलवेनिया 's largest bi-county fair.
The fair शामिल agricultural दर्शाती, a शिल्प दिखाएँ, खाना विक्रेता, and carnival rides amongst other things.
Every summer on the पिछला शनिवार of अगस्त, shippensburg holds the मकई पर्व, an event that brings regional artisans and vendors to operate stands downtown.
The शहर is बंद to ट्रैफ़िक लिये at least 5 blocks for most of the day.
Average attendance at the festival is अनुमानित at 60,000 - 70,000 each year.
ब्लैक बालदार जीभ ( bht, भी termed lingua villosa nigra ) refers to a कंडीशन of the tongue where the filiform papillae elongate with black or brown discoloration, giving a black and hairy appearance.
The appearance may be alarming, लकिन it is a हानिरहित condition.
Predisposing factors include smoking, xerostomia ( dry mouth ), soft diet, ग़रीब मौखिक hygiene और निश्चित medications.
Management is by improving oral hygiene, especially scraping or brushing the जीभ.
The IEEE 1394 interface is a serial bus interface standard for high-speed संचार और isochronous real-time data transfer.
It was developed in the late 1980s और जल्दी 1990s by Apple, who called it FireWire.
The 1394 interface is comparable to USB, and often those two technologies हैं माना साथ, हालांकि USB has more market share.
Apple first शामिल firewire in कुछ of इसके 1999 मॉडल, and most Apple computers since the year 2000 have included FireWire ports, though, as of 2013, nothing beyond the 800 version ( IEEE-1394b ).
The interface is also known by the brand i.LINK ( Sony ), और लिंक्स ( टेक्सास Instruments ).
IEEE 1394 replaced parallel SCSI in many अनुप्रयोग, क्युकी of निम्नतर क्रियान्वयन लागत और a सरलीकृत, more adaptable cabling system.
The 1394 standard also defines a backplane इंटरफ़ेस, हालांकि इस is नहीं as widely used.
IEEE 1394 is the High-Definition Audio-Video Network गठबंधन ( हाना ) मानक कनेक्शन इंटरफ़ेस for A/V ( audio/visual ) component communication and control.
FireWire is also available in wireless, fiber ऑप्टिक, और समाक्षीय संस्करण using the isochronous protocols.
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray Vaughan ( अक्तूबर 3, 1954 – अगस्त 27, 1990 ) was an American guitarist, singer-songwriter, and record producer.
Often referred to by his आद्याक्षर srv, vaughan is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a founding member and leader of Double Trouble.
Together with drummer Chris Layton and bassist Tommy Shannon, वे ignited the ब्लूज़ पुनरुद्धार of the 1980s.
With a career spanning सात सालो, vaughan और दोगुना ट्रबल consistently sold out concerts while their albums frequently went gold.
He was born and raised in Dallas, Texas, and for a short काल of समय जिया in ग्राहम, Texas.
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan, Vaughan started playing the guitar at आयु सात और formed अनेक bands कि occasionally performed in local nightclubs.
At age 17, he dropped out of high स्कूल और स्थानांतरित to ऑस्टिन to further pursue उसके musical career, joining groups such as Krackerjack, the Nightcrawlers, and the Cobras.
In 1977, he formed Triple threat revue, a बैंड कि आखिरकार विकसित into Double Trouble and regularly performed around Austin.
In 1982, Vaughan and Double Trouble performed at the Montreux Jazz Festival in स्विट्ज़रलैंड, catching the ध्यान of musicians David Bowie and Jackson Browne.
Bowie asked Vaughan to play on his upcoming studio album Let 's Dance, while Browne offered the band free use of his निजी स्टुडियो in लॉस एंजिल्स to रिकार्ड an album.
In March 1983, vaughan और दोगुना ट्रबल यहूद हस्ताक्षरित to Epic Records by veteran record producer John Hammond Sr. and released their debut album, Texas Flood in June of that year.
After successful touring, the group released the albums, could n't स्टैंड the मौसम ( 1984 ) और आत्मा to आत्मा ( 1985 ), the latter of which featured new keyboardist Reese Wynans.
Although his career had progressed सफलतापूर्वक, vaughan checked into a पुनर्वास हॉस्पिटल in अटलांटा, जॉर्जिया to दे up a कोका और दारू habit and returned to touring with the band.
In June 1989, In Step was released और अर्जित उन्हें a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार for Best Contemporary Blues Performance.
On August 27, 1990, Vaughan थी मारे in a हेलीकाप्टर क्रैश following a performance in East Troy, Wisconsin.
vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet तीव्र style was derived from a variety of musical genres.
He was influenced by blues musicians including Albert King, Freddie King, Otis Rush, and Muddy Waters, और चट्टान guitarists ऐसे as जिमि हेंड्रिक्स और lonnie Mack.
His guitar playing reflected the classic blues and pentatonic तराजू.
He has received चौड़ी नाजुक मान्यता लिये उसके गिटार playing, ranking at # 6 on Rolling Stones list of `` 100 Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011.
He थी मरणोपरांत inducted into the Blues Hall of Fame in 2000 and a memorial statue was erected in Austin 's Auditorium Shores park.
Stevie Ray Vaughan is widely माना to be एक of the greatest musicians to come from the state of Texas.

In computer नेटवर्किंग, gigabit ईथरनेट ( gbe or 1 gige ) is a term describing various technologies for transmitting Ethernet frames at a rate of a gigabit per second ( 1,000,000,000 bits per second ), as defined by the IEEE 802.3-2008 standard.
It आए into उपयोग शुरूआत in 1999, धीरे supplanting Fast Ethernet in wired local networks, where it performed considerably faster.
The cables and equipment are very समान to पिछला मानकों and were very common and economical by 2010.
Half-duplex gigabit links connected through hubs are allowed by the specification, but full-duplex usage with switches is much अधिक आम.

The main components of a stamp:
1. चित्र
2. perforations
3. denomination
4. देश नाम
A postage stamp is a small piece of paper that is purchased and displayed on an item of mail as प्रमाण of भुगतान of postage.
Typically, stamps are बना इससे खास पेपर, with a national designation and denomination ( price ) on the face, and a gum adhesive on the reverse side.
Postage stamps are purchased from a postal administration or other प्राधिकृत विक्रेता और हैं प्रयुक्त to अदा लिये the लागत शामिल in moving mail as well as other business necessities such as insurance and registration.
The stamp’s shape is usually that of a छोटी आयताकार of varying proportions, हालांकि त्रिकोण or other shapes are occasionally used.
The stamp is affixed to an envelope or अन्य डाक कवर ( i.e., पैकेट, box, mailing cylinder ) that the customer wishes to send.
The item is then processed by the postal system, जहाँ a postmark, sometimes ज्ञात as a रद्दीकरण चिह्नित, is प्रायः लागू over the स्टैम्प and cover ; this procedure marks the stamp as used, which prevents its reuse.
The postmark indicates the तिथि और पाइंट of उत्पत्ति of the mailing.
The mailed मद is तब वितरित to the address that the customer has applied to the envelope or cover.
Postage stamps have facilitated the डिलीवरी of मेल चूंकि the 1840s.
Before this time, ink and hand-stamps ( hence the word 'stamp ' ), प्रायः बना इससे लकडी or कॉर्क, यहूद प्रायः प्रयुक्त to फ़्रैंक the मेल और confirm the payment of postage.
The first adhesive postage stamp, commonly referred to as the Penny ब्लैक, थी जारी in the संयुक्त Kingdom in 1840.
The invention of the स्टैम्प थी a भाग of the attempt to सुधार और improve the डाक system in the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland, which in the early 19th century was in disarray and rife with corruption.
There are varying accounts of the आविष्कारक or आविष्कारक of the stamp.
Before the परिचय of postage stamps, मेल in the uk थी सशुल्क लिये by the प्राप्तकर्ता, a प्रणाली कि थी संबद्ध साथ an irresolvable प्रॉब्लम : the लागत of delivering mail were not recoverable by the postal service when recipients were unable or unwilling to pay for delivered items, and senders had no incentive to restrict the number, size, or weight of items sent, whether or not they would ultimately be paid for.
the postage स्टैम्प resolved इस समस्या in a सरल और सुरुचिपूर्ण manner, with the additional benefit of room for an element of beauty to be introduced.
Later related inventions include postal स्टेशनरी ऐसे as prepaid-postage लिफाफे, पोस्ट ताश, lettercards, aerogrammes और wrappers, postage meters, and, more recently, specialty boxes and envelopes provided free to the customer by the U.S. postal service for priority or express mailing.
The postage स्टैम्प afforded convenience लिये दोनो the मेलर और डाक officials, more efficiently recovered costs for the postal service, and ultimately resulted in a better, faster postal system.
With the conveniences stamps offered, उनके उपयोग resulted in greatly increased mailings during the 19th and 20th centuries.
Postage stamps during this era were the most popular way of paying लिये मेल, लकिन by the end of the 20th century were rapidly being eclipsed by the use of metered postage and bulk mailing by businesses. )
The same result with respect to communications by private parties occurred over the last decade of the 20th century and the first decade of the 21st due to घटती लागत of long अलहदा टेलीफोन communications and the development and explosive spread of electronic mailing ( `` e-mail '' via the Internet ) and bill paying systems had.
As postage stamps with उनके engraved imagery began to appear on a फैली basis, historians and collectors began to take notice.
The study of postage stamps and their use is referred to as philately.
Stamp collecting can be दोनो a शौक और a रूप of ऐतिहासिक पढ़ाई और सन्दर्भ, as government-issued postage stamps and their mailing systems have always been involved with the history of nations.
The University of अलबामा at बर्मिंघम ( uab ) is a public university in Birmingham in the U.S. state of Alabama.
Developing from an extension center established in 1936, the संस्था became an autonomous संस्था in 1969 और is today one of three institutions in the University of Alabama System.
UAB offers over 140 programs of study in 12 academic divisions अग्रणी to स्नातक 's, निपुण 's, डॉक्टरेट, और पेशेवर डिग्री in the सोशल और behavioral sciences, the liberal arts, business, education, engineering, and health-related fields such as medicine, dentistry, optometry, nursing, and public health.
The स्कूल is अत्यधिक प्रसिद्ध लिये इसके चिकित्सा research and natural sciences programs.
The UAB Health System, एक of the largest अकादमिक चिकित्सा centers in the United States, is affiliated with the university.
UAB Hospital sponsors residency programs in various चिकित्सा specialties, सहित आतंरिक आयुर्विज्ञान, neurology, surgery, radiology, and anesthesiology.
UAB Hospital is the only ACS verified स्तर i आघात बीच in Alabama, as rated by the American College of Surgeons Trauma Program.
UAB is the state 's largest employer, with more than 18,000 संकाय और स्टाफ और over 53,000 jobs at the university and in the health system.
An estimated 10 percent of the jobs in the birmingham-hoover महानगर क्षेत्रफल और 1 in 33 jobs in the state of Alabama are directly or indirectly related to UAB.
The university 's overall annual economic impact was अनुमानित to be $ 4.6 अरब in 2010.
In the fall of 2012, the विश्वविद्यालयों of Alabama at Birmingham enrolled 17,999 students from more than 110 countries, including 1,605 freshmen.
There are plans to commence with an `` आक्रामक '' विकास in नामांकन at uab.
The current uab अध्यक्ष is dr. Ray L. Watts.
टोफू, भी पुकारा bean curd, is a food made by coagulating soy juice and then pressing the resulting curds into soft white blocks.
It is a component in अनेक ईस्ट एशियाई और southeast एशियाई cuisines.
There are many different किस्में of टोफू, सहित भैस टोफू और tofu that has been processed in some way.
Tofu has a subtle flavor and can be used in savory और मीठी बर्तन.
It is प्रायः seasoned or marinated to suit the dish.
Tofu originated in प्राचीन China some 2,000 years ago.
Chinese legend ascribes its आविष्कार to प्रिंस लियू an ( चाइनीज : 劉安 Liú Ān, 179–122 BC ).
टोफू और इसके उत्पादन technique were introduced into Korea and then Japan during the Nara period.
It spread into अन्य भाग of ईस्ट एशिया as well.
This spread likely coincided साथ the स्प्रेड of buddhism क्युकी it is an महत्वपूर्ण source of protein in the vegetarian diet of East Asian Buddhism.
Li Shizhen in the Ming Dynasty described a विधि of बनाना टोफू in bencao Gangmu.
Tofu has a low calorie count, relatively विशाल amounts of प्रोटीन, और छोटी fat.
It is high in iron and depending on the coagulant used in manufacturing, may also be ऊँची in कैल्सियम and/or मैग्नीशियम.
Bubbles ( born 1983 ) is a common chimpanzee, known for being the one-time pet of अमरीकी रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार माइकल जैक्सन, जो खरीदा the primate from a Texas research facility in the early 1980s.
The animal was a frequent सफर साथी to the सिंगर, जिनकी अनुलग्नक to the animal led to media mockery and, among other factors, to a public perception of Jackson as an eccentric.
During the Bad World Tour, for example, जैक्सन brought बुलबुले साथ उसे to जापानी, where they both drank tea with the mayor of Osaka.
Bubbles was initially kept at the Jackson परिवार 's घर in encino, लॉस एंजिल्स, लकिन थी स्थानांतरित to Neverland Ranch in 1988.
There, he slept in a crib in Jackson 's bedroom, used the सिंगर 's प्रसाधन, और ate कैंडी in the Neverland movie theater.
In 2003 the public learned that, like all captive chimpanzees, बुलबुले था matured into a विशाल और आक्रामक adult chimp unsuitable as a companion animal.
He was sent to a California animal trainer, where he was reported to have attempted suicide.
When the trainer shut bas उसके आपरेशन in 2004, बुलबुले थी स्थानांतरित to the Center for Great Apes, a sanctuary in Wauchula, Florida, where he has lived since 2005.
Muse are an English rock band from teignmouth, देवों, जिससे formed in 1994.
The band consists of school मित्रों मैथ्यू bellamy ( सीसे vocals, सीसे गिटार, पियानो, keyboards, keytar ), क्रिस्टोफर wolstenholme ( bass, vocals, keyboards, rhythm guitar, harmonica ) and Dominic Howard ( drums, percussion, synthesisers, sampling ).
Since the release of their 2006 album ब्लैक छेद और खुलासे, keyboardist और percussionist Morgan Nicholls has performed live with the band.
Muse are known लिये उनके ऊर्जावान और हद सजीव प्रदर्शन और उनके संलयन of अनेक म्यूज़िक जाति, including space rock, progressive rock, alternative rock, heavy metal, classical music and electronica.
Muse have released six studio albums : Showbiz ( 1999 ), Origin of Symmetry ( 2001 ), absolution ( 2003 ), ब्लैक छेद और खुलासे ( 2006 ), The Resistance ( 2009 ) and The 2nd Law ( 2012 ).
They have भी जारी तीन सजीव एल्बम, hullabaloo साउंडट्रैक ( 2002 ), जिससे is भी a संकलन of B-sides, Absolution Tour ( 2005 ), and HAARP ( 2008 ), which documents the band 's performances at Wembley Stadium in 2007.
Black Holes and Revelations earned the band a पारा पुरस्कार नामांकन और a तीसरा प्लेस finish in the NME Albums of the Year list for 2006.
Muse have also won a collection of music awards throughout their history, including five MTV Europe Music Awards, six Q Awards, eight NME Awards, two Brit Awards —winning `` बेहतरीन अंग्रेजों सजीव अधिनियम '' twice, an MTV Video Music Award, four Kerrang !
Awards and an अमरीकी म्यूज़िक Award.
They were also nominated for five Grammy Awards, of which they won बेहतरीन चट्टान एल्बम, लिये उनके पांचवां स्टुडियो एल्बम the प्रतिरोध ( 2009 ).
Muse have sold over 15 लाख albums worldwide.
Bloemfontein (, ; Dutch for `` fountain of flowers '' ) is the capital city of the Free State प्रांत of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी ; और, as the न्यायिक पूंजी of the स्वदेश, एक of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी 's तीन नेशनल राजधानी – the other two being Cape Town, the legislative capital, and Pretoria, the administrative capital.
Bloemfontein is popularly और poetically ज्ञात as `` the नगर of गुलाब ``, owing to the abundance of these flowers and the annual rose festival held there.
The city 's Sesotho name is Mangaung, meaning `` place of cheetahs `` and it has been शामिल in the mangaung लोकल नगरपालिका चूंकि 2000.
Bloemfontein is situated on शुष्क घासभूमि at, at an altitude of above sea level.
The city is home to 369,568 निवासियों, जबकि the mangaung Local Municipality has a population of 645,455.

The meaning of life is a philosophical question concerning the significance of जीवन or अस्तित्व in general.
It can भी be expressed in अलग फ़ॉर्म, ऐसे as `` Why are we here ? ``, `` What is life all about ? ``, and `` What is the purpose of existence ? ''
It has been the subject of much philosophical, वैज्ञानिक, and theological speculation throughout history.
There have been a large number of proposed answers to these questions from many अलग सांस्कृतिक और वैचारिक पृष्ठभूमि.
The meaning of जीवन is in the philosophical और धार्मिक conceptions of अस्तित्व, सोशल ties, consciousness, and happiness, and borders on many other issues, such as symbolic meaning, ontology, value, purpose, ethics, good and evil, free will, the existence of one or multiple Gods, conceptions of God, the soul, and the afterlife.
Scientific contributions focus primarily on describing सम्बन्धित अनुभवजन्य तथ्य परिचय the ब्रह्मांड, exploring the context and parameters concerning the 'how ' of life.
विज्ञान भी अध्ययन और can provide सुझाव for the pursuit of well-being and a related conception of morality.
An alternative, humanistic approach poses the सवाल `` कया is the अर्थ of my जीवन ? ''
The मान of the सवाल pertaining to the purpose of life may coincide with the achievement of ultimate reality, or a feeling of oneness, or even a feeling of sacredness.
Family Guy creator Seth MacFarlane also provides the voices of Peter griffin, stewie griffin, ब्रायन griffin, और Glenn Quagmire.
Family Guy is an अमरीकी एनिमेटेड sitcom कि सुविधाएँ पाँच main voice actors, and numerous regular cast and recurring guest stars.
The प्रिंसिपल आवाज़ डाल consists of दिखाएँ निर्माता सेठ macfarlane, एलेक्स borstein, सेठ ग्रीन, mila kunis ( जो replaced Lacey Chabert after the first season ) and Mike Henry and now, the new actor Beau Osborne.
Recurring voice actors include पैट्रिक warburton, आदम वेस्ट, जॉन G. ब्रेनन, निकोल सुलीवान और Jennifer Tilly, and repeat guest stars include Phyllis Diller, Charles Durning, Rush Limbaugh, and Phil LaMarr.
Many cast members provide आवाज़ें लिये multiple characters.
The voice actors, in portraying the various character personalities on the दिखाएँ, draw inspiration from celebrities and pop culture.
Family Guy characters have been played by अधिक than एक कर्ता, बाद सदस्यों of the दिखाएँ left the series or had conflicting obligations.
Kunis was nominated for an Annie Award for voicing Meg Griffin in the season 5 episode `` Barely Legal `` and MacFarlane has भी जीती an एमी पुरस्कार लिये बकाया voice-over प्रदर्शन और an एनी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन आवाज़ एक्टिंग in an एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न उत्पादन, हालांकि no other cast member has won an award for their work on the series.
