`` The Princess and the Pea '' ( ; literal translation : `` the राजकुमारी on the मटर '' ) is a साहित्यिक परी टेल by hans ईसाई andersen परिचय a यंग स्त्री जिनकी royal पहचान is established by a test of her physical sensitivity.
The tale was first published with three others by Andersen in an inexpensive पुस्तिका on 8 may 1835 in Copenhagen by C.A. Reitzel.
Andersen had heard the story as a child, and it likely has its source in folk material, possibly originating इससे स्वीडन as it is अनजान in the डैनिश मौखिक परंपरा.
Neither `` The Princess and the Pea '' nor Andersen 's other tales of 1835 यहूद खूब प्राप्त by डैनिश आलोचकों, who disliked their casual, chatty style, and their lack of morals.
In 1959 `` The Princess and the Pea '' थी adapted to the musical स्टेज in a उत्पादन called Once Upon a Mattress starring Carol Burnett.
German Americans ( ) are citizens of the संयुक्त राज्य जो यहूद either born in Germany or are of German ancestry.
वे comprise परिचय 50 लाख लोगों, बनाना उन्हें the largest ancestry group ahead of Irish Americans, African Americans and English Americans.
They comprise about 1/3 of the जर्मनी diaspora all over the world.
None of the German राज्य had New World colonies.
Not until the 1670s did the first significant समूह of जर्मनी आप्रवासियों arrive in the अंग्रेजों colonies, settling primarily in New York and Pennsylvania.
Immigration जारी in बहुत विशाल संख्याएँ दौरान the 19th century, with some eight million arrivals from Germany.
They were pulled by the attractions of land and religious freedom, और धकेल आउट of यूरोपीय by shortages of land and religious or political oppression.
Many arrived seeking religious or political freedom, others for economic opportunities greater than those in Europe, and others बस लिये the मौका to प्रारंभ भैस in the New World.
The arrivals before 1850 यहूद ज़्यादातर किसानो जो sought आउट the सबसे उत्पादक land, where their intensive farming techniques would pay off.
After 1840, many came to cities, where `` germania '' —german-speaking districts—soon उभरा.
German Americans established the first kindergartens in the United States, introduced the क्रिसमस पेड़ परंपरा, और originated लोकप्रिय अमरीकी भोजन ऐसे as hot कुत्तो और hamburgers.
German American celebrations are held throughout the country, one of the most well-known being the German-American Steuben परेड in नई यॉर्क नगर, आयोजित प्रत्येक तीसरा शनिवार in सितंबर.
There are also major annual कार्यक्रम in शिकागो, सिनसिनाटी, मिल्वौकी, पिट्सबर्ग, St. Louis and other cities.
Like many other immigrants that came to the संयुक्त राज्य, an overwhelming क्रमांक of लोगों of जर्मनी or आंशिक German descent have essentially become Americanized.
The Preamble to the United States Constitution is a brief परिचयात्मक बयान of the संविधान 's आधारभूत उद्देश्य और guiding principles.
It states in general terms, and courts have referred to it as reliable evidence of, the Founding Fathers ' intentions regarding the संविधान 's अर्थ और कया वे hoped the संविधान होता achieve as it pertains to सब of the people of the United States.
As the phrase, `` we the people '' suggests that the new government originates from the people of the United States and it सेट into गति a सवाल as it pertains to कि विशाल जनसांख्यिकी concerning the individual rights and equality among all people ; this can be seen most broadly in the divide between republicanism and social democracy.
The इतिहास of the अंतरजाल began साथ the development of electronic computers in the 1950s.
The public was first introduced to the concepts that would lead to the Internet when a message was sent over the ARPANet from computer science Professor Leonard Kleinrock 's laboratory at विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, लॉस एंजिल्स ( ucla ), बाद the दूसरी टुकड़ा of संजाल उपकरण थी संस्थापित at स्टैनफोर्ड शोध Institute ( SRI ).
Packet switched networks such as ARPANET, Mark I at NPL in the UK, cyclades, मेरिट संजाल, tymnet, और telenet, यहूद विकसित in the late 1960s and early 1970s using a variety of protocols.
The arpanet in particular led to the विकास of प्रोटोकॉल लिये internetworking, in जिससे multiple separate networks could be joined together into a network of networks.
In 1982, the Internet protocol suite ( tcp/ip ) थी मानकीकृत, और नतीजतन, the concept of a world-wide network of interconnected TCP/IP networks, called the Internet, was introduced.
अभिगम to the arpanet थी विस्तारित in 1981 जब the नेशनल विज्ञान न्यास ( nsf ) विकसित the Computer Science Network ( CSNET ) and again in 1986 when NSFNET provided access to supercomputer sites in the United States from research and education organizations.
वाणिज्यिक Internet service providers ( ISPs ) began to emerge in the late 1980s and early 1990s.
The ARPANET was decommissioned in 1990.
The Internet was commercialized in 1995 when NSFNET was decommissioned, removing the पिछला प्रतिबंध on the उपयोग of the Internet to carry commercial traffic.
Since the mid-1990s, the Internet has had a revolutionary impact on culture and commerce, including the rise of near-instant communication by electronic mail, instant messaging, Voice over Internet प्रोटोकॉल ( voip ) `` फोन काल्स '', two-way इंटरैक्टिव वीडियो काल्स, और the संसार चौड़ी वेब साथ इसके चर्चा forums, ब्लॉग, सोशल networking, and online shopping sites.
The research and education जातियाँ continues to develop और उपयोग उन्नत संजाल ऐसे as nsf 's बहुत ऊँची speed Backbone Network Service ( vBNS ), Internet2, and National LambdaRail.
Increasing amounts of data are transmitted at उच्चतर और उच्चतर speeds over रेशा ऑप्टिक networks operating at 1-Gbit/s, 10-Gbit/s, or more.
The Internet 's takeover over the global communication landscape was almost instant in ऐतिहासिक शर्तें : it तभी communicated 1 % of the सूचना बहती through two-way telecommunications networks in the year 1993, already 51 % by 2000, and more than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007.
Today the Internet continues to grow, driven by ever वृहद amounts of ऑनलाइन सूचना, कॉमर्स, entertainment, and social networking.
Southwest Airlines Co. ( ) is a major U.S. airline and the world 's largest low-cost वाहक, headquartered in डलास, टेक्सास.
It was established in 1967 and adopted its वर्तमान नाम in 1971.
The airline has more than 46,000 कर्मचारी और operates अधिक than 3,400 flights per day.
As of June 5, 2011, it carries the सबसे घरेलू यात्री of any U.S. airline.
As of April 2013, Southwest Airlines has scheduled service to 84 गंतव्यों in 41 states and Puerto Rico.
Southwest Airlines has solely संचालित बोइंग 737s, मगर लिये a few सालो in the 1970s and 1980s, when it operated Boeing 727s.
As of अगस्त 2012, दक्षिणपश्चिम is the largest ऑपरेटर of the 737 worldwide with over 550 in service, each operating an average of six flights per day.
in may 2011, the एयरलाइन acquired airtran एयरवेज़, साथ संयोजन of the carriers expected to be complete by 2014.
On March 1, 2012, the कम्पनी थी जारी a single operating certificate, technically becoming one airline.
Rolling Rock is a 4.6 % abv pale lager शुभारम्भ in 1939 by the Latrobe Brewing Company.
हालांकि संस्थापित as a लोकल बियर in पश्चिमी पेन्सिलवेनिया, it was marketed aggressively and eventually became a national product.
The brand was sold to anheuser-busch of st. लुई, मिसौरी, in mid 2006, which transferred brewing operations to New Jersey.
Benedict XVI (,, ; born Joseph aloisius ratzinger on 16 अप्रैल 1927 ) is पोप emeritus of the Catholic Church.
He served as Pope इससे 2005 to 2013.
In that स्थिति, he थी both the leader of the Catholic Church and Sovereign of the Vatican City State.
Benedict was elected on 19 April 2005 in a papal conclave, celebrated his Papal Inauguration Mass on 24 April 2005, and took कब्ज़ा of उसके गिरजाघर, the archbasilica of st. जॉन lateran, on 7 may 2005.
Ordained as a priest in 1951 in his native Bavaria, Ratzinger established himself as a highly regarded विश्वविद्यालयों theologian by the लेट 1950s और थी नियुक्त a पूरा प्राध्यापक in 1958.
After a long career as an academic, serving as a professor of theology at several German universities—the last being the University of Regensburg, where he served as Vice President of the university in 1976 and 1977—he was appointed Archbishop of Munich and freising और कार्डिनल by पोप पॉल vi in 1977, an असामान्य प्रमोशन लिये किसी साथ little pastoral experience.
In 1981, he settled in Rome when he became Prefect of the Congregation लिये the doctrine of the आस्था, एक of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण dicasteries of the Roman Curia.
From 2002 until his election as pope, he was also डीन of the कॉलेज of कार्डिनल्स, and as such, the primus inter pares among the cardinals.
prior to बनने पोप, he थी `` a प्रमुख फिगर on the वेटिकन स्टेज लिये a क्वार्टर of a सदी '' as `` एक of the सबसे आदरणीय, influential and controversial members of the College of Cardinals '' ; he had an influence `` second to none when it came to setting church priorities and directions '' as one of Pope John Paul II 's closest confidants.
He was originally a liberal theologian, but adopted रूढ़िवादी दृश्य बाद 1968.
His सफल कृतियाँ बचाव परंपरागत Catholic doctrine and values.
During his papacy, बेनेडिक्ट xvi advocated a return to fundamental Christian values to counter the increased secularisation of many Western countries.
He views relativism 's denial of objective सच्चाई, और the denial of moral सच्चाई in particular, as the central problem of the 21st century.
He taught the importance of both the Catholic Church and an समझना of परमेश्वर 's redemptive love.
Pope Benedict also revived a number of traditions including elevating the tridentine Mass to a more prominent position.
He renewed the relationship between the Catholic Church and art, viewing the use of beauty as a पाथ to the पवित्र, प्रचारित the उपयोग of लैटिन, और reintroduced traditional papal garments, for which reason he was called `` the pope of aesthetics ''.
He has been वर्णित as `` the प्रमुख बौद्धिक फ़ोर्स in the Church '' since the mid-1980s.
Several of Pope Benedict 's students from his academic career are also prominent churchmen आज और confidantes of him, notably Christoph Schönborn.
On 11 February 2013, Pope Benedict घोषित उसके इस्तीफा in a वाक in लैटिन पहले the कार्डिनल्स, citing a `` lack of strength of mind and body '' due to his advanced age.
His resignation became प्रभावी on 28 February 2013.
He is the first pope to resign since Pope Gregory XII in 1415, और the पहला to do so on उसके अपना पहल चूंकि पोप celestine v in 1294.
As pope emeritus, बेनेडिक्ट retains the style of His Holiness, and the title of Pope, and will continue to dress in the papal colour of white.
He was succeeded by Pope फ्रांसिस on 13 कूच 2013, और he स्थानांतरित into the newly संवर Mater Ecclesiae monastery for his retirement on 2 May 2013..

Stereoscopy ( also called stereoscopics or 3d इमेजिंग ) is a तकनीक लिये बनाना or बढ़ाना the illusion of depth in an image by means of stereopsis for binocular vision.
The word stereoscopy derives from the Greek `` στερεός '' ( stereos ), `` कड़, ठोस '' + `` σκοπέω '' ( skopeō ), `` to look '', `` to see ''.
Most stereoscopic methods present two offset बिंब separately to the बाएँ और सही eye of the viewer.
These two-dimensional बिंब हैं तब संयुक्त in the brain to give the perception of 3D depth.
This technique is distinguished from 3D प्रदर्शक कि प्रदर्शक an चित्र in तीन पूरा dimensions, allowing the observer to increase information about the 3-dimensional objects being displayed by head and eye movements.
John Adams ( October 30, 1735 ( O.S. October 19, 1735 ) – July 4, 1826 ) was the second president of the United States ( 1797–1801 ), having पहले परोसा as the पहला वाइस अध्यक्ष of the United States.
An अमरीकी founding पिता, he थी a statesman, diplomat, and a leading advocate of American independence from Great Britain.
Well educated, he was an Enlightenment political theorist who promoted republicanism and wrote prolifically परिचय उसके प्रायः seminal विचार, दोनो in प्रकाशित works और in letters to his wife and key adviser Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers.
Adams came to prominence in the जल्दी चरण of the American Revolution.
A lawyer and public फिगर in बोस्टन, as a प्रतिनिधि इससे मैसाचुसेट्स to the महाद्वीपीय Congress, he played a leading role in persuading Congress to declare independence.
He assisted Thomas Jefferson in drafting the Declaration of Independence in 1776, और थी इसके प्राथमिक एडवोकेट in the कॉंग्रेस.
Later, as a diplomat in Europe, he helped negotiate the eventual peace treaty with ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, और थी जिम्मेदार for obtaining vital governmental loans from Amsterdam bankers.
A political theorist and historian, Adams largely wrote the Massachusetts संविधान in 1780, जिससे साथ साथ उसके पहले Thoughts on Government, influenced American political thought.
One of his greatest roles थी as a न्यायधीश of अक्षर : in 1775, he मनोनीत जार्ज वॉशिंगटन to be commander-in-chief, and 25 years later nominated John Marshall to be Chief Justice of the United States.
Adams ' revolutionary श्रेय secured उसे दो शर्तें as जार्ज वॉशिंगटन 's vice president and his own election in 1796 as the second president.
During his one term, he encountered ferocious attacks by the Jeffersonian Republicans, as well as the dominant faction in उसके अपना federalist पार्टी led by उसके कड़वा दुश्मन Alexander Hamilton.
Adams signed the विवादास्पद एलियन और राजद्रोह अधिनियमों, और निर्मित up the फौज और नेवी विशेषकर in the face of an undeclared naval war ( called the `` Quasi-War `` ) with France, 1798–1800.
The major accomplishment of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी थी his peaceful resolution of the conflict in the face of Hamilton 's opposition.
in 1800, एडम्स थी पराजित लिये re-election by Thomas Jefferson and retired to Massachusetts.
He later resumed उसके दोस्ती with Jefferson.
He and his wife, Abigail Adams, founded an accomplished family लकीर of राजनेता, diplomats, and historians now referred to as the Adams political family.
Adams थी the पिता of जॉन क्विंसी Adams, the sixth President of the United States.
His achievements have received greater recognition in modern times, though his योगदान यहूद नहीं initially as मनाये as those of other Founders.
Adams was the पहला u.S. अध्यक्ष to reside in the building that eventually became known as the White House.
The United राज्य ten-dollar विधेयक ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of United States currency.
The first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury ( 1789–95 ), Alexander Hamilton, is currently featured on the obverse of the विधेयक, जबकि the u.S. राजकोष Building is featured on the reverse.
( हैमिल्टन is एक of दो non-presidents featured on currently issued U.S. bills.
The other is बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन, on the $ 100 bill.
Hamilton is एक of तभी चार लोगों प्रदर्शित on u.S. पेपर करेंसी ( 1861 to the present ) who was not born in the continental United States, as he was from the West Indies.
The others are : Albert Gallatin, Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal Tender ) ; George Meade, Spain ( $ 1,000 1890/91 राजकोष नोट ) ; और रॉबर्ट मॉरिस, इंग्लैण्ड ( $ 1,000 1862/63 विधिक टेंडर ; $ 10 1878/80 चांदी Certificate ).
In addition, Kamehameha I, appears on the 2008 हवाई राज्य क्वार्टर. )
All $ 10 बिल्स जारी today are Federal Reserve Notes.
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the average life of a $ 10 bill in परिसंचरण is 18 महीने पहले it is replaced due to पहनें.
Approximately 6 % of सब us banknotes मुद्रित in 2009 were $ 10 bills.
Ten dollar bills हैं वितरित by संघीय आरक्षित Banks in yellow straps.
The source of the face on the $ 10 bill is John trumbull ’s 1805 पोर्ट्रेट of हैमिल्टन कि belongs to the portrait collection of New York City Hall.
The $ 10 bill is the only U.S. paper currency in circulation in which the portrait faces to the बाएँ ( the $ 100,000 विधेयक प्रदर्शित a पोर्ट्रेट of वुडरो विल्सन facing to the बाएँ, लकिन थी used only for intra-government transactions ).
A rider on a Yamaha Waverunner XL performing a high-speed फेरे.
A jetboat is a boat propelled by a jet of water ejected इससे the वापस of the शिल्प.
Unlike a powerboat or motorboat that uses a propeller in the water below or behind the नाव, a jetboat draws the जल इससे अंतर्गत the नाव into a पंप अंदर the नाव, तब expels it through a nozzle at the stern.
Jetboats were originally designed by Sir William Hamilton ( who developed a waterjet in 1954 ) लिये आपरेशन in the fast-flowing और उथले नदियाँ of नई जीलैंड, specifically to overcome the problem of propellers striking rocks in such waters.
Previous attempts at waterjet propulsion had very short lifetimes, generally due to the अकुशल डिज़ाइन of the इकाई and the fact that they offered few advantages over conventional propellers.
Unlike these previous waterjet developments, such as Campini 's और the hanley hydrojet, हैमिल्टन था a विशिष्ट need लिये a नोदन प्रणाली to operate in very-shallow water, and the waterjet proved to be the ideal solution.
From this, the लोकप्रियता of the जेट unit and jetboat increased rapidly.
Through further developments, it थी मिला the waterjet offered अनेक अन्य लाभ over propellers लिये a चौड़ी दायरा of पोत प्रकार, और as ऐसे, waterjets are used widely today for many high-speed vessels, including passenger ferries, rescue craft, patrol boats and offshore supply vessels.
Jetboats are highly maneuverable, and many can, from full speed, be reversed और brought to a रोकें भीतर छोटी अधिक than their own length, in a maneuver known as a `` crash stop ''.
The well known Hamilton turn or `` jet spin '' is a high-speed maneuvre where the boat 's engine throttle is काटें, the परिचालन is turned sharply और the throttle opened again, causing the boat to spin quickly around with a large spray of water.
There is no engineering limit to the size of jetboats, though the validity of their use depends a लॉट on the प्रकार of अनुप्रयोग.
Classic prop-drives are generally more efficient and economical at low speeds, up to about, but as boat speed increases beyond this, the extra hull प्रतिरोध उत्पन्न by struts, rudders, shafts ( इत्यादि. ) अर्थात् waterjets हैं अधिक कुशल in the 20-50 गांठ range ( up to ).
Also, in situations साथ बहुत विशाल propellers turning at slow speeds ( such as tug boats ), the equivalent size waterjet would be too big to be practical.
For these reasons, the विशाल बहुमत of waterjet इकाई हैं संस्थापित in high-speed बरतन और in particular situations where shallow draught, maneuverability, and load flexibility are main concerns.
The biggest jet-driven बरतन हैं मिला in सैन्य use or the high-speed passenger/car ferry industry.
South Africa 's s ( approximately long ) are the biggest jet-propelled बरतन so दूर.
Even these german-built बरतन हैं सक्षम of performing `` crash stops ''.
Uveitis is broadly पारिभाषित as सूजन of the uvea.
The uvea consists of the मध्य, pigmented, vascular structures of the नजर और शामिल the iris, ciliary body, and choroid.
Uveitis requires an urgent referral और thorough परिक्षा by an ophthalmologist or optometrist along with urgent treatment to control the inflammation.

The Shining is a 1980 psychological horror film produced and directed by Stanley Kubrick, co-written साथ उपन्यासकार डायने जॉनसन, और अभिनीत जोकर निकोल्सन, शेली duvall, scatman crothers, and Danny Lloyd.
The film is आधारित on the स्टीफन किंग novel The Shining.
A writer, जोकर torrance, takes a जॉब as an off-season caretaker at an isolated hotel.
His young son possesses मानसिक abilities और is समर्थ to देखिए things from the past and future, such as the ghosts who inhabit the hotel.
Soon after settling in, the family is trapped in the hotel by a snowstorm, and Jack धीरे becomes बहकावे by a अलौकिक उपस्थिति ; he descends into madness and attempts to murder his wife and son.
Unlike previous Kubrick films, which developed an audience gradually by building on word-of-mouth, The Shining was released as a mass-market film, opening at first in बस दो शहरों on मेमोरियल दिन, तब nationwide a month later.
Although आरंभिक जवाब to the फिल्मी थी मिश्रित, बाद नाजुक मूल्यांकन थी अधिक favorable and it is now viewed as a classic of the horror genre.
Film director Martin Scorsese, लिखने in the रोज़ जानवर, क्रमित it as one of the 11 scariest horror movies of all time.
Film critics, film students, and Kubrick 's producer, Jan Harlan, have remarked on the विशाल influence the फिल्मी रै था on लोकप्रिय culture.
The initial European रिलीज of the जगमगाता थी 25 मिनट्स shorter than the अमरीकी संस्करण, हासिल by removing most of the scenes taking place outside the environs of the hotel.

Patio Diet Cola was a brand of diet soda introduced by पेप्सी in 1963.
It was created in response to Diet Rite Cola, which थी the पहला आहार कोला on the मार्केट.
Fitness promoter Debbie Drake was Patio आहार कोला 's प्रवक्ता.
In 1964, Patio released नारंगी, अंगूर, और root beer flavors.
This flavor line was नहीं meant to compete साथ ब्रांड्स जैसे नारंगी Crush, but rather fill out the line.
Patio sodas were available in the cold-bottle मार्केट : किराना और mom-and-pop stores.
Advertising for Patio was comparatively scarce ; at the समय, bottlers यहूद regionally franchised, and related advertising was necessarily local.
In 1964, आँगन आहार cola became Diet Pepsi.
The newly branded diet soda was advertised alongside पेप्सी साथ the टैगलाइन `` पेप्सी either रास्ता '', जिससे replaced the स्लोगन `` Dances with flavor ''.
the छोटी जीवन स्पैन of आँगन आहार कोला makes it a great addition for bottle collectors.
Most of the remaining Patio line of flavors were phased out by the जल्दी 1970s, जबकि a few बच जबतक the मिड 70s
Infrastructure is basic physical and organizational structures needed for the operation of a society or enterprise, or the सेवाएं और सुविधाएं जरुरी लिये an अर्थव्यवस्था to फलन.
It can be generally defined as the set of interconnected structural elements that provide फ्रेमवर्क supporting an संपूर्ण ढांचा of development.
It is an important पद लिये judging a देश or region 's development.
The term typically refers to the technical structures that support a society, such as roads, bridges, water supply, sewers, electrical grids, telecommunications, and so forth, और can be पारिभाषित as `` the शारीरिक components of interrelated प्रणालियों providing commodities और सेवाएं essential to enable, sustain, or enhance societal living conditions. ''
Viewed functionally, infrastructure facilitates the production of goods and services, and also the distribution of finished products to markets, as well as मौलिक सोशल सेवाएं ऐसे as स्कूलों और अस्पताल ; for example, roads enable the transport of raw materials to a factory.
In military parlance, the term refers to the buildings and permanent installations जरुरी लिये the support, redeployment, और आपरेशन of military forces.
To make it simple, infrastructure is anything कि is needed रोज, an everyday item.

mitochondrial डीएनए.
Human genetic variation is the जेनेटिक मतभेद दोनो भीतर और among populations.
There may be multiple variants of any given gene in the human जनसांख्यिकी ( जीनों ), अग्रणी to polymorphism.
Many genes are not polymorphic, meaning that only a single allele is उपस्थित in the जनसांख्यिकी : the जीन is तब कहा to be fixed.
no दो इंसानो हैं genetically identical.
Even monozygotic twins, who develop from एक zygote, have infrequent genetic differences due to mutations occurring during development and gene copy number variation.
मतभेद between individuals, भी closely सम्बन्धित individuals, हैं the कुंजी to तकनीकों such as genetic fingerprinting.
Alleles occur at different frequencies in different human populations, with populations that are more geographically और ancestrally रिमोट tending to differ more.
Causes of differences between individuals शामिल the एक्सचेंज of genes during meiosis and various mutational events.
There are at least two कारण क्यों जेनेटिक विभिन्नता exists between populations.
Natural selection may confer an अनुकूली लाभ to individuals in a specific environment if an allele provides a competitive advantage.
Alleles under selection are likely to occur तभी in those geographic regions where they confer an advantage.
The second main cause of genetic विभिन्नता is due to the ऊँची उपाधि of neutrality of most mutations.
Most mutations do not appear to have any चयनात्मक प्रभाव एक रास्ता or the other on the organism.
The main cause is genetic drift, this is the effect of random परिवर्तन in the जीन pool.
In humans, founder प्रभाव और पास्ट छोटी जनसांख्यिकी आकार ( increasing the likelihood of genetic drift ) may have had an important influence in neutral differences between populations.
The theory that humans recently migrated आउट of अफ़्रीकी supports this.
The study of human genetic variation has both विकासवादी significance और चिकित्सा अनुप्रयोग.
It can सहायता वैज्ञानिकों समझे प्राचीन इंसान population migrations as well as how different human groups are biologically related to one another.
For medicine, study of human genetic variation may be important because some disease-causing alleles occur more प्रायः in लोगों इससे विशिष्ट भौगोलिक regions.
New findings show that each human has on औसत 60 नई mutations compared to उनके parents.
Apart from mutations, many genes that may have aided humans in ancient times plague humans today.
For example, it is suspected that genes that allow humans to more efficiently process food are those that make people susceptible to मोटापा और मधुमेह आज.
Tea Party protesters on the West Lawn of the U.S. Capitol and the नेशनल मॉल at the करदाताओं कूच on वॉशिंगटन on September 12, 2009.
The Tea पार्टी गति is an अमरीकी राजनैतिक गति कि अधिवक्ताओं strict adherence to the United States Constitution, reducing U.S. government spending and taxes, and reduction of the U.S. national debt and federal budget deficit.
The movement has been पुकारा partly रूढ़िवादी, partly libertarian, and partly populist.
The movement has sponsored protests and supported राजनैतिक उम्मीदवार चूंकि 2009.
The name of the गति is निकला इससे the बोस्टन Tea Party of 1773, an iconic event in American history.
Anti-tax protesters in the United States have often referred to the असली बोस्टन चाय Party for inspiration.
References to the Boston Tea Party यहूद भाग of कर दिन विरोध आयोजित throughout the 1990s and earlier.
By 2001, a custom had developed among some रूढ़िवादी कार्यकर्ताओं of mailing चाय बैग to विधायक and other officials as a symbolic act.
The मुद्राएँ of प्यूर्टो रीको closely follow the historic development of Puerto Rico.
As a colony of Spain and the United States, Puerto Rico was granted the use of दोनो विदेशी और प्रांतीय मुद्राएँ.
Following the स्पेनी colonization in 1502, प्यूर्टो Rico became an important port, with its own supply of gold.
However, as the mineral reserves ran खाली भीतर the सदी, the archipelago 's economy suffered.
The Spanish Crown issued the Situado Mexicano, which meant that a semi-regular shipment of gold from the Viceroyalty of New स्पेन होता be भेजा to the द्वीप, as a रास्ता to provide आर्थिक support.
Between 1636 and 1637, Philip IV of Spain imposed a tax जिससे था to be सशुल्क using a revenue stamp.
Inspired by this, Puerto Rico began producing banknotes in 1766, becoming the first colony to print 8- real banknotes in the स्पेनी साम्राज्य और जिससे in the स्पेनी सरकारी 's स्वीकृति of subsequent मुद्दे.
The situado was discontinued during the 19th century, creating an आर्थिक संकट, as a परिणाम of मैक्सिको gaining its independence from Spain.
Salvador Meléndez Bruna, the colonial governor in office, ordered the issue of provincial banknotes, बनाना the प्यूर्टो rican पेसो.
However, मुद्रण of ये banknotes ceased after 1815.
During the following decades, विदेशी सिक्के became the widespread currency.
In the 1860s and 1870s, banknotes reemerged.
On February 1, 1890, the banco español de प्यूर्टो Rico was inaugurated and began issuing banknotes.
The bank designed four series and placed three in circulation अंतर्गत स्पेनी नियम.
In 1895, a Royal Decree ordered the production of प्रांतीय पेसो सिक्के.
On August 13, 1898, the spanish-american युद्ध ended साथ स्पेन ceding Puerto Rico to the United States.
The Banco Español de Puerto Rico was renamed Bank of Porto Rico and issued बिल्स समतुल्य to the संयुक्त राज्य डालर, बनाना the प्यूर्टो rican डालर.
in 1902, the पहला National Bank of Porto Rico issued banknotes in a parallel manner.
दो अधिक श्रेणी were issued until 1913.
After Puerto Rico 's economy and monetary system was fully एकीकृत into the संयुक्त राज्य ' economic and monetary system, the Puerto Rican dollars were redeemed for those issued by the United States Treasury.
the पेसो और डालर have महरूम followed by अन्य समकालीन issues, including commemorative banknotes, private currency, and a quarter coin designed with Fort San Felipe del Morro in the face.
Pepsi ( stylized in lowercase as pepsi, formerly stylized in अपरकेस as पेप्सी ) is a कार्बोनेटेड नरम पेय कि is produced and manufactured by PepsiCo.
निर्मित और विकसित in 1893 और introduced as ब्रैड 's Drink, it was renamed as Pepsi-Cola on August 28, 1898, then to Pepsi in 1961.
The Book of Ezekiel is the third of the Latter Prophets in the Hebrew Bible, following the किताबे of यशायाह और यिर्मयाह और preceding the Book of the Twelve.
( The order is somewhat अलग in the ईसाई Old Testament ).
it गर्भाशयी इसके नाम इससे, और रिकॉर्ड the visions of, the 6th century BC priest and prophet Ezekiel.
According to the किताब, the नबी, exiled in बाबुल, अनुभवी a श्रेणी of सात visions during the 22 years from 593 to 571 BC, a period which spans the final destruction of Jerusalem in 586.
The visions, and the book, are structured around three themes : ( 1 ) judgment on Israel ( chapters 1-24 ) ; ( 2 ) judgment on the राष्ट्र ( अध्याय 25-32 ) ; और भविष्य आशीर्वाद लिये इसराईल ( अध्याय 33-48 ).
New ऑरलियन्स ( or, locally or ; ) is a प्रमुख संयुक्त राज्य बंदरगाहों और the largest city and metropolitan area in the state of Louisiana.
The population of the city was 343,829 as of the 2010 u.S. जनसांख्यिकी.
The New Orleans metropolitan area ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner Metropolitan सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल ) था a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,167,764 in 2010 and was the 46th largest in the United States.
The New orleans–metairie–bogalusa संयुक्त सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल, a larger व्यापार area, had a 2010 population of 1,214,932.
The city is नामित बाद orléans, a नगर स्तिथ on the loire नदी in केन्द्र, France, and is well known for its distinct French Creole architecture, as well as its cross-cultural and multilingual heritage.
New Orleans is also famous for its cuisine, music ( विशेषकर as the जन्मस्थान of जैज़ ), और इसके annual celebrations and festivals, most notably Mardi Gras.
The city is often referred to as the `` सबसे अद्वितीय '' in America.
New Orleans is located in southeastern louisiana, straddling the मिसिसिपी River.
The city और ऑरलियन्स Parish ( ) are.
The city and parish are bounded by the parishes of st. tammany to the उत्तर, st. बर्नार्ड to the ईस्ट, plaquemines to the south and Jefferson to the south and west.
Lake Pontchartrain, part of जिससे is शामिल in the नगर हद, झूठ to the उत्तर और झील borgne lies to the east.
The नेशनल जनम कंट्रोल लीग थी a birth control organization in the United States.
It थी संस्थापित in कूच 1915 by Mary Dennett, Clara Gruening Stillman and Jessie Ashley.
Its main purpose was to overturn the laws जिससे बैन contraceptives from the U.S. mails.
Campaigns were mounted in New यॉर्क, लकिन in 1919 the लीग थी disbanded और reformed into the Voluntary Parenthood League.
Cancer, known medically as a malignant neoplasm, is a broad समूह of विभिन्न रोगों, सब involving unregulated cell growth.
In cancer, cells divide and grow uncontrollably, forming malignant tumors, और invade आसपास भाग of the body.
The कर्कट may भी स्प्रेड to अधिक दूर भाग of the body through the lymphatic system or bloodstream.
नहीं सब tumors are cancerous.
Benign tumors do not grow uncontrollably, do not invade neighboring tissues, और do not spread throughout the body.
There are over 200 different known cancers कि पहुँचकर इंसानो.
Determining what कल्याणकारी कर्कट is complex.
Many things are known to increase the risk of कर्कट, सहित तम्बाकू उपयोग, निश्चित infections, विकिरण, कमी of शारीरिक कार्यकलाप, obesity, and environmental pollutants.
These can directly damage genes or combine with existing जेनेटिक त्रुटियां भीतर कोशिकाएं to cause the disease.
लगभग पाँच to टेन प्रतिशत of cancers are entirely hereditary.
Cancer can be detected in a number of ways, including the presence of निश्चित लक्षण और लक्षण, स्क्रीनिंग tests, or medical imaging.
Once a possible cancer is detected it is diagnosed by microscopic परिक्षा of a tissue sample.
Cancer is usually treated साथ कीमोथेरेपी, विकिरण चिकित्सा and surgery.
The संभावना of surviving the disease vary greatly by the type and location of the cancer and the extent of disease at the start of treatment.
While cancer can affect people of all ages, and a few types of cancer are अधिक आम in children, the रिस्क of विकासशील कर्कट generally increases with age.
In 2007, cancer caused परिचय 13 % of सब इंसान deaths worldwide ( 7.9 million ).
Rates are rising as more people live to an old age and as द्रव्यमान जीवनशैली परिवर्तन occur in the विकासशील world.

Skiing is a recreational activity and प्रतिस्पर्धी खेल in जिससे the भागीदार attaches long धावक or skis to बूट or जूते on the feet and uses them to travel on top of snow.
Aside from recreation and competition, skiing has been used for सैन्य उद्देश्य और भी यात्राएं in क्षेत्रों कि अनुभव भारी snowfall.
अनेक प्रकार of प्रतिस्पर्धी स्कीइंग events are recognized by the International Olympic Committee, and the International Ski Federation.
John Maynard Keynes, 1st Baron Keynes, CB, FBA ( ; 5 June 1883 – 21 April 1946 ) was a British economist whose ideas have fundamentally affected the सिद्धान्त और अभ्यास of आधुनिक macroeconomics, और सूचित the आर्थिक policies of governments.
he निर्मित on और greatly परिष्कृत पहले कार्य on the कल्याणकारी of कारोबार चक्र, और is widely considered to be one of the founders of modern macroeconomics and the most influential economist of the 20th century.
His ideas are the basis for the school of विचार ज्ञात as keynesian अर्थशास्त्र, as खूब as its various offshoots.
In many ways, subsequent developments in 20th century अर्थशास्त्र can be viewed as either भवन on keynes ' विचार or reacting against them.
In the 1930s, Keynes spearheaded a revolution in economic thinking, overturning the पुरानी विचार of neoclassical अर्थशास्त्र कि आयोजित कि फ़्री बाज़ार would, in the short to medium term, automatically provide full employment, as long as workers were flexible in their wage demands.
Keynes instead argued that aggregate demand determined the overall level of economic activity, and that inadequate aggregate माँग could सीसे to prolonged अवधि of ऊँची बेरोजगारी.
He advocated the use of fiscal and monetary measures to mitigate the प्रतिकूल प्रभाव of आर्थिक recessions and depressions.
Following the outbreak of the Second World War, Keynes 's ideas concerning economic policy were अपनाया by अग्रणी पश्चिमी economies.
In 1942, keynes थी awarded a खानदानी peerage as Baron Keynes of Tilton in the County of Sussex.
Keynes died in 1946, लकिन दौरान the 1950s और 1960s the कामयाबी of keynesian economics resulted in almost all capitalist governments adopting its policy recommendations.
Keynes 's influence waned in the 1970s, partly as a result of problems कि began to पहुँचकर the anglo-american economies इससे the प्रारंभ of the दशक, और partly क्युकी of critiques इससे मिल्टन फ्राइडमैन and other economists who were pessimistic about the ability of governments to regulate the business cycle with fiscal policy.
however, the आगमन of the वैश्विक वित्तीय संकट in 2007 caused a resurgence in Keynesian thought.
Keynesian economics provided the theoretical underpinning for economic policies undertaken in response to the संकट by राष्ट्रपतियों जार्ज W. बुश और बराक Obama of the United States, Prime Minister Gordon Brown of the United Kingdom, and other heads of governments.
In 1999, Time magazine included Keynes in their list of the 100 most important and influential people of the 20th सदी, commenting कि : `` उसके कट्टरपंथी विचार कि governments should spend money they do n't have may have saved capitalism. ''
In addition to being an economist, Keynes was also a civil servant, a director of the British Eugenics Society, a निदेशक of the बैंको of इंग्लैण्ड, a संरक्षक of the कला और an आर्ट कलेक्टर, a भाग of the Bloomsbury Group of intellectuals, an advisor to several charitable trusts, a writer, a philosopher, a private investor, and a farmer.
This 1768 parchment ( 612×502 mm ) by Jekuthiel Sofer emulated the 1675 टेन आयतें at the एम्सटर्डम Esnoga synagogue.
The Ten Commandments, also known as the Decalogue, are a set of biblical laws relating to ethics and worship, which खेल a आधारभूत भूमिका in judaism, islam और Christianity.
They include निर्देश to इबादत तभी परमेश्वर, to रखना the sabbath पावन और prohibitions विरूद्ध idolatry, blasphemy, murder, theft, deception and adultery.
Different समूह follow थोड़ा अलग traditions for interpreting and numbering them.
The Ten Commandments appear twice in the यहूदी बाइबल, in the books of Exodus and Deuteronomy.
According to the story in exodus, परमेश्वर inscribed उन्हें on दो स्टोन टैबलेट, which he gave to Moses on Mount Sinai.
Modern scholarship has found likely influences in Hittite and mesopotamian कानून और treaties, but is divided over exactly when the Ten Commandments were written and who wrote them.
The discography of the English वैकल्पिक चट्टान बैंड the smiths consists of चार स्टुडियो एल्बम, एक विस्तारित खेल ( ep ), one live album, ten compilation albums, twenty singles, one video album and fourteen music videos on the Rough Trade, Sire and WEA record labels.
The band was formed in 1982 in Manchester by vocalist Morrissey, guitarist जॉनी marr, बास खिलाड़ी एंडी rourke और वादक माइक joyce.
Despite being championed by BBC Radio 1 disc jockey John छिलके, the बैंड 's डेब्यू सिंगल, `` हाथ in दस्ताने `` ( May 1983 ), failed to chart.
Its follow-up, `` This Charming Man `` ( October 1983 ), मिले साथ नाजुक acclaim और पहुँचे क्रमांक twenty-five on the UK Singles Chart.
The Smiths ' cult status was followed by मुख्यधारा कामयाबी in 1984, as वे पहुँचे क्रमांक बारह in the uk साथ the `` कया अंतर Does It Make ? `` single and reached number two on the UK Albums Chart with their debut album, The Smiths ( 1984 ).
उनके अगला तीन singles सब पहुँचे the शीर्ष बीस of the चार्ट in the UK, helping to consolidate their previous chart success.
The अगला स्टुडियो एल्बम, मांस is हत्या ( 1985 ), पहुँचे the शीर्ष of the अंग्रेजों चार्ट ; however, the only single to be released from the album, `` That Joke Is n't Funny Anymore `` ( 1985 ), failed to break the UK Top 40.
Returning to form, The Smiths ' next six singles all reached the higher than number thirty in the UK and their third एल्बम, the महारानी is मुर्दे ( 1986 ), पहुँचे number two in the UK.
Despite the band 's chart success, Marr left the group in August 1987 due to a strained संबंध with Morrissey.
Failing to find a replacement, The Smiths disbanded by the time their फाइनल स्टुडियो एल्बम, strangeways, यहाँ we आइये, was released in September that year.
Strangeways, Here We Come reached क्रमांक दो in the uk और became the बैंड 's highest-charting release in the United States when it reached number fifty-five on the Billboard 200.
In early 1992, WEA acquired the entire back catalogue of the smiths और उत्पादित दो compilations – बेहतरीन... i और... बेहतरीन ii – the पहला of which reached the top of the UK Albums Chart.
WEA released दो further singles compilations in 1995 and 2001, with a further compilation, The Sound of The Smiths, released in November 2008.
Gone साथ the हवा is a अनोखा लिखा by Margaret Mitchell, first published in 1936.
It is often placed in the literary sub-genre of the ऐतिहासिक रोमांस novel.
However, it has been argued the अनोखा is a `` निकट मिस '' और करता नहीं contain सब of the elements of the romance genre, making it simply a historical novel.
The story is set in Clayton County, Georgia, and Atlanta दौरान the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध और पुनर्निर्माण.
It depicts the experiences of Scarlett O'Hara, the spoiled daughter of a well-to-do plantation मालिक, जो जरूर उपयोग प्रत्येक अर्थात् at उसके निपटान to आइये आउट of the poverty she finds herself in after Sherman 's `` March to the Sea ''.
Margaret Mitchell began writing Gone साथ the हवा in 1926 to pass the समय जबकि recovering इससे an auto-crash injury that refused to heal.
In April 1935, Harold Latham of Macmillan, an editor who was looking for new fiction, पढ़ा कया वो था लिखा और देखी कि it could be a best-seller.
After Latham agreed to publish the किताब, मिशेल worked लिये another छह महीने checking the historical references, and rewrote the opening chapter several times.
मिशेल और उसके husband जॉन दलदल, a copy editor by trade, edited the final version of the novel.
मिशेल लिखा the किताब 's फाइनल पल first, and then wrote the events that led up to it.
as to कया became of उसके प्रेमियों, रहेट और स्कारलेट, after the novel ended, Mitchell did not know, and said, `` For all I know, Rhett may have found someone else who was less difficult. ''
Mitchell received the Pulitzer Prize for Fiction for the किताब in 1937.
the किताब थी adapted into a 1939 American film.
Gone with the हवा is the तभी अनोखा by Mitchell published during her lifetime.
Endodontics ( from the यूनानी endo `` अंदर '' ; और odons `` दाँत '' ) is एक of the दंत specialties पहचाना by the अमरीकी दंत Association, Royal College of Dentists of Canada, and Royal Australasian College of Dental Surgeons, and deals with the tooth pulp and the tissues surrounding the root of a tooth.
Endodontists perform a variety of procedures including endodontic therapy ( commonly ज्ञात as `` रूट कनाल चिकित्सा '' ), endodontic retreatment, सर्जरी, treating cracked teeth, and treating dental trauma.
Root canal therapy is एक of the सबसे common procedures.
If the pulp ( containing nerves, arterioles, venules, lymphatic ऊतक, और तंतुमय ऊतक ) becomes diseased or injured, endodontic treatment is required to save the tooth.
Serial Attached SCSI ( SAS ) is a point-to-point serial protocol that चालें आंकड़ा to और इससे computer storage devices such as hard drives and tape drives.
SAS replaces the older समानांतर scsi ( सुनाया `` scuzzy '' ) bus technology that first appeared in the mid-1980s.
sas, जैसे इसके पूर्ववर्ती, uses the standard SCSI command set.
sas offers पिछड़ा संगतता with second-generation SATA drives.
SATA 3 Gbit/s drives may be कनेक्ट to sas backplanes, लकिन sas ड्राइव can नहीं कनेक्ट to SATA backplanes.
The T10 technical committee of the International Committee for Information Technology Standards ( INCITS ) develops and maintains the sas प्रोटोकॉल ; the SCSI Trade Association ( SCSITA ) promotes the technology.

Status as a natural-born citizen of the United States is one of the eligibility आवश्यकताएँ स्थापित in the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान लिये चुनाव to the दफ्तर of President or Vice President.
This requirement was intended to protect the स्वदेश इससे विदेशी influence.
The Constitution does not define the phrase natural-born नागरिक, और विभिन्न राय have महरूम offered over time regarding its precise meaning.
A 2011 Congressional Research सेवा रपट stated
The natural-born-citizen clause has been mentioned in passing in several decisions of the United States Supreme Court and lower courts dealing with the question of पात्रता लिये नागरिकता by जनम, लकिन the परम् अदालत रै never directly addressed the question of a specific presidential or vice-presidential candidate 's eligibility as a natural-born citizen.
Kurtis Eugene `` Kurt '' Warner ( born June 22, 1971 ) is a पूर्व अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल player.
He played quarterback for three National Football लीग ( एनएफएल ) टीमों : the st. लुई मेढ़ों, the New York Giants, and the Arizona Cardinals.
He was originally signed by the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स as an undrafted free agent in 1994 after playing college football at Northern Iowa.
Warner would go on to be considered the best undrafted player of all समय, following a 12-year करियर regarded as एक of the greatest stories in NFL history.
Warner first attained stardom while playing लिये the st. लुई मेढ़ों इससे 1998 to 2003, जहाँ he जीती two NFL MVP awards in 1999 and 2001 as well as the Super Bowl MVP award in Super Bowl XXXIV.
He led the 2008 Arizona Cardinals to Super Bowl XLIII ( the franchise 's first सुपर कटोरी berth ), और owns the तीन उच्चतम single-game passing yardage totals in Super Bowl history.
Warner फिलहाल holds the seventh-highest करियर passer दरजा of all-time ( 93.7 ), and the third-highest career completion percentage in NFL history with 65.5 %.
in 13 करियर playoff खेल, warner बाँधने first all-time in completion percentage ( 66.5 % ), yards per attempt ( 8.55 ), and second in passer rating ( 102.8 ).
he भी holds the उच्चतम पूर्णता प्रतिशत लिये a single game during the regular season, at 92.3 percent ( 24/26 ), on September 20, 2009, against the Jacksonville Jaguars.
He announced his retirement on जनवरी 29, 2010. < संदर्भ name='cnn 2010-01-29 ' >
Janet Kay Ruthven hagan ( ; born may 26, 1953 ) is the जूनियर United States Senator from North Carolina, in office since January 2009.
Previously वो परोसा in the उत्तर Carolina Senate from 1999 to 2009.
She is a सदस्य of the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी और is viewed as a moderate member of her party.
When Hagan defeated Republican incumbent एलिज़ाबेथ dole in the 2008 संयुक्त राज्य Senate election, she became the first woman to defeat an incumbent woman in a Senate election.
The Heisman Memorial Trophy Award ( usually known colloquially as the heisman ट्रॉफी or the heisman ), is awarded annually to the player deemed the most outstanding player in collegiate football.
it थी निर्मित in 1935 as the शहर एथलेटिक क्लबों ट्रॉफी और renamed in 1936 following the मौत of the क्लबों 's एथलेटिक director, John Heisman ( former Brown University and University of Pennsylvania player ; head football coach at Oberlin College, Auburn University, Clemson University, Rice University, and the University of Pennsylvania ; and football, basketball, and baseball head coach and athletic director at Georgia Tech ).
The award is presented by the Heisman ट्रॉफी विश्वास in जल्दी दिसम्बर पहले the postseason bowl games.
it is the oldest of अनेक overall awards in college football, including the Maxwell Award, Walter Camp Award, and the AP Player of the Year.
The Heisman and the AP Player of the Year are the only awards to honor the most outstanding खिलाड़ी, जबकि the मैक्सवेल पुरस्कार और वाल्टर शिविर पुरस्कार recognize the बेहतरीन player, and the Archie Griffin Award recognizes the most valuable player.
The United Nations Command ( UNC ) is the unified command structure for the बहुराष्ट्रीय सैन्य शक्तियां supporting the Republic of Korea ( South Korea or ROK ) during and after the Korean War.
After troops of the Democratic People 's Republic of Korea ( North Korea or DPRK ) invaded दक्षिण कोरियाई on जून 25, 1950, the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सुरक्षा परिषद अपनाया रेज़ोल्यूशन 82 calling on North Korea to cease hostilities and withdraw to the 38th parallel.
On June 27, 1950, it adopted Resolution 83, recommending that members of the United Nations provide assistance to the Republic of कोरियाई `` to repel the हथियारबंद आक्रमण और to restore अंतरराष्ट्रीय सलाम and security to the area ''.
Security Council Resolution 84, adopted on July 7, 1950, recommended that सदस्यों providing सैन्य शक्तियां और अन्य सहायता to दक्षिण कोरियाई `` मेक ऐसे शक्तियां and other assistance available to a unified command under the United States of America ''.
Although the resolutions सुझाया the शक्तियां अंतर्गत the unc यहूद `` United Nations forces '', and United Nations itself could be considered a belligerent, in practice the United Nations exercised no control over the combat forces, which were controlled by the United States.
Most observers concluded कि the शक्तियां अंतर्गत the unc यहूद नहीं in विधि United Nations troops, and the acts of the UNC were not the acts of the United Nations.
The UNC can be regarded as an गठबंधन of नेशनल सेना, ऑपरेटिंग under the collective right of self-defense.
On August 29, 1950, the British Commonwealth 's 27th Infantry ब्रिगेड arrived at Busan to join the UNC, which until then included only ROK and U.S. forces.
The 27th Brigade moved into the naktong नदी लकीर वेस्ट of Daegu.
Troop units from other countries of the UN followed in rapid succession ; Australia, Belgian United Nations कमांड, कनाडा, कोलंबिया, इथियोपिया, फ़्रांस, यूनानियों, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, New Zealand, the Philippines, Thailand and Turkey.
The संघ of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी provided air units which fought alongside the air forces of other member nations.
Denmark, India, नार्वे, और स्वीडन provided medical units.
Italy provided a hospital, even though it was नहीं a un सदस्य.
The United Nations Command and the chinese-north कोरियाई कमांड हस्ताक्षरित the कोरियाई armistice अनुबंध on 27 जुलाई 1953, ending the heavy fighting.
The armistice agreement established the Military Armistice Commission ( MAC ), consisting of प्रतिनिधि of the दो signatories, to supervise the implementation of the armistice terms.
The North Korean-Chinese MAC has been replaced by Panmumjon प्रतिनिधि अंतर्गत विशेष उत्तर कोरियाई management.
Regular meetings have been stopped, although duty officers of Joint सुरक्षा क्षेत्रफल, commonly ज्ञात as the युद्धविराम गाँव of panmunjom, from each side meet regularly.
Lincoln Heights is an American family drama television series about Eddie Sutton, a Mission Vista police officer जो चालें उसके परिवार वापस to उसके बूढ़ा पड़ोस, lincoln हाइट्स, to प्रारंभ a new life and to help out his old neighborhood.
It is a dangerous place to raise a family, and through the many trials the family goes through, वे जल्द सीख कि settling in is not as easy as it seems.
While Officer Sutton struggles to cope साथ प्रत्येक दिन जीवन as a गली cop in लॉस एंजिल्स, his kids try to fit in at their new schools and with their new neighbors.
The show premiered January 8, 2007 on the ABC Family network with 13 एपीसोड ordered लिये the पहला ऋतु.
It was approved for a दूसरी ऋतु, जिससे premiered सितंबर 4, 2007.
Vanessa Hudgens ' song, Say OK had been used in a वाणिज्यिक to प्रचार the दूसरी ऋतु.
To promote the तीसरा ऋतु, वे दिखाया क्लिप्स of cassie और चार्ल्स 's संबंध to the सोंग, Crush by the American Idol 's seventh season runner-up, David Archuleta.
To promote season 4, वे 're using the सोंग, हिमस्खलन by Marie Digby.
The show 's theme song was लिखा और performed by bassist स्टेनली Clarke and singer-songwriter Blaire Reinhard.
On January 29, 2010, एबीसी परिवार घोषित the रद्दीकरण of the series after four seasons.
A Christian denomination is an identifiable धार्मिक देह अंतर्गत a आम नाम, ढांचा, और doctrine भीतर Christianity.
In the Orthodox tradition, churches are विभाजित प्रायः साथ जातीय और भाषाई लाइनों, into पृथक churches and traditions.
Technically, divisions between one group and another are पारिभाषित by doctrine और गिरिजाघर authority.
Issues such as the nature of Jesus, the प्राधिकार of अपोस्टोलिक उत्तराधिकार, eschatology, and papal primacy separate one denomination from another.
The Roman Catholic Church is the largest denomination with over 1.1 अरब सदस्यों, over हाफ of सब ईसाइयों विश्वव्यापी, बनाना it the largest denomination for any religion worldwide ( although the church does not view itself as a denomination, but as the original pre-denominational church ).
प्रोटोस्टेंट denominations comprise roughly 38–39 % of Christians worldwide, and together the Catholics, Protestants, Anglicans, and other closely related denominations comprise Western Christianity.
The Eastern Orthodox Church, Oriental Orthodox Churches and the assyrian गिरिजाघर of the East are considered Eastern Christian denominations.
Western Christian denominations prevail in पश्चिमी यूरोपीय और its former colonies.
पूर्वी ईसाई denominations हैं represented ज़्यादातर in Eastern Europe, the Middle East and North Africa.
Christians have various doctrines परिचय the गिरिजाघर, the देह of वफादार कि वे मानना was established by Jesus Christ, and how the divine church corresponds to Christian denominations.
Both the Catholics and the Eastern Orthodox consider each of themselves solely to faithfully represent the One Holy Catholic and अपोस्टोलिक गिरिजाघर to the exclusion of the other.
Protestants separated from the Catholic Church because of theologies and practices that they considered to be in उल्लंघन of उनके निर्वचन.
Generally, members of the विभिन्न denominations acknowledge प्रत्येक अन्य as ईसाइयों, at तनिक to the extent कि वे have mutually recognized baptisms and acknowledge historically orthodox views including the Divinity of Jesus and doctrines of sin and salvation, even though doctrinal and ecclesiological obstacles hinder full communion between churches.
Since the reforms surrounding वेटिकन ii, the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर रै referred to प्रोटोस्टेंट communities as `` denominations '', while reserving the term `` church '' for apostolic churches, including the Eastern Orthodox ( see subsistit in and branch theory ).
There हैं however कुछ non-denominational Christians who do not follow any particular branch.
The panda ( ailuropoda melanoleuca, lit.
`` black and white cat-foot '' ), also known as the giant panda to distinguish it from the unrelated रेड पांडा, is a भालू देशी to central-western and south western China.
It is easily recognized by the large, distinctive black patches around its eyes, over the ears, और आरपार इसके गोलाकार देह.
Though it belongs to the order Carnivora, the panda 's diet is 99 % bamboo.
Pandas in the जंगली होगा occasionally eat other grasses, wild tubers, or even meat in the form of birds, rodents or carrion.
In captivity, वे may प्राप्त मधु, eggs, fish, yams, shrub leaves, oranges, or bananas along with specially prepared food.
The giant panda lives in a few mountain ranges in central China, mainly in Sichuan province, but भी in the shaanxi और गांसू provinces.
As a result of farming, वनों और अन्य विकास, the पांडा रै महरूम चलित आउट of the lowland क्षेत्रों where it once lived.
The पांडा is a संरक्षण reliant endangered species.
A 2007 report shows 239 pandas जीना in captivity अंदर चीन और another 27 outside the country.
जंगली जनसांख्यिकी estimates vary ; एक अनुमान shows कि there are about 1,590 individuals living in the wild, while a 2006 study via DNA analysis estimated that this figure could be as high as 2,000 to 3,000.
Some reports also show that the number of pandas in the जंगली is on the वृद्धि.
However, the IUCN does not मानना वहीँ is पर्याप्त certainty yet to reclassify the species from Endangered to Vulnerable.
जबकि the ड्रैगन रै प्रायः परोसा as China 's national emblem, internationally the panda appears at least as commonly.
As such, it is becoming widely used within China in international contexts, for example the पाँच fuwa mascots of the बीजिंग ओलंपिक.
The Kite Runner is a 2007 American drama film निर्देशित by मार्क forster आधारित on the अनोखा of the same name by Khaled Hosseini.
It tells the story of Amir, a well-to-do boy from the Wazir Akbar Khan ज़िला of काबुल, जो is tormented by the guilt of abandoning उसके dost हसन, the son of his father 's Hazara servant.
The story is set against a backdrop of tumultuous events, from the fall of the monarchy in Afghanistan through the Soviet military intervention, the द्रव्यमान exodus of अफगान शरणार्थियों to पाकिस्तानी और the संयुक्त राज्य, और the तालिबान regime.
Though most of the film is set in Afghanistan, ये भाग यहूद ज़्यादातर शॉट in Kashgar, China, due to the dangers of filming in Afghanistan at the time.
The majority of the फिल्मी 's संवाद is in Dari, with the remainder spoken in English.
The child actors are native speakers, but अनेक वयस्क अभिनेताओं था to सीख Dari.
Filming लपेटा up on दिसम्बर 21, 2006, and the film was expected to be released on November 2, 2007.
However, after concern for the सुरक्षा of the यंग अभिनेताओं in the फिल्मी due to fears of हिंसक reprisals to the यौन प्रकृति of कुछ दृश्यों in which they appear, its release date was pushed back six weeks to December 14, 2007.
The Kite Runner was released on dvd on March 25, 2008.
A HD DVD release was announced for the same date, but was canceled following the स्वरूप 's निधन.
the फिल्मी थी मनोनीत लिये the Golden Globe Award for Best Foreign Language Film in 2007.
the फिल्मी 's स्कोर by अल्बर्टो इग्लेसियस थी nominated for Best Original Score at the Golden Globes and the Academy Awards.
the वैधता of cannabis varies from country to country.
Possession of cannabis is illegal in most countries and has been since the शुरूआत of फैली कैनबिस निषेध in the late 1930s.
However, many countries have decriminalized the कब्ज़ा of छोटी quantities of कैनबिस, विशेषकर in उत्तर America, South America and Europe.
Furthermore, possession is legal or effectively legal in the Netherlands, North Korea and would be in the U.S. states of कोलोराडो और वॉशिंगटन if it यहूद नहीं लिये संघीय विधि, जिससे governs persons in all states.
The medicinal use of कैनबिस is विधिक in a क्रमांक of देशों, including Canada, the Czech Republic and Israel.
While federal law in the United States bans all sale and possession of cannabis, enforcement varies widely at the state level and some states have established medicinal marijuana programs in that contradict federal law ; two states ( Colorado and Washington ) have repealed उनके कानून prohibiting the recreational उपयोग of कैनबिस और replaced उन्हें साथ a नियामक शासन, भी contrary to संघीय statute.
Some countries have laws that are not as vigorously prosecuted as others लकिन, अलावा इससे the देशों कि प्रस्ताव अभिगम to चिकित्सा मारिजुआना, most countries have various penalties ranging from lenient to very severe.
Some infractions are taken more seriously in some countries than others in लिहाज़ to the cultivation, उपयोग, कब्ज़ा or ट्रांसफ़र of cannabis for recreational use.
A few jurisdictions have lessened penalties for कब्ज़ा of छोटी quantities of कैनबिस, बनाना it दंडनीय by confiscation and a fine, rather than imprisonment.
Some jurisdictions/ drug courts use mandatory treatment programs for young or frequent users, with freedom from narcotic drugs as the लक्ष्य और a few jurisdictions परमिट कैनबिस उपयोग लिये औषधीय उद्देश्य.
वहीँ हैं भी परिवर्तन in a more restrictive direction as in Canada.
Drug tests to detect कैनबिस हैं increasingly आम in अनेक देशों और have resulted in jail sentences and people losing their jobs.
However, simple possession can carry long jail sentences in कुछ देशों, विशेषकर in भाग of East Asia and Southeast Asia where the sale of cannabis may lead to a sentence of life in prison or even execution.
Loxahatchee is a जातियाँ स्तिथ in Palm Beach County, Florida, United States.
It is located in the areas north of Wellington and west and northwest of royal ताड़ बीच, फ्लोरिडा और लगभग west of West Palm Beach.
Loxahatchee is भी the नाम of the पोस्ट Office that serves this area, which is under the zip code of 33470.
The name loxahatchee अर्थात् `` कछुआ river. ''
Loxahatchee is located within the Indian Trails Improvement District and the loxahatchee groves जल कंट्रोल ज़िला.
Lion Country Safari, a drive-through safari पार्क, is स्तिथ in Loxahatchee.
In 2006, the राज्य of फ्लोरिडा स्वीकृत incorporation of भाग of loxahatchee as the Town of Loxahatchee Groves to become the 38th municipality in Palm Beach County.
The main reason for incorporating was to better protect the क्षेत्रफल इससे बुवाई विकास और to बचाना the rural character of the neighborhood.
Perhaps the most rural area within a बंद निकटता to वेस्ट ताड़ बीच, साथ लॉट sizes range from 1-20 acres.
साथ साथ the acreage, it is notable लिये loose land restrictions and the native and exotic animal presence is quite notable.
Seminole Ridge High School serves the क्षेत्रफल.
The Canadian Citizenship Test is a test, administered by Citizenship and Immigration Canada ( CIC ), that is required for all applicants for Canadian citizenship who are aged between 18 and 54 and who meet the मौलिक आवश्यकताएँ लिये नागरिकता.
The test is उपलब्धियाँ in दोनो फ्रेंच और English, the official languages of Canada.
Renaissance Cruises, originally संस्थापित in 1989 स्वामित्व by fearnley & eger rederi in ओस्लो - नार्वे, बाद खरीदा by Edward Rudner ( founder of Alamo Car Rental ) as the company faltered during the Gulf War.
They operated year-round cruise itineraries to the Mediterranean, the Greek Isles, tahiti और the दक्षिण प्रशांत, उत्तरी यूरोपीय और scandinavia.
The company ceased operations on 25 September 2001 and accommodated up to 220,000 अतिथि in 2000.

The fleet is listed अंतर्गत सूची of क्रूज ships.
It थी headquartered in Fort Lauderdale, Florida.
Epithelium is एक of the चार मौलिक प्रकार of एनिमल ऊतक, साथ with connective tissue, muscle tissue and nervous tissue.
Epithelial tissues line the cavities and surfaces of structures throughout the देह, और भी रूप अनेक ग्रंथियों.
Functions of epithelial cells include secretion, selective अवशोषण, सुरक्षा, transcellular हस्तांतरण और detection of sensation.
In Greek `` ἐπί '' ( `` epi '' ) means `` on '' or `` upon '', और `` θηλή '' ( `` thēlē '' ) means `` nipple ''.
Epithelial layers are avascular, so they must receive nourishment via diffusion of substances इससे the underlying संयोजी ऊतक, through the तहखाने झिल्ली.
Epithelia can also be organized into clusters of cells that फलन as बहिःस्रावी और अंतःस्रावी glands.
Kent E. hovind ( born जनवरी 15, 1953 ) is an अमरीकी young Earth creationist.
Hovind has spoken on creation science and has aimed to मनाना श्रोता to अस्वीकृत theories of एवोल्यूशन, भूभौतिकी, and cosmology in favor of his interpretation of the Genesis creation narrative from the Bible.
Hovind 's views are contradicted by scientific evidence and some of उसके विचार have भी महरूम criticized by यंग Earth creationist organizations such as Answers in Genesis.
Hovind established the Creation Science Evangelism in 1991, and frequently spoke on young Earth creationism at seminars at निजी स्कूलों और चर्च, debates, और on रेडियो और टेलीविज़न broadcasts.
Since January 2007, Hovind has been serving a ten-year थाना वाक्य बाद होने convicted of 58 संघीय रिश्तो, सहित 12 tax offenses, one count of obstructing federal agents, and 45 counts of structuring cash transactions.
He is incarcerated at the संघीय correctional संस्था at Berlin, New Hampshire.

A bindi (, from Sanskrit bindu, meaning `` a drop, small particle, dot '' ), or a pottu/bottu ( in Tamil, Telugu, and Malayalam ) is a forehead decoration worn in South एशिया ( विशेषकर इण्डिया, बांग्लादेश, नेपाल, श्री लंका और मॉरीशस ) और Southeast Asia.
traditionally it is a उज्जवल बिन्दु of रेड रंग लागू in the बीच of the forehead close to the eyebrows, but it can also consist of a sign or piece of jewelry worn at this location.

Incumbent Democratic Governor David Paterson, निर्वाचित as लेफ्टिनेंट राज्यपाल in 2006 as the कार्यशील mate of पूर्व Governor Eliot Spitzer, chose not to run for a full-term.

The main cast of Dragon Ball at the समाप्त of the manga.
The Dragon बॉल manga और दुश्मनी श्रेणी सुविधाएँ an extensive डाल of वर्ण created by Akira Toriyama.
The series takes place in a fictional universe, the same as Toriyama 's previous series Dr. Slump, and follows the adventures of martial कलाकार बेटे goku इससे बाल्यकाल to adulthood as he खोज for the seven spheres known as the Dragon Balls, used to summon a wish-granting dragon.
During the course of the story, he encounters allies such as Bulma, yamcha, kuririn और trunks, विरोधियों ऐसे as tenshinhan, Piccolo and Vegeta, and enemies such as Freeza and Cell.
While many of the characters are humans with superhuman strength and/or supernatural abilities, the डाल भी शामिल anthropomorphic पशु और बाद, extraterrestrial lifeforms.

the comanche हैं a मैदान भारतीय जनजाति जिनकी ऐतिहासिक territory, known as Comancheria, consisted of present day eastern New Mexico, southern Colorado, northeastern Arizona, southern Kansas, all of Oklahoma, and most of northwest Texas.
The comanche लोगों हैं नामांकित in the federally recognized Comanche Nation, in Oklahoma.
historically, the comanches were hunter-gatherers with a horse culture.
There may have महरूम as अनेक as 45,000 Comanches in the late 18th century.
Today, the Comanche Nation Comanche tribal enrollment numbers 15,191 with approximately 7,763 सदस्यों residing in the lawton – फोर्ट sill और surrounding क्षेत्रों of दक्षिणपश्चिम ओक्लाहोमा.
The Comanche Nation Homecoming Powwow is आयोजित annually in walters, ओक्लाहोमा in mid-July.
The Comanche spoke the Comanche language, a Numic language of the Uto-Aztecan family, sometimes classified as a shoshone dialect ; however, तभी परिचय 1 % of comanches बोलो it today.

Times Square Studios ( TSS ) is an American television स्टुडियो स्तिथ in the टाइम्स वर्गाकार पड़ोस of the Manhattan borough of New York City, New York.
The studio is best known as the उत्पादन घर of एबीसी न्यूज ' शुभ morning अमेरिका ( GMA ), a morning news and talk program and segments for GMA on ABC News Now.

coca-cola is a कार्बोनेटेड नरम पेय बेची in स्टोर्स, रेस्तरां, and vending machines in every country except Cuba and North Korea.
It is produced by The Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta, Georgia, and is often referred to बस as कोक ( a पंजीकृत trademark of The Coca-Cola Company in the United States since March 27, 1944 ).
Originally intended as a patent medicine when it was invented in the late 19th century by John Pemberton, Coca-Cola was bought out by businessman Asa Griggs Candler, जिनकी विपणन tactics led कोक to इसके दबदबा of the संसार soft-drink मार्केट throughout the 20th सदी.
The कम्पनी produces concentrate, which is then sold to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the world.
The bottlers, who hold territorially विशेष अनुबंध साथ the कम्पनी, उपज समाप्त उत्पाद in डिब्बे और बोतलों इससे the concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners.
The bottlers तब बेचें, वितरित and merchandise Coca-Cola to retail stores and vending machines.
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola Enterprises, which is the largest सिंगल coca-cola bottler in उत्तर अमेरिका और पश्चिमी यूरोपीय.
The Coca-Cola कम्पनी भी बिकता concentrate लिये सोडा स्रोतों to major restaurants and food service distributors.
The Coca-Cola Company has, on अवसर, introduced अन्य कोला पेय अंतर्गत the Coke brand name.
The सबसे आम of ये is आहार कोक, साथ अन्य सहित caffeine-free Coca-Cola, Diet Coke Caffeine-Free, Coca-Cola Cherry, Coca-Cola Zero, Coca-Cola Vanilla, and special versions with lemon, lime or coffee.
Based on Interbrand 's best global brand 2011, coca-cola थी the संसार 's most valuable brand.
Types of bar-lines
In musical संकेतन, a बार ( or माप ) is a खण्ड of time defined by a given number of beats, each of which are assigned a particular note value.
dividing म्यूज़िक into बार provides regular reference points to pin point locations within a piece of music.
It also makes written music easier to follow, चूंकि प्रत्येक बार of स्टाफ प्रतीकों can be पढ़ा और निभाई as a batch.
Typically, a piece consists of अनेक बार of the वही लंबाई, और in आधुनिक musical संकेतन the क्रमांक of बीट्स in प्रत्येक बार is निर्दिष्ट at the शुरूआत of the score by the top number of a time signature ( such as 3/4 ), while the bottom number indicates the note value of the beat ( the beat has a quarter note value in the 3/4 example ).
The word bar is more common in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी, और the शब्द माप is अधिक आम in अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी, although musicians generally understand both usages.
In American English, although the words bar and measure are often used interchangeably the correct use of the word 'bar ' refers only to the लंबवत लकीर itself, जबकि the शब्द 'measure ' refers to the beats contained between bars.
In अंतरराष्ट्रीय उपयोग, it is बराबर सही to बोलो of बार संख्याएँ and measure numbers, e.g. ‘bars 9–16’ or ‘mm. 9–16’.
Along the वही लाइनों, it is हिकमत to reserve the abbreviated form ‘bb.
3–4’ etc. for beats only ; बार चाहिए be referred to by नाम in पूरा.
The first metrically complete measure भीतर a टुकड़ा of म्यूज़िक is पुकारा ‘bar 1’ or ‘m. 1’.
When the टुकड़ा begins साथ an anacrusis ( an incomplete measure at the head of a piece of music ), ‘bar 1’ or ‘m. 1’ is the following measure.
the 19.9 mw gemasolar solar plant in Spain features 15 hours of storage and can supply power 24 hours a day.
Solar energy, radiant light and ऊष्मा इससे the सूर्य, रै महरूम harnessed by humans since ancient times using a range of ever-evolving technologies.
Solar energy technologies include solar heating, सौर photovoltaics, सौर थर्मल विद्युत, सौर वास्तुकला और कृत्रिम photosynthesis, which can make considerable contributions to solving some of the most urgent energy problems the world now faces.
Solar technologies हैं broadly characterized as either passive सौर or active solar depending on the way they capture, convert and distribute solar energy.
Active solar techniques include the use of photovoltaic panels and solar thermal collectors to harness the उर्जा.
Passive solar techniques शामिल orienting a भवन to the सूर्य, selecting सामग्री साथ अनुकूल थर्मल mass or light dispersing properties, and designing spaces that naturally circulate air.
In 2011, the International Energy एजेंसी कहा कि `` the विकास of सस्ती, inexhaustible and clean solar energy technologies will have huge longer-term benefits.
It will increase countries’ energy security through reliance on an indigenous, inexhaustible और ज़्यादातर import-independent संसाधन, बढ़ाएँ स्थिरता, reduce प्रदूषण, lower the costs of mitigating climate change, and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise.
These लाभ हैं global.
hence the अतिरिक्त लागत of the प्रोत्साहन लिये जल्दी deployment should be considered learning investments ; they must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared ''.
Primary care may be provided in जातियाँ health centres.
Primary care is the health care given by a स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रदाता.
Typically this provider acts as the principal पाइंट of परामर्श लिये मरीजों भीतर a स्वास्थ्य care system and coordinates other specialists that the patient may need.
Such a पेशेवर can be a प्राथमिक परवाह चिकित्सक, ऐसे as a सामान्य practitioner or परिवार चिकित्सक, or depending on the मोहल्ले, स्वास्थ्य प्रणाली संगठन, और रोगी 's discretion, वे may देखिए a pharmacist, a physician assistant, a nurse practitioner, a nurse ( such as in the United Kingdom ), a clinical officer ( such as in parts of Africa ), or an Ayurvedic or other traditional medicine professional ( such as in parts of Asia ).
depending on the प्रकृति of the स्वास्थ्य condition, patients may then be referred for secondary or tertiary care.
`` Ocean Avenue '' is a song अंकित by अमरीकी पॉप पंक समूह yellowcard.
It was released in February 2004 as the second सिंगल इससे समंदर एवेन्यू और the third track.
It is known for bringing them into the मुख्यधारा, as it received numerous spins on MTV and increasing radio airplay.
Ocean Avenue is a street in Jacksonville, Florida, the band 's stomping grounds निकट उनके ऊँची स्कूल, डगलस एंडरसन स्कूल of the Arts, and another street mentioned in the song, Cherry Street.
The name of Ocean Avenue in jacksonville is दरअसल Beach Boulevard.
वे बाएँ उनके असली base behind when they moved to Los Angeles.
