A psychiatrist is a चिकित्सक जो specializes in psychiatry.
A psychiatrist specializes in the उपचार of दिमागी disorders.
psychiatrists हैं प्राधिकृत to prescribe आयुर्विज्ञान, conduct शारीरिक examinations, अनुक्रम और interpret laboratory tests, use psychotherapy and may order brain imaging studies such as computed tomography ( CT/CAT Scan ), magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ), and positron emission tomography ( PET ) scanning.
Within the framework of the World स्वास्थ्य संगठन 's ( जो ) परिभाषा of स्वास्थ्य as a राज्य of पूरा शारीरिक, दिमागी और सोशल well-being, and not merely the absence of disease or infirmity, reproductive health, or sexual health/hygiene, addresses the reproductive processes, functions and system at all stages of life.
Reproductive health, इसलिए, implies कि लोगों हैं समर्थ to have a जिम्मेदार, संतोषजनक और safer sex life and that they have the capability to reproduce and the freedom to decide if, when and how often to do so.
One interpretation of this implies that men and women ought to be informed of and to have access to safe, effective, affordable and acceptable methods of birth control ; also access to उचित स्वास्थ्य परवाह सेवाएं of यौन, reproductive आयुर्विज्ञान और क्रियान्वयन of स्वास्थ्य शिक्षा कार्यक्रम to stress the importance of women to go safely through pregnancy and childbirth could provide couples with the best chance of having a healthy infant.
On the other हाथ individuals do फेस inequalities in reproductive health services.
Inequalities vary based on socioeconomic status, शिक्षा स्तर, आयु, नस्ल, धर्म, और संसाधन उपलब्धियाँ in their environment.
It is possible for example, that low income individuals lack the संसाधन लिये उचित स्वास्थ्य services and the knowledge to know what is appropriate for maintaining reproductive health.
According to the WHO, `` Reproductive and sexual ill-health accounts for 20 % of the वैश्विक बोझ of ill-health लिये women, and 14 % for men. ''
Reproductive health is a part of यौन और reproductive health and rights.
This is a list of episodes for the Disney Channel original series The Suite Life on Deck, which aired for three सीज़न on डिज़्नी चैनल इससे सितंबर 26, 2008 to May 6, 2011.
Core 2 is a brand encompassing a range of Intel 's consumer 64-bit x86-64 single-, दुआl-, और quad-core microprocessors based on the Core microarchitecture.
The single- and dual-core models are single- die, whereas the quad-core models comprise दो मरता, प्रत्येक containing दो cores, packaged in a multi-chip module.
The introduction of Core 2 relegated the Pentium brand to the mid-range मार्केट, और reunified लैपटॉप और डेस्कटॉप cpu लाइनों, which previously had been divided into the Pentium 4, Pentium D, and Pentium M brands.
The Core 2 brand was introduced on 27 July 2006, comprising the Solo ( single-core ), Duo ( dual-core ), Quad ( quad-core ), and in 2007, the चरम ( दुआl- or quad-core cpu लिये enthusiasts ) subbrands.
Intel Core 2 processors with vPro technology ( designed for व्यवसायों ) शामिल the dual-core और quad-core branches.
The Super कटोरी is the सालाना चैंपियनशिप खेल of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ), the highest level of professional American football in the United States, culminating a season that begins in the late summer of the previous calendar year.
The Super Bowl uses Roman numerals to identify प्रत्येक खेल, बल्कि than the साल in which it is held.
For example, Super Bowl I was played on January 15, 1967, following the 1966 नियमित ऋतु, जबकि सुपर कटोरी XLVII was played on February 3, 2013, following the 2012 season.
The game was created as part of a merger agreement between the NFL and its then-rival लीग, the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल League ( AFL ).
It was agreed that the two leagues ' champion teams would play in an afl–nfl संसार चैंपियनशिप खेल जबतक the merger was to officially begin in 1970.
After the merger, each league was redesignated as a `` सम्मेलन ``, और the खेल थी then played between the conference champions.
Currently, the National फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( nfc ) लीड the series with 25 wins to 22 wins for the American Football Conference ( AFC ).
The दिन on जिससे the सुपर कटोरी is निभाई, अभी माना by कुछ a de facto American national holiday, is called `` Super Bowl Sunday ``.
It is the second-largest दिन लिये u.S. खाना खपत, after Thanksgiving Day.
In addition, the Super Bowl रै अक्सर महरूम the सबसे देखी अमरीकी टेलीविज़न broadcast of the year.
Super Bowl XLV, निभाई in 2011, became the most-watched अमरीकी टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम in इतिहास, आरेखण an औसत दर्शक of 111 million viewers and taking over the spot held by the previous year 's Super Bowl, which itself had taken over the # 1 spot held for twenty-eight years by the final episode of M*A*S*H.
The Super Bowl is also among the सबसे देखी sporting कार्यक्रम in the संसार, लगभग सब होने उत्तर अमरीकी audiences, and is second to association football ’s UEFA Champions League final as the most watched annual sporting event worldwide.
Because of its high viewership, commercial airtime during the Super Bowl ब्रॉडकास्ट is the सबसे महंगी of the साल.
Due to the high cost of investing in advertising on the Super Bowl, कंपनियाँ regularly develop उनके सबसे महंगी विज्ञापन for this broadcast.
As a result, watching and discussing the ब्रॉडकास्ट 's commercials रै become a significant पहलू of the event.
In addition, many popular singers and musicians have performed during the event 's pre-game और मध्यांतर ceremonies क्युकी of the exposure.
Fiona is a feminine दिए नाम.
the नाम फिओना थी invented, और first used, by the Scottish poet James Macpherson ( 1736–96 ), author of the Ossian poems, which he claimed were translations from ancient Gaelic sources ( sources, when challenged, he never produced ).
The name was subsequently प्रयुक्त as a pseudonym by विलियम शार्प ( 1855–1905 ), जो authored अनेक romantic works under the name `` Fiona Macleod ''.
The name has since become लोकप्रिय in इंग्लैण्ड, स्कॉटलैंड और आयरलैंड.
The name is considered to be a latinised रूप of the गैलिक शब्द fionn, अर्थ `` श्वेत '', `` fair ''.
the नाम फिओना is भी sometimes प्रयुक्त as an anglicisation of the Irish-language name Fíona, although these names are otherwise unrelated ( as Fíona is derived from an element meaning `` vine '' ).
There is also a modern tendency to equate the authentic स्कॉटिश गैलिक feminine नाम fionnghal साथ फिओना.
The name Fiona is rising in लोकप्रियता विशेषकर in जर्मनी -speaking countries.
Fiona थी the 49th most popular name for baby girls born in 2008 in Germany.
Fiona was tied for third प्लेस in the रैंकिंग of सबसे लोकप्रिय names for baby girls born in the tiny principality of Liechtenstein in 2008.
The name was the 347th most popular name for girls born in the United States in 2008, जहाँ it रै क्रमित among the शीर्ष 1,000 most popular names for girls since 1990 and among the top 500 since 1999.
The name Fiona has been particularly popular for girls of Asian or Pacific Islander descent in New York City, where Fiona ranked as the ninth most लोकप्रिय नाम लिये लड़कियों इससे those समूह in 2007.
Many languages are used, or historically have महरूम प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त States.
The most commonly प्रयुक्त भाषा is English.
There are भी अनेक भाषाएं स्वदेशी to North America or to U.S. states or holdings in the Pacific region.
Languages brought to the country by colonists or immigrants from Europe, Asia, or अन्य भाग of the संसार मेक up a विशाल portion of the भाषाएं फिलहाल प्रयुक्त ; अनेक languages, including creoles and sign languages, have also developed in the United States.
लगभग 337 भाषाएं are spoken or signed by the population, of which 176 are indigenous to the area.
Fifty-two languages formerly spoken in the देश 's territory हैं now extinct.
The variety of अंग्रेज़ी बोला in the संयुक्त States is known as American English.
English is the de facto national language of the United States, with 80 % of the population claiming it as a mother जीभ, और कुछ 95 % claiming to बोलो it `` खूब '' or `` बहुत well ''.
However, no आधिकारिक भाषा exists at the federal level.
There have been several प्रस्ताव to मेक अंग्रेज़ी the नेशनल भाषा in amendments to immigration reform bills, but none of these bills has become law with the amendment intact.
The situation is quite varied at the state and territorial स्तर, साथ कुछ राज्य mirroring the संघीय नीति of adopting no आधिकारिक भाषा in a de jure क्षमता, अन्य adopting English alone, others officially adopting English as well as local languages, and still others adopting a policy of de facto bilingualism.
Spanish is the second सबसे आम भाषा in the देश, and is spoken by over 12 % of the population.
The संयुक्त राज्य holds the संसार 's पांचवां largest spanish-speaking population, outnumbered only by Mexico, Spain, Colombia, and Argentina.
Throughout the Southwestern United States, long-established spanish-speaking समुदायों coexist साथ विशाल संख्याएँ of more recent Hispanophone immigrants.
Although many new Latin American immigrants are less than fluent in अंग्रेज़ी, nearly सब second-generation Hispanic Americans speak English fluently, while only about half still speak Spanish.
According to the 2000 US census, people of German ancestry make up the largest single जातीय समूह in the संयुक्त राज्य, and the German language ranks fifth.
Italian, Polish, and French are still widely spoken among populations descending from immigrants from those देशों in the जल्दी 20th सदी, लकिन the उपयोग of ये भाषाएं is dwindling as the older generations die.
Russian is also बोला by अप्रवासी populations.
Tagalog and Vietnamese have over one million speakers each in the United States, almost entirely भीतर हाल अप्रवासी populations.
Both भाषाएं, साथ साथ the किस्में of the चाइनीज भाषा, जापानी, and Korean, are now used in elections in Alaska, California, Hawaii, Illinois, New York, Texas, and Washington.
Native American languages are spoken in smaller pockets of the देश, लकिन ये populations हैं अवरोहण, और the भाषाएं हैं लगभग never widely used outside of reservations.
Hawaiian, although having few देशी अध्यक्षों, is an आधिकारिक भाषा साथ साथ English at the state level in Hawaii.
The state सरकारी of louisiana offers सेवाएं and documents in French, as does New Mexico in Spanish.
besides अंग्रेज़ी, स्पेनी, फ्रेंच, जर्मनी, navajo और अन्य देशी अमरीकी भाषाएं, सब अन्य भाषाएं हैं प्रायः learned from immigrant ancestors that came after the time of independence or learned through some form of education.
1990 's Pontiac Grand Am Sedan फेंडर और क्वार्टर फलक
On an automobile, a quarter panel ( or rear wing as it is known in British English ) is usually considered the body panel which goes between the पश्च द्वार और the ट्रंक और typically wraps around the व्हील खूब ; however, the समान सामने खण्ड फेंडर ( गाडी ), between the door and the hood, is sometimes incorrectly referred to as a quarter panel.
The quarter panel is typically made of Sheet metal, but is sometimes made of fiberglass or fiber-reinforced प्लास्टिक ; हालांकि, इस varies with different makes and models.
A क्वार्टर फलक is typically a welded on component of the uni-body structure or Monocoque.
Replacement of a sheet metal quarter फलक typically requires it to be काटें बंद the गाडी और a replacement part to be welded ( or sometimes bonded ) to the Vehicle.
due to इस ऊँची राशि of specialized मजदूर, a क्वार्टर panel may often be repaired rather than replaced by hammering out the damage, and a body filler sometimes referred to as bondo to be applied to finalize the original surface.
shropshire ( or ; alternatively salop ; abbreviated, in print only, Shrops ) is a county in the West Midlands region of England.
It borders Wales to the वेस्ट, चेशायर to the उत्तर, staffordshire to the east, Worcestershire to the south-east and Herefordshire to the south.
A unitary authority ( shropshire परिषद ) थी निर्मित on 1 अप्रैल 2009, लेने over इससे the previous county council and 5 district councils, and covers most of the county.
The borough of Telford and Wrekin has been a पृथक एकात्मक प्राधिकार चूंकि 1998 लकिन continues to be शामिल in the ceremonial county.
The county 's population and economy is centred on five towns : the county town of Shrewsbury, which is culturally and historically important and is located in the centre of the county ; Telford, a new town in the east which was constructed around a क्रमांक of पुरानी कस्बों, सबसे notably वेलिंगटन, dawley और madeley, जिससे is आज the सबसे populous ; और oswestry in the north-west, bridgnorth बस to the दक्षिण of telford, और Ludlow in the south.
The काउंटी रै अनेक further मार्केट कस्बों, सहित whitchurch in the north, Newport just to the north-east of Telford, and Market Drayton in the north-east of the county.
The Ironbridge gorge क्षेत्रफल is a युनेस्को संसार विरासत Site, covering Ironbridge, Coalbrookdale and a part of Madeley.
There are, additionally, other notable historic industrial sites located around the county, ऐसे as at shrewsbury, broseley, snailbeach और highley as खूब as the Shropshire Union Canal.
The Shropshire Hills Area of बकाया प्राकृतिक सौंदर्य covers about a quarter of the county, mainly in the south.
Shropshire is one of England 's most rural and sparsely populated counties, with the जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व of the shropshire परिषद क्षेत्रफल होने बस 91/km2 ( 337/sq mi ).
The Wrekin is one of the most famous natural landmarks in the काउंटी, हालांकि the उच्चतम पहाड़ियाँ are the Clee Hills, Stiperstones and the Long Mynd.
wenlock किनारे is another significant geographical and geological landmark.
In the low-lying northwest of the county ( and overlapping the border with Wales ) is the Fenn 's, Whixall and Bettisfield Mosses National प्रकृति आरक्षित, एक of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण और बेहतरीन preserved bogs in Britain.
The River Severn, Great Britain 's longest river, runs through the काउंटी, exiting into वॉस्टरशायर via the Severn Valley.
shropshire is landlocked, और साथ an क्षेत्रफल of, is इंग्लैण्ड 's largest inland county.
The काउंटी पुष्प is the round-leaved sundew.
For eurostat उद्देश्य, the काउंटी ( less the unitary district of Telford and Wrekin ) is a NUTS 3 region ( code UKG22 ).
The two Shropshire unitary areas ( covering all of the ceremonial county ), together with the authorities covering the ceremonial county of staffordshire, comprise the `` shropshire और Staffordshire '' NUTS 2 region.
The Big Bang सिद्धान्त डाल at कॉमिक कॉन 2009, इससे बाएँ : कुणाल नय्यर, साइमन Helberg, Kaley Cuoco, Jim Parsons, and Johnny Galecki
The American sitcom the बिग बंग सिद्धान्त, निर्मित और कार्यपालिका उत्पादित by Chuck Lorre and Bill Prady, premiered on CBS on September 24, 2007.
The show centers on five वर्ण : roommates शेल्डन कूपर और लियोनार्ड hofstadter, दो caltech physicists ; पैनी, a वेट्रेस और aspiring actress who lives across the hall ; and Leonard and Sheldon 's friends and co-workers aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz, and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali.
Over time, several supporting characters have been promoted to starring roles : Leslie Winkle ( season 1 recurring ; season 2 regular ; season 3 guest ), a physicist colleague, and, at different times, a lover of both Leonard and Howard ; Bernadette Rostenkowski-Wolowitz ( season 3 recurring ; season 4-present regular ), a microbiologist, Howard 's fiancée and subsequent wife, and former part-time वेट्रेस alongside पैनी ; neuroscientist एमी farrah fowler ( ऋतु 3 अतिथि ; ऋतु 4 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ), जो joins the समूह बाद होने matched to शेल्डन on a डेटिंग जालस्थल ; और कॉमिक किताब store-owner, स्टुअर्ट खिलते ( सीज़न 2–5 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 6-present regular ), who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space.
The show also features numerous supporting characters, प्रत्येक of जिसको plays a prominent भूमिका in a small group of episodes.
The A-Team is an American action-adventure टेलीविज़न श्रेणी, कार्यशील इससे 1983 to 1987, परिचय a fictional समूह of ex– United States Army Special Forces personnel who work as soldiers of fortune, while on the run from the Army after being branded as war criminals for a `` crime they did n't commit ``.
A विशेषता फिल्मी आधारित on the श्रेणी was released by 20th Century Fox on June 11, 2010.
A comic book series, A-Team : Shotgun Wedding, began कूच 9, 2010.
Diana प्रिंस is a fictional अक्षर appearing regularly in stories published by DC Comics.
She debuted in Sensation Comics # 1 ( January 1942 ) and serves as the civilian and secret पहचान of the सुपरहीरो Wonder Woman.
the अक्षर थी निर्मित by Charles Moulton and Harry G. Peter.
Wat Phra kaew, बैंकॉक, Thailand
There is no official state religion in the थाई संविधान, जिससे guarantees धार्मिक स्वतंत्रता लिये सब Thai citizens, though the king is required by law to be Buddhist.
According to the last census ( 2000 ) 94.6 % of Thais are बौद्धों of the थेरवाद परंपरा.
Muslims are the दूसरी largest धार्मिक group in Thailand at 4.6 %.
Thailand 's southernmost provinces - Pattani, Yala, Narathiwat and part of Songkhla Chumphon have प्रबल मुस्लिम populations, consisting of both ethnic Thai and Malay.
The southern tip of Thailand is ज़्यादातर जातीय malays.
ईसाइयों, मुख्यतः catholics, represent 0.7 % of the population.
A small but influential जातियाँ of सिखों in थाईलैंड और कुछ हिन्दुओं also live in the country 's cities, and are heavily engaged in retail commerce.
There is भी a छोटी यहूदी community in Thailand, dating back to the 17th century.
Since 2001, Muslim activists, generally described by the Thai government as आतंकवादी or separatists, have rallied विरूद्ध the सेंट्रल सरकारी क्युकी of alleged corruption and ethnic bias on the part of officials.
Thailand 's Department of Religion, currently under the Ministry of Culture, is formally जिम्मेदार लिये the पंजीकरण of धार्मिक समूह in थाईलैंड url_http जिससे hold properties through legally established foundations.
It has oversight, साथ साथ the आव्रजन पुलिस, over the कार्य permits of प्रचारकों जो हैं `` प्रवासी religious workers '' of all religions.
A value added tax ( VAT ) is a रूप of खपत tax.
From the परिप्रेक्ष्य of the खरीदार, it is a tax on the purchase price.
From that of the seller, it is a tax only on the value added to a product, सामग्री, or सेवा, इससे an हिसाब पाइंट of दृश्य, by इस stage of its manufacture or distribution.
The manufacturer remits to the government the difference between these two amounts, and retains the बाकी लिये themselves to ऑफसेट the कर वे था previously paid on the inputs.
The value added to a product by or with a कारोबार is the बिक्री दाम चार्ज to इसके ग्राहक, ऋण the cost of materials and other taxable inputs.
A VAT is like a बिक्री कर in कि ultimately तभी the समाप्त उपभोक्ता is taxed.
It differs from the sales tax in that, with the latter, the कर is एकत्रित और remitted to the government only once, at the point of purchase by the end consumer.
With the VAT, collections, remittances to the government, और क्रेडिट लिये कर already सशुल्क occur प्रत्येक समय a कारोबार in the supply chain purchases products.
A referee कॉलिंग a high-sticking penaltyHigh
-sticking is the name of two infractions in the sport of ice hockey that may occur when a player intentionally or inadvertently plays with his or उसके स्टिक ऊपर the ऊँचाई of the कन्धों or ऊपर the क्रॉस बार of a hockey goal.
इस can परिणाम in a stoppage of play or in a penalty.
In the नियम of the नेशनल हॉकी लीग, high-sticking is defined as a penalty in Rule 60 and as a non-penalty foul in Rule 80.
A stoppage in play results if a ऊँची स्टिक आता in सम्पर्क साथ the पक और the टोली who touched it regains control of the puck.
However, play usually continues if a player touches the puck with a high स्टिक और the opposing टोली gains control of the puck.
If the puck goes into the opposing net बाद coming into सम्पर्क साथ a ऊँची स्टिक, the goal is disallowed.
The level at which a stick is माना too ऊँची लिये a लक्ष्य is the crossbar of the net.
However, if a player knocks the पक into उसके अपना जाल साथ a ऊँची stick, the goal is allowed.
A penalty is assessed if a खिलाड़ी हमलों another player with a high stick.
The player is given a minor penalty unless his high stick caused an चोट, in जिससे मामला the रेफरी has the option to assess a double-minor, major or match penalty.
It is the रेफरी 's discretion जिससे दंड to assess : the नियम काल्स लिये a दोगुना minor for an accidental injury, or a match penalty for a deliberate attempt to injure ( whether the opposition player was actually injured ).
Injury is प्रायः decided by the ऊँची स्टिक causing bleeding, but the presence of blood does not automatically mean an extra penalty is awarded.
Some referees have been known to award an extra penalty without the presence of blood if the referee determines that the चोट sustained थी sufficient to वारंट a double-minor penalty.
Typical modern memory card reader, संगत साथ अनेक आम स्वरुप
A memory card reader is a device, typically having a USB interface, for accessing the data on a memory card ऐसे as a compactflash ( cf ), Secure Digital ( SD ) or MultiMediaCard ( MMC ).
Most card पाठक भी प्रस्ताव लिखें काबिलियत, and together with the card, this can function as a pen drive.
Some printers and personal कंप्यूटर have a built-in card reader.
A multi card reader is used for communication साथ अधिक than एक प्रकार of फ्लैश memory card.
Multi card readers do not have built-in memory capacity, but are able to accept अनेक प्रकार और शैलियाँ of मेमोरी ताश.
The number of संगत मेमोरी ताश varies इससे reader to reader and can include more than 20 different types.
The number of अलग मेमोरी ताश कि a मल्टी कार्ड रीडर can accept is expressed as x-in-1, with x being a figure of merit indicating the number of memory cards accepted, such as 35-in-1.
There are three categories of card readers sorted by the type and quantity of the कार्ड स्लॉट : सिंगल कार्ड रीडर ( e.g. 1x sd-only ), मल्टी कार्ड रीडर ( e.g. 9-in-1 ) and series card reader ( e.g. 4x SD only ).
Some kinds of memory cards with their अपना usb कृत्यों do नहीं need the card reader, such as the Intelligent Stick memory card, which can plug directly into a USB slot.
The USB यंत्र क्लास प्रयुक्त is 0x08.
धमकाना is हानिकारक to students ' well-being and development.
Bullying is the use of फ़ोर्स or coercion to abuse or intimidate others.
The behavior can be habitual और involve an असंतुलन of social or physical power.
It can include verbal harassment or threat, physical assault or coercion and may be directed repeatedly towards particular पीड़ितों, शायद on grounds of रेस, धर्म, लिंग, कामुकता, or ability.
If bullying is किया by a समूह, it is पुकारा mobbing.
The victim of धमकाना is sometimes referred to as a `` target ''.
Bullying can be पारिभाषित in अनेक different ways.
The UK currently has no legal definition of धमकाना, जबकि कुछ u.S. राज्य have कानून against it.
Bullying consists of three basic types of abuse – emotional, मौखिक, और physical.
It typically involves हल्का विधि of coercion such as intimidation.
Bullying ranges from simple one-on-one bullying to more complex धमकाना in जिससे the बुली may have एक or अधिक `` lieutenants '' जो may seem to be willing to assist the प्राथमिक bully in his or her bullying activities.
Bullying in school और the कार्यस्थल is also referred to as peer abuse.
Robert W. Fuller रै analyzed धमकाना in the context of rankism.
A धमकाना संस्कृति can develop in कोई context in which human beings interact with each other.
This includes school, church, family, the कार्यस्थल, घर, और पड़ोस.

Laura Bush and Rae leigh bradbury ( formerly लापता ) on अप्रैल 4, 2007, in ऑस्टिन, टेक्सास, बाद the 8-year-old introduced mrs. बुश during announcement of the future opening of the Texas Regional Office of the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children.
Rae Leigh was the first child in the U.S. to be recovered as a result of an AMBER चेतावनी जब वो थी 8 सप्ताह old in November 1998.
An AMBER Alert or a Child Abduction आपात ( वही कोड : cae ) is a चाइल्ड abduction चेतावनी प्रणाली originating in 1996, now employed in 9 countries.
AMBER is officially a backronym for America 's Missing : Broadcasting Emergency Response, named for Amber hagerman, a 9-year-old abducted और murdered in आर्लिंगटन, टेक्सास in 1996.
Alternate regional alert names were once used ; in जॉर्जिया, `` लेवी 's कॉल '' ( नामित बाद लेवी frady ) ; in हवाई, `` maile एम्बर चेतावनी '' ( बाद Maile Gilbert ) ; and Arkansas, `` Morgan Nick Amber Alert '' ( in memory of Morgan Chauntel Nick ).
AMBER Alerts are distributed via commercial radio stations, Internet radio, satellite radio, television stations, and cable TV by the Emergency Alert प्रणाली और noaa मौसम रेडियो ( जहाँ वे हैं termed `` चाइल्ड abduction आपात '' or `` Amber Alerts '' ).
The alerts are also issued via e-mail, electronic traffic-condition signs, the LED billboards which are located outside of newer Walgreens locations, along with the LED/LCD signs of billboard कंपनियाँ ऐसे as साफ Channel Outdoor, CBS Outdoor and Lamar, or through wireless device SMS text messages.
AMBER Alert has also teamed up with Google और फेसबुक to रिले सूचना regarding an AMBER Alert to an ever growing demographic.
Those interested in subscribing to receive AMBER Alerts in their area via SMS संदेश can विज़िट बेतार एम्बर चेतावनियाँ, जिससे हैं offered by विधि as फ़्री संदेश.
In some states, the display scrollboards in सामने of लॉटरी terminals are also used.
The decision to declare an AMBER Alert is made by each police organization ( in many मामले, the राज्य पुलिस or राजमार्ग पैट्रोल ) which investigates each of the abductions.
Public information in an AMBER Alert usually consists of the name and description of the abductee, a description of the suspected abductor, and a वर्णन और अनुज्ञा थाली क्रमांक of the abductor 's गाडी, if available.
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born जुलाई 23, 1973 ) is an अमरीकी स्त्री साथ whom United States President Bill Clinton admitted to having had an `` improper relationship '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996.
The affair and its repercussions ( which included Clinton 's impeachment ) became ज्ञात as the lewinsky कांड.
House of रात्रि is a श्रेणी of पिशाच -थीमd fantasy novels by American author P. C. Cast and her daughter Kristin Cast.
It follows the adventures of zoey redbird, a sixteen-year-old लड़की जो रै बस become a `` fledgling vampyre '' and is required to attend the House of Night boarding school in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
The series has been on the New York Times Best Seller सूची लिये 63 सप्ताह और वहीँ हैं over सात लाख copies in print in North America alone.
The sixth novel, Tempted, which went on sale on October 27, 2009 with a first printing of a लाख नक़ल, डाला the यूएसए आज बेस्टसेलर list that week at # 1.
In जनवरी, 2010, gezeichnet, a जर्मनी अनुवाद of Marked, reached the # 1 spot on the Der Spiegel bestseller list.
the श्रेणी रै so दूर बेची more than ten million books in 39 countries.
burned थी released on अप्रैल 27, 2010, और जैसे Tempted, it entered the USA Today bestseller list that week at # 1.
Awakened, released in जनवरी, 2011, also entered the list at # 1.
The श्रेणी, जिससे is प्रकाशित by St Martin 's Press is planned to include twelve books.
In 2008, plans for a film adaptation यहूद भी घोषित.
The tenth book in the श्रेणी, छुपा, was released on October 16, 2012.
The दूसरी किताब in the novellas ( जिससे दे पृष्ठभूमि on supporting characters ), Lenobia 's Vow, was released January 31, 2012.
Book eleven is currently called Revealed, and the Casts have announced कि दो अधिक novellas, neferet’s अभिशाप, नियोजित to be released फ़रवरी 19, 2013, and a prequel novel about Kalona, are to be released to coincide with the eleventh and twelfth books.
In Greek mythology, the trojan युद्ध थी waged विरूद्ध the नगर of ट्रॉय by the Achaeans ( Greeks ) after Paris of Troy took Helen from her husband Menelaus king of Sparta.
The war is one of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण कार्यक्रम in यूनानी mythology और रै महरूम narrated through many works of Greek literature, most notably through Homer 's Iliad and the Odyssey.
The Iliad relates a part of the last साल of the घेरा of ट्रॉय ; the ओडिसी describes Odysseus 's journey home.
Other parts of the war are contained in a साईकिल of एपिक कविताएं, जिससे have बच through fragments.
Episodes from the war provided material for Greek त्रासदी और अन्य works of यूनानी साहित्य, और लिये रोमन poets including Virgil and Ovid.
The war originated from a quarrel between the goddesses Athena, Hera, and Aphrodite, after Eris, the देवी of संघर्ष और अनबन, दिया उन्हें a सुनहरी ठहराना, sometimes ज्ञात as the ठहराना of अनबन, चिह्नित `` for the fairest ''.
Zeus sent the goddesses to Paris, who judged that Aphrodite, as the `` fairest '', चाहिए प्राप्त the ठहराना.
In exchange, Aphrodite made Helen, the most beautiful of all women and wife of Menelaus, पतन in प्रेम साथ पेरिस, जो took उसके to ट्रॉय.
Agamemnon, king of Mycenae and the brother of Helen 's husband menelaus, led an expedition of achaean सैनिकों to Troy and besieged the city for ten years because of Paris ' insult.
After the deaths of many heroes, including the Achaeans Achilles and Ajax, and the ट्रोजन्स हेक्टर और पेरिस, the नगर गिरी to the ruse of the Trojan Horse.
The Achaeans slaughtered the Trojans ( except for some of the women and children whom they kept or बेची as स्लेव ) और desecrated the मंदिरों, यूँ कमाई the देवताओं ' wrath.
few of the achaeans लौटे सकुशल to उनके घरों और अनेक संस्थापित colonies in दूर shores.
The Romans later traced their origin to aeneas, एक of the ट्रोजन्स, जो थी कहा to have led the surviving Trojans to modern-day Italy.
The ancient Greeks thought that the Trojan War was a historical event कि था लिया प्लेस in the 13th or 12th सदी bc, और believed that Troy was located in modern-day Turkey near the Dardanelles.
By modern times, both the war and the city were widely believed to be non-historical.
In 1868, however, the German archaeologist Heinrich Schliemann met Frank Calvert, who convinced Schliemann that Troy was at Hissarlik and Schliemann took over calvert 's excavations on प्रॉपर्टी belonging to calvert ; इस अर्जी is now accepted by most scholars.
Whether there is any historical reality behind the trojan युद्ध is an open question.
Many scholars believe that there is a ऐतिहासिक कोर to the टेल, हालांकि इस may बस औसत कि the homeric कहानियां हैं a fusion of various tales of sieges and expeditions by Mycenaean Greeks during the Bronze Age.
Those who believe that the stories of the trojan युद्ध हैं निकला इससे a विशिष्ट ऐतिहासिक विरोध प्रायः तिथि it to the 12th or 11th सदियां BC, often preferring the dates given by Eratosthenes, 1194–1184 BC, which roughly corresponds with archaeological evidence of a catastrophic burning of Troy VIIa.
Anarchists have employed निश्चित प्रतीकों लिये उनके कारण, सहित most prominently the circle-A and the black flag, although anarchists have historically largely denied the importance of symbols to political movement.
चूंकि the पुनरुद्धार of अराजकतावाद around the प्रारंभ of the 21st-century concurrent with the rise of the anti-globalization movement, anarchist cultural symbols are widely present.
The greater palatine canal ( or pterygopalatine कनाल ) is a ड्योढ़ी in the कपाल कि transmits the वृहद palatine धमनी, vein, and nerve between the pterygopalatine fossa and the oral cavity.
Surface temperature of अंटार्कटिक in शीत और गर्मियाँ इससे the यूरोपीय Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts
the जलवायु of अंटार्कटिक is the coldest on the whole of Earth.
Antarctica has the lowest naturally occurring तापमान कभी अंकित on the ground on Earth : −89.2 °C ( −128.6 °F ) at Vostok Station.
It is also extremely dry ( technically a मरुस्थल ), averaging 166 mm ( 6.5 in ) of precipitation per year.
Even so, on most parts of the continent the snow rarely melts and is eventually compressed to become the glacial बर्फ कि makes up the बर्फ चादर.
Weather fronts rarely घुस far into the continent.
Most of Antarctica has an ice cap climate ( Köppen EF ) with very cold, generally अत्यधिक शुष्क मौसम throughout the साल और no माह averaging above 0 °C ( 32 °F ).
Some fringe coastal areas have a टुण्ड्रा जलवायु ( köppen ET ) with a short summer averaging above freezing, and much higher precipitation.

The Pittsburgh Steelers franchise has had 16 सिर कोच throughout its history.
Founded as the पिट्सबर्ग pirates in, the नाम थी बदला to the Steelers prior to the season to celebrate the city 's heritage of producing steel.
Joe Bach served two separate terms as head coach and वॉल्ट kiesling परोसा तीन पृथक terms.
During the and seasons, due to the amount of players who fought in संसार युद्ध ii, the स्टीलर्स संयुक्त उनके टोली साथ फिलाडेल्फिया and Chicago, respectively.
During these seasons, Steelers ' coach Walt Kiesling shared coaching duties with Greasy Neale और फिल हैंडलर, जो have नहीं महरूम शामिल within this list.
Struggling for much of the franchise 's early years, the टोली 's पहला ऋतु साथ more wins than losses was coached by Jock Sutherland in.
In, under Sutherland, the Steelers निभाई उनके पहला playoff खेल विरूद्ध the Philadelphia Eagles.
Ten of the 16 सिर कोच खर्च उनके संपूर्ण पेशेवर कोचिंग careers with the franchise, including John McNally, Walt Kiesling and Chuck Noll, who have also been voted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame.
One of only four men to coach the same team for 23 सालो, चक noll retired in.
Noll is also the only coach in National Football लीग इतिहास to जीत चार सुपर प्याले.
Bill cowher, noll 's बदलना, coached the Steelers to their fifth Super Bowl victory, in 2005.
The Steelers sixth Super Bowl win came in Super कटोरी xliii, जबकि सिर coached by माइक tomlin, the टोली 's current head coach.
In criminal law, fraud is जानबूझकर deception बना लिये निजी लाभ or to क्षति another individual ; the related adjective is fraudulent, and verb is defraud.
Fraud is a crime and a civil law violation, हालांकि the विशिष्ट दण्ड विधि परिभाषा varies by विधिक क्षेत्राधिकार.
defrauding people or entities of money or valuables is a common purpose of fraud.
A hoax also involves deception, but without the इरादे of लाभ or of damaging or depriving the victim.
Fraud is a रक्षा in a सिविल कार्रवाई लिये उल्लंघन of अनुबंध or specific performance of a contract.
Fraud is a basis for equitable क्षेत्राधिकार.
Passover, or pesach ( इससे : in यहूदी, यहूदी ), tiberian :, आधुनिक यहूदी : /ˈpesaχ/ pesah, pesakh, यहूदी : peysekh, Paysakh, Paysokh ) is an important Biblically -derived Jewish festival.
Historically, together with Shavuot ( `` Pentecost '' ) और sukkot ( `` झोपड़ियों '' ), passover is एक of the तीन यात्राएं त्यौहार ( shalosh Regalim ) during which the entire population of the kingdom of Judah made a pilgrimage to the Temple in Jerusalem.
Samaritans still make this pilgrimage to माउंट gerizim, लकिन तभी men participate in public worship.
Passover commences on the 15th of the Hebrew month of Nisan and lasts लिये either सात दिनों ( in इसराईल ) or eight days ( in the diaspora ).
In Judaism, a day commences at dusk and lasts until the following dusk, thus the first day of Passover only begins बाद संध्या of the 14th of nisan और ends at संध्या of the 15th दिन of the month of Nisan.
The rituals unique to the Passover celebrations commence साथ the passover seder जब the 15th of Nisan has begun.
In the Northern Hemisphere Passover takes place in spring as the Torah prescribes it : `` in the माह of [ the ] वसन्त '' ( בחדש האביב ).
It is one of the सबसे widely observed Jewish holidays.
The Jewish people celebrate Passover as a commemoration of उनके मुक्ति over 3,300 सालो पहले by परमेश्वर इससे गुलामी in ancient Egypt that was ruled by the Pharaohs, and their birth as a nation under the leadership of Moses.
It commemorates the स्टोरी of the exodus as वर्णित in the यहूदी बाइबल विशेषकर in the Book of Exodus, in which the Israelites were freed from slavery in Egypt.
In the narrative of the Exodus, the Bible tells that God helped the Children of Israel escape from their slavery in Egypt by inflicting टेन plagues upon the प्राचीन उन्होंने पहले the pharaoh होता रिलीज उसके israelite स्लेव ; the दसवाँ और worst of the plagues थी the death of the Egyptian first-born.
The israelites यहूद instructed to चिह्नित the doorposts of उनके घरों साथ the रक्त of a slaughtered spring lamb and, upon seeing this, the spirit of the Lord knew to pass over the first-born in these homes, hence the name of the holiday.
There is some बहस over जहाँ the पद is actually derived from.
When the Pharaoh freed the israelites, it is कहा कि वे बाएँ in ऐसे a hurry that they could not wait for bread dough to rise ( leaven ).
In commemoration, for the अवधि of passover no leavened ब्रैड is खाया, लिये जिससे कारण it is पुकारा `` The Festival of the Unleavened Bread ''.
Thus Matzo ( flat unleavened bread ) is eaten during passover और it is a प्रतीक of the अवकाश.
Halley 's Comet or Comet Halley ( or ), officially designated 1P/Halley, is the best-known of the short-period धूमकेतुओं और is दृश्य इससे धरती प्रत्येक 75–76 years.
Halley is the only short-period comet that is clearly visible to the naked eye from Earth, and thus the only naked-eye धूमकेतु कि might appear twice in a इंसान आजीवन.
अन्य naked-eye धूमकेतुओं may be उज्जवल और more spectacular, but will appear only once in thousands of years.
Halley 's returns to the भीतरी सौर प्रणाली have been observed and recorded by astronomers since at least 240 BCE.
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were made by Chinese, Babylonian, and मध्यकालीन यूरोपीय chroniclers, लकिन यहूद नहीं पहचाना as reappearances of the same object at the time.
The comet 's periodicity was first संकल्पित in 1705 by अंग्रेज़ी astronomer Edmond Halley, after whom it is now named.
Halley 's Comet last appeared in the inner सौर प्रणाली in 1986 और होगा next appear in mid-2061.
During its 1986 apparition, Halley became the first comet to be observed in detail by spacecraft, providing the first observational data on the structure of a comet केंद्रक और the यांत्रिकी of कोमा और टेल गठन.
These observations supported a number of longstanding hypotheses about comet construction, particularly Fred Whipple 's `` dirty snowball '' model, which correctly predicted that Halley would be composed of a mixture of volatile ices – ऐसे as जल, कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड and ammonia – and dust.
The missions also provided data जिससे substantially reformed और reconfigured ये विचार ; लिये उदाहरण it is now understood that Halley 's surface is largely composed of dusty, non-volatile materials, and that only a small portion of it is icy.
anti-communism is विपक्ष to communism.
Organized anti-communism विकसित in प्रतिक्रिया to the वृद्धि of साम्यवादी, विशेषकर after the 1917 October Revolution in Russia and reaching global dimensions during the Cold War.
Most anti-communists अस्वीकृत the अवधारणा of historical materialism, which is a central idea in Marxism.
Anti-communists reject the Marxist belief that पूंजीवाद होगा be followed by समाजवादी और साम्यवादी, बस as सामंतवाद was followed by capitalism.
Anti-communists question the validity of the Marxist claim that the समाजवादी राज्य होगा `` wither दूर '' जब it becomes अनावश्यक in a true communist society.
Anti-communists argue कि the दमन in the जल्दी सालो of bolshevik नियम, जबकि नहीं as चरम as कि दौरान जोसेफ स्टालिन 's नियम, थी स्टिल कठोर by उचित मानकों, citing examples such as Felix Dzerzhinsky 's secret police, which eliminated numerous political opponents by extrajudicial executions, and the brutal crushing of the Kronstadt rebellion and Tambov rebellion.
Some anti-communists refer to दोनो साम्यवादी और फासीवाद as सर्वसत्तावाद, देखकर similarity between the actions of communist and fascist governments.
Historian Robert Conquest has argued that Communism was जिम्मेदार लिये tens of लाखो of deaths during the 20th century.
Opponents argue that Communist parties that have come to power have tended to be rigidly असहिष्णु of राजनैतिक विपक्ष.
These opponents claim कि सबसे कम्युनिस्ट देशों have shown no signs of advancing from Marx 's socialist stage of economy to an ideal communist stage.
बल्कि, कम्युनिस्ट सरकारें have महरूम अभियुक्त of बनाना a नई सत्ताधारी क्लास ( a Nomenklatura ), with powers and privileges greater than those previously enjoyed by the upper classes in the non- communist regimes.
Gil Heron ( 9 April 1922 – 27 नवम्बर 2008 ) was a Jamaican professional footballer.
He थी the पहला ब्लैक खिलाड़ी to खेल लिये स्कॉटिश club Celtic, and was the father of poet and musician Gil Scott-Heron.
He died in Detroit of a heart attack on 27 नवम्बर 2008.
The soybean ( US ) or soya bean ( UK ) ( Glycine max ) is a species of legume देशी to ईस्ट एशिया, widely grown लिये इसके खाद्य सेम जिससे has numerous uses.
The plant is classed as an oilseed rather than a पल्स by the un खाना और agricultural Organization ( FAO ).
Fat-free ( defatted ) soybean meal is a significant and cheap source of protein for animal feeds और अनेक prepackaged meals ; सोया सब्ज़ी आयल is another product of processing the soybean crop.
For example, soybean products such as textured सब्ज़ी protein ( TVP ) are ingredients in many meat and dairy analogues.
Soybeans produce significantly more protein per acre than most अन्य उपयोग of land.
Traditional nonfermented food uses of soybeans शामिल सोया मिल्क, और इससे the latter tofu and tofu skin.
fermented भोजन शामिल सोया सॉस, fermented bean paste, natto, and tempeh, among others.
The आयल is प्रयुक्त in अनेक industrial applications.
The main producers of soy are the United राज्य ( 35 % ), ब्राज़ील ( 27 % ), अर्जेंटीना ( 19 % ), China ( 6 % ) and India ( 4 % ).
The सेम contain significant amounts of phytic acid, alpha-linolenic acid, and isoflavones.
हैरिसन घाट ( born जुलाई 13, 1942 ) is an American film actor and producer.
He is famous for his performances as Han Solo in the original Star Wars trilogy और the title character of the Indiana Jones film series.
घाट is भी ज्ञात लिये उसके भूमिकाएँ as Rick Deckard in Blade Runner, John Book in Witness and Jack Ryan in Patriot Games and Clear and Present Danger.
His career has spanned छह दशकों और शामिल भूमिकाएँ in अनेक हॉलीवुड blockbusters, including Presumed Innocent, The Fugitive, Air Force One, and What Lies Beneath.
At one पाइंट, चार of the शीर्ष छह box-office hits of all time included one of his roles.
Five of his films have महरूम inducted into the National Film Registry.
In 1997, घाट थी क्रमित no. 1 in साम्राज्य `` The Top 100 Movie Stars of All Time '' list.
, the United States घरेलू बक्सा दफ्तर grosses of घाट 's films कुल over US $ 3.5 billion, with worldwide grosses surpassing $ 6 billion, making Ford the third highest grossing U.S. domestic box-office star.
Ford is the husband of अभिनेत्री calista flockhart.
A tube of chapstick
chapstick is a ब्रांड नाम लिये लिप बाम manufactured by Pfizer Consumer Healthcare and used in many countries worldwide.
It is intended to सहायता दावत and prevent chapped lips ; hence the name.
Many varieties also include सनस्क्रीन in अनुक्रम to prevent sunburn.
Due to its popularity, the पद रै become a genericized trademark.
It popularly refers to any lip बाम contained in a lipstick-style ट्यूब और लागू in the same manner as lipstick.
However, the पद is स्टिल a पंजीकृत trademark, with rights exclusively owned by Pfizer.
In Sweden and in the United Kingdom, the product 's main competitor is Lypsyl, made by novartis उपभोक्ता स्वास्थ्य, जिससे is distributed in similar packaging to ChapStick.
George Berkeley ( ; 12 March 168514 January 1753 ), also known as Bishop Berkeley ( Bishop of Cloyne ), was an Anglo-Irish philosopher whose primary achievement was the advancement of a theory he called `` immaterialism '' ( बाद referred to as `` subjective idealism `` by others ).
This theory denies the existence of material substance and instead contends कि परिचित वस्तुएँ जैसे टेबल और कुर्सियां हैं तभी विचार in the minds of perceivers, and as a result can not exist without being perceived.
Thus, as Berkeley famously put it, for physical objects `` esse est percipi '' ( `` to be is to be आभास `` ).
Berkeley is also known for his critique of abstraction, an important आधार in उसके तर्क लिये immaterialism.
In 1709, Berkeley published his first major work,, in जिससे he discussed the सीमाएं of human vision and advanced the theory that the proper objects of sight are not material objects, but light and colour.
This foreshadowed his chief philosophical work A Treatise Concerning the Principles of Human Knowledge in 1710 which, after its poor reception, he rewrote in dialogue form और प्रकाशित अंतर्गत the शीर्षक तीन संवाद between hylas और philonous in 1713.
In this book, Berkeley 's views यहूद represented by philonous ( यूनानी : 'प्रेमr of mind ' ), while Hylas ( Greek : 'matter ' ) embodies the Irish thinker’s opponents, in particular John Locke.
बर्कली argued विरूद्ध सर इसहाक़ न्यूटन 's doctrine of absolute space, time and motion in De Motu ( on Motion ), published 1721.
His वितर्क यहूद a precursor to the views of Mach and Einstein.
In 1732, he published Alciphron, a Christian apologetic against the free-thinkers, and in 1734, he published The Analyst, an empiricist critique of the foundations of infinitesimal calculus, which was influential in the विकास of गणित.
His last major philosophical work, Siris ( 1744 ), begins by वकालत the औषधीय उपयोग of तारकोल जल, और तब continues to discuss a चौड़ी दायरा of topics including science, philosophy, and theology.
Interest in Berkeley 's work increased after World War II, because he tackled many of the issues of paramount interest to philosophy in the 20th सदी ऐसे as the समस्याएं of बोध, the अंतर between प्राथमिक और द्वितीयक qualities, and the importance of language.
Qingdao ( ), historically known as Tsingtao, is a major नगर in पूर्वी शानदोंग प्रांत, पूर्वी चीन, with a population of over 8.715 million ( 2010 census ).
Its built up area, made of 6 शहरी जिले और 4 county-level शहरों, is home to about 4,896,000 inhabitants in 2010.
It सीमायें yantai to the पूर्वोत्तर, Weifang to the west and Rizhao to the southwest.
qīng ( ) in चाइनीज means `` green '' or `` lush '', while dǎo ( ) means `` island ''.
Qingdao is administered at the sub-provincial level.
Lying across the Shandong Peninsula while looking out to the पीला समुद्र, चिंगदाओ is a major seaport, naval base, and industrial centre.
It is also the site of the tsingtao ब्रेवरी.
The world 's longest sea bridge, the Qingdao Haiwan Bridge, कड़ी the प्रमुख शहरी क्षेत्रफल of चिंगदाओ साथ huangdao ज़िला, straddling the Jiaozhou Bay sea areas.
Qingdao is named China 's most livable नगर.
Mimivirus is a viral genus containing a single identified species named Acanthamoeba polyphaga mimivirus ( apmv ), or is a समूह of phylogenetically सम्बन्धित विशाल वाइरस ( designated usually MimiN ).
In colloquial वाक, apmv is अधिक commonly referred to as just `` mimivirus ''.
Until October 2011, when a larger virus megavirus chilensis थी वर्णित, it था the largest capsid व्यास of all known viruses.
Mimivirus has a large and complex genome compared with most other वाइरस.
Mimivirus, short for `` mimicking microbe '', is so called to reflect इसके विशाल आकार और apparent Gram-staining properties.
The Mexican War of Independence ( 1810–1821 ) was an armed conflict between the people of Mexico and the Spanish औपनिवेशिक अधिकारियों जिससे प्रारंभ on सितंबर 16, 1810.
The movement, which became known as the मैक्सिकन युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता, थी led by Mexican-born Spaniards, Mestizos and Amerindians who sought independence from Spain.
It started as an idealistic peasants ' rebellion against their colonial masters, but ended as an असंभावित गठबंधन between मैक्सिकन ex-royalists और मैक्सिकन छापामार insurgents.
Crohn 's बीमारी, भी ज्ञात as crohn सिंड्रोम और क्षेत्रीय enteritis, is a प्रकार of जलन bowel बीमारी कि may affect कोई भाग of the जठरांत्र tract from mouth to anus, causing a wide variety of symptoms.
It primarily causes abdominal pain, diarrhea ( which may be bloody if inflammation is at its worst ), vomiting ( can be continuous ), or weight loss, but may भी कारण जटिलताओं बाहर the जठरांत्र ट्रैक्ट ऐसे as स्किन rashes, गठिया, inflammation of the eye, tiredness, and lack of concentration.
Crohn 's disease is caused by interactions between environmental, immunological and bacterial कारकों in genetically susceptible individuals.
This results in a chronic inflammatory disorder, in जिससे the देह 's प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली हमले the जठरांत्र tract possibly directed at microbial antigens.
Crohn 's disease has wrongly महरूम वर्णित as an असंक्राम्य बीमारी in the पास्ट ; हाल जांचकर्ताओं have described it as an immune deficiency state.
There is a genetic association साथ crohn 's बीमारी, primarily साथ variations of the NOD2 gene and its protein, which senses bacterial cell walls.
Siblings of affected individuals हैं at higher risk.
Males and females are बराबर प्रभावित.
Smokers are two times more likely to develop crohn 's बीमारी than nonsmokers.
Crohn 's disease affects between 400,000 and 600,000 लोगों in North America.
Prevalence estimates for Northern Europe have ranged इससे 27–48 प्रति 100,000.
Crohn 's disease tends to present initially in the teens and twenties, with another peak incidence in the fifties to seventies, हालांकि the बीमारी can occur at कोई age.
There is no ज्ञात फार्मास्युटिकल or सर्जिकल cure for Crohn 's disease.
Treatment options are restricted to controlling लक्षण, maintaining remission, and preventing relapse.
The disease was named after gastroenterologist burrill बर्नार्ड crohn, जो, in 1932, together with two other colleagues at Mount Sinai Hospital in New York, described a series of patients with inflammation of the terminal ileum, the area most commonly affected by the illness.

The list directly includes the tallest इमारतें और structures लिये प्रत्येक देश, और where appropriate, it also points to more detailed country-specific lists.
Rough and Ready is a census-designated प्लेस in Nevada County, California, United States.
It is located west of Grass घाटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, लगभग 62 miles ( 100 km ) from Sacramento.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 963 at the 2010 census.
YouTube is a video-sharing जालस्थल, निर्मित by तीन पूर्व paypal कर्मचारी in February 2005, on which users can upload, view and share videos.
The company is based in San Bruno, California, and uses Adobe Flash Video and html5 प्रौद्योगिकी to प्रदर्शक a चौड़ी किस्में of user-generated वीडियो सामग्री, including movie clips, TV clips, and music videos, as well as amateur content such as video blogging, short original videos, and educational videos.
Most of the content on YouTube has been uploaded by individuals, although media corporations including CBS, the बीबीसी, vevo, hulu, और अन्य संगठन offer some of their material via the site, as part of the YouTube partnership program.
Unregistered users can देखें वीडियो, जबकि पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता can अपलोड an unlimited number of videos.
Videos considered to contain potentially offensive content हैं उपलब्धियाँ तभी to पंजीकृत users at least 18 years old.
In November 2006, YouTube, LLC was bought by Google for US $ 1.65 अरब, और operates as a subsidiary of google.
Sister Act is a musical written by Cheri Steinkellner and Bill steinkellner साथ अतिरिक्त किताब सामग्री by डगलस कार्टर beane, साथ lyrics by Glenn Slater and music by Alan Menken.

The 2009 West End production was produced by Stage entertainment, whoopi Goldberg, and Michael Reno for Sis Acts LLC.
गोल्डबर्ग is भी a producer of the 2011 Broadway adaptation.
Microsoft DirectX is a संग्रहण of अनुप्रयोग प्रोग्रामिंग अंतरफलक ( api ) लिये हैंडलिंग कार्य related to multimedia, especially game programming and video, on Microsoft platforms.
originally, the names of ये api सब began with Direct, such as Direct3D, DirectDraw, DirectMusic, DirectPlay, DirectSound, and so forth.
The name DirectX was coined as shorthand पद लिये सब of ये api ( the x खड़ा in लिये the particular API names ) and soon became the name of the collection.
When Microsoft later set out to develop a gaming console, the X was प्रयुक्त as the आधार of the नाम एक्सबॉक्स to indicate that the console was based on DirectX technology.
The X initial has been carried forward in the naming of APIs designed for the Xbox such as XInput and the Cross-platform Audio Creation Tool ( XACT ), while the DirectX pattern has been continued लिये खिड़कियाँ api ऐसे as direct2d और directwrite.
Direct3D ( the 3D graphics API within DirectX ) is widely used in the विकास of वीडियो खेल लिये microsoft खिड़कियाँ, microsoft एक्सबॉक्स, microsoft Xbox 360 and some Sega Dreamcast games.
Direct3D is also used by other software applications लिये कल्पना और ग्राफिक्स कार्य ऐसे as CAD/CAM engineering.
As Direct3D is the most widely publicized component of DirectX, it is common to देखिए the names `` डाइरेक्टएक्स '' और `` direct3d '' प्रयुक्त interchangeably.
The DirectX software development kit ( SDK ) consists of runtime libraries in redistributable शब्दकोष रूप, साथ साथ accompanying दस्तावेज़ीकरण and headers for use in coding.
originally, the runtimes were only installed by games or explicitly by the user.
Windows 95 did not launch with डाइरेक्टएक्स, लकिन डाइरेक्टएक्स थी शामिल साथ खिड़कियाँ 95 OEM Service Release 2.
खिड़कियाँ 98 और खिड़कियाँ nt 4.0 दोनो shipped साथ DirectX, as has every version of Windows released since.
the sdk is उपलब्धियाँ as a free download.
While the runtimes हैं मालिकाना, closed-source software, source code is provided for most of the SDK samples.
starting साथ the रिलीज of खिड़कियाँ 8 Developer Preview, DirectX SDK has been integrated into Windows SDK.
Direct3D 9Ex, Direct3D 10, and Direct3D 11 are only available for Windows Vista and newer because each of these new versions was built to निर्भर upon the नई खिड़कियाँ प्रदर्शक ड्राइवर मॉडल कि थी introduced लिये खिड़कियाँ विस्टा.
The new Vista/WDDM graphics architecture includes a new video memory manager supporting आभासीकरण of ग्राफिक्स हार्डवेयर लिये विभिन्न अनुप्रयोग and services like the Desktop Window Manager.
Quetzaltenango, also commonly known by its indigenous name, xelajú, or अधिक commonly, xela, is the दूसरी largest city of Guatemala.
It is both the पूंजी of quetzaltenango विभाग और the नगरपालिका seat of Quetzaltenango municipality.
It has an अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी of 224,703.
The population is about 61 % स्वदेशी or amerindian, 34 % मेस्टिज़ो or ladino and 5 % European.
Quetzaltenango is located in a mountain valley at an उन्नयन of 2,330 मीटर ( 7,655 ft ) above sea level at its lowest part.
It may पहुँचें ऊपर 2,400 meters within the city.
The नगरपालिका of quetzaltenango consists of an area of.
Municipalities abutting the नगरपालिका of quetzaltenango शामिल : salcajá, cantel, almolonga, zunil, el Palmar, Concepción Chiquirichapa, San Mateo, La Esperanza, Olintepeque, and San Andrés Xecul.
All these municipalities are part of the Department of Quetzaltenango, मगर सैन आन्द्रेस xecul जिससे is a part of the Department of Totonicapán.
The Epic of Gilgamesh, an epic poem from Mesopotamia, is amongst the earliest surviving works of साहित्य.
The literary history of gilgamesh begins साथ पाँच स्वतंत्र sumerian कविताएं परिचय 'bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian for Gilgamesh ), king of Uruk.
Four of these were used as source material लिये a संयुक्त एपिक in Akkadian.
This first combined epic, known as the `` Old Babylonian '' संस्करण, तिथियाँ to the 18th सदी bc और is titled after its incipit, Shūtur eli sharrī ( `` Surpassing All Other Kings '' ).
Only a few fragments of it have बच.
The later `` Standard Babylonian '' version तिथियाँ इससे the 13th to the 10th सदियां bc और bears the incipit शा naqba īmuru ( `` He who Saw the Deep '' ).
fragments of लगभग दो तिहाई of this longer, twelve-tablet version have been recovered.
कुछ of the बेहतरीन नक़ल यहूद खोजा in the library ruins of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal.
The story centers on a दोस्ती between Gilgamesh and Enkidu.
Enkidu is a wild man created by the gods as Gilgamesh 's बराबर to distract उसे इससे oppressing the people of Uruk.
Together, वे यात्रा to the Cedar Mountain to defeat Humbaba, its monstrous guardian.
Later they kill the Bull of स्वर्ग, जिससे the देवी इश्तार भेजना to सजा Gilgamesh for spurning her advances.
As a punishment for these actions, the gods वाक्य enkidu to death.
The second हाफ of the एपिक focuses on Gilgamesh 's distress at Enkidu 's death, and his quest for immortality.
In order to learn the secret of अनन्त जीवन, gilgamesh undertakes a long और perilous journey.
He learns कि `` the जीवन कि you are seeking you will never find.
When the gods created man they allotted to him death, but life they retained in उनके अपना keeping. ''
This quote was originally attributed to Siduri in the Old Babylonian version of the एपिक, and then attributed to the immortal flood hero Utnapishtim in the Akkadian version of the epic.
Nevertheless, Gilgamesh 's fame lived on after his death, because of his great building projects, और उसके खाता of what Utnapishtim told him happened during the flood.
the स्टोरी रै महरूम अनूदित into अनेक अलग languages, and Gilgamesh has since become adapted in works of popular fiction.
There are numerous debates over who created the first video game, with the जवाब depending largely on कैसा video games are defined.
The evolution of video games represents a tangled web of अनेक अलग उद्योग, सहित scientific, computer, arcade, and consumer electronics.
The `` video '' in `` वीडियो खेल `` traditionally refers to a raster display device.
With the लोकप्रिय कैच phrase उपयोग of the पद `` वीडियो खेल '', the पद अभी implies all display types, formats, and platforms.
इतिहासकारों have भी sought to बायपास the समस्या by बजाय using the more specific `` digital games '' descriptive.
इस पद पत्ते out the earlier analog-based computer games.
This is a सूची of best-selling वीडियो खेल franchises that have sold or shipped at least 5 million copies.
Unless वरना stated, संख्याएँ indicate विश्वव्यापी इकाई बेची, ordered alphabetically whenever two or more list the same amount.
the एक्सेप्शन हैं the ones specifying shipments, which have lower precedence than others listing sales.
Franchise sales include विस्तार पैक भी हालांकि they are not considered full video games.
For best-selling व्यक्तिगत वीडियो games, see List of best-selling video games.
The sales figures given below do not include arcade game sales, which can be found at सूची of highest-grossing आर्केड वीडियो खेल.
– इस रंग indicates a sub-series of a larger video game franchise.
This does नहीं necessarily लागू लिये series that are not video game-based.
Dorothy Ann Willis Richards ( September 1, 1933 – September 13, 2006 ) was an American politician and the 45th Governor of Texas.
She first came to national attention as the state treasurer of Texas, when she delivered the keynote address at the 1988 लोकतांत्रिक National Convention.
Richards served as the 45th राज्यपाल of टेक्सास इससे 1991 to 1995 और थी पराजित for re-election in 1994 by George W. Bush.
Ann Richards थी the दूसरी मादा governor of Texas.
Data Execution Prevention ( DEP ) is a सुरक्षा विशेषता शामिल in आधुनिक ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों.
It is known to be available in लिनक्स, मैक os x, आईओएस, microsoft Windows and Android operating systems and is intended to prevent an application or service from executing code from a non-executable memory region.
This helps prevent निश्चित कारनामे कि स्टोर कोड via a buffer overflow, for example.
DEP runs in two modes : hardware-enforced dep लिये cpu कि can चिह्नित मेमोरी पृष्ठों as nonexecutable, and software-enforced DEP with limited protection for CPUs that do not have hardware support.
Software-enforced DEP does not protect against निष्पादन of कोड in आंकड़ा पृष्ठों, लकिन बजाय counters SEH overwrite, another type of attack.
DEP was introduced on Linux in 2004 ( kernel 2.6.8 ), on Windows in 2004 with Windows XP सेवा पैक 2, जबकि ठहराना introduced dep जब वे स्थानांतरित to x86 in 2006.
Example उदाहरण of दो आम futanari variants
, is the Japanese word for hermaphroditism, जिससे is भी प्रयुक्त in a broader sense for androgyny.
Beyond Japan the term is used to describe a commonly pornographic विधा of कंप्यूटर खेल, कॉमिक्स और एनिमेशन, which includes characters that show both primary sexual characteristics.
But in today 's language it refers almost exclusively for वर्ण जो have an overall feminine appearance.
In that case the term is also often abbreviated as futa ( s ), which is occasionally भी प्रयुक्त as पद लिये the works itself.
Early CAPTCHAs such as these, generated by the ez-gimpy कार्यक्रम, were used on Yahoo !
A modern CAPTCHA, rather than attempting to create a distorted background and high स्तर of warping on the टेक्स्ट, might फ़ोकस on बनाना segmentation difficult by adding an angled line.
Another way to make segmentation मुश्किल is to भीड प्रतीकों साथ, as in Yahoo ! 's current CAPTCHA format.
Some CAPTCHAs try to utilize the ability of people to see three-dimensional वस्तुएँ.
On this image, प्रतीकों हैं drawn साथ लाइनों of different thickness to make an effect of extrusion.
A CAPTCHA ( ) is a type of challenge-response परीक्षण प्रयुक्त in कम्प्यूटिंग as an attempt to ensure कि the response is generated by a human being.
The process प्रायः involves a कंप्यूटर पूछे a उपयोक्ता to complete a simple test which the computer is able to grade.
These tests are designed to be easy for a computer to generate लकिन मुश्किल लिये a computer to solve, but again easy for a human.
If a correct solution is received, it can be presumed to have महरूम डाला by a इंसान.
A common type of CAPTCHA requires the user to type letters and/or अंक इससे a distorted चित्र कि appears on the स्क्रीन.
Such tests are commonly used to prevent unwanted internet bots from accessing websites, since a normal human can easily read a captcha, जबकि the bot can नहीं प्रक्रम the चित्र अक्षर and therefore, can not answer properly, or at all.
Although most CAPTCHAs are letter pictures randomly generated, many of them have become मुश्किल भी लिये a इंसान to पढ़ा, so चित्र captchas यहूद निर्मित in जिससे a इंसान is दिखाया a simple test to show a picture of a certain animal ( given few animal pictures ), which is simple for a human being to process, and therefore easy to pick, while a bot can not process and solve the question because although it can analyze the picture, it can not easily guess the animal.
The term `` CAPTCHA '' was coined in 2000 by Luis von Ahn, Manuel ब्लम, निकोलस J. हॉपर, और जॉन langford ( all of Carnegie Mellon University ).
It is an acronym based on the word `` कैप्चर '' और खड़ा लिये `` completely स्वचालित पब्लिक Turing test to tell Computers and Humans Apart ''.
कार्नेगी mellon विश्वविद्यालयों attempted to ट्रेडमार्क the term on 15 October 2004, but the trademark application was abandoned on 21 April 2008.
A CAPTCHA is sometimes described as a reverse Turing test, because it is administered by a यंत्र और targeted at a इंसान, in कंट्रास्ट to the मानक turing परीक्षण कि is typically administered by a human and targeted at a machine.
Jacques-Yves Cousteau ( ; commonly known in English as Jacques Cousteau ; 11 June 1910 – 25 June 1997 ) was a French naval officer, explorer, conservationist, फिल्मकार, innovator, वैज्ञानिक, फ़ोटोग्राफ़र, लेखक और शोधकर्ता जो पढ़ाई the समुद्र और सब forms of life in water.
He co-developed the Aqua-Lung, pioneered marine conservation and was a member of the académie française.
KFC ( Kentucky Fried Chicken ) is a fast food restaurant chain headquartered in Louisville, केंटकी, United States, which specializes in fried chicken.
An `` American icon '', it is the world 's second largest restaurant chain overall ( as measured by sales ) after मैकडोनाल्ड 's, साथ over 18,000 आउटलेट in 120 देशों और territories.
the कम्पनी is a subsidiary of Yum !
Brands, a restaurant company जिससे भी owns पिज़्ज़ा हट and Taco Bell.
KFC was founded by Harland Sanders, who began selling fried मुर्गा इससे उसके roadside रेस्तरां in कोर्बिन, Kentucky during the Great Depression.
Sanders was one of the first people to see the potential of the रेस्तरां फ़्रेंचाइज़िंग अवधारणा, साथ the पहला `` केंटकी fried Chicken '' franchise opening in Utah in 1952.
The franchise popularized chicken in the fast food industry, thereby diversifying the मार्केट और चुनौतीपूर्ण the dominance of the hamburger.
Marketing खुद as `` कर्नल सैंडर्स '', he became a legendary figure of American cultural history, and his image is still prominently used in KFC branding.
The company 's rapid विस्तार देखी it grow too विशाल लिये सैंडर्स to मैनेज, और in 1964 he sold the company to a group of investors led by John Y. Brown, Jr. and Jack Massey.
KFC was one of the first fast खाना जंजीरों to विस्तार internationally, खोलने आउटलेट in इंग्लैण्ड, Mexico and Puerto Rico by the mid-1960s.
Throughout the 1970s and 1980s, KFC experienced mixed fortunes domestically, as it गई through a श्रेणी of corporate owners who had little or no experience in the restaurant business.
In the early 1970s, KFC was sold to the spirits firm Heublein, जो यहूद लिया over by the r.J. रेनॉल्ड्स खाना और तम्बाकू conglomerate, who sold the chain to PepsiCo.
The chain continued to expand overseas however, and in 1987 केएफसी became the पहला पश्चिमी रेस्तरां कड़ी to खोलें in China.
The chain has since expanded rapidly in चीन, और the देश is अभी the company 's most profitable market.
PepsiCo spun off its रेस्तरां प्रभाग as tricon वैश्विक Restaurants, which later changed its name to Yum !
ब्रांड्स.
KFC primarily sells fried chicken pieces and variations such as chicken sandwiches and wraps, salads and side dishes such as French fries and coleslaw, desserts और नरम पेय, प्रायः supplied by पेप्सिको.
Its most प्रसिद्ध उत्पाद is दबाव fried मुर्गा टुकड़े, seasoned with Sanders ' `` Original Recipe '' of 11 herbs and spices.
The exact nature of these संघटक is अनजान, और represents a notable व्यापार secret.
Larger portions of fried chicken are परोसा in a distinctive गत्ता `` बाल्टी '', जिससे has become a signature of the chain since being introduced by franchisee Pete Harman.
KFC is famous for the स्लोगन `` उंगली lickin ' शुभ '', जिससे रै चूंकि महरूम replaced by `` Nobody does chicken like KFC '' and `` So good ''.
Cnidaria ( with a silent c ) or Coelenterata is a phylum containing over 10,000 प्रजाति of animals found exclusively in aquatic and mostly marine environments.
Their distinguishing feature is cnidocytes, specialized कोशिकाएं कि वे उपयोग मुख्यतः for capturing prey.
Their bodies consist of mesoglea, a non-living jelly-like substance, sandwiched between two layers of epithelium that are ज़्यादातर एक कोशिका मोटा.
They have दो मौलिक देह फ़ॉर्म : तैराकी medusae और स्थानबद्ध polyps, both of which are radially symmetrical with mouths surrounded by tentacles that bear cnidocytes.
दोनो फ़ॉर्म have a सिंगल orifice and body cavity that are used for digestion and respiration.
Many cnidarian species उपज colonies कि हैं सिंगल जीवों रचित of medusa-like or polyp-like zooids, or both.
Cnidarians ' activities are coordinated by a विकेन्द्रित तंत्रिका जाल और सरल receptors.
Several free-swimming Cubozoa और scyphozoa possess balance-sensing statocysts, and some have simple eyes.
Not all cnidarians reproduce sexually.
Many have complex lifecycles with asexual polyp stages and sexual medusae, लकिन कुछ omit either the polyp or the medusa stage.
Cnidarians were for a long time grouped with ctenophores in the phylum coelenterata, लकिन increasing awareness of their differences caused them to be placed in separate phyla.
Cnidarians are classified into four main groups : the almost wholly sessile Anthozoa ( sea anemones, corals, sea pens ) ; swimming Scyphozoa ( jellyfish ) ; Cubozoa ( box jellies ) ; and Hydrozoa, a diverse group that includes all the freshwater cnidarians as well as many marine forms, and रै दोनो स्थानबद्ध सदस्यों ऐसे as hydra और औपनिवेशिक swimmers ऐसे as the पुर्तगाली Man o ' War.
staurozoa have recently महरूम recognised as a क्लास in उनके अपना सही बल्कि than a sub-group of scyphozoa, और वहीँ is debate about whether Myxozoa and Polypodiozoa are cnidarians or closer to bilaterians ( more complex animals ).
Most cnidarians prey on organisms ranging in size from plankton to animals several times larger than themselves, but अनेक obtain much of उनके पोषण इससे endosymbiotic शैवाल, और a few हैं parasites.
Many are preyed upon by अन्य पशु सहित starfish, sea slugs, fish and turtles.
Coral reefs, whose polyps are rich in endosymbiotic algae, support कुछ of the संसार 's सबसे उत्पादक ecosystems, and protect vegetation in tidal zones and on shorelines from strong currents and tides.
While corals are almost entirely प्रतिबंधित to गरम, उथले समुद्री waters, अन्य cnidarians live in the depths, in polar seas and in freshwater.
Fossil cnidarians have been found in रॉक्स formed परिचय, और अन्य जीवाश्मों दिखाएँ कि corals may have महरूम उपस्थित shortly पहले and diversified a few million years later.
Fossils of cnidarians कि do नहीं निर्माण mineralized structures are very rare.
Scientists currently think that cnidarians, ctenophores and bilaterians are more closely related to calcareous sponges than these are to other sponges, and that anthozoans are the evolutionary `` aunts '' or `` sisters '' of अन्य cnidarians, और the सबसे closely सम्बन्धित to bilaterians.
हाल analyses have concluded कि cnidarians, although considered more `` primitive '' than bilaterians, have a wider range of genes.
The Aztec Pyramid at St. Cecilia acatitlan, मैक्सिको राज्य.
Aztec jade mask depicting the god Xipe totec.

Aztec cosmogram in the pre-hispanic codex fejérváry-mayer - the आग परमेश्वर xiuhtecuhtli is in the center.
The Aztec people were certain ethnic groups of central Mexico, particularly those groups who spoke the नावातल भाषा और जो वर्चस्व विशाल भाग of मेसोअमेरिका इससे the 14th to 16th centuries.
The Nahuatl words aztecatl ( singular ) and aztecah ( plural ) mean `` people from Aztlan ``, a mythological place for the Nahuatl-speaking संस्कृति of the समय, और बाद अपनाया as the शब्द to define the Mexica people.
Often the term `` Aztec '' refers exclusively to the Mexica people of Tenochtitlan ( अभी the स्थान of मैक्सिको नगर ), situated on an द्वीप in Lake Texcoco, who referred to themselves as Mexica Tenochca or Cōlhuah Mexica.
Sometimes the term also includes the inhabitants of Tenochtitlan 's two principal allied city-states, the acolhuas of texcoco और the tepanecs of tlacopan, who together with the Mexica formed the Aztec Triple Alliance which controlled what is often known as `` the Aztec Empire ''.
In other contexts, Aztec may refer to all the various city states and their peoples, who shared large parts of their ethnic history and cultural traits with the mexica, acolhua और tepanecs, और जो प्रायः भी प्रयुक्त the नावातल language as a lingua franca.
In this meaning it is possible to talk about an एज़टेक सभ्यता सहित सब the particular सांस्कृतिक पैटर्न common for most of the peoples inhabiting Central Mexico in the late postclassic period.
From the 13th century, the Valley of Mexico was the heart of एज़टेक सभ्यता : यहाँ the पूंजी of the एज़टेक ट्रिपल गठबंधन, the नगर of tenochtitlan, was built upon raised islets in Lake Texcoco.
The ट्रिपल गठबंधन formed a उपनदी empire expanding its political hegemony far beyond the Valley of Mexico, conquering other city states throughout Mesoamerica.
At its शिखर, एज़टेक संस्कृति था समृद्ध और जटिल पौराणिक and religious traditions, as well as reaching remarkable architectural and artistic accomplishments.
In 1521 Hernán Cortés, along with a large number of नावातल बोलना स्वदेशी allies, conquered tenochtitlan और पराजित the Aztec Triple Alliance under the leadership of Hueyi Tlatoani Moctezuma II.
Subsequently the Spanish founded the new settlement of Mexico City on the site of the ruined एज़टेक पूंजी, इससे जहाँ वे proceeded with the process of colonizing Central America.
Aztec culture and history is primarily known through archaeological evidence found in excavations such as that of the renowned Templo Mayor in Mexico City ; from indigenous bark paper codices ; from eyewitness accounts by Spanish conquistadors such as Hernán Cortés and Bernal Díaz del Castillo ; and विशेषकर इससे 16th और 17th सदी descriptions of एज़टेक संस्कृति और इतिहास लिखा by स्पेनी clergymen और साक्षर aztecs in the Spanish or Nahuatl language, such as the famous Florentine Codex compiled by the Franciscan monk Bernardino de Sahagún with the help of indigenous Aztec informants.
Anderson hays कूपर ( born जून 3, 1967 ) is an American journalist, author, and television personality.
He is the प्राथमिक लंगर of the CNN news show Anderson Cooper 360°.
The कार्यक्रम is सामान्यतः ब्रॉडकास्ट सजीव इससे a नई York City studio ; however, Cooper often broadcasts live on location for breaking news stories.
As of September 2011, he also serves as host of his own eponymous syndicated daytime talk show, Anderson Live, which होगा be रद्द at the समाप्त of the दूसरी season.
A plot of a normal distribution ( or bell-shaped curve ) जहाँ प्रत्येक बैंड रै a चौडाई of 1 मानक विचलन – देखिए also : 68-95-99.7 rule
संचयी संभाव्यता of a normal distribution with expected value 0 and standard deviation 1.
In statistics and probability theory, standard deviation ( represented by the symbol sigma, σ ) shows how much variation or dispersion exists इससे the औसत ( औसत ), or अपेक्षित मान.
A low standard deviation indicates that the आंकड़ा अंक tend to be बहुत बंद to the औसत ; ऊँची standard deviation indicates that the data points are spread out over a large range of values.
The मानक विचलन of a यादृच्छिक परिवर्तनीय, सांख्यिकीय population, data set, or probability distribution is the square root of its variance.
It is algebraically simpler though practically कम मजबूत than the औसत absolute deviation.
A useful property of standard deviation is that, unlike variance, it is expressed in the वही इकाई as the data.
Note, however, that for measurements with percentage as ईकाई, the मानक विचलन will have percentage points as unit.
In addition to expressing the variability of a जनसांख्यिकी, मानक विचलन is commonly used to measure confidence in statistical conclusions.
For example, the margin of error in polling आंकड़ा is संकल्पित by calculating the अपेक्षित standard deviation in the results if the same poll were to be conducted multiple times.
The reported हाशिया of गलती is typically about twice the standard deviation ­– the radius of a 95 percent confidence interval.
In science, researchers commonly report the standard deviation of experimental data, and only effects that fall far outside the range of standard deviation are considered statistically significant – normal random error or variation in the माप is in इस रास्ता विशिष्ट इससे causal विभिन्नता.
Standard deviation is भी महत्वपूर्ण in वित्त, जहाँ the standard deviation on the rate of return on an investment is a measure of the volatility of the investment.
When only a sample of data from a population is available, the standard deviation of the जनसांख्यिकी can be अनुमानित by a परिवर्धित मात्रा पुकारा the `` sample standard deviation ''.
When the sample is the entire population, its unmodified मानक विचलन is पुकारा the `` population standard deviation ''.
Ulluco ( u : ju : kɔ : ) ( ullucus tuberosus ) is a संयंत्र grown primarily as a root vegetable, secondarily as a leaf vegetable.
The ulluco is one of the most widely grown and economically महत्वपूर्ण रूट फसलों in the Andean region of South America, second only to the potato.
It is known there with the common name of papa lisa, but also by the क्षेत्रीय names melloco ( इक्वाडोर ), olluco ( पेरू ), chugua ( कोलंबिया ) or ruba ( वेनेजुएला ), among others.
The leaf and the tuber are edible, similar to spinach and the आलू, क्रमशः.
They are known to contain ऊँची स्तर of प्रोटीन, कैल्सियम, and carotene.
Papalisa were प्रयुक्त by the incas prior to आगमन of Europeans in South America.
Ulluco tubers are marketed as `` धरती रत्नों '' in नई जीलैंड, by halfords Exotic Produce.
Ulluco tubers in नई Zealand
An April 24, 1851 poster चेतावनी the `` रंगीन लोगों of बोस्टन '' परिचय पुलिसकर्मियों acting as slave catchers.
The Fugitive Slave Law or Fugitive Slave Act थी passed by the संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस on सितंबर 18, 1850, as part of the Compromise of 1850 between Southern slave-holding interests and Northern Free-Soilers.
This was one of the most controversial acts of the 1850 सुलह और heightened उत्तरी fears of a `` slave power conspiracy ''.
It declared that all runaway slaves were, upon capture, to be लौटे to their masters.
Abolitionists nicknamed it the `` Bloodhound Law '' लिये the कुत्तो कि यहूद प्रयुक्त to track down runaway slaves.
Frank Joseph Pallone, Jr. ( born अक्तूबर 30, 1951 ) is the u.S. प्रतिनिधि for, serving since 1993.
He is a member of the लोकतांत्रिक Party.
He previously represented the 3rd ज़िला from 1988 to 1993.
trin-i-tee 5:7 is a इन्जील duo from New Orleans, Louisiana in the United States.
The group was marketed as a gospel alternative to R & B girl groups such as नियति 's चाइल्ड और tlc.
trin-i-tee 5:7 रै बेची over 2.5 million albums.
In 1998, the समूह released उनके पहला एल्बम हकदार Trin-i-tee 5:7 which debut at # 1 on the Top Gospel charts.
The एल्बम प्रदर्शित the गीतों `` परमेश्वर 's Grace '' and the cover song `` Oh !
Mary do n't तुम Weep ''.
The album later became certified gold.
in 1999, terri भूरा बाएँ the group and was later replaced by singer Adrian Anderson.
During that year, the group recorded and released उनके दूसरी एल्बम, आध्यात्मिक प्रेम.
The album became the समूह 's दूसरी # 1 album on the Top Gospel charts.
The album contained the singles `` Put Your Hands '' और `` my देह ''.
In 2002, the group released their third album The Kiss which debuted at # 2 on the शीर्ष इन्जील चार्ट.
In 2007, the group left GospoCentric रिकॉर्ड और हस्ताक्षरित a रिकार्ड deal with Spirit Rising Music.
