T57 charted # 2 on the शीर्ष इन्जील एल्बम, # 5 on the शीर्ष Christian charts, and # 12 on the Top R & B charts.
The United States federal earned income tax credit or earned income क्रेडिट ( eitc or eic ) is a refundable कर क्रेडिट लिये low- और medium-income individuals और युगल, primarily for those who have qualifying children.
When the क्रेडिट exceeds the राशि of कर owed, it परिणाम in a tax refund to those who claim the credit.
This credit is provided to ऑफसेट the बोझ of सोशल सुरक्षा कर and also to promote an incentive to work.
In order for a person or couple to claim one or more persons as their qualifying child ( ren ), the आयु, संबंध, और साझा रेसिडेंसी आवश्यकताएँ जरूर be मिले, as well as some other requirements.
U.S. tax forms 1040ez, 1040a, or 1040 can be used to claim EIC without qualifying children.
To claim the credit with qualifying children, 1040a or 1040 जरूर be प्रयुक्त, as खूब as attaching Schedule EIC.
EIC phases in slowly, has a medium-length plateau, and तब phases आउट अधिक धीरे than it phased in.
Since the credit phases out at 21 % ( for two children and for three or more qualilfying children ) or 16 % ( for one qualifying चाइल्ड ), it is सदा अस्तबलों to have एक अधिक डालर of वास्तविक सैलरी or मजदूरी ( हालांकि technically, चूंकि the eic तालिका चालें by पचास dollar increments, it 's always preferable to have an extra fifty-dollar increment of salary or wages ).
For कर साल 2011, the अधिकतम eic लिये a सिंगल person or couple filing without qualifying children was $ 464.
The maximum EIC with one qualifying चाइल्ड थी $ 3,094, साथ दो children थी $ 5,112, and with three or more qualifying children was $ 5,751.
These amounts हैं indexed annually for inflation.
The earned income tax credit has been part of political debates in the United States regarding whether raising the minimum wage or increasing eic होगा बेहतर पता a seeming shortage of good-paying jobs.
The following is a list of halftime shows held at the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग 's चैंपियनशिप खेल, the Super Bowl.
While halftime shows are a tradition during football games at all levels of competition, the Super Bowl halftime show represents a fundamental कड़ी to पॉप संस्कृति, which helps broaden the television audience and nationwide interest.
In most years since the mid-1980s, the halftime show of the Super Bowl has featured popular रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकारों और अन्य well-known celebrities.
It has measurably increased television viewers दौरान और बाद the halftime show.
The performance is regarded one of the most-watched events in American television annually साथ over 100 लाख दर्शक in the संयुक्त राज्य alone.
Musical genres over the सालो have represented a broad range of music types, including pop, rock, classic rock, country, hip hop, rap, blues, and soul.
In some सालो, छोटी skits or drama scenes are acted out on a stage.
the प्रदर्शन समूह up साथ लोगों रै performed at the most Super Bowl halftime shows, starring in four during the 1970s and 1980s.
According to Nielsen ratings, Super Bowl XLVI halftime show headlined by Madonna in 2012 remains the most-watched मध्यांतर दिखाएँ in इतिहास, साथ 114 लाख दर्शक or परिचय 3 लाख अधिक than the वास्तविक game.
Beyonce 's 2013 मध्यांतर दिखाएँ प्रदर्शन was the second most viewed show in history.
It is listed on the Guinness World Records as the largest tv दर्शक लिये a सुपर कटोरी half-time प्रदर्शन.
International Men 's Day ( IMD ) is an annual अंतरराष्ट्रीय इवेंट मनाये on 19th नवम्बर.
Inaugurated in 1999 in त्रिनिदाद और टोबैगो, the दिन और इसके कार्यक्रम ढूँढें support from a variety of individuals and groups in Australia, the Caribbean, North America, Asia, Europe and Africa.
Speaking on behalf of UNESCO, Director of Women and Culture of Peace Ingeborg Breines said of IMD, `` This is an excellent idea and would give some लिंग संतुलन. ''
She added that UNESCO was looking आगे to cooperating साथ the organizers.
The objectives of celebrating an अंतरराष्ट्रीय मेन 's दिन शामिल focusing on मेन 's और boys ' health, improving gender relations, promoting gender equality, and highlighting positive male role models.
It is an occasion to highlight पक्षपात विरूद्ध मेन और लड़कों और to celebrate उनके उपलब्धियाँ और योगदान, in particular for their contributions to community, family, marriage, and child care.
The broader and ultimate aim of the इवेंट is to प्रचार मौलिक humanitarian values.
International Men 's Day is celebrated in over 60 countries, including Trinidad and Tobago, Jamaica, Australia, India, China, United States, Romania, Singapore, Malta, United Kingdom, South Africa, Tanzania, ज़िम्बाब्वे, बोत्सवाना, australia, बुरुंडी, हंगेरियाई, आयरलैंड, आइल of man, घाना, कनाडा, डेनमार्क, नार्वे, ऑस्ट्रिया, बोस्निया और Herzegovina, Ukraine, France, Italy, Pakistan, Cuba, Antigua and Barbuda, St. Kitts and Nevis, St. Lucia, Grenada and Cayman Islands, on 19 November, and global support for the celebration is broad.
घाटी गाँव ParkValley
Village is a district in the San Fernando Valley region of लॉस एंजिल्स, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
The median age of its population, at 36, is `` बूढ़ा लिये the नगर of लॉस एंजिल्स. '' और इसके औसत household आकार of दो लोगों is low, compared to other parts of the city.
Developmental psychology is the scientific study of changes that occur in इंसान beings over the कोर्स of their life span.
Originally concerned with infants and children, the field has विस्तारित to शामिल किशोरावस्था, वयस्क विकास, aging, and the entire life span.
This field examines change across a broad range of topics सहित मोटर कौशल और अन्य psycho-physiological प्रक्रियाओं ; cognitive development involving areas such as problem solving, moral understanding, and conceptual understanding ; language acquisition ; social, personality, and emotional development ; and self-concept and identity formation.
Developmental psychology includes issues such as the extent to which development occurs through the क्रमिक accumulation of ज्ञान बनाम stage-like development, or the extent to which children are born with innate mental structures versus learning through experience.
Many researchers are interested in the interaction between personal characteristics, the individual 's बर्ताव, और पर्यावरणीय कारकों सहित सोशल कॉन्टेक्स्ट, और उनके प्रभाव on विकास ; अन्य take a more narrowly-focused approach.
Developmental psychology informs several applied fields, including : educational psychology, child psychopathology, और forensic developmental psychology.
Developmental psychology complements several other basic research fields in psychology including social psychology, cognitive psychology, ecological मनोविज्ञान, और तुलनात्मक psychology.
Joseph Michael `` Joey '' Stivic is a fictional अक्षर जो पहला appeared on the 1970s अमरीकी sitcom सब in the परिवार.
Joey Stivic was the son and only child of माइक stivic ( निभाई by रोब reiner ) और ग्लोरिया stivic ( निभाई by Sally Struthers ), and the grandson of Archie Bunker ( Carroll O'Connor ) and Edith Bunker ( Jean Stapleton ).
The character first appeared as a newborn baby in a two-part episode of All in the परिवार जिससे aired in दिसम्बर 1975.
After many appearances on All in the Family until Reiner and Struthers left the series in 1978 ( by that time, Joey had been निभाई सबसे प्रायः by प्रत्यावर्ती जुड़वा जेसन और जस्टिन draeger ), the जॉय stivic अक्षर अगला appeared on the सब in the परिवार spin-off series ( some call it a continuation of the original ) Archie Bunker 's Place in a guest appearance in the November 1979 episode `` Thanksgiving Reunion. ''
In this instance, the character was played by child कर्ता लंड billingsley and was appropriately pre-school age.
With ग्लोरिया अभी अलग इससे माइक, वो लौटे to आर्ची बंकर 's Place with Joey in the February 1982 episode `` Gloria Comes Home. ''
In this एपीसोड, जॉय थी निभाई by क्रिस्टोफर Johnston.
Joey Stivic was a regular अक्षर on the सब in the परिवार spin-off series Gloria in 1982 and 1983.
On this series, in which the now-divorced Gloria Bunker character had moved to Upstate New York in अनुक्रम to कार्य as an सहायक veterinarian, the भाग of Joey Stivic was played by ten-year-old actor Christian Jacobs.
After Gloria was canceled in 1983, Joey Stivic disappeared from prime time television for 11 years, until the character बना एक पिछला रूप on 704 hauser, a short-lived 1994 श्रेणी परिचय a ब्लैक परिवार जो था स्थानांतरित into the बूढ़ा Bunker home, years after Bunker had sold it.
In this appearance, the Joey Stivic character was played by Casey Siemaszko, an actor born in 1961 ( 14 सालो पहले जॉय stivic 's fictional जनम ).
In 1976 the Ideal Toy Company released a 14-inch `` Joey Stivic doll '' ( called `` आर्ची बंकर 's पोता '' ) जिससे थी billed as the `` first anatomically correct male doll. ''
The doll inspired mild विवाद at the time, and is a collectors ' item today.
The 2011 Rose Bowl was the 97th edition of the annual bowl game played on January 1, 2011, as भाग of the 2010 कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल ऋतु.
Played in Pasadena, California, the TCU horned मेंढक of the पहाड़ वेस्ट सम्मेलन defeated the Wisconsin Badgers of the Big Ten Conference by a score of 21 – 19.
The Pasadena टूर्नामेंट of गुलाब संघ was the organizer of the game.
Vizio Inc. was the corporate sponsor and the खेल थी officially नामित `` The Rose Bowl Game presented by Vizio ''.
This game marked the first time a team from a non-Automatic Qualifying सम्मेलन निभाई in, और जीती, the रोज़ कटोरी in its 97 years.
The contest was ब्रॉडकास्ट on केबल टेलीविज़न स्टेशन ईएसपीएन साथ a रेडियो ब्रॉडकास्ट on ESPN Radio and XM Satellite Radio and ESPN3 streaming video over the internet.
Coverage began at 1:30 PM ( PST ) साथ kickoff at 2:10 pm ( PST ).
This marked the first time कि the खेल थी नहीं ब्रॉडकास्ट nationally `` over-the-air '' ( स्थलीय टेलीविज़न ) since the games prior to the 1952 Rose Bowl, which was the first nationally televised college football game.
The Rose Bowl Game, themed Building Dreams, Friendships, & Memories, was a contractual sell-out, with 64,500 टिकटें आबंटित to the participating teams and conferences.
Ticket prices लिये सब सीटे in the Rose Bowl are listed at $ 145.
The remaining tickets went to the Tournament of Roses सदस्यों, प्रायोजकों, नगर of pasadena निवासियों, और the सामान्य public.
The Rose Bowl स्टेडियम क्षमता is listed at approximately 91,000.
The Declaration of Independence is a statement adopted by the Continental Congress on July 4, 1776, which announced that the thirteen American colonies, then at युद्ध साथ ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, regarded themselves as स्वतंत्र राज्य, और no longer a भाग of the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य.
Instead वे अभी formed a new nation—the United States of America.
John Adams was a leader in pushing for स्वतंत्रता, जिससे थी unanimously स्वीकृत on July 2.
A committee had already drafted the औपचारिक घोषणा, to be ready when congress voted on independence.
Adams persuaded the committee to select Thomas Jefferson to compose the original ड्राफ्ट of the दस्तावेज़, जिससे कॉंग्रेस होता संपादन to उपज the final version.
The Declaration थी ultimately a औपचारिक स्पष्टीकरण of क्यों कॉंग्रेस had voted on July 2 to declare independence from Great Britain, more than a year after the outbreak of the American Revolutionary War.
The national birthday, the स्वतंत्रता दिन is मनाये on July 4, although Adams wanted July 2.
After ratifying the text on July 4, Congress जारी the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता in अनेक फ़ॉर्म.
It was initially published as the printed Dunlap broadside that was widely distributed and पढ़ा to the public.
The most famous version of the घोषणा, a हस्ताक्षरित नक़ल कि is popularly regarded as the घोषणा of Independence, is displayed at the National Archives in Washington, D.C.
हालांकि the wording of the घोषणा was approved on July 4, the date of its signing was August 2.
The असली जुलाई 4 संयुक्त राज्य घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता manuscript was lost while all other copies have been derived from this original document.
The स्त्रोत और निर्वचन of the Declaration have been the subject of much scholarly inquiry.
The घोषणा जायज the स्वतंत्रता of the संयुक्त राज्य by listing colonial grievances against King George III, and by asserting certain natural and legal rights, including a right of revolution.
Having परोसा इसके असली purpose in announcing स्वतंत्रता, the text of the Declaration was initially ignored after the American Revolution.
Since तब, it रै आइये to be माना a major statement on human rights, particularly its second sentence:
We hold these truths to be self-evident, that all men हैं निर्मित बराबर, कि वे हैं endowed by their Creator with certain unalienable Rights, that among these are Life, Liberty and the pursuit of Happiness.
This has been called `` one of the best-known वाक्य in the अंग्रेज़ी भाषा '', containing `` the most potent and consequential words in American history. ''
The passage आए to represent a moral मानक to which the United States should strive.
This view was notably promoted by Abraham Lincoln, who considered the घोषणा to be the न्यास of उसके राजनैतिक philosophy, and argued that the Declaration is a statement of principles through which the United States Constitution should be interpreted.
It has inspired work for the rights of अधिकारहीन लोगों throughout the world.
Chitty chitty बंग बंग is a 1968 अंग्रेजों musical film loosely based on Ian Fleming 's novel.
The film 's script is by Roald Dahl and Ken Hughes और इसके गीतों by the शरमन Brothers.
It stars Dick Van dyke as caractacus potts और सैली Ann Howes as Truly Scrumptious.
The film was निर्देशित by केन ह्यूजेस और उत्पादित by Albert R. Broccoli ( co-producer of the James Bond series of films, also based on Fleming 's novels ).
जॉन stears supervised the special effects.
Irwin kostal पर्यवेक्षित और conducted the म्यूज़िक, while the musical numbers were staged by Marc Breaux and Dee Dee Wood.
A region is arid when it is characterized by a कठोर कमी of उपलब्धियाँ जल, to the extent of hindering or preventing the growth and development of plant and animal life.
environments विषय to arid climates tend to lack vegetation and are called xeric or desertic.
Most `` arid '' climates surround the equator ; these places include सबसे of अफ़्रीकी और भाग of दक्षिण अमेरिका और सेंट्रल अमेरिका.
Cancer ( ♋ ) is an astrological चिह्न, जिससे is संबद्ध with the constellation Cancer.
It spans the 90-120th degree of the zodiac, between 90 और 125.25 उपाधि of celestial देशांतर, which the Sun transits this area on average between June 22 to July 22 each year.
And under the sidereal zodiac, it is फिलहाल इससे जुलाई 21 to August 9.
The United States अध्यक्षीय चुनाव of 1960 थी the 44th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, held on Tuesday, November 8, 1960.
The Republican पार्टी मनोनीत लाज़िम vice-president Richard Nixon, while the Democratic Party nominated John F. Kennedy, Senator from Massachusetts.
the लाज़िम अध्यक्ष, रिपब्लिकन ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर, थी नहीं योग्य लिये re-election बाद सेवारत the maximum two terms allowed by the Twenty-second Amendment.
Kennedy was elected with a lead of 112,827 votes, or 0.17 % of the लोकप्रिय vote, giving उसे a विजय of 303 to 219 in the Electoral College, the closest since 1916.
This was the first चुनाव in जिससे सब पचास of the वर्तमान संयुक्त States participated.
A number of factors explain why the चुनाव थी so close.
Kennedy gained since there was an economic recession which hurt the incumbent Republican, and he had the advantage of 17 million more पंजीकृत डेमोक्रेट than republicans.
Furthermore, the new votes that Kennedy gained among Catholics लगभग neutralized the नई मत निक्सन gained among protestants.
Kennedy 's campaigning कौशल decisively outmatched Nixon 's.
in the समाप्त, निक्सन 's जोर on his experience carried little weight, and he wasted energy by campaigning in all 50 states instead of concentrating on the swing states.
Kennedy used his large, well-funded campaign organization to win the नामांकन, सुरक्षित समर्थन, और, साथ the सहायता of the पिछला of the big-city bosses, to get out the vote in the big cities.
He relied on running mate Lyndon B. Johnson to hold the South and used टेलीविज़न effectively.
This election is notable as being the first time in U.S. history that two sitting U.S. Senators ( Kennedy and Johnson ) were elected as president and vice-president, a घटना कि रै महरूम दोहराया एकबार, by बराक Obama and Joe Biden in 2008 ( in both cases, the president was the younger, more junior senator ).
Sherwood is a city in वॉशिंगटन काउंटी, ऑरेगॉन, संयुक्त States.
Located in the southeast corner of the काउंटी, it is a आवासीय जातियाँ in the Tualatin Valley southwest of Portland.
The population was 11,791 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.
According to the 2010 census, the जनसांख्यिकी थी 18,205 निवासियों.
Indirectly named for the Sherwood Forest in इंग्लैण्ड, it थी पहला incorporated in 1893 as a town.
The USA PATRIOT Act of 2001 is an Act of the u.S. कॉंग्रेस कि थी हस्ताक्षरित into विधि by अध्यक्ष George W. Bush on October 26, 2001.
The title of the act is a ten letter acronym ( USA PATRIOT ) कि स्टैंड लिये uniting ( और ) strengthening अमेरिका ( by ) providing उचित Tools Required ( to ) Intercept ( and ) Obstruct Terrorism Act of 2001.
The act, as a response to the terrorist attacks of September 11th, significantly reduced restrictions in law enforcement agencies ' gathering of प्रज्ञा भीतर the संयुक्त राज्य ; विस्तारित the सचिव of the treasury’s प्राधिकार to विनियमित वित्तीय ट्रांजेक्शन, विशेषकर those involving foreign individuals and entities ; and broadened the discretion of law enforcement and immigration authorities in detaining and deporting immigrants suspected of terrorism-related acts.
The act also expanded the definition of terrorism to include domestic terrorism, thus enlarging the number of क्रियाएँ to जिससे the यूएसए patriot act’s विस्तारित विधि प्रवर्तन शक्तियां can be applied.
On May 26, 2011, President Barack Obama used an Autopen to sign the PATRIOT Sunsets एक्सटेंशन अधिनियम of 2011, a four-year एक्सटेंशन of तीन कुंजी प्रावधानों in the यूएसए patriot अधिनियम जबकि he थी in फ़्रांस : roving wiretaps, खोज of कारोबार records ( the `` library records provision `` ), and conducting surveillance of `` lone wolves '' — individuals suspected of terrorist-related activities not linked to terrorist groups.
Republican leaders questioned if the use of the autopen मिले the संवैधानिक requirements for signing a bill into law.
A house in Queen Anne style at 223 एवेन्यू a.
Snohomish is a city in Snohomish काउंटी, वॉशिंगटन, United States.
The population was 9,098 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
The mayor of snohomish is karen guzak, और the City Manager is Larry Bauman.
Snohomish prides itself for its historical downtown, and was once known for its many antique shops when it was known as the `` पुरातन पूंजी of the उत्तरपश्चिम. ''
The historic business and residential center of the town constitutes the Snohomish Historic District, जिससे is सूचीबद्ध on the नेशनल पंजीकरण of ऐतिहासिक स्थान.
Many houses bear plaques with the year the house was built and the नाम of the परिवार or व्यक्तिगत जो originally occupied it.
Once every साल, the नगर देता टुर of the historic houses ; one of them, the Blackman House, is a year-round museum.
A general aviation airfield, घनघोर एयरफील्ड, is कम than एक मील दक्षिणपश्चिम of Downtown Snohomish.
Dave Matthews Band ( DMB ) is an American rock band that was formed in charlottesville, वर्जिनिया, United States, in 1991.
the founding सदस्यों यहूद singer-songwriter और guitarist Dave Matthews, bassist Stefan Lessard, drummer /backing vocalist Carter Beauford and saxophonist LeRoi Moore.
Boyd tinsley थी added to the band as a violinist soon after the band was formed.
Moore died suddenly in अगस्त 2008 due to जटिलताओं इससे चोटों sustained in an ATV accident.
GRAMMY Award -winner Jeff Coffin of Béla Fleck and the flecktones रै चूंकि भर मूर 's स्पॉट as the बैंड 's saxophonist.
rashawn रॉस और टिम रेनॉल्ड्स have also become full-time touring members of the band.
The band 's 2009 album Big Whiskey and the GrooGrux King ( the first album since Moore 's death ) debuted at number one on the Billboard 200, earning the band their पांचवां लगातार number-one debut— बनाना उन्हें the second band behind Metallica to do so.
Their most recent album, Away from the World, थी released in 2012, और भी debuted at number one on the Billboard chart.
As of 2010, the Dave Matthews Band रै बेची over 30 लाख रिकॉर्ड worldwide.
The band is known लिये उनके सालाना summer-long टुर of the संयुक्त राज्य और Europe, featuring lengthy improvisational renditions of their songs, accompanied by an elaborate video and lighting show.
This portion of the tour has become a stamp of dmb और रै grown साथ the बैंड चूंकि fenton विलियम्स began working with them in the early 1990s.
After twenty consecutive years of touring the band announced that it would लो the गर्मियाँ of 2011 off.
Dave Matthews Band has जीती एक ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, और थी awarded the NAACP Chairman 's Award.
According to Julian Bond, `` they sell out the largest arenas on Earth, but frequently give their music away. ''
Transcendental Wild Oats : A अध्याय इससे an अलिखित रोमांस is a गद्य व्यंग्य लिखा by louisa may alcott, about her family 's involvement with the Transcendentalist community Fruitlands in the early 1840s.
The work was first published in a नई यॉर्क समाचारपत्र in 1873, and reprinted in 1874, 1876, and 1915 and after.
In her account, Alcott provides the real people शामिल साथ पतला pseudonymous disguises.
Her father Amos Bronson alcott is `` abel मेमने, '' जबकि उसके संगी और जातियाँ co-founder Charles Lane is `` Timon Lion ; '' Abigail May Alcott, Louisa 's mother and Bronson 's wife, is `` Sister Hope. ''
Alcott depicts उसके पिता as dominated by his more forceful partner, and both men as feckless and impractical dreamers.
The men of the जातियाँ खर्च उनके समय in pointless debates जबकि सिस्टर आशा works इससे dawn to dusk to maintain their existence.
A crisis arises at कटाई समय, जब the अनाज crop is threatened by an approaching storm.
In Alcott 's words, `` परिचय the समय the अनाज थी तैयार to house, some call of the Oversoul wafted all the men away. ''
Sister Hope organizes the तभी उपलब्धियाँ help, three little girls and a boy, and manages to save the crop.
The little community collapses as जल्द as the मौसम turns cold, when it becomes clear that their provisions are too meager to last the coming winter.
Timon Lion and his बेटे abscond to जुड़ें the shakers — हालांकि timon is अप्रसन्न to learn that life among them is `` all work and no play. ''
Abel is crushed by the failure of the enterprise ; after days of despair he begins to eat again तभी जब he realizes कि उसके परिवार needs him.
Sister Hope finds a रास्ता लिये उन्हें to subsist and persevere.
Alcott 's view of male arrogance and female exploitation in this piece is paralleled in उसके अनोखा, प्रकाशित in the same year as `` Transcendental Wild Oats. ''
`` अनुभवातीत जंगली Oats '' has been reprinted in several modern editions.
Mount of the Holy Cross is the northernmost 14,000-foot mountain in the Sawatch Range, part of the Rocky Mountains in Colorado.
It is located in the Holy Cross Wilderness near the भुत कस्बा of पावन Cross City and in Eagle County.
It was named for the distinctive cross-shaped snowfield on the northeast face.
Under USDA Forest Service administration, the mountain was proclaimed `` Holy क्रॉस नेशनल स्मारक '' by हर्बर्ट Hoover on May 11, 1929.
The monument was transferred to the नेशनल Park Service in 1933.
In 1950, it was returned to the Forest Service and lost its National Monument status—the number of visitors to the पहाड़ और the आसपास `` pilgrim 's हट '' था waned, और the व्यय of full-time staff could not be justified.
This mountain has been the subject of painters, photographers and even a poem by Henry वाड्सवर्थ लांगफेलो, ( The Cross of Snow ).
The first publicly available फोटोग्राफ थी प्रकाशित in नेशनल Geographic magazine.
Thomas मोरान चित्रित the पहाड़ in an oil painting, which now is part of the collection of the Museum of the American West, part of the Autry National Center in Los Angeles, California.
It is still much photographed but it is not as well ज्ञात आज as it थी in the पास्ट.
Nearby features include Bowl of Tears Lake, directly under the east face of the peak, Tuhare Lakes, in a cirque that झूठ दक्षिण of a significant subpeak, और अनेक अन्य झीलों.
notable स्थितियाँ भीतर शामिल the dotsero volcano ( near Interstate 70 ), Vail and Aspen.
US 24 runs निकट the शिखर through Gilman.
Photochrom print of Mount of the पावन क्रॉस c. 1900.
इस चित्र is a reversed दृश्य of the mountain compared to how it actually appears.
The first recorded ascent of पावन क्रॉस थी in 1873, by F. V. hayden और photographer W. H. Jackson during one of Hayden 's geographical surveys.
however, the शिखर may खूब have महरूम ascended previously by miners or American Indians.
The first winter ascent of the peak was made in 1943 by Russel keene और हावर्ड freedman of the 10th Mountain Division, then stationed at Camp Hale.
Holy Cross can be climbed by at least four different routes, with the easiest and most common route होने the उत्तर लकीरें, जिससे involves of लंबवत लाभ over और is रेटेड YDS Class 2 for moderate scrambling.
The Cross Couloir रूट फ़ॉर्म the लंबवत portion of the famous cross feature, and provides an advanced snow climb or extreme ski descent.
Mount of the पावन क्रॉस रै a इतिहास of endangering the lives of many hikers.
Primarily, the hikers who require rescue are unfamiliar साथ the risks of प्रवेश wilderness क्षेत्रों और do नहीं लाओ पर्याप्त उपकरण and supplies to respond to emergency conditions.
Although the summit on Mount of the Holy Cross is frequently reached on a long day hike, unprepared hikers are frequently stranded or lost due to changing environmental conditions and भ्रम regarding the surrounding लैंडस्केप, विशेषकर on the descent of North Ridge.
Thorough research and reasonable नियोजन चाहिए prevent सबसे tragedies.
Mount of the पावन क्रॉस is accessible इससे Tigiwon Road, south of Minturn, Colorado.
The हाफ चंद्रमा pass ट्रेल is the मानक रूट to the summit of Mount of the Holy Cross via the North Ridge.
Following the Fall Creek Trail to an ascent of Notch Mountain Trail provides the बेहतरीन दृश्य of the पावन क्रॉस हिम विशेषता इससे पायदान पहाड़ लकीरें.
The GSM लोगो is प्रयुक्त to पहचानो compatible handsets and equipment
GSM ( Global System for Mobile Communications, originally ' ), is a standard नियत विकसित by the यूरोपीय दूरसंचार मानकों संस्थान ( ETSI ) to describe protocols for second generation ( 2G ) digital cellular networks used by mobile phones.
It became the de facto global standard for mobile संचार साथ over 80 % मार्केट share.
The GSM standard was developed as a replacement for first generation ( 1G ) analog cellular networks, and originally वर्णित a डिजिटल, सर्किट switched network optimized for full duplex voice telephony.
This was expanded over time to include data communications, first by circuit switched transport, then packet data हस्तांतरण via gprs ( सामान्य पैकेट रेडियो सेवाएं ) और किनारे ( उन्नत आंकड़ा दरों for GSM Evolution or EGPRS ).
Further improvements were made when the 3GPP developed third पीढी ( 3g ) umts मानकों followed by चौथी generation ( 4G ) LTE Advanced standards.
`` जीएसएम '' is a trademark owned by the GSM Association.
President Franklin D. Roosevelt signs the Lend-Lease bill to दे सहायता to ब्रिटेन और China ( 1941 )
The Lend Lease act was an अधिनियम जहाँ the संयुक्त राज्य था supported its allies.
Lend-Lease ( ) was the law that started a कार्यक्रम अंतर्गत जिससे the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका supplied the संयुक्त Kingdom, the USSR, Republic of China, Free France, and other Allied nations with materiel between 1941 and 1945.
It was signed into law on March 11, 1941, a year and a half after the outbreak of संसार युद्ध ii in यूरोपीय in सितंबर 1939.
This was nine months before the U.S. entered the युद्ध in दिसम्बर 1941.
Formally titled An Act to further प्रचार the रक्षा of the संयुक्त राज्य, the अधिनियम effectively ended the United States ' pretense of neutrality.
A कुल of $ 50.1 अरब ( समतुल्य to $ आज ) लायक of supplies were shipped : $ 31.4 billion to Britain, $ 11.3 billion to the Soviet Union, $ 3.2 billion to France, $ 1.6 billion to China, and smaller sums to other Allies.
Reverse Lend-Lease comprised services such as rent on air bases that went to the u.S., और totaled $ 7.8 अरब ; of इस, $ 6.8 अरब आए इससे the अंग्रेजों and the Commonwealth.
The terms of the agreement provided कि the materiel थी to be प्रयुक्त जबतक समय for their return or destruction.
आपूर्तियाँ बाद the termination तिथि यहूद बेची to ब्रिटेन at a विशाल discount for £1.075 billion using long-term loans from the United States.
Canada operated a similar program that sent $ 4.7 billion in supplies to the संयुक्त किंगडम और the सोवियत संघ.
The United States did not charge for aid supplied अंतर्गत इस विधान.
This program was a निर्णायक कदम दूर इससे non-interventionist नीति, जिससे had dominated United States foreign relations since the end of World War I, towards international involvement.
The Jerusalem artichoke ( Helianthus tuberosus ), also called sunroot, sunchoke, earth apple or topinambour, is a species of sunflower native to eastern North America, and found from eastern Canada and Maine west to North डकोटा, और दक्षिण to उत्तरी फ्लोरिडा और टेक्सास.
It is also cultivated widely across the शीतोष्ण मण्डल लिये इसके tuber, जिससे is used as a root vegetable.
Castillo San Felipe del Morro also known as Fort San Felipe del Morro or Morro किला, is a 16th-century citadel स्तिथ in सैन जुआन, प्यूर्टो रीको.
Stonehenge is a prehistoric monument in Wiltshire, England, about west of amesbury और उत्तर of Salisbury.
One of the most प्रसिद्ध साइट in the संसार, stonehenge is the remains of a ring of standing stones set within earthworks.
It is in the middle of the सबसे घना जटिल of पाषाणकालीन और कांस्य आयु monuments in England, including several hundred burial mounds.
archaeologists मानना it was built anywhere from 3000 BC to 2000 BC.
Radiocarbon dating in 2008 suggested that the पहला पत्थरों यहूद उठाया between 2400 और 2200 bc, whilst another theory suggests that bluestones may have been raised at the site as early as 3000 BC.
The surrounding circular earth bank and ditch, which constitute the earliest phase of the स्मारक, have been dated to about 3100 BC.
The site and its surroundings were added to the युनेस्को 's सूची of संसार विरासत साइट in 1986 in a co-listing with Avebury Henge.
It is a national legally सुरक्षित अनुसूचित प्राचीन Monument.
Stonehenge is owned by the Crown and managed by English Heritage, जबकि the surrounding जमीन is स्वामित्व by the National Trust.
Archaeological evidence found by the Stonehenge Riverside Project in 2008 indicates कि Stonehenge could have been a burial ground from its earliest beginnings.
The dating of cremated remains found on the site indicate that deposits contain human bone इससे as जल्दी as 3000 bc, जब the खाई और bank were first dug.
Such deposits continued at stonehenge लिये at तनिक another 500 years.
The site is a प्लेस of धार्मिक significance and pilgrimage in Neo-Druidry.
The NCAA Women 's Division I Championship is an सालाना कॉलेज बास्केट tournament for women.
Held each April, the Women 's Championship थी उदघाटन in the 1981–82 season.
The NCAA tournament थी preceded by the aiaw महिलाओं 's बास्केट टूर्नामेंट, which was held annually from 1972 to 1982.
Basketball was one of twelve women 's sports added to the NCAA championship program for the 1981-82 school year, as the NCAA engaged in battle साथ the संघ लिये intercollegiate एथलेटिक्स for Women for sole governance of women 's collegiate sports.
The AIAW continued to conduct its स्थापित चैंपियनशिप कार्यक्रम in the वही बारह ( और अन्य ) खेल ; however, after a year of dual women 's championships, the NCAA prevailed, while the AIAW disbanded.
उपस्थिति और ब्याज in the महिलाओं 's प्रभाग i चैंपियनशिप have grown over the सालो, विशेषकर चूंकि 2003, when the final championship game was moved to the Tuesday following the Monday men 's championship game.
The women 's चैंपियनशिप खेल is now the final overall game of the college basketball season.
Before कि, the महिलाओं 's फाइनल चार थी प्रायः निभाई on the शुक्रवार पहले the मेन 's Final Four or the hours before the men played on the final Saturday of the tournament.
The final was प्रायः निभाई the Sunday afternoon following the Men 's Final Four.
The टूर्नामेंट कोष्ठक is बना up of champions इससे प्रत्येक प्रभाग I conference, which receive automatic bids.
The remaining slots are at-large bids, साथ टीमों चुनी by an ncaa चयन कमेटी.
The selection process and tournament seedings are based on अनेक कारकों, सहित टोली rankings, win-loss records and Ratings Percentage Index ( RPI ) data.
Unlike the men 's tournament, there are only 32 at-large बोलियों ( as of the अगला टूर्नामेंट in 2014 ), और no play-in game.
The women 's tournament, like the men 's, is staged in a single elimination format, and is भाग of the मीडिया और पब्लिक frenzy ज्ञात colloquially as कूच दीवानगी or The Big Dance.
All 63 खेल have महरूम ब्रॉडकास्ट on television since 2003 on ESPN and ESPN2.
Similar to the pre-2011 men 's टूर्नामेंट कवरेज on सीबीएस, लोकल टीमों हैं दिखाया on each channel when available, with `` whip-around '' coverage designed to showcase the most competitive contests in the rest of the country.
The rosetta स्टोन in the British Museum
The rosetta स्टोन is an प्राचीन मिश्र granodiorite stele inscribed with a decree issued at Memphis in 196 BC on behalf of King Ptolemy V.
The decree appears in three scripts : the अपर टेक्स्ट is प्राचीन मिश्र चित्रलिपि, the मध्य portion Demotic script, and the lowest Ancient Greek.
Because it presents essentially the same text in all three scripts ( with some नाबालिग मतभेद between उन्हें ), it provided the कुंजी to the आधुनिक understanding of Egyptian hieroglyphs.
Originally displayed within a टेम्पल, the स्टोन थी संभवतः स्थानांतरित दौरान the जल्दी ईसाई or मध्यकालीन period and eventually used as building material in the construction of Fort Julien near the town of Rashid ( Rosetta ) in the Nile Delta.
It was rediscovered there in 1799 by a soldier, pierre-françois bouchard, of the फ्रेंच expedition to Egypt.
As the first Ancient Egyptian bilingual text recovered in modern times, the Rosetta स्टोन aroused फैली पब्लिक ब्याज साथ इसके संभावित to decipher this hitherto untranslated ancient language.
lithographic नक़ल और प्लास्टर casts began circulating among European museums and scholars.
Meanwhile, British troops defeated the French in Egypt in 1801, और the असली स्टोन आए into अंग्रेजों कब्ज़ा अंतर्गत the capitulation of Alexandria.
Transported to London, it has been on public display at the अंग्रेजों संग्रहालय चूंकि 1802.
It is the most-visited ऑब्जेक्ट in the British Museum.
Ever since its rediscovery, the stone has been the focus of nationalist rivalries, including its transfer from French to British कब्ज़ा दौरान the napoleonic युद्धों, a long-running विवाद over the सापेक्ष मान of यंग 's और champollion 's योगदान to the decipherment, and since 2003, demands for the stone 's return to Egypt.
Study of the decree was already under way as the पहला पूरा अनुवाद of the Greek text appeared in 1803.
It was 20 years, however, before the transliteration of the Egyptian scripts was announced by Jean-François Champollion in Paris in 1822 ; it took longer still before विद्वानों यहूद समर्थ to पढ़ा प्राचीन मिश्र inscriptions and literature confidently.
Major advances in the decoding were : recognition that the stone offered three versions of the same text ( 1799 ) ; that the demotic text used phonetic characters to spell foreign names ( 1802 ) ; that the hieroglyphic text किया so as खूब, और था pervasive similarities to the demotic ( थामस यंग, 1814 ) ; और कि, in जोड to होने प्रयुक्त लिये विदेशी names, ध्वन्यात्मक characters were also used to spell native Egyptian words ( Champollion, 1822–1824 ).
Two other fragmentary नक़ल of the वही डिक्री यहूद खोजा बाद, and several similar Egyptian bilingual or trilingual inscriptions are now known, including two slightly earlier Ptolemaic decrees ( the Decree of Canopus in 238 BC, and the Memphis decree of Ptolemy IV, ca. 218 BC ).
The Rosetta Stone is therefore no longer unique, but it was the essential key to modern समझना of प्राचीन मिश्र साहित्य और सभ्यता.
The term Rosetta Stone is now used in अन्य contexts as the नाम लिये the essential clue to a new field of knowledge.
Poison dart frog ( also dart-poison frog, poison frog or formerly poison arrow मेंढक ) is the आम नाम of a समूह of मेंढक in the परिवार dendrobatidae जिससे हैं देशी to Central and South America.
ये प्रजाति हैं diurnal and often have brightly colored bodies.
हालांकि सब जंगली dendrobatids हैं at तनिक somewhat विषाक्त, स्तर of toxicity vary considerably from one species to the next and from one population to another.
अनेक प्रजाति are threatened.
These amphibians हैं प्रायः पुकारा `` डार्ट मेंढक '' due to the Amerindians ' indigenous use of their to poison the tips of blowdarts.
However, of over 175 species, only four have been documented as being used for this purpose ( curare plants are more commonly used ), all of which come from the phyllobates genus, जिससे is characterized by the अपेक्षाकृत विशाल आकार and high levels of toxicity of its members.
Cajeta is a Mexican confection of thickened सिरप प्रायः बना of sweetened caramelised milk.
According to chef Rick Bayless, the नाम लिये cajeta आए इससे the स्पेनी phrase al punto de cajeta, जिससे अर्थात् `` a द्रव thickened to the point at which a spoon drawn through the liquid reveals the bottom of the pot in which it is being cooked ''.
Another hypothesis is that it takes its name from the small wooden boxes in which it थी traditionally packed.
Mexican cajeta is considered a specialty of the city of Celaya in the state of Guanajuato, although it is भी उत्पादित साथ the परंपरागत method in several towns of the state of Jalisco, such as Mazamitla, Sayula, and Atotonilco el Alto.
Cajeta is made by simmering बकरी 's मिल्क, or occasionally a sweetened द्रव, stirring अक्सर, until it becomes very viscous due to evaporation of water, and caramelized.
While goat milk is the most usual base, अन्य liquids or रस may be प्रयुक्त.
In celaya, और आखिरकार the बाकी of मैक्सिको, the confection of half goat 's milk and half cow 's milk became known by the name cajeta, but elsewhere, the milk candy became known as leche quemada, dulce de leche, etc.
it रै cousins in the अनेक भारतीय milk-based मिठाई जैसे प्रभा और the मिल्क फ़ज burfi, और in the ओपेरा फ़ज of the U.S. Cajeta is eaten on its own as a sweet, as a spread or filling for breads and pastries, such as churros, and as a topping for ice cream.
Certain liquors are added to खास व्यंजनों पुकारा cajeta envinada.
In addition, cajeta envinada especial is समृद्ध साथ किशमिश, बादाम, pecans or nuts.
Often it is used as a topping for crêpes, as a sweet sauce boiled and softened bas साथ मिल्क to soak the crepes, resulting in a स्वादिष्ट मिठाई.
In Mexico many brands make cajeta लकिन the सबसे आम ब्रांड is coronado.
it is भी बहुत आम to प्लेस cajeta between obleas to make a traditional Mexican dessert.
Prince William, Duke of Cambridge ( William Arthur Philip Louis ; born 21 June 1982 ), is the elder बेटे of चार्ल्स, प्रिंस of वेल्स, और डायना, राजकुमारी of वेल्स, और third-eldest पोता of महारानी एलिज़ाबेथ II and Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh.
He is second in the line of succession, behind his father, to the thrones of sixteen independent sovereign states known as the Commonwealth realms : the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Jamaica, Barbados, The Bahamas, Grenada, Papua New Guinea, the सुलेमान आइलैंड्स, तुवालू, संत लूसिया, संत विंसेंट और the grenadines, Belize, Antigua and Barbuda, and Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Prince William was शिक्षित at चार स्कूलों in the संयुक्त किंगडम और obtained a degree from the University of St Andrews.
He spent parts of a gap year in Chile, Belize, Tanzania, और कीनिया जहाँ he रै जिया और holidayed several times.
Prince विलियम रै भी लिया Kiswahili studies at universities in Kenya and Tanzania.
He was commissioned as a Lieutenant in the Blues and Royals Regiment of the Household Cavalry —serving साथ उसके bhai प्रिंस हैरी —and, दो सालो बाद, अर्जित उसके विंग्स by completing पायलट प्रशिक्षण at royal एयर फ़ोर्स कॉलेज Cranwell.
In 2009, he transferred to the Royal Air Force, थी प्रचारित to उड़ान लेफ्टिनेंट और underwent हेलीकाप्टर उड़ती प्रशिक्षण in order to become a full-time pilot with the Search and Rescue Force.
In 2010, he completed his general and special-to-type helicopter training और गई on to raf घाटी on no. 22 स्क्वाड्रन performing co-pilot कर्तव्य on फलक a समुद्र किंग ढूंढें और बचाव हेलीकाप्टर.
Prince William married his longtime गर्लफ्रेंड, कैथरीन मिडलटन, on 29 April 2011 at Westminster Abbey.
Hours prior to his wedding, Prince William was created ड्यूक of कैम्ब्रिज, अर्ल of strathearn, and Baron Carrickfergus.
Mali is a बहुभाषी देश.
The languages spoken there reflect ancient उपनिवेश पैटर्न, migrations, and its long history.
ऍथनोलॉग रिश्तो 50 languages.
Of ये, फ्रेंच is the आधिकारिक भाषा and Bambara is the most widely spoken.
Altogether 13 of the indigenous languages of माली have the विधिक औकात of नेशनल language.
Sign in फ्रेंच, at a स्मारक in Bamako.

Rogers Building, the मुख्यालय of Rogers Communications
Rogers Communications Inc. is a diversified पब्लिक Canadian communications and media company.
It is particularly in the field of wireless संचार, केबल टेलीविज़न, टेलीफोन, और अंतरजाल connectivity with significant additional telecommunications and mass media assets.
The company is headquartered in the रोजर्स Building in Toronto, Ontario.
The company claims the heritage of the Rogers Vacuum Tube Company, founded in 1925 by Edward Rogers, which started the cfrb रेडियो स्टेशन in टोरंटो, जिससे थी बाद acquired by बाहर रूचि.
The present enterprise dates to 1960, जब रोजर्स ' बेटे, टेड रोजर्स, संस्थापित रोजर्स रेडियो प्रसारण Ltd.
That company acquired CHFI that year, as well as Aldred-Rogers प्रसारण, a साझेदारी साथ जोएल aldred जिससे helped launch CFTO in 1961.
Rogers later खरीदा आउट aldred और प्रारंभ the current cable and wireless operations, known as Rogers Cablesystems Ltd.
The chief competitor to the company is Bell Canada, which has a similarly extensive portfolio of radio and television media assets, as well as wireless, television distribution, और टेलीफोन सेवाएं, विशेषकर in पूर्वी और सेंट्रल कनाडा ; the दो कंपनियाँ हैं प्रायः देखी as having a द्वयाधिकार on संचार सेवाएं in उनके regions.
However, the company also competes nationally with telus लिये बेतार सेवाएं, and primarily indirectly with Shaw Communications for television service.
The company भी competes साथ a क्रमांक of other media companies in the broadcasting industry.
The Internet is a global system of interconnected computer संजाल कि उपयोग the मानक अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल सुइट ( TCP/IP ) to serve billions of users worldwide.
It is a network of networks that consists of millions of private, public, academic, कारोबार, और सरकारी संजाल, of लोकल to वैश्विक पैमाना, कि हैं linked by a व्यापक सरणी of electronic, wireless and optical networking technologies.
The Internet carries an extensive range of information resources and services, such as the inter-linked हाइपरटेक्स्ट दस्तावेज़ of the संसार चौड़ी वेब ( www ) और the infrastructure to support email.
Most परंपरागत संचार मीडिया सहित टेलीफोन, म्यूज़िक, फिल्मी, and television are being reshaped or redefined by the Internet, giving birth to new services such as voice over Internet Protocol ( VoIP ) and Internet Protocol television ( IPTV ).
Newspaper, book और other print publishing are adapting to Web site technology, or are reshaped into blogging and web feeds.
The Internet has enabled and accelerated new forms of इंसान interactions through तत्काल messaging, Internet forums, and social networking.
Online shopping has boomed both for major retail outlets और छोटी शिल्पकार और traders.
Business-to-business and financial सेवाएं on the अंतरजाल affect सप्लाई जंजीरों across entire industries.
The origins of the Internet reach back to research commissioned by the United States सरकारी in the 1960s to निर्माण मजबूत, fault-tolerant संचार via computer networks.
The funding of a new U.S. backbone by the National Science Foundation in the 1980s, as खूब as निजी funding लिये अन्य वाणिज्यिक backbones, led to worldwide participation in the development of new networking technologies, and the merger of many networks.
The commercialization of what was by the 1990s an international network resulted in its popularization and incorporation into वस्तुतः प्रत्येक aspect of modern human life.
, more than 2.4 billion people—over a third of the world 's human population —have used the services of the Internet ; लगभग 100 टाइम्स अधिक लोगों than यहूद using it in 1995, जब it थी ज़्यादातर प्रयुक्त by tech-savvy मध्य and upper class people in the United States and several other countries.
The Internet has no centralized शासन in either technological क्रियान्वयन or policies for access and usage ; each constituent network sets its own policies.
Only the overreaching definitions of the two principal name spaces in the Internet, the Internet Protocol address space and the Domain Name System, are directed by a maintainer संगठन, the अंतरजाल निगम लिये आबंटित names and Numbers ( ICANN ).
The technical underpinning and standardization of the core protocols ( IPv4 and IPv6 ) is an activity of the Internet Engineering Task Force ( IETF ), a non-profit organization of loosely affiliated international भागीदार कि anyone may संबद्ध साथ by contributing technical expertise.
The 2006 Winter Olympics, officially ज्ञात as the xx ओलम्पिक शीत खेल, थी a शीत multi-sport इवेंट which was celebrated in Turin, Italy from February 10, 2006, through February 26, 2006.
This marked the second समय इटली hosted the ओलम्पिक शीत खेल, the first being the VII Olympic Winter Games in Cortina d'Ampezzo in 1956.
Italy also hosted the खेल of the XVII Olympiad in Rome in 1960.
टोरीनो थी चयनित as the host city for the 2006 games in 1999.
The official logo displayed the name `` Torino '', the Italian name of the city ; the city is ज्ञात as `` टोरीनो '' in दोनो अंग्रेज़ी और the लोकल परंपरागत भाषा, Piedmontese.
The Olympic mascots of Torino 2006 were Neve ( `` snow '' in इतालवी ), a female snowball, and Gliz, a male ice cube.
The official motto of the xx ओलम्पिक शीत खेल was `` Passion lives here ''.
`` Help ! '' is a song by the Beatles that served as the title song लिये दोनो the 1965 फिल्मी और इसके साउंडट्रैक album.
It was also released as a single, और थी क्रमांक एक लिये तीन weeks in both the United States and the United Kingdom.
`` Help ! '' was written primarily by जॉन लेनन, लकिन credited to lennon–mccartney.
During an interview with Playboy in 1984, Paul McCartney stated that the शीर्षक थी `` आउट of छटपटाहट ''.

Siegfried Bing ( 26 February 1838 – 6 September 1905 ), who usually gave his name as S. bing, और थी यूँ प्रायः संदर्भित erroneously as `` सैमुएल bing '' ( सैमुएल ओटो bing, 1850–1905, थी उसके bhai ) थी a जर्मनी आर्ट डीलर जो जिया in पेरिस as an वयस्क, और जो helped introduce जापानी आर्ट और artworks to the West and was a factor in the development of the Art Nouveau style during the late nineteenth century.

Kennewick is a city in benton काउंटी in the southeastern भाग of the u.S. state of Washington, near the Hanford nuclear site.
It is the most populous of the तीन शहरों collectively referred to as the Tri-Cities ( the others being Pasco and Richland ).
kennewick is स्तिथ साथ the दक्षिणपश्चिम बैंको of the कोलंबिया नदी, विपरीत Pasco and just south of the confluence of the Columbia and Yakima rivers.
The population was 73,917 at the 2010 census.
April 1, 2012 estimates इससे the वॉशिंगटन State Office of Financial Management put the city 's population at 75,160.
The nearest commercial airport is the Tri-Cities विमानक्षेत्र in pasco, a क्षेत्रीय वाणिज्यिक and private airport.
Forbes magazine named Kennewick the # 2 area in the United States for job growth, while nearby yakima थी नामित # 1.
The article cites the number of scientists employed by the प्रशांत उत्तरपश्चिम नेशनल प्रयोगशाला and area farmland for this outlook.
The prothrombin time ( PT ) and its derived measures of prothrombin अनुपात ( pr ) और अंतरराष्ट्रीय सामान्यीकृत अनुपात ( inr ) are measures of the extrinsic pathway of coagulation.
This test is भी पुकारा `` protime INR '' and `` PT/INR ''.
They are used to determine the clotting tendency of रक्त, in the माप of warfarin dosage, liver damage, and vitamin K status.
pt उपायों कारकों i ( फाइब्रिनोजेन ), ii ( prothrombin ), V, VII, and X.
It is used in conjunction with the activated आंशिक thromboplastin समय ( aptt ) जिससे उपायों the intrinsic pathway.
`` I 'm in the Mood for Love '' is a लोकप्रिय सोंग.
the म्यूज़िक was written by Jimmy McHugh, the lyrics by Dorothy Fields.
The song was प्रकाशित in 1935.
It was introduced by frances langford in the फिल्म प्रत्येक Night at Eight released that year.
The song was प्रदर्शित in the 1936 हमारी गिरोह ( छोटी दुष्टों ) छोटी, the पिंच सिंगर, सुंग by कार्ल `` Alfalfa '' Switzer, and in the 1936 film Palm Springs.
It is often ज्ञात to be switzer 's signature song.
James Moody 's saxophone सोलो on a 1952 रिकॉर्डिंग of इस सोंग प्रेरित the song `` Moody 's Mood for Love ``.
Hip hop artist Prince पॉल sampled the सोंग as the आधार लिये the track `` Mood for Love '' on his album A Prince Among Thieves ( 1999 ), with Don Newkirk singing its original lyrics.
The song 's title प्रेरित the अंग्रेज़ी शीर्षक of Wong Kar Wai 's movie In the Mood for Love.
Cross-cultural psychology is the वैज्ञानिक पढ़ाई of इंसान बर्ताव और दिमागी प्रक्रियाओं, including both their variability and invariance, under diverse cultural conditions.
Through expanding research methodologies to recognize cultural variance in behavior, language, और अर्थ it seeks to extend और develop मनोविज्ञान.
Since psychology as an academic discipline was developed largely in North America, some psychologists became concerned that constructs स्वीकृत as सार्वभौमिक यहूद नहीं as निश्चर as previously assumed, विशेषकर चूंकि अनेक कोशिशें to replicate notable experiments in other cultures had varying success.
Since there are questions as to whether theories dealing with central themes, such as affect, cognition, conceptions of the self, and issues such as psychopathology, anxiety, and depression, may lack external validity when `` exported '' to other cultural contexts, cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान re-examines उन्हें using methodologies designed to फ़ैक्टर in सांस्कृतिक मतभेद so as to खाता लिये cultural variance.
Although some critics have pointed to methodological flaws in cross-cultural psychological research and claim that serious shortcomings in the theoretical and methodological bases used impede rather than help the scientific search for universal principles in psychology, cross-cultural psychologists हैं turning अधिक to the पढ़ाई of कैसा मतभेद ( variance ) occur, बल्कि than searching लिये universals in the स्टाइल of भौतिकी or chemistry.
In 1972 the अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ of Cross-Cultural Psychology ( IACCP ) was established.
This branch of psychology has continued to विस्तार as वहीँ रै महरूम an increasing लोकप्रियता of incorporating culture and diversity into studies.
Cross-cultural psychology is differentiated इससे सांस्कृतिक psychology.
The latter is the branch of psychology that holds that human behavior is significantly influenced by cultural differences, अर्थ कि मनोवैज्ञानिक phenomena can तभी be compared साथ each other across cultures to a very limited extent.
In contrast, cross-cultural psychology includes a search for possible universals in बर्ताव और दिमागी processes.
Walter J. Lonner, writing for Eye on Psi Chi, has stated that `` cross-cultural psychology can be विचार of as a प्रकार शोध methodology, बल्कि than an entirely पृथक फ़ील्ड भीतर मनोविज्ञान ( 2000 ). ''
`` Judas '' is a song by American recording artist Lady गागा, इससे उसके दूसरी स्टुडियो album Born This Way ( 2011 ).
It was released by Interscope Records on अप्रैल 15, 2011, चार दिनों ahead of its scheduled release.
Written and produced by Lady Gaga and redone, `` यहूदा '' is a नृत्य और इलेक्ट्रो हाउस song about a woman in love with a man who betrayed her.
It embodies the incidents that have haunted Gaga in the past, and its core meaning refers to the negative parts of her life that she ca n't एस्केप.
Gaga has further explained that the song was also about honoring one 's inner darkness in order to bring oneself into the लाइट.
the कलाकृति लिये the सिंगल was designed by Gaga in Microsoft Word.
In spite of a polarizing प्रभाव on अनेक धार्मिक समूह, the सोंग थी generally खूब प्राप्त by critics, who likened the song to `` Bad Romance `` with some noting it should have been the album 's lead single.
The song has a similar sound to Gaga 's previous RedOne-produced ट्रैक्स, सहित `` पोकर फेस ``, `` lovegame ``, `` ख़राब रोमांस '', and `` Alejandro ``.
it contains तीन पृथक hooks and a house -influenced break down.
Gaga explained that the lines spoken during the breakdown talk about her as beyond redemption, regarding the परंपरागत दृश्य of कया a स्त्री should be.
`` Judas '' initially had a strong sales opening, but was less कामयाब commercially in तुलना to गागा 's पिछला singles.
The सोंग पहुँचे the शीर्ष टेन of the चार्ट in सबसे प्रमुख music markets, and also reached the top of the charts in South Korea.
A music video for the song was filmed in April 2011, co-directed by गागा और laurieann गिब्सन और co-starring Norman Reedus.
It has a Biblical कथानक जहाँ reedus निभाई यहूदा Iscariot and Gaga played Mary Magdalene.
The video portrays उन्हें as आधुनिक दिन प्रचारकों going to Jerusalem.
It included the Biblical story of यहूदा betraying यीशु, और ended with Gaga as Magdalene getting stoned to death.
Before its release, the Catholic League condemned गागा लिये the कथित उपयोग of religious imagery and her role in the video.
However, critics generally praised the वीडियो, नहीं ढूंढना कोई offensive content.
The video was nominated for two awards at the 2011 एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार.
Gaga has performed `` Judas '' on a number of television shows, including The Graham Norton Show, Saturday रात्रि सजीव, शुभ morning americas `` गर्मियाँ कॉन्सर्ट श्रेणी '', the French X Factor as well as on The Ellen DeGeneres Show.
H.264/MPEG-4 Part 10 or AVC ( Advanced Video Coding ) is a standard for video compression, and is currently one of the most commonly प्रयुक्त स्वरुप लिये the रिकॉर्डिंग, संपीडन, और वितरण of ऊँची परिभाषा वीडियो.
The final drafting कार्य on the पहला संस्करण of the standard was completed in May 2003.
H.264/MPEG-4 AVC is a block-oriented motion-compensation -based codec standard developed by the ITU-T Video Coding Experts समूह ( vceg ) साथ साथ the iso/iec jtc1 Moving Picture Experts Group ( MPEG ).
The project साझेदारी प्रयत्न is ज्ञात as the Joint Video Team ( JVT ).
The ITU-T H.264 standard and the ISO/IEC MPEG-4 AVC standard ( formally, ISO/IEC 14496-10 – mpeg-4 भाग 10, उन्नत वीडियो कोडिंग ) हैं jointly कायम so that they have identical technical content.
H.264 is perhaps best known as being one of the कोडेक मानकों लिये blu-ray discs ; सब Blu-ray Disc players must be able to decode H.264.
It is also widely used by streaming internet sources, such as videos from Vimeo, youtube, और the itunes स्टोर, वेब तन्त्र ऐसे as the adobe फ्लैश खिलाड़ी और microsoft Silverlight, and also various HDTV broadcasts over terrestrial ( ATSC, ISDB-T, DVB-T or DVB-T2 ), cable ( DVB-C ) and satellite ( DVB-S and DVB-S2 ).
Non-binding मध्यस्थता is a प्रकार of मध्यस्थता in जिससे the arbitrator makes a determination of the rights of the parties to the dispute, but this determination is not binding upon them, and no enforceable arbitration award is issued.
The `` award '' is in effect an advisory opinion of the arbitrator 's दृश्य of the संबंधित merits of the parties cases.
Non-binding arbitration is प्रयुक्त in कनेक्शन साथ कोशिशें to पहुँचें a negotiated settlement.
The role of an arbitrator in non-binding arbitration is, on the सतह, समान to कि of a mediator in a mediation.
However, the principal distinction is that whereas a mediator will try to help the parties find a middle ground to compromise at, the arbitrator remains totally removed from the उपनिवेश प्रक्रम और होगा तभी दे a determination of देयता और, if उचित, an indication of the quantum of damages payable.
Subsequent to a non-binding arbitration, the parties remain free to pursue their claims either through the न्यायालयों, or by रास्ता of a बाइंडिंग मध्यस्थता, although in practice a settlement is the most common outcome.
The award and तर्क in a non-binding मध्यस्थता is लगभग invariably inadmissible in any subsequent action in the courts or in another arbitration tribunal.
Non-binding arbitration is utilised mostly in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा.
It is largely unknown in Europe, although in the United Kingdom there is a practice of parties who are seeking a उपनिवेश to jointly instruct a महारानी 's counsel लिये an राय on the merits और likely quantum of a claim, and then to negotiate on the basis of the views expressed in that opinion.
Augustine Volcano is a Lava Dome Complex on Augustine Island in southwestern Cook Inlet in the kenai प्रायद्वीप बरो of southcentral तटीय अलास्का, दक्षिणपश्चिम of Anchorage.
The Alaska Volcano Observatory currently दरों माउंट अगस्टाइन as स्तर of Concern Color Code Green for aviation and the Volcano Alert Level is at Normal.
Augustine Island has a land area of, while West Island, बस बंद अगस्टाइन 's पश्चिमी shores, has.
The island is made up mainly of past फटना जमा.
Scientists have been able to discern that past dome collapse has resulted in विशाल avalanches.

The country of Belize has roughly 386 km of तटरेखा, और रै many coral reefs, cays, and islands in the Caribbean Sea.
Most of these form the Belize Barrier Reef, the longest in the पश्चिमी गोलार्ध stemming approximately.
The reef and its islands have been a युनेस्को संसार विरासत Site since 1996.
The following is a list of oceanic islands of Belize, arranged according to प्रदेश लकिन सब of जिससे are in the Caribbean Sea.
Most of the islands variate in स्पेलिंग between `` cay '' और `` caye '', and also use the Spanish `` cayo ''.
River islands have नहीं महरूम सूचीबद्ध.
Drive Letter Access ( DLA ) is a discontinued commercial packet writing application for the Microsoft Windows operating system that allows optical disc data भंडार डिवाइस to be used in a manner similar to floppy disks.
DLA is a पैकेट लिखने प्रौद्योगिकी for CD and DVD media that uses the UDF file system.
DLA is not compatible with खिड़कियाँ विस्टा और नए, although a patch exists to fix this issue under Windows Vista.
Roxio Burn was introduced on April 30, 2009.
As a replacement for DLA, it remedies संगतता issues Internet Explorer 8.

Limitless is a 2011 American thriller film निर्देशित by neil बर्गर और अभिनीत ब्राडली कूपर, abbie Cornish, and Robert De Niro.
It is based on the 2001 novel The Dark Fields by एलन glynn साथ the पटकथा by Leslie Dixon.
Alaska ( ) is a state in the United States, situated in the उत्तरपश्चिम extremity of the उत्तर अमरीकी महाद्वीप, साथ the अंतरराष्ट्रीय boundary साथ कनाडा to the ईस्ट, the आर्कटिक समंदर to the north, and the Pacific Ocean to the west and south, with Russia further west across the Bering Strait.
Alaska is the largest state in the United States by area, the 4th least populous और the तनिक densely आबादी of the 50 United States.
Approximately half of Alaska 's 731,449 residents live भीतर the anchorage महानगर क्षेत्रफल.
Alaska 's economy is वर्चस्व by the आयल, प्राकृतिक गैस, और फ़िशिंग industries ; it has these resources in abundance.
Alaska was purchased from Russia on March 30, 1867, लिये $ 7.2 लाख ( $ adjusted for inflation ) at approximately two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
The land went through several प्रशासनिक परिवर्तन पहले बनने an व्यवस्थित ( or incorporated ) territory on May 11, 1912, and the 49th state of the U.S. on January 3, 1959.
The name `` Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already introduced in the Russian colonial period, when it was used only for the peninsula and is derived from the Aleut alaxsxaq, meaning `` the mainland '' or, अधिक वस्तुतः, `` the ऑब्जेक्ट towards जिससे the कार्रवाई of the sea is directed ''.
It is also known as Alyeska, the `` great land '', an Aleut word निकला इससे the वही रूट.
Nelson मंडेला महानगर विश्वविद्यालयों ( nmmu ) is a दक्षिण African tertiary education institution with its main administration in the coastal city of Port Elizabeth.
A merging of three संस्थानों संस्थापित nmmu in जनवरी 2005 लकिन इसके history dates back to 1882 with the foundation of Port Elizabeth Art School.
The University draws अंतरराष्ट्रीय विद्यार्थी इससे all over the world.
There are over 3000 international विद्यार्थी और शामिल विद्यार्थी इससे the संयुक्त राज्य, फ़्रांस, चीन, जर्मनी, बेल्जियम, डेनमार्क, Finland, Netherlands, Norway, Sweden, United Kingdom and many other countries.
nmmu is a व्यापक विश्वविद्यालयों offering professional and vocational training.
The विश्वविद्यालयों रै छह campuses - five in Port Elizabeth and one in George.
The main campus is the दक्षिण कैम्पस.
Students at NMMU can पढ़ाई towards diplomas and degrees up to and including doctoral level qualifications.
A number of पाठ्यक्रम शामिल कार्यस्थल experience as part of the curriculum.
CoverGirl is an American कॉस्मेटिक्स ब्रांड संस्थापित in मेरीलैंड, by the noxzema रासायनिक कम्पनी ( बाद पुकारा Noxell ) and acquired by Procter & Gamble in 1989.
The Noxell कम्पनी advertised इस कॉस्मेटिक्स लकीर by allowing `` cover girls '', fashion models who appear on the front cover of women 's magazines, to wear its products.
CoverGirl makes up for lack of सीधा व्यक्तिगत ग्राहक service by providing a wide variety of cosmetics available at reasonable prices.
On the Origin of Species, published on 24 November 1859, is a कार्य of वैज्ञानिक साहित्य by चार्ल्स डार्विन जिससे is माना to be the foundation of evolutionary biology.
Its full title was On the Origin of Species by Means of Natural Selection, or the संरक्षण of favoured दौड़ in the संघर्ष for Life.
For the छठे संस्करण of 1872, the छोटी शीर्षक थी changed to The Origin of Species.
Darwin 's book introduced the scientific theory कि populations evolve over the कोर्स of पीढियां through a process of natural selection.
It presented a body of evidence कि the विविधता of जीवन arose by आम descent through a branching pattern of evolution.
Darwin शामिल प्रमाण कि he था gathered on the beagle expedition in the 1830s and his subsequent findings from research, correspondence, and experimentation.
Various evolutionary ideas had already been proposed to बताइये नई निष्कर्षों in जीवविज्ञान.
There was growing support for such ideas among dissident anatomists and the general public, but during the first half of the 19th century the English scientific establishment was closely tied to the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड, जबकि विज्ञान थी भाग of प्राकृतिक धर्मशास्त्र.
Ideas about the transmutation of species were controversial as वे विरोधी साथ the मान्यताओं कि प्रजाति यहूद अपरिवर्तनशील भाग of a designed hierarchy and that humans were unique, unrelated to other animals.
The political and theological implications यहूद पडती debated, but transmutation was not accepted by the scientific mainstream.
The book was written लिये non-specialist पाठक and attracted widespread interest upon its publication.
As Darwin was an eminent वैज्ञानिक, उसके निष्कर्षों यहूद लिया seriously और the evidence he presented generated scientific, philosophical, and religious discussion.
The debate over the book contributed to the campaign by T.H. Huxley and उसके fellow सदस्यों of the x क्लबों to secularise science by promoting scientific naturalism.
Within two decades there was widespread scientific agreement that evolution, with a branching pattern of common descent, had occurred, लकिन वैज्ञानिकों यहूद slow to दे प्राकृतिक चयन the significance that Darwin thought appropriate.
During the `` eclipse of Darwinism `` इससे the 1880s to the 1930s, various other mechanisms of evolution were given more credit.
With the विकास of the आधुनिक विकासवादी संश्लेषण in the 1930s और 1940s, Darwin 's concept of evolutionary adaptation through natural selection became central to modern evolutionary theory, now the unifying concept of the life sciences.
चार्ल्स डिलन `` केसी '' स्टेंगल ( ; जुलाई 30, 1890 – सितंबर 29, 1975 ), nicknamed `` The Old Perfessor '', was an American Major League Baseball outfielder and manager.
He was निर्वाचित to the बेसबॉल Hall of Fame in.
Stengel was born in कान्सास नगर, मिसौरी, और originally nicknamed `` डच '', a common nickname at that time for Americans of German ancestry.
After his major league career began, he acquired the nickname `` Casey '', जिससे originally आए इससे the आद्याक्षर of उसके गृहनगर ( `` K. C. '' ), जिससे evolved into `` Casey '', influenced by the wide popularity of the poem Casey at the Bat.
In the 1950s, sportswriters उतावले उसे साथ yet another उपनाम, `` the बूढ़ा प्राध्यापक '' ( or `` Perfessor '' ), for his sharp wit and his ability to talk at length on anything baseball -related.
Although his baseball career spanned a number of teams and cities, he is primarily संबद्ध साथ क्लब in नई York City.
Between playing and managing, he is the only man to have worn four of नई यॉर्क 's प्रमुख लीग क्लब ' वर्दी.
He was the first of चार मेन ( through the ऋतु ) to manage both the New York Yankees and New York Mets ; Yogi Berra, Dallas Green, and Joe Torre are the others.
Like Torre, he भी प्रबंधित the Braves and the Dodgers.
He ended his baseball career as the beloved मैनेजर लिये the तब विस्तार नई यॉर्क मेट्स, जिससे जीती over the hearts of New York partly due to the unique character of their veteran leader.
June ( ) is the sixth month of the year in the Julian and gregorian पंचांग और एक of the चार महीने साथ a length of 30 days.
Ovid provides two etymologies for जून 's नाम in उसके कविता concerning the months entitled the Fasti.
The first is that the month is named after the Roman goddess Juno, wife of Jupiter and equivalent to the Greek goddess Hera ; the दूसरी is कि the नाम आता इससे the लैटिन शब्द iuniores, अर्थ `` younger ones, '' as opposed to maiores ( `` बड़ो '' ) for which the preceding month May may be named ( Fasti VI.1–88 ).
See : Months in various calendars also called the season of the जून is the माह साथ the longest daylight घंटों of the साल in the Northern Hemisphere and the shortest daylight hours of the year in the Southern Hemisphere.
June in the Northern Hemisphere is the seasonal equivalent to दिसम्बर in the दक्षिणी Hemisphere and vice versa.
In the Northern hemisphere, the शुरूआत of the meteorological गर्मियाँ is 1 June.
In the Southern hemisphere, the beginning of the meteorological शीत is 1 जून.
At the start of June, the sun rises in the नक्षत्र of वृष ; at the end of June, the sun rises in the constellation of Gemini.
however, due to the precession of the equinoxes, जून begins with the sun in the astrological sign of Gemini, and ends with the sun in the astrological sign of Cancer.
June is known लिये the विशाल क्रमांक of विवाह that occur over the course of the month.
According to one etymology, जून is नामित बाद Juno ( Hera ).
Juno was the goddess of विवाह और a शादीशुदा युगल 's household, so some consider it good luck to be married in this month.
According to another etymology provided by the Roman poet Ovid, June is named for the iuniores, latin for `` young लोगों '' ( fasti vi.88 ) और कि the माह of may is नामित लिये the maiores, Latin for `` elders ''.
in आइसलैंड, लोकगीत says that if you bathe naked in the morning dew on the morning of June 24, you are supposed to keep aging at bay for longer.
A constitution is a set of fundamental सिद्धान्त or स्थापित precedents according to जिससे a state or other organization is governed.
ये नियम साथ make up, i.e. constitute, what the entity is.
When these principles are लिखा bas into a सिंगल दस्तावेज़ or नियत of विधिक दस्तावेज़, those दस्तावेज़ may be कहा to embody a written constitution ; if they are written down in a single comprehensive document, it is said to embody a codified constitution.
Constitutions concern different levels of organizations, from sovereign राज्य to कंपनियाँ और unincorporated associations.
A treaty which establishes an international organization is also its constitution, in that it होता define कैसा कि संगठन is constituted.
Within states, whether sovereign or federated, a constitution defines the सिद्धान्त upon जिससे the राज्य is आधारित, the कार्यविधि in which laws are made and by whom.
Some constitutions, especially codified constitutions, भी अधिनियम as limiters of राज्य शक्ति, by establishing लाइनों जिससे a राज्य 's rulers can not cross, such as fundamental rights.
George Washington at संवैधानिक सम्मेलन of 1787, हस्ताक्षर of u.S. Constitution.
The Constitution of India is the longest written constitution of any sovereign country in the संसार, containing 448 आलेख, 12 schedules और 100 amendments, साथ 117,369 शब्द in इसके अंग्रेज़ी भाषा version, while the United States Constitution is the shortest written constitution, at 7 articles and 27 amendments.
