Engineering management is a specialized form of management that is concerned with the अनुप्रयोग of अभियान्त्रिकी सिद्धान्त to business practice.
Engineering management is a career that brings together the technological problem-solving savvy of अभियान्त्रिकी और the organizational, प्रशासनिक, and planning abilities of management in order to oversee complex enterprises from conception to completion.
Example areas of engineering are product development, manufacturing, construction, design engineering, industrial अभियान्त्रिकी, प्रौद्योगिकी, उत्पादन, or कोई अन्य फ़ील्ड कि employs कर्मियों जो perform an engineering function.
Successful engineering प्रबंधक typically आवश्यकता प्रशिक्षण और अनुभव in business and engineering.
Technically inept managers tend to be deprived of support by their technical team, and non-commercial प्रबंधक tend to कमी वाणिज्यिक सूझबूझ to उद्धार in a market economy.
Largely, अभियान्त्रिकी प्रबंधक मैनेज इंजीनियर्स जो हैं चलित by non-entrepreneurial सोच, thus require the necessary people skills to coach, mentor and motivate technical professionals.
Engineering पेशेवर joining निर्माण कंपनियाँ sometimes become engineering managers by default after a period of time.
They are required to learn कैसा to मैनेज एकबार वे हैं on the जॉब, हालांकि इस is usually an ineffective way to develop managerial abilities.
In an insurance policy, the deductible is the amount of expenses that must be paid out of जेब पहले an insurer होगा अदा कोई expenses.
In general usage, the पद deductible may be प्रयुक्त to describe एक of अनेक types of clauses ( see below ) that are used by insurance companies as a threshold for policy payments.
Deductibles are typically प्रयुक्त to deter the विशाल क्रमांक of trivial claims that a consumer can be reasonably expected to bear the cost of.
By restricting its coverage to events that are significant enough to incur large costs, the बीमे कड़ expects to अदा आउट थोड़ा छोटी amounts much कम अक्सर, incurring much higher savings.
As a result, insurance premiums are typically सस्ता जब वे involve उच्चतर deductibles.
Deductibles are normally provided as clauses in an बीमे नीति कि dictate कैसा much of an insurance-covered expense is borne by the policyholder.
They are normally quoted as a fixed quantity और is a भाग of सबसे policies covering losses to the policy holder.
The insurer then becomes liable for claimable खर्च कि exceed इस राशि ( विषय to the अधिकतम sum claimable indicated in the contract ).
Depending on the policy, the deductible may लागू प्रति covered घटना, or per year.
For policies where incidences are not easy to delimit ( for उदाहरण स्वास्थ्य बीमे ), the deductible is typically applied per year.
Several deductibles can be set by the insurer आधारित on the कारण of the claim.
For example, a single housing insurance policy may contain multiple deductible amounts for घाटा or क्षति arising इससे चोरी, आग, प्राकृतिक calamities, evacuation etc.
There are also deductible reimbursement programs that reimburse a deductible in the event of an auto, home, boat/yacht or health insurance claim.
An invoice or bill is a commercial document जारी by a विक्रेता to a खरीदार, indicating the उत्पाद, quantities, and agreed prices for products or services the seller has provided the buyer.
An चालान indicates the sale transaction only.
Payment terms are स्वतंत्र of the चालान और हैं negotiated by the buyer and the seller.
Payment terms are usually included on the चालान.
The खरीदार could have already सशुल्क लिये the products or services listed on the invoice.
Buyer can also have a maximum number of days in which to pay for these goods and is sometimes offered a discount if paid before the due date.
In the rental industry, an invoice must include a specific सन्दर्भ to the अवधि of the समय होने billed, so in जोड to मात्रा, price and discount the invoicing amount is also based on duration.
Generally each line of a rental invoice will refer to the वास्तविक घंटों, दिनों, सप्ताह, महीने, etc., being billed.
From the point of view of a seller, an invoice is a बिक्री चालान.
From the point of view of a खरीदार, an चालान is a खरीदें invoice.
The document indicates the buyer and seller, but the पद चालान indicates धन is owed or owing.
In English, the context of the term invoice is usually used to clarify its meaning, such as `` We sent them an invoice '' ( they owe us money ) or `` We प्राप्त an चालान इससे उन्हें '' ( we owe them money ).
The right main bronchus ( or right primary bronchus, or right principal bronchus ) is a bronchus of the respiratory प्रणाली.
It is wider, shorter, और अधिक vertical in direction than the left.
It is परिचय 2.5 cm long, और enters the right lung nearly opposite the fifth thoracic vertebra.
The azygos vein arches over it from behind ; और the सही pulmonary धमनी झूठ at first below and then in front of it.
About 2 cm from इसके शुरुआत it देता बंद a branch to the upper lobe of the right lung.
This is termed the eparterial शाखा of the bronchus, because it arises above the right pulmonary artery.
The bronchus now passes below the artery, and is known as the hyparterial शाखा ; it divides into दो शाखाओं लिये the मध्य and lower lobes.
If a foreign body in the airway passes through the trachea, it will most likely enter the right main bronchus instead of the left, due to the straighter alignment of the right bronchus to the trachea.
Squash is a racquet sport played by two ( singles ) or चार खिलाड़ी ( युगल ) in a four-walled court with a small, hollow rubber ball.
The players must alternate in striking the बॉल साथ उनके racquet और hit the बॉल onto the playable सतहों of the four walls of the court.
The game was formerly called squash racquets, a reference to the `` squashable '' soft ball used in the game ( compared साथ the fatter बॉल प्रयुक्त in its parent game racquets or rackets ).
Squash is recognized by the IOC and supporters are lobbying लिये इसके incorporation in a भविष्य ओलम्पिक program.
In 2003, Forbes rated squash as the number एक healthiest खेल to खेल.
Residual oil is आयल मिला in कम concentrations naturally or in exhausted oil fields.
प्रायः मिश्रित साथ जल, it can not be recovered by conventional techniques.
However, it can be recovered using carbon dioxide-enhanced oil recovery ( co2 eor ) जिससे involves injecting कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड into the well reducing viscosity and enhancing flow of the oil.
The technique is not new but has not महरूम प्रयुक्त extensively on अवशेष आयल zones, low-grade deposits of petroleum such as the 38 square miles in the Permian Basin of Texas leased by Elliott Roosevelt Jr.
the तकनीक is सीमित by availability of carbon dioxide.
It does not result in sequestration of the कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड लकिन the गैस is recycled as much as possible.
United States reserves of अवशेष आयल हैं अनुमानित to be 100 billion barrels.
Artist 's rendering of the fire, by John R. Chapin, originally मुद्रित in हार्पर 's साप्ताहिक ; the दृश्य चेहरों पूर्वोत्तर आरपार the Randolph Street Bridge.
The Great Chicago आग थी a conflagration कि burned इससे संडे, अक्तूबर 8, to जल्दी मंगलवार, October 10, 1871, killing hundreds and destroying about in Chicago, Illinois.
Though the fire was one of the largest U.S. disasters of the 19th century, the rebuilding that began helped develop शिकागो as एक of the सबसे populous और economically महत्वपूर्ण अमरीकी शहरों.
Henry VIII ( 28 June 1491 – 28 January 1547 ) was king of इंग्लैण्ड इससे 21 अप्रैल 1509 जबतक his death.
He was lord, and later king, of Ireland, as खूब as continuing the नाममात्र अर्जी by the English monarchs to the Kingdom of France.
Henry was the second monarch of the ट्यूडर राजवंश, succeeding his father, Henry VII.
Besides his six marriages, Henry VIII is known for his role in the विरह of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड इससे the रोमन कैथोलिक Church.
Henry 's struggles with Rome led to the separation of the Church of इंग्लैण्ड इससे papal प्राधिकार, the विच्छेद of the monasteries, और उसके own establishment as the Supreme Head of the Church of England.
Yet he remained a believer in कोर कैथोलिक theological शिक्षाओं, भी बाद his excommunication from the Roman Catholic Church.
Henry oversaw the विधिक संघ of इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स साथ the Laws in Wales Acts 1535 and 1542.
In 1513, the new किंग अलाइड साथ the पावन रोमन सम्राट, Maximillian I, and invaded France in 1513 with a large, well-equipped army, but achieved little at a considerable financial cost.
Maximillian, for his part, used the English invasion to his own ends, and इस prejudiced इंग्लैण्ड 's क्षमता to शिकस्त the French.
This foray would prove the start of an obsession लिये हेनरी, जो invaded again in 1544.
This time, Henry 's forces captured the important city of Boulogne, but again the Holy Roman Emperor, Charles V, समर्थित हेनरी तभी as long as he needed to और इंग्लैण्ड, strained by the विशाल लागत of the war, ransomed the city back for peace.
His contemporaries considered हेनरी in उसके प्रधान to be an आकर्षक, शिक्षित and accomplished king, and he has been described as `` one of the most charismatic rulers to sit on the English throne ''.
Besides ruling with absolute power, he also सगाई खुद as an लेखक और composer.
His desire to provide England with a male heir – which stemmed partly from personal vanity and partly because he believed a daughter would be unable to consolidate the ट्यूडर राजवंश और the नाजुक सलाम कि existed following the युद्धों of the गुलाब – led to the दो बाते लिये जिससे Henry is most remembered : his six marriages and the English Reformation.
Henry became morbidly obese and his health suffered, contributing to उसके मौत in 1547.
He is frequently characterised in his later life as a lustful, egotistical, हर्ष, and insecure king.
La Reina del Sur ( The Queen of the South ) is a Spanish-language telenovela produced by the United States टेलीविज़न संजाल telemundo, in संयोजन साथ the एंटेना 3 संजाल और rti producciones.
Based on a novel of the same name by Spanish author Arturo Pérez-Reverte, the drama depicts the rise of टेरेसा मेंडोज़ा ( केट डेल कैस्टिलो ), a यंग स्त्री इससे मैक्सिको जो becomes the सबसे powerful drug trafficker in southern Spain.
Patricio Wills, the president of Telemundo टेलीविज़न studios, थी the executive producer.
Though La Reina del Sur was nominated for Novela of the Year, Favorite Lead Actress, and Best Bad Luck वीडियो, it जीती no पुरस्कार.
With a $ 10 million budget, La reina डेल सूर थी the सबसे महंगी telenovela ever produced by Telemundo.
The program 's premiere on February 28, 2011, was the संजाल 's उच्चतम रेटेड premiere for a telenovela to date.
The program frequently dominated its time slot, even over English भाषा प्रोग्रामिंग on अन्य प्रमुख u.S. संजाल.
La Reina del Sur completed its 63 episode चलाएं on telemundo और इसके 13 एपीसोड चलाएं on एंटेना 3 simultaneously on May 30, 2011.
The final episode was the उच्चतम रेटेड ब्रॉडकास्ट in telemundo 's 19-year इतिहास ( 4.2 लाख दर्शक ), और ताल सब of the English language U.S. television networks to earn the number one slot in the 18-49 adult demographic.
The program 's success spurred telemundo to लॉन्च इसके first campaign to gain the series an Emmy Award nomination.
A one-night special featuring several cast members aired on May 31, 2011, and marked the telemundo डेब्यू of विख्यात latina टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व Cristina Saralegui.
La Reina del Sur is broadcast in several other markets, including Serbia, Colombia, Chile, Cyprus, Nicaragua, Costa Rica, Mexico, Albania, हंगेरियाई, स्लोवेनियाई, क्रोएशिया, रोमानिया, ( among others ).

A web hosting service is a type of Internet hosting service that allows individuals और संगठन to मेक उनके जालस्थल accessible via the World Wide Web.
Web hosts are companies कि provide स्पेस on a सर्वर स्वामित्व or leased for use by clients, as well as providing Internet connectivity, typically in a data center.
Web hosts can also provide data center space and connectivity to the अंतरजाल लिये अन्य सर्वर स्तिथ in उनके आंकड़ा बीच, पुकारा colocation, भी ज्ञात as आवास in Latin America or France.
The scope of web hosting सेवाएं varies greatly.
The most basic is वेब पेज और small-scale संचिका होस्टिंग, जहाँ फाइलें can be uploaded via File Transfer Protocol ( FTP ) or a Web interface.
The files हैं प्रायः वितरित to the Web `` as is '' or with minimal processing.
Many अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाताओं ( isps ) offer this service free to subscribers.
Individuals and संगठन may भी obtain Web page hosting from alternative service providers.
Personal web site hosting is typically फ़्री, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
कारोबार वेब साईट होस्टिंग प्रायः रै a उच्चतर expense depending upon the size and type of the website.
Single page hosting is generally sufficient लिये निजी वेब पृष्ठों.
A complex site calls for a more comprehensive पैकेज कि provides डेटाबेस support और अनुप्रयोग विकास platforms ( e.g. PHP, Java, Ruby on Rails, ColdFusion, or ASP.NET ).
These facilities allow customers to लिखें or स्थापना स्क्रिप्ट लिये अनुप्रयोग like forums and content management.
Also, Secure Sockets Layer ( SSL ) is typically प्रयुक्त लिये e-commerce.
The host may also provide an interface or control फलक लिये मैनेजिंग the वेब सर्वर और installing स्क्रिप्ट, as खूब as अन्य मौड्यूल और सेवा अनुप्रयोग like e-mail.
Some hosts specialize in certain software or services ( e.g. e-commerce ), which are commonly used by larger कंपनियाँ कि outsource संजाल अवसंरचना.
Madden NFL ( known as John Madden Football before 1993 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल वीडियो खेल श्रेणी विकसित by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कला tiburon for EA Sports.
The game श्रेणी is नामित बाद प्रो फ़ुटबॉल हॉल of famer जॉन मैडेन, a well-known former Super Bowl –winning coach of the Oakland Raiders and color commentator.
The श्रेणी is the बेहतरीन selling EA Sports series.
The खेल have consistently महरूम a best seller, and has even spawned TV shows where players compete.
Among the game 's realistic features include sophisticated playbooks and player statistics, and voice commentary कि allows खिलाड़ी to सुन the खेल as if it यहूद a real TV broadcast.
The Madden NFL series has been nicknamed the एनएफएल 's 33rd Franchise.
The series was originally conceived by Electronic कला संस्थापक ट्रिप हॉकिन्स, जो तब approached Madden in 1984 for his endorsement and expertise.
Due to Madden 's insistence that the game be as realistic as संभावित, the पहला संस्करण of जॉन मैडेन फ़ुटबॉल was not released until 1988.
The दूसरी संस्करण of the खेल थी released in 1990, with annual versions since then.
The श्रेणी ' नाम थी बदला to मैडेन NFL in 1993 after EA acquired the rights to use NFL teams and players.
Despite Madden 's retirement as a broadcaster in 2009, he continues to lend उसके नाम और provide expertise for the game.
Cindy Lee Miller Sheehan ( born July 10, 1957 ) is an American antiwar activist whose son, U.S. Army Specialist Casey Sheehan, थी मारे by दुश्मन कार्रवाई दौरान the इराकी युद्ध.
She attracted national and international media attention in August 2005 for her extended antiwar विरोध at a makeshift शिविर बाहर अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश 's टेक्सास ranch —a स्टैंड कि खींचा दोनो passionate support and angry criticism.
Sheehan ran unsuccessfully for Congress in 2008.
She is a vocal critic of President बराक ओबामा 's विदेशी नीति.
Her memoir, Peace Mom : A Mother 's Journey through heartache to सक्रियता, थी प्रकाशित in 2006.
Sheehan was the 2012 vice-presidential nominee of the Peace and Freedom Party.
Wyclef Jeanelle Jean ( ; ; born October 17, 1969 ) Wyclef Dumped From Haiti 's अध्यक्षीय बैलट – समय, अगस्त 21, 2010.
`` Before he announced on August 5 that he was running for President of Haiti, Wyclef जां थी स्टिल लिस्टिंग उसके age as only 37 years old.
But after declaring himself a presidential candidate, the Haitian-American-Irish hip-hop star also decided to come clean and confirm that he was वाकई 40. '' is a three-time ग्रैमी पुरस्कार -winning haitian-american rapper, singer-songwriter, संगीतकार, रिकार्ड निर्माता, and politician.
At age nine, Jean moved to the संयुक्त राज्य साथ उसके परिवार and has spent much of his life in the country.
He first प्राप्त कीर्ति as a सदस्य of the acclaimed New Jersey hip hop group the Fugees.
On August 5, 2010, Jean filed for उम्मीदवारी in the 2010 haitian अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, although the Electoral Commission subsequently ruled him ineligible to stand as he had not met the requirement to have been resident in Haiti for five years.
wyclef जां to अपील against Haiti election ruling – BBC News, Aug 22, 2010.
Haiti 's electoral commission said that Mr Jean was ineligible to स्टैंड as the haitian संविधान requires उम्मीदवार to have जिया in the देश लिये पाँच years prior to an election.
The 40-year-old सिंगर जीवनदान in the US.
Jean 's efforts at earthquake relief, अत्यधिक publicized in 2010 throughout हैती और the संयुक्त राज्य, यहूद channeled through his charitable organization, Yéle Haiti.
The charity, which performed a किस्में of charitable works in हैती between 2005 and 2010, effectively closed in 2012.
In law, a set-off is a statutory रक्षा to the पूरे or to a portion of a plaintiff 's claim.
It had no existence under the अंग्रेज़ी आम विधि, होने निर्मित by 2 जियो. II c. 22 for the relief of insolvent debtors, although set-off was recognized in equity.
Such a defense could be pleaded only in respect of mutual debts of a definite character, and did not लागू to मामले in जिससे क्षतिपूर्ति यहूद claimed, nor to निष्पक्ष दावा or demands.
By the rules of the परम् अदालत ( O. xix. r. 3 ) a प्रतिवादी in an कार्रवाई may नियत बंद or set up any right or claim by way of counterclaim against the claims of a plaintiff, and such set-off or counterclaim has the same effect as a statement of claim in a cross-action.
The विधिक रक्षा of set-off ( ऊपर ) थी originally introduced to prevent the अन्यायपूर्ण हालात whereby a person ( `` Party A '' ) who owed money to another ( `` Party B '' ) could be sent to debtors prison, despite the fact that Party B also owed money to Party A.
The law thus allows दोनो पार्टियों to टालना payment until their respective claims have been heard in court.
Upon judgment, both claims are extinguished and replaced by a single net sum owing ( e.g. If Party A owes Party B 100 and Party B owes Party A 105, the two sums are set off and replaced साथ a सिंगल दायित्व of 5 इससे पार्टी b to पार्टी a ).
Set-off can also be incorporated by contractual अनुबंध so that, where a party defaults, the mutual amounts owing are automatically set off and extinguished.
In certain jurisdictions ( सहित the uk ), set-off takes प्लेस automatically upon the insolvency of a company.
This means that, for each party which is both a creditor and debtor of the insolvent कम्पनी, परस्पर debts हैं set-off विरूद्ध प्रत्येक अन्य, और तब either the दिवालिया 's creditor can claim the balance in the bankruptcy or the trustee in bankruptcy can ask for the balance remaining to be paid, depending on which side owed the most.
This has been criticized as an undeclared सुरक्षा ब्याज that violates the principle of pari passu.
The alternative, where a creditor has to pay all its debts, but receive only a limited portion of the leftover moneys कि अन्य unsecured लेनदारों मिलेंगी, मुद्राएँ the खतरे of 'knock-on ' insolvencies.
the सही to नियत बंद is विशेषकर important when reporting a bank 's exposures to regulatory authorities.
The situation where a bank has to report that it has lent a large sum to a borrower ( and is therefore exposed, because there is a risk that the borrower might default thereby leading to the loss of the bank 's or its जमाकर्ताओं ' धन ) is यूँ replaced ( जहाँ the बैंको रै लिया सुरक्षा over shares or securities of the borrower ) with an exposure of the money lent minus the value of the security taken.
Jennifer Joanna एनिस्टन ( born फ़रवरी 11, 1969 ) is an American actress, film director, and producer.
Aniston gained worldwide recognition in the 1990s for portraying Rachel Green on the television sitcom Friends, a role which earned उसके an एमी पुरस्कार, a सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार, और a स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार.
एनिस्टन रै भी enjoyed a successful Hollywood film career.
She gained critical acclaim for her प्रदर्शन in the स्वतंत्र films वो 's the एक ( 1996 ), दफ्तर स्पेस ( 1999 ), The Good Girl ( 2002 ) and Friends with Money ( 2006 ).
She has had her greatest commercial सफलताओं साथ the films ब्रूस सर्वशक्तिमान ( 2003 ), the break-up ( 2006 ), Marley & Me ( 2008 ), Just Go with It ( 2011 ) and Horrible Bosses ( 2011 ).
Aniston received a star on the हॉलीवुड चलना of Fame on February 22, 2012.

( वीडियो )
A श्वेत बाघ at tobu Zoo, in Saitama, Japan.
The white tiger is a recessive म्यूटेंट of the बंगाल बाघ, जिससे थी reported in the जंगली इससे time to time in Assam, Bengal, Bihar and especially from the former State of Rewa.
Conventional PCI ( पीसीआई is an initialism formed इससे परिधीय घटक इंटरकनेक्ट, part of the PCI Local Bus standard and often shortened to just PCI ) is a local computer bus for attaching hardware devices in a computer.
The PCI bus supports the functions found on a प्रोसेसर बस, लकिन in a मानकीकृत format that is independent of any particular processor.
Devices connected to the bus appear to the processor to be connected directly to the प्रोसेसर बस, और हैं आबंटित पता in the प्रोसेसर 's address space.
Attached devices can take either the form of an integrated circuit fitted onto the motherboard itself, पुकारा a planar यंत्र in the पीसीआई specification, or an विस्तार card that fits into a slot.
The PCI Local Bus was पहला implemented in ibm pc compatibles, where it displaced the combination of ISA plus one VESA Local Bus as the bus configuration.
It has subsequently महरूम अपनाया for other computer types.
PCI and PCI-X are being replaced by PCI Express, but, most motherboards हैं स्टिल बना साथ एक or अधिक पीसीआई slots, which are sufficient for many uses.
The पीसीआई specification कवर the शारीरिक आकार of the बस ( सहित the size and spacing of the circuit board edge electrical contacts ), electrical characteristics, bus timing, and protocols.
The specification can be purchased from the पीसीआई खास ब्याज समूह ( pci-sig ).
Typical PCI cards used in PCs include : network cards, ध्वनि ताश, modems, अतिरिक्त पोर्ट ऐसे as usb or serial, TV tuner cards and disk controllers.
PCI वीडियो ताश replaced isa और vesa ताश, जबतक growing बैंडविड्थ आवश्यकताएँ outgrew the capabilities of PCI ; the preferred interface for video cards became AGP, and then PCI Express.
PCI video cards remain available for use with old PCs बगैर अगप or पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस स्लॉट.
Many devices previously provided on PCI विस्तार ताश हैं अभी commonly एकीकृत onto motherboards or उपलब्धियाँ in universal serial bus and PCI Express versions.
कैफीन is a कड़वा, white crystalline xanthine alkaloid that acts as a stimulant drug.
Caffeine is found in varying quantities in the seeds, leaves, and fruit of some plants, where it अधिनियमों as a प्राकृतिक कीटनाशक कि paralyzes और मारता निश्चित कीट feeding on the पौधे, as well as enhancing the reward memory of pollinators.
It is most commonly consumed by इंसानो in infusions निकाली इससे the बीज of the कॉफी संयंत्र और the पत्ते of the tea bush, as well as from various foods and drinks containing products derived from the kola nut.
अन्य स्त्रोत शामिल yerba maté, guarana berries, guayusa, and the yaupon holly.
In humans, caffeine acts as a central nervous system stimulant, temporarily warding बंद drowsiness और restoring alertness.
It is the world 's most widely consumed psychoactive drug, but unlike many अन्य psychoactive substances, it is विधिक और unregulated in nearly सब भाग of the world.
Beverages containing caffeine, such as कॉफी, चाय, नरम पेय, और उर्जा पेय, आनंद great popularity.
In North America, 90 % of वयस्कों consume कैफीन daily.
Part of the reason caffeine is classified by the Food and Drug Administration as GRAS ( generally recognized as safe ) is कि विषाक्त doses ( over 10 गामा ) हैं much उच्चतर than typically used doses ( less than 500 milligrams ).
Ordinary consumption can have low health risks, even when carried on for years – there may be a modest protective प्रभाव विरूद्ध कुछ रोगों, सहित parkinsons बीमारी, और निश्चित types of cancer.
Caffeine can have दोनो धनात्मक और ऋणात्मक प्रभाव on anxiety disorders.
Some people experience sleep disruption if they consume caffeine, especially during the संध्या घंटों, लकिन अन्य दिखाएँ little disturbance and the effect of caffeine on sleep is highly variable.
Evidence of a risk to pregnancy is equivocal, लकिन कुछ अधिकारियों have concluded कि दूरदर्शी सलाह is for pregnant women to limit consumption to the equivalent of two cups of coffee per day or less.
The American Congress of Obstetricians and स्त्रीरोग ( acog ) concluded in 2010 कि caffeine consumption is safe up to 200 mg per day in pregnant women.
Caffeine has pressor and mild diuretic effects when administered to people who are not used to it, but regular users develop a tolerance to this effect, and अध्ययन have generally विफल to support the आम ख़्याल कि ordinary खपत contributes significantly to निर्जलीकरण.
With heavy use, सहिष्णुता develops rapidly to autonomic प्रभाव ऐसे as elevated दिल rate and muscle twitching, but not to the cognitive or arousal effects of caffeine.
The degree to which caffeine can produce clinically significant शारीरिक और दिमागी dependence remains a विषय of controversy in the medical literature.

A longboard is a longer रूपांतर of a skateboard.
It is commonly used for cruising, downhill racing, slalom रेसिंग, स्लाइडिंग, and/or हस्तांतरण.

The Coast Ranges of California span from Humboldt County, कैलिफ़ोर्निया दक्षिण to सांता बारबरा काउंटी.
The other three coastal California mountain ranges हैं the अनुप्रस्थ सीमाएँ, Peninsular Ranges and the Klamath Mountains.
Physiographically, they are a section of the larger Pacific Border province, which in turn हैं भाग of the larger प्रशांत पहाड़ प्रणाली physiographic प्रभाग.
UNESCO has included the `` California Coast Ranges Biosphere Reserve `` in its Man और the जीवमंडल कार्यक्रम of संसार Network of Biosphere Reserves since 1983.

An automobile, autocar, motor car or car is a wheeled motor vehicle used for transporting यात्री, which also carries its own engine or motor.
सबसे परिभाषाएं of the पद बताएँ कि ऑटोमोबाइल हैं designed to चलाएं primarily on सड़कें, to have seating for one to eight people, to typically have four wheels, and to be constructed principally for the transport of people rather than goods.
The term motorcar रै भी महरूम प्रयुक्त in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of electrified रेल प्रणालियों to denote a car which functions as a small locomotive but also provides space for passengers and baggage.
These locomotive cars were often used on suburban routes by both interurban और intercity रेलरोड प्रणालियों.
It was estimated in 2010 that the number of ऑटोमोबाइल था risen to over 1 billion vehicles, up from the 500 million of 1986.
The numbers हैं increasing rapidly, विशेषकर in China and India.
John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May 29, 1917 – November 22, 1963 ), often referred to by his initials JFK, थी the 35th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, सेवारत from 1961 until his death in 1963.
After military service as commander of the Motor Torpedo Boats PT-109 and PT-59 दौरान संसार युद्ध ii in the दक्षिण प्रशांत, कैनेडी represented मैसाचुसेट्स ' 11th congressional ज़िला in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a Democrat.
Thereafter, he served in the u.S. सीनेट इससे 1953 until 1960.
Kennedy defeated Vice President and Republican प्रत्याशी रिचर्ड निक्सन in the 1960 U.S. presidential election.
At 43 सालो of आयु, he is the youngest to have महरूम elected to the office, the second-youngest President ( after Theodore Roosevelt ), and the first person born in the 20th century to serve as president.
A Catholic, Kennedy is the तभी non- प्रोटोस्टेंट अध्यक्ष, and is the only president to have won a Pulitzer Prize.
Events during his presidency included the Bay of Pigs Invasion, the Cuban Missile Crisis, the building of the Berlin Wall, the स्पेस रेस, the african-american सिविल अधिकारों गति, और जल्दी चरण of the Vietnam War.
Therein, Kennedy increased the क्रमांक of सैन्य advisers, खास आपरेशन शक्तियां, और helicopters in an effort to curb the spread of communism in South East Asia.
The Kennedy administration adopted the policy of the रणनीतिक हैमलेट कार्यक्रम जिससे थी implemented by the South Vietnamese government.
It involved certain forced relocation, village internment, and पृथक्करण of ग्रामीण दक्षिण वियतनामी इससे the northern and southern communist insurgents.
Kennedy was assassinated on नवम्बर 22, 1963 in डलास, Texas.
Lee Harvey Oswald was charged with the crime, but he was shot और मारे by जोकर माणिक्य दो दिनों बाद, before a trial could take place.
the एफबीआई और the वारेन Commission officially concluded that Oswald was the lone assassin.
However, the United States House Select Committee on Assassinations ( HSCA ) concluded that those investigations यहूद flawed और कि कैनेडी थी संभवतः assassinated as the परिणाम of a conspiracy.
However, ABC News in their investigation, The Kennedy Assassination : Beyond Conspiracy, पुष्टि the निष्कर्षों of the वारेन आयोग ; having concluded Oswald acted alone.
Kennedy 's controversial Department of Defense TFX सेनानी bomber कार्यक्रम led to a congressional छानबीन कि lasted इससे 1963 to 1970.
Since the 1960s information concerning कैनेडी 's निजी जीवन has come to light.
विवरण of कैनेडी 's स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं in which he struggled have become better known, especially since the 1990s.
Although initially kept रहस्य इससे the सामान्य पब्लिक, रिपोर्ट्स of कैनेडी 's philandering have garnered much press.
Kennedy ranks अत्यधिक in पब्लिक राय ratings of U.S. presidents.

A Fire Alarm Control Panel ( FACP ), or Fire Alarm कंट्रोल ईकाई ( facu ), is the controlling घटक of a Fire Alarm System.
The panel receives information from environmental sensors designed to detect changes associated with fire, monitors उनके operational अखंडता और provides लिये स्वचालित कंट्रोल of उपकरण, और हस्तांतरण of सूचना जरुरी to तैयारी the facility for fire based on a predetermined sequence.
The panel may also सप्लाई विद्युत उर्जा to operate any associated sensor, control, transmitter, or relay.
There are four basic प्रकार of panels : coded panels, conventional panels, addressable panels, and multiplex systems.

Bandaranaike International Airport ( BIA ) ( also known as Katunayake International Airport and Colombo अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र ) is एक of the दो अंतरराष्ट्रीय airports serving the city of Colombo, the other is Ratmalana International Airport.
mattala राजपक्षे अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र स्तिथ in दक्षिणी city of Hambantota is the other international airport in Sri Lanka.
भण्डारनायके International Airport is located in Katunayake, 22 miles ( 35 km ) north of Colombo.
It is administered by विमानक्षेत्र और विमानन Services ( Sri Lanka ) Ltd.
It is the hub of SriLankan Airlines, the नेशनल वाहक of श्री लंका, और mihin लंका, the budget airline of Sri Lanka.
Black Swan is a 2010 American psychological thriller and horror film directed by Darren aronofsky और अभिनीत नताली पोर्टमैन, विंसेंट Cassel, and Mila Kunis.
The plot revolves around a production of tchaikovsky 's swan झील बैले by a prestigious नई यॉर्क नगर company.
The production requires a ballerina to play the निर्दोष और नाजुक श्वेत swan, लिये जिससे the वचनबद्ध dancer Nina ( Portman ) is a perfect fit, as well as the dark and sensual Black Swan, which are qualities embodied by the new arrival Lily ( Kunis ).
Nina is अभिभूत by a अहसास of immense दबाव जब she finds herself competing for the part, causing her to lose her tenuous grip on reality and descend into a living nightmare.
Aronofsky conceived the premise by connecting his viewings of a उत्पादन of swan झील साथ an unrealized screenplay about understudies and the notion of being haunted by a double, similar to the folklore surrounding doppelgängers.
Aronofsky cites Fyodor Dostoyevsky 's `` the दोगुना `` as another प्रेरणा for the film.
The director also considered Black Swan a companion piece to उसके 2008 film The Wrestler, with both films involving demanding performances for different kinds of art.
He and Portman first discussed the project in 2000, and after a ब्रैड अनुलग्नक to सार्वभौमिक studios, ब्लैक swan was produced in New York City in 2009 by Fox Searchlight Pictures.
Portman and Kunis trained in ballet for several months prior to filming, and notable figures from the बैले संसार helped साथ फिल्मी उत्पादन to आकार the बैले प्रस्तुतीकरण.
The film premiered as the opening फिल्मी लिये the 67th वेनिस अंतरराष्ट्रीय फिल्मी Festival on September 1, 2010.
It had a limited release in the United States starting दिसम्बर 3, 2010 and opened nationwide on December 17.
Black Swan received नाजुक तारीफ़ upon इसके रिलीज, विशेषकर for Portman 's performance and Aronofsky 's direction, and was a significant box office success, grossing $ 329 million worldwide.
The film received five Academy Award nominations and Portman won the Best Actress award for the film, as खूब as अनेक अन्य बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री पुरस्कार in अनेक guilds and festivals, while Aronofsky was nominated for Best Director.
In addition, the film itself प्राप्त a नामांकन for Best Picture.
The world’s first ice-calorimeter, used in the winter of 1782-83, by एंटोनी लाव्वाज़्ये और pierre-simon लाप्लास, to determine the ऊष्मा शामिल in विभिन्न रासायनिक परिवर्तन ; calculations जिससे यहूद आधारित on Joseph Black ’s prior discovery of latent heat.
These experiments mark the foundation of thermochemistry.
A calorimeter ( from Latin calor, meaning heat ) is an object used for calorimetry, or the process of measuring the ऊष्मा of रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ or शारीरिक परिवर्तन as well as heat capacity.
Differential स्कैनिंग calorimeters, समतापी microcalorimeters, titration calorimeters and accelerated rate calorimeters are among the most common types.
A सरल ऊष्मामापी बस consists of a थर्मामीटर संलग्न to a metal container full of water suspended above a combustion chamber.
To find the enthalpy change per mole of a substance A in a reaction between two substances A and B, the substances are added to a ऊष्मामापी और the आरंभिक और फाइनल temperatures ( पहले the प्रतिक्रिया प्रारंभ और बाद it has finished ) are noted.
Multiplying the temperature बदलें by the द्रव्यमान और विशिष्ट ऊष्मा capacities of the substances gives a value for the energy given off or absorbed during the reaction.
Dividing the energy change by how अनेक औज़ार of a यहूद उपस्थित देता its enthalpy change of reaction.
This method is used primarily in academic शिक्षण as it describes the सिद्धान्त of calorimetry.
It does not account for the heat loss through the container or the ऊष्मा क्षमता of the थर्मामीटर and container itself.
In addition, the object placed inside the calorimeter shows that the objects transferred their heat to the calorimeter and into the liquid, and the heat अवशोषित by the ऊष्मामापी और the द्रव is बराबर to the heat given off by the metals.
A जोड़ी of green flip-flops
Flip-flops ( also called zōri, thongs, jandals, or a variety of other names throughout the world ) are a type of open-toed चन्दन typically worn in कैज़ुअल परिस्थितियों, ऐसे as बाहर or at the बीच.
They consist of a flat sole held loosely on the foot by a y-shaped डोरी कि गुजरता between the पहला and second toes and around either side of the foot.
They may also be held to the foot with a single strap over the सामने of the पैर बल्कि than a thong.
The name `` flip-flop '' originated because of the sound कि is बना by slapping between the एकमात्र of the foot and the floor when walking.
This style of footwear has been worn by the people of many cultures throughout the world, originating as जल्दी as the प्राचीन उन्होंने in 4,000 B.C.
The modern flip-flop उतरता इससे the जापानी zōri, जिससे became लोकप्रिय बाद संसार युद्ध II when soldiers returning to the United States brought them back.
They became popular in casual settings during the 1960s, 1990s, and 2000s, and some किस्में have भी मिला उनके रास्ता into अधिक औपचारिक पहनावा, despite criticism.
The use of flip-flops can result in many pains और चोटों, including ankle sprains and broken bones.
Some individuals जो चलना लिये long अवधि रपट पीड़ा in the feet, ankles, and lower legs.
The कमी of support provided by flip-flops प्रायः results in over-pronation injuries, caused by the foot slipping inwards further than normal.
इस can सीसे to flat feet and tendonitis.
Other injuries that may result are due to the footwear 's open-toed nature, such as stubbed toes, कटौती, और bruises.
Doctors सुझाएँ खरीदना pricier चप्पल साथ thick-cushioned सोल्स, as well as those that have a strap that is not canvas and that comes back almost to the ankle.
The owners of Hanjin Osaka, seen here transiting the Panama Canal in 2008, घोषित सामान्य औसत following an विस्फोट in the ship 's engine room on.
The law of general average is a legal principle of maritime law according to which all parties in a sea venture proportionally share कोई नुकसान resulting इससे a voluntary बलिदान of भाग of the जलयान or कार्गो to सहेजें the whole in an emergency.
In the exigencies of hazards faced at sea, crew members often have precious little time in which to determine precisely जिनकी कार्गो वे हैं jettisoning.
Thus, to avoid quarrelling कि could बर्बाद मूल्यवान समय, वहीँ arose the निष्पक्ष अभ्यास whereby सब the व्यापारियों जिनकी कार्गो उतरा सकुशल would be called on to contribute a portion, based upon a share or percentage, to the merchant or merchants whose goods had been tossed overboard to avert imminent peril.
While general average traces इसके origins in प्राचीन मेरीटाइम विधि, स्टिल it remains part of the admiralty law of most countries.
The पहला संहिताकरण of सामान्य average was the York Antwerp Rules of 1890.
American कंपनियाँ स्वीकृत it in 1949.
General average requires three elements which are clearly stated by mr. Justice Grier in Barnard v. Adams:
`` 1st.
A common danger : a danger in which vessel, cargo and crew all participate ; a danger imminent and जाहिर 'inevitable, ' मगर by voluntarily incurring the loss of a portion of the whole to save the remainder. ''
`` 2nd. There must be a voluntary jettison, jactus, or casting दूर, of कुछ portion of the संयुक्त चिंता लिये the purpose of बचने इस imminent peril, periculi imminentis evitandi causa, or, in other words, a transfer of the peril from the whole to a particular portion of the whole. ''
`` 3rd.
इस attempt to avoid the निकट आम peril must be successful ''.
Example Polish कॉल लिये टीकाकरण against Diphtheria and Tetanus.
A vaccination schedule is a series of vaccinations, including the timing of all doses, which may be either recommended or अनिवार्य, depending on the देश of निवास.
A vaccine is an antigenic preparation used to उपज क्रियाशील प्रतिरक्षण to a बीमारी, in अनुक्रम to prevent or reduce the प्रभाव of infection by any natural or `` wild '' pathogen.
Many vaccines require multiple doses for maximum effectiveness, either to produce sufficient initial प्रतिरक्षा response or to boost response that fades over time.
For example, tetanus vaccine boosters are often अनुशंसित प्रत्येक 10 years.
Vaccine schedules are developed by governmental agencies or physicians groups to achieve maximum effectiveness using required and recommended vaccines for a locality जबकि महती the क्रमांक of स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रणाली interactions.
Over the past two decades, the recommended vaccination अनुसूची रै grown rapidly और become अधिक जटिल as many new vaccines have been developed.
Some vaccines are recommended only in certain areas ( countries, subnational क्षेत्रों, or at-risk populations ) जहाँ a disease is common.
For instance, yellow fever vaccination is on the routine vaccine schedule of French Guiana, is recommended in certain regions of ब्राज़ील लकिन in the संयुक्त राज्य is तभी दिए to travelers heading to countries with a history of the disease.
In विकासशील देशों, टीका सुझाव भी take into account the level of health care access, the cost of vaccines and issues with vaccine availability and storage.
Sample vaccinations schedules discussed by the संसार स्वास्थ्य संगठन दिखाएँ a विकसित देश using a अनुसूची जिससे extends over the पहला पाँच सालो of a चाइल्ड 's जीवन और उपयोग vaccines which cost over $ 700 including administration costs while a developing country uses a schedule providing vaccines in the first 9 months of life and costing only $ 25.
This difference is due to the lower cost of health care, the निम्नतर लागत of अनेक टीके provided to विकासशील राष्ट्र, और कि अधिक महंगी vaccines, often for less common diseases, are not utilized.
In 1900, the smallpox vaccine was the only one administered to children.
By the early 1950s, children routinely received four vaccines, for protection विरूद्ध ( डिप्थीरिया, pertussis, टेटनस, पोलियो, और smallpox ), और as अनेक as पाँच गोलियाँ by two years of age.
Since the mid-1980s, many vaccines have been added to the अनुसूची.
, the US Centers for बीमारी कंट्रोल और रोकथाम ( सीडीसी ) now recommends vaccination against at least fourteen diseases.
By two years of age, U.S. children receive as many as 24 vaccine injections, and might receive up to पाँच गोलियाँ दौरान एक विज़िट to the doctor.
The use of संयोजन टीका उत्पाद अर्थात् कि,, the संयुक्त Kingdom 's immunization program consists of 10 injections by the age of two, rather than 25 if vaccination for each disease was given as a separate injection.
दो revellers नृत्य in the streets.
The form of नाचना is पुकारा `` wining '' ( winding ) pronounced wine-ing
a म्यूज़िक ट्रक entertains the crowd on the streets.

The Trinidad and Tobago Carnival is an सालाना इवेंट आयोजित on the सोमवार और मंगलवार पहले राख Wednesday, and is well known for participant 's colorful costumes and exuberant celebrations.
Carnival in Trinidad and Tobago is the most significant इवेंट on the आइलैंड्स ' सांस्कृतिक और पर्यटन पंचांग, साथ numerous cultural events running in the lead up to the street parade on Carnival Monday and Tuesday.
It is said that if the islanders are नहीं celebrating it, तब वे हैं तैयारी लिये it, जबकि reminiscing about the past year 's festival.
The heart of the musical जश्न रै महरूम कैलिप्सो ; recently सोका रै replaced calypso as the most celebrated type of music.
Costumes, stickfighting और limbo प्रतियोगिताओं are also important components of the festival.
कार्निवल as it is मनाये in Trinidad and Tobago is also celebrated in cities worldwide.
These सहित टोरंटो 's caribana, मियामी 's मियामी कार्निवल, Houston Carifest, London 's Notting Hill Carnival as well as New York City 's Labor Day Carnival to name a few.
Carnival was created when West अफ़्रीकी स्लेव mimicked उनके फ्रेंच स्वामी जो जहाँ ज्ञात for their lavish costumes balls.
Forbidden to partake in these festivities और confined to उनके quarters, slaves combined elements from their own cultures to their master 's fete.
Hence the creation of वर्ण ऐसे as jab jab or jab molassie ( शैतानों ), Midnight Robbers, Imps, Lagahroo, Soucouyant, La Diablesse and Demons.
With the abolition of slavery in 1838, freed Africans took their version of Carnival to the गलियों through अभिव्यक्ति of ड्रम, riddim भाग जैसे tamboo बाँसुरी और as प्रत्येक नई अप्रवासी जनसांख्यिकी entered Trinidad, Carnival evolved into what we know today.
The city of Chicago, Illinois held a nonpartisan mayoral election on मंगलवार, फ़रवरी 22, 2011.
Incumbent Mayor Richard M. Daley, a member of the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी जो था महरूम in दफ्तर चूंकि 1989, किया not seek a seventh term as mayor.
Candidates needed to collect 12,500 petition signatures by November 22, 2010 to qualify लिये a प्लेस on the बैलट.
April 5, 2011 was scheduled to be a runoff चुनाव तिथि if no प्रत्याशी प्राप्त an निरपेक्ष majority.
Rahm Emanuel won the race for mayor साथ अधिक than 55 % of the vote.
He was उदघाटन on May 16, 2011.
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' is a song by American इंडी पॉप बैंड फोस्टर the People.
It was released as the समूह 's डेब्यू सिंगल in सितंबर 2010, और the following year was included on their EP Foster the People and their debut album Torches.
`` उत्तेजित up kicks '' became the समूह 's breakthrough hit and was one of the most popular songs of 2011.
The song was written and अंकित by frontman चिह्नित फोस्टर while he was working as a commercial jingle writer.
Contrasting with the upbeat musical संयोजन, the गीत describe the homicidal thoughts of a troubled youth.
The track received considerable attention after it थी posted ऑनलाइन in 2010 as a फ़्री डाउनलोड, और it helped the group garner a multi-album record deal with Columbia Records imprint Startime International.
`` Pumped up kicks '' proved to be a स्लीपर hit ; in 2011, बाद receiving significant airplay on modern rock stations, the song crossed-over onto contemporary hit radio stations.
The song spent eight consecutive weeks at number three on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट in the संयुक्त राज्य, बनाना it the first Billboard Alternative Songs number-one single to crack the U.S. top 5 since Kings of Leon 's `` Use Somebody `` in 2009.
The song थी widely praised by आलोचकों, और it रै महरूम licensed for use in a wide range of popular media since its release.
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' प्राप्त a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन पॉप Duo/Group Performance.
The State Fair of वेस्ट वर्जिनिया is an annual state fair for West Virginia.
It is held annually in mid-August on the State Fairgrounds in Fairlea, निकट lewisburg, वेस्ट वर्जिनिया in the southeastern भाग of the state.
The State Fairgrounds consists of a विशाल खोलें फ़ील्ड लिये carnivals और प्रदर्शनियों, a horse track, grandstands, and several exhibition buildings.
Free parking is provided adjacent to the fairgrounds और, जबतक 2006, फ़्री कैंप थी भी उपलब्धियाँ in a विशाल field with running-water toilets and showers, but no hookups.
Campers are now चार्ज a small fee.
the श्वेत हाउस, the अध्यक्ष 's official residence and center of the administration
Under the United States Constitution, the President of the United राज्य is the सिर of राज्य और सिर of सरकारी of the United States.
As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal government as a whole, the presidency is the उच्चतम राजनैतिक दफ्तर in the संयुक्त राज्य by influence and recognition.
The president is also the commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद शक्तियां.
The president is indirectly elected to a four-year term by an Electoral College ( or by the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि चाहिए the चुनावी कॉलेज असफल to award an absolute majority of votes to any person ).
Since the ratification of the Twenty-second Amendment to the United States Constitution in 1951, no person may be elected President more than twice, and no एक जो रै परोसा अधिक than दो सालो of a पद to which someone else was elected may be elected more than once.
Upon the death, resignation, or removal from office of an incumbent President, the वाइस अध्यक्ष assumes the office.
The President must be at तनिक 35 सालो of आयु और a `` प्राकृतिक born '' citizen of the United States.
This list includes only those persons who were sworn into office as president following the अनुसमर्थन of the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान, which took effect on March 4, 1789.
For अमरीकी नेताओ पहले इस ratification, see President of the Continental Congress.
The list does not include any एक्टिंग राष्ट्रपतियों अंतर्गत the twenty-fifth amendment to the United States Constitution.
There have been 43 people sworn into office, and 44 presidencies, as Grover Cleveland served two non-consecutive terms and is counted chronologically as both the 22nd and 24th president.
Of the individuals elected as अध्यक्ष, चार died in दफ्तर of प्राकृतिक कल्याणकारी ( विलियम हेनरी हैरिसन, zachary टेलर, Warren G. Harding, and Franklin D. Roosevelt ), four were assassinated ( Abraham Lincoln, James A. Garfield, William McKinley, and John F. Kennedy ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ).
George Washington, the first president, was उदघाटन in 1789 बाद a सर्वसम्मत vote of the Electoral College.
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest समय in दफ्तर साथ 32 दिनों in 1841, और फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट spent the longest with over twelve years, but died shortly into his fourth term in 1945.
He is the only अध्यक्ष to serve अधिक than दो शर्तें, और a संवैधानिक amendment, affecting presidents after Harry Truman, was passed to limit the number of times an individual can be elected president.
Andrew Jackson, the seventh president, was the first to be elected by men of सब वर्ग in 1828 बाद सबसे कानून barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed.
Warren Harding was the first निर्वाचित बाद महिलाओं gained voting rights in 1920.
History रिकॉर्ड चार राष्ट्रपतियों – जॉन q एडम्स, रदरफोर्ड B. हेज़, बेंजामिन हैरिसन and George W. Bush – who lost the popular vote but assumed office.
John F. कैनेडी रै महरूम the तभी अध्यक्ष of रोमन कैथोलिक आस्था, and the current president, Barack Obama, is the first president of African descent.
`` लोम्बार्डी ट्रॉफी '' redirects here.
For the award awarded annually to the best college फ़ुटबॉल lineman or linebacker, देखिए Lombardi Award.
The Vince Lombardi Trophy is the trophy awarded प्रत्येक साल to the जीतना टोली of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल League 's championship game, the Super Bowl.
The trophy is named in सम्मान of legendary NFL coach Vince Lombardi.
इस is a सूची of टेबल of the सत्यापित oldest people in the world in ordinal rank, such as oldest person or oldest man.
In these tables, a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if his or her claim has been validated by an अंतरराष्ट्रीय देह कि specifically सौदे in आयु शोध, ऐसे as the Gerontology Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records.
The longest unambiguously प्रलेखित इंसान जीवनकाल is that of Jeanne Calment of France ( 1875–1997 ), who died at age 122 years, 164 days.
She met विंसेंट वैन Gogh when she was 12 or 13.
This led to न्यूज मीडिया ध्यान in 1985, after Calment turned 110.
Subsequent investigation found documentation for Calment 's age, परे कोई उचित सवाल, in the रिकॉर्ड of her native city, Arles, France.
More evidence of calment 's जीवनकाल रै महरूम उत्पादित than लिये कोई other supercentenarian ; her case serves as an archetype in the methodology for verifying the ages of the world 's oldest people.
The longest undisputed lifespan for male supercentenarians is that of jiroemon किमुरा, जो फिलहाल जीवनदान in Japan and is age as of.
Since the death of 115-year old Dina manfredini of the संयुक्त राज्य, on 17 दिसम्बर 2012, Kimura, born 19 April 1897, is the oldest living person in the world whose age can be documented.
he रै भी महरूम the oldest living man since the death of 114-year old Walter Breuning on 14 April 2011.
Since the death of 115-year old Koto Okubo of जापानी on 12 जनवरी 2013, the oldest जीना woman has been -year-old Misao Okawa, also from Japan, born on 5 March 1898.
The People 's Court is an American arbitration-based वास्तविकता अदालत दिखाएँ, फिलहाल presided over by रिटायर्ड फ्लोरिडा राज्य सर्किट Court Judge Marilyn Milian, in which small claims disputes are handled.
The People 's Court is the first court show to use binding मध्यस्थता, introducing the स्वरूप into the genre in 1981.
The प्रणाली रै महरूम duplicated by most of the show 's successors in the judicial genre.
Moreover, The लोगों 's अदालत is the पहला लोकप्रिय, long-running reality in the judicial genre.
It was preceded only by a few short-lived realities in the विधा ; ये short-lived पूर्ववर्तियों यहूद तभी loosely related to judicial proceedings, except for one : Parole ( 1959 ) took footage from real-life courtrooms holding legal proceedings.
Prior to The People 's Court, the vast majority of TV courtroom shows used अभिनेताओं, और बनाई or fictional मामले ( as किया radio before that ).
Among examples of these types of अदालत shows शामिल प्रसिद्ध जूरी ट्रायल और अपना Witness.
The लोगों 's अदालत रै था two contrasting lives.
The show 's first life was presided over solely by former Los Angeles काउंटी श्रेष्ठ अदालत न्यायधीश जोसेफ Wapner.
His tenure lasted इससे the दिखाएँ 's डेब्यू on September 14, 1981, until May 21, 1993, when the show was cancelled due to low ratings.
इस बाएँ the दिखाएँ साथ a total of 2,484 1⁄2-hour episodes and 12 seasons.
The दिखाएँ थी taped in Los Angeles during its first life.
After being cancelled, reruns aired जबतक सितंबर 9, 1994.
on सितंबर 8, 1997, बाद होने आउट of उत्पादन for four years, The People 's Court was revived for a second life in first-run syndication as a 60-minute program.
Former lawyer and Mayor of New York Ed Koch was chosen as arbiter, जिससे he कायम लिये 2 सीज़न इससे the 1997–98 ऋतु through the 1998–99 ऋतु ( the उपस्थित life 's 2nd season and overall show 's 14th ).
By the 1999–00 season, husband of Judith Sheindlin ( who presides over Judge जुडी ) और पूर्व नई यॉर्क राज्य परम् अदालत न्यायधीश Jerry Sheindlin succeeded Koch.
Sheindlin lasted एक और a हाफ सीज़न as he थी replaced towards the end of the 2000–01 season ( present life 's 4th season and overall show 's 17th ).
Beginning in spring 2001, Florida न्यायधीश मर्लिन milian took over The People 's Court and has presided over the show ever since.
Once Milian completes the 2012–13 season, she will have served as longest arbiter over the श्रेणी साथ 12 और a half seasons.
As of the उपस्थित, however, उसके सालो on the कार्यक्रम tie Wapner at 12 seasons.
In the 2009-10 टेलीविज़न ऋतु, the लोगों 's Courts 2nd/present life outlasted its first when it reached 13 seasons.
While the show taped in New York City for the पहला 15 सीज़न of इसके दूसरी जीवन, it अभी टेपों in Stamford, Connecticut as of the 2012-13 season.
On September 3, 2012, The People 's अदालत 's 2nd/present जीवन डाला its 16th season ( 28th overall season ).
With 28 total seasons, The People 's Court ranks as the 2nd longest-running courtroom program behind the ongoing Divorce Court at 33 सीज़न ( इससे इसके 3 संयुक्त lives ).
Utah ( or ) ( arapaho : wo'tééneihí ' ) is a state in the Western United States.
It became the 45th state admitted to the संघ on जनवरी 4, 1896.
Utah is the 13th-largest, the 34th-most populous, and the 10th-least-densely populated of the 50 United States.
Approximately 80 % of Utah 's 2,817,222 people live along the Wasatch Front, centering on Salt Lake City, leaving vast expanses of the state nearly uninhabited और बनाना the जनसांख्यिकी the छठे सबसे urbanized in the u.S. यूटा is bordered by Colorado on the east, Wyoming on the northeast, Idaho on the north, Arizona on the south, and Nevada on the west.
It also छू a कोने of नई मैक्सिको on the southeast.
यूटा is the सबसे religiously समरूप state in the Union.
Approximately 63 % of Utahns are reported to be members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints or lds ( mormons ), जिससे greatly प्रभाव यूटा culture and daily life.
The world headquarters of The गिरिजाघर of यीशु मसीह of latter-day Saints ( LDS Church ) is located in Utah 's state capital.
The state is a center of transportation, education, सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी और शोध, सरकारी सेवाएं, mining, and a major tourist destination for outdoor recreation.
According to the U.S. Census Bureau 's population estimates, यूटा is the पांचवां fastest-growing राज्य in the संयुक्त States as of 2012.
st. जार्ज, थी the fastest–growing महानगर area in the United States from 2000 to 2005.
A 2012 Gallup national survey found Utah overall to be the `` best state to live in '' based on 13 forward-looking माप सहित विभिन्न आर्थिक, lifestyle, and health-related outlook metrics.
Coldwater is a small town in टेट काउंटी, मिसिसिपी.
it is in the Memphis Metropolitan Area.
The population was 1,674 at the 2000 census.
The hard palate is a thin आड़ा बोनी थाली of the कपाल, स्तिथ in the roof of the mouth.
It spans the मेहराब formed by the upper teeth.
It is formed by the palatine process of the maxilla और आड़ा थाली of palatine अस्थि.
It forms a partition between the nasal passages और the mouth.
भी on the अग्रवर्ती portion of the छत of the मुश्किल तालु is the rugae जिससे are the irregular ridges in the mucous membrane that help facilitate the movement of food backwards towards the pharynx.
This partition is जारी deeper into the मुँह by a fleshy extension called the soft palate.
Complete set of scrolls, constituting the entire Tanakh.
The Tanakh (, or ; also Tenakh, Tenak, Tanach ) is a नाम प्रयुक्त in Judaism for the canon of the Hebrew Bible.
The Tanakh is also known as the masoretic टेक्स्ट or the Miqra.
The name is an acronym formed from the initial Hebrew letters of the Masoretic टेक्स्ट 's तीन परंपरागत subdivisions : the तोरा ( `` शिक्षण '', भी ज्ञात as the पाँच किताबे of मूसा ), nevi'im ( `` नबियों '' ) और ketuvim ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh.
The name `` Miqra '' ( מקרא ), meaning `` that which is read '', is an वैकल्पिक यहूदी पद लिये the Tanakh.
The books of the tanakh यहूद relayed साथ an accompanying oral tradition passed on by each generation, called the Oral Torah.
Sobriety checkpoint in जर्मनी
Driving under the influence ( DUI ), driving while intoxicated ( DWI ), drunken driving, drunk ड्राइविंग, पेय ड्राइविंग, ऑपरेटिंग अंतर्गत the influence, पीने और ड्राइविंग, or impaired ड्राइविंग is the अपराधों of ड्राइविंग a मोटर vehicle with blood levels of alcohol in excess of a legal limit ( `` Blood Alcohol Content '', or `` BAC '' ).
Similar regulations cover driving or operating certain types of machinery while affected by पीने दारू or लेने अन्य दवाएँ, सहित, लकिन नहीं सीमित to नुस्खा drugs.
This is a दण्ड ठोकर in most nations.
convictions do नहीं necessarily involve actual driving of the vehicle.
In most jurisdictions a measurement such as a रक्त दारू सामग्री ( bac ) in excess of a विशिष्ट दहलीज स्तर, ऐसे as 0.05 % or 0.08 % defines the offense, with no need to prove impairment or being under the influence of alcohol.
In some jurisdictions, there is an aggravated category of the offense at a उच्चतर स्तर e.g. 0.12 %.
in सबसे देशों, anyone जो is convicted of injuring or killing someone while under the influence of alcohol or drugs can be heavily fined, as in France, in addition to being given a lengthy prison sentence.
Some jobs have their अपना नियम और bac हद, लिये उदाहरण वाणिज्यिक पायलट, and the Federal Railroad Administration in the United States has a 0.04 % limit for train crew.
Some jurisdictions have multiple levels of BAC ; for example, the राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया रै a 0.08 % bac सीमा, जिससे is lowered to 0.04 % if the ऑपरेटर holds a commercial driver 's license.
The कैलिफ़ोर्निया bac सीमा is 0.01 % लिये those younger than 21 years of age and those on probation for a previous DUI conviction.
Some large corporations have their own rules ; Union Pacific Railroad has their अपना bac सीमा of 0.02 % कि, if violated दौरान a यादृच्छिक test or a for-cause test — for example, after a traffic accident — can result in termination of employment with no chance of future re-hire.
Many states in the U.S. and provinces in Canada have adopted truth in sentencing कानून कि enforce सख्त दिशानिर्देश on sentencing, differing इससे पिछला अभ्यास जहाँ थाना time was reduced or suspended after sentencing had been issued.
Some jurisdictions have judicial दिशानिर्देश requiring a अनिवार्य minimum sentence.
Penalties for DUI charges range from expensive fees to forfetiruree of अपना अनुज्ञा प्लेटों और in कुछ गंभीर हालातों, अपना गाडी.
A drunk ड्राइविंग सिम्युलेटर in Montréal, Canada
The specific criminal offense may be called, depending on the jurisdiction, driving under the influence [ of alcohol or other drugs ] ( DUI ), driving under intense influence ( DUII ), driving while intoxicated ( DWI ), operating under the influence ( OUI ) ऑपरेटिंग जबकि intoxicated ( owi ), ऑपरेटिंग a मोटर गाडी जबकि intoxicated ( omvi ), driving under the combined influence of alcohol and/or other drugs, driving under the influence per se or drunk in charge [ of a vehicle ].
Many such laws apply also to motorcycling, बोटिंग, piloting वायुयान, उपयोग of motile फार्म उपकरण ऐसे as tractors और combines, riding horses or driving a horse-drawn vehicle, or bicycling, possibly with different BAC level than driving.
In some jurisdictions there are पृथक आरोप depending on the गाडी प्रयुक्त, ऐसे as bwi ( bicycling while intoxicated ), which may carry a lighter sentence.
In the United States, local law enforcement एजेंसियों बना 1,467,300 रखवाले देशभर लिये ड्राइविंग अंतर्गत the influence of alcohol in 1996, compared to 1.9 million such arrests during the peak year in 1983.
In 1997 an estimated 513,200 DWI offenders यहूद in थाना or कारावास, bas इससे 593,000 in 1990 and up from 270,100 in 1986.
Officers from US Customs and Border सुरक्षा बोर्डिंग a जलयान
Law enforcement in the संयुक्त राज्य is एक of तीन प्रमुख components of the दण्ड justice system of the United States, along with courts and corrections.
Although there exists an inherent interrelatedness between the different groups that make up the दण्ड इंसाफ प्रणाली आधारित on उनके अपराधों deterrence purpose, each component operates independently from one another.
However, the judiciary is vested with the power to make legal determinations regarding the conduct of the अन्य दो components.
Apart from maintaining order और सेवा कृत्यों, the purpose of policing is the investigation of suspected criminal activity and the referral of the results of investigations and of suspected criminals to the courts.
Law प्रवर्तन, to varying डिग्री at अलग स्तर of सरकारी और in अलग एजेंसियों, is भी commonly चार्ज साथ the जिम्मेदारियों of deterring दण्ड कार्यकलाप and of preventing the successful commission of crimes in progress ; the service and enforcement of warrants, writs and other orders of the courts.
Law प्रवर्तन एजेंसियों हैं भी शामिल in providing पहला जवाब to emergencies and other threats to public safety ; the protection of certain public facilities and infrastructure ; the maintenance of public order ; the protection of public officials ; and the operation of some correctional facilities ( usually at the local level ).
Elmer Figueroa Arce ( born June 28, 1968 ), best ज्ञात अंतर्गत the स्टेज नाम chayanne, is a प्यूर्टो rican Latin pop singer and actor.
As a solo artist, chayanne रै released 21 solo albums and sold over 15 million albums worldwide.
`` World युद्ध हल्क '' is a कॉमिक किताब क्रॉसओवर कथानक that ran through a self titled limited series and various other titles published by Marvel Comics in 2007, featuring the Hulk.
the श्रेणी consists of पाँच प्रमुख मुद्दे titled संसार युद्ध हल्क, साथ ग्रेग पाक as लेखक और जॉन romita, Jr. as penciller, and three other limited series : World War Hulk : Front Line, World War Hulk : Gamma Corps, and World War Hulk : X-Men.
It also भागा through अनेक अन्य Marvel comics series.
The plot is the culmination of a series of events that began with the Hulk being tricked into स्पेस by the illuminati और a जीवन मॉडल decoy of उपनाम फ़्यूरी, the हल्क 's subsequent exile seen in Planet Hulk and his imminent return to Earth to seek revenge on the Illuminati.
Marion Mitchell Morrison ( born Marion Robert Morrison ; may 26, 1907 – जून 11, 1979 ), बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज name John Wayne, was an American film actor, director and producer.
An Academy Award -winner, वेन थी among the शीर्ष बक्सा दफ्तर draws लिये तीन decades, and was named the all-time top money-making star.
An enduring अमरीकी प्रतीक, he epitomized rugged masculinity and is famous for his demeanor, including his distinctive calm voice, walk, and height.
Wayne was born in Winterset, Iowa but his family relocated to the वृहद लॉस एंजिल्स area when he was four years old.
He found work at local film studios when he lost his football scholarship to USC as a परिणाम of a bodysurfing accident.
Initially working for the Fox Film Corporation, he ज़्यादातर appeared in छोटी बिट भाग.
His first leading role came in the widescreen epic The Big Trail ( 1930 ), जिससे led to अग्रणी भूमिकाएँ in numerous films throughout the 1930s, अनेक of them in the western genre.
His career rose to further heights in 1939, with जॉन घाट 's stagecoach बनाना उसे an तत्काल superstar.
Wayne would go on to स्टार in 142 तस्वीरें, primarily typecast in Western films.
Among his best known later films are The Quiet Man ( 1952 ), which follows him as an Irish-American boxer and his love affair with a fiery spinster निभाई by maureen o'hara ; the searchers ( 1956 ), in जिससे he plays a Civil War veteran who seeks out his abducted niece ; Rio Bravo ( 1959 ), playing a Sheriff with Dean Martin ; True Grit ( 1969 ), playing a humorous U.S. Marshal who sets out to avenge a man 's death in the role that won Wayne an Academy Award ; and The Shootist ( 1976 ), his final screen performance in which he plays an aging gunslinger battling cancer.
Wayne moved to Orange काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया in the 1960s, और थी a prominent Republican in Hollywood, supporting anti-communist positions.
He died of stomach कर्कट in 1979.
In June 1999, the American Film Institute named Wayne 13th among the महानतम पुरूष स्क्रीन महापुरूष of सब Time.
Galileo Galilei ( ; 15 February 1564 – 8 January 1642 ), was an Italian physicist, mathematician, astronomer, और पारस जो निभाई a प्रमुख भूमिका in the वैज्ञानिक Revolution.
His achievements include सुधार to the दूरदर्शी और consequent खगोलीय observations and support for Copernicanism.
Galileo has been called the `` father of modern observational astronomy ``, the `` पिता of आधुनिक भौतिकी ``, the `` पिता of विज्ञान '', और `` the पिता of आधुनिक विज्ञान ''.
His contributions to observational astronomy include the telescopic पुष्टि of the phases of शुक्र, the डिस्कवरी of the चार largest satellites of बृहस्पति ( named the Galilean moons in his honour ), and the observation and analysis of sunspots.
Galileo also worked in लागू विज्ञान और प्रौद्योगिकी, inventing an improved military compass and other instruments.
Galileo 's championing of heliocentrism was विवादास्पद भीतर उसके lifetime, when most subscribed to either geocentrism or the Tychonic system.
He met with opposition from astronomers, who doubted heliocentrism due to the अनुपस्थिति of an observed तारकीय लंबन.
The matter was investigated by the Roman Inquisition in 1615, और वे concluded कि it could be supported as only a possibility, not an established fact.
Galileo later defended his views in संवाद concerning the दो मुख्य संसार प्रणालियों, जिससे appeared to attack Pope Urban VIII and thus alienated him and the Jesuits, who had both supported Galileo up until this point.
He was tried by the inquisition, मिला `` ओजस्वी suspect of heresy '', forced to recant, and spent the rest of his life under house arrest.
It was while Galileo was under house arrest that he wrote one of उसके finest works, दो नई sciences, in जिससे he summarised the work he had done some forty years earlier, on the two sciences now called kinematics and strength of materials.

demonstration of a flexible OLED device
An OLED ( organic light-emitting diode ) is a light-emitting diode ( LED ) in which the emissive electroluminescent layer is a film of सशुल्क यौगिक जिससे emits लाइट in response to an electric current.
This परत of सशुल्क सेमीकंडक्टर is situated between two electrodes.
generally, at least one of these electrodes is transparent.
OLEDs are used to create digital displays in devices such as टेलीविज़न screens, कंप्यूटर मॉनीटर, पोर्टेबल प्रणालियों such as mobile phones, handheld games consoles and PDAs.
A major area of research is the development of श्वेत oled डिवाइस लिये उपयोग in solid-state lighting applications.
There are two main families of OLEDs : those आधारित on छोटी अणुओं और those employing polymers.
Adding mobile ions to an OLED creates a light-emitting electrochemical कोशिका or लैक, जिससे has a slightly different mode of operation.
OLED displays can use either passive-matrix ( pmoled ) or active-matrix addressing schemes.
Active-matrix oleds ( amoled ) आवश्यकता a thin-film ट्रांजिस्टर backplane to स्विच प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत पिक्सेल on or off, but allow for higher resolution and larger display sizes.
An OLED display works बगैर a backlight.
Thus, it can display deep black levels and can be thinner और हल्का than a द्रव क्रिस्टल display ( LCD ).
in कम परिवेश लाइट शर्तें ऐसे as a अंधेरा रूम an oled स्क्रीन can achieve a उच्चतर कंट्रास्ट ratio than an LCD, whether the LCD uses cold cathode fluorescent lamps or LED backlight.
A carton and a glass of eggnog from Montreal, Canada, showing its French facade ( अंग्रेज़ी रिवर्स ) और the फ्रेंच पद लेत de poule ( वस्तुतः, `` hen 's milk '' )
Eggnog, or egg nog, is a sweetened dairy -based beverage traditionally बना साथ मिल्क and/or मलाई, शुगर, और whipped अंडे ( जिससे gives it a frothy texture ).
Brandy, rum, whisky, bourbon, वोदका, or a संयोजन of liquors are often added.
The finished serving is often garnished साथ a sprinkling of ground cinnamon or nutmeg.
It was also known as the अंडा मिल्क पंच.
eggnog is a लोकप्रिय पेय throughout the United States and Canada, and is usually associated with Christmas.
Eggnog may be added as a flavoring to खाना or पेय ऐसे as coffee and tea.
Eggnog as a कस्टर्ड can भी be used as an ice cream base.
A pasty (, ), ( sometimes known in Britain as a Cornish pasty, and in the United States as a pastie or British pasty ) is a baked pastry, a traditional variety of जिससे is विशेषकर संबद्ध साथ कॉर्नवॉल, the westernmost county in England.
It is made by placing uncooked filling typically of meat and vegetables, बगैर मांस in शाकाहारी संस्करण, on a चपटा पेस्ट्री वृत्त और फोल्डिंग it to wrap the filling, crimping the edge to form a seal.
After baking, the result is a raised semicircular comestible.
The traditional cornish pasty, जिससे रै सुरक्षित भौगोलिक indication ( PGI ) status in Europe, is filled with beef, sliced or diced potato, swede ( also known as a yellow turnip or rutabaga – referred to in Cornwall as turnip ) and onion, seasoned with salt and pepper, and is baked.
Today, the pasty is the खाना सबसे संबद्ध साथ कॉर्नवॉल, it is regarded as the national dish, and it accounts for 6 % of the Cornish food economy.
Pasties with many अलग fillings हैं बना ; कुछ shops specialise in selling all sorts of pasties.
The origins of the pasty are unclear, though वहीँ हैं अनेक सन्दर्भ to उन्हें throughout historical documents and fiction.
The pasty is now popular world-wide due to the स्प्रेड of cornish खनिक, और विसंगतियाँ can be मिला in Australia, the United States, Mexico and elsewhere.
The ( ortho- ) sympathetic nervous system ( SNS ) is one of three major parts of the autonomic बेचैन प्रणाली : the अन्य being the enteric and parasympathetic systems.
Its general action is to mobilize the देह 's बेचैन system fight-or-flight response.
It is, however, constantly active at a basic level to maintain homeostasis.
सुरक्षित डिजिटल or ( sd ) is a non-volatile memory card format for use in portable devices, such as mobile phones, digital cameras, GPS navigation devices, and tablet computers.
The Secure Digital standard is maintained by the SD Card संघ ( sda ).
SD technologies have been implemented in more than 400 brands across दर्जनों of उत्पाद श्रेणी और more than 8,000 models.
The Secure Digital format शामिल चार कार्ड परिवारों उपलब्धियाँ in तीन अलग रूप कारकों.
The four families are the original Standard-Capacity ( SDSC ), the High-Capacity ( SDHC ), the extended-capacity ( sdxc ), और the SDIO, which combines input/output functions with data storage.
the तीन रूप कारकों are the original size, the `` mini '' size, and the `` micro '' size ( see illustration ).
There are many combinations of form कारकों और यंत्र परिवारों.
Electrically passive adapters allow the use of a smaller card in a मेजबान यंत्र निर्मित to hold a larger card.
Host devices that comply with newer versions of the specification provide backward compatibility and accept older SD cards, but this article explains अनेक कारकों कि can prevent the उपयोग of a नए SD card:
A नए कार्ड may प्रस्ताव वृहद capacity than the host device can handle.
A नए कार्ड may उपयोग a संचिका system the host device can not navigate.
Use of an sdio कार्ड requires the मेजबान यंत्र be designed for the input/output functions the card provides.
The संगठन of the कार्ड थी बदला starting with the SDHC family.
Some vendors produced SDSC ताश ऊपर 1 gb पहले the sda था मानकीकृत a method of doing so.
The SDA uses several trademarked logos to enforce compliance with इसके विशेषताएँ और assure उपयोक्ता of compatibility.
