Daniel Lawrence Whitney ( born February 17, 1963 ) best known by his stage name and character Larry the केबल guy, is an अमरीकी stand-up हास्य, कर्ता, देश म्यूज़िक कलाकार, आवाज़ कर्ता, and former radio personality.
He was one of the members of the Blue Collar Comedy Tour, a comedy troupe which included Bill Engvall, Ron White, and Jeff Foxworthy ( with जिसको he रै स्ट्रक्चर on Blue Collar TV ).
Whitney has released seven कॉमेडी एल्बम, of जिससे तीन have महरूम certified सुनहरा by the RIAA for shipments of 500,000 copies.
in जोड, he रै स्ट्रक्चर in तीन ब्लू कॉलर कॉमेडी tour-related फिल्मों, as खूब as in the films लैरी the Cable Guy : Health Inspector, Delta Farce, and Witless Protection, as well as voicing Mater in the Cars franchise.
Whitney 's catchphrase : `` git-r-done ! '' is भी the शीर्षक of his book.
On January 26, 2010, the TV channel History announced that it was ordering a series starring Whitney called तभी in अमेरिका साथ लैरी the केबल guy, in जिससे he होता explore the देश and immerse himself in different lifestyles, jobs, and hobbies.
The first episode of the श्रेणी aired on फ़रवरी 8, 2011.
Vitamin D is a group of fat-soluble secosteroids responsible for intestinal अवशोषण of कैल्सियम और फास्फेट.
In humans, the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण सम्बन्धित यौगिकों of vitamin D are vitamin D2 and vitamin D3.
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) and ergocalciferol ( vitamin D2 ) are unique as वे constitute कया we जान as विटामिन D and can be ingested from the diet and/or supplements.
The body can also synthesize vitamin D ( from cholesterol ) when sun एक्सपोज़र is पर्याप्त ( hence इसके उपनाम, the `` sunshine vitamin '' ).
Although vitamin D is commonly called a vitamin, it is not actually an essential dietary vitamin in the strict sense, as it can be synthesized in पर्याप्त amounts by सबसे स्तनधारियों उजागर to sunlight.
( Cats and dogs can नहीं synthesize विटामिन d efficiently और जरूर receive it in their diet. )
An organic chemical compound ( or सम्बन्धित नियत of यौगिकों ) is तभी scientifically पुकारा a विटामिन जब it can नहीं be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism, and must be obtained from their diet.
However, as with other compounds commonly called vitamins, vitamin D was खोजा in an प्रयत्न to ढूँढें the dietary पदार्थ that was lacking in a disease, namely, rickets, the childhood form of osteomalacia.
Additionally, like other compounds called vitamins, in the developed संसार विटामिन d is added to स्टेपल भोजन, such as milk, to avoid disease due to deficiency.
Measures of serum levels reflect endogenous संश्लेषण इससे एक्सपोज़र to धूप as खूब as सेवन इससे the आहार, और it is believed that synthesis may contribute generally to the maintenance of adequate serum concentrations.
The प्रमाण indicates कि the संश्लेषण of विटामिन d इससे सूर्य एक्सपोज़र works in a प्रतिक्रिया लूप कि रोकता toxicity but, because of uncertainty about the cancer risk from sunlight, no recommendations are issued by the Institute of Medicine, USA, for the amount of sun exposure required to meet vitamin D requirements.
Accordingly, the Dietary Reference Intakes for vitamin D assume that no synthesis occurs और कि सब of a व्यक्ति 's विटामिन d is इससे उनके आहार, हालांकि that will rarely occur in practice.
In the liver vitamin D is converted to calcidiol, which is also known as calcifediol ( इन ), 25-hydroxycholecalciferol, or 25-hydroxyvitamin d—abbreviated 25 ( oh ) d ; और जिससे is the विशिष्ट vitamin D metabolite that is measured in serum to determine a person 's vitamin D status.
Part of the calcidiol is converted by the kidneys to calcitriol, the biologically active form of vitamin D. calcitriol circulates as a हार्मोन in the रक्त, regulating the विशेषज्ञता of कैल्सियम and phosphate in the bloodstream and promoting the healthy growth and remodeling of bone.
Calcidiol is also converted to calcitriol outside of the kidneys for अन्य उद्देश्य, ऐसे as the अप्रसार, differentiation और apoptosis of cells ; calcitriol also affects neuromuscular function and inflammation.
Beyond its use to prevent osteomalacia or rickets, the evidence for other health प्रभाव of विटामिन d supplementation in the सामान्य population is inconsistent.
The best evidence of benefit is for bone स्वास्थ्य और a घटी in mortality in elderly women.
मानक रूप of the periodic table.
the रंगों represent अलग categories of elements explained below.
The periodic table is a tabular display of the chemical elements, organized on the basis of their atomic numbers, इलेक्ट्रॉन configurations, और पुनरावर्ती रासायनिक properties.
तत्व हैं प्रस्तुत in अनुक्रम of increasing atomic number ( number of protons ).
The standard form of table comprises an 18 × 7 grid or main देह of तत्व, positioned ऊपर a छोटी double row of elements.
The table can also be deconstructed into four आयताकार ब्लॉक : the s-block to the left, the p-block to the right, the d-block in the middle, and the f-block below that.
The rows of the table are called periods ; the columns of the s-, d-, and p-blocks हैं पुकारा समूह, साथ कुछ of ये having names such as the halogens or the noble gases.
Since, by definition, a periodic table incorporates recurring trends, any such table can be used to derive relationships between the गुण of the तत्व और भविष्यवाणी the गुण of नई, yet to be खोजा or synthesized, तत्व.
As a result, a periodic table—whether in the standard form or some other variant—provides a उपयोगी फ्रेमवर्क लिये analyzing रासायनिक बर्ताव, और ऐसे टेबल हैं widely used in chemistry and other sciences.
Although precursors exist, Dmitri mendeleev is generally credited साथ the प्रकाशन, in 1869, of the first widely recognized periodic table.
He developed his table to illustrate आवधिक रुझान in the गुण of the then-known elements.
Mendeleev also predicted कुछ गुण of then-unknown elements that would be expected to fill gaps in this table.
Most of his पूर्वानुमान यहूद proved सही जब the elements in question were subsequently discovered.
Mendeleev 's periodic table has since been expanded and refined with the discovery or synthesis of further new तत्व और the विकास of नई सैद्धांतिक मॉडल to बताइये रासायनिक बर्ताव.
All elements from परमाणु संख्याएँ 1 ( हाइड्रोजन ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have been discovered or synthesized.
The elements from 1 to 98 ( californium ) have been found to exist naturally, although some are found only in trace amounts और यहूद initially खोजा by synthesis in laboratories.
The elements after 98 have तभी महरूम synthesized in laboratories.
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is being pursued, with the question of how the periodic table may need to be परिवर्धित to accommodate कोई ऐसे परिवर्धन होने a पदार्थ of ongoing debate.
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally occurring तत्व have भी महरूम उत्पादित in laboratories.
Minimum wage by u.S. राज्य और u.S. territory ( American Samoa, Guam, Puerto Rico, Virgin Islands ), as of Jan. 1, 2013.
in the संयुक्त राज्य, मजदूर हैं generally entitled to be paid no less than the statutory minimum wage.
The federal government mandates a nationwide minimum wage level of $ 7.25 per hour, while कुछ राज्य और municipalities have नियत न्यूनतम मजदूरी स्तर उच्चतर than the federal level, with the highest state minimum wage being $ 9.19 per hour in Washington as of 2013.
Among those paid by the hour in 2012, 1.6 million were reported as earning exactly the प्रचलित संघीय minimum wage.
परिचय 2.0 लाख यहूद reported as earning wages below the minimum.
Together, these 3.6 million workers with मजदूरी at or नीचे the न्यूनतम बना up 4.7 percent of all hourly-paid workers.
A चयन of bourbons और टेनेसी whiskeys offered at a liquor store in Decatur, Georgia
evan विलियम्स bourbon whiskey
Bourbon whiskey is a type of American whiskey – a barrel-aged distilled स्पिरिट बना primarily इससे मकई.
The name of the spirit derives from its historical association साथ an क्षेत्रफल ज्ञात as बूढ़ा bourbon, around कया is अभी bourbon काउंटी, केंटकी ( which, in turn, was named after the French House of Bourbon royal family ).
It has महरूम उत्पादित since the 18th century.
While it may be बना anywhere in the संयुक्त राज्य, it is strongly associated with the American South in general, and Kentucky in particular.
The Mona Lisa ( La gioconda or la joconde ) is a half-length पोर्ट्रेट of a स्त्री by the इतालवी कलाकार लियोनार्डो da Vinci, which has been acclaimed as `` the best known, the most visited, the most written about, the most sung about, the most parodied work of art in the world. ''
The painting, thought to be a portrait of Lisa Gherardini, the wife of Francesco del giocondo, is in आयल on a poplar फलक, और is believed to have महरूम painted between 1503 and 1506.
It was acquired by किंग फ्रांसिस i of फ़्रांस और is अभी the प्रॉपर्टी of the French Republic, on permanent display at the Musée du Louvre in Paris since 1797.
The ambiguity of the subject 's expression, which is frequently described as enigmatic, the monumentality of the संयोजन, the हल्का मॉडलिंग of फ़ॉर्म और the वायुमंडलीय illusionism were novel qualities that have contributed to the continuing fascination and study of the work.
Robert Allen Palmer ( 19 January 1949 – 26 सितंबर 2003 ), थी an अंग्रेज़ी singer-songwriter and musician.
He was known for his distinctive आवाज़ और the eclectic मिक्सर of musical शैलियाँ on उसके एल्बम, combining soul, jazz, rock, pop, reggae and blues.
He found success both in his solo career and in the musical act The शक्ति स्टेशन, और था शीर्ष 10 गीतों in both the UK and the US.
His iconic music videos by Terence Donovan for the hits `` Addicted to Love `` and `` Simply Irresistible `` featured identically dressed dancing महिलाओं साथ पाले चेहरों, अंधेरा नजर मेकअप और उज्जवल रेड लिपस्टिक, जिससे resembled the women in the art of Patrick Nagel, an artist popular in the 1980s.
Sharp-suited, his involvement in the music industry commenced in the 1960s, covered पाँच दशकों और शामिल a वर्तनी with Vinegar Joe.
Palmer received a number of awards throughout his career, including two Grammy Awards for Best Male Rock Vocal Performance, an एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार, और थी twice मनोनीत लिये the ब्रिट पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अंग्रेजों Male.
Computed tomography angiography ( CTA ) is a computed tomography technique used to visualize arterial and venous बरतन throughout the देह.
This सीमाएँ इससे धमनियों सेवारत the दिमाग to those bringing blood to the lungs, kidneys, arms and legs.
The Champs-Élysées सजा साथ flags for Bastille Day
Horseman of the French Republican गार्ड दौरान the 2007 सैन्य परेड on the Champs-Élysées.
prise de la bastille by Jean-Pierre-Louis-Laurent Houel
bastille दिन is the नाम दिए in english-speaking countries to the French National Day, which is celebrated on the 14th of July each year.
In France, it is formally called La Fête Nationale ( ; The National Celebration ) and commonly le quatorze juillet ( ; the fourteenth of जुलाई ).
It commemorates the 1790 Fête de la Fédération, held on the first वर्षगांठ of the storming of the bastille on 14 जुलाई 1789 ; the वर्षगांठ of the storming of the bastille fortress-prison थी देखी as a प्रतीक of the uprising of the आधुनिक nation, and of the reconciliation of all the French inside the constitutional monarchy which preceded the First Republic, during the French Revolution.
Festivities and official ceremonies are आयोजित सब over फ़्रांस.
The oldest and largest regular military parade in Europe is held on the morning of 14 जुलाई, on the champs-élysées एवेन्यू in पेरिस in सामने of the अध्यक्ष of the गणतंत्र, फ्रेंच officials and foreign guests.
The United States of America ( USA or U.S.A. ), commonly called the United States ( US or u.S. ) or अमेरिका, is a संघीय गणतंत्र consisting of fifty states and a federal district.
The lower forty-eight contiguous states and the federal district of Washington, d.C. हैं in सेंट्रल उत्तर अमेरिका between कनाडा और Mexico.
The state of Alaska is वेस्ट of कनाडा और ईस्ट of रूस आरपार the Bering Strait, and the state of Hawaii is in the mid-North Pacific.
The country also has five populated और नौ unpopulated territories in the Pacific and the Caribbean.
At 3.79 million square miles ( 9.83 million km2 ) and with around 315 million people, the संयुक्त राज्य is the third- or fourth-largest देश by कुल क्षेत्रफल और the third-largest by दोनो land area and population.
It is one of the संसार 's सबसे ethnically विविध और multicultural nations, the product of large-scale immigration from many countries.
The geography और जलवायु of the u.S. is भी अत्यधिक विविध, with deserts, plains, forests, and mountains that are home to a wide variety of species.
Paleoindians migrated from Asia to what is now the संयुक्त राज्य मेनलैंड around 15,000 years ago.
बाद 1500, बूढ़ा संसार रोगों introduced by Europeans greatly reduced their populations.
European colonization began around 1600 और आए ज़्यादातर इससे इंग्लैण्ड.
The United States emerged from thirteen अंग्रेजों colonies स्तिथ along the Atlantic seaboard.
Disputes between Great ब्रिटेन और the अमरीकी colonies led to the American Revolution.
On July 4, 1776, delegates from the 13 colonies unanimously जारी the घोषणा of Independence, which established the United States of America.
The American Revolutionary War, which ended with the recognition of independence of the United States इससे the किंगडम of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, थी the पहला कामयाब युद्ध of independence against a European colonial empire.
The current Constitution was adopted on सितंबर 17, 1787 ; twenty-seven amendments have चूंकि महरूम added to the संविधान.
The first ten amendments, collectively नामित the विधेयक of अधिकारों, यहूद ratified in 1791 and guarantee many fundamental civil rights and freedoms.
Driven by the doctrine of manifest destiny, the United States embarked on a vigorous expansion across उत्तर अमेरिका throughout the 19th सदी.
This involved displacing देशी जनजातियों, acquiring new territories, and gradually admitting new states.
The American Civil War ended legalized गुलामी in the संयुक्त States.
By the end of the nineteenth century, the संयुक्त राज्य विस्तारित into the प्रशांत समंदर, and its economy was the world 's largest.
The Spanish–American War and confirmed the country 's औकात as a वैश्विक सैन्य power.
The United States emerged from as a global superpower, the first country with nuclear weapons, and a स्थाई सदस्य of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र Security Council.
The end of the Cold War and the dissolution of the Soviet Union left the United राज्य as the एकमात्र महाशक्ति.
The United States is a developed country and has the world 's largest नेशनल अर्थव्यवस्था, साथ an अनुमानित 2012 जीडीपी of $ 15.6 trillion 19 % of global GDP at purchasing-power parity, as of 2011.
The per capita GDP of the U.S. was the world 's sixth-highest as of 2010, हालांकि अमेरिका 's माल असमानता थी भी क्रमित उच्चतम among OECD countries by the World Bank.
The economy is fueled by an प्रचुरता of प्राकृतिक संसाधन, a well-developed अवसंरचना, and high productivity ; and while its economy is considered post-industrial it continues to be one of the world 's largest manufacturers.
The country accounts for 39 % of global military spending, और is a अग्रणी आर्थिक, राजनैतिक, और सांस्कृतिक फ़ोर्स in the संसार, as well as a leader in scientific research and technological innovation.
The NCAA Men 's Division I Basketball Championship is a single-elimination tournament played each spring in the United States, फिलहाल featuring 68 कॉलेज बास्केट teams, to determine the national championship of the major college basketball teams.
The tournament, organized by the National Collegiate Athletic Association ( NCAA ), was created during 1939 by the नेशनल संघ of बास्केट कोच, और थी the विचार of ओहियो राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों coach Harold Olsen.
निभाई ज़्यादातर दौरान कूच, it is ज्ञात informally as कूच दीवानगी or the बिग नृत्य, and has become one of the most famous annual sporting events in the United States.
The NCAA has credited Bob Walsh of the Seattle Organizing Committee for starting the March Madness जश्न दौरान 1984.
The tournament teams include champions इससे 31 प्रभाग i सम्मेलनों ( which receive automatic bids ), and 37 teams which are awarded at-large berths.
These `` at-large '' teams are chosen by an NCAA चयन कमेटी, as विस्तृत नीचे.
The 64 टीमों हैं विभाजित into चार regions और व्यवस्थित into a सिंगल विलोपन `` bracket '', which predetermines, when a team wins a game, which team it will face next.
Each team is `` seeded '', or क्रमित, भीतर its region.
After an initial four games between eight lower-ranked टीमों, the टूर्नामेंट occurs दौरान the कोर्स of three weekends, at pre-selected neutral sites around the United States.
Lower-ranked teams हैं लगाई in the कोष्ठक विरूद्ध higher ranked teams.
Each weekend eliminates three-fourths of the teams, from a round of 64, to a `` मीठी सोलह '', और लिये the पिछला वीकेंड of the टूर्नामेंट a फाइनल चार ; the फाइनल चार is प्रायः निभाई during the first weekend of April.
These four teams, one from each region, then compete in एक स्थान लिये the नेशनल championship.
The tournament has been at least partially televised चूंकि 1969.
Presently, the games are reported by सीबीएस, tbs, टीएनटी, और trutv by the trade-name NCAA March Madness.
Since 2011, सब खेल हैं उपलब्धियाँ for viewing nationwide.
As टेलीविज़न कवरेज रै grown, so too has the tournament 's popularity.
Presently, millions of अमेरिकी `` भरण आउट a कोष्ठक '', predicting winners of all 67 games.
With 11 national titles, UCLA has the record for the most NCAA Men 's Division I Basketball Championships ; John Wooden coached UCLA to 10 of इसके 11 शीर्षक.
The University of Kentucky is second, with 8 national titles, while Indiana University and the विश्वविद्यालयों of उत्तर कैरोलिना are tied for third with 5 national titles.
Duke विश्वविद्यालयों बाँधने fifth with 4 national titles.
A sample of सिंथेटिक मोटर oil
Synthetic oil is a lubricant consisting of रासायनिक यौगिकों कि हैं artificially made ( synthesized ).
Synthetic lubricants can be manufactured using chemically modified petroleum components rather than whole crude oil, but can also be synthesized इससे अन्य कच्चा सामग्री.
Synthetic oil is used as a substitute for lubricant refined from petroleum when operating in extremes of तापमान, क्युकी, in सामान्य, it provides श्रेष्ठ mechanical और रासायनिक properties than those found in traditional mineral oils.
Aircraft jet engines, for example, require the use of synthetic oils, whereas वायुयान पिस्टन इंजन do नहीं.
Jackass is an American reality series, originally shown on MTV from 2000 to 2002, featuring people performing विभिन्न खतरनाक, crude self-injuring स्टंट and pranks.
The show served as a launchpad लिये the टेलीविज़न और एक्टिंग करियर of bam margera, steve-o, and also Johnny Knoxville, who previously had only a few minor acting roles.
Since 2002, three Jackass films have been produced and released by MTV corporate sibling सर्वोपरि तस्वीरें, continuing the मताधिकार after its run on television.
The show sparked several spin-offs including चिरायु la bam, wildboyz, homewrecker, Dr. Steve-O and Blastazoid.
The show placed # 68 on entertainment साप्ताहिक `` नई tv क्लासिक '' list.
Roseanne Cherrie Barr ( born November 3, 1952 ) is an American अभिनेत्री, comedienne, लेखक, टेलीविज़न निर्माता, निदेशक, और 2012 presidential nominee of the California -based Peace and Freedom Party.
Barr began उसके करियर in stand-up कॉमेडी at क्लब पहले gaining fame for her role in the sitcom Roseanne.
The show was a hit and lasted नौ सीज़न, from 1988 to 1997.
She won both an Emmy and a Golden ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री लिये उसके कार्य on the show.
Barr had crafted a `` fierce working-class घरेलू देवी '' persona in the आठ सालो preceding उसके sitcom और चाही to do a यथार्थवादी show about a strong mother who was not a victim of patriarchal consumerism.
The granddaughter of immigrants from Europe और रूस, barr थी the oldest of चार children in a working-class यहूदी नमक झील नगर परिवार ; she was also active in the LDS Church.
In 1974, she married Bill Pentland, with whom she had three children, before divorcing in 1990 और marrying हास्य tom अर्नाल्ड लिये चार सालो.
Controversy arose when she sang `` The Star-Spangled Banner `` off-key at a 1990 nationally aired बेसबॉल खेल, followed by grabbing उसके crotch और spitting.
After her sitcom ended, she शुभारम्भ उसके own talk show, The Roseanne Show, which aired from 1998 to 2000.
in 2005, वो लौटे to stand-up comedy with a world tour.
In 2011, she starred in an unscripted TV show, Roseanne 's nuts, कि lasted इससे जुलाई to सितंबर of कि साल, परिचय उसके जीवन on a Hawaiian farm.
In early 2012, Barr announced her उम्मीदवारी लिये the अध्यक्षीय नामांकन of the Green Party.
barr खोया the nomination to Jill Stein.
She then sought the presidential nomination of the सलाम और स्वतंत्रता पार्टी, जिससे she won on August 4, 2012.
Barr प्राप्त 61,971 मत in the general election, placing sixth overall.
francesco albani 's 17th सदी बपतिस्मा of Christ is a typical depiction with the sky opening and the Holy Spirit descending as a dove.
The baptism of Jesus marks the शुरूआत of his public ministry.
This event is recorded in the canonical gospels of Matthew, Mark and ल्यूक.
John 's gospel does not describe यीशु ' बपतिस्मा, लकिन जॉन the बैपटिस्ट करता गवाही of the other things in.
In the New Testament, John the Baptist preached the baptism of repentance for the remission of पापों ( ), और घोषित खुद a forerunner of he कि would baptize `` with the Holy Ghost and with fire '' ( ).
In so doing he थी तैयारी the way for Jesus.
Jesus आए to the जॉर्डन नदी where he was baptized by John.
The baptismal झाँकी शामिल the आकाश खोलने, a dove-like descent of the Holy Spirit, and a voice from heaven saying, `` This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased. ''
Most आधुनिक विद्वानों दृश्य the फैक्ट कि यीशु थी baptized by John as an historical event to which a high degree of certainty can be assigned.
Along with the crucifixion of Jesus most scholars view it as one of the two historically certain तथ्य परिचय उसे, और प्रायः उपयोग it as the starting points for the study of the historical Jesus.
The baptism is one of the five major माइलस्टोन in the इन्जील कथा of the जीवन of यीशु, the others being the Transfiguration, Crucifixion, Resurrection, and Ascension.
Most ईसाई denominations दृश्य the बपतिस्मा of Jesus as an important event and a basis for the Christian rite of baptism ( see also ).
In Eastern Christianity, Jesus ' baptism is commemorated on 6 जनवरी, the feast of epiphany.
In the Roman Catholic Church, the Anglican Communion, the Lutheran Churches and some other Western denominations, it is recalled on a day within the following week, the feast of the baptism of the Lord.
In Roman Catholicism, the baptism of Jesus is एक of the चमकदार रहस्यों sometimes added to the Rosary.
It is a Trinitarian feast in the पूर्वी Orthodox Churches.
Methylcobalamin ( shown ) is a रूप of विटामिन b12.
Physically it resembles the अन्य फ़ॉर्म of विटामिन b12, occurring as dark red crystals that freely form cherry-colored transparent solutions in water.
Vitamin B12, vitamin B12 or vitamin B-12, also called cobalamin, is a water-soluble विटामिन साथ a कुंजी भूमिका in the सामान्य कामकाज of the दिमाग और बेचैन प्रणाली, and for the formation of blood.
it is एक of the eight B vitamins.
It is normally involved in the metabolism of every cell of the human body, especially affecting डीएनए संश्लेषण और विनियमन, लकिन भी वसीय एसिड संश्लेषण और energy production.
Neither fungi, plants, nor animals are capable of producing विटामिन b12.
Only bacteria and archaea have the enzymes required for its synthesis, हालांकि अनेक भोजन हैं a प्राकृतिक सोर्स of B12 because of bacterial symbiosis.
The vitamin is the largest and most structurally जटिल विटामिन और can be उत्पादित industrially only through bacterial fermentation-synthesis.
Vitamin B12 consists of a class of chemically related compounds ( vitamers ), सब of जिससे have vitamin activity.
It contains the biochemically विरल तत्व cobalt.
Biosynthesis of the basic structure of the vitamin is accomplished only by bacteria ( which usually उपज hydroxocobalamin ), लकिन परिवर्तन between अलग फ़ॉर्म of the विटामिन can be accomplished in the human body.
A common semi-synthetic form of the vitamin, cyanocobalamin, does not occur in nature, but is produced from bacterial hydroxocobalamin और तब प्रयुक्त in अनेक दवाएँ और पूरक, और as a खाना योगात्मक, because of its stability and lower production cost.
In the body it is converted to the human physiological फ़ॉर्म methylcobalamin और adenosylcobalamin, leaving behind the cyanide, albeit in minimal concentration.
अधिक recently, hydroxocobalamin, methylcobalamin, और adenosylcobalamin can be found in more expensive pharmacological products and food supplements.
the अतिरिक्त यूटिलिटी of these is currently debated.
Vitamin B12 was discovered from its relationship to the disease pernicious anemia, which is an autoimmune disease in which parietal cells of the पेट जिम्मेदार लिये secreting मूलभूत factor are destroyed.
Intrinsic factor is crucial for the normal absorption of B12, so a lack of intrinsic factor, as seen in घातक रक्ताल्पता, causes a vitamin B12 deficiency.
अनेक अन्य subtler kinds of विटामिन B12 deficiency and their biochemical effects have since been elucidated.
Full Metal Jacket is a 1987 युद्ध फिल्मी उत्पादित, निर्देशित और co-written by Stanley Kubrick.
It is an adaptation of Gustav Hasford 's 1979 novel The short-timers और सितारों Matthew Modine, Vincent D'Onofrio, R. Lee Ermey, Arliss Howard, and Adam Baldwin.
the फिल्मी follows a platoon of U.S. Marines through their training and the experiences of two of the platoon 's Marines in the Tet Offensive during the Vietnam War.
The film 's title refers to the पूरा मेटल जैकेट bullet used by infantry riflemen.
The film received नाजुक acclaim.
It received an Academy Award nomination for Best Adapted पटकथा लिये kubrick, माइकल हेर और Gustav Hasford.
In 2001, the American Film Institute placed Full Metal Jacket at # 95 in their `` AFI 's 100 सालो... 100 thrills `` poll.
TMZ is a हस्ती न्यूज जालस्थल that debuted on November 8, 2005.
It was a collaboration between AOL and Telepictures Productions, a प्रभाग of warner भाईs., जबतक समय warner divested AOL in 2009.
However, it remained affiliated with AOL न्यूज और रै the एओएल न्यूज लोगो affixed in the upper right corner.
The name TMZ स्टैंड लिये the ऐतिहासिक `` स्टुडियो मण्डल `` or 30-mile मण्डल दायरा from the intersection of West Beverly Boulevard and North La Cienega Boulevard in Los Angeles.
TMZ 's managing editor is घनघोर levin, a lawyer-turned-journalist जो was previously a legal expert for the Los Angeles television station KCBS-TV.
The site claims that it करता नहीं अदा लिये कहानियां or साक्षात्कार ; however, levin रै admitted कि tmz करता `` sometimes pay sources for leads on stories ''.
Levin has stated कि `` सबकुछ is शोधकार्य and vetted for accuracy. ''
A companion TV series, TMZ on TV, debuted on सितंबर 10, 2007.
Scream 3 is a 2000 American slasher film created by Kevin Williamson, directed by Wes Craven and written by Ehren Kruger, starring Neve कैम्पबेल, courteney कॉक्स arquette और दाउद arquette.
It was released on February 4, 2000 as the तीसरा किश्त in the Scream film series.
The events of the story are set three years after those of Scream 2 and follows Sidney Prescott ( Campbell ) who has gone into self-imposed isolation following the कार्यक्रम of the पिछला दो films लकिन is drawn to हॉलीवुड बाद a नई ghostface begins हत्या the डाल of the फिल्मी within a film `` Stab 3 ''.
Scream 3 combines the violence of the slasher विधा साथ कॉमेडी और `` whodunit `` रहस्य while satirizing the cliché of film trilogies.
Unlike the previous Scream films, there was an increased emphasis on comedic elements और the हिंसा और हॉरर थी घटाया in जवाब to increased पब्लिक scrutiny about violence in media following the Columbine High School massacre.
The film was the concluding chapter of the Scream series जबतक it थी revived साथ a sequel, Scream 4, in 2011.
Williamson provided a five-page outline for two sequels to चीख जब auctioning उसके असली स्क्रिप्ट, hoping to entice bidders with the potential of buying a franchise.
Williamson 's प्रतिज्ञाओं to अन्य प्रोजेक्ट meant he थी असमर्थ to develop a complete script for Scream 3 and writing duties were undertaken by Ehren Kruger who discarded much of Williamson 's notes.
Craven and Marco Beltrami returned to direct and स्कोर the फिल्मी क्रमशः as वे had with the previous two series entries.
उत्पादन थी troubled साथ स्क्रिप्ट rewrites, साथ पृष्ठों sometimes only ready on the day of filming, and scheduling difficulties with the main cast.
Scream 3 performed both financially and critically worse than its preceding films, earning over $ 161 million and with many critics claiming that the film had become कया चीख originally `` spoofed ``.
Despite negative आलोचना the फिल्मी किया receive praise with reviewers calling it the perfect end to the Scream trilogy.
As of 2012, the film is currently the number 3 highest-grossing slasher-film in उत्तर अमेरिका, following चीख at क्रमांक 1 और Scream 2 at number 2.

Shoulder impingement syndrome, also called painful arc syndrome, supraspinatus syndrome, swimmer 's कंधे, और thrower 's कंधे, is a नैदानिक सिंड्रोम जिससे occurs जब the tendons of the rotator कफ मांसपेशियां become irritated and inflamed as they pass through the subacromial space, the passage beneath the acromion.
This can परिणाम in पीड़ा, कमज़ोरी and loss of movement at the shoulder.
JLA was a monthly comic book published by DC Comics from January 1997 to अप्रैल 2006 featuring the Justice League.
The colonial history of the United States covers the history of European settlements from the start of colonization of America until उनके incorporation into the संयुक्त राज्य.
In the late 16th century, England, France, Spain and the नीदरलैंड्स शुभारम्भ प्रमुख colonization कार्यक्रम in पूर्वी उत्तर America.
Small early attempts—such as the English Lost उपनिवेश of roanoke —often disappeared ; everywhere the मौत rate of the first arrivals was very high.
Nevertheless successful colonies यहूद स्थापित.
European settlers came from a किस्में of सोशल और धार्मिक groups.
No aristocrats settled permanently, लकिन a क्रमांक of adventurers, soldiers, farmers, and tradesmen arrived.
Diversity was an American characteristic as the Dutch of New Netherland, the Swedes and finns of नई स्वीडन, the अंग्रेज़ी quakers of पेन्सिलवेनिया, the अंग्रेज़ी puritans of नई इंग्लैण्ड, the अंग्रेज़ी settlers of jamestown, और the `` worthy ग़रीब '' of जॉर्जिया, आए to the नई महाद्वीप and built colonies with distinctive social, religious, political and economic styles.
Occasionally one उपनिवेश took कंट्रोल of another ( during wars between their European parents ).
Only in Nova Scotia ( now part of कनाडा ) किया the conquerors expel the previous colonists.
बजाय वे सब lived side by side in peace.
There यहूद no प्रमुख सिविल युद्धों among the 13 colonies, और the दो मुख्य हथियारबंद विद्रोहों ( in Virginia in 1676 and in New York in 1689–91 ) were short-lived failures.
Wars between the French and the British—the French and Indian Wars and Father rale 's युद्ध —were तूल, और शामिल French-support for Wabanaki Confederacy attacks on the frontiers.
By 1760 France was defeated and the अंग्रेजों जब्त इसके colonies.
The four distinct regions यहूद : नई इंग्लैण्ड, the Middle Colonies, the Chesapeake Bay Colonies ( Upper South ) and the Lower South.
Some इतिहासकारों add a पांचवां प्रदेश, the frontier, जिससे was never separately organized.
By the time European settlers arrived around 1600–1650, the majority of the Native Americans living in the eastern United States had been decimated by नई रोगों, introduced to उन्हें दशकों पहले by explorers and sailors.
See timeline of Colonial America लिये सूची of ऐतिहासिक कार्यक्रम.
Gloria Laura Vanderbilt ( born फ़रवरी 20, 1924 ) is an अमरीकी कलाकार, author, actress, heiress, and socialite most noted as an early developer of designer blue jeans.
वो is a सदस्य of the prominent वेंडरबिल्ट family of New York and the mother of CNN 's Anderson Cooper.
यूनानियों ( रोमनाइजेशन of greek| ), officially the हैलेनिक Republic ( ' ), is a country in Southeast Europe.
According to the 2011 जनसांख्यिकी, यूनानियों 's जनसांख्यिकी is around 11 million.
Athens is the nation 's capital and largest city, इसके शहरी क्षेत्रफल भी including Piraeus.
Greece is strategically स्तिथ at the क्रॉसरोड्स of यूरोपीय, एशिया, the मध्य ईस्ट, और अफ़्रीकी, and has land borders with Albania, the Republic of Macedonia and Bulgaria to the north, and Turkey to the northeast.
The ईजियन समुद्र झूठ to the ईस्ट of मेनलैंड Greece, the Ionian Sea to the west, and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.
Greece has the 11th longest coastline in the world at in length, featuring a vast number of islands ( approximately 1,400, of which 227 are inhabited ), सहित क्रेट, the dodecanese, the cyclades, और the आयोनियन Islands among others.
Eighty percent of Greece consists of kyu, of जिससे माउंट ओलम्पस is the highest at.
Modern Greece traces its roots to the civilization of प्राचीन यूनानियों, generally माना the cradle of Western civilization.
As such, it is the birthplace of democracy, Western philosophy, the Olympic Games, Western literature and historiography, political science, प्रमुख वैज्ञानिक और गणितीय सिद्धान्त, और पश्चिमी नाटक, सहित दोनो त्रासदी और कॉमेडी.
This legacy is partly reflected in the seventeen UNESCO World विरासत साइट स्तिथ in यूनानियों, रैंकिंग it 7th in यूरोपीय और 13th in the world.
The modern Greek state was established in 1830, following the यूनानी युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता.
Greece is a founding member of the United Nations, has been a member of what is अभी the यूरोपीय संघ चूंकि 1981 ( और the eurozone चूंकि 2001 ), और रै been a member of NATO since 1952.
यूनानियों is a विकसित देश साथ an उन्नत, high-income economy and very high standards of living, including the world 's 21st highest quality of life as of 2010.
Greece 's economy is also the largest in the Balkans, where यूनानियों is an महत्वपूर्ण क्षेत्रीय investor.
A prime meridian is a meridian, i.e. a line of longitude, at जिससे देशांतर is पारिभाषित to be 0°.
A prime meridian and its opposite in a 360°-system, the 180th मध्याह्न ( at 180° देशांतर ), रूप a great circle.
This great वृत्त divides the गोला, e.g. the Earth, into two hemispheres.
If one uses directions of East and West from a defined प्रधान मध्याह्न, तब वे can be पुकारा Eastern Hemisphere and Western Hemisphere.
Gerardus Mercator in his एटलस cosmographicae ( 1595 ) उपयोग a प्रधान मध्याह्न कही बंद to 25°w, passing just to the west of Santa Maria Island in the Atlantic.
His 180th मध्याह्न रनों साथ the जलसन्धि of anián ( Bering Strait )
A prime meridian is ultimately arbitrary, unlike an equator, which is determined by the axis of rotation—and विभिन्न प्रथाओं have महरूम प्रयुक्त or advocated in different regions and throughout history.
Minka dumont केली ( born minka Dumont Dufay ; June 24, 1980 ) is an American actress.
She is perhaps best known for her roles in Charlie 's Angels, Friday रात्रि लाइट्स, और the रूममेट.
R.O.B. ( Robotic Operating Buddy ), released in Japan as the, is an accessory लिये the निन्टेंडो entertainment System ( NES ).
It was released in July 1985 in जापानी और बाद कि year in North America.
It had a short उत्पाद जीवनकाल, साथ support for only two games which comprised the `` Robot Series '' ; Gyromite and Stack-Up.
R.O.B. was released with the intention of portraying the Nintendo Entertainment प्रणाली as कुछ अनोखा in अनुक्रम to alleviate retail fears following the video game crash of 1983.
R.O.B. was available in the डीलक्स नियत, a विन्यास लिये the console that included, among other things, R.O.B. and Gyromite.
Stack-Up was purchased separately और शामिल इसके अपना शारीरिक game pieces.
The Walking Liberty half dollar was a silver 50-cent piece or half डालर सिक्का जारी by the संयुक्त राज्य मिंट इससे 1916 to 1947 ; it was designed by Adolph A. Weinman.
In 1915, the new Mint Director, Robert W. Woolley, came to believe that he was not only allowed लकिन जरूरी by विधि to बदलें coin designs that had been in use for 25 years.
He therefore began the प्रक्रम of replacing the नाई coinage : dimes, quarters और हाफ डॉलर, all bearing similar designs by long-time Mint Engraver Charles E. Barber, and first struck in 1892.
Woolley had the Commission of ठीक कला conduct a प्रतियोगिता, as a परिणाम of which Weinman was selected to design the dime and half dollar.
Weinman 's design of स्वतंत्रता striding towards the सूर्य लिये the हाफ डालर proved difficult to perfect, and Treasury Secretary William G. McAdoo, whose department included the Mint, considered having Barber create his own design.
Mint officials were successful in getting Weinman 's design into उत्पादन, हालांकि it never struck बहुत खूब, जिससे may have महरूम a factor in its replacement by the Franklin half dollar beginning in 1948.
Nevertheless, art इतिहासकार कॉर्नेलियस vermeule माना the piece to be among the most beautiful US coins.
Since 1986, a modification of Weinman 's obverse डिज़ाइन रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये the अमरीकी Silver Eagle.
The Toyota 4Runner is a mid-size sport utility vehicle ( SUV ) produced by the जापानी निर्माता टोयोटा और बेची throughout the संसार इससे 1984 to present.
In Japan it थी ज्ञात as the टोयोटा Hilux Surf.
The original 4Runner was a कॉम्पैक्ट एसयूवी और छोटी अधिक than a टोयोटा पिकअप ट्रक साथ a fiberglass शेल over the bed, लकिन the मॉडल has since undergone significant independent development into a cross between a compact and a mid-size SUV.
All 4Runners have been built at Toyota 's Tahara plant in Tahara, Aichi, जापानी, or at hino मोटर्स ' hamura, जापानी संयंत्र, और in ब्राज़ील.
Its mid-size क्रॉसओवर एसयूवी बंटवारा is the Toyota Highlander.
This आलेख सौदे साथ आयुर्विज्ञान as practiced by प्रशिक्षित professionals from ancient times to the present.
The ancient Egyptians had a प्रणाली of आयुर्विज्ञान कि थी very advanced for its time and influenced later medical traditions.
The Egyptians and Babylonians both introduced the concepts of निदान, prognosis, और medical examination.
The Greeks went even further, and उन्नत as खूब चिकित्सा ethics.
The hippocratic शपथ, स्टिल लिया by डॉक्टर आज, थी written in Greece in the 5th century BCE.
In the मध्यकालीन era, सर्जिकल practices inherited from the ancient masters were improved and then systematized in Rogerius 's The Practice of Surgery.
Universities began व्यवस्थित प्रशिक्षण of physicians around the years 1220 in Italy.
During the Renaissance, understanding of anatomy improved, और the सूक्ष्मदर्शी थी invented.
The germ theory of बीमारी in the 19th सदी led to cures for many infectious diseases.
Military doctors advanced the methods of trauma उपचार और surgery.
Public health उपायों यहूद विकसित विशेषकर in the 19th century as the rapid growth of cities required systematic sanitary measures.
Advanced research centers opened in the early 20th century, often कनेक्ट साथ प्रमुख अस्पताल.
The mid-20th century was characterized by नई biological उपचार, ऐसे as एंटीबायोटिक.
These advancements, along with developments in chemistry, आनुवंशिकी, और lab प्रौद्योगिकी ( ऐसे as the x-ray ) led to modern medicine.
Medicine was heavily professionalized in the 20th century, and new careers opened to women as nurses ( from the 1870s ) और as physicians ( विशेषकर बाद 1970 ).
The 21st century is characterized by very advanced research involving numerous fields of science.
The Hippocratic Corpus, is a collection of early medical works from प्राचीन यूनानियों strongly संबद्ध साथ the प्राचीन यूनानी चिकित्सक हिपोक्रेटिस और उसके teachings.
Potassium is a रासायनिक तत्व साथ प्रतीक k ( इससे Neo-Latin kalium ) and atomic number 19.
Elemental potassium is a soft silvery-white alkali metal that oxidizes rapidly in air और is बहुत प्रतिक्रिया साथ जल, generating sufficient heat to ignite the hydrogen emitted in the reaction and burning with a lilac flame.
Because potassium और सोडियम हैं chemically very similar, their salts were not at first differentiated.
the अस्तित्व of अनेक तत्व in उनके लवण was suspected from 1702, and this was proven in 1807 when potassium and sodium were individually isolated from different salts by electrolysis.
Potassium in nature occurs तभी in ionic salts.
As such, it is found dissolved in seawater ( जिससे is 0.04 % पोटैशियम by weight ), and is part of many minerals.
Most industrial chemical applications of potassium employ the relatively high solubility in जल of पोटैशियम यौगिकों, ऐसे as potassium soaps.
Potassium metal has only a few special applications, होने replaced in सबसे रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ साथ सोडियम metal.
Potassium ions हैं जरुरी for the function of all living cells.
Potassium ion diffusion is a कुंजी यांत्रिकी in तंत्रिका हस्तांतरण, और पोटैशियम depletion in animals, including humans, results in various cardiac dysfunctions.
Potassium accumulates in संयंत्र कोशिकाएं, और यूँ fresh fruits and vegetables are a good dietary source of it.
Conversely, most पौधे मगर विशेषज्ञ halophytes are intolerant of salt, and sodium is present in them only in low concentration.
This resulted in पोटैशियम पहला होने पृथक from potash, the ashes of plants, giving the element its name.
For the same reason, भारी क्रॉप उत्पादन rapidly depletes soils of पोटैशियम, और agricultural fertilizers consume 95 % of global potassium chemical production.
the सिंगापुर डालर or dollar ( sign : $ ; code : SGD ) is the official currency of Singapore.
It is normally abbreviated with the dollar sign $, or alternatively s $ to फर्क it from other dollar -denominated currencies.
It is divided into 100 सेंट.
The Monetary Authority of Singapore and the Brunei Currency and Monetary Board still maintain the historic exchangeability of their दो मुद्राएँ, the singaporean डालर और the Brunei dollar, respectively.
The dollar is स्वीकृत as `` प्रथागत टेंडर '' in ब्रुनेई according to the Currency Interchangeability Agreement.
Likewise, the Brunei dollar is customarily स्वीकृत in Singapore
James Samuel Coleman ( May 12, 1926 – March 25, 1995 ) थी an अमरीकी समाजशास्त्री, theorist and empirical researcher, based chiefly at the University of Chicago.
He was elected president of the अमरीकी समाजशास्त्रीय संघ.
Coleman studied the समाजशास्त्र of शिक्षा, पब्लिक नीति, और थी एक of the earliest users of the term `` social capital ``.
His मूलाधार of सोशल सिद्धान्त influenced sociological theory.
His The Adolescent Society ( 1961 ) and `` Coleman Report '' ( समता of शैक्षणिक अवसर, 1966 ) यहूद दो of the most heavily cited books in educational sociology.
The landmark Coleman Report helped transform educational theory, reshape national education नीतियों, और बहकावे पब्लिक और scholarly opinion regarding the role of schooling in determining equality and productivity in the United States.
Superman ( from DC comics ) was the first सुपरहीरो निर्मित, आर्ट by जिम Lee.
A superhero ( sometimes rendered super-hero or super नायिका ) is a प्रकार of भण्डार अक्षर possessing `` असाधारण or superhuman powers '' and dedicated to protecting the public.
Since the debut of the prototypical superhero Superman in 1938, कहानियां of superheroes—ranging इससे ब्रैड episodic adventures to continuing years-long sagas—have dominated American comic books and crossed over into other media.
The word itself तिथियाँ to at तनिक 1917.
A female superhero is sometimes called a superheroine ( भी rendered super-heroine or सुपर नायिका ).
`` SUPER HEROES '' is a trademark co-owned by dc कॉमिक्स और आश्चर्य Comics.
By most परिभाषाएं, वर्ण do नहीं सख्ती आवश्यकता वास्तविक superhuman शक्तियां to be deemed superheroes, although terms such as costumed crime fighters or masked vigilantes are sometimes used to refer to those such as Batman and Green Arrow without such powers who share other common superhero traits.
Such characters were generally referred to as `` रहस्य मेन '' in the so-called सुनहरी आयु of कॉमिक किताबे to distinguish them from characters with super-powers.
सामान्यतः, superheroes use their powers to counter day-to-day crime while also combating threats against humanity by supervillains, their criminal counterparts.
Often, one of ये supervillains होगा be the superhero 's archenemy.
As well, some longrunning superheroes, ऐसे as सुपरमैन, बैटमैन, spider-man और आयरन man प्रत्येक has a rogues gallery of enemies.
As well, superheroes sometimes will कॉम्बैट ऐसे irregular खतरे as एलियंस, magical/ fantasy entities, American war enemies such as nazism or communism, and godlike or demonic creatures.

The Shawshank मोचन is a 1994 अमरीकी नाटक film written and directed by Frank Darabont and starring Tim Robbins and Morgan Freeman.
Adapted from the Stephen King novella Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption, the film tells the story of एंडी dufresne, a बैंकर जो खर्च nearly दो दशकों in shawshank राज्य थाना लिये the हत्या of उसके बीवी और उसके प्रेमी despite उसके दावा of innocence.
During his time at the prison, he befriends a fellow inmate, ellis boyd `` रेड '' redding, और पाता खुद सुरक्षित by the गार्ड after the warden begins using him in his money laundering operation.
Despite a lukewarm box office reception that barely recouped its budget, the film received favorable reviews इससे आलोचकों, अनेक पुरस्कार nominations, और रै चूंकि enjoyed a remarkable life on cable television, VHS, DVD, and Blu-ray.
It थी शामिल in the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान 's 100 Years... 100 Movies 10th Anniversary Edition.
IT management is the अनुशासन whereby सब of the प्रौद्योगिकी संसाधन of a firm are managed in accordance with its needs and priorities.
These resources may include tangible investments like computer hardware, तन्त्र, आंकड़ा, संजाल और data centre facilities, as well as the staffs who are hired to maintain them.
Managing this responsibility within a कम्पनी entails अनेक of the मौलिक प्रबन्धन कृत्यों, जैसे budgeting, staffing, and organizing and controlling, along with other aspects that are unique to technology, like change management, software design, network planning, tech support etc.
The Penitentiary of नई मैक्सिको थाना riot, जिससे took प्लेस on फ़रवरी 2 और 3, 1980, in the राज्य 's maximum security prison south of Santa Fe, was one of the most violent prison riots in the history of the American correctional system : 33 inmates died and more than 200 inmates were treated for injuries.
None of the 12 अधिकारियों लिया बंधक यहूद मारे, लकिन seven were treated for injuries caused by beatings and rapes.
This was the third major riot at the nm राज्य penitentiary, the पहला occurring on 19 जुलाई 1922 and the second on 15 June 1953.
Author Roger Morris suggests the death toll may have महरूम उच्चतर, as a number of bodies were incinerated or dismembered during the course of the mayhem.

The Northern Cardinal ( Cardinalis cardinalis ) is a उत्तर अमरीकी बर्ड in the genus Cardinalis ; it is also known colloquially as the redbird or common cardinal.
It can be found in southern Canada, through the eastern United राज्य इससे maine to टेक्सास और दक्षिण through मैक्सिको.
It is found in woodlands, gardens, shrublands, and swamps.
The उत्तरी कार्डिनल is a mid-sized songbird with a body length of 21 centimeters ( 8.3 inches ).
It has a distinctive crest on the head and a mask on the फेस जिससे is ब्लैक in the पुरूष और gray in the female.
The पुरूष is a हर्षोल्लास red, while the female is a dull red-brown shade.
The उत्तरी कार्डिनल is मुख्यतः granivorous, but also feeds on insects and fruit.
The पुरूष behaves territorially, marking out his territory with song.
During courtship, the पुरूष फ़ीड्स बीज to the मादा beak-to-beak.
A clutch of तीन to चार अंडे is रखी, और दो to four clutches are produced each year.
It was once prized as a pet, but its sale as cage birds is now बैन in the संयुक्त राज्य by the migratory बर्ड Treaty Act of 1918.
Surface runoff, also called nonpoint सोर्स प्रदूषण, इससे a फार्म field in Iowa during a rain storm.
Topsoil as well as फार्म fertilizers और अन्य संभावित pollutants run off unprotected farm fields when heavy rains occur.
Topsoil is the upper, outermost layer of soil, usually the top to.
It has the highest concentration of सशुल्क पदार्थ और microorganisms और is where most of the Earth 's biological soil activity occurs.
Musical cryptogram : `` Aschbeg '' set in schoenberg 's sechs kleine klavierstücke, Op. 19, no. 1, m. 5.
Note that the notes do not come in स्पेलिंग अनुक्रम लकिन हैं सब सटा ( नहीं अलग by other notes ).
Sechs kleine Klavierstücke, Op. 19 ( or Six Little Piano Pieces ) is a set of टुकड़े लिये सोलो piano written by the Austrian composer Arnold Schoenberg, published in 1913.
McAfee, Inc. ( ) is an American global computer security software company headquartered in Santa Clara, California, और the संसार 's largest समर्पित सुरक्षा प्रौद्योगिकी कम्पनी.
As of February 28, 2011, McAfee is a wholly स्वामित्व subsidiary of Intel.
McAfee 's प्रतिस्पर्धी in the एंटीवायरस उद्योग are Avira, BitDefender, BullGuard, F-Secure, Frisk, Kaspersky, Symantec, and Trend Micro to name a few.
Saint Rita of Cascia ( Born Margherita Lotti 1381 - May 22, 1457 ) was an Italian Augustinian nun, widow and saint venerated in the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर.
Rita was married at an जल्दी आयु.
The marriage lasted for 18 years, during which she is remembered for her Christian values as a model बीवी और माँ जो बना प्रयत्न to बदलें उसके husband from his abusive behavior.
Upon the हत्या of उसके husband by another feuding family, she sought to dissuade her sons from revenge.
She subsequently joined an Augustinian community of धार्मिक बहनों, जहाँ वो थी ज्ञात लिये practicing mortification of the flesh, along with the apparent efficacy of her prayers.
St. Rita is venerated due to various miracles attributed to her intercession, and is often portrayed with a bleeding wound on her माथे, जिससे the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर दावा to have महरूम a partial stigmata.
The Roman Catholic Church, under the pontificate of Pope leo xiii officially canonized रीता on may 24, 1900, while her feast day is celebrated every May 22.
In many परहेज़गारों कैथोलिक देशों, रीता is known to be a patroness for abused wives and mourning women.
North America is a continent wholly within the उत्तरी गोलार्ध और लगभग wholly within the Western Hemisphere.
It is also considered a northern उपमहाद्वीप of the americas.
It is bordered to the उत्तर by the आर्कटिक समंदर, to the ईस्ट by the अटलांटिक समंदर, to the वेस्ट और south by the Pacific Ocean, and to the southeast by South America and the Caribbean Sea.
North America covers an area of about 24,709,000 square kilometers ( 9,540,000 वर्गाकार मील ), परिचय 4.8 % of the ग्रह 's सतह or about 16.5 % of its land area.
As of July 2008, its population थी अनुमानित at nearly 529 लाख लोगों across 23 independent states, representing about 7.5 % of the human population.
North America is the third-largest continent in area, following Asia and Africa, and the चौथी in जनसांख्यिकी बाद एशिया, अफ़्रीकी, और यूरोपीय.
The first people to live in उत्तर अमेरिका यहूद paleoindians who began to arrive during the last glacial period by crossing the Bering land bridge.
They differentiated into a क्रमांक of विविध संस्कृतियों और communities across the continent.
The largest and most advanced Pre-Columbian civilizations in North अमेरिका यहूद the aztecs in कया is अभी मैक्सिको और the Mayans in Central America.
European colonists began to arrive starting in the 16th and 17th centuries, wiping आउट विशाल संख्याएँ of the native populations and beginning an era of European dominance.
Jermaine Lamarr Cole ( born January 28, 1985 ), better known by his stage name J. कोल, is an अमरीकी hip-hop रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार and record producer from Fayetteville, North Carolina.
In 2009, he became the पहला कलाकार to चिह्न to Jay-Z 's Roc Nation label.
His long-awaited डेब्यू एल्बम, हकदार कोल संसार : the sideline Story, was released on September 27, 2011.

he प्राप्त a नामांकन for Best New Artist at the 54th Grammy Awards.
The two main characters of the series, ratchet ( सही ) and Clank ( left ).
Ratchet & Clank is a series of मंच वीडियो games.
The franchise was created and developed by Insomniac Games and published by Sony Computer Entertainment for many different PlayStation consoles, such as PlayStation 2 and PlayStation 3 with the exclusion of आकार matters और रहस्य एजेंट clank, जिससे were developed by High Impact Games for the PlayStation Portable.
Every game in the श्रेणी रै महरूम released लिये प्रत्येक कंसोल, as the IP is owned by Sony Computer Entertainment.
An animated feature film adaptation produced by Rainmaker Entertainment and Blockade Entertainment is अनुसूचित लिये a नाट्य रिलीज sometime in 2015.
The games take place in a science fiction setting and follow the adventures of Ratchet ( an animalistic human-like character known as a Lombax, who is a mechanic ) and Clank ( a diminutive, sentient रोबोट ) as वे सफर through the ब्रह्मांड, छायांकन it from evil forces on a regular basis.
The series is विख्यात लिये the समावेश of अनेक exotic और unique, over the top weapons and devices, a concept that Insomniac Games also expanded into their other games.
A will or testament is a legal declaration by which a person, the testator, names one or more persons to मैनेज his/her एस्टेट और provides लिये the ट्रांसफ़र of उसके प्रॉपर्टी at death.
For the devolution of property not disposed of by होगा, देखिए उत्तराधिकार और intestacy.
In the strictest sense, a `` will '' has historically महरूम सीमित to रियल प्रॉपर्टी जबकि `` वसीयत '' applies तभी to dispositions of निजी प्रॉपर्टी ( यूँ giving rise to the popular title of the document as `` Last Will and Testament '' ), though this distinction is seldom observed today.
A will may also create a testamentary trust that is प्रभावी तभी बाद the मौत of the testator.
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar plant in स्पेन सुविधाएँ 15 घंटों of भंडार और can supply power 24 hours a day.
Solar energy, radiant light and heat from the sun, has been harnessed by इंसानो चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स using a दायरा of ever-evolving technologies.
Solar energy technologies शामिल सौर हीटिंग, सौर photovoltaics, सौर थर्मल विद्युत, सौर वास्तुकला और कृत्रिम photosynthesis, which can make considerable contributions to solving some of the most urgent energy problems the world now faces.
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive सौर or क्रियाशील सौर depending on the रास्ता they capture, convert and distribute solar energy.
Active solar techniques include the use of photovoltaic panels और सौर थर्मल collectors to दोहन the उर्जा.
Passive solar techniques include orienting a भवन to the सूर्य, selecting सामग्री साथ अनुकूल थर्मल द्रव्यमान or लाइट dispersing properties, and designing spaces that naturally circulate air.
In 2011, the International Energy Agency said that `` the development of affordable, inexhaustible और साफ सौर उर्जा technologies होगा have विशाल longer-term लाभ.
It will increase countries’ energy security through reliance on an स्वदेशी, inexhaustible और ज़्यादातर import-independent संसाधन, enhance sustainability, reduce pollution, lower the costs of mitigating climate change, and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise.
These लाभ हैं global.
Hence the additional costs of the प्रोत्साहन लिये जल्दी deployment चाहिए be माना सीखना investments ; they must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared ''.
Sir Thomas More ( ; 7 February 14786 July 1535 ), known to Roman Catholics as Saint Thomas More since 1935, was an अंग्रेज़ी वकील, सोशल पारस, लेखक, statesman, और विख्यात पुनर्जागरण humanist.
He was an important councillor to Henry VIII of England and was रब चांसलर इससे अक्तूबर 1529 to 16 May 1532.
He was canonized by Pope Pius XI in 1935 as one of the जल्दी शहीदो of the schism कि अलग the गिरिजाघर of England from Rome in the 16th century.
In 2000, Pope John Paul II declared उसे संरक्षक of कैथोलिक कूटनीतिज्ञों and politicians.
More थी an प्रतिद्वन्दी of the प्रोटोस्टेंट reformation, in particular of Martin Luther and William Tyndale.
However, since 1980, he is भी commemorated by the गिरिजाघर of England as a reformation martyr.
More coined the word `` utopia `` – a name he gave to the आदर्श और काल्पनिक द्वीप स्वदेश, the राजनैतिक प्रणाली of जिससे he वर्णित in Utopia, published in 1516.
He opposed the King 's separation from the Roman Catholic Church and refused to accept उसे as Supreme Head of the Church of England, a title which had been given by parliament through the Act of Supremacy of 1534.
He थी imprisoned in 1534 लिये उसके refusal to लो the oath required by the First Succession Act, because the act disparaged Papal Authority and Henry’s marriage to Catherine of Aragon.
In 1535, he was आजमाया लिये देशद्रोह, convicted on perjured testimony, and beheaded.
More also helped to originate the phrase `` grasp at लोभी '' to औसत `` शिद्दत trying भी व्यर्थ बाते '', in his Dialogue of Comfort Against Tribulation.
intellectuals और कूटनीतिज्ञों across Europe were stunned by More 's execution.
Erasmus saluted उसे as एक `` जिनकी soul was more pure than any snow, whose genius was such that England never had and never again will have its like ''.
There was a more controversial side to More 's जीवन, क्युकी he advocated the persecution और निष्पादन of Protestants who refused to recant their faith.
However, the judgement of history has been largely willing to forgive this in light of the times he lived in and उसके शहादत in the रोमन कैथोलिक कारण.
Two centuries later Jonathan Swift said More was `` the व्यक्ति of the महानतम पुण्य इस किंगडम ever produced '', a sentiment with which Samuel Johnson agreed.
Historian Hugh trevor-roper कहा in 1977 कि अधिक थी `` the पहला ग्रेट अंग्रेज whom we feel that we know, the most saintly of humanists, the most human of saints, the universal man of our cool northern renaissance. ''
Captain Nemo, also known as Prince Dakkar, is a fictional character invented by the French विज्ञान fiction लेखक जूल्स वर्न.
Nemo appears in two of Verne 's novels, Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea ( 1870 ) और the रहस्यमय द्वीप ( 1874 ), और makes a कैमियो appearance in Verne 's play Journey Through the Impossible ( 1882 ).
Nemo, one of the most famous antiheroes in fiction, is a mysterious figure.
The son of an Indian Raja, he is a scientific genius who roams the depths of the sea in उसके पनडुब्बी, the नॉटिलस, जिससे थी built on a deserted island.
Nemo tries to project a stern, नियंत्रित विश्वास, लकिन he is चलित by a thirst for vengeance and a hatred of imperialism ( particularly the British Empire ).
He is also wracked by remorse over the deaths of his crew members और भी by the मौतों of दुश्मन sailors.
Nemo रै appeared in विभिन्न adaptations of वर्न 's novels, including films, where he has been portrayed by a number of different actors.
He has furthermore been adopted by other authors for समावेश in उनके novels, सबसे notably in एलन मूर 's the लीग of असाधारण सज्जनों and Philip José Farmer 's The Other Log of Phileas Fogg.

ध्वनिक coupler modem
A modem ( modulator-demodulator ) is a यंत्र कि modulates an एनालॉग वाहक सिग्नल to encode digital information, and also demodulates such a carrier signal to decode the transmitted information.
The goal is to produce a signal that can be transmitted easily और decoded to reproduce the original digital data.
modems can be प्रयुक्त over कोई अर्थात् of transmitting analog signals, from light emitting diodes to radio.
The most familiar example is a voice band modem कि turns the डिजिटल आंकड़ा of a निजी कंप्यूटर into modulated electrical signals in the voice frequency range of a telephone channel.
These signals can be transmitted over टेलीफोन लाइनों और demodulated by another modem at the receiver side to recover the digital data.
Modems are generally classified by the amount of आंकड़ा वे can भेजें in a दिए ईकाई of समय, प्रायः expressed in bits per second ( bit/s, or bps ), or bytes per second ( B/s ).
Modems can alternatively be वर्गीकृत by उनके प्रतीक rate, measured in baud.
The baud ईकाई denotes प्रतीकों प्रति दूसरी, or the number of times per second the modem sends a new signal.
For example, the ITU V.21 standard used audio frequency shift keying with two संभावित बारंबारता सम्बन्धित to दो distinct symbols ( or one bit per symbol ), to carry 300 bits per second using 300 baud.
By contrast, the original itu v.22 मानक, जिससे थी समर्थ to संचारण और प्राप्त चार पृथक प्रतीकों ( दो बिट्स per symbol ), handled 1,200 bit/s by sending 600 symbols per second ( 600 baud ) using phase shift keying.
The Declaration of Independence is a statement adopted by the Continental Congress on July 4, 1776, जिससे घोषित कि the तेरह अमरीकी colonies, तब at युद्ध साथ ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, regarded themselves as independent states, and no longer a part of the British Empire.
Instead they now formed a new nation—the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका.
John Adams थी a नेता in pushing for independence, which was unanimously approved on July 2.
A committee had already drafted the formal घोषणा, to be तैयार when congress voted on independence.
Adams persuaded the committee to select Thomas Jefferson to लिखें the असली ड्राफ्ट of the दस्तावेज़, which congress would edit to produce the final version.
The घोषणा थी ultimately a औपचारिक स्पष्टीकरण of क्यों कॉंग्रेस था voted on जुलाई 2 to घोषित स्वतंत्रता इससे Great Britain, more than a year after the outbreak of the American Revolutionary War.
The national birthday, the Independence Day is celebrated on July 4, हालांकि एडम्स चाही जुलाई 2.
After ratifying the text on July 4, कॉंग्रेस जारी the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता in several forms.
It was initially published as the printed Dunlap broadside कि थी widely वितरित and read to the public.
The most famous version of the Declaration, a signed copy that is popularly regarded as the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता, is प्रदर्शित at the National Archives in Washington, D.C.
Although the wording of the Declaration was स्वीकृत on जुलाई 4, the तिथि of इसके हस्ताक्षर was August 2.
The original July 4 United States Declaration of Independence manuscript थी खोया जबकि सब अन्य नक़ल have been derived from this original document.
The sources and interpretation of the घोषणा have महरूम the विषय of much scholarly inquiry.
The Declaration justified the independence of the United States by listing colonial grievances विरूद्ध किंग जार्ज iii, और by asserting certain natural and legal rights, including a right of revolution.
Having served its असली purpose in announcing स्वतंत्रता, the text of the Declaration was initially ignored after the American Revolution.
Since then, it रै आइये to be considered a major statement on human rights, particularly its second sentence:
We hold these truths to be self-evident, that all men are created equal, that they are endowed by उनके निर्माता साथ निश्चित unalienable अधिकारों, कि among ये हैं Life, Liberty and the pursuit of Happiness.
This has been called `` one of the best-known वाक्य in the अंग्रेज़ी भाषा '', containing `` the सबसे potent and consequential words in American history. ''
The passage came to represent a moral मानक to जिससे the United States should strive.
This view was notably प्रचारित by अब्राहम lincoln, जो माना the घोषणा to be the foundation of his political philosophy, and argued that the Declaration is a statement of principles through which the United States Constitution should be interpreted.
It has inspired work for the rights of अधिकारहीन लोगों throughout the world.
The Economy of Greenland can be characterized as small, मिश्रित और vulnerable.
The उपस्थित अर्थव्यवस्था consists of a बिग पब्लिक सेक्टर और व्यापक विदेशी trade, which has resulted in an economy with periods of strong growth, considerable inflation, unemployment problems and extreme dependence on capital inflow from Denmark and use of outside, mainly Danish, skilled labor.
GDP per capita is similar to the average European economies but the economy is critically dependent upon substantial support from the Danish government, which supplies about half the revenues of the home नियम सरकारी जो in फेरे employ परिचय 8,000 greenlanders आउट of a मजदूर फ़ोर्स of 40,156 ( jan. 2012 ).
Unemployment nonetheless remains high, with the rest of the अर्थव्यवस्था निर्भर upon माँग लिये exports of shrimp and fish.
हाइड्रोजन is a रासायनिक तत्व with symbol H and atomic number 1.
With an atomic weight of ( for hydrogen-1 ), हाइड्रोजन is the lightest तत्व और इसके monatomic रूप ( h1 ) is the most abundant chemical substance, constituting roughly 75 % of the Universe 's baryonic mass.
Non- remnant stars हैं मुख्यतः रचित of हाइड्रोजन in its plasma state.
at मानक तापमान और दबाव, हाइड्रोजन is a colorless, odorless, tasteless, non-toxic, nonmetallic, highly combustible diatomic gas with the molecular formula H2.
Most of the hydrogen on Earth is in molecules such as water and organic यौगिकों क्युकी हाइड्रोजन readily फ़ॉर्म covalent यौगिकों साथ सबसे non-metallic elements.
Hydrogen plays a विशेषकर महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in acid-base रसायन साथ अनेक reactions exchanging protons between soluble molecules.
In ionic compounds, it can लो a ऋणात्मक चार्ज ( an anion ज्ञात as a hydride and written as H− ), or as a positively charged species H+.
the latter cation is लिखा as हालांकि रचित of a bare proton, but in reality, hydrogen cations in ionic compounds always occur as more complex species.
The most common isotope of हाइड्रोजन is protium ( नाम rarely प्रयुक्त, प्रतीक 1h ) with a single proton and no neutrons.
as the सरलतम अणु ज्ञात, the hydrogen atom has been of theoretical use.
For example, as the only neutral atom with an analytic solution to the Schrödinger equation, the study of the energetics and bonding of the हाइड्रोजन अणु निभाई a कुंजी भूमिका in the development of quantum mechanics.
Hydrogen gas was first artificially produced in the early 16th सदी, via the mixing of metals with acids.
In 1766–81, Henry Cavendish was the first to recognize that hydrogen gas was a discrete substance, and that it produces water when burned, a property which later gave it its name : in Greek, हाइड्रोजन अर्थात् `` water-former ''.
Industrial production is mainly from the steam reforming of प्राकृतिक गैस, और कम प्रायः इससे more energy-intensive hydrogen production methods like the electrolysis of water.
Most hydrogen is employed near its production साईट, साथ the दो largest उपयोग होने चट्टान ईंधन प्रसंस्करण ( e.g., hydrocracking ) and ammonia production, mostly for the fertilizer market.
Hydrogen is a concern in metallurgy as it can embrittle अनेक धातुओं, complicating the design of pipelines and storage tanks.
Unstoppable is a 2010 American action thriller film निर्देशित by टोनी स्कॉट, लिखा by चिह्नित bomback, और अभिनीत डेंज़ल Washington and Chris Pine.
The film, loosely based on the real-life csx 8888 घटना, tells the स्टोरी of a runaway freight train, and the two men ( Washington and Pine ) who manage to stop it.
It was Scott 's final feature film पहले उसके मौत in 2012.
The film was released in the United States and Canada on नवम्बर 12, 2010, and in the United Kingdom on November 24, 2010.
It received mostly favorable reviews from film critics ; it garnered a `` certified भैस '' rating on Rotten Tomatoes based upon aggregated reviews and a rating of `` Generally favorable reviews '' at Metacritic.
The film was nominated for an Academy Award for Best ध्वनि संपादन at the 83rd अकादमी Awards, but lost to Inception.
In photography, bracketing is the सामान्य तकनीक of लेने अनेक गोलियाँ of the same subject using different camera settings.
Bracketing is useful and often recommended in situations that make it difficult to obtain a satisfactory image with a single shot, विशेषकर जब a छोटी विभिन्नता in एक्सपोज़र पैरामीटर्स रै a comparatively विशाल प्रभाव on the resulting image.
Autobracketing is automatic bracketing by using a setting on the camera to take several bracketed गोलियाँ ( in कंट्रास्ट to the photographer altering the settings by hand between each shot ).
Given the time it takes to accomplish multiple shots, it is typically, but not always, used for static विषय.
Insulated glazing ( IG ), more commonly known as double glazing ( or double-pane, and increasingly triple glazing/pane ) हैं दोगुना or ट्रिपल कांच खिड़की panes अलग by an एयर or other gas filled space to reduce heat transfer across a part of the building envelope.
Insulated Glass Units are manufactured with glass in range of thickness from 3 mm to 10 mm or अधिक in खास अनुप्रयोग.
laminated or tempered कांच may also be used as part of the construction.
Most units are manufactured with the same thickness of glass used on both panes but special applications such as acoustic attenuation or security may आवश्यकता चौड़ी सीमाएँ of thicknesses to be incorporated in the same unit.
A sectioned diagram of a फिक्स्ड insulated चमकीले Unit ( IGU ), indicating the numbering convention used in this article.
Surface # 1 is facing outside, Surface # 2 is the inside surface of the exterior pane, सतह # 3 is the बाहर सतह of the आंतरिक फलक, और सतह # 4 is the inside surface of interior pane.
The window frame is labelled # 5, a spacer is indicated as # 6, seals are shown in red ( # 7 ), the internal reveal is on the सही हाथ पक्ष ( # 8 ) और the exterior windowsill on the बाएँ ( # 9 )
To reduce shear effects on the sealed unit ( a major cause of premature failure ), manufacturers use a rule of thumb that permits a difference of 1 mm between the मोटाई of the panes of glass used in the unit and still maintain the warranty for the unit.
For example, a unit may be ordered with a 4 mm फलक on the exterior और a 3 mm pane on the interior.
These variations हैं अनुमत लिये architectural and cost reasons.
Other combinations can be specified and produced लकिन the निर्माता may आरक्षित the सही to सीमा the term of the warranty or refuse to warranty the unit altogether.
For ease of description the surfaces of a double paned unit are named according to the following convention : Surface # 1 ( facing outside ), Surface # 2 ( inside of outside pane ), Surface # 3 ( outside of inside pane ) and सतह # 4 ( अंदर सतह of अंदर pane ).
Applying the corresponding नामकरण लिये ट्रिपल paned इकाई परिणाम in surfaces # 1 through # 6.

Selenium is a रासायनिक तत्व साथ प्रतीक Se and atomic number 34.
It is a nonmetal with properties that are intermediate between those of its आवधिक तालिका column-adjacent chalcogen elements sulfur and tellurium.
It rarely occurs in its elemental राज्य in प्रकृति, or as pure ore compounds.
Selenium ( Greek σελήνη selene meaning `` Moon '' ) was discovered in 1817 by jöns याक़ूब berzelius, जो विख्यात the समानता of the नई तत्व to the previously-known tellurium ( named for the Earth ).
Selenium is found impurely in metal sulfide ores, जहाँ it partially replaces the sulfur.
Commercially, selenium is produced as a byproduct in the शोधन of ये ores, सबसे प्रायः during copper production.
Minerals that are pure selenide or selenate यौगिकों हैं ज्ञात, but are rare.
The chief वाणिज्यिक उपयोग लिये सेलेनियम आज हैं in glassmaking and in pigments.
Selenium is a semiconductor और is प्रयुक्त in photocells.
Uses in electronics, once important, have महरूम ज़्यादातर supplanted by silicon semiconductor devices.
Selenium continues to be प्रयुक्त in a few प्रकार of dc शक्ति surge protectors and one type of fluorescent quantum dot.
Selenium salts are toxic in large amounts, but trace amounts are जरुरी लिये सेल्यूलर फलन in अनेक जीवों, including all animals.
Selenium is a component of the antioxidant एंजाइमों glutathione peroxidase और thioredoxin reductase ( which indirectly reduce certain oxidized molecules in animals and some plants ).
It is also मिला in तीन deiodinase एंजाइमों, which convert one thyroid hormone to another.
Selenium requirements in plants differ by प्रजाति, साथ कुछ पौधे requiring अपेक्षाकृत large amounts, and others apparently requiring none.
The United States presidential चुनाव of 2008 थी the 56th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय election.
it थी आयोजित on मंगलवार, November 4, 2008.
Democrat Barack ओबामा, तब the जूनियर सीनेटर इससे इलिनोइस, defeated Republican John McCain, the senior Senator from Arizona.
As the campaign progressed, the War in Iraq and outgoing Republican अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश था become increasingly unpopular, and the major-party candidates ran on a platform of change and reform.
Domestic policy and the economy eventually emerged as the main themes in the last few months of the चुनाव अभियान बाद the onset of the worst मंदी since the 1930s.
Obama would go on to win a decisive victory over McCain in both the चुनावी और लोकप्रिय vote.
Obama received the most votes for a presidential candidate in American history, and won the popular और चुनावी vote by the largest हाशिया in 12 सालो, as खूब as the largest percentage of the popular vote for a Democrat in nearly a half-century.
This was the first U.S. presidential election in which an African American was elected, having also been the first in which an African अमरीकी जीती the नामांकन of either प्रमुख पार्टी.
This election was also notable for being the first time in U.S. इतिहास कि दोनो प्रमुख पार्टी उम्मीदवार यहूद बैठे u.s. सीनेटरों, तभी the तीसरा समय ( बाद 1920 और 1960 ) कि कोई बैठे u.s. सीनेटर थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष, and only the second time that the winning President and Vice President ( Obama and Biden ) were both sitting U.S. Senators.
This was also the first election since 1952 in which neither of the प्रमुख पार्टियों ' नामांकित थी the लाज़िम President or Vice President.
the sovereign प्रिंस or राजकुमारी of Monaco is the reigning monarch and head of state of the Principality of Monaco.
All princes or princesses have officially लिया the नाम of the हाउस of grimaldi, लकिन have belonged to विभिन्न other houses ( Goyon de Matignon, Polignac ) in male line.
The reigning प्रिंस is Albert II.
Visualization of fragmentation और तब of defragmentation
In the maintenance of file systems, defragmentation is a प्रक्रम कि reduces the amount of fragmentation.
It does this by physically आयोजन the सामग्री of the द्रव्यमान भंडार यंत्र प्रयुक्त to store files into the smallest number of contiguous regions ( fragments ).
It also attempts to create larger regions of फ़्री स्पेस using compaction to impede the return of fragmentation.
Some defragmentation उपयोगिताएँ कोशिश to रखना छोटी फाइलें within a single directory together, as they are often accessed in sequence.
Defragmentation is advantageous and relevant to file प्रणालियों on electromechanical disk drives.
The movement of the hard drive 's read/write heads over अलग क्षेत्रों of the डिस्क जब accessing fragmented files is slower, compared to accessing the entire contents of a non-fragmented file sequentially without moving the read/write heads to seek other fragments.
A service-level अनुबंध ( sla ) is a भाग of a service contract where a service is formally defined.
In अभ्यास, the पद sla is sometimes प्रयुक्त to refer to the contracted delivery time ( of the service or performance ).
As an example, internet service providers will commonly include service level agreements within the शर्तें of उनके अनुबंध साथ ग्राहक to define the स्तर ( s ) of सेवा होने बेची in plain language terms.
In this case the SLA will typically have a technical definition in terms of mean समय between असफलताओं ( mtbf ), औसत समय to मरम्मत or औसत समय to recovery ( MTTR ) ; various data rates ; throughput ; jitter ; or similar measurable details.
Union Station is a पूर्व खरीदारी मॉल in संघ नगर, Georgia, in southwest metro Atlanta adjacent to Interstate 85.
बाद नई स्वामित्व और renovations in 2006, the name was changed from Shannon Southpark Mall in 2007 to Union Station Mall.
A previous renovation was done in the लेट 1990s.
The mall has महरूम बंद चूंकि नवम्बर 2010.
This map shows the संलग्न संयुक्त राज्य और, in insets at the निम्नतर बाएँ, the दो राज्य that are not contiguous.
The contiguous United States are the 48 adjoining U.S. states on the महाद्वीप of उत्तर अमेरिका कि हैं दक्षिण of कनाडा और उत्तर of Mexico, plus the District of Columbia.
The term excludes the states of Alaska and Hawaii, and सब off-shore u.S. territories and possessions, such as Puerto Rico.
Together, the 48 contiguous states and D.C. occupy a संयुक्त क्षेत्रफल of, जिससे is 1.58 % of the कुल surface area of the Earth.
Of this, is जमीन, composing 83.65 % of U.S. land area.
Officially, is water area, composing 62.66 % of the nation 's water area.
The 2010 census population was 306,675,006, composing 99.33 % of the स्वदेश 's जनसांख्यिकी, और a घनत्व of 103.639 inhabitants/sq mi ( 40.015/km2 ), compared to 87.264/sq mi ( 33.692/km2 ) for the nation as a whole.
`` Why '' is the title of a song अंकित by अमरीकी देश बैंड rascal Flatts.
