It was लिखा by रोब mathes और एलन shamblin.
Utilization management is the evaluation of the appropriateness, medical need and दक्षता of स्वास्थ्य परवाह सेवाएं प्रक्रियाओं और सुविधाएं according to established criteria or guidelines and under the provisions of an applicable health benefits plan.
Typically it शामिल नई क्रियाएँ or निर्णय based upon the analysis of a case.
Utilization management describes proactive प्रक्रियाओं, सहित निर्वहन नियोजन, संयुक्त नियोजन, pre-certification and clinical case appeals.
It also covers proactive processes, such as concurrent clinical reviews and peer reviews, as well as appeals introduced by the प्रदाता, payer or रोगी.
As pre-certification and concurrent review of cases grew, utilization प्रबन्धन spun आउट of utilization review.
While not synonymous, स्वास्थ्य परवाह पेशेवर tend to use the terms as interchangeable.
The difference is utilization management is and intends to manage health care cases efficiently और लागत effectively पहले और दौरान स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रशासन.
Utilization review is अधिक considering whether स्वास्थ्य परवाह was appropriately applied after it was administered.
There are चार मौलिक तकनीकों in utilization management:
Demand प्रबन्धन
utilization Review
मामला प्रबन्धन
बीमारी प्रबन्धन
The Outsiders is a coming-of-age अनोखा by S. E. hinton, first published in 1967 by Viking Press.
Hinton was 15 when she started writing the novel, but did most of the कार्य जब वो थी सोलह और a जूनियर in ऊँची school.
hinton थी 18 जब the book was published.
The book follows two rival groups, the Greasers and the Socs ( pronounced by the author as, छोटी लिये socials ), who are divided by their socioeconomic status.
The book takes प्लेस in तुलसा, ओक्लाहोमा, in 1965, but it is never stated in the book.
A film adaptation was produced in 1983, और a little-known short-lived television series appeared in 1990, picking up where the movie left off.
The United States हाउस of प्रतिनिधि is एक of the दो घरों of the United States Congress ( a bicameral legislature ).
It is अक्सर referred to as the House.
The other हाउस is the Senate.
The composition and powers of the हाउस हैं स्थापित in आलेख One of the United States Constitution.
The major power of the House is to pass federal legislation that affects the entire देश हालांकि इसके बिल्स जरूर भी be passed by the सीनेट और further agreed to by the U.S. President before becoming law ( unless both the House and Senate re-pass the legislation with a two-thirds majority in each chamber ).
The House has several exclusive powers : the शक्ति to initiate आय बिल्स, to impeach officials, और to elect the U.S. President in case there is no majority in the Electoral College.
Each U.S. state is represented in the House in proportion to its population but is हकदार to at तनिक एक प्रतिनिधि.
The most populous state, California, फिलहाल रै 53 प्रतिनिधि.
The total number of voting प्रतिनिधि is फिक्स्ड by law at 435.
Each प्रतिनिधि serves for a two-year term.
The Speaker of the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि, जो presides over the कक्ष, is निर्वाचित by the सदस्यों of the हाउस, और is इसलिए traditionally the नेता of the House Democratic Caucus or the House Republican Conference, whichever party has more voting members.
The House meets in the दक्षिण wing of the संयुक्त States Capitol.
a सप्लाई कड़ी is दरअसल a जटिल and dynamic supply and demand network.
( cf. wieland/wallenburg, 2011 )
A supply chain is a system of organizations, people, activities, सूचना, और संसाधन शामिल in चलती a product or service from supplier to customer.
Supply chain क्रियाएँ रूपांतरण प्राकृतिक संसाधन, कच्चा सामग्री, and components into a finished product that is delivered to the end customer.
In sophisticated supply chain systems, used products may re-enter the सप्लाई कड़ी at कोई पाइंट where residual value is recyclable.
सप्लाई जंजीरों link value chains.
`` Purple Haze '' is a सोंग लिखा और अंकित by जिमि हेंड्रिक्स in 1967, released as the दूसरी single by The Jimi Hendrix Experience in both the United Kingdom and the United States.
It later appeared on the American version of the band 's 1967 एल्बम हैं तुम अनुभवी.
`` Purple Haze '' has become one of the `` archetypical साइकेडेलिक ड्रग गीतों of the sixties ''.
`` जामुनी haze 's '' गिटार virtuosic techniques would be emulated by many metal guitarists.
A close up picture of a गैंडा skin.
Skin is the soft outer covering of vertebrates.
अन्य एनिमल छतरियाँ ऐसे as the सन्धिपाद बहि have different developmental origin, structure and chemical composition.
The adjective cutaneous अर्थात् `` of the स्किन '' ( इससे Latin cutis, skin ).
In स्तनधारियों, the स्किन is the largest अंग of the integumentary प्रणाली made up of multiple layers of ectodermal tissue, and guards the underlying muscles, bones, ligaments and internal organs.
Skin of a अलग nature exists in amphibians, reptiles, and birds.
All स्तनधारियों have कुछ बाल on उनके skin, even marine mammals which appear to be hairless.
The skin interfaces साथ the पर्यावरण and is the first line of defense from external factors.
For example, the skin plays a key भूमिका in protecting the देह against pathogens and excessive water loss.
Its other functions are insulation, temperature विनियमन, सनसनी, और the उत्पादन of vitamin D folates.
severely क्षतिग्रस्त स्किन may heal by forming scar tissue.
This is sometimes discoloured and depigmented.
the मोटाई of स्किन भी varies from location to location on an organism.
In humans for उदाहरण, the स्किन स्तिथ अंतर्गत the आँखें और around the eyelids is the thinnest skin in the body at 0.5 mm thick, and is one of the first areas to show signs of aging such as `` crows feet '' and wrinkles.
The skin on the palms and the soles of the feet is 4 mm thick and the thickest स्किन in the देह.
फर is घना hair.
Primarily, fur augments the इन्सुलेशन the स्किन provides लकिन can also serve as a secondary sexual characteristic or as camouflage.
On some animals, the skin is very hard and मोटा, और can be processed to बनाएँ leather.
Reptiles and fish have hard सुरक्षात्मक तराजू on उनके स्किन लिये protection, and birds have hard feathers, all made of tough β- keratins.
Amphibian skin is not a strong barrier to ड्योढ़ी of रसायन और is प्रायः विषय to परासरण and diffusive forces.
For example, a frog sitting in an anesthetic solution would be sedated जल्दी, as the रासायनिक diffuses through its skin.
थामस स्कॉट
The Rev. Thomas Scott ( 1747-1821 ) was an influential preacher and author who is principally known for his best-selling कार्य a commentary on the पूरे बाइबल और the फ़ोर्स of सच्चाई, और as एक of the संस्थापकों of the गिरिजाघर Missionary Society.
Daniel Radcliffe, who portrays Harry Potter, has been the icon of the film series चूंकि the रिलीज of the पहला फिल्मी in 2001.
Some of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध अभिनेताओं of the संयुक्त किंगडम और आयरलैंड have voiced or portrayed characters appearing in the Harry Potter film series based on the book series by J. K. Rowling.
डेनियल radcliffe, रुपर्ट grint और एम्मा वाटसन have निभाई हैरी Potter, Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger in all the films.
When they were cast only radcliffe था previously acted in a film.
Complementing them on screen are such actors as Helena Bonham Carter, Jim Broadbent, John Cleese, Robbie Coltrane, Warwick Davis, Ralph Fiennes, Michael Gambon, Brendan gleeson, रिचर्ड ग्रीफिथ, रिचर्ड हैरिस, जॉन ठेस, जेसन isaacs, miriam margolyes, हेलेन mccrory, गेरी Oldman, Alan Rickman, Fiona Shaw, Maggie Smith, Timothy Spall, Imelda Staunton, David Thewlis, Emma Thompson, and Julie Walters, among others.
Thirteen अभिनेताओं have appeared as the same character in all eight films of the franchise.
Some well-known British actors who have not appeared in the श्रेणी, हैं पूछा in jest क्यों वे have not been cast.
When David Yates was directing the fifth film, विधेयक nighy, जो था previously collaborated साथ येट्स on three of his television projects, said that he joked with Yates that maybe now he would n't be the only actor in England who had n't been in Harry Potter.
`` But nobody पुकारा '', nighy added.
But in 2009, येट्स डाल nighy as मंत्री of Magic Rufus Scrimgeour in Deathly Hallows.
Nighy कहा, `` i am no longer the तभी अंग्रेज़ी actor not to be in Harry Potter and I am very pleased. ''
Jude Law has quipped, `` nobody 's पूछा me.
I was a bit too बूढ़ा लिये Harry ''.
When a reporter compared potions professor Horace Slughorn 's obsession with famous names to the series ' connection to `` every notable British actor, '' Jim Broadbent, जो plays slughorn कहा, `` खूब, नहीं प्रत्येक actor gets invited.
I know some who are स्टिल प्रतीक्षारत. ''
With the exception of Chris Columbus, each director has had a cameo appearance in his respective film : Alfonso Cuarón appears as a जादूगर पकड़कर a मोमबत्ती दौरान a झाँकी at the तीन broomsticks in कैदी of azkaban ; माइक newell is सुना briefly as the रेडियो प्रस्तुतकर्ता in Frank Bryce 's house in Goblet of Fire ; and David Yates features as a wizard within a magical moving portrait in Order of the Phoenix.
Producer David Heyman also makes a cameo रूप as a जादूगर प्रदर्शित भीतर a जादुई moving portrait in the third film, Prisoner of Azkaban.

She announced that वो could never have dreamt of the प्रतिभाशाली अभिनेताओं और अभिनेत्रियों who have appeared in all the Harry Potter movies.
Rowling also announced that there are seven Harry Potter film series cast members, who she refers to as `` The Big सात '', वे हैं डेनियल radcliffe, रुपर्ट grint, एम्मा वाटसन, Tom Felton, Matthew Lewis, Evanna Lynch and Bonnie Wright.
The list below is sorted by film and character, as कुछ वर्ण have महरूम portrayed by अनेक actors.

( y ) indicates the कर्ता or अभिनेत्री portrayed the role in a flashback scene or when the character was young.

A twelve-step program is a set of guiding principles ( accepted by members as 'spiritual principles, ' based on the स्वीकृत साहित्य ) outlining a कोर्स of action for recovery from, compulsion, or other behavioral problems.
Originally proposed by Alcoholics Anonymous ( AA ) as a method of recovery from alcoholism, the बारह कदम यहूद पहला प्रकाशित in the किताब alcoholics बेनाम : the स्टोरी of How More Than One Hundred Men Have Recovered from Alcoholism in 1939.
The method was then adapted और became the न्यास of अन्य twelve-step programs.
As summarized by the American Psychological Association, the process involves the following:
admitting that one can not कंट्रोल एक 's व्यसन or compulsion ;
recognizing a उच्चतर शक्ति कि can दे strength ;
examining past errors साथ the सहायता of a प्रायोजक ( अनुभवी member ) ;
making amends लिये ये त्रुटियाँ ;
learning to live a new life with a new कोड of बर्ताव ;
helping others who suffer from the वही व्यसनों or compulsions.
Witness impeachment, in the law of evidence of the United States, is the process of calling into question the विश्वसनीयता of an व्यक्तिगत जो is testifying in a विचारण.
the संघीय नियम of प्रमाण contain the rules governing impeachment in federal courts.
Party leaders and whips of the United States House of प्रतिनिधि हैं निर्वाचित by उनके संबंधित parties in a closed-door caucus by secret ballot and are also known as floor leaders.
The U.S. House of Representatives करता नहीं officially उपयोग the पद `` अल्पसंख्यक नेता '' हालांकि the media frequently do.
The House instead uses the terms `` Republican Leader '' or `` लोकतांत्रिक नेता '' depending on which party holds a minority of seats.
The current House बहुमत नेता is रिपब्लिकन eric cantor, जबकि the current House Minority Leader is Democrat Nancy Pelosi.
The current House Majority Whip is Republican Kevin McCarthy, while the वर्तमान हाउस अल्पसंख्यक चाबुक is डेमोक्रेट Steny Hoyer.
Following the outbreak of संसार युद्ध i in 1914, the जर्मनी फौज खोली the पश्चिमी Front by first invading Luxembourg and Belgium, then gaining military control of important industrial regions in France.
The tide of the अग्रिम थी dramatically turned with the Battle of the Marne.
Following the रेस to the समुद्र, दोनो पहलू खोदा in साथ a meandering लकीर of fortified trenches, stretching from the North Sea to the Swiss frontier with France.
This line remained essentially अपरिवर्तित लिये most of the war.
between 1915 और 1917 वहीँ यहूद अनेक major offensives along this front.
The attacks employed विशाल तोपखाने bombardments और massed infantry advances.
However, a combination of entrenchments, यंत्र गन nests, कंटीले तार, और तोपखाने repeatedly inflicted severe casualties on the attackers and counterattacking defenders.
As a result, no significant अग्रिम were made.
Among the most costly of these offensives were the Battle of Verdun with a combined [ estimated ] 700,000 dead, the Battle of the Somme with more than [ an अनुमानित ] लाख हताहत, और the बैटल of passchendaele साथ roughly [ an अनुमानित ] 600,000 casualties.
In an effort to ब्रेक the deadlock, इस सामने देखी the परिचय of new military technology, including poison gas, aircraft and tanks.
But it was only after the adoption of improved tactics कि some degree of mobility was restored.
The जर्मनी वसन्त अप्रिय of 1918 थी made possible by the Treaty of Brest-Litovsk that marked the end of the conflict on the Eastern Front.
Using the recently-introduced infiltration tactics, the जर्मनी सेना उन्नत nearly to the वेस्ट, जिससे चिह्नित the deepest अग्रिम by either पक्ष चूंकि 1914 and very nearly succeeded in forcing a breakthrough.
In spite of the generally stagnant nature of this सामने, इस थिएटर होता prove decisive.
The inexorable advance of the Allied सेना दौरान the दूसरी हाफ of 1918 persuaded the जर्मनी कमांडरों कि शिकस्त was inevitable, and the government was forced to sue for conditions of an armistice.
The terms of peace were agreed upon with the signing of the सन्धि of versailles in 1919.

ये वर्ण यहूद regularly rotated, often disappearing for long periods during the series.
The following list of वर्ण रै महरूम sorted alphabetically, by first name.

Because this position is traditionally filled by the wife of the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, the शीर्षक is सबसे प्रायः लागू to the wife of a sitting president.
The current पहला महिला is मिशेल Obama.
After her husband Barack Obama was re-elected on November 6, 2012, she is scheduled to serve जबतक January 20, 2017.
Septic shock is a medical condition as a result of severe infection और सेप्सिस, हालांकि the microbe may be प्रणालीगत or स्थानीयकृत to a particular site.
It can कारण अनेक organ dysfunction syndrome ( formerly known as multiple organ failure ) and death.
Its most common victims are children, immunocompromised individuals, और the बुजुर्ग, as उनके प्रतिरक्षा प्रणालियों can नहीं deal with the infection as effectively as those of healthy adults.
Frequently, patients कष्ट इससे सेप्टिक शॉक हैं cared लिये in intensive care units.
The mortality rate from septic शॉक is लगभग 25–50 %.
Kevin Brereton ( born फ़रवरी 20, 1972 ), बेहतर ज्ञात by his stage name k-os ( ; `` chaos '' ), is a Canadian rapper, singer, songwriter and record producer.
His given name may also be cited as kheaven, a स्पेलिंग he later adopted.
The alias `` k-os '', spelled with a lower case `` k '', was intended to be कम आक्रामक than the pseudonyms of अन्य rappers जिनकी names यहूद सब अपर case, such as KRS-One.
It is an acronym लिये `` ज्ञान of स्वः, '' हालांकि in a बाद इंटरव्यू he said that it originally stood for `` Kevin 's Original Sound. '' k-os ' music incorporates a wide variety of music genres, including rap, funk, rock, and reggae.
The lyrics frequently focus on promoting a `` positive message '' while at टाइम्स expressing आलोचना of mainstream hip hop culture 's obsession with money, fame and glorification of violence.
A musician as well as a producer, k-os रै लिखा और उत्पादित nearly every part of all four of his albums.
k-os usually performs with a live band, something कि is uncommon in the हिप हॉप विधा.
He sometimes plays गिटार और कुंजीपटल both during live performances and in the studio.
k-os received his first musical exposure with the single `` musical essence '', released in 1993.
After the रिलीज of उसके दूसरी सिंगल `` वृद्धि जैसे the सूर्य '' in 1996, he withdrew from the industry because he was dissatisfied with his musical style.
He reappeared briefly in 1999 और released उसके डेब्यू album Exit in 2002.
The album received positive समीक्षाएँ लकिन बेची अपेक्षाकृत few नक़ल.
He released उसके दूसरी एल्बम आनन्द विद्रोह in 2004, which received platinum status in Canada.
A third album,, was released in 2006 and भी गई प्लेटिनम.
उसके चौथी एल्बम, Yes !
, was released in 2009.
His पांचवां एल्बम ब्लैक on सुनहरे was released in 2013.

the वर्दी वाणिज्यिक कोड ( ucc or the कोड ), पहला प्रकाशित in 1952, is एक of a क्रमांक of वर्दी अधिनियमों कि have महरूम promulgated in conjunction with efforts to harmonize the law of sales and other commercial transactions in all 50 states within the United States of America.
Multi-pitch climbing is the ascent of climbing routes with एक or अधिक stops at a belay स्टेशन.
Each section of actual climbing between stops at the belay स्टेशन is called a pitch.
the नेता ascends the pitch, placing gear and stopping to anchor themselves to the belay station.
The reason for the stops can be संकल्पित by choice, convention or necessity.
लिये example:
The rope is too short to do the entire route in one पिच ( necessity ).
The leader has run out of सुरक्षात्मक गियर ( necessity ).
There is a convenient protectable ledge, or fixed bolts placed by previous चढना, at the स्थान for a belay station ( convention ).
the नेता chooses to बाकी or एक्सचेंज लीड before the next section of the climb ( choice ).
The general purpose of these stops is to allow the second to ascend to the point of the lead climber while collecting the सुरक्षात्मक गियर इससे the रूट in the कोर्स of the सीसे climber 's ascent.
At the belay station, the protective gear is collected, possibly exchanged to a new leader, and the leader of the अगला पिच ascends the रूट.
A आरेख प्रर्दशित an i गठन on offense and a 4-3 Formation on defense
In American football, each team has eleven खिलाड़ी on the फ़ील्ड at एक time.
The specific role that a player takes on the फ़ील्ड is पुकारा उनके position.
Under the modern rules of American football, teams are अनुमत असीमित subsititutions, कि is टीमों may बदलें कोई number of players after any play.
This has resulted in the development of three `` platoons '' of players, the offense ( the team with the ball, जो is trying to स्कोर ), the रक्षा ( the टोली trying to prevent the अन्य टोली इससे स्कोरिंग, और to लो the बॉल from them ), and the special teams ( who play in kicking situations ).
Within those platoons, विभिन्न विशिष्ट स्थितियाँ मौजूद depending on what the player 's main job is.
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into विधि by the कॉंग्रेस of the संयुक्त States as Title II of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970.
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug नीति अंतर्गत जिससे the manufacture, importation, possession, use and distribution of certain substances is regulated.
The Act also served as the national implementing विधान लिये the सिंगल सम्मेलन on Narcotic Drugs.
The legislation created five Schedules ( classifications ), with varying योग्यता लिये a पदार्थ to be included in each.
Two federal agencies, the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug प्रशासन, determine जिससे substances हैं added to or removed इससे the विभिन्न schedules, हालांकि the statute passed by Congress created the initial listing, and Congress has sometimes scheduled other substances through legislation such as the Hillory J. Farias and Samantha Reid Date-Rape Prevention Act of 2000, which placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I. Classification decisions are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ), currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States, and international treaties.
The वेन रूट 23 पारगमन बीच is a नई जर्सी पारगमन park-and-ride स्टेशन in वेन, नई जर्सी along the Montclair-Boonton Line that provides bus service to New York City and various other points in the area as well as Montclair-Boonton Line train service to New York, Hoboken, and intermediate points along the line between Hackettstown and Montclair State University.
It is located off of the southbound lanes of New Jersey Route 23 on West Belt Road, near the इंटरचेंज जहाँ रूट 23, अंतरराज्यीय 80, और u.S. Route 46 meet, across from the Willowbrook Mall.
The station opened in January 2008 और रै 1,000 पार्किंग spaces.
New Jersey Transit intends for this combined rail and bus स्टेशन to become an `` interceptor स्टेशन, '' कि होगा सहायता relieve the habitual congestion at the West Belt Road Interchange, where the three major highways meet.
In addition, the construction of the station was meant to also ease the congestion at what was then Route 23 Park & Ride, a बस डिपो on रूट 23 उत्तर कि रै चूंकि महरूम renamed माँ 's Park & Ride, and the Willowbrook Mall Park & Ride ; the now-Mother 's site had limited parking while NJT was having trouble with overfull parking areas at Willowbrook.
The Wayne Township bus garage is located on the विपरीत पक्ष of रूट 23.
There has been a प्रस्ताव to निर्माण a पार्किंग डेक साथ another thousand spots and develop the land at the station.
In addition to Montclair-Boonton trains, the Transit Center is परोसा by the following नई जर्सी पारगमन bus lines:
75 to Newark penn स्टेशन और Butler
194 to Port Authority Bus Terminal and butler/newfoundland
198 to Port Authority Bus टर्मिनल और विलियम paterson University
324 to Port Authority और वेन रूट 23
748 to willowbrook Mall and Paterson
The at sign @ is also commonly called the at symbol, ampersat, apetail or वाणिज्यिक at in english—and less commonly a wide range of other terms.
The fact that there is no सिंगल शब्द in अंग्रेज़ी लिये the प्रतीक रै prompted कुछ लेखक to उपयोग the French arobase or Spanish and Portuguese arroba—or to coin new words such as asperand, ampersat—but none of these has achieved wide currency.
Originally an accounting and commercial invoice abbreviation meaning `` at the rate of '' ( e.g. 7 widgets @ $ 2 = $ 14 ), it was not included on the keyboard of the earliest commercially कामयाब typewriters, लकिन थी on at तनिक एक 1889 मॉडल और the बहुत कामयाब underwood मॉडल इससे the `` underwood No. 5 '' in 1900 onward.
It is अभी universally included on computer keyboards.
In recent years, its meaning has grown to include the sense of being `` located at, '' `` and, '' or `` directed at '', विशेषकर in ईमेल पता और सोशल मीडिया, विशेषकर ट्विटर.
The चिह्नित is एनकोडेड at.
The Catcher in the Rye is a 1951 अनोखा by J. D. Salinger.
Originally published for वयस्कों, it रै चूंकि become लोकप्रिय साथ adolescent पाठक लिये its themes of teenage angst and alienation.
it has been translated into almost all of the world 's major languages.
Around 250,000 copies are बेची प्रत्येक साल साथ कुल बिक्री of अधिक than 65 million books.
The novel 's protagonist and antihero, होल्डन caulfield, रै become an icon for teenage rebellion.
The novel was included on Times 2005 list of the 100 best english-language novels written since 1923, and it was named by Modern Library and its readers as one of the 100 best English-language novels of the 20th century.
It रै महरूम अक्सर challenged in the संयुक्त States and other countries for its liberal use of profanity and portrayal of sexuality.
It also deals with complex issues of identity, belonging, कनेक्शन, और alienation.
skeletal मांसपेशियां homo sapiens
इस is a तालिका of मांसपेशियां of the human anatomy.
वहीँ हैं लगभग 642 skeletal मांसपेशियां within the typical human, and almost every muscle constitutes one part of a pair of identical bilateral muscles, found on both sides, resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles, as presented in this article.
Nevertheless, the exact number is difficult to define because different sources group मांसपेशियां differently, e.g. regarding कया is पारिभाषित as different parts of a single muscle or as several muscles.
Examples दायरा इससे 640 to 850.
The muscles of the human देह can be categorized into a क्रमांक of समूह जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the सिर and neck, muscles of the torso or trunk, muscles of the upper limbs, and muscles of the lower limbs.
The action refers to the कार्रवाई of प्रत्येक मांसपेशी इससे the मानक anatomical position.
In other positions, other क्रियाएँ may be performed.
Bad Girls Club ( BGC ) is an American reality television series created by जोनाथन मरे लिये the ऑक्सीजन टेलीविज़न station.
The show centers on seven feisty और शरारती महिलाओं साथ अलग backgrounds and personalities, who have a number of psychological and behavioral problems.
They are introduced to the दिखाएँ बंद उनके घातक behavior and accomplish specific goals.
The cast, deemed `` bad girls '', enjoy a luxurious जीवनशैली in a ठीक mansion लिये तीन months, during which they must obey specified rules.
Their जीवनदान अंदर – और बाहर – of the house are chronicled and recorded by the production team.
The Bad Girls Club is ब्रॉडकास्ट in पाँच देशों ( संयुक्त States, Netherlands, Australia, Hungary, and Sweden ).
It has received negative reviews from critics, who believe the दिखाएँ promotes हिंसा by adolescent viewers.
Furthermore, several cast members made विवादास्पद remarks जिससे outraged अनेक दर्शक.
The format of the show has changed इससे जल्दी सीज़न.
If a `` bad girl '' breaks a rule, she is evicted from the show and, if it is early in the ऋतु, replaced by a नई `` ख़राब लड़की ''.
There have been nine complete seasons of The ख़राब लड़कियों क्लबों, साथ the tenth season currently airing.
the चौथी ऋतु था the उच्चतम दरजा in the show 's history, becoming its `` breakthrough season ''.
वहीँ have महरूम तीन spin-offs of The Bad Girls Club.
One of them, Love Games : Bad Girls Need Love too, जहाँ पास्ट डाल सदस्यों seek true love, has gained high ratings.
Oxygen has also released a मोबाईल खेल, कॉमिक स्ट्रिप and merchandise to promote the show.
Of the 92 प्रतियोगी, केरी harvick ( of ऋतु एक ) was a successful country singer before the show.
Tanisha Thomas ( of season two ) later hosted ऑक्सीजन 's oxygenlive !
and the subsequent सीज़न of प्रेम Games : Bad Girls Need Love Too.
थामस, जो रै महरूम उतावले the `` godmother '' to all contestants, has her own television documentary entitled Tanisha Gets Married.
As of Season 8 she 's been the host of the पुनर्मिलन specials.
The Iowa सीनेट is the अपर house of the Iowa General Assembly.
There are 50 seats in the Iowa Senate, representing 50 single-member districts across the state with populations of लगभग 60,927 प्रति constituency,.
Each Senate ज़िला is रचित of two House districts.
The Senate meets at the Iowa State कैपिटल in देस moines.
Unlike the lower house, the Iowa House of Representatives, Senators serve four-year शर्तें, साथ हाफ of the सीनेट लड़खड़ाते लिये re-election every two years.
There are no term limits for the सीनेट.
mechanical repair
Maintenance, repair, and operations ( MRO ) or maintenance, repair, and overhaul involves fixing any sort of mechanical, plumbing or विद्युत यंत्र चाहिए it become आउट of अनुक्रम or टूटा ( ज्ञात as मरम्मत, unscheduled or casualty maintenance ).
It also includes performing routine actions which keep the device in working order ( known as scheduled मेंटेनेंस ) or prevent ट्रबल इससे arising ( preventive maintenance ).
MRO may be defined as, `` All actions which have the objective of retaining or restoring an मद in or to a राज्य in जिससे it can perform its required function.
The actions include the combination of all तकनीकी और सम्बन्धित प्रशासनिक, managerial, and supervision actions. ''
MRO operations can be categorised by whether the product remains the property of the customer, i.e. a service is being offered, or whether the उत्पाद is खरीदा by the reprocessing संगठन और बेची to कोई ग्राहक wishing to मेक the खरीदें ( Guadette, 2002 ).
In the former case it may be a backshop आपरेशन within a larger organisation or smaller operation.
The former of these represents a closed loop supply chain and usually रै the पैमाना of मेंटेनेंस, मरम्मत or of the product.
The latter of the categorisations is an open loop सप्लाई कड़ी और is typified by refurbishment and remanufacture.
The main characteristic of the closed loop system is कि the माँग लिये a उत्पाद is matched साथ the सप्लाई of a used product.
Neglecting एसेट write-offs और असाधारण क्रियाएँ the कुल population of the product between the customer and the service provider remains constant.
Prince William, Duke of Cambridge ( William Arthur Philip Louis ; born 21 June 1982 ), is the elder बेटे of चार्ल्स, प्रिंस of वेल्स, और डायना, राजकुमारी of Wales, and third-eldest grandchild of Queen Elizabeth II and Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh.
He is second in the line of उत्तराधिकार, पीछे उसके पिता, to the तख्तों of सोलह स्वतंत्र sovereign राज्य ज्ञात as the राष्ट्रमंडल realms : the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Jamaica, Barbados, The Bahamas, Grenada, Papua New Guinea, the Solomon Islands, Tuvalu, Saint Lucia, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, Belize, Antigua and Barbuda, and Saint Kitts and Nevis.
प्रिंस विलियम थी शिक्षित at चार schools in the United Kingdom and obtained a degree from the University of St Andrews.
He spent भाग of a गैप साल in चिली, बेलीज़, तंजानिया, and Kenya where he has lived and holidayed several times.
Prince विलियम रै भी लिया kiswahili अध्ययन at universities in Kenya and Tanzania.
He was commissioned as a Lieutenant in the Blues and Royals Regiment of the Household Cavalry —serving with his bhai प्रिंस हैरी —and, दो सालो बाद, अर्जित उसके विंग्स by completing pilot training at Royal Air Force College Cranwell.
In 2009, he transferred to the Royal Air Force, was promoted to Flight Lieutenant and underwent हेलीकाप्टर उड़ती प्रशिक्षण in अनुक्रम to become a full-time pilot with the Search and Rescue Force.
In 2010, he completed his general and special-to-type helicopter training and went on to RAF Valley on no. 22 स्क्वाड्रन performing co-pilot कर्तव्य on फलक a Sea King search and rescue helicopter.
Prince William married his longtime girlfriend, Catherine Middleton, on 29 अप्रैल 2011 at वेस्टमिंस्टर ऐबी.
Hours prior to उसके विवाह, प्रिंस William was created Duke of Cambridge, Earl of Strathearn, and Baron Carrickfergus.
DeAndre Cortez Way ( born July 28, 1990 ), बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम soulja लड़के बताना 'Em, or simply Soulja Boy, is an American rapper, record producer, actor, and entrepreneur.
In September 2007, his single `` Crank कि ( soulja लड़के ) `` reached number one on the Billboard Hot 100.
The single was initially self-published on the internet, and it later became a number-one hit in the संयुक्त राज्य लिये सात non-consecutive सप्ताह starting in September 2007.
On August 17 Way was सूचीबद्ध at # 18 on the फोर्ब्स सूची of hip-hop Cash Kings of 2010 earning $ 7 million for that year.
Way has currently released three studio albums and एक स्वतंत्र एल्बम : उसके डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम souljaboytellem.com ( 2007 ) was certified platinum by the RIAA.
However, his next two albums, isouljaboytellem ( 2008 ) और the deandre रास्ता ( 2010 ) किया नहीं मैच the वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी of उसके डेब्यू, the latter तभी selling 100,000 नक़ल, despite the success of several singles across both albums, such as `` Kiss Me Thru the Phone `` and `` Turn My Swag On `` ( iSouljaBoyTellem ) and `` Pretty Boy Swag `` ( The DeAndre Way ).
This was mainly due to negotiation problems with Interscope Records which meant a सीमित राशि of रिकॉर्ड यहूद बना उपलब्धियाँ to the public.
As of 2011, Way has confirmed he is working on उसके चौथी स्टुडियो एल्बम, हकदार यूएसए ड्रे, जिससे होगा be released in 2013.
The electron transport chain in the सूत्रकणिका is the साईट of oxidative phosphorylation in eukaryotes.
The nadh और succinate उत्पन्न in the citric acid cycle are oxidized, providing energy to power ATP synthase.
Photosynthetic electron transport chain of the thylakoid membrane.
An electron transport chain ( ETC ) couples electron transfer between an electron donor ( such as NADH ) and an electron acceptor ( ऐसे as o2 ) साथ the ट्रांसफ़र of H+ ions ( protons ) आरपार a झिल्ली.
The resulting electrochemical proton gradient is प्रयुक्त to generate रासायनिक उर्जा in the रूप of एडीनोसिन triphosphate ( ATP ).
Electron transport chains are the cellular mechanisms used for extracting energy from sunlight in photosynthesis and also from रेडॉक्स प्रतिक्रियाएँ, ऐसे as the ऑक्सीकरण of sugars ( श्वसन ).
In chloroplasts, light drives the conversion of water to oxygen and NADP+ to NADPH साथ ट्रांसफ़र of H+ ions आरपार हरितलवक membranes.
In mitochondria, it is the परिवर्तन of oxygen to water, NADH to NAD+ and succinate to fumarate that are required to generate the proton gradient.
Electron transport chains are major sites of premature इलेक्ट्रॉन leakage to ऑक्सीजन, generating superoxide और potentially resulting in increased oxidative stress.
Tramadol hydrochloride ( trademarked as conzip, ryzolt, ultracet, ultram in the USA, Ralivia, Zytram XL Durella { CR-100/200 mg } in Canada or Adolonta in Spain ) is a centrally acting synthetic analgesic used to treat moderate to moderately severe pain.
The drug has a wide range of applications, including treatment of आमवातीय गठिया, बेचैन टाँगे syndrome, motor neurone disease and fibromyalgia.
It was शुभारम्भ और marketed as tramal by the जर्मनी फार्मास्युटिकल company Grünenthal GmbH in 1977.
Tramadol is a weak μ-opioid receptor agonist कि भी induces serotonin release and inhibits the reuptake of norepinephrine.
Tramadol is metabolized to O-desmethyltramadol, a significantly अधिक potent μ-opioid agonist.
tramadol और इसके major metabolite ( s ) are distinguished from other more potent opioid agonists by relative selectivity for μ-opioid receptors.
Bernard Lawrence `` Bernie '' Madoff ( ; born April 29, 1938 ) is an American former stockbroker, investment advisor, financier, and white collar criminal.
He is the former non-executive Chairman of the NASDAQ stock market, and the admitted operator of a पेन्शन योजना कि is माना to be the largest वित्तीय fraud in U.S. history.
Madoff founded the Wall Street firm बर्नार्ड L. madoff निवेश प्रतिभूति llc in 1960, और थी its chairman until his arrest on December 11, 2008.
The firm was one of the top market maker businesses on Wall Street, which bypassed `` विशेषज्ञ '' firms by सीधे निष्पादित आदेश over the counter from retail brokers.
He employed at the कड़ उसके bhai पीटर as Senior Managing Director and Chief Compliance Officer ; Peter has since been sentenced to 10 years in prison.
Peter 's daughter Shana Madoff as the firm 's नियम और अनुपालन अधिकारी और attorney, और उसके बेटे Andrew and Mark ( Mark committed suicide by hanging exactly two years after his father 's arrest ).
On December 10, 2008, Madoff 's sons told अधिकारियों कि उनके पिता था confessed to उन्हें कि the एसेट प्रबन्धन ईकाई of उसके कड़ थी a विशाल पेन्शन scheme, and quoted him as describing it as `` one big lie. ''
The following दिन, एफबीआई एजेंटों गिरफ्तार Madoff and charged him with one count of securities fraud.
The U.S. प्रतिभूति और एक्सचेंज आयोग ( सेक ) था previously conducted investigations into madoff 's business practices, but did not uncover the massive fraud.
In March 2009, Madoff pleaded अपराधी to 11 संघीय felonies और admitted to turning उसके माल प्रबन्धन कारोबार into a massive Ponzi scheme that defrauded thousands of investors of billions of dollars.
Madoff said he began the Ponzi योजना in the जल्दी 1990s.
However, federal जांचकर्ताओं मानना the धोखाधड़ी began as जल्दी as the 1970s, और those चार्ज साथ recovering the लापता धन मानना the investment operation may never have been legitimate.
The amount missing from client accounts, सहित fabricated gains, थी लगभग $ 65 अरब.
The court-appointed trustee estimated वास्तविक नुकसान to निवेशकों of $ 18 अरब.
On June 29, 2009, he थी sentenced to 150 years in prison, the maximum allowed.
Administrative Professionals Day ( also known as secretaries दिन or एडमिन दिन ) is an unofficial धर्मनिरपेक्ष अवकाश observed in अनेक देशों to recognize the work of secretaries, administrative assistants, receptionists, and other administrative support professionals.
In North America, it is celebrated on the Wednesday of the पिछला पूरा सप्ताह of April ( April 24 in 2013 ).
In France it is celebrated on the third गुरुवार in अप्रैल ( अप्रैल 18 in 2013 ).
In Australia it is मनाये on the first Friday in May
A quasi-judicial body is an entity such as an arbitrator or tribunal board, generally of a public administrative agency, which has powers and procedures resembling those of a court of law or न्यायधीश, और जिससे is obligated to objectively determine तथ्य और चित्रण conclusions इससे उन्हें so as to provide the basis of an official action.
Such actions are able to remedy a हालात or थोपने विधिक दंड, and may affect the legal rights, duties or privileges of specific parties.
Monument of Tycho Brahe और योहानेस कॅप्लर in Prague
Tycho Brahe ( 14 December 154624 October 1601 ), born Tyge Ottesen Brahe, was a डैनिश nobleman ज्ञात लिये उसके सटीक और व्यापक खगोलीय और ग्रहीय observations.
He was born in Scania, then part of डेनमार्क, अभी part of modern-day Sweden.
Tycho was well known in his lifetime as an astronomer और alchemist.
In his De nova stella ( On the new star ) of 1573, he refuted the aristotelian विश्वास in an अपरिवर्तनशील celestial realm.
His precise measurements indicated that `` new stars, '' ( stellae novae, now known as supernovae ) in particular that of 1572, lacked the parallax expected in sub-lunar phenomena, और यहूद इसलिए नहीं `` वायुमंडलीय '' tailless धूमकेतुओं as previously believed, लकिन यहूद above the atmosphere and moon.
Using similar measurements he showed that comets were also not वायुमंडलीय phenomena, as previously विचार, and must pass through the supposedly `` immutable '' celestial spheres.
As an astronomer, Tycho worked to combine what he देखी as the geometrical लाभ of the copernican प्रणाली साथ the philosophical लाभ of the Ptolemaic system into his own model of the universe, the Tychonic system.
Furthermore, he was the last of the major naked eye खगोलशास्त्रियों, working बगैर telescopes लिये उसके observations.
Tycho Brahe was granted an estate on the island of Hven and the funding to build the uraniborg, an जल्दी शोध संस्थान, जहाँ he निर्मित विशाल astronomical instruments and took many careful measurements, and later Stjerneborg, underground, when he discovered that his instruments in the former were not sufficiently steady.
On the island ( on which he demonstrated autocratic character and behavior toward the निवासियों ) he संस्थापित manufactories such as paper-making to provide material for printing his results.
After disagreements with the new Danish king Christian IV in 1597, he थी आमंत्रित by the bohemian किंग और पावन Roman emperor Rudolph II to Prague, where he became the official imperial astronomer.
He built the new observatory at benátky nad jizerou.
Here, from 1600 until his death in 1601, he थी assisted by योहानेस कॅप्लर who later used Tycho 's astronomical data to develop Kepler 's laws of planetary motion.
Guro District ( Guro-gu ) is a ज़िला of सियोल, दक्षिण कोरियाई, जिससे थी अलग from Yeongdeungpo District on April 1, 1980.
Located in the southwestern part of the नगर, जहाँ besides yangcheon ज़िला और geumcheon ज़िला guro ज़िला रै an महत्वपूर्ण स्थिति as a transport link which contains railroads, land routes from the rest of Seoul to the south of the country.
The gyeongbu और gyeongin रेल lines connect Seoul to Busan and Incheon.
In addition, Seoul महानगर सबवे लाइनों 1, 2, और 7, और प्रमुख highways intersect in Guro District.
The name Guro originates from the legend that nine ( ) बूढ़ा मेन ( कोरियाई : ro ) enjoyed आयु in the district.
a डिजिटल औद्योगिक complex is located in Guro District.
The Guro Digital Industrial Complex, which played a leading industrial role mainly with textile manufacturing, dressmaking and other labour-intensive उद्योग in 1967, रै महरूम rapidly changed into an IT industrial complex.
This complex played a pivotal role in the economic growth of the South Korea 's development era, referred to as the `` चमत्कार on the हान नदी ``, और भी contributed 10 percent of national export in the 1970s.
Twenty-one percent of the total area of Guro District is a restricted zone to be प्रयुक्त as a greenbelt with the only arboretum in Seoul.
The zone is changing into a lively district as large labour-intensive factories हैं चलती इससे the क्षेत्रफल और the परिषद is विकासशील कया it terms its four zones.
An `` e-government `` system आधारित on इस hosted the अंतरराष्ट्रीय e-participation forum on February 7–9, 2007, with the participation of more than thirty-seven countries.
The forum was launched with the theme `` Promoting Democracy and Regional Development '' and twenty-five mayors including André Santini ( Issy-les-Moulineaux, France ), Kevin Foy ( Chapel Hill, US ), Apirak Kosayothin ( Bangkok, Thailand ), uvais मोहम्मद emthiyas ( कोलोन, श्री लंका ), और संसार विशेषज्ञ ऐसे as dr विलियम H. dutton ( निदेशक of ऑक्सफोर्ड अंतरजाल संस्थान at the विश्वविद्यालयों of ऑक्सफोर्ड, uk ) and Dr Ari-Veiko Anttiroiko ( professor at the University of Tampere, Finland ) participated in the forum.
The Guro घोषणा, अपनाया दौरान the फ़ोरम, aims to नियत up a पोर्टल साईट for e-government development and to establish a concrete project in order to bridge the digital divide among the world 's cities.
This practice has been recognised for providing a नई महत्वपूर्ण step in the development of e-democracy.
The e-participation forum was a key factor for guro to खेल the अग्रणी भूमिका in bridging the digital divide among cities, to provide I.T. enterprises located in Guro Digital Industrial Complex the opportunity to launch into the international market, to improve its image and become a global leader to concrete e-democracy.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय e-participation फ़ोरम on February 7–9, 2007
a wonton ( भी spelled wantan, wanton, or wuntun in ट्रांसक्रिप्शन from Cantonese ; Mandarin : húndùn ) is a type of dumpling commonly found in a number of Chinese cuisines.
Many people were involved in the आविष्कार of रेडियो as we now know it.
Several possible methods of wireless communication were considered, including inductive and capacitive induction and transmission through the ground, however the method used for radio today exclusively involves the हस्तांतरण और reception of electromagnetic waves.
After early speculation on the subject, experimental work on the कनेक्शन between विद्युत और चुंबकत्व began around 1820 साथ the कार्य of hans ईसाई Ørsted and continued with the work of André-Marie Ampère, Joseph Henry, and Michael Faraday.
These investigations culminated in the पूरा सिद्धान्त of विद्युत्चुम्बकत्व developed by James Clerk Maxwell.
This theory described the सैद्धांतिक आधार of the propagation of electromagnetic waves.
After Maxwell 's theory was published many people experimented with wireless संचार, कुछ intentionally using मैक्सवेल 's theory some not.
It is considered likely that the first intentional transmission of a signal by means of electromagnetic waves was performed by David Edward ह्यूजेस around 1880, हालांकि इस थी माना to be प्रेरण at the time.
The first systematic and unequivocal हस्तांतरण of em लहरें थी performed by heinrich Rudolf Hertz and described in papers published in 1887 and 1890.
Hertz famously माना ये परिणाम as being of little practical value.
After Hertz 's work many people were involved in the development of components और सिद्धान्त शामिल साथ the transmission and reception of electromagnetic waves.
Others, notably Guglielmo Marconi, were concerned साथ व्यावहारिक सुधार और the वाणिज्यिक अनुप्रयोग of radio to wireless telegraphy.
Later on रेगिनाल्ड A. fessenden became the पहला to send an audio signal by means of electromagnetic waves.
Scurvy is a disease resulting इससे a कमियां of विटामिन c, जिससे is required for the synthesis of collagen in humans.
The chemical name for vitamin C, ascorbic acid, is derived from the लैटिन नाम of स्कर्वी, scorbutus, जिससे भी provides the adjective scorbutic ( `` of, characterized by or having to do with scurvy '' ).
Scurvy often presents itself initially as लक्षण of malaise और lethargy, followed by formation of spots on the skin, spongy gums, and bleeding from the mucous membranes.
Spots are most abundant on the thighs and legs, and a व्यक्ति साथ the ailment looks पाले, feels उदास, and is partially immobilized.
As scurvy advances, there can be open, suppurating wounds, loss of दांत, पीलिया, ज्वर, न्यूरोपैथी और मौत.
Scurvy was at one time common among sailors, pirates and others aboard ships at sea longer than perishable fruits and vegetables could be stored ( subsisting instead only on cured and salted meats and dried grains ) and by सैनिको similarly वंचित of ये भोजन लिये विस्तारित अवधि.
It was described by Hippocrates ( c. 460 BC–c. 380 BC ), and herbal cures for scurvy have महरूम ज्ञात in अनेक देशी संस्कृतियों चूंकि prehistory.
Scurvy थी एक of the limiting कारकों of समुद्री सफर, often killing large numbers of the passengers and crew on long-distance voyages.
This became a significant issue in Europe from the beginning of the modern era in the Age of Discovery in the 15th century, continuing to play a significant role through World War I in the 20th सदी.
While आज स्कर्वी is ज्ञात to be caused by a nutritional कमियां, until the isolation of vitamin C and direct evidence of its link to scurvy in 1932, numerous theories and treatments were proposed, often on little or no experimental data.
This inconsistency is attributed to the lack of vitamin C as a distinct concept, an inability to reliably link अलग भोजन ( notably उपस्थित in भैस citrus, watercress, and organ meat ) to scurvy.
An additional concept required to understand scurvy was the degradation of vitamin C by एक्सपोज़र to एयर और तांबे और अन्य परिवर्तन मेटल लवण ऐसे as those of आयरन, यूँ बदलना the कड़ी of foods to scurvy over time.
Treatment by fresh food, particularly citrus fruit, was periodically implemented, as it था महरूम चूंकि antiquity.
However जबतक the 1930s, उपचार थी inconsistent, with many ineffective treatments used into the 20th century.
It was a Scottish surgeon in the Royal Navy, James Lind who first proved it could be treated with citrus फल in प्रयोग he वर्णित in उसके 1753 किताब, a treatise of the स्कर्वी, हालांकि उसके advice was not implemented by the Royal Navy for several decades.
In infants, स्कर्वी is sometimes referred to as barlow 's disease, named after Sir Thomas Barlow, a British physician who described it.
However, Barlow 's disease may also refer to mitral वाल्व prolapse.
Other eponyms for स्कर्वी शामिल moeller 's disease and Cheadle 's disease.
Scurvy does not occur in most animals because they can synthesize उनके अपना विटामिन c.
However, humans and other higher primates ( the simians - बंदरों और apes - और tarsiers ), गिनी सूअर, सबसे or सब bats, और some species of birds and fish lack an enzyme ( L-gulonolactone oxidase ) necessary for such synthesis and must obtain vitamin C through their diet.
Vitamin C is widespread in संयंत्र ऊतकों, साथ विशेषकर ऊँची एकाग्रता occurring in citrus fruits ( oranges, lemons, limes, grapefruits ), tomatoes, potatoes, cabbages, and green peppers.
आयरन is a रासायनिक तत्व with the symbol Fe ( from ) and atomic number 26.
It is a metal in the पहला परिवर्तन series.
It is the सबसे आम तत्व ( by द्रव्यमान ) forming the ग्रह धरती as a whole, forming much of Earth 's outer and inner core.
It is the चौथी सबसे आम तत्व in the Earth 's crust.
Iron 's बहुत आम उपस्थिति in रॉकी ग्रह जैसे धरती is due to इसके abundant उत्पादन as a result of fusion in high-mass stars, where the production of nickel-56 ( which decays to the most common isotope of iron ) is the last nuclear fusion reaction that is exothermic.
This causes radioactive nickel to become the last element to be उत्पादित पहले पतन of a सुपरनोवा लीड to the विस्फोटक कार्यक्रम that scatter this precursor radionuclide of iron abundantly into space.
Like other समूह 8 तत्व, आयरन exists in a चौड़ी दायरा of ऑक्सीकरण states, −2 to +6, although +2 and +3 are the most common.
Elemental iron occurs in meteoroids and other low oxygen environments, but is प्रतिक्रिया to ऑक्सीजन और जल.
Fresh iron surfaces appear lustrous silvery-gray, लकिन oxidize in सामान्य एयर to दे hydrated iron oxides, commonly known as rust.
Unlike अनेक अन्य धातुओं जिससे रूप passivating ऑक्साइड परतों, iron oxides occupy more volume than iron metal, and thus iron oxides flake off and expose fresh surfaces for corrosion.
Iron metal has been used since प्राचीन टाइम्स, हालांकि तांबे alloys, which have lower melting temperatures, were used first in history.
Pure iron is नरम ( softer than एल्युमिनियम ), लकिन is unobtainable by smelting.
The सामग्री is significantly hardened और strengthened by impurities from the smelting process, such as carbon.
A certain proportion of carbon ( between 0.002 % और 2.1 % ) produces steel, which may be up to 1000 times harder than pure iron.
crude आयरन मेटल is उत्पादित in धमाका furnaces, जहाँ अयस्क is घटाया by coke to pig iron, which has a high carbon content.
Further refinement with oxygen reduces the कार्बन सामग्री to the सही proportion to make steel.
Steels and low carbon iron alloys with other metals ( alloy steels ) are by far the most common metals in industrial use, due to उनके ग्रेट दायरा of वांछनीय properties and the abundance of iron.
Iron chemical compounds, which include ferrous और ferric यौगिकों, have many uses.
Iron oxide mixed with aluminium powder can be ignited to बनाएँ a थर्माइट प्रतिक्रिया, प्रयुक्त in वेल्डिंग और सुथरा ores.
It forms binary compounds with the halogens and the chalcogens.
Among its organometallic यौगिकों is ferrocene, the first sandwich compound discovered.
Iron plays an important role in जीवविज्ञान, forming देवालय साथ आणविक oxygen in hemoglobin and myoglobin ; these two compounds are common oxygen transport proteins in vertebrates.
Iron is also the metal प्रयुक्त at the क्रियाशील साईट of अनेक महत्वपूर्ण रेडॉक्स एंजाइमों dealing with cellular respiration and oxidation and reduction in plants and animals.
The Blue Cross Blue Shield Association ( BCBSA ) is a संघ of 38 पृथक स्वास्थ्य बीमे organizations and companies in the United States.
Combined, वे सीधे or indirectly provide health insurance to over 99 million Americans.
The history of Blue Cross dates back to 1929, जबकि the इतिहास of Blue Shield dates to 1939.
The Blue Cross संघ तिथियाँ वापस to 1960, जबकि its Blue Shield counterpart was created in 1948.
The two संगठन मिलाया in 1982, forming the current association.
A potato chip ( known as a chip in American, Australian, New Zealand, Canadian, Singaporean, Hong Kong, South African and Jamaican English ; as a crisp in British अंग्रेज़ी और hiberno-english, और as either a चिप or wafer in भारतीय अंग्रेज़ी ) is a पतला टुकड़ा of आलू कि is गहन fried or baked जबतक crunchy.
Potato chips are commonly served as an क्षुधावर्धक, पक्ष डिश, or स्नैक.
The basic chips are cooked and salted ; additional varieties are manufactured using various flavorings and संघटक सहित seasonings, herbs, मसाले, cheeses, और कृत्रिम additives.
`` Crisps '', however, may also refer to many अलग प्रकार of savory स्नैक उत्पाद बेची in the संयुक्त किंगडम और आयरलैंड, कुछ बना इससे आलू, लकिन may also be made from maize, tapioca or other cereals.
An उदाहरण of ये kinds of savory snacks is Monster Munch.
Potato chips are a predominant part of the snack food market in english-speaking देशों और numerous other Western nations.
The global potato chip market generated कुल revenues of us $ 16.4 billion in 2005.
इस accounted लिये 35.5 % of the total savory snacks market in that year ( US $ 46.1 billion ).
Henry Clay, Sr. ( April 12, 1777 – जून 29, 1852 ) थी a वकील, राजनेता और skilled orator who represented Kentucky in both the Senate and in the House of Representatives.
He served three different terms as Speaker of the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि और थी भी सचिव of State from 1825 to 1829.
he खोया उसके अभियान लिये अध्यक्ष in 1824, 1832 and 1844.
Clay was a प्रबल फिगर in दोनो the First and Second Party systems.
As a leading war hawk in 1812, he favored युद्ध साथ ब्रिटेन और निभाई a significant role in leading the nation to war in the War of 1812.
In 1824 he ran for president and lost, but threw his electoral votes to John Quincy Adams, जो बना उसे सचिव of राज्य as the jacksonians denounced कया वे माना a `` भ्रष्ट सौदेबाजी. ''
He ran and lost again in 1832 और 1844 as the प्रत्याशी of the Whig Party, which he founded and usually dominated.
Clay was the foremost proponent of the American System, लड़ लिये an बढ़ाएँ in tariffs to फोस्टर उद्योग in the संयुक्त राज्य, the use of federal funding to build and maintain infrastructure, and a strong national bank.
He opposed the annexation of टेक्सास, fearing it would inject the slavery issue into politics.
Clay also opposed the mexican-american युद्ध और the `` manifest नियति `` नीति of Democrats, which cost him votes in the close 1844 election.
Dubbed the `` Great Pacificator, '' Clay brokered important compromises during the nullification संकट और on the गुलामी समस्या.
As part of the `` Great Triumvirate `` or `` Immortal Trio, '' along with his colleagues डेनियल वेबस्टर और जॉन C. calhoun, he थी इंस्ट्रूमेंटल in formulating the Missouri Compromise of 1820 and the Compromise of 1850.
He was viewed as the प्राथमिक प्रतिनिधि of पश्चिमी रूचि in इस group, and was given the names `` Henry of the West '' and `` The Western Star. ''
A plantation owner, मिट्टी आयोजित स्लेव दौरान उसके आजीवन but freed them in his Will.
Abraham Lincoln, the Whig leader in Illinois, was a ग्रेट admirer of मिट्टी, saying he थी `` my आदर्श of a great man. ''
lincoln wholeheartedly supported Clay 's economic programs.
In 1957, a Senate Committee selected Clay as one of the five greatest U.S. सीनेटरों, साथ साथ डेनियल वेबस्टर, जॉन C. calhoun, रॉबर्ट la follette, and Robert Taft.
BJ 's Wholesale Club, Inc., commonly referred to बस as bj 's, is a membership-only गोदाम क्लबों chain operating on the United States East Coast, as well as in the state of Ohio.
The company is ranked # 232 on Fortune magazine 's 2010 listing of अमेरिका 's 500 largest पब्लिक corporations.
The Wizard of Oz, known during his reign as The Great and Powerful Oz, is the epithet of Oscar Zoroaster Phadrig Isaac नॉर्मन henkel emmannuel ambroise diggs, a fictional अक्षर in the जमीन of oz, निर्मित by American author L. Frank Baum.
The character was further popularized by the क्लासिक 1939 फिल्म, wherein उसके पूरा नाम is नहीं उल्लेखित.
Kristinia Jamie DeBarge ( ; born March 8, 1990 ) is an American सिंगर, songwriter, नर्तकी and actress.
She first appeared on national टेलीविज़न in 2003 as a प्रतियोगी on the American Idol spin-off, American Juniors.
In 2009, debarge हस्ताक्षरित a अनुबंध साथ the द्वीप रिकॉर्ड विभाग Sodapop, releasing her debut album Exposed in July of the same year.
The first single, `` Goodbye ``, reached the top 20 in the us और कनाडा.
The lead single ( `` क्राई भेड़िया '' ) इससे उसके बेनाम sophomore album was released on September 27, 2012.

The team is coached by norm Chow.

Marvin Gaye ( April 2, 1939April 1, 1984 ), born Marvin Pentz Gay, Jr., was an American singer-songwriter और संगीतकार.
Gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown Records in the 1960s with a string of hits including `` How Sweet It Is ( To be loved by तुम ) `` और `` i सुना it through the grapevine `` और duet रिकार्डिंग साथ मरियम Wells and Tammi Terrell, later earning the titles `` Prince of Motown '' and `` Prince of Soul ''.
During the 1970s, Gaye recorded the concept albums What 's going on और let 's मिलेंगी it on और became among the पहला कलाकारों in motown to ब्रेक दूर from the reins of its production company.
Gaye 's later recordings influenced several R & B subgenres ऐसे as शांत तूफ़ान और neo-soul.
Following a period in यूरोपीय अंतर्गत a कर निर्वासन in the जल्दी 1980s, gaye released the 1982 Grammy Award-winning hit `` Sexual Healing `` and the Midnight Love album.
Since his death in 1984, Gaye has been posthumously honored by अनेक संस्थानों, सहित the ग्रैमी आजीवन उपलब्धि पुरस्कार और the चट्टान और फेंकें हॉल of कीर्ति.

The Chernobyl disaster (, Chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a catastrophic nuclear accident that occurred on 26 April 1986 at the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant in Ukraine ( तब officially the यूक्रेनी ssr ), जिससे थी अंतर्गत the सीधा क्षेत्राधिकार of the सेंट्रल अधिकारियों of the सोवियत Union.
An explosion and fire released large quantities of रेडियोसक्रिय अणु into the माहौल, जिससे स्प्रेड over much of the western USSR and Europe.
The Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst nuclear power plant accident in history, and is one of only two classified as a level 7 event on the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नाभिकीय इवेंट स्केल ( the अन्य होने the फुकुशिमा Daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011 ).
The battle to contain the contamination and avert a greater प्रलय ultimately शामिल over 500,000 मजदूर और लागत an अनुमानित 18 billion rubles.
The official Soviet casualty count of 31 deaths has been विवादित, और long-term प्रभाव ऐसे as cancers and deformities are still being accounted for.

Mrs. Claus is the wife of Santa Claus, the Christmas gift-bringer in उत्तर अमरीकी और European Christmas tradition.
She is known for making cookies with the elves और तैयारी खिलौने साथ उसके husband Santa Claus.
Her first name is a mystery, though she रै महरूम referred to as मरियम, जेसिका, layla, Annette, Heidi, or Martha.
HijackThis ( also hijackthis or hjt ) is an खोलें सोर्स enumerating औजार लिये microsoft Windows originally created by Merijn Bellekom, and later sold to Trend Micro.
The program is notable for targeting browser-hijacking विधि, rather than relying on a database of known spyware.
It scans a उपयोक्ता 's कंप्यूटर जल्दी, and displays browser hijacking locations, showing what entries are there.
HijackThis is used primarily for diagnosis of browser hijacking, as uninformed उपयोग of इसके हटाना सुविधाएं can cause significant software damage to a computer.
HijackThis does not remove or detect spyware ; it lists most common locations जहाँ ब्राउजर hijacking कार्यकलाप can occur.
Browser hijacking can कारण मैलवेयर to be installed on a computer.
On February 16, 2012, Trend Micro released the HijackThis source कोड as खोलें सोर्स और it is now available on the SourceForge site.
Saddle Creek Records is an अमरीकी रिकार्ड लेबल आधारित in Omaha, Nebraska.
Started as a college class project on entrepreneurship, the लेबल थी संस्थापित by माइक mogis और जस्टिन oberst in 1993 ( as Lumberjack Records ).
Mogis जल्द turned over his role in the company to Robb Nansel.
The label is named after Saddle Creek Road, a street that cuts through the east side of midtown Omaha, and the beginnings of a scene whose members included Conor Oberst ( then a solo artist, currently of Bright Eyes, Conor Oberst and the Mystic Valley Band, desaparecidos और राक्षस of लोक ), टिम kasher ( तब of slowdown वर्जिनिया, फिलहाल of कर्सिव और The Good Life ), and others.
collectively, they were known unofficially as the `` Creekers ''.
Saddle Creek first appeared in print on a show flyer, offering to `` खर्च an संध्या साथ काठी क्रीक '' ( later to be the title of the label 's DVD. )
Saddle Creek became an incorporated एंटिटी as a परिणाम of a class project on entrepreneurship.
Distribution is संभाला by the वैकल्पिक वितरण Alliance, which is under the Warner Music Group umbrella.
Saddle Creek Records continues to be the flagship label of a स्टाइल of म्यूज़िक पुकारा `` the Omaha Sound ``, characterized by a slight country twang.
This is increasingly inaccurate, though, with the वृद्धि of अधिक इलेक्ट्रॉनिक ध्वनि ऐसे as those favored by The Faint and Broken Spindles.
The eclectic sounds of Saddle Creek 's disparate सदस्य bands is somewhat समझाया by उनके इतिहास ; a number of the original members of the label attended grade school together.
A `` sister label '', of sorts, to काठी क्रीक is टोली प्रेम, प्रारंभ by Conor Oberst in 2004.
The label opened arms to their first bands not based in Omaha in 2001 साथ रिलीज by अभी it 's ओवरहेड और sorry परिचय ड्रेसडेन.
Other non-Nebraskan artists followed, including Los Angeles 's Rilo Kiley, Eric Bachmann ( formerly leader of Archers of Loaf and Crooked Fingers from North Carolina ), Georgie जेम्स ( वॉशिंगटन d.C. ), दो gallants ( सैन फ्रांसिस्को ), और सबसे recently टोकियो पुलिस क्लबों ( टोरंटो ).
In 2005, खर्च an संध्या साथ काठी क्रीक, a documentary detailing the first ten years of the record label 's history, was released.
The DVD features extensive interviews with the Saddle Creek bands, archival फुटेज, और विरल सजीव प्रदर्शन.
On June 8, 2007, the लेबल खोली उनके अपना म्यूज़िक स्थान नामित slowdown ( बाद the group Slowdown Virginia ), located in downtown Omaha, Nebraska.
The following is a सूची of एपीसोड for the television show Full House.
In total, there were 192 episodes filmed for the show over the course of its आठ सीज़न, इससे 1987 to 1995.
Full House is a situation comedy which क्रॉनिकल्स a विधवा पिता 's struggles of raising his three young daughters and the lives that they have touched.
The patriarch of the family, Danny ( bob saget ), आमंत्रण उसके brother-in-law जेसी ( जॉन stamos ) and his best friend Joey ( Dave Coulier ), to help raise his children ( Candace Cameron, Jodie Sweetin, and Mary Kate/Ashley Olsen ), after his wife was killed during an automobile accident involving a drunk driver.
After episodes 88 and 89, Jesse marries Becky ( Lori loughlin ), और वे मूव into the attic.
Then, after episodes 104 and 105, बेकी और जेसी have जुड़वा लड़कों named Nicky and Alex ( Daniel and Kevin Renteria/Blake and Dylan Tuomy-Wilhoit ).
The series ends with episode 192, `` Michelle Rides Again Part 2 '', जब मिशेल loses उसके मेमोरी और the परिवार कोशिशें to restore it.
Notice of स्टैम्प अधिनियम of 1765 in Newspaper
American newspapers reacted to the स्टैम्प अधिनियम साथ गुस्सा और पूर्वानुमान of the demise of journalism.
The Stamp Act 1765 ( short title Duties in American Colonies Act 1765 ; 5 जार्ज iii, c. 12 ) imposed a सीधा कर by the अंग्रेजों पार्लियामेंट specifically on the colonies of अंग्रेजों अमेरिका, और it जरूरी that many printed materials in the colonies be produced on stamped paper produced in London, carrying an embossed revenue stamp.
These printed materials were legal documents, magazines, newspapers and many other types of paper प्रयुक्त throughout the colonies.
Like previous taxes, the stamp tax had to be सशुल्क in मान्य अंग्रेजों currency, not in colonial paper money.
The purpose of the कर थी to सहायता अदा लिये सैनिकों stationed in उत्तर अमेरिका after the British victory in the Seven Years ' War.
The British government felt that the colonies were the primary beneficiaries of इस सैन्य उपस्थिति, और चाहिए अदा at तनिक a portion of the expense.
The Stamp Act met ग्रेट प्रतिरोध in the colonies.
The colonies भेजा no प्रतिनिधि to पार्लियामेंट, and therefore had no influence over what taxes were raised, how they were levied, or how they would be spent.
Many colonists considered it a violation of उनके अधिकारों as अंग्रेजो to be taxed बगैर उनके सहमति —consent that only the colonial legislatures could grant.
Colonial सभाओं भेजा याचिकाएं और विरोध.
The Stamp Act Congress held in New York City, reflecting the first significant joint colonial response to कोई अंग्रेजों माप, भी petitioned पार्लियामेंट और the किंग.
Local protest groups, led by colonial merchants and landowners, established connections through correspondence that created a loose गठबन्धन कि विस्तारित इससे नई इंग्लैण्ड to Georgia.
Protests and demonstrations initiated by the Sons of स्वतंत्रता प्रायः turned हिंसक और destructive as the masses became involved.
Very soon all stamp tax distributors were intimidated into resigning their commissions, and the कर थी never effectively एकत्रित.
Opposition to the Stamp Act was नहीं सीमित to the colonies.
British merchants and निर्माताओं, जिनकी निर्यात to the colonies were threatened by colonial economic problems exacerbated by the tax, also pressured Parliament.
The Act थी repealed on कूच 18, 1766 as a पदार्थ of expedience, but Parliament affirmed its power to legislate for the colonies “in all cases whatsoever” by also passing the Declaratory Act.
There followed a series of new taxes and regulations, likewise opposed by the colonists.
The episode played a major role in defining the grievances और enabling the व्यवस्थित औपनिवेशिक प्रतिरोध कि led to the अमरीकी Revolution in 1775.
