PT boats were a variety of torpedo-armed तेज़ आक्रमण शिल्प प्रयुक्त by the United States Navy in World War II to attack larger surface ships.
`` pt '' is the US hull classification symbol for `` Patrol Torpedo ''.
The PT boat squadrons यहूद nicknamed `` the मच्छर fleet ''.
The Japanese पुकारा उन्हें `` Devil Boats ''.
The original pre– World War I torpedo नौकाएँ यहूद designed साथ `` displacement '' hulls.
They displaced up to 300 टन और the top speed was.
the pt नौकाएँ प्रयुक्त in संसार युद्ध ii यहूद निर्मित using the planing -type hull form developed for racing boats.
They were much smaller ( 30–75 tons ) and तेज़ ( 35–40 knots ).
Both types were designed to स्ट्राइक at larger warships साथ torpedoes, using अपेक्षाकृत high speed to get close, and small size to avoid being spotted and hit by gunfire.
They were much कम महंगी than विशाल warships.
PT boats यहूद much तेज़, छोटी, और सस्ता than conventional ( displacement hull ) vessels.
During World War II, American PT boats engaged enemy destroyers और numerous अन्य सतह शिल्प, ranging इससे छोटी नौकाएँ to विशाल supply ships.
PT boats also operated as gunboats विरूद्ध दुश्मन छोटी शिल्प, ऐसे as कराया barges used by the Japanese forces for inter-island transport.
Good Friday is a religious अवकाश observed primarily by ईसाइयों commemorating the crucifixion of Jesus Christ and his death at Calvary.
The holiday is observed during Holy Week as part of the paschal triduum on the शुक्रवार preceding ईस्टर संडे, and may coincide with the Jewish observance of Passover.
It is also known as Holy Friday, Great Friday, Black Friday, or Easter Friday, हालांकि the latter properly refers to the शुक्रवार in ईस्टर सप्ताह.
Based on the details of the Canonical gospels, the Crucifixion of Jesus थी सबसे संभावित to have महरूम on a शुक्रवार ( the दिन पहले the sabbath ) ( ).
The estimated year of the Crucifixion is AD 33, by two different groups, and originally as ad 34 by इसहाक़ न्यूटन via the differences between the Biblical and Julian calendars and the crescent of the moon.
A third method, using a completely different astronomical approach based on a lunar Crucifixion darkness and eclipse model ( सतत साथ apostle पीटर 's सन्दर्भ to a `` चंद्रमा of रक्त '' in Acts 2:20 ), points to Friday, 3 April AD 33.
The Great Basin is the largest क्षेत्रफल of endorheic watersheds in North America.
It is noted for both its arid conditions and its Basin and range topography कि varies इससे the उत्तर अमरीकी कम पाइंट at badwater जलाशय to the उच्चतम point of the contiguous United States, less than away at the summit of Mount Whitney.
The प्रदेश spans अनेक physiographic divisions, biomes / ecoregions, and deserts.
Raster may refer to:
Raster graphics, graphical तकनीकों using arrays of पिक्सेल मान
Raster graphics एडिटर, a computer program
Raster scan, the pattern of चित्र readout, हस्तांतरण, भंडार, and reconstruction in television and computer images
Rasterisation, or rasterization, परिवर्तन of a वेक्टर चित्र to a raster image
Raster image processor, or RIP, a component of a मुद्रण प्रणाली कि performs rasterisation
Raster interrupt, a computer इन्टरनेट सिग्नल
Raster to vector, an चित्र परिवर्तन process
Raster बार, an प्रभाव used in computer demos
raster-noton, a record label
Rastrum, a device used in मध्यकालीन म्यूज़िक पांडुलिपियों to draw staff lines
Raster दस्तावेज़ ऑब्जेक्ट, a file format
Beowulf ( ; Old English : ) is a legendary geatish नायिका और बाद turned किंग in the एपिक कविता नामित बाद उसे, एक of the oldest surviving pieces of literature in the English language.
The attack on Pearl Harbor ( called Hawaii Operation or Operation AI by the Japanese Imperial General Headquarters ( Operation Z in planning ) and the Battle of Pearl Harbor ) was a surprise सैन्य स्ट्राइक conducted by the इम्पीरियल जापानी नेवी विरूद्ध the संयुक्त राज्य नवल आधार at पर्ल हार्बर, हवाई, on the morning of December 7, 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ).
From the standpoint of the defenders, the attack commenced at 7:48 a.m. Hawaiian Time.
The attack was intended as a preventive action in order to keep the U.S. Pacific Fleet from interfering with military actions the Empire of Japan was planning in Southeast Asia against overseas territories of the संयुक्त किंगडम, the नीदरलैंड्स, और the संयुक्त राज्य.
The base was attacked by 353 Japanese fighters, बमवर्षक और torpedo planes in दो लहरें, शुभारम्भ इससे छह वायुयान carriers.
All eight U.S. Navy battleships were क्षतिग्रस्त, साथ चार being sunk.
Two of these यहूद बाद उठाया, और साथ the बाकी चार repaired, six battleships returned to service later in the war.
The Japanese also sank or damaged three cruisers, तीन destroyers, an anti-aircraft training ship, and one minelayer.
188 u.S. वायुयान यहूद नष्ट ; 2,402 Americans were killed and 1,282 wounded.
Important base installations such as the power station, shipyard, maintenance, and fuel and torpedo भंडार सुविधाएं, as खूब as the पनडुब्बी पियर और मुख्यालय building ( also home of the intelligence section ) were not attacked.
जापानी नुकसान यहूद लाइट : 29 वायुयान और five midget submarines lost, and 65 servicemen killed or wounded.
One Japanese sailor थी captured.
The attack came as a profound शॉक to the अमरीकी लोगों और led सीधे to the American entry into World War II in both the Pacific and European theaters.
the following दिन ( दिसम्बर 8 ), the United States declared war on Japan.
Domestic support for non-interventionism, जिससे था महरूम दमदार, disappeared.
Clandestine support of Britain ( for example the neutrality पैट्रोल ) थी replaced by active alliance.
Subsequent operations by the U.S. prompted जर्मनी और इटली to घोषित युद्ध on the U.S. on December 11, which was reciprocated by the U.S. the same day.
There were numerous historical precedents लिये unannounced सैन्य action by Japan.
However, the lack of any formal warning, particularly while negotiations यहूद स्टिल जाहिर जारी, led अध्यक्ष Franklin D. Roosevelt to proclaim December 7, 1941, `` a date which will live in infamy ``.
U.S. Route 85 ( US 85 ) is a north–south संयुक्त राज्य राजमार्ग कि रनों लिये in the Mountain - Northern Plains states of the United States.
The southern terminus of the route is at the संयुक्त states-mexico किनारा in el पासो, टेक्सास, connecting with Mexican Federal Highway 45.
The northern terminus is at the United States-Canada border in Fortuna, North Dakota, where the रूट continues उत्तर as saskatchewan राजमार्ग 35.
In both the United States and Saskatchewan, Canada the रूट is ज्ञात as the canam Highway.
Sections of US 85 are considered part of the थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट एक्सप्रेसवे.
The United States presidential election of 1968 थी the 46th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, held on Tuesday, November 5, 1968.
The Republican nominee, former Vice-President Richard Nixon, won the election over the लोकतांत्रिक nominee, incumbent Vice-President Hubert Humphrey.
Nixon ran on a campaign that promised to restore विधि और अनुक्रम to the स्वदेश 's शहरों, torn by riots and crime.
विश्लेषकों have argued the चुनाव of 1968 is a realigning चुनाव as it permanently disrupted the New Deal Coalition that had dominated presidential politics for 36 years.
Coming four years after Democrat Lyndon B. Johnson won in a historic landslide, the election saw the incumbent president forced out of the race and a Republican elected लिये the पहला समय in बारह सालो.
It was a wrenching national experience, conducted during a year of हिंसा कि शामिल the हत्या of सिविल अधिकारों नेता मार्टिन लूथर किंग, jr., और subsequent रेस दंगे आरपार the स्वदेश, the assasination of लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी रॉबर्ट F. कैनेडी, फैली opposition to the Vietnam War across university campuses, and violent confrontations between police and anti-war protesters at the 1968 Democratic National Convention as the Democratic party split again and again.
The election प्रदर्शित the strongest third party effort since 1912 by former Alabama Governor George Wallace, a Democrat.
Because Wallace 's अभियान opposed संघीय हस्तक्षेप in the दक्षिण to end school segregation, he carried the Deep South and ran well in ethnic industrial districts in the North.
This was the last चुनाव in जिससे New York had the most votes in the electoral college ( 43 votes ).
After the 1970 census, California gained the most electoral मत और रै remained the सबसे populous राज्य since then.
This is the latest election where a presidential ticket won without carrying the वाइस अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी 's घर state.
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System monitor application included with the Microsoft Windows NT family of operating प्रणालियों कि provides सीमित सूचना परिचय कंप्यूटर प्रदर्शन and running applications, processes and CPU usage, commit charge and memory information, network activity and statistics, logged-in users, and system services ( and as often is the case with software tools provided by Microsoft for Windows, 3rd party software is available which fills the requirements more thoroughly, e.g, `` Process Explorer '', `` Extended Task Manager '', `` Anvir Task Manager '', `` Process Hacker '', and `` System Explorer '' ).
The कार्य मैनेजर can भी be प्रयुक्त to नियत प्रक्रम प्राथमिकताएं, processor affinity, forcibly terminate processes, and shut down, restart, hibernate or log off from Windows.
Windows कार्य मैनेजर थी introduced with Windows NT 4.0.
Previous versions of खिड़कियाँ nt शामिल the कार्य सूची अनुप्रयोग, which had far fewer features.
The task सूची थी सक्षम of लिस्टिंग फिलहाल कार्यशील processes and killing them, or creating a new process.
In Windows XP only, a Shutdown menu is also present that allows access to Standby, Hibernate, Turn बंद, restart, log बंद और स्विच उपयोक्ता.
Earlier versions of Microsoft खिड़कियाँ ( microsoft Windows 3.x, Windows 95, Windows 98 ) had a program known as tasks to display the programs currently running.
This file was executed by running the taskman.exe file from the c : \खिड़कीs निर्देशिका.
Kanji ( ; ) are the adopted logographic Chinese characters ( hanzi ) that are प्रयुक्त in the आधुनिक जापानी लिखने system along with hiragana ( ひらがな, ), katakana ( カタカナ, ), Hindu-Arabic numerals, and the occasional use of the Latin alphabet.
The Japanese term kanji ( ) for the चाइनीज वर्ण वस्तुतः अर्थात् `` Han characters '' and is written using the same characters as the Chinese hanzi ( ).
John R Williams ( May 4, 1782 – October 20, 1854 ) was an American soldier, merchant, and politician जो is सबसे खूब ज्ञात लिये सेवारत as the पहला महापौर of डेट्रॉयट, मिशिगन.
In total, he served as डेट्रॉयट 's महापौर लिये पाँच other terms.
He भी थी a ब्रिगेडियर सामान्य in the United States Army during the Black Hawk War.
A simple dry magnetic पोर्टेबल कम्पास.
a स्मार्टफोन कि can be प्रयुक्त as a compass because of the magnetometer inside.
An iPhone that can be प्रयुक्त as a geological कम्पास क्युकी of the 3-axis teslameter and 3-axis accelerometer inside it
A सैन्य कम्पास कि was used during World War I.
A compass is a navigational यंत्र कि shows दिशानिर्देश in a फ़्रेम of सन्दर्भ that is stationary relative to the surface of the earth.
The frame of सन्दर्भ defines the चार कार्डिनल दिशानिर्देश ( or अंक ) – north, south, east, and west.
इंटरमीडिएट दिशानिर्देश are also defined.
Usually, a diagram called a कम्पास रोज़, जिससे shows the दिशानिर्देश ( साथ उनके names प्रायः abbreviated to initials ), is marked on the compass.
When the compass is in use, the rose is aligned साथ the रियल दिशानिर्देश in the फ़्रेम of सन्दर्भ, so, लिये उदाहरण, the `` N '' mark on the rose really points to the north.
अक्सर, in जोड to the रोज़ or sometimes instead of it, angle markings in degrees are shown on the compass.
North corresponds to zero degrees, and the कोण बढ़ाएँ clockwise, so ईस्ट is 90 degrees, south is 180, and west is 270.
These numbers allow the कम्पास to दिखाएँ azimuths or bearings, which are commonly stated in this notation.
The magnetic compass was first invented as a यंत्र लिये भविष्यवाणी as जल्दी as the Chinese Han Dynasty ( Since about 206 BC ).
The compass was used in Song Dynasty China by the military for navigational orienteering by 1040-1044, and was used for मेरीटाइम नेविगेशन by 1111 to 1117.
The use of a compass is recorded in Western Europe between 1187 and 1202, और in फारस in 1232.
The dry कम्पास थी invented in यूरोपीय around 1300.
This was supplanted in the early 20th century by the liquid-filled चुम्बकीय कम्पास.
The Inca Empire or Inka Empire ( quechua : tawantinsuyu ) थी the largest empire in pre-Columbian America.
The administrative, political and military बीच of the साम्राज्य थी स्तिथ in कुज़्को in modern-day Peru.
The Inca civilization arose from the हाइलैंड्स of पेरू sometime in the जल्दी 13th century.
From 1438 to 1533, the Incas used a variety of methods, from conquest to peaceful assimilation, to incorporate a large portion of पश्चिमी दक्षिण अमेरिका, केन्द्रित on the andean पहाड़ सीमाएँ, सहित, besides पेरू, विशाल भाग of आधुनिक इक्वाडोर, western and south central Bolivia, northwest Argentina, north and central Chile, and southern Colombia into a state comparable to the historical empires of Eurasia.
The official language of the साम्राज्य थी quechua, हालांकि hundreds of local languages and dialects of Quechua were spoken.
The Inca referred to उनके साम्राज्य as Tawantinsuyu which can be translated as The Four Regions or The Four United Provinces.
There were many local forms of worship, most of them concerning local sacred `` Huacas ``, but the इन्का नेतृत्व प्रोत्साहित the इबादत of inti —the सूर्य god—and imposed its sovereignty above other cults such as that of Pachamama.
The Incas considered their King, the Sapa इन्का, to be the `` चाइल्ड of the sun. ''
The kidneys are organs that serve several अनिवार्य नियामक भूमिकाएँ in सबसे पशु, सहित vertebrates and some invertebrates.
They are essential in the urinary system and also serve homeostatic functions such as the regulation of electrolytes, maintenance of acid–base balance, and regulation of blood pressure ( via maintaining नमक और जल संतुलन ).
They serve the body as a natural filter of the blood, and हटाएँ wastes जिससे हैं diverted to the urinary bladder.
In producing मूत्र, the गुर्दे excrete wastes ऐसे as urea and ammonium, and they are also responsible for the reabsorption of water, glucose, and amino acids.
The kidneys also produce hormones including calcitriol, erythropoietin, and the enzyme renin.
Located at the rear of the abdominal cavity in the retroperitoneum, the kidneys receive blood from the paired renal arteries, and नाली into the युग्म renal veins.
Each kidney excretes urine into a ureter, itself a युग्म ढांचा that empties into the urinary bladder.
Renal physiology is the study of kidney function, जबकि nephrology is the चिकित्सा specialty concerned with kidney diseases.
Diseases of the kidney are diverse, but individuals साथ गुर्दा बीमारी अक्सर प्रदर्शक characteristic clinical features.
Common clinical conditions involving the kidney include the nephritic and nephrotic syndromes, renal cysts, acute kidney injury, chronic गुर्दा बीमारी, urinary ट्रैक्ट संक्रमण, nephrolithiasis, और urinary tract obstruction.
Various cancers of the kidney exist ; the सबसे आम वयस्क renal कर्कट is renal cell carcinoma.
Cancers, cysts, and some other renal conditions can be managed साथ हटाना of the गुर्दा, or nephrectomy.
When renal function, measured by glomerular filtration रेट, is persistently poor, dialysis and kidney transplantation may be treatment options.
हालांकि वे हैं नहीं severely harmful, kidney stones can be painful and a nuisance.
The removal of kidney stones involves अल्ट्रासाउंड उपचार to ब्रेक up the पत्थरों into smaller pieces, which are then passed through the urinary tract.
One common symptom of kidney stones is a sharp pain in the medial/lateral खण्ड of the निम्नतर back.
Lockton Companies Inc. is the world 's largest privately held insurance brokerage कड़, providing insurance, risk management and employee benefits solutions.
In addition to its कान्सास नगर, मिसौरी मुख्यालय, lockton operates 60 locations in 17 countries.
Lockton is currently home to अधिक than 4,450 शरीक worldwide.
The company was founded by Jack Lockton in 1966 और रै चूंकि become the world’s 9th largest insurance brokerage firm.
lockton serves a चौड़ी सरणी of उद्योग साथ services that include risk management, casualty, surety, professional indemnity and more.
For 46 years, lockton posted असाधारण सशुल्क विकास, with global revenues reaching $ 915 million in fiscal 2012.
Lockton लाभ समूह : lockton’s कर्मचारी benefit’s टोली works closely with insurance carriers and administrators to create comprehensive and integrated benefits strategies for clients.
the lockton लाभ समूह provides सेवाएं including compliance, executive benefits, health and welfare, health risk solutions, retirement and more.
Lockton अपनापन : lockton अपनापन, an संबद्ध of lockton कंपनियाँ, meets the insurance needs of affinity groups, franchises, professional organizations, and associations of all sizes.
Lockton Affinity offers a किस्में of बीमे उत्पाद options and programs.
उत्पाद शामिल : सामान्य देयता, पेशेवर देयता, प्रॉपर्टी, Workers Compensation, Directors & Officers Liability, Commercial Auto, Specialty Coverage, Excess, Health Plans and more.
Lockton International : Lockton International operates offices in the UK and Ireland, as well as कार्यालयों throughout एशिया और लैटिन America.
In Europe, Lockton अंतरराष्ट्रीय is a संगी in eos risq, europe’s अग्रणी insurance broking and risk management consultancy.
EOS RISQ is an equity-based यूरोपीय partnership of major independent insurance brokers with over 3,500 employees based in more than 30 countries in Europe.
Lockton International provides specialized solutions for निजी लाइनों, sme’s and major multi-national clients.
White चॉकलेट is a चॉकलेट derivative.
it commonly consists of cocoa मक्खन, शुगर, मिल्क solids and salt, and is characterized by a pale yellow or ivory appearance.
The melting point of cocoa मक्खन, इसके प्राथमिक cocoa सेम घटक, is high enough to keep white chocolate solid at room temperature.
Donald Leon `` Don '' blankenship ( born कूच 14, 1950 ) थी अध्यक्ष और सीईओ of Massey Energy Co., the sixth largest coal company ( by 2008 production ) in the United States.
He served in those roles from November 30, 2000, जबतक दिसम्बर 31, 2010.
Blankenship is an active financial backer of the Republican party and participant in local and राज्य राजनीती, विशेषकर in उसके घर राज्य of West Virginia.
He has frequently spoken out publicly about politics, the पर्यावरण, संघ, और कोयले उत्पादन.
U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission filings दिखाएँ blankenship थी सशुल्क $ 17.8 million in 2009, the highest in the coal industry.
His 2009 अदा represents a $ 6.8 लाख उठाएँ over 2008 and almost double his compensation package in 2007.
Blankenship also received a deferred compensation पैकेज valued at $ 27.2 लाख in 2009.
On December 3, 2010, Blankenship announced that he was retiring as CEO at the समाप्त of the साल, और होता be succeeded by massey अध्यक्ष Baxter F. Phillips Jr.

Negligence ( Lat. negligentia, from neglegere, to neglect, literally `` not to pick up something '' ) is a failure to exercise the परवाह कि a reasonably दूरदर्शी व्यक्ति होता कसरत in like circumstances.
The area of tort law known as negligence involves नुक़सान caused by carelessness, not intentional harm.
According to Jay M. Feinman of the rutgers विश्वविद्यालयों School of Law ;
`` The core idea of negligence is that people चाहिए कसरत उचित परवाह जब वे अधिनियम by लेने खाता of the potential harm that they might foreseeably cause harm to other people. ''
`` those जो go personally or लाओ प्रॉपर्टी जहाँ वे जान कि वे or it may आइये into टक्कर with the persons or property of others have by law a duty cast upon them to use reasonable care and skill to avoid such a collision. ''
Fletcher v rylands ( [ 1866 ] lr 1 Ex 265 )
Through civil वाद, if an घायल व्यक्ति proves कि another व्यक्ति acted negligently to कारण उनके injury, they can recover damages to compensate for their harm.
Proving a case for negligence can potentially entitle the घायल अभियोक्ता to मुआवजे लिये नुक़सान to उनके देह, प्रॉपर्टी, दिमागी well-being, financial status, or intimate relationships.
However, because negligence cases are very fact-specific, this सामान्य परिभाषा करता नहीं fully बताइये the अवधारणा of जब the विधि होगा require one person to compensate another for losses caused by accidental injury.
Further, the law of negligence at common law is only एक पहलू of the विधि of liability.
Although resulting damages must be proven in order to recover compensation in a negligence action, the nature and extent of those क्षतिपूर्ति हैं नहीं the primary focus of negligence cases.
A melanocytic nevus ( also known as `` Nevocytic nevus '' ) is a type of lesion कि contains nevus कोशिकाएं ( a प्रकार of melanocyte ).
Some sources equate the पद mole साथ `` melanocytic nevus ''.
Other sources आरक्षित the पद `` mole '' लिये other purposes.
The majority of moles appear दौरान the पहला दो दशकों of a person’s life, while about one in every 100 babies is born with moles.
Acquired moles are a form of benign neoplasm, while जन्मजात औज़ार, or जन्मजात nevi, हैं माना a नाबालिग malformation or hamartoma और may be at a उच्चतर risk for melanoma.
A mole can be either subdermal ( अंतर्गत the स्किन ) or a pigmented growth on the skin, formed mostly of a type of cell known as a melanocyte.
The high concentration of the body’s pigmenting एजेंट, melanin, is responsible for their dark color.
Moles are a member of the family of स्किन lesions ज्ञात as nevi.
The comprehensive metabolic panel, or रासायनिक स्क्रीन, ( cmp ; cpt कोड 80053 ) is a फलक of 14 रक्त परीक्षण जिससे serves as an initial broad medical screening tool.
The CMP provides a rough जाँच of गुर्दा फलन, जिगर फलन, and electrolyte and fluid balance, but it is far from perfect.
Abnormal values from a CBC may be a result of false positives and thus the cbc may need to be दोहराया लिये a patient ( or replaced with a more specific test ).
The CMP is an expanded version of the basic metabolic panel ( BMP ), जिससे करता नहीं शामिल जिगर परीक्षण.
A CMP ( or BMP ) can be ordered as भाग of a दिनचर्या शारीरिक परिक्षा, or may be used to monitor a patient with a chronic disease, such as diabetes mellitus or hypertension.
Previous names for the panel of परीक्षण have महरूम chem 12, रसायन फलक, रसायन स्क्रीन, sma 12, sma 20 and SMAC ( Sequential Multiple Analysis - Computer ).
The परीक्षण हैं performed on मशीने आधारित on the AutoAnalyzer invented in 1957.
Natural gas extraction by देशों in घन मीटर per year.
Natural gas is a naturally occurring हाइड्रोकार्बन गैस मिश्रण consisting primarily of मिथेन, लकिन commonly including varying amounts of other hydrocarbons, carbon dioxide, nitrogen, and hydrogen sulfide.
Natural gas is an energy source often प्रयुक्त लिये हीटिंग, कुकिंग, and electricity generation.
It is also used as fuel for vehicles and as a chemical feedstock in the manufacture of plastics and other commercially महत्वपूर्ण सशुल्क रसायन.
Natural gas is मिला in गहन भूमिगत प्राकृतिक चट्टान formations or संबद्ध with other hydrocarbon reservoirs in coal beds and as methane clathrates.
Petroleum is also another संसाधन मिला in निकटता to and with natural gas.
Most natural gas was created over time by two mechanisms : biogenic और thermogenic.
Biogenic gas is created by methanogenic जीवों in marshes, bogs, landfills, and shallow sediments.
Deeper in the earth, at वृहद तापमान और pressure, thermogenic gas is created from buried organic material.
Before natural gas can be प्रयुक्त as a ईंधन, it जरूर undergo प्रसंस्करण to हटाएँ impurities, including water, to meet the specifications of marketable natural gas.
The by-products of प्रसंस्करण शामिल इथेन, प्रोपेन, butanes, pentanes, और उच्चतर आणविक वज़न hydrocarbons, hydrogen sulfide ( which may be converted into pure sulfur ), carbon dioxide, water vapor, and sometimes helium and nitrogen.
Natural gas is often informally referred to बस as गैस, विशेषकर when compared to other energy sources such as oil or coal.
This page is about the कल्पना Movers band.
For information about the tv दिखाएँ अभिनीत the बैंड, देखिए कल्पना Movers ( TV series ).
Imagination Movers is a band formed in New ऑरलियन्स, louisiana, in 2003.
The lineup includes समृद्ध कॉलिन्स, स्कॉट durbin, डेव Poche, and Scott `` Smitty '' Smith.
Members of the समूह यहूद longtime friends and neighbors.
The group started as a television/music concept which was pitched to local PBS affiliates in New Orleans.
WLAE-TV was the first to take an ब्याज in the समूह और बाद introduced उन्हें to बेथ Courtney, the President & Chief Executive Officer at Louisiana Public Broadcasting.
Soon after, LPB began airing one-minute videos उत्पादित by the कल्पना मूवर्स themselves.
The मूवर्स निर्मित a sizable क्षेत्रीय following by setting educational songs for kids to melodies and rhythms that adults appreciate as well.
They sold more than 100,000 नक़ल of उनके self-produced CDs and DVDs.
Their three indie CDs : `` Good Ideas, '' `` Calling All Movers, '' and `` Eight Feet '' along with उनके ग्रास जड़ें dvd `` हलचल it up '' have, संयुक्त, जीती चौदह नेशनल पुरस्कार, इससे ऐसे समूह as the National Association of Parenting Publications ( NAPPA ) and Parents ' Choice.
In early 2005, Disney took सूचना, और initiated negotiations to add the मूवर्स to the company 's roster.
These were interrupted in August when the flood protection designed and built by the Army corps of इंजीनियर्स to protect नई ऑरलियन्स failed.
The resulting floodwater claimed the बैंड 's दफ्तर, as खूब as the घरों of कॉलिन्स, durbin and Poche – but the deal was signed in the spring of 2006.
in 2008, वॉल्ट डिज़्नी रिकॉर्ड introduced the कल्पना मूवर्स ' music to the nation with the release of the Movers ' first nationally-released CD, `` Juice Box Heroes. ''
In September 2008, a 30-minute दिखाएँ featuring the समूह began airing on the डिज़्नी चैनल 's प्रीस्कूल प्रोग्रामिंग block known as Playhouse Disney, and currently airs on Playhouse Disney 's replacement, Disney Junior.
the मूवर्स लिखें और perform all the songs on their show.
Moreover, the Imagination Movers have received critical kudos for उनके सजीव कॉन्सर्ट प्रदर्शन.
In October 2009, the कल्पना मूवर्स started the `` Live from the Idea Warehouse Concert Tour 2009 ''.
Traveling from mid-October to mid-December 2009 their live प्रदर्शन शामिल लोट of उनके पसंदीदा गीतों और नाचना, as खूब as वीडियो दिखावे of Warehouse Mouse.
Beginning in early-February 2011 and wrapping up in late May 2011, the कल्पना मूवर्स प्रस्तुत उनके `` in a बिग गोदाम कॉन्सर्ट दौरे, '' playing अधिक than 100 shows in 50+ शहरों आरपार North America.
From March to October 2012, the Imagination Movers toured North America on their post-disney `` rock-o-matic '' दौरे.
The show maintained अनेक तत्व of the असली tv अवधारणा, ऐसे as an on-stage `` विचार आपात '' और अनेक सेट इससे उनके older catalogue ; however, with the departure of Wendy Calio back to her native Hawaii, the character `` Nina '', along with her musical numbers, is not present.
The tour promotes the कल्पना मूवर्स ' नई album/dvd release, `` Rock-O-Matic '', which features all new music from the band.
The एल्बम itself is उत्पादित independently of डिज़्नी और रै a notably अधिक वयस्क, contemporary rock-and-roll sound, though still very appropriate for children.
अनेक प्रदर्शन तिथियाँ यहूद स्थानांतरित to later in 2012 to benefit from the increased exposure of the Imagination Movers TV show now playing daily on Disney Junior.
The platypus ( ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic स्तनधारी endemic to पूर्वी Australia, including Tasmania.
Together with the four प्रजाति of एकिडना, it is एक of the पाँच extant प्रजाति of monotremes, the only mammals that lay eggs instead of giving birth.
It is the sole living representative of its family ( Ornithorhynchidae ) and genus ( ornithorhynchus ), हालांकि a क्रमांक of related species have been found in the fossil record.
The unusual appearance of इस egg-laying, बतख -billed, बीवर -tailed, otter -footed स्तनधारी baffled European naturalists when they first encountered it, with some considering it an elaborate fraud.
It is one of the few venomous mammals, the male platypus having a spur on the हिन्द पैर कि delivers a venom capable of causing severe pain to humans.
The unique features of the platypus make it an महत्वपूर्ण विषय in the पढ़ाई of विकासवादी जीवविज्ञान और a recognisable और iconic प्रतीक of Australia ; it has appeared as a mascot at national events and is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent coin.
The platypus is the एनिमल emblem of the राज्य of नई South Wales.
Until the जल्दी 20th सदी, it थी hunted for its fur, but it is now protected throughout its range.
Although captive breeding programmes have had only limited success और the platypus is vulnerable to the प्रभाव of pollution, it is not under any immediate threat.
The Chupacabra or Chupacabras (, from chupar `` to suck '' and cabra `` goat '', literally `` goat sucker '' ) is a legendary cryptid rumored to inhabit भाग of the americas.
It is associated more recently with sightings of an allegedly unknown animal in Puerto Rico ( जहाँ ये sightings यहूद पहला reported ), मैक्सिको, और the संयुक्त राज्य, विशेषकर in the latter 's Latin American communities.
The name comes from the एनिमल 's reported आदत of attacking and drinking the blood of livestock, especially goats.
Physical descriptions of the प्राणी vary.
Eyewitness sightings have महरूम claimed as जल्दी as 1995 in प्यूर्टो रीको, और have चूंकि महरूम reported as far north as Maine, and as far south as Chile, and even being spotted outside the Americas in countries like Russia and The Philippines.
It is supposedly a heavy creature, the size of a small bear, with a row of spines reaching इससे the गर्दन to the आधार of the tail.
Sighting reports of the Chupacabra have been disregarded as uncorroborated or lacking प्रमाण, जबकि सबसे रिपोर्ट्स in उत्तरी मैक्सिको और the दक्षिणी संयुक्त States have been verified as canids afflicted by mange.
Biologists and wildlife management officials view the chupacabra as a समकालीन legend.
The North American Free Trade अनुबंध ( nafta ) is an अनुबंध signed by Canada, Mexico, and the United States, creating a trilateral trade bloc in North America.
The agreement आए into फ़ोर्स on January 1, 1994.
It superseded the Canada–United राज्य फ़्री व्यापार अनुबंध between the U.S., Canada, and Mexico
NAFTA has two supplements : the North American Agreement on पर्यावरणीय सहयोग ( naaec ) और the North American Agreement on Labor Cooperation ( NAALC ).
Thermal comfort is the condition of mind that expresses satisfaction with the thermal environment and is assessed by subjective मूल्यांकन ( ansi / ashrae Standard 55 ).
Maintaining this standard of thermal comfort for occupants of buildings or other enclosures is one of the महत्वपूर्ण लक्ष्य of HVAC ( heating, ventilation, and air conditioning ) design engineers.
The Predicted Mean Vote ( pmv ) मॉडल स्टैंड among the सबसे पहचाना थर्मल सुकून models.
It was विकसित using सिद्धान्त of ऊष्मा संतुलन और प्रायोगिक data collected in a controlled climate chamber under steady state conditions.
Because the PMV model was derived from data collected in a controlled climate, it is not suitable for अनुप्रयोग in naturally हवादार स्पेसेस जिससे प्रायः have ऊँची स्तर of air movement.
This shortcoming motivated the development of a family of empirical statistical मॉडल of थर्मल सुकून in naturally हवादार स्पेसेस ज्ञात as अनुकूली मॉडल.
Adaptive models of thermal comfort consider occupants as dynamically interacting with their environment, and controlling their thermal सुकून by अर्थात् of कपडे or window-opening and closing.
This is in contrast to थर्मल सुकून in sealed इमारतें, in जिससे occupants अनुभव the environment passively.
Thermal comfort is affected by heat conduction, convection, विकिरण, और evaporative ऊष्मा loss.
Thermal comfort is maintained when the heat generated by human चयापचय is अनुमत to dissipate, यूँ maintaining थर्मल equilibrium with the surroundings.
It has been long recognized that the sensation of feeling hot or ठंडा is नहीं बस निर्भर on एयर तापमान अलोन.
Thermal comfort calculations according to ansi/ashrae मानक 55 can be freely performed with the CBE Thermal Comfort Tool for ASHRAE-55.
Durante degli एलीगियरी, बस referred to as दांते (, ; ; c. 1265–1321 ), was a major Italian poet of the Middle Ages.
His Divine Comedy, originally पुकारा ' और बाद पुकारा ' by boccaccio, is widely considered the greatest literary work composed in the Italian language and a masterpiece of world literature.
In Italy he is known as ' ( `` the परम् Poet '' ) or just '.
He, Petrarch और boccaccio हैं भी ज्ञात as `` the तीन स्रोतों '' or `` the three crowns ''.
Dante is भी पुकारा the `` पिता of the Italian language ''.
मुख्यालय ( कोबे, जापानी )
( ) is a tire and रबर कम्पनी आधारित in Japan.
it is भाग of the Sumitomo Group.
The company traces its origins to 1909, when the sumitomo समूह बना an निवेश in dunlop जापानी, the newly formed Japanese subsidiary of the British company Dunlop Rubber.
Over the years Sumitomo and Dunlop developed a close business relationship, and in 1963 the Sumitomo Group acquired control of dunlop जापानी और renamed it sumitomo रबर Industries Ltd.
In 1985, when Dunlop Rubber was taken over by btr पीएलसी, the कम्पनी acquired the ऑटोमोबाइल टायर एसेट of Dunlop, including the right to use the Dunlop brand on automobile tires.
The acquisition did not include the US and Australian व्यवसायों, जिससे यहूद separately स्वामित्व, लकिन in 1986 Sumitomo also acquired the Dunlop Tire Corporation of the US from its management.
In 1997, Sumitomo formed a joint venture with goodyear टायर और रबर कम्पनी, by जिससे goodyear और sumitomo सहमत to manufacture tires for each other 's markets, including Dunlop branded tires.
As part of the agreement, Goodyear acquired 75 % interests in Dunlop Tyres, the UK company which sumitomo था formed, और in dunlop टायर Corporation.
Goodyear and Sumitomo also made निवेश in each other.
Today, the company makes a चौड़ी दायरा of रबर based products, including automobile tires, golf balls and tennis balls.
Microsoft Visual Studio Express is a set of freeware integrated विकास environments ( आईडीई ) विकसित by microsoft कि are lightweight versions of the Microsoft Visual Studio product line.
Express Editions were conceived शुरूआत साथ विज़ुअल स्टुडियो 2005.
The idea of Express editions is to provide streamlined, easy-to-use और easy-to-learn ides लिये उपयोक्ता अन्य than पेशेवर software developers, such as hobbyists and students.
The Alps are one of the great mountain range systems of Europe stretching approximately across eight अल्पाइन देशों इससे ऑस्ट्रिया और स्लोवेनियाई in the ईस्ट, स्विट्ज़रलैंड, liechtenstein, जर्मनी, फ़्रांस to the west and Italy and Monaco to the south.
The kyu यहूद formed over सैंकड़ों of लाखो of years as the African and Eurasian tectonic plates collided.
Extreme shortening caused by the event resulted in marine sedimentary rocks rising by thrusting and फोल्डिंग into ऊँची पहाड़ चोटियों ऐसे as मोंट blanc और the matterhorn.
Mont Blanc spans the French–Italian किनारा, और at is the उच्चतम पहाड़ in the Alps.
The Alpine प्रदेश क्षेत्रफल contains अनेक चोटियों उच्चतर than, known as the `` four-thousanders ``.
The altitude and size of the range affects the climate in Europe ; in the mountains वर्षण स्तर vary greatly और climatic शर्तें consist of distinct zones.
Wildlife such as ibex live in the higher peaks to elevations of, और पौधे ऐसे as edelweiss grow in रॉकी क्षेत्रों in lower elevations as well as in higher elevations.
प्रमाण of इंसान habitation in the Alps goes back to the Paleolithic era.
A mummified man, संकल्पित to be 5,000 सालो बूढ़ा, थी खोजा on a glacier at the Austrian–Italian border in 1991.
By the 6th सदी bc, the Celtic La Tène culture was well established.
Hannibal may have crossed the Alps with a herd of हाथियों, और the romans था settlements in the region.
In 1800 Napoleon crossed one of the mountain passes with an फौज of 40,000.
The 18th and 19th सदियां देखी an influx of naturalists, लेखक, और कलाकारों, in particular the Romantics, followed by the golden age of alpinism as mountaineers began to ascend the peaks.
In World War II the Third Reich invaded the Alpine countries, with the exception of स्विट्ज़रलैंड और liechtenstein ; एडोल्फ हिटलर रखा a आधार of आपरेशन in the Bavarian Alps throughout the war.
The Alpine region has a दमदार सांस्कृतिक पहचान.
The traditional culture of farming, cheesemaking, और woodworking स्टिल exists in अल्पाइन गांवों, हालांकि the पर्यटक industry began to grow early in the 20th century and expanded greatly after World War II to become the dominant industry by the end of the century.
The Winter Olympic Games have महरूम hosted in the स्विस, फ्रेंच, इतालवी, Austrian and German Alps.
At present the region is घर to 14 लाख लोगों and has 120 million annual visitors.
Lois Patrice Griffin ( née Pewterschmidt ) is a अक्षर इससे the एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न series Family Guy.
वो is voiced by लेखक एलेक्स borstein और पहला appeared on टेलीविज़न, साथ with the rest of the family in the 15-minute short on December 20, 1998.
Lois was created और designed by श्रेणी creator Seth MacFarlane.
MacFarlane was asked to pitch a pilot to the Fox Broadcasting Company based on Larry and Steve, a short made by macfarlane जिससे प्रदर्शित a middle-aged अक्षर नामित Larry and an intellectual dog, Steve.
After the pilot was दिए the ग्रीन लाइट, the griffin परिवार appeared on the episode `` Death Has a Shadow ``.
लोइस is the माँ of the Griffin family.
With her husband Peter, she has था तीन children : मेग, Chris, and Stewie.
Lois is often portrayed as a stereotypical television mother, despite her admitting to होने a ड्रग उपयोक्ता, a recovering मेथ नशेड़ी kleptomaniac.
Lois रै भी था अनेक अफेयर्स, one of which allegedly resulted in the conception of Meg.
She has appeared in अन्य मीडिया relating to परिवार guy—including a video game, commercials and books—and inspired an entire line of merchandise.
Lois 's distinctive नई यॉर्क एक्सेंट originated इससे a अक्षर in a स्टेज दिखाएँ कि एलेक्स Borstein had performed in, which was largely inspired by a relative who grew up on Long Island, New York.
Family हस्तांतरण of बास्क भाषा ( बास्क as आरंभिक भाषा )
प्रतिशत of विद्यार्थी पंजीकृत in बास्क language schools ( 2000–2005 ).
Location of the basque-language प्रांतों भीतर Spain and France
Basque ( endonym :, ) is the ancestral language of the Basque people, who inhabit the Basque Country, a प्रदेश spanning an क्षेत्रफल in northeastern स्पेन और southwestern फ़्रांस.
It is spoken by 27 % of Basques in all territories ( 714,136 out of 2,648,998 ).
Of these, 663,035 सजीव in the स्पेनी भाग of the बास्क country and the remaining 51,100 live in the French part.
In academic discussions of the distribution of Basque in Spain and France, it is customary to refer to three ancient provinces in फ़्रांस और चार स्पेनी provinces.
Native speakers are concentrated in a contiguous area including parts of the Spanish autonomous समुदायों of the बास्क देश और नावारा और in the पश्चिमी half of the French département of Pyrénées-Atlantiques.
The Basque Autonomous Community is an administrative entity within the binational ethnographic बास्क देश incorporating the परंपरागत स्पेनी प्रांतों of biscay, Gipuzkoa, and Álava, which retain their existence as politico-administrative divisions.
These provinces and many areas of Navarre are heavily आबादी by जातीय basques, लकिन बास्क थी, at तनिक जबतक the 1990s, नहीं बोला as a देशी भाषा in सबसे of álava, पश्चिमी भाग of biscay और सेंट्रल and southern areas of Navarre, either because it had been replaced by Spanish along the centuries, in some areas, or because it had never been spoken there, in other areas.
In southwestern France, the ancient Basque-populated प्रांतों यहूद labourd, निम्नतर Navarre, and Soule.
They and other regions were consolidated into a सिंगल département in 1790 under the name Basses-Pyrénées, a name which persisted until 1970.
A standardized रूप of the बास्क भाषा, called Euskara Batua, was developed by the Basque Language Academy in the late 1960s.
Euskara Batua was created so that Basque language could be used—and easily understood by all Basque speakers—in formal situations ( शिक्षा, द्रव्यमान मीडिया, साहित्य ), और इस is इसके प्रमुख use today.
The role of this standard Basque language depends on the linguistic शैक्षणिक मॉडल of प्रत्येक प्रदेश और प्रत्येक स्कूल.
In most areas of the Spanish Basque देश, the शैक्षणिक मॉडल d, जहाँ सब विषय हैं सिखाया in बास्क, मगर `` स्पेनी भाषा and literature '' ( which is taught in Spanish ) is now the predominant model.
In France, the Basque language school Seaska and the association for a bilingual ( Basque and French ) schooling Ikasbi meet a wide range of Basque language educational needs up to the छठे रूप, जबकि प्रायः struggling to surmount financial and administrative constraints.
Apart from this standardized version, there are five main Basque dialects : Bizkaian, Gipuzkoan, and Upper Navarrese in स्पेन, और navarrese–lapurdian and Zuberoan ( in France ).
Although they take their names इससे the उल्लेखित ऐतिहासिक प्रांतों, the dialect boundaries are not congruent with province boundaries.
The President, Directors and Company, of the Bank of the United राज्य, commonly ज्ञात as the पहला बैंको of the संयुक्त राज्य, was a central bank, chartered for a term of twenty years, by the United States Congress on February 25, 1791.
Establishment of the Bank was included in a three-part expansion of federal fiscal and monetary power ( along with a federal mint and excise कर ) championed by सिकंदर हैमिल्टन, पहला सचिव of the Treasury.
Hamilton believed a सेंट्रल बैंको थी जरुरी to stabilize और improve the स्वदेश 's क्रेडिट, and to improve handling of the financial business of the United States government under the newly enacted Constitution.
Officially proposed to the first session of the पहला कॉंग्रेस in 1790, हैमिल्टन 's Bank faced widespread resistance from opponents of increased federal power.
Secretary of State Thomas Jefferson and जेम्स मैडिसन led the विपक्ष, जिससे claimed कि the बैंको थी असंवैधानिक, and that it benefited merchants and investors at the expense of the majority of the population.
The First Bank building is now a National Historic लैंडमार्क स्तिथ in फिलाडेल्फिया, पेन्सिलवेनिया भीतर स्वतंत्रता National Historical Park.
James Wesley Marsters ( born August 20, 1962 ) is an American कर्ता और संगीतकार.
Marsters first came to the ध्यान of the सामान्य पब्लिक playing the लोकप्रिय अक्षर स्पाइक, a platinum-blond yobbish English vampire in the television series Buffy the Vampire Slayer and its spin-off series, Angel, from 1997 to 2004.
Since then, he has gone on to play अन्य विज्ञान fiction भूमिकाएँ, ऐसे as the एलियन supervillain brainiac on the सुपरमैन -inspired श्रेणी smallville, the omnisexual समय मुसाफ़िर Captain John Hart in British science-fiction show Torchwood and terrorist Barnabas Greeley in Sci fi 's Caprica.
Marsters appeared in a supporting भूमिका in the 2007 movie P.S.
I Love You and as the प्रमुख विपक्षी, piccolo, in the 2009 fantasy adventure film Dragonball Evolution.
He appeared as a recurring character in the पहला ऋतु of the पुनरुद्धार of Hawaii 5-0.
In molecular biology, human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) is a hormone produced by the निषेचित अंडा बाद धारणा.
Later during pregnancy it is made by the developing placenta, और बाद by the placental घटक syncytiotrophoblast.
Some cancerous tumors produce this hormone ; therefore, elevated स्तर measured जब the रोगी is not pregnant can lead to a cancer diagnosis.
However, it is not known whether this production is a contributing कारण or an प्रभाव of tumorigenesis.
The pituitary एनॉलॉग of hcg, ज्ञात as luteinizing हार्मोन ( LH ), is produced in the pituitary gland of males and females of all ages.
, the FDA has prohibited the sale of `` होम्योपैथिक '' और over the काउंटर hcg आहार उत्पाद and declared them fraudulent and illegal.
Beyoncé Giselle Knowles-Carter, known by her stage name Beyoncé ( ; born September 4, 1981 ), is an अमरीकी सिंगर, songwriter, dancer, and actress.
Born and raised in Houston, टेक्सास, वो performed in गायन और नाचना प्रतियोगिताओं as a चाइल्ड पहले forming in 1990 a समूह with Kelly Rowland and LaTavia Roberson that was eventually named Destiny 's Child.
Once signed to कोलंबिया रिकॉर्ड, the लड़कियों subsequently became one of the world 's best-selling girl groups of all time.
The group was plagued by internal conflict and legal turmoil and Knowles suffered इससे अवसाद कि lasted for a number of years.
During the group 's hiatus, Knowles released her debut solo album Dangerously in प्रेम ( 2003 ), जिससे अर्जित उसके पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार और रै बेची a कुल of 4.9 लाख नक़ल in the US alone.
It spawned Billboard number one singles `` Crazy in Love, '' considered by VH1 to be the `` महानतम सोंग of the 00 's, '' और `` baby Boy. ''
Following the disbandment of Destiny 's Child in 2005, Knowles 's second solo album B'Day ( 2006 ) contained the शीर्ष पाँच singles `` déjà Vu ``, `` Irreplaceable ``, and `` Beautiful Liar ``.
Her performance in Dreamgirls ( 2006 ) earned her दो सुनहरी ग्लोब nominations.
Knowles ' work playing etta जेम्स in कि फिल्मी प्रेरित her subsequent album I Am...
Sasha Fierce ( 2008 ) जिससे शाखित हिट्स `` if i यहूद a लड़के ``, `` Single Ladies ( Put a Ring on It ) ``, `` Halo ``, and `` Sweet Dreams ``.
The album also helped Knowles earn six Grammys in 2010, breaking the रिकार्ड लिये most Grammy Awards won by a female artist in one night.
Her चौथी एल्बम 4 ( 2011 ) deviated towards परंपरागत r & b और became her fourth consecutive number one album on the Billboard 200.
In जनवरी 2012, नॉलेस दिया birth to daughter Blue Ivy Carter, her first child with husband Jay-Z.
Knowles has sold over 13 million albums in the US and 118 million records worldwide ( as well as a further 50 लाख रिकॉर्ड साथ नियति 's चाइल्ड ), and is one of the best-selling music artists of all time.
The Recording Industry Association of America ( riaa ) पहचाना नॉलेस as the शीर्ष certified कलाकार of the 2000s.
In 2009, Billboard named her the शीर्ष रेडियो गीतों कलाकार of the दशक और क्रमित उसके the शीर्ष मादा कलाकार और the fourth Artist of the Decade.
Beyoncé Knowles is the most nominated स्त्री in ग्रैमी पुरस्कार इतिहास, receiving 17 पुरस्कार ; अन्य accolades शामिल 12 एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार, 7 Billboard Awards including a Millennium Award, and a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame as part of Destiny 's Child.
`` Angry All the Time '' is the title of a song written by ब्रूस robison और पहला अंकित on his 1998 album Wrapped.
It थी बाद covered by टिम McGraw with guest vocalist Faith Hill.
released in जुलाई 2001, McGraw 's version was the second single from McGraw 's Set This Circus Down album.
The song reached Number One on the बिलबोर्ड hot देश singles & ट्रैक्स ( अभी hot देश गीतों ) charts.
Dear John is a 2010 American romantic drama - war फिल्मी अभिनीत अमांडा seyfried और चेनिंग Tatum.
It was released theatrically in उत्तर अमेरिका on February 5, 2010.
The film was directed by Lasse hallström, और it is an अनुकूलन of निकोलस Sparks 's novel of the same name.
It follows the life of a soldier ( चेनिंग टैटम ) बाद he जलप्रपात in love with a young woman ( Amanda Seyfried ).
They decide to एक्सचेंज अक्षर to each other after he is deployed to the war.
The movie was filmed in 2009 in चार्ल्सटन, South Carolina.
Despite receiving ऋणात्मक समीक्षाएँ, the फिल्मी बना a दमदार बक्सा दफ्तर प्रदर्शन, knocking off Avatar after seven weekends in first place and grossing a total of $ 114,977,104 worldwide.
The film was released on may 25, 2010 on DVD and Blu-ray.

Santa Fe ( ; ( tewa : ogha po'oge, ) ) is the capital of the U.S. state of New Mexico.
It is the fourth-largest नगर in the राज्य and is the seat of.
Santa Fe ( meaning “holy faith” in स्पेनी ) था a जनसांख्यिकी of 67,947 in the 2010 census.
It is the principal city of a Metropolitan Statistical Area जिससे encompasses सब of सांता fe काउंटी और is part of the larger Albuquerque-Santa Fe-Las Vegas Combined Statistical Area.
The city’s full name when founded was La Villa Real de la Santa Fé de San फ्रांसिस्को de asís ( “the royal कस्बा of the पावन आस्था of st. फ्रांसिस of Assisi” ).
Pepsi ( stylized in lowercase as पेप्सी, formerly stylized in अपरकेस as PEPSI ) is a carbonated soft drink that is produced and manufactured by PepsiCo.
Created and developed in 1893 और introduced as ब्रैड 's पेय, it was renamed as Pepsi-Cola on August 28, 1898, then to Pepsi in 1961.

The Sons of Liberty was a group consisting of American patriots that originated in the pre-independence उत्तर अमरीकी अंग्रेजों colonies.
The group was formed to protect the rights of the colonists और to लो to the गलियों विरूद्ध the कर by the British government.
They are best known लिये undertaking the बोस्टन चाय पार्टी in 1773, जिससे led to the असहनीय अधिनियमों ( an तीव्र crackdown by the British government ), and a counter-mobilization by the Patriots.
Osaka किला
is a city in the Kansai region of Japan 's main island of Honshu, a designated city under the Local Autonomy Law, the capital city of Osaka Prefecture and also the largest भाग of the keihanshin metropolis, जिससे comprises तीन प्रमुख शहरों of जापानी, Kyoto, Osaka and Kobe.
Located at the mouth of the Yodo River on Osaka Bay, Osaka is Japan 's third largest नगर by जनसांख्यिकी बाद टोकियो ( special wards ) and Yokohama.
Keihanshin is the second largest metropolitan area in Japan by population and one of the largest metropolitan areas अत्यधिक क्रमित in the संसार, साथ nearly 19 लाख लोगों, और by जीडीपी the दूसरी largest क्षेत्रफल in Japan and the seventh largest area in the world.
Historically the वाणिज्यिक बीच of जापानी, ओसाका कृत्यों as एक of the command centers for the Japanese economy.
The ratio between daytime and night time जनसांख्यिकी is 141 %, the उच्चतम in जापानी, highlighting its status as an economic center.
Its nighttime population is 2.6 million, the third in the country, but in daytime the population surges to 3.7 लाख, दूसरी तभी बाद टोकियो ( combining the खास wards of टोकियो, जिससे is नहीं a single incorporated city, for statistical purposes ; see the Tokyo article for more information on the definition and makeup of Tokyo ).
Osaka used to be referred to as the in feudal ईदो काल क्युकी it थी the केन्द्र of व्यापार लिये राइस, बनाना the first modern futures exchange market in the world.
The Little Mermaid is a 1989 American animated musical fantasy film produced by Walt डिज़्नी विशेषता एनिमेशन and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures.
Based on the Danish fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen, The Little Mermaid tells the स्टोरी of a खूबसूरत मरमेड जो सपनो of बनने इंसान.
Written, directed, and produced by Ron Clements and John Musker, with म्यूज़िक by एलन menken और हावर्ड ashman, the फिल्मी सुविधाएँ the आवाज़ें jodi बेंसन, क्रिस्टोफर डेनियल barnes, पैट कैरल, सैमुएल E. राइट, Jason Marin, Kenneth Mars, Buddy Hacket, and Rene Auberjonois.
The 28th film in the Walt Disney Animated Classics श्रेणी, the छोटी मरमेड थी released to थिएटर on नवम्बर 14, 1989 to largely positive reviews, garnering $ 84 million at the box office during its initial release, and $ 211 million in total lifetime gross.
After the success of the 1988 Disney / Amblin film Who Framed Roger Rabbit, The Little Mermaid is given credit for breathing life वापस into the आर्ट of डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड विशेषता films बाद a स्ट्रिंग of नाजुक or वाणिज्यिक असफलताओं उत्पादित by डिज़्नी कि दिनाँक वापस to the early 1970s.
It also चिह्नित the प्रारंभ of the era ज्ञात as the Disney Renaissance.
A stage अनुकूलन of the फिल्मी साथ a किताब by डग राइट और अतिरिक्त songs by Alan Menken and new lyricist Glenn Slater opened in Denver in July 2007 and began performances on Broadway January 10, 2008.

Purple drank is a slang term for a recreational drug लोकप्रिय in the हिप हॉप जातियाँ in the दक्षिणी संयुक्त States, originating in Houston, Texas.
Its main ingredient is नुस्खा -strength खांसी syrup containing codeine and promethazine.
Cough syrup is typically mixed with संघटक ऐसे as sprite नरम पेय or पहाड़ ओस और pieces of Jolly Rancher candy.
The purplish hue of purple पिया आता इससे dyes in the cough syrup.
There are numerous slang terms for purple drank, including sizzurp, lean, syrup, drank, barre, जामुनी जेली, टेक्सास tea, and Tsikuni.
first/given, मध्य, और last/family/surname diagram with J. S. Bach as example.
J. S. Bach shared his given name with six immediate family members and many विस्तारित परिवार सदस्यों.
He shared his family नाम साथ सबसे परिवार members.
A given name, in Western contexts प्रायः referred to as a पहला नाम, is a निजी नाम कि specifies और differentiates between सदस्यों of a समूह of individuals, especially in a family, all of whose members usually share the same family name ( surname ).
A given name is purposefully दिए, प्रायः by a चाइल्ड 's अभिभावक at or near birth, in contrast to an inherited one such as a family name.
A given name is sometimes legally बदला through a name change.
Given names are often used in a परिचित और दोस्ताना manner in अनौपचारिक situations.
In more formal situations the surname is used बजाय, जबतक it is जरुरी to फर्क between लोगों साथ the same surname.
The मुहावरा `` on a first-name आधार '' ( or `` on first-name terms '' ) alludes to the familiarity of addressing another by a given name.
The western style of having both a family name ( surname ) और a दिए नाम is दूर इससे सार्वभौमिक.
In many countries it is आम लिये ordinary people to have only one name ( a mononym ).
Hydrochloric acid is a clear, colourless समाधान of हाइड्रोजन chloride ( H Cl ) in water.
It is a अत्यधिक क्षयकारी, दमदार खनिज एसिड with many industrial uses.
Hydrochloric acid is found naturally in gastric acid.
Historically called muriatic एसिड, और आत्माओं of नमक, हाइड्रोक्लोरिक एसिड थी उत्पादित from vitriol ( sulfuric acid ) and common salt.
It first appeared दौरान the पुनर्जागरण, and then it was used by chemists such as Glauber, Priestley and Davy in their scientific research.
With major production starting in the Industrial Revolution, hydrochloric acid is used in the chemical industry as a chemical reagent in the large-scale उत्पादन of विनाइल chloride लिये पीवीसी plastic, and MDI / TDI for polyurethane.
It has numerous smaller-scale applications, including household cleaning, production of gelatin and other खाना एडिटिव, descaling, और चमड़े प्रसंस्करण.
About 20 million टन of हाइड्रोक्लोरिक acid are produced annually.
Wheat ( Triticum spp. ) is a cereal grain, originally from the Levant region of the Near East and Ethiopian Highlands, लकिन अभी cultivated विश्वव्यापी.
In 2010, world production of wheat was 651 million tons, making it the third most-produced खाद्यान्न बाद मक्का ( 844 लाख टन ) और राइस ( 672 million tons ).
Wheat was the second most-produced cereal in 2009 ; world production in that year was 682 लाख टन, बाद मक्का ( 817 लाख टन ), and with rice as a close third ( 679 million tons ).
इस अनाज is grown on अधिक जमीन क्षेत्रफल than any other commercial food.
World trade in wheat is greater than लिये सब अन्य फसलों संयुक्त.
Globally, wheat is the leading source of सब्ज़ी प्रोटीन in इंसान खाना, having a उच्चतर प्रोटीन सामग्री than soybeans or the other major cereals, maize ( corn ) or rice.
In terms of total उत्पादन tonnages प्रयुक्त लिये खाना, it is फिलहाल दूसरी to rice as the main human food crop and ahead of maize, after allowing for maize 's more extensive use in animal feeds.
Wheat was a key factor enabling the emergence of city-based समाजों at the प्रारंभ of सभ्यता because it was one of the first crops that could be easily cultivated on a large scale, and had the additional advantage of yielding a harvest that provides long-term storage of food.
Wheat contributed to the emergence of city-states in the Fertile Crescent, including the babylonian और assyrian empires.
Wheat अनाज is a स्टेपल खाना प्रयुक्त to मेक आटा लिये leavened, चपटा और steamed breads, बिस्कुट, cookies, cakes, breakfast cereal, pasta, noodles, couscous and for fermentation to make beer, other alcoholic beverages, or biofuel.
गेहूं is planted to a सीमित extent as a forage crop for livestock, and its straw can be used as a construction material for roofing thatch.
The whole grain can be milled to leave बस the भ्रूणपोष लिये श्वेत flour.
The by-products of इस हैं चोकर and germ.
The whole grain is a concentrated source of vitamins, minerals, और प्रोटीन, जबकि the परिष्कृत grain is mostly starch.

To publish is to मेक सामग्री उपलब्धियाँ to the general public.
While specific use of the term may vary among देशों, it is प्रायः लागू to टेक्स्ट, बिंब, or अन्य audio-visual content on any traditional medium, including paper ( newspapers, magazines, catalogs, etc. ).
The शब्द प्रकाशन अर्थात् the अधिनियम of publishing, and also refers to any printed copies.
Melissa & Joey is an एबीसी परिवार असली टेलीविज़न श्रेणी अभिनीत Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.
it पहला aired on ABC Family on August 17, 2010.
The श्रेणी फ़ॉलो लोकल राजनेता mel बुर्के ( मेलिसा जोन हार्ट ) और जो longo ( Joey Lawrence ), whom Mel hires to look after her niece and nephew after a Ponzi scheme leaves him broke.
The series was renewed by ABC Family for a second season of fifteen episodes, which began airing on may 30, 2012 और ended on अगस्त 29, 2012.
Melissa & Joey ranks as cable TV 's # 1 telecast at 8 o'clock across निशाना ऑडियंस 18–34, 18–49 और 12–34 जनसांख्यिकी.
On August 17, 2012, ABC Family renewed Melissa & जॉय लिये a तीसरा ऋतु, नियत to premiere in spring 2013.
The Dharma wheel, often used to represent the प्रतिष्ठित eightfold Path
The Noble Eightfold Path (, ) is one of the प्रिंसिपल शिक्षाओं of the बुद्ध, जो वर्णित it as the रास्ता अग्रणी to the cessation of कष्ट ( dukkha ) and the achievement of self-awakening.
It is प्रयुक्त to develop इनसाइट into the true nature of phenomena ( or reality ) and to eradicate greed, hatred, and delusion.
the प्रतिष्ठित eightfold पाथ is the चौथी of the Buddha 's Four Noble Truths ; the first element of the Noble Eightfold Path is, in turn, an understanding of the Four Noble Truths.
It is also known as the मध्य पाथ or मध्य रास्ता.
All eight तत्व of the पाथ शुरू साथ the शब्द `` सही '', which translates the word samyañc ( in Sanskrit ) or sammā ( in Pāli ).
These denote completion, togetherness, and coherence, and can also suggest the होश of `` पूर्ण '' or `` आदर्श ''.
'Samma ' is also translated as `` wholesome '', `` हिकमत '' and `` skillful ''.
In बौद्ध प्रतीकवाद, the प्रतिष्ठित eightfold पाथ is प्रायः represented by means of the dharma wheel ( dharmachakra ), whose eight spokes represent the eight elements of the path.
The Grammy Award for Song of the साल is an सम्मान प्रस्तुत at the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, a ceremony that was established in 1958 and originally called the Gramophone Awards.
Awards in several categories are distributed annually by the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences of the United States to `` honor artistic उपलब्धि, तकनीकी proficiency और overall excellence in the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग, without regard to album sales or chart position. ''
Economics is the social विज्ञान कि analyzes the उत्पादन, distribution, and consumption of goods and services.
The term economics comes from the Ancient Greek ( ', `` management of a household, administration '' ) इससे ( ', `` हाउस '' ) + ( ', `` कस्टम '' or `` विधि '' ), hence `` rules of the house ( hold ) ''.
Political अर्थव्यवस्था थी the पहले नाम लिये the विषय, लकिन अर्थशास्त्रियों in the लेट 19th सदी सुझाया `` अर्थशास्त्र '' as a shorter पद लिये `` आर्थिक science '' that also avoided a narrow political-interest connotation and as similar in form to `` mathematics ``, `` ethics '', and so forth.
A focus of the subject is how economic agents behave or interact और कैसा economies कार्य.
Consistent with this, a primary textbook भेद is between microeconomics and macroeconomics.
Microeconomics examines the behavior of basic elements in the economy, including individual agents ( such as households और firms or as खरीदार और विक्रेता ) और बाज़ार, और उनके interactions.
Macroeconomics analyzes the संपूर्ण अर्थव्यवस्था और मुद्दे affecting it, सहित unemployment, inflation, economic growth, and monetary and fiscal policy.
Other broad distinctions include those between positive economics ( describing `` what is '' ) and normative economics ( advocating `` what ought to be '' ) ; between economic theory and applied economics ; between rational and behavioral economics ; and between mainstream economics ( more `` orthodox '' and dealing with the `` rationality-individualism-equilibrium नेक्सस '' ) और शास्त अर्थशास्त्र ( अधिक `` कट्टरपंथी '' और dealing साथ the `` institutions-history-social structure nexus '' ).
Economic analysis may be लागू throughout समाज, as in business, finance, health care, and government, but also to such diverse subjects as crime, education, the family, law, politics, religion, social institutions, war, and science.
At the turn of the 21st century, the expanding domain of अर्थशास्त्र in the सोशल sciences रै महरूम वर्णित as economic imperialism.
An increasing number of अर्थशास्त्रियों have पुकारा लिये increased जोर on environmental sustainability ; this area of research is known as Ecological economics.
This is a list of Schedule IV drugs under the नियंत्रित substances Act for the United States.
जरूरी निष्कर्षों लिये दवाएँ to be placed in this schedule:
The drug or other substance has a low potential लिये गाली सापेक्ष to the दवाएँ or other substances in schedule III.
The drug or other substance has a currently accepted medical use in treatment in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Abuse of the drug or other substance may lead to limited physical dependence or psychological dependence relative to the दवाएँ or अन्य substances in अनुसूची III.
The complete सूची of अनुसूची IV drugs are as follows.

US county household मध्य आय 2009.
Median US household आय, 2001-2011
Household आय is a माप commonly used by the United States government and private institutions.
Each household is measured by the आय of प्रत्येक निवासी over the age of 15.
Income includes wages and salaries, unemployment insurance, disability payments, चाइल्ड support भुगतान प्राप्त, नियमित rental रसीदें, as खूब as कोई निजी कारोबार, investment, or other kinds of income received routinely.
While inflation-adjusted ( `` रियल '' ) household आय था been increasing almost every year from 1945 to 1999, it has since been flat and even decreased recently.
U.S. मध्य household आय गिरी इससे $ 51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011.
Extreme poverty in the United States, meaning households living on less than $ 2 per day before सरकारी लाभ, doubled इससे 1996 to 1.5 million households in 2011, including 2.8 million children.
The residents of the household do not have to be related to the head of the household for their earnings to be माना भाग of the household 's आय.
As households tend to share a similar economic context, the उपयोग of household आय remains among the most widely accepted measures of income.
That the size of a household is not commonly taken into account in such measures may distort any analysis of fluctuations within or among the household आय श्रेणी, और may रेंडर सीधा comparisons between quintiles मुश्किल or भी नामुमकिन.
The lapse rate is defined as the rate of decrease with ऊँचाई लिये an वायुमंडलीय परिवर्तनीय.
The variable शामिल is तापमान unless specified otherwise.
The terminology arises इससे the शब्द lapse in the sense of a decrease or decline.
While most often applied to Earth 's atmosphere the concept can be विस्तारित to कोई gravitationally supported ball of gas.
Blue पहाड़ राज्य is an अमरीकी comedy series that premiered on Spike on January 11, 2010.
The series producers include Chris Romano and Eric falconer, और it is उत्पादित by lionsgate Television.
The series is about a fictional university, ब्लू पहाड़ राज्य, और इसके फ़ुटबॉल टोली, `` the Mountain Goats. ''
It portrays certain aspects of American university life, including football, sex, binge पीने, दवाएँ, जंगली पार्टी, and hazing.
In February 2012, it थी reported कि ब्लू पहाड़ राज्य would not be renewed for a fourth season.
In March 2013, Ed Marinaro stated कि he is working on a ब्लू Mountain State film.
Apple Inc., formerly Apple कंप्यूटर, inc., is an अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय निगम headquartered in cupertino, California that designs, develops, and sells consumer electronics, computer software and personal computers.
Its best-known hardware products are the Mac line of कंप्यूटर, the ipod म्यूज़िक खिलाड़ी, the iphone स्मार्टफोन, and the iPad tablet computer.
Its software includes the OS X and आईओएस ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों, the itunes मीडिया ब्राउजर, the Safari web browser, and the iLife and iWork creativity and production suites.
The company was founded on April 1, 1976, और incorporated as ठहराना कंप्यूटर, Inc. on January 3, 1977.
The word `` Computer '' was removed from its name on जनवरी 9, 2007, reflecting इसके shifted फ़ोकस towards उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स बाद the परिचय of the iPhone.
Apple is the world 's second-largest information technology company by revenue after Samsung Electronics, and the world 's third-largest मोबाईल फोन मेकर बाद samsung और Nokia.
Fortune magazine named Apple the most admired company in the United States in 2008, और in the संसार इससे 2008 to 2012.
However, the company has received criticism for its contractors ' मजदूर practices, और लिये ठहराना 's अपना पर्यावरणीय और कारोबार practices.
, ठहराना maintains 394 खुदरा स्टोर्स in चौदह countries as well as the online Apple Store and iTunes Store.
It is the second-largest publicly traded निगम in the संसार by मार्केट capitalization, with an estimated value of US $ 414 billion as of January 2013.
, the company had 72,800 permanent full-time कर्मचारी और 3,300 अस्थाई full-time employees worldwide.
Its worldwide annual आय in 2012 totalled $ 156 billion.
Section 8 आवास in the South Bronx
Section 8 of the Housing अधिनियम of 1937 ( ), प्रायः बस ज्ञात as खण्ड 8, as repeatedly amended, authorizes the payment of rental housing assistance to private landlords on behalf of approximately 3.1 million low-income households.
It operates through several programs, the largest of which, the Housing Choice वाउचर कार्यक्रम, pays a विशाल portion of the rents और उपयोगिताएँ of परिचय 2.1 लाख households.
The US Department of आवास और शहरी विकास manages the Section 8 programs.
The Housing Choice Voucher Program provides `` tenant-based '' rental सहायता, so a किरायेदार can मूव इससे एक ईकाई of at तनिक न्यूनतम housing quality to another.
It also allows individuals to apply their monthly voucher towards the purchase of a home, with over $ 17 billion going towards such purchases each year ( from ncsha.org analysis ).
The maximum allowed voucher is $ 2200 a माह.
Section 8 also authorizes a variety of `` project-based '' rental assistance programs, under which the owner reserves some or all of the units in a building for low-income tenants, in return for a Federal government guarantee to make up the अंतर between the किरायेदार 's योगदान और the किराया लिये 1 cent in the मालिक 's अनुबंध साथ the सरकारी.
A tenant who leaves a subsidized प्रोजेक्ट होगा खोना अभिगम to the project-based subsidy.
The United States Department of Housing and Urban विकास और संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of दिग्गजों अफेयर्स have a खास खण्ड 8 कार्यक्रम पुकारा vash ( Veterans Affairs Supportive Housing ), or HUD-VASH, which gives out a certain number of Section 8 vouchers to eligible homeless and otherwise vulnerable US armed forces veterans.
Restaurants categorized by प्रकार और सूचना परिचय these different types.
